tlaminako tonati wan noponi kiitato aw in ye yuhki in on tlenamakak niman ye ik teixpan on motlalia se tlakatl itech mokawa. ¿in chalchiwitl, teokwitlatl, mach ah ka on yas? aw in oyuh in yoka walmotlali tonatiw ilwikatitech, niman ik pew in wel ye tlakosawia, san iwiantsin ye tlayowatiw inik ye poliwtiw tonatiw, inik wel ixpan || 147 ye yatiw inik wel ixpan ye onmomana metstli, wel kasitimoman inik yawaltik tonatiw inik kixtsakwili, i san iwiantsin wel onpoliwiko tonatiw. entonses yoya imono onkán yokinsakwiliton arieros para kinkixtili. in onkan mowikatsa iwan in siudad kabildo tlaka iwan oidores audiensia real tlakan, kinepantlawitiake in tlahtokakorona real kinapalotia se tlakatl koxín ipan mantia, san ye inmamanian in mantiake. kwaltia aw inin ka wel yewatl kimosenteotia || 31r in wei tlakatekolotl, ma senka kinmikneli ma kinpalewi ma kinmakixti, inik amo mochtin kinmiktiske inik amo kinsenpopoloske, ma kana oksekkan kinwika ma kana kwalkan yekkan kintlalmaka, in onkan senka kixkawiske inik kitlaekoltiske. iwan okse kavalero itoka don fransisko de kardona komendador de montesa, no chichiltik krus san ixkich nepaniwki in ikomienda kitlalia, no umpa wala in españa, inin nikan inhwes mochiwako in obraheros. kalakiyayah milnakastsin wei tlatlaimetl katka panowayan chane, inin okichiwtia se ipiltsin itoka iknoixtsin. ﻿inin tlakatl semi tlatkiwa. ne tokone ya ma mokawati ipan in motlahtokatlali in tsiwtekatl in kolwakan tlahtowani. in monamaka kwesalan. sayoh se taman. amo ximotomintema, intla amo kwalyotika tiktlani. 139v xi kali xiwitl, 1269. kwali se kikwa, mah se kitewatsa itech komal. mochiwa ne kalikampa, texayakatitan, kuoujtaj, kahfentah wan amo kiteximaj, por in se kikwa itakka. ohkion nikitowa nikilwia ichpokato nikitaya nikontelwiani nokompadre san tóbyas ma sikiera ka'waki'. vi tochtli xiwitl, 1602 años. in nanakatl kwali mochipawa iwan moteteki, in ahmo wei in tlatetektli; in yepasohtli mokwihkwilia in iatlapalton iwan mochinin motlalia komalpa, in ahmo wel totonki, motlalilia in istatl ixkich in monekis iwan in chilkwitlaxkoli ahnoso chiltlaixtlapantli; motlapachoa ika sokikaxitl ixkichkaw in ye tlawikxitili. achiwki muchipa motlaxkaltlapikkwa. nikan ipan in in ya witse in mexiko tenochtitlan in kweskonpiaya in amakemekan kinonotsako in tlakatewktli in itskowatsin, in ikwak in ayemo tlahtowani ka san ok tlahtokapili i nikan mexiko; aw ka yewatl tlahtokati in witsiliwitl in teomeka in iwki itoka in, aw itlan tewktlahtowa in kwatlekowatl tlakochkalkati. se da donde se siembra, komo en las milpas. aw in yewatl in kowasakatsin ka oksenka piltsintli in ikwak, ayamo yewatl kichichiwke; san yewatl kichichiwke in siwapili in inantsin in kowasakatsin, itoka in siwapili tlakosiwatsin, kontlalilike in tewktsontli iwan in xiwitsoli iwan in ixkichtlamantli tlahtokayotl konmamakake in siwapili. ónkan wan yekimakan sikawastli yekimakak xohwastli yekimakan listón mochi. in oyuh omotlali intlatokaw kwakwawtsi, in okimopew chimalwaka. okito in testigo ka wel melaoak inik onokonan huramento inik onitlatolmelaw in ye ninemi tlaltikpak ye napoalxiwitl aw inik nikneltilia notlatol san oniktlatlawti in eskribano nopampa kitlalia notoka yoan nofirma ipampa amo nikmati nitlakwilos don gaspar de mendosa pedro daniel nixpan fransisko milan eskrivano. kaxtilyakanki san niman okistiwets in iwikpa mexikotenochtitlan; oya chalchiwkwekan kikalito tlakatl in yankwikan asik. kwaltia in chakaikwoukamoh wan istakkuoujkamoj. in siwatekipano okintlali nawi tlatekontin ipan ahkopechtli. ipan matlaktli omome tekpatl xiwitl, oyake mexikah tekpayokan. in tlatolmatinime, aw in intekiw in kimokwitlawia in kopaltemalistli, in tlenamakilistli, in witstli, in akxoyatl, in nekolistlili. tla niknamakaskia in kalí, ayokmo tlen nowaxka nikpiaskia. in oonewake motlalito akweko; kimopewito omotlalito teukalwiaka; onehoake soltepek; onewake unka motlalito tepotsotla; onewake omotlalito sitlaltepek; onehoake motlalito temaskalapa, unka namikoke makoke totoli totoltetl tlaoli, unkan iyokwitiloke. siempre xitechtaokxitili kwaltsin, in kilit. chilkwitlaxkoli aw iwan ya yepowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolomome xiwitl in ipan 1 tekpatl xiwitl, 1532 años, in omotlali in okwawtlahto in don pablo xochikentsin; ikwak axiwako mexiko ya yexiwtika inik ompa wilowaya teokulwakan. mochiwa kwoutah wan kajfentaj. tlakoapan a itemoya. 77. nopiltsine, ma ximewititie, at onkanin in kwelachitsinka, in semilwitsin in tikmochielitika in itetsin, in ikwawtsin, in itemotsin, in iehekatsin in totekwiyo. in ipan iatsin, itepetsin in tokommomatemilitinemi in chokistli, in ixayotsintli, in semilwitl, in se yowal. in aiwiyan, in ahisemele, in tiwalmewa, in tiwalisa; ahmo iwiyan, ahmo isemele, in kochistli in netekistli in tikmuchiwilia. in tepaltsinko, in tenawaktsinko, in san motsontlantsinko temi immokaksoltsin, immotopiltsin aw immowakaltsin, immotlamatsowaltsin, immowiktsin, immomekapaltsin, inik omitstenyoti, inik omitsmawissoti in totekwiyo. in tikwawtli, in toselotl; immolwil, immomasewal. in titiakaw, in titekwikaw. in xamitl, impololi, in kakaxtli, in topili, in wiktli, immekapali inik tikmopalewilia in atl, in tepetl, in petlatl, in ikpali, inik titlakaskaltia, inik titlakawapawa, inik wel tetloktsinko, tenawaktsinko timewititika. ma senka itlantsinko ximakilti immokakatsin, immotopiltsin, immowiktsin, immomekapaltsin. in ipan axkan domingo ik xviii mani metstli de hulio de 1593 años, ikwak walmowikake mokalakiko in sant hwan de la penitensia in siwapipiltin monhastin sankta klara ipilwantsitsin; san ok makwiltin in walmowikake, ye teotlak in mokalakiko, otsilin nawi ora. aw no onkan in in omotenew tisayokan onkan kichiwako kitlakatiliko in tlakilxochtsin tsompanko siwapili se ikonetsin okichtli okitokayotike wewe witsiliwitl, inin sa se mexika chichimeka in ithatsin mochiw. in nikan siudad mexiko tenochtitlan in ipan semilwitl hweves sempowali ommakwili in mestli de setiembre de 1586 años in newatl alkalde migwel de los angeles hustisia tiktokwitlawiya in ikatsinko su magestad audiensia. in xochiyowa agosto, ihwak in chikawaya, ta in por tiempo sah in onkak, amo nochipa. walewake omotlaliko apasko, motlalmomostike, ye yuh oxiwtia; unkan mik apantewktli, niman kontlalike sitlal, yexiwtike. ... in teokolwakan in inawak astlan in wewetke chichimeka in totolinpaneka in axkan ye intoka amakemeke; inik ompa wekawake ontsonxiwitl ipan kaxtolpowalxixiwitl ipan yepowalxiwitl inik niman ye walolinke inik walnenenke. viii tekpatl xiwitl, 1500 años. iwan ilwilok in testiko ke tikmati kwix ika onpa otlalchiwaya in toltekatl isiwaw katka kito in testigo san techtlapololtiya ka yakin oxiwitl in onpa owetsiko aw amo tikmati kenin onpa mokwentiya ka sa niman yuh nikmati in tlali in itech powi in atlixeliwki okaiwini nokomati. axkan ikse domingo kwaresma, in ik 24 mani metstli febrero de 1613 años, wel ipan ilwitsin sant matía ye teotlak, inik nikan mexiko onmopewalti inik ompa mowika la siudad de los ángeles kwitlaxkowapan in tlahtowani señor el lisensiado don pedro de otálora presidente in audiensia real mexiko, inik ompa mowika moteochiwtsinos inik teopixki klérigo mochiwtsinowa, iwan ika umpa ik moteochiwtsinos in epístola iwan evangelio iwan in missa ik kimochiwilis, san oppa ik kimoteochiwilis in ipan in se kwaresma in obispo don alonso de la mota i eskobar; yuh kiwalmonawatilia in sankto padre san eilwitl mochiwas, aw masiwi in iw katka in nawatili, ka ye kin ipan domíniga in passión tlamiko in ineteochiwalitsin inik missa kimochiwiliko. in monamaka ompa ne kwesalan. nikan ompewa in wewe mexika xiwtlapowalamatl, in kitlalitiake in ye wekaw onemiko wewetke chichimeka in topalankakolwan in tachkokolwan katka; inik xiwtlapowaya inik onemiko nikan tlaltikpak in ipaltsinko in tloke nawake totekwiyo hesuchristo, ka neli ka ipaltsinko. aw in kinkawtia in ipilwan makwiltin: in ikse itoka akolnawakatl tsakwalkatl, inin onkan kiwalatokatlali in tlakopan; in ikome itoka kwakwapitsawak, inin onkan kiwalatokatlali in tlatilolko; in ikyei itoka epkowatsin, inin ompa kontlahtokatlali in atlakwiwayan; in iknawi itoka maxtlatsin, inin ompa kontlahtokatlali in koyowakan; in ikmakwili ichpoch itoka ayawsiwatl, inin konmitlani in witsiliwitl in tlahtowani nikan tenochtitlan, yniqu is kichiwako in tlahtokapili chimalpopoka. iiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1340. ¡uan ne chichi xihwika!" aokmo wel kikwa in neli mach kinkwitlawiltia sa yuh ki nentlamati in inyolo sa ye kimatikate in immikis. tlen 49 tlanawatihkayotl. in weyi chikawalistli tlen sentlanawatiloyan moxeloa, tlen ika tekichiwas, ipan tlahtolchiwalistli, tekichiwalistli iwan tlahtolsenkawalistli. amo welis monechikoseh omeh noso eyih tlen inin chikawalismeh ipan se tlakayotl noso nechikolistli, iwan amo welis motlalis in tlahtolchiwalistli ipan se tlakatl, kena keman tlehtleya weyi tlanawatilmeh motemaktilis itechpa sentika tekichiwalistli, ken mointowa ipan 29 tlanawatihkayotl. ayokmo ipan seyok tlahtoli, san mokixtia ken moihtowa ipan ome tlahtoltlakwiloli tlen 131 tlawatikayotl, motemaktilis tekiwekayotl iwikpa welis mochiwas tlahtoltlachiwalistli. ye wi, ya motlakawani, xi witi, xi witi, ai ometeotl in teyokoyani, teskatlanextia. tlake tihchiwase nama. in toltekatl: tlamachtili, tolin, sentson, aman. in kwali toltekatl: moskaliani, moskalia, mihmati; moyolnonotsani, tlalnamikini. kito “tla xiwalaw, tla xikkaki san iwiantsin: xikito keskintin in otikinmikti teteo soldatosme”. kalakito isisna. aw oksekintin wewetke tlasopipiltin yuh kitotiwi yuh kimachiyotitiwi, ka yuh kikwilotiwi in imamoxtlakwilolpa, kilmach in ihkwak yaskia kwawnawak iwan michwakan kilmach ayemo tlalmasewaya ayemo kiketsaya in ixkich inkwaxoch in imomextin omotenewke tlahtoke in atonaltsin iwan kwawitsatsin. in moknin yonikontiak. onkak ome taman: chalwih tein nikan mochiwa wan tein kwoutah mochiwa. toh. kenin mochiwa aw in itsonnepilwas tlatlapalikpatl chichiltik, kostik, texotli, tliltik. istak iwitl in ik tlamalintikatka. in tlailii ye wehka mitiwits ompa toaltepepan yewatl in tepachnewktli in mochiwa yuhkin nikan mihtoa in anis iwan kanela tlatsikwewali motlalia ihtik in tilmapoxakton kwali tlatsawktli; inin makia ihtik in komitl ika makwili litro atl in kwakwalakas miek minuto. satepan motesi in patlawakchili iwan mokwakwachwia ipan atl in ye posontok iwan motlalilia pilonsilo; inin moneneloa ahso ika chikwei litro newktli; ma itstia iwan ye wel mis. in mila chichime innemilis in tlen itech innematilis xii tekpatl xiwitl 1243 años ipanin in onkan ahsiko mexika in tekpayokan onkan nawxiwtike yewatl walteyakana teskwekwexkatl kaw tlatohuiz3 aw in itawan mochiwtiwitse inik se itoka xiwkak inik ome itoka witsiliwitsin ok telpochtli in ihkwak in ayamoitoka tenantsin in iuki kitokaitiah por in uitsyoj. satepan, in ye onetemalok, in inamik kimama in mixiw-ki, ahmo kikawa in nehnemis, kimamahtiw ichan. kemmani-an, intla wehyi in siwatl, intla tomawak iwan yetik, kiayaxikipililpiayah (in mixiwki moteka nepantla in ayatl iwan inin monakasilpia), mokalakia in kwawpitsaktli iwan mokechpanoa. yuhki momama. in kan ahmikkowa in trigo riego moregaroa motepewa. yei akatl ik motlatokatlali witsiliwitsi tenochtitla. kemahkatsin. nikneki sente kalxeloli niktlakewis. tlatimonekitia ximopanolti ximotiliki. iwan in ipan in senka kiyaw, ik mochiw || 98r in tonakayotl. ximohtalwi, ¿aquin tlahtowa?. 83. aw intla otitlaelelaxiti ka ahmo tetlan, tenawak, tinemis, ka niman titotokos, tikixtilos; ik tikintochtilis, tikimmasatilis immosiwaw, immopilwan. akan mochan, akan mokal ihtik tikittas; vmpa onkisas in iknoyotl, in tktonew, in techichinats; akan monopal, akan monewk tikitstias. inda yuh tikchiwas, intla yuh tinemis, san monewiyan tikmottitis in tekoko, in tetonew, in techichinats; san monewiyan itlan timokalakis in tsotsomatli, immaxtlasoli; san monewiyan tikmokwilis in ahmo kwali, in ahmo yektli, in tlawelilokayotl, in teawilkixti, in tetlawelilokatili, in ahmo tetlakamachilistli, in tsonteyotl. amo kineki inik sesen klérigos ye kinmiwalisneki nowiyampa ipan arsobispado motlalitiwi, kontratisión ik ye kichiwa in frailes; ach ken tsonkisas in inneteilwil, tla ok yewatsin kimomachiltia in totekwiyo dios, ka ok ye nemi in tlahtoli. "xitlachiyati tlake onka". . aw in ihkwak tlanawatiaya moteoksomatsin in saso kampa kalakia pochteka ostomeka in teoknenemiske intla ompa impan owalmotsaok, intla onmikito in oakmo kiwel kakilia itlahtul moteoksomatsin, aw in inteyakankaw okatka in itoka witsilopochtli in weitlakatekolopixki itetlaekoltikaw, i wei tlakatekolotl tetsawteotl senka kitlakanotsaya kimottitiaya in witsilopochtli; inik satepan okimixpitlati in tetsawteotl inik sa itoka mochiw witsilopochtli. semi kwakwaltsin motah awilistika patlanih in yawalol kwameh iwan xochimeh. o iwin in i motlamaniltilia in intlatekpanpantsinko tlasoteopixke; ma yuh mochi tlakatl kimati ka yuh kinmottiliske intla kimonekiltitsinos itla itlanekilistsin totekwiyo dios ka walmowikaske, tikihtotiliske in nikan san antón mexiko nweva españa, aw itlakamo itlanekilistikatsinko mochiwas totekwiyo dios, ka amo wel walmowikaske. ik niman, ipan chikome tekpatl xiwitl oasike mexitin amalinalpan, in tlein itech powi askapotsalko itlahtokayotsin. in ihkwak in in ompa owalkiske wewetlapalan nonowalko in nonowalka teotlixka tlakochkalka tekpantlaka in ipan in omotenew se tekpatl xiwitl, 1272 años, ik niman owalnenenke in tsiwaktla nekwametla xiwalakatla kwilotla sakatla ixtlawakan tepetla atlawtla. axkan domingo ik 10 metstli oktubre de 1610 años, ikwak omonamikti in tlakatl don antonio valeriano telpochtli, okimonamikti in siwapili doña bárbara san iwayolkatsin, inin omotenewke ikkatotonwan in tlakatl don diego de alvarado wanitsin tlahtowani katka tenochtitlan. iiii akatl xiwitl, 1431. ipan in ikwak momikili in totlasotatsin frai alonso de molina sant fransisko teopixki totemachtikatsin katka. yei axoxtlantli anmowaxkawan aw inik senka wekawake inik ompa katka in astlan teokulwakan in chichimeka totolimpaneka, ontsonxiwitl ipan kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan yepowalxiwtike inik nimann ompa walolimke walewake inik owalnenenke. tlasohkamati wel miak. kanin kwali nikinkowas in painpepeyoktin ? testigo fransisko de luna namike itlaxilakaltiyan san martin ateskapan makok huramento ipaltsinko in totekuyo dios iwan in siwapili sankta maria iwan in imachiyo santa krus onka tlatlakoltilok inik melawak kitos in tlein tlatlanilos in tla melawak kito ikimotlaokolilis in dios in tlakamo miktlan kitsakuktias aw in yewatl yuh kito inik me [f.112v.] lawak kitos. aw no iwi in iskikan teopan monasterios in onkan moyetstikate teopixke frailes, || 165 wel iskikan no ipampatsinko tlatlatlawtilok in omotenewtsino teoyotika tlahtowani arsobispo; aw sanno iwi in iskikan teopan monasterios monhas tlatlatlawtilok, wel se semana in iskikan mixtlapowiltitikatka sanktíssimo sakramento sesemilwitl, inik amo momikilis, san kimochikawilis in totekwiyo dios. nikan ipan in in onkan walmikwanike tisayokan mexika, onkan sexiwtike. istatl, ixkich in monekis nehin hosé alkántara? yese in ihkwak ayahmo momikiliaya notahtsin onechmonochilioninopacho itloktsinko san kemmach omotlahtolti onechmolwili kan in okimotlatili ipan se itlalmiltsin in chikome komid kan okimoakili in tomin in okimonechikalwi in ipan miek xiwitl itlatekipanolistsin iwan yewatsin kimonekiltiaya ma newatl ika ninokwiltonos mah amo kimatoka talihkochin, aw in o ahsiko,kimilwi isiwawan: aw in kali ka wel imatika kiketstia in tatli iwan nantli ilamatsin aw in onkan tlatwa in axkan moteilwia in pedro masaken ka amo intlatowaya in tlatowa ihoan ines tiakapan san kelewia in mikakali in tlen okitlali in ilamatsin katka maria xoko inik monamakas kali ka wel tixpan in iw okitotia ihoan tiktekipanowaya inik omokokowaya ixkichin in itlatul in testigos ik okineltili okitlali in ifirma. pedro hernandes. testigo. migwel witstekpankatl ichan san sebastian sakatla omonamikti in iskich kawitl ye nemi ye epowalxiwitl ye onkastoli xiwitl o makok huramento inik otlatlakoltilok inik amo istlakatis. se kilo pelenkosnanakatl ya ahachika nimitsilwi. ipan tlakwalchiwaloyan tlanahnamiki iwan tlakaxitlpahapaka. onkán satepa okihto pus axan nehwa nihneki xinechmaka se sikawastli se no listón se xulwhastli wan se no espexo. nikan ipan in in kitlalkawike in imaltepew in tlalwakpaneka inik motekato in kwawximalpan; onkan oxiwtike, niman noseppa kalakke in atsakwaloyan in kwawnepantla. onkak kahfentah wan milaj. amo monamaka. si no se siembra, no se da. kipachanito. manxitlanamakan kimilwiaya “totecuiouané, ma iskich! tle amailia? motolinia masewali; kwix ichimal kwix imakwaw yetinemi? ka mopetlauiltitinemi”. xikwaltotokakan nehin kiawitsini, aw in okikakke mexika, niman ye ik choka; aw niman ye noseppa onkan kimilwi in diablo witsilopochtli "maca ximotekipachokan, tla tonkwikakan". wetstok okikwalike in ixayak atlan chaneke; onkan in ichan iwino anoso ivinonamakayan morexón temastitlan in kimiktike; san kikokowitekke ika se gadana, san iwayolke in tleika kimiktike choloke. nečewa' niawni tlahpias onkan. iwaxka. aw in monasterios teopixkan mochi sepo kandelas inteopantlapantikpak tlatlatlak, in iw mochi tlakatl okittak. ome axoxtlantli xi akatl xiwitl, 1347. itakilo se kikwa de oksik, se kiteki wan iuki se kikwa ya. . aw ye onkan im monawatike in ik mosentlalike, kihtoke inin xiwpan ompewa in motokayotia "cristerosme inyaoyo". ihwak se kimewa xochiyohtok. yoan niktenewa sentetl wapali achi wei teixiptla yewatl in onkan hikwiliwtok transfigurasion yas nikan santiago aso kana manis yewan kimomachitia in padreme. mopaka in nakatl iwan mokwakwalatsa ixkichkaw in ye tlawikxitili; in katarinahnanakatl in ye tlachipawtli, motlalia ipan kaxitl iwan motlapachoa inik ihpotokwiksis (intla moneki inin wel motlalilis senxumali pitsochiyawisotl); ihtik in xoxokton motlalia se tekontontli iwan tlaheo atl iwan ompa kwakwalakas in tomatl, chili, axox iwan xonakatl. ihkwak mochi ye tsapotik ye motesi iwan ye motlalilia in katarinahnanakatl ika nakatl iwan istayutl. ma kwakwalaka sempoali ahnoso sempoali iwan mahtlaktli minuto. siva koatl ikwik ka kiawak kaukwaltsin in kali; amo ihkion ka tlahtik. no iwan ye yuh nepa chikontsonxiwitl ipan yepowalxiwitl ipan yexiwitl kiwalmiwali, wel yewatsin itenkopatsinko in noé inik owala inik onkan motekako inik onkan motlaliko españa in yewatl patriarcha tubal, ixwiwtsin in noé ipiltsin in japheth, iwan isiwaw ipilwan in kinwalwikak iwan okseki miek tlakatl in kiwaltepotstokake. ik niman altar mayor omotlankwaketsato in tottatsin, chokatia kihtotia "macamo ximotekipachokan in anmexika, ka nel aokmo ankimottitilani in tetl in kwawitl, ma newa niktsakwa"; inik niman onkan oyah in temimiltitech in onkan oteketsaya in otepinawtiaya, wel kinawatekito in temimili, onkan ye mowiteki, kilwia fiskal: "xinechhuitequi!". onentasiko,tonkisako in tlaltikpak. tla tewa tieskia. aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl yankwika kintekiwti tlawilantli in chalka in tisosikatsin; ompa mowilan in popokatepetl inakastlan itokayokan xochikiyawko, inin wel wei kwawitl in mowilan. tein istak xiktihtiltik wan exot tsikitsitsin wan istaket, yeh ihistak. ¡anentlaxia! aw in oyuh kiske matlakxiwitl omei in kistinenke i nekwametitla in tsiwaktla. aw in omotenew totoltekatl tsompachtli tlailotlaktewktli ka sa onasiko in onkan atentlipan onkan momikiliko in sa ya yewatl ipan in omotenew in vi tochtli xiwitl, 1238 años; aw inik tlahtokat inik mosenpowa senpowalxiwitl tisatepek, matlakxiwitl kwitlatetelko, ik mochi senpowalonmatlaktli xiwitl in intlahtokaw katka hestlapiktin tenanka. opehke san niman kixexeloa premios de tlen ok walokiske ipan okse xiwitl otipanoke. iwan onechmakake se diploma kano ikwilaktaya newatl, niporfirio dias, altepetl mexiko, ipan itoka totlalnantsin, niktexexelwia inimekes medayatin ipampa momachtia kokone, onkwan on aih kilkawaske tlen kinmaka in tsonteko kwali momachtia. mochiwa kampa kitokaj. tleinmach kineki immitsin, moyolotsin, immonakayotsin, ka yuhki in nopampa otikmotsakwiltitsino, in ik otinechmoskaltili. in nextitlan, in tlekwilan, in nopan otikochyayatikatka, intla xinechmotenkopiniliani, intla xinechmokochpachilwiyani, ka wel nopampa otimoteputsmamawtitsino; in aiwiyan kochistli, in nktekistli in otikmuchiwili; in wel nopampa otimixtosowaltitsino iwan in naxix, in nokwitl otikmatsolwitikatka. in aiwiyan, in ahisemele, in owalchiawatia, in owalpepeyokatia im mochichiwalayotsin in nokamak otinechmotetekilili, otinechmochichipinilili. aw in oyuh ye ontsonxiwitl ipan matlakpowalxiwitl ipan matlaktli onnawi xiwitl kate in onka anepantla aitik in ipan mitowa motenewa weikan altepetl siudad astlan in yewantin wewetke chichimeka in ye motenewa asteka, aw, in iw kitowa wewetke in iw kimachiyotitiwi, se tekpatl xiwitl ipan in intlapowatl, aw inik kinamiki in totekwiyo dios ixiwtsin ya yewatl in in tlakpak nestika de 1064, oyuh ye ontsonxiwitl ipan matlakpowali ipan epowali onnawi xiwitl motlakatilitsino i neli dios ipiltsin, in ikwak okinnots in inteow in yewantin asteka; inin achto ik kinnoch inik satepa okimoteotike. aw yuh okihtoke in wewetke españolesme aik iwki omottak se visurrei in nikan mexiko inmakase iwki okichiw, in ye nepa achtopa otlahtokatiko visurreyesme nikan mexiko, in iw yewatsin okimochiwili don hwan de mendosa i luna markés de montesklaros. se kitoka mahmakwil oso nahnawi taoltsitsin wan kemah se kitahtanilia taltikpak wan todios, wan kwali mochiwas. noponi isisna no pankiski yese san ichan in tlatlaya, amo yowalnepantla ok achi tonatiw, ikwak in ye on motskalo on mopiloa tonatiw kitlatiaya. v akatl xiwitl, 15. tlasohkamati wel miak. kena wahki aw in tlalmanalko itoka tosantewktli, in okinmotenpotika in kweskonpixke in okiwalmatke in ya wi in chalko tlahtoke, ik senka tlaltekwin. yuh motlanawatilia in tlatowani gobernador hwes ihoan hweses inik huramento konanaske ini kineltiliske in intlatol ixpan muchiwas in pedro heronimo regidor mayor yoan pedro de san fransisko regidor yuh motlanawaltilike ik okimoneltililike okimotlalilia in infirmatsin. antonio valeriano toribio lukas fransisko martin alkalde migwel sanches hwes. paso ante mi diego leonardo eskribano. nima ik kitoa tesosomoktsi, kintlatlawtia, kimilwi “oanquihiouique, mexikaé, oantlaknelike. tehwatsin tiachiwke, domingo a 26 de abril, ikwak kimonpewaltike in oselome kastilan, kinwikake onteme tekpan komonidad manka. ivitl in makok mupupuxotiw yawtlato noteow aya tepankiski mitoa ya yeva vel mamavia in tlaxotekatl tewtlan tewtlan milakatsoa. keneme. xtechyewaloti namehwanke ahmo onka okin oksé akioksé kanas. xii kali xiwitl, 1257. tla newa onieskiaya. xinechkawati wan neka ya niyati". ye temowa ipiltsin, xoxopan in ompa temoya, in ipalnemowani. in piltsintli, in wewentsin, sanno ihkwak tlahkwiloaya ompa kaxtilan in itawkayo don bartolomé esteban murilo. in matsah sesek. axkan sábado in ik 8 mani metstli de disiembre de 1612 años, wel ipan ilwitsin totlasonantsin komsepsión, ihkwak senka tlamawistililistika tlayawalolistika kitokake kostik teokwitlatl in teopixke san fransisko ipan in kommissario frai hwan surida, in ompa totlasonantsin sankta maría motenewa de la redonda kwepopan, inik otlamachiyotike in onkan opew ik otlatlalanok inik ye mochiwa yankwik tlatlapoloyan portería, in onkan mochiwas missa in okik mochiwas yankwik kochiantli iwan yankwik teopankali intlatkitika in teopixke; ye kimochiwilia xitinis in teopansoli. xilex istatl, ixkich in monekis ompa onnesia in ilwikatl, in sisitlaltin, in mamalwastli. aw in motekusoma, senka kimotetsawi in ikwak kimittak sisitlaltin, iwa[n] mamalwastli. monamaka ika tamachiutsin. aw i yewatsin sant augustín kimitalwia "yn impa in ompa in itokayokan atitlan inik mokaki amo san ixkich itechpa in tlaltikpak ka in weyatl in atoyatl in ameyali, ka sano iwan itechpa tlatowa mokaki in ehekatikpak in ontetsawa in epotoktli in apoktli kichiwa in tleko nikan tlaltikpak, aw ka itech inin in tlakatke mochiwke in totome in iwki mimichti"; aw inik mota moneltilia inin yehika ipampa in manenenke tlaltikpak ka itech tlakatke itech mochiwke, in mimichtin atitla in onkan tlasematikate, aw sano yuhki in totome hehekatikpak ka nel wel yewatl inenka. ipal laterannenonotsali otsintik tlahtokayotl in itoka vatikano. se tetskoko konmotlalilia, inik ompa teoyotika sakramentotika kinmokwitlawitiw in ixkichtin umpa onoke in ompa chanchiwa españoles; aokmo yewantin frailes teoyotika sakramentotika kinmokwitlawiske, kinmokixtililia in españoles, aw sa techixkawiske in frailes timasewalti techmokwitlawiske. wan kimaxintoke tikihtose nochi iwan in tlakechpanyotl iwki almatika, amatl in tlakwiloli iwan iposolkak. in nonoya ye ichan, ninopoliwi. istatl, ixkich in monekis "pero nama kena achi xihchikoka aw wel iw semilwitl in kalakowa in nepielo aokmo nehtotilo. im mokawaya kwikatl san tlakwalispan. oiwin in kinpewke in tepaneka in koyowake ipan in xiwitl, poliw altepetl koyowakan. kiski in ome kali xiwitl. aw inik kimonektiaya tlahtokayotl wetsin in onkan kulwakan ka onkan siwapili onkan yewak in inantsin itoka koatetl, ompa kichiwihto tlahtowani kowatlichan in itoka itsmitl, in ikontetl itoka tlakoxinki; inin yankwikan tlahtowani mochiw in kowatlichan. aw inin tlali inik wiak nappoalkwawitl aw inik patlawak san nekok ixkich yoan wel ik toyolopachiw in titechmaka tomines sempoali onchikwasen pesos wel tomatika tokokwi in tehoanti don balthasar tlilankalki yoan in nonamik hwana tlako. no ihkon yehwan no tayokoyah se kikwa in itakka, in semi welik. aw in neli mexika, in noxwiwan, sesentekpantika, ontekpantika, in wewehti,chimali xochitl tomak onmania. noha walase kitokiliah para sikera amo keman tokwapolos q u e h, kihtosneki wel tiyolchicahqueh. in ik amo okitlasotlake in intsontekon in imelchikiw, ka amo kakwíke kinenkwike in okittake in tachkawyotl in weweyotl in ik ye petlati ye ikpalti in ik ye kontlanewi in ipetl in imikpal in puchteka. ammo tikmatih intla axolotl noyuh salamandra nawatlahtolkopa itoka aitskwin mah motakatilti. in no se kikwa in itakka, wan no kwaltia para pahti. xochiketsal ikwik se mamahpikton yepasohtli inik monamakake in wewetke mexika; inik motenewa in kwawitl onaktiake, inkwawkoski yetia inik wikoke i nowian in altepetlipan. axkan lunes in ik 13 mani metstli henero de 1614 años, ihkwak yowatsinko in omixiw in siwapili virreina doña mariana riedre markesa, siwatl in kichiw itoka doña brianda, ikome ipilwantsitsin in ye kinchiwa nikan siudad mexiko, in ipilwantsitsin tlahtowani visurrei don diego fernándes de kórdova markés de gwadalkásar. in chololistli ikwik aw in axkan ye ikomilwitl in ipan martes sankto omotenew, in ik 17 mani metstli abril, ihkwak nikan kaltenko san antón xoloko ipan weyotli omotlaliko miekintin yaotiakawan soldadostin españoles in oyaotlapiako tlawistika; no iwi iwan in ipan weyotli tepeyakakpa yahtikak koyonakasko no miekintin in onkan motlalito soldadostin; no iwi in ipan ohtli chapoltepekpa yahtikak, onkan kalyakak temetskrustitlan no senka miekintin in onkan motlalito || 184 soldadostin; iwan inik nowiyan iski ohtliipan walkalaki siudad mexiko wel iskikan ye yaotlapialo, sa se inik nowiyan in yawaliwkan in ikaltenyok ixkich ik siudad mexiko. aw ka itech tasitiw itech tipachitiw itech timotsotsonatiw in temamawtia atl in yuhki soloni in yuhki tetekwikatiw xaxamakatiw ik yaw; amanteka toyawan q.n. iyaoan in akike in kanin omosen- tlalike. aw in ipan sant hwan baptista ilwitsin kis, ikwak senka yekene chikawak iksen pew in momanako kiyawitl in sesemilwitl iwan seseyowatl ye kiyawi inik nowian ipan nweva españa, inik ye no nikwel opeyoniko otemiko atl nikan mexiko; in iksennowian awatsalpan wewei aixtlawakan omochiw, iwan in mochi chinamitl wel popoliw in apachiw. mostla nikan asis. ¿ac in,aok timochin,tik awiltiske,tik welamachtiske,moyokoyatsin? atlakwiti noponi ipa ameli. in oyuh omik tlotepetl nima ye konixketske in kwawtliketski, yee kiwalyaka mexika. xochiyowa itech agosto. ah nomation a itolok ah nomation a itolok tsokotsontla a itolok tsokotsontla a itolok. achi kwali na niyas nikitati in anoso tototl, ipan kisas teokwitlatl, niman yuh mokwikwi, iw moxima in tekuli, inik miwiyotia, matlapaltia, mokwitlapiltia, mokxitia. "nama axa nopa siya, nomontli aw in yewatl tekusistekatl in ipan tlamasewaya muchi tlasotli in iakxoyaw, ketsali; in isakatapayol, teokwitlatlin iwits, chalchiwitl; in iktlaeswili tlaessotili, tapachtli, aw in ikopal, wel yeh in kopali. onkak eyi taman: se taman kilwiah xokoyolin, se taman tekoseh wan se pesohxokoyolin. testigo. thoribio chichimekatl ichan sank sebastian sakatla in ixiwtlapowal yehepowalxiwitl on kastoli on nawi okichiw huramento inik otlatlakoltilok inik amo istlakatis ipaltsinko dios iwan sankta maria iwan sankta krus. aw in tla tistlakatis ka diablo kiwikas in maniman. ompoali iwan chikweyi sentavoh san ihki, tlakamo onyetis oktepitsin makwili gratnoh. yetok aw ka yuhki hin in okipewaltike yaoyotl; inik pew, san kiwalitlan chinamitl in maxtlaton tlahtowani in askapotsalko. aw inik okonmokakitike in imelawaka tlatoli niman omotlanawatilike ma ok mochiya in tlatoli aso aka itla kitokih in itechpa kali tlali yuh omotlanawatilike kimotlalilike in infirmatsin antonio valeriano migwel de los angeles alkalde martin xwares alkalde. pasó ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. ¿axtijneki tinechpalewis?", kiilwi aw in axkan omotenew ipan semilwitl viernes inik omixtlapachoka ika metstli tonatiw inik mihtowa "oqualoc tonatiw". tlakaktok in ixpan tonkisatiw, ahkaso mihikoltis, ye wexotsinko xayakamachan, in tetsmelokan. nisiwatl, ninomaoxiwia, ninokxiwia, nokon asiko ye nochkwe ye nochwipil, niksesentlamitas. nikimelewi xaltepetlapan, ye wexotsinka, tson in kwetlaxtlan malin, tson in kwetlaxtetekwekwex, niksesentlamitas. ¿ln ken ok san in tlamati? nechmitlania in konetl, in tlatowani, in axayakaton, tle on in ma ik tepal no chachawatlalia. noka titlaomepias nokonetsin. piyome nochi kwaltia se kichiwa panelah in eyi taman. se mamahpikton silantro viii tochtli xiwitl, 1474. nikan ipan in in ye yuh onpowalxiwitl onmakwili kate in nikan tenochtitlan in mexika, inik asiko chichimeka mexitin kolwake. kwaltia xi kali xiwitl, 1477. aw in ikwak in onmotemakato in kwawtemoktsin, nhman kiwikake in akachinanko in ye yoa. aw in imustlayok in ie achiton tonatiw, ie no seppa walake in españoles; wel miekintin. no san yuh tlantiwitse, in moyauchichiwtiwitse, tepuswipili, in tepuskwakalalatli. aw aok tle in intepusmakwaw, iwan aok tle in inchimal. aw i mach yewatl in inawatil i witsilopochtli kayatle wetsi. no ikwak poliwke toltitlankalke. in nikan onok, in ixwatok, aw kimilwi in ketsalkanawtli "ohuaquimocnellilique in amoteow in amotlahtokaw, ma tiwiyan". yewa ikechkwahyoilpili istakeh iwan texohkeh quinpiah. titlanamakaskiaya kwaltia niman kihtoke in chalka akxoteka "ca ye kwali, ka amechmokawilitiwi". xa ne elwiak. ik niman onkan kintlaokolike, in tlali senka wei in kikaw in atonaltsin in itlamasewal; aw in kwawitsatsin in kikaw in tlali in itlamasewal, san kexkichka tlakatekoloitwalko in kistikaka in tenanka tepantli in tekwanipan. ipampa inon okachi kwali in tlen amotepakti mochiwa amo sasan tik malhuizqueh. aw nawi in estandarte tliltik tlayakantiake ome istak teokwitlatl plata || 241 in ikrusyo tlanepantla mantiake, aw nekok intlok mantiake kintsatsakwitiake in okome omotenew estandarte, san kwawitl teokwitlayo in ikrusyo. nochi xiwit saj. xii tochtli xiwitl, 1322. yahke. kampa etayih wan kikixtihkeh ya in et, kemeh in yekintsin tapaniantiak, ewati ya. tlahkoxonakatl ahmo wehyi 44. iwan wel xikwika, wel xitlahto, wel xitenotsa, wel xitenankili, wel xitetlatlawti; ahmo tlakowali in tlahtoli. ma yuhki in tinontli, in tixolopitli timokwep. iwan immalakatl, in tsotsopastli wel xikmokwitlawi, in tlalchiwik, in akowik, in potonkatsintli, in pilinkatsintli, in tlamasewaltsintli iwan in tlakwiloltsintli, immachiotsintli, in tlapaltsintli. ik wel tetlok, tenawak timonemitis, inik tikmomahsewis in kana achitsin atolatsintli, in tlamatsowaltsintli, in kiltsintli, in nopaltsintli; iwan in kan kexkitsin xaxaltsintli, in popoltsintli immokespantsinko, immokechtlantsinko ompilkas inik ontotonias, inik onyamanias immotlaktsin, immonakayotsin inik ipan tikmotlasokamachitis in totekwiyo in itetlaokolilitsin, in iteiknelilitsin. aw in ye yuhki, in o tlasenkaw ye mochi nes ixkich omotenew in omito, niman ye im om pewa in tochtepek in ompa sem onoke in puchteka in ostomeka in ye nowian altepetl ipan, in ye nowian altepetl ipan tlaka, onkan sem onoka in ikal. aw ipan in in xiwitl in okipewalti in ye kinmitlanililia inwelitsin iwan intepalewilitsin in tlahtoke don fernando iwan doña isabel inik walas nikan ipan nweva españa, inik kinextikiw yankwik tlali in intechtsinko powis tlahtoke españa. inik mitowa, in ihkwak asiko in intlamasewkaw in tekwanipan tlaka in itoka tsiwtlakawki, siwatl in kiwalwikak imekaw katka in tliltekatl, walotstita in ihtik walyetia siwatl in piltontli ipiltsin in tliltekatl in yachkaw katka in atonaltsin, ka wexotsinkopa in waltemoke. .oticmo chiwili, otikmoyolitili mixpantsinko oyekawki. sano ipa se tochtli xiwitl in kitlatlawtito i mexika in tesosomoktsi inik kitlanito in ipiltsi, in intlatokaw mochiw, konilwia “nopiltzintziné tlatowanié, tekwaliwake i motechiwkawa mexika wewetke, ka konitoa ‘ma kimokakiti tlakatl: motolinia i mokolwa, ka titoteutisneki, ka tiktomako i mokoski moketsal. iwan inik nowian ihtik siudad in inkaltikpak kastilteka nowian kitlatike kwawitl, iwan nowian tlatsitsilitsalok in iskikan teopan mexiko in monasterios. komo kajfentaj, kimewa, pero komo kwouhihtik amo akah kimewa. in siwakalehkapo kipia konte kali. chikwei tekpatl anotle mochiw. nikan ipan in kinpewke xikochimalko tlaka; aw sanno ikwak kinpewke poliwke in xaltepeka iwan totomiwake. in alotl ikpak in kwakwawitl ka. aw in yekene ihkwak in ye inma in ye tlayowas, in ye ome tsilini ipan tlako hora, ik niman opew in ye mikwania mixtli in ye kitlalkawia tonatiw, inik mochi tlakatl wel kittas in kenin ipan ye mochiwas tonatiw; achi weka ik kitlalkawi tlanawak, san wel walmoyekyawaliwkatekato in mixtli, inik kitlakawili tlanaliwtikis in ilwikatitech, inik wel sempani iyoka waltlali tonatiw. in iskich kawitl otlamiko in tlatoli ontetl metstli in iskich kawitl otlamiko in informasion etk. ik nautetl axkan tlachipahtika. i akatl xiwitl, ii. yoan niktenewa nawi pesos nechmakas in kristina tlahko tiankistenko chane aw in tla nomoxikos ma sa nel ome pesos yoan nawi tomines kimanas naniman itech powis. aw sano ipan in in xiwitl inik ompa nenka makwilxiwitl in koyowakan in yakapichtlan in diablo, aw ye ipan in in matlaktliomei tekpatl xiwitl in yekene ixkichtin wi in chalka in kanaske in kinotsaske in diablo; san inneixkawil in chalka, amo tewanme in amakemeke. aw sano ipan in in omotenew xiwitl, in ihkwak ye se xiwitl onkan kate chapultepek in mexika. tlahkoxonakatl postehtli ka yuh kihtotiwi in wewetke, ka yewantin in nikan kintokake in kinpewke tlahtoke atonaltsin chichimekatewktli iwan itiachkawtsin tliltekatsin chichimemekayaotekiwa iwan xochitsin kowayaotekiwa iwan mapiwatsin iwan inik ye mochintin chichimeka totolimpaneka itstlakosawke. aw yeintin in nikan kinkawtia ichpochwan tlahtowani don lwis de velasko markés de salinas: in ikse iknosiwatl itoka doña maría de dirsio inamik katka don hwan altamirano komendador sanktiago; in ikome ichpoch itoka doña beatris de la enkarnasió abbadessa del monasterio de regina seli; in ikei itoka doña isabel de hesús monha iwan in onkan omotenew regina seli; iwan iweltiw nikan kikawtia in itoka doña ana de kastila iknosiwatl inamik katka diego de ibarra komendador sanktiago, iwan moch nikan kinkawtia in ixkichtin iwanyolke in imachwan ixwiwan. tewan tikpia se kalmantli. nepa yawih ihkí ya nopa san kwesihke inika siudad de mexiko a tres dias del mes de hunio de mil e kinientos i setenta i siete años i senka mawistililoni in mwi magnifiko señor don antonio valeriano governador hwes in in mopiyalia hustisia in itechkopatsinko su magestad ixpantsinko onesiko balthasar sanches iwan in iteikkaw gaspar sanches iwan in insiwawan marina tiakapan iwan hwana tlako chaneke sank hwan tekixkipan aw no nixpa newatl migwel xwares eskrivano in tlatoltika okimokakiltilike in tlatowani konitowa tiktokakiltiliko in hustisia tiknamakako totlal iwan tokal iwan in ichinanyo nawtetl techkawilitia in totatsin katka pedro sanches. onkanik walaya monakikiya' en medio del sielo. . aw in oasiko ayak ichan ya, san niman kin tlamelawaltike in itekpanchan awitsotsin. in kwamekat, mowiwilana, walewa itech witsyolotsin in talihtik, wan mowilana. 80. yekene ma ok ye amechonmawti in tlakoyotl, in tekiyotl, inik tepaltsinko amonkate, in tlein kiske, iwan in tlein kikwaske, in ankimiskaltia, in ankinwapawa, yekene in tlein intech pilkas. para techpalewis mosta wipta, 61r xi akatl xiwitl, 1295 años. "ay, nokone notahtsin ye okachi moyekmatiwa inihkwak ixtlawapa onemiwa. yewantin in imixpan testigosme mochiwa merino matheo abrian tepixke hwan iechinan, bartolome osoma, fransisko epkowatl, balthasar kowatl wewetke algwasil martin de la krus pedro akosakatl,martin chochokatl, pablo hernandes,sepastian xwares. san timonenkawa nowik. ma te tisiwantin, ahso nel ah tiyekos, in yuhki chawayotl in ixochitsin in ikwikatsin nokonetsin. seki kilwiah in mochipautani wan okseki, amo. 1.- testigo migwel anyaxkan inchan san pablo tlachkwititla omonamiktin omakok huramento inik testigo mochiwa aw in ixiwtlapowal in ye nemi yuh kitowa in asiko kastilantlaka ye chikwexiwtia in ye nemi. tomila, nikan ipan in iknawtetl toxiw molpili; kilpilike in mexika onkan tekpayokan. kwaltia anka sa ye in mokwik a ika niwalchoka,in san niwaliknotlamatiko, nontiya. tlen 116 tlanawatihkayotl. in altepechantli chikawalistli tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh moxelos, iwikapa motekiwis, ipan tekichikwani, tlahtol tekichiwani iwan tlasenkawani, iwan amo welis monechikos ome noso achi miak chikawalistli ipan san se tlakatl noso nechikolistli, iwan amo welis moixkawilis tlahtol tekichiwani ipan se tlakatl. in chikawalmeh tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh monechikoseh ken moihtowa ipan amatlanawatili tlen yewantin mopialiah, iwan motlaskiliseh ipan innin tlanahuatilmeh: i. in tekiwameh tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh amo welis mowekawaliseh ipan intekiwakayo kipanos chikwasen xiwitl. in tlapehpenitli tlen tekiwameh tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh iwan tlen chinanko tlahtol tekichiwaneh mochiwas xitlawak iwan ken moihtowa ipan tlahtol tlanawatilmeh tlen tlapepenili itechpowi. in tlanawatianeh tlen tlaltlanahuatilmeh, tlen kintekiwamakatoseh ipan chinanko tlamatlalantli, tlen ipa noso san kemantika, amo keman oksepa weliseh kitekiwiseh tlanawatili, ihatsah san se tlatocpah, san se ome tonatih, san tepatlaseh noso san kimokwitlawiseh kaltlatlanawatili. amo keman welis kintlapehpeniseh iwikpa saniman kawitl: a) in tlanawatiani tepatlani tlen amatlanawatiloyan, noso tlen kitekiwamakaseh makitlami kawitl tla poliwi tlen neltekiwa, ihatsa seyok itokah tekiwakayotl; b) tlen gobernador tlen ki tekitlamiltiti, tlen kentsi ki tokahtihtokeh noso tla katliweli tlakatl mo tlantok, sankatliweli ki tocahtiyah, ki patlas se kentsi nopa gobernador, nochipa ki tekitiltis san ome xiwitl tlen poliwi nochi in teki. san welis elis gobernador konstitusional tlen se altepetl se tlakatl mo tlantok ma tlakatitos ni mexihkotlali iwan nompaya ma elto, noso mamochantihtos nelia ki panotos makwilxiwitl ki axitihtosa kemah pewas elekksiones, iwan ma ki pia sempowali iwan mahtlaktli xiwitl ki axitihtos kemah onka eleksión, aachi kentsi, tla ihkinoh ki ihtowa tlen weyiamatlanawatili tlen nompa altepetl. ii. in tlapowalmeh tlen moixnextianeh tlen tlahtol tekichiwaneh tlaltlanawatiloyan elis itamachihka tlen keskih chanewaneh tlen se iwan se tlaltlanawatiloyan, ika inon tlamantli, welis achi amo miak se chikomeh tepantlahtoanih ipan tlaltlanawatilmeh tlen chanchiwanih amo asiseh se tsontli mil chanchihuaneh; chiknawih kampa chanchiwanih kipanos inin tlapowali iwan amo asis 2 tsontli mil chanchihuanih, iwan matlaktli iwan se kampa in tlaltlanawatilmeh kipanoseh ya inin tlapowali chanchihuanih. in tepantlahtoanih tlen tlahtol tekichiwaneh tlen tlatlanawatilmeh amo weliseh saniman kintlapehpeniseh iwikpa seyok kawitl. in tepantlahtoanih tlapatlanih welis kin tlapehpeniseh tlen saniman kawitl tlen neltlayecanaseh, tla amo tequichihtoseh, san amo weliseh tepantlahtoanih kintlapehpeniseh saniman kawitl itlatokil tlen san tlapatlanih. in tlahtol tekichiwanih tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh moyolitiseh ika tepantlahtoanih tlen kintlapehpeniseh ken moihtowa xitlawak tlahtoli tlen achi miakintin iwan tlaixnextili tlen san tlatamachiwali, ken kiihtoseh tlanawatilmeh tlen yewan. ki tlachiliskiya ni tlanawatihkayotl altepetl iwan ki tlaliski ya se xiwitl kenikatsa yati tomi. kenihki kikwamachilihke ni tlaxtlawili tlen ni tekitini ki makaskiya ki tlachiliskiya ipan ni tlanawatiloyan 127 tle ni weyi amatlanawatili. tle ni tlanawatiyanih altepetl ki nawatiya legislativo, ehekutivo iwan hudisial, iwan mo sehkotiliyani kin amatlalihtoke ipan altepetl pilkentsitsi, kipia kin kalakise ipan ni amatl, kenikatsa kin kixtihtiyase ni tekitini tlen ipan altepeko. ni tlapowalistli kin tlachiliskiya kenikatsa kin axilis in tomi ni altepeko, mo tlaskiliskiya ipan ni amatlatoli iwan kwali kisaskia. tlen legislaturas tlen estados kipixtose entidades de fiskalisasión, tlen moneki . atlakatl ichan teskatsonko tekpan teutl makok ye choka maka ivi maka ivi teutl makok ye choka ikan kexkich yekitlakolia ini karga wan ye'on keyi resibiroaya initeko. itlanahnamik: ¡amo ximoistlakati! mochinin axkan mochipa ye wel tikihtoskeh ahmo san momachtihkeh tlasemmelawaskeh itechpa in tomomostlanemilis no iwki inin wel tikchiwaskiani ahkiwan techtlamachtiah ahnoso techteopoah tonemilis xinechmomakili arnatl kantea tlapaltin. ma kimatikan in ixkichtin kitaske inin karta de venta in ikwak newatl maria salomen nichpochnemi nikan nichane mexiko santiago tlatilulko itech nipowi in tlaxilakali s. martin ateskapan nikitoa nosielistika notlanekilistika nimitsnamakiltia notlalman nechkawilitiake notatsin nonantsin wel imaxka katka ipanpa in axkan nimitsnamakiltia paskwal hernandes español tichane mexiko siudad. in iuki kitokaitiah por in wehweyi in itakka. xochiyowa kemeh itech hulio. mah amo askayowa, in kwowit. aw sanno ipan in, in ipan ilwitsin kis sant matheo, onkan ye no nikwel seppa missa mito in ihtik teopankali sankto domingo; ye otlayekchichiwalok, ye kwalkan in ihtik, in ipampa ik tlatlakawka atl in manka ihtik. istak inakayo wan tiltik in iteyo. ka ichkapixke in obisposme in arsobisposme, in ihkwak yuh tlei tepan mochiwa in in senka temamawti teisawi, in okik tsontekonti moteyakanilia motepachilwia in ipan sankta iglesia, ka yewantsitsin achtopa tsatsiske, kiteilwiske ik tenemachtiske in tlein in katlewatl wel moneki in tlatlatlawtilistli, in tlamasewalistli, in tlayawalolistli kichiwaske in imichkawan in intlapacholwan in altepewake. ya ximoketsaka ye chikweyi iwan ompoali iwan makwili imán. axkan domingo in ik 27 mani metstli henero de 1613 años, ihkwak okikwaatekike in iyakapa in ipiltsin tlahtowani don diego fernándes de kórdova markés de gwadalkásar visurrei de la nweva españa; kitokayotike inik mokwaateki ipiltsin itoka mochiw doña mariana manwel, aw in ipadrino mochiw se tottatsin wel sankto itoka frai pedro lásaro teopixki san fransisko. ¡ ma wel mani tlala! aw san omakwiltetlmetstiko in nikan mexiko tenochtitlan in padre frai isidro in inewan fransisko faustino ketsalmasatsin. inin tlatiwani everardo ma tikitokan yewatl okintekihtiaya nochi in pweblo kitetla koliske tlaxkali, atl iwan tlakwali para yolkame. wan kikawatiwe ompan kwartel. nochtlakatl otlaneltokaya. watsinko, teotlak, oyaya tlakwali para sapatistas iwan yolkame. ipan in tonaltin okimikilike don abraham monterola wehka. ayokik omachix, tla okimomiktilike. noihki tlatiwani itoka hwan bastida; noihki okimikilike. ayokik omachix kanon nekawalo. nopa pablo wan nopa san pedro ¿canin ka mokwasekawil ? niman ik tlanawatia isiwka mochiwa in tlakwali in totolin in kakawatl. aw in frai herónimo de sárate ihkwak kis in kapilero katka teowakan yah, aw inik nikan kisin mexiko in tenochka yuhkin sewtiake, in ipampa, yuh omotenew tlakpak, inik senka otlatoliniko mexiko inik nikan oyeko tottatsin, in ayak seppa se gwardián yuh nikan otlachiwako in ye ixkichika ahsiko teopixke san fransisko nikan siudad mexiko nweva españa. sano ikwak walmotewktlali in tlaweloktsi. aw sanno ihkwak in wala in don hwan gano motewksoma inik onwia españa, ik-expa ilo. in ma san tiankisko, ma titlapatla, ma titlatennonots, aw in ma san xopan, ma timotlatlattili, ma tihikulmik: in kenamikatsintli in at wel ihikak, in at noso san kenamikatsintli ma tikmaxopew, ma yehoatl, ka itlaioaltsin in totekuyo intlaka xosia moka onmawiltis, ka nel mokekeloa, mitsonawianikwepas. monamaka itakka exot wan keman waki ya kinamakah in et por kilo. in nenewki in tokwik, nenewki in toxochiw, kan tikwaoxpan, in tokonawiltia ipalnemoa. mah amo nechtatilikan inchayohkan wehweyi awani, in kenin wel yewatsin isel teutl dios yewatsin tsintilispewalistli okimochiwili in ixkich in kexkich tlamantli, in oyuh kimoyolotike ka wel ... kilnamikke ... aw tlaka katka in itechpatsinko yewatsin dios. ... amo mochipautani. tinemi ompa walmewiti in askapotsalko inik motlalitsinoko in itlahtokaikpalpan, aw inik san katka in mosewitsino, in atle itekiw katka; yexiwitl ipan chikwasentetl metstli inik ompa walmowikak || 52 perú, ompa visurrei moyetstikatka, yewatsin ompa kiwalmopatilito in konde don gaspar de súñiga i asevedo. 2 tekpatl, 1572 años. i{n} nikam nikawa se noxwisin itoka dfon] baltesar de san hwan iwan dfon] martin hwáres kortes de san hwan nika nikitlalia inwak {sic} teopam iwan nikinkawilia merset ipampa inin teopam onikichiwili {en el margen iskierdo años= 1529= 9= akatli} san hwan amo akin kikakayawak iwan san bart{o}lome teopam iwan sankta krus in teopam mochi i/e/wantin kimokwitlawiske inin yei altepetli imaka inin sankta krus omka se atlawtli sa nika tem{a}matlatli tleko. ya nopa kichihki. aw in oksekintin in ipilwantsitsin in tlakatl kwawitsatsin: in iktemakwilka itoka xalayotsin in tlahtokapili, in iktechikwasenka itoka ayomekatsin; inin no ompa motlakatilike in atenko, motenewa ikalpanpilwantsitsin in tlakatl kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli tlahtowani. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. teipa ya nopa monexti mach nonoxikotas ye nanawatl. sesen akin papayah onkan walkis in atl, posontewak in ihtik katka mania in inteokal, ik axkan motokayotia atlkiskan; iwan chichix in okseki onkan mokawka atl, aw in satepan wakiko, aoktle ones. imahtsakalwan sanipayouij. ixiuyo tepitsin papatawak wan amo semi weweyak. noknin san kwalyotika okasik ikalmimilo iwan ichan omokwep. xkintatawti nachiwanime, tihwíkase tlamintli. martes a v días del mes de febrero, ikwak makoke possesión in padreme deskalsos onkan in sankt ipólito ikiyawayok; itekopatsinko visurrei siudad tlaka kinmomakilike alkaldes, regidores, in onkan moteokaltitsinoke. xanmoketsakan oo annikutsitsinwan, tonwian, tonwian, tixochitemoske, tonwian, tonwian, tixochitekiske. nikan mani a, nikan mani a tlachinolxochitl, chimali xochitl in tehikolti, wel tematlachtli, yaoxochitl. mikeltsin leonportila temachtikatsintli "¡ta xinechpalewi!", kiilwi. in newatl lwis [tachado: de] savalos nikitowa in ipanpa kali monamaka niktema nikaxiltia chikonpowali onmatlaktli pesos yuh nikitowa imixpan testigosme bartholome sanches iwan pregonero diego astaxochitl ipan a veinte i uno de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años. ipan chikonawi tochtli xiwitl pepeno migwel de la madrid yuhkin wei itlahtokaw méxiko. amo se kichipawa, ihwak tawitekih kiteximaj, mokawa kwouten wan sepa selia. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. nosa in senekilistli inik oksekin insepan kwali nemizqueh. san ye chokan teuktli nakanaya toteosi,kowatsin teuktla. aw nikan ka intoka in chikwei altepeme i teokolwake in ikse altepetl wexotsinka, in ikome altepetl chalka totolinpaneka, in ikei altepetl xochimilka, in iknawi altepetl kwitlawaka, in ikmakwili altepetl malinalka, in ikchikwasen altepetl chichimeka, in ikchikome altepetl tepaneka, in ikchikwei altepetl matlatsinka. xi akatl techpopoyomiktike askapotsalka. amo se kitoka, iteyo in ixwa. aw ik niman yewantin kimontokatiake in ixkichtin soldadostin yaotiakawan; aso wel chikwepowaltin in ye mochi in nekokkampa motekpanke inik tlayawalolotia, mokwekwentilike inik tekpankayahke. sanyeno ihkwak asik mexiko "tlahuilchicahualiztica kakistepanitlasaloni". wan xrosiarokih in toplantitas. no ikwak wilowak in xochipilan, ikwak poliwke in xochipilteka; ompa motlahtokapakato in don diego tewetskititsin. niman ye ik wal temo in painalton. kinwalana in ixkichtin miquizquc kinyakantiw in ik tleko in ompa mikiske in ikpak witsilopuchtli. kinwika in tealtianime in intlaaltiwan. okito in testigo ka wel melaoak inik onokonan huramento inik onitlatolmelaw in ye ninemi tlaltikpak ye epoalxiwitl onkaxtoli don gaspar de mendosa nixpan fransisko milan eskribano. se taxtawil, wel inyolokakopa in ye kikwi in teokwitlatl onpowali pesos iwan se peso ik omopakkanonotske inik aokak seppa kitlakos in aso tlein kitos. in ipan axkan ik 15 mani metstli de oktubre de 1608 años, ikwak nikan mexiko omaxitiko omokalakiko in yewatsin senka mawistililoni teoyotika tlahtowani don frai balthasar akobarrobias obispo waxakak teopixki sant augustín, ye kin ik opa walmowikak in waxakak, san onxiwitl in ompa motlapialito; aw inik nikan mexiko omokixtitikis ok nawtetl metstli ipan tlako nikan omoyetstikatka. martes ik 24 mani metstli marso in asiko isedulatsin in toweitlahtokaw rei don felipe tersero in kimomakiliko yewatsin exselentíssimo señor don frai garsía gwerra arsobispo mexiko inik virrei governador i kapitán general mochiwtsino in nikan ipan nweva españa iwan presidente de la real audiensia in ipan moyetsinotika. towaixka. san kitowa noyolo, ayok seppa ye niwits,ayok seppa nikisakiw in yese in tlaltikpak, san ye niyaw, san ye niyaw ye ichan. tonilwisolowan atlixko, in toteosi teuktli, kowatl teuktli, yewa mitsyolopoloa, in ipalnemoa. nikan ipan in i walkiske in ompa walewake inchan chikomostok in oksentlamantin wewetke || 36r in wixtoka iwan tsompawake i ye motenewa tekwanipan tlaka, in satepan otlaetlamantiliko in onkan amakemekan chalko; aw in intlahtokaw in ompa kinwalkixti chikomostok in kinwalyakan in kinwalpachotia itoka kwitlachtewktli tlahtowani walmochiwtia in wixtoko tekwanipan. aw in masewaltin omotenewke in anchto onkan onoya in xochteka in olmeka in kiyawisteka in kokolka inik kintokake inik onkan kinpewke amakemekan. aw in tlenamakak tenuch kenin oquimah, niman okilwi in kwawtleketski teomama "tlacatlé kwawtleketskié, kilmach ye timikiske in timexika in axkan, kilmach yuh kihtowa in tlasiwki kopil in texkaltepek ichan malinalkatl; iwan kilmach toloke in witse". mochiwa kampa chilah oso kampa etaj. aw i ye iwki oyake nima ye ik untlaiwa in kolwaka tlatoke, kimonilwia i xochmilka “xochmilcaé, tle ankimati? ka ye unpa wi i mexika, ma ok se anquicauhti”. i nikan ankitkitiwitse in amochokis in amotlaukol; in ankitemoa in ankineki a wei a yetik. aw in alkaldesme motlalike san sebastián atsakwalko melchior xwáres chane tomatla, san kitlamelawalti in alkaldeyotl, iwan sebastián migwel chane kwitlatlawaktonko. tlen 97 tlanawatihkayotl. in magistrados tlen sirkwito iwan hweses tlen distrito kin tokatlalis iwan kintekimakas hudikatura tlen sentlanawatiloyan, ika tlahtoli tlen xitlawak iwan noihki tlahtolnekilistli iwan tekichiwalistli ken kiihtos tlahtol tlanawatili. wekawas chikwasen xiwitl ipan tlanawatili, iwan keman tlamis itlanawatil, tla osepa kimakaseh tlanawatili noso kinmakaseh kachi weyi tlanawatili, san welis kinkwiliseh intekih ken tlehtleya tlamantli iwan tekichiwalistli moihtos ipan tlahtol tlanawatili. in suprema korte tlen hustisia tlen totlalnantsin welis kitokahtlalis akahya noso sekin tlen imawan noso akahya hwes tlen distrito noso magistrado tlen sirkwito, noso kitokahtlalis se noso miakin kwahkwalmeh tequichihuanih, keman ihkinon kiyeyekos noso tlahtlanis in tekikwani tlen sentlanawatiloyan noso akahya tlahtokan tlen sennechikolistli, noso akahya weyi tekiwa tlen se tlaltlanawatiloyan, san iwikpa tlahtlanis tlehtleya axkwali tlahtloli tlen ika moixpanos tlen tleweli intechpowi tlacameh. noihki welis kitlahtlanis tlahtokan tlen hudikatura tlen sentlanawatiloyan, makitemo kenihki inemilis tlen akahya tlaxitlahketl noso magistrado tlen sentlanawatiloyan. in suprema korte tlen hustisia kipia tlanawatili iwikpa tlahtlanis kenihki mochihki tlehtleya tlahtlakoli noso tlahtlakolmeh tlen kikotonas altepeyotl tlaixwasantli, san keman tlehtleya tlahtoli kiitas amo moneltokas tlanawatili tlen nochi tekichiwali tlapehpentli tlen akahya chikawalistli tlen sennechikolistli. tlen ikiska tlatetemolistli saniman motemaktilis ipan kaltlanawatikayotl tlen intechpowi. in suprema korte tlen hustisia kitokahtlalis iwan kipatlas itekipanoani iwan sekinok tekichiwanih iwan tequitinih. in magistrados iwan hweses kintokatlaliseh iwan kinpatlaseh tekichiwanih iwan tekitinih tlen tribunales tlen sirkwito iwan hweses tlen distrito, ken moihtowa ipan tlahtol tlanawatili tlen itechpowi hudisial tekiyotl. iasika nawi xiwitl, in sennechikolistli kitlapehpenis tlen inipan tlatskitokeh in tlayekanani ten korte de hustisia tlen totlalnantsin, tlen yewa amo welis oksepa kitekimakaseh ipan saniman kawitl opanos. se iwan se ministro tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia, keman kipewaltis itekichiwalis, motlahtoltemaktilis ipan wehkapan tlahtokan, ika inin tlahtoli tlayekanani “¿timotemactilia nelkwali iwan xitlawak titekichiwas ipan tlanawatili tlen ministro tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia totlalnantsin tlen axkan otimitsmaktiliah iwan tihmokwitlawis iwan titlanawatis momotlepanita in tlahtoli amatlanawatili tlen sentika mexihko tlaltlanawatilmeh iwan tlahtol tlanawatilmeh tlen ipan yewa moyolitia, tihtlachilis nochi tonatih nelkwali mamopanolti iwan mamoyolchikawa sennechicolistli?” ministro “quemah, nimotemactilia” tlayekanani tla amo ihkinon tichiwas, totlalnantsin mamits ixpanti. in magistrados tlen sirkwito iwan hweses tlen distrito motemaktiliseh iixpan tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia iwan konseho tlen hudikatura tlen sentlanawatiloyan. kontlachiyeltito in ompa in amaxak; ompa kikwiloto tekpatl, kihto "ca amo nikan i niwalamattia". aw in omotenew tlakatl kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli chapantika in kitlahtokatlalike onkan in omotenew inawak ayotsinko tapalkatetelko. aw in tlatilolko ipan onkalak konpatlato yewatl in don melchior de sotu, hwes governador mochiw in tlatilolko; inin wel onkan chane, yese ompa walewak in kwitlawak, ompa hwes governador katka. in nanakat saj. tlanankili in tlatowani “oannechmocnelilique, tetekwiwtiné, oixtlakawki in amoyollotzin”. ¿quexquich ipatin se amamachiotl inik altepepanowayan? in ihkwak in ye oyuh nepa ontsontli ipan matlakpowalxiwitl ipan epowalonnawi xiwitl motlakatilitsino in neli dios itlasopiltsin hesuchristo, in ihkwak waltekawke mexitin in ompa astlan. telpokero wan kiihto weyi akwakwahtli elito porke noponi sayolime aw inik ototechkiwalmokawili in itlatoltsin in tlatoawani seinos ipanpa i yewatl in omik español in itoka katka amador nangoro intlalnemak katka onka nonetlalilok in onka desada idienta in ikiawak in tiankistenko. miyak se kanasta kiwika tlaxkali ma i tekpatl xiwitl, 1220. ma xi iknotlamati noyolo. kwaltia axkema moyoltlali yahki nopa konetsa —mitalwi kemen titlato'a tlenon timitia. iwan ikwak ye no kinpewke ikoppa in tlapantsinka iwan totoltenanko tlaka iwan atlchayawakan tlaka; in oxiwitl makwilkan in tepew in awitsotsin. xochiyowa itech septiembre. ¿ac aso aik?nonawiya in tenawakan. ok achi wei in tonatiw in kinwika ixpan witsilopuchtli im umpa kim on xalakiaya ompa kiwalitia itspaktli. ome tekontontli kalwahsaxoxowki aw in kali senka miyekkan in pachiw in inkal españoles, in ye wekawa wewei kali ik netlapacholok; iwan seki tepantli miyekkan in wetsiko wel tlaltitech ya, no seki tepan wets ik mikowak, senka achi wel keskikan in mexiko ik netlapacholok kali ik mikowak. no maiknin ka tlatsakwalpan kalaki. akin kimati tlen mostla panos. ii tekpatl xiwitl, 1364. nochipa xochiyohtok. aw in tenochtitlan tlahtowani axayakatsin ye ihkwak nowian motetlatlakewi in altepewaka i tonawak onoke; inik tlaihiwa ihkwak kitemakak kopili tlatokayotl iwa chayawak koskatl iwa chalchiwitl iwa ketsalistli. okpa in yeyi, chikwasen. iwan tewatl titlanankilia okimotlahtlanili iawitsin kema tus nitewaltititlanis xikwalmotitlanili ammo tikixpachos in mitlahtol ammo ik niman konanke ye kitlekawia in tepetikpak, ik niman onkan ye kimana ye kiteka in sakatechiali, ik niman onkan kontekake in okasike tlatlawki oselotl; ik niman ye kihtowa ye kimolwia in tlahtoke iwan in oksekintin chichimeka totolimpaneka "tla tikpowakan tla tikihtokan tla tiktemachikan in ihiyo in itlahtol in toteow. amo nik neki. mah welikan, in tetepeton san omochiwilihkeh in tochantlakatsitsintinye wehka ammo onyeya atl ipan toaltepew in tlakotenkatsitsintin san omonechikalwiaya in atl ihkwak okiawia ihtik in se atekochtli in isehsekak pano ome wehweyi atlawtin leekak se inintin atlawtin omochiwilihkeh se akwemmitl ika kampa okalakia in atl ihtik in xawen inik motamachiwa in tlali inik patlawak nanmatl iwan senyolotli aw inik wiak makwilmatl aw in chinamitl kastoli omei maitl nawkanpa omomaman sesen estakas ome chinankwak home tlalpan. aw yehika in oksenka wei in tonatiw in ahmo mach iwki in metstli, amo wel mochiwas in metstli kisentsakwilis in itlanextilis in tonatiw, san seki san achiton ahnoso sekni in onkan wel ixpan momana, aw in oksekkan in amo wel ixpan kasitimomana amo wel ixkwichewas in tonatiw. mah amo wehweliwi in tixtsin aw ik niman yewantin kimonmotokilitiake mochintin in ixkichtin kabildo siudad tlaka tekpantiake, kintokatia ome vamderra ahnoso esdantarde real, itech ikwiliwtia in itlahtokatlawistsin in iarmastsin rei, inin ka tafetán tliltik netlok mantia iyomexti. xa itech ehekat, nimitstasohkamatilia. inin xiwpan ompewa in motokayotia "yaoyotl ipan ei xiwitl" iwan panitlasalo "tlapapatiliztli in inawatil". antepilwan, in antetekutin san chichimeka. aw in tesenkaw in tealtis niman ye ik yaw in tlenamakas. kitkilia in solin. in sowapa ¡ca chichiton owilowak panohli. aw in onkan atenko .... nikan nimitstatawtiti ika miak favor. ayemo ehko. aw in hwan diego in oiwkikak in iihiyotsin in itlahtoltsin in ilwikak siwapili, wel senka ik omoyoollalih, wel ik pachiw in iyolloh. aw in ipan ik v mani metstli de febrero, ikwak momikili in totlasotatsin frai bernardino de sahagún, tlatilolko moyetstikatka aw nikan in motokatsino kalitik sant fransisko; mochintin walake tlatilolko tlahtoke kimotokiliko. ika in okse in kwali tepanolti awilistli. aw yewatsin okimoteochiwili in senka mawistililoni don hwan péres de la serna arsobispo mexiko, kimopalewilike in doktor sausedo arsediano iwan doktor don hwan de salamanka chantre, mitra kitlalike iwan kapa de choro, aw ipadrinotsin muchiw in tlahtowani visurrei don diego fernándes de kórdova markés de gwadalkásar. ¡xinechmactili! domingo a xxv de abril, ikwak moteochiw in kustodia in imaxka tepetlatsinka natividas tlaka, niman iwan || 7 in isewalkaltsin in palio iwan teokwitlatlekaxitl sesario. inik nowiyan owalnentiake inik owalakxipetlatiake, ka masatl tochtli kowatl tekwani tototl iwan in okseki miektlamantin yoyolime manenemi in kimasia in kinminaya in kinwalkwatiake; nakasintli in imitak || 29v walmochiwtia, intlawitol inmiw inik walmotlaekoltihtiake, inmikon walyetia imewatilmah walyetia, san inmatla walonotia; in intlawitol inik walmotlaekoltihtiake, inik motokayotia teochichimeka. onkan otlakat pedronila maría, inin okimonamikti in migwel de sant hwan itstlakosawkan chane; onkan otlakat domíniga || 143r maría, inin okimonamikti in lukas de kastaneda tenanko pili. nima ye kiwalilwia “motolinia i mokolwa i machkawa. inin xiwpan ompoliwi in kkkp. tikinmakas, oyeyah. ya xielika ken ipa inieltoke. . aw in o ahsike pochteka in anawak xikalanko in yewantin ompa tlahtoke in kipachowa altepetl anawak niman ye ik kimmaka in ixkich om mokokow in tlahsotilmatli in tlasokweitl in tlasowipili in iaxka awitsotsin in ik kim on tlapalowa. niman ik onkan kihto in teomama tlamakaski witsiltsin: "tocnihuané nopilwané!"; kimilwi || 22v in mexika "ma ye ik otiwalake, ma ye ik otiwalkiske in tochan astlan". matlaktli tochtli xiwitl ipa mik awitsotsi, kastolxiwitl omome tlatokat awitsotsi. xiyaw akmo nihneki nikan tias tinechendrogaroa kanin kosas. amo xochiyowa. san se karransista otlekok wan okimomatokili ye tikatsintli. okintsatsili oksekintin. otlekoke nawi iwan yewatl ye makwiltin. mach kimoxinakatlaliliske in tonantsin. ye okikxikahke altar iwan omotepexiwike. sente omopepetoni ikxi; oksente opostek iman iwan inon achton otlekok oxixitikak itsonteko. se momostla otokwikatiaya iixpan akpatl; iixpan otokwikatiaya. iman tika in tatatsitsintin ika nanatsitsintin okipiaya tlen inixpan panos tlen okinmachtiaya piltsitintin. okintlatolmachtiaya kaxtilankopa iwan telpochtiaske noso ichpochtiaske kimatiske kenemiske iwan tlen kichiwaske. kema nepa ihwanti mokweso yewa okilkan kititlanis in amatl. tetlapalolistlahtoli in aka tlahtowani ik kitlapalowa, kinonotsa, in pili tewktli aw in kali ayak ontlachalanis in ikwak tla onimomikili yuh konitotia inik omonanawatitia aw in kali naw tekitimani ka wel nikmati ka san ninneixkawil wel imaxkan inkal ihoan ontetl ichinanyo. xa itech taltikpaktsin, i mochipa konittaya in kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli in chichimekatl in iwki in ayawkosamalotl moketsaya, ankaso ihiyo i kowatl aw in itla onoka in omotenew istak i malinali. aw in okik ayemo kinmiktiaya in wewe witsiliwitl senka kitlaokoltiaya in ichpuchtsin chimalaxotsin, in atle ma itla itech wetstia itlakentsin, kilwi in tlahtowani koxkoxtli "tlahtohuanié, ma itlatsin xikmotlaokolili i nochpuchtsin". nikan nimitsmaktilia nehin orasiones. xochitl tsetseliwtok in ma on netotilo antokniwan wewetitlan. ¿ on chielo ? san nentlamati toyolo. in san ka yewan tla xik ya kakikan. ye wal temo ilwikatl itik, in kwikatiwits in. kinankila tepilwan, on tlapitstiwitse. in tonatiw ixkopa itstiake, itlanahnamik: mahtlaktli wan yeyi se wei xonakatl amo keman mah tasewi amo teyi taseliya, 5.- iwan nikitowa i nopilo migwel hernandes nikmakatiw nochina 4 iwan kalatili in opa akosak aso itla nechtlaokolis notech monekis. in tlatokat witsiliwitl xxii xiwitl. ayak neli ye mokniw ¡lpalnemohua! yuh tontemati tlaltikpak monawaka san yuhkin xochitsalan ye timitstemoa tewantin tinemi tlaltikpak. namehwan mosta nantechtahuiliah, tlahkoxonakatl, in ahmo wel wehyi ¿tictlazohtla inin piltontli? nikan ipan in miyekintin oyaomikito in tetskoka in onpa tliliwkitepek. tomaiknin omokoko. akin kineki kipipina in iteyo, in semi welik. yewatl achto kiwalpewalti in tlahtokatlalilok || 75 in itoka in tepiltsin wewe nawyotsin tlahtowani kulwakan, inik yewatl itlakamekayotitech otemoko okisako in iskintin kulwakan tlahtoke; iwan in ikome itoka akamapichtli in otlahtokatiko achto nikan tenochtitlan, inik no yewatl itlakamekayotitech otemoko okisako in iskintin mexiko tenochtitlan tlahtoke. aw niman ik omowikake in yewantin ichkapixke in ompa mamasa intlakwayan senka san wel isiwka iwan papakilistika, aw in okimottilike okimoteotitsinoke okimotlatlawtilike; aw in owalmokwepke okimilwiko okintlapowiliko in oksekintin imikniwan in tlein okittato iwan in okimottilike. amotlen mawistik. newktli, ixkich in monekis iuki monotsa por in ajuayoj, tekekelowa komo se moohsak ichokilo. in onkan kichiw ipiltsin atenko itoka itskwawtsin xokoyotl, yuh kihtowa itech kis in siwapili kulwakan. tlakwalo aw in on tlakwalok ye no seppa tematekilo tekamapako. niman ye ik teamako teiyemako. satepan tetlawtilo. nitlayokoya, niknotlamatiya, san, nitepiltsin nesawalkoyotl. ontlasohtlakeh nikan ipanin amatl motenewas nochi in itech rnomati inintin yoyolitisitsin tewan tiknemilia kwali yes in momatis ken ika monemilistia mila in chichitoton in tlen mopuwas teahsihkamachiltis intla mihtoa in chichi ye teikniw okachi kwali yes mihtos yewatl senkiskakwali in miltekitka ikniwtli iii kali xiwitl, 1261. iaxax onikihto axkan nechmokwahwilis ihkwak momachitis tleipampa oniwala yoniktitla techialoyan nopetlakal. ¿ mowaxkatsin yotimoyektlalili? nikan ipan in tlachapolkwalok, temoke chapoltin; ikwak no mayanalok, mochi kikwake in tonakayotl. aw i yewatl in omotenew tonakachimal ka no onkan momikiliko in atentlipan inawak ayotsinko. 58. aw intla ok semilwitl, omilwitl nikan, ipaltsinko in tloke nawake, mixko, mokpak nontlachia, ok nimitskwaltis in chalchiwitl, in teoxiwitl, in kenin ahmo tiktokas in tochtil, immasatl; inik ahmo kana titekochwilos, ahnoso titapayolwilos. inik san ye tiktokas immelawak ohtli, in kitoka in akike in wel toptin, in wel petlakaltin in tlaltipak, iwan in akike in wel teixti, tenakasti, in wel intech netlakanekoni, aw in wel imihtik tlalilo in koskatl, in ketsali, in chalchiwil. ¿auh kan ok wits, kan ok kisakiw in tlein moxilan, moyomotlan mitsakilis? kwikachimal ayawi, tlakoch kiyawi tlaltikpak, in nepapan xochitli on yowala ika, ya tetekwika in ilwikatl. 63. ¿cuix ok iwiyan, kwix ok yokoxka in nemowa in tlaltikpak? ka san ixkich ik nimitsonpachilwiya in momatsin, in moexitsin. ma ik ken moma, in mix, in moyolo. ¿cuix iyopa in nimitskwaltis, nimitsitis in notenkwalak, in notenpopozoqui11o? san ok ye ixkich in tokommokakitia, notelputse. in intlal matlakmatl aw inik wiak chikwepowali niman ayak wel sepa kimonkwilis in iskich in intlal inik oaxkatiloke itenkopa in hustisia aw in inamik toltekatl isnawatilo inik aokmo sepa kontekwilis in tlali inik otlayelewika teixpan kawaltilo yuh titlanawatia in ipaltsinko su magestad axkan mierkoles a tres dias del mes de marso de 1563 años. don lukas kortes alkalde don tomas de akino alkalde paso ante mi migwel de los angeles eskribano. . iwan in konkwia yewatl iwiyak ketsali iwan xiwtototl iwan chalchiwtototl. nikan ipan in omikiko in xiwitltemok || 76r in tlahtowani kolwakan, in tlahtokat matlakxiwitl omei; aw sa niman ipan in in xiwitl in motlahtokatlali in koxkoxtli tlahtowani kolwakan. kimahkawato wan se tlalochtli noha tlaltekatl, in xokwawatsi, tosmaketsin, ye nekwametsi. achin ka tlakwiloa ipalnemoani. "tozquivaya niktsotsoni oa q.n. niktsotsona in teskatsintli onkan neva in teskatsonko onkan oyol tsonistapalatiati ok xokon i in uktli. onkak se taman saj. ikwak oticholoke iwan ocholoke sapatistas toxolal omokaw isel momochko malakatepek. omokawke kwanakame, chichime, mimistin, pitsome, kawatin. ikan awel otikinmamake méxiko ompa otikinkahke. inlá nikonitlanitiw i enechtlakw i lia' lakamo' baya skiera i kwenta nian i kwenta lakate lakahmo. mochiwa kampa eski, amo moneneki. kimelawak inkiahsise noponi ikanaya no xi tekpatl xiwitl, 8. —mačye serka diabli xotlatlapak ichpokaton. itoka porke el dia de san hwan otlakatl. in kwawtlatowatsi tlantokat xxix xiwitl. amo xikinmohmowti nopilwan, wahka ihkino momahkawato tlaskito ipa ne wan tikitah kena onka noponi axkan domingo kwaresma in ik 1 mani metstli abril de 1612 años, ihkwak opew in ye kimana tliltike inik sekintin okimanke tliltike; onkan hospital witsilan nwestra señora ye teotlak ipan sermón kinmachtiaya in onkan kimanako hustisia inik kinkalakike la kársel de korte. inik tikneltilia nikan tiktlalia totoka tofirma fecho ut supra. migwel de los angeles alkalde por mandado del señor alkalde pasó ante mi bernardino xwares eskribano. niman ye ik kinyawaloa in mitotia, niman ye ik wi in wewetitlan, niman kimawitekke in tlatsotsona walkokoton omexti in imakpal. satepan kikekwitekke weka wetsito in ikech. iwan san ye moch iw walmochichiwtiake in iw umpa mochichiwa in iwki san inxikolwipil kimakia, ipan mokwitlalpia in intlakotian in inpitsawayan, onkan kitekatiwi se gadana tepostli yuhki in imespada ipan ponwi, iwan san iwki tlamantilawia; aw in inkak yamanki tlayamanili kwetlaxtli || 135 in motenewa gamosa, yuhkinma san xokpalwandes ipan powi, ik kakia imikxik. no ihoan tokonitoa in tla titotlatolkwepaske san niman nayokmo tle topalewiloka mochiwa in topalewiloka mochiwaskia ihoan amo no itla tiktenewaske ai ik titlachalaniske in itechkopa amonamakak aik tle tikitoske in itechkopa omonamakak aik tle tikitoske in itechkopa tlatokatlatsontektli in okimotsontekilike leyes. itlanahnamik: nonotsalistli ye omotenew in oiw onmomikili in ik niman kontlahtokatlalike in wewe witsiliwitl, aw yehika ipampa ka weitlahtokatlakamekayotl kipiaya in inantsin tlakilxuchtsin ipampa ka ichpuchtsin in tlahtowani tsompanko. aw axkan otiknonotske in katharina de san hwan española ye kiwalaxiltia ka nel mononotske iwan no yewatl in inamik katka isabel maria itoka domingo garsia konito ka noyolokakopa in nikmaka in kali tlali in española ka nel titononotske iwan ka seki kikwik in itomines in nonamik katka. masewalme. san ihkí yaya tomokawai". paratani ayotsinapan, xaltipan kachi wehweyi sinti mochiwa wan kachi wewehkapantik in owat, kemeh eyi metro. xochitika ye iwan kwikatika nikimilnamiki tepilwan, —ma tehkwa yuwa sowako ka inchikame, ahmo. tik kawtewaskeh iwan nikitowa in itwalo omito kali inik omotamachiw inik wiak omatl senmitl aw inik patlawak sen matl ipan senmitl in in sa no...mochiwas in nomamik omito. aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl in asito yaoyotl in ompa chalko atenko; aw chikwexiwitl in san ok xochiyaoyotl in manka in kimasia in mexika pipiltin san ok kinkawaya in chalka, aw no iwi in kimasia in chalka pipiltin san ok kinkawaya in mexika, ka san ik inseltin in masewaltin in mikia. kikwechowah in itakka wan kichiwah paletas. vi tochtli xiwitl, 42. aw ye komolwia “tleyn kitoske? ma sa toconcaquiti”. mah takayowa. ¡anca ye nechmictizque!quihualhuica in wepantli, ka. noiwan okimpew nepapan tlakah yuhkin atlapulko, xa latlawko, tlakotepek, metepek, kapulwak, okoyakak, kwawpanoayan, xochiakan, teotenanko, kalimayan, tsinakantepek, tolokan (matlatzincah), xikipilko, tenantsinko, tepeyakak, tlaximaloya, ostoma, xokotitlán, okwilan, ostotikpak, matlatlan, kweskomatliyakak, tekalko, kwetlaxtlan, awilisapan, tlaolan, mixtlan, tetsompotitlan, tochpan, iwan oksekintin. lotah no kilwiah xaltotomat. in xiwit. no mokehketsa, pero komo ke tepitsin mososowa. nima ye wexotsinkatl kiwaltokili, walteyaka masamoyawal. ayamo' nihneki tlatete.kos kanin ni tokas in notlaoli. aw nel otlatlan in motakatsin in motlatokaya kwix a tikmokwaltis in tlaxkalkwappitstli in tlaxkaltotopuchtli in totopuchtsintli in tamamaliyakatsintli ? yewa in ikpak kwahutl owalwets. aw in on tlamanalok niman ye ik pewalo in kwiko; ok achiton tonatiw in kipewaltia in kwika. kimonilwia “ca ye kwali. isisna. miak nechpaktia moteki. nehwa, neh mosta nikisati, aw ka niman ik waltemmok, kiwalmotkililih in ilwikak siwapili in nepapan xochitl okitehtekito; aw in oiuhquimottilih, imatikatsinko conmocuilih; niman ye okseppa ikwexanko quihualmotemilih. se kimana ika komit wan at, mah oksi wan se kikwa ya, komo semiwehweyi mah se kitehteki para se kimanas. semi tsohtsopek. ye iman ticochizqueh. ik niman kihtoke in chichimeka totolimpaneka "aamoca sa tiaske ka ompa in titlamatiwi". aw in axkan motlapachilwitika in teoyotika motlatokatilia in ipan in nweva españa in senka mawistililoni don frai garsía gwerra arkobispo sankto domingo teopixki, in mokalakiko mexiko ipan yewatl in xiwitl de 1608 ik 29 mani metstli de setiembre, wel kwali inik kimonamikilike. a veinte i kwatro dias del mes de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años onkan ipan tlaxilakali siwateokaltitlan onkan tsatsik in tekpoyotl in ipanpa monamaka ikal mariana in teokaltitlan mani okitenew in iski ipatiw mochiwa aw in ikwak okakok ayak otlanankili testigo diego astaxochitl. konetl aweyilme, nikan ipan in omomikiliko in itoka kwawtexpetlatsin in ikchikwei tlahtowani kulwakan, in tlahtokat ompowalon- || 25r -caxtolli ipan exiwitl in nikan kulwakan. onka sente tliltik pantsin kotoktli ihtik in mahchihkoli. ipan in in opewke wewetke chichimeka, in ye kiwalkawtimani in inchan astlan inik onkan ye witse, inik onkan ye waltlatlamankakistimani in ihtik in onkan ka ostotl chikokkan in koyonki motenewa chikomostok kinewayan, inik nikan ye tlatlamankawitse, inik nikan ye || walmoteka; san onkan kisako in chikomostok kinewayan tsotsonpa miskitlikakan, kin wel achto ik pewke in ipan in xiwitl omotenew, in ye onkan walkistimani. . iwki in in ik walahsia in ostomeka. mochiwa miak. axan para tehwa xtoka wan skiera xitechchiwilikan kaso. . ma intlaaxkawil intonewilis in chichinakilis omochiw ma intlaahkwiw: ma xokom mocuili. aw inik onkan in katka kwitlatetelko in akxoteka, onkan kimanka sentetl intiyankis in onkan tiamikia; inin tiyankistli ompa kiwalwikake in tulam. vi tochtli atle muchiw. in tenkwouhayoh xohxoxoktik wan tsikitsitsin wan ikakauyo yek takwawak. aw i topatiw mochiw. in ipatiw mochiw i telpochtili, in tlamakaski, in ichpochtli, in piltsintli. ye ixkich, masewali in oipatiw mochiw san omatekochtli tlaoli, sa matlaktli axaxayakatlaxkali, tekixkisakatlaxkali sa sempowali topatiw mochiw. amomasewalti, amolwilti. aw sanno ipan in in omotenew xiwitl in asiko atonaltsin chichimekatewktli iwan tliltekatsin chichimekayaotekiwa iwan oksekintin totolimpaneka chichimeka, onkan onmotlaliko sekni texkalko itlok inawak tepupola; onkan kimotemilike simatl, ik axkan motokayotia || 40v simatexkalko. ipan chikwase tochtli xiwitl temokke oksepa chapolme iwan kikwakke immil mexicah. onkan ye kawalo chichimekatl i tlakamasatl. axkan hwebes sankto in ik 27 mani metstli marso de 1614 años, ihkwak okse yankwik tlayawalolistli prosessión onkan okis in parrochia de la vela krus; || 246 inin españoles iwan sekintin timasewaltin in onkan okitlalike inkofradía animastin intech powi. oksepa nikisa yeniaw nitlahpias. ipan in ikwak moyekti motlakwikwili in akalotli in nikan mexiko, in iski akalotli; nowiampa witsa in altepetlipan tlaka. iuki kitokaitiah por in taki mochiwa in exot, wan in iteyo kemeh in exoyeman, tamati kemeh kahfen ololtik. nechsiekapikiltike onkan kitowan in doktor pus axan niaw nimikmakas inpahtli para tikuni:s para mamisinyektarokan. xi tekpatl xiwitl, 1464. tewan ticaquih. in no nanakat. onkan kimakak in tlahtokayotl in tewktsontli, in iwki korona ipan powia; aw onkan yankwika ik pewki in teowatewkyotl. amo wel mochi nikan mihtos motenewas ka senka miek tlamantli || 163 in tepan kichiwaya, amo moneki moch mihtos, aso kwali ahnoso amo kwali; ma san isel ik kimomakilis kwenta in totekwiyo dios, makamo italwilo ma san motelchiwa, kiyokoli yewatl kimati, ka nel teopixki itetsinko powki in totekwiyo dios, ka tel ixpantsinko ixkoyan ik kwenta kimomakilis in ihkwak momikilis. amo monamaka. tetl ipa kitihtisi. xihsiwi; tioweh noka pewas tlachipinis. kwali mochipawa in kiltonili, mopaka iwan mokwakwalatsa ika istatl; satepan ma kwali ixika, mopatsoa inik ahmo itech mokawas in atl. ipan kaxitl motlalia in pitsochiyawisotl; motsoyonia in xonakatl iwan kiltonili; inik ye mokwas motlalilia in chiltemoli in ye omochiw ipan molkaxitl. —pero xmitalwi en mexikano. noketsalwikolol teokwitla mekatika nik ilpia. namoknoikniw. san nixotlatlapia, namokniwtsin. noxochintlapitsakaltsin in ik nonpaktika ye kwekwentla yewan. sanno ihkwak kitlaliah tewktli in itoka fransisko havier vene gas yuhkin tlahtokateixiptla nikan yankwik kaxtilan. aw in ichan tlaka niman ikwak kompewaltia in tlamasewa. motsoyotia aokmo mamowia tel wel maltia in itlakapa, yese aokmo polaki. aw ye ok konpanawi in kawitl in imman ipan tlatenewke tlamatinime, ye kin ipan in omochiwako ome tsilini ipan tlako hora, in opew wel yekene tlakosawia, in san iwiantsin ye tlayowatiw, aokmo chikawak tonaya, iwan mixtli san ipan okikistinenka tonatiw. iwan in kenin iw yewatsin totekwiyo dios moch ik moyetsinotika i mochi nowian in ixkich inik wei semanawatl in saso kampa in ipa yewatl semanawatl, aw ka sa wel no yuhki in iyolia in iánima in tlakatl ipan ka itech ka in semanawatepitsin, aw ka yewatl in itlak in inakayo ka moch itech ka i mochi inik nowian in itlakapa ka moch ik nowian katki in saso kampa yewatl in itlaktitech in tlakatl. aw axkam ipam inin xiwitli nikam nikpewaltia nomatika ika makwili nom/o/ nikchiwa inin teopam ichansinko in dios iwan no yewasin san hwan newatli notoka d[on] hoseph de san hwan iwan nopilwan itoka d[on] fransisko hwares de san hwan iwan ite/s/aw itoka dfon] nikolás baptikta de san bartolomé iwan omentin noxwiwan siwasisintin se itoka dfoña] maria de la krus iwan dfoña] christina toribia de san hwan wan nonamik itoka dhoña] maria nikolasa iwan nomonsin in /o/mic itoka dfon] fran[sis]ko hwáres de san hwan itoka doña ines teresa iwan okse nopilsin itoka d[on] pablo de san frahnsisko} de san hwan telpochtli iwan nopilosin d[oñ]a nilacha katalina de san bartolomé de san hwan timochintin xochitetekutin kwawtli oselotli nochi nopilwan inin notlakamekayowan. de afrika. ninemi tlen nenmayitia chanehkeh ammaka nawati tlen nenmayitia chanehkeh sasanka nekochmelawalok tlen nenmayitia chanehkeh taktewatsin newatl tlen timonekiltia oniwala oniwala nimechmotlahpalwiko yese taktewatsin newatl tlen timonekiltia ammitla ika oniwala tleinammitla ika oniwala xinechmochili san tepitsin ihkwak motlakatili in kakamatltewktli. in okachi mochiwa kampa panian. ne tlaiko atl", ihkini kiilwi. in kwameh tsikitsitsin. itlanahnamik: tetsilakatl, ayotl kawantok aya amokal, in manika wexotsinko. kemeh in hulio onkak ya itakka, in semi ahwiak. in istakowat semi yemanik, pisilowat amo wehweyi mochiwa wan chichilowat no kwaltsin. kinehki para kena taol yakmo ohkion yakmo ohkion keme antigwa okin maetiyaya'. inik san mokaw yuh mihto kimotlakewi in frai herónimo inik sa mixkawi motlayawalwi se inkrusifixotsin semanawatl in ipan moketsinotiw, iwan inin san hwan baptistatsin españoles san moketsinotiw mahkopatlachialtihtiw iwan momanepanotsinotiw iwan totlasonantsin. ihkwak nipipilton senka nikwekwets iwan noyolo kimati miekpan onikmotlawelkwitili in nonantsin. yehika newatl achto onitlakat, notech monekia nikchiwas mochi in netitlanilistli iwan kemmanian nikinnamikia nokniuwan ipan ohtli, intlok nawiltiaya iwan ok nikilkawaya in notlanawatil, kemen ihkwak ahmo nikmatia intla tomatl ahnoso xitomatl in nikkowaskiani, yese senka onechpalewi in onikilnamik in nonantsin omotenkwawtilihtsino in nikkowas “inon kipia icoton”. inin onikilwi in tlanamakak iwan ika nonemak onechahsihkamat. ye ome tsilini ipan tlako hora in omosewiko hehekatl; wel itstik in omochiw omilwitl. aw on seppan ik moteilwi se tlakatl kimotlalkowaltokayan siwatsintli amo nikmati in tlen itoka aw omomikili in axkan aw notech motlatlanili in tlatowani sorida ixpan tekwikake techilwin wel xikmelawaka yen keski xiwitl in otlatek in pablo makwex. amonka tleka tlachiwaltin nochi motlahuihuiquiltizqueh. kemahkatsin, mach amotepakti timitsnolwilis ka n kokolo. ye sekipan tonali san tlapechpan yeloak. kani moilochti. ik otsatsik okitekakiti akin kikowasneki in kali in onkan ipan tlaxilakali sant hwan yopiko inakastlan teopan in kinamakan in hoan de la turre yoan gaspar de san pablo albaseas omomikili maria xoko in itenkotsinko hustisia in señor governador yoan señores hweses. ye onpewa in tlahtolmachiyotl. axkan martes ik 10 mani metstli abril de 1612 años, ihkwak ye teotlak tlaka ipan makwili tsilini in okixowak onkan tekpan palasio otlayawalolotia inik okalakowato weiteopan iglesia mayor inik ihonrras ivigiliatsin omochiwili inik omomikili toweisiwatlahtokatsin doña margarida de austria reina de españa moyetstikatka, in inamiktsin okatka toweitlahtokatsin don felipe tersero rei españa in axkan moyetstika. in tlakah ayokwel okalakeh in tlamawisaloyan. ¿ihuan tlen opanok ka in kalmantli otimokowihtsinoskia? elito tokfli pehki mexikah opanokke gwextekatlichokayan iwan oasikoh koatlikamak noso koatepek, ipan ome kali xiwitl. lwego otia’ke asta xanisio. se kikwa, se kiixka wan iwan se kikwa emol oso chiltamoltal iwan tomat. itech nehin hora,
