aw in oasiko in wel achto audiensia mexiko yewatl ipan xiwitl de 1528, aw in oidoresme walake onkan intekiw mochiw yewatl in lisesiado alonso de la parada, iwan yewatl in lisesiado fransisko maldonado, iwan yewatl in lisesiado hwan ortis de matienso, iwan yewatl in lisesiado delgadilo, iwan ikwak makok inik presidente mochiw onkan audiensia in nuño de gusmán governador ompa in pánuko. wan ya waikapa itstok nopa pilokichpiltsi aw in ipan in omotenew metstli de febrero de 1608 años, ikwak no senka miekpa in moyeyeko kiyawitl, achi keskipan in kiyaw. nikan motlahtokatlali in don fransisko de sandoval akasitsin tlatkik iwan don hernando de gusmán omakatsin teowatewktli, tlahtoke tlalmanalko. no ikwak omik don lurenso hwáres de mendosa, ipan metstli hunio. ye pewas kiawis. tlanankililistli in tewktli ik kinankilia in tlahtowani in okitlapalo. in tomakilit ahwiak. in iteyo ya walewa kampa posoni wan teyowa wan entos kimoyawa ya in ehekat wan tamiti kasá wan komo se tameuj ompa ya in ixwa. ye ixkich in itlahtoltsin don hwan de sandoval. ornea sente weyi kwawitl ipan xochimila. ¿queniuh kani yatih nopilwan, kani tacuatih? ateukwitlatl nokon ya ittas. amo se kitoka. amo mochipautani. para kiahsiskí ilwikaktli in iskitlamantli omotenew tlasomaxtlatl tlasotilmatli yewantin kimotlawtiaya in wewei tiakawan: tlakatekkatl, tlakochalkatl, kwawkwachiktin in otomi in mixkowatlailotlak in eswawakatl in masatekatl in tokwiltekatl in atenpanekatl in tlilankalki in tisokyawakatl in teskakowakatl in tlakochalkatl tewktli in ye mochintin tlasopipiltin. —¿aquin okse? istatl, ixkich in monekis tehwa kwawtawewentsin, mochiwa in kaltsintan oso kuoujtaj. aw in akulnawakatl in askaputsalko teyakana in kwawtlahtowa okontlali itlahtol in xochimilko iwan kulwakan iwan xaltokan; makwilkampa namoyaloke mexika kwawnawak. xiwala xisewaki motlaxeal kema ompa niaw kalihtik inin omotlatenewi tikihtas ammo tikwalanis in tlen nimitsilwis tleika kwali ka xikihta tlahwonon nan tikchixtoke tlen ammo tikahsikamati ye titlakatl xikixtemo motlaixnamik ye ximosetili ammo toka ximotekipacho yotitekit yotitechpalewik na nikintemos karpinteros. see tosaasaanil, see tosaasaanil. tias iipan see tepeetl, iitlakotian tepeetl, tikoonextis san see aameyali. kimottilito in mili inik moteilwia tlakwiloke fransisko martin iwan ipilwan lurenso martin aw ipampa kitlanke hustisia i yewatl migwel de los angeles fiskal san fransisko san hoseph okelimik iwan okipixkak aw amo san kimokwili kimomakili in don martin hernandes akatekatl ipiltsin katka wewe motewksoma ilwikamina. nikan mopouha aw inin, inik ompa ichantsinko walmokixti inik onkan walmowikak omotenew iglesia mayor, san ik ye onkan mokalakiko in tekpan kiyawakpa in onkan katki okse pwerta; aw in yewantin kabildo tlaka, in deán, in arsediano, in chantre, in kanónigos in rasioneros, in okimottilike onkan ye onmaxitihtiw arsobispo, ik niman kiwalmonamiktiliaya, se palio kwachkali inik kimonamikiliaya inik kimokwachkaltilitiaskia inik on- || 230 -mocallaquito teopan, aw in yewatsin omotenewtsino teoyotika tlahtowani arsobispo amo kinmoselilili in omotenewke kabildo tlaka in intenamikia kwachkali, atle ipan kinmottilili, san iw ommokalaki in teopan. aw iwan ye matlakpowalxiwitl ipan onpowalxiwitl ipan ome xiwitl in ipan v akatl xiwitl, 1367 años, in motlahtokatlali in tlakatl akama- || 86 -pichtli achto tlahtowani tenochtitlan. nikan ipan in in yakwikan in asito in mexika in chalko in amakeme ikpak, kimiminato in ikal tlakatekolotl in kimoteotiaya amakemeke; iwan tsakwaltitlan tenanko diablo ikal katka in kimiminato. wan kema ayi achi yowi nimanísi kimachilihki wan imorral kitlali iuki monotsa por in tihtiltik wan tihtilawak. ¡xinechnezcayotili wan xinechmaktili! vii tekpatl xiwitl, 4. itlak neka neixtiloni. in oiw tixitinke in tlatilulko tlatoke motlalito kwawtitla in topantemoktsi, tlakuchkalkatsintli koyowewetsi, temilotsi. iwan aik san niman wel walasia in nanawaltin in kintokayotiaya chichwewetke, in wel senka weweintin tlakatekolonawaleke katka, wel kimakasia in altepetl amakemekan chalko. .ica nitemok nomatlavakal niki ima kwi ni ki ima kwi niki ima kwi ni ki ima kwi aw inik omotamachiw mili makwilpowali inik wiak aw inik patlawak senpowali onkan estakas omomaman aw in yewatsin tetawan i nikan chaneke san pablo tlalistakapan wel in senyoloka in konchiwaske ka nelimikiske aw ye onpa tistiwi kitokaske aw ye mako in intlaxtlawil 4 pesos inik aokmo seppa motlatolkwepaske inik neli nikan kitlalia itoka iwan ikrus fecho en mexiko u[t] supra migwel sakobo martin sakobo migwel pablo fransisko ximenes migwel hernandes thomas sakobo. nixpan omochiw eskribano fransisko xwares eskribano. pahke nopa sopilotes. itech ne nikalihtik. in ipan axkan sábado a xxiii de hulio de 1594 años, in mawistililoni padreme in wei tlamasewalistli kimopielia deskalsos ikwak walmikwanitsinoke in onkan yankwik inkaltsin okimokechilike sant ipólito kiyawak in iwikpa tlaxilakali wewekalko. ok seppa no iski ik kikixtia in tekowani in tlaaltile ik wal mako ya in itlaaltil. nikitoa i newatl atonalsin istlakosawkan chichimekatewktli in kwawisasin tenanko nikmakatiw in kwawtlatli yniqu itechkopa in popokasin; wel pewa heloxochitepetl, sonpanko, moxala, kiwalmotla kialowakakatl, konmotla kwautepos, konnosa ayawkaltikpak, konnosa ilamak, no konnosa techalok, iwan konosa mesintitlan iwan kesaltepek. 87. ¿tle ninochiwa, tle ninomati? ¿ca san axixpan, ka san kwitlapan nochan, nihkayan, nonemian, nokisayan? kan ahastli, kan ikwitlapili, ka xamitl, ka pololi nitekwikaw, niteankaw, ka nimasewali, ka nitlapaliwi, ka nikwawki, ka nelmikki, ka niknotlakatl. ka onikchokti, ka oniktlaokolti, ka ixtlampa, ka inakastitlampa onechmottili in notekwiyo, in ipalnemowani; yuhkiin in onokonkak, in onokonmawiso. metlapa kitenki wan kitiski kwali aw in mexiko tlahtoke don antonio valeriano wewe, don herónimo lópes governador mexiko, don hwan baptista tlahtowani governador tlatilolko; alkaldesme mexiko martín xwáres, || 29 migwel sánches, don bartholomén, don migwel sánches, gabriel xwáres; iwan fiskal hoseph xwáres, antonio raphael síndiko eskrivano iglesia, fransisko sánches korregidor mexiko. iyaha iyaiya iya ai a aiyo aiyaiya aya iya yo aiya iya aiya iya iyo kolivakan mavispan inon amo owi. nia nikanatin sente. seki nihkaki borachos koni' miak nekwtli asta motlamotlatinemi' borachos pero nehwatl ahmo nadamás sanonikwalilkaw. monamaka. aw ma im ixko ma im ikpak nitlachie in iknowewe in iknoilama aw in tonanwan in totawan in puchteka wewetke in pwechteka tlahtoke; iiii kali xiwitl, 1301. in tlatokat awitsontsin xviii xiwitl. ipan in mochiw inik tlayawalolok in ipampa sankto konsilio in teoyotika nesentlalilistli; sankto domingo walpewaloto onkan walwilowak i sant augustín. aw in oyuh kikakke in in chalka in akxoteka in tlahtowani toteositewktli in tekwachkawtli ik pakke, kihtoke "ma iwi, ka ye kwali, kaokmo weka, ka sa nikan, ka yuh tokonmati in onkan ka in chalchiwmomostli". ¡amo xikelkawa! aw in okontokake niman ye ik teponaskwiko. yewatl in kewa anawakayotl ahnoso xopan kwikatl. aw nikan ka oksentlamantli intlatol in oksekintin wewetke; yuh kitowa in. tlen 95 tlanawatihkayotl. iwikpa motlapehpenis ministro tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia tlen totlalnantsin, monekis: i. mexika altepechaneh ika itlakatilis, nelkwali kitekiwitos tlahtoli iwan altepeyotl tlen itechpowi; ii. kiaxitihtos sempoali iwan kaxtoli xiwitl keman asis tonatih quitocahtlaliseh; iii. mopialis keman quitocatlaliseh, matlaktli xiwitl wekawayotl, amatokayotl tlen tlahtol tlaxitlahketl, kiixwasanihtos tekiwa noso kaltlanawatili tlen melawak kipia tlanawatili; iv. mopialis nelkwali tlatenewalistli iwan amo keman kiixpantihtoseh ika tleweli tlahtlakoli iwan kitlatsakwiltihtoseh ika se xiwitl tlatsaktli; tla tlachtektos, tlakahkayatos, tlaixpanotos iwan sekinok tlamantli tlen kipitsowis tlaixnewalistli tlen inixpa altepechanehke, mokotonas itlanawatikayo, san tleweli tlahtlakoli tlen quicahuiltoseh; v. mochantlalihtos ipan totlalnantsin ome xiwitl iwekawayo keman asis tonati quitocatlaliseh; iwan vi. amo tekichihtos ken sekretario tlen estado, prokurador general tlen totlalnantsin noso tlen hustisia tlen distrito federal, wehkapa tepantlahtoani, tepantlahtoani tlen sentlanawatiloyan iwan amo weyi tekiwa tlen se tlaltlanawatiloyan noso hefe tlen iyolo weyi altepetl, tlen se xiwitl panotos keman quitocatlaliseh. in amatokayotl tlen ministros kachi kwali ipan wetsis tlakameh tlen melawak kwali tequipanotoseh, kipiaseh tlalnamikilistli iwan xitlawak tlasenkahtoseh noso nochi kinixmahtoseh ika kwali inyolo, kwali tekitinih iwan kwali ohtli kiwalikah ipan tekitlasenkawali. nikan ipan in in momikiliko i nesawalkoyotsin tlahtowani akolwakan tetskoko, in tlahtokat onpowalxiwitl ipan onxiwitl; aw sa niman ikwak motlatokatlali in ipiltsin itoka nesawalpili tlahtowani akolwakan tetskoko. aw in kali in ikwak monamakas ayak onkan tlatos anoso tlachalanis yuh kitotia in itlatol in ilamatsin maria xoko konito i nopilotsin anan mosel ka nel imak in ye no newan in ikwak in tla monamakas in kali onkan itlatsin tlaokolilos yuh kitotia i ka nopan motlatoltis in tlaxilakaleke inin testigos konitowa in pedro lwis ompa omomikilito in kwawchinanko. tlahko kilo chilakachtextli iwan innakoch kwawnakochtli tlatlatlapalikwiloli, iwan yakapilolixtspatlaktli ipan kisaya. aw niman yewatl kitokilia in xochitl. in ik kitki imayawkampa in kitsitskia in chimalxochitl; aw iopuchkopa ompa kitsistkia in kwawxochitl. in ixiw molpili mexinka sano insexiwyok, in omokaltike. in nanakatl, in ye tlapaktli, motlapoa iwan motemitia ika keso; in waxchili moihseki ika xonakatl iwan axox; satepan mochi inin motesi yese achto in waxchili mosiyawa. ipan kaxitl motlalia yei xumali pitsochiyawisotl iwan ihkwak ye senka totonki ye motlalia in waxchili in ye tlatextli ika tepitsin atl, ihkwak ye kwali tlatlewatsali, ye motlalilia ok tepitsin atl ixkichkaw in ye tepitsin tetsawak. ipan kaxitl ahnoso tepuskaxitl motlalia in tlaonewia pitsochiyawisotl, motsoyonia in kwitlaxkoinanakatl in ye tlatemitili, in ye totoltetlakimiloli, satepan ye motlalia ihtik in waxchilmoli ma wel wiksi. se kilo exotl in senka konetik onkán nihxiyutis nikawa in pakyotl. yotikalakeh ipan sente ohtlipa altepenepantla, kampa onka miak ohanalistli. kalmimiloltin yomotekpanakeh iwan yoyolik nehnentikateh mocempanohuah. ¿canin titemosneki? ayokwan okpoliwih sekin calmahmanquih. nitemos ixtlan tlawilchihchikan kalko. inik ontlamantli nikitowa notlatol in tla omonamakak kali iwan tlali yepowali pesos nikmakatia in nonamik isabel itech ononekis aso kana kaltsintli ye kitemoliske in kwepopaneka honkan moyetsties. in onkan ahsiko weiteopan iglesia mayor, ye kiniwti much onkan tekpantia, kiwikatiake in iskitlamantli in wei in owi in mawistik in itlamawisolotsin in imisteriosyotsin tlahtokaichpochtli sankta maría, inik yewatsin spíritu sankto miek tlamantli || 213 yqu itechpatsinko kimopohtilitsinowa kimonenewililia in omotenewtsino tlahtokaichpuchtli, in itechpatsinko kimotlachieltilia in wel itechtsinko powi in teotlamatilistlamawisoli in nikan motenewa; ipan ik tlayawalolok in iskitlamantli yewatl in imachiyoilnamikokatsin in ineskatlahtolotsin in ichipawakanenakayotilistlakatililokatsin motenewa limpia konsepsión, in itech powi ye in tonatiw, in metstli, in wei sitlali tlatwinawak walkisa, in tlatsakwilotl tsawktiw in iteokaltsin totekwiyo dios inik awastli ilwikak, in soyatl, in asitonaskwawitl, in awewetl, in tlatska, in teskatl, in kastilan tulpatlak-witstekolxochitl lilio, in xuchitl rosa, in kilmiltepankali werto in wel tsawktika, in ameyali fwente in wel tlatsawktli, iwan in oksekitlamantli itetsinko neskamachiyotlahtowa tlahtokaichpuchtli konsepsión, moch onkan kikixtike in. iwan ihkwak kimonanke in ayotsinka in tenanka. x tochtli xiwitl, 1502 años. aw in onkan tlahtowani in kulwakan yewatl in tlakatl in itoka koxkoxtli. nitelwitiw in san tóbyas kechikwali óhkion tinechchiwaltia. kwaltia aw yehika ipampa inpan popokak se sitlali ilwikatitech. kiwik se komitl vii kali xiwitl, 953 años. ¿quexqui imanin kipia se tonali? aw in tlali ka towewetlal techkawilitiw in nokoltsin katka tenochtsin aw inin oniktenew in kali iwan tepankali iwan tlamantli mochi monamakas mokwis chikonpowali pesos anoso chikwasenpowali ka tel tikpie exekutoria inik ninoteilwi. tewa nian se mosenyelisienin tikpia ipan neka altepenawak. aw sanno ompa walake in tolam; aw in intlahtokaw walmochiwtia itoka tekonewatewktli tekwachkawtli, ompa motewktlali in tetlweweyakan, inik walake inik ompa walolinke. nonotsalistli. mah amo kimatoka kimichin, mochiwa miak. se tochtli xiwitl in nima aukmo kiaw, ikwak xitinke mesika maianalistika; kwawtika anotiake mesika. wan nechpachaniko nika atitla. nikan ipan in in kinwalyaochiwaya in kinwalpewaya in mexika in onkan chapultepek, weitenanko inchan in kinyaochiwako; onkan kasike onkan kimiktike in teomama kwawtleketski. owatl nikawín amo semi onkak, tel onkak ne tonalixkopa. in aso kwextekatl, aso teoweyo, yakawikole, yakako yanki, ixtlamiwa, motlakikwilo, itskoautika. niman yoh motlatlalia in tekuli, inik moxixima, inik motlatlamachia. niman wewets tlekikistli, aw inik mokilike in iw mochiw, ompa nawtetl in tilmatli itech tlakwiloli mopipilo teopan sant joseph; ixkich tlakatl kittak kimawiso in españoles in timasewaltin. aw in oiw kinpew in tokolwan chichimeka, san nokwel motekato imapan in popokatepetl. aw in yewantin in ahtle okikwake nanakatl no kimonihtilia in tle inpan mochiwas, iwan in tlein kichiutinemi sekintin in ahso ichteki in ahso tetlaxima. in iketetl semanawatl in tlali motokayotia afrika; inin inik kixexelotiake in ye wekaw tlaka katka miek tlamantika, aw masiwi in axkan ipan tokawiw inik kixexelowa yewantin in ilwikatitech tlamatinime iwan tlaltikpak tlalmatinime in motenewa geógrafos, sa ixkich makwilkan kistika. se rei tlaixpiya aw in hin: timotolinia telpuchtlé: intla itla moknopil momasewal mochiwas, intla itla ipan mitspowas totekuyo ka ok tokon ittas ok tokon mawisos in tekoko in tetolini in ayekolistli in teyakakpa kikis: marso noitoka marseño wanin mektli abril non yehwatl tlaol ku:netl i toka tlaol konetl. akmo yopanok inon tiempo den baratura. aw ye ipiltsin in ipan asiko, oyuh ya yexiwitl tlakat iwan ya yexiwitl tlahtokati itoka kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli, yehika ok chapantika in kitlahtokatlalike atentlipan, aw yewatl kitewktlahtalwia in tlakatl wewe itskwawtsin atlawtekatltewktli. iuki kilwiah por in kixtiliah pulke.yon ipa iuki moskaltia kemeh ewa : tsitsikitsin imai wan tihtilaktik wan yek uitsyoj, yek aachka uitsyoj.uan moskaltia, wehweyi mochiwa imai wan imayekapan no uitsyoj.ipa se taman saj. mochiwa parahko, amo nikawín, nikawín amo teyi.tehwan tikpiyayah se pesmaapan, tsikitsin tikoukeh sakapoasta. kitokah wan ompa mokoneyotia.kemeh yetok inalwayo tein tomawak ompa ya pankisa ikonewan, amo ikespan mochiwa itsmolinia, ta wehka pankisa.kimeuaj.kemej kahfentenoh ompa ihkaya, kimeuayaj.amo miak mochiwa, ipa kampa kitokaj, ompa sah mochiwa.no kipiyayah se ne atautsalan.no xochiyowa, amo nikmati kemanian. monamaka imaj.yejuan ya kikwitih akin kipiya kwakwoweh wan tempalanij.no monamaka in pulkej. iwan in krus kimoyakaniliaya inik arsobispo ikxitlantsinko ixpantsinko ihkaya, iwan in okseki tlamantli itlahtokamawissotsin inik visurrei moyetstikatka moch onkan katka itlantsinko; onkan mochi tlakatl kontennamikia in imatsin, inik onkan itechtsinko moknopilwiaya onpowalilwitl in tesentlapopolwilistli indulgensias. namehwan nikan namechaxkatiliti nehin namotahtoltsin, aw sano ipan in in omotenew xiwitl se tekpatl in motlahtokatlali in tlakatl kihnatsin pochotl tlaltekatsin tlahtoani mochiw tetskuko akulwakan; ihkwak kimosiwawati in siwapili kwawsiwatsin in ichpuchtsin en blanko. || ka no yewantsitsin in teopixke ik motemachtilike in iw mochiwas in iw axkan omochiw, kimitalwike in teopixke "ayac momawtis misawis inik kwalos tonatiw, ka san achitonka in tlayowas; teopan ximosenkixtiki, nikan timechyolchikawaske"; ipampa inik sekintin teopan mokaltemato. nochipa. ¿ kwix sa aokmo, kwix sa ye ixkich ? ¿ kwix ye iwki, kwix aokmo ilotis, in kwawitl, in tetl? ¿cuix aokmo kwepis, in meleltsin, in mokwalantsin ? ¿ kwix aok tle ik sewis in mosomaltsin, in meleltsin? ¿ kwix sa otimakawaloke, kwix oitolok in topan, in miktlan, kwix omito, kwix aokmo san, atl sesek? ¿ kwix aokmo san tsitsikastli? ¿ kwix neli axkan: semmayan tlayowas? ¿za aokmo monakastitlampatsinko tikmottilis in masewali? niman ye ik temulkawaltia kin machitia in wewetke in ilamatke iwan in ixkichtin kipalewiske iwan in kwikanime chikometika in tekakitia. san kristóbal, moskaltia kemeh xokokwowit wan ikwouyo no uitsyoj, imaxiuyo yek ahwiyak. se malkochtli kiltonili ome litro atl tlen 85 tlanawatihkayotl. tla keman pewas kawitl tlen tlanawatiloyan amo moixnextis tlayekanani tlen motlaphpenihtok, noso tlapehpentli amo mochihtos iwan amo motokatlalihtos ipan 1º disiembre metstli, mokotonas itekih tlayekanani tlen kitlami itlanawatil iwan moixkawilis tlanawatili tlen weyi tlahtokan sennechikolistli, kewak tlayekanani san tlatokpa, tlen kitokahtlalis weyi tlahtokan sennechikolistli, noso tla amo akas iwan kewak san tlatokpa tlanawatihketl, tlen kitokahtlalis sennechikolistli tekichiwani, kichiwas tlahtoli ken moihkwilohtok ipan tlanawatikayotl tlen onpanokok. keman poliwis tlayekanani san se ome tonatih, in weyi tlahtokan sennechikolistli, tla mosentilihtos, noso tla amo, kena monechikohtos sennechikolistli tlen tekichiwani, kitotlahtlalis se tlayekanani san tlatokpa tlen tekichiwas nochi tonatih tlen keman akas tlen neltlayekanas. keman poliwis tlayekanani kipanos sempoali iwan mahtlaktli tonatih iwan weyi tlahtokan sennechikolistli amo monechikohtos, in sennechikolistli tekichiwani kikixtis amatlanotsali tlen amo nochipa nechikolistli tlen weyitlahtokan iwikpa inin makisenkawa tlamakawalistli iwan tokayotl, tlen inon itechpowi, tlayekanani tlen san tlatokpa. tla tlen poliwis, san tlatokpa mochiwas nochipaya, mosenkawas ken moihtowa ipan tlanawatikayotl tlen onpanok. vii kali xiwitl, 1317. ye wits yowali. ma ik itech nonasi,yektli yan kwikatl in tesosomoktsin. .nonan sitlalkweye, otikmochiwili ? otikmoyolitili? ka no tewatl ika tewan ika timilakatsoa ¡nanechtoca, okito sapata, hasta kampa tlamis último kartucho! iwan tla nechmiktia xikayan namewan. makamo namechkitsikikan everardo gonsáles wan andrés kampos ika melchor kampos. iwan tla amo nanekiske nanechtokaske, xikayan intlal tierra fría. ¡aihmo xinechtokakan! nian ka tlen nankikwaske ipan otli. xikalakikan ompa méxiko. ¡amotla namechpanoz! mochiwa kajfentaj. no kwaltia para pahti ihwak tekokoh se itsontekoh mah se kiteki kahkanawak wan mah se motalili se ikwahkwanakastah wan mah se mokwapiki ya. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. iwan amo tentsoneke, iwan san iwkin siwaxayakeke, iwan san istalekpopol inik chipawake, in inxayak san istalektik; moch iwke in habón tlaka, yuhki innakayo iwan amo senka kwawtike, in iw mochi tlakatl okimittak. iwan in kanin kixowayan, ahmo tewatl achto tikisas. intla onkate in mitspanawiya, yewatin achto kisaske. ahnoso kalakowayan, ahmo tewatl achto tikalakis, yewantin achto kalakiske, immitspanawiya. san no yewantin kiyakattitieske in kampa netlaliloyan; in kampa neketsaloyan, san no yewantin kiyakattitimaniske. ¿zazo poliwi ya moyolo? ¿can monekwiltonol, tikwikanitl? ¿can mach in tikyemasew xochitl? ¿ln tikyaitak in kwikatl tiktemaka ye nikan? xochimekatl i mokamakpa kistikak, tontekwiltia aya, ika onetlamachtiloya in tlaltikpak. walewake umotlaliko kowatepek, no motlalmomostike, ye yuh nawxiwitl unoke; unka molpili in ixiw, chiwknawxiwtike in unka. sente piltontli tekiti noka oksente okmawiltihtika. aw sano yuh kimochiwili i yewatsin sant eusebio, in amoxtli kimikwilwi ikatsinko pew in totekwiyo dios. aw inik nikitlaniko hustisia in ye axkan yei mestli inik nimixiw aw ye nechtlatlawtia in nowepol katka itoka hwan ekapitsak onomixiw in inamik aw nechilwi ma hok ompan onkalaki in amochatsinko hok onkan nontlakwatekis aw tel niman ik onpa kalake in tochan. onkak ome taman: ikwenta san onkankate. aw in yewantin in chichimeka in totolimpaneka in imitak walmochiwtia san yewatl inik walmotlayekoltitiake; in inmiw in intlawitol kiminia in masatl in tochtli in kowatl in tototl in tekwani. kenin mochiwa in se kitoka imekayo. tlawel tihoven. ipa se taman saj. aw tle itoka i moteow, i motlakimilol in tikmama in tikwalwika?". in totonik. iixwi. tenonotsalistlahtoli in tetta ik kinonotsa in ipiltsin namike, tlasopili tia’ke tipasiaroto. onkan in otokoto inakayo omotenew siwapili doña ana de mendosa, no yewatsin kimotokilito in tlahtowani don diego fernándes de kórdova visurrei iwan mochintin in audiensia real tlaka. pachaniko ikwaxanko nopa tlen tena. aw iwan ye noseppa kavalotlatlalochtike in españolesme in tlahtoke ipan chikwasen tsilini in ye teotlak; ye noseppa iwin mochiw in iw achtopa mochiw, ye noseppa yewatsin achtopa mokavalotlatlalochtili in tlahtowani visurrei, kimonmopewaltilili in tlahtoke inik kavalotlatlalochtike. in onkan kintosawiaya se yowal in kwika mitotitinemi. "pampa ta namantsi, namantsi ta mitstemowa in axkan ipan semilwitl domingo iknawitl mani metstli de marso de 1601 años, ikwak momamal in inteokaltsin sant fransisko teopixke in yankwik teokali, yese ok miek in itlakapa inik mosenkawas; san oksenka yewatl in omochali in letablo wel mawistik, tlasenpanawia inik mawistik in tablero in pilar korona in kassamiento tabernákolo, in sanktome hitik mani in inkaltsin inkorona sentekpantli onkastoli onse. exoyeman yeh totalmanik no tahyowihtinemi, in on tlatotoni in tekwanotsa niman ye ik wal kisa in mihtotiske in tlakatekkatl in tlakochkalkatl in ye mochintin kwakwachiktin in otomi in tekiwake in titiachkawan. nikan ipan in tesiw, moch mikke in mimichtin iwan in ixkichtin atlan chaneke in atlan onoke. aw niman otlanankilike okitoke ka ye neli ka ikalkowal yoan sempoali pesos ka ik opalewilok in ianima in omotenew angelina de la krus aw ka imatiantsinko muchiw in totlasotatsin frai pedro oros ka ikwak mogwardiantilia yoan ka iw kitotia in mikki inik san iehoantin kikowaske in teixwihoan in iw tenewtika in ipan karta de venta. tlen 101 tlanawatihkayotl. in ministros tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia, in magistrados tlen sirkwito, in hweses tlen distrito, tlen yewa in sekretarios, iwan konseheros tlen hudikatura federal, iwan noihki magistrados tlen sala superior tlen tribunal elektoral, amo keman hueliseh, kiseliseh iwan kichiwaseh seyok tekitl ipan sentlanawatiloyan, ipan tlaltlanawatilmeh noso ipan iyolo weyi altepetl, noso santlacameh, san mokixtia tekiwakayotl tlen amo motlaxtlawa tlen nechikolismeh tlen ixtlamatinih, tlamachtianeh, tlahkwiloanih noso tlapalehuianih. in tlakameh tlen tekipanotokeh ipan tlanawatili tlen ministro tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia, magistrado tlen sirkwito, hwes tlen distrito noso konsehero tlen hudikatura federal, iwan noihki tlen magistrado tlen sala superior tlen tribunal elektoral, amo welis, keman tekikisaseh onpanos ome xiwitl, tekipanos kewak tequichaneh, tlahtoltepalewianih noso tlaixnextianih ipan tleweli ohtekitl tlen kaltlanawatili tlen poder hudisial tlen sentlanawatiloyan. ipan inon kawitl, in tlakameh tlen tekipanotoseh kewak ministros, san momanawia tlen akaya tlen tekichihtos san tlatokpa noso san tepatlani, amo welis kiselis tlanawatilmeh tlen moihtowa ipan vi tlatlapantli tlen 95 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili. in tlatsakwiltilmeh tlen inin tlanawatikayotl welis moixkawiliseh tekichiwanih hudisiales tlen motlahtlanihtoseh amatlamakawali. in tlatlakoli tlen moihtowa ipan tlahtolmeh tlatlapantli tlen onpanok, motlatsakwiltis ika ixpoliwis itekiwakayo ipan poder hudisial tlen sentlanawatiloyan, iwan noihki tlapalewili iwan sekinok tlaaxkatilistli tlen teipan itechpowi eliskia, iwan iyoka tlen sekinok tlatsakwiltilistli tlen tlahtokan tlanawatilmeh quiixtlaliseh. tlatiwani sapata okimekanaya itlakawan. okalakia kinonotsaya nochtlakatl momochko. ¡notlac ximomanaka! newatl onakok; onkwan on ika tepostli iwan nochantlaka nikinwikats. ipampa in totatsin días aihmo tikneki yewatl techixotis. tikneki okse altepetl achi kwali. iwan totlak ximomanaka ipampa amo nechpaktia tlen tetlaxtlawia tlatkiwa. amo konewi ika tlakwalo ika netsotsomatilos. noihki nikneki nochtlakatl kipias itlal: onkwan on kitokas iwan kipixkas tlaoli, yetsintli iwan okseki xinachtli. ¿tlen nankitoa? ¿namehuan totlak namomanazque? okihto axkali nawitsin axkan otiwalmoikak tlen tewatsin titononotsaske xikmolwili inon tlakatl nikistinemi kemmanian nan tokalixpan wits motlalis kwika tlatsotsona ika organilo newatl ye nikixtlalia tlen kelewia yese ahso newatl nitenotsas xikmolwili ma wala ma kimolwiliki notlahtsin ma kimixotili ihkwak yewatsin moikats mokweptsinoa mexihkopa inin testigo otlatlanilok kwix kimati in tlali mili tlalistakapan in kenin nemakok kitowa kamo nistlakati ka ye niwewe inin tlali mili ka yewatl kitemakok don pablo xochikentsin tlatowani mexiko. in kwamekat. in tepilwan ika yewa, amelel on kisa. in sesek por in mochiwa ne ahkokopa wan newín atepoliwi. en el año de 165. nikixehekowa ne sesek. tlakxipanwike, moch kamdelas kitkike inik kiwalmotlawililitiake; sekintin wel asike in onpa totoltepek, aw sekintin sa otlika kimonamikilike; iglesia mayor in kimokechilito, aw matlakilwitl in nikan moyetstikatka mexiko. chalchiwtla noyolo, pisinanakat makamo kana tealtepew ipan ximowikaka, ma sa ye nikan xipaktiekan, inik amo ankitoliniske in kwitlapili atlapali, in ilamatsin i wewetsin in piltsintli in mokosoltentok in mowilana in mokeketsa; xikinmokwitlawikan xikintlaokolikan. aw in yewantin in amakemeke in chalka in momakixtito in onpa in amomolokko in iw momatke ye kinyaotlatalwia in amakemeke in chalka, ompa ye kinpewatiwi in onpa kate in amomolokko. v tekpatl xiwitl, 1224. semitlak weyi altepetl onka se tepetl. aw in momikili ipan hwebes a xxvii de hunio 96 años. i tochtli xiwitl, 1194 años. aw axkan viernes in ik 12 mani metstli abril de 1613 años, ihkwak piloloke eintin timasewaltin; in matlaktli tsilini in tlakah okinwalkixtike in kársel de korte in omotenewke ichtekke timasewaltin in onkan omotenew tlakpak kársel de korte temiktike, in kinmiktike yei tlakatl ome español se mulato, ye omihto in españolti mikke se alkaide in ikome bastonero. axkan sábado in ye ik 23 mani metstli marso de 1613 años ye teotlak, ihkwak opew in san ok oawechkiyawiko; aw in ye ikomilwitl ipan domingo in ye teotlak ye ik senpew in momanako kiyawitl sewalatl, senka itstik in isekwisyo mochiw iwan seppayaw in nowiyan cuauhtlah, ixkichika inik tlamiko metstli marso in kiyaw in sewalatl manka, in aik yuh mochiwani ipan omotenew metstli. atla i mikalke, ye chimaltika panoke inik tematitlan kiske; seki tlamake, inik unka mike in imalwa, inik unka senkiske i mexikatsinko. tlen 117 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlaltlanawatilmeh amo hueliseh, ipan yon se tlahtoli i. mosentika cuiseh, motlahtolpalewiseh noso mosentikatlaliseh iwaya seyok tlaltlanwatili iwan noihki iwaya yolchikawalismeh tlen kiawak ehuanih. ii. moixpolohtok. iii. kikixtis tomih, kichiwas amatomih, amatlaixkopintli iwan amatl ika machiotl. iv. kininamas tlakameh tlen panoh noso tleweli tlen tlaixpanos ipan itlalpan. v. axtekawilis iwan tlainamas xitlawak iwan amo xitlawak tlen kalakiseh ipan itlalpan, iwan tlen keman quisaseh, tlakowali tlen nikan ewa iwan tlen walah kiawak. vi. tlainamas tlen nemi iwan tlen motekiwiya tlen itechpowi nikan iwan tlen kiawak, ika tlainamalmeh noso tlatechpowilmeh tlen tlapopolwili mochiwas ipan chinanko caltlapanolmeh, monekis tlamokwitlawili noso tlakwiloli tlen tlamamali noso tenekilis amameh tlen iwaya motlalis tlanamakali. vii. kikixtis iwan amo kisenpixtos tlanawatilmeh noso tomintlanawatihkayotl tlen kinextis sekinok tlainamayotl noso amatlanekilmeh tlen kiihtos kani wala tlanamakalistli tlen nikan iwan tlen kiawak, welis inin mopatlaka moixtlalis tlen iwikal moeliltia ipan chinanko, noso iwikal tlaeliltilmeh tlen sehkanok hualah. viii. mokwiltis xitlawak noso amo xitlawak tlanawatilmeh noso tlatlanewili iniwaya tekiwakemeh tlen sehkanok tlaltlanahuatilmeh, iniwaya altepechantli noso san tlakameh tlen sehkanok, noso keman moneki tlaxtlawaseh ika tomin tlen kiawak noso kiawak tlen totlalnantsin. in tlaltlanawatilmeh iwan altepeyomeh amo welis mokwiltiseh tlanawatikayotl noso tlatlanewilmeh san keman moixkawilis altepeko tlatoktli tlatekiwili, noihki tlen moixkawiltiseh inselti tlayoltilismeh iwan altepeko caltequitilmeh, ken moihtos ipan tlahtolpechtli tlen kiixtlaliseh tlanawatil tekichiwaneh ipan se tlahtol tlanawatili iwan tlen ika tlahtolnelwayomeh iwan imiaka tomin tlen yewan kiixtamachiwaseh sesen xiwitl ipan itechpowi tomintlayeyecolmeh. in tlayekananih tematiltiseh tekichiwalistli keman temaktiliseh kenihki moitski tomin tlen altepechantli. ix. kikotonas tlaeliltili, tlanechikolis iwan tlanamakalistli iyatl ika imakwayo, ika seyok tlamantli noso achi ipatih tlen kenihki kiihtos tlahatokan sentlanechikolistli. in tlahtokan sennechikolistli iwan tlanawatil tekichiwalismeh tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh quiixihcuiloseh, saniman, tlanawatilmeh tlen ika moixkotonas iwintilistli. tein kemeh aman mochiwa exot, chikawaya san migwel ilwit ihwak kitsetselouaj. el lisensiado valesilo fiskal del rei de lo sivil 10 kipantito. tlawel techtiakasoló ne nowelti". seki metstli ipan onechnonotske maeh ometstekitito mexihko intla kemmanian walaya tochan aye onikihtak satepan oniemat kinmach yokipiaya itlaixnamie iwan oehantia ipan oksente altepetl kemahkatsin. in sempoali ok isel ka. se kichipawa komo kajfentaj, se kimewa sehsé xiwit, yewa onech ilwi manikon tlahpaloti. ¿ ken nechittas in noyekol? xochiyowa hunio. aw inik wel mochiwas, inik nowian altepetlipan seseyaka sese eskrivanostin ixketsaloske, san kixkawiske in kichiwaske testamentos, in iw itech nestika provissión real. aw i nopan motlatoliske in kimopalewiliske nanima yehoantini pablo hernandes merino barthasal xwares hwan paptista. testigos ini ixpan omuchiw testamento martin xwares algwasil mayor hwan martin sihoatsitsintin doña maria salomen. fecho en mexiko ut subra. pasó ante mí simon leonaldo eskribano. aw in okik itechpa in nitlahtowa, ma sa noso achitsin nikan nokonisiwkanextitiwetsi ma san nokonisiwkaittotiwetsi in iw pewtika in iw tsintitika inin yankwik in itsintika ipewka inik walpew yankwik teopixkatlatekpantli horden inik notsalo tokayotilo san antón, iwan in imachiyo tau ahnoso krus xoxoktik in kinemiltia kitlalia kiwalwika itech innechichiwaltsin intlakentsin imhabitotsin in yewantsintsin teopixke nehtoleke in ipan in teopixkanemilistlatekpantli. in iwan momimihke in atonaltsin in kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli; aw in satepan in omottake in omonenewilike i nenewke inik chichimeka, niman kimotlapanike in tepetl amakeme, inik niman kitlalike in altepetl amakemekan in ipan in xiwitl. nikan pam inin xiwitl otechkawki in san fran[sis]ko teopixke aw in tewantin senkam otimothekipachoke nikam ipam toaltepew san eartolome iwan sankta krus wikulthepekt xochiwakam. aw onkan omomaman estakas in onkan tlatlami kwaxochtli imixpan in testigos thomas de akino fransisko de la krus marina xoko hwan de rosas lusia tlako hwana xilo. i tochtli xiwitl, 1350. mochiwa miak pero kuoujtaj. se taman saj. tlaskamati para tiwalahki". in ihkwak in ye iw kaxtolomei xiwitl tlahtokati in totepew kulwakan tlahtowani. onkak ome taman: nikan umpewa ... in iksetlamantli tlatoli. mochiwa kwoutah kampa amo akah tawiteki. kinmowikili tlapitske nawintin, aw sa walake walmokwepke; san isel in kiwikake chirimías kipitsa, atlixokan ichan. aw in ixkichika kwaresma in okik ayemo tlamia ineteochiwalistsin, wel ixkichkaw umpa moyetstikatka in kwitlaxkowapan; san ik ompa kiwalmihtalwitewak in yankwik missa, inik niman owalmowikak nikan mexiko kimochiwiliko in itlahtokatekitsin inik pressidente. kwali ka no nikmowalwikilis in no teotikanantsin tlen timihtilwia timohtilis ken ika ninomalwia in kwowit. kenihki eme para yahtiyahtok para ne postehtli. x kali xiwitl, 1489. aw in yewantin in kweskonpixke inik kintentlapikiko in chalko tlahtoke, senka ik motlamawtilike, aw in ixkichtin in ixtlamati in achkakawtin in tekitlatoke in tiyakawan in ompa pipiltin mochi tlakatl inwik setiyak. san tonkwetlawiko, antokniwan, ma ok on poliwi iknopilotl ma ok amelelkisa ye nikan. amo onkak miak nikawín. semi kwali. newa niamatlahkwilotenonotski, niteki kema kiipawiltehki kiwalikak icha. se kilmaitl yepasohtli nohkí weyi ika yahto aw ik yake in kastila, inik niman kinmononochilitasike in tlahtoke don fernando iwan doña isabel inik kixnamiki kiyaochiwa don christóval kolón almirante, in kitotasike in ixkich in kexkich in okito don christóval ka san nechachamawalistli neweilistli iwan teka netenkelolistli. orno ¡ma wel manin tlali! ¿machilihuiztia, nemia tewik, teyakoni? testigo.- balthasar de la krus iknookichtli nichane sankta ana witsila omakok huramento etk. tlatlanilok in testigo ilwilok ken wel tikmati inik moteilwia maria geronima in inamik hwan de eskalante inik nixnamiki antonio hoseph yoan in inamik magdalena ines ak tlale katka ak axkaoa katka in umpa otioalake. inik mnochiwas in pinoli, okachi kwali ma mochiwa ika xiwtoktsin; inin moihseki ahso okachi kwali ipan sokikomali yese, intla moihseki pan tepuskomali, san mochiwa ika ahmo wei tletl. motlalia in xiwtoktli komalko iwan molinia tlasemanalistika sehsentlapal ixkichkaw in ye tlaihsektli; yehika ahmo mochi san niman moihseki, san tlamach mokixtihtiw in ye tlaihsektli iwan motlalihtiw ihtik in wei kaxitl. ihkwak ye mochi tlaihsektli motlalilia kanela tlatsikwewali iwan mowika tlatesiloyan. seki tlaili mochiwa ika pinoli, yuhkin atoli; yese kemmanian mokwa yuhkin xochitlakwali, ihkwak inin mochiwa, in ye tlatextli, ye motlalilia tlatsopeliloni, ixkich in monekis. . yewatl in in ik kin neskayoti ayotlan kalakke aw no iwan in kin makak tilmahtli in sehsemme sesenkimili in tochpanekayotl; yon axkiitah tlan tlakwase. kiski in vi tochtli xiwitl. san tewan nopiltsin, san yeti yoyontsin. chikwasen tochtli ika ikwak yaotlato awitsotsi in tekwantepek; yexikipili ipan nawtsontli i yaomikito inik mochin apanekawi. sa wel yayatimani tlali, aokmo wel titoketsaya, sa tiwetstiwetsia in titoketsaya; wel yuh ipan nemachok ka ik ye tlamin semanawatl. aw in oksekin nokalpatiyow misa ik nopan mitos iwan tonehoan in achtopa nonamik katka itoka katka hoana aw in kin axkan nonamik ines papan ka ose nikchiwili nopiltsin hoana ka mochi intech nikkahoan in kali ayak kinkwilis aw in nonamik makos in kastoli pesos in ikwak omonamak in kali ka nel inemak ka yuh nikitohoa i notlatol. se totlaakatsiin, nochipa kwak kiawi, notlakenpatla. se mamahpikton yepasohtli kampa nikan ipan in in motlaliko i walake wewetke chichimeka kulwake in anepatla in axkan onkan motenewa kulwakan; san owalkwawtlahtotiake, ayak intlahtokaw okiwalwikake. ipanpa in axkan wel sehtetia in notlatol nikitowa in newatl iwan nopilwan in oksekiti notechpa kisaske tikchiwa inin eskritura inik nimitsnamakiltia in nokal in notlal in tewatl lwis savalos español iwan monamik margarita de la krus española iwan amopilwan nikan anchaneke mexiko. tlahkechiwani tlakame aw ik niman yewantsitsin in wel yewantin mikkawake kimonmotokilitiake in senka mawistililoni teopixke in motenewtsinowa predikadores in itlasopilwantsitsinwan totlasomawistatsin sankto domingo patriarcha; ahso wel makwilpowalonmatlaktin in onkan momaniltitiake omotenew ik tetokok, se krus manka kimowikilike, nekok itlok mantia ome siliares, iwan se kapa kimotlalilitia iwan nekok itloktsinko mantiake ome diágonos almátikas kitlalitiake. towaxkawan. itlanahnamik: axkan lunes ik 5 mani metstli hunio de 1611 años in owaltlatwi, otlalolin yowaltika yowalnepantla yowali xeliwi in ipewayan lunes, ihkwak in senka chikawak tlalolin; san tel niman onkistikis, atle kitlako atle kimayaw tepantli, inik walatwik lunestika ye omochiw in tlalolinalistli yowaltika. aw in omosenkaw in ixkich tetech moneki niman ye ik tenotsalo. kinnotsa in ostomeka in tealtianime in tekowanime. matlaktepetl omome kinotsaya yowalnepantla in kalakia. weyi kwentos noikí, ayok mero nihmati kwali. in ipan axkan domingo ikchikweilwitl mani metstli de disiembre de 1596 años, in ipan ilwitsin de la konsepsión de nwestra señora, ikwak kintlatike hudiosme tlateotokanime makwiltin, señorasme nawintin, kastilteka ik ix tlakatl. mihtoa kimmach ye wehkaw, ihkwak yankwik in temaskal-li, achto kalakia se tlakatl, kikalakiaya sentetl chichi. mihtoaya kimmach intla itech in temaskali itla ahmo kwali oyeya ipan inon chichi motsikoaya iwan kikixtiaya. ikanin inon ahmo kwali ahmo motsikoa ipan tlatlakah iwan ahmitla impan mochiwas. ihwak oksi ya se kitapana wan se kikwa kemeh xantiaj. in iuki kilwiah por in taki wan miak iteyo kipiya, pisiltik mahyá xal wan tsopek. in ipan in ikoxiwitl in ye mayanalo. 178 axkan hwebes ik 15 mani metstli marso de 1612 años, ihkwak in owalatwik ye omomikili yowaltika in siwapili doña ana de kastila inamik in antón de ibarra katka aw ichpotsin in wewe don lwis de velasko in ikome visurrei mochiwako nikan mexiko nweva españa. aw in axkan onkan tlatoa in pedro masaken ihoan in ines tiakapan ihoan anan mosel ka amo intlatowayan san kelewia ixkichin in tlatol testigos ik okineltili imatika okikets krus nixpan eskrivano. amo mochipautani. yewatl in ik mitowaya teyolmelawa ok yowan in pewa kalakowa in on tlakwalo in on atliwa in on nexochitilo in on neiyetilo in on netlautilo. san ik wal kixowatikak. chikwasen waxchili akiwan mopakaskeh kinechikoah in tekapolxiwitl ah-nozo kapolxiwitl, mochinin senka yamanki, ika mototonia in tonakayo. ikanin xiwitl nexiwwilo. kemanian nexiwwilo ika ahwiyayalisxiwitl itoka teyawitl, poleoxiwitl. kwaltia para se kiahwiyalis tapalol. ok mikiko walmotlali wewe montekwiksumatsi, i motlatokantlali in ipan xiii tekpatl xiwitl. ik niktlalia notestamento i sa tlatsakkan i sa tlatsonka notlanekilis inik mochipa mopias inik ayak kitlakos. i tochtli xiwitl, 1194. inik nechmakake wewetke mosentlalike aw kito i notlatsin inik nimitsmaka notlal inwan nochina[n] ka on tenechtekipano in tinomach inpanpa i nechmakak i newatl pablo makwex i notlatsin intoka anton kenkis yewatl inmatika kikets in kali. kiwikatine i mokiwitsi in tenochkatl, i sa motewikalti tlatilulko. in kwamekat, mahyá yon kaxtapan tehko, xoxoktik in imekayo. kenin mochiwa v kali xiwitl, 1445. onkak eyi taman: limón inhertado, limón korriente wan limahlimon. pero yehwa niteko inkareglarotiw wanin pobre yulitl tlamamahtika mochixtika para tlatemowis. iwan axkan miérkoles ik 6tia henero ipan ilwitsin de los reyes yein tlahtoke, ikwak omomikili in don pedro suga alkalde te korde i presidente de audiensia real de mexiko. axkan hwebes in ik 12 mani metstli setiembre de 1613 años, ihkwak nikan siudad mexiko san fransisko ahsiko kalakiko in yankwik komissario itoka frai christóval ramíres, españa walmowikak kiwalmowikili in senka mawistililoni padre frai hwan torkemada, in omowikaya españa san onsexiwtito in ompa nikan ik mowikaka. aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl kis in itokatsin temasatl in kwawnawak, aw ompa inmak wetsito in xochmilka, onpa kitetekke. wan kitlanantehki wan kitokato 102. iwan tiksenkixtia, tiknenewilia in akatik, in wel ololiwki, in wel xiktik, in wel malakachiwki in chalchihwitl; impatlawak in teoxiwitl, in welachiktli; in welakanawali in chalchiwitl, in wel senkiski, in wel kwekweyoka. in tieso, in tikwipana in koskatl, in ketsali, in wel tsine, in wel yake, in wel sensiakatl, in witoliwki, in wel xopalewak, in pepetska. iwan tiksenkixtia, tikwipana in nepapan tlasotli, in nepapan tlasoiwitl: in xiwtototl, in tlahkechol, in tsinitskan, in sakwan. in tiktoptema, in tikpetlakaltema; in wel iyeyeyan tiktlalia, in wel itetenkan tiktema; in wel imamayan tikmana. ka tiktlapalania, ka tiktlapalakia in amuxtli, in tlakwiloli; ka tiktlalia in tlili, in tlapali, immachiotl, in oktakatl, in xiotl, in kwatsontli, in neskayotl. yuhkin tetl, kwawitl, timokwikwi, timihkwilowa. aik ilkawis; aik poliwis immotenyo, immihtawka. xii tekpatl xiwitl, 1036 años. okachi weyak aw in ipan semilwitl i- || 224 -n ihkwak omotenew inik mawake mixnamikke ipampatsinko sankta krus, ka no niman ihkwak pew in ye mokokowa san oqu itsonteko inik pew ye kikokowa in omotenew señora mariana rodrígwes; aw in imustlayok ik walatwik ye omotekak i tlapechko in mokokowa, matlaltotonki in itech motlali, senka san niman chikawak iwan niman iglesia mayor kiwalmowikililike in sakramento, inik niman kimoselili. oticpixqueh. axkan timohtilis immanon ye wehka yowali oninotekak isan niknemilihtaya tlen tlahtoliniktenkixtis ima san isiwka tlawiskali moketsa san achitonkawitl onitlahtlachix tlen kawitl ye tiyeske oniknolwi welis ok wehka yowali ammitla mokakia otwel oninotekak yese ayokmo onikoch tokniwtsin ihkwak ok tiyakaxoxoktin ken ika tikxikoa in ixtlatwilistli in ipan axkan miérkoles ik 4 mani metstli oktubre de 1606 años, ipan sant fransisko ilwitsin ye teotlak, in maxitiko in mokalakiko nikan mexiko in yewatsin visitador general itoka el lisesiado diego lantenras i veláskes in ompa owalmowikak españa, okiwalmiwali in toweitlahtokaw rei inik yewatsin motlachiyeltis nikan ipan nweva españa. aw in oasik yowali xeliwi in ye wel yowalnepantla in yewatl tekowanotsa niman ye ik moxtlawa. aw in ikwak oyuh kimokakilti i yewatsin don antonio valeriano governador hwes in nikan mexiko konmopakkaselili niman in tlanawatili in ika iwelitilitsin in ixkich kimopielia ika hustika in itenkopatsinko in rei toweitlatokatsin in omotlakowike lwis savalos iwan inamik inpilwan kinmomakilia semikak intech powis in kali in tlali aik kikawaske aw in akin kemanian kitlakos konixnamikis inin tlatokatlanawatili hustisiatika tlatsakwiltilos. in ipan axkan hwebes a xxiiii de marso de 1594 años, ikwak molnamik in imikilitsin tlahtowani visurrei in wewe don lwis de velasko katka, in itatsin katka totlahtokaw visurrei in axkan moyetstika, in kenin mochiw in ikwak momikili in ipan xiwitl mil i kinientos i sesenta i kwatro años, in ye axkan senpowali onmatlaktli xiwitl ipan yei metstli. keh noteokaltsin, in onkan niknextis, nikpantlasas, niktehmakkas, in ixkich notehtlasohtlalis, notehiknoittalis, in notehpalewilis, in notehmanawilis, ka nel newatl in namoiknowahkanantsin, in tewatl iwan in ixkichtin inik nikan tlalpan anzepantlacah, iwan in oksekin nepapantlakah notehtlasohtlakawan in notechmotsatsilia, in nechtemoa, in notechmotehmachilia, ka onkan nikinkakilis in inchokkis, in intlaokol, inik nikyektilis, nikpahtis in iskich nepapan innetolinilis, intoneuhis, inchichinakkilis. iwan okseki miek tlamantli in mochiw ikwak ipan ilwitsin katka sant matheo, inik papakowak in ipampatsinko inik omotlakatili prínsipe; aw in iw walikwiliwtia tlahtoli in españa, ipan ik viii mani metstli abril in sa ye ipan in xiwitl de 1605 años ipan viernes sankto in motlakatili yewatsin prínsipe don felipe domingo víktor de austria in itlasopiltsin toweitlahtokatsin rei don felipe tersero in axkan moyetstika españa. kiitak kiwalika se weyi ayatl kikwatlanantiwala ome litro atl aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl in momikili in itoka chalchiwtlatonak tlahtowani opochwakan chalko tlalmanalko, in tlahtokat nawxiwitl. aklkakaki inin tlahtoli, ye omihto itech tlakixtili in ilwikatlamachilisamoxtli, ka yewantin intlatlalil intlanemilil in wei tlamatinime in philosophosme in astrologosme, in kinemilike iwan kihkwilotiake in iskitlamantli tlaltikpakayotl iwan in iskitlamantli in tikitta in tikmawisowa in inyelis. ¿toni kitekipacho? aw ye omotenew tlakpak, in ipan in xiwitl xii tepatl xiwitl, 1608 años, in omomikili don herónimo lúpes hwes governador tenochtitlan, in otlahtokatiko tenochtitlan matlakxiwitl ipan chikwetetl metstli ipan senpowalonse tonatiw. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. don hosé del kastilo, alkalde ordinario aw ipampa in axkan tokonixketsa algwasil balthasar de luna iwan eskribano fransisko moisen niman ayak kimontlakawaltis ayak kimoixnamikis san iyolik kontsakwaske. nikan niktaktsontaliti nehin tixochitsin. ¿in ayatika nikimilolo? "uta, para ta fiero tihchihto ni notlake. e yuh xv xiwitl tlantokanti in omomostike mexika. onkak kahfentah pero mas mochiwa kampa xiukawal. nino tlatonewilia se taman saj. nikan ipan in in omomikiliko in tlotli tlatkik atlawtekatltewktli, in tlahtokat matlakxiwitl omei in atlawtlan tenanko amakemekan. aw in oumik tlakateusi nima ye omotlalia in iixwiw kwawtlatoasi tlatilulko; ye mosiwawatia, makwestekasi yichpoch in kona. kwatatapamoli ika xokonochtli chirimoya tanto kemeh tehwa, se okichxuchikali iwan senka chikawak i mochiw kokolistli yewatl saranpió iwan kechposawalistli apitsali. wan ihkino kitsahtsili, kiilwi wan ta san yayá titlayi para tihneki mili sekintin koyome in bohemian chanehke in akike waltepotstokayah ineltokokayo lutelotsin, kalakikoh iitik tekpantsin in moketstikak in onkan altepepan motenewa "praga", iwan okimmayawke in iwikpa puchkiyahdail omextin tlahtokaixiptlatsitsintin.yewatl in, iximacho yuhkin "puchquiyahuacpa itemayawilis in praga" iwan omochiw ipan chikonawi tochtli xiwitl (1618). yuh opew in motokayotia "cempoalli ommatlaktli xiwitl inyaoyo. "tla walase ma walaka aw niman onkan asiko in itokayokan teokolwakan; yuh kitowa, amo weka kitstika inin in astlan, in onkan asiko san ya ipan in se tekpatl xiwitl. in ikniktli okachi weyi keh in isiwaiknin. ¿ha tamonawiyaske, ha tawelamatiske, tokniwan? se kitoka. ye onik amapoh in sentetl amoxtli. aw inik okitekakititinen senpowali onmatlaktli tonatiw nowian tlatlaxilakalpan inikipatiw mochiwas epowali onmatlaktli pesos in onkan ipan tlaxilakali yopiko ayak okinankili inik okitsatsitine diego astaxochitl. tuwaltukwepke para michoakán oksé tonali tuwaltukwepke. v tochtli xiwitl, 1302. intsalan onkateh texohtiqueh. yei kali xiwitl ika poliw altepetl, inik tixitinke ipan nexochimako, semilwitonali se kowatl. in okaxitiko in okiwalwikake, aw san yowaltika in itik kontlalike in intlalmomos; kiyolotike in tlakatekkatl itoka chichilkwawtli in kolwakan tlakatekkatl. kiski in x kali xiwitl. xi tekpatl xiwitl, 1308. sampa walahke ni tlalchi. axkan hwebes ik 20 mani metstli henero de 1611 años, ihkwak ipan ilwitsin katka san sebastián, in mokalaki sakramento i yankwik teopan san sebastián atsakwalko; ihkwak yekaw in yankwik inteopankal sant augustín padreme iwan atsakwalka in onkan kiketske awatonko. tlahkoxonakatl, in ahmo wel wehyi in kwamekatsin. onkak ome taman. otitlanamakakeh ontlasohtlaskeh kilwi “quemaca; makamo xinetlamati”. kinnonotstiake in ixkichtin kinkawtiake, in ipan in ikyexiwitl mayanalo. 21. no yewantin achto tlakwaske, atliske; aw in tewatl ahmo niman no tikelewis in achto atlilistli, tlakwalistli. ye ok tokontemos in tlamahsewalistli, in neknotekalistli. niman ye tokommokwilis in atsintli, timotematekilis, timotekamapakilis. intla tipili, ahmo onkan tikkawas immopilo, immotlahtokayo, immoweika. ahmo ma chalchiwitl, teoxiwitl immomak temi, ahmo waltepewis; san ye tlamahkkwalo ipaltsinko in dios. tel ah san iwian wikoke on in motelchiwtsin, ha in tlakotsin. san mokwikaelakwawke akachinanko in ah ikwak in tlepan kixtiloto in koyowakan. inin tlakatekolotl carrancista, okito chantlakatl tobarrio, yotleko itlawtsinko san mateo. kineki makis ikapatsin. ¡noihqui itsotsomatsin san markos, ikonetsin mateo! xiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1180. ihkiihon oniwapaw welis onikpiaya kaxtoli ome anosokaxtoli yei xiwitl ihkwak onikimihtak in telpokame ken ne ye mosenkawaya seki kin ammo wehka otitlamochyaya tikinkahkawaske amapapalome ipan potrero ipan tlaixtin kemmanian otitawiltinemia otitotlalteyaowiaya otitotexokotemotlaya san techpowiliah nopa kwento kemahkatsin nikankateh ome ika motokayotsin ye oeheoqueh. yewatl in tlasomaxtlatl yekawiyak iwan koyochkamaxtlatl aso tlapilmaxtlatl anoso kwappachmaxtlatl aso istak maxtlatl. aw ye kinankiliskia, in konittake, opoliw, aok tle kitoke. __¿quen tinemiske? amo olini in tonatiw. ni kwakwawtsin, ninonkoneki xochitl, san nomak on mani, in ninentlamati. in semi totonik. inik tikimontotlapalwia inik tikimontotlatlawtilia; ma kimonselilikan in tlahtoke || 45r in toteositewktli in tekwachkawtli. kikwahtika in amo se kitoka, mochiwa saj. hxihsiwi in titlawelilok okilwi se kaxtilantlakatl in ye kikixtihtaya in itepusmakwaw in pepetlakilistli kisaya itech in tepusnekimilol in kaxtiltekatl in kaxtiltekatl okiwilan in itskwawtli inok kiteliksaya in mixkolotl inakayo monotsa istaknanakat por in istak in nanakatsin wan xononanakat por in itech xonokwowit in mochiwa. inon sikawastli mersiyero muchi kanganik tlenon kititlania in sowatl. in kwowit, ohoxihkwowit. in ipan in ikonxiwitl in in amo kiyaw. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. aw in ipan kapítulo omotenew in axkan omochiw, ihkwak nikan kapila san hoseph san fransisko kapilero omochiw in frai herónimo de sárate kapelán motenewa. i.- pregon: in ipan in siudad mexiko sanktiago tlatilulko ipan axkan lunes ik omilwitl mani agusto de 1599 años inik sepa otsatsik in tekpoyotl gaspar lorenso okonito akin kineki kikoas kipatiotis in ikal in iewantin pedro hernandes iwan in inamik in itoka maria barbola iwan itex itoka hwan peres ompa mani in ipan tlaxilakali sankta ana kwepopan ma konitoki in axkan ik sepa tsatsiwa sempowaliwitl onmatlakpa inik tsatsioas tiankisko iw ka in itlanaoatil iwka in sedula in itechka in totlatokaw rei aw in ixpan testigos migwel hernandes diego hakobo aw inik kimoneltilia nikan kimotlalilia intokatsin iwan infirmatsin. in xiwit. monamaka. seki kilwiah ‘tomarosaj’. kiihto mochiwa nikawín wan ne atpoliwikopa. tlahko xonakatl in ahmo wehyi tlehkoke kikakih ilwikatl. amo nikmati kemanian xochiyowa. sasotlen imán kwali twalmwikas. mochiwa itech kwopach wan ompa ya pewa itsmolini, no mochiwa itech tepach. sesek eski por in chichik. tewan, nonantsin ika ome noknewan. san okito okse noknew: tla onikmatini kename wehka metstok ik chalma aik onikitoani niaz'. iwan inon noknew kawapa oyaya mokwepa wan kilwía amo xikwalantiw; xitsikwini. ye yiman timokawatlalis. newatl ye ninenentaz. amoka itech omachiaya tlen kipanos noknewan. inon kawapa oyaya omotepexiwi iwan okalak itsintla kawayo. otikitoke yomopepetoni noso okitilisak yolkatl. amotla okipano ipampa yewatl oyak ika nochi iyolo. inik walkiske in incha in ostotl i motenewa chikomostok, inik kiske se akatl xiwitl, i semilwitonali in ipan kiske se sipaktli. aw in tla walas in pedro lwis in kwawchinanko in achto kimotlachkwitlaxili nikmaka aso tepantsintli kitlalis onkan aw in inamik magdalena ka san tlawelilok aik tlema onechtlaokoli ka chane aso kiwikas yewatl kimati. aw kixitinike inik nikan kiwalikwanike in onkan sakatla inik amo nistlakati hok seki onpa nikpia in tetl iwan kwawitl in itlakawilo kali kixitinike ixkichi. in nikmelawa notlatol ipanpa nikan nomatika nikchiwa krus. pasó ante mi migwel hernandes eskribano. itlanahnamik: el doktor valensia fiskal del rei del krimen 14 para kena yehyektsi ma eli tlen itlake. yuh tikitowa ka totlalpa in mokaltike san konxitiniske anoso iwan konnamakiltiske in ye tiknamakiltia in tokal in tochina in totlal in ye mochi inik machiyotika kostik tlapali in axkan tiknamakako in ispan hustisia. mopupuxotiw yawtlatoaya q.n. in ik mopupuxotikalki yauk iwan q.n. yevatl kitemaka in yauyutl kitemasevaltia. yoan in ikwak ik onkan nika okixixitini in tepantli antonio hosephe yoan oquitzatzacu in unkan tikisaya onikilwi in antonio hoseph tleika in tikxixitinia tepantli yoan tiktsatsakwa in unkan niman okito ka noyolokakopa nehoatl nikmati aw niman ik onikis onimikwani ka nel otlaxixitini yoan otlatzatzacu aokkan wel nikisa. aw in oumomikili tlatilulko tlatoani kwakwawsi nima ye walmotlalia in ipilsi tlakateusi, ye kosiwatlania in koatlicha, ikopa siwatlanok, i konanato siwapili itoka chalchiwxochitsi yichpoch xankinsi ye ixwiw akolmistli. kiski in iiii kali xiwitl. niman amo haka mechtlakawaltis in tla haka amechtlakawaltisneki san ixpan xikiwakan in hustisia onpa neltis in aso itlal san in axkan notenkopa nik mochi ankaxkatitiwi in itlal pedro nali iw nitlanawatia ipanpa nikan niktlalia notoka iwan nofirma. omochiw mexiko a xxx dias del mes de marso mil e kinientos e setenta años. fransisko ximenes. pasó ante mi migwel hernandes eskribano. amo nikmati kemanian xochiyowa. ix kali xiwitl, 1293. no mah takayowa, nikan ipan in in momikiliko in tlahtowani tenochtitlan in akamapichtli, in tlahtokat senpowalxiwitl onse in tenochtitlan; aw in kinkawtia in ipilwan in kinchiw ka sempowali omei in itlasopilwan in tlahtokapipiltin: in ikse itoka kwatlekowatl; in ikome itoka ixewatsin; in ik-ei itoka ometochtsin, aw inin ompa kitlaniko in tolam ompa tlahtokatiskia, aw san onmomikilito; in iknawi in ipilwan in akamapichtli itoka kwetlachtsin, aw nokwel yewatl in ompa ommotlahtokatlali in tolam, aw ompa siwapili in kimosiwawtitasik itoka xiloxochtsin, inin ichpoch in itoka kwetlachiwitl tlahtowani katka in ompa tolam, aw in satepan in ompa opiltike tolam ka itech okiske in kwetlachtsin; in ikmakwili in ipilwan akamapichtli itoka sitlalkowatsin; in ikchikwasen itoka makwextsin; in ikchikome itoka itskowatsin; in ikchikwei itoka wewesaka; in ikchiwknawi itoka tetlepanketsa; in ikmatlaktli itoka yaotlantsin; in ik xi ixkwitlantok; .... aw inik okimoneltililike kimotlalilike in intokatsin in infirmatsin. fecho e méxiko ut supra. don martin kortes alkalde migwel sanches hwes difundos. por mando de los señores alkaldes i hwes difundos. ante mi hwan de san fransisko. nika siudad de mexiko tenochtitlan axkan hweves xvi dias del mes de nobiembre de mil kinientos i sesenta i kwatro años. aw in ik expa tenotsaya ikwak in tetewaltia ikwak kim on aki aya imikpak in tlaaltilwan mitowaya anekuyotl. niman owala okse tlakasintli sa nenenkasintli okinawati in xochitewitli tlakapowak aw awel okinpo amo kinxikowaya okipowaya niman axkan okinawatike kipowak se mili keski tlaksontli omka miyahuatü ik omkam omotlamke ik otlamki okixikoke. niman axkam tlein okichiw i{n} yewatl ye kimoaxkatía inmasewaltin ompa kopaltepek okatka niman ik otlakwalani niman ompa oyake okonanato okiwalwikake omkam tepeteopam ornean omosentlalike omononoske inin kikwaske niman okimiktike ipampa okelewiyaya inchalchiw tepoknastli iwan chimali kesali okelewiyaya ika inon otlatlako niman okixipewke okikixtilike in iyewayo ipan omitotike. okitoko ka nikmokakiltilia in hustisia in ipanpa nonamik okatka itoka martin lasaro pantekatl nechmakatia in ikal xochimilkopa itstikak in itepots ematl aw in iyomotlan sa no yematl iwan seyolotli iwan in itoalo sematl iwan in tlali napowali onpa mani in itokayokan tolan ipan kítlalitia in testamento inik techtlamamakatia. tleka . aw kin on mako in innechichiwalis: in inneokichihtol in aposonaltentetl iwan ketsalkoyonakochtli ketsalichayatl koxoli hekasewastli sakwantika tlatsinpacholi xawaktopili tostlapilolo kwitlakochyo in ipan wal ohtlatokatiaya in ik wal ahsia nikan mexiko. aw niman yehoatl in kakawatl kinextiaya aso sen tekpan xikipili in tetech moneki. onkan tlakat in don hoseph de sankta maría tewktlakosawkatsin tlamaokatltewktli, inin konmonamikti itoka doña maría de kastila tsonatsin. aw nikitowa i naniman ka okimochiwili i noteow i notlatokaw aw imaktsinko nokontlalia iwan nikitowa in ixkichtin i nopilwa i nika notlan amoyetstikate namechnonawatilia makamo anechmolkawiliske ma mochipa ipanpa ankimotlatlawtiliske in totekuyo i naniman. [al margen iskierdo axka martes honeltik in inetol marina tiakapan hetetl omito resposus in iespati ik tlakokowalok 7 pesos iwan ome tomi] temilotsin ikwik moyekchiwa kampa motaktsontalia. tlen kineskayotia in wewe mexihkah tlakah intlaixasihkamatilis itechpa in kenin okiyelismakakeh in wewe nemilistli inik senka wei tlamantli in okahsihkeh masel no iwki senka wei in ahmo okiximatkeh in ipan oksetik wehkatlali in satepan omotokayoti wewe semanawak in welik, se kikwa. nikan ipan in || 82r in motlahtokatlali in siwapilatowani in itoka xiwtostsin tlailotlaktewktli mochiw in tsakwaltitlan tenanko amakemekan; inin ichpochtsin in tlahtowani kwawitsatsin. se xiwitl kipiah omepowa li iwan mahtlaktli iwan ome semanah aw in ye yuhki in omextin onmomamayawke tleko, inikwak ye otlatlake. niman ik kichixtimotekake in teteu in kampa yeh kisakiw in nanawatsin in achto onwets tleko, inik tonas, inik tlatwi. mahtaktiomeyi mil ángeles serafines, nikawín amo mochiwa, mopachania sah kemaj, in imekayo. in kwowit totonik. aw in omotenew maría xukoatolnamakak inik mikiko, ka yuh mihto yuh ipan machok itechkopa kihtoke in nikan tlaka ipan tlaxilakali ka san ikwalantsin isomaltsin itetsin ikwawtsin in totekwiyo dios kiwalmiwali ipan in omotenew siwatsintli, aw yehika ipampa itech tlahtowaya itech asia in imawissotsin sankta krus, ka kimixnamiktika amo kinekia inik onkan kimokechiliske ohtlipan in axkan onkan okimokechilike ohnepantla in ikaltepa español hernán martín inin omotenewtsino sankta krus, ka imaxkatsin yewantin intlaketsaltsin in tokniwtsitsinwan in toteikkawtsitsinwan hwan morales iwan in iyome bernabé de san herónimo kwechiwke, iwan insepantlatkitsin okseki tlakatl mexika nikan chaneke xuloko masiwi in amo muchintin nikan itech powtikate omotenew tlaxilakali xuloko. san nikkaki itopyo ipetlakalo, ¡ah in tepilwan! tiyoke timikini. timasewaltin, nawi, nawi, in timochi tonyaske, timochi tonmikiske in tlaltikpak. tiwian ka nikan kah t onakachikiwtli mits otlatoktis ka ye ixkich kawitl no se kikwi ika se kiweliltia in albóndigas tein se kichihchiwa ika nakat, in longanisa wan sopa. aw ye tlakoxiwtika in ipan omotenew 2 akatl xiwitl in onmikwanike in onkan in akokolko; onkan yaoyawaloloke in mexika, aw onkan temak tlanke, onkan inpan motlali in molpixiwitl. seki kihtowah sesek por in taseutok kalihtik komo ika kwouxiwit kipantsakwah wan okseki kihtowah totonik. —te ihte koko onin kitlapana. . kitlahkoilpia tlawtika ik kaltia in okonsenkawke niman ye oltika kihkwilowa. aw aokak tlatowani tenochtitlan; se tlakatl teuchiwtiw itoka mexikatl, wel kosoololtik san tsapaton, iwan oksekintin ikniwan. aw inik okimoteotike in tonatiw ka san intech omixkwitike in intemachtikawan in tlaxkalteka; ka san yewan kinmachtike, yehika ka sanno yewantin kimoteotiaya in tonatiw. nikan otsonkis in iwalalis in tsakwaltitlan tenanka inik walake. aw in ipampa ye no yewatsin omotenewtsino san basilio magno inik ye no watsin omotlayankwilili in omotlapahpatili, inik okinmomakiliko oksentlamantli in omotenew teoyotika yoktakateopixkatlatekpantenemitiayatsin in ireglatsin, inik okinmomakiliko i wel kinmosemaxkatili semihkak in itlasoteopixkateikkawtsitsinwan in omotenewtsinoke isel iyoka nenkatsitsinti mongestin, yewatl ipan mowika in axkan inik teoyotika monemilisnehtoltitsinowa in tlasoteopixke san antonio, ik ipampa on okimosentokayotitsinoko teopixke basilios inik axkan ik monotsinowa. aw san niman ipan in in xiii akatl xiwitl in motlahtokatlali in itskowatsin, inin ipiltsin in akamapichtli achto tlahtowani tenochtitlan. mah amo timikikan de amik. in kwowit no kwaltia para kalkwowit, para kalewal oso taihtiyot. nihwikas para na nihneki. para ma [...] aw no ikwak yaomikito atlixko in ilwikaminatsin tlahtowani xochmilko. tematitlan kiske i mexika wewetke atla yake, amoxtli kimokentike akokolko. in lá yas kwakwawitiw inokniw te'wakun ixmika ixmo tlakawili. yei axoxtlantli aw in imomiyo kaxatika kinwalnapaloke, no tlatleikwiloli kaxa iwan mikistsontekontlakwilolo, moch tlatiloke; ikwak kitlatike in iyomiyo antonio machado sastre iwan inmaestro katka in hudiosme, in iyomiyo ompa kikixtito in sant augustín teopan. tlen 82 tlanawatihkayotl. iwikpa elis tlayekanani moneki i. mexikatlakatl ika itlakatililis, kiasikamatis nochi tlen itechpowi, itahtsin iwan inantsin mexicameh, iwan mochantlalihtos ipan totlalnantsin kipia axnelmiak sempowali xiwitl. ii. mopialis kiaxitihtok 35 xiwitl keman quitlapehpeniseh. iii. mochantlalihtos ipan totlanantsin nochi xiwitl tlen onpanokok tlen keman tonati quitlapehpeniseh. keman kikahtewas totlalnantsin kiaxitis sempoali iwan matlaktli tonati, amo mokotonas chanchiwani. iv. amo tlatskitos ipan se teotlahtoli tlanawatili iwan amo teopixkatsin mochihtos. v. amo tekipanohtos tla tlatskitos ipan yaotekayotl, iwekawayo chikwaseh metstli tlen keman onkas tlapehpentli. vi. amo tekipanohtos kewak sekretario noso subsekretario tlen estado, prokurador general tlen totlalnantsin, gobernador tlen se tlaltlanawatili, iwan amo hefe tlen gobierno tlen iyolo weyi altepetl, kena welis tla kikawas itekih chikwaseh metstli tlen keman asis tonatih tlen tlapehpentli; iwan vii. amo kipantihtos tlehtleya tlamantli kokolistli tlen moihtowa ipan 83 tlanawatihkayotl. aw inin omotenew chikomostok tsotsompa kinewayan in onkan koyonki chikokkan texkali ostotl senka temamawtikan, tsiwakyotok nekwameyotok in omotenew chikomostotl. aw nowian imixpan in altepetlipan tlahtoke, aw ipan metstli kecholi aw in semilwitlapowali ye omotenew se hekatl, in ipan kalakke españoles in itekpanchan in motewksomatsin. aw niman ikwak otlatolmelawke konitoke inin kali inin tlali in okimakake alvaseasme sa wel neli i yaxka itlatki katka in anton sanches aw iwan wel neli kinnawatitia in otlanamakake. yoan niktenewa sakatenko mani nowewekal yoan achi itlalmaio monamakas naniman itech powis. nianse se kwartiya wahtli kamotlani. iwan ahmo san inon. nikilnamiki ihkwak sehpa otitomaololohqueh, seki otiyahqueh, otikwahkwawito wehka, kampa onka wehyi kwawitl, inon ye wahki, ye momati, inin owihtik ika monextia. san wel iwki otitlanechikohkeh iwan otitocuepqueh; yehika notech monekia tomin ahmo oninokaw tochan, onitlamelaw momosko malakachtepekopa inik san niman niknamakas. iwan ma iliwis titlakwikwi, ma iliwis titlanenek, ma iliwis timotlatepewalti, ma iliwis titepanawi in ahmo molwil, in ahmo momasewal, in ahmo monemak; ahmo san tikmokwilis, ahmo san tiemanilis. ka san yewatsin in totekwiyo, dios, motechichiwilia, ka san iseltsin kimotemakilia in seseyaka temaheewal, in tenemak. ka yewatl tikmokwitis, tikmonemilistis immolwil, immomasewal, immonemak. ma kin ihkwak in omitsmahsewalti in totekwiyo, ipan ties, ipan tihkas, ipan tinemis. ahmo wel niman no ipan tinemis, intla timihmatini, san iknotlakayotl in ipan tinemis. ye weyas in momasewal, ka intla mopan kichiwas in totekwiyo. aw intla sa tel noso tikkwis, ayak ye ken kihtos, ayak ye tiktolinis, yehika ka maxka, ka momasewal, ka monemak. aw intla iliwis xikkwi in ahmo momasewal, in ahmo monemak ye titolinilos, ye tipinawtilos iwan ye timotkopowas ixpantsinko in totekwiyo. aw masiwi in iw okitlalitewake in wewetke tlahtoli, yese ka ye ki nikan in kimomekati tliltekatsin in siwatl in inweltiw tekwanipan tlaka. aw maso neliwi in amo wel momati melawak in kampa yewatl tlali ipan walewake in omotenewke wewetke in onkan atenkisako astlan, aw yese wel iw tikneltokaske wel iw toyolo pachiwties ka seme yewantin ipan in etetl tlali in exkan xeliwtikate in exkan kistikate in wel nononkwa kate in iksekkan sentetl tlali ipan motenewa asia, in ikontetl tlali ipan motenewa afrika, in iketetl tlali ipan motenewa europa; ka ininn omotenewke yetetl tlali in wel sesekkan kistikate, ka onpa seme yewantin inpa in owalewake in owalake in omotenewke wewetke chichimeka in onkan atenkisako astlan, in ipan iknawtetl tlali in iknawkan xeliwtika in iknawkan kistika tlali, in ipan in motenewa yankwik semanawatl nwevo mundo, in san iwanpo, in san ik netechantika in tlali astlan iwan nikan tlali mexiko tenochtitlan in ipan tonoke timasewaltin. timotolinia ka ye tonmoketsas ye tokontlalkawis in altepetl in mochan in méxiko in tlatilulko ye tikimonkawtias in tenuchtitlan; aw iwan ye senpowalxiwitl ipan chiwknawxiwitl in ipan x tekpatl xiwitl, 1580 años, in o- || 100 -mohuicac perú in tlakatl don martín emrríkes visurrei, in tlahtokat tenochtitlan matlaktlomei xiwitl; aw sanno ikwak in ipan omotew xiwitl in omaxitiko mexiko in tlakatl don lurenso xwáres de mendosa konde de koruña visurrei, inin anotle enkomienda kipiaya. xolenanakatamali ika xoxowki chilmoli xi tochtli xiwitl, 1282. ixwa iteyo wan ompa moskatia ya. wan no se kitoka. komo yehwa tein kwali se kitamewia. "ah, bweno. itewktlahtokawan katka in kwawitsatsin, itech itstikatka, inik weikan iyeyampa katka in onka tlailotlakan tekpan. sesek. in kiltsin, semi fresko kemeh tomakilit. aw ka senka weka in kanin chikomostok tsotsompa kinewayan, ka yuh || 30r kihtotiake in omotenewke in ompa walkiske in senka weweintin tlapaltike chikawake in motenewa teochichimeka; ka yuh okimilwitiatiake in inpilwan imixwiwan in kin ohtlipan otlakatiko. mah teyoti, se titlanamakaskiyah iiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1288. . aw in ik konkwi amatl achtopa kikwi in itech powi in tlakotsontli. niman yewatl in itech powi sakatsontli. niman yewatl in itech powi sekoatl hotli melawak. axkan domingo in ik 30 mani metstli setiembre de 1612 años, ipan ilwitsin san herónimo, ihkwak omachistiko omomikili kwawtemalan in doktor gravahar oidor katka in onpa omotenew kwawtemalan; inin nikan mexiko yahka, kin isel kriyoyo oidor omochiwtia. aw in ontlatlachiyato in mexika, niman ik walmokwepke in tenochtitlan kinonoko in tlahtowani in witsiliwitsin iwan in kwatlekowatsin iwan in itskowatsin. xochiyowa kemeh itech enero. san ye tikitake in ye mochi onka aw niman ye ik motepan[f. 7v.]tia in innantsin in axkan moteilwia pedro nanali iwan in omik in itoka hwan in iw nikmati wel yewatl i mokalti in tenantsin katka itoka madalena teukchon aw san tikkakke kitowa ka okitlamachi in ipilwan in ipan mochalaniya i ye itech powki in omik in itoka hwan yuh nechilwi in pedro nali. kemanian tekitih kaxtoli iwan se imán. kenin omotepalewili leonportila inik kipiaskeh in masewalahtoltlahkwilohkeh inkal mochiwa newín parahko. weltetewilotik, xiwtewiltik, in ketsalits,akwekweyokatimani. aw kitkike in tlili, in tlapali, monamaka, semi kikowah in tokniwantsitsin. iwan in itlatokayotsin senka ok tlapanawia inik mawistik inik tlachiwtli chalchiwitl welasekawtli wel pepetlaka tlanextia. amo monamaka, akin kwoukwowiti komo ixtawat panowa, ompa kikwi yon nanakat. ma in tonawikan, antokniwan ma on nekechnawalo nikan. vi.- pregon a dose dias del mes de hebrero de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in tlaxilakalpan teskatsonko okitekakiti inik monamaka ikal itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak otlanankili ixpan testigo hwan fransisko ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. mah no nesi onkak se mataj, nikan in ixtawat. aw in tlahtowani tisosikatsin ok yewatl kilnamik in tlahtokayotl chalko, kintemo in tlahtokatepilwan. iwan ayemo intoka katka in mexika, in achtopa ka san ok intoka katka mexitin; aw inik mexitin, kihtosneki mixtitlan ayawtitlan in okisako in owalewake in owalake, yuh mihtowa, ka yuh tlamani in ompa astlan mixayawtitlan. yei kanela tlatsikwewali ok oniyeya nipiltsintli ihkwak notahtsin onechmohtitili nikmotokilihtinemis nohwian onikpiaya welis chikwei anoso chiknawi xihüitl in ye nechmowikiliaya timilachiaske tikwahkwawiske ompa mila onechmohtitili in tekitl yewatsin mochiwiliaya wan xikxochiyoti, nitlanamakaskia in intokayokan tamooanchan, in semi monamaka xolal. xii tekpatl xiwitl, 1296 años. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. iwan okihtoke in tlamatinime in astrologosme okineskayoti inik no iwan ipampa in iw omochiwin se siudad wei altepetl poliwis, in kampa mochiwatiw amo wel momati in tlein ik poliwis, iwan se wei tlakatl tlahtokapili motenewa prínsipe momikilis, in kampa tlali ipam momikilis iwann aki amono wel momati, in kampa mochiwatiw ye kin ihkwak nesitiw in kampa ye omochiw; yese ye ones itech in tonatiw inik omixtlapachoka, ka okineskayoti in iw mochiwas. amalayoh in domingo tekisewilistli tlahko kilo ayohtoton iwan no ikwak motlahtokatlalike inn omentin tlahtoke chalko tlalmanalko kwateotsin itskawakan iwan tesiutsin opochwakan. itlanahnamik: yoa xikimilwilika tlatilulka tlatoke in tenochtitlan aukak motekas, ka nel intepewalpan in tetew. no kwaltia ika se kichiwa agwa freska. ¡amo onikmatia inin amo tepakti wel melawak tlen tepantsinko mochiwa! teyewatsin se kwali nomaiknin. timitsnotlatlahtia xitemomakili inin a m a t o n wan xitemotlahtlanili in tla kwali niteitas. akin kikwa itakka wan kitamota in iteyo, ompa ixwa. inik matlaktlamantli omei nikitowa onka nochalchiw makupesos nikmaka in nopiltsin in itoka ana kipielis in inantsin. amo onontlati, karlohtsin. ye in mexihko wele weyi yeyi milón chatiehkeh kinpia. wel mimichtik, kemanian kana omexipa se amo konamiki aka kixmati iwan kemanian okpa se onmonamiki ipan se tonailisan ika se tlakatl. amo mochipautani. inoyuhopeuh itlahtokayo, ernesto sedilo tenawati ma temo ipatio in mexikatlakowaloni. ahsiko de onkan kinwalikawiyaya wan kimakake in eskolta para kimiktikan. tlahko kilo textli semi tamatisneki kemeh in pahpata. satepan kiamatalia wan kitemaka sepa mah kixmatikan okseki tomasewalikniwan kuesalankaj, wan ika yon mah in tomasewaltahtol techtamachilistapo wan mah techohmaka keniuj in tisentekitiskeh wan mah kwali timotahtowikan. "ah, bweno yuh mochiw kimopalewili inik amo mik, san tlaltitlan in kikixtike; inin iw mochiw ik senka ok walka ik omawisowak in san nikolás nikan mexiko. asta ateno tihwikas", ihkino kiilwi. nikan om pewa in tealtilis tlahtuli i "uta, ne weyi kwesoli nihpí onkan kwaltlamotlatewak se yehwan sikawastli satepa ompa motlapo yahkweli walpanoya. in mochiwa mas kampa kajfentaj, kemeh newín xaltepekopa, no mochiwa kuoujtaj, kaltsinta wan tepekespaj. onkak chikwasen taman: in kostik (caturra), in chichiltik (caturra), burbón, garnika, mundo novo wan krioyo (arábigo). pitsome kwawin kwawin kilastla koaestika xayavalok ivivi aya kwauhivitl vitsa notlatlalia, ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. inik amo timotekipacholtis,nochipa ximokowihtsino san tlen kwali. kimanato tlaxkali ma tlakwaka kampa mantok aw in ikwak okimokakitike tlatoke omtlanawatilike senpowal onmatlaktli tonatiw tsatsiwas in aso aka mexiko chane kimokowis in kali tlali iwan aso aka kimiyekilis in ipatiw ka yewatl makos axkatilos in kali tlali omotenew. yewa noihki otewikaya tosiwamaiknin. 60. nokoske, noketsale, onimitsmamal in yuh teokwitlat] pitsalo; in chalchiwitl mamaliwa, san no iwi in otipitsalok, in otimamaliwak. aw in nikoske, ni niketsale. sententli, ontentli nisan monakastitech nimitsilpilisneki. in at, yuhki in at, ayuhki, in at, san nipopolonis in niwewe, in nilama. sa yuhkin moxilan, motoskatlan xokompacho. nokxie, nomae, timotolinia, in tikoskatl, in tiketsali, aw in tikwitlapili, in tatlapali. ¿can ok wits in sententli, in senkamatl? in chalchiwitl in nimitstololtis, nimitskwaltis, in maka san titoptli, tipetlakali. ¿can ok wits? immihtik kontlatis, in chalchiwitl, in teoxiwitl, in tlatiloni, in pialoni. aw kwix a tikmitis in xokok atl in alchichik in tlaelatih in atsoatl? aw inikwak okisako in omomanako tonatiw, yuhkin tlapali monenekwilotimani, amo wel ixnamiko, teixmimikti, senka tlanextia, motonameyotia, in itonameyo nowiyampa aasitimokets, aw in itonalmiyo nowiyampa kakalak. "nama mehor ta xihpatla ne nopapá achto niknekiskiani nikimmotlasohkamachililis ahkiwantsitsinokimochihchiwilihkeh inin temawistililistli iwikpatsinko innotemachtikatsin mikeltsin leonportila no iwki welyewatsin in teyakanki alisia mayer inik nokontenewasnikwalakis in notlahtol intloktsinko in wei temachtikatsitsintin in nikan mokalaktihtsinohkeh inik tikmotlasohkamachililiskeh in itekiwtsin in senka wei temachtikatsintli ipan axkan mexihko aw inik ankasikamatiske moneki yuh yesin in amoyolo, aw kamo san iseltin in mexika in weka in owalmowikake, aw ka akachto okalakiko chikwetlamantin in masewaltin in ompa walkiske in ompa walewake inchan in itoka katka weikan siudad astlan iwan teokolwakan, yese kamo sepan walake kamo ompa sepan walkiske kamo wel se tonatiw ipan walpewke amo sepan walololiwtiake. ka ye ixkich ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años anoso de 1609 años. san makwili tlakatl opoliwia kano asini omesientos mimikes. sayoh kwaltia para se kikwas, amo kwaltia para pahti. inik 7 tlamantli nikitohoa kimotlanewi notomines maria hernandes chane xiwitonko mitlanilis nopan popoliwis yoh nikitohoa i nehoatl ka ye ixkich i nikitohoa i notlatol ka ninosenkaohtioh ixpantsinko totekuyo dios nehoatl isaber ana nikan nomatika niketsa krus. isaber ana [co]coxqui. 92. nokonetsin, notekwiyokichtli, nimitskokos; nimitstlasas, nimitstlalkawaltis; miek motlakoyo, motekiw tikmomachitia; otlakawki immoyolotsin. ka nikkwi, ka nikana, ka nikkaki, ka iknotlamatis iiyolotsin in tlakatl, in totekwiyo. in aso niknoknotlamachtilis, akanosomo, iwan in akasomo yewatl in toko, in melawalo in nimitsonnotoktilis, ma ipaltsinko titlaweiyekokan. konilwia “tla xiwalaw, ken antlachia ken ankita in amotlapiello?”. in xiwit. ammaka okikwalihtaya ninosiwawtis axkan nien ammo onechtlahtlanililok ahkinon siwatl in itlok niknekia ninosenkawas yuhkin aik itecheopanin itla mihtoani ayokwik itechpa itla omihto in ichpuchtli nopinawiliseopa nien ammo niknawati tlen omoehiw ken ika nikilwiani ayokweli titosenkawaskiani ika ammo niknekia nechihtas san kwalkan oniyaya mila iwan oninokwepaya noehan ye wehka teotlak ikwali ichpokatl yewatlol wel neli ewali inemilis in ipan metseayotl oniktoeatinemia oniknemilisahsie tenohnotski mimatkatsintli inik nemia inik moyolew inik kilnamik in kinextikiw yankwik tlali. xii akatl xiwitl, 1283. ik ye kiwalilwia “ma ximowika, ma ye xitlamachiotitiw, ma xikmatsayatiw in kwawitl ma tetl xiktlalitiw inik tiquitztiazque”. in kwowit. sayoh se taman saj. tika in ewa sah itech teswakwowit. okitoke tikkakiltiya in hustisia ipampa in omomikili in itoka katka alo[n]so tokatsin kichiwtiw itestamento inik monamakas in ikal aw in ipatiw mochiwas kali ik misa ipan mitos in sankto hosephe technawatitia talvaseas inik neltis in itestamento. in kwamekatsin. mah amo kimatoka se okwilin, inik niman yewantin kimontokatiake in españoles in iskikampa kofradías kipia mexiko, san tel iksepan mantiake in omotenewke mulatotih; mochintin sesen kiwikatiake in esdantardes in invamderra, in ye mochi mosenpowa imaxka españoles senpowali, yewatl tesenpowalka in iesdantardetsin in ivamderratsin totlasonantsin sankta maría nwestra señora del rosario, sa tlatokatiw yehika ka ya wekawa, ka achto motlali inon kofradía sankto domingo katki, sa se in ye mochi omotenew kofradías san imamanian in tekpantiake inik mantiake inik yahtiake. ya kewa ye kihtowa in inchichimekatlahtol: "ye no poktli ayawitl kikisa"; in onkan mopotonike kin yewantin in totolimpaneka tlatokayotike tepotoniloyan, inik axkan motokayotia in onkan tepotoniloyan. onkak ome taman : seki kohkostik sah wan seki chichiltik. milchiwayaya wan ne san hwan san itstok ika nochin noyolo, kwalanih inihwanti. moneki inikpak tlen mochiwa tiezqueh. tla no tinechtemas no yaya nopa nihneki yoyolik aw in tlahtoani obispo wel miak tlamantli inik quitlahtlanih, quitlatemolih, inik wel iyolioh mahsis: kampa in quimottilih, kenamikatsintli. wel moch kimopouhililih in tlahtouni obispo; aw masiuhi in moch quimomelauhililih, in iwkayotsintli, iwan in iskich okittak, oquimahuizoh, in ka wel iw nesi ka yewatsin in senkiska ichpochtsintli, in itlasohmawisnantsin in totehmakixtihkatsin, totewkyo hesukristo, yese ahmo niman ik omonelchiw, kihtoh ka ahmo san ika itlahtol, itlaihtlanilis mochiuhas, moneltilis, in tlein kihtlani. inik makwilamantli nikteneoa in ompa san heronimo tepetlakalko mani nomilkoal nikowili don alonso kwawnochtli nikmakak matlaktli omei pesos inik motamachiwa tonatiw ikisaian itstok inik wiak ompoalkwawitl aw inik patlawak nekok ixkich kikwaxochnamiki in imil felipe heronimo koatlan chane aw in kipia itoka sebastian inin itech powis in noxwiw hoana maximiliana. achtotipa is katki in yuh tlamanka in ye wekaw in ipan puchtekayotl kimahkawato papaskamoh aw san wel ome metstli in ontlaawakka in wel onpoliwka atl in iksennowian chinampa; in san iyokan nikan mexiko in ipan metstli abril tlaawaki, iwan in ipan metstli mayo tlaawaki wel popoliwka in atl chinampa iwan in aixtlawakan, wel tetein tsatsayan in tlali. san pedro, san andrés, señor san hwan. atle kitoke in tlalmanalko tlahtoke don hernando de gusmán omakatsin iwan don fransisko de sandoval akasitsin; san kitoke "amo nel ye kichiwan don thomás ketsalmasatsin?, tlein tichiwaske ka yaxkan?". in xochiyowa itech in hunio, wan agosto. in sesek. in textli moneneloa ika istatl ixkichkaw in ye poxaktik; in ayoxochitl mochipawa iwan mopaka ika in yepasohtli; inin motsoyonia iwan ye tlaxkalmanalo; ihtik inin, ok tomak, motlalilitiw in ye tlatsoyonili ihun ome tlatlapantli chichiwalayotlatetsawtli; motsoyonia ahnoso mowikxitia komalko. wan tekitiyaya kema se domingo onkán yemowikak in yichkatl tlapisintli onkán nikan yemokawa. techtiakasoló in ik kitokaya "uitztli in yetl tiktlalakia kikwaske kiske in topilwan in toxwiwan: ahmo sen poliuiz. i tekpatl xiwitl, 1376. in taol yehwa totakwaltsin, ihwak elot welik tatewats oso chilposon iwan epasot, no welik tamanal oso kioyah wan kichiwah elotamal. nikwalita. tepitsin nisiahtok ka in teposkalmimilol wehka onwala. xinechmokwi tetepitsin, nia nomapahpakas. yeh kipiya problema mantitlanamakakan ye titemo ikpak minastepetl. tonoana keman makwili tepostlapoali watsinkopa. ye tiawe kampa tikochiske itokayoka santa marta. ompoyon chanekes ye kipia tlakwali, atlaposonali, tla ka kinekis tlayis iwan kikoas pantsin noso kikwaske in tlaxkali. iwan motekatiwe. in senyelis kikwalita kikwas nochi trigo pantrin. oktepitsinika, alfredo. ma isiwkan xisewi iwan achi in mostlatika. xxv pregon.- a kadorse dias del mes de mayo de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in tlaxilakalpa teskatsonko okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal in itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak otlanankili testigo pedro hernandes. ante mí fransisko maldonado eskrivano. amo se kitoka, mochiwa saj. aw in onkan ik nenka intlan; in kampa onmowikaya kimamatiw in ipetlakatl, aw in kanin onwiwia kiwalpilotasi in ipetlakaltsin. "amo ximokweso nomama. ihkwak ye omokixtili in iewayo in tochtli, mopohpoa kwali, makahmo tsomoni in chichikatl iwan vehiga, mopaka, motonalwatsa tepitsin, achto moxahwilia istatl; in waxchili mokixtilia in ikwitlaxkol iwan moihseki ika xonakatl iwan axox; mochinin motesi ika orégano ika tepitsin atl, inik mochiwas in chilatl tepitsin tetsawak; inin moxahwilia in tochtli, mokawa ahso ome kawitl, satepan motlalia tlexochpan iwan san tlamach mokwekweptiw ixkichkaw ye tlawikxitili. ya kitlachalito san yayá kwatitla. aw inhi “ma xikmomakawili, ma xikimomakili i nokoski i noketsal i noxuiuhtzi”. tlehkok nopa koneho ipaniko yektok. sana sana ayo veka nivia sana sana ayo veka nivia. ye nikwiliva ai a nivaya nivaya nivaya a ikanaw nivaya nivaya nivaya a ikanaw. tla ixtotoka ye kanawtsin in in amo rnonamaka. amo wekawake in istakalko;
