aw nima ye ik witse onmotlaliko in tenochtitla, tolitik akaitik in ikak tenochtli, ume kali xiwitl i oasiko. ximonemachtihtsino nochi tlen mowaxkatsin man yekmani. aw in ihkwak ye noseppa nokwel owalnes, in wel owaltewilakachiwkanes mochi tonatiw, in wel ye tlanextia, ik niman ixko walmosensow in mixtli, ik nowianpa in ilwikatl ik walmixtsawktimomah in omotenew mixtli, aokmo senka kana walnes in ixkichika onakito tonatiw in ikakalakiyampa inik onyowato. in se kitoka. mochipautani, tepitsin moneki mah se kinehmachpiya. ikwak onkan motlaliko in kwawxayakatitlan in chichimeka, onkan walewake inik konamakenikwiloke tetl tlatenko. in ipan in xiwitl de mil i seissientos, in ipan yankwik metstli de henero, ikwak ontsintik in alkaldesme nawintin motlalike, sesen ixketsaloke in inawkampaixti || 25 sant hwan motlali alkalde hwan bonifasion, sant pablo motlali alkalde hernando garsía, sant sebastián motlali alkalde don antonio de mendosa, sankta maría motlali alkalde diego sánches. kito in malin: “cuix we melawak in tikitowa? akasomo melawak in iw tikitowa yaotekato in quauhtemoctzin?”. ni tumba serros okse monamihke okihto yehwa itoka tumba serros. axaka kikwa nopa tekwani. aw in ikwak in asito in ompa in koyowakan, aw in ompa tlaka in koyowake mochi tlakatl kinyakapiktasik in diablo, in ika in tlein in itlatol; aw inik kimyakapiktasik, ik axkan motokayotia yakapichtlan. in ipan in xiwitl in ipan axkan domingo ik xx mani abril, ikwak auto mochiw in sant joseph, sentekpantli teittitiloke hudiosme in tlateotokanime. nikitoa newatl neskrivano hoan silvestre ka ye neli itlatol in angelina martina nikan chane itlaxilakaltia san martin telpochkaltitlan pochtlan yoan wel nikixmati in ixkich nikan onikikwilo yoan wel nikimiximati in testigos aw inik nikneltilia nikan niktlalia notoka yoan nofirma. fecho a kinse dias del mes de febrero de mil e kinientos i ochenta años. hhoan de san silvestre eskrivano. viii akatl xiwitl, 1279. xikal nikan ipan in in momikiliko witsiliwitl tlahtowani tenochtitlan, inin ipiltsin in akamapichtli, in tlahtokat senpowalxiwitl ipan chikwasen xiwitl; aw san niman ikwak motlahtokatlali in ipiltsin in itoka chimalpopokatsin, aw in itskowatsin tlakatekkati, itlan kinanamiki. ontsetseliwi, pipixawi, onneapanaltsin ye itech. mah se kimolonti, mah ixkwetawi saj, mah amo wehkawa manto, ta tel yemanik wan pati. axean timohtilis opanoke miek xiwitl newatl tekipan oninemia aik okseppa oniknemili ninosiwawtis seppa onechmonochili nonantsin yewatsin motlaxealmanilihtaya tlaewalchiwkan aw iwan ye senpowalxiwitl ipan yexiwitl in ipan 3 tochtli xiwitl, 1586 años, in omopewalti mowikak kastila in teoyotika tlahtowani don pedro moya de kontreras arsobispo mexiko, matlakxiwitl in arkobispo moyetstikat mexiko tenochtitlan, aw iwan inik visitador iwan inik governador mochiwtsino mexiko yexiwitl. komo miak se kikwa tekwilia in esti. ach in iwki xochitl san ketsalia kemitl wilantok amoxkalitek. in ik on pialo in teotl aya tepetl. xochimitletlewatok, mochalchiwkankal noteokwitlaamoxkakal, anse ye mochan, in teotl. aw in kali ontetl tonatiw ikalakiyanpa itstimani iwan tepan tlatsakwali inik machiyoti mani xochipali nitlapali amo iwan tokal oksekintin imaxka itoka simon iwan maria ompa chaneke tlatilolko. se kilo chilnanakatl aw inin in okimonpew in axayakatsin in tepetikpak tlaka in masawake, aw nimann ik onkalak in michwakan in axayakatsin inik okinpewato in tlasimaloyan || 101r tlaka; okito in axayakatsin: "çan niman tasiske in michwakan". aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl omotenew in ipan metstli agosto in momikili tlakatl wewe don antonio valeriano askapotsalko ichantsinko; inin governador katka in nikan mexiko tenochtitlan, inin imontsin katka in tlakatl don diego de alvarado wanitsin, aw senka wekaw in kimopialiko altepetl tenochtitlan. ye kiwalwia in tlaxkalteka “can amocha?”. aw sano ihkwak in omachistiko inik owala tlahtoli españa in kenin yewatsin rei kiwalmiwalia se komendador klérigo deán muchiwtiwits, onkan kiwalmotlalilia in pirú inik onkan kinpachos klérigos; inin omotenew komendador ka kanónigo reglar itetsinko powki iteopixkatsin ipiltsin in wei patriarcha san antonio abbad notlasottatsin. xochiyowa febrero wan marso. iuki kitokaitiah por in alawak tepitsin. kemaj, momeutani. xii tochtli xiwitl, 1270. san hwan bautista kitemouaj. intla in tatahtin ixtlahuatlacah, pilantoton iwan siwantoton iniman oktsitsikitsitsin ye konixmatih nochi tlen intatah ipan tequitih, ka in sente piltontli in weyaltepetl nemi amo keman kixmati. tohwanti ya santika tijkuaj. niman onotsaloke in wewetke kowatlayawkan martin lasaro martin sakarias regidor martin lwis kwitlachkowakatl felipe sanches ilwiloke in ye wekaw kanin welpew tlali inik kinmakake moyoteka. anyezquiayah. ixwa wan tehko itech mil, ompa ya taki. pewa 140 (ciruela) a 165 (xonekuil -jinicuil) : blas soto islas ihwak achi wehka ya pewa xochiyowa. ni kichiwa o iskatki in ohtli tiktokas, iwin tinemis, i iwiin in otechmoskaltilitiake, in motekwiiotsitsiwan, in totekuyoan, in sioapipiltin, in ilamatlaka, in tsonistake, in kwaistake. ¿ kwix senka ixkich kikawaya in, ka san senkamatl in kitemakaya, in kikawaya, in kihtoaya ka san ie ixkich intlatol. awin san yewatsin kimachiltia in asitla nechmo...lilis". se kitoka. ninemiskia no pahti para reuma se kiatema in iteyo wan se motalilia. sekintin wewetke mexika kimachiyotia kil okno ipan mochiw in toskwekwextli in inteyakankaw mexika; inik mihtowa onkan kilpilike in ixiw in tekpayokan, aw ye itsonkis san in ipan in omotenew 2 akatl xiwitl in omomikiliko. tlan axmayanah meltihka", inihwanti moiluiyaj. aw in achtopa tlalkowali tlali inik patlawatika onmatl iwan sensiakatl aw inik chikokistika senmatl iwan senyolotli aw inik wiyakixtika nanmatl iwan senmiti inik onasitika kalakowayan. wan teipa kiilwi nikanka tomin. itla ye oni. kilkawaya, notechmoneki nikinkowas sekintin painpepeyoktin eheka amatitlantin. ¿quexqui itechmoneki sente eheka amatl? wan kipí bentos nohkí. in okinnawati in ittawan maxtlaton, niman kimonilwiko in mexika. xikiskalti wan xikihiyomaka, iii ka- || 77v -lli xiwitl, 1313. aw in ikexkan ka mitowa libia, ka kitosneki kwawtlan sakatlan kwawixtlawakan, aw yehika ka oksenka ixkich in ipan onkatki ka oksenka tlapanawia inik wewei in kwawixtlawatl in sakaixtlawatl iwan tlalkawyan, san kaktimani yuhkatla, san nemiwyan, ayak nemi. axkan miérkoles in ik 11 mani metstli marso de 1615 años, ihkwak nikan mexiko kimaxitiko eintin españoles de la gwardia yewantin kinpixtiwia in forsados la china kinwika hustisiatika in tlakpak omotenewke, korte kimontsake; aw iw machistiko yuh mihto in nikan mexiko epowalonmatlaktli in kinchololtito. yewa onechtlahkwilwi se weyi amaihkwiloli. axiwaka tlaxilakali ma yektenewalo in totekuyo i dios axowaka axkan sabato ik xx2 de mayo 1561 años niktlalia notlatol i newatl ni marina tiakapan san ipaltsinko in totekuyo in dios i keni nitlanawatia ayak kixitinis i notlatol i tla nimomikilis. aw i maso neliwi i yewatl in || 3r in mitowa motenewa in inenewkatsin in ipatilotsin in totekwiyo dios, kitosneki, in iw kimomachitia sankto thomás, "yn kwaltika yektika tlamamakok inik chiwalok, san poliw itech in tlakatl ipampa in itlapilchiwal in itlatlakol, aw ka yuhki in in tlachiwaltin in yolkame tlaltikpak in ayokmo kitlakamati ayokmo tlein ipa kitta, sa motlaimakaskaneki sa yuhki tsonteme; aw i kwaltiwani yektiwani in itech katka kitlalkawi kiknokaw. no kwaltia se kichiwa papayahat para se tayis. yahkeya inincha nikan peoa in kenin walake mexika inik asiko nika. xikinpiya nopilwan, xikinpiya kwidado. ah tle ipan titechmati, ti tech tlatia, ti tech popolowa ye nikan. axkanelime. nitlahtlanis tomi para ma techmaka para manxitlanamaka miérkoles a iii de mayo de 1600 años, wel ipan in sankta vela krus ilwitsin, ikwak asiko in itlahtolo arsobispo don alonso fernándes bonila inik ompa omomikili perú, aw niman ik pew in nowian tsilin kampana in mikkatepostli; achi keskilwitl in tlatsilin, aw satepan missa ipan mito in iglesia mayor. in ixpan testigosme in omoyolsewike algwasilesme pedro de sanktiago, hwan wakal, migwel xwares, anton ramires, pedro makoknen, migwel tochtli. nikan ipan in ipewayan inin xiwitl in onkan tisatepek walewake inik ye witse teotenanka chichimeka chikwasen kalpoltin: in tlailotlake, in atlawteka, in tlakatekpan tlaka, in amilka, in tewktipan tlaka, in tepameka. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. otitlasohtlakeh ihwak onkak mochiwa miak. in mochiwa kampa se kitoka etsin. kwalika man tik nitsakan in tlaxexelotekipana. akowak. wan komo se kineki tatsoyon, mah se kimimilo iayoh wan mah se kimapatska, satepan mah se kitikoketsa in kaswela mah kawani wan se kitalilia mantekita wan ompa se kipantalia ya in ahmolkilit wan mah se kipoyeli. ma kwakwalaka in ome litro atl; moatilia in textli ika ome tekontontli atsintli; mochiwa in atoli, motlalilia in xoxowki kalwahsa in ye kwali tlachipawtli; senka moteteki in yepasohtli, in chili motesi ika istatl; mochinin motlalilia in atoli. aw kolotin tlachichiwaltin matlaktin chiwknawi kastilteka, se señora ikmatlaktli, ik on se kwawtanako tentia iyomiyo, iksentekpantli tlatlake. miak chichiwalatl kin pak tia kiskeh in piltsitsintin. ii tekpatl xiwitl, 1260. tlen 113 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlahtol tlanawatilmeh tlen tekichiwalismeh intechpowi tlen altepeko tequichihuaneh, kiihtoseh katlia ihki in tlanawatil ten ika kimokwitlawiseh tlanawatikayotl, kwalnemilistli, tlaneltokilistli, xitlawak nemilistli iwan nelkwali tekitikayotl, tekipanoli, tlanawatili iwan tlanechicolismeh; tlatsakwilismeh ipampa tleweli kichiwaseh noso tlailcahuaseh; iwan noihki tekichiwalismeh iwan tekiwakemeh tlen quitequihuiseh. inin tlatsakwiltili, iyoka tlen kinextiseh tlanahuatilmeh, kiihtosneki tekikotontli, tekikixtili iwan amo keman welis tekitis, iwan noihki tomin tlatsakwiltili iwan moneki kikwalitas tlen kitlatlakawih iwan tlen tetlahtlakawi ipan tlapiali ika inemilis tlen kihtowa ipan iii tlatlapantli tlen 109 tlanawatikayotl, san amo welis kiixpanos eyi tlen nochia tlen tetlahtlacahuih. in itlanawatil tlen tekpan kaltlanawatiloyan tlen tlatlacolmeh, tla tleweli tekichiwalistli axkwali kichiwas, ika inon kitlahtlakawis akahya itlapialis noso tlen itechpowi, saniman moxitlawas. in santlakameh kipiaseh tlanawatili makinmakakah tlapalewili ken motetoniah, moixtlamia iwan moixtlalia ipan tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh. xa itech karretera, i tekpatl xiwitl, 1064. pus axan nankimatiske tiawe titlakwalchiwaske karambas nepahka chaparrito bigotudo pus órale xischiwakan tokomida. ye omito kamo wel momati in kampa yewatl tlali ipan owalewake in wewetke, aso asia, anoso afrika, anoso europa, in moxeloke in ompa waltekaw- || -que wewetke chichimeka, inik owalake inik onkan atenkisako astlan. septiembre se kiichkwa ya aw in oksekintin wewetke mexika in iw kihtowa onkan in inxiw yankwikan kilpiliko in itokayokan teokulwakan, in anoso saso kampa, yese wel ipan in in omotenew xiwitl. vii tochtli xiwitl, 30. . "ca ye kwali, ka nikan tika, ka otokonanke ka otokonkwike aw ka otokonkakke in mihiyo in motlatol: xochiyowa itech enero, febrero wan marso aw in ikwak okonkake tlatokatlatoli nima mochitin kitoke “ma walmowika i tlakatl in totekwiyo totlatokatsin; ma tiktomasewitsinoka. iii tochtli xiwitl, 26. no nana in kwawnawak ka. mopaka in ayohtli iwan moyexkampanakasemachiyuteteki; mokixtilia in ayohwachtli ahnoso mokawilia, kenin monekis. achto motlalia in xoktli tleko, ahso wehyi ahnoso ahmo wel wehyi, ixkichtoton ayohtli mowikxitis ika makwili litro atl. ihkwak ye kwakwalaka, motlalilia kanela, pilonsilo, ixkichtoton ayohtli in omotlali; motlalilia naranha iewayo, in achto ye omopak. mowikxitia kenin monekis, atik ahnoso tetsawak; intla inin moneki mokawa okachi tleko. sekih tlakah kimpaktiah atik yehika ihkwak ye kiyehyekoskeh kitlaliliah sekih xumali pinoli iwan iwki okachi quiahhuiyacamatih. onkak ome taman: kahfentahchalawih wan kuoujtajchalauij. imekayo tehko itech owasín wan ompa ya taki. iwan aokmo no sepa ik mixnamikiske in akin ok sepa teixnamikis ipan tiktlalia pena chikomilwitis karsel iwan v pesos tomines konixtlawas in ikamara su magestad omochiw nikan siudad mexiko a 20 de hulio de 1571 años. fransisko de la krus alkalde tomas [sic] lukas alkalde newatl fransisko moisen eskribano. se kikwa in itakka se kikokototsa wan se kikwa. inik ontlamantli nikitotiw ok sentetl onikak nokal tienta akokalo tonatiw ikisayanpa itstikak amo tlekopayo nicmacatiu in nokonew itoka maria ka ikal iwan in tlalmantli in onkan monamaka tesontlali in tonatiw ikisayampa. aw ka nikitowa iwan nikmaka in nokonew itoka maria. nikan ipan in poliwke in okwilteka iwan chontalkowatlan tlaka, yewatl tepew in axayakatsin; aw sanno ikwak kinpew in kwawnawak tlaka. v tekpatl xiwitl, 1068. kikwa. yaokwikatl in ipan siudad mexiko a dies i ocho dias del mes de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años onkan in ipan tlaxilakali tekpankaltitlan onkan otsatsik in tekpoyotl in ipanpa monamaka ikal mariana se tlakatl español kitema chikwasenpowali pesos aw in ikwak okitenew ayak kitenyoti testigo fransisko flores iwan diego astaxochitl. aw in yewatl in tlahtowani in wewetewktli in chichimekatewktli sa tekitl onasiko in atenko onkan momikiliko; in san ya yewatl ipan asiko in omotenew ix kali xiwitl. —ingeni morespetaroaya'. inochtin tosenyehkan transilvania chantih. in kalxeloli weyi. amo nikinkwalita in tsitsikitsitsin kalxexeloltin. notechmoneki weyi kalxeloli kampa kwali nolinis. ¿quexquich se metspa kitlani? amwel tokahyan inik tikchiwaskew inin tekitl. kwaltia mochiwa nikan atmolonkopa, tonalixkopa, tekoltepek wan ne santiago yankwitlalpan no onkak. ¿aquin newa? niman ye ik kiyawalowa in tepetl chalchiwmomostli; in okonyawaloke in chichimeka, nokwel seppa ompa motlalito in omotenew tepetikpak tonaliitlatlayan chikonkiyawtepetl imapan, ka wel iwki in ompa inchan katka. neltika in tlatsihki kitlakolwia in tekitl. viii akatl xiwitl, 1227 años. onetekipacholoya ipampa amoka oteixmatia ika méxiko ka okseki lugar. iwan iki on omonemili onkwan ika panoske tepilwan iwan tatatin amo motekipachoske ika tomin. ika on oyowalkixowak. amatlakawkwalikak nian chichi, nian mistli, nian se kwanaka kwache chikeletsatsin iwan kikakiske in karransistas. axweli ¿in akin teka otimotlahtolti? i wel achtopa onkan omochantiko ka yewantin in omotenewke ulmeka xikalanka xochiteka kiyawisteka kukolka, in achtopa || 41r walake in motekako in tlalmasewako in ipan tlali chalchiwmomosko, in ipan in motenewa nweva españa. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. aw masiwi in iaxka katka inin omotenew tlali, yese sa atl otentimanka in onkan, senka achi wekatlah okatka; aw in oyuh konkow yewatl omotenew antonio barreto, kin yewatl okitlalten inik okiwekapano oksekni okisakato in tlali, onkan okitetenmako inik okipolo atl onkan omanka. aw ixkich kawitl okawtikatka ayak okitemakake in testigo informasio ihoan amo no tle ik otlanankilike in ixkich kawitl inik otsatsitinenka in tekpoyotl in diego astaxochitl ipan metstli a 25 dias del mes de henero ipan xiwitl 1578 años. aw iwan ye chiwknawpowali ipan se xiwitl in ipan 1 tekpatl xiwitl, 1428 años, in opoliw altepetl askapotsalko inik pewalok, ipan mochiw yewatl in tlakatl maxtlatsin ikwak onkan tlahtokatia in askapotsalko. mochipa yuh walnesia, inmakasan walmapilowaya, ye nikan tokpakpa in kiwalketsaya ikwitlapil tonatiw ikisayampa onitstikaya. tein chichikxokot semi tilawak in iewayo wan pahpatachtik; komo se kitokaitia amo wel se kikwa, se kiyekowayek chichik wan komo amo se kitokaitia, amo chichik. semi se kiita miak xochiyowa mayo. in okisako tlatlenpa nima ye ik tletlalia; nima ye ik umpa ipan tleko tenoch, kilwia “oticmihiouilti”. in sesek. aw yexiwitl iwan yei metstli in moyetstikatka sant ipólito ipan tlaxilakali teokaltitlan. .ya tochi kiyokuxkia notew. ni ki ya tlasas, ni ki ya mamalis mixkoatepetl kolwakan. toskiva aya niktsotson in teskatsintli in teskatsintli nikan nopilwantsitsin mitsnemaktitih in kwamekat monotsa texokomekat, iuki kilwiah por in tel ayoj. niman ik tetlan omokalakike in kulwankan, in tlatlatlawtito itoka estloselonpa; aw in otlaiwake xomimitl, michinistak, tenoch, istakchiawtototl. aw in isiwaw kiwalwikak omotenew tlahtowani totoltekatl || 33v tsompachtli itoka kwawxuchtsin, in siwapili tewan wala. tlen 111 tlanawatihkayotl. iwikpa welis kin tlatsakwiltiseh tepantlahtoanih iwan wekapah tepantlahtoanih tlen tlahtokan sennnechikolistli, in ministros tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia tlen totlalnantsin, in magistrados tlen sala superior tlen tribunal elektoral, in konseheros tlen hudikatura federal, in sekretarios tlen despacho, in diputados tlen asamblea tlen distrito federal, in hefe tlen gobierno tlen distrito federal, in prokurador general tlen totlalnantsin iwan prokurador general tlen hustisia tlen distrito federal, iwan noihki in konsehero presidente iwan konseheros elektorales tlen konseho general tlen instituto federal elektoral, ipan nechikolistli tlen tlahtlakolmeh tlen kawitl tlen keman intlanawatil, in tlahtokan tlen tepantlahtoanih kiihtos ika senmiakintin tlen imawan ompa yetosqueh, tla welis noso amo welis kitlahtlakoltiseh in tlatlakoani. tla tlasenkawali tlen tlahtokan axtetlahtlakoltis mokotonas nochi tekichiwalistli tlen teipaya, inon amo kitsakwilis tlahtoli iwikpa mokotonas tlahtlakoli tlen ika kitelwiah tlen keman tlamitia itlanawatil, inon nechikolistli amo kisenkawas tlahtoli tlen quicahuiliah. tla in tlahtokan kiihtos welis motokilis tlahtoli, in tlakatl motemaktilis inimako tekiwakemeh iwikpa matekichiwakah ken kiihtowa tlahtol tlanawatili. tlen iixkawil tlayekanani tlen totlalnantsin, san welis motelwis ipan wekapa tlahtokan ken moihtowa ipan 110 tlanawatihkayotl. ipan inin tlamantli tlahtoli, in wekapa tlahtokan tlasenkawas ken moihtowa ipan tlahtlakoli amatlanahuatilmeh. iwikpa welis kintlatsakwiltiseh ika tlahtlakoli tlen sentlanawatiloyan in tlanawatianeh tlen tlaltlanahuatilmeh, tepantlahtoanih tlen chinankopa, magistrados tlen tribunales tlen hustisia tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh iwan, seha tlamantli, imawan tlen konsehos tlen hudikaturas lokales, motokilis seha tekichiwalistli tlen ixnesi ipan inin tlanawatikayotl, san inin tlamantli tlahtoli, in tlasenkawali tlen tlahtlakoli motematiltis ipan chinankopa tlanahuatilchihuanih, iwikpa tlen yewa itekichiwalis makichiwa tlen monekis. in tlahtol tlasenkawalmeh tlen tlahtokan tepantllahtoanih noso wekapan tlahtokan amo welis motewis. in yolpacholi tlen kiwalikas tlahtoli tlen keman kitlahtlakoltiseh tlahtlakoani elis kiihkweniseh ipan itlanawatil kewak akahya tlen kinotsah ipan tekichiwalistli tlanawatili. tla inin tlasenkawali tlamis ipan tlamakixtilistli wankinoh tlen kitlahtlakoltiah welis sampa kikwis itequih. tla tlasenkawali kineltlahtlakoltis iwan nopa tlahtlakoli kichihtos tlen keman tlanawatiaya, amo welis kimakaseh tlapohpolwili. ipan tlatelwili tlen san altepechantli kampa kitelwiah se altepeko tekitini amo monekis tlahtoli tlatelwili. in tlatsakwiltilmeh motekiwis ken moihtowa ipan tlanawatilmeh tlen tlatsakwiltili, iwan keman tlahtlakoli tlen mochiwas anke ihkinoh nemis mokawilis tomih noso kitlahtlakawis tlen akahya iaxka, moneki motamachiwas tlen kenihki mokawili tlen kikwik iwan tlen monekis ika mokwaltlalis tlahtlakoli tlen ika axkwal nenki. in tomin tlatsakwiltilistli amo welis kipanos expa tlen moaxkatihtos noso tlen ipatih tetlahtlacahuih. aw in axkan in tiktomasewitikate in tlali in mexiko tenochtitlan. noponi tiyas aw inewan in imach hwan diego kinkalohtih in ichan obispo achi keskilwitl, in ok ixkich ika moketsinoh ite'¿caltzin tlahtohkasiwapili in onkan tepeyakak in kanin kimottitilih in hwan diego. i tenayoka tlatokati itoka ixkosawki, tekwanitsi. istatl, ixkich in monekis in ikwak sant sebastián ilwitsin katka, in ipan lunes a xx de henero de 1597 años, in yewatsin totlasotatsin frai alonso urbano gwardián san fransisko onpowali pesos kinmotlaokolili in kokoxke; ik mokow tlaoli tlaxkali markexodi xochikwali xokotl. yiman tlaxexeloa nochtin okikixtike in tlaxkal. iwan tsatsi nechka, ye wits tlacualero. kwikats totlaxkal; axan tektlakwaske. ihtik in ome litro atl motlalia tlahkoxonakatl iwan yei axoxtlantli, mokwakwalatsa; ihkwak ye kwakwalakatos ye motlalia in nakatl in ye tlapaktli. ika ome tekontontli atl mowikxitia in chili ika tomatl, xonakatl iwan axox; mochinin motesi ika tepustlatsoaloni ahnoso temolkaxitl. tleko motlalia in kaxitl, motlalilia in pitsochiyawisotl iwan motsoyonia mochi in omotes, satepan motlalilia in nakatl iwan istayutl in ihtik owiksik. aw in tlakatl in ilankweitl atlawtekatltewktli ye omito tlakpak amoma wel wala i nikan tolteka tsakwaltitlan tenanko, ye ompa tlahtokat in atenko, kaxtolomei xiwitl in onkan tlahtokat. iska in itepewal: tlatlaukiikxik, onkan tsiukowak, molanko, tsapotla, saltepekek, pantlanala, xochtla, amaxtla, yawtepeke, kuskakwahtenako, xolochiwkan, tsowipilan, koyokak, akalekan, xiwistlawaka, akatepek, akapolko, wexolotlan, tekpatepekek, nexpan, istaktlalokan, teokwitlatlan, tsotsola, xikonchimalko, kwawxayankantitla, koyolapan, nakaskwautla, kwesalkwitlapilko, iswatla, siwatlan, wewetla, wistla, xolotla, matsantlan, wipilan, tekwantepekek, ayontochkwintlatlan, kwautlan, miskitlan, tlakotepekek, kwaupiloyan. se xonakatl tlatilolka sa tlatsawktiake, yei in invandera onkan kikixtike wewei, krus soledad gwion krus iwan krus manka. aw in intlahtokaw walmochiwtia in akxoteka in ompa kiwalwikak tetlweweyakan in kiwalyakan itoka tekonewatewktli tekwachkawtli, in tlahtowani walmochiwtia akxotlan in onkan in kwitlatetelko; inewan monepanoko in tlahtowani totoltekatl tsompachtli tlailotlaktewktli. ne se wala, kikwasneki, kifeuiaj. xii akatl xiwitl, 1283. epasot komino, ixkich in kikwi tomahpil oka yewantin in in kinpanawike tlaxkalteka in onkan onoya in katka in axka amakemekan. lo ke tein namechtahtanilihtok itech nehin tonal, amo mochipautani. kwaltia komino, ixkich in kikwi tomahpil ik senka kimotetsawike kolwaka tlatoke, kitoke “aquique hi i mexica?”. iwan yewatsin leonportila senka kwali temachtiani kemen kihtoa in tlahtoli in teukwitlatl, in chalchiwitl, in kwachtli, in ketsali, i ye ixkich tlasotli, aoktle ipan motak sa tetepewi. "¡xitlakonana! kitlalihke wan tlatsilinihke opewaya oanaske ipan metstli enero. oyaya miak tlaka iwan siwame mowentiske ompa chalma, kinmotlasokamachililiske. tlaka omokoko iwan okimotenewili totatsin chalma ika nochi iyolo okimosewiliaya. noso seki okintsakwaya noso okinmiktiskia ichtehkes iwan san nika okimotenewiliaya toteotatsin chalma, okimokwepililiaya chikawalistli. iwan inomekes kintsakwiliaya ichtehkes okinmomakixtiliaya noihki. san ika okinmotenewiliaya mawistik teotl ocholowaya ichtehkes: nian amo kinmakatewaya, nian amo tla okikixtiliaya. ika on tlaka ompopolawia ompa itik teokali chalma. axkinehki kiitas itakilo se kikwa wan para se tayi atol. okchikwexiwitl in inka nekakayawalok in tlakochkalka. ye miek xiwitl in nikchiwtaya noaltepetekiw ompa wei altepetl oaxyakak in kin iwti notech oahsik in itlahkwiloltsi mikeltsin leonportila inon ones ipan tlahtolnextilamatl in itokakaxtilankopa espeho in kimoyakaniliaya yewatsin lwis spota in san keskintin itlapowalmachiyoh omopantlaskeh iwan ipan oneskeh in intlahkwiloltsin mikeltsin leonportila iwan yewatsin in teopixkatsintli angel maria garibai in itlahkwiloltsin leonportila motokayotiaya in wewe mexihko in itlaxelolis in semenawak tlahtolotl kihto in tliltekatsin: "yn at sekintin nikan nopan kalakikiwi, ompa inwikpa nikimoniwas in topilwan". in ikse mokwateki yewatl in pili tewktli habón itoka mochiw in onka ipan baptismo don alonso, teoyotika ithatsin mochiw in don hernando de altamirano kapitán de la gwardia in ihkwak; aw in ikome mokwateki habón tlakatl itoka mochiw lurenso, teoyotika itatsin mochiw in don pedro altamirano. iwan nikan motenewa in akin okinwalyakantia in diablo in okiwalmoteotitiake in motokayotia tetsawteotl. anmetstikateh in amo kwaltia para pahti, solo para se kikwa, semi welik. . niman yewatl kiteki in itech powi tlali, kitoawaya tlalteoktli, amatika tlaelelpili no oltika kitentia kiyakatia kihixtelololtía. no yuhkin tlakatl tlachie. tein wehweyi moskaltiah semi wan tamimoskaltia yon teh wehweyi, tilewi wan se kikwapata mochiwa potoxtik mahyá kwounex komo se kipitsa. . in oasike niman ye ik kin tlenamakilia kin nanamikke in iw muchiwaya ye wekaw. sahagún wewetke itlapalewiantlahtol nama inkineltokase tlen nimechilwiski. . inin tlatkitl wel ixkoya iaxka in awitsotsin in kitkiliaya anawak pochteka. wan kiihtowah ya achka elito. otlakatiwak ipan nawi tsontli, mahtlakomepowali iwan nawi xiwitl, makwiltonalpa metstlí marso. okipixkeh chikome tepilwan in akinomeh san yeyi nemih. n o k h i nt i n noiwitlapaltin kwahkwaltin. ye motech on kisa a iwintixochitli,¡ma xon awiyakan! tlayowa komo nama kiilwi inin nawtlamantli nikitowa in newatl ni hwana mosel se tlakatl itoka fransisko chane amanalko kipia notomines senpowali omatlaktli pesos aw in axkan nikitowa kastoli pesos intech powis in pipiltotonti in imextin martina lopes, maria geronima, klara aw in ok kastoli pesos notech powis ik palewilos in naniman misas ye mitos iwan ontetl baila [sic] nikpie aw inin sesentetl kikwiske in nopilwan in martina lopes iwan maria. yon kwowit. ixtlawaka ma itilok tamatepew, ikwepka nanosiwatsi tetokatsi, aiya i yewa ye. in iknoke on kate intepilwan, non nesawalkoyotsin, ni kwikanitl, tsontekochotsin. aw in omotenewke wewetke chichimeka inik onkan kisako ka san ok sentetl in intlatol walmochiwtia inik walatotiake; aw yese san ixkich amo wel melawak momati kampa inchan kampa tlali in ipan walewake, iwan tleik kiwalkawke in intlal in imaltepew, kwix yaoyotika in walake aw kwix noso san ika iteyolewilistsintika in totekwiyo dios in owalake, inik weyapan || [13r] akaltika walmotlalike, inik nenenke atlan in motenewa teowapan, inik ompa kisako in kampa okisako. "na axnihmati", kiilwi tekayewatsin iyolnonotsal wan xtahtowikan natmalin: tlen 20 tlanawatihkayotl. tlahtlakoltehtemolistli moneki elis moteilwiseh iwan ika intlahtol kamanal. tlen tlahtoli tlayakanas moneki elis nochimeh weliseh ki matiseh, mo ixkotemiliseh ika tlahtol, san sehko ki kixtiseh in tequih, mohmotskitok in tekih elis iwan moneki itstoseh tlen mo ixkotemiliseh se tlahtlakoli iixpah tequihueh. a. tlen tlahtoli tlayakanas: i. tlahtlakoltehtemolistli kitemos maixnesi kenihkatsa panok tlahkia, ki mokwitlawis akin amo tleno kichihtok, nochi kichiwas kitlatsakwiltis tlahtlakolchihketl iwan amo san keni mamo kawa iwan maki kwaltlali kanke tecocoh; ii. nochi tlakakilistli kichiwaseh ixpah tequihueh, amo kemah seyok ki kawilihtewas itekih kemah kitlachiliseh kenihki kiixtomah iwan kitlaliliah ipatih nochi tlen ika momanahuiah, yainih amo kanah kin tsakwiliseh san keh yowantih welih iwan quicuamachiliah; iii. tlen inakayo sentensia san kikalakiseh tlen ika momanawiseh nochi tlen kiitakeh kiixtohtonkeh pan in tlakakilis iixpan tequihueh. amatlanawatili kiihtos semah amo welis ke tlah tlen moneki iwan ihkinoh ki seliseh iixpan tekiweh ika mo manawiseh kemah ayimo itonal, iwan ihkinoh noneki mo ixnextis nimantsi; iv. kamanali mo ixtomas iixpah tekiweh tlen amo kanah kiixmati tlen ika asitokeh nopaya. in kamanal tlahtol tlen ika momanawiseh iwan nochi tlenweli tlen ika mo manawiseh no ixtomas inixpah akin weli sekinok tlacameh, mo ixkoilwiseh tlemach iwan ki tekiwiseh san in tlahtolkamanali; v. tlen imahmal kipias kiixnextis se tlakatl itlahtlakol elis akin te tlateilwia, san keh kiihtos amatlanawatili tlen tetlatsakwiltia. iwan tlen mo ixkoihliah san se in wikal kin tlakakilis tekiweh kemah akahya kimamaltiah se tlahtlakoli ke tlah tlen momanawiya, kehani quichihtiaseh; vi. amo weli yon se tekíweh mo senkawas tlahkía iwaya akahya tlen mo teilwiya tlah nopaseh amo aki, nochipa moneki ki tlepanitaseh tlahtoli kiihtowa mo ixkotemiliseh in kamanal, amo ihkinoh elis san kemah ihkinoh te kawilis ni weyi amatlanawatili; vii. kemah pehkía tlahtlakoltehtemolistli, iwan axmo tlahkotlalis tlen kinmatiltiah se tlahtlakoli, weli nimantsi tlamis tla onka tlamantli iaun tekawilia amatlanawatili. tla akih kinmamatiltiah se tlahtlakoli kiselia iixpah tekiweh tlen yainoh itequih, ika iselti iwan kimahtos nochi tlen weli panos, kena tlahtlakolchihki iwan onka tlemach ki ixnextia kena ihkinoh panok, nopa tekiweh kin notsas se tonali kikakiseh in tlatsakwil. amatlanawatili kiihtos senihki welis ki palewiseh nopa tlahtlakolchihketl kema ika iselti ki selih i tlahtlakol; viii. tekiweh san te tlatsakwiltis kemah nelnelia onka tlemach kiixnextia nopa akin ki tlahtlakoltemolia ipampa panok tlahtlakoli; ix. nochi tlenweli tlen kiixnextia se tlahtlakoli tlah ki matih kikixtihkeh pampa te kokohtokeh pan se tlakatl ke tlah itlapialis amo tleno ipatih elis, iwan x. tlen tlahtoli tlayakanah pan ni tlanawatili, no motlepanitaseh kemah mo kamanalkakiseh iixpah tekiweh maskeh ayi pewa kanih ki tlahtlacoltemiliseh. b. tlen ki tlepanitaseh tlen akin ki mamaltía se tlahtlakoli i. moneki kineltokiliseh amo tleno kichihtok tlah ayimo onka se amatlatsakwiltili kani ki pantilihtokeh nochi itlahtlakol kiixtomahka tekiweh tlen kiixmatki; ii. ki ihtos tlemach iixpah tekiweh ke tlah amo tleno kiihtos. san keh ki itskiseh no meki kiihliseh nochi tlen ipampa ian kiilwiseh kikawilia amatlanawatili amo tleno kiihtos, amo mo ihtosneki ki ixpanos tlanawatili. amo kemah noneki elis iwan motlatsakwiltis ika tlahtlakoli tlanawatili, nochi tlatsaktli, tlatetsoptli iwan tlawitektli.in yoltlahtoli tlen ki chiwas tla ax aki iwaya itemanawihketl amo tleno ipatih elis; iii. ma quiihlicah, kemah ki itskiseh iwan kemah itstohka iixpah akin tekiweh aw in omotenew maría xukoatolnamakak inik momikiliko, amo wekawtika kitstia in imon itoka katka en blanko no momikili, ka noso kipalewiaya in omotenew imonnan inik moteilwika. domingo iksentetl domingo kwaresma ipan senpowalilwitl mani metstli de febrero iwan xiwitl de 1600 años, in yewatsin temachtiani frai hwan de torkemada kimochiwili kimotteittitili neixkwitili tomachiyow in timasewaltin in tonemilis, yuh tlamito kwaresma in vitetl domingo; aw in iskitetl viernes inik tlayawalolok sesentlamantli nestia in itlaihiyowilistsin totemakixtikatsin christo. kin ok ka tlamati noyolo yewa nikkaki in kwikatl nikitta in xochitl. maka in kwetlawiya. tlachikos diario diario ohpan tonal 1 i sehpan wakonko waoksehpa yotlayowak tlatahtako diario diario asta tlamis imetl. imixpan omochiw testigosme andres garsia regidor iwan algwasilesme diego astaxochitl bernardino xwares hwan baptista yewantin otlatamachiwke iwah imixpan españolesme fransisko korrea hwan lwis de kabrera iwan fransisko rodrigwes yewantini in imixpan mochiw. opopoliwke ohkión mochtin es ke kintlan yeye'on mismo porke yeye'on oksé. tewan amitla tiquintitlanilizqueh. itlanahnamik: seki kichipawah para kwaltsin taki. wan axkana weli. totolime sesek porke ikwouyo yek xoxoktik; semi ayoh in ikwouyo, semi etik. "tlake tlamantli? ok nikilnamiki sekih tlahtoli in okimohkwilwi yewatsin leonportila in itech onimaxaliw ompa yewatsin mihtalwiaya kenin sekih tlakah ye itech mokatiayah kenin ye monekia okachi kwali miximatis in tlamatilistli in omomelaw ihkwak ayahmo ahsiah in wewe semanawak tlakah nikan mihtalwiaya in temachtikatsintli walmotlalike tlakatewksi yolokwanitsi, tlakuchkalkatl itskwawsi. "¿ta axtihneki tinechchiwilis se... [favor]? entós ahsiton ganoso axan kani totlaliske kani tochantiske pos nikan mero. ome tekpa xiwitl ika ye ikwak mik i motewksomatsi, no ikwak mik in itskwawsi tlatilulko tlakuchkalkatl. niman ik yake in teumamake, mah amo tonalmiki, anmoh. aw in ipanpa in in ok konpanawi in ipan tlatenewke tlamatinime pewaskia, matlaktlonse tsilini, inik tlayowatiaskia, ixkichika tlamitiw ipan ome tsilini inik okseppa nesitiw tonatiw, yniqu ipampa ok konpanawi, yuh mochi tlakatl momatka ka aokmo mochiwas in iw okihtoka tlamatinime in iw ipan mochiwas tonatiw. aw in ikwak in ye iw nepa kaxtolonnawi xiwitl tlahtokati in tlakatl koxkoxtli in onkan kulwakan. weyi in tlakwalchiwaloyan. itla iknelilistli xinechihtlani iwan amo noxixikos. ok tokahikan. xikonilwi in siwatekipano man kitlali in ahkopechtli iwan ye ximakiti motlaken. newa ok niah itla nikyektlalis inika mostlatika tlakwalchihkan monekis. niman noihki notlakentitin. atlawa ikwik itlanahnamik: maske kimaka tla' totlatlawiolton. konewke "otech ya maka ik-wa ya tokwe towipil wixawiaó ipalnemowani". mowikoltsin,anoso ihkak motolteka itsontsotsokoltsin. ika tamemeske, tasakatiwi ik onkan ye méxiko, in chapolkopa atitlan. ma xon awikan. tla ok senka xon pakta, xochinkokoskapatsiné tekayewatl teuktli. tsohpikilit oso tsohpilomekat aw san yewantin inin omotenewke yetlamantin teopixke, in kil kinkwalittaya tliltike inik kinkawaskia inik amo kinmiktiskia; yese masiwi in kinkawaskia yniqu intlan tliltike monemiltiskia, yese kil mochintin kinmatekixtiliskia kinmatekwiliskia inik amo kampa wel ok seme tlapilwatiskia intech señorati, inik kil wel kinsenpopolosnekia españoles. baltasar kotolkatl ichan kowatla omonamikti epowalxiwtia ye on makwili i ye nemi huramento okitennamik in ika bara de hustisia inik amo istlakatis ilwilok wel xokonmelawa in motlatol in tlatistlakatis ka diablo kiwikas in moyolia maniman aw in tla wel tokonmelawas motlatol ik mitsmotlaokolilis in totekuyo dios iwan tonantsin santa maria mochipa ichpochtli. mochiwa nikawín itech kaltsintan. yahtok asta wahkapa. mah matapani, aw xikmatikan, in annotiachkawan in annoteikkawan, ka yewantin in tlaxkalteka achitsin kimixtlamachtike, kimilwike in kenin nemonwas. .macevalli ma ya temako. wiya! tsonimolko xoxolkwikatl kakavantok "ovica mokwiltonoasi tetekutin moteiknelil mavistli. itlanahnamik: ikwouyo alaxtik wan imaxiuyo pihpitsawak. "uta, nepa ya tlakwah ¿queyeh mosenketsa itech nehin takawan? no iwi in intliltikawan in intlakawan wel kinsenkawke in innechichiwaltika, in onkan kintokatinemia intekwiyowan. tlahkoxonakatl ikwakun yotečtlaliaya' ipan tobanko para yetomachtiske techmakan toleksion. yomitstlanankili in iknopilichpokaton nechmotlahtlanili notahtsin kema yewatlo kwalika kwali ka tus axkan nias nikmohtiliti moteotikanantsin yehon ye wehkaw motlahtlanihtiwits iwan kemman omitsnawatihkeh tias okseppa ipan hweves tlen kawitl makwili iwan tlahko ye nikanka atsintli. tehwa tikalyolot, amo nehwa. por in xohxochitik wan mahyá kahkaxtik. nochipa xochiyowa. tlen 47 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlaltlanawatili tlen nayarit kipias iasika tlali iwan nepamitl tlen namah iixkotiah tlaltipaktli tlen tepik. in sukichiwki aw nikitowa, okseppa ipan in pewaloke wexotsinka. komino, ixkich in kikwi tomahpil yewa xochitla okinexti ikwamatlatl. in amo monamaka no kwaltia para amo tekwi sonewilis. kwaltia inon. . "ca nikan tika ka otokonkwake ka otokonike in ipatiw in tepetl in atlawtli in ixtlawatl aw in melsisiwilis in mochokilis. molini . akasomo iwian yektli in titechkwaltia in titechtia, aso tsoyo aso tewyo aso tlahsulo? ipan in ix tochtli xiwitl ikwak momikili in tlakatl in atonaltsin in chichimekatewktli; sa onxiwitl in kittake in panowayan tlaka. se dia domingo wel okiawik yalwa. ipan 18 días elki vii kali xiwitl, 1473. aw ik niman yewatsin inkisidor mayor omochiwtsino in don gutierre bernardo de kirós, ikchikome in inkisidores mayores ye mochiwtsinoa in nikan ipan wei altepetl siudad mexiko tenochtitlan. ipampa inon amitla onyes tlen tech kwatlapololtis. iiii tochtli xiwitl, 14. wel weyi motlamatiltsin. maman yota’siko tineki' titlakwaske xtechmomakili n totlaxkal. aw niman inpa onasito okno omentin tenanko tlahtoke in ikse yewatl in itoka kwawitsatltewktli tlailotlaktewktli, in ikome itoka wewe itskwawtsin atlaw- || 80 -tecatlteuhctli. viii kali xiwitl, 1305. tepeitik, tonakatlalpan, xochitlalpan, nechkalakike. onkan on awachtotonameyotimani. onkan nikitta, ka ya in nepapan tlasoawiak xochitl, tlasowelik xochitl, ahawachkekentok, ayawkosamalotonameyotimani. kinekih kintlakakilise tlen padre selestial in semi kikouaj, sayoh mah onka. aw satepan achitsin ik papakoa neyolalilo tlawano in ik motlaokolpopoloa motlaokol sesemmana. . iwan teokwitlaixkwamatl iwan teokwitlatlankoskatl iwan teokwitlakoskapetlatl iwan xokotik teokwitlatlapitsalkoskatl iwan pitsawak teokwitlakoskatl. itlanahnamik: kiilpi ixokpiltipa nopa ichichi para ke machilis nikan timitznextiliah, aw inik otiwalake in kaltsalantli in nikan tlaxilakaleke thoribio tlesannen in migwel hernandes balthasar kowatl pedro gaspar hwan de la krus migwel damian pedro de kante pedro thomas martin sitlalatl matheo xwares fransisko hernandes matheo xwares in mochintin tlaxilakaleke kineltilike in tlatoli. inin totlanawatil in akin kitlakos kichalanis ipan tiktlalia pena chikwasemilwitl ilpitiyes karsel iwan kixtlawas x pesos itechtsinko powis in igamara su magestad. itsintla inon xiwitl se weyi tlakatl kwali motlatis. iii tekpatl xiwitl, 1508 años. onkak ome taman: chichilwaukilit wan istakuauj kilit, pero sen taman sah iteyo, kemeh xelahxochitet. tein chichiltik, chichiltik ikwouyo wan ixiuyo wan ixochiyo wan tein istak, no istak ikwouyo wan ixiuyo wan ixochiyo. mochiwa mas kampa chiltokaj. iteyo yek pisiltik. kitepewah in iteyo wan no mochiwa kampa kaltsintan, sayoh mah se kitepewa in iteyo. aw yewatl ipampa in inik ompa kowitiaya atl chimalwakampa, kintsakwiliskia in wexotlaka, in kiyawtsin tlahtokapili wexotla ipan in in konitlan chalchiw- || 33r -cihuatzin, imichpuchtsin in in wewe kakamatsin teowatewktli tlahtowani tlailotlakan amakemekan chalko, inewan nikan tenewalo in isiwaw kakamatsin itoka kowaxochtsin; imichpuchtsin i walmowikak wexotla. tlahko kilo patlawakchili yoan nikktenewa kaxtoli omome pesos in nomon hernando ximenes onkan kisas makwili pesos mokawatiw noestra señora de gwadalupe ompa misa ik nopan mitos yoan se peso honkan kisas mokawas san martin yoan nawi pesos onkan kisas nikinpielia pochteka makoske gabriel hernandes yoan tomas xwares yoan oksekintin pochteka aw in chikome pesos nopan poliwis ik nitokos. x akatl xiwitl, 1151 años. yei xumali pitsochiyawisotl ix tochtli xiwitl, 1514 años. kafen nikonisneki, mach achto xinechonmaka se vaso naranhayotl; yetikmati, ika in ivitaminah totechmoneki. yonomat momostla niki inin aayotl. tlen 118 tlanawatihkayotl. noihki amo huelisqueh, tla amo temaktilis tlahtolselistli tlahtokan sennechikolistli i. kixtlalis tlatechpowilmeh tlen tlaetikayotl, iwan noihki tlen akalmeh inichan, iwan amo teixkotlalis tlapalewilmeh noso tlatechpowilmeh tlen walasi iwan tlen kisa. ii. mopialis, ipan amo tlen kawitl, nochipa yaotekameh iwan akalmeh tlen yaoyotl. iii. sanmolwi kichiwas yaoyotl ahkaya tlen kiawak chikawalistli, san mokixtia tlamantli tlen kalakih iwan melawak mochiwa kwalantli, tlen amo welis mowekawilis. ipan inin tlamantli saniman momatiltis tlayekanket tlen totlalnantsin. istatl, ixkich in monekis inin ayak seme i itechkopa kisa in nikan mexiko tlahtokatlakamekayotl. tlenkwa mikmoserbirwi para ntimikas. aw no iwan ikwak motlahtokatlali in itskwawtsin wewe atlawtekatltewktli, in imomextin kipachoke tenankayotl; inin sa ya ok onkan in kwitlatetelko. kimitalwia in totekuyo, se kilo tlatsopeliloni ahnoso nawi pilonsilo ¿tlen tikihtowa? iuki kilwiah por in tsikitsitsin. xa inchayohkan wehweyi tepewani. asika tonati nipamkixtis no tlamatilis asika tonati ninextis nonemilis, sampa nisemoyawas ipan tlaltipaktli ipan nochi semanawak. iii tochtli xiwitl, 1378. konilnamiki in iwki tlayekoltike mexika in ittatsin katka tesosomoktli, in kinekia sanno yuh kichiwaskia; in iw kichiw inpan mexika in tesosomoktli, in kiwilanke chinamitl in konmakaya in onpa askapotsalko. kwaltia aw ixkich hi in topa mochiw, in tikitake in tikmawisoke in techokti in tetlaokulti inik titlaihiowike. inomeh. febrero kipia sempoali iwan chikweyi tonali. enero sempoali iwan mahtlakse. amo siske in tlatoke; inik nima ye kiwalitowa kuxkuxtli “niccauhtziné, ma sa quitlalica”. ma ka aik nimiki mah ixwa matapani, nixochinkwika bweno pus tiawa' itich inkwawtlahtle aber akehwa tlatlanis nepa nehwatl. 2 akatl xiwitl, 1299. in elotl mokixtilia in iiswayo. makahmo tsayani. moowa; motesi in elotlatlaolton ika tlatsopeliloni iwan kanela ika san tepitsin atl inik ahmo ayo yes; motamalpiki, motlalia ihtik in tepuskomitl ika atl, ixkich in monekis. iwan mowikxitia ika ahmo wei tletl. ahso ompoali minuto. ihkwak in tamali ayokmo motsikoa itech in iswatl kihtosneki ye tlawikxitili. koyolchilmoli ika exotl in ikwak tla- || 141v -cat in don hwan baptista toyaotsin. ke inana wan teipa kwalanki. nawi axoxtlantli ¿tinechtlanehtizquia mobisitleta? nikan ipan in in pew inik koppawike in ikal in diablo witsilopochtli, in kichiwke mexika. kweponi. .. yeewaya! aw in ikwak in omotenew inik kinmokawilike teopixke kalmenitas in atsakwalka, aw in yewantsitsin sant augustín teopixke no niman ikwak kinmanilike in omotenewke atsakwalka. kampa onkas, aw sanno ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl wala in tlakatl don gastón de peralta visurrei komendador sanktiago. inik nekok omak umotekake, ik niman kisako siwatl walyakatia, sematika kitstiwits in iokikwi kwatsontlalpitiw itlamekayow i makwawtopili. ma nechtlamika michime. i mexika kitlayawalochtike xakali; aw in tepaneka kimixkawike in kiketske i tewktlatoaya, nawtetl tlapankali nawtetl xakali, ipan ikako in kali in teskakoakatl chacha. itla' kinamiki' se persona biexito o awelita o saninakehwa kinamiki' kitla'paloa' lamano sea awelito kikickilia' imán wan kitenamikilia'. itlanahnamik: ipan in tlalolin; ihkwak xitin sankta krus teopankali in ikpak amakeme, ipan metstli mayo. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. ¿ticmati katlewatl okachi kwali pahtli iwikpan tsompilawistli? limonayotl moneloa ika tepitsin atl, amo mo tsopelilia, yexpa noso nakpa mi ipan tonali. in poyox mokixtilia in ihtisewa iwan in ye tlapaktli, mowikxitia ika ome litro iwan tlahko atl; motlalilia in xonakatl, axox iwan istatl; in waxchili moihseki, mosiyawa iwan motesi ika komino iwan motlalilia in istayutl; ihkwak ye achi tlawikxitili ye motlalilia in tsilakayohtoton, ahnoso ayohtoton, in xokonochtli iwan in chili in ye tlatextli, in ye omokwachwi, iwan tleko mokawa ixkichkaw in ye owiksik in tsilakayohtli. in tahtli in ipilwan okimilwi ximotlasohtlakan. 25. iwan ma no kana tetopko, tkpetlakalko, tekomik. tekaxik, timayaw. ka onkan te no tias, onkan taktias. iwan ma tipato, ma awilotl tikmokwitlawi; onkan tikmonamiktis in owi, in etik. aso wel kana ipampa tichtekis, ka kin ihkwak tipinawas. in tiankisko moka tsatsiwas: ¿ac tiktenyotis, ka niman newatl in nimonan, in nimotta, in tinechpinawtis teixpan? ye kwali, ye yektli, xikmoewitlawi in tlaltikpakayotl; xitlaai, xitlatekipano, xikwakwawi, xelimiki, xinopaltoka, ximetoka; ik tikis, ye tikkwas, ye tiemokentis, ye ye tihkas, ye ik tinemis, ik tihtolos, titenewalos; ik mitsiximatiske immaw, immotlakwal, immowayolke". . sehseyaka konkwitimani in kopali kontentimani in tleko. niman ik kis timani akalko tlamelawa. ini 2 tlamantli nikitohoa in okimokowi nokal in opa nestepehoalko in ok nechmacaz2 pesos ihoan nawi tomines itoka lunsia ayakmo nikma posesio aw in tla okixtlaoh misa in nopa mitos. para ya kitoktok nopa ipilkone ihwak amo teyi tomat kikuij, kiixkah wan kimoltah iwan chil. kitlaniya nawi tomin in se tonali. aw yuh kitowa in ipowaloka inin tlatoli, in tlakatl in anenemia akaltika amo kis amo kan amo ipan moketsako in tlali, san kiwalitak, aw ik noseppa mokwep. o ikich in nimitsonmaka, in noten, in notlahtol. inik iwiktsinko, ixpantsinko ninokixtia in totekuyo. aso kana tokontlatlasas, ka ye tewatl tikmati. yese ka nonekixtil nikchiwa. o nochpuchtse, nopiltse, kokotse, tepitse. tle tikmatikatsintli, ma mitsmotlamatkatlalili in totekuyo. in axkan i yewatl migwel de los angeles nikan chane tekikaltitlan ye techkwilia in totlal tomil ye ik onxiwitl axkan in kichiwa yuh techilwia ka nechmakak in don martin akatekatl ipanpa in tikitlani hustisia ka yewekaw in tiktopiyalia yepowali onmatlaktli xiwitl ka yewatl kimotemakilitiw in tlatowani don pablo xochikentsin aw inik neli totlal tomil ka unkate in testigos in kimati. xi kali xiwitl, 21. xochiwewetitlan. ika ipan in xiwitl mitoa novesientos chikweyi onikalak ipan tlamachtilkalko itoka konsepsión arenal momochko malakatetikpak. ompa chantiaya tlakpak direktor iwan inspektor. direktor itoka lusio tapia iwan inspektor itsonkiska gusmán. se kikwi in nanakat wan ika se kixakwalowa kampa se xiyoti. ye itech in tlalnamikilisilwitl in mochiwa itechkopa in makwili makwilpoalxiwtilistli inik molnamiki in amerika tlapaninextilistli ahnoso ken kimihtalwia in temachtikatsintli in ome semanawak nenamikilistli ompa tlahtokayohpan miek tlamantli in omochiw inik molnamikis inon tlamawisoli no iwki in ipan miek masewalaltepetl no omoelewi in inon molnamikis yese oksetika monekia mopatiyotis in otechmokawililihtekwakeh in wewe mexihkah monekia inon tetlakahkawilili moteihtitis in ok nemi ok wehkawi iwan tlatlemati kitlemati mochi in tlamatilistlapewtliin kiihyowia iwan wel neli mihtos san ika ome yei tlaxikkawalistli tlakahkawalistli tlatelchiwalistli sente kwahtoktii itoka “hoja de plata” kinpiah kwakwaltsitsin camohtlapalxochimeh. xochiyowa panowa in todosantos. aw in ixkichtin mexika tenochka in onoke in wel chinampa chaneke ka sa nowian akaltika in kalakia inchachan, ipampa in ixkich ik wekapan tlaltikpaktli in omotenew iyoloko altepetl mexiko; wel kitenkwitimoma kixasitimomanako in ixkich omotenew ik wekapan tlaltikpatli in atl, ik makok inik moteponaso. se kwarto exotl in ispan gabriel xochitl hwan oselotl martin kokotl fransisko yaotl hwan kwawtli pedro yaoxel isaber tlamiyawal martha martin kano yewantin in imixpan okimokowi in ikal i migwel awiyen. eskribano domingo leonardo. itenonotsalis in tettatsin inik kinonotsa ipiltsin, in ihkwak ye monamiktisneki. aw ini kihtotiwi ye wekaw wewetke || 67v ka nomah yoltika in axkan, amo miki, aw ka okseppa walmokwepas in tlahtokatikiw. ii.- pregon a siete dias del mes de hebrero de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in teskatsonko okitekakiti inik monamaka ikal itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak otlanankili testigo pedro hernandes. ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. "nama tiyase mostla, tiyase mostla isisna ya mokwaxipehki in kahchichikes oyeya ompan momochko malakatepek. setsin ipan barrio san mateo, oksetsin san hwan istayopan omotlakatili iwan omosiwawtitsino noihki ompan san mateo itlak se kwali ichpokatl. nochi imakopatian. inimekes tlatiwanime omotekahchichiwiliaya iwan amo patio omotlaniliaya. omotelwiliaya chikome tonali tikimanilikiw kakahtin. kwaltsitsin kahtin, axkan mokwitia choklo. oyeya noihki achi kwaltsitsin kwaltoton kahtin: okwikaya botontin desde tlaxitla hasta tlakpak. noihki oyeya oksekintin okintlatlachaltiaya. ika masewalkopa mitoaya sayoltoton de tepostli iwan noihki botontin okikaya desde tlaxitla hasta tlapak. oksekintin noihki botastin ikan abuhetas achi kwaltsitsin omohtaya. in san tiktlasotsetselowa,in motechpa ye wits in monekwiltonol, x tochtli xiwitl, 1242 años. aw in okomentin tlahtoke itstlakosawke in atonaltsin chichimekatewktli iwan tliltekatsin chichimekayaotekiwa san ok onkan mokawke in sentlapal in ikpak amakeme in ihkwak in. aw in tla kenmanian aka kitsowis ketlatolwis ka ninotsalos ipan nitlatos newatl niktsonkixtis in tlatoli aw in tlakamo yuh nikchiwas ka san nimitskwepilis in motomines in matlakpowali pesos in otinechmakak iwan mochi nimitsixtlawilis in kostas iwan in ixkich motekipanolis inik otitlachichiw in onkan kali. in ikwak okimoka[ki]ti señor hwes governador senka okimopakkaselili in itlaitlanilis melchior de parada español ik niman okimixkechili in yewatsin hwan martin inik yewatsin posesion konmomakilis in mokalkowi okimotlalili in itokatsin iwan firma. antonio valeriano. ante mí fransisko maldonado eskribano. in iuki kilwiah por in yon ixtojtojmiyoj. xiii akatl xiwitl ipa momikili tlakateusi; no ikwak mik in akulwaka tlatoani ixtlilxochitsi, ikwak wala nesawalkoyotsi nika nemiko mexiko. inik v tlamantli nikitowa noyolokakopa onmani nomil in onpa san simon intatsakwalkonemak timochtimani martin kano onpowal wiyak senpowal patlawak nikmaka nochpoch ana newan in inan maria tiyakapan amo itlakawis in notlatol. asta kalihtik yato. vel timaliwis in texomolko in tekaltech in tetlasakwiltitlan timotololtities mokwitlaxkol motech motetekaties. aw in ok nepa in ayemo kipewaltiaya in iteyakanalis ye keski xiwitl kipiaya inik nemia tlaltikpak amo wel momati; ka san yewatl nikan tikpowa in xiwitl se tekpatl in ipan onkan kiwalpewaltika in iteyakanalis, in san kikawako, inik niman konpatlak in itoka akasitli, inik no teyakan kaxtolxiwitl. tlen 2 tlanawatihkayotl. tomexihko tlalnantsin san se iwan amo moxelos. totlalnantsin monelchiwa iwan monelwayotia ipan miakintin masewal altepemeh tlen walawih ipan kalpolmeh tlakamekayotl chanchihkeh ipan anawak totlalnantsin tlen keman opehki yankwik chantilistli iwan mopialia tlen yewan tlanawatikayotl, tlapialistli, toltekayotl iwan tlatolkayotl, noso san achitsin tlen yewan. in tlayolmatilistli tlen masewal ixtli iwan yolohtli yewa kiihtos ahkia welis kiselis tlanawatilmeh tlen masewal altepemeh. in kalpolmeh tlen masewal altepemeh, yewan tlen mosen nechicohtoqueh, kipiah tlapialistli iwan tlaiyokalistli, mochantlalihtokeh ipan tlaltipaktli iwan kineltokah tlen yewan intekiwa tlen walah ipan intlaneltokilis. in tlatechpowilistli tlen masewal altepemeh tlen ika mosennawatiseh welis mochiwas ipan se tlachiwali sentlanawatili tlen melawak kitlepanitas sentika anawak tlaltipaktli. in tlakaitalistli tlen kalpolmeh iwan masewal altepemeh mochiwas ipan amatlanawatilmeh iwan tlahtoltlanawatilmeh tlen tlaltlanawatiloyan, iniwantihya moneki quiitaseh, nochi tlen moihtowa ipan tlaneltokilistli tlen inin tlanawatikayotl, noihki tlayeyekoli tlahtolmekayotl iwan tlalchantilistli. a. inin amatlanawatili kikwalita iwan kimanawia tlatechpowilistli tlen masewal altepemeh iwan kalpolmeh tlen ika welis mosennawatiseh iwan ika yewa mosenchanchiwaseh tlen ika welis: i. kiihtose kenihki mosenwikaseh iwan monahuatiseh, moyolchicahuaseh, moyekanaseh iwan kiyeyekoseh tlaiyokalistli. ii. kitekiwis tlen yewan intlanawatil tlen ika welis kixolewaseh kwalantli, moixkwiseh ipan weweyi tlayeyekoli tlen ixnesi ipan amatlanawatili, motlepanitas tlanawatil nemilistli, tlakanemilistli iwan kachi nelkwali, siwayotl tlatlepanitalis. in tlanawatili kiyektlalis tletleno tlahtoli iwan ohtlahtoli tlen ipatih kichiwaseh tlahtoltlasekawanih iwan caltequichihuanih. iii. kin tekiwatlalis, ken kihtowa wewetlahtoli iwan wekapa tlanawatili, tekiwekemeh tlen kiyekanaseh tekiwekayotl tlen masewal altepeyotl, kitlepanitaseh tlapalewilistli tlen siwameh sentikah ipatih iniwaya tlacameh, ipan se tlahtolmekayotl tlen kitlepanitas tlahtolmachiotl tlen nochi totlalnantsin iwan sentlanawatikayotl tlen tlaltlanawatiloyan. iv. moahokwis iwan moyolchikawas inneltlahtol, intlamatilis iwan nochi tleweli iyokalistli iwan tlaixnestilistli. v. moyektlalis iwan mokwaltlalis chantilistli iwan momalwis intlalwa ken ixnesi ipan inin amatlanawatili. vi. moasikamatis, san moneki motlepanitas nochi tlamantli tlen ixnesi ipan amatlanawatili iwan tlanawatilamatl tlen itechpowi, noihki intechpowilistli tlen sekinok moaxkatihtokeh noso tlen chantih ipan calpolmeh, welis motekiwis nochi tlen onkah ipan totlalnantsin kampamo chanchiwah masewal altepemeh, san amo tlen sentika tlatekiwilistli tlen kiihtowa amatlanawatili. tlen ika inin tlahtoli masewal kalpolmeh welis mosen nechikoseh ken kihtowa tlanawatili. vii. kin tekiwetlalis, ipan masewal altepemeh tlanawatiloyan, tlen ixnesiseh ipan altepetlahtokan. in amatlanawatilmeh iwan tlanawatilmeh tlen tlaltlanahuatilmeh, kitlepanitaseh iwan kitekpanaseh inin tlanawatilmeh ipan altepemeh tlanawatiloyan, tlen ika welis kiyolchikawaseh tlapalewilistli i tlanawatili ixnestilistli ken moihtoa ipan wewetlahtoli iwan masewal tlanawatili. viii. mosentlalis ipan nochi tlaltlanawatihkayotl. tlen ika welis momanawis tlatechpowilistli, ipan nochi tlahtolmatilistli iwan intlayeyekolpamitl kampa ixnesiseh, iseltika noso sentika, moneki motlepanitas intlachiwalis iwan intlayeyekolistli ken moihtoa ipan amatlanawatili. in masewalmeh nochi kawitl kipiah tlatechpowilistli mopalewiseh iwaya se tlahtolkwepketl iwan temanawiani tlen kiixmatih mase- onkán yokinwalkepeke in siya wan in seyo i ikwakon in yomokikkihke fwerte a balasos. wel yetlahka ontacicoh. kwali mopaka in exotl; in koyolchili moihseki ika xitomatl iwan axox iwan motesi ipan temolkaxitl ahnoso tepustltsoaloni; inin motsoyonia ika ome xumali pitsochiyawisotl, motlalilia in exotl iwan ye mowikxitia ika ahmo wei tletl. miktiloke onxikipili ommatlaktsontli tlacah. tlamakaske tekpatika, ixkwawaktika kinkixtilitiwiah inyolo in tlein wenchiwaloya in ok tekwinia. axkan sábado in ik 15 mani metstli noviembre de 1614 años, ihkwak yankwikan ipan navioviso || 263 omotlatitlani in españa i nothatsin padre frai augustín del espíritu sankto patrón kimopachilwia i wel ixkoyantsinko yaxkatsin inik kimopielia in iteopankaltsin notlasomawisthatsin in weitsintli san antonio abad in nikan siudad mexiko; inewantsin motlatitlania in señor doktor antonio roke inik ompa tetech konmokawilia españa san ok tlatlanilistli konmochiwilia kampa e in moetstikate teopixke san antonio, ma kwix walmomachistilikan ahso wel walmowikaske yewantin in komendadores. moatilia in textli ika tepitsin atl, pitsochiyawisotl iwan istatl; ihkwak ye itstik in chilmoli, ye mopiki in tamali ika iswatl in achto ye omosiyaw, ye oixikak. motlalia ome xumali textli iwan senxumali chilmoli ika in xolenanakatl; mowikxitia ika wehyi tletl. xii akatl xiwitl, 1491. ika xitetlahpalo ika tetlahpaloski mopapá. chimalpanekatl ikwik iwan tlaltekawa nanotl mehor ihkatsa". in monamaka kwesalan, sehsé wan por kilo. okontsatsakwako, in iskikampa kixoaya, kalakoaya, in kwawkiyawak tekpantsinko, akatl iyakapan, teskakoak. aw in okontsatsakke no iskikan momanke, aokak wel walkisa. yewatl in kitowaya teotlawitl in ik temiktia teelteki ixkwaewak ika yewatl in tekpatl welatentili. in ipan siudad mexiko a veinte dias del mes de mayo de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años ixpantsinko yewatsin don antonio valeriano hwes governador in nikan ipan omotenew altepetl mexiko iwan inik nowian inik tlantika kwaxochtli tewktlatoloyan moyetstikatka onkan okseppa ixpantsinko nesiko in marianan chane sankt ipolito teokaltitlan. aw in osenkisato in ye mochi tlakatl niman ye ik tematekilo. in on tematekilok niman ye ik tetlamako. nechpaktiskiani nipewas in nokonilnamikis kenin kin iwti oniknamik itlahkwiloltsin mikeltsin leonportila wel neli masiwki ye miek xiwitl otitiximatkeh aik onikmononochili inin iwan axkan ahmo nikneki niknixkawis inin welipanyotl inik nikmomachiltilis in namewantsitsin nammotlaneltililiskeh iwan ipampa namechmotlatlawtilia ma xinechmotlapohpolwilikan inin iknoixtsin okichiw yewatl in omotenew doña maría de kastila tsonatsin, in kimonamikti omotenew don hoseph de sankta maría tlamaokatltewktli tewktlakosawkatsin tlahtowani panowayan; onkan tlakat in omotenew don felipe páes de mendosa. kani kinitskia wan wehweyi michime?", kiilwi in ipan axkan semilwitl hweves a xiiii dias del mes de marso de 1566 in tewantin alkaldes don migwel sanches, fransisko xwares in tikpia hustisia in ipampatsinko su magestad in axka audiensia tixpan owalake in itoka gabriel yaotl newan in inamik itoka maria tewcho nikan chane san hwan amanalko okimokakiltilike in mwi magnifiko señor doktur seinos inin neteilwil. nochi san puro asta ne wahkapa kichihke aw no iwan in ihkwak in in onkan okalakiko kulwakan mexika, ye oiw nepa sentsonxiwitl ipan matlakpowalxiwitl ipan exiwitl i wel itsinekan ik walpew i ye tlahtokatiwa kulwakan, in ipan walpew tlahtokayotl ipan v kali xiwitl, 717 años, in onkan walmotlahtokatlali wewe nawyotsin i wel achto tlahtowani mochiw kulwakan. tikintakayotia teh, tehwa tata hesukristo tlen 27 tlanawatihkayotl. in axkayotl tlali iwan atl mani ipan iitihko anawak tlaltipaktli, achtowi iaxka totlalnantsin, tlen yewa mopialihtok iwan kipia itechpowi kinmaktilis san tlacameh, tlen ika mochiwas sentlapiali. in tlalkixtilistli san welis mochiwas tla motekiwis iwan nochi altepeyotl kinpalewis iwan moneki motlaxtlawas. in totlalnantsin nochipa kawitl itechpowi kiixkawilis in teaxkayotl sekinok tlamantli tlapiali tlen kiihtos altepeyotl, iwan no ihki kikwaltlalis, tlen nochi tlakameh mopalehuiseh, in tlatekiwili tlen onkah ipan tlaltipaktli tlen welis se moaxkatis, tlen ika welis mochiwas tlaxexeloli kampa nochi kiasiseh yolchikawalistli tlen altepeyotl, momokwitlawis, moasis yolchikawalistli tlen nochi totlalpan iwan nochi kwali itstoseh tlen chantih ipan chinanko iwan altepeko. ipampa inon, moihkwilos tlahtol tamachiwali tlen monekis iwikpa mochantlaliseh tlakameh iwan moixtlalis tlen nelkwali monekis, tlatekiwili, kwatitlankawali iwan tlali tlatekiwili, atl, weyi kwatitla, iwan ihkon mochiwas tlachiwali tlen altepeyotl iwan mochiwas tlayeyekoli iwan mokwaltlalis tlaketsali, tlamokwitlawili, tlakwalchiwali iwan moweyichikwali tlen inyolo altepechantli, tlen ika mosenpixtos iwan motlatlamanis senyetos kwatitlamitl, iwikpa moxexelos weyi tlalmeh, iwikpa mochiwas, ken moihtowa ipan tlanawatili itechpowi, in nechikolistli iwan sentika tlatekiwili tlen tlalpianeh iwan calpolmeh; iwikpa yolchikawalistli tlen kalpoli tepitsin tlapiali; iwikpa moweyilis miltekitl; cuacuehmeh, kwatitlamitl iwan sekinok tomin tekitl tlen mochiwa ipan calpolmeh, iwan iwikpa amo mokawilis ma kitlatlakawika tlen okah ipan tlaltipaktli iwan tlahtlakoli tlen welis kipantis axkayotl iwan kitlahtlakawis altepeyotl. itechpowi totlalnantsin kimatis xitlawak nochi tlamantli tlen onkah ipan tlapechtli weyi anawak iwan atsintla tlen ayahualmeh; tlen nochi tepos ostoko noso atlamaneloli tlen motlaloa, mantok, tlaxakwaloli noso ameyalotl, mosenchiwah ipan ostoko iwan itlakayo seyok tlamantli tlen kenihki tlali, welis tikihtoseh tepesili tlen ipan mokixtia tepostli tlen motekiwia ipan industria; kampa moyolitia chalchiwitl, istatla iwan istapan tlen moyolitia ipan weyiatl; tlamantli tlen moeliltia tepexiko keman monekis tlakoyontli; ameyalotl tlen tepesili noso sekinok tlamantli tlen motekiwia kiyolchikawa tlali; tepostlatatili tlen chikawak, chapopohtli iwan nochi tlatlatili tlen chikawak, tlen atik, noso poktik; iwan kaktli tlen mochihtok ipan anawak tlaltipaktli, ken tlawexka iwan tlahtoli kiixtlalis semanawak tlanawatili. iaxka totlalnantsin atl tlen weyiatl tlaltikpak iwexka iwan tlahtoli ken kiixnextis semanawak tlanawatili; tlaakalaktli tlen weyiatl; amanalmeh iwan ameyalotl tlen iwaya monamiki nochipa noso san kemantika iwaya weyiatl; amanalmeh tlen tlaihtik tlen inselti mochihtokeh tlen iwaya monamikih tlen motlaloa atl; in atemimeh iwan amaxalmeh, pewa kampa mosentlaltika atl, atlawitektli noso xopanatl, iwan kampa onasi ipan weyiatl, amanali, ameyalotl nochi iaxka anawak; tlen mosentlaltika atl iwan imakwayowan, keman aohtili tlen yewan nochi noso san achi, mochiwas nepamitl tlen anawak tlaltipaktli noso ome tlaltlanawatiloyan, noso keman panos tlen se tlaltlanawatili ipan seyok noso kiixpanos nepamitl tlen totlaltikpak; in amanalmeh, ameyalotl tlen imapa, iixpan noso itempan, tlaixpano iwaya nepamitl tlen ome noso achi miak tlaltlanawatilmeh noso totlaltikpak iwaya seyok nechka tlaltikpaktli; tlen ameyalotl tlen walkisa ipan axalpan, iixpan weyiatl, atlahtli, atempan tlen amanali, ameyalotl tlen iaxka nochi anawak, iwan tlen mokixtis ipan ostotipan; iwan atlahtli, atempan tlen amanalmeh iwan tlaltsintla atlahmeh tlen iweyixpan kiixtlalis tlahtol tlanawatili. in atl tlen momana ihwak pewa oksi in kahfen no chikawaya ya in wanabana. in iswat. aw in maría gostansa inik teixpan kikets kiteittiti kipepetlaw, ichichiwal pani katka; san ipampa ichan kanato in ipan omotenew domingo, kil amo missa kikakito teopan san joseph. in iuki kitokaitiah por in itakka kipiya ixipoj. kwaltia tlen tewan tik weyimati, aká okse san kiwewetskilis. ii akatl xiwitl, 1455. tlatiwani sapata morelos. iwan omixmatia ikan kwali itsotsoma okwalikaya. okipiaya se kalasekawili patlaktik, polainas iwan. itlakawan okipiaya intsotsoma nochi istak: ikoton istak, ikalson istak iwan tekahtin. inimekes tlaka nochtin otlatoaya masewalkopa. noihki tlatiwani sapata omotlatoltiaya in inasewalatoli. ika on ikwak omokalakia in milpa alta nochtlakatl okikakia tlen omitalwiaya. inimekes sapatistas okipiaya in kalasekawil; itech okintlaliliaya tlen isanto okitlasotlaya onkwanon kipalewis. nochtin iki on owalaya in kalasekawil ika santo. iwan nikitowa in mili mani san pablo tlalistakapan xx powali nikmaka in nomon hoseph mawitoka kichiwas. aw ka notenkopa i nemechnonawatili inik monamakas ka wel naxka aw in axkan in iw nikkaki inik moteilwia in alonso kwawtli iwan in isiwaw iwan in ichpoch simon. aw in okimittake aokake, niman ye ik tlakawaka, ik niman ye kitowa "tlacopanecayé askapotsalkayé, ye onkisa in totetsanwan, xonnenemikan xikintsitskiti!". aw in ikwak omuchi motamachiw niman okimonochili in kalkowki [tachado: in tlakpak] omotenew ana xwares inomatsinko imatitech okimanili okimokalakili in kalitik yoan ipan okimonemitili in itwalo yoan in kiaoak inik umpa asitika in itlalo in atenko aw niman nawkampa omomaman estagas aw ayak in ma aka unkan onesiko inik okichalani posesion [tachado: wel teixpan] in omuchiw. se totlaakatsiitsiitsiin, kimaamatinemi iikaltsiin. aw ik niman yewantsitsin kimonmotokilitiake in senka mawistililoni ixtililoni in teotlamachilistikatsinko || 169 in motenewa teopixke la kompañía de hesús, in san kinkwitia ik notsalo teatinos; ka amo yewantsitsin innotsaloka, ka oksentlamantin umpa moyetstika in roma iwan italia in teopixke teatinos, iwan ik monotsa la kongregasión de los klérigos reglares, inin ipilwan wel achto itlatlalilwan in don pedro karrafa obispo umpa in ipan altepetl teatinense, aw inin obispo satepan kardenal omochiw, yekene sankto padre mochiwtsinoko, kimotokayotitsino in ipan ik kimokoronamakilike paulo kwarto, o yewatsin in in intatsin in wel yewantin teopixke motenewa teatinos, in ayemo walmowika nikan ipan nweva españa. aw in ounasiko waxkwawtla nima ye ik kitlalia tlalmomostli, in unkan unoka matlakxiwitl umome. kachi kikowah itech in todosantos. ait ox pahti, sayoh se kikwa. nikmakak ome pesos aw in axkan nikmaka in nonamik maria tyakapan iwan in nopiltsin ana ayak kinkwilis. in santo nobarrio, inintsin teotl itokatsin san mateo, omotewitekiliaya kan tekoko. ikwak karransistas okalahke noihki mach kimoxinatlaliliske nochi tsotsomatli. ¿tlen otimaiti nochi in semana ka amo otimitsnotili? v kali xiwitl, 1289. aw niman no kitoke in asteka "ca ye kwali, ma tamechtowikilikan". ka ixkichtsin inik mixpantsinko niwetsi, inik mixpantsinko ninomayawi, ninotlasa, in aneketsaloyan, in akixowayan, in temawtikan in mawisiokan: ma meleltsin nikkets, ma motlaweltsin ipan nia. tlakatle, tlasopile totekwe ma ximotlakotili, ma ximotekitili. aw in onmotlahtokatlali in axayakatsin, niman no kikokolike, okinamoxke in intlakalakil in kowaixtlawake, || 100v iwan otlanamoxke in innanwan in tekpansiwa, otlakixtike; aw in oneske ik ocholoke yake in kampa opoliwito, ik okipoloke in inpilo in inmawiso. itakilo semi tepitsin sah monamaka kwesalan. "na nikintemos". itstolotimani yewatl in popokaya in atl itenko mani malinali, senka wei inik mani; ankaso onkan onok kowatl in axalpan senka tomawak motenewa chikonkowatl, chikontetl in ikwitlapan kaka in imachiyo inik kwikwiltik inik mokwikwilo. in o ya wal asik,on ya moketsa in kwikanitl. aw in ikwak oyuh mopow niman ika in iwelitsin in imawistlatoltsin motlanawatili in itechpatsinko señor alkalde kimomakili itech kimopowili makwilpowali in mili inik wiak inik patlawak senpowali nekok ixkich. in kitta, in kimokwitlawia in ioohtlatolis in inematacacholizq in ilwikatl, in iw yowali xeliwi. na nokia ni tlakatl nipia notlalamikilis nipia nonemilis; wekakia ni tlachixtok ipan ni tlaltipaktli wekakia nikan nimochantlalitok nikan niyolki nikan nitlachixki. aw intla san otlalmik ostomekatl —quitoz nequi— intla ka amo yaomik —in aso san okokoliskwik, san ye no iwi in kichikwaya ieuillo,— imixpan omochiw in testigos don martin hernandes thoribio lukas hipolito de santa maria martin kano anton hoachin migwel garsia martin garsia gaspar de akino martin tentli fransisko ximenes migwel hernandes fransisko daniel pedro hakobo migwel de los angeles hwan baptista. notetla nesi ye mokowilis sente tlali kaltenko in weyaltepetl ka. .ma ya avialo xochinkwawitl itlan: in nepapan kecholi ma ya in kecholi xik kakikan tlatoa aya in toteow.xik kakikan xirosiarokih in xiwit totonik. niman ik tsatsis in tekpoyotl in akin kikowasneki in kali ixpantsinko nesikiw in hustisia inik wel omochiwas in venta tlanamakilisamatl yuh omotlanahoatilike ik okimoneltililike okimotlalilike in intokatsin ihoan inin firmatsin. antonio valeriano, migwel de sanches hwes, fransisko martin alkalde, thoribio lukas. pasó ante mi diego leonardo eskrivano. wel ipan in konpewaltia in itekipachol in yehoatl tealtis. aw in axka nechteilwia kwix kin owalneske kanmo yenwantin in seppa nechteilwike ka omik i nechteilwiyaya aw no kimonawatili in tlatowani soridan inik kinextis in itestigowan aw anyake neske san nosel ineske notetigowan. tlatlanilok ken kimati in iyolo in itechpan inik moteilwia ana papan iwan marina susana iwan mensia marta kwix neli in kikwiliyan in inkal iwan in itlalman kito ka inik nikmati ka yewatl chane katka itoka chimaltsin ixochimakaw katka in moteoksomatsin ayamo mokwatekitiya. . "totecué tlatowanié: ka is katki in ompa mochiwa tsinakantlan: ka amo otik axkawike in ik otik kwito ka sekintin ipan omiktiloke, okitsauktiake in motlaatsitsinwan nawalostomeka. akehkelti, axihxikti. itech nechikawalo, itech nenetsahtsililo, temachilo, itech netlakaneko, itech netlakwawtlamacho. tlayolpachiwitia, tepachwitia, tlapalewia, tisiti, tepatia. tal ves achá sesek, kemah sesek; ihwak se tayi ¡uta fresko!, se kontento se mokawa. yoan niktenewa tekaltepotsko mani notlalkoal nikowili martin siwatenetsin inik motamachiwa xochimilkopa itstok inik wiak matlakmatl aw inik patlwak chikwematl kwapitsawatok monamakas naniman itech powis. mantikonikan vermouth. xitech walwikili se tewilotl inon oktli. inik noseppa ompa kinpewato axochko; in kintlaxilito nawali, in kasik motewksoma otontlamakaski. in ye okonmotekiliko, onkan nimann ikse responso kwikayo onkan ipantsinko in inakayotsin kihtoke in kapila tlaka klérigos in offisiales iglesia mayor. tlein san monexpachoa amo monamaka. ¿quenamialo monantsin? xii tochtli xiwitl, 1218. xitlanamakakan aw in ik nawkan tlatotonia ompa inimayawkampa tlali mitoaya mimixkowa in tlalpan: no nawpa in koniawaya in itlema. tenantsi. in nimitsilwia ipampa tik matis. xinechneskayotili kani mokawak nikan ipan in in momikili in temistsin teowatewktli tlahtowani achto in onkan teowakan amakemekan, in tlahtokat epowalxiwitl onmatlaktli ipan se xiwitl. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. aw in okikakke kilwitito in markés iwan mali “aquique in tlatowa itik acalli?”. tlen 102 tlanawatihkayotl. a. in tlahtol tlanawatili kiyolitis ministerio públiko tlen sentlanawatiloyan, iwan itlanawatikawa kintokatlalis iwan kinpatlas tekichiwani, ken kiihtowa tlen itechpowi tlahtol tlanawatili. in ministerio públiko tlen sentlanawatiloyan kiyekanas se prokurador general tlen totlalnantsin, kitokatlalis tlayekanani tekichiwani tlen sentlanawatiloyan iwan kikwalitas wekapa tlahtokan noso, keman mosiakawas, sennechikolistli tekichiwani. iwikpa elis prokurador moneki altepechaneh ika itlakatilis, kiaxitihtos sempoali iwan makwili xiwitl keman kitekiwa tlaliseh, kipias, nel amo miak matlaktli xiwitl ika machiotl tlen tepantlahtoani tlen tlahtoli xitlawak; kipias nelkwali tlatenewalistli, iwan amo kitlatsakwiltihtoseh ika tleweli tlahtlakoli. in prokurador welis kipatlas iseltika tekichiwani. iixkotiah ministerio públiko tlen sentlanawatiloyan, kintepotstokas, kampa tribunales, nochi tlahtlakolmeh tlen sentlanawatiloyan; ipampa inon, yewa itechpowi motlahtlanis tlanawatili tlen ika welis kinitskis tlahtlacolchihuanih; kitemos iwan kinextis tlaneskayotl tlen ika kintlatlakoltis; kichiwas makwali mowika tlatelwili iwikpa tlen tekichiwanih tlasenkawanih manima tlasenkawaka; tlahtlanis mamochiwa tlatsakwiltilistli iwan mokalakis ipan mochi tlamantli tlahtoli tlen kiihtos tlahtol tlanawatili. in prokurador general tlen totlalnantsin yewa mokalakis ipan tlaixkowili iwan tekiyotl tlen kiihtowa 105 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili. ipan nochi tlahtolsenkawalmeh kampa sentlanawatiloyan mokalakis; ipan tlahtoli tlen diplomátikos iwan kónsules generales iwan sekinok tlamantli kampa moneki mokalakis ministerio públiko tlen sentlanawatiloyan, in prokurador general yewa kichiwas noso itekitikawa. in prokurador general tlen totlalnantsin iwan itekitikawa, inixkotiah elis nochi tlamantli tlahtlakoli, tlailkawali noso kiixpanos tlanawatili tlen kipantis ipan itekiwakayo. in tekipanoli tlen konsehero hurídiko tlen tlanawatiani, imako eltos kaltlanawatili tlen tekichiwani tlen sentlanawatiloyan tlen ika inon, kiihtos in tlahtol tlanawatili. b. in tlahtokan tlen sennechikolistli iwan tlahtokan tlen tlaltlanahuatilmeh, kampa yewan tlanahuatiah, kiyolitiseh nechikolismeh tlen kinmanawiseh tlen intechpowi tlakameh tlen kipalewia mexihko tlanahuatilmeh, tlen yewan kiixmatiseh tlatelwili noso tlailkawali tlen tekichiwali tlen walah kampeka se tlanawatihketl noso altepeko tekitini, san amo tlen walah kampeka tlen poder hudisial tlen sentlanawatiloyan, tlen kiixpanoseh inin tlatechpowilistli. in kaltlanawatilmeh tlen ika moihtowan ipan tlahtolpamitl tlen onpanok, tetlaihiliseh altepeko, amo tlaxolewali iwan tlatelwili iwan tlaixpantili inixpa tekiwakemeh tlen intechpowi. inin tlakayochiwalmeh amo kipiaseh tlanawatilmeh tlen itechpowi tlahtolmeh tlen tlapepenilmeh, tekitikayotl iwan tlen tlaixpantilistli. in tlakayochiwalistli tlen kiyolitis tlahtokan sennechikolistli motokayotis komisión nasional tlen derechos humanos; moselnawatis ipan itekih iwan itomin tlaxtlawil, kaltlanawatili iwan itlapialis. in komisión nasional tlen derechos humanos kipias se konseho konsultivo kampa tlatskitoseh mahtlakmeh wewetlakameh tlen kin tlapehpeniseh ika tlamatlahantli ika ome tlen eyi tlatlapantli tlen tepantlahtoanih tlen wekapa tlahtokan noso, keman mosiacahuaseh, tlen sennechikolistli tlen tlahtokan sennechikolistli, tlen seha tlamatlalantli. in tlanawatili kiihtos tekichiwalistli tlen kitokilis iwikpa kinextis tlen kintokatlalia tlahtokan. nochi xiwitl kin patlaseh omeh wewetlakameh tlen achi wekatoseh ipan intequih, san amo tla oksepa kintokatlaliseh iwan kinnelseliseh iwikpa ompa tlanawatili. in tlayekanketl tlen komisión nasional tlen derechos humanos, noihki in ipan axkan domingo ik 15 mani metstli hulio de 1607 años, ikwak ipan makwili tsilini ye teotlak, in maxitiko in mokalakiko ihtik altepetl mexiko tenochtitlan, ik mowetsitiko inik ye no nikwel onkan noseppa konmanili in itlahtokayo tlahtowani don lwis de velasko ikoppa visurrei omochiwtsino in nikan mexiko. wahkahki in yuhka nemotsali, mexika walake sentsakutiake in chichimekapan, in teutlalpan. inikwak ye wekawtika onoke mochixka onoke teteu, niman ye ik pewa in tlachichiliwi nowiyanpa tlayawalo in tlawiskali in tlatlawilotl. in yuh konitoa niman ye ik motlankwaketsa in teteu inik kichieske in kampa yeh kisa, kiw tonatiw omochiw, nowiyanpa tlachiske, awikpa tlachiemomalakachotinemi. ahkan wel sentetix in intlatol in in. nemachilis, atle iwelyaka in kitoke. tehtsonkilit aik aka okimolwili inin okimosenkiskaichtakapieli kementlachtakayutl in yeyantli kan yewatsin okimotlatili in komitl an axkan ka ye timotlachialtia, ka ye titlachia inik yuhkan: ka tlasiawa, ka umpa onkisa, timaliwin tonewistli. ye nonisiximatin chalchiwitl,¡in tepilwan! xochiyowa itech marso, mayo se kita ya in iteyo. aw ka yuhki in in omochiw in ihkwak sankto padre muchiwtsinotika urbano segundo in onpa roma in ipan ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1095 años, in || 250 ye ontsonxiwitl ipan matlakpowalxiwitl ipan nawpowalonkaxtoli xiwitl motlakatilitsino neli dios itlasomawispiltsin, aw in yewatsin san antonio abbad in ihkwak in ye oyuh nepa sentsonxiwitl ipan kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan onpowalonchikome xiwitl momikilitsino in ompa itokayokan thebas egipto, in tepetla texkala kwawtla sakatla ixtlawakan in onkan motlamasewili sankto; ka ye ixkichkawtika in in ihkwak ipan omotenew xiwitl in kiwalmonextilitsino kiwalmottititsino iwan kiwalmonawatili ilwikakpa san antonio inik tlein kichiwas kipewaltis ipanpatsinko se wei tlasopili kavalero in ompa ipan wei altepetl provinsia in itokayokan viena, wel inesyan ik machiyotikatka in iteiknoittalis itoka don gastón, inik kintlalis teopixke komendadores itetsinko powiske. iknochichi omik. nikitoa in nehoatl in eskrivano in tlatsintlan ninotokayotia ka ye neli ka nixpan in otlalnamakake in don balthasar tlilakalki yoan in inamik hwana tlako unpa mani ipan tlaxilakali [entre paréntesis: digo] tolpan techichikilko tlalitik. amo mochipautani. aw inik okseppa ikwitlawik owalaka onkan kuyowakan ka san sentlamanpa iyachton iprimo hermano i konitlanka inik wala onkan kuyowakan, in kiwalmonamiktika achtopa itoka don felipe || 253 de gusmán; inin satepan ogovernadortito in onkan kuyowakan, ipiltsin in in don hwan de gusmán, tlahtoke tlahtokatepilwan katka in onkan kuyowakan. tikin piah sekintin totomeh. yewa okixtlan in tlawikilis. || 69r aw iwan in amotlakawan miyek onyeske; kinnemiltiske, aw i nepapa iwitl i xiwtototl in tlawkechol in tsinitska in ye ixkich in tlasoiwitl aw i tlapapalkakawatl in tlapapalichkatl. kipano nikanika neka domingo ik ix mani metstli de hunio de 1591 años, ikwak papakowak in ipampatsinko arsobispo don pedro monya de kontreras kimomakilike in ompa españa wei tlahtokayotl, ik kimowekapanilwi in rei su magestad, in makok konsehoyotl de indias presidente, i nikan ik nowian nweva españa isemaktsinko kimokawili in nikan mexiko. in san kwel achitsinkan tlaltikpak, "imojuanti imokwesowah para initlaxikowah in ipan ok ka wel mimati inakayo in welamelawak in iwki kwilotik in anose ipan ok ka temimiltik niman ye ik kitenonotsa in tlakanekwilo in keski ipatiw intiakaw. ¿catlehua okachi weyi? ihkwak onenke kontitlan, kintlakachiwke in mexikah miektin inkonewan. —puro atl wankimaka kafesito kimaka oxitas. ik moteilwiko in onkan mani itokayokan sokipan aw in ikwak oyake sochimilko okikaltentiake in tetl in kwawtemimimili iwan tlaketsali sentetl kali in ikiketstiake aw in ohoalake ayoktle iomochi poliwik. aw in iskikanme chikwetlamantin masewaltin onimechtenewiliwi seseyakan ka sesekni walake, aw ipampa in in ikwak yç okalakiko owasiko kamono semilwitl ipan kalakiko, ka san seseyakan ka sesentlatlantin inik owasiko. tehwa tiabogado de nehin ehekatsin. in owalnawatiloke nima ye ik monawatia i mexika, kinmolwia “mexicaé, tle ankimati? ka nel otitekitiloke; sa ok uyake, ma aka tekixti, san titewiwiteki in tomalpowa, sesekni tiquinacaztlaça”. chikwasen xokonochtli 53. iwan wel ipan titlahtos in amokwen, in amomil iwan wel tikimmokwitlawis immotlatkkipanokawan; iwan wel tikpias in toptli, in petlakali, wel tiktsatsakwas in komitl, in kaxitl. ahmo san tewatl timawilkixtis, ahmo san tewatl timoxixitinis, timomomoyawas intla san tikistinemis, intla san tiyatinemis; aik wel mokon, mokax tikittas, aik wel mochan, mokal tikittas intla yuh tinemis. viii tochtli xiwitl, 1162. okipiaya. aw in pablo makwex okito hok totonteilwiske in tewantin iwan in martin migwel onoyuhkonito hok tontoteilwiske ik nikan tiktlalia totoka iwan tofirmas fransisko martin algwasil mayor. pasó ante mi fransisko garsia eskrivano. matlaktlose akatl xiwitl sewetsiko, yawaliwi toktli sewechililok. pablo. tiyaske ye ichan aw ka inik ompa walkiske, inik ompa walewake walolinke in chikomostok kinewayan istaktexkalokan, inik nowian otlipan walnentiake, inik walmotetekatiake inik walmotlatlalitiake, in ixkich ik kiwalpanawike tlali, ka yeintin in intlahtokawan in tekwanipan tlaka in otlika momikiliko, ka nikan tokatenewtikate. kenin mok hiwa aw in ikwak omonamikito in tlali niman semka opapake omosolalike omokowanoske mochitin nanawaltin iwan okinoske owala chikóme xochitü iwitli nahuaü icham itokayokam teosakwalko otlamawisoko okixtike in xochiteuctü kwawtli ose{l}otli. omitotike mochintin masewaltin omoyolaüque ik {entre líneas: o}paike ye okixeloke in tlali ye ik nochi ik opapake omoyolaüque. niman sa tepam owala se tlakatl/i/ itoka tlakakaksin imak owale/... /ctia sakamalinali iyomextli iman iwan se kowatl ikwan/ i/panda owalwestotiya ipapan omoxikowaya iwan okse cohuatü ikxitlam okiwalwikaya okikwaskiya in tiatowani in xochitekutli kwawtli ose{l}oltli. nochalchiwteponas, in noxiwkecholkikis, yuh tokon ya pitsa san ye ti yoyontsin. ni o ya walasik on ninoketsa, nikwikanitl. axkan martes ik 19 mani metstli mayo de 1609 años, ikwak nikan mexiko ompew inik ya españa don hwan gano de motewksoma, kinwikak inamik iwan ipilwan. in ipan axkan domingo a tres días del mes de oktubre de 1593 años, in yewatsin teoyotika tlahtowani inkisidor sanktos garsía kimokwili in teoyotika itlahtokayotsin inik obispo mochiwtsino; onkan teochiwalok in sant hosep in sant fransisko, yewatl kimoteochiwili in visitador don diego romano kwitlaxkowapan obispo. inik ye kimokowia sensilia ximenes española inik ye kipatiotia xxxviii pesos aokmo kemanian nikixtukas in nokal ipanpa ka ixpa hustisia onokonkwis in tomines xxxviii pesos iwan nimixpa testigos merino thomas de akino tepixke pablo garsia diego xwares pedro sipak iwan nimixpa wewetke fransisko ximenes thomas minas migwel fonebasio pedro xwares. kwaltia in ixkich in xiwtotoiwitl, testigo. marta teyuhk ichan san hwan amanalko omonamikti in ixiwtlapowal yehepowali xiwitl okichiw huramento inik otlatlakoltilok inik amo istlakatis in ipaltsinko dios etk. san ka ilwikatl itek onkan tikyokoya motlatol, ipalnemowani. ¿ln tonkonnekis? ¿mach titlatsiwis? ¿ ye nikan tik inayas in motenyo, in momawiso tlaltikpak ye nikan? ¿ ken in tokonnekis ayak wel ikniw ipalnemowani antokniwan, ancuauht'amocelo, ¿can nelpa tonyaske? in titlakowa ye nikan, antepilwan. in ma ok nentlamati tech kokolia, in techmiktiani. ximotlapalokan moch ompa tonyaske in kenonamikan. in o inmak on asik in mikis niman ye ipan konteka in techkatl; kinawkawia kitilinia. nikan nimitstatawtia itech nehin hora. okatka in kwartiya tlaxkali okatka se tlanepanoli de tlaxkali kwartiya asta nian motlamiyaya in almosal kaxiliayan toalmorsar o antusena kwartiya se tlanepanoli tlaxkali. entonses kachikwali in len kichiwaya machkihto bweno inon hwan del oso tleka ohkión tihchiwa in lá kión tichiwtinemi. nonantsin onechmomatechanilitaya iwan otitaya tiankisko.iwan ikan otipanoya ixpan on kali otitaya omawiltiaya kokone noso kema nian omomachtiaya. newatl onichokaya; oniknekia nikalakis noihki nomachtis. nichokaya kosa ipampa oniknekia nikmatis tlen kitoa amame, inon tlakwiloltin. ayemo wel niweyi; onikpiaya chikome xiwitl. nonantsin amo omonekiltiaya nias itik tlamachtilkali ipampa nitepiton iwan nechtlakaliske okseki kokonetoton. kan noso amo wekaw nonantsin iwan notatsin ika nichoka onechwikake itlawtsinko siwapili in omotemachtiliaya. amo teh ika moesyotia. xa inchayohkan rayohtsitsin, . aw in ye iwki in oitech kompachohke in okonkihkixtli in kwauyo in teyo in teawalistlahtoli, aw inik nikan mokixti mexiko tekpan palasio inik onmopewalti tlahtowani don lwis de velasko, inewantsin mantiake in teoyotika tlahtowani don frai garsía gwerra arsobispo mexiko, kimokawilito ohtlipan umpa kimokechilito sankta ana tlatilolko, onkan monawatitsinoke inik niman nepa omowikak tlahtowani don lwis de velasko tepeyakakpa, aw ik walmokweptsino in arsobispo. in karransistas okimokixtiliaya tsotsomatli de teopantli iwan omakiaya yewan. ikwak okinekia motlakitaske in tsotsomatli de teopantli,
