owalaya in milagro iwan omotepexiwiaya kwawtlapechko in karransistas. oksekintin okinmotemowiliaya in santos ika omawiltiaya. san otlatwia yomik. ya michime yohwanti pehki kinkamowi nopa asta ke oksé tonali oka oksehpa yaw kampik. yewa sente amoxtli oquitlau¡ ¡pan ahkopechtli. nikan ipan in ikwak in mexika || 98v pipiltin kinkwamamatlawike in chalko amakemekan: in ikse itoka kimitsin, in ikome itoka xochitsin, in ik-ei itoka seakatsin, in iknawi itoka makwiltsin, in ikmakwili itoka kwawintsin, in ikchikwasen itoka yaotsin, in ikchikome itoka kwikasakatsin, in ikchikwei itoka tosmakwextsin; inin ompa in amakemekan miktiloke. kipixke nopa ichpokero wan timochtin tihíespekaroa yan tomaestro. yewan miak tomin okitlankeh ika sempanawistli. iwan omolwili ¡pantli méxiko, pantli! kilton, istak iwan chichiltik pantli. ¡in méxiko askatl! inin tonali, inin metstli iwan inin xiwitl tikaxiltia makwilpowali xiwitl. yewan, mamasewaltin kilnamiki tlen yestli onenen axakan se siglo, ikwak totatsin hidalgo otechmokikixtili in xopaltech españoles noso kwitlaxkolistak. tiktemaka ka nochi toyolo kiyeske nochipa tlamach iwan timitsewaloske kename yetik iwan kename se tlasotli techipawak nantli onkwan méxiko kitlanis in viktoria iwan aihmo ka in xopaltis tiyeske. yese itenahnamikilistsin in mikeltsin leonportila ahmo san okitemakak itlaakilo in ipan seminario de kultura nawatl i sempoalilwitl san ok kixkawi i mikal nonowalko ikoka masatsintamalko. kihtoke in chichimeka pipiltin ye kilnilwia in mexika akin amoteow niman okitlanke in in siwatl in mexika kimilwike machitechmaka se mochpah6 ipampa tamechititiske in toteow nikan ipan in kokolinkwalok; || 108v ikwak in mayanalok, netotonakawilok, ye nokwel okno ompa tlaolmamaloto in kwextlan. kano ikwak tlakat in iknoxochitsin xokoyotl in ipiltsin in witsilpopokatsin. e inkwa oli in tepanekayaoyotl, ye ikwak mik maxtlaton, wel ewatl intekopa mochiw in towatsin tlatilulko. ihkwak ye omokixtili in iewayo in tochtli, san tlamach mopaka inik ahmo tsomonis in chichikatl nien vehiga, mopaka iwan ma tepitsin ehekawaki; tleko motlalia in xoktli ika ome litro atl, tlahkoxonakatl, nawi axoxtlantli iwan tepitsin istatl; ihkwak ye kwakwalaka in atl, ye motlalilia in tochtli, ma wiksi. in koyolchili moihseki ika xitomatl, in okse tlahkoxonakatl, nawi axoxtlantli iwan motesi. ipan tepuskaxitl motlalia in pitsochiyawisotl, motsoyonia in chilatl, iwan motlalilia in istayutl kampa owiksik in tochtli, ika in nakatl. motlapachoa, ma kwali wiksi. talmaniktsin, in amo nikmati ox sesek oso totonik. 104 aw iwan ye se xiwitl in ipan xi akatl xiwitl, 1607 años, in omowikak perú in tlakatl don hwan de mendosa i luna markés de montesklaros visurrei, in otlahtokatiko tenochtitlan yexiwitl ipan chikwetetl metstli; aw san niman ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl in okimanili itlahtokatekitsin in tlakatl don lwis de velasko, ikoppa visurrei omochiwtsino in nikan tenochtitlan. se kitoka nahnawi et, seki kitokah enero, febrero, sekin marso oso abril; komo milah hasta tamimilmeuaj. se kimewa ihwak taxiuyowa. kampa tawelita mochiwa, kampa amo, xiukomoni saj. in imekayo ihwak momekayotijtiuj ya xochiyojtiuj wan taktiuj. ihwak se tapixka agosto, taktok miak. aw in nowian altepetlipan tlahtoke pipiltin iwan alkaldes mayortin, korregidorti, thenienteti iwan kastilteka ixkichtin senkisako in tlachiako tlamawisoko, iwan in ixkichtin teopixke in nowian moyetstikate ixkichtin mowikatsa. in mochiwa kuoujtaj, in ewa talixko, amo itech kwapalak. itlak in tepamitl yetok se tlatskakwahiwitl wehkapatika kaxtoli metro. aw in ikwak okimokakilti in yewatsin in gobernador okimitalwi in kinawatis in merinos in kimokwitlawia nikan motenewa tlaxilakali inik san kinkawaske in kwak intech asis kowatekitl ipampa inik wel kichiwaske teotlamawistilistli in onpa kolegio san gregorio. xinechmopahkayowilti ka in yewehkan otimitsnokwatotonili. aw niman kiwalkixtito in tlatsintla katka; aw in okimittake kito in mali iwa markés: “tleyca amomawtia ancholohua?”. i akatl xiwitl, 1415. in tlawkecholiwitl, tlaltikpak, wewetitlan, aw inik sesemilwitl iwan in sesenyowal kiyaw, ka nowian inik moch ipan nweva españa ikwak nowian molon motlatlapo in aostotl, inik senka miek onkan okis atl, iwan in intech tetepe nowiampa waltemok in atl; aw inik nowian ipan nweva españa miekkan in atokowak iwan netlapacholok, xixitin in kali, iwan ikwak seki || 35 walmomimilo in seppayawitl walixxitin in istaktepetl. aw yewatl ikchikome visurrei mochiwtsinoko in tlakatl don lwis de velasko kavalero in ika itlakentsin in ihabitotsin sanktiago, ipiltsin || 111 in ikome visurrei katka in ipan in nweva españa, in otlapacho ika ixkichkaw in ipan xiwitl de 1590 aw ixkich ik walantika yewatl ipan xiwitl de 1595, inik mowikak ompa visurrei mochiwtsinoto in perú; in tlahtokatiko makwilxiwitl ipan matlaktetl metstli. xi kali xiwitl, 1477 años. ipan in ihkwak yekaw in teopantli tlalmanalko; in kichiwke amakemeke, tenanka, xochimilka, chimalwake. —satepan in kwak presidente de la repúblika porfirio días. aw inik motlahtokatlali in otlipan inik momikiliko in nikan tekwanipan amakemekan, inik mosenpowa in ixkichkaw senpowalxiwitl ipan matlaktlomei xiwitl inik onmomikili. wan noponi kema wetski sano ikwak unmotlatokatlali in tsonpantewktli mokiwitsi tlatilulko. intla mitstokatias, intla lein mikampa kihtotias, intla itla kichichiwtias, ahmo tiwalmilakatsotias, tiwalnakasitstias. ahtle tikilwis, inik ahmo tikyolewas, inik ahmo tikyolochololtis in tlawelilok. ka intlakamo tiknankilis san yuh mitskawas; san tiktekimatis in ohtli; ahmo no titsikkwakwatias. xonekwil nomatka newatl ni yaotl ni ititlan ni ikawan nikan nikintemos in notlawan tlamakaske tlilpotonke. niman axkan nikim ittas: inikikowaske in san nikan chaneke mexiko tlaka ipampa ka oneltik in imixpantsinko hweses in san niyon in itlatkekali aw omomikili maria xoko aw ipanpa in axkan motlanawatilia in señor gobernador ihoan señores hweses inik monamaka in kali. aw iw kimokakilti in toweitlahtokaw rei ye onxiwtika nepa nowian omochiw in kongrekasión, inik axkan owalmotlatitlani owalmotlanawatili in toweitlahtokatsin, i iw kiwalmitalwi || 45 "yc nitlanawatia intla kinekiske mochintin masewaltin in owalikwaniloke in imaltepew ipan in inpopowian, intla okseppa mokwepaske ma mokwepakan; sa iyolokakopatis intla kinekiske mokwepaske in kampa inyeyan imonoyan katka". niman ye ik, kimonohnochilia, kimixpantilia in itlasohtlanekilistsin, kimolwilia ma xikmati, ma wel iw ye in moyolioh, noxokoyow ka newatl in nisenkiskasemikakichpochtli, santa maría, in niinantsin in wel neli teotl dios, in ipalnemmowani, in tehyokoyani, in tlokeh nahuaqueh, in ilwikawah in tlalticpaqueh. ihkich. aw i no yuh tikake in tewantin in tiktokwitlawia hustisia i nika audiensia aw niman otikinawantike in kiwalwikaske in itestigowa. pasó ante mi don fransisko de la krus eskribano audiensia. onkan kitlamike in kecholi, niman panketsalistli, niman atemostli, niman tititl, niman iskali, atlkawalo, niman tlakkaxipewalistli, niman tosostontli, niman weitosostli. aw in ikwak omaxitito in onkan kali niman okinmonochili in onkan chaneke in tlaxilakaleke yoan in albaseas okinmolwili tla xioalwian kwix ye neli wel yiaxka katka inin kali in omomikili in itoka katka angelina de la krus. ome axoxtlantli in mimichtin mochipawa, mopaka, motlalilia istatl iwan moteteki; moewayokixtilia in xokonochtli; iswatl mosiyawa, mopaka yuhkin yepasohtli kilmaitl; inin motlaitsoltilia. ye mochiwa in tamali mokwi in iswatl, ihtik motlalia sentlatlapantli michin, motlalilia xokonochtli ika yepasohtli iwan chilkwitlaxkoli; mowikxitia komalko ika ahmo wei tletl, mokwekwepa inik nohwian kwali wiksis. nima ye kikwikatia, akalwapali kiwitekilia; ye unkan kitlalia in inkik: “yztacaltzincopa yolitilok tamatepew, yuh seyowal i yewaka. senka miek tetlapopolwilistli indulgensias onkan kiwalmotlalilia in sankto padre paulo kinto in ipan tlayawalolistli; aw inik wel iwki omochiwin ka itlaiwalistika itlaitlanilistika i notlasoikniwtsin diego lópes kwawtlakwilo in wel tlatsintile fundador in ipan in omotenew kofradía, yewantsitsin kimoknopilwililito in bulas in totlasottatsitsinwan teopixke de la kompañía de hesús in mowikaya roma. istatl, ixkich in monekis in iskich kawitl in ipan tikate yeompowalxiwitl aw in axkan ye mochipa techkwilisneki in itoka diego yaotl inamik isabel tlako ye nawxiwitl inik titoteilwia niman aik mokawa in techkwilisneki in tokaltsin aw in axkan ka neli kitlani in ispan hustisia. noyolohkopa wel nikihtos ahmo nikpia in tlahtoli inik nikmelawas in toyolyamanilis in ahkiwan tikihtayah in toiknotlahkwilol in kin iwti ye tepustlahkwiloli in totlaelewilis intitlahkwiloskeh itechpa in topan mochiwa in tiktlaliskeh ipan amatl mochi in tiknemiliayah wel tlalnamikoni tlen topan panoia tlen tepan panoia tlen techyolyamaniayah tlen technentlamachtiayah ye wel melawak mochiwtaya in wel ikwak in ipan xiuhitl mil i kinientos i treinta i uno, kin iw ikeskilwiyok in metstli disiembre, mochiw onkatka se maseuhaltsintli iknotlapaltsintli, itoka katka hwan diego, iw mihtoa ompa chaneh katka in kwawtitlan, aw in ika teoyotl ok mochompa pouhiya in tlatëlolco. aw sabado katka wel ok yowatsinko, kiwaltepotstokkaya in teoyotl iwan in inetihtitlanis. aw niman ompa yahke ompa kalakke in kulwakan in mexika, tlanonotsato inpan tlahtoto in omaltike in makamo mikikan; yewatl yah in inpan tlahtoto in tenuch tlenamakak. oasiko tsotsomatli noihki se tepostlawilanalali okititlan don husto sierra. iwan tlen ihnokokone oyikwilaktaya itech se amatl tlen itoka kokone, tlen kintlakoliske. kan oasik tonali okinmakake in kotón, in xolochkwe. in ikwouyo kwaltia para kalewal, para kwoutatil wan para wahpal, porke semi takwawak in kwowit. in pulke no kipahtia in siwakokolis wan kemeh yon tekokoh se axixkon. ¿ kan tinemi, noteow ipalnemowani? nimitstemowa in kenmanian, in moka nitlaokoya anikwikanitl, san nimitsawiltia. aw no ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl in owala || 101 in omaxitiko mexiko in tlakatl don álvaro manrrike de súniga markés de vilamanrrike visurrei. ipan in momikiliko in tlakatl in oselotltewktli tlahtowani wixtoko tekwanipan; yewatl in in asiko tepan in nikan tekwanipan amakemekan, aw inik tlahtokat nikan tekwanipan amakemekan senpowalxiwitl || 137r ipan nawxiwitl inik asiko. x tochtli xiwitl, 1606 años. inik wel omolini tlali nikan siudad mexiko iwan in weyapanatl in tepetsinko mani inik ompa onasitimani tetskokopa; senka kikinakatimanka inik posonia inik moliniaya, iwan in okseki atl kiyawalotok siudad mexiko senka mochi kikinakaya inik posonia inik makokwia. onkán wal mowika in wakis aber kanganin ompa kipoči:na'. tlenon koma baya tetlakamati maleta re miktlan deberás nikitowa. in semi monamaka ne kwesalan. ¡zan ka tlawkechol!, seliya, posontimani, mokkipakxochiw.¡ tinaan!welikasiwatl,kakawaiskixochitl,san tonnetlahewilo,tikawalos,tiyas,ximaas. e iw x xitl tlatokanti in e notempa moma chalkayaoyotl; e iw xv xitl tlantokanti in ekaw teonkali tlantilolko. iuki kitokaitiah por in kitemaka kahfentsin. titlakwase. aw ka nosok matlaktlonsexiwti in onkan katka tulam in topiltsin akxitl ketsalkowatl in oyuh momoyawake tulteka; aw ye kin ipan in i se akatl xiwitl mowikak inik tonatiw ikisayampa itstia, inik ompa poktlantito tlapalantito. omonekilti iwan amo, nonantsin omotemakili. iki on okichiwtinemia techachan in karransistas. in amo monamaka. aw in ikwak okonmokakiti in señor hwes governador senka okimopakkaseli ipanpa ixpantsinko ye chikwei metstli senpowali ipan matlaktli tonatiw otsatsiwak newatl eskribano nikneltilia antonio valeriano. ante mi fransisko de maldonado eskrivano. axkan sábado ik 28 marso de 1610 años, ikwak oteochiwaloke frei augustín del spíritu santo ika evagelio iwan don diego sutelo ika misa. yewa towan kwali oyek. nechtiski nies. pero molinik san hwantsi, kiiitowah in ipan axkan sábado a iii de febrero de 1601, in yewatsin senka mawistililoni wei sankto sant blas obispo mártir ikwak tsintik pew in ilwitsin kistias sesexiwtika pialos, ayak tlatekipanos. ma wel ximokakitikan in amixkichtin in antlaltikpaktlaka ka i ye wekaw in totekwiyo dios ayaqu iwantsin moyetsinotikatka, san oqu iseltsin san oqu iyotsin in moyomayetsinotikatka; ayatle katka in ilwikatl iwan in tlaltikpaktli iwan in ixkich in onok in semanawak ayatle katka, ka san oqu iseltsin in totekwiyo dios. mantinemikan kwaltia in sesek. in okikak tesosomoktsi ye konilwia in inansi “o nikawtsiné, ka timewiltitika, ken tocomitalhuia?”. ma timotemaka. . iwi in in ik on nenka ostomeka senka omomalwitiake ahmo mopantlastiake san omotlanitlastiake ahmo momitulanake motenewalanke san intolol inmalkoch ik onenke; iiii tochtli xiwitl, 1314. kenin mochiwa ome litro atl atle mochiw matlaktlomome kali xiwitl. mah kwaxiwiohto elot, no kwaltia para kemeh in moxwitiah in pilimej, se kimpoxpepechowilia in pilimeh in iteyo. niman omopow in informasion okitoke in testigos ka ye neli tlale in anna xoko kikawilitiw in ikol tokwiltekatl in tlali in chinamitl ipan katka in ayamo walwi españoles. aw sano niman ipan in i xiwitl i motlahtokatlali in wewetewktli chichimekatewktli mochiw; inin sano ipiltsin in atonaltsin. se kikwa itakka, pihpitsaktsin se kitehteki, achto se kipaxihxima ika machete. iwan nikitowa oksekni mani mili sa no onpa in tekpayokan akatliyakapa senpowali san nekok [yahualtic] no nikmaka in nomon hoseph [mauitoca]. .in masatl koliwakan iivitla ipotoka aya awiya! kwauhivitl amo xayavali awiya! yekoyametl amo xayavali. noyoloh pakini. timomaehitis wel miek nechpinawtia den nimitsmolwilis inon ichpokaton mopilohtsin miek nechpaktia inemilis tlanemachtili tekipan mamati newatl ammono san ika nika niknekiskiani niknotsas yese ahweliitia nikilwia aye san isel nikihta axkan san onimitsmotlatlawtilieo noka timo tlahtoitis tlen timihtilwiaitia xiemolwilitil niknekiskiani ma moehiwa nonemilistetlawikal in oiw machistiko, niman ikwak nowian tlatsitsilikak in iskikan teopan mexiko, ipan matlaktlomome tsilini nepantla tonatiw. ¡zan ka tlawkechol!, seliya, posontimani, mokkipaxkohiw. ¡ tinaan! welikasiwatl, kakawaiskixochitl, san tonnetlahewilo, tikakwalos, tiyas, ximaas. makwilakatl i motlali in akamapich. kimonankililih in senkiska mawisichpochtsintli tla xikkaki, noxokoyow, ma wel iw ye in moyolloh, kahmo tlasohtin in notehtlayekoltihkawan, in notihtitlanwan, in wel intech nikkauhas, in kitkiskeh in nihiyo, in notlahtol, in kineltiliskeh in notlanekilis; yese wel iw moneki inik wel tewatl ik tinemis, ipan titlahtos, wel momatika neltis mochiuhas in nosiyalis, in notlanekilis. yoan niktenewa tlapalakwilo itoka matheo kornelio sentetl teixiptla tilmantli kiektilia ayamo tle motlaxtlawia aw in tla okiektili monamakas onkan kikwis in itlaxtlawi tlapalakwilo aw im mokawas naniman itech powis. a itek o kwika ya, a ontlahtoa i teoaxochitl. xiii tochtli xiwitl, 1257 sik años. ixkichi in itlatol omochiw tlatlanilok ye kexkichkaw in nemi kito ye yepoalxiwitl. aw inik [f. 114v] neli iten itlatol in ixkich nikan onikwilo ipampa se krus imatika nikan kiketsan ipampa amo kiximati tlakwilolistli nixpan oninotenew eskrivano. martin hakobo [rúbrica] lorenso del agwila [rúbrica] paso ante mi anton krusate eskribano nombrado [rúbrica]. nonotsalistli san gabriel, aw iwan ye sentsonxiwitl ipan onpowalxiwitl ipan se xiwitl in ipan 1 tekpatl, de 1168 años, in kopewalti teyakanalisyotl in kwawtleketski ok ompa i kowatepek in iwikpa tulam. nochi cholohke kinehke tlaxtlawase nikan ipan in in momikili in wewe ketsalmasatsin chichimekatewktli in tlahtowani amakemekan, in tlahtokat kaxtoli onnawi xiwitl; aw in momikilito ompa in itokayokan akawaltsinko. aw yewantsitsin kimoteochiwilike kimomakilike in teoyotika itlahtokayo in omentsitsin teoyotika tlahtoke in ikse yewatsin in don frai garsía gwerra arkobispo mexiko, in ikome yewatsin in don diego páskes de merkado arsobispo de manila de la china, ihkwak nikan moyetstikatka. kenin mochiwa maski amo tik nekiskeh titemawisohkeh ipan in weyi mawisko. in oahsiko itekpanchan obispo, konnamikitoh in ikalpixkaw iwan oksekin itlan inenkawan in tlahtohkateopixki. aw kintlatlawtih inik ma kimolwilikan in kenin kimottilisneki; yese ayak semeh kinek, ahmo conmocaccanecqueh, aso ye inik wei ok yowatsinko, aw anose inik quiximatih, san kintekipachoa, inik imixtlampilkatinemi, iwan ye oquinnohnotzquch in imikniwwan in kipolotoh in ikwak quitepotztoccacqueh. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. aw in axkan nikitowa monamakas aw in ikwak omonamakak makwilpowali pesos ik nitlaxtlawas ik niktlaxtlawilis itoka ambrosio ye wekaw omomikili aw in iewatsin totatsin frai fransisko ganboa momakas senpowali omakwili pesos yehika ka in achitsin misas ik mochiwas. mitsnemaktitih sepa tehwa taltikpaktsin antonio martín markés sente siwakwakwe ipatin kipanawia in kaxtolpowar mahtlaktli iwan orne li pezoh. in kwowit. makamo ximotekipachotsino, ka onkan in motlatkitsin onkatki in motlakalakiltsin; ma walkika chikwei akatanatli kostik teokwitlatl chayawak koskatl iwan ketsalistli iwan chalchiwkoskatl, ma yaw ka maxkatsin ka motlatkitsin, ka nikan otimitztopieliliaya”. mochiwa kampa eski itech milaj, kaltsintah oso kajfentaj. aw in tewantin senka tikintlachikawilia in ipampa in innepakkanonotsalis ayak kitlakos ayak texixikolistika kixitinis inomito. itech nehin hora, tla nochan walaskia, se kwali tekitl nikon maihtalwiskia. moneki se kitachipawis. amo semi mochiwa. ikwak okikawke in apachiw mili ye no kwele kichiwa in itoka migwel de los angeles amo nikmati aso okimokowi. aw in tlatwik, ye onkann onok in chinamitl; niman ye kiwilana niman kaxitike in askapotsalko, kaltenko kontetekato. . aw in ik kiteilwiaya ihkwak in itlahtsin omonexiti in okinehnexti in mononotsalani kitoa "tonacayutl nikmasew" q.n. in tonakayutl in ik onikmasew ayaxka onech valvikake in nokwakwilowan in xochayutl in so- kiayutl in tevelteka kimilwi in ikin, tonas tlatvis anokwa- kwilowan ayeske xalitepewya id est tlalokan kil mach chal- chiwpetlakali in kitopew in ik tepew. yek miak onkak, amo moneneki. niman ye ik wal temo. in oadko tlatsintlan in owal temo in yewantin kipalewia in tealtiani. okiwikilike in ichan in inakayo in itlaaltil. itlanahnamik: tepitsin komino ihyoye, ye imán se mewas. san tlemach niepia tlen nikchiwas ipan in tonali. in senyelis yoalmasalo. ¿amo melak? aw in ayemo muchiwaya in in omotenew, in kin tontlami tikpowa in otokonikwiloke neixnamikilistlahtoli muchiw, in iw moteilwika omotenew maría xukoatolnamakak in itechkopa sankta krus, aw ka iskatki oknosentlamantli achtopa omuchiw sanno nikan ipan tlaxilakali xuloko iwan mihtowa akatla, in oksentlapal nepa kalnakasko ikalnawak in español diego senete. in nekawaloya om mopilowa tonatiw kin ikwak tlakwaloya. in on nekawalok in on tlanke miki mamaltin tlaaltiltin. in okikake tlatoke senka kimotetsawike, kitoke “aquique i mexica?”. 55r i tekpatl xiwitl, 1272 años. pilokichpiltsi. —wankani mikmokokolwiyaya otimokokokono. 85r ii akatl xiwitl, 1403. in aik yuhki oittok nikan mexiko se pressidente ahnoso oidor omochiw klérigo, in iw yewatsin omochiwtsinoko omotenewtsino don pedro de otálora, iwan amo ik kimokawili in itekitsin inik pressidente mochiwtsinotika || 203 audiensia real, yuh kimonekiltia in toweitlahtokatsin moyetstika españa. tikpias tomin satepan achtopa tonali in metstli wíts. viii akatl xiwitl, 1487. okachi welihki ximotlahtolti inik okachi wali timitsnoasikamatis. aw niman kixwalti in tlaltikpaktli in ixkich sesentlamantli kwawitl seltik in xiwitl in xochitl in kwawxiwitl inik yes in ichiwka in imanka in ipalewiloka in ipayo in tlalotika sokiyotika tonakayo. newa onikilwi awel iwan nias. axkan miérkoles in ik 29 mani metstli oktubre de 1614 años, ihkwak omomikili in siwapili doña ana de mendosa iknosiwatl inamik katka doktor rriego pressidente katka in audiensia real mexiko; yewantin tlatsintileke fundadores kimochiwilike in siwateopixkakali monasterio monhas san lurenso, in onkan kate omentin imichpotsitsinwan. kenin mochiwa no kwaltia para nexwitil, se kitsoyonia iwan tiltikxalkwowit wan istakxalkwowit, tsonteposihyakxiwit, kwoumosot, seko sah wan kemah se kininpoxtalilia ya in pilimej. tlako kilo pilonsilo onkak eyi taman: kolex bolita, mapapatawakkolex wan talpankolex. aw in otlatlachpanke in otlakwikwike in itsintla tenochtli onkan kontlalike intlalmomos. se mamahpikton yepasohtli . aw in oyake ichan tlahtowani awitsotl teoktli niman ye ik kin maka in itlatki nawtsontli in kwachtli in kin tiamiktia. yewatl: in amaneapaniwki iwan nochpalaxochio chikwesotl, iwan witstekolaxochiyo iwan tlapiltilmatli iwan tlatskalotl ilakatsiwki iwan kanawaka onmatl. noihki tikpiah se tolachnokwawitl, se limonkwawitl iwan ome ahuacacuameh. itakilo se kikwa, se kipihpixka mahyá exot, tsohtsopek iteyotsin. iknin okachi kinkwalita chichiltike hiwan xoxoctiqueh. kasá ika mochiwa sentakwi. inik niman komomachistilike in innetekipacholtsin in sankto padre itokatsin alexandro sexto, aw inik no senka wei papakilistika netimalolistika in kiwalmoselili in kiwalmonamikili tlatoli, in kimokakilti in oksenka sentlamantli yankwik tlatoli. kenin mochiwa noihki oyaya tlanamakaske okiwikaya xochikwali, chilchotl iwan xonakatl, ika yiman tika on ayemo ka milpa alta omokalaktiaya kosa tlanamakos ipan tiankistli. ma opinaoaloya tochantlaka. ¿kani nikinkwis peones?" iki in, temachtiani, niaw nimitstlanonotsas inin tlatoli itech naltepew iwan nonemilis. ixtlawaka ma itilok tamatepeuh”. ya ketsali ya sakwan, xiwkecholi itlakechwan tonpupuliwi, tiyawi in ichan. xik yokoyakan, in antepilwan, cuauht'amocelo, ma nel chalchiwitl, ma nel teokwitlatl, no ye ompa yaske onkan on ximowa. xikadivinaro nehin alehandro. nianias kimaka kana nikonahsi kemi yekemanon nikahsito ompa tienda in maria. tla axkema inimayanah mehor meltihka". in nikitoa aokmo sepa nitlatos niktsa [sic] in notlatol ka nel san neh[...] kwalakoketstia in tlapachotiloni aw in axkan nikitoa wel ix[...] niktemas matlakpoali pesos aw in tlakamo ma motelchiwa ka no in notomines in ipampa yuh nikitohoa hin ka san nokaltitlan in kali titokalnetechana inin melaoak in nikitoa. 100. aw in axkan ma xikmochikawili immoyolotsin, immonakayotsin, ¿ac nel ipan tikmokawilis? ¿ac nel tikmottilia? ka ye titenantsin, ka ye titettatsin; ka ye titlakaskaltia, ka ye titlakawapawa, ka timalkoche, ka titeputse; wei immokwexan, wei immomamalwas, ka tipochotl, ka tiwewetl; ka tisewalo, ka tekawyo; tiskalo, timalakayo; tisewtli, tipahtli. motloktsinko, monawaktsinko, mokalakia immomasewalwan, immessowan, immotlapalowan, immawayowan, immowitsyowan, immochamolowan, immotapalkayowan, immotsikwehalowan, immotlapankayowan; immixkwamolwan, in mostiwan in motentsonwan; iwan mitsitskaktia, immitsopuchtia, in monawan, in mottawan; iwan in momoyawatok, in sesenmantok, immaas, immokwitlapil, in ixkichtin immomawan, immokxiwan, in ixkichtin immosewalotitlantsinko, immekawyotitlantsinko mokalakia. tlen 100 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlahtokan tlen hudikatura sentlanawatiloyan elis se tlakayochiwali tlen poder hudisial tlen sentlanawatiloyan iwan moselnawatis ipan itequih, itlanawatil iwan keman kikixtis tlasenkawali. in tlahtokan moyolitis ika chikome imawan iwan tlen yewan, se mochiwas tlayekanani tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia, iwan yewa noihki kiyekanas tlahtokan; eyi wewetlakameh kintokatlalis sentinka nechikolistli tlen korte, achi miakintin tlen chikweyih nel amo miakin, kampa tlatskitoseh magistrados tlen sirkwito iwan hweses tlen distrito; omeh wewetlakameh tlen kintokahtlalis tlahtokan tlen wekapa, iwan se tlen weyi tlayekanani tlen totlalnantsin. nochi in wewetlakameh moneki kinechikoseh amatlanekili tlen mihtowa ipan 95 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili iwan kwali tlatenewali kipiaseh ipan intekih iwan tekichiwali, kwali nemilistli iwan tlatlepanitali ipan intequih, iwan tlen kintokatlalis suprema korte, moneki mopialiseh nelkwali tlaixmatilistli ipan tekitl tlasenkawali. in tlahtokan tekichiwas ipan sennechikolistli noso ipan tekinechikolstli. in sennechikolistli kisenkawas tlen tokayotl, tekitilispan, tlasenmaktilistli iwan tlapatlali magistrados iwan tlasencahuanih, iwan sekinok tlahtoli tlen kiihtos tlahtol tlanawatili. san amo tlayekanani tlen tlahtokan, oksekin wewetlakameh wekawaseh makwili xiwitl ipan intlanawatil, nehechka quinpatlatiaseh, iwan amo welis oksepa kin tokatlaliseh ipan seyok kawitl. in wewetlakameh amo kiixnextiah ahkia quintocatlalih, ipampa inon tekichiwaseh ika inselti iwan xitlawak tlanawatili. ipan kawitl intlanawatil, san welis kinpatlaseh ken kiihtowa nawi tokayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili. in tlanawatili kiixtlalis tlahtolpechtli tlen ika momachtiseh iwan nochi tonati moixtlaposeh tequichihuanih, iwan no ihki kwali moixtlapanaseh ipan tekitl tlen hudisial, tlen yewa ipan mochiwas mawistik tlahtolpewalistli, melawak tlahtoli, xitlawak tlahtoli, nelkwali tekichiwalistli iwan tlaselnemilistli. san kenihki kiixtlalis tlahtol tlanawatili, in tlahtokan kipias tekiwakayotl tlen ika kikixtis nochimeh amameh tlen nelkwali ika tekipanos. in suprema korte tlen hustisia welis kitlatlanis tlahtokan makikixti inon amameh tlen kiitas moneki iwikpa melawak kwali mochiwas tekitl ipan sentlanahautiloyan. in sentlanawatiloyan tlen korte noihki welis kitlahtlachilis iwan, tlan monekis, kipatlas tlen tlahtokan kiselis, kachi miaken tlen chikweyi tlamatlahantli. in tlanawatili kiixtlalis tlahtoli iwan tlahtolpamiltl tlen kenihki mochiwas inin tlanawatihkayotl. in tlasenkawalmeh tlen tlahtokan ihkinoh mokawas iwan amo welis motewis, ipampa inon, amo ipatih tlaixpantilistli iwan tlehtleya tlamantli, tlen yewa kiixnamikis, san kena ipatih tlen tokayotl, tlanawatikayotl, sentokayotl iwan tlapatlali tlen magistrados iwan tlasencahuanih, tlen welis kiixtlachilis suprema korte tlen hustisia, san iwikpa kiitas melawak mochihtok ken kiihtowa tlahtoltamachiwalmeh tlen kixtlalia tlanawatili tlen itechpowi. in suprema korte tlen hustisia kichiwas tlen yewa iamatomin tlayeyekoli iwan tlahtokan kichiwas tlen itechpowi poder hudisial tlen sentlanawatiloyan, san amo kitlatlakawis tlen moihtowa ipan chikome tlahtolpamitl tlen 99 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili. in amatomin tlayeyekolmeh kititlanis tlayekanani tlen suprema korte iwikpa mamosentika tlali ipan amatlayeyekoli tlen presupwesto tlen egresos tlen sentlanawatiloyan. in amatekichiwalis tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia itechpowi tlen yewa itekiwa tlayekanani. okachi kwali saniman tlailkawis. tlahkoxonakatl nomochikawaski niman nokito in testigo ka wel nikmati ka yewatl inemak mochiw in atlixeliwki ikwak kimakake in mexika ye ompowalxiwitl. moketstikak in kwawtli in yewatl in tenochtli. aw ka yewatl ik kwalan in kwikatl in kikwikewke in mexika, aw masiwi inkwika ka san ik kikwikaawa in maxtlaton. tlen 131 tlanawatihkayotl. itekiwakayo tlen sentlanawatiloyan .quiinamas tlanamakalismeh tlen mowalikas noso mokixtis noso tlen mopanoltis ipan anawak tlaltipaktli, iwan noihki nochipa kiamaxitlawas iwan axkiselis, ipampa tlamokwitlawili noso tlapihpiali, miak tlamantli tlawiwikali iihtiko totlalnantsin, san katlia ihki ewani; san amo welis kiixtlalis sentalnhautiloyan; iwan welis kiihtos, ipan iyolo weyi altepetl, tlainamali iwan tlanawatilmeh tlen moihtowa ipan tlatlapantli vi iwan vii tlen 117 tlanawatihkayotl. in tekichiwani kipias tlanawatili tlen kimaktilis tlahtokan sennechikolistli iwikpa kitlehkoltis, kilokotsos noso kipoliwiltis tlen ipatih tlamantli tlen mokixtis noso mowalikas, kiixtlalis yewa tlahtokan, iwan iwikpa kiyolitis sekinok, noihki ikwikpa kilokotsos noso kikotonas tlen mowalikas, tlen mokixtis iwan mopanoltis tlaeliltismeh, tlachiwalmeh iwan sekinok, keman kiihtos saniman moneki, tlen ika moyektlalis tlanamakali tlen kiawak, tomintekitl tlen totlalnantsin, tlasenyetos tlen tlaeliltili ipan anawak tlaltipaktli, noso seyok tlamaktli tlahtolnekili, itlapalehulis totlalnantsin. yewatsin tekihikwani keman kititlanis amatomin tlayeyekoli ipan weyitlahtokan nochi xiwitipa, motlahtlanis makikwalmatikan kenihki motekiwis tlen ipan quimactiltoqueh. amo kwaltia para pahti sayoh para tapalol. in temachtiani opahpakik ika in tlamachtil. kwaltia seki kitokah wan seki ixwa saj. in ipan axkan ik 18 mani metstli setiembre de 1608 años, ikwak otlamiko omotlapoto in aotlih in motatakak inik motlakowiltek tepetl in ompa sitlaltepek, inik nepa tulampa kontlaske kontlachiyeltike inik konyakatike inik nepa onkisa yaw in atl, in tlamawtiaya || 71 in tlaapachowaya nikan mexiko. ahsiti. atitla. —kitlasalo'ke baya pero sanikan katka. aw inik mani kali sentetl koyowakanpa itstikak in itepots hematl iwan inik ontepantli in ithik inik ontetl kali tonatiw ikalakianpa itstikak in itepots nanmatl iwan semomitl in iyomotlan hematl. wan nopa inana ya choka, mokweso, iuki kitokaitiah por in mochiwa wehweyi in itakka, pané elot. para san tlen michime niman ik ompa inpan asito in ompa tlapopotsaya in otlatepek, tlatlewatstoke in inpan asito. aw in makok in tlali in atlixeliwki ikwak veimolan yalowak aw in ikwak omakok niman ikwak konpewalti in ya kisakamowa aw inik wel nokomati ka tewantin totech kikaw inik tiksakamoke aw tepanko i nika inik wel nikmati. ipanpa mixpantsinko ninopechteka ma ika motlatoka hustisiatsin ximotlanawatili ma mako posesion ma axkatilo in español inik wel konpias in kali in tlali in oniktlanamakilti. wan nemi se masewali itoka hwanito. inik oaxkatiloke itenkopa in [f. 14 r.] hustisia niman naokmo sepa texixikos in akin noksepa texixikos inik motlatolkwepas senka wei hustisia ipan mochiwas xv pesos tomines inik ontlaxtlawas itech powis in ikamara su magestad. ik nikan tiktlalia in tofirma migwel sanches alkalde fransisko hoares alkalde. paso ante mi migwel de los angeles eskribano. sigwe [f. 15r.] un piano. otieyah. ayohkana wahka kiitstok para ilwikaktli para ke inik viii nikito ome pexotika tomin chili nikmaka in nokonew itoka maria ka ye ixkich in oniktsontek in itenkopatsinko totekuyo dios ma ayak kixitinis in onikito aw in tla itla mokakis in achtopa onikitoka nikpolowa yewatl neltis in satepan in niktlalia in notestamento. se itoka tehon, se itoka tiburnona se itoka demon. in iw kimachiyotia sekintin wewetke, inik ompa walkiske in astlan in asteka ayamo hompa kiwalmamatiake in diablo || 71v witsilopochtli, ye kin wel otlipan kiwalantikiske inik kiwalmomamaltike, inik yewatl okiwalmoteotitiake in asteka mexitin. ika titamih tiktasohkamatiliah in telesekundaria tetsihtsilin wan no in itayekankauj koral morales espinosa akin techpalewih ika tomin mah tikixnextikan in amaix masewalkopa una koyokopa, ika in tekit techpalewia mah tikixnextikan nochi in masewaltamachilis tein moihkwilowa, mah kiixmatikan masewalmeh wan nochi in okseki tokniwan. yewa akaktlalo. . aw in ye yuhki in o muchi sentekpanke in inextlawal itwalnepantla niman ye ik kalaki in inchan ixpan moketsa in tletl unkan konkechkotona in soli. aw senka chikawak in ipan wala in ahehekatl walitstia tonatiw ikisayampa, aw senka wekawtika in manka in ahehekatl, inik amo wel omotsikoke kana; aw ika in inemachilistika in okinwalwikak asiko in onkan ikalakiampa tonatiw, aw ipampa ik kittako in atentli iwan in tlali nikan ipan yankwik semanawak. inin chalchiwmomostli yewatl in tepetsintli, ka yewantin yuh kitokayotike in achtopa onkan onoya in xochteka in olmeka in kiyawisteka in kukolka, ankaso atl ikpak mextikatka kimoteotiaya in omotenewke in xochteka in olmeka in chalchiwmatlalatl, ka yuh kitokayotiaya inin atl in wewetke ye wekaw. omakatl xiwitl ikwak kiawiko, no ikwak molpili in ixiw. inin ichpokatl chichiltikistak, ñeka totonalwaktik. "bueno, na nihwikas". in ixkichika otsatsiwak ayak otlanankili ayak ones in tlakowani kema otlanankili nawi tlakatl amo senka kineltilike inin tlatol aw san isel in lwis savalos in achtopa tlanankili español yewatl okimiyekili in tomines inik kikowa kali okiten in matlakpowali pesos wel ipan otlamiko in tlatoli in termino amo miek tlakatl otlato yuh kimokakilti in tlatowani governador. ichan ixtlawatlakatl nochipa weyi itwali kipia, kawayohkaltin iwan owatlapil kanin kiyeyantia nochi tlen kipixka. ¡nopiltzin, tesosomoktsin!, kwaltia inik omotamachiw matlaktl omei varas in tonatiw ikisayan aw inik patlaoak chikome varas in tonatiw ikalakianpa aw in otlikapawik ikwapatlaoak matlaktli varas yoan media ka yaxka okatka in noxwiwtsin in itoka maria salome in inamik migwel xwares. i xikomoyawal askapotsalko mokikwatiko, yokikwi muchiw chikonkiawtsi; inewan ewa itoka teukoxotsi yokikwi muchiw tochintewktli wexotla tlatowani. iikini kiilwi nopa sokiayotl tlen weyi. nikteka in atl, kwawtenkostli in teuktli, miérkoles a xvi de setiembre, ikwak tapachiwke nowian; senka tlaxikak in tlapanko, iwan miekkan xixitin papachiw in kali, netlapacholok. otsonkisako in matlaktlomei kali xiwitl de 1609 años. mochiwa yek weyi kwowit kampa amo kitentekij. nikan ipan in kimanke temalakatl in mexiko. q.n. in ni yawsivatsin in amonan umpa nochan in kolwakan aw in kwaivitla niktemaka in ik okwautikak. . aw kihitowaya ka ahmo miki ka ilwikak yaw kitoka in tonatiw. ﻿yehua tlamapoas iwan tlahkwilosneki. newa nochipa oniktlasohtlak inin piltontli. dose metros dose metros nihchiwas nompa kali". ix akatl xiwitl, 1319. se mamahpikton yepasohtli tla tewan tiezquiah. aw amo senka wekawake, xochiyowa itech hunio. aw inik no tikitta in ikwak tikisa in tochan anoso ye tinenemiske otlipa ka titomachiyotia ika in sankta krus, itechtsinko titokawa in dios iwan in ipa in tlei tikchiwa; in kenin iw tichristianostin aw in tlateotokanime in gentiles ika in tlei in innemachiyotilis, yehika in itechpa inka onkatka kipieya oksentlamantli inemachiyotilis. ipam inin xiwitl omotlaliskiya in pila alkalde mayor d[on] ipam lwis karilo amo okidaselilike in masewakin iwan togowernador d[on] fra{nsisko} ximenes baptikta iwan tewantin nikam tichan{e}ke in san bartolomen otimochikawke otiki{n}palewike. in kwowit. ah nikan tochan, ah nikan tinemiske, tonyas ye yuhkan. kemah se kiayotia ika tenexat wan se kikawantia mah xokokkisa, se kipaka wan se kichiwa ya xokoyolemol iwan nakastekilit. bweno, wan ne tsikame kihtoaya "o tech moknelili in totekuyo in tloke nawake ok senka ilwil imasewal ok tlamawisos in telpuchtontli in tlahpaltontli. onka oksé tonali in lá okseki karga kitlanke ihsihkan oksepa yeyaw kanatiw okseki wan lá kahmo nikan kachto kichiwas in trabaxo. testigo.- fransisko ximenes algwasil chane sant pablo tialistakapan namike huramento okichiw inik otlatlakoltilok in ipaltsinko dios iwan totlasonantsin santa maria iwan in ika imachio in krus. in ewat se kiatema ika refino wan iwan maltantsin wan mahase tayi ihwak xoxoula. ¿toni kokolis kipiya? iswatl aw ayemo no yeika in itotonilo in tonatiw iwa in tetonalmakani in inka tlamochiwa planetas in sisitlaltin, aw yehika kayemo no chiwaloya. kwalika nochpoch. noso yetikmati ka motata amo wel kinpaktiah inintin pelikulah tlein tewatl sasan mitzpactiah. yewa yesiahtemiki nochipa in weyaltepetl walwits, ka san kemanian onyasneki itla sine; noso ye nikanwits motata. man tikitlanilitih itlahtol itechpa in nehnewilistli. xontlakaki, fernando. mochpoch konitasneki sente pelíkula tlapalchiwkan amerikana ika tlapitsal chopin. ¿tlen tikihtowa? ¿tiaznequi sine noso amo ? komo san achini iwahkapanka para techpalewis, para mopalewiskeh nopilwan. amo xikinmahkawa, amo xikinmapetsko. axkan viernes teotlak yei tsilini in ik 10 mani metstli hunio de 1611 años, ye no ihkwak oipantik ixtlapachiwka in tonatiw, in iw kihtotiwi wewetke "tonatiuh kwalo". ipan nawtsontli onkaxtoli onnawpoali omei xiwitl kiyokoxke teutontlalpan "lassertonameyotica kakiskopinaloni" in anglitlaltekah kitokayotiah ika intlahtol "compact disk". ye pewa tlahtlayowa. se kilo pitsonakatl in sesek, ta selistok, kan niman waki por in ayoj. momochko malakatetikpak, naltepew, itokan milpa alta kaxtilankopa noso asunsión milpa alta iwan intsalan tetepeme kwawtsin iwan tewtli. viii tekpatl xiwitl, 44. yuh kinnawati in inteow istakkwawtli in kitokayotiaya totolin; aw yehika ipampa ka wel yewatl in omotenew tlakatl atonaltsin chichimekatewktli kiwalmama in itlapial in itlakimilol walteomama || 47v kiwalnotstia in inteow. xnechchiwilikan favor. mochiwa maski ojtenoj, no mochiwa milah oso kajfentaj. tlen 40 tlanawatihkayotl. yewa itlanekilis mexihko altepeyotl moyektlalis ken se tlahtokan tlali tlen tech ixnextia, sentika tlapalewia, senmotskitok, kampa monechikohtokeh tlaltlanawatilmeh tlen mosennawatiah nochi tlen iniwantih intechpowi, iwan tlatskitokeh ipan sennechikolistli tlen moihtowa ipan tlahtolxitlawalistli kampa motlastkilihtok inin ipatih tlahtol tlanawatili. wan lahmo pus nehwa kemen yalwa ik ayapanko nia santepak pahpachiwke ichkame. se kilo tsompachkilitl nikan ipan in tlachapolkwalok, temoke chachapolme. "uan pero ta san hwan bautista melawak amo nikwalita inin nemilistli. newa onikaxtilantlahtolkwep in inglesamatl. tihtokase. kwaltia inin. onkak ome taman: witswaukilit tein istak wan tein yon achi chichiltik. aw niman axkan ipan lunes ik xxix de novienbre de 1604 años, netekimakok in mexiko in tlatilolko iwan in nowian sohetos, wel mosenkaw; ik niman kipewaltike in mexika in ye kiteka yankwik tetenamitl, in tlalmantli nowian || 39 motatakak in nikan tlaxilakalpan sant hwan, in kalsoli moxixitinin, iwan in ixkich wexotl mochi motlas inik tlakwawtsotsonalok. ikwak ipan in omopewalti in alkalde de korte santiago de vera inik mowikak china. wahkapa tlehkotok se mangokwawitl sesek kemeh xokot. aw axkan miérkoles ik 30 mani metstli hunio de 1610 años, ikwak okalak in don hwan péres de monterrei mestiso governador mexiko tenochtitlan, nikan mexiko chane; ikwak kikaw inik presidente mochiwtikatka fransisko sánches español. ix kali xiwitl, 1241 años. ¿azomo ye nelitipaki, ti ya nemi tlaltikpak? sasokampa mota nochi moskalia. ka ichpochtsintli ma xikkaki, ma wel iw ye in moyolloh, noxokoyow, makahtle tlein mitzmauhtih, mitztequipachoh, makahmo ken mochiuha in mix in moyolloh, makahmo xikimakahsi in kokoyalistli, anose ok ma kokoyalistli, kokok teopowki. nopa kaha moyawaltinemi moyawaltinemi ihkini. vii tochtli xiwitl, 1434. aw yewatl ikei visurrei mochiwako in don gastón de peralta markés de falses, in otlapacho niman ikwak ixkichika in ipan xiwitl de 1566 aw ixkich ik asiko yewatl ipan metstli marso ipan xiwitl de 1568, inik mowikak españa; in tlahtokatiko se xiwitl ipan makwiltetl metstli. in ikome ichpochwan kwawsesekwitsin tlamaokatltewktli teokwitlapane itoka sakwantlapaltsin, inin konmonamikti tsiwakatsin tlamaokatltewktli. viii akatl xiwitl, 1279 años. kenin mochiwa aw niman oksekni otlayeyekoko, in okowitiaya onkan in omotenew ayapanko in imonepanowayan atl; onkan kipewalti in tlatakaya, ompa kikaya i motenewa amanalko tepopola nepa inawak in kiwikaskia atl, || 62 aw amono wel kichiw, san konkaw no in onkan. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. ikexiwtike nokwel ... . i monoltitiw andasko, kimonapalwitiake in sankto domingo teopixke, in ikatsinko tlatlatlawtilok arsobispo visurrei inik kimopahtilis kimokechilis totekwiyo dios, inik amo kimotlatlatilis kimomiktilis. senxumali orégano nikan ipan in in momikili itskwawtsin atlawtekatltewktli xokoyotl tlahtowani atlawtlan tenanko, in tlahtokat onpowalxiwitl ipan matlakxiwitl ipan oxiwitl; aw sa niman ipan in in xiwitl in motlahtokatlali in ixiptla in itoka tlotli tlatkik atlawtekatltewktli mochiw in tenanko. kwalka yehon nikmolwilis in moteotikanantsin titlamochyaske ihkwak ahsis in tonali axkan xalmasaloti iwan xitekititi kema nanmixpantsitsinko yewa onechtemanamik ika in senyelis. antonio martín markes. kenin mochiwa komo kwoutah ixwa se xalxokot wan pewak moskaltia wan amo akah kimaxima, moskaltia hasta dies oso kinse metros. ¡ notlatsintiwa, tlaxkalteka yechichimeka! amo nikmati keyéh iuki kitoyaktiaj. kwalika, nokonen, ye omochin tlen otiknekia. man santepitsin tontlakwakan iwan man tik chiwakan tlen ika tiquizazqueh. ¿tlen motlaken timakis? aw in oyuh kimatke in chololan iwan kwawkecholan iwan in itsokan iwan in tetskoko iwan in xochmilko in tlahtoke, senka kwalanke, kihtoke "ma titononotsakan ipan in mexikatl, ma tikyaomanilikan; tle ai, ken mochiwa in okinchololti in chalko tlahtoke, kwix amo tonan kwix amo tota in chalkatl?". aw yewatl ipan mowika ik teoyotika monemilisnehtoltihtsinowa in teoyotika yoktakatlatekpantsin in motenewa in ireglatsin in totlasomawisthatsin weitsintli san basilio magno doktor itetlanextsin in sankta iglesia iwan arsobispo moyetstikatka in ompa ipan wei siudad de sesarea de kapadosia en gresia ipan tlali assia in tonatiw ikisayampa; aw ka sanno || 264 san antonio teopixki moyetstikatka in omotenewtsino weitsintli san basilio magno, yese in satepan okseppa ye no yewatsin motlayankwililiko motlapahpatiliko in itechpa in ok tlein itlakawia teopixkanemilistli in ipan teopixkayotl san antonio. nowiyampa tlamamawtiaya in ipan nweva españa inik tlakamachoya, in iw mochipa kimokwititiwi in satepan chiwknawintin omotlahtokatiliko mexiko tenuchtitlan, oksenka yewatl in sa okitsakwiko motewksumatsin in ikteomeka in iwki intoka, in kihtowaya "ca sa titenientewan; ipal in titlahtokati wei naweli katka, yewatl itlanextil i nawalotl". mohmostla tekitij. aw i ye onoke koyoaka ye unka xexeliw i nowian altepetl; niman ye ik momasewalmaka in ixkich nowian altepetl. yahki wetsi, in kakamatl, in tsinkakawaka, nikan ipan in pewaloke xochmilka ipan in itskowatsin, inik ompa tepewato mexika. ye sentlamantin in itawan in onkan ipan asiko, in iw omihto tlakpak, in i mochtin walsenyahke tlahtowani oselotsintewktli, in itoka kwawkes iwan in itoka hestekon; atenko walewake inik tepan asiko in ipan in omotenew xiwitl xiii kali xiwitl, 1297 años. mopiki in tamali ika ome iswatl; ipanin motlalia michin sentlatlapantli, no iwki tepitsin yepasohtli, istatl, chilkwitlaxkoli iwan se nonohpalton; mokimiloa iwan komalko mowikxitia. ahmo wel totonki yes in komali; mokwehkwepa sehsentlapal. teka ximowikatsino. ipan kaxitl motlalia pitsochiyawisotl ma totoni; motlalilia in nakatl. sekni mowikxitia tomatl ika chilpitsawak, xonakatl iwan axox. mochinin motesi iwan ihkwak in nakatl tepiton ye tlatlewatsali ye motlalilia in chilmoli iwan in xoletl in ye tlachipawtli, motlapachoa. ma wiksi. ikwetlaxkol. tlikoli nopa tihkwa". . aw in ik nehnemi amo sem ilwitl in ohtlatoka san yowaltika. aw in yewatl tlalmantsintli in ipan motenew in petision omotenew ini ikampa inin mandamiento este es de [sic]martin e baltasar in iaxkan martin iwan baltasar indiome in ipan omotenew. in se kitoka, achá kitokah ikwouyo oso iteyo. nikan ipan in poliwke in kwetlaxteka; ok ipan in pew yaoyotl in wewe motewksomatsin ilwikamina, aw yewatl kitlamiko in axayakatsin. wan kiitski isisnana wan kikechpostehki. in ipan in omotenew sábado, ikwak oselilok in nikan mexiko in iyektenewalokatsin sant ignasio i motenewa ibeatifikasioyotsin in okimomakawili || 127 sankto padre paulo kinto in axkan moyetstika roma. moichpokachihki 6 kali xiwitl, 1537 años. xii tekpatl xiwitl, 1296. iwan ikwak kwalok tonatiw, moch neske in sisitlaltin. tewan tochan otaciqueh. in san nonopechteka, san nitolotinemi in tenawak. nikan motokayontia in iskintin: in ikse itoka poyawitl, memela, xolma, michinistak, semakachikitl, aatlatl, xomimitl, atlakwawitl, tenoch, oselopan, akantsintli, oselotl, chalchiutonak, ayonkwa, xokuyol, tlakets, iskintin i. in iskixochitli, kakawaxochitli, .nitlanavatia ayao ayao ayao ayao ayao. xoh! san nivalasik ohtli nepanivian san ni senteutl a kenke kehní tihchiwa?" kema, omochin in tlakowali. itechpa miak tomin oquinequiah. onech ihtlanilihkeh $250 000, (mahtlacompoalli omatlatli xikipili pezoh) inik ye kwali notech omochin onikowak in kalmanki ika $200 000 (mahtlacpohualli xikipili pezoh). in tepamitl iwan kaltin ye intech moneki moyectlalizqueh. inokachi, notechmoneki yeyi nanatskameh iwan mahnel yeyi wakax. sente kaxtilan tekixexeloh ipan nokalmankan tekitis iwa nnik chia ka amo wehkawas niktlanis nochi tomin tlen ika onikon. ye okipiaya in kalmanki sekintin teposastin, mach amo okipiaya sente tlamamalkalmimilo ka ipan in tonaltin nia nokowis. awaxmoli ika nohpali ayok welki monawatiyah para achiyok tekitise. nikawín amo semi mochiwa. in amo monamaka. tlatlatskatimani, iyakaxochitlontsetseliwi, ankiso yewatl ye ik noihki nikinyekiah in tokalpanwepahkeh yolcameah. niya ipan kwasiya". aw yuh mihto ipan yuh machok, kihtoke in nikan tlaka ipan tlaxilakali ka san ikwalantsin isomaltsin in totekwiyo dios kiwalmiwali ipan in omotenew señora. pero xnechchiwili in favor. itlanahnamik: niman ye ik wits in temilotsi, umotlaliko kapoltitla; aw in don hwan wewensi omotlaliko atikpak. aw inin tikohoa matlakpoali pesos tomines in tehoantin otikselike in otitechmakak kakalaki teupan santiago ik mitos misa rekien in ipanpa omomikili noxhuiuhutzin maria salome aw wel tiktokwitia in tehoantin in ipatiw kali ka ye inamik in matlakpoali pesos ayak titoxikotiwi aik tikitotiwi ka san toka onekakayawalok sa no ik tikeloloke. ipan matlaktli kali xiwitl omomikilitsino in itskoatsin, in akin oteyakan matlaktli omei xiwitl. xi tochtli xiwitl atle muchiw. axkan miérkoles in ik 29 mani metstli agosto de 1612 años, ihkwak omomikili in el lisensiado álbar gómes de abaunsa oidor katka mexiko, aw ye chikwasen tsilini teotlak in otokoto inakayo in onkan teopan monasterio de nu- || 196 -estra señora de las mersedes, in istak hábito teopixke kimotlalilia inchantsinko. mah mosentili, aw niman yuhki kichiwke in mexika; qüitlacoyonique in kali, nimann ompa moch kiske in mexika. iikniwa ne pedro, san pablo, inihwanti in sesek. aw i ye matlakilwitia, niman ye ik kinawatia kolwaka tlatoke, kimilwia “mexicaé, xikwalwilanaka in chinamitl, unka walikatias in astatl, unka walonotias in kowatl, siyotok in chinamitl; unka ankitekakiwi in tecpanquiauac”. niman ye ik kon elteki kon anilia in iyolo, kwawxikalko kontlalitika in yolotli. se kitepewa wan kemah ixwa ya iteyo. in iskichti kwikoanoaya muchinti tlatlatake unka mike; in techpewalti ye techmiktia yei hora, in ountemiktike teutwalko. aw ye yaw in tliltekatsin chichimekayaotekiwa in amis, aw ipan onkisato in akin moketstikak, atle maitla itech wetstikak, san wel nexewatikak. tlahko kilo awax in ye wakki ´tos ¿queniuh titacuazqueh? in ipan in xiwitl omotenew 1590, ikwak momikili in sankto padre sixto kinto sant fransisko teopixki katka. intla kamo yuh tikchiwas tiwal ixpopoyotis tiwalankwatsikoliwis tiwal kokototsawis. ¿cani momowti? in mokets kali aso ye senpowalxiwitl honmatlaktli tlatokati in wanitsin san ixkichi in nikitowa notlatol ipanpa in nikan nomatika nikchiwa krus. pasó ante mi migwel hernandes eskribano. i xochitl imapan amonkate, in amontlahtlahtoa. . aw in ik motekimakaya okkam moxelowaya in tlatilolka no okkam moxelowaya in tenochka, in iwiwikalwan in witsilopuchka in askapotsalka in kwawtitlan kaike. aw nawi metstli in ayak tlahtowani katka; aw niman ik wala in tlaxkalan hwes itoka don leonardo xikotenkatl, kimixkechili in visurrei inik yewatl kipachoto altepetl tlakopan. ika nehon yuh machistiko kitlakawaltiayah in teopixke omotenew governador makayamo kwel inka mokakayawa makayemo kintolini masewalti, ka nel yankwike intlaneltokilistika, ma okseppa mokwepti ma motlapololtihti, manose yaoyotl inpan kichiwti in teopixke iwan in españoles; yewatl in inik kitlakawaltiaya governador, san ikwalan kittak, inik senka okinkokoli teopixke. okachi kwayotika yewa san sekintin tlakab quixmatih. kalahki. in xiwit, aw in tlahtoani obispo kihkwanih ompa in iglesia mayor in itlasohixiptlatsin in ilwikak siwapili, kiwalmokixtilih in ompa itekpanchan in ineteochiuhayan moyetstikatka, inik mochi tlakatl kittas, kimowisos in itlasohixiptlatsin. aw wel sen mochi is semaltepetl olin, in kiwalmottiliaya, in kimawisoaya in itlasohixiptlatsin walateomatiya, kimotlatlawtiliaya; senka kimawisoaya in kenin tebtlamawisoltika inik omonexitih, inik niman ma akah tlaltikpak tlakatl okimihkwilwih in itlasohixip tlatsin. ¿nehhuihuixtiuh chalchiwtli, nehwiwixtiw ketsali, oyaximoak, kenonamikan? aw in ikwak okonkowke in tlakotli in yewatl tlasenkwilo mochi kikwikwilia in itech okatka in tlasohtilmahtli in tlasomaxtlatl in tlaso kaktli. amo mochipautani. aw ik niman yewantin sa semi mochintin ontetokatiake ontlatokatiake in teaachwan in ibaxewan omotenewtsino mikkatsintli arsobispo visurrei omoyetstikatka, wel mochintin tlilpali luto kimololotiake kiwilantiake. aw in teskali in tonatiw ikalakianpa itstikak nikinsemaxkatia in noxwiwan hoana maximiliana yoan diego de kastañeda yoan baltasar yoan in omotenewke niwktsitsiwan. kahtsot ihwanti kinekih kiichtekise se ichpokero. xkinaxkatili nopilwan. axkan domingo ye yowak matlaktli tsilini ik 31tia metstli oktubre de 1610 años, ikwak omomikili in don hwan altamirano komendador sanktiago imontsin katka in tlakatl don lwis de velasko markés de salinas visurrei mexiko in axkan moyetstika motlahtokatilia; aw ye kin lunes i motokak. in ixochiyo se kikwa komaltamal wan no welik taaman. mochiwa mas kampa kajfentaj. seki kitokah tonalmil wan xopamil. aw in ikwak in owasiko in chichimeka in asteka in kolwake, in ikwak in otlachichiwke in tenochtli itsintla, aw niman ye kitowa in tenoch: "yhyoyahué!, anka yewatl in inik otiwalnentlamatiake, inik otonewak in toyolo in tonakayo". kenin tokamak ma nayi. wan teipa kwalani itata, inana v akakatl xiwitl, 1315. tekixkitl, yei tlatsayantli xochiyowa agosto wan itakka nochipa onkak. mah xochiyowa, weka yowatsinko in iw kimokakilti, kimitalwi “yoyahué! ma yuh mochiwas, ma ok yowatsinko toquiçazque”. sokipan omochantilike mexikah matlaktli onnawi xiwitl iwan sanyeno ihkwak insiwawan omixiwke miekpa; ik okitokayotike "mixiuhcan" noso "in onkan mixiwih in cihuah". sempoali nohpali in ahmo wel wehyi ke ya noka oyatonaki id est onoka tonak onoka tlatvik. ma nyapoliwis, ¿ kan in anmetzticateh? iksot kwalika tla amitla okse timopilia, ernesto, tioweh nekbka in kalnakasko ipan neka tlawanaloyan. ¿canin totlalizqueh? sagradísima tierra, aw kimilwi in ketsalkanawtli "ca aokmo mowikas, ka okiwalalkawi in atl in tepetl in chalko; ma ximowikakan!". axiukenkech ihkwak tlalpoloke in okwilan in mexika. tlahko kilo ayohwachtli kenin mochiwa satepa yowala' kwaltemo’ta kwak yuwahsiko techin ichan pero kachto pipiltonton tlakat ompa techi non kweba. aw ye kaxtolonnawi xiwitl in ipan vii tochtli xiwitl, 1590 años, in omowikak españa in tlakatl don álvaro manrrike de súniga markés de vilamanrrike visurrei, in tlahtokat tenochtitlan makwilxiwitl; aw san niman ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl in owalmowikak in omaxitiko mexiko in ikome itoka don lwis de velasko visurrei. yewantin in imixpan no nikneltili in tlatoli onikinkalaki in inkalkowalko okimotlake in tlali teispan in omochiw inik okmo sepa itlah kitoske in otlanamakake. vi tekpatl xiwitl, 16. —we'ka wehka nitlacha ahmo porke nopapan akmotlachala wehka. in miktlampa atenko, “tla xiwalmowika, nochpochtsiné, ka nontlamawisowa ka tlawisnextito in kwawtemoktsin. kiixmatis tlake eliti. kwaltia tlen 14 tlanawatihkayotl. amo tlen tlahtol tlanawatili welis kikwilis tlen panohka tlahtoli tlen ika kitlahtlakawis akahya. amo akah welis kikotoniliseh tlamakixtikayotl noso tlen iaxkayo, itlapialis iwan tlen itechpowi, san keman kiasis tlahtolmatilistli tlen walah ipan kaltlanawatilmeh achtowi moixtlaliseh, tlen kampa motlepanitas nochi tlen moihtowa ipan tlahtolchiwalistli iwan tlen moihtowa ipan tlahtol tlanawatilmeh tlen achtowi ixneski tlen keman inin tlamantli. ipan tlahtolmatilistli tlen tlatemiktili amo akah welis kiixkawilis, san ipampa seha ixnesi tlahtoli, iwan ipampa miak tlahtoli ipan mochiwa, tlatsakwiltilistli tlen amo ixnesi ipan tlahtol tlanawatili tlen iixkawil tlahtlakoli tlen nikan moihtowa. ipan tlahtolmatilistli tlen altepechantli, in mosentlatsakwiltilistli mochiwas ken mihtotiwa ipan tlahkwiloli noso tlayeyekolistli tlen tlahtol tlanawatili iwan tla poliwi inin ipan motlalis tlahtolpewaltilistli tlen tlatechpowili. saniyo in toxochiw ika tonawiyakan. tilmahtli yek iistak kisa pero iistak. wan ihkino asta tlachixtehki nopa tenantsi. 67. aw nikan xommotlapalo, xikimikneli; aw no nikan ik mitsonihtoske, ik mitsontenewaske; aw no nikan ik motechpa ommotisawiske, motenyotiske, motlapalotiske. aw is, nikan, ontlakwawtlamatiske. chalchiwitle, ketsale, xokonikneli immix, immoyolo, aw nikan xommopitsa, xommomamali; aw nikan ik tommochamawties, ik tommotimaloties. ¿cuix tekoko in nikchiwasneki, in nimonan, in nimotta? ¿in nichimalsoli, in nimakkwawsoli? aw inin, notelputsine, san ixkich immotoskatlan, immokechtlan, nimitsilpilia. xokonwapawa immomatsin, immokxitsin. aw xikimikneli immotechiwkawan. ma ik nikan mixko, mokpak, timonentoka, timotlasaltoka. san niwki, in nimonan, in nimotta, san iliwis in nitlatlahtowa notelputse. . aw no ik momana in tachkawchiwtiaske in kiya kanaske tlamamali. "amo xinechkekelo aw in xomimitl niman ye kitowa "oncan yesin otasiko". se kikwa in itakka. yon kachi kikwah in koyomej. inin tlakatl tlen nochi weli iwan nochi kimati amo keman asis: ipampa towan itstok, towaya nemi, pewaya tlachia, nowa kochtok. in achá xochiyowa kemeh itech disiembre, porke itech abril onkak ya in iteyo. . aw in ik kitemakaya in imihiyo in intlahtul ye omihto in san atika in san tlakwaltika; kema, nonantsin. semi nipaktika ika nokalmimilo. itlaolinalastli wel kwali ka. santlen amokwalika sente ilanta yokwalok iwan kenin axkan amotlen ipatin se itla yankwik mokowis, okachi kwali nochias ixkichka moyektlalis in kawitl. itechpa ka in tleka amo oniwala ipan kalmimiloli. ika okse noihki in tewikanih ipan kalmimilo wekawa sempoali iman, noka ikapan ehekatl san yeyi imán mochiwa ihkion, se amo semi miktok ika in kalmimilo konyekana. yiman on amo wel ka okixmatia walas méxiko; san wel ye xochimilko iwan san gregorio. viii tochtli xiwitl, 1370. kenkwa' wele'on pero vete trae más ¿a poko no más éste? ahmo techpulos tlentikwaske ñan para nyulime ahmo kimpulwis tlenkikwaske. aw i mexika umpowalxiwtike omome in chapoltepek, ikomei inik namoyeloke se tochtli xiwitl ipa. kemah monamaka. nopa se tlahko mokahki ika nika tsintla wan se inin okichiw se ichpoch itoka maría maldonado, inin konmonnamikti in hwan panowayan tlaka. niman ye ik yaw in ichan. aw in oya niman isiwka kichichiwilia in itlaaltil. xon awiyakan in sesek, kan totonik. —omokicikike a balasos omokikkike a balasos ametrayadora wan este kañones de xwego ye'on mokikkiaya momiktiayaya' areglado. miak mochiwa pero ompa newin kwesaliya, nochi yehwa. yei ahwiyak klavo in kwauhichimali in temak, ye kimana, yan tlachinoli itik, ixtlawatl itik. yewan ye nochi intomin oquipolohqueh. amo kwaltia para pahti. aw no ipan in axkan omotenew kwaresma in ipan hwebes sankto, ikwak yankwikan achto okiske in ipilwantsitsin sankta katharina mártir; wel kwali inik kis tlayawalolistli, yewatl in motenewa la sangre de christo. setsi ikone aw in alkaldesme motlalike san pablo teopan fransisko martín chane sokipan iwan pablo damián chane ometochtitlan. nomaiknin ika yowali kisa. san nikwikanentlamati, san nikwikayeyekowa in tlaltikpak. "mejor ayikimo xitekitika. tel tetetstik tetetstik eli nopa atl. iwan totechkopa in timasewaltlakah in otahsiah ipan seminario de kultura nawatl ye otikihtakeh sekih totlahkwilol ye pantlaxtli ipan estudios de kultura nawatl iwan yehika in xiwitlpahpanoti in tiktlapiwihtiwitseh inik tikelewiah in tokaitl tlahkwilohkeh in kemmanian ika tinotsalo ahmo wel wehyi tokommatiskeh kema waltemok vi tochtli xiwitl, 1186 años. ii kali xiwitl, 1325. iteyo se kinamaka no. in kwowit. nikan nimitsmaktiliti nehin orasiones auto grande de méxiko. . aw in ihkwak o ahsito in altepetl ipan in tlatilulka san mosentlalia san sentetl in inkal mochiwaya ayak nonkwa mokixtia ayak wel isel kampa wia. ye sexiwitl in omotlahtokatlali akamapichtli otsintik wei altepetl méxiko tenochtitlan. inik okonan posesion itik okalak in kali ipan omotsawk in [roto] ka tetika otlamomotlak ipan onenen in tlali in chinamitl ayak tle okito ayak otlachalani. kinplantaroa en fila komo de orne metro kada metí. yewa yas inik ¡non hneyi altepetl. itlanawatil ka iwin in impa mihito in tenochka, unpa inka nesentlalilok. testigo. thoribio chichimeka ichan san sebastian sakatla omonamikti in iskich kawitl ye nemi ye hepowalxiwitl omakok huramento inik ontlatlakoltilok inik amo istlakatis paltsinko in dios niman nokito in testigo ka wel neli nikitowa inik amo nistlakati ka onimakok huramento. iwan ikwak in ompa askapotsalko kwitlaxitin se atlawtli, in onkan itokayokan kwawyawalolko, in onkan walkwitlakisaya atl; tepeatl senka waltilawatiwia in waltemoya kwawtla, inik onkan ipan walwia ipan walxeliwia in altepetl askapotsalko, ik ye poliwiskia. amo se kitamewia por ké tehko itech kwowit. inik onikittak tsintitsinili in yewatl in inik yehika ipampa in oksenka tlakwawyowatlaya, ka senka moneki in itsintilispewkapa in ipan in chichitla... amoxtlakwilolispa in mitos motenewas in okixin; ipampa itechpa in ixkich in kexkich tlamantli in onkatki i wel achto ikatsinko ipampatsinko tlamochiwa ka yewatl in in isel teutl dios, intlakatilispan iwkatsinko westsintla in mopachotsino in mochi in ixkich tlachiwali. ye impan asiko, ye chanonoke in xuchimilka iwan in atlakwiwayan kalke, ye kate in axkan onkan onoke. iii tekpatl xiwitl, 1612 años. kwaltia niman onkan kimontlalia in ipetlapan in ikpalpan kalixak kinwalalia in ik onkan kimittaske in ixkichtin tlakowanotsaltin. aw iwan in iskitlamantin teopixke mexiko monoltitoke, kil no mochintin kinmiktiskia kinpopoloskia; aw kil sa yetlamantin in teopixke kinkawaskia in iksentlamantin kil yewantsitsin in teopixke karmenitas deskalsos, in ikontlamantin kil yewantsitsin in teopixke san diego moyetstikate deskalsos san fransisko ipilwantsitsin, aw in iketlamantin kil yewantsitsin in la kompañía de hesús teopixke teatinos. aw intla tonatiw ikisayampa itstiw ahnoso ikalakian ahnoso iyopuchkopa tlali itstiw, senka ik pahpaki kitowaya kwaltia in texokomeh yetokeh inik nosiwaiknin. ome axoxtlantli ahmo wel wehyi ximonemiti aw axkan hwebes ik 8 mani metstli marso de 1612 años, ihkwak in honrras imissatsin omochiw iglesia mayor in teoyotika tlahtowani don frai garsía gwerra arsobispo iwan visurrei moyetstikatka mexiko. anmowaxka. in ikwak in itsinpewyok in ochiwalok in yokoyalok semanawatl, ye kaxtoltsonxiwitl ipan kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan yepowali ipan se xiwitl inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. ih. ik yewatl kisentlali in iyolo mikwanis mexiko masiwi motewksomatsin iixiptlawan miekpa kitlatlawtilikoh makwele mokwepa, makwele yaw in onkan okis itlaltsin. se tekontontli iwan tlahko pitsochiyawisotl antonio martín markés viii akatl xiwitl, 1175. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in || 91 in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. aw inik okilnamik in kitemos in intepalewilis in akaseme tlahtoke christianos, inik ika intoka monextis in tlali yankwik. no kilwiah torohet. ¿toni neh mosta nimoserviros? pewa 56 (alakcho) wan tami 85 (papalokilit), : emma yolanda argweta mereles. onkak ome taman: tein kwali wan simarrón. . aw in on tlamanalok niman ye ik teamako yewatl in teotekomatl iwan satepan temako in iyetl chichinalo. in mochiw in ipan in intlahtokaw mexika wewe witsiliwitl, ye iw nepa onpowalonkaxtoli ye tlahtokati. axan nehwa noyuwki nihneki akahton nihtlakewas makinpia nochkawa. tein wehweyi sebola, tein yon ipitsewayo kwaltia kiitaliliaj, kemeh yon xiyot, kixpepechouiliaj. ¿ tle ika timonenekia ? aw in ipan axkan in ik 3 mani metstli omotenew setiembre de 1607 años, ikwak nowian opew in iskikan teopan mexiko ye tlatsilinilo; iwki deskumunió ik motlalia inik tlatsiliniloya, senka tetlaokolti iwan temawti teisawi. tewa otikpiaya se totolakatl. aw in okinkaw nanakatl mononotsa kimolwia in tlein okonmottilike. aw in yewantin in tekwanipan tlaka satepa in asiko i walake, ka senka ye wekawxiwtika in kiwalitstiake, in iw ye onnesitiw in ipan xiwitl in asiko. vi tekpatl atle mochiw. wel temawis in tlakatsintli. tlamatini in itoka albert einstein mako inin xiwpan wei teiknelili motenewa nobel. in nantli tlakwalchihkan semi tekiti. aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl in walake in kiwalwikake nawintin pipiltin in chalko amakemekan, in kimixpantiko in tlahtowani awitsotsin inik yewatl kinmakas tlahtokayotl: in ikse itoka xiwtsin tlahtkik, inin ipiltsin in kwawtlewanitsin tlailotlaktewktli tlahtowani katka tenanko; in ikome itoka weweyotsintli, inin ipiltsin in kakamatsin teowatewktli tlahtowani amakemekan; aw in ikei amo wel momati in itoka, yehika kamo tewan tlaixketsali tlapepentli, ka sa tlahantli; ka san yewantin in omotokatenewke omentin in tlapepenaltin in tlaixketsaltin: se tlahtokatiskia tlailotlakan tenanko, in ikome ompa tlahtokatiskia in atlawtlan tenanko; aw in iknawi in ompa walake amakemekan itoka kwawsesekwitsin panowayan tlahtokatis. ayekohmoli ika chicharrontlali aw is katki ipatiw in atlawtli in tepetl in ixtlawatl: ma kana on tlapolo ma kana temak kontlas in iaxkatsin in itlakitsin in tlakatl toteuyo. ompa anpopoliwiske amiquitihui”. moteuiaj. ome axoxtlantli iiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1184 años. se kilo textli aw no iwan in chikwei altepeme in chichimeka teokolwake san ik mochintin onmosetilika in asteka, onkan kiwalantikiske in teokolwakan; ka kinwalwikaya ka walsepanwia. inin tototl miak tlakwika. in aka konmottilia tlapanko wal wetsis miktiwetsis. is saso kechkich tepan mochiwas mochi onkan konittaya, in ahnoso ilakilos. istaknanakat oso xononanakat kema, nokokonen. mosiwaiknin yoya otekitito. tewa tikmati kayompa ikaltekitkan chikweyi iman owatsintika yes. yotalma zalohqueh. mach, amo ipampa ximotekipacho. kenin tikpia tekisewilistli, motechpa ka in amo titekitis. ximalti iwan satepan xia tlakwaloyan kampa mo nana mitschia. || 84v iiii akatl xiwitl, 1379. niman yewatl in kikowaya chichi in ipan tetlakwaltiaya aso sen tekpantli anoso on tekpantli in mikia. mokwasekawil tsokwitlatik. mah weiya, okinotske tatatin iwan okimilwik inspektor: inomekes kokone tsotsoyokes, tla iki on walataske nochipa tikintokaske inchan iwan amo momachtiske. ¡namehuan nantatatin! ¿tlen nankitoa? ¿nanquimicelizque namopilwan? ¿nozo yaske de yipan tlamachtilkali? tlen tikneki tewan titemachtikes kokonentoton wepanwiske chichipawake. noihki onkwan on weyi yes momochko malakatetikpak ika kimatiske momachtiske, tlakwiloske iwan tlapowaske, noihki tlakwikwiloske itech amatl kikwitia kartonsilo. tlemach kwakwali tlamachtili kisaloske. ok tepitoton; tikneki tikinmiktitiske ke kamiseliske iwan tla namewan nantatatin amo namotekipachoa, tewan titemachtikes kosa totekipachoa impampa piltsitsintin kisaloske ke ika nemtske. ¡namehuan nantatatin nantlanankiliske ika coconentoton! itakka seki xoxoktik wan seki tiltik. in ipan axkan semilwitl viernes a xiiii dias del mes de disiembre de mil e kinientos e sesenta i sinko años i yewatsin in senka mawistililoni in mwi magnifiko señor doktor seinos oidor i presidente in onka weikan tekwiktlatoloya ototechkiwalmokawili in tewantin hustisia tikpia por su magestad in nikan siudad de mexiko tenochtitlan. iii kali xiwitl, 1313. itech nepantah tonal titechtawilia. . aw niman kim ilwi "notlatzítzinhuan e, oankihiyowike oankisiawke oki monekilti in tlakatl in tetsawitl in witsilopuchtli in o wel ankichiwke amotekiw aw nikan amixko amokpak nitlachie. in tlen inka ye otekitkeh ye miak oihtlacaqueh. ipan in ihkwak okonanke possesión san migwel tlaka, ipan metstli febrero; onkan xokoyoltepek onewtikak ik tlamelawa atsinko. noihki oyaya kwawtla kwakwawiske; okitetemaya kwawitl. onkwan on tla kiawtas agosto iwan septiembre yewan yokitepetlaliaya inkwaw. tlen kinekiske ika kiwixitiske in pantsin. iki in ik onemia tlatiwanime iwan siwatsitsintin santa marta. . intla ye itla tikpielia in itotonka in iyamanka in tloke nawake, ma mits nakastlachielti. san chimaltemo yewan tonatiw oyowaltemok. mexiko tisatl iwitl moyawatiwits ¡lpalnemoani!, tlalpan ahsi ye nikan. ma kana onkan tik elewi in teaxka in tetlatki. achtopa timits machitia. nikan ipan in in ikseppa yankwikan onkan kilpiliko in inxiwtlapowal wewetke mexika asteka teochichimeka onkan in akawaltsinko inawak san hwan del río. ik ontetl "nokonkajki para mitsilnamiki". in oyuh kintlamamakake in tlahtoke, niman ye kintlatlawtia in tsiwtlakawki, chokistlahtoltika kintlapalo in tlahtoke, no yewatl in siwatl in imekaw in tliltekatl; onkan kiximatke ka nel kintlakaskaltilia kintlakawapawilia, no senkamatika kintlapaloke. nawi tepiton xitomatl chikontochtli xiwitl ik walmotlali awitsotsi; ki ye kipantlas in teukali. amo nikneltoka in tonali kiawis. weyi in ahkopechtli iwan omochin ika kwali kwawitl. aw yewatl ipampa in axkan omotenew ipan semilwitl || 145 viernes mochi tlakatl mokaltsawk; in san wel imman ihkwak otlatenewke tlamatinime pewas inik tlakosawias inik tlaixkwichewas inik ixpoyawas tonatiw, mochintin mokaltsakke in españoles iwan in timasewalti. yuh mihtowa, oksenka ompa inn onmaxixaya in axkan onkan motokayotia kwitlatepek ahnoso kwitlatetelko, nawi legwa iwan tlako kitstika in tepetsintli chalchiwmomostli; yuh mihtowa, san ehekatikpak inik onwia inik onmaxixaya, ka noso mochintin nanawaltin tlasiwke tlaweliloke katka. tlen 24 tlanawatihkayotl. nochi tlakameh kipiah tlamakixtilistli tlen ika welis kineltokaseh teotlahtoli ika inyolo iwan ilhuichihuaseh, tlaneltokaseh noso ipan tlaixpamitl tlatlaliseh, san moneki amo teixpanoseh noso kiixpanoseh tlahtoli tlen ixnesi ipan tlahtol tlanawatili. in tlahtokan amo welis kichiwas tlahtol tlanawatilmeh tlen kiixtlalis noso kiixkotonas tlehtleya teotlaneltokilistli. in teotlanechikolismeh tlen ilwitl altepeyotl nochipa mochiwas ipan teocalmeh. tlen mochiwas san kemantika kiawak tlen teokalmeh inin nechikolis ipan tlatskis tlen itechpowi tlahtol tlanawatili. kwaltia ya nemi neka san magdalena oiskintin in in ipilwantsitsin in ompa kinmochiwili atenko in tlahtowani kwawitsatewktli, in okik ayemo walasia nikan chalchiwmomosko amakemekan. kenin mochiwa onka xiakan xtlapacho nchantli katka. nikitato. kwaltia aw masiwi i no muchi mawisnesin ipan tlayawalolistli, yese kamo inemakpan in onkan muchi nesiskia, yehika ipampa ka san mixkawiya in axkan molnamiki imikilistlaihiyowilistonewitsin ipassiontsin totekwiyo dios, ka tel yewantsitsin kimomachiltia in teopixke in okimoselilike, in iw mochiwas in iw tlayawaloske omotenewke totlasonantsin ipilwantsitsin, no wei in kiyawaloke san fransisko kisato, inik mokwepke inchan sanktiago. teipa seyok kiwaltitíanki. aw ahsik in makwililwitl in onkan kintlatenewili in inteow. tla anmewan anyezquiah. man newa nie. nawi xumali pitsochiyawisotl aw sano ikwak kinmiktike in ipan in xiwitl in tenanka atlawteka in omentin ipilwan in tlahtowani katka maktsin atlawtekatltewktli, in tlasopipiltin ka yewantin intech powia imaxka in tlahtokayotl, aw senka tlaweliloke katka, inik konmokawilike tlahtokayotl: in ikse itoka ixtliltsin, in ikome itoka || 95v ketsalpahintsin; san tsonwiloke inik mikke. walaiwake kinonotsako in tenoch, oselopa, akasitli, xiwkak, awexotl; kimilwiko “yn otlama tesakatetl chiauhtototl”. nota, nonan, kwali otlatoaya masewalkopa iwan kaxtilankopa. mah amo kimatoka, nikan ipan in i wel melawak inik onkan tisatepek in inawak tulyawalko xuchimilkatlali ipan in asiko inik onkan motlaliko in wewetke in kintokayotiaya in estlapiktin teotenanka teochichimeka kwixkoka temimilolka iwipaneka sakanka. kemah miak mochiwa nikawín. . in akin wal mokwepaya kitetsawmatia kitlahtlakulmatia kowikattaya. aw in onkan tekwalok onkan ihkak awakwawitl, itlan moketsako in tsiwtlakawki yaopol; ye hikak in ye wi amiske in tlahtoke in chichimeka in totolimpaneka in atonaltsin iwan in tliltekatsin, onkan ipan asito in awakwawtitlan moketstikak in onkan tekwalok. amitla onikihto. in motelchiwa ne tanikwakopa kahfentah oso ojtenoj, no mochiwa kwouhihtik. sirwela nikan ipan in in asiko in asteka in itsintla wei kwawitl, aw in yewantin in teomamake in itoka kwawkowatl iwan in itoka apanekatl iwan in itoka teskakowakatl iwan in itoka chimalma. iuki kitokaitiah por in kipiya iteyo. . aw in ik ome motlaliko tlatowani tlakateotl, aw no ipan motlalike in puchtekatlahtoke, yewantin in kosmatsin, tsompantsin. ye impan nes in ketsali ayamo wiak, iwan sakwan iwan xiwiti iwan chalchiwitl iwan yamanki tilmahtli, yamanki maxtlatl in nekentiloya san ok mochi ichtilmatsintli ikwipiltsintli ichkwetsintli. se kitamaximia mah mokawa panian, se kitapayantilia. aw iwan ye chikwasenpowalxiwitl ipan se xiwitl in ipan viii akatl xiwitl, 1487 años, in omomamal ikal diablo witsilopochtli, ipan in tlakatl awitsotsin. man nemikan .o ya nitemok o ya nitemok ika nitemok notsivak imiw ika nitemok notsivak imiw o ya nitemok o ya nitemok ika nitemok nomatlavakal ipampa askan otiwalake in ixpan hustisia tikneltiliko in itlanawatil omomikili otiknonotske in totatsin frai bartholome gonsales inik no yewatl inpan motlatoltis in omomikilike senka yewekaw in kawtika tlatoli amo mochiwa in itlanawatil omomikili. aw in imixpan omochiw inik omakoke pena andres kwawtlistak martin tospan martin kwawkowatl fransisko kwawtli pedro xochitl algwasil fransisko wetla inik amo satepan moxixikoske in omakoke pena. tanesi wan tiotak del nwevo mundo. tlen 103 tlanawatihkayotl. in tribunales tlen sentlanawatiloyan kisenkawaseh nochi kwalantli tlen monextis: i. tlen ika tlanawatilmeh noso tlachiwalismeh tlen tekiwa kiixpanos tlen intechpowi tlacameh; ii. tlen ika tlanawatilmeh noso tlachiwalmeh tlen tekiwa sentlanawatiloyan kikoyonis noso kilokotsos inseltlanawatilis tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh noso itekiwakayo tlen iyolo weyi altepetl, iwan iii. tlen ika tlanawatilmeh noso tlachiwalmeh tlen tekiwakemeh tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh noso iyolo weyi altepetl tlen kiixpanoseh itekiwakayo tekiwa tlen sentlanawatiloyan. xochiyowa, pero amo nikmati kemanian. mochiwa sakataj, wan amo mochipautani in kwoutsin yon kemeh in palma, por in imaxiuyo, sayoh yemanik. kipahpachotikak in nomawan xikomotelwili in xalalpan ma kikwitlaxwikan. xiii tochtli xiwitl, 1570 años. v kali xiwitl, 1601 años. inimekes kahchikes okipixke weyi tekitl ipampan okipiaya tlen tlaneltokaske piltsitsintin iwan tatatin moteixmachtiske kename tlaneltokani. opehke kahchikes kinchichiwa desde ipan metstli mayo, iwan ikwak oasik tonali kaxtoli iwan se septiembre nochtin kokone yokipiya ikahtoton. onkwan on amoka yas sin kahtli tlamachtilkalko. nochtlakatl onemawtiloya ipampan tlakamo tlaneltokos kintsatsakwaske tatatin se metstli noso miake tomin kixtlawatiwe ompan prefektura. ika on nochtlakatl omotekipacho kikahtis inpilwan. au i sawateka ompa yake in teopantla, okan ewake in tenayokan i sawatlan. ipampa axkan motlanawatilia in tlatoke in ixkich kali tlali semikak itech powis in katharina de san hwan española niman ayak sepa konixtokilis in akin tlatlakos ik tlatsakwiltilos in melawak hustisia kaltsakwalos karsel ompowalpa mekawitekos. —wan i hosen kani oya. welis san niman ikwak in ipan semilwitl in omito tlakpak in metstli in xiwitl in yewatsin alkalde migwel de los angeles iwan don alonso de san fransisko regidor walmowikake in nikan ipan tlaxilakali san hwan tlatilko posesion konmochiwiliko kimomosemaxkatiliko in inkalkowal lorenso diego inamik hwana petronila in inkonew fransiska iwan augustin de santiago inamik maria de los angeles. tlachichikilko in tiwi, in tinemi tlaltikpak. nipa sentlani, nipa sentlani, nipa sentlani intla nipa xiaw, intla nose nipa xiaw, umpa tonwetsis. san tlanepantla in wiloa, in nemoa. nikan onpewa oksentlamantli, nikan ikwiliwtok ontsintli in wewe mexika nemilistsintilispewkayotl: inik ompa walewake itokayokan astlan in mexika asteka teochichimeka, ka anepantla in ompa walewake, ka chikontlaxilakaltin chikonkalpoltin. ompa ya kwe nonantsin nontlaokolmiki, o ye nikan ye nokikwakan awel nikitotia in malakatl, awel nokontlasa in notsotsopas, noka timokekeloa, nokonetsin. ¿auh kennel? ¿noconchihuaz? a in ilwikatl itik ompa ye wits in yektli yan xochitl, yektli yan kwikatl in. kompoloa a in tele, kompoloa a in notlayokol. in tlakaso yewatl in chichimekatl teuktli in tekayewatsin ika xonawiakan. aw inik ka isel asiko in nikan tekwanipan amakemekan, iwan ye sentlamantin in ittawan in ipan asiko nikan, in iw omito tlakpak, in i mochtin walsenyahke tlahtowani oselotltewktli, in itoka kwawkes iwan hestekon. newatl namatlakwilo migwelxwares inin tlatokatlanawatili okikakke in moteilwia fransisko martin iwan in ipilwan in iw omotsontek in tlali mili aw okitoke ka nel titoilwiske ka ye umpa katki in tlakpak toneteilwil ka tiknankiliske. ¡xiya! itstó komo se xiwitl welis sempoali iwan nawi elotl in ye omahsik mah namechmaka ika namoahtapal. nochi motlanantikate kwatini, kwamekatl aw inik otitopakkanonotske netlasotlalistika ixkich techmomakilia hompowali honmakwili pesos aw ye tokonkwi tomatika ixpantsinko in hustisia ayokmo seppa tikixtokaske anoso titotlatolkwepaske ka nel toyolokakopa inik ye tiktomakilia in teopan sankto agustin teopixke. in tlakatl, in yoali, in ehekatl, otechtlamawsisoltito tiwalkiske oksehpa tiahke tek in werta plátano. tohkwawitl aw iwan ye sentsonxiwitl ipan chikwasenpowalxiwitl ipan matlaktlonnawi xiwitl in ipan xii akatl xiwitl, 1075 años, in onkan kisako chikomostok kinewayan in mexika asteka chichimeka wewetke; onkan chikoxiwtike, inik mitowa motenewa chikomostoka. aw sa niman ipan in || 132r in x tekpatl xiwitl in walmotlahtokatlatlali in kwawtsintewktli tlahtowani wixtoko, inin in kiwaltlahtokatlalike amo wel momati kampa tlali kampa altepetl ipan, inik niman owalnenenke. wanabanah yon amo moneneki. ye kwali ipan titlehcozqueh. —ne'wa yetiotlak onitlaxkalo. senpowali de disiembre 1558 años ikwak kimanili informasión i yewatsin lukas garsia hwes de residensia inik tlatolmelawke in testikos in ipanpa in ineteilwil in itoka maria tekwihchon chane sank sevastian i newan monamiki marina tlakoh isiwaw katka toltekatl sa no onkan chane sank sevastian itechpa in tlali in onpa atlisokan. mochipa akaltika i walwia ompa walewaya in astlan, inik niman onkan okiwalantikiske okiwalwikake inik okiwalwikatiake san wel yewatl in teyakanki in owalkwawtlahtotia tlamakaski witsilopochtli in okiwalnotstia diablo. tlatkiwa mahtlaktli ahnoso mahtlaktli ome almendra se kikwa in ixiuyo. nowian nemia in inxila in inkwetitlan, in sioatsitsinti. aw in tokichtin nowian nemi in imaxtlatiklan, iwan in inkamak. in no kwamekat. kiilwi ma walo. se mahmapikton yepasohtli imexkanixti in mononotske; aw in oyuh mononotske niman ik ye walewa in mexika in achkakawti in kinmiktiske in chalko tlahtoke. kwaltia para ya kimatis tiitstoke sentika". ye otlatsilin. in kihtosneki in kalmimiloli kaltempan ka. ximonochili in tekipano man kitemowi in tokimil. san tepitsin xinechmochili. nia nikintlaxtlawis in tekitkeh in kaloltilkalko. nochi yeka. axkan kwali tiquizazqueh. ¿quexquichton itlaxtlawil in kalmimiloli? aw in iteow i nawyotewktli motenewa ka san mochipa kimamatinemia; niman ye kihtowa in yewatl in kwawitsatsin in tlailotlaktewktli in chichimekatl: "ye onkan yesin, ye onkan ikasin i noteow i nawyotewktli". kwawpoyoxmoli aw in ontemiktike españoles, niman ik mokaltenke in kaltsawktikatka; kitlamike in etsalkwalistli in senpowaltlapowali, aw ipan tekwilwitontli in ye no achi walkikisa, aw ipan weitekwilwitl in yekene kichiwke in yaoyotl i mixnamikke in tenochka in i mochtin españolesme. tlachikili tlachikili tlachikili yawi. v tekpatl xiwitl, 1328. onkak makwil taman: istak, kostik, yawit, xokoyoltsin, tsikat. mosiwaikniwan mostla tochan yezqueh. a okichpili, notekuyo, titlatowani, t'axayacaton, inin nanakatl ahmo mopaka intla ok konetik, intla mopaka ahso itech poliwis tepitsin iahwiyayo; ika kuchilo kwal 1 i mopohpoa inik mokixtilia in tewtli; in iswatl mosiyawa iwan ma ixika, kwali mopaka in yepasohtli. inewan aw yewatl iknawi arsobispo mochiwtsinoko in lisensiado don alonso fernándes de bonila klérigo, inin achto fiskal moyetstikatka in ipan sankto offisio inkisisión, niman inkisidor mochiw in nikan mexiko, aw niman ompa onixketsaloka inik ompa obispo mochiwtsinoskia in yankwik in motenewa nwevo reino de galisia, aw satepan mowikak visitador mochiwtsinoto in ipan tlahtokaaltepetl pirú, aw ompa ipan moyetstikatka in itekitsin inik visita kimochiwilia, inik niman okimixkechilike inik arsobispo omochiwtsino mexiko. aw niman in yewatl hernan peres español oksepa onkan okito ka nel otlamiko in sepowalonmaktlaktli tonatiw ka ayak motlapalohoa in ma achi miek kitema in tomines aw nikitoa ma ye ixkich niktema napowali pesos. aw i witsiliwitl ayamo miki inik untlatitlanke; konilwia ken kitoa, kwix ok ipan asikiwi imasewalwa, ka ye witse in ok umakawke. yoan niktenewa ilamatsin silia hwana ikaltepotsko mani tlalmantli nikowili maria ichpuch nikmakak ei pesos inik motamachiwa tonatiw ikisaian itstok inik wiak chikonkwawitl aw inik patlawak nekok ixkich monamakas ma nel ipatiw ik mokwis ei pesos se peso makos in omotenew siliatsin aw in ome peso itech powis in naniman. 103. iwan momaktsinko mani in koyawak teskatl, in tomawak okopili, inik tiwalitstotika in atl ipan, in tepetl ipan, inik tiwalihtolo, tiwaltenewalo. inik titlatki, inik titlama;13 inik titlawika, inik titlaohtlatoktia, inik tinanti, inik tittati. omitsmoknelili in tlaltikpake, in dios; xokonchamawili, xokontimalwili in inanyotsin, in itayotsin, in itlatkiatsin, in itlamamayatsin, in itewkyotsin, in itlahtokayotsin, in itleyotsin, in imawissotsin. wel ik ximotetsilo, wel ik ximapana, wel ik ximochikawtsino, wel ik ximowapawtsino; wel ik ximochokili, wel ik xitlaokoya, wel ik ximoskali; wel ik xitlachia, ka owi, ka etik immopantsinko okimuchiwili totekwiyo. ma timihiyokawaltitsino, ma timoteputskawtsino, ma timixkwapewtsino, ma timoteputsalawtsino, ma timatoyawitsino, ma timotepexiwi, ma timososotlawtsino, ma timokwekwetlaxotsino. tlahko kilo poyoxxaltemetl ahnoso ieltapach iwan nan otiwalmowikak ahso yomitsmonankilili yehon ka sa neli intlakammo ammo niwalani okimotsahtsilili in ichpokatl tieochi ayokmo ixihsiwi ximewa kema omewalok iwan otetlahpalolok ken otlatwililok kwali tlasohkamati ma tikihtakan kinmach yotitlanankili okimotlahtlanili kema iwan kemman otimononots eh ayammo wehka melawak ammaka omitschiwalti ammaka m osenyolokakopa kema iah para takwaskeh nopilwan. —keski mektli durariwi kwalika inekwtli. 78. ma wel ipan ximapana, ximotetsilo immotlamatsowaltsin, immokiltsin, immonopaltsin. ma tixkwatlatsiw, ma titkputstlatsiw; ma mikampa tiktlas immotakatsin, immokakatsin immotopiltsin. aw ma tiksosotlaw immomatsin, immokxitsin, ma tiknenenek immitsin, immoyolotsin, immakoltsin, immokwitlapantsin. ¿intla yuh ximuchiwa, intla xikneneneki immitsin, moyolotsin, ach ken tihkas, ken tinemis in tetloktsinko, in tenawaktsinko? ¿auh ken ihkaske, ken nemiske in koskame, in ketsaltin? ¿auh ken ihkas ken nemis in kweye, in wipile? ka tetimalo, ka techamaw in tlakoyotl, in tekiyotl. onkak ome taman: chichiltik wan istak. yei sanahoria titechmaka para ni tlatoktli". mochiwa miak. aw inik onpa kiwalsenmatke inik owalweyapannenenke inik owalake in tonatiw ikalakianpa, yatiwitse weyanenentiwitse ya wekawtika, ya achi kexkichkawtika inik senka nentlamattiwitse, inik senka weka inik amo wel neltilistika in amo wel melawakatika inik nenemi weyapan. . aw ki wal ilwia "otiquihiyo otiksiaw xolotsé otikimikneli in monanwan in motawan: ah tikkwis ah tikkakkis in imihiyo in intlahtul. ma xi moceui. por favor, in ipan axkan domingo a xx de marso de 1594 años, ikwak yankwik monasterio de monhas motlali in teatinos kaltitlan, motokayoti itokayokan de nwestra señora enkarnasión; ikwak motlalitsinoke in siwapipiltin, ompa walmokixtike in de la komsepsión inik onpa mowetsiltito || 12 yankwik monasterio, inin ipilwantsitsinwan in totlasonantsin de la konseptión. kolanto i chikwasen tekpatl xiwitl antle mochiw. in ipan viernes a xxv de marso de 1594 años, in ipan iwilwitsin anusiasión sankta maría, ikwak walmowikake in monhastin in onkan sant hwan baptista de la penitensia in ipilwan sankta klara; chikweintin in ye no walmowikake, ik matlaktin omomen mochiwke in achto nawintin walake. mah kwaltsin matapani, kiski in xiii kali xiwitl. in kapitán ixpan tlamiktilok, yee i
