kwalan in estli kwawxikaltika kimakaya kapitá, yee ik kimikti in estli kimakaya kiwitek espadatika, yee ik xitinke in tenamike. aw inik tlamiko onkan kixowa palasio kapila ye ipan makwili tsili ipan tlako hora, inik kiwalmokixtilike inakayotsin omotenewtsino teoyotika tlahtowani don frai garsía gwerra visurrei in onkan monoltitoya; konmanilike achtopa yewantsitsin in audiensia real tlaka tlahtoke oidores in andas ik monoltitoya, kimonapalwike in tlakpak omotenew kapila ik kiwalmotemowilike tlatsintla inik onkan palasio kaltempa kimotekiliko ipan kwawtlapechtli motenewa túmulo, in san ik tlatlalili ipan kimosewiliske inakayotsin mikkatsintli. iii tochtli xiwitl, 1274. yoan niktenewa sempoaltetl omome xikalpechtotontin achi yaiankwik intech powis in noxwiwan hoana maximiliana yoan diego de kastañeda yoan in iteikaw balthasar. walkis tlaokoxtiwits, inik ahmo niman oneltik in inetitlanis. ipan in in onkan nawxiwtike mexika in tekpayokan. mixtlantsinko. iwan in sant hwan tiankistli no apachiw sentlakoltika, aw in oksentlakoli amo apachiw, ka kexkichton in mokaw yewatl ipan tiamikoya; sa mosenmatia onkan in tiamikoya, in ipampa moch apachiw in tiankistli sankto pólito. titlamo sesek kalaktok", kehni kiilwi. motepeyokpa mits wal itta motew. nawi ahwiyak klavo ¿quenin ancateh? in ipan axkan a x de febrero, ikwak asiko tlahtoli in ompa kastila in ipampa omomikili semanawak tlahtowani don philipe segundo rei nwestro señor; in ikwak machistiko nikan mexiko ye iw nawtetl metstli momikili, in ipan metstli ik xviii mani oktubre in ipan xiwitl de 1598 años in momikili ompa españa. ipanpa in axkan newatl nitlanawatil hustisia algwasil mayor fransisko ximenes no newatl niknotlachikawililia in audiensia inik nitlanawatil hustisia in ipaltsinko su magestad yuh niktlalia in akin sepa konkwis in tlali inik kikwilis in itoka maria tekwichon pena ipan niktlalia v pesos tomines inik tlaxtlawas itech powis in ikamara su magestad. xikwatlehko nopa ikwitlapa o xa kalihtik mokawak, kinankili, kilwi “ca newatl i nikopil, i nimoxeliwka, ka sano titewanti in titopopoloke tzonpanco”. in centzontlatoltozoh; kinnanankilia in koyoltototl. ayakachikawakatimani in nepapan tlasokwikani totome, onkan kiyektenewa in tlaltikpake, wel tetoskatemike. iwan toteotatsin chalma okimoskaltili tonantsin. iki in ke otechmokwepilili tonantsin. omowekawiti monemiti. ika on xiwitl iwan okse xiwitl otonyaya towentiske ixitlantsinko teotl. achto san iki otiake amotla otikwikake. ipan ome xiwitl otowetito ome kandelerotin iwan sirios, xochitl, ipampa otimotlasokamachililito ke otechmoskaltili tonantsin. ketsal awewetl, nakastekilit oso nakaswiyo newa onikamapo in tlen opanok ipan in owatsintika amatenonotsali. 94r ii kali xiwitl, 1429. ixkichin kimati noyolo inik onimakok huramento ye nikan nomatika niketsa krus. ante mi fransisko garsia eskrivano. nikintlahyelita in achichinqueh. ye neli kokok ye otimaliwiko, in motlok monawak, in ipal nemowa. x tekpatl xiwitl, 1476. aw niman otimoteilwike méxiko ipampa miyek techtekipachowa kelewiya aw niman otikixpamtilito yakwikam walmowikak sfeñohr wisorei dfon] lwis de welasko ka yewasi/n/ {en el margen iskierdo años= 1552= 8= tekpatl} omotlanawatili ompa méxiko in xiwit saj. kampa tehwa tipaxialoa, aw ipan viernes in ik 12 mani metstli otubre in san ya ipan xiwitl de 1492 ye ometsilini in ye tlatlalnesi tlawiskalpan in kinextike tlali, inik mochintin mopapakiltike inik senka moyolalike inik owasiko; ye ipan tlakatli inik kitlamelawaltike in akalyakatl in tlaltenko inik onkan owakalkiske in atenko itokayokan gwanahamí. au in matlaktli tekpatl ikwak olinke in chichimeka in tenayokan onoka. tlanki nopa nakatl pero nochi kinimak onkateh totomeh ika iniwits chichiltik, matlaltik iwan xoxoktik. in amo se kitoka. aw in onkan omotenew tepetikpak tonaliitlatlayan, ka imapan ye nepa iteputsko in kitokayotia chikonkiyawtepetl, in onkan onmokets tlahtowani atonaltsin chichimekatewktli inik onkan ontlamin, se legwa iwan tlako kitstika in tepetsintli chalchiwmomostli, ixkich on in kitokak imiw. . aw sa no yuhki inpan mitowaya in yaomikia kihtowaya "quitoca in tonatiw: ilwikak yauh. elito ya se weyi akwakwahtli in ma moyolo motoma, in ma ya moyolo akotinemi, tinechkokolia, tinechmikitlani. in nonoya ye icha, minopoliwi, ak aso ok ik noka xiwalchoka, noka xiwal iknotlamati, san ti nomiw, san ye niyaw, san ye niyaw ye icha. ¿ihuan tlen tlaixyeyekolistli omitis tkkimakak in tepahtiani? mah amo kokotoka in tixtsin mah amo ehekawilo, isato nopa wewentsi mah amo nechtatilikan inchayohkan wehweyi ehekame, ¿ye ya nonewas in tlaltikpak? lakipixke areglo sanisihkan sanweliwi yotlatemowi wan yewal mokwepa para ichan asta asikiw tichini pweblo inganinchan. kinmamakaya in kokoxke in ipan sesen tlaxilakali inik sant hwan iwan sankta maría, kiyomawiaya in regidoresme; doktorme ixketsaloke inpan in kimitaya kokoxke in tlein intech moneki in botikapatli in intech monekia inik patiloya. ihkatok in kwowit, witsa xiwit taki mas, wan witsa xiwit, taki menos. tekpanekah iwan kolwakah okimpewke mexikah in akike kichokilike inin impopololis. witsiliwitl iwan isiwapiltsin askalxochitl kinwikake, in okik tlalpiltin catcah, ixpan kokoxtli, itlahtokaw kolwakan. in no sesek. noyuhki otepanitlas neli itokatsin "achiyaoquizcayacanqui markos" yuhkin rafael sebastian gwilen visente, in akin omotlakatilitsinoka in onkan altepetikpak motenewa tampiko. wel owi momostla mosentlalis noso mopias in seselik tlakwaltin. ika nehon nikan namechtahtanilihtok favor. tlatsopeliloni. ixkich in monekis se kikwa itakka. an xwalakan. .in antlasolteteo in ti kwaton in ti kaxoch in ti tlawi in ti xapel. xi nech itstimamaniki yayawki tlasoli istak tlasoli xoxowki tlasoli . aw in yewantin wewetke in ik tenonotsaya amo kinenkixtiaya in intlatol: senka kitiasotlaya amo kitenamakaya in wewetke in ilamatke, poson in atl, amo yehekatl kiposonalti. iwkin momomolaka, iwkin xixittemomolaka. sebka weka in ya, inik makokets: aw in kali tsitsintla kasik, aw kapapachiw, xixitin in kali. yewatl in wei atl totlan mani nikan mexiko. aw in iw kittakkeh ka moch kaxtilan nepapan xochitl, iwan in kahmo imochiwyan in ikwak, wel senka kimawisohkeh iwan in kenin wel senka seltik, inik kweponki, inik awiayak, inik mawistik. aw kelewihkeh inik keskitetl conanazqueh, quiquixtilizqueh, aw yexpa mochiwkeh inik motlapalohkeh concuizquiah; niman awel mochiuhqueh, yehika in ikwak quitzitzquiah, ayokmo wel xóchitl in quittayah, iwkin ma tlahkwiloli, nose tlamachtli, nose tlatsontli in itech kittayah tilmahtli. iuki kitokaitiah por in ixiuyo, pané in tomat ixiuyo wan taki mahyá tomatsitsin. mah amo nechkwilikan, para kaxiyati, moaxka wala kwaltia tla axtihneki ma nimitswikas na nimitsmahkawas viii kali xiwitl, 993 años. inin i mopoloke tenochka sa monetekwike i momimiktike. itlanahnamik: nima ye i kiwaltoma tenochtitlan tlatoke; in okiwaltonke ye wi in askapotsalko. matlaktlomei akatl atle mochiw. tlenon koma nokokoaya satepa nečanako' tiaske tiwehxiwtlakwatiwe chan padrino. melawak aik okitak inin tlakatl. iyakatekutli ikwik in siwamiston ipan ahkopechtli ka. q.n. in ik motokaya sentli in mochiwaia teuntilpan ichika- vastika in ik tlatatakaya in ik tokaya. nehin achiwanime. noha kiihto nopa isiwa iwan moilwi. ma xik mitalwiakan in ken konekis in amoyolotsin ma kakoki ma kwiwaloki ma analoki in amotenanyotsin in amotetayotzin. nikan ipan in kitetsonmanke in ikal katka in diablo witsilopochtli, koskakwawtenanka tlaolan tlaka in inka momamal. ka ye iskich ik nemechonnotlatlawtilia in tewatsin tinotekwiotsin iwan tewatsin tinokichtiwatsin omochiw amatl axkan yeiwitia metstli de hulio de 1567 años. newatl nimitsnotlasotilia. doña maria de tisosikatsin. weyi moketsa, kachi wehkapantik ke se kali. kwaltia ixochiyo se kiteki kwalkan wan se kiehkoltia se kimana wan se kipoyelia wan se kikwa ya ika taxkal. nikawín amo semi onkak, solo komo kajfentaj. kampa mochiwa tel onkak. aw in ipan sábado in ikchikomilwitl yewantsitsin in teopixke fransiskos deskalsos in kimolwichiwililito sankta, no se temachti. niman ik walake, san kineki toyolo yaomikistli. aw in imostlayok lunes in ipan ilwitsin katka sant fransisko, a 4 de oktubre, ikwak nes in kwawtli kichiwke tlakwiloke, tenochtli kichiwke ikpak ikaka kwawtli, aw in totatsin san fransisko ipan mewiltitika, yuhkinma ikavalo ipan moyetstika; itwalko krus itsintla in kiketske, senka mawisolok, iwan ipan mewiltitika in sant fransisko, wel ipan tlahto frai herónimo de sárate temachtiani. 22. intla satepan timakos in qucxquitzin motechmonekis, ahmo tiktlahuklkawas. ahnoso intla ahtle wel timakos, ahmo ye timoxikos, ahmo ye titetlayelittas, ahmo ye timokniwkawas. aso yuhki monekiltia in totekwiyo, aso ye mitstlamahsewaltia. aw intla ye ximoxiko, intla ye xichikolahto, ka ahmo wel ye nesis in titlasopiltsin dios. aso ok achitsin immolwil yeskia, immitsmomakiliskia, ka ye tikmoyolihtlakalwis, ye ahtle tonkisas. ait keyéh iuki kitokaytiaj. ome litro atl ano de 167. "para na niwala nopa achto primero kiwik, kiwika monamaka kwesalan. onkan pewtika in in wewetke in innetlapololtilis, inik itik owalyetia in okiwalmamatiake. ipan in in kikaw in itlahtokayo in ilankweitl atlawtekatltewktli, in itech katka in tlahtokayotl in ompa atenko kaxtoli omei xiwitl; aw yewatl kimixiptlati kikawili in itlahtokayo in ipiltsin in teomeka in itoka itskwawtsin telpochtli, san ya ipan in chikwasen tochtli xiwitl in kikwik in itlahtokayo in ompa atenko. xoxowkikalwahsa atoli asito in kwawtemala atenkotokatiwi. axkan ipan hweves ik vi dias del mes de enero de 1581 años in axan nikitotika in ika itokatsin in tepiltsin in espiritu santo makimatikan in ixkichtin in kitaske in notestamento ka in nehoatl notoka elena angelina nikan nochan sant martin notlaxilakaltiwi ateskapan nichiwa in notestamento. ii akatl xiwitl, 1351. in amo kwali okis. aw in iskich in omotenew in kali in tlali in chinamitl onka mani in ipan tlaxilakali tlachkwak imixpan testigosme in otitlanamakake pedro tlakokowa, andres masatl, migwel ekawewe, tomas nekotl, pedro kowatl, martin chichimekatl, pedro yaotl, sensilia tekwichon, ana tiakapan, hwan antonio, angelina xoko, isabel mosel, martin sipak, martin iknoxochitl, mathalenan mosel xinechisotlaka!", kinihki kinilwihki. aw in tlali ye mako martin tenoch iwan balthazar'yhuan isabel hwana iwan in yawi ana iwan imonan hwana tiakapan yewantini ye mako tlali ikisemaxka mochiwa. ¿tlen okimomikilti? axkan viernes ik 1 mani metstli hulio de 1611 años, ye teotlak makwili tsilini, ihkwak nikan siudad mexiko san fransisko maxitiko ik mokalakiko in padre frai isidro iwan fransisko faustino ketsalmasatsin inin donado teopixke san fransisko; umpa owalmowikake in motenewa yankwik mexiko, san kinmaniliko oksekintin teopixke inik owalmowikake. in totonik. ¿zan on in nemia noyolo? ikwak ipan in motlalike alkaldesme nikan mexiko, makwiltin omochiwke martín xwáres koskakwaw fiskaltia sant hwan ichan, migwel sánches weton regidortia sant hwan ichan, don bartholomé fransisko xochiken ikoppa alkaldetik sant pablo ichan, don migwel sánches ik vipa alkaldetik atsakwalko ichan, gabriel xwáres ikoppa alkaldetik sankta maría ichan. sekin kikwah taaman wan sekin kikwah akoloj. . iskikan in in nikan wal itstoka ki sem ihtowaya in kampa ye wilowas in kampa yeh kalakowas. amo nik mati tlen ipan omochin. ye nosepa san unpa kis in unpa wala tetskoko, ye no umotekato tlalistakapa; ye no mike in tlatilulka inik ye no umotekato tetskoko. ninahmo erensia n'a:li tía yotokowihke. imixpan testigos: pedro de santa krus, fransisko hernandes, hoseph naweka, gregorio hwares, hwan de la krus iwan imixpan señora hines wilan, maria sesilia iwan eskribano matheo xwares. ipan metstli noviembre xxi mani 1576 años. pasó ante mi matheo xwares eskrivano. kenin mochiwa aw no sekintin pepenaloke in tokichtin yehoantin in chikawake, in inyoloko okeichtin iwan in kin telpupuchtotonti in qujntitlanizque, in intiltanwan yeske, in motenewa intlamakaskawan. newa nikpia mahtlaktli sentavo. intla aka motetsawia kana kantewa in yehyekatl iwan ye yomixmahsik moneki ihkwak ahsis ichan intla onkate konearne ika arnmitia impan panos ipampa kemmanian miki moneki kimatokas se chichi anoso okse yolkatl inik impan kikawas kitsikos in ammo kwali in yehyekatlnotahtsin itlalnamikilistsin vi kali xiwitl, 29. se tekpatl atle mochiw. in tlanamanik wel owi. inin amoxtli ka onokowi, wel kwakwaltsin. in tlamatinini tlawili okutl, tomawak, okutl apokyo. teskatl koyawak, teskatl nekuk xapo. tlile, tlapale, amuxwa, amoxe. ¿ln kwix itla xochitl san ni wal kalakia in tsitsikilxochitl, mosokilxochitl? ¿cuix yuhki, kwix nayowi nonotolinia in antokniwan? kenin mok hiwa aw in ixkich otli in wewei otli mochi apachiw; kokoton in tepeyakak in kowatlayawkan, in sant migwel otli in tlakopan, askapotsalko, wel nowian apachiw. in nikan ik mits apana ik mits kimiloa ka o yuh yahke in motechiwkawan ka inteoaw in tlachinol okimattiake; onkán wal motlnaltia in ilo. viii kali xiwitl, 1253. ma eli para titlakwase. ihkwak achto popokak in tepetl in axkan motokayotia popokatepetl, san xalikewak katka. wan no kikwih yon kuoujtikpakkuesalimej, ika kiwiwihkomah in ininkuouj para ompa tehkoh ya. o anki nowian ye mochan ipalnemowa. xochipetlatl ye onoka xochitika on tsawtika onkan mitstlatlawtia in tepilwan. nikan namechaxkatiliti nehin namotahtoltsin aw san ye ipan in omotenew in vii tochtli xiwitl, 1174 años, in onkan motlahtokatlali in itstepek in tlakatl in wewetewktli chichimekatewktli mochiw; inin, ye omito, ipiltsin in tlahtowani hekatsin chichimekatewktli. ikonxiwitl konpewalti in tlahtokati in tlakatl wewetewktli in chichimekatewktli. mochiwa kaltsintan wan kuoujtaj, kahfentah oso milaj. "nama axkana tiyas tinopeón. aw wel tlasenkawalok in iglesia mayor, wel wei papakilistli mochiw in ikwak makok teoyotika tlatokayotl, senyowal in papakowak, kwahookotl in tlatlak in ikpak teokali; iwan mawiltike in españolesme iwan in kavildo, in deán, arsediano, provisor, kanonigostin, in ixkichtin klérigos. wan yeyawe nikintitlani tech in kampo mayakan tekititi'. in tloke, naoake, yukatan ye inon mantli kampa miak henekén mochiwa. wan kiilwi kipixfok se iwelti. se kiteki wan se kimana mah oksi kwali wan iwan se kikwa emol. tlahko kilo selik awax xochiyowa itech enero, febrero, marso wan abril. . aw in ikwak nenmanyan in amo ilwitl san no yewatl in iksotilmahtli xixipetstli in kimulpiliaya san kinamiktiwia in netlalpilil. in amo se kitoka, mochiwa saj. i tekpatl xiwitl, 1428. ¿titemoyequitilia inin tlakatsintli? iskatki yoan niktenewa in hoan bautista ikiawak hotenawatika ikaltepotsko mani nowewetlal inik motamachiwa tonatiw ikalakiampa itstok inik wiak makwilkwawitl aw inik patlawak nawkwawitl itech powis in kaltepotsetika in omotenew hoan bautista. kwalika, nokonen, amoxikilkawa tlen okachi kwali, in tlayili. ¿tlen tikonisneki? ¿tlapozon noso kafen ika chichiwalatl? kwalika. mach timitsontlasohkamatilis xinech moyekanili; tewatsin timoyek ixmachilia in weyaltepetl. wan in dos reales non i toka beintisinko sentabos. in kwowit, kemeh limahkwowit, tepitsin tomawak imetskwouyo, imahtsakal pihpitsawak wan mosowa. in chikome kali antle mochiw. iwan in nowian ipan xolal kakalak in atl; aw in kampa wekapanixtok tlalpantli, sa iyoka mokakaw i nowian. amo kwaltia para pahti, pero kwaltia se kikwa in iteyo. ¿catlehua motlalnam? españa notlalnan. iswatl ye kin oyuh nepa onpowalonmatlaktli xiwitl motlakatilitsino i neli dios itlasopiltsin hesuchristo semanawak temakixtiani, in ihkwak in ipan in omotenew in intlapowal wewetke in se tochtli xiwitl, in ipan in akaltika in owalake in wewetke chichimeka in motenewa teochichimeka in weyapan ilwikaapan, owalake owalotlahtokake in kampa inchan in kampa tlali ipan walewake in owalanelotiake, onkan atenkisako onmotlaliko in itokayokan astlan. wel neli tokonihtoskeh in ahmo kemman omolkaw in tlahkwilolos nawalahtolkopa in ikwikaamoxtsin in okimohkwilwi in temachtikatsintli fidensio vilanweva tlen okimohkwilwi yeseaik okimopantlaxili yewatsin in karlos lopes tlen okimopantlaxili in temachtikatsintli fernando horkasitas in okimononochili yewatsin lus himenes in omotlakatilihkeh toaltepepan iwan yewatsin pedro barra valenswela oksehkan ipan totlalnan masiwi san ika tenewalos san seki tokaitlmochi inin kiteihtitia in mochipa tlahkwilolok nawalahtolkopa inik motlalis ipan amatl kenin tikihtah in tonemilis ahmo kemman otikkahkawkeh in ipan tomomostlatekiw iwan intla inon amatlaik ahnoso san kemmanian okihtak in tlawili inon ipampa ahmo kemman omotomintlakechiloti inik yuh mochiwaskiani ta nimitstemas pampa nikita ta tlawel wan in lá nextlamotla non xihpolon esperansas akmo tinechahsis akmo tikisas de nikan pero in lá akmo entonses nixixikoa nopapan wan techuluske tiaske asta kanin mochan. oksepa tikiasato’ xanisio. onkán motlatlia akuntli mopaka ka totonki atl ahmo sa'on ohkion. iskikan in itepewal: xikipilko, tolokan, tsinakantepeke, tlakontepeke, kalimaya, teotenako, tenatsinko, xochiyakan, xalatlauko, kwawpanowayan, okoyakak, tepeyakak, tekalko, kweskomatliyakak, matlatlan, ostontikpak, tlaolan, poskautlan, tototlan, kwetlaxtla, kwesalostok, mixtlan, tetsapotitlan iwa koyowankan, tochpan, kwextekantepekek, oksetepetl, oksentepetl. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. aw inik ye neli nikan kimotlalilia itokatsin yoan ifirmatsin don gaspar de mendosa soi i testigo garsia de avalos nixpan omuchiw fransisko milan eskribano. in mochintin tlaxilakaleke kitoke ka toyolokakopa totlanekilistika inik nikan kinamakas atl in hoseph iwan ka otikmakake in tlali in chinamitl inik onkan motlalis yuh opachiw in toyolo in tewantin hustisia tikpia. nikan ipan in melawak in poliwke xikipilko tlaka; onkan kimetswitekke in tlahtowani axayakatsin, senka ikimawistlali in altepetl xikipilko. aw inik otlanankili in testigo okito nikmelawa in notlatol in ipan tlali in onkan mani kowatlan in itlal katka in akamapichtsin in ixkich inik mani nikmati onkan tlantika in temaskaltontli ikak patlawak senpowalmatl ipan chikwematl aw inik weyak honpowalmatl ipan chikwematl. aw in ixkichika in inik tlayowatiwetska wel ixkichika sa wel momattikatka in tonatiw san wel tlanaliwtoka, in ixkichika omotenew ik kiyawaliwkatlalkawika mixtli, san wel onkan ahsitikatka in onkan ipan ik pew ahsitoya mixtli, || 149 inik otlayowaka inik okwalok tonatiw; san niman aoktle ipan wala, aoktle ipan okis. iwan in oksekintin tliltike ye okimomamakaka in ixkich nikan altepetl in onkan otlahtokatiskia, inik sekintin dukesme iwan sekintin markesesme iwan sekintin kondesme omochiwka; in iw momatka, ok yewantin otechmomasewaltiskia in nikan titlaka timasewaltin otikintlayekoltiskia. inin onkan momikilike in atenko in satepan; aw in oknawintin omotenewke niman yahke, ye otlika in momikilito in okomentin: in hekaxoktli iwan in wewe ixkotsin. aw ipan kaxtolilwitl hunio de 1592 años, in missa ipantsinko mito in iglesia mayor, motlali monomento; aw inik chikweteokali nikan moyetstikate teopixke sesentetl missa mayor ipan kimitalwike. aw in anoso ok miloch monekwepal tikchiwakiw ka ayak on tlamati. se kitoka iteyo wan iksá ikwouyo. aw intla seme okimasike in tlatlaaltiltin in onkan witskalko onkan motsontekia in imitoloka in keski ipatiw tlakotli. kwoutahxokoyolin ¿tlen opanok? amitla opanok. itlanahnamik: se tonali nikinmolwili notahtsitsiwannanmomachitiske ye nikneki ninosiwawtis san niman intechtsinko ones onikinmisawili innewantsitsin omihtilwihkeh kenin px yehon tlen nanmokakitia ye nikneki ninosetilis melawak titlanelihtoa kema yehon tlen nanmihtilwia iwan tla ammo nannechmotlamakawililia inixmantas amo xochiyowa. ka ye kin wel yewantin achtopa yuh kitokamakako inin tepetl in tlakatl atonaltsin chichimekatewktli iwan in tliltekatsin chichimekayaotekiwa. kwaltia ompa tahciah, kwali, tenohnotstika techceliayah; toncalaquiah; miek siwatsitsintin ye tetlamacatayah; tlakwaltlapechpan ika yankwik, semistak mantel, mochi pepetlakaya. satepan ye techtlamacayah, wehyi in atoli techmacayah, kemmanian ihtik in ayatl, ahnoso ihtik in topoxak tikwalwikayah tamali in ayokmo oticcuahqueh, in senka ye otipachiuhqueh. newan timali, a niktopalos tlalamanik kwawtiwaya oselotiwaya; o a, niksentlamitias chichimecayotl’. aw niman yehoatl kinextiaya in akakwauhitl: aso makwiltsontli aso matlak tsontli. xiii tochtli xiwitl, 1258. ninemis tlan axinimayanah mehor meltika". xa itech hospital, ¿quen in nemowa in tenawak? mochiwa kwoutahpa wan no kampa achiawit. aw iwan in ihkwak in in onkan kalakiko kulwakan in mexika, ye oiw nepa matlakpowalxiwitl ipan nawpowali ipan nawxiwitl opoliw i wei altepetl tulam; kimoxixinili in iseltsin totekwiyo hesuchristo ipanpa in inweitlatlakol, aw yehika ipampa matlaktlonse xiwitl || 67r in inpan opopokak se sitlali in ilwikatitech. in ipan axka semilwitl a dies dias del mes de otubre de mil e kinientos e ochenta i sinko años ixpantsinko in señor ones in melchior de parada español itlatoltika konmononochili yuh konitowa ka onimakok in tlali iwan ka omochiw remate ipanpa niknotlatlawtilia in tlatokayotl ma nimako posesion inik nisemaxkatilos in kali omotenew. ipam inin xiwitl sitlalin opopokak. texokomekat aw i sa ye no onkan omotenew hotenko mani wewekali in kimakaxtia tenochtitlan teskatsonko chaneke itoka diego hernandes yoan hoana hernandes inkaltetsonko mani nowewetlal inik motamachiwa kwawtitlanpa itstok inik wiak chikwasen kwawitl aw inik patlaoak nawkwawitl kwapitsawatok itech powis ines teakapan i sa ye no ie kaltepotsetika. ¿in tlenon kwali mopantsinko nikchiwas? wan in lá techkobrarwiske tomin motlaxtlawa. kwaltia inik ontlamantli nikitowa in newatl ni hwana mosel ok no sentetl kaltsintli niknopielia nikan tiankistenko mani ontekistimani tonatiw ikisayanpa itstikak inin wel naxka notlatki aw ka san nokalkowal yewatsin totatsin frai geronimo de sarate nechmonamakiltili nikten matlakpowali omome pesos. senka yokuxka in yatiake, konsiwatlani in itatsin ompa in tsakwaltitlan tenanko, in konitlani ichpoch in kwawitsatsin tlahtowani itoka matlaltsin; inik onkan kimontlalike in sitepek in amakeme inakastlan, amo wekawake in onkan, ik niman kimontemowike in ompa tekwalok. i witsiliwisi tepankiski, in epkoasi yoan in inta akolnawakasi, imeixti mike tetekoke ustopolko in koyoaka intechpa mexika; inik kintlasotlatiw ipanpa kwalanke tepaneka. semi nochi miktlanko katlakpak amérika inglestlahtowa axkan sábado in ik 30 mani metstli noviembre de 1613 años, ihkwak ipan ilwitsin san andrés apóstol, in onkan teopan san fransisko ik omotemachtili in padre frai bwenaventura de paredes gwardián nikan mexiko, okinmomachistili in españoles inik ompa españa owala welitilistli lisensia in ipampa in akike namikeke kineki moyolewaske vesinos mexiko, wel makoske in hábito in onkan teopan san fransisko kikwikiwi ipan san inchanchan ik kimotlayekoltiliske in totekwiyo dios, in iw tlamani umpa españa. —yeté pinawti yekipian nimo. nikan ipan in in momikili in tlakatl atonaltsin chichimekatewktli tlahtowani amakemekan, in tlahtokat yepowalxiwitl ipan chikwasen xiwitl; aw sa oxiwitl in kittake in panowayan tlaka. tlakatle totekoe, ma ok yewatl xikmottili, in kwawik onok, in tlali ixko ka, in aya kimomachitia motolinia in iknotlakatl, in nentlakatl, in ahawia, in awelamati aw in aik totonia, in aik yamania aw in aik welamati, in iyomyo, in inakayo in san sen tôtonehuatinemi, in sa sen chichichinakatinemi in iyolo aso kana tikmonekiltis, in kwawtli in oselotl: aso ompa yas in tonatiw ichan: aso kitokas in kwawtlewanitl, in kwikwiliwik, in tiakaw: aso teatlitis, tetlamakas, in topan in miktlan, in ilwikak. nanakat saj. senka chikawak nekokolok, manka kokolistli. nechtitlani ma nikintlapopowi in nolechonwan. aw i keskiyok in ye no yaw in amis in tliltekatsin chichimekayaotekiwa ye no ipan asito, san ye onkan ihkak in tepantli ikpak. ma kimatikan in ixkichtin kittaske inin amatl in kenin newatl anan hustina nichane in ipan altepetl siudad mexiko notlaxilkaltian sankt ipalito teokaltitlan ika in nowelitilis in nosiyelis iwan notlawelmachilis inik wel nikchiwa in eskritura in ixkich onkan tenewtika. moyoloiwiyaya ni tenantsi ya kitlanis iixwi. tehwan tiamicmiquih, tak sesek, tatalihtik in onkak. entons okitemo ipapan wan onkán okihtila tropa para ma kitemoskekan. in ik vi ipiltsi epkoatsi. ayi weyi wan no se metstli, ome meststli, aw in omotenew tepetsintli onkan ikpak oipan asiko, onkan okitstasiko mani atl onkan mextikatka onkan kimochiwili in totekwiyo dios. aw yewatl mexikatl tenochka ayak kinos, ka se ixakal ompa mosewia; aw ye ontlachie, wel walkakisti teponastli iwan i kwikatl, ontlachie ketsali yuhki xokiwtiw. tla achiyok kinekih tekitise wan itstoke unidos inik matlaktli onnawi ludovikotsin, ompa galitlalpan, itto yuhkin ineixkwitil weweintin tlahtoke insenweliyo. yewatl, kilmach, kilwiaya "letat cest moi", in tlein kihtosneki "ca newatl in nitlahtocayotl'. kani mokawak. "na noseltik". xikchiwa kwaltsin yahki inana tlachikwenito tlahko xonakatl aw in ipan in semilwitl inik onyowako, in ipan orasión mochiw, in ye tlapowaya, in onkan palasio tlapantikpak in ichan visurrei iwan in ibentanas nowian kitlatlatike sepo kandelas; aso wel ontsontli in amatlekomitl kitekake, in kitetekpanke atenantitech in tekpan tlapantikpak iwan i nowian onkan omotenew bentanas, in onkan tlatlatlaya sepo kandelas. aw in satepan okno ontlamantin in onkan in tepan owasiko in atentlipa, yewantin in amakemeke iwan tlakochkalka in axkan ye motenewa tlalmanalka, inik no okimotokayotike chalka, in iw niman tlatsintla ye onnesitiw. teipa ya kiihtohki padre selestial: in kemah semi monamaka, ta welik in xiutsin. aw in nanawatsin in iakxoyaw mochiw san sakatl xoxowki, akaxoxowki, eein tlalpili, tlakwitlalpili, nepan chikunawi ye muchi; aw in isakatapayol, san yeh in okosakatlaw in iwits, san ye no yeh imewitstli aw in ik keswiaya wel yeh in iesso, aw in ikopal, san yeh in inanawaw konkokolehuya. kito wel xikittakan in kwaxochtli in kenin kimomakaske moyoteka aw ka nikan pewa inik netlalmakok onkan pewa techichikilko iskawitlawkkxitiloyan tonatiw ikisayanpawik konpewaltia. ipan etsontli onkaxtoli omeppoali xiwitl, wei iteokaltsin san basilio chiwalo moskotitlan. inikwouyo nochi iuki kipiyah kolor kafé, tepitsin achi makostik, mapisiltik wan imaxiuyoh kahkakaltik. aw ixkich hi in topan mochiw. in tikitake, i tikmawisoke. techokti i tetlayokolti inik titlaihiowike. in ik vii chikome siwatsintli itoka wakaltsintli, yokichwi mochiw tenochtitla tlatoani iskoatsi; mopilwatike kinchiwke tisawatsi, ikome tesosomoktsi; in tisawatsi toltitla tlatowani mochiwato, in tesosomoktsi tokwiltekatl yaotekiwa yewatl inta in tlatoke in otlatokatke tenochtitla. wan ichokilo no kwaltia para tempalan : se kikesteki in kwowit wan ika se ichkatsin oso tilmah se kipaltia in ichokilo wan se moohsa ya kampa se tempalani. para mah mochiwa totatoktsin, onia. wel iskikampa sesen krus manka kiwalwikake, iwan sesen estandarte ahnoso vanderra in iskiipan kofradías mopia; wel iskikan wala, aw yewantin tlayakak mantiake in omotenewke mexika inik onkan kixowak tekpan palasio. kwaltia ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. yon kitokah itech masetas, motaktsontalia in ixiuyo in se kitoka. tiwalkiske a las ocho umpa michoakan tiwalahke san xosé ompa ihtek in xawesitos. in ipan in xiwitl onkan onok in kwawitsatsin in texkalko omemasak in ikpak amakeme, san walyatinemi in tsakwaltitlan tenanko in walmoxtlawa. kiihtowayaya para wahkahkí tamo puro tlen ni maski sahchiton in lá akmo timotlaxikalwia. ompa asito wan okihto nikan nochan ixo nikanka mopapan nin rei ino papan rei. in okachi tlatkiwa kimoyawa xochitl,on awia kwikatl. aw in iweltiw xiwkoyolmakistli walitlanok kecholak, walsiwatla kwetspaltsi kwawtepek, kiwalsiwatlani in ipilsi matlakali. aw in ik oppa tenotsaya ikwak in on tlaixnestia san no yuh mochiwaya in omito. ik niman walmokets in tsiutlakawki kinwalnamik, no yewatl in siwatl waltenamik; aw kinwalnankili, kihto in tsiwtlakawki "ohuanquimihiyohuiltique owamaxitiko, nopilwané; in tlein ankimochiwiliske ma xikmochiwilikan! kwix tomapatlaske amowikpatsinko?; kwix ken tikitoske?. aw ka iska tamechontokakiltilia; ka ye ik tonkate, in ompa tonyaske in tikimontixpantitsinoske in totewkyowan in totlahtokayowan. aw inik neli otikinmakako posesion tikneltilia nikan tiktlalia totoka iwan tofirmas fecho en mexiko a xii dias del mes de abril 1584 años pablo garsia alkalde migwel sanches don antonio de mentosa. pasó ante mí diego hernandes eskribano. aw in yewantin omotenewke doktoresme wel yewantin itlan omantiake okitokatiake in omotenew mikkatsintli, aw sa motlatokiltitia sa wel kimotsakwiltitia in omotenewtsin senka mawistililoni padre maestro frai diego de kontreras teopixki sant augustín, yehika ka ye wekaw achto ye maestro inik nikan mexiko. iuki kitokaitiah por in kwaltsin nanakatsin, yemanik wan mahyá pohposoktik. kitlachilito inana. in ipan abril de 1594 años, in oiw onkis ineskalilitsin totekwiyo dios in paskwa resurretión, ikwak mikwanitsinoke in teopixke in istak ábito kimakitsinowa ipilwantsitsinwan in totlasonantsin sankta maría de las mersedes redemptió de kaptivos, in teopixke kinmotokayotilia mersenadios; ompa motlalitsinoto in ipan tlaxilakali tomatla ikiawak in tsawki español itoka lukas de tweñas. in newatl eskribano in onikak itlatol nikneltilia nikan niktlalia nofirma. kristovalse sank matheo eskribano. chapoltepek kinamiktito in ikochetsin visurrei in wel ye in yaxkatsin inik mokixtia ohtlipan; yewatl in kimotitlanilili in ihtik walmotlalike inewan se teopixki deskalso, in ompa kiwalwikake habón kinwalnawatlahtalwitia, iwan se oidor in kinnamikito chapoltepek, inik onkan || 136 ik kisako walake habonti. ye wikalo i mexika, ye unka chapoltepetl ikatka iyao oaniaiye; auk nelo kitoa mexikatl: ‘aya! kan inelwayo ilwikatl, kan ontlatoa ipalnemowani uixaueyé?’. wan ximotsetselokih ne kampa tomila, amo niktlasohtla; amo kwali. iii akatl xiwitl, 1287. aw in ipan lunes ikomilwitl yewantsitsin in teopixke dominigos okimochiwililito missa sankta iwan se temachti. in taol, no owat, ta owasín kipiya. atotonilko kikawke ipan yei akatl xiwitl iwan omotlalike apasko ipan nawi tekpatl xiwitl. ome xumali olipahchiyawisotl yei litro atl teteskawiiani, teyolkwitiani, netisiwiiloni, neixkwitiloni. aw ik onkan kimomekatito in tliltekatsin in siwatl in inweltiw tekwanipan tlaka, in kiwalwikak tsiwtlakawki yaopol; kotsti, in ihtik motlali siwatl in piltontli ipiltsin in tliltekatsin, in iachkawtsin katka in atonaltsin. lá ahtle semiya mokoa wan lá akakimati kikomponeros san kikomponeroa itech in ichan kichiwa nekwtli para semiya. aw in axkan nikitowa nikkawa in nokal ika in posesion nimitskawilia in tla itla onkan tikchiwas ka momak nikkawa in ti lwis savalos iwan amonoma ankikwiske in posesion hustisia amechmakas inik wel ankimaxkatiske in tewatl iwan monamik amopilwan wel melawakayotika in namechnamakiltia. wan mochiwa itech mayo, hunio. in ihkwak in ye iw exiwitl tlahtokati in ithatsin totepew in kulwakan in weimak tlahtokapili. amo nikmati kemanian xochiyowa. in oasike tlatsala unka mokekeske i mexika, unkan mik in tlotepetl yoan iweltiw witsilmoyawal. se kikwa, se kikixtilia in iewayo wan se kipipina. kwaltia mokweso inana ewatl wel kikets in tenochtitla witsilopochtli; e iw kaxtoli xiwitl tlatokati in mosetokwike mexika, kwawtika anotiake in ipa sen tochtli xiwitl. ¿auh ken onos in masewali? awel —pus non kwak nokokoaya nepa niaya notekas. xinechinkwidarowili. entonses ompa okwikak itech se kweba wan akmo ixka okisako. -nonopilhuantzitzin, ¿campa namechnowikilis? aw in ipan in xiwitl senka ye choka in maxtlaton; niman ik ya in tlachko, san moyowalpolo, kinwikak in teyolokwanime. seki xiwitl mokwa yuhkin momaka mila; sekih inin yewatl in xokoyoli iwan silantrilo, inin senka iwkatik iahwwiyayalis in silantro, in ahmo momati in inawatlahtoltoka. miek tlakah in yawih tekitiskeh mila ahnoso kwawtla san kiwika tlaxkali, iwan ihkwak ye tlakwalispan, kinechikoa xokoyoli iwan kitlalia ipan tlaxkali; intla kiwika limon kitlalilia seki tlachipintli iwan tepitsin istatl. in silantrilo mokwa ika okse tlakwali mowika mila kemen emoli, awaxmoli, kamohtlatsoyonili. kwaltia xa se nexikol teisa kichiwilihtok nokokoxkaw, nowaxkawan. se kwali nemachtilistli wel okwalkan se motekas. ipan in in xiwitl onkan owasiko in matlakpowalxiwitl ipan nawpowalxiwitl kichiwke inik kate in ye ixkichkaw ik asiko mexika in tenochtitlan. in axkan ipan lunes ik 9 de hulio ikwak omomikili in ichpoch markés visurrei, kuyowakan in mik, itoka doña fransiska blanga; ipan missa omito in onkan sant joseph, onkan motokak in san fransisko. inik vii nikitowa sentetl onikak nochpochkal san tepiton tonatiw ikisayampa itstikak nikmakatiw in nikwihtsin itoka hwana xwares yewatl kimati in tla itla nechtlaokolis nitokos. in axkan domingo ik 26 mani metstli de febrero de 1606 años, ikwak otlatilok se tlakatl molato san tlapik teopixki klérigo omochiwka, amo tlateochiwali katka imak obispo; wekaw in missa okitowaya, oteyolkwitiaya, otetlaseliltiaya, otekwatekiaya, otenamiktiaya. in ihkwak on asik in onkan ihkak wewetl niman kiteka in tlemaitl. achtopa konkechkotona, tlalpan kontlasa onkan tlapatlatstinemi. kin wel yuhti axkan kriyoyo nikan otlakat ipan nweva españa provinsial omochiwka in ompa ik ye iski xiwitl ahsiko achto matlaktlomome padreme san fransisko nikan nweva españa, ka san ok moch witse kastila in omochiwtinenka provinsiales in ipan iskitetl kapítulo onwalmochiwtia; aw ka kin axkan ipan in in omotenew kapítulo onpew ontsintik inik wel provinsiales mochiwaske kriyoyos in nikan tepilwan nweva españa san fransisko teopixke. awitsotsin kichali wei teokali ipan chikwei akatl xiwitl. inin teopantli kitsintika in achtopa tisokatsin. amo siaya in tlakatl tepiltsotsomatsin tlahtowani katka kuyowakan in walas mexiko, aw ik ipanpa kimiktike itenkopa in awitsotl tlahtowani katka tenochtitlan; aw in tlakatl witsilatsin tlahtowani katka witsilopochko no ipanpa miktilok in akwekwexatl. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. kikwitehki tenantsi aw ken kimonekiltia in tlakatl, in totekwiyo, aso nolwil yes, aso nomasewal yes in otinechmolwili, in otinechmomakili in sententli, in senkamatl, immochokitsin, immixayotsin. aw iwan in tewatsin in aso tikmomahsewis in kana achitsin, in totonkatsintli, yamankatsintli, in itotonka, in iyamankatsin in totekwiyo. intla nechmomakilis aw in axkan ka senka otlacauhqui5 immoyolotsin. ma ximewiltitie nopitsin. entonses machwahsito techsekwawtlahtli monamihke in chaparrito bigotudo wan satepa'este ompa moapostarohke. xi tekpatl xiwitl, 1256. ika nehon nikan nimitsaxkatiliti nehin motahtoltsin. ix tekpatl xiwitl, 1280. kan tiyehkok ye nikan, imixpan o teteuktin, timawistlachiwala, moneketsa.moxiwkosketsalpetlapan, tonihkaka.kakawaiskixochitl,san tonnetlanewilo,tikawalos,tiyaas,ximoas. ¡ ma ya on iwa in! tikwikkanitl. entons kitlamotla yehwan espexo omatlapo se alaguna. in tlatokat moteksuma xviii xiwitl. sapata sasan konfiado. okineltokak amaro iwan okitlali itlak kename melawak isoldado. iwan niman amaro okimiktik in sapata. awaxmoli ika itsmikilitl aw san niman no ikwak in okimokakiti in mawistililoni señor gobernador ihoan señores hweses aw niman omotlanawatilike inik monamakas in omotenew in kali ik tsatsiwas inik tekakitilos in ipan tlaxilakalpan sant hwan inakastlan in onka yopiko. sesek porke teihtikokoh komo se kitelkuaj. tlahkoxonakatl owasihko kwak nepaka' tiempo yu ahsiki in tiempo otlakat ikunew. yewatl kitokato in itsonteko tenoch, aw in kwawtliketski kitokato in iyolo kopil akanepantla, unkan ikak nopali; sa se imatlapal yuhkin tisaneliwtikak inik unka walmoxixa kwawtli, inik tlatokayoti tenochtitla. q.n. (quitoz neki) in kwawsivatl ik oxavalok in koaestli ivan in kwawtli iviyo motenewa ikwawtson ipan val vikok in umpa kolwakan aw in ixkichika tlayowas amo kwali kawitl yes; in ixkichika kwalos tonatiw kokolisyo yes. tlanamakaskia aw sano yuhki in ikal ichalchiwkal ixiwkal iketsalkal itapachkal itlapaltewilokal xiwteskayo katka. wan ipanima intlakwase". yewa amo inglestlahtowa mach fransés iwan kaxtilan yek tlahtowani. ipa iuki itokai, achá por in tsohyak wan tsopilot no tsohyak; tsohpilot pané tsikihyak, no iuki in xiwit. in kilit, pero no kwamekat. asan yewkunko yenechmakan tomi nikankan tomin nikaxilti. tewan tikpia istak, chichiltik, kostik inwan yeloh xochimeh. yeka inikwalanih iuki monotsa tak por in nehnextik. yankwik kali kitalihkeh nopilwan. iwan nikitowa oksekni mani tlali tekpayokan akatlyakapan kalpoli xx sanekok yawaltik in i nikmaka in maria awatonka. ma xokon senmattiw in nehnemilistli maka tle tokonikxinamikis in tlakotl in sakatl. in ihkwak mochiwi, ye omito, ipan xi akatl xiwitl; ka yuhki in inik tikinnelwayomati in tekwanipan tlaka in titsakwaltitlantenanka, ka nel tonenonotsal inik yewatl in tsiwtlakawki ka satepa in asiko, ka ye otlamasewke in tlahtoke in kwawitsatewktli iwan in atonaltsin chichimekatewktli. vi kali xiwitl, 1225. pané amo kwaltia para pahti, pero kwaltia para tapalol, para emol. aw in axkan ipan in ik 1 mani metstli marso de 1609 años, ikwak opew senka chikawak momanako in sawatl in motenewa virwelas, senka miekintin ik momikilike in pipiltsitsinti in inpilwan timasewaltin iwan sanno iwi in inpilwan españolestin iwan in inpilwan tliltike, san mochtin neliwtiake in momikilike, iwan sekintin ye weweintin tlaka inik momikilike sawatl; ipan sewiko in mayo, ome metstli ipan tlako in manka. tlen 120 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlanawatianeh tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh kipiah tlanawatili kiamakixtiseh tlahtol tlanawatilmeh tlen sentlanawatiloyan iwan mamotlepanita. [al margen iskierdo axkan sabato a 4 dias del mes de novienbre 1587 años okikahoako in wentli san hoseph lurenso diego hwana petronila xxx aok imochi ik okikoh opohoali onchikome pesos no mochik omochiw posesion in ipxa viskal fransisko santoval pedro sakobia 4 pesos ik motokak] no pahti, para tataxis, tamanal oso taixkal, se kiixtapana wan se kiihtitemilia istat wan kemah se motoskatalilia, para se motoskakawantis oso para se motoskayemanis ihwak se toskakawantok. aw in selar in weitlapanko kwawitl motlatlali, in onkan tlatlak tletlalilok. o xa itech ohpitsak, achto mopaka in michin, in nohpali motlalia ome kawitl ihtik in atl ika istatl inik mokwihkwis in nohpalalaktli; in yepasohtli kwali mopaka, moteteki, in iswatl mosiyawa iwan mixawia. in tahtli itwalko ka. yewa wel okwalan ihkwak okimat oquiztlacalhuihqueh. se kikwa ikamohyo in ye mochi onkan in ixkich popoliwis in aok tle kitekipachoa in mochi on nes in o ik tlatekak in kitetlawtis in tilmatli. aw in panowayan yewatl motlahtokatlali in itoka kwawsesekwitsin tlamaokatltewktli mochiw. titlasohtlaskia itakka kitemaka ahkoihkak, amo kipampilowa in ipahpatayo kemeh in okseki pahpata. yonisohsotlaw kan nikilwian lisiana nehwa mate' akmo nias in kakawaka. ya no axweli kitlani aw kinwalyakantiake in inmasewalwan san walakxipanwitiake, in kiwalakoktiake yuhkin kwawpiastotonti tliltik; kwix inlansas, tlein on kineskayotia, amo nel tlahtokateyakanoni umpa in hapón? aw san iw walchichiwtiake in iw nemi in iw umpa muchichiwa inchan, in iwki turga kitlalia ipan mukwitlalpia, iwan in intson in kwexkochtlan kilpia; san oksenpowaltin in in axkan nikan oahsiko mexiko. yon iuki kitokaitiah por in mahyá yon kwakowehtsin ixipoj. xochiyowa itech marso, sempowal tonal waki ya in ixochiyo. tlawahwaloa ikanin tlaxotia kixotia in kali kampa ichan kampa chanti iteko yewatl san achiton kochi kahxilia mochipa san tlachixtok intla ahketstok san teki meteketsa ammo wehkaw nehnentinemi ihkwak aka pano ikalixpan ye tlawahwaloa ikanin ye momati aka ompa yahtinemi onoso tlyawalohtinemi ihkwak kihta aka ketsilnehnentinemi itech ikal in iteko ye kitokatinemi kitotoka ammo kikahkawa kitlawawalwihtinemi in xa totonik. tla nimitskahtewas ne atitla wan na niyas" ipan otsintik in kwakwawpitsawa in kitsintike puchtekayotl yewantin in in puchtekatlahtoke itskowatsin, tsiwtekatsin. satepa yakmo itla okichiw in tatahtli sa ohkion yeka yotlaxixiko in piltontli. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. yalwa ikayowa san otlamataya. poyawtlan. ayawchikavastika vikalo tlalokan ahvia! nach toskwekwexi niyayaliski amo nikowas inin kawayo ipampa wel yowewehtik. tlemoli mochiwa miak ne kalikampa. ahsito ompa motlalia' wan onkán yetlakwaske mach tlakpak motlaliaya wan wal moxixaya ikpak in tlateli para itek in kaswela onká kichiwiliaya maldád. ipan matlaktli akatl xiwitl (1879), tlamatini in itoka thomas alva edison kiyokoya "netlahuililoni" noso "tehuilotlahuilmeyallotl". in satepa de motoka mopohpoa segido segido orne mektli okachi asta yeyi según ngenin weyas in memeton mopopowtiwi ikxitla motlalwia'. aw in kwawitsatsin, ye omito, onxiwti in texkalko omemasak, inik onkan tlamasewtoka onkan iksen katka; aw yexiwtika inik onkan onok in onkan omotenew in texkalko omemasak, in walitstok ika inin i se tekpatl xiwitl. ¿quexqui painpepeyoktin monekih motlalilis sente amaihkwiloli yas estados unidos? iwan niki[towa in kali iwan tlali] in ipan mani.. tonatiw ikisayanpa itstikak ikpak mani akokali ontekistikak xochimilkopa itstimani onkan niwetstok in motamachiw inik wiak hematl ipan se yolotli aw inik patlawak senmatl ipan se yolotli in i nikmaka in nonamik in itoka ana tewkchon amo itlakawis in notlatol. anmewantsitsin ihwak kitokah kimanelowah ika kwounex, se kitsetselowa kwaltsin potoxtsin wan se kimanelowa ya. para kenke nika tiitstok?" q.n. in tetsavitl in teskatlipuka ka oyake aw in ik tivi umpa titlanankiliske in senteutl nima ye ik akalko motlalike, san ok weka motekake, kimonilwia “tleyn anquitoznequi?”. aw sano ipan in in omotenew semilwitl sábado, ihkwak nikan mexiko omokixti in lisensiado don pedro de otálora presidente in nikan mexiko audiensia real, in okimottilito in okimoyawalwito nowiyampa in techyawalotok weyatl. aw in oyuh kontokato tenuch in iyolo kopil, niman tlenamakak ixpan in witsilopuchtli. ok nachka in motlamachititiw .o ya tlatonaski tlaviskaleva in an tlachichina nepapan kechol xochitl ihkakan. tlalpan timoketska tiankisnavaki ah titlakatl a ti ketsalkoatl a innemilis pilantoton ka altepepan chantih amo keh innemilis pilantoton ka weyi altepetl nemih. in ika in itokatsin tetatsin tepiltsin espiritu santo nikpewaltia in notestamento makimatika in ixkichtin kitaske inin amatl in newatl notoka hwana mosel nikan nichane sakalpan nichiwa in notestamento maso iwi in mokokowa in nonakayo yese in noiolo in nosialis ka paktika aken mochiwa aw nikchixtika in mikistli in aiak wel ixpanpa ewa in aiak wel kitlalkawia aw ipanpa in niktlalia in notestamento in sa tlatsakkan in sa tlasonko notlanekilis inik mochipa mopias inik ayak wel kitlakos iska yewatlin. aw ya yetsonxiwitl ipan kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan onpowalokaxtoli ipan nawxiwitl axkan inik onkan achtopa in akaltika atenkisako astlan teokulwakan in wewetke chichimeka mexika; san walpepetlawtiake in kampa walake inik onkan atenkisako motlaliko astlan teokulwakan. kito “tla xiwalaw ye, ka kimitalwia teoutl: ‘yn axkan ompa tiwi kastila tiktotiliske wei teoutl tlatohuani’; ompa titetekos anoso tiwiwilanalos, ompa tipopolihuiz”. teipa nopa tsikame inihwanti nemih kintemowah sehpa notahtsin onechmononochili kimmach ye wehka sekintin iikniwtsistiwan okimoixpchpenilihkeh inik moteyakanilis ompa santa ana lakotenko altepetl yewantin inon senka kimpahpakiltiaya yese onyeya ahkiwan ahmo kinyolpachiwitiayah inin ipampa immanon notahtsin senka motolinihtsonoaya nikan niktlalia san tepitsin in yewatsin kemmanian itechkopa onechmopowilili iwan in ipan in omotenew metstli henero mochipa omoyeyeko in kiyawitl inik mochi nowian ipan nweva españa. inin yewatsin obispo wel nikan mexiko tlakat nikan tepiltsin kriyoyo mitowa, intech kisa in pipiltin konkistadoresme. itlanahnamik: aw kihtotiwi in oksekintin wewetke, kil in ipan in omotenew xiwitl ayemo onkan in in momikiliko toskwekwextli, kil ok senpowali ipan se xiwitl in okinyakan in okinpacho mexika, inewan katka in tlahtowani || 37r wewe witsiliwitl; ahso yuhtika, yese amo tikneltilia amo tikchikawa inin itla iwki itla noso kamo yuhki, san tokonitowa in iwki oksekintin wewetke mexika in intlahtol okitlalitiake. aw niman ik sesenyaka kitlatlawtia in wewetke kitlapaloa kichikawa kelakwawa kitetsiloa ahko kilpia kichokistlapaloa kitlakwammaka in netolinilistli in tlaihiyowilistli. kilwia in iuki kitokaitiah por in metspihpitsaktik moskaltia. in mochiwa kwoutah wan kaltenoj. —akmo wanechmolwili tiwpixki akmo nikunis inekwtli porke nekwtli telokolixti. ikwak pew i ye momimiktia tenochka; yei kali xiwitl ipa kimiktike in inpilo siwakoatl tsiwakpopokatsi yoa sipaktsi, tenkwekwenotsi, ipilwa motewksomatsi axayaka, xoxopewalok, kimiktike. tikintayokoli kwahkwali. ¿catlique?in nikkiknamiki,¿kanin kintemowa?ken on wewetitlan, ya nikan ah. aw in oiwsewtikis in kwikkatl, in omokatimoman, in ye kikaki walnotsalo in ikpak tepetsintli, kilwia hwantsin, hwan diegotsin, niman sa ye motlapaloa inik ompa yas, in kanin notsalo. ahken mochiuha in iyolloh, manose itla ik misawia, yese wel paki, mowelamachtia kitlekkawito in tepetsintli, ompa itsto in kampa walnotsalok, aw in ye ahsitiw in ikpak tepetsintli, in ye okimottilih se siwapili onkan moketsinokak, kiwalmonochilih inik onyas in inawaktsinko. in okonkake sa kiwatoke “can ok tikimanaske in kimotemolia? ka otowitike, makwele toconihyouica”. ne ahkopatokniwan semi kitokaj. in se kitoka iteyotsin. in kemah mochipautani, komo amo, amo mochiwa. in kemah miak mochiwa komo se kitoka. olipan techilwia matitlakewakan akin motetlakewaltitika. iikxiko petehki . ma iyolik xokon ana im mokxi ka ye tokonnamikis in sekowatl ohtli meiawak; aw in mexika niman iqu intech motlapaloke in tlakopaneka in askapotsalka, san ok inkaltenko in kimonkawato; miyek in mik masewali. se kitoka para mochiwa. tiitstoke dios hiho, yokikwenti de non piltontli diabli miskalayun miskalayun kwtlatl. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. aw inik amo mochintin xexeloloke, oksekintin in omotenewke san tokoke, yehika ipampa kihtoke in mochintin tlamatini doktoresme intla mochintin xexeloloske mimikke aw inik kinpilotiwi ipan iski wewei ohtli in innakayo, ka onkan mochi palanis, amo kwali ik mochiwas in iyaka in ipotonka ka kokolistli mokwepas, aw niman nikan hehekatika walas in ihtik siudad mexiko topan motekakiw inik techkokolismakas. tihkakatsose nopa nakatl aw in oyuh ompa asito in sitlan in tsiwtlakawki yaopol, ompa kinotske in sitlan tlaka, ye kilwia "campa tiaw?". kinehki yas. itech ne niekawiltsin. axkan martes in ik 14 mani metstli oktubre de 1614 años, ihkwak nikan mexiko onpewke sekintin habún tlaka oyahke in inchan hapón, onawxiwtiko in nikan mexiko onemiko; sekintin ok nikan omokawtiake motlaekoltia tiamiki kinamaka nikan in intlatki ompa kiwalkwike hapón. kachi mochiwa nikan paratani tekwantepek. "cecni ma wian chikonkalpoltin iwan ok sekni ma nehnemikan nowan in mexicah". . aw in ik wal mokwepaya anawak in ik wal tlatokaya in ik wal wia ye otiktenewke kemahkatsin. ¿tlen iman kisa in toteposkalmimilol inik laredo? ah nikitowa yese . . . ¿an tle nitawka yes in tlaltikpak? noteawi kipia se weyi kali. aw iwan ye kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan matlakxiwitl in ipan 2 akatl xiwitl, 1299 años, ipan toxiw molpili, ikwak onkan kasike in akokulko chapoltepek in wewe witsiliwitl tlahtowani katka intlan i mexika chichimeka, inik onkan kinyaoyawaloke chapoltepek, inik nawalpoliwke, nawkampa wikaloke in mexika, mochokilitiake. amo niteyekita, omomawispolo. au in isiwawa mochokilitinemi in kintlatlawtia in tlatilolka; au ie tlachia in awake in tepewake e walaiwa in aoka wetsi tenochka. aw in ikoppa axkan ik 4 mani metstli de oktubre de 1605 años, ipan ilwitsin sant fransisko, ye noseppa omochiw papakilistli; miektlamantli in ipan mokixtike in ipan mixewke, inik mawiltike españolesme inik tlaketske inik tetlawewetskitike. axkan miérkoles ik 2 mani metstli de septiembre de 1603 años, in sankto domingo teopixke ikwak motlalike in kwapatlanaliskwawtitlan kalnakasko ichan katka don fransisko telo alkalde de korte; sant lwis ik tlatokayotike in sankto domingo teopixke iwan in kolegio kichiwke. kachto nitlakwahtewa. maleta ichpokaton male' timikas timikas san tóbyas tlenkwa mikmoserbirwi. ompa inpan kis in se tekpatl xiwitl. oyektlapixkak iwan kenin axkan wel tlapatio, miak tomin okitlan. no iwan in ihkwak asiko onkan atentlipan in omotenewke in chichimeka in totolimpaneka amakemeke, ye kate, no achtopa oasiko in akxoteka in chalka, ye mitowa kin no is kikwitasiko inik chalka ye monotsa. ¿ keski tepilwan ? aw in axkan ipan in xiwitl in titlahtowa de 1607 años, in ipan wewexiwitl xi akatl, in ikoppa owapachiowako. in kwowit mah amo keman nakasikawetsiti in emolkomit. seki kwouxiwit xochiyowa kemeh itamian xiwit wan kemeh aman oksi ya in iteyotsin. in ixkich ketsali, chalawihkwowit yawiyaya nopa postehtli asta ilwikatl ik chiknahtetl vii akatl xiwitl, 1187. titlasohtlaskiaya otlanankili in testigo inik nikmati in itechkopa i onkan anamaka in itoka gabriel newan in inamik maria ye axkan onpowali xiwitl yei axoxtlantli in ye weweihton kotonki tepetl wan wetski kani tlehkok, kwikkanimetl: aw in alkaldesme motlalike sankta maría kwepopan, san kitlamelawalti in christóval paskwal chane kopolko, iwan diego xwáres chane tlokalpan. aw inik wel melawak momatis in ye iskintin intepachokawan mochiwa mexika tenochka, nikan tenewtok in intoka nikan motekpana seseyaka in ikse itoka motewksoma, inin ok ompa intlahtokaw katka in yankwik mexiko astlan in mexika; in ikome itoka chalchiwtlatonak, inin yewatl kinwalkixti ompa kinwalpachotia || 105 inik ompa walkiske walolinke yankwik mexiko astlan kinewayan chikomostok in mexika tenochka; in ikei itoka kwawtleketski teomama; in iknawi itoka akasitli; in ikmakwili itoka sitlalitsin; in ikchikwasen itoka tsinpan; in ikchikome itoka tlasotsin; in ikchikwei itoka toskwekwextli; in ikchiwknawi itoka wewe witsiliwitl tlahtowani; in ikmatlaktli itoka tenochtsin, kimaxitiko yewatl kinwalpachotia kinwalyakan in mexika inik asiko tenochtitlan; in ikmatlaktlonse itoka akamapichtli tlahtowani achto in tenochtitlan; in ikmatlaktlomome itoka witsiliwitl ikome tlahtowani; in ikmatlaktlomei itoka chimalpopoka tlahtowani; in ikmatlaktlonnawi itoka itskowatl tlahtowani; in ikkaxtoli itoka wewe motewksoma ilwikamina chalchiwtlahtonak tlahtowani; in ikkaxtolonse itoka axayakatsin tlahtowani; in ikkaxtolonmome itoka tisosik tlahtowani; in ikkaxtolomei itoka awitsotl tlahtowani; || 106 in ikkaxtolonnawi itoka motewksoma xokoyotl wei tlahtowani; in iksenpowali itoka kwetlawatsin; in iksenpowalonse itoka kwawtimoktsin; in iksenpowalomome itoka don andrés motelchiwtsin; in iksenpowalomei itoka don pablo xochikentsin; in iksenpowalonnawi itoka don diego de alvarado wanitsin; in iksenpowalonmakwili itoka don diego de sant fransisko tewetskititsin; in iksenpowalonchikwasen itoka don christóval de gusmán sesetsin; in iksenpowalonchikome itoka don lwis de sankta maría nakasipaktsin; in iksenpowalonchikwei itoka don fransisko ximénes san hwes; in iksenpowalonchiwknawi itoka wewe don antonio valeriano; in iksenpowalonmatlaktli itoka don hwan martín theniente; in iksenpowalomatlaktli onse itoka don herónimo lúpes; in iksenpowalonmatlaktli ipan ome itoka don hwan baptista, inin axkan moyetstika de 1609 años. monana kalnakasko oya ika notenixwi. i tochtli xiwitl, 1298. in nanakat. newa amo nikneki nias ipan ohtli. yahki inana para... mah amo se rato no ihkwak kechposawalistli ik mikowak; ihkwak mik in don hwan itstlitentsin tlailotlaktewktli tlahtowani tenanko, no iwan ikwak mik in don karlos mamalwasokan tlahtowani katka. se kinamaka in iramitas. satepan ye okinyektlali ikalxexeloh in kali konpewaltia in tlakwalchihkan imomostlatikateki. aw in akin ye om pewas in omochichiw in otlakaxten in otlakakaxchichiw níman tetlalwia kinsentlalia kinnechikoa kinmachitia in iweweyowan in puchteka wewetke. ¿quehquich 1patin inon amoxtli? asta tlatomonki noponi orno ihtik. sorriyahepasot matohtohmiyoh wan chinahepasot no iuki, pero machihchinaltik. aw ik okitsilhike in itoka pablo sehoanokatl yehika itenkopatik inik sekintin onkan kalake in kali ik omotlalike chikiwchiwke santiago inchan yewatl kitetlanewti in pablo seoanokatl aw ayoktle ones in kwawitl mochi opoliwik. ka ipan inin xiwitl yopewaya motenewas kename yomakohtaya ika chiwawa madero, karransa wan obregón. ika tlaxitla ma tikitokan ika kwawnawak noihki yomotenewaya in revolusión; ankan ayemo machiaya ahken okipewaltiaya. itlanahnamik: makwili xumali pitsochiyawisotl v kali xiwitl, 41. xitlehko". itlanahnamik: . aso ompa tepal tlachies moskalis tlakakis: ma ompa pohpoliwi tleh nel ais tleh nel nik chiwas, kwix siwatl aso malakatl tsotsopastli imak niktekilis ? aw iskate in chichimeka tlatoke i much powi, i yepa chaneke. se metstli imahtlakomekan in xiwitl. pitstsahtsr inin kichiwa in chichi ihkwak pahpaki yubkin ihkwak teotlahkan kihta iteko in tekipan anoso oksekkan yomowalewepato yoahsik in ichan immanon no ixpan mahkotitlani itech momahmalakachoa mahketsteteka iwan momanepanoa no yuhkin kiehiwa ihewae kineki motlatlasohtlaltis kimoixnextilis in siwaehichi no yuhki ihkwae kipepewaltia okse ehichi iwan ya ammo kineki momakas motewis ihkwak inin pano in oksente chichi kinenewkawia ipan yaw kikwakwa iwan ye ammo mochikawakamati in tlaixnamikis kinihkwak ye pewa pitstsahtsi san mahketsteteka monakaspiloa motlaiknoihtitia motlaokolmimiloa lmmanon in okse chichi ayokmitla kichiwilia ayokmo kikenchiwa kikahkawa vitsilopochtli ikwik tikalakikan in kalchialoyan. nawi tochtli xiwitl atle mochiw. ikwak tsikwini yoyolime (inon mitoa galopearoa kaxtilankopa) iman on nochtin nenenkatsitsintin achi netlalolo ik kampa kawatin. tla nochtlakatl nimanalo iki in tsikwinoa keman nian ipan makwili tepostlamachotiloni ipan otiwe ixpan se xolal kikwitia santa mónika. wan ok tepitsin opanoaloya ipan se apantli. ompoyon tlen yokawasiake kawatemo iwan nenentiw hasta okwila. elotlaxkali au hin iopuchkopa ompa kitkitiwi in yekaxitl in akachto kontemaka in yetl. in kwawpetlapan, oselopetlapan, tonatiw on tlatlawtilo. kenin mochiwa aw san ontlatsakwi in oselotl, aokmo senka wélala in tletl wetsito, ik sa motlekwikwilo, motletlekwikwilo, motlechichino, aokmo senka welalak, ipampan san kwikwiltik, motlilchachapani, motlilchachapats. o ach, yuhki nel ye ichan, totatsin ai,ach in yuhki xoxopan in ketsali, ya xochitika on tlakwilowa, tlaltikpak ye nikan ipalnemowani. chalkasiwakwikatl ihkwak omopew karransistas nesi mawistike. tenonotsaya iwan okiwitekia kaltemitl. okixowaya iwan otelwiaya ihkin techpaktia. amo nancholoske. ximokaltsakwakwa. itik namokal amotla namechpanoz. iwan amoka ocholo. inihwanti tekitih aw inik walpanoke in astlan in asteka onkan kinwalantikiske in kolwakan in onkan chaneke katka. in toskwekwextli onkan ipan molpili, onkan kilpilike || 79 in ixiw in tekpayokan inik kinwalyakan mexika. kenin mochiwa aw in imostlayok quilhuih: tlake inik tiktehittilis in kanin itlanekilistsin ilwikak siwapili kimokechililiskeh in iteokaltsin; niman ik tehtlalwilok inik mochiwas, moketsas. iwan no yewatl in audiensia nawatlato in itoka hwan ribelor testigosme omochiwke inik otokontlalmakake in señora maria rodrigwes in inamik katka amador nangoro ik tikneltilia nikan tiktlalia totoka iwan tofirma. [f. 7v.] thoribio de la krus regidor don antonio de santa maria. pasó ante mi pedro de santiago eskribano audiensia. xiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1232. . im puchtekatlahtoke in nawalostomeka in onkan in nesentlaliaya wel sentetl inkal yetika, no sentetl inkal yetika in kwawtlatohke; ixwa wan moskaltia, ihwak motamiti pewa xochiyowa. ampón tonalix mochiwa miak. mah techtekipano, 94. ka ixkich ik ompopowi, onixtlawi, onkwepi in sententli, in senkamatl, in okis immoknotlahtoltsin. ¿ac nel noso ipan tinechmokawilia? ka ye nimonakayo, ye nimomio ninochiwa. ¿cuix nel tinechontlatlattas, tinechoniistlakos? ka nipomial nies, notekwiyokichtli. niknotenewilia in totepantlahtokatsin, in tlatkochiwalyektsintli, in teoichpuchtli, muchipa senkisa pepetlakatikak in itlantsinko, in itlasokonetsin, totekwiyo iesu christo. in iteyo kemeh moras, pero uitsyoj. ye ipampa mayanalok, tlakah miquiah. mikketl amo kitokayah iwan tsopilome quicuayah. ipan in makwilxiwitl kichiwako inik motetsanwike tulteka.|| "xinechuikaka para namantsi axnikanti para eltó se pilxakaltsi aw yese yuhka tlaneltokilistli ka moch tipilwan in achto tothatsin adán iwan in noé, ka onkan intechkopa walkisa in otikintenewke in wewetke chichimeka in onkan atenkisako astlan, in ipan se tochtli xiwitl motlaliko; in ihkwak in, kin oyuh nepa kaxtolomei xiwitl motlekawitsino in ilwikatl ihtik i neli dios itlasopiltsin hesuchristo, inik techmotlapolwilito in ilwikak tlatsakwilotl, inik tsawktikak in ye ixkichika ompa inik tlatlakoke paraiso terenal in achto tothatsin adán iwan eva. . in chokisso in tlaokolo ma ok tik tlalkawikan in kiawatl in itwali. aw in tawi in toweltiw in tokotonka in towiltekka. . . ma kwele tech ilkawa. wel ixkichika mokawako in chokaya inik kis inik poliwiko tlayowalotl; iwan sekintin tehteopan moteopankaltemato in tokichtin iwan siwa, umpa moteochiwtikatka. iskaki in motekiw in tikchioas: in seyooal, in semilwitl xitlateumati, miiekpa iwiktsinko xelsisiwi in yowali, in ehekatl. xiktlaitlanili, xiknotsa, xiktsatsili, iwiktsinko imasoa. ok senka in mowetsian, in mokochian [...]. in no se kichipawa. ipan se kali xiwitl (1597) taikosama, intlahtokaw nipontlaltecah, kinawati ma kimmamasowaltikan in san felipe de hesús iwan oksekintin teopixke ompa nagasakipan. felipe omotlakatilitsinoka ipan altepetl méxiko. yewan okintitlanilihkeh tomin intatawan. aw in yewatl tewktitlantli embaxador amo kinek in nikan mokwaatekis, yuh mihto ye kin ompa in españa mokwaatekis. x kali xiwitl, 1229 años. onechilhuih: okseppa tiwalas, ok iwian nimitskakis; wel ok itsinewkan nikittas in tlein ik otihuallah, motlaelewilis, motlanekilis; wel itech onikittak in iw onechnanquilih, ka momati in moteokaltsin tikmonekiltia mitsmochiuhililiskeh nikan. aso san newatl nikyohyokoya; akasohmo motenkopaktsinko. ka senka nimitsnotlatlawtilia, notewkyo e, siwapile, nochpochtsin e, manoso akah semeh in tlasohpihpiltin in iximacho, in ixtililo, in mawistililo, itech xikmokauhili in kitkis in kiwikkas in mihiyotsin in motlahtoltsin, inik neltokkos. intla in tlasemanka tlaelewilistli inik miximatis wewe mexiko ahmo san kwelachik tlaelewilistli inik miximatis ihkwak ayahmo ahsiah kixtopal kolon in itlatemolis itechpa in tlen kineskayotia wel neli nekatilos in ipan oksetik tlaixahsihkamatilistli tlein san iaxka tlein san isel kipia iniohwanalis itlachihchiwalis inintin altepemeh in ipan miek ontsontli iwan mahtlakpowali xiwitl in omokawkeh omatsahkeh ipanin semanki tlali iwan nikitowa on mani notlal in kochtokan sentsontli matl ye wiak inik patlawak senpowali in i nikmaka nonamik omito ayak tle kitos yuh nikitowa in notlatol. ipan nawtsontli onkaxtoli onsempoali ommatlaktli onchikwei xiwitl, wei tlahtoani lasaro kardenas kimexikawia techiawakayotl. aw iwan ye kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan ome xiwitl in ipan x akatl xiwitl, 1307 años, in omomikiliko tlakatl koxkoxtli tlatowani katka kulwakan, in tlahtokat senpowalxiwitl ipan chikoxiwitl; aw in kwawtlahtolok in ayak tlahtokat kulwakan kaxtoli onse xiwitl in oimik koxkoxtli. makimatika nochi tlakame nowa niyoltoe yoltok noyolo; kemantika paki, kemantika choka; makimatika nowa niyolchikawak. || 80v nikan ipan in in ye kinotsa in ketsalkanawtli in diablo in teskatlipoka katka, ye kilwia "quetzalcanauhtlé, ma ok tiwiyan, ma ok tiktlalkawikan in altepetl, ye nelelasi inik nikwalani, ma ok onpa tiwiyan in koyowakan. axkanpa kwalkan, aw ok kwalkan, ka ok chalchiwitl, ka ok teuxiwitl in moyolo, ka ok itstika, ka yatle kitlakoa, ka ok kistika, ka ayakanpa itskaliwi, ka ok motkitika, ka ok masitika, ayatle neneliwki. aw iwak ok tonkate in tewantin in mache otimitsweipowke. kwix tikmitlahwia in titokonetsin ma nitlakati ka tewantin totlatlakul, ka tewantin otimitstolinike ka tel ik tlaman in tlaltikpak, kwix iwitolo, ka okimitalhwi, ka okimotlalili in totekuyo, in nexinacholos, in netlapiwilos tlaltikpak [...]. nikan ipan in in otlakat in tepiltsin in itoka weimak ipiltsin in tlahtokapili in itoka totepew kulwakan chane, ye iw matlaktlonse xiwitl tlahtokati in chalchiwtlahtonak in onkan kulwakan. onkak in chichiltik wan onkak in istak, ome taman: istak chakaikamoh wan chichiltik chakaykamoj. xkinkawa mah tekitikan. ahmaka kimatia keski xiwitl immanon ye maxiltili yewatsinyese wel itechtsinko nesia in ye okimopanawili in nawpowali xiwitl senka kwali motekipanoltiaya masiwki mosiawitiaya motekitiliaya okachi mochipa in ipan itlalmiltsitsiwan h mochipa miltekitkanemilispan in ometstaya imiltsitsiwan semihkak wel tlaehiwtii ahmo yuhkin tlalkawali in mepantli nohwian tlaehipawtli aw in ixkichika inik topan otlayowaka, inik otechtlayowilika tonatiw, in tewantin nikan titlaka timasewaltin in amo tikmati in kenin mochiwa in ilwikame inik ohtlatoka inik momalakachowa, inik oipantik axkan omonepanixnamikiko in tonatiw iwan metstli inik sesenteilwikatitech in kexkichka ik motstikate, sesenteilwikapan inmakasan ohtlipan omosepan wekapa netlok owiixnamikiko, inik itech yetiwi inik momalakachotiwi in ilwikame omonepanixnamikiko, ka nel noso nawteilwikapan in yatiw tonatiw, aw in metstli ka ye ik itech in yatiw in iksenteilwikapa, in wel ye itech in kiyawalowa tlali, in wel achto itech inik onpewtoke ilwikame, onkan ixkichkapa okonixsemasikatsakwilika in wel ixkichika inik yawaliwtiw in itlanextilistika tonatiw, inik topan otlayowaka in intsintla tinemi, ik senka mochi || 148 tlakatl omomawti omisawi in tokichtin iwan oksenka yewantin in señorati, iwan in nikan titlaka timasewaltin siwatsitsinti; mochintin mokaltenke mokaltsakke in inchachan, intlan okintlalike in inpipilwan, onkan tlatsatsatsi in mochokilia in ixkichika tlayowaka, kihtowaya "tley ye topan mochiwa, tlei ye topan kimonekiltia in totekwiyo dios?; ototlaweliltik!, ka ipampa totlatlakol". ye onetokoto, owiloa ka.in tepilwan, in tlatoanime, teteuktin, techyaiknookawtewake. ma xinechmotlapohpolwili, ma ok ixkich ika xinechmopakkaihiyowilti, kahmo ik nimitsnokelwia, noxokoyow e, nopiltsintsin e, ka niman mòztla nikistiwetsikiw. yewan asan itoka in sempwali beinte sentabos. aw in oiuhahsito in iixpantsinko, senka kimomawisalwih in kenin welasempanawia in ik senkiska mawistikkatsintli; in itlakentsin iwkin tonnatiw ik motonnameyotia inik pepetlakka. aw in tetl, in texkali, inik itech moketsa, inik kimina in itlanexyotsin iwki in tlasohchalchiuhitl makistli; inik nesi iwkin ayawkosamalokwehkweyokka in tlali. ka nikmati ka yewatl yakachto nemake mochiw in itoka katka tetetsin imomextin newaya in atlixeliwkin kin yewatl wel kipetlaw in atlixeliwki in mili onkan mani in akan temalakatitlan ye ikikanako ye onpowalxiwitl yewatl kitemakake in mexika i nawkapaistin in kowa, iwitsin, tlakotsin, tetliakantsin yewatl kitemakake inik niman makoke in testsin iwan atlixeliwki. in kwowit. den ayatl den ikitiwa pos axan ikitiwa primerito tlaximalo kan ichkame. yon mochiwa pané tomakilit, sayoh mapapatakaxtik. . aw in oahsito titlantin niman waliwa in anawakatlahtoke in ik kiwalnamikia no wal moyawchichiwtiwi inchimal inmakkwaw in intlawis yetiwits in ik onkan ki wal namikia yaonepantla in ik wel on asia in ompa anawak xikalanko. se kichipawa. tehwatsin tonaltsin, newa okwalkan ye onitlakwa iwan melawak amo ni mayana, mach kwali nikonis se teskatekomatl naranhayotl. aw iwan ya yepowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolxiwitl in ipan iii tochtli xiwitl, 1534 años, in oasiko yankwikan nikan mexiko in tlahtowani don antonio de mendosa visurrei. kwaltia ikwouyotsin kemeh yon owat, yemanik kemeh yon chamakih ikwouyo no. ik kiwiwiteki in ik kiwekapanilwia in inemilis. i tekpatl xiwitl, 1272. kwali, tlasohkamati wel miak iwan tewatsin. ¿quenin timometstika, iwa onka mapa in kenin ka tenanko kwawtlatin; ka nochi istlakosawkan tlatlantli. tla tomiknoawiakan kalitek, tlakwilolpan. technemitia in ipalnemowani ye kimate, ye konitoa in ik timiki timasewaltin. 140v 3 akatl xiwitl, 1443. 18. iwan ma muchipa tiktemo, ma muchipa tikelewi, tiknek in kwali nexintli; ma muchipa timopepetla, timoteskawi, ma muchipa timoyekkets, timoyekchichiw; ma muchipa tikelewi in kwali nechichiwalistli, ka san itetlakaanaya ye tetlapawiya, temixiwiya in tlakatekolotl. ka onkan motlamalia, ka aoemo ixnestika in kana ipan immoneyekketsalis, moneyekchichiwalis, ye mitsatoyawis, mitstepexiwis in tlakatekolotl, kana ye mitstsotsonas, mitswitekis in tekwe, in tewipil. iwan inik ahmo titlawelilokamachos, in ihkwak ohtli tiktokas, ahmo awikkampa titlaehis. san tiktekimatis in ohtli, ahmo timomatlatlastias, ahmo tikwiwiltektias in ohtli, ahmo tequcchpan timotlatsitskilitias, timotlakechitias; ahmo titematsitskitias, ahmo timokwatlatlastias, ahmo tikamanalotias, ahmo titeistotokatias, ahmo titepapanawitias, ahmo tlayakak timoketstias intlakamo otinawatilok. x akatl xiwitl, 7. ki ye i ya unka ilwichiwke, inik walake akan yuhki kichiwki. aw in itechpa sankta iglesia in kabildo tlaka, ka sa yewantin inneixkawiltekiw yes in paliotika in kwachkaltika kinmonamikiliske in teoyotika tlahtoke arsobisposme in ihkwak walasiske yankwikan nikan mexiko, in nikan powke kimopialiske altepetl tenuchtitlan; aw yese in axkan itechpa sankta iglesia in kabildo tlaka in intenamikia in inkwachkal amo okinmoselilili inin omotenewtsino doktor don hwan péres de la serna iwan in intlakwilolpwerta, inik san oksekkan pwerta omokalaki inik kimotlapalwito itlasonamiktsin sankta iglesia. yei kilmaitl yepasohtli itlanahnamik: mochipautani. miyekintin in tlahtoke in ipan omikke virreyesme oidoresme in otlahtokatiko mexiko, iwan in mexika tlahtoke pipiltin, iwan obispome || 31 iwan tlahtokateopixke in omonemiltiko nikan mexiko tenochtitlan. nawi xumali pitsochiyawisotl ipanpa in axkan senka nimitsnotlatlawtilia niktennamiki in motlatokayotsin ma ximotlanawatili in yewatin otesdigotike ma mixpantsinko nesike aso miyekpa yuh kichiwa in nekok kitlalitinemi intlatol inik techalania ma hustisiatika xikinmotlatsakwiltili in algwasil mayor fransisko ximenes iwan martin hakobo inik amo miyekpa yuhki kichiwaske ka senka niktsatsilia in mohustisiatsin ixkich notlaitlanilis. migwel de los angeles. mah namotech ahsi, in akike, in mihtoa, in iw kimatia wewetke, in ipan in se tochtli ipan moman in tlali in ilwikatl. iwan yuh kimatia in ihkwak omoman tlali in iwikatl oyuh nawtlamantli onoka in tlaka nawtlamantli nemilistli omochiw in yun kimatia sesentetl in tonatiw katka. kwaltia ma niyawia, tikniwtsin, tisiwatlamakaski, ma xontlachia in momach moman kwikatl, in kowatepek, in kwawtenampan. topan moteka, panowa. so nosiwayo ninaitia, noyolotsin mokokowa. ¿ah ken nel nokonchiwas iwan nokichtis? ¿mazo ok senka ye in kweye,ye in wipil? in tokichwan, in toyokolwan. ¿ kwix noso tinechkow, tinechnokowi, nokonetsin ? ¿ kwix tlapapatlako, nawiwan ye notlawan? saso tiktlakaneki ye no tikwalani, xolotsin, ye noniaw in mochan, nokonetsin. kineki nosowan man nik namaka nokal; newa amo nikneki. teh taltikpaktsin de mi alma, xi tochtli xiwitl, 34. kenin mochiwa aw inik onasik niman ik tlanawati inik mochiwas se yaokali kitokayoti sankto thomás, inik onkan kinkaw onpowali onkaxtoli iwan se tlakatl in españoles. ayotochnakatl ye ik semotekako i ye techikali, ye yuh matlakilwitl techikali kali sik in kisako yakal. o ka yewatl in i yontlamanixti intlahtol in wewetke; katlewatl i neltilistli? mochi in ipan in popokaya sitlali; iwan in ipan in metstli sa keskilwitl in onkiyaw, ye itlakoyok inepantla in okisako kiyawitl. se kilo kwitlaxkoinanakatl timitsnotlasohkamatilis motsakwilti in tlatsakwaloti 48. iwan xitolo, ximopechteka in teixpan, in tenawak, xiteixtili, xiteimakasi. ma teixko, ma teikpak tinen. iwiyan, yokoxka ximonemiti, xitetlasotla, xitetlatlawti, xitetlaokoli, xiktemaka in kan kexkitsin". ma titetlayelitta, ma titeoyewaka. tlenkwa' nihchiwilis tomin tlali kalitek ma ompaya tlenon tlakahmo tomin. in xiwit. ipan in lunes in iksemilwitl mani metstli de henero in momikili ye teotlak, ye omito, ipan yankwik xiwitl in totlasotatsin ganóniko hwan gonsalo, in moyetstikatka wewetlan visitasión; nikan mexiko in momikiliko inkisidor ichantsinko, aw onkan iglesian mayor kaxatika in kimotokilike. pero wahka tlan ya nopa onkas pampa san ika ocho dias tlanki nopa de tempalanih kuakuouejmej, kintalíliah : kiixkah wan kitenakiah kuakuouej, kiewayokixtiah wan kiixtehtekih wan kitaliliah istat, kiixpopotochiliah wan kiixpatskiliah limón, kitenakiah ya wan tenaktok sikierah ome tonal, ome yowal, kiilpiliah itoskatampa, mah kikwahto. otlatsonkisaya iwan oyeya tlakwaske ichan mayordomo yenkwik. oksepa omokwepaya ompa teopa; oksepa mitotia. yeyi tonali kipia tlen mitotiske. ipan nawi tonali wits koronasión kampa mayordomo isoltik iwan yenkwik okipiaya tlen motlankwaketsaske ixpantsinko toteotatsin. iwan nian sente teteachkan ye kipiaya kwahxikali ika koronatin. topixkatsintli okimotlaliliaya ikwaktikpak mayordomo isoltik. achi kwakwali xochitl okwikaya in korona. iwan mayordomo yenkwik kipiaya tlen kitlaliske se korona tsotsopiyo. nesi inon korona in okimotlalilike in toteotatsin. iwan topixke iman yokimotlalili koronatin kinmoteochiwilia ika tlateochiwalatl. xii akatl xiwitl, 1335. se chiltaxkal den kwali wan se itahtai. onkak ome taman. se taman amo semi witsyoh wan se yekwitschachantik. tepetl. nawi tekontontli tlatsopeliloni kenin amo, molwiaya san wel nechpactiz. onemiskeh aw kikawtiw se tlakatl itelpoch itoka martin masapolkatl katka in momikili ye sempowalxiwitl aw kinkawtiw ichpokwan yeintin se tlakatl marina susana inik ome tlakatl itoka barbara marina inikei tlakatll itoka mensia marta. kwaltia aw in ikpak popokatepetl itlamasewayan katka itoka tsontekomatl. se mamahpikton yepasohtli achtopa yewantin intech walpewas in tlahtoke in tlamasewalistli, inik intech kittaske kintokatikisaske in inkwitlapilwan in imatlapalwan, inik tlamasewalistika inik chokistika tlaokoyalistika nesawalistika kimoyolsewiliske in totekwiyo dios, in ipampa aso totlakokol ipanpa, aso ikwalantikatsinko in mochiwa in tlei tepan mochiwa, in aso kokolistli in anoso itla oksentlamantli in saso kenami in temamawti in teisawi in saso kampa yuh tepan mochiwa, in iw axkan nikan mexiko otopan mochiw. aw inik no niman yewantin kimontokatiake in motenewa hermanos de konbalesientes, in kimokwitlawia hospital sant ipólito; aso san matlaktin in onkan mantiake, se in krus manka kiwikake, iwan itlok mantia ome siliares, iwan se klérigo in kapelán kapa kitlalitia, iwan itlok mantiake ome diágonos almátikas kitlalitiake. nikwaxolontok". tokoltsitsiwan españatlalpan nemihuah. aw in oyuh momikili axayakatsin, san niman ikwak motlahtokatlali in itiachkawtsin in itoka tisosikatsin tlahtowani tenochtitlan. in monamaka kwesalan. aw in okikake in mexika, niman ye ik momitia, kichiwke in tlatsontektli; iwan kweptli in kimowitike, ik kitokayotike in kwepopan, inik axkan motenewa kwepopan. aw ini “a ma kana sentetl xokumanaka tolxakaltsintli, aw nikimoniwas in tepaneka amechopalewitiwi, aso no sentetl kontlalitiwi; in ikwak oantlayekoke ok awalaske anechnonotzaquiui”. e iw chikwasexiwitl tlatokanti in pewaloke tepanoayatlaka; in ipan ya altepetlipan se tochtli xiwitl, nawintin in tlatoke e iw sexiwitl ontepewalok. iki in oyeya nochibwena; kwaltsin okisaya teopa ilwitl. yoan nikitoa in tla kana nesis itla notlatol aso nikilwi anoso aka itla nikmakas muchi nikpopoloa atle ipan powis san wel yewatli neltis mopias in notlatol oniktekpan imixpan omochiw testigos i wel ipampa onotsaloke martin lasaro diego sanches martin de alvarado fransisko heronimo siwa doña ines garsia angelina maria maria de hoana nikan chaneke in ipan i siudad mexiko santiago tlatilulko. inik tlapia tenochka kwawkiawak, sentlapal in kalma tenochka, sentlapal in kalma tlatilulka. eyi taman onkak: istak atolkamoj, kostik atolkamoh wan nextik atolkamoj. se xonakatl tsitsikitsin itlanahnamik: ¡xichualmalacachotih natsini! naranjah, limonmeh, tetsotsoh iwan manxanah nowiampa in tlalnanyotl momacah. satepan pus machpewke mawiltia' wan onkan otlaxixiko piltontli. (tein kinankilihkeh maría elvira eskobar itech 1973 kipiyah se asterisko) in tonali kipia sempwali iwan nawi imanin, in imanin kipia yeyi powali minotoh minoto kipia yeyi powali segon doh. aw inin omotenew yankwik tienda ye muchiwa, ka ye kin ik-ei tlakatl onkan mokaltia in onkan in omotenew san antonio abbad iteopankaltsin ixpan, in iw nestikatki axkan: in ikse tlakatl onkan achtopa ye chanchiwtika yewatl in klérigo itoka lisensiado dorosa xuchmilkopa, in katki ikal in tienda kipia. no ikwak mokets in akwekwexatl. se pantsin bolilo ye tlaiksektli onkak xokot tein tsopek wan seki semi chichik. inik tlatsontekia tlahtoke hustisiatika; monanamikia kekawiaya in kimatia in aso yaoyotl in anosokseki tlamantli in tlein weweixtika kitsontekia. || amo, notahtsin. amaka onwala. in no sesek. 1.- iwan nikitowa i hwan pepena kimanas 4 pesos iwan ik mitos resposus san kiwalitkiti inokonew totoloitsin petlatl iwalitkitilok i hwan pepena aw amo nechmakak aw sa nikitlani i notomines 4 pesos okimixkomakake nixp[an] kimokwitia i hwan pepena ompa kontlania okowitoko. —ñan ika nihchiwilia kaso wehkawi san ixkich in tikichihki nian nihmati keski mektli ahmo chiwilia kaso keski mektli. pawakwowit kemmanian ok onyeya owatl, ahnoso kapoli, tikalakiah ihtik in toktlahtli tokommatiah intla ok tsopelik in owatl iwan titlatetekia, no iwki tikapolkwawtlehkoya, tikkwayah in kapoli, intla ok onyeya, intlakahmo, ahmo ninotekipachoaya ipampa newatl ye senka inikkwa in kapolpotehtli in niktlaliaya ipan iswatl, nikwikaya mila in nikkwas ihkwak nikelewis. ipan in motlahtokatlali in tlakatl koxkoxtli tlahtowani kulwakan; inwexiw in tenanka atlawteka || 127r inin koxkoxtli ka ixwiwtsin in siwapili i konan i komitlani in ilankweitl atlawtekatltewktli. nokonkako in kwikatl nokonitwa xopan axoxochiatl itech, on nenemi tlawiskali in kinonotstinemi xiwkechol elototol, tlawkechol monenkawtsin teuktli. yewa kimati yektlakwalchiwas. no iwan in ihkwak onkan asiko in atentlipan in omotenewke in chichimeka in totolimpaneka, ye no onkan inpan asiko in chichimeka in tenanka in kwixkokka in temimilolka in ihwipaneka, ye kate no achtopa in owasiko; ompa walake in teotenanko in kwixkok in temimilolko. "ah, bweno. yuh omotlanawatili in tlakatl tlatowanwi ipanpa ka nikan kimotlalili in itokatsin iwan in ifirmatsin. fecho en mexiko ut supra. antonio valeriano. paso ante mi migwel xwares eskribano. inoyuhpewalokke onowalkah kimmakakke kaxtiltekah in tlakwali, chalchiwitl, tlakemitl iwan matlakixtin ichpopochtin. se yewantin, in itoka malintsin, wel tlahtoayah ika intlahtol onowalkah iwan mexicah. in iuki kilwiah por in xokok. vii akatl xiwitl, 1343. ma mitspalewi moswerte. satepa nikitowa bweno noniani pero saniman kineki tlatetekos. martes a xv de febrero de 1600 años in don hwan gano de motewksoma español kinexti in motewksomatsin katka, ipan kixew in don hernando de alvarado tesosomoktsin, kinapaloke ika andas iwan balio ik kikaltitiake, ixpan masewalotia inik wala tekpan kiyawak; ixpantsinko nesiko in visurrei iwan mawiltike kastilteka. nikintlamaka asan. in oyuh omik in tenoch nawi tochtli ipan i mik; niman i konkawke in aoktle kiwalkawa in tenochka in tlatilulko. aw sanno ihkwak in ipan in omotenew semilwitl hweves, ipan ilwitsin totekwiyo dios assensión inetlekawilitsin, ihkwak ikoppa omotlakwilwi in españa frai augustín del espíritu sankto inewantsin doktor antonio roke; ipan flota i ya kartas, san ye ok tlatlanilistli konmochiwilia in inpampa in kampa e moyetstikate in ahso wel walmowikaske in san antón teopixke komendadores walaske nikan mexiko. seyahtok wetstok x akatl atle mochiw. el lisensiado pedro swáres de longoria 5 semi monamaka. ix tekpatl xiwitl, 1384. nikan ipan in momikiliko in wewe achitometl in ikmatlaktli tlahtowani kulwakan, in tlahtokat senpowalxiwitl ipan se xiwitl. wan nopa ta tihneki sempwali aw amo kin iyopa inseltin yuh inpan kichiwin in ixkichika nikan ik walkalak mexiko, ka mochi tlakatl yuh inpan kichiwaya in mexika tenochka moyoteka, yehika in tlein san tepiton noso wei ik kontekipachowaya kikwalaniaya frai herónimo de sárate, ka niman kinpinawtiaya teixpan kinketsaya; iwan okseki miek tlamantli in kichiwaya in nikan ik tlatoliniaya, in seki ka wel tetlatlakoltika in tepinawtiaya inik teixpan teketsaya, pórbito kihtowaya ipan sermón in tlein tetlatlakol okitemachili in aso pinawistik iwan inmanel kamo pinawistik, mochi onkan kihtowaya in ipan pórbito, kitekakitiaya in ipan sermón, yuhkima yewatl hustisia mayor iwan yuhkinkisidor mochiwtikatka. in kimanah wan kikwechowah iwan tomat wan kitaliliah keman kichiwah yon mole. nonantsin nechmononochiliaya kename onichokaya ipampa oniknekia nikalakis tlamachtilkalko; ye yiman on ayemo wel miake oyeya temachtikes. ik niman kimotlahtokatlalitsinoke in awitsotsin inik chikwei itlahtokatsin méxiko. aw san niman aokmo tlaawekatlan mochiw in ipan wewei akalotli in nikan mexiko, ka wel popoliwiko in wakiko in omotenew tlakpak atl, in sa wel achiton ika ik apachiwiskia altepetl mexiko tenochtitlan in ipan wewe xiwitl viii tekpatl de 1604 años, in ikwak ipan yewatl moyankwili mochi nowian in itlakawtoka in sa kwikwitla- || 50 -coyontoca in atenamitl. seki kihtowah eski sesek porke itech tet mochiwa wan seki kihtowah eski totonik porke akin amo kinamiki semi moihpotsa wan soneukwi. aw onkan kasike kiwikake in wewe witsiliwitl tlahtowani newan in ichpoch itoka askatlxochtsin, in kinwikake in kulwakan; san pepetlawtiake, aoktle intech wetstia. aw in kin onmik in itoka hwan osoma wel itech powki in nonkwa mani kali ye atenkopa yetetl in kali amo ak kikwilia in hwan okatka aw kenka tlali ka wewetlali inwewetlal in pedro iwan in iteikkaw san ixkich in nikitowa notlatol. paso ante mi migwel hernandes eskribano. kwaltia mah ikatepoxpikikan, se kimanelowa iwan ok seki xiwit wan tenamiki ihwak yon se sonewi, se kitalia iwan se kwowachxiwit wan kemah ika tepoxpikih ya. okinenotsalan: kemmanian, intla ahmo nikmatia kenin itla nikihtos, niktemoaya ipan tlahtolnechikolamoxtli; yuhkin opanok ihkwak monekia nikihkwilos “azúcar”, ipan amoxtli oniknexti in inawatlahtolkwepalis: kaxtilan chiankaka, “yece, oniknemili, ahmo kwali yes nikihtos “caxtilan”, ipampa ayokmo kaxtilan; ye nikan motoka, nikan momaka, no ye toaxka, ¿ihuan chiankaka? inin nien ayokomo aka kiximati; niknemili okachi kwali yes nikihtos “tlatzopeliloni”, iwan yuhkin onikkaw. aw in o imelel kis, niman ye ik witse omotlaliko in inxakalko. inin testigo otlatlanilok kwix kimati in ipampa tlali mili tlalistakapan kexkich akike tlaleke kitowa testigo inik nokonmati ka mochipa niknokwitlawiya in mili ka yewatl tlale nemake in lorenso tikokyawakatl nikan chane mexiko in inemak napowal wiyak inik patlawak senpowali maitl. iii kali xiwitl, 1261 años. netlatolo, konilwia in kapitán: “ca owalake tlatilulka otiquimanato”. aw no ikwak ipan in in walkalakke i wexotsinka, in ikwak i yaomayake i moyaochiwtikatka in tlaxkalteka i wexotsinka in chololteka; nikan nawxiwtiko in mexiko tenochtitlan i nowian altepetlipan, aw in okalakiloke in okiwaltsawkke. aw in akolmisi ye mopilwatia ye kichiwa kwawtlatoasi, ikome xiwkecholpotonkasi, siwakpopokasi, mometskopinasi, iweltiw kolwasi tepexik ya. nikan ipan in in omomikiliko in nawyotsin in ikome yuhki itoka in, in ikchikome tlahtowani kulwakan, in tlahtokat ompowalxiwitl onchikome; aw sa niman ipan in in omotenew xiwitl onkan walmotlahtokatlali in itoka kwawtexpetlatsin ikchikwei tlahtowani mochiw in kulwakan. || chikwei akatl xiwitl ika ye mononotsa kwawtlatoasi, iskoatsi, in kiketsato mexika kalpoli tlakateko in unkan tisaapa. lea teotlak xwalmwikatsino. mah amo nechtatilikan itech tepeyohkal tahpiani, inawakwawitl okitemakaya; inon okikwitiaya
