ahuatzapotl. ikwak owetsia awatsapotl walaya inon okikwitiaya kaxtilankopa belota. technonotsaya kename kwali omochiwaya ke kafé. omosekia iwan omotisia iwan okineloaya ika tepitsin kafé tlen okwalnamakaya tepostlantlaka. in totoltemeh yetokeh inik nantli.. xinechneskayotili kani mokawak, kiiluiaj. eloatoli iuki kitokaitiah por in mapisiltik. mochiwa kwoutah oso kajfentaj. aw sa yewantin in wewe tsiwtlakawki yaopol iwan in chalchiwtsin in ompa asika in itokayokan in sitlan, inik yahka wewe tsiwtlakawki yaopol kiwikaka kimamatia in iteow in itoka mixkowatl. in kali tonatiw ikalakiyampa itstikak in itepots inik motamachiwa yematl ipan senyolotli in inakas san no ixkich ipan senyolotli. aw in omotenew tlayawalolistli inik mochiw, san nikan itlanawatiltika in provisor, ipampa ikwak manka kokolistli toskamiawalistli, mochi tlakatl yuh mochiw. aw iwan ye matlakxiwitl in ipan iii akatl xixiwitl, 1599 años, in owala in omotlaliko mexiko don herónimo lúpes mestiko, hwes governador mochiwako in mexiko tenochtitlan, inin xaltokan ichan; aw ikwak wel kikaw in itekiw inik hwes governador katka wewe don antonio valeriano, in tlahtokat tenochtitlan senpowali onchikome xiwitl. in sesek, kwando se tayi se momaka kwenta. ¡ ma ika xi mototi! onkak ome taman: s¡-wakakate, poxawak in ikwouyo wan yek neli taki; kakatemacho sayoh xochiyowa wan yek takwaktik kemeh omit. xa itech tixochit, wan onkan satepa pos oksehpa yomotl amuchiw. ihtik se litro iwan tlahko atl motlalia in nakatl, ika xonakatl, axox iwan istatl, ma kwakwalaka ixkichkaw in ye tlawikxitili; in chili moihseki ika xitomatl, xonakatl iwan axox; mochinin motesi, satepan motsoyonia ika yei xumali pitsochiyawisotl; motlalilia achitsin istatl; motekilia in istayutl kampa owiksik in nakatl; motlalilia in istayutl kampa owiksik in nakatl, iwan nakatl, in nanakatl; motlapachoa inik wiksis ika ahmo wei tletl. motlakayo i tekpatl xiwitl, 1480. aw ken kimitalwiske in tlahtoke?; ma tamechtowikilikan ma tikintotlapalwiti!". itspahpata ipa se kikwa sah in inakayo : achto se kiteyohkixtia para oksi ya wan kemah se kikwa ya. in san tewa moteki. intla tiasneki, mantiwian. nesi yowehkan in ihkwak saimanon otiahkeh sine. xiii tochtli xiwitl, 1518 años. ximoketsa, xik tsotsona in towewew. in ma ikniwtlamacho. at on titlanewiko saniyo takayew iwan toxochiw. kimolwili niktennamiki in momatsin in mokxitsin in titlatowani ka ye otikmokakilti inik niknonamakilia in nokal nawtemani akokalo itwalo aw ka san no niknokowi mochintin imixpan mochiw in tlaxilakaleke in ikwak niknokowi aw ka ye omochiw in pregones inik otsatsiwak in se metstli otekakitilok yewatl wel kimokowia in otitononotske español lwis savalos in nechmaka matlakpowali pesos achtopa onikkwik chikonpowali on matlaktli pesos aw sa onpowali onmatlaktli pesos in nechmakas ik asis matlakpowali pesos in tomines in nokalpatiw. aw ye kin ipan de 1609 años, ye itlamian metstli marso kwaresma, in onmopewalti ompa mowikak in michwakan, ompa komikwanili in toweitlahtokaw rei, inik ompa ye no yewatsin motlapachilwis ik mopatlak in waxakak. in kwamekat. aw inik nelti omotlanawawatilike [sic] hwes govemador yoan alkaldes ordinarios ye kimoneltililia nikan kimotlalilia intokatsin infirmatsin fecho a primero de agusto de mil e kinientos i noventa i seis años. geronimo lopes geronimo de soto alkalde sebastian de san fransisko alkalde intenkopantsinko hwes gobernador yoan alkaldes gwilermo krusate eskribano. tlamantli para ma mitsmelawa?" kenin mochiwa ayikana kikwalani sampa noha achi yahki noha ika nehon nimitskwehmoloa tepitsin nikan kampa tehwa timotekipanoa, kitlanantehke ikanasta wan walahki. se kwarto pitsochiyawisotl aw in mochiwato ipan viernes a xix de marso de 1599 años, ikwak ilwitsin kis in sant joseph. totapalol, vi tochtli xiwitl, 1290 años. xi tochtli xiwitl, 1230. xi tochtli xiwitl, 1282. aw inik teoyotika omotlahtokatiliko mexiko san wel nawxiwitl. aw in yewantin in xochteka in xikalanka in ulmeka in kiyawisteka in kukolka sanno ipan in in omotenew in kali xiwitl in kitonaltiaya in inteow katka in atl; i ye ontlachia in chichimeka in totolimpaneka ye moteomanilia in xochteka in ulmeka in xikalanka in kiyawisteka in kukolka, ye poktli moketsa in ikpak tepetsintli chalchiwmomostli tamoanchan. in okimah frai herónimo de sárate inin omoteochiwtsinoke yankwike sanktome inka tewan umpa motlayawalwiske sant hwan la penitensia in ipan in omotenew martes sankto, niman ihkwak in ipan omotenew domingo de ramos onkan kinmotsakwilili in mexika san hoseph in insanktotsitsinwan inik amo umpa tewan motlayawalwiske san hwan; kihto in frai herónimo de sárate "amo wel xeliwis in altepetl, ye kin iksen in ipan hwebes sankto nikan san hoseph motlayawalwiske in san hwan baptista iwan imikilitsin san diegotsin". aw niman nokitoke in imeixtin ka senka ik otechyolpachiwitin in hernan peres español ka wel senka otechtlaxtlawili ka wel ipatiw omochiw lxxx pesos in kali iwan itlalo ichinayo ka wel senka otechmotlaokolili ipanpa ka yuhkin totatsin techmotlasotilia. . aw kin wikaya intlawis kin om akiaya in ahso siwatl konakiaya in tlawistli ipampa ka yaotitlan in kisaya in kim imakasia toyaowan tekwantepekatl tsapotekatl chiawpanekatl in intsalan kiyasa. aw in onkan inpan asiko in inpan kisako chikwei altepeme in onkan onoke masewaltin in motenewa teokolwake. sino ke mah miakiya, aw ka iwan in itoka baptista egnasio iwan in itoka antonio sabéliko in amoxtli kikwiloke i neixkwitili in mitowa motenewa exemplos, onka ittalo ka pewke itechpatsinko in dios; aw yese tleik moneki tle yas in ineixkwitilo in tlaltikpak tlaka, aw itla wel yewatsin in totekwiyo dios itechpatsinko tikpia tikana in welyolki nalkiski, in atle iwki inamik in oktakatl machiyotl, inik kimonawatili amapan kikwilos in ichiwaloka semanawatl in iyamatlakwilokatsin. aman agosto onkati ya. amokeman tikmatih ihkwak wilowats tlakapa. in amo nikmati komo kikwih pahti. sankwalyotika onikoch. ¿aquin wits? nochiwa itech ixtawat. inik nawtlamantli nikitowa notlatol xv pesos intech powis in nonatstin katka iwan notatsin seki misa ikipan mitos in nonantsin aw in notatsin no seki itech moneki inin nikitowa amo poliwis. inik 1 tlamantli nikitowa ini nokal i noka niwetstok sentetl siwakali tonatiw ikalakiyapa itstikak iwan sentetl kaltepito iwan kalixatl akkokalo iwan iyatenyo nikitowa in tla nechmopolwis in totekuyo dios in yewantin in inawixtin nopilwan i nikan ye motlalia in itoka hwana martin, hwan maltin, hwan fransisko, hwana baskwala. aw in satepan in omottake in omonenewilike in san nenewke inik chichimeka, niman kimotlapanike in tepetl amakeme inik niman onkan kitlalike in ome altepetl: in isekka itstlakosawkan totolimpa amakemekan, in ikokkan tsakwaltitlan tenanko chikonkowak amakemekan; iwan ikwak kitlalike in ixkich inkwaxoch, inik niman motlalike. komino ixkich tikkwi ika tomahpil inin nikan tlakat nikan tepiltsin mexiko konkistadores intechpa kis, iwan yewatl in in tlakpak miekkan omotenew in itoka, ka achtopa etlamantli itekiw mochiw in nikan mexiko in ayemo yuh obispo mochiwtsinowaya in iksentlamantli nikan iglesia mayor arsediano katka; in ikontlamantli itekitsin muchiw igovernador kiwalmochiwilika nikan mexiko in teoyotika tlahtowani don alonso fernándes de bonila arsobispo mexiko in ok ixkichika umpa monemiltiaya in in okik visita kimochiwiliaya in ompa ipan tlahtokaaltepetl pirú, inik ompa ipan momikili itekitsin, amo wel walmowikak in mexiko; in iketlamantli itekitsin muchiw don hwan de servantes kathetrádiko katka in ika eskriptura kiponwaya in nikan de la viversidad eskwela mexiko, inik niman satepan obispo mochiwtsino waxakak, inik ompa omomikilito, inik owala axkan itenyotsin. 96. iwan onkan mani in koyawak teskatl, in nekok xapowki, immiktlan tlanesi, in ilwikak tlanesi, inik onkan tontlachixtika; in kenamikan immiktlan, in ilwikak inik tonitstika in semanawak; iwan onkan ihkak" in tomawak okopili, in ahmo pokyo, in ahmo ayawyo inik nowiyan tlankstimani in kkmanawak, inik walittalo in itlawiskalo, in itonameyo, immaw, immotkpew. aw iwan omitsmati, omitsikxiti; omitsatlapalti in dios, omitskwitlapilti in ipan onok, in ipan momoyawatok, sesenmantok immatsin, immotepetsin. in tikyakana, in tikiskaltia, in tiknenkkiltia; inik omitsihkwilo, inik omitspoyaw in totekwiyo, iwan omitstenti, omitstlanti, omitstleyoti. omitsmawissoti; inik omitstetsilo, inik omitsapan, inik omitstisawi, inik omitspotoni, inik omitspanti, inik omitstetewti. tlen 71 tlanawatihkayotl. tlen tlatechpowili mopewaltis tlahtol tlanawatilmeh noso tlahtol tematilismeh itechpowi i. weyi tlanawatihketl tlen totlalnantsin; ii. tepantlahtoanih iwan wehkapah tepantlahtoanih tlen sennechikolistli; iwan iii. tlahtokan tlen tlaltlanahuatilmeh. in amatlapewaltilmeh tlen tlatemaktilis weyi tekiwa tlen totlalnantsin, tlahtokan tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh noso tepantlahtoanih tlen inin intechpowi, panoseh inimako tequichihualismeh. tlen kiixnextiseh tepantlahtoanih noso wekapah tepantlahtoanih, motlaskilis ipan tekichiwali tlen kiixnextis tlanawatili tlen tlahtolkamanali. mochiwa kampa nen hortalisas, yon mochiwa semi komo kitaliiiah abono de borregos. aw in ipan semilwitonali in oasik ilwiw, inepantla tonatiw, tlapitsaloya, tlakokixtiloya aw in pipiltsitsinti kosolko onoke kinakastekia aw mochi tlatatl misoya. aw atle ik tlapaloloya; san ixkich in nesosowaya tlakokixtiloya, tlenamokoya. mochi tlakatl ayak ixkawtikatka. antokniwané, namechtetemowa. sesenkwemitl niktoka aw ika ankate. xon papaktiakan, xon tlaketstiakan. san ye on niwalasik in amokniw namokniwan. aw in tlayawaloke ixkichtin españolesme; vela krus perochia senkixowak, ompa senkiske in iskitetl kofradías. aw in vela krus sankto ligno krus andasko mikatiltitiw, palio ik kimokaltilitiwi, iwan totlasonantsin nwestra señora del rosario wei andasko mikiltitiw; teopixke kimonapalwike, iwan miyekintin teopixke motlayawalwike. in senyelis chikome owatsintika mewa. newa notoka enrike. iwan opew tlakatl: inin se peso amo xoxokew. okwakwalaka itik xoletl. kwal on nikpapak ka xapo ika ichtli in se peso. iman kwakwalaka atl ika xoletl oniktlakal inin peso itik xoletl. wan xikitakan: nian xoletl amo xoxoktik nian se peso amo xoxokew. inin kitosneki kwakwali xoleme. aw in yehoatl angelina de la krus kitlalitia itestamento kitotika in unkan niwetstok in kali tonatiw ikisayampa itstikak yoan in unkan monoltitok ixiptlatsin totekwio yoan muchi itlalo ithoalo yoan in unkan onok tepatsintli iski ik wiak iski ik patlaoak ka nikkowili in itoka hwan kwawtsetseltin nikmakak makwili peso. 20v nikan mihtowa motenewa in kenin iwan im kampa inchan in kampa walewake in axkan motenewa mexika, aw kin satepan nikan okikwitasiko in ikontlamantli ik notsalo tenuchka. aw in yewatl in pedro nali imak nikkawa in tlali in ixkichika in okiwalpixtia in ye makwilxiwitl anoso ye matlaktli xiwitl san iw kipies iwan in iteikaw in itoka maria tlako mononotsaske in aso kimoxelwiske yewantin kimati inmak nikkawa. kani kikwise para motlipichise mochiwa saj, ixwa iteyo. kiwika para kimahkawaski niman kinankili kilwi "ca amo nisia, ka san iw yes". ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. iuki monotsa por in kwoutah mochiwa. aw in axkan sa iselton in omokaw ana tepi ka nel ixtlamati ma momaka in inemak in ipan ikwiliwtika testamento ka ixkichi inik kiitlaniko in iwelitilis hustisia. in oiw kimasike, niman kinnonotsato in kulwakan tlahtowani koxkoxtli iwan oksekintin pipiltin in itoka wewe akamapichtli iwan in itoka in ikome yuhki itoka achitometl iwan oknose itoka chalchiwtlatonak, in pipiltin kimilwike || 64r in inmasewalwan: "ca otikimanke in mexika pipiltin, oksenka yewatl otikanke in witsiliwitl in intlahtokaw mexika, iwan in ichpuch chimalaxochtsin iwan in teskakowakatl iwan in simatsin". senka tipahpakiah in tikchiaya ahsis in tonali in tlalwikixtilos ompa tochan; tikimmochiliaya tokniwtsitsiwan, tosetkawan in walmowikayah techmotlahpalhuizqueh. mochintin imixpan in omomaman estakas aw in ikwak in kali koyowakampa itstikak in itepots nanmatl iwan semomitl in iyomotlan hematl ok sentetl tonatiw ikalakiyampa itstikak se no sentetl tonatiw ikalakiyampa itstikak ik mixnamiktimani iwan in tepankali iwan in tlalkowali mochi otikimonsemaxkatiko aw inik wel oneltik in posesion onkan momama sesen estakas in onkan tlami tlapowali in onkan tlatlanti kwaxochtli yewatli in otikimonsenmaxkatiko. no nana iwan siwatekipano miak tekitl quipiah. ne ehkatlan semi kitokaj. tenonotsalistlahtoli in tenan ik kinotsa kixtlamachtia in ichpuch. itlanahnamik: ¿catlehua kawayo okachi patio? in tliltik kawayo. aw in santiago tlatilolko no iwan nowian apachiw in altepetl, aw sa ixkich in ompa tiankistli in amo apachiw; inik yehika ompa kiwikaskia ompa kimanaskia in tiankistli sankt ipólito iwan in tiankistli sant hwan, ik moteilwiaya in tlatilolka, aw yese amo wel mochiw, ik mixnamikke in tenochtitlan tlaka. senka ik motolinike; in sesenkali in namikeke in intekiw mochiw matlatlaktetl omehei, ipan mochi tlakatl sepan ya, ayak mokaw. nikawín no mochiwa komo se kitoka, sayoh amo semi kitokaj. —¿quen yes ke hin, teteuhé? ¿cuix onteixtin ontlatokaske, onteixti yuh tlanextiske ? aw in ihkwak ye intlahtokaw in mexika in chalchiwtlahtonak, aw ik niman ye kikokolia in itiachkaw, kwalani ye kihtowa "camo welitis, in se intlahtokaw yes in mexika; ka san moch nikinsenpachos newatl in mexika, in iw okatka tothatsin motewksuma". ixkichi in itlatol omochiw tlatlanilok yekexkichkaw aw in nemi kito yeyepoalxiwitl onchikwein. aw inik neli iten itlatol in ixkich nikan onikwilo ipampa se krus imatikan nikan kiketsa amo kiximati tlakwilolitstli nixpan in oninotenew eskrivano nombrado gabriel mwisen, [rúbrica] lorenso del agwila [rúbrica] anton krusate eskrivano nombrado. ayohnekuhatoli de amo teh ika seliya, aw ye noseppa ikwak nekokolok; yestli toyakakpa kis, wel totokak in kokolistli, miek tlakatl in momikili. ... i mexika. aw intla aka itlan timonemitis, timotlakwitlawis in ichantsinko titletlalis, titlatlatlalis, titlachpanas, ye tihkas, ye tinemis; ye tatlis, ye titlakwas in tetlok, in tenawak; ka intla san onkan titlakolos, titlakatsawas, ahmo tiwekawas. aw in manka atl nikan mexiko in amo wel wakia onxiwitl ipan tlakoxiwtika inik wakiko in ipan xiwitl omotenew. mewakan mochachos porke šitlačati’ in seminteras. isiwtika tlachpana, ixpan konteka petlatl. in okontekak, niman ye ik kixintinis in itlaken yetikak in yakatekutli. aw mawel yuh mochi tlakatl kimati ka niman amo welitis in wekawtika ixpoyawaties ixkwichewaties ixmatlalewaties in tonatiw, ka san isiwka onkistikisa; ka in kenin nepantla tonatiw in tlamelawkaonmottitia in sewalkali, ka tettsakwilia inik amo topan tonas, yese niman in ye ommopilotiw in ye onmotskalotiw tonatiw, techtlanextilia in onkan amo techtlanextiliaya. ye tlatlapohticateh. nia nik notsas sente tlamamani inik tokimíl tech wi “ kilis ompa kalotiloyan. timits tlatlahtia xikonotsa in tlapixki. inalwayo no kikwih in parteras, kwando pewa olini in siwat ki man i i iah para tayis. tlen 29 tlanawatihkayotl. keman totlalpan calaquiseh, onkas kwalantli ipan altepeyotl, noso seyok tlamantli kwalantli tlen kikalakis mahmayotl ipan altepeyotl, san tlayekanani tekiwa tlen sentlanawatiloyan mexihko totlalnantsin, itechpan tlahtoli tlen kiyekanah sekretarías de estado iwan prokuraduría general de la repúblika iwaya itlahtolseliltis tlen sentika weyi tlahtokan iwan keman inin mosiahkawas, tlen komisión permanente, welis kikotonas ipan nochi mexihko tlaltikpaktli noso san kampeka tlali, tlanelchiwalistli tlen motlahkowia tlen amo welis moixketsas, saniman iwan amo owin kwesoli; san moneki amo mowekawilis, ika sentika tematiltilistli iwan amo aken welis motlatlakawis. tla inin tlakotontli mochiwas keman monechikohtos weyi tlahtokan, inin temaktilis tlamakixtilistli tlen kiitas moneki iwikpa tekichiwani tlen sentlanawatiloyan welis kiixnamikis tlahtoli; tla mochiwas keman mosiakawa, saniman monotsas weyi tlahtokan iwikpa momsenkawa tlahtoli. pamitl tlen ii tlen mexihko tlakameh vii akatl xiwitl, 43. kitlayawalkwili ka yuh moneki inin motenewa palio inik tlachiwtli yuhkinma san nelpiloni ipan powi in motenewa faxas tepitoton achi onmapili inik patlawak, in moteka kiyawaliwka ahsitok in nekokkampa akolipa, aw in itepotsko tlanepantla in ikampa achi weyak semistitl inik wiak, aw in ixpan san ye no ixkich wiak sa tel achiton inik tepiton; aw inon yuhki nelpiloni faxas kisepanpachowa in akoli, in ika okseki faxas in kiyawalotok itepotsko kechtli aw itech kipia itech tlatlalili ei teposwitsmalotl aguhas ahnoso alfileres, ka kihtoneki kineskayotia tlamawisoli; aw in ipipilkaya palio itech kipia itech kahka keski tetl telolototonti temetstli, amo wel istak teokwitlatl yes; aw iwan itech kipia itech kahka krus chichiltik chikwasen in itlamelawyan aw san ome tlatlatepotsko, san itech tlatlamachiwtli, inin miek itech ka kineskayotia miek teotlamawisoli. niman tikinnotske in tlaxilakaleke pedro hernandes tomas de akino bartolome garsia gabriel xwares fransisko de luna fransisko sanches hwan garsia diego sanches chikwei tlakatl huramento omakoke inik otlatlakoltiloke in ipaltsinko in totekuyo dios ihoan totlasonantsin santa maria senkiska ichpochtli ihoan ika in imachio santa krus. nochi yato ihkontsin moskaltia de 25 a 40 sentímetros kampa kipiya abono. in ye mochi ones omonextin in semanawatl in tlaltikpaktli inik ye ixkichkaw axkampa ka nawkampa in moxelowa. mochiwa kampa chaparral oso kuoujyoj. nokniwan axkan teka tokoltsitsiwan cateh. tlahko kilo textli aw inik walmowikak inik maxitiko mexiko, ok konfirmasió kiwalmotemakilitikis in kwawtitlan iwan tepotsotlan. kana kan imán nepa kitlamotla kahsi se pino kitlamotla arranka pinos. axkan sábado in ik 11 mani metstli oktubre de 1614 años, ihkwak nikan siudad mexiko teopan san augustín omaxitiko in teoyotika tlahtowani don frai hwan sapata i sandoval obispo teopixki sant augustín, ompa itekitsin motlalia kimopielis in altepetl siudad chiapa; inin nikan mexiko chane nikan tepiltsin motenewa kriolo, españa walmowikak nikan mowikak, wekaw ompa omoyetstikatka in españa, inik ompa okimomakili rei in teoyotika itlahtokayotsin. ankasaikik toselochokaske, in tikwawewetke. nomaikniwan yowalahkwaii aw in ipampa inon, in iw kitowa, ka ye ipampa inik mosepaixnamikke inik monetechchalanike, in amo ilokakopa in amo itlanekilistika in kapitán inik kisaya in kiwatlakwikwiliaya iwan kinwaltoliniaya in masewaltin; aw inik kinmiktike in oksenka tlapanawia miyekintin in yewantin masewaltin weka in amo itlan in inyaokatl españoles, aw in satepan kinyaoyawaloko onkan iwan kintlatilike in inyaokatl in itik katka, yehika san moch kwawitl, aw in ixkich tlakatl españoles in itik katka ik mochtin momayawke in weyapan inik mochtin onkan mikke atitlan. nikan nimitstatawtiti itech nehin tonal, motekipacho wan xtechchiwilikan favor yei totoltetl no se kikwi in owapach, komo se kineki kochpetat. seki kinamakah kihkilowiah wan se kikinamakah tatatehtek, tamanal ya. i kali xiwitl, 1285. aw in ikontlamantli kihtotiwi wewetke, itech || 49r kikwitasiko in onkan mani wei ateskatl, yehika ipampa kitokayotiaya i ye wekaw tlaka wewetke katka chalchiwmatlalatl in atl, aw i wei ateskatl kitokayotiaya chalchiwtlikwe; aw inik kichalchiuhitowaya atl in akxoteka, yqu itech okikwike inik okimotokayoke chalka. okse tlakah in herónimo de agwilar tetlayakoltiani katka mayatewktli in ichantsinko. yewatl in, oya itlok in tepewani inoyuh notsalo, aw in axkammochipa kintepotstokak in caxtiltecah. herónimo de agwilar mayatlahtoltika wel in tlahtoaya. onkan pew in xoloko sant antonio abbad ostokaltitlan in ye mochiwa in ye moteka yankwik tetenamitl, ik san ompa ontlantika in xokonochnopalyakak in amanalkopa; ik kitsakwilike in atl ipampa in senka walapexontikalakia in ihtik siudad inik ye tlaapachowa, ka mochi tepeatl in onkan walmomana awatsalpan. ome axoxtlantli x tekpatl xiwitl, 20. amo akah kitoka, in ewa sah itech in kwapalak. satepan onechitak, yewa okis ka ixtlawapa. xv pregon.- a veinte i kwatro de hebrero de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in tlaxilakalpan tlokalpan okitekakiti inik monamaka ikal itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak tlanankili testigo thomas de santiago. ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. ipan in in onkan senpowalxiwtike mexika in chapultepek inik onkan katka. okatka yaya katka respekto otiyaya' ninkolexio ta'siya' totlankwakecaya' wan toresaroaya'. in okixkichika hwan diego katka iixpantsinko semikak ichpochtsintli; kilwiaya itehnankilis in kitkilito itenkopa wei teopixkatlahtoani; in oiwkimokakiltih in tlahtokahsiwapili, quilhuih: ka ye kwali, amo tixkanwis in mokneliloka ka timihiyotamachiwas wel on tlamis in mihiyo in motlapaliwis. . aw in sam maseoaltin intech monekia itsnakochtli teposnakochtli iwan itstlaewali neximaloni iwan vitsawki iwan koyoli iwan witsmalotl, nochestli, tlalxokotl, tochimitl, tlakopahtli, xochipahtli. seppa tlatlamaya, manoso tlamatlawiaya. in atlaka sentetl kasike tototl nextik, iwkin tokulkoyotl. nima[n] kittitio in motekusoma, tlilan, kalsemak. ichimal ipan chipuchika wei a mixiwilok yautlato ichimal ipan chipuchika wei a mixiwilok yautlato . aw in ik nawxiwtiake ompa ayotlan in intson wel in kwitlakaxiwyan wal wetstia in ikwak walewake. itstok nopa pilokichpiltsi. aw iwan ye matlakpowalxiwitl ipan yepowalxiwitl ipan matlaktlomome xiwitl in ipan 1 se kali xiwitl, 1337 años, in moxeloke mexika, matlaktlomome tlakatl in omotlalito xaltilolko, in axkan ye tikitowa tlatilolko; in ompa yahke mexika chichimeka in ikse || 85 itoka kwitlachkwawtli teomama, in ikome itoka xochileletsin, in ikei itoka semakachikiwitl, in iknawi itoka xomimitl, in ikmakwili itoka kalaomitl, in ikchikwasen itoka oselopane, in ikchikome itoka atlankwawitl, in ikchikwei itoka istakmichin, in ikchiwknawi itoka kosiwatli, in ikmatlaktli itoka poyawitl teomama, in ikmatlaktlose itoka xiwkoyolatsin, in ikmatlaktlomome itoka maltekatsin. aw niman ye ik kikwepa in tlatoli in puchteka tlatoke in iskintin sesen altepetl ipan. tlapachowa teyakana kitowa in ipan axkan ik 2 mani metstli mayo de 1606 años, ikwak omomikili in don diego romano obispo katka tlaxkalan. in sesek. lkan omotak ika miaktin kokone opopolawia itik tlamachtilkalko momochko malakatepek owaltemoke momachtikes desde tupileho, san pablo ostotepek, san pedro atokpan, santa ana tlakotenko, san lorenso tlakoyuka, san fransisko tekospa, san herónimo miakatlan iwan san hwan tepenawak. nochtinin kokone okakawania ipan milpa alta. nichoka yewa niknotlamati, san nikelnamiki tikkautewaske yektli ya in xochitl yektli ya in kwikatl. in ma ok tonawikan, ma ok tonkwikakan, sentiyawi, tipoliwi ye ichan. aw kil sa yewantin in ilamatsitsin unkan mokawaskia monasterios in temachtiskia; aw kil ok yewantin in tliltike siwa kalakiskia in monasterios, onkan motsakwaskia inik ok yewantin siwateopixkatiskia monhastin mochiwaskia. xikihta ilnin nien ayammo kimati tekitis iwan tlen ye kelewial ok tenkwalaktli san kaxtoli ome xiwitl kipia iken ika ye kimatis in tlaltikpakkayotll notetla kinmopilia makwili tepilwan. anaikwowit in ikei ichpochwan kwawsesekwitsin tlamaokatltewktli itoka chimalmantsin, inin konmonamikti chilmoltsin tiyakaw. mahtlaktli ome wakki kwawchili in kwowit no kemeh kostiktsapot. pahti para in tataxis, sayoh mah se kikwa in tsapot. v tekpatl xiwitl, 1172 años. aw in kwawtliketski ye kitowa "oquimihiyohuilti in tlakatl ka omaxitiko in witsilopochtli, ka yewatl || 93v ontlasotis". aw in okinemilito algwasil pedro hakobo in iw mani in kali iwan tlali aw in okipixke in ikal iwan in tlali senpowalxiwitl onkaxtoli omome inik omopakkanonotske inik ye kinomakan. aw inik neli nikan titlalia totoka iwan tofirmas fecho en mexiko. don martin kortes regidor don antonio de mendosa regidor pasó ante mi hwan de san fransisko eskrivano nombrado. no nehwa no nikwelita. ipan se tekpatl xiwitl kimottahtokatlalitsinoke akamapichtsin yuh inik se wei intlahtokatsin. aw in okimonsenkawke yowalnepantla achtopa kintlakwaltia kimatlitia. yewa amo oyeya noihki. weyi ika nehin kwawta para timoixpetanis, nochi ihkwak ye oquitlanqueh, ye okichiwkeh in temaskali, motemoah in teoyotikatahtli iwan monotsa in teopixki. mochiwi saj, in iteyo ixwa, ta in no teyowa. komo se kineki se kipiyas, se kiwiwita kampa onkak wan se kitoka itaktsoyo kampa tet itsinta. amo momeutani. in ipan siudad mexiko a veinte i dos dias de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años ik sempowali onse tonatiw inik tsatsiwa tekakitilo inik kinamaka in ikal marianan chikonpowali onmatlaktli kitema español itoka lwis savalos aw in ikwak otsatsiwak ayak otlanankili testigo diego astoxochitl. na niyas nitekititi wan ta xitlachiwas tiyasa xi kali xiwitl, 1321. . in ikwak ye kisa estli imatika konkwi kitowaya teonawpa in kontlasa tleko. niman ye ik ipan kichichipitsa in amatl in oipan ommihsok. o ixkichtlamantli in in italwililoke in tenewililoke in tliltsitsin, iwan okseki miektlamantli in italwiloke in amo wel moch nikan motenewas tlahtoli, ka senka miek in intech tlan; in aso neli kichiwaskia in anoso amo, ka san iseltsin wel yewatsin kimomachiltia in totekwiyo dios intla yuhtika, yehika ipampa ka amo wel melawak kimokwititiwi in sekintin. aw in intsonteko onkan tepilolkwawtikpak kinsasaloke, aw in intlaknakayo onkan kinkalakike in kontadoría tlatsintla; sa moch kechkotontia onkan kinkimiloto in inwayolke tliltike, aw in ayak ika mochiw san iwki, aw ik niman ye teotlak ye ipan chikwasen tsilini in onkan kimonewaltike, umpa kintokato in hospital nwestra señora de || 192 la miserikordia. newa ye oniyekatka. se kilo poyoxnakatl in kolwaka in chikomostok in kinewya unka kixowak unkan kiske in tokolwa inik nowian altepetlipa. ¡yca xonawiakan! in ikwak on, in san ye inmah in tlasemiknopilwiliskawipan in ipan in omotlakatilitsino in totekwiyo dios omochiw weilwitl in ompa ilwikak, iwan in ixkichtin in angelosme walmowikake kimotlatlawtiliko kimoteotitsinoko iwan kimiximachiliko inik intlahtokatsin iwan intekwiyotsin iwan intlahtokapetlaikpaltlachichiwkatsin in kiwaltlatlapantewake in akwaltin in tlaweliloke angelosme, in iw kiwalchiwtewake, inik walwetske inik waltlasaloke ilwikak. nimitstemas noixwi niman ye kilwia in tsiwtlakawki in yaopol: "cuix ye onkan in in titlawelmati, in at ye onkan; ma ye onkan ximotlali". no kwaltia para pahti; ika se kichiwa pelotilas. kien sabe kanika san yato san hwan bautista entonses machiwala yowalahke mach achto kwaltlamotlatewak muxulwaswia in sowatl porke kilwi ikonew muxulwaswi ikan solwasdi xikixti mochin mokonkal onkan tipewas timosikawaswis ika sikawastli para tipepekton tias tikwatapaxi. tikateh ¿ kan onnikmasewia in mach iwkan nitlakat, in tlaltikpak ixama ? ik yektli ya weliwi kampa nemoa san kitoa noyol. in ikwak okonmokakiti alkalde niman no ikwak konmasikakakiti in testamento in kikawtia isabel anan ik opachiw in iyolotsin senka okimowelkakiti in imelawaka testamento. iwan intla aka itla mitsmolwilis, in itechmoneki immoyolia, ahnoso in tlaltikpak wel nemowaloni, wel ihkaloni, wel tikanas, wel tikkwis, tikmonemilistis, intlakamo tikanilis, intlakamo tikkwilis, intlakamo tiktlakamatis ka senka ik mowiepa motetsawis, tlamawisos, ka ahtle yuhki ipan mitsittas in tlaltikpak. in xiwit totonik. aw in omotenew wetsin masiwi kitokaka yaoyotika kulwake, ka okseppa walmokwep in onkan kulwakan tlahtokatiko. nikan ipan in tsintik in tlahtokayotl in kwawnawak; in achto ompa tlahtokat in motlali itoka teweweltsintewktli. in onkan momikilike in españolesme se sant augustín teopixki telpochtli ayemo missa kichiwaya, iwan in okse español itoka diego de pas prokurador audiensia real katka, in onkan mochtin momikilike matlanwike. in sesek. melawak yehon yoniktlahtlani inda iyolokopa noso aka kichiwaltia tetlanankilis okimonochili hei tewatl iximewal omewalok techtlatlahpaloa kimoyawa xochitl, on awia kwikatl. kwaltia —we'kan ayapanko. turasno kwali se kikwa iteyo, kohkostik. tsilakayoh neh nikittoa, ni xikohtenkatl teuktli maría madre trinidad, pero ya axonka tlake ika tihkakatsose. se kikwa, se kimana ika tenexistat; welik kemeh waukilit. titlasohtlaskiayah ahmolkilit . aw intla san imatika okonan niman ik powi in ihiwiyo in ik xiwtototl sa iwki in kwitlatexohtli mochiwa. iwan in tekwanewatl tlatlawke. ximohtili onechmolwili axkan domingo hweves nimitsmochilia xikinmowalwikili motahtsitsiwan ma yewantsitsin motlahtoltikan in padreme mersenadios in ikwak mowikake motlalitsinoto in ikiawak lwis de tweñas tsawki, ipan tlaxilakali tomatlan, san ik onkis in paskwa resurretión, ipan abril de 1594 años; yexiwitl iwan nawi metstli in onkan katka ipan tlaxilakali sant ipólito teokaltitlan. onkan yotlatlan. tlen 112 tlanawatihkayotl. amo monekis tlahtoli tlahtlakoltili tlen tlahtokan tepantlahtoanih keman akahya tlen altepeko tekitini tlen ixnesi ipan tlahtolpamitl tlen se tlahtoltlahkwiloli tlen 11 tlanawatikayotl kichiwas se tlahtlakoli ipan kawitl tlen keman kikahtos itekiwakayo. tla in altepeko tekitini oksepa kichihtos itekih tlen ipa kichiwa noso kitokatlalihtoseh noso kitlapehpenihtoseh ma kichiwa seyok tlanawatili, tlen moihtowa ipan 11 tlanawatikayotl, mochiwas ken moihtowa ipan inin tlanawatihkayotl. wahka ihkino nama ma elika sopilotes". pisilchalawih kampa tainamiki, mochiwa wehweyi wan kwando tel miak in taki, mochiwa tsikitsitsin. aw ka nel nikikwilowa in itsinpewkayo in ixkich tlamantli, in intlamanitilis in inyelis in tlaltikpak tlaka iwan in inteonemilistika, iwan in itechpa i mochi in ixkich tlamantli onkatki, iwan in ak yewatl in itechpa in ittalok in nes. saniman mosiawa ichkatl onkán moparka. iiii kali xiwitl, 1301. niman ye ik kimotlekawilia pochotitech in kwawtemoktsin, onkan kimopilwike in kowanachoktsin chane teskoko iwan tlepanketsatsin chane tlakopa; inmeixtintsitsin ompa momikilito i weimola pochotitech. aw in iktechikonka ipilwantsitsin tlakatl kwawitsatewktli itoka xiwkwatektsin siwapili, in iktechikweka itoka xochitlistakatsin siwapili. "totecouan é pochteka yé ka nikan anmonoltitoke ka otokonanke ka otokonkwike in chokistli in ixayotl ka otokontlapoke in toptli in petlakali in oilpitoka in otsawktoka in ipatiw in kwawtli in oselotl. ka ye iwki, noxokoyow, nikan mostla okseppa tiwalas inik tikitkilitiw wei teopixki in tlaneltilistli in neskayotl in mitstlahtlanilia; ik niman mitstlahtolkakilis, iwan itechpa ayokik mitschikomatis, ahmo no motech chikoyolowas; iwan ma wel iw ye in moyoloh noxokoyow, ka nimitstlaxtlawis monetlakwitlawilis, motlatekipanolis mosiammikilis, in nopampa titlapohpolotok; tlakwele notelpochtsin ka tel mostla ye nikan nimitsonchixtos. otikitato in kwautlatepantin in ixmaxka tlatoke istlakosawke, wel otonpewke wel achto tepeiewalko se paraxe iwan tekalko, ikome auchpanko, ikei atlikalokan, iknawi toretitlan teapastli inakasko, ikmakwili apatlak tepisin iwa makwilekatl, ikchikwasen apatlaktlik wei, ichikome tepechichinoka, ikchikwei temaskalekan, ikchiuknawi toltitla, ikmatlaktli siwapiliyomisekwilpa. aw in ikwak oyuh kimokakilti in iewatsin hwes governador iwan alkaldes niman onmotlanaoatilike okimonaoatilike in pregonero gaspar lorenso inik tsatsis in ipampa kali ka nel in tlanekilistika in tlanamakaki okinmowelkakililike inin tlaitlanilis. ka nikan tontiachia ipaltsinko in tlakatl totekuyo in tloke nawake otech moknelili. aw in ye ixquich. tikateh in insentetl tonali in disiembre kihtoke in chalka akxoteka kimilwike in chichimeka totolimpaneka "xihualmohuicacan, tlahtokeé chichimekaé, kan anmowika, kan antlamatiwi?". in takilot se kikwa iwan chiltamoltal wan mole wan no kwaltia para pahti se kiixtapana wan se kitekilia refino wan se moyolixxakwalowa ihwak se totonia. ¡aocac kittoa in ye tikinkekesa ilamatsitsin! aw in ik tealtis onkan kitemachitia intla ome kaltis, se okichtli se siwatl, aw intla nawi kaltis, ome okichtli ome siwatl. tlasohtla aw inik momikili in konde de koruña, niman otlapacho ogovernadortik in teoyotika tlahtowani don pedro moya de kontreras arsobispo mexiko, ka inik otetlatetemoli inik visitador mochiw iwan inik otlapacho in ogovernadortik in itekitsin katka in konmanili yewatl ipan xiwitl de 1584 aw ixkich ik walantika yewatl ipan xiwitl de 1586, inik mowikak españa. wan tapiyal waxin, yeh tamelawa xoxoktik. iman owalake inimekes tierra fría soldados okikahke sapata ipan tepetl hilgwero wan tlanonotsaloke okikwamanke sapata. oyak inin general itokan amaro wan okikwaman sapata. okito ye nigwala ononeloko namotlak. aihmo nikarransista ¡axcan ye nizapatista! —tehuatl tiyes, nanawatsé. aw in ihkwak in ye oyuh nepa chiwknawpowali ipan nawxiwitl ompa walkiske in inchan astlan chikomostok in mexika, ka ye ixkichkaw xiwitl kipiaya inik ne- || 52v -mi tlaltikpak in omotenew tekpatsin. san ihkí timokawah wahkino. aw in ik wia in ompa mopieske mosesentlamantilia ahso mamakwiltin ahnoso chichikwahsemme ahnoso matlatlaktin momana is saso keskintin mantiaske. . aw in ikwak osenkis in ye mochi tlamamali, niman ye ik kichichiwa kakaxtika, kikehketsa in tlakewaltin kimamaske achi etik, san kipantia. chichimekohet oso torohet matlaktlomome ompa walmowikake in españa; aw san onmokixtitikiske in mexiko, mowikake a la china inik ompa motemachtiliske. monamaka in itakka. in amo se kitoka, ixwa sah de patani iteyo. ohkión nechchiwaltia ohkión kichiwa pero nimodos tlenon nikitos kion nechchiwaltia ichpokato ohkion kichiwa nimodos tlenon pero ma nichiwa nechilwia ohkion nechchiwaltia lisiana ninkikowka nomanta. aw otlanankilike okitoke ka tixpan hotikitake in nokonkawato sank hoseph kapila in itech powi yanima niman omomikilike alonso tokatl inik misainpan omito iwan ka omakoke karta de pago inik neli. noktakwawach 18v i se akatl xiwitl, 1051 años. luna. notepixkatsin señor san ramos, imaikniwan amo tlen nech paktia. ayokmo kiawi. wahka walkalahki kalihtik nopa wewetlakatl axkan sábado in ik 14 mani metstli abril de 1612 años, ihkwak ik otsatsiwak in ihtik siudad mexiko in tliltike okichti aokak espada kitekas kiwalwikas iwan kwelo aokmo kitlaliske; no iwi in tliltike siwa aokmo tliltik manto kitlaliske, iwan mulatati moch kinkawaltike iwan pena ik kintlalilike. tlachichwtli de ikwitlax in chibos o ikwitlax ixkame. seki tlaka kintlašilia' maxada. x tochtli xiwitl, 670 años. ¿ihuan kexki xiwitl mopilia mosihtsin? in sesek. miak mochiwa. ihwak ixwa ya moneki mah se kichipawa. aw okseppa onse tlakatl in ik onnechteilwiskia intokan maria siwatsintli omik in axka ixpantsinko in mwi magnifiko señor tokdor sorida kilmolwilin notlalkowal in kipia pablo makwex aw niman ik walmotlatitlani in tlatowani sorida kimanako in tlaxilakaleken wewetke i welkimati in ye ixkich kawitl i nikpia i notlal inwan nochinan inik niktek inwan inik niktlachkwitlas. . aw niman ye tlakochkalkatsintli, teskatsin, tlakatekkatsintli, totosakatsin: omextin kwawpipiltin mexikapipiltin. in tlali mokwepa, ya ilwikatl olini, onyek inimekes tlaka, seki okinkwitiaya sapatistas, okseki karransistas, wan okseki vilistas. inimekes yeyi tlamanaltin okalakia ompa momochko malakatepek. otlakwekwepotsaya san tlalwis. ompan altepepa omomawtiaya tlaka, siwame wan piltsitsintin ikan ayemo omomatia tlen omokalaktiaya inomekes tlaka. iii akatl xiwitl, 1599 años. . in tehiktikpak kikis in tekohkotsotlali in toyolo konkwa in iatlitstikaw in iaselsekaw in itsitsikas in tloke nauaque. ini watsalwan wewexochiwake,o sa ketsalchimaleke. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. inin amatl san iuwi in ikwiliwtika ye wekaw mochiw nikan tlatilulko, ipan xiwitl de 1528 años, kin iw walwi kastilteka; wel ompa tlaana inik walkixowak deokorwaka astla, ka tel mochi nikan mottas. ¿ln kanon nemian noyolo? ¿can wel ye nochan? ¿ kan wel nokal mania ? ninotolinia. aw sanno ipan in in omotenew in xi akatl xiwitl, 1295 años, in senpowalonsexiwtike tulam in nonowalka teotlixka tlakochkalka, san ok ya yewatl in intlahtokaw in itoka yakawetskatsin teowatewktli. nelí wan xitlatski kwali nika ne notlakentipa". sesenyaka okinmomakili huramento in testigos nikan audiensia in ipanpa ik moteilwia maria geronima in inamik hwan de eskalante inik mixnamiki antonio hoseph yoan in inamik magdalena ines chaneke sankta ana witsila aw in yehoatsin hwes gobernador okimopakkaselili aw inik nelti in kimotlalilia ifirmatsin itokatsintika fecha ut supra don gaspar de mendosa nixpa fransisko milan eskribano. inik tekpayokan kitokayotike mexika onkan in momikiliko in itoka tekpatsin in ikomentin inteyakankawan mexika, in inewan tlamakaski witsilopuchtli ompa astlan chikomostok kinwalkixtike mexika. aw i yewantin in in otikimontenewke mochintin tlateotokanime gentiles in kimomachistitsinoke in isel teutl dios, aw i nikan tlayakak motlalia yewantin in akike in ki satepa in oyuhke katka in tlakwiloke in intla christianostin, in iwki yewatl kwali yektli itechpa tikana tikpia neltilistli in itoka laktansio firmiano, aw ka inik kitsinpewkayoti in kikwilo amoxtli in kitokayoti divinas institutiones, ka itechpatsinko ikatsinko in pew totekwiyo dios. oksik no se kikwa chilayot: kikwechowah iwan tomat wan akolih wan kimanah ya wan se kikwa ya. tewan ye wel tlahka in kalmanko otualahqueh. aw niman okipilwati in tlakatl kwawitsatewktli, itech okinchiw in omotenew siwapili nawintin in ipilwan, in ompa motlakatilike atenko in ikse tlakatl i wel yakapantli itoka wewe kwawtlewanitsin; in ikome itoka || 43r xiwchiwatsin siwapili; in ik-ei itoka xiwtostsin, ya yewatl in in satepan siwatlahtowani mochiw; in iknawi itoka xochipapalotsin siwapili; san iknawintin motlakatilika in inpilwantsitsin, itech kiske in siwapíli silkwetsin. chichikwepon ikwik ¿zan ka iwkin onyas in o ompopoliwxochitla? ompa amo teyi tatok. aw in yewantin oksekintin in atitlan momikilike satepan ye ikeskilwitiyok in nesiko matlaktlomome tlakatl, in ompan kinkixtike in kimanke chimalwakan atenko in mimikkatsitsinti, ompa tokoke. in ipan se kali xiwitl (in ye nenewki etsontli onkaxtoli omompoali ommakwili xiwitl ipan ixiwpowal in wewe semanawak), mochiw altepepan in itoka tridentum inik kaxtoli onnawi wei aw ka oksenka yewatl ipan inepantla in afrika in katki in yewatl wei tewkyotl tlahtokayotl in onkan motokayotia nubia, in kampa motlalia in inweitlahtokaw in motenewa in intoka abbassinos, in san ik kisentokayotia tlahtowani preste hwan, kitosneki teopixki klérigo in tlahtowani hwan. satlatsonko, ipan chikonawi tekpatl xiwitl, omotlalikoh mexikah chapoltepek. owekawke mexikah chapoltepek sempoali xiwitl. makimatikan in ixkichtin kitaske inin amatl in kenintin pedro hernandes iwan nonamik in itoka maria barbola iwan in itoka hwan peres tosenyolokakopa totlanekilistika inik tiknafmaka] tokal ompa mani in ipan tlaxilakali sankta ana kwepopa totla[ne]kilistika inik tiknamakiltia in iewatl español iw itoka paskwal hernandes. mohmostla. mochiwa nikawín. otiktokayotihkeh migwel. . aw in yeh yuhki niman ye ik kin wikatse kin yakantiwitse; in ixkichtin otenamikito motekpantiwitse no sak in ahkim ittasneki! otikalahke i’tek in mar asta umpa otiwia' ganin unka tlentikwaske. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. . yewantin in siwapipiltin ik kitsakwa in innakayo. iwan in maxitlastli in itoka matsatsastli. iwan teukwitlanakochtli iwan tewilonakochtli. aw sa nawi tlakatl in momakixtike, in ka atitlan yahke tlamanelotiake inik ompa atenkisato chimalwakan atenko. xi akatl xiwitl, 1347. de nokuñada axan kwak mokwatek nichpokaton mokwatek kwak notlasekmik inawelita kitowa' tlaxta paskasio xikanan chantli xikanan tlali de mokniw xitechkwepilikan in tomin den len iktitokake mokniw den iktitokake tehwanke. tlen 78 tlanawatihkayotl. keman moketsas sentika weyitlahtokan onkas se sennechikolistli kampa tlatskitoseh 37 tlakameh tlen 19 tepantlahtoanih iwan 18 tlen wekapah tepantlahtoanih, kintokahtlaliseh kampa tlatskitokeh keman tonilis tlamisa nochipa nechicolismeh. iwikpa nochi tlen se iwan se tepantlahtoani in tlahtokan quitocatlaliseh, se ipatlaka tlen tepantlahtoani tlen noihki tekipanoa. in sennechikolistli, iyoka tlen tlanawatili kimaktilia inin amatlanawatili, mopialis: i. tlatemaktilis ikwalitalis iwikpa motekiwis anawak tlamokwitlawiani ipan sekin tlamantli moihtowa ipan 76 tlanawatihkayotl iv tlatlapantli; ii. kiselis, keman monekis, itlahtol weyi tekiwa tlen totlalnanstin; iii. kisenkawas tlahtolmeh tlen itechpowi; kiselis keman moketsas semikak tlanawatiloyan in amatlapewaltilismeh tlen tlanawatilmeh kititlanilia tlahtokan iwan temaktilis iwikpa kikwalitaseh nechikolismeh tekitikayotl tlen quintitlaniliah, tlen yewan moneki temaktiliseh keman saniman pewas nechicolismeh; iv. kiihtos tlen yewa noso tlen kiixtlalis tekichiwani, in amatlanotsali tlen weyi tlahtokan noso tlen setsin tlahtokan nechikolismeh tlen sankemantika, monekis ipan inin ome tlamantli momatlahanaseh ome tlen eyi tlatlapantli tlen tlakameh nopayoh yetoseh. in amatlanotsali kiihtos tlenon mochiwas ipan inon san kemantika nechicolismeh; v. tlatemaktilis noso amo tlatemaktilis isenteki tlen tokayotl prokurador general tlen totlalnantsin, tlen tlatitlanis tlayekanani weyi tekiwa tlen totlalnantsin; vi. tlatemaktilis tlamakawalistli iasika sempowali iwan mahtlaktli tonati tlen weyi tlayekanani totlalnanstin iwan kitokahtlalis tlen kipatlas; vii. kisenkawas tokayotl tlen weyi tekiwa kichiwas tlen ministros, agentes, diplomátikos, kónsules, generales, weweyi tekichiwanih tlen hasienda, koroneles iwan sekinok weweyih tlayekananih tlen ehérsito, armada iwan fwersa aérea nasionales, ken kiixtlalis tlanawatili, iwan viii. kiixmatis iwan kisenkawas tlamakawalismeh amatlatlanilmeh tlen kimaktiliseh amatlanawatil chihuanih. tlaxexeloli tlen v: tlen fiskalisasión superior tlen sentlanawatiloyan laurel iastlakapal komo se kiahsiskia miak se kinamakaskia, pero kemeh semi keman weli sah se kiahsi, se yeh se kikwa. aw in ikontetl semanawatl in tlali motokayotia asia; inin semikak okitokatenewke in amoxtlakwilowanime yehika ipampa ka ipan katka ipan pew tsintik in achto in wewei tewkyotl in tlahtokayotl inik semanawak in kenin || [13v] niw yewantin katka, o ipan tewktiko otlahtokatiko in motenewa assirios iwan persas iwan medos. in teotl omotlaixtlapan itechpan iyektilis semanawak okis tlekoihtik tonatiw poktsalan nawkanpa wikaloke mexika; mochokilitiw tlakuchkatl wisiliwitl, a se panitl imak tekok in kolwaka iyao iyan. .tlamacaz ehekatl a piltzintecutlon ki ya temoa aya ye xochinketsala xoyaawia ai nopilwan xikinmaka miak ninemilis no yehwan. ixkichin in okimelaw testigos yuh kitowa amo nowanyolke san nikinpalewiya ipaltsinko in totekuyo dios otlatlanilok in testigo keski xiwitl nikan nemi kitowa yepowali onmatlaktli xiwitl nikan imatika okikets in krus. ante mí migwel xwares eskribano. nikan ipan in in omikiko in itskowatsin tlahtowani katka kwawnawak, in tlahtokat 9 xiwitl; aw yexiwitl in ayak tlahtokat kwawnawak. se kikwa in itakilo, se kikixtilia in iewayo. ika yon nimitstatawtia ika miak favor. wan yupanok yewekkatiw ika wekka yukontupewtewak. kiitak ne padre selestial para axmosewiah ipan chikwase tochtli xiwitl (1914), tatlahtokayotl in sepanka asiko chalchiwkwekan, in onkan kimpewa iakalyaokiskawan méxiko. mochiwa kampa eski kajfentaj. aw iskate in i mochintin walake in ithawan walmochiwtiake in ikse itoka chikawastli, in ikome itoka teotlama xiwtlapoka, in ik-ei itoka nexewak, in iknawi itoka chalotl, in ikmakwili itoka tsiwaktli, in ikchikwasen itoka matlalkowatl; yewantin in in kiwalwikatiake in tlahtowani chichimekatewktli in ithawan walmochiwtia- || 26v -que. satepa nikilwia de manta tela istak manta. komo ompaka win mokawak, wan nimitstatawtia. nochi yahke axkan a xiiii de mayo 96 años, ikwak momikili sancho lópes sekretario, motokak sant fransisko. para kenke intekitih wan tlan intlaxikouaj? ix akatl xiwitl, 1423. istatl, ixkich in monekis in ixtlawatlakatl kimpia chikweyi cuahcuatentzoneh, mahtlaktli iwan ome ichkameh iwan nawi pitzomeh. tla oktonkwikakan, tla ok tonkwikatokan, in xochitonalo kalitek,¡antokniwan! yawi ihkini in o ya wal asik,on ya moketsa in kwikanitl. || 5 aw in ikwak okimomachiltike sant fransisko teopixke, niman mosentlalitsinoke in dominigos, augustinos, klérigos, moteilwitsinoto in audiensia ixpantsinko visurrei don lwis de velasko iwan kisidor sanktos garsía iwan no ikwak nikan moyetstika don frai domingo de salasar china obispo. axkan sábado in ik 7 mani metstli marso de 1615 años, wel ipan ilwitsin santo thomás de akino, ihkwak nikan mexiko kimonewaltihke matlakpowali ipan chiwknawi tlakatl in forsados, in españoles temak owetske, bagamondos iwan sekintin tlahtlakoleke temiktilistika, sekintin tliltike, sekintin mulados, sekintin mestisostin iwan makwiltin timasewaltin indios, in wikoke la china hustisiatika; mochintin teposotiake iwan mailpitiake. yewa amitla onechmakak. amo teyi ika ixpetani; nikan ipan in in asiko i nonowalka in poyawteka in motenewa || 77r panowayan tlaka; in kinwalyaka in kiwalwikak itoka tlohtlitewktli, onkan motlaliko in amakemekan. in lá timonekiltia timokawiltiw te'wakun in kwawitl te'wakun ximika. vii akatl xiwitl, 1447. aw in onpan okatka chalchiwmomosko oksentlamantin tlaka, yewantin in xochteka in olmeka in kiyawisteka in kokolka. xikintayokoli 4 kali atle muchiw. aw in yewantin in omotenewke ilpiloskia seral san walmokwepato seral kiyawak, amo wel kintsakke itepantlahtolistikatsinko in padre frai augustín del spíritu sankto in nikan kimopialia teopankali san antonio abbad, kinmottili onkan in seral kiyawak || 221 in kinwikaya yniqu ilpiloskia omotenewke hwan morales. wel miak nopakilismochiwa ka in timitsnoixmatilia. tlahko kilo tliletl ka miak pahpakilistli. oniaya weyi tlamachtiloyan, mach ok se tlahko iman nokahyan imán pewas tlamachtilistli. noka tepitsin tononotsakan. ¿campa tikonisneki kafen? noihki tlen kokone ichpokatoton iwan telpokatoton oksepa okinmonochililike tatatsitsintin kename kimpiaske inimekes kokone. ichpokatoton okipiaya tlen tlekoske ika ipan eskalera ipan ome piso tlamachtilkalko. okinmonochililike tatatin onkwan on ohkwe kinkahkowiske, kinmediaskowiske ichpokame amo kitehtitiske in nakayo. pipiltoton noihki kipiaske ikahwan; iwan motitiske kename nemiske ikan ye telpokatoton iwan ichpokatoton. se tlakatl oikataya teopantli iwan chantlaka. noihki ompa oyeya kitstoke tlen kichiwaske karransistas. ome axoxtlantli ¿quexqui xiwitl timopilia? ¡ ma wel ika tepetl! ka wel toyolokakopa tikneltilia in timitsnamakiltia in omotenew in kali nawtemani mochi in itlalo ichinayo in tewatl hernan peres español tichane nikan siudad senka tikpakkaselia in otitechmakak napowali pesos in tomines otokonkwike ka a niman itech powis misa ik mochiwas ixpantsinko mochiwa in señor governador, [f. 13r.] ihoan señores hweses ihoan testigosme. axkan ome xiwitl otikpiaya sente weyi chichiton, se mastin danes chiantik. amo otieya ipan kali in tokalehkapo akin isiwakonen timoixmachilia, yalwa omik. sempwali wan mahtlaktli niman inik konmopewaltilia in kimotenextililia in keni onkatki kimopielia ome altepetl in dios, in mitowa ome siudad, aw sesentlamantin in ipan nemi tlaka; aw in iksekkan ka ompa in ilwikatl itik, iwan in ikokan nikan tlaltikpak. in tlili, in tlapali. aw yewatl in malintsin niman kinonots in teoutl markés in iw okikak kostemexi. satepa okihto in piltontli tlenon tayi nikan mamá pus in tehwa tichpokaton tixente wan ino papan mono ahmo melawak de kristiano. chikomexochitl. aw sano ipan in in ome akatl xiwitl in onkan chapoltepek senpowalxiwtike in mexika inik onkan katka. kanoneskwowit aw sanno ipann ikwak in omotenew xiwitl in omomikili tlakatl don lurenso xwáres de mendosa konde de koruña visurrei, in tlahtokat tenochtitlan onxiwitl ipan chikwetetl metstli ipan senpowalonmatlaktli ipan eilwitl. amo mochiwa nikawín, nikan sayoh yetok se ne takespan. "nopa imohwanti inkimatih timitstlatlahtia xinech walwikili se teskatekomatl naranhayotl. xikintekipano. ihtik in komitl mosiyawa in chilakachtextli ika ome tekontontli atl; ipan in sokikaxitl motlalia in pitsochiyawisotl, motsoyonia in bisté, iwan ihkwak ye tlahkowikxitili, ye motlalia in chilakachtextli, motlewatsa iwan motekilia ome ahnoso yei tasa atl; makahmo senka tetsawak nien ayo. intla moneki motlalilia nohpaltlatetektli iwan kamohtli. wan ika nopa magdalena. in newatl don lwis de santa maria gobernador por su magestad iwan tewantin alkaldes pedro dionisio thoribio vaskes hustisia tikpia por su magestad iwan tewantin in kabildos tipilwan in tiregidoresme in timatlaktin tomome iwan tewantin timochintin in tipipiltin in taltepewake mexiko. iselti mochiwa, amo akah kitoka, iteyo mawilowa, ompa ixwa. 35. aw intla aka mitsmononochilis ahmo titlalihkwiloties, ahmo itla tiemawiltities, ahmo timokxitlatlawitekties, ahmo timokxitlatlawitsoties, ahmo timokximamatiloties, ahmo motilma tiktlatlankwakwaties, ahmo tichichichaties, ahmo awik kampa titlachias, ahmo timoketstewas, ahmo no timotlastikas, ahmo no timotatakatikas. 27. ka wel ontimaliwi, ka wel onchamawa, in tekoko, in tetonew ayaxkan temamawti. inik omitsiskalti, inik omitswapaw, inik otiskalowae, inik otichamawak. ka wel ontlami in nakol, in nokwitlapan inik oniktkmo, inik onikxklo in otikmiti, in otikmokwalti. yekene, immottetsinko onikpilo in ichpilinaltsintli, ka tiankistla, ka nanawistla oniknentlamachti in kwawtsintli, in istaxaltsintli, in chilpostektsintli; iwan onitetlaaili, onitekwakwawili; onikteanili in tetopil, in tekakax, inik oniktematemilti in kkmmatsin popoyotsintli, in kan kexkitsin xaxaltsintli inunottetzinco' omonek; inik achitsin oselis, ototonix immonakayotsin. ahmo onimitsxikkaw. ahmo onimitsnenkaw; wel mopampa onichokatinen, onitlaokoxtinen. ahmo axixtli, ahmo kwitlatl onimitstlalili. ahkan tetopko, tepetlakalko, ahkan tekomik onikan, onikkwik inik onimitsiskalti, inik onimitswapaw. ka wel otimaliw, ka wel ochamawak in kwawyotl, in oseloyotl. san iwiyan, ísemele, in nimitsonkawtias in tetlok, in tenawak. otlanamakayah salamandra moxinkayopatla mokwikwiltlakentia kwali nemiskiani tlaltikpak yehse okachi kineki atitlan pero saniman kineki tlatetekos kachikwali ahmo. ika on omopanoltiaya notatsin iwan nonantsin. san niman oyekoke tepilwan. ye timiaktin. iwan noknewan otiyeya tichikwasentin. ye yiman tika on okwache notatsin omotekiliaya okwache ipampa ye timiaktin otiyeya ipan kali. notatsin omopiliaya tlen motekitilis tekwekwentla. yomikiliaya arado, yomotekitiliaya tlaltepostli. noihki kemanian omotekitiliaya ika tlalacha; inon ika metsontekikixtilo iwan tlaltepostli ika omotokaya tlaoli. ihki on ik omonemiti notatsin. onkwan on aik otechpolo tlen tikwaske, tlen tikiske; nian noihki totsotsoma aik otechpolo. se piltoktsi elito. niman ye ik nepanotl mohotta, kimottitia, kimolwia 2 akatl xiwitl 1299 años ipanin in onkan sempowalxiwtike mexika in chapultepek aw mean kinmikalke onkan mie in wewe huitzillihuitzin2o achto intlahtokaw katka in mexika iwan iweltiw itoka chimalaxochtsin iwan itoka tetskakowakatl iwan in tokasimatsin aw walmakiske kowasotsin iwan nakussiwatl ompa siwapili kulwakan onkan makisekatsintli iwan tensakatetl kwetlaxochkwawtlix iwan ximatiluleiwatl iwan nawyo aw niman yahke makisato asoleo in toleatsin in kikwake katon in ipan in xiwitl san ya ok yewatl governador in hwan péres de monterrei in nikan tenochtitlan. san inseltin mexika in kitokayotiaya tetsawteotl yaotekiwa. niman ik kompewaltike in ye tlamasewa, mosaw. ke nawiilwitl omextin in tekusistekatl. aw niman no ikwak motlali in tletl, ye tlatla in unkan tlekwilko, kitokayotia in tlekwili teutexkali. ome taman: tein mas kwahkwali sanfransiskanohwaxin wan tapiyalwaxin, por ké yon pisilwaxin no kwali se kikwa, sayoh ke semi pisiltik. ¡nemi san iwiyan, san isemelia! in san nonopechteka, nikan no mochiwa, pero amo miak. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. mochiwa ojtenoj. iii tochtli xiwitl, 1482. in toltekachihki moyekmati ka tlen kimach omochin. ye konkwepa in tlatoli in tlatilolko tlatoke, kimonilwia “otechmocnelili in tikawtsi; atel ewatl inik tona inik tota in akolwa i chichimekatl? ka iska kimokakitia a e sepowali kinekia i mochiwaskia in iw kiwalmitalwia; au in axka kan ok nikitak ka owel mixtlati kaokak motenochkasasilia, ka e seki mokwawtitlakalkatlapikia, seki tenayoka, askaposalka, koyowaka, teka motlamiya; kan ok nikita. vi akatl xiwitl, 1251. iii tekpatl xiwitl, 1248. no kwali se kikwa iwan nakat. 218 axkan domingo in ik 12 mani metstli mayo de 1613 años, ihkwak yankwikan motenextilitsinoke in onkan kapila san hoseph san fransisko inik walmokalakike in padre frai hwan masurra, yewatsin in kapelán mochiwtsinoko in onkan omotenew san joseph, iwan itlantsinko onkan kiwalake in telpuchtli padre frai sebastián de garibái, intemachtikaw muchiw in mexika. ye mopilwatia ye kichiwa anepantlasi, ikome xiwkanawalsi. nimitsmiktis. na nimokwesohki inin xiwpan motlahtokatlaliko napoleon bonaparte yuhkin wei intlahtokaw gallitlacah. para na nihneki nihchiwas in xochiyowa itech marso. aw in ikwak ontsonkis nonemilis yuh nikneki in notlalnakaio ka se tilmatli ik mokimilos ompa motokas in wei teopan santiago in kani nechmomachiotililis padre gwardian. aw in iopuchkopa ompa kitkitiw in chikiwitl: wel tentiw in tamali amo itenko in kana, san no imakpal nepantla in kiketsa chikiwitl. aw nikan nestika inik kinamik in tlakatl katka motewksomatsin in akachinanko; inik kinamik teokwitlakoskatl kimotlatlawtili, kimolwili "oticmihiyohuilti otikmosiyawilti, ka mochantsinko ka mokpaltsin ka mopetlatsin in otikwalmomachilti". in totonik. tlen 48 tlanawatihkayotl. in ayahualmeh, tepeyakak iwan axalmeh tlen weyiatl tlen itechpowi anawak tlali, tlapechtli tlen semanawak, iyolo tlen ayawali atsintla, tepeyakak iwan axalmeh, tlaltipaktli tlen weyial, aihtik tlen weyiatl iwan nochi ehekaixpa tlen anawak tlaltipaktli, xitlawak motlatskilihtos ipan sentika tlanawatikayotl, san amo tlen ayawalmeh tlen namah nowah kinnawatiah tlaltlanahuatilmeh. nikan amo teyi. in yewatl in omotenew español iwan inamik itoka mariana rodrígwes española okichiwke neixnamikilistli in ipewayan in omotenew metstli mayo, inik sanno itechpa tlahtoke itech asike in imawisotsin okse sankta krus, inik ikatsinko kimixnamikke in omotenew onkan tlaka tlaxilakaleke in imaxkatsin omotenew sankta krus, in senka ye wekaw in onkan kimokechilitiake in inttawan wewetke katka. aw inik onkan walmotsotsona atl itech tepetlamimiloli chikomostok, yewatl ipampa inik no mitowa tsotsompa. ¡ xon mimati! iwan inimekes tetepe nochtin antika yenkwik tlaxkol ika kwawnawak. ka se otli itsintlan tehwewentsin wan yaw asis kwawnawak. metstika ompa okse wei tlamakatsintli okse lado metstika impan in xolal in tepostlan tlatiwani noihki mawistiktlakatl tepostekatl. inintsin tlatiwani no weyi tlamatkatsintli. miake tlaka momochko malakatetikpak owilaloya tepostlan monamakas kwawitl. san niman wits; kan metstika wei tlamatke in teposton. aw imixpan omuchiw testigos don baltasar de la krus yoan baltasar señor alkalde yoan hoseph xwares yoan gabriel hakobo hwan hernandes muchitin tetekuti hoan garsia davalos español topile nikan sanktiago tlatelulko. san iwi ya aso, iwan in iwiyan. 19. intlanel tinawatilos inik titeyakanas, aso san ye titlatlatto, ye tistlakolo in ¿cuix timihmati? inik kwali ves aso okseppa, asokoppa, in titlanawatis inik ahmo titeyakanas. aw intlanel tikimpananwiya in oksekintin, ayamo niman vsiwka tikinvakanas, ok timoketsas, ok tikchias in aso titlalkawilos. kitowa "nopiltzin é, nikan katki macatzin. aw inik wala tenochtitlan, yewatsin kiwalmokalakili in tlahtowani visurrei don lwis de velasko. one, nen notlakatl, o nen nonkisako teotl ichan in tlaltikpak, ¡ninotolinia! in ma on nel nonkis, in ma on nel nontlakat. ah nikitowa yese... ¿tlen nais?, ¡anonohuaco tepilwan!, ¿at teixo ninemi?, ¿quen wel?, ¡xon mimati! mokwetlanihti. ka nel yeh in tiktemoa ka yeh in tiktotokak ka iwkan otlakotike in motechiwkawan in wewetke ka ik omomotlake okimomakake in tlai. tlatlanilok in testigo kwix tikmati inik omakok posesion in hwan de eskalante yoan inamik okito in testigo ka neli ka wel melaoak in nikitoa ka ye uppamanyan in mako posesion aw in antonio hoseph san omoyokox inik okixixitini itepan hwan de eskalante yoan in inamik yoan in ye wekaw in kisayan oquitzatzacu yoan in estakas okinkixtili amo itenkopa hustisia. aw in ihkwak in ipan in omotenew iii kali xiwitl ka ye kin no ihkwak onkan asiko in kwawkecholan inik tlalyawaloto in oksentlamantin wewetke teochichimeka itstlakosawke totolimpaneka amakemeke, ayemo walasi i wel onkan amakemekan chalko, ka ok otlipan nemi, ka ye kin oyuh nepa ompa walkiske in inchan chikomostok onpowalonmatlaktli xiwitl ye walnehnemi; aw yewatl kinwalyakana in intlahtokaw wewetewktli in chichimekatewktli. cholohki. nopa nimechkahtehtok aw inik otlanankili in testigo okito ka nikmelawa in notlatol ka wel nikmati intlal in onka mani kowatlan in itlal katka in akamapichtsin in onkan mamanka in ikal ka wei inik mani in tlali onpa asitika in- akalotenko itech walasi in temaskaltontlikatka in oxixitin inik patlawak senpowalmatl ipan chikwematl aw inik weyak honpowalmatl ipan chikwematl. iwan ihkwak onawatilok in don thomás in telpochtli inik tlahtokatis itstlakosawkan, ipan ilwitsin visitasión. in nanakat. in amo pahti. kenin mochiwa mah se kimana wan se tayi. inin tlali amechmomakilia in totekuyo, yowehkawak amo nech nankilia. .zan kikakis nokwik ok oyowale teumechawe ok kikakis nokwik in sipaktonala tilili ovvaya ayao ayao ayao ayao nianse tonali okia. ¡xrociaroquih toplantitas! kana sempoali minotoh, noka tiwalas nia nalmasalox. antes ixwaya saj, paharitos kimoyawayah in iteyo kampa miijkuitayaj, yehwa ya in iteyo ixwa. ximonemachtihtsino okwalkan timomewas. sanno ihkwak nikan mokixti don frai domingo de salasar obispo, nikan motetsonilpilitikis amakemekan. ipa se taman saj. elonanakat oso milahnanakat oso sinanakat se tonali okse kontoka. noponi, noponi itstoke miyake gentes yewantini in imixpan nomochiw inik oneltik in tlatoli nawxiwitl in otlamiko in tlatoli ipanpa in axkan totenkopa titlanawatia tiktlalia sentensia niman naokmo seppa aka kinkwilis im imakal iwan in tlali in ipan ika ipanpa ka ye umpowalxiwitl in ipan kate in itoka gabriel yaotl inamik maria tekwichon inikinsemaxkaw ye mochiwa. aw in ikwak okimomachilti in ye momikilis, niman kimixkechili kimonawatili in itlasopiltsin, sanno itokatsin don felipe, kimomakili in itlahtokayo in ikoronatsin, inik yewatl kipachos semanawak altepetl. aw axkan sábado sankto ik 10 mani metstli abril de 1610 años, ikwak nikan mexiko mokixti inik onmopewalti inik ompa mowikak pirú in teoyotika tlahtowani don alonso de peralta arsobispo de las charkas in ompa ipan tlali perú. nikan tokatenewtikate, iska in intotoka yewantin in: in ikse tenoch, awexotl, akasitli, xiwkak teomama, oselopan, tensakatetl, ahatl, xomimitl, || 138r kopil teomama, kwawtliyolki. in ipa amoxtli in itoka sabiduría kitowa in teoamoxtli in adam kimochiwili in totekwiyo dios, ik kimochichiwili ik kimixkechili ka intatsin in ixkichtin tlaltikpaktli ipan nemi, aw ka kimokixtili in ipa in itlapilchiwal in itlatlakol kichiw, aw ik momati ittalo yehika inin tlaneltilistli ka melawak kathólika iwan neltokoni, ka i yewatsin adam ka kimochiwili tlamasewalistli penitensia in itechpa in itlapilchiwal in itlatlakol aw sa tlapopolwilok, ka momakixti aw ompa moyetstika in ilwikak. aw ik yekene yewatl in: in aokmo yekene san kexkich tlakatl in amo san tlapowali kimowikiliaya ohtlipan, ik onkan walmowikak in iglesia || 152 mayor, ik onkan walmokixti, ik niman mokalakiko in tekpan palasio inik onkan ixpantsinko kichiwke in ixkichtlamantli in tetlahtokatlalilis nemanilismachiyotl inik tetlahtokatlalilo, inik okimoselilike in audiensia real tlaka oidoresme, inik onkan axkan motlahtokatilia. in totonik. aw san kiwalwilanke ika koche, intlan walyetiake in inwanyolke; kinwalmowikili alkalde selar gonsalo gómes de servantes iwan algwasil mayor balthasar mexía iwan kastilteka mawistike. aw nikan pew in innetlapololtilis in wewetke in chichimeka; onkan pew in kwawitl in inpan postek, okinnots in tlakatekolotl in witsilopochtli, oitik kalak in ipepechtsin in totekwiyo dios. aw in oyake in tlahtoke. aw in oksenka yewatl ye tlahtowa omotenew señora mariana rodrígwes, in ye kimixnamiki ye kimawa ye kinmawispolowa tlaxilakaleke, kexkich in akwali yektli tenkwikwitlatlahtoli kimilwi in amo wel mihtos motenewas; iwan wel kineltilisihtowaya in ka kimokixtilis krus in onkan moketsinotikak, kihto onkan mokaltiske. se xaxalohton arros achi tlahko altepemasewaltlakah omikke ipan chikwase tekpatl xiwitl (1576) ipampa wei sawatl. pomarosah oso tomarosah wel kittaya in kampa yeh itstias: intla ompa itstiw in kitoaia miktlampa, in imayawkan tlali, senka ik momawtiaya kitetsawmatia, kitowaya aso kana namech on notlaxililis ka ik nonnapantiw noxilan notoskatlan on aktiw noyolo itlan on yetiw in amonayotsin in amotayotsin in amonowan ankimaxkwilike. niman oksepa okinapaloke okiwikakke ompam wikoltepek xochiwakam okiteochiwato in tlali iwan okichiwke se teopam tepisin omkam okikeske se krus aw niman okito in teopixkasintli in tekwatekiani itokasin fra/ik/ martin de walensia okito nikam itoka yeski sankta krus wikoltepes xochiwakam nikam nikteochiwa inin altepesintli ika idasomawistokasin in ipalnemowa/hi/ni semikak neli dios te dios tesktasin iwan dios tepilsin iwan dios espirto sankto ma yuh mochiwa semikak. tlahko kilo ayohwachtextli sa itstok. xiwitl ipan matlaktlonnawi xiwitl inik onkan in walasitika in ipan omotenew xiwitl de 1631 años, in ipan omomikiliko don diego hoseph hernándes iwan iteikkawtsin don christóval de kastaneda, kano chikwetlamanpa ixwiwtsitsinwan in omotenewtsino wewe tsiwtlakawki tsompawakatewktli in asiko tekwanipan amakemekan. .xoh! aya tik ya ittakan chikunavixtlavatla masatl iyolo ika moskaltiski tonan aya tlaltewktli. yankwik tisatla ye yankwik ivitla se mamahpikton yepasohtli xinachtli aw wekawtika in ompa || 71r katka in asteka in onkan inpan postek kwawitl. chikwasen axoxtlantli i tochtli xiwitl, 1610 años. tlahko kwarto chiltomawak, ahso tepetlachili ahnoso kwawchili xii tochtli xiwitl, 1374. ¿amo namechtlakoltia kenamewan nankipano? tla nankimatiskia amatl achi okse kwali tekitl nankipiaskia. wel miak namechilwia itech xitlachakan inimekes kokone. namewan nanwewetiske iwan namopilwan amo namechekiktaske ipampa amo kwali omomachtique. itlatsoyotl ikwitlapa i ye tikneki ye tikchiwaske iwan in tlei ik ye titlatoske in kwali yektli yes, itechpatsinko in tikpewaske in totekwiyo dios inik yewatsin isel teutl dios, aw kano iwan itla in senka akotlakpakka in itlatsontekilis in itenanamikilis; in mitowa motenewa ipa in isentensias in iyamaw in itoka sóphokles poeta trágiko kitowaya ka "ça niman amo tle onkatki kwali yektli itsonkiska i nepepewkayotl". impara tlatetekos oan para nehwa akmo itla má mochi ohkionya kion kichiwtinemi kemanian dios kimokastigarwis yehwatl. amo teyi onkak plantas iii tekpatl atle muchiw. 1 kali xiwitl 1285 años ipanin kinwalpewaya in mexika in onkan chapultepek wei tenanko inchan onkan kimiktihke in teomama kwawtlikeski in okonmiktike aw nikan ewake yahke achito tlalkokomoko ewake ahsito atisappan ewake ahsito tlamtsinko ewake ahsito tlenamakoyan ewake ahsito wewetlan ewake ahsito akweskomak ewake ahsito atlixokan ewake ahsito kolwakan ewake ahsiko tepetokan ewake ahsito witsilopochko ewake ahsito kulwakan ewake ahsito kowaltepek ewake ahsito teyon ewake ahsito kwexomatitlan ewake ahsito tlapitsawayan ewake ahsiko nextikpak walmokwepke ahsiko okseppa chapoltepek ika in itokatsin dios tetatsin dios tepiltsin spiritu sankto nikpewaltia in notestamento makimatikan in ixkichtin kitaske inin amatl ka in newatl notoka hwana fransiska nikan nochan san sebastian tsakwalko itech nipowi konfrades santa maria konsepsion. aw in ihkwak i walake in chichimeka in totolimpaneka, no iwan in wala in chichimekatl in kwawitsatsin ye ka in tsakwaltsintli, yewatl inik axkan motenewa || 125r tsakwaltitlan tenanko. ¿titemoixmatilia in siwatsintli sánches? mexikaweliyotl ontlakakiyaya ilwikak. in lá kahmo santitemaka' oksé balida titlatlahtlaposke titlaomewiske titlatlalwiske ikan semiya'kun ikan non yutidaxtlahwike in yunta. kichixtikate in kenman wits in kenman kalakiw painalton; in otli kitokas in tlayawalos: in chiawakilit se kikwa, se kimana kemeh tomakilit wan se kikwa ya. amo nochipa taki, sayoh kada ome xiwit. noikí temia aw in okinmontlawtike in okimontlamakake in mexika in ye yuhki, niman ye kimilwia "ca kimitalwia in tlahtowani `ma onkwikakan in mexica'". nikan ipan in kinpewke miskik tlaka ipan in itskowatsin; aw no ipan in kinpewke in kwawkecholteka, yaoyotl inpan mochiw inik poliwke. in ikwak otlatlawtilok niman no ik senkamatsintli ik tlakwepa ik tlanankilia kitoa newa oniyeni. asta momoloka nopa atl para kitekili aw niman otlatlakoltilok inik amo istlakatis in ipaltsinko totekuyo dios aw niman otlana[n]kili in testigo kitowan amo nistlakatis in ipaltsinko totekuyo dios. nikan ipan in omomikiliko in kwawtlahtonak || 32r in ikmatlaktlonse tlahtowani kolwakan, in tlahtokat matlaktlonnawi xiwitl. asikamatl seki kihtowah ika kixmatih eyi taman: mankos kriolo, mankos manila wan tein inhertado. kali" tetlatlawelkaw, teyolokokokan in tlaltikpak. in kenman on nontlatlayokoya, ninotlawelneki, nonexiwtlatilko. nik-wal ihtoa, kwe konetl, ma no se nimiki aw onkan witekok in chalchiwtsin; in iw kitotiwi wewetke, ye wel onasia in itsonko in ikpak popokatepetl in onkan witekok. ye konotsa tenoch, konilwia “tla xiwala. wan amo mokwidarohtani. amo xochiyowa. mochiwa tepeix, kwoutah wan tapachiwis. yewantin in itech moneki in kintlatlawtiaya tealtis. ipan neka weyaltepetl sekintin nomaikniwan nikinpia. mochiwa newin paratani kampa etayij, newin xaltipampa, pochotitampa; kachi tawelita paratani. tak totonik. kalahki nopa pilokichpiitsi in okiwalmamatiake inik okinnots mexitin, okimilwi "tiazque, amo tiwekawatiwi; san tinawxiwtiske, san titlachikiske inik tiwi". yewan okimanke miekintin xochimilcah, yeseh amo kintekilike innakas, san ye kinkotonilike inyak, inik amo momatis in tlahtoani ka san tlahko kimilpike. ¡maca kokoya inyolo!, itlok inawak in ipal nemowa. . aw intla isiwka tlatla in senka kokomoka kwekwetlaka ik senka papaki, iitik kitowa iteyotsin ixwa . para tinemis. yewatl in iwitl tlachiwali xinapalotl wel ixkich in nepapan iwitl ik tlachiwali, yuhkin tsonkali istak iwitl in itlapilolo in itson muchiwaya. aw in tewantin alkaldes oyuh tikkakke in tlatoli otikitake in testamento in iw tenewtika inik okintlamamaktia ipanpa i axkan senka tiktlachikawilia in itoka ana tepi ayak sepa aka konkwilis in ikal in itlal in iw tenewtika in ipan testamento niman hamo itlakawis titlanawatia in ika itokatsin toweitlatokaw su magestad in akin oksepa texixikos inik motlatolkwepas xv pesos tomines inik ontlaxtlawas itech powis in ikamara su magestad ik nikan tiktlalia in tofirma don lwis de pas alkalde, don martin hernandes alkalde paso ante mi migwel de los angeles eskribano. nochi ne torome axkan martes ik 29 mani metstli noviembre de 1611 años, ihkwak oseppa omokwepke in oyahke yankwik mexiko in padre frai isidro in inewan fransisko faustino ketsalmasatsin donado amakemekan ichan, in kinmaniliko oksekintin san fransisko teopixke in ompa kinmowikilia yankwik mexiko, umpa motemachtiliske. aw in ichpoch alonso tokatl itiyakapan yewatl kiteititinen in onkan mokekets estakas inik okichiw algwasil mayor pablo de san hwan fecho a hweves a xxv dias del mes de septiembre de 1586 años. ante mi bernardino xures eskribano. iskatki machiyotl: in sewalkali in wel tikixnamiktia in tonatiw ka kitsakwilia in itlanex inik amo topan tonas; yese in oksekintin in amo kixnamiktia in insewalkal ka kittaske in itlanextilis in tonatiw in inpan momanas. aw in omotenew wetsin ka san kimonektiaya in tlahtokayotl kulwakan, ka amo onkan ichan in in kulwakan ka kowatlichan chane, san kitokake in kulwake yaoyotika. tlaikotona elki nekateh tlamantin wel kwali monamacah. ¿timocaxtilantlahtol tsiaowa? aw in onetekpanok, ik niman pew in ye kixowa, wel yei tsili ipan tlako hora teotlak; aw inik netekpanok inik kixowak onkan tekpan palasio, wel tlayakak mantiake in timasewaltin mexika, wel iskikanpa onkan walake kiwalsenkawke mochintin in iskikampa kofradías kimopialia mexika in san hwan moyotlan tlaka iwan san pablo teopan tlaka iwan san sebastián atsakwalko tlaka iwan sankta maría kwepopan, iwan in sanktiago tlatilolko. ye tiwi:ceh. kimitato, asok untekpanti. aw machitsin nikan tokonitokan in iwki i katki in itlahtokatlakamekayo. || 281 aw in omotenew hwan gr ande in nikan mexiko tenuchtitlan governador katka; yewatl iyaxka katka, kimomakilitia in tlahtowani visurrei don lwis de velasko markés de salinas, ka makwilxiwitl in itech okatka governasió. tehwa namehwan xicuitih, xicmalacachotih, xikwalkwitih kani mokawak, san tlakwekwepalchimaltika ik tipoliwke chapoltepek tela; nimexikatl yewaia, omotlamachti i kolwa omotlamachti in tepanekatl iyo. kwak katka nodifunto aik aik niselosiarwi n pobre tlakatl. pipilteka toyaovan xi nech on sentlaliski ikalipan yawtiva vi nech on sentlaliski texokonekuhatoli ixiuyo kwaltia paratemaskal kipantsakuaj. ome axoxtlantli in okihto in toteow in axkan makwili ikpak atlis tlakwas in iska tepetl; tlein quicuaç on, tlein kis, tlein mochiwas in makwili? tla tiktemachikan in itlahtol". neli mach in tetech sesewi in tonali, in ehekatl, aw amikooayan, teusiooaya sa san niman ye yuhka. aw niman senka miyekpa in otsatsik tekpoyotl ayak okinankili san [i]cel melchior de parada español okinankili okito ka newatl ni[k]temas makwilpowali pesos ok no senka miyekpa otsatsik in tekpoyotl ayakak okinankili. yeh semi wehkapantik wan mochiwa tomawak. ¿timo alemantlahtoltía? —amo, notahtsin, mach noknin kixmati. aw ka san yewatl in in kitenewtiwi wewetke chalchiwkali in ihkak onkan atentlipan in ipan asiko akxoteka, ok yewantin intlaketsal mochiwtiw in opoliwke tulteka. nawi pilonsilo ka ye iwi in kis masewali inik nowia moyawak in atlipan tepetlipa, in texomolko tekaltech maakito. onkán techtlamakaske titlakwaske titlaiske ti'iwintiske. in itakka se kipihpixka, se kiwatsa ika tonal wan kemah se kitewatsa wan ompa se kikwa ya. nopa san kema. aw in ahatl ye kitowa "ypalnemohuanié, otitechmoknelili; ka yewatl in inik otinentlamatinenka i nowian otiyaochiwaloke". aw ik niman ye noseppa onkan walewake walmikwanike in akxoteka in sanno atentlipa; onkan motlaliko in tlakatl toteositewktli in tekwachkawtli onkan motekpankaltiko in itokayokan chalchiwtepek. ka iskatki in karta de venta in niknextia amixpantsinko pres[...]nikchioa inik wel ankimotiliske ka nokalkohoal in kali aw niktlatlautilia in amotlatokayotsin ka moneki in ika nonomatka umpa anmowikaske inik anechmomakilitiwi posesion de an[...] inik wel annechmaxkatiliske hustisiatika. onkan tlakwa, onkan kikwa, kitsotso pitstikasin, 34 domingo ik xxi mani metstli de marso de 1604 años, in ikwak hin wei papakilistli mochiw in palasion tlapanko; amatlekomitl motekpan in atenantitech in onkan tlatlak sepo kamdela. para atol kiixtapanah in vainiya wan kipantaliliaj. no kwali komo se kwaxiini, kikwechowah wan kitekiliah at wan mah se mokwatekilia. sa ye no ik onpa i iwan ilama tepiton, iwa ontlamotla itech in toro, kiwalyewalwa in popokasin, iwa in oksekin paraxes nexpayantla, techinantitla; tlaskan kiyawak santo domingo teteskak, mochi in ome tlamimiloltin inik atlawtlan kaltenko itech in wastepek. istatl, ixkich in monekis para ya moskaltik, moskaltik wan in kwomekat, mowilana kemeh ayohmekat. asta noponi amo nineki nimikis "tlake tihkwase aw ya yepowalxiwtika onkaxtolixiwtika inik ompa walkiske inik ompa walewake walolinke in chikomostok kinewayan inik asiko nikan; ka wexotsinkopa iwan kalpan in walake i waltemoke tlayewaloto. kema kitekili atl nopa orno tlatomonki kiski in 8 tekpatl xiwitl. ye onikonseli moamatsin. mach amo nokayantiak nikonankilis. . aw ye ikwak sentlapow in ixkich anawakatlali, in aok ak toyaow omochiw, in tsapotekatl in anawakatl. in ik kinchichiwaya in okichtin, achtopa kinsenkawaya kimonilpiliaya in tlasotilmahtli in tlasomaxtlal, iwan kinkaktia yewatl in senka kwali kaktli; wan tehwatsin, vii kali xiwitl atle mochiw. keme intomawan kión tokamak. kiwalnotstia; moch itenkopa mochiw in omotenew inteow katka in kitokayotiaya tetsawteotl yaotekiwa, kinawati yewatl in teomama in itoka witsiltsin inik kinnawatis kinnotsas kinkixtis inik kinwalwikas inik tlaltemokiwi inik tlalmasewakiwi in ipan in oksentetl tlali; iwan inik kinawati ye omotenew tlakpak chikonkalpoltin in kiwalkixti. aw niman yewatl walmotlali ikwak in tlakatl in wewetewktli chichimekatewktli mochiw; inin sano ipiltsin in atonaltsin. amotlen nikmati. amomachia tleka wehkawa amo tlahkwilowa. nik chia amitla amo kwali ipan omochin. niman ye ik konkwi in itlema kixnamiktimoketsa in wewetl. nappa in koniawa in itlema in ompa wal kisa tonatiw mihtowaya tlapkopa. "nimitschiuilis tlaxkali xxiii pregon.- a dose dias del mes de mayo de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in ipan tlaxilakali kolwakatonko okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal in itlal isabel maria okito ipatiw napowali pesos ayak tlanankili testigo hwan iknotl.ante mí fransisko maldonado eskrivano. amo xochiyowa, ta nanakat. in ipan in xiwitl san ye ok onkan onok in kwawitsatsin in texkalko omemasak. 75. ma motech kitta, in ipampa ka in teixtlamachtiani itechtsintis, itechpewas in kenin ahmo ixmalakachiwis in itlaixtlamachtil, immotolinia, in serne, in ornen in itlatepewalwan, in itlachayawalwan, immotsotsopas, immomalak. aw nikan xinechontimalo, xinechonchachamawa, in nimonan, in nimotta; ma kwali immotlahtol, aw ma yektli inik xikimonixtili, inik xikimonmawistili. ¿cuix oppa in tlakatiwa? ¿cuix oppa immikowa? ¿cuix oppa in nemowa tlaltikpak? ka san semi, ipaltsinko in totekwiyo, dios; intlakamo, san ye in ihkwak neskalilos. ye nonnokwiltonowa no kwaltia para in kokolis tein taol xokoyoltsin iewayo tein morado kimolontiah wan tayij. in taol monamaka, seki no kinamakaj. ihwak auki in owasin, seki kikwih ika tatsintsakuaj, kipihpixkah wan kiwipanah ika kwamekat, kwaltsin mokawa in tsintsakwil kostik. no kwaltia ika taxotaltiah ihwak se tatoka, no kwaltia ika se takwouyotia. in ik-expa iloke, sa nestlatilko motlalike in tenochka, in kenin omononotske; aukmo asike, sa iyoke asike tlatilulka. xochiyowa abril, hunio onkak ya. tepaneka tlatokayotl, aw niman okitoke in tlaxilakaleke ka kemaka itlatki i kali ka inemak katka in itatsin ka makoke ka ye kipia karta de venta in ineltika. aw iwan ye chikwasenpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolomome xiwitl in ipan vi tekpatl xiwitl, 1472 años, in omomikili in tlakatl i nesawalkoyotsin tlahtowani tetskoko, in tlahtokat onpowalxiwitl ipan onxiwitl; aw in san pili katka senpowalonchiwknawi xiwitl in okik ayemo tlahtokatlaliloya, aw inik mosenponwa in ixkichkaw nen tlaltikpak inik tlakat yepowalxiwtika ipan matlakxiwtika onsetika inik onmomikiliko. in ipan in siudad mexiko sanktiago tlatelulko ik matlaktli umei mani metstli de hulio de mil i kinientos i noventa i dos años ixpantsinko ones in hwes gobernador don gaspar de mendosa in itoka maria geronima chane sankta ana witsila nikan mandamiento tlatenewtli aw okimitlanilili ma kimomakili in posesion in kenin motlanaoatilia totlatokaw visorrei. in no monamaka ne sakapoastan. aw axkan martes in ik 8 mani metstli mayo de 1612 años, ye makwili tsilini teotlak, ihkwak otokoke in intsonteko omotenewke tliltike piloloke in yaoyotl kihtowaya, ika san chikomilwitike in onkan kakatka tepilolkwawtikpak; ipampa senka ye iyayaya, inik niman kinkixtike, sanno umpa kihtokato in omotenew hospital de la miserikordia. in tenonotsamah yetokeh inik noknin. amoxtli in iyokoyaloka in ilwikatl iwan tlaltikpaktli, iwan in achto totatsin adán iwan in achto tonantsin eva. .iztac tlalok... ma noka tewatl ma noka timilakatsotin nomatka newatl nitlamakaski ni nawaltekutli aw in iw mochiw in tlatsilinilok mexiko mochi in ipan metstli omotenew setiembre. akmo akmo kipia perdón maske imama i papan yekixnamiki wan nechmolwili kachi kwali mankawa akmo akmo nikunis perdón yekixnamiki wanekmomakili no bendisión. 39. nottatsine, otlakawki immoyolotsin, otinechmoknelili, in nimokoski, in nimoketsal. ¿azo nikanas, aso nikkwis in sententli, in senkamatl in walkisa, in walwetsi, in waltepkwi, in walchayawi immoxilantsinko, immotoskatlantsinko? inik nowikpa timokixtia in nimokoski, in nimoketsal; inik ahmo ninoxikos. in kemmanian in aso itla onax onikchiw in ahkwali, in ahyektli; inik ahmo tle mawalokatsin yes in tinottatsin. in ipan siudad mexiko a veinte i dos dias del mes de abril de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años imawistililonime tlatoke don andonio valeriano hwes governador iwan alkaldes martin xwares migwel de los angeles in axkan imixpantsinko nesiko in [mi]guel de los angeles diego xwares nikan chaneke san fransisko teskatsonko. aw ananosomo ken kihtoske?". itlanahnamik: istatl, ixkich in monekis in tepanekatl itepewal in kwawtlantowantsi; e ikwak mik i maxtlato. eyi metstli kwali chikaelotl elito. tein tekitikeh (1986) wewehtlahtoli ik kinankili kito in temistsin: "ca hamo; ka san niknotlapalwiko, ka san niknotlatlawtiliko in noteow in notlahtokaw. aw in ipan ye chiwknawi tsili in ye yowak, ikwak pewke in españolesme || 42 in tlahtoke kavalerostin kavalotlatlalochtike in tekpan kiyawak; mochi senka tlasotli in innechichiwal kontlalike, sanno iwi kinsenkawke kinchichiwke in inkavaloswan. tehwa taltikpaktsin, . aw in san no kukulistli okikwik in ompa omik anawak amo kitookaya san ki kakaschichiwaya in ik kichiwaya mikki hiwitessakatl konakiliaya in itenko, mowiwilana kemeh eskia kwamekat. aw no iwan in ihkwak in in onkan kalakiko kolwakan in mexika in ipan in omotenew 2 akatl xiwitl, 1299 años, ye oiw nepa matlaktsonxiwitl ipan nawpowalonkaxtoli ipan nawxiwitl omokwekwep in sann ok se tlahtoli katka achtopa, inik mokwekwep ompa babilonia epowalonmatlaktli ipan etlamantli tlahtoli; yewantin inpan mochiw in ompa kisalowaya in nepowalistika in tlachiwaltepetl in kihtowaya ilwikak asiskia, amo kimonekilti in totekwiyo dios. iiii kali xiwitl, 1197. i ye kiteka in sakapechtli i ye kimana in sakaxikali in chichimeka, inik onkan kinotske kitlatlawtike in kimoteotiaya; niman ye onwi in itech tepetl, nokwel onkan kinotske kitlatlawtike in kimoteotiaya, ikokkan kinotske. kenin mokwitiah ixexelohkan xiwitl? tawitsa ika at kiilwi "ah, bwen hoven", kiilwi ika kichihchiwah garsas inipachyo.no kwaltia para eskineros de kali. in ipan axkan lunes a kwatro dias del mes de mayo de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años yewatl dieto astaxochitl otsatsik okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal marianan español in kikowa kitema chiwknapowali peso aw in ikwak okitekakiti ayak otlanankili ixpan testigo tekpoyotl. i nikan siudad mexiko a ocho dias del mes de otubre de mil e kinientos e ochenta i sinko años i iwewatsin mawistililoni señor don antonio valeriano hwes governador ixpantsinko nesiko in balthasar morales iwan hwan hernandes nikan chaneke san hwan. i ye kiwalita tletl kolwake i momatke ak imikniw; nima ye ik witse, in okitake senka kitlatlawtike yewatl tlakanechiko im inka. no kineki kinintasohkamatilis in tokniwan osorio sierra, kayomeh san migwel, kampa kwaltsin takwalis kimakahkeh wan miak nemachtil ika in masewaltahtol wan keniuj motanemilia itech in masewainemilis. miak mochiwa, pero yetok tiempo saj: hunio wan mayo. aw sanno ipan in in omotenew in xiii kali xiwitl, 1297 años, onkan walewake in tlakokulwakatepek, onkan onxiwtike anoso san sexiwtike i nonowalka teotlixka tlakochkalka;
