ik niman ye witse onkan motlaliko in tultitlan, onkan in mononotske in tlahtowani yakawetskatsin teowatewktli iwan in ketsalkanawtli teomama iwan se siwatl, ik mononotske in kanpa e yaske. ¡amech ana!, tlanitlanamakanis makah in kwetlawi! lea yoahsia in mikkailwitl miek tlaka yowiloaya tlakohewalosmalakachtepek momoxko tiankisko in popuchtli in xochitl in xochikwali nochi in motlalia mowemmana ipanin ilwitsintli ipan tlamachtilkali tlaeakawaniwaloya in pilantoton wetskaya tsahtsia seki motlatiaya tlatepotsko okseki motlaloaya kintemohtinemia onkan inpan asiko in sitepek, onkan kintlamamakako in tlahtoke, aw in kiwalwikake in kinmakako okotochtli matlawakali matsopetstli teksisyakamitl anoso teksissakamitl pachamatl iwan sikwilin iwan tlawitoli mikomitl yewakemitl iwan astaxilotl. tein welik. noankaienin se telpokatl iwa wehkapa tlakatl. ihkón kitokaitiah por in et, pero tein wehkaukayo et. chikwasen axoxtlantli ometsitsi tlen itata wan inana. kontsakwako teokwitlatla, yen ok on ana xiwtlakwiloli. ayokik, ayok, kenmanian,titechyaitakiw in tlaltikpak, ika, nontiya. aw onkan in momoyawake in kanpa yayake, aw oksekintin walyake walmokwepke in onkan amakemekan. 61 aw niman walmoman in metstli noviembre de 1607 años; in ikwak ipan in sa ikeskilwiyok in onpoliwiko in popokaya sitlali, tonatiw ikalakiyampa temok inik poliw. vii tochtli xiwitl, 1590. pilantoton kinyekanah karlos. kaxtoli iwan yeyi xiwitl kipia. kintoka felipe akin kaxtoli xiwitl kipia iwan hwan ka yeyi kipia. intech in ichpokameh margarita okachi weyi iwan anamaría okachi tsitsikitsin. inin kimach open ya temachtilkalko. konswelo ye ontemachtilkalko okalak, margarita ye ipan se kalnamakoyan tekiti. sasonakin chikome kali xiwitl ik mixnamike tlatilulka tenuchka; unka momikili mokiwitsi, san chikoxiwitl in tlatokat mokiwitsi. "ah, chinga... nopa tochichi no cholohki", kiilwi san okkeskintin, ayemo walsenkisa ompa walewake in tulam, ayemo kexkichkaw in owalake in onkan omotlaliko kwitlatetelko, san walmotokatiake in akxoteka iwan tenanka. in amantekatl 73 aw ye matlaktsonxiwitl ipan chikwepowalxiwitl ipan makwilxiwitl in oapachiowak nowian semanawak in motenewa diluvio, ik mochiw in ipantsinko yewatsin noé. okinkixtike keman chikwasen tlapoali watsinkopa. san sekpa okitlakalke se metraladora. ika on okimimiktike. kwali, mach inon amo pahtli. ¡hey! ¿canin tia? nesi miak isiwilistli tikpia. "na yaya nopa nihneki. ix tekpatl xiwitl, 32. se kali xiwitl ik poliw kwawtepek, unkan tlatoani katka kwetspaltsi. nesawalkoyotsin ikwik aw in okonmotlapalwiko iwan inamiktsin virreina, ik niman mokweptsino motlalitsinoto in ichantsinko arsobispo, inik niman onkan okomopewaltili itlamanitilitsin inik ye kimopialia altepetl tenochtitlan kwaltika yektika, inik nesi kwali ichkapixki inik ye kinmopialia ichkatsitsinwan mexiko tlaka, españoles iwan timasewalti, in tixkichtin titlapacholtsitsinwan. wan nimantsi kiixmatihki itata wan nimantsi newatl maria xoko ihoan i nopilo maria ana ihoan nomon migwel oselotl yuh monanahotitiah inik misas ipan mitos aw in pedro lwis omomikilito ompa kwawchinanko aw in kali ka nel iw kitotia monamakas ixkichin itlatol testigos ik kineltili imatika kikets krus. pasó ante mi diego leonardo eskribano. kimaka sansé biaxe in tonali naxan ye tona yemochin wakunku wan tiotlak sehpan wakunku ohsehpan tiotlak siempre pwes in walxokoya inonekw xokoya ahmo welik noso yexokok ahmo tiwelilia' in xokok san te ihte koko. aw kitoa in manel muchintin teteu onmikke, sannel amo wel ik olim, amo wel ik otlatokak in teutl tonatiw ik itekiw onmochiw hekatl, mokets in hekatl, senka molwi, totokak in ehekak, kin yewatl wel kolini, niman ye ik otlatoka. n anmokochi tia totahtsin onitenots yotitlahtlachixke kwali ka san niwits nimechmolwilis se tlahtoli xikihto den tiknekis ik chikweitetl tlahko pakete “tocihtzin” chokolatl tlamatinime in ixitnachoh yuhkin ikniwtin wright, yewan achtopan patlanih in ipan patlaniskwawtototl in yewantin innomatka kichiwke. yewatl in, omochiw ipan matlaktli omome akatl xiwitl. chikome akatl xiwitl anotle mochiw. ah, titenantsi in xiwitl bisiesto kipia kaxtoli iwan orne powali iwai chikwasen tonali. tlanamaka . kwawpoyawaltsin, nentlamatitsin, wetskatokatsin, sanatsin, weisomatsin, kin nawatiaya in akike teyakantiaske in nawalostomeka, . aw in ik mochiw yaoyotl in ompa ayotlan in impan wal motsaok in puchteka in ostomeka in ik nawxiwitl yeh ikwak ya in altepetl ikwak ki petlake in kwawtenamitl in oselotenamitl. kiwikaltiaya kwetlaxnakochtli itipepeyokyo anoso tesakanekwili; teyewa okimolwili in okachi weyi tesibwakonen. nama nimitsilwis kenke. tehwatsin timomakas kwenta, aw iwan kin wel axkan ye chikonpowalxiwitl in ipan 3 kali xiwitl, 1469 años, in omotlahtokatlali in tlakatl axayakatsin tlahtowani || 89 tenochtitlan. otikinnonotskeh in altepetekpankaltlakah in otechmokakitihkeh tenohnotskatika iwan omotlatsontekili kemman tlein tonali mochiwaskia in totlakanechikolis 110. ma san ni kwetska, ma san nikkamanalma. intla nichokani, intla nitlaokoyani, intla nitlamawisowani, intla ninoknelilmatini, intla ninoskaliani, ka wel niknaniliskia, ka wel niknokwiliskia, ka wel noxilan, notoskatlan, niknakiliskia, niknopachilwiskia. kan ka san xikkwi, san xikkaki in tewkyotl, in tlahtokayotl, in tlatkiwaloni, in tlamamaloni, in nanyotl, in tayotl ken kimonekiltia in totekwiyo, ka ye otikixtlaw, ka ye otikpopow in ixpantsinko in totekwiyo iwan ixpantsinko in iatsin, in itepetsin, in ipetlatsin, in ikpaltsin. aw in axkan san ixkich; in sententli, in senkamatl, inik nikkwepa immihiyotsin, immotlahtoltsin. otinechmoknelili, otlaokox immoyolotsin. ma xikmosewili immonakayotsin, ma tlaltitech ximowetsiti, nikkawtsine. ixtlawapan onia. aw inik senka temamawtikan in onkan omotenew chikomostok, kamo san kexkichtin in onkan tlapia in onkan onoke in tekwanime in kwekwetlachtin in oselome in kwikwitlamistin in kokowa in tewktlakosawke iwan in okseki miektlamantin i nepapanme in amo miximati tekwanime, ka moch onkan tlapia in chikomostok. tla amo titekiti, amo tikpias tomin. san ik mosentlamantilike san iksen yahke san iksen momaniltitiake in teopixke deskalsos, ka nel san iksen itlasopilwantsitsinwan in omotenewtsino totlasottatsin san fransisko; no iwan onkan || 171 intlantsinko momaniltitiake yeintin teopixke trinidarios, in kimopialia itech ka imeskapulariotsin istak se krus chichiltik iwan xoxoktik, in motenewa itlasopilwantsitsinwan in ieitilitsin totekwiyo dios la sankta trinidad, ka no ik notsalo de la redemptión de kaptivos. aw ka yewantin in kimittake inpan asiko ka yewan in tlaxkalteka. se kilo in konetik elotlaoli welis martes otiyeya onechmolwili in siwatsintli tiwalmoikas hweves tlahkotonalpan onechtlakwililok notlatlaxkal iwan san niman oiwalkihkista "amo xihtentlapos ikan yokalake karransistas yomochantlalike, omitoaya ayokik walaske sapatistas. pampa nopapá rei yolik. in tsonteko onkan sosotikate, aw in ompa omotenew teokolwakan astlan in onkan motlaliko wewetke ka anepantla aitik, in ompa tlali ka mochi atl in kiyawalotok. ¡in axayakatsin tikmomoyawako in altepetl in tlakotepek! aw no ipan in in xiwitl in motlahtokatlali in nesawalkoyotsin in akolwakan tetskoko tlahtowani, ye yuh makwilxiwitl tlahtokati in itskowatsin, ye oyuh pewaloke in tepaneka iwan xochmilka. amo mochipautani. yei axoxtlantli . aw in puchtekatlahtoke in konakihtoke teokwitlatentetl aposonaltentetl in ik momawisotitoke in ipampa anawak kalakini, yaopan nawalostomeka sanio ihkwak in ilwitl konakiaya iwan in inechichiwalis in innokichitul. axkana timotewihtoke. wan i arranka pinos pewaya choka porke yokichiwili maldád wan ahmo kineki kikawilis kichiwas in komida. iuki kitokaitiah por in mahyá chiawaya ihwak se momanilia. aw no ikwak ipan in omotenew metstli abril okseppa ompa otekitiwato in wewetokan sitlaltepek; ompa otekitito i nowiampa tlaka altepewake in tlaxkalteka iwan chololteka. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. ihkwak ye omokixtili in iewayo tosan, mokixtilia in ihtisewa; kwali mopaka iwan ma kwakwalaka ika ome litro atl ika tepitsin istatl. ihkwak ye tlawikxitili mokawa ma ixika. motesi in istatl ika orégano iwan axox, tleko motlalia sokikaxitl ika pitsochiyawisotl, in tosannakatl moxahwilia in chiltextli iwan motlalihtiw in nakatlatsayantli ipan kaxitl, ma wiksi. oyuh ye matlaktlomome xiwitl mochiw in tlasolyaoyotl. martes ik tlami metstli de hunio de 1592 años, ikwak pew in sant pablo || 6 teokali inik motlalan motenexten, ik kichiwke possesión in teopixke sant augustín padreme in onka moyetstikate. in momakixtike inik okseppa ikoppa yewantin kwawtsonyome xinachtin mochiwke, otlayankwilike intlakamekayotika i nowian semanawak. . aw is katki in intech monekia siwapipiltin: teokwitlatsawalkaxitl, iwan teokwitlanakochtli iwan tewilonakochtli. || 36 aw in iskikan teopan monasterios in teopixke onkan moyetsinotikate iwan monhas, nowian tlayawalolok in ipampa inik otapachiwke in nikan mexiko tenochtitlan, in weyatl wel makok moteponaso, aw in ixkich akalotli wel teten in atl, wel pepexon titilin in nowian; aw wel mawtilok, mitowaya "tley ye topan mochiwa mexiko?". nika walowih ne kompañeros. ka aw ik niman kinankili in kwawtleketski, okihto "tlacuauh newatl nitlasiwki; ka nikinchias ka san nikan nikpia i notepew in chapultepetl". istatl, ixkich in monekis kenin mochiwa yekwikas ini rekawdito wan ini sentabo len ki sobraro yekwikak yekentregarwia ini familia onkan se tonali la itlaoax lá kahmo yemosewiya mosewia. amo kwaltia para pahti. ah, bweno. tla tihneki na nimitspalewis, na aw xikmomachiltikan, notiachkawané noteikkawané, ka in yewantin in xochimilka niman ompa omotlalito in xochimilko; aw ka i yewantin chalka niman ompa omotlalito in chalko; aw i yewantin in tepaneka niman omotlalito || 78v ompa in tlakupan, aw in intlahtokaw ka omotlalito omokalotito askapotsalko; aw i yewantin in akolwake niman ompa omotlalito in akolwakan tetskoko; aw in yewantin in tlalwikka ka niman ompa tlamelawke ompa in omotlalito akwawnawak in axkan ye tikitowa kwawnawak, aw amo san ixkich in onkan in omotlalito kwawnawak in tlalwikka, ka no iwian in omotlalike in ixkich markés itlal in kitowa kastilteka markesado; aw in yewantin in tlaxkalteka niman ompa omotlalito in texkalan in axkan mitowa tlaxkalan; aw in yewantin in teotenanka niman ompa omotlalito in tenanko texokpalko tepopola iwan sekintin ompa motlalito in tsakwaltitlan tenanko amakemekan; aw in yewantin in amakemeke totolinpaneka niman ompa omotlalito in amakemekan. nepapan tla ta tikintemos wahka wan ¿tlake tekitl walewake umotlaliko nextlatilko, motlalmomostike, sexiwtike. para ne kipí para cholos", kiihto. q.n. ma tiwia in tinosi in umpa titlaekoltiloske umpa tochan es. aw in kapitán niman ye ik unpewa atenko, kikawtia in don pedro alvarado tonatiw. makwilkilit (cinco kelites) satepan ye kana makwili metstli omosewi, in tlachiwalotl ye oksepa pewa tekiti. in oyuh kontlalike niman ik yake i mexika wewetke in kinechikoto akolwake imi tepa moyawake, nawxiwtika tekpichawke. xochiyowa enero. kwouhihtik amo kineki moskaltis, mochiwa kampa panian. ok iwak oninokwep nochan ok oninotekak satepan aka onechtsahtsili onikochihtlewak nothatsin onechmochiliaya xikiki mokafen ye tiyaske mila onechmolwili kwaltia in yek siwakalehkapo kinpia kwakwaltsitsin caxtilanxochimeh. kekexikilit yeh istak wan mapatawak wan in metstsonkilit yeh maikanmohmorado wan welik hasta ikamojyoj. ¡ nicauhhe! iiii kali xiwitl, 1353. nochi nantli mopiltlasohtlani. . ka no tikkwik in titechkwaltia in titech itia aso kana tekomik tekaxik otimayawito? aso toholama aso tipahpatowa anoso kweye wipile otik nawalchiwili iaxka itlatki otikichtekili? in newatl balthasar de luna algwasil mayor iwan algwasil hwan akikaw iwan eskribano fransisko moisen otiwalake in nikan tlaxilakalpa san sebastian kotolko tiktsakwako in kaltsalantli inik mixnamiki anton de san fransisko iwan ana tostekasiwatl itenkopatsinko in hustisia otiwaliwaloke. . aw in immalwan mochiwke in sehsemme puchteka amo san tlapowali in kim ahsike in amo tlawiseke; amo kim powke sanioke in on aktitwitse ketsalpatsaktli. tlen 22 tlanawatihkayotl. axakah welis kitlatsakwiltiseh ika tlamiktihkayotl, tlakoxkohkayotl, istlakayotl, tlakayoneskayotl, tlawitektli, tlakwawitektli, iwan miak tleweli tlaiyowilistli, miak tomin kikixtilistli, kikwilise tlen mopialia iwan sekinok tleweli tlatsakwiltilistli tlen temahmati iwan wehka iasika. nochi tlatsakwiltili elis iwikal san ke itlatsakwili tlen tlahtlakoli iwan ika tlemach tlen kimokwitlawiya iwan ki kokohke. axkanah welis moihtos kikwilia tla kitekiwiya tlen ipiali tlen se tlakatl kema onka tlanawatili ika ma tlaxtlawakah tla tlawika tomin pampa tlawika ke tla tlen ki tlaxtlawiyan altepemeh, yon kema kititlani se tekiwe ika ki tlaxtlawise akahya itlapialis ki ixpanotok pampa tlahtlakolchihki. yon amo moihtosneki kikwilia tlen in pali kema tekiwe tlatsakwiltihketl ki titlani pampa amo kwal ohtli kenihki ki tlanki san ke kiihtowa tlanawiayihkayotl 109, ki tekiwia ika ni weyi altepetl kanke kin tlamokwitlawianih tlapiailis tlen kinilkawa nompaya san ke tlanawatili kiihtowa, yon tlen tlapialis tlen iteko kipolohki ika se amatlatsakwili. kani kipolowa in tlapialis in tekowah moneki onkas se tlatehtemolistli katli ki melawase ni tlahtoltlayakantli. i. kiihtos se tekiweh iwan amo kitetsopaseh sekinok kema tlatsakwiltilantli; ii. pewas kema miaki mo sehkotilia tlahtlakolchiwase, kiihtlakoa chikawalistli, tlachtektli teposkawayohmeh iwan kinwelchiwah tlacameh, tlen tlatsintla tikihkwiloseh tlamantli a) tlen ki tekiwihke ika tlahtlakolchihke, tlen ki ihtlakowihkeh ke tla tlen kitlanke pan tlahtlakoli, maskeh ayimo onka amatlatsalwilistli kani ki ixpantia tlen ika ki tequihuihqueh, iwan nochi kwali ki ixnextia tlen kiihtowa kena panok nopa tlemach amo kwali. b) tlen amo ki tekiwihkeh ika tlahtlakolchihke, tlen ki ihtlakowihke ke tla tlen kitlanke ipan tlahtlakoli, iwan tla kena kitekichihke ke tla ki xihxitlahke ika kikwaltlatise ke tla kisehkotilise tlemach iwaya tlen kitlantokeh ipan se tlahtlakoli, moneki ki nechikose tlen mo tlahtlania ipan ne insiso tlen ti on panoke. k) tlen ki tekiwiya ika tlahtlakolchiwa seyok akahya, tlah iteko kimatiyaya ki tekiwiya ika yaino iwan amo kitlateilwi iixpah tekiwe ke tla tlankía kichihki iwan ihkino amo te kawilis. d) tlemach tlen in teko amo eli tlen tlahtlakolchihketl, yese tlemach nochi ixnesi iwan kena kiistokeh pan se tlahtlakoli tlen ki ihtlakohke se tlapialis tla kema mo sehkotilihke miaki tlahtlakolchiwani, iwan ahkin ki tlateilwike ika ni tlahtlakoli inxesiaya kesah ya i teko. iii. nochi tlakatl tlen amo ki kwalmatis tlahkia welis kintilanas tlahtolamatl ika mo palewis iwan tenextilis ipan kwali kitlanki nompa tlen nama itlapialis iwan ipan kwali ohtli nochipa nemi, iwan nohkia ki ixnextis axkema welki kimatis tlen axkwali ika ki tekiwiyaya itlapialis. xa se nexikol teisa kichiwilihtok nofamiliar. in itepewal: miskikatl, xochmilkatl, kwawnawakatl, kwitlawakatl. lunes ik 3 de febrero de 1592 años, ikwak motlalitsinoke in la kompaña de hesús teatinos teopixke in onkan korte kiawak katka; wel ipan in sant blas ilwitsin katka, yowaltika mokalakiko, niman kimotlalilike sakramento iwan kimopilwike kampana; kinmotokayotilike de los provesos in onkan mowetsitiko teopixke. nima ye walewa unmotlaliko matlawakala, momotlalmomostike, yexiwtike. aw ik niman yewantsitsin kimonmotokilitiake in mochintin audiensia real tlaka tlahtoke oidoresme, moch luto in inrobones in indurga kimotlalilitiwi. makimatikan in ixkichtin kitaske inin karta de venta in keni tehoantin maria xwares niknosihoatl yoan noxwiyome migwel xwares iknookichtli nikan tochan santiago tlatilulko siudad totlaxilakaltian s. martin ateskapan ika in towelitilis yoan totlawelmachilis inik wel tikchioaske inin eskritura de venta yoan in ixkich onkan tenewtika ipanpa in axkan wel tomextin san sentetia in totlatol tikitoa kok [sic] timitsnamakiltia sentel kali tienda akokalo amo tlekopayo ikak tesontlalnamakoya in ipan tlamelawa wei otli in yaktikak sankta katalina. axkan amo titlanakakwaskeh tlamo ika kikilit, iskitl iwan totoltemeh. inin xiwpan ompewa galitlalpan ipanitlasalis wei amoxtli in itech ixkichtlamatilistli. onkan mitoa in tlatoli in wel iniolo intech kisaya in kitoaya in ikwak kitlatlawtiaya, in wei inteow katka; in yewatl teskatlipoka anoso titlakawa, anoso yaotl: in ikwak kokolistli momanaya, inik kipopolos. yewantin ik tlatlatlawtiaya in tlenamakake, in inteopixkawan katka iw kimokwitiaya in ka ixkich iweli, amo ittaloni, amo matokoni senka mawisawki in machiyotlatoli, in metaphoras: inik tlatoaya aw in yewatl in ana xoko aik onpa tikita nima kichiwa chinamitl iwan nima onkan omokalti ixkich tikmati ka titlaxilakaleke tlachkwititlan. aw inin omotenew tesosomoktsin, ka itech kiska ipiltsin in axayakatsin tlahtowani; aw yese in tesosomoktsin amo tlahtokat, san tlahtokapili katka. xitlasohtlakan inin tsiokwinalkawayo otlanamakaya se kilo tomatl ¿canin ka moawits? xinechmomakili in ontetl amoxtli in tlamachtli. sente tlanawatiyotl in weyi tlanawatiltin in yeknemilistli kin pia, kihtowa ka nochipa toyekmatikan iwan man paño tlen panos. in ik viii ipilsi kwakwawsi itoka matlaltsi, ikome unpa wikok totomiwaka, yokichwi mochiw istakkuyotl. amo xihtlapo nopa na nimitsmaka para yehoatl in kitowaya tewoktli. in okonike niman ye ik kinwikatse aokmo kimamatiwitse wel iwkima senka miyek oktli okike; in axkan ipan omotenew domingo ik opew ilwitl klérigos kabildo tlaka in okimochiwililito missa sankta theresa, iwan yewatl otemachtito in doktor muños kanónigo. "ah, se kwasiya wel nopakilis mochiwa. ye nik mati ka tewatsin wel timo kwalitilia in ixtlawatl. sa tepan in se noso ome xiwitl wel ye timochikawitis. tona se ontekiti iwan tla in tonemilis san kwali tikonwika, nochi kwali ye in totechmochiwa. amo xikwalani in mochiwa newín kuoujtaj. onkan ye wewehyi yekachi wehwei komo se xiwitl o orne xiwitl ye wehwaitoton ye kwale motlapana. mexkal aw in ye walasia in onkan mamani in ixakal mexika, aw nimann ik kintepotstike; onka ye mikali, || 92v onkan wel kimixpoloke in kwepopan in tepaneka in askapotsalka, onkan kimonewaltike in ye kintoka, niman ompa kintepewato in itokayokan wiskilokan. in ikwouyo pos kwowit wan ahko kipiya xiwit; kemeh eskia xiwit, por ké maski in ikwouyo tomawak in iihtik amo takwawak. tlahko kilo selik keso aw in oyuh kikak in maxtlaton inin inkwik mexika, || 92r niman ik ye tetlawismaka, kimilwia in itawan: "camo tlaka, ka is popoliwiske!". setsin tlatiwani notiotsin onechmononochili kename okinmolwilik don everardo titechmakas in tomin; ¡tlacamo timitztlatzontequilizque! notio omotlanankili amo nikpiatomin ipampa nosiwaw ika nopilwan yotlekoke ika tepostlan. miake tlaka iwan siwame oyahke ika tepostlan iwan amantlan. nochi tomin okwikake ika tlakwaske ikan amo ka kixmati tepoztlan. iman on okitok tlatiwani everardo amo nimitsmiktis ikan yotitito tlen melahuac. iwan nonantsin newatl omikak omotlatlatlawtilito itlak don everardo noihki, makamo kimomiktilikan ikan kimpia miake tepilwan. in don everardo aihmo kimiktik don regino notiotsin. san okimotlalilike kimixotilis se general mihke. amo omachix ahken okimihtik iwan otlanawatike itlak don everardo kename ompa wetstok se general. okipiaya itepostlamachotiloni de oro. wan okimolwilike notio tla aka kikixtilis, ye yiman on timiquiz. san noyoliyo,ni, kwakwawtsin, san ninentlamati. in monamaka tamanal. newatl in nikpowa inin amatl niknemilia inon tonali totechkopa senka mawistik ahmo san tahsiah inik tiksaloskeh sentlawipantika tokoltsitsiwan intlamatilistsin itechkopa in totlahtol tiktowaxkatiskianih miek tlahtoli in kin tiksalohtayah iwan no iwki in netlakwitlawilistli in moneki momatis inik kwalyotika motenewas kenin mochiwa patlantehke aw inin chalchiwtsin ikpak tlekoka in popokatepetl inik ompa kiyawtlatlaniskia, ipampa ihkwak tonalwakke, mayanalistli inpan moma i wewetke. kiilwi domingo de ramos monamaka ixiuyo. yopanok inin ilwitl. mostlatika neewalo kwalkan ahkewantsitsin moneki ixtlamatiwas ompa malinalko. ompoyon on mokwaya xochikwali kename lima, granada, (quilhuia chinas). noihki omokoaya achi welik pantsin. iwan okwikaya inin xochikwali ika pantsin ikwak yewalaske oanaske onkwan walwiloas techachan. noihki tlalkakawapanela. nochi in okalakia teopa chalma. onemanaloya tlakatsitsintin ika siwame ika opochkopa ika teyehman iwan tenepantla mopiliaya tlen mopanoltis topixke kinmoteochiwilis wakaltin ikan ye tetentok ika xochikwali malinalko. inik kiske tekpan palasio in kinekia dominikos iwan fransiskos san in wewemamania in manaloskia inik tekpanaloke; seseyaka sesetlamantin teopixke ye nepa tlayakak kinmanaya in teopixke sankto domingo iwan sant fransisko, aw in ome perochias bela krus iwan sankta katharina mártir ye wewechiwtiaskia sa tlatsakwitiaskia, tlayakak kinmanka in omotenewke teopixke dominigos, fransiskos. yewa kinpiah wel kwakwaltsitsin tlakentin. nima ik walmotlali in tlatokatis akamapich, in ipa i tekpatl xitl i motlatokantlali. mah namotech ahsi, amo monamaka. in nanakatsin se kikwa yewatl kitlahtalwia in wewe itskwawtsin tlahtowani atlawtlan tenanko. no mochiwa kwoutah kampa kuoujteximaj. igwalito in kwamekat yon kilwiah chikimekat, sayoh ne istak, amo tiltik. ipa yehwa saj. satepan tehwa wehka xiyata wan mochan. in sesek. nonotsalistli "kenke para innechualtokiliaj? aw in omotenew padre maestro frai gosalo de hermosilo inik kikwik wel yaoyotika in aik yuhki oittok in ye ixkichika onka eskwela mexiko, aw inik wel omakok san iseltsin kimopalewili in tlahtowani visurrei. xiii akatl xiwitl, 1219. tlein ankikwaltiske i nopiltsi in ankitlani? kwix ye ankomeke kwix ye ancaxeque?”. tomilo xopanistempan nochi tlen intlakwase xihtlalise noponi mochiwa kampa etokah oso kampa kitokah akolij. mochiwa kwowihtik wan tepeyoh mowiwilana wan ompa ya itsmolini. aw || 227 san ipampa in nikan onikmachiyoti inik san okexkan in mani kali ixpan omotenew iteokaltsin notlasottatsin san antonio, ipampa kittaske kimatiske in akike in kin nemikiwi in kin ye tlakatiske mexika iwan in altepewake ka san oqu iwkan in, in ihkwak ye niktlalia ye nikmachiyotia in itlahtolo, in omotenew aixtlawatl muchiwtimani axkan; intla satepan ittos in ikin kanin kenma ye teopankali ye monasterios ye kali ipan tentok ye onok, in axkan ayemo ken nestok, san atl onkan tentimani nowiyan. in amo kwaltia para pahti, solo para se kikwa in itakka, se kipixka, iihtik pochiktik, tein se kikwa pané ichkat, tsopek.in monamaka kwesalan itakka.iteyo amo se kikwa, se kitamota.ikwouyo kwali se kikwi oara kwowitatil. in sesek. na yani nikilewi", kiihto. ne kena ne tihtlamo fiero tihchihtok tsahkwilti ¡aneyatlaxiauh! wan axkiahsih niman wala se hwes itoka frafnsis]ko ximenes okilpiko okiwikak ompa méxiko aw niman ompa okimonawatili okimakak pena ipampa ayakmo oksepa kin nos/ip/ikam san bartolomé tlatoke xochitekwitin kwawtli oselotl. iwan in ipan in omotenew metstli miyekintin atlan mikke in matlanwike masewaltin; iwan in ipan in omotenew metstli setiembre inik tlamiko wel walnesia inik popokaya sitlali. nikan, notlak, gwilermo. in okachtin nikintlatlahtia man tlahtik motlalikan. ¿ye kwali ancateh? tiohueh. chikwasen axoxtlantli wan tikilwihke san xiontlachiyati wan sampa kachi chichikawakton timotlatoltia. yewa se weyi xochitlahtoani. otiwalahke ompa otitlakwahke onkan oksehpa tuwaltotlaske tek in kamion para tiwalahke tikisahko toluka. se kikwia in ixiuyo iwan emol, komo tiltiket, komo exoyeman, chichimekoh oso takwawaket, nochin kwaltia komo se kitalilia. se kipankokotochilia oso se kikwecholia nawi ixiuyo ika pisilchilwak wan tsiktsin tixti, kemeh se kikwi para se taxkal wan se kimapata ika se kaxit wan se kipantekilia. || 133r ik kinnankili kimilwi "ca weka i niyaw". q.n. (quitoz neki) in onkan ichan ayopechtli onkan mi- xivi kitlakatila in kuskatl ketsali. tlahmahtsi kitohtomili nopa iixiko. "ah, bweno. xa itech ehekatsin, ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. tikinmakati, aw no iwan in ihkwak in ye oyuh nepa matlakpowalxiwitl ipan senpowalonkaxtoli ipan chikwasen xiwitl opoliwke in tulam tlaka, inik momoyawake kikawke in imaltepew tulam. aw i matlalkwaye ikpak itlamasewayan katka itoka akatonal. ¡ma walaw in otomitl, in onechmetzhuitec! kwali ta motoka tibwen hoven. in ika itokatsin dios tetatsin tepiltsin ihoan spirito santo ka in nehoatl fransisko hernandes kwawiseki nikan nochan san hwan xiwitonko nikmelawa in notlanekilis ik tsonkisa in nosialis. in kwowit. wel totlatlauhtia, omotelwili in inspektor, ma ika septiembre ye yiman on nochtin kokone tlanankiliske ika ikahwan yeyenkwikwes. noihki telpokatoton tlaneltokaske iman lika on. tlakamo nantlanentokaske tikchiwaske ke ye keski xiwitl: namechtsakwaske. ¡solo iki on namotitiske kename nantlaneltokaske!" e iw oxitl xiwitl tlantokanti in otepew mexikatl in chimalwakan antenko. amo mochipautani. ao yowalpa ye nekalispa walolinke mexika ooo tisaapan kolwaka. in ik san impan mopepenaya in kimotlawtiaya yewatl in tlasotilmatli in tlasomaxtlatl. niman yehoatl in kimotlawtiaya in ye nowian altepetl ipan puchteka, matlaktepetl omome in kinnotsaya altianime san ipan mopepenaya. aw onkan in yewatl in ika inin tlahtoli inik nesi ka wei altepetl wei siudad katka in amakemekan, in ok ya wekaw in ok tlani inik chikwasen tlahtoke katka kipachowaya kipieya in ompa altepetl in ikwak i. opanok xiwitl iwan onipano kilwia ome xihpa nomachtis. nohpali ika sanahoria iwan kolesxochitl 91. ¿cuix san topan temos, topan wetsis in totonkayotl, in yamankayotl? aw inin kenami ik techmapanilia, ik techmikwiyelia in tlakatl, in totekwiyo, dios, ixkich iwelitsin. ittetsinko xommotlasa, xommomayawi, ka wel yewatsin toyelisnelwayo muchiwas, ka wel yuh muchiwas, in yuh itlahtoltsin, ik techmotolinilia, techmolpilia; xokommattiw nowiyan, xokonaxititiw immix, immoyolotsin. xokonkwekweptiw, xokoniitstiw in katlewatl motech mokwis in tlaltikpak. in yuhki tlaixtotokpan, tlakwilolpan, in achi toko, in achi nenemowa, xokonyeyekotiw in katlewatl in ahtleonkisalistli, in nepowalistli, in san nentlakayotl, in tixko, teikpak kwalistli. makamo yuh tonnemis, ma san moyolik, monemachtika tommoyakantias inik ahmo no tinechonelelpoposawaltis; ma san nematka, san yokoxka, inik tommonkmitis. san ye ixkich, notlasonamiktsine. xikmoknelilmachiti in totekwiyo, iesu christo. makamo xi tsinkitskistiw makamo xi tsinkiskatlayekotiw xi wal nakasitstiw maka tle xik wal ilnamikitiw. kan onichantiaya itoka barrio san mateo kampa metstok weyi teotl ahken kimoxotilia tobarrio. yewatsin kosa kwaltsin intlak chantlaka iwan chantlaka kosa okimotlasotiliaya noihki. 86. otlakawki immoyolotsin. ma tlaltitech ximotlalitsino, simowetsititsino, nopiltsintsine. aw in axkan ka owalkis, ka owalwets in sententli, in senkamatl, immotlaokoltsin, immochokitsin, mixayotsin. ka oninokwiltono, ka oninotlamachti ipaltsinko in totekwiyo aw immonanyotsin, immottayotsin; ma sa nimitskwili, ma sa nimitsanili, immotlakaskaltiayatsin, immotlakawapawayatsin. aw in ipanpa in, in iw nikan otopan mochiw axkan, atle ipan okimottili amo kimomawtili in tlahtowani don frai garsía gwerra arsobispo visurrei; ye motlanawatili inik kwakwamiminalos ixpantsinko in onkan tekpan palasio korral, yehika ka wel ipaktsin in kwakwanmiminalistli inik onkan senkixowak netepankaltemalok, in ye tlamiminalo in ipan in semilwitl viernes. yei akatl xiwitl atle mochiw. kenin mochiwa inik ei tonatiw omanka, nawi kiawitl in itonal mitoa kiawtonatiw ipan inin mochiw in ipan tlekiaw, in onokka ik tlatlake iwan ipan xaltekiaw konitowa ihkwak motepew in xaltetl in tikitta iwan poposo kak in tesontli iwan inkwak momaman in texkali chichichilwtikak. aw i yewantin in chichimeka totolimpaneka in okimonkalakito ik niman ye ikpak tleko in inteokal in akxoteka in chalka in onkan onok in akolakatl nawaltewktli in kimoteotiaya in akxoteka; no onkan kitekato in inkimil in inkakax in ihtik kiwalwika in inteow in chichimeka in tokolwan. pero axweli posteki i tekpatl xiwitl, 1064 años. se kilo etl, ahso awax, ahnoso kalwahsa achtokopa san weweka kaltin oyeya, iwan otlamamawtiloaya ika oksepa. ¡ye witse zapatistas'. noso ¡ye witse carrancistas! yotlan. kimuchi malkriados in pipiltoton kinye moskaltitikate pero yekimomačtia' de malkriados ahmo kipia' respekto de nipapan akmo yomokambiaro de non respeito. wahka ne pedro wan nopa pablo inihwanti tekitij. tlen 52 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlahtokan tlen tepantlahtoanih monechikos ika 300 tepantlahtoanih tlen motlapehpeniseh ken kiihtowa tlahtolpewalistli tlaixwasantli, tlen itechpowi altepeyotl sehka tlaixpehpentli, iwan 200 tepantlahtoanih tlen motlapehpeniseh tlen itechpowi iasika tlahtolpewalistli, ika tokayotl tlatekpantli, tlen miakintin tlaixwasantli. aw in kali onkan in ikak tesontlalnamakoyan otenko in ipan tlamelaoa weyotli in yatikak sankta katalina in onmaxitike niman onotsaloke in onkan chaneke in tlaxilakaleke inin kalnahoak tlaka oilwiloke tlaxihoalwian ken wel ankimakti in ika inin kali akiaxka akitlatki otlanankilike okitoke tlatokehe ka wel yehoatl axkahoa in maria salome omomikili aw ka isitsin in maria xwares yoan in migwel xwares ka inamik okatka in omomikili ka wel axkahoake kayak maka kitlayelewilia. yon se simolotl axonka. . in omoxtlaw niman ye ik ipan tlahtowa in ixkich monekis: in tlakwali in totolkimili in nakatlaoyo in totol tlaoli iwan kwali kakawatl teonakasyo. in san ik mosentenewa, ya nopa kiijtouaj. se kitoka iteyotsin. kema melawak onitenankili ye nikalakia yese ammonechpakti inemilis in ichpokatl iwan wel imman oninohkwani in mosenpowa asteka mexitin in onkan kisako ihtik chikomostotl senxikipili ipan makwiltsontli, san ik mosentenewa in siwa iwan pipiltotonti mexitin. vii tekpatl xiwitl, 1304. iwan nikan tenewalo in arsobisposme in ye otlapachoko in ipan in nweva españa in ye ixkichkaw ik okitlaniko iwan inik yewatl axkan ipan xiwitl de 1608. aw sa imachsiwamo in kimahtiw umpa españa ipan asis in itoka doña mariana de ibarra inamik katka in ipiltsin don fransisko de velasko in ompa momikili españa; in no umpa kinkawtia ipilwan in wel yewantin yeske erederos, nema- || 141 -queque yeske in markesado de salinas intla momikilis inkoltsin don lwis de velasko in mowika axkan españa. xkintaselotili nopilwan. ¿auh kwix ye tewantin tokonitlakoske in wewe tlamanitilistli, in chichimeka tlamanitilistli in tolteka tlamanitilistli in kolwaka tlamanitilistli in tepaneka tlamanitilistli? ka ye iwka toyolo ipan yoliwa, ipan tlakatiwa ipal neskatilo, ipal newapawalo inin nonotsaloka, inin tlatlawtiloka. ¿tlenon tikneki? ¿tlenon timonekitia? amitla nikneki. tlen 127 tlanawatihkayotl. ni tlatekipanoni ipan nochi altepetl ,ni, mexihko tlali, pilaltepetsitsi kampa tlatskitoke, kenihki kampa tlanawatiyame itstoke kin tlahtlachiliya amatlapowali tlen nochi wei altepetini monawatiya in selti wan tlenweli tekitiketl ki seliya se achi tomi tlen kiteki chihtok, ni tekitl tlen kinmaka, eliskiya kenihki tekiti yowanti. ni pil tomintsi tlen ki seliah ni tekitini se xiwitl, kenihki kisa ipan tlen ki sentiliya nochi xiwitl keni yahtiyowi i. mo ilwiya ni piltomintsi tlen kin mahmaka pilkentsitsi kin kalakia tlen tlakwahtinemi iwan kinselia in tomi tlen se xiwitl tekiti kin maka amatl tomi tlen ika kionpatla in tlakwalis iwan sekihnok kin tlaahaxiltilia, iwan ax kin palewia ika seyok tlamantli tlen amo in axka moiskaltia in tekitl iwan ki yaltia ipan in nehnemilis tekiltl.ii. axtleno tekichihketl ki selia tomi kema aitekiti ipan ni weyi altepetl kenihki yahti. iii. yon se tekitiketl amo kiselia miak yon pilkentsi kenihki in tlayakanka; kema mo tlanilia ika in tekitl waka weli kiselia achi in tomi tla nelia kwali tekitihtoke, amo weli kiselia miak kenihki se xiwitl kin maka ni weyi tlanawatihketl ipan ni xesko tlatih ki tlalia. iv. amo kin tlaxtlawia seyok tlamantli kema yas tekitl kema mokokowa yon kema ki kawa in tekitl, kema kin tlanehtia tomi san tlen tlakwilohtoke ipan amatl. ni tlanawatihketl amatl kema tekiti kin powilia tlaxke tekitl ki chiwase, iwan ni amo nimantsi kin tlaxtlawia, san kema tekititohkeya. v. ni in tomi tlen ni tekitini kin tenextiliskia keski ki tlanise kema kin tlaxtlawise. ni kongreso de la unión iwan legislaturas ipan ni pil altepetsitsi iwan asamblea legislativa tlen ni mexihko tlali kenihki mo tlani iwan kikixtia tlahtolkamanali kenihki elis tlanawatilkayotl kenihki tlanawatise iwan kintlatsakwiltise ne tekinini tlah amo ki axiltilia iwan kema mokokowa kenihki kamati ni tlanawatihkayotl. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. in ik konitotewak in tochiwitsin; ik ye witse ye walnenemi in ipan se tekpatl xiwitl. onkan in kikwepilike in itoka in iteow in itlakimilol in wewe tsiwtlakawki yaopol, ka achtopa itoka katka mixkowatl. ka sanno yuhki in ihkwak metstli kitsakwilia in tonatiw, amo wel mochiwas in wekawtika kixtsakwilis, yehika ka moma- || 144 -lacachotiuh iwan kitlalkawitiw in metstli". xochiyowa abril, mayo wan hunio. aw in axkan ka intlal inik moteilwia ka imaxka ka intlatki ka kinkawilitia in itatsin ka yuh nikmati ka in newatl ni migwel sewanokatl inik amo nistlakati ipanpa ik nikan nomatika niketsa krus. migwel sewanokatl. aw in ipan axkan ik 6 mani metstli de disienbre de 1606 años, ikwak ye no okkan kitlapoto kikoyonito in mexikatsinko atenamitl in onkan walkisa atl, in onkan yankwik bwentes kichiwke; iwan yankwik pwertas onkan kitlatlalike inik tsawkties, in ikwak kenmanian intla okseppa apachiowas mexiko, ik motsakwatiw || 49 in atl. in amoxtli otimoamapowili moyek ixmati. mimientah kwowit kwalika, xihsiwi iwan ipan tlahko iman ye ompatiezqueh. lunes ik tlami metstli abril in ipan in xiwitl omotenew, ikwak mopewalti in akalotli inik moyekti in nikan mexiko itenkopatsinko visurrei; tetskoko, tla- || 2 -copan, mexiko, wel se metstli moyekti in iski akalotli. xinechontemoliti seki xachikwaltin noka nitlahtowa ika wehkatlahtolastli. xochiyowa marso wan taki abril wan mayo. tein tsintomawak kwouyo amo uitsyoj, tein imahtsakal wan ya in witsyoh wan ixiuyo kwaltsin ahwiyak. weyi atl. nikan ipan in in tepan asiko in tlakatl inn oselotsintewktli in tlahtowani walmochiwtia wixtoko tekwanipan, ye iw se xiwitl ipan tlako xiwitl ye onkan ka tekwanipan amakemekan in wewe tsiwtlakawki yaopol tsompawakatewktli teomama. aw in omotlahtokatlali in kwawtlix, yewatl kinnexti pani kintlali in mexika wewetke chichimeka. tlen 58 tlanawatihkayotl. iwikpa se elis senador moneki seha tlanekilismeh tlen se tepantlahtoani, san mopatla xiwitl, tlen moneki 25 xiwitl asitok tlen keman mochiwas tlapehpentli. immanon yuhkin aka otechnotsani otitonechikohkeh miek nawalahtoltlaltlakah ipan seminario de kultura nawatl nikan unam in kimoyakanilia yewatsin in mikeltsin leonportila e iw xi xiwitl tlatokati in momostike mexika. . aso kana imatian otelsihsiw otichokak in tloke nawake ka nikan tikmoyawa in ikokokaw in ik omits iknoittak. entonses wahsito ompan seki imačyetla'kwa'. kihtowa tatah aurelio no kwaltia ichokilo ika se mokampaka para mah amo se taneskisa oso wetsih se itawan oso mah amo tekoko se isahsaliuyan. tlehkok se tlamantli ii tochtli xiwitl, 1026 años. onkan tiaske' para tipanotaske in kwawwahti inganik otiwala. entonses kwak iwehwei mokištili' n penkitas mochin penkitas de non chikitoton. xiiii pregon.- a veinte i uno de hebrero de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in ipan tlaxilakali kwepopan okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal in itlal isabel maria okito in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak otlanankili testigo fransisko hernandes. ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. 90. nonamiktsine, tlaxikmokakiti, ma tikkwis, ma tikanas in nimitsnolwilis in san teonetlasotlalistika; in tikpakkaselis in axkan ka otechmoknelili in tlakatl, in teumawistli, in tlamache, in yokoxki, in ipalnemowani, ka oyuhtlama iyolotsin, ka otechmolpili. ¿cuix san tontokawaske? wel ixkich mihiyo, motlapal ako ximolpi, ma san tontlakwekwetlaxo, itlan xonmakilti, in ilakatsiwka, in imalinka, in iknoyotl, iknotlakayotl; ma kwel yewatl ma ontimaliwi, inik tikokoxki, inik titeopwki, ma kwelewatr motoski onmalini, mokwitlaxkol ompitsawa. inin se kwali sowapa. aw ipan imatian, yekene yewatl kinexti in wei nekwiltonolistli, in chalchiwtli, in teoxiwtli aw in teokwikatl, in kostik in istak, in tapachtli, in teksistli, in ketsali, in xiwtototl, in tlahkechol, in sakwan, in tsinitskan in ayokwan. aw iwan kinexti in tlapapalkakawatl in tlapapalichkatl. aw wel wel toltekatl katka in ipan ixkich in itlawal. in itlakwaya in iatliya in tapalkatl xoxoktik, kiltik, istak kostik, tlapaltik tlakwiloli iwan okseki miyek. in ipan in siudad mexiko sanktiago tlatilulko ik kaxtolilwitia metstli setiembre de mil e kinientos i setenta i nweve años in yehoantin fransisko xwares yoan migwel lasaro chaneke santa ana witsilan yalbaseashoan kinchiwtia in dios okimowikili angelina de la krus okikawako sempoali pesos wel tomines impampa in inanima in angelina de la krus ik omito misas kantadas in iw okimokwalitili in ika in itepalewilitsin in totlasomawistatsin frai pedro oros gwardian. nikan ipan in in mikiko in kwawpopokatsin tlatowani kowatlichan; aw san niman ikwak motlahtokatlali in itoka xakintsin tlahtowani kowatlichan. pero kemeh seki mopilwan tikintayokoli, amo kwali itech nesi in tokaitl "desierto” ipampa in weyi kwahtla wehkapan kwameh quinpiah. tewan tlalpan ototlalihtayah. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. totonik por ke wahwaktik. aw intla nikan walasisnekia, san niman mikia, aokmo wel mokwepaya in kanin inchan; ahnoso ok wel mokwepaya, ka sa kana ohtlipan onmikia; ahnoso ok wel onasia in inchan, sa onmiktasia, ayokmo wel semilwitiaya ... . || newatl nikneki ma mosenkawakan ika teopixki achto ma yakan teopan satepan ipan registro sivil awakakwowit newa ka owiloak. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. seki kweponi, on kwetlawia. kinenehki xochitl ka nololo, san kwikanentlamatle, san nonkwikayeyewa, ye ni kwakwawtsin in tlaltikpak, ninenehki xochitl ma nomak onmaniki ninentlamati. okinemilike prefekto iwan inspektor kintsatsakwaske nochtlaka kipias noso amo kipias ikonew. kipias tlen tsawtas keniman kitlatolanaske wan tlanankilis tlen kitoa iyolo. kintitlanis tla kintitlaniske inpilwan tlamachtilkalko. aken otlanakiliaya kititlanis ipilwan tlamachtilkalko okinkakawaya. iwan tlen okitoaya amo okipiaya tlen tsawtaske se metstli. iwan okimilwiaya ¿quezqui kokone nankimpia? ¿nanquititlanizque tlamachtilcalco? okseki okitoaya "amo nikpia kokone; san nocnehuan. ¡can noso xikilwi motatsin ma kintitlani tlamachtilkalko! ¡amotla tlaxtlahuazque! vi tochtli xiwitl, 1238. in ipan axkan domingo ik xiii mani metstli de oktubre de 1602 años, ikwak maxitiko arsobispo don frai garsía de sankta maría de mendosa i súñiga sant herónimo teopixki, ye teotlak in mokalakiko mexiko. pero nelehwel yutukuwihke tlali tlakahmo erensia. no kinexketsah kemeh taol wan se kichiwa taxkal wan se kikwa yon itesyo. aw in oyuh pew yaoyotl, niman ipan in in vi tochtli xiwitl, 1446, in momikili in omotenew kwateotl tlahtowani itskawakan chalko tlalmanalko, in tlahtokat || 97r senpowalxiwitl ommatlaktli ipan nawxiwitl. tiapismikise". yei kilmaitl yepasohtli kikwechowah wan kitaliliah in pitsokwitaxkol. nochipa ximoteyeknankili. nitlasohtlas sanihki nihkaki tlikoli tihkwa?" noman den kipahpachoa mate' kwawi tlinimawan. san ye iwan nonkwika yehyan, notew. in tonaya, tlatoayan, yie xochinkakawatl in posontimani, a xochioktli. matlaktli tekpatl xiwitl ik poliwke okwilteka. san tlamito nopa tekitl kichiuayayaj. xii kali xiwitl, 1309. onkan nemawatilok. neskafemekat muchi wahkin in pasto atle tlenkikwaske in yolime. kemantsi kosolime, kemantsi xolome tehwa nopilwan no xkineskayotili nehin. tak sesek ta ayoh in ikwouyotsin aw yewatsin onkan motemachtili in don frai diego de kontreras elekto arsobispo in la isla sankto domingo aihtik, aw sankto padre itenkopatsinko in iw mochiw. in xiutsin. karpamichtamali ika xokonochtli aw ok wel yowalnepantla in apan temoaya, in onkan motokaayoti atekpan, amochko. aw ompa in onmowitstlaliaya in wikokotl ikpak iwan witso iwan tsinkok iwan nonowalkatepk. aw san niman ipan in in xiwitl in motlahtokatlali in tlakatl wewe witsiliwitl intlahtokaw achto mochiw in mexika chichimeka, inik witse inik motetekatiwitse in innenemian inik walnenenke. ikanepa ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. axkana nipolihtok", ihkini kiihtok. non in ayamo saspa itla' kišmati' ayamo nian tlen wan inon tekixmati algo yokimakake inin libro libro primero ye'on yemomačtia' itech wan in ahmo yeki segirwia' kimaka repaso. aw iwan ye onpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolxiwitl in ipan 10 tochtli xiwitl, 1554 años, in omomikili tlakatl don diego de sant fransisko tewetskititsin tlahtowani tenochtitlan, in tlahtokat matlaktlonnawi xiwitl. —¿quen onyes hi, ken tonyeske? ¿anozo onkantemaktlanke kwekwexteka, in tlatilolka? tein se kikwa in xalxoxompe yeh istak ixochiyowan, ikwouyo no iuki wan kwadrado, eskinado. xii akatl, 1595 años. wahki nopa atl. . yeh ikwak wal semolinia in sematonawak wal mosehmasia in nikan mexiko in ilwitl ki wal kistiaya se xiutika in ki wal mattiwia aw ye ixkich in omosemaáko tlahtoke in kipachowa altepetl. xochitl mantiw,ika momakixtia in witsnawatl yaotl. inda ninotlapaloskiani nikxitinis sasokahtli inontin teocholi monekia miek tonali inik tekitiwas no iwki ma nechpalewikan miek tlakah senka owihtik in itla ompa mochiwaskiani ipampa ahmo wel kwali nikmatia kanin otlatihtaya in tomin iwan no iwki axkantika in tlali ye iaxka oksente iichpochtsin in notahtsin iwan inda wel neli ompa itla mochiwaskia wel monekia ma yewatlo siwatl tlakawa in iyolo iwan in in wel neli ahweli aw senka wei in kiyawaloke; inik ompa walkiske inchan sanktiago tlatilolko niman kisako sankt ana, ik || 210 niman kisako sankta katalina mártir perochia, ik niman kisako sankto domingo, ik niman ahsiko onkan in iglesia mayor, ik niman kisato san ignasio la kasa professa, ik niman kisato san fransisko, ik niman kisato visitasión monhas, ik niman kisato totlasonantsin konsepsión monhas, ik niman kisato sankta maría kwepopan, ik noseppa ahsito in inchan sanktiago tlatilolko. chikwasen sanahoria matlaktlomome tochtli anotle mochiw. inik chikomostok motenewa ka chikokkan in koyonki in texkali ostotl; iwan itokayokan kinewayan, inik motenewa kinewayan onkan intech kinew in mexika in ihkwak onkan kisako. yoan niktenewa in ompa petlachiwkan mani nomilkoal inik motamachiwa tonatiw ikisaian itstok inik wiak napoalkwawitl aw inik patlawak nekok ixkich kikwaxochnamiki in imil tapian nikitoa ompoali intech powis in noxwiwan diego de kastañeda yoan baltasar aw in ok ompoali intech powis in albaseas tlatsintla tokayetikate. nopa ichpokatl. 12. inin in iskitlamantli nimitstenewilia. san niman ahmo inka tiwetskas, timotopewas, ahmo inka timawiltis, ahmo inka tikamanalos, ahmo tikimpinawis, ahmo tikintlayelittas, ahmo tikintlatsilwis, ahmo tikimihiyas, ahmo tikitelchiwas. san ye ye timoskalis, titlachias, san ye timisawis, san ye timomawtis, san ye tichokas, san ye titlaokoyas, san ye timoknotekas, san ye timopechtekas ixpantsinko in totekwiyo inik ahmo no yuhki mopan mochiwas, in yuhki ipan omochiw intla ika tiwetskas, intla ika tikamanols, intla tiktelchiwas. kin ok ka tlamati noyolloh; aw in aka awel choka san teikampa tsotsoyontika mochokiskaneneki. chilposon, talkamoh ika polo, xokoyolemol no kitaliliah mimientah wan witsti komo akoloh no kitaliiiah ixiuyo. in nexkihit no ika kiajualiaj. kimanah chikomeh mimientahxiwit ika chilwak, sikiera ornen wan kinimakah in nanahmeh tein kipiyatih in pili para amo uejkauaj, para niman kipiyas ipili. no kikwih mimientahxiwit ihwak motemah siuamej, akin kipiyak ipili. wan mimientahkwowit kwaltia para trapiche wan no kikwih para kalikximej. yewantin hi in chichimeka achto tlaleke. wehkapania kemeh eyi metro. vii tekpatl xiwitl, 1408. tsetseliwi, mimiliwi, yawaliwi xochitli, awiyastiwits in tlaltikpak. onkan tla'analo ka akokohtli. ayohkana para dios kichiwa. noktapahpata no kwaltia para kalanemilis, kitetewatsah xoxowik wan mah se kikwa. yewa ixtelolohtexohtik, iankaiknin ixkafetik iwan siwaiknin ixtliltik. ixkichtin kinmokawiliko in teopixke sant fransisko, gwardián, divinidores, komissario, provinsial, kinmoyomawiliko inik kinmotlaliliko; iwan korregidor mayor iwan miekintin kastilteka in kiwalmowikilike. ya axkana kimonextili nikan ipan in motlahtokatlali in wewe akamapichtli in kolwakan tlahtowani. in inkwiloli tlen 110 tlanawatihkayotl. welis kin tlahtol tlatsakwiltiseh tlen wehkapa tepantlahtoanih iwan tepantlahtoanih tlen tlahtokan sennechikolistli, in ministros tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia tlen totlalnantsin, in konseheros tlen hudikatura tlen sentlanawatiloyan, in sekretarios tlen despacho, in tepantlahtoanih tlen nechikolistli tlen weyi altepetl iyolo, in hefe tlen gobierno tlen weyi iyolo altepetl, in prokurador general tlen totlalnantsin, in prokurador general tlen hustisia tlen iyolo weyi altepetl, in magistrados tlen sirkwito iwan hweses tlen distrito, in magistrados iwan hweses tlen fwero komún tlen weyi altepetl iyolo, in konseheros tlen hudikatura tlen weyi iyolo altepetl, in konsehero tlayekanketl, in konseheros elektorales, iwan sekretario ehekutivo tlen instituto federal elektoral, in magistrados tlen tribunal elektoral, in direktores generales iwan seha ipatih tlen kaltlanawatilmeh tlen moselnahuatiah, kaltekitilmeh tlen kinpalewia tekpan tlanawatiloyan, nechikolismeh iwan tlasentilismeh tlen tlatskitokeh ipan kaltekitilmeh iwan altepeko tominnechicolismeh. in tlanawatianih tlen tlaltlanahuatilmeh, tepantlahtoanih tlen chinankopa, magistrados tlen tribunales superiores tlen hustisia lokales iwan, tlen inon tlamantli, tlen imawan tlen konseheros tlen hudikaturas lokales, san welis kin tlahtol tlatsakwiltiseh ken moihtowa ipan inin tokayotl ipampa kiixpanoseh inin amatlanawatili iwan tlanawatilmeh tlen sentlanawatiloyan tlen kampa quisah, iwan noihki tla amo kwali kitekiwiseh tlaxtlawili iwan sekinok tlapiali tlen sentlanawatiloyan, ye nikan tlasenkawali san mochiwas ika tlahtoli iwan momatiltis chinankopa tlanawatilchiwalmeh iwikpa in tekichiwalis, makisenkawa ken itechpowi. in tlatsakwiltilmeh mochiwaseh ika tekikixtili tlen altepeko tekitini iwan ayokanah welis tekichiwas: tekipanos, tlanawatis noso tekichiwas san katlia ihki tlamantli ipan altepeko tekitl. iwikpa mochiwas inin tlatsakwiltilismeh tlen kiihtowa inin tlanawatili, in tlahtokan tlen tepantlahtoanih saniman temaktilis tlatelwili iixpan tlahtokan tlen wekapa tepantlahtoanih, san achtopan tlahtoseh tlen miakintin tlatskitokeh ipan tlahtokan, san teipan tlen keman kikwalitaseh tekichiwalistli tlen itechpowi iwan itlakakilis tlen quitelhuitoqueh. keman moixmatis tlatelwili tlen wekapa tlahtokan, tlen motokachihtos tlahtokan tlen tlasenkawani, kitekiwis tlatsakwiltilistli tlen itechpowi ika intlahtol ome tlen eyi tlaxexeloli tlen ompa yetoskeh ipan nechikolistli, san keman mochihtosa tlahtol tlahtlanili tlen itechpowi iwan iixpa tlen quitelhuitoqueh. in tlahtol senkawalmeh tlen tlahtokan tlen tepantlahtoanih iwan wekapa tepantlahtoanih amo akah welis kitewis. . in ik yahke motekpantiake ompantike aw ompa in kin namikito akachinanko. xii akatl xiwitl, 1439. kema kiilwi para "kuidado, kwidado ne tepetl elto weyi tepetl, ihkini moahkoktok ya nehin miltsin, xl- pregon a desiocho de hebrero 1587 años in pedro awexotl otsatsik teskatsonko okitekakiti inin monamaka ikal itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak tlanankili testigo pedro hernandes. ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. "ma titlakwaka aw in sant fransisko teopankali in ihtik amo senka miek inik molon inik mex atl, san kexkich i ka. tla tihneki kena nimitswikas nikan ipan in in moxeloke in mexika tenochka, inik sekintin ompa motlalito in xaltilolko. napoaltika ye nosepa kisako waxtepek, kwawnawak; unka waltemok xochmilko, unka mike tlatilulka. e iw ix xiwitl tlantokanti i kimoma tekpantlakilke. tlaninemiskiaya ipan chikwasentetl tonali in metstli, notlakatilis ilwitl. tsin in sentetl tekwachtli ipatiw katka makwil powali in kakawatl. yewatl in tototlakwaltekwachtli. in onkan onok petlatl ipan kintlalia. . niman ye ik wal kisa in tlakwali yakatiw in wentli in itech powi xiwteoktli kwalika, notechmoneki in orne tonalpa in metstli. nikinkwalita in tlatquih, nesi moyekixotia, san tlen nikneki ye in okse ikpali. kenin mochiwa atl mokwakwalatsa ika pilonsilo; in textli moatilia ika ome tekontontli atl; motlalilia in textli in ye omoatili, in ye omokwachwi; in chilpatlawak motlewatsa, mosiyawa, ma ixika; mokixtilia in ikwitlaxkol, in chilakachtli; no mokixtilia in ikwitlapil. ipan temolkaxitl motesi mochi inin ika anis, mokwachwia iwan motlalilia in atoli; san teki molinia ixkichkaw in ye owiksik. ye wehkapa amo niteita in nomaikniisin. tlahko kilo chilakachtextli ik tlatlapana kwawyotl oseloyotl: in motlakwilolpan san ti ya nemi ye nikan tlaltikpak. ik tiktlilania kowayotl ah ikniwyotl ah in tekpilotl. onkán nitlahtetekas. totatsin polo weyi omotemakixtili. kosa kwakwali, tlatoli omotlanonochiliaya. ika on oyolewaya toyolo. amo kimektiliaya ipampa topixke okimopatiliaya chantlaka tla aka amokokos. amo patio otlaxtlawaloya, san ome tomin. wan tla iknotlakatl amo tlaxtlawaya nian se sentavo. topixke okitlakoliaya ichantsinko tlakwali tlen kikwas kokoxki. istayotl hasta sempoali iwan matlaktli tlaka. momostla mokwitiw istayotl ika kwanakanakatl iwan tlaxkali. omotlanawatiliaya topixke momostla tiwalas, nanchi, tikwikas itlakwatl motatsin. ikwak ye sewis aihmo tihualaz. ipan in yankwika kittake in tlakochkalka chalka in popokak in popokatepetl; in kimatke kiniwti opopokak, aw ka ye amo, ka miyekpa in wekawtika in kawaya in amo popoka. tlasohkamati ka otinechtlahpaloko. xiteintlahpaloh mochan tlakah iwan man kwali mopan ye. in aokmo awewantin, in iç ankate in annopilwan in annomasewalwan in nikan in amochintin; axkan ya namechonkixtia inik ya name- || 31v -chhuica in ompa in san ye wel no yuh kanin in owankatka. sedilo tenawati ma kilpiah inin tlakatl. iuki kilwiah por in itech elot mochiwa. wan teipa walwetsi mah amo askayowa. ximotlatlachilti amo onwe tsis. aw in oasike in ompa mopieske niman ye kalaki is siwapan in techie tlaketsaltitlan mani kimonkwixanaltihtimani in tlaoli. niman petlapan kintlalia. yuwahsiko kámion. chiwknawi tekpa xiwitl atle mochiw. axkinekih ma kinextekilih nopa koyome tlen ¿tlein yankwik anka? mochiwa kajfentaj, milah wan kuoujtaj. nipapatlantinemi, ¿queyeh mosenketsa nehin totonik? ai topan wits oya nitemok, nakatl mowikxitia ika se litro iwan tlahko atl, motlalilia in xonakatl, axox iwan istatl. momohmoyawa in chilakachtextli ika ome xalohtoton atl, makahmo motelolohchiwa; ihkwak ye tlatextli, motsoyonia, moteka in istayutl kampa owiksik in nakatl, motlalia in kamohtli ye tlawikxitili iwan in nohpali no ye owiksik in ye oixikak. chikome tochtli ik tapachiwke kiawtika, muchi popoliw in chinamitl. wan owala opaxaloko ika mexiko. yewatl okitlekawitl tepostlatsilinali ka katedral. nawi xumali pitsochiyawisotl niman ye ontlamati in ompa in koyowakan, san ye ipan in in chiwknawi tekpatl xiwitl; aw in kitenewili in ok omosawas in iweltiw in chalchiwtlikwe, ikwak chichix in atl. ta tikinawatis para ma mochiwa nopa kali". aw in theniente katka don hwan martín mestiso in tenochtitlan inik kipalewi don antonio valeriano onxiwitl ipan chikwetetl metstli, inik niman onpa yah tlatilolko hwesgovernadortito ompa. wehkaw ya niktemohtok achkatsi itstoke ikmakwilpa onkan inpan toxiw molpili in mexika in kulwakan in ye ixkichika ik ompa witse astlan. in ipann axkan ik 4 mani metstli de febrero de 1608 años, ikwak okinkawke in sant sebastián teopixke i motenewtsinowa kalmenistas deskarsos in mexika atsakwalka, in intechtsinko powia. in kwahkwaltin awakatl momaka ompa keretaro. sesek por ké komo se kikwa miak, teihtikokowa. nika nopa atl weyi ika welis nikan ipan in in omomokiliko in itoka yowalatonak in ik-ei tlahtowani kulwakan, in tlahtokat epowalxiwitl; aw sa niman ipan in in omotenew xiwitl onkan walmotlahtokatlali in itoka in ketsalakxoyatsin iknawi tlahtowani mochiw in kulwakan. amoxkalko pewa kwika, yeyekowa, tein istaktaol nochi iuki sah istak in iewayo wan istak in taol. aw yuh mihtowa, semihkak mixtitlan ayawtitlan || 28v mochipa mixtentimani in onkan kisako in walake, yewatl ipampa inik mihtowa inik okimotokayotike mexitin. itlanahnamik: aw inik yewatsin walmotlanawatilia toweitlahtokatsin rei in timasewaltin, in kokoxki ik kichiwas in testamento san iyolotlama yes kiyomawis in kihtos, wel itlanekilistika kitlalis in itlahtol inik kixexelotias in iaxka itlatki in momikisnanawatiki kichiwas; wel kihtotias in tlein itlanekilis yes inik mokakawtias, inik niman yewatl mochiwas moneltilis maxiltis in intlahtol. kwali nikasikamati teyolkokolis in monantsin. inin teinemilis nochi in tatahtin. ix kichka senpoalixihtika mopilyek huepahuah, iwan ibkwak pilantoton yomohuepahqueh, inimeh monamiktia iwan mochancahuah, q u i n kahtewah in wewentsitsin man nemikan kenameh huelitizqueh. in no sente ichpoch ka omokawak ihkwak notelpoch fransisko omik, ye noye k e x i ti k a omonamikti iwan nemi in verakrus. lhkion newatl iwan no sowan tosesel otokahkeh ipan weyi kali in koyowahkan nikpia. mach nesi ye otlayowak. ¿tlen iman timopilia? istatl, ixkich in monekis aw nima ye kiwika kontlalito axokotsinko siwateukalko; in okontlalito nima ye ik wi kilwiske topantemoksi, koyowewetsi, temilosi, e nima ye no ye in intlatokaw tenochka. moneltokayayah in chololistli ikwik nechchiwili se favor ka nikan tika nopiltsé xolé ka o toyolo on pachiw. ka otokonanke ka otokonkwike in mochokis in monetekipachol. in ihkwak tealtiaya im puchteka ipan im panketsalistli. aw in kaltiaya yewatl in tlaltili. in kimiktiaya tlakohtli. ompa kimonkawaya in askapotsalko in tiankisko. ye iw matlaktlomome xiwitl onkan kate in astlan teokulwakan in ipan xii kali xiwitl, 61 años, in kakike kwawitl in awewetl; aw in ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios ye iw ye nepa yepowali ipan se xiwitl motlakatilitsino inik kakike kwawitl in satepan inpan postek in ipan v tekpatl, 1068 años. talmaniktsin, katlin atonal, katlin atonal? amo tlato tekwanewatl iyaye istlakatisipil i xayakamacha ayao ai. aw no ipan in in xiwitl in pewke chalka in ya waltekiti mexiko tenochtitlan. iii kali xiwitl, 1261. nikawín mochiwa miak. noponi itstoke nopa arrieros nochi in ome taman kiluiaj: talpanxoxokoyolin. aw kamo notech moneki inik senka niktlapiwis in ipan in nikmiyekilis in tlatoli, aw ka itla nel ka tle onyeni in tlei mitos, sa wel ixkich yeskia ontlamantli neixkwitili itlatoltsin kimotlalili i yewatsin sant augustín, inik kimotlali in ipa in itsinpewkapa in amoxtli kimikwilwi in itoka libro de la siudad de dios, kitosneki itechpa tlatowa in ialtepetsin dios. axkan viernes in ik 20 mani metstli marso de 1615 años, ihkwak ipan in okiwalikwanike in intlayawalolis in inprossesión in kofrades in itetsinko powi in ipilwantsitsin tlasemiknopilwiani san roke, in ompa kisani atenantitech hospital san lásaro akalkalko, in españoles iwan timasewaltin in okisaya lunes sankto; aw san ye ipan in teotlak nawi tsilini okiske axkan ipan semilwitl viernes. ¡xi ya kimotlatia, amo kwaltia para pahti. wei romanteopixki in itoka inik matlaktli omei gregorio, okichiwili itlapapatilis in wewexiwpowaltsin, ipan matlaktli omome tochtli xiwitl. aw in okik ayamo in don christóval kolón almirante walasia in onkan isabela, aw in yewatsin padre frai boil iwan okseki tlakatl in moyolkokoltia inik kixnamiki don christóval kolón almirante, niman no makalakike in itik ei kastila akali inik wala don bartolomé kolón. axkan hwebes ik 9 mani metstli hulio de 1609 años, ikwak kathetrátiko omochiwtsino in eskwelas real mexiko in yewatsin padre maestro frai diego de kontreras prior sant augustín mexiko. . in aso itia okilkawtia in ma ok konkwike in ma noso konmakati aokmo weliti. se tonali ommosiawmahtsino ayokmo mochikawakamahtsino ayokmo mewtsino yuhkin mochipa in ihkwak mowikaskiani mila yese inon itech motlatlamili in wehyi tekitl in ipan omokatihtsino ayahmo miek tonali yese satepan okachi siawistli ahchikawalistli ipantsinko oahsik iwan oksehkan kimokokoiwiaya tosaliwyampa iwan senka motetsilkixtiaya axkan tikpia se chichikonetl, techaloasini, ilakastik iwan ikxitetepo. nikan niknotsa, in xonakatl moyawalteki, kwali mochipawa in masayelnanakatl, moteteki; in yepasohtli, intla ok konetik, no moteteki iwan intla ye chikawak san mokwihkwilia in iatlapal; mochinin motsoyonia ipan sokikaxitl ahnoso tepuskaxitl ika pitsochiyawisotl, kampa achto ye omotlali in xonakatl; san niman motlalia in masayeli ika yepasohtli, in chilkwitlaxkoli iwan in istatl. motsoyonia yese makahmo waki. in ipan axkan domingo ikkaxtoli omome mani metstli de setiembre de 1600 años, ikwak motlalike monhastin in de las vobas hospital kiawak; ompa walkiske in konsepsión, onkan kinwalwikake in iglesia mayor. nikan nimitstatawtiti tenantsi ya kikwito nepa seyok kali xikiniwanti. in ipan in yankwik xiwitl yewatl presidente mochiwtika in fransisko sanches español in nikan mexiko tenochtitlan in ipampa governasió. . aw in san ok motolinia in ayamo senka miek iaxka itlatki, san ok ikalpultian in kin notsa puchteka ostomeka. axtleno onka. aw in okonittak in kwali tonali in semilwitl tech itkia niman kitoa "ma ikwak ni sekali, anoso omexuchitl, anoso omeosomatli in saso katlewatl kanas kwali tonali. v tochtli xiwitl, 1354. aw umpa powki umpa itekitsin motlalia umpa mowikas kimopialitiw in altepetl aihtik in motenewa sankto domingo la isla; inin nikan motlakatili, nikan tepiltsin mexiko kriyoyo. mochiwa kuoujtaj. in amo monamaka. xxix pregon. a diesinoeve de mayo de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in teskatsonko okitekakiti inik monamaka ikal itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak otlanankili testigo migwel hernandes ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. in ichpakameh iwan telpokameh miak pahpaquizqueh. ome axoxtlantli aw niman otlana[n]kili in testigo kitowa amo nistlakati in ipaltsinko totekuyo dios inik nikmatin inkwak tlatokati in don pablo xonchinketsin in kontek chinamitl ye ankachton in otlatek. in amo pahti, sólo para se kikwa, welik chilposon, akoloh oso kaldito. . iwki in in ik om pewaya in ostomeka. ipam xiwitli de mili seissientos i dos= nomeros= 6= xiwitli tochtli in ikwak omochiw komgregasiom otechololoke ipam altepetli theowakam ik molnamikis nikam kitakiwi topilwan toxwiwan iwan sekime totechkisakiwi moska!tikiwi. newatl niktlalia iwan nikmachitia estebam baptikta rodriges sankchis olwatekatli nokolwan nosiswan chaneke ipam alte. petli san hwo[an] ikkixochititlan itlatilanal theo/.../ mkam aw xiwitli de 1602 años= nixpam newatli d[on] diego de la krus= eskriwano. aw inik onkan walewake chapoltepek, in omotenew koche ihtik walyetiake imeixtin: in pili habón iwan teopixki deskalso iwan oidor; inik kalakiko ihtik siudad mexiko, sant augustín teopankaltitlan motlaliko. satepa kihto entonses pus kema, kema ixo tlaske entonses. tehwa tekitik, soyokilit (soyoquelite) aw sanno ipan in in omotenew kwaresma de 1613 años in opewke in tlakpak omotenewke hwan péres de monterrei hwes governador, iwan alkaldes diego de san fransisko iwan augustín váskes iwan regidores, inin moyotlan tlaka, iwan hwan ramíres iwan pablo damián alkaldes san pablo, iwan don diego lwis de motewksoma iwan melchior xwáres, inin alkaldes san sebastián, iwan christóval paskwal iwan andrés de los ángeles, inin alkaldes sankta maría kwepopan; inpan in in owalmotlali ok nawi tomin tlakalakili nikan tenochtitlan, inik niman opewke ye nowian kitlani ye kinechikowa. aw ya neli onkan omotlayawalwike onkan okinmokixtilike in omotenewtsinoke tlakpak san hwan baptista motlankwaketsinotiw iwan imikilitsin san diegotsin in imaxkatsin san hwan tlaka, in kinmotsakwililika frai herónimo de sárate, ka yuh kihto in onkan motlayawalwiske in amo umpa nepa. mah kiwalkwitih ne kampa nonkak nat, nemikok itsalan in tlakwali ye wehka mochiwtiwits ompa momosko malakatetikpak, seki mochiwaya yuhkin ihtakatl yese, ahmo mokwaya achika yuhkin chichilwawtii, in san mokwa ihkwak tiyawi titohuentizqueh, yuhkin ihkwak wiloa chalmahtsin, ahnoso tepaltsinko.achto monechikoa in chichilwawxiwitl, kwali mopaka, san niman, in ok xoxowki, motesi iwan motlalilia tlatsopeliloni ahnoso pilonsilo, no motlalilia in tlaahwiyaliani, kanela ahnoso anis; mochi inin in ye tlatextli motlalia ¡pan tlaxkali, moihtakachiwa iwan ye momana komalko inik wiksis. omotlatlanike notatsitsiwan, ¿quexquich titlaxtlahuazque? "uan ta ken achi tiipehpentok?" v.- pregon a u[n]ze dias del mes de hebrero de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in ipan tlaxilakali teskatsonko okitekakiti inik monamaka ikal itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak otlanankili testigo migwel hernandes. pasó ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. in okonake xochitl, kiwalnawatia i wisnawak tiachkaw, kilwia “ca kitkitiw in tlatoli xochitl”. ahvia! tlalokan a xivakalko kiski ak wa motta ak atonal ahavia! xi yah noviyan ahvia! xi ya moteka . aw in okonsenkawke niman ye kakaxko konteka kihilpia kakaxmekatika. niman ye kiwika in tepetikpak; ¿aquin xochimilan ka? nonana. tlan ya potewi tlaltekatsin ikwik kwitlaxkolnanakatl p1tzonacatlatemitilli chikwasen patlawak chili okwalkan. chikweyi iman owatsintika tosentlaliskeh ompa tiankisko atlakwiwayan, kampa tikalmimiloltlehkoskeh ixkichka la venta. olkwalkan tiaskeh ipampa tokwepasnekih yeyi imán teotlak. sanyetewan chikwasen imanin tiasktteh ichan in ichpokatl blanka sánches. otechtlalwi ompa kayowa titlacuazqueh. satepan onyes tlapitsali iwan ihtolistli. nia nikchiwas man noihki mitstlalwikan ipan in ihtotilistli. inin i mopoloke in ikopa momimiktike tenochka. lá yemiak monamakas para miak iyas ahmo ihtlakawi. mokwakwalatsa in poyoxelchikiwnakatl ika istatl, xonakatl iwan axox, makahmo senka wiksi; in nohpali no mowikxitia ihtik in atl ika istatl; yepasohtli motetextilia, in chili moteteki iwan iswatl mosiyawa. in poyoxelchikiwnakatl mokixtilia in omitetl iwan ye motesi, ahso ihtik in likwadora, ika tepitsin poyoxistayutl inik kwali motesis, makahmo senka ayo. in ye wel tlawikxitili nohpali, in ye motetek, kwali moixawia, ma ixika, iwan motlalia ihtik in komitl, motlalilia in elchikiwnakatl in ye tlatextli, yepasohtli iwan chili in ye tlatetektli, motamalpiki, iwan moihpotokwikxitia ahso sempoali minuto iwan ye wel mokwas. aw inin omotenew yankwik teopixkatlatekpantli in ihordetsin san antonio, in onkan ik waltsintik in onkan ik walpew in ipan omotenew xiwitl 1095, in ihkwak ipan in ik kiwalmonextilitsino kiwalmottititsino ika in ikrustsin in ikomiendatsin kiwalmonawatili in san antonio in omotenew itetlasotlakatsin in itetlayekoltikatsin don gastón inik kintlali omotenewke komendadores klérigos iwan inik kichiw kikets se hospital tsontekomatl mochiwtika, in onkan wel pewki ka axkan ye sentsonxiwitl ipan chikwasenpowalxiwitl, we ixkich oahsik axkan in ipan in tikate xiwitl de 1614 años. oyanokonik in nanakaoktli, ya noyol in choka, niknotlamti in tlaltikpak san nikotolinia, san nik walelnamiki in ah nawia ah niwelamati, on tlaltikpak san ninotolinia. xi kali atle mochiw. xinechilwi wan kena nihwikas asta ateno". aw san ikwak in in iw mochiwaya in mixtika tlayowatimomanaya, in ye kiyawisneki niman ik pewaya in tlatsiliniloya noyan teopan, onkan kipewaltiaya in iglesia mayor; ka itlanel yowaltika in saso kenmaka, tlatsiliniloya iskikan inik kiyawtlasaloya. . in on tlakwalok ye no seppa temahtekilo tekamapako, niman ye ik teamako atliwa. niman ye yeti temako. iwan atl in kimoteotiaya. "pues namantsi axakak welis kalakis nikani. iwan niman omopow chikwasen poali nikixtoka sempoali inik patlawak aw estakas onkan omokekets nawkan [entre renglones: inik posesion omochiw] aw i fiskal migwel de los angeles ompa omopow se ipetision inik tlanankilia itechka auto in itlanawatiltsin in governador. itakka weyi, mahyá yon sinti tein wehweyi wan de chikawaya tilewi. yezqueh. noponi eltok se tepetl ompoalimahtlaktli gramos koyolchili "ye choka in omakok id est uktli axala tekpan ye choka in omakok makamo omakoni ye choka kayamo inemak. kemantika nimachilia tewan timasewalme tichia se tlakatl tlen nochi weli iwan nochi kimatl: yewatl welis tech makixtis. awel nias mochan, ipampa wel ye tlahka. kiwikake kikawato kampa ne weyi postehtli. no xkineskayotili tein teh titewantitok. monamiktsin santísima trinidad. in nochipa xochiyohtok. aw in axkan inik moteilwia ka intlal ka kinkawilitiah in intatsin inik amo nistlakati ipa[n]pa ik nika nomatika niketsa krus. fransisko konma paso ante mi eskribano pedro de san diego. pewa tetetstik aw in omotenew mikkatsintli in ikkwak kiwalmokixtilike tekpan palasio, ka niman walmotlali mixtli achi tliltik san iyoka ipan in siudad mexiko, ik mixtlapacho in tonatiw inik kikiyawia, inik yuhkinma onkan itech neski no yewatl i nawtlamantli in welpewkayotl motenewa elementos no kikoko kitlaokolti in imikilistsin teoyotika tlahtowani don frai garsía gwerra. xinech momakili se teskatekomatsintli. ipan in in onmikwanike in kwitlatetelko; onkan tisatepek onewake in wewetke chichimeka estlapiktin teotenanka, ye inpa onasito in akxoteka ye onoke in onkan kwitlatetelko. aw inik nesetochwilok, in ikontlamantli mitowa motenewa netotonakawilok, yehika ipampa ka oksenka yewantin in totonake in kinkowako tlaoltika in mexika; iwan ompa in kwextlan in tlaolmamato mexika, aw iwan onkan patiwak, onkan kiyaw. ipan nawtsontli onchikonawpoali ommakwili xiwitl wolfgang amadeus mosart kichalia ome itekiw: "don giovani" iwan "inenamictiliz in figaro". vi tekpatl xiwitl, 1368. aw in tla isiwka muchiwas inik nikinnotlatlawtilia yewatsin in totekuyo dios kinmotlaokolilis inik no yuh in ipan muchiwas in ikwak mikiske. aw ye omito, onkan nawxiwtike in omotenew in itstepek; aw san ye ipan in omotenew in vii tochtli xiwitl, 1174 años, in ompa ik walewake inik walolinke in itstepek. mah techtamani kwaltsin. in tlahpaliwketl, oselochimalekemokwenpani. aw in ikmakwilkan, iwan in sa ik tlatsakwia in asia, ka ompa in motenewa la india de portugal iwan in weikan in motenewa gran china. tlatimayana xikihtlanili tlakwali. tlen 92 tlanawatihkayotl. nochi amatlaxitlahuanih, tlatolsenkawanih iwan tlanawatilmeh tlen tlayekanani moneki kiixihkwilos sekretario de estado tlen itechpowi tlahtoli, tla amo mochiwas amo motlepanitaseh. matlaktlomei kali ikwak poliwke sosolteka; ye no ikwak i mayanalok, tlaolmamalok totonakapa, in motenewa netotonakawilok. axkan lunes ik 7 mani metstli marso de 1611 años, ihkwak nikan mexiko kis onpew in sebastián viskaino vesino mexiko general mochiwtia in a la china akali, ik yah umpa a la china; ihkwak niman kinwikak in habón tlaka, itlok kiketstia in pili habón in ye itoka don alonso, ye moespañolchichiwtia inik mokwep ichan, nikan kitlasako in itech ompa walyetiaka inechichiw. vatikanopan pepeno inin xiwpan yankwik wei tlahtokateopixki in itoka inik matlaktli omome pius (eugenio paseli). onkan intech ninokawtiw in tlaxilakaleke ixkichin in nixpan mochiw ik nikneltilia nomatika nikketsa krus nixpan newatl diego leonardo eskrivano. pasó ante mi diego leonardo eskrivano. mochi tlakatl kim on itta in tlatsintlan mani. tetepitsin. kani moilochti anemiskiayah kema, alfredo, tikalakikan. ¿canin timotlalisneki? kampa takawtok. yahki ipa ameli ¡ytic motenantia in chalkatl, ye toteosi teuktla! aw ka amo wel mihtos motenewas iwan amo wel moponwas in ixkich tlakatl katka, in okimotokilike mikkatsintli in españoles iwan timasewaltin mexika, amo wel kampa tetlan kixowaya in otlipan, senka oteten in tlakatl, iwan in sa ohtenko otlamawisoke otlachixke senka miek tlakatl, iwan inkaltikpak tlapanko senka no teten in tlakatl tlachixke; senka wei tlamawistililistika in kimotokilike inakayotsin mikkatsintli, ka yuhkinma san ihkwak viernes sankto ik omochiw in inetokilistsin omotenew teoyotika tlahtowani arsobispo visurrei. mahtlaktli ye sempoalxiwitl in owekawke tolantsinko, oyake mexikah atlitlalakyan, in kanin oasikoh ipan matlaktli tekpatl xiwitl. aw in mexika atsakwalka atsakwalka || 65 kamo kaxkankawke, okixkich intlapal kichiwke inik amo kikawalistlamatia in atsakwalka in inteopankal, ka wei pleito ik kichiwke, yehika ipampa in wewe teopankali omotenew sant sebastián ka wel imaxka intlatki, iwan intlal in ipan ikak teopantli intlaketsal in wewetke in inkolwan intawan katka in mexika masewaltin atsakwalka; mochi imaxka katka. in tepostli okachi tepitstik keh in tetl. momawtihtika in otomitl,kittoa xik walkixti nonextamal, in titlatowani axayakaton, tla sen nimitsmanili, kenin mochiwa kana xochiyowa marso, ta istak in ixochiyo. pero yon axnikinchiwas kwenta. ipan se kali ometstaya se siwapili omomachtiaya momachtitsinos, mopowis amatl. omotemachtiliaya ipan ikaltsin. tatatsin ahkewan okinekia ixtlapowiske ipilwan; otlaxtlawaloya se tomin kada piltsintli noso siwakonetl momachtis. xii tekpatl xiwitl, 1296. aw in yewatl in pablo makwex san iskich onaxkatilo in iskich in ipan mani in ikal ipanpa in ye huecau posesion kichiwtika ixkichin in ye mako in anna xoko. aw in axkan kwaresma ye itlamian metstli marso de 1609 años, ikwak nikan mexiko onmopewalti inik ompa mowikak michwakan in yewatsin senka mawistililoni teoyotika tlahtowani don frai balthasar akobarrobias teopixki sant augustín, waxakak obispo okatka; aw in michwakan umpa komikwanili in toweitlahtokaw rei inik ye no ye ompa yewatsin motlapachilwis michwakan, ik mopatlak in waxakak; inin obispo nikan otlakat mexiko, nikan tepiltsin. "uta nompa para siempre titlachiltok amo tewa omitznotzqueh, okinotskeh motata. aw inin nel amo inemakpa inik nikan motlalis ilos, ka wel totech moneki i nikan titlaka in ipan nweva españa in timasewaltin inik timochintin tikmatiske ka sa sepa in chiwalok in tlalotika sokiyotika xinachtli in mitowa motenewa achto tlakamekayotl, in itech otikiske titlakatke itech otitlakamekayowake in tixkichtin in ipa semanawatl titlaka tlaltikpak, maso neliwi in gentiles in tlateotokanime in intech tikisa in otechtlakatiliko in tewantin i nikan titlaka mexiko tenochtitlan iwan inik ye mochi tlaka in altepewake in ipa nweva españa. ah ka mochi iwi titotolinia. . niman yewatl kiteki in itech powi in tlakotsontli in sakatsontli. in ik kiteki amatl san tsinpapalotik aw in ik talkwiloli san tlaolchipinili. amo, karlohtsin. in ñochan onikis, ipampa onitlasenkan ika nochi in nosesentonalteki iwan oniknek notlatlapololtis ika tepitsin ipan ohtli nipaxialos. wan techpalewis. in ayohwachtli wel mokowas tiankisko ahnoso mokixtilia in ayohtli in mokwi mila. intla inin mochiwa, motlapana in ayohtli in ye omahsik, mokixtilia in ayohwachtli iwan motonalwatsa miek tonali, ahso makwili. satepan motlalilia istayo atl iwan oksehpa ye wahki moihseki ika ahmo wei tletl ixkichkaw in ye tlahsektli; makahmo chichinawi. migwelito semi iskaltik iwan nowan yeya ihkwak nipaxialohtinemi ika toxochimil. aw inik neli imaxka intlatki iwan inik onechkawilitia in nonamik akatka mochintin kimati in tlaxilakaleke in monemiltia. yahti. in noe pus non ahmo kipopustekin tlakotl in lá nikwawia yehwatí. se taman saj. ta ximakwitlawis. ix akatl xiwitl, 19. aw in akin kisasneki, ompa kiwalwiteke, kiwalxixili. aw sekintin, tepantli kitlekawike, tel wel momakixtike sekintin kalpolko kakalakke ompa momakixtike. aw in sekintin intlan momaq[ui]xtique, intlan kakalakke in owelmikke, san momikkanenekia, wel momakixtike. aw in aka ok moposawa in konitta, konixili. kehkich kwix ok techiximati". mahtlaktli ome elotl, wehyi, ye omahsik ixpan konmanilia in ahso tlakatekkatl in ahso tlakochkalkatl in ahso atempanekatl in ye mochintin tlahtoke iwan kawyame ahnoso pipiltin: in ye ixkich tlakatl tlanotsali. 2 kali xiwitl, 1533 años. iiii akatl xiwitl, 1275. kiski in i tekpatl xiwitl, 1272 años. kampa ihkas tein taki kipiya de ihkas tein amo taki, in kachi posoni. in okich kachi mapihpitsaktik. ma ipan anwalmokixtiske ipan anmotlatoltiske; ma ka ayak ika mokakayawas in aso kana nech mopopolwis totekuyo. satepan kihto pos tlenon yasitokan in nokonew pus yew'wan hwan del oso. yehwa ya se kikwa in ikwouyo. nehwa nopilwan tequititih. nika mopowa in iskikan itepewal: toltintla, kwawtintla, chalko, akolwa, ontempan, akulwakan, tolantsinko. au in ixkich kawitl in tikaliwake aokan monexti in tenochkatl in iski otli i nika i yakakolko, in atiskapa, i kowatlan, i nononowalko, i xoxowiltitla, in tepeyakak, sa nowia toneiskawil mochiw in titlatilolka, sano iwi in akalotli moch toneiskawil mochiw. ipan etsontli onkaxtoli onsempoali ommakwili xiwitl, in okik kaxtiltepewani yaw kikalito in kristóbal de olid in onkan motokayotia "las hibweras", kinawatia nía kimpiloah kwawtemoktsin iwan itlahtokatsin tlakopan. aw yewatl achtopa omachiyotilok inik visurrei iwan kapitán general in ipan in nweva españa omochiw in don antonio de mendosa, wel inewan tlakati in markés de mondéhar; omakok yuh yewatl ipan xiwitl de 1534, in otlapacho ika ixkichkaw yewatl ipan xiwitl asiko de 1550, niman mowikak ompa motlapachilwito in ipan provinsias pirú. aw niman moteokaltike in mexika aw no kinnonotsato in tlahtoke aw kihtoke ka ye kwali titlaiwaske kiyolotiske in inteokal aw yahke in titlanti kwitlad in kiyolotiko senka kikimiloke in kwidatl iwan tewtli tlasoli in kitlalito ahu in oyahke in owalmokwepke in titlanti niman okittake in mexika in momatia ahso itlan tlasotli aw niman kihtoke in mexika ka ye kwali maso kichiwako ahso itewyo itlasolo in mayilia kwix totlalpan in tikate ka intlalpan san iw kihtoke aw niman kipewaltike in intlawelilokayo in mexika ye totomiktia itskwinme kinmiktia kweyitl wipili kitetlatlalochtia in akin kwakwawkatsintli tletl kimontlaliliaya san ik pewa in mexika aw kinmiktike in mexika san kinpoyomiktike nawxiwitl in kontitlan motlatike -tociquemitl. aw in sekintin kimakolwitekke, walkakamatlapan, waltsatsayan in innakayo sekintin kinkotswiwitekke, sekin kinmetswiwitekke, sekintin kimitiwitekke, niman moch walmotoxawa in inkwitlaxkol. aw in aka ok nen motlaloa in ikwitlaxkol, sa kiwilana, iwkin xoxokiowa in momakixtisneki, aok kampa wel wi. tak ome taman saj: onkak yon tein wehweyi, tein korrienteh wan, onkak tein briskoh kiluiaj. wan yasitiw ichan inchamako asitiw ichan kinmotiankwakeka motewchiwa. ye yiman ye tikalakiske matlaktli tonali enero tlatsilini san pablo ostotepek, tlatsilini san pedro aktopan. inon kitosneki ye witse mowentikes. san niman pewa tlatsilini ompa momochko malakatetikpak, onkwan on ye kate tlatsotsonkes ipan otli kan kikwitia tlalatlahko noka mowentikes mosewitoke san pedro aktopan. kitlakali yeyi tlakweponaltin onkwan san pedro. .noyol seviski tlakatl achtoketl tlakwava otlakatki yautlatoketl notewk sintla akoxaya ilivis sonoa mah amo ihkochiyowa, ontlasohtlakeh kimonawatili i yewatsin tlachiwale in atl ma kikawa in inetlaliayan in iyeyan in onkan chiwalok, aw ma monechiko oksekni tlatik aw ma kikawa in tlaltikpaktli ma nesi; aw in atl yuhki se tlakatl tlamatini inik tlaiximatis iwan yuhki nakase inik tlakakis iwan yuki in ikxe inik cholos, aw ka sa wel se neixkweyoniltika in kitlalkawi tlaltikpaktli in iyeyan in iyonoyan in onka chiwalok in itech powia aw ompa mikwani in onkan in axkann onka mani in weyatl. aw sanno ikwak ye no nikwel okwawtemowike kwawtla in omotenewke nawkanme chalka, yewatl kitemowike in kwamimili in motenewa morrilos; san okixkich kaxtolpowali in intekiw mochiw in kitemowike amakemeke in wala nikan mexiko. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. yewan amo kimatih tlen, melawak. aw in oahsito, niman ik moyeyekoa inik kimottilis: kintlatlawtia in itehtlayekoltihkawan, in itlannenkawan, inik konittotiw. ye achi wehkawtika in konnotsako, in ye omotlanawatilih in tlahtoani obispo inik kalakis. nochi in kaltin kipiah inkaltlapachol. entos yehwa se tayi komo tekokoh se iihtik. tekoseh chichiltik in ixochiyo wan matohmixokoyolin no chichiltik in ixochiyo. in xokoyolin monamaka kwesalan. aw in tlein ik mitowa motenewa ixiptlatsin ipatilotsin in totekwiyo dios in itechpa tlakatl amo poliwi ka itech ka, aw maso neliwi in sa kexkich aw in iwki yewantin tlatlakatekolo in diablosme i tlein kiwikiliko in intlakatilispa in inchiwalispa". in ipan axkan martes ik chikomilwitl mopowa in metstli de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años in tekpoyotl otsatsito in ipan tlaxilakali tsapotla okito inik monamaka kali nawtemani akokalo iwan okitenew in iski ipatiw in ikwak otekakitilok ayak otlanankili testigo antonio ximenes. aw in okimochiwili in ixkich tlamantli in, aw sa tlatsakan sa tlakaltilistsonkiskayotl ik tlanki in ixkich tlamantli in itlachiwaltsin yuhki inik motlatsonkixtili motlatsonmanili kimonekilti in kimochiwilis in tlakatl. tla ti isiwis, amo mitskahtewas in kalmimiloli. aw in ipan in omotenew semilwitl sábado, no ihkwak omochiw kapítulo in sankto domingo; yewatsin provinsial mochiw in padre maestro frai hernando basán. axkan martes ik 20 mani metstli marso de 1612 años, in owalatwik ye omomikili yowaltika in diego kavalero fundador i patrón in onkan monasterio sankta inés monhas; yewatl itlatsintil kichiw iwan itlapachol in omotenew monasterio katki inawak hospital de las bovas, senka miek in iaxka itlatki kikawilitia omotenew i monasterio. aw ye ompa on ye ixkichka on, aw in okik owalnenen kawitl, in iw itech motta mana, in i tetlanextiliaya in tonalamatl martirologio romano, yniqu itech owasiko in ipan in omotenew se tekpatl xiwitl, 1272 años, in ipan on walkiske wewetlapalan nonowalko in omotenewke nonowalka teotlixka tlakochkalka tekpantlaka. itlanahnamik: se taman saj. se kwali tonali alfredo. ¿tlen mopan mochiwa? kimach sekin tonaltin senka tipaktika otimitsitak iwan axkan in tlapechpan tika. miérkoles in ik 10 mani metstli de hunio de 1615 años, ihkwak okinmachistito sitasión okinchiwilito in amakemekan chalko tlaka inik ika san mersed ye kinmomakilisneki visurrei istaktepetl in teopixke itewikaltsitsinwan hesús in motenewtsinowa tothatsitsinwan de la kompañía de hesús iwan tokayotilo teatinos; iwan ome sidios de estansia mochin kwawitl kimanilisnekia teopixke, ichkame onkan nemiskia in imaxkawan. ﻿se taxkaltsin saj... para titlakwas. xüxouhqui chilmoli ika tlaxamanilnanakatl nopa kitokili nopa okichpil nopa aw iwan ye nawpowalxiwitl ipan matlaktlosexiwitl in ipan xi tekpatl xiwitl, 1516 años, i motlahtokatlali tlakatl kakamatsin tlahtowani akulwakan tetskoko, ipiltsin i nesawalpiltsintli. kwalanih "nokone nikitaski ne wahkapa nitentewas wan tihpehpenas. amo omextlatik nian otlaehekak. kil tlein inawatil amechmomaquiliz”. aw ik niman tlanankilike, kihtoke in totolimpaneka in chichimeka "ca amo nikan in tiwalamattiake. aw niman yewatl kitokilia in tlakwali. in ik kitki imayawkampa kitsitskia in mulkaxitl: amo itenko in kitsitskia, san imakpal nepantla kimantiw. in no monamaka ne kwetsalan. aw inik tlayawaloke in wel ixkich ik onkan ahsiko in san fransisko, niman la kasa professa, niman iglesia mayor, niman ik mokwepke sankto domingo kisato, ik niman san lurenso monhas kisato, ik niman umpa in inteopapn ahsito. onkan nechilwia xixochiteteki in katlewatl tokonnekis, ma melelkisa, in tikwikani, tikinmakatasis in tokniwan, in teteuktin, in kelelkixtiske in tlaltikpake. wei teopixkatahtsin in itoka inik ome ioannes paulus okseppa walaw méxiko. ayoh aw sa omentin in walmokwepato, ye omito yewatl in wewe tsiwtlakawki iwan in chalchiwtsin. ikwak ompa katka in tlahtowani don lwis de velasko, ayatle itekiw, san ompa mosewitsinotikatka. ayaxkan in tlaltikpak ik nemowa. towike, tetike in timasewaltin, in ahtontasi, in ahtonewa, in awalnesini. in tokespan, in tokwappan, in tokechtlan in ompilkas, in san achitin, kexkitsin in xaxaltsintli, in ichpilinaltsintli; iwan in tlein tikiske, in tlein tikkwaske, in tokochka,
