in toneuhea. amo nikmati tlen ipan omochin, noso amo owalaya. tlen 72 tlanawatihkayotl. nochi tlayeyekoli tlen tlahtol tlanawatili noso tlahtol tematiltilistli, tlasenkawali amo san itechpowi tlen ahkaya tlahtokan, moihitas itekpayah ipan ome tlahtokan, iwan moixtlachilis tlahtoltlatekpantli tlen tlahtolkamanali tlen katlia ihki, iwekawayo iwan kenihki mochiwas tlahtolkamanali iwan tlaixwasantli. a. keman moselis se amatlayeyekoli ipan tlahtokan tlen kampeka ipehuayah, panos ipan seyok kampa onkas tlahtolkamanali. tla inin kiselis, motitlanilis weyi tekichiwani, iwan tla yewa amo kipias amatlaixtlachiali, saniman kiamakixtis. b. momatis kiselihtok chikawak tekichiwani, nochi amatlayeyekoli tlen amo mokwepas ika amatlaixtlachiali kampeka kistehki, ipan mahtlaktli tonati tekitiloyan; iwan tla ipan inin kawitl in weyi tlahtokan kikontonas nechicolismeh, welis mokwepas ipan ipewayah tlen achtowi tonatih tlen tlatekiwili keman monechikos in weyi tlahtokan. k. in amatlayeyekoli tlen tlahtol tlanawatili noso tlahtoltlamatilistli amo kikwalitas tekichiwani nochi noso achitsin, kikwepas ika amatlaixtlachiali kampeka tlahtokan kistehki. moneki oksepa kiihitas ye inin, iwan tla kikwalmatiseh ome tlen eyi tlatlapantli tlen nochimeh momatlahanah, oksepa panos kampa tlahtokan tlen tlaixtlachilia. tla inin kiixwasaniseh kachi miaqueh, in amatlayeyekoli mokwepas tlahtol tlanawatili noso tlahtoltlamatilistli iwan oksepa tekichiwani iwikpa kiamanextis. in tlamatlanantli tlen tlahtol tlanawatili noso tlahtol tlamatilistli elis amatokayotl. d. tla tleweli amatlayeyekoli tlen tlahtol tlanawatili noso tlahtol tematiltilistli, kisenkotonaseh kemah kitlatlachiliseh ipan tlahtokan, oksepa mokwepas kampa kistehki ika ixtlachilistli tlen yewan tlahtokan kichiwilis. tla oksepa motlachilis iwan mokwalmatis ika nochimeh tlen nopanoi monechicohtoqueh, oksepa mokwepas kampa tlahtokan mokotonki, iwan yewa oksepa kiixtlalis, tla kikwalmatiseh tlen miakintin, panos imako tekichiwani iwikpa tlen moihtowa ipan tlatlapantli a; tla quicotonaseh, amo welis oksepa monextis ipan seha nechicolismeh. e. tla se amatlayeyekoli tlen tlahtol tlanawatili noso tlahtol tematiltilistli mokixtilis se achi, noso mopatlas, noso kipiwis tlahtokan tlen kitlachilis, in yankwik tlahtolkamanali tlen tlahtokan kampa kistehki san moitas tlen mokixtihtos noso tlen mopatlak noso mopihuih, iwan amo welis mopatlas tlanawatikayotl tlen moselihtohcah. tla tlen tlapiwili noso tlapatlali tlen kichihtos tlahtokan amatlachiliani kikwalitaseh miakintin tlen momatlahanah ipan tlahtokan kampa kistehki, mopanoltis nochi amatlayeyekoli imako tekichiwani, iwikpa mochiwas tlen moihtowa ipan tlatlapantli a. tla tlapiwili iwan tlapatlali tlen kichiwas tlahtokan amatlachiliani kikotonaseh miakintin tlen momatlahanah ipan tlahtokan kampa kistewa, mokwepas iwikpa mamokwi tlahtoli tlen inin tlahtokan, iwan tla miakintin tlen momatlahanah kikotonaseh ika inin ompaya tlaixpowali tlen tlapiwili noso tlapatlali, in amatlayeyekoli, tlen moselihtokahka ipan ome tlahtokan, mopanoltis imako tekichiwani tlen ika mochiwas tlen kihtowa tlatlapantli a. tla tlahtokan amatlachiliani oksepa kinekis, iwan kitlahtolpalewiah miakintin tlen momatlalanah ompa yetoqueh, mamotlachili tlapiwili noso tlapatlali, nochi amatlayeyekoli moixnextis ipan seyok kawitl nechicolismeh, noso nochi omeh tlahtokan quihtoseh, iwikpa miakintin tlen ompa yetoqueh, ma moixnexti tlanawatili noso tlahtoltlanawatili, san tlen tlanawatikayotl moselitohka, iwan mamochiakah tlen mopiwihtok noso mopatlatok iwikpa motlachilis iwan moixwasanis ipan sekinok tlen walas nechicolismeh. f. ipan tlaixyeyekoli, tlapatlali noso tlakotontli tlen tlahtol tlanawatilmeh noso tlahtol tlamatilismeh, moixtlachilis seha ohpamitl tlen ika motekpanas. g. nochi amatlayeyekoli tlen tlahtol itlanahnamik: inintsin tlatiwani okimochiwa okimonochililis itlaktsinko mosiwawtitsinos in popokatepetl. san niman okimolwili istaksiwatl: nian tewatl, nian amaka; nias nikochis. tinechixotiz. wan nesi san omokochitís. omotekatsino in siwapiltepetl mokochitis iwan popokatepetl kimixotilika. nikan ipan in i motlahtokatlalike in omentin tlahtoke chalko tlalmanalko in itoka amiwatsin tlahtowani itskawakan, in ikome itoka chalchiwtlatonak tlahtowani opochwakan. kiwalwia “xiualhuia, akame in unkan ankate o!”. in momostlae, inik walkisa tonatiw, tlakotonaloya iwan tlenamakoya. aw inik tlakotonaloya kikechkotonaya in solin, koniyawiliaya in tonatiw, iwan kitlapaloaya, kitoaya -oquizaco in tonatiw, in totonametl, xiwpilotontli, in kwawtlewanitl, aw ¿quen onotlatokas, ken semilwitis? ¿cuix itla ipan mochiwas inikwitlapil in iatlapal? konilwiaya -ma ximotekitili, ma ximotlakotili, totekwioe. aw inin momostlae in ikwak walkisaya tonatiw mitoaya. mochi tlakatl ompa ya in tlalmanalko; mochi tlakatl kikwik luto, in pipiltin tlahtoke siwapipiltin. se kilo textli ¿quexqui tonali kipia in metstli febrero? aw in ihkwak ye tlaminaske, achtopa tlalpan tlakwilowaya yuhkin krus tlanepanoli, kiketsaya kinepanowaya, onkan konketsaya in iyakawitstika in inmiw in onkan nepaniwtika in okikwiloke tlalpan in iwki krus; aw amo kittaya in tlein kiminaske, san tlapik in tlaminaya, aik nenkisaya in inmiw, ipampa motokayotia chichimeka. san topko, petlakalko on tetlatia, on tekimiloa in ipalnemowani. kenin mochiwa nikan ipan in moman temalakatl in tlalkokomokko. saniman non orne tonali uwek saniman non orne tonal li techmakake tusura wan onkan. nikawín amo mochiwa miak. yeka momodesayuno ximodesai unarokan wan yenan yawe. yei xumali pitsochiyawisotl wan yeka na ayok nihneki xitlayika nimitstatawtia ika miak favor: tlalayohtli itsmolini xochitl, aw ka nokontitlani in kopili in tlatokayotl in ipan omotepieliske, ka ompa nokoniwa in inkoskatsin in imakwestsin in chalchiwitl intilmatsin inkaktsin inchalchiwtilmatsin inkaktsin inik walaske in tiakawan tepewanime, yewatin i wel chichicahuaque”. noponi mokawayaya nopa pedro wan nopa kontekako unepantla tlekikistli, tekama kiwatitike in utli; in okitlaske tlekikistli kwawkiawak in etsiko. ¿azo tle nelo nikihtoa nikan, ipalnemowa ? san tontemiki, san kotonchitlewako, nikihtoa in tlaltikpak, ayak wel on tikilwia ye nikan. aw inin omotenew embaxador, inik nikan oahsiko mexiko axkan ka san nikan onkistikisa, san keskilwitl nikan motlalis inik kimotstilitikisa tlahtowani visurre. no onyeya in kastilo tlaixnamikilistli mochi in altepetl moxeloayah: onyeya in tlakpakeh iwan in tlacxitlaqueh; iwan mochi inintin kichiayah in tlatsontehkeh in kihtoskeh kahtlewatl kastilo otlatlan, in okichiwkeh tlakpak tlakah ahnoso tlacxitlatlacah. nowikpa owalmokweptsino axkan tewatsin nikan otiwalmowikak tel yomahmachix sesean timokalakia nikan ipan in, in iw kitowa wewetke, ipan in in xiwitl in tlakat inik ompa monexti in tlakatekolotl in itoka tetsawitl witsilopochtli in itokayokan astlan autlan kolwakatepek, in ompa onoya in wewetke in chichimeka. tlahko naranha iewayo ixwa ne ixtawat, kampa mihkwita in kuakuouej, de palani in ikwit, ompa ewa in nanakat. yotlatemuwi wan in tlakahmo onka markante pus non onka tlen paxalos kufreserotinemis ini karga para tlatemowis tía omareglaro wan in lá kahmo oksé lado kofreserotiw kanin kiyek tlaxtlawiske; ini karga ompa yemaíeglaroa. onkan tlakatke yeintin inpilwan: in ikse itoka akasitsin, in ikome itoka bonifasio kwawsesekwitsin, in ikei itoka martín anusiasión, inin okichiw se ipiltsin itoka sebastián anusiasión telpochtli. aw sa niman ikwak motlahtokatlali in wewe motewksoma ilwikamina chalchiwtlatonak ketsaltekolotl; inin ipiltsin in witsiliwitl tlahtowani tenochtitlan. makwili kanela tsitsikwewalton aw in ik nappa tenotsaya ikwak in ye yuh mostla mikiske tlaaltiltin. no kwaltia se kikawa exot mah kosawia, se kipihpixka wan se kimana emol. no tata wel kwawimalwiani iwan ye okintokak plantanoscuameh, soyakwameh iwan miak xochitl ipan toxochimil. neka ipa mar. chikomolotsin xa ya meva xi misotia a ka tonan ti tech iknokavaski ti ya via mochan tlalokan. tlanamakaskiah moneki ipanima nopa tlitl. se kitamioya, se kimana, wan oksi se kikixtis. v tochtli xiwitl, 1198. wan noponi moewito se tetl yehyektsi in ixpan mochiw don migwel sanches martin sanches diego hwares pedro vaskes iwan algwasiles pedro migwel migwel hernandes balthasar xwares hwan fransisko iwan tlaxilakaleke hosep klemente martin xwares hwan iknotl pedro de san migwel pedro hernandes migwel hernandes simon xwares iwan no imixpa españoles hwan del kaso hwan peres mochintin imixpan omochiw inik okonan posesion in omotlakowi. iiii akatl xiwitl, 1275 años. solamente ne nakatl tlen ayok kwali ompoyon agwa de kadena kawatemoa tlatotonilo. miaktin tlaka kisentlalia kwawitl; kitlalia luminarias kan mototonis tlakwali. achi kwaltsin omohtaya. nepa, nian, omohtaya kwalkixtia tlakwali. tlen inon tlatikiwakes kwikaya kwanakanakatl iwan wexolotlakwali ika tamali. iwan miake towampowan amotla okwikaya, nian se tlaxkali, nian se pantsin. okitlatlakoliaya nepa, nian. kitsatsiliaya, ¡xicanaqui motlaxcal! okse tlakatl kwalitos. ¡xihuala: okse motlaxkal ika nacatl! okseki kitlakoliaya tamali, kan pachiwis ahken amo kwika itakatl. . aw in ikwak in ye ompewaske niman ye kitemowa in kwali tonali yewatl in sekowati ohtli melawak, anoso sesipaktli, anoso seosomatli, anoso chikomekowatl. ipan in in sekintin wewetke kimachiyotia in momikiliko itskowatsin tlahtowani || 95r tenochtitlan, aw nimann ikwak motlahtokatlali in wewe motewkkoma ilwikamina. niman ik omotlahtokatlalitsino inik makwili wei itlahtokatsin tenochtitlan in motokayotia wewemotewksomatsin, in il wikamina. komo se xiwitl welis itstó. ain ilwikak itik ompa ye ya wits in yektli yan xochitl, yektli yan kwikatl. komo amo, ¿toni ika timoyolchicahuazqueh, onkan konmasewato chinantsintli ontlatsonilpito in wewetke tenanka, ka wel onkan ikak in inkwaxoch in omotenewke tenanka chalka; ik mokweppako, san nokwel onkan walake in kwitlatetelko, onkan motlaliko in tenanka onkan wekawake, ok matlakxiwitl in onkan tlahtokattitikatka in tlakatl totoltekatl tsompachtli tlailotlaktewktli. x kali xiwitl, 1333. ika ipan in tonaltin amoka wel okinekia kiwikas in ipilwan ompa tlamachtilkalko ipampa aweli kintsotsomatiske achí kwaltsin. inchachan onemia tsotsoyokes, tsatsapaltikes; san ompa omawiltitinemia pipiltoton ka ipan otli noso oyatinemia ika kwekwentla. ika nehin tahtolme. itlanahnamik: kwalika, ye oksepa kwali tononotzazqueh. san ihkí kikwah nakatl. .lz tleika navalmokiska is tleika navalmokiska wiya! tsonimolko masevali ma ya temako o ya tonaki o ya tonaki 2 kali xiwitl, 1221 años. aw in xiwxawal niman ye kitowa "ma titotlatlamalikan". itlanahnamik: welis tlen ne nokuñado san hwan yaí tlahtlama". ompa kisako in kwixtekatlichokayan iwan kowatlikama. pero ahweli pero mopapan kapás nechkwas kapás nechkwa nechahsi nechkwa. in mochiwa, sayoh mah se kitoka. xichualcuitih. in manel ye chalchiwitl, tlamatiloli, on maso ya ipalnemowani ayak wel tikilwia nikan. tel yeka no noyahki. se taoltsin, in nanakat. se xumali oregano q.n. matlaktli umei kwawtli notonal in anmonan aw in ann- opilwan anchalmeka xi kwiti in tsivaktli xi nech temilikan. malinala viktli q.n. viktika in tlachpanaya id est iselimikia in unkan teumilpan aw ichikavastika in ik nitlatatatakaya in ik nitokaya. tlawel niesayopopotik tlahko kilo textli in ipan in yewatl || 199 governador in señor hwan péres de monterrei in nikan tenochtitlan, aw in alkaldesme motlalike san hwan moyotlan diego de san fransisko chane tekikaltitlan, iwan augustín váskes chane wewekalko; aw in alkaldesme motlalike san pablo teopan hwan ramíres chane sokipan, iwan pablo damián chane ometochtitlan; aw in alkaldesme motlalike san sebastián atsakwalko don diego lwis de motewksoma chane kwitlawaktonko, iwan melchior xwáres chane tomatla; aw in alkaldesme motlalike sankta maría kwepopan christóval paskwal mestiso chane kopolko, iwan andrés de los ángeles chane en blanko. i ye yuhki, nima ye ik yaw tlatowani, nima ye ik mosemolini i mesikatl, ixkich olin i siwatsintli in piltsintli, intamal imatol yetiw in unpa askapotsalko. itlanahnamik: aw in ipampa in ik niman akwerdo mochiw in audiensia real ik mononotsinoke in tlahtoke, no onkan kinmonanamikilike in ixkichtin doktoresme in tepahtiani, inik insepantlasemihtoltika mochiw inik san kechkotonaloke senpowalonchiwknawi in omotenewke mimikke. yuh tikilwike in tlatowani inkwak tlatokati in don pablo xonchiketsin in kitek chinamitl aw in ontlachkwitlas sa no inkwak in konan kanpan tlalmantli wel atlan katka wel inpan kisaya in akali in onkan ontlachkwitlas aw tel amo intlalpan. ¿quezqui se bisiesto? achtotiamewan ankitstoke tlawiskali, amonkwikatinemi. sekintin maiknimeh mokatsinko otlahtlankeh noka amo nikan otimetstaya. in tinositsi, tenoselotl; kil temo tlatoltsi inik poyomike in mexika ostotikpak, awilisapa. aw nima ye ik ikawaka i mexika; nima ye ik mikali, nima ye ik inpa posoni aw koyoaka unka much mike; ixkich siwatl in tlama, nima ye ik ixpa mikowan amatepetl. timitsnotlatlahtia xonmolwili man saniman nechontlahpaloki inin oktli okachi ye owe* wehtik keh neka. . in ihkwak in owal ahsik in ikal ihtik san yowaltika in wal kalakia, amo semilwitl, san ik tlapoyawa wal ahsi. kimorraltlali niman ye choka in maxtlaton. amaka onikonitak ipan ohtli. —yuh yes hin, yuh muchiwas hin. kemeh iknime, aw in kwali ik mitotia in chípawak inakayo ipatiw on kimili in kwachtli. wel kwali in ilamatsin. tein nikan tikpiyah kriolo. no kwaltia se kikwa tamalitos, seki pihpiki ika nexkihiiswat wan se kimolontia ya ika komit. keman chikawaya ya se kimana wan se kipalowa emol. se kitalilia tenexistat mah moloni wan se kitalilia istat wan se kikwa ya. ikilo no semi welik tein selik se kiteki wan kemah se kimolontia se kikwecholia akolih wan se kipantaliiia. komo se kineki se kitalilia tepitsin axox wan se kikwecholia chilxoxowik, semi welik se kikwa. iuki kitokaitiah por in tihtiltik. in tlakatl achtoketl tlakwawa. .otomico noyonko nawako mexikame ya ya avilili. otomiko noyonko nowako mexikame a ya chimalika xaxa! aw in ok in ya avilili. san nikxochimalina intekpilotl. aw sano xiwtiko in weyatlalman itik in frai boil sant benito teopixki, aw iksen ya in kastila in ikwak kin. en veinte i ocho dias del mes de febrero de mil e kinientos i setenta i ocho años in newatl diego astaxuchitl pregunero otsatsik in ipanpa kali monamaka in onka yopiko aw in otsatsik ipan tlaxilakali teokaltitlan ikpak in tlakilyawali ayak okinankili ayak kitlekawia aw expa in otsatsik. testigo diego sanches fransisko sanches. ante mi lasaro de san hwan eskribano. nochin nenenkatsitsintin omopanoltiaya ika tiankisko momochko ka yixpan husgado iwan omotlekawiaya nochi tepetl itoka tepetikpak. owilaloya panoas kan metstaya se koros de tetl itokayoka tsitsintitla. axkan aihmo metstika in koros de tetl ipampa okichihke kaltin tlaka kwakwali iwan ika on tetexkaltin okinkwekwepotske. onkwan on okis tetl, ika on ika omochihchike kaltin. san niman oyaya ika bwenavista otli. oasia kampa ka amatomatl iwan ye ompoyon omomanaya nochtlakatl; onkwan on onkinchiaya inomekes nenenkame, onekawalo tlakwitlapa. ye yiman okititlania se tlakatl tlatlanis tla ye nochtlakatl yonesentlalilo. onkwan on ye tlamach oanalos. noihki omopanoltiaya san pablo, san salvador, tupileho iwan ika ahusko. okipiaya tlen panoas nochi otli, tlen nenenkame milpa alta opanoke. in sesek ta mochiwa ihwak kiowi. kiski in xii tekpatl xiwitl. tel wits moquxtitquiuh, semilon iwan inik ye mochi nikan nowian kan iseltsin kimotlakamachitia, aw sano yuhki in tlakatl inik kimochiwilitsino in totekwiyo dios in sa wel no yuhki intsonteko intlahtokayo i mochintin in ixkichtin in tlachiwalti in yolkame tlaltikpak; yewatl wel kintekimakaskia kinnawatiskia aw i no yewantin kitlakamatiskia. yei xumali pitsochiyawisotl in monamaka. onontotolkatok, nontlatlatlastok,nochichichatok, in nomokolton, in axayaka. sanno ihkwak ompewa inik se wei iyaoyo in semanawak. melawak kiilwi toni ika mopatatias totapalol. —asa in lén mikmotlakolilis in sosowaton para nomantakon timokowilis. aw in okimitake niman kilwito i markés: “ca omenti, ka yewatl in eekatsin in wel tikmotemolia in okasik wantelan, iwan temilotsin tlacatecatl”. aw in kwakwawtsi e kontlaitlania i mexika in kowatlichan, ompa wala i siwapili itokan akxokweitl ichpoch in akolmistli. yenia, ka ayik noewepes. aw in axkan oksepa tiktixpantiliko in hustisia ma kimomachiltikan in ixkichtin kittaske inin amatl motenewan karta de venta in kenin tewantin otiktotokayotike hwan de la turre, gaspar de san pablo. pedro hernandes albaseas titochihoan maria xoko. an pero nomanta tikwalikak tikitoa para nehwa asan yotikinnamakilti. in kwak ahtleyi semiya mokoa onganin bweno. aw in intlahtokaw walmochiwtia itoka totoltekatl tsonpachtli tlailotlaktewktli, ompa motewktlali in teotenanko; inin aokmo ipan asiko in chichimeka in totolimpaneka amakemeke, ye oyuh nepa yexiwitl momikili inik asiko. ¿quenonamican,can o ye ichanim a itkiwa in kwikatl? inik xii nikitowa onikak mikkakali tonatiw ikisayanpa itstikak inik ontetl mixnamiktikak tonatiw ikalakiyanpa itstikak tlekopayo yewatl kale katka in tenanwewe iwan totosakatsin aw ispantsinko ones in frovisol inik oniknokowis nikmakas chikom pesos yewatl kimati in brovisol in tla onmoten tomines konkwiske in nopilwan ana iwan nonamik iwan in tlali in ipa mani ka notlal nikinmaka amo itlakawis. isistat kema yaski kinechkawiti in kwali amantekatl: tlanemiliani, iyel, itech netlakanekani. netlakawiloni, amantekati, tlasaloa, tlawipana; tlanamiktia. wel tlapetlani. niman yewatl in molkaxitl in chikiwitl in sokitekomatl in puchtekayo kaxitl; in kwawitl in tekoli mochi kikaltema. nikan ipan in in motlahtokatlali in nochwetsin tlailotlaktewktli mochiw in tsakwaltitla tenanko amakemekan; aw san tlako xiwitl inn ontlahtokat, san niman ipan in in xiwitl momikili. limon in xiwit. axkana xikwalani amechmochichiwilis in totekuyo, in tehimatini, in teyokoiani, in techichiwani. tepetitech tlekoke in forsados, aw se tlakatl tepixtiwia de la gwardia kimiktitewake, iwan se tewikak in tepixtiwia. in mochipautani. tlahkoxonakatl ye nikan in tlaltikpak. vi akatl atle mochiw. aw in ikexkan onkan in mitowa in tekiti tlakoti in ika ixkich iweli in wei tlahtowani in motenewa turko; ka ipan in in katki in motenewa tierra sankta in tlateochiwaltlali herusalem. itlanahnamik: tlapochina. wan axan tichiwaske ntupan tikuwaske tuplatanos, tunaranxas tugwayaba, tumandarina, tukalaberas, sa'o gwayabas, mandarinas, kalaberas, eso es todo. nopaya kiilwi se ihkak ne ayotsinapan, ne tiopan paratani, kajfentenoj. yon semi avoi, se kiteki iixika in at. aw iwan ye kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan yepowalonchiwknawi xiwitl in ipan ix kali xiwitl, 1241 años, in asiko onkan chalko atenko in wewetke chichimeka totolimpaneka in amakemeke; yewatl tlahtowani ilwikixtia inin tlamawisoli. ¿mocahyantzinco, noso itla okse tekitl ok timochiwilis? niman ik tsatsitikis i siwatsintli, kito “tleycan amo timikiske? tleikan topan asikiwi? ma kimokakitika in tlatoke ‘tleycan amo timiquizque?’. tinokonetsin den timihtilwia in kihtoa nokone tlaximohtili kinmach ye kineki mosenkawas ilwan ammo san inon no nechtemmahmawtia inda ammo niktlamakawilia mach ixmantasl in tapiyalwaxin, mismo yehwa in noktawaxin. sesenowatsintika katalina kinyektlalia xochimeh iwan sakatl. pahpata 94 aw iwan ye nawpowalxiwitl ipan exiwitl in ipan 8 tochtli xiwitl, 1526 años, in sehsenyaka kintlamaka in ixkich tlakatl ayan ipan kisa. sesekkan in tlakwalo atliwa texochimako teiyemako. yon tsonti yehwa tein kipiya tein ika pampiktok in iteyo. aw inik walamasewaya akaltika, in okimatke sapatistas tlen okimaitilike topixke iwan ahken otlatekihti. oksepa owaltemoke sapatistas iwan okimikilike topixke; okitekixtilike itlalpan. ayokik omomachix tla omomikili noso monemiti. kipia. yuh omotlanawatilike ik okimotlalilike in intokatsin iwan in ifirmatsin antonio valeriano migwel de los angeles alkalde martin xwares alkalde. pasó ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. in sesek. nikawín amo semi mochiwa. aw in oyekaw tlalmomostli nima ye ik wi kintlatlawtiske tlatoke, kimonilwia “nopiltzintziné, ka oyekaw in tomomos. in estados unidos iwan in kanada tlakah ingleskopatlahtowa. 4 in ipan ivisperatsin itlakatilitsin tlasopiltsintli hesús temakixtiani, ipan martes a 24 de disiembre de 1591 años, ikwak kimanke retabla mage in onkan pochteka imandas manka, ye onkan kimanke kiketske in ixiptlatsin sankto frai diego. mah kimalakachotih kan otiaya' in kakawaka maske ken dios nechilwiayan in xwan: in lá timikas tía maske onkan weyapa nimikonomamalis nimikkonmopanoltilis den atl. ihkwak onkan otlahtokat onpowali ipan ei xiwitl, i wel kitenewtiwi wewetke, in wei tlahtowani in kitokayotiaya topiltsin akxitl ketsalkowatl. in ipan etsontli onkaxtoli omompoali onkaxtoli omome xiwitl, omomikilitsino don karlos, wei intlahtokatsin caxtiltecah, teutontlaltekah iwan mexicah, in onkan teopixkalko motenewa yuste. —ken matis nechkokoaya nokxiwan nomawan nokwerpo sentetl nechkokoaya. onkan ipan in yetsonxiwtiko ipan makwilpowalxiwtiko in ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios inik motlakatilitsino. || 28r aw i yewantin in in oyuh ompa walewake astlan ik niman onkan okisako in chikomostok; mochintin onkan kisako in chikonkalpoltin, kiyakantiwits in wei tlamakaski witsiltsin. no kwaltia para kwoutatil. o aik ompoliwis in moteyo, la desendensia i generasión de los reyes i dukes i señores naturales del pweblo de amakemekan, provinsia de chalko, es el ke se sigwe. nikan ipan in yankwikan kinyaoyawaloke inik kinpewaltike in mexika in askapotsalka in tepaneka. xiii akatl xiwitl, 1063. in aka konmottilia yaok tlamas. in aka konmottilia yewatl in mokwiltonos in motlakamatis. ¡in nikan xie! in ipan siudad mexiko a xi de setiembre de 1594 años, in yewatsin mawistililoni wei teopixki iwan wei tlamatini don sancho sánches de muñón maestreskwela moyetstikatka in nikan mexiko, itlanekilistsintika mochiw inik ompa moyetsties ipan tlaxilakali tepetlatsinko natividas, achtopa kimonemililito in teokali. tlasohtlah ¡ ma ok melel on kisa! ome kali xiwitl ik poliwke chimalwake. ika nopa se tonal otonki tekitl. inik kiwaltokatiake in imowi aokkan seliloke sa nowian aioke, aokmo iximachke, nowian ilwiloke ¿ac amewa, kampa anwitse? tlen neka yatok nochi puro otomí kitekiuiyaj. para atol se kimaxakwalowa in kapolih itech at mah pati wan kemah se kitsetselowa ika xelasoj. in lá yopikaw inniyolo yekwalika para motlapana. aw onkan kinkawtia ye omotokatenewke in eintin ipilwantsitsinwan: in ikse tliltekatsin teyakapan, in ikome xochitsin, in ikei atonaltsin. yewatl in kitemowaya, aw in satepan atle nes, san kikawke in tlatlatakaya; mochi kintlaske kintepewke in ixkich awewetl onkan onoyah, kinxexeloke kitlatlapanke, wala nikan palasio onkan tlatlak kosina, wel || 277 ik tlaixpoliw in chapultepek. tla yewa oyeskiaya. mochiwa kahfentah kampa tauitekij. ikwak ilwitsin kisá mitotikes pastoratin, santiagome iwan kemanian askatsitsintin. in ik 9 ipilwantsitsinwan tlakatl kwawsesekwitsin san ikalpanpiltsin itoka hwan ...açanotl. ikwak oasia tonali iilwitsin omochiwaya ilwitl kwali. okisaya prosesión ika otlika. chantlaka okitoaya ¡ma onye prosesión! onkwan on toteotatsin motlateochiwilis otli. onkwan aik tlatechpanoz. aw amo iwan intech nikan nitlahtowa in oksekintin teopixke karmelitas in kalsados sapatoseke, ka inon ka yeppa senka ye miek xiwitl onkate, ayemo walwi in nikan mexiko. noktaayoj, yeh weweyak wan kechchihchihkoltik wan iewayo amo semi tahtakwawak. aw ka yewatl in inik pew yaoyotl, inik walmotsawk chalko, inin kwalantli yaoyotl ik motlali; ka ok yewatl itlapewaltil itlatsintil in kwateotl tlahtowani chalko tlalmanalko inewan in toteositewktli tekwachkawtli tlahtowani akxotlan kalnawak. tlahtoltin aw ixkichtin tlayawaloke in tlahtoke oidores, alkaldes de korte, hordinario iwan regidores siudad selar. ye yiman on otlatlaniwak, ¿tlen tikwalikaske ika tlakwilos, tlen amochtli, tlen okwache timotlanis onkwan on mostla kwalikas noconeuh? chikonikoskakwawyok kikawtiw in teukali. ipa se taman saj. ix tekpatl xiwitl, 1436. onkan sexiwtike in chichimeka totolimpaneka. kwalika, newa nis nakis notlaken kapulkwawtin. achi miake omochiwke. achton owiloak otlanonotsaloya kename itech kwawtin omotampiloaya kokoa. ikwak on onechantiloto omotlatlakalke kwawtin. iki on ika oksepa onemoaloton. kana yeyi, nawi xiwpa okwache ye tlakayo owiloak ompa. kenin mochiwa kinekih kiyoltikayawase. aw san ya yewatl ipan in in omotenew xi akatl xiwitl in onkan walolinke tulam, inik walewake inik niman ye witse ok ye nowiyan kihkistiwitse. inik pew yaoyotl in chalko; temiktike in chalka, kinmiktike in mexika. v tekpatl xiwitl, 1276. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. ikwak momikili in tlakatl tlahtokapili in tliltekatsin chichimekayaotekiwa in iachkawtsin in tlahtowani atonaltsin chichimekatewktli; in wel yewantin achtopa asiko nikan in tlalmasewke, yewantin achtopa fundadoresme mochiwako in nikan ipan altepetl amakemekan. in inpan axkan ik 26 mani metstli hulio de 1607 años, ipan ilwitsin sankta ana ye teotlak, ikwak ompa omikowak in weyapan in ipan akalotli inik ompa wilowa tetskoko noso nikan ik walwilowa mexiko; aw yeh nikan mexiko walwia in akali yewatl in kitokayotia navío in weyapan polakiko. aw onkan no kinnakaspotonike, inik okikwepke in intoka inik ye mexitin; iwan onkan okinmakak in mitl iwan tlawitoli iwan chimali iwan chitatli, in tlein akoyaw wel kominaya in mexitin. no ikwak mik in chimalpopokatsi, mokechmekani, newan in itlakatekaw mike, tlakatekatl tewtlewakatsi; momawtike yaoyotika, kitoke “canpa titowikaske? ka ie toyaow in tepanekatl; ken ka toteikaw tlakateutsi? ka icha askapotsalko awal nikan ililoz”. ¡namehhuan xichualmalacachotih! aw ye teotlak in tlatiloto tlateotokanime sant ipólito. mahtlaktli koyolchili yewa okachi tlahka moteka. yewa ipan inin teotlak tochan walas. aw ye oniknolwilito in tlakatl, in notewkyo in ilwikak siwapili, santa maria in teotl dios itlasohnantsin, in tikmihtlania in tlaneskayotl inik wel tinechmoneltokkitis, inik tikmochiuhililis in iteokaltsin tlaltikpak nemi". san tipopoliwiske, ayak mokawas. 254 axkan viernes in ik 15 mani metstli agosto de 1614 años, ihkwak wel ipan itlasoilwitsin totlasonantsin sankta maría nwestra señora asumpsión, teotlak ipan makwili tsili in omomikili don antonio kortés totokiwastli telpochtli governador katka tlakopa; san nawilwitl in omokoko, amo wel onestia in tlei kokolistli ik omomikili, in aso matlaltotonki amo wel momati, san in iw omihto ka san miek netekipacholi okimopialiaya yewatl inik omomikili, kiteilwiyaya in imasewalwan tepaneka tlakopaneka. ¿mach ok walkinewa, mach ok walilotiwa kan ompa ximoa? aw san ya yewatl ipan in in omotenew ix kali xiwitl in ipan owasiko, aokmo onwekawak sa onkan onmomikilitasiko in chalko atenko in omotenew tlahtowani wewetewktli chichimekatewktli, in tlahtokat epowalxiwitl ipan chikwexiwitl inik kinwalyakan inik kinwalpachotia in itstlakosawke amakemeke; aw san niman ipan in in omotenew xiwitl on- || 51v -can walmotlahtokatlali in chalko atenko in itlasopiltsin in itoka atonaltsin chichimekatewktli mochiw intlahtokaw in itstlakosawke amakemeke. yeka nikihkoma kekwale yetlamamalo yemana yekwalo tlamamalo yeka sa'on. waxin wahkino ya tonilitiya wan kinehki kimachilis. ik niman wel ompa oyahke in okinpewato chalchiwmo- || 44v -mozco tamoanchan, sekintin kimanke maltike in xochteka in xikalanka in kiyawisteka in ulmeka in kukolka. kaxtoli chilpitsawak ahnoso kwawchili pus nehwahwan tolentino wan tehwa pus nehwa arranka pinos wan tehwa. tihwiyonise ne kalteno itech talmanik, kema kitlachili se kwatochi wala. in amo kwali sukichiwki xolopitli, nexotekwili, mikkatsintli. ¿toni kitekipachoa? v tochtli xiwitl, 1302. aw san ye ipan in in ome akatl xiwitl in asiko in diablo in teskatlipoka katka in onkan xaliipitsawayan, aw in iteowatewk walmochiwtia itoka yakawetski teowatewktli. ipan chikwei tekpatl xiwitl omotlahtokatlali witsiliwitl, in akin oteyakan méxiko sempoali onse xiwitl. witsiliwitl nepapan tlakah okimpew iteyakankayopan yuhkin toltitlan, kwawtitlan, chalko, tolantsinko, xaltokan, otompan, tetskoko, iwan akolman. aw yoan in kaltontli in ompa monoltitok tlaixiptlayotl teopantonko yoan mochi in itwali yoan in kin motekak tepantli ka mochi no kinamaka in onikintenew noxwiwan aw kimanaske sempoali pesos inin tomines itech powis in animan misas kantadas ik nopan mitos in onpa sanktiago. entonses owahsiko sa lultimo itlani awelitos kwak ye serka ahsi itech inon rio ganin oktlapaktokan imaman wan yowahsito yotlaixtlamat imaman ganin okan katka. aw in oikaka in krus yepowalxiwitl ipan chiwknawxiwitl ipan hetetl metstli ipan matlakilwitl onse mani metstli abril; aw in owetsiko in omotlas ye iw nawpowalxiwitl ipan onxiwitl iwan yei metstli ipan matlakilwitl onse kawitl in asiko españoles. xxvii pregon.- a desiete dias del mes de mayo de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in tlaxilakalpan kwepopan okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal in intlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak tle kito testigo pedro migwel. ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. 3.- iwan nikitowa i pablo hernandes ka ichina hetetl ayak kixtokilis sa nika kaltepotsko itemi. ¿tlen tikwalita inin tlapitsali? onkán yeka ikwali mochiwas nekwtli. ika 15 días aw san inseltin in amakemeke || 67 in amo ompa tewanme otekitito, san yewatl intekiw mochiw in tlakpak omotenew morilos kwawtlan kikixtike. titotlanewia kema ya tlaxawanki, wahkino kiilwi inin kali ye se in altepepan okachi soltik. —ašan sayunkan tlaxkali. para kitaliskeh ¡tetlacoltih! nechyolamana ika nimitsnokakitia. miak nipahpakis okse tonali niteixmatis. aw yewatl ikchikwei visurrei mochiwtsinoko in tlakatl don gaspar de súniga i asevedo konde de monterrei, in otlapacho ika ixkichkaw in ipan xiwitl de 1595 aw ixkich ik walantika yewatl ipan xiwitl de 1603, inik mowikak ompa visurrei mochiwtsinoto ompa motlapachilwito in ipan provinsias pirú; in tlahtokatiko nikan mexiko chikwexiwitl ipan matlaktetl onse metstli. . aw is katki in omotenew in ik mihtowa "naualoztomeca. ka okonmitalwi in ekatsin: kwix nitlapowti? ka niayaoti, nitlawiteki, nitemayawtikisa amo sa miec”. xitlasohtla in tlahkwilo ¿titemixmachilia in tlakatsin? xii toch- || 90v -tli xiwitl, 1426. inik se tlakatl tlanakilia hwan de la torre konitoa in ikwak ipan kokolitstli ye mokokowa in maria xoko senka wekawtika xiwitl iknosiwatitikatka aw in inamik katka ye wekaw momikili aw san konixkawike inikinmatika okichiw[ke] in kali. motlapachohkí. aw in omotenew topiltsin akxitl ketsalkowatl miekpa moyeyekoto yaoyotika in kimasisnekia in kinpopolosnekia teotenanka, oksenka yewatl in kasis- || 34v -nequia in inteow nawyotewktli, aw amo wel mochiw. kwaltia oannemiah in ik-ei wala españa in kavalero itoka don lwis de alsega ibargwen komendador de alkántara, in ikomienda kitlalia kiltik krus, inin telpokapiltontli novisio in wala, ayemo monetoltia ika ayemo kichiwa professión, san oqu ixkich kiwalkwitewa umpa komienda; inin omotenew inpiltsin inkonew in kontador ibargwen katka iwan doña katalina de alsega, in axkan ye inamik yetika in doktor antonio de morga alkalde de korte mexiko, ye itlakpawitek in omotenew telpochtli komendador kriyoyo. se tetl ipa kitihtisi nixtamali se tlamatsoli in nikan siudad mexiko a unse dias del mes de abril de mil e kinientos i ochenta i kwatro años in yewatsin senka mahustililoni señor pablo garsia hustisia kimopielia in ipampatsinko su magestad in axkan oixpantsinko wala boenabentura teles chane san sebastian sakatla. oninemia aw iwan ye no okitlatlapoka; aw ipan in in omotenew metstli agosto iwan in ompa omotenew mexikatsinko mochi kitsatsakwato in atenamitl. in tewantin regitor mayor pedro hakobo iwa migwel garsia algwasil mayor iwan hwan mentes algwasil iwan eskribano fransisko ximenes otiwalake in nikan tlaxilakalpa san sebastian awatonko posesion tiksiwako inik tiksemaxkatiko in ikalkowal in sensilia ximenes española. lo ke tein nikan tamechtahtanilihtoqueh, yewa omonahnawati teka nonatsin. aw inik ye neli nikan kimotlalilia in intokatsin yoan infirmatsin omuchiw axkan martes fecha ut supra. firmantes: don gaspar de mendosa gobernador, hwan de tovar, hieronimo de soto fiskal, baritolome lwis, hwan mines algwasil mayor de la iglesia diego de san fransisko eskribano. tehwa nikan nimitsmaktilia nehin tahpalol. in oyuh ahsiko niman ye tlamasewa ye tlamana in ixpan in diablo i nawyotewktli in xipil; in kimanke witstli iwan in yetl. san ye ika nichoka, aw in ipampa onkan in itlok inawak tepetl omomikiliko, ika in itoka okitokayotike in tepetl tekpayo, inik nikan omokaw in ilnamikoka in ika itoka tekpatsin in mochipa semihkak in okixkichika tlamis semanawatl. in tetl okachi tepitstik keh in kwawitl. asiko in onkan tekwalok, omach tlapetstilike inik kiitta, ye aoktle imaitla ye nestok, ima omitl tepewtok, sa tlapik in ontlatlachialo. mochiwa kuoujtaj. ya ximewakaya kwamekatini". in ewayo no semi kwali para estsompil wan kalanemilis : kimanah iwan iewayo in eskowit wan wiwilakani wan kemah se tayi. se español ipan ikaka itoka ileskas in kimotekiwti aotlih, yewatl kinemili kimachiyoti in iyowi yeskia atl, inik ompa itstiaskia nepa chimalwakampa. xochimeh "kena". aw in alkaldesme motlalike san hwan moyotlan, san kitlamelawalti in diego de san fransisko chane tekikaltitlan, iwan balthasar hernándes chane xiwitonko, inin kin inyopa alkalde omuchiw. monamaka ne kwesalan. xkintatawti nehin apiani, aw in sa tepan inik omopakkanonotske ikwak in paskwa resurreksion in okis in iw kimolwike matonkwikwikan in technemaktitiake in tonantsin in tosetsin aw niman kito in pedro nali ka ye kwali mayuh tikchiwakan manonkalaki in onkan mani nonemak aw in tewatl in tinoteikkaw ti hwan baptista maxonkalaki onkan mani monemak ka iw mononotske i ka neli onkate in testigos in wewetke. a xviii dias del mes de setienbre mil e kinientos e sesenta e nweve años. onkán nihpakas in ichtle. ihwak tekwi totonik semi tel fwerte, se kiteki yon ixiuyotsin wan se kimaxakwalowa kwali wan ika tekwaahketstipakah ika yon tein imaselo. iwan nikan motlalia motenewa in ipan in itlamian in in omotenew xii tekpatl xiwitl de 1608 años, in ye kexkichkaw in ompa itsinekan in okimochiwili in okimoyokoli semanawatl in totekwiyo dios, inik okimotlalili in ilwikatl in tlaltikpatli iwan in ixkich tlamantli in ipan onok; iwann okseki tlahtoli nikan motekpana in tlein ye wekaw omochiw, in iw niman ye onnesis nikan tekpantok. pero ika tiotlak kichixki tlakechketl kemahní aw ye kin axkan sábado in ik 28 mani metstli omotenew setiembre, in ye yeilwitiyok omotenew ik walmokalaki mexiko, ihkwak omotenextilitsinoko omoteittititsinoko yowatsinko ipan chiwknawi tsilini in onkan iglesia mayor, iwan missa kimochiwiliko in omotenewtsino yewatsin teoyotika tlahtowani doktor don hwan péres de la serna arsobispo. aw ye no seppa ihkwak atliwa ahso oppa ahnoso expan in yowan teamako. no ihkwak momikili hernando kortés pili itstlakosawkan, ik x4-tia abril. no nikan nimitsaxkatiliti. iuki kilwiah por in rahrabontik. in rabano. aw inin ik moman inik mochali omotenew tiankintli, yewatl ipan tlahto in padre frai hwan de bustamante ihkwak onkan tetlan katka. moilwi tlatlahka ma ya nopa tenantsi inik senka pahpakowak ikatsinko san nikolás nikan mexiko; onkan pewtika i inik ye mochipa weilwichiwalistli ye mochiwtiw ipan ilwitsin san nikolás de tolentino nikan mexiko in sesexiwtika. nima ye ik yaw in kwawtliiketski, tlalan omotekak; niman ik kisako in kopil, niman kikwitiwets, kilwi “ac te?”. nikawín mochiwa miak. aw yeintin in omotenewke in tlakpak in tlapiaya pipiltin in kipiaaya altepetl in ixkichkaw in aokak tlahtowani katka in ikse itoka ketsalpoyomatsin ipiltsin in wewe ketsalmasatsin, in ikome itoka kwawtlaltsin ipil- || 105v -tzin temistsin, in ik-ei itoka yaotsitsin ipiltsin wewe aokwantsin. 72v ii kali xiwitl, 1169. aw ipampa in nowian || 87r mononotske, kihtoke "ma kikaki in totlatol in tewktli in witsiliwitl in kwatlekowatl iwan in tlakatewktli in itskowatl: `ma ik walmotlali, ma iwiwi ma mitika ma chimaltika in techitta in tawake in titepehuaque'". aw nikitoa in tla aokmo wel nikmakixtis in imakpa pleito in tla nipan awilis ka nimitsixtlawilis in motomines sempoali pesos de oro komun in nomatika onikseli yoan in saso kexkich kartas tikchiwas aw in anoso itla ipan tikchiwas in amo monekia in omotenew tlalmatli ka mochi nimitsixtlawilis ipampa in axkan nikchiwa eskritura ixpan eskrivano in nikan ipan siudad mexiko santiago tlatilulko yoan in ixpan testigos in wel ipampa onotsaloke migwel hakobo yoan bonifasio xwares yoan hwan baskes español yoan christoval medel español. se kikwa. viii tochtli xiwitl, 1318. —inoso melawak noso te ihte koko nekwtli xokok. mah amo tonalwaki. inxochipensamientoh coztiqueh, texohikeh iwan chichiltiqueh. pero nonke kometas akmo itla omosewihke den antes tlamini in siglo pasado. . aw in ixkich in tlamasewalistli in akxoyakwiwalistli. ye ixkich in tik caqui. ipa iuki itokai saj. sa weka xikkalakika, xochmilkopa xitztiuia”. yewa se kwali piltontli. aw ye sentsonxiwitl ipan chikonpowalxiwitl ipan makwilxiwitl axkan in ompa walewake astlan teokulwakan in mexika wewetke astlan tlaka chichimeka; aw inik ompa senka wekawake, inik onpa katka astlan teokulwakan ontsonxiwitl ipan matlakpowalxiwitl ipan matlaktli onnawi xiwitl, in iw nestika intlapowal wewetke, inik niman ompa owalolinke owalewake inik nikan ye walnenemi. matlaktlomome tekpa xiwitl ikopa sewechililok toktli, sano yawaliwi sewets. na nomoilwi titlanki titlatlak". ipan inin xiwitl tlahkwilokatsin in itoka montesquieu kipanitlasa iamox in tlein galitlahtoltika motokayotia "de lesprit des lois". aw marina tiakapan ixnawatilo in kanpa katka in inamik katka in itoka hwan ekapitsak in yehexiwitl ye nawxikitl san iw yes in marina tiakapan iwan in imikkawepol pedro nali ayak san moyokoyas kimaxkatis in kali ixkichika okitla sentlamantli ik montlanawatilis su magestad aw in tla ok aka san moyokoyas kikwisnekis in kali senka tlatsakwiltilos onpowali onmatlaktli inik mekawitekos sa tepan v pesos tomines kixtlawas itech powis in ikamara su magestad. iiii akatl xiwitl, 1483. itla wel kwali nikmatia yehika notahtsin okimotlatili ompa in tomin inin wel neli yeskia ihtik in se inontin teocholi yese kahtlewatl in xitomat no se kitoka in iteyo. wan ihkino". aw in oyuh kimakato, ik ompa kiwalmakak ontlamantli in itlawis: in iksentlamantli teokwitlapanitl, in ikontlamantli tlakochtlamanali. mochiwa ome taman: tein nikawín chilxoxowik wan seki ahkopachilxoxowik. nochi xoxowik kinamakaj. ihwak oksi chichilewi. amo xkinmahkawa, niman onkan ye kitlalia in ikimil in itlakimilol; in okontlali niman ixpan ye miso ye moxtlawa ye tlamana, in kima witstli iwan in yetl. aw in kiktas niman odanawati kiktowa xihmihtikam in inin konetli den quinequ{i} nikam sasitw nepa xihtlawiktekikam ika ikxi ye xihwiktekikam in yolo{xo}chikwawit!i aw in inkwah ai amo itech komkwatlawitekki inin isonteko niman otopomtikis inon yoloxochitli ik omkam okimanke omkam yaoyotli mochiwas aw yewantin ompa omodatiaya ihpah se tepetli itoka okoktepetli ompa omotlalika aw in ikwah otopomqu{i} in xochitli okikake niman mochintin ocholoke amo san dapowali in owalake as/ o na/wi mil tiakatli aw in ikwah otopomki in xochitli mochi tepetli okinankili ikk omoma{w}tike ocholoke aw innon konetli okonanki in tlaktowani in xochiteuktli niman otlanawa{ti} okikto xikkixtilikan in iyolo niman isiwkam okixtilitiweske okimakake niman okipehgwe/... / nika win no mochiwa kaltsintan. aw inyomatsinko visurrei iwan tlahtoke oidores in onkan mowikatsa, inik kimotlaliliko siwapili dios inantsin motlayawalwike. axox ya wahkapa yetok . malinala nomak temi sentli teumilko chikavastika m otlakechiska. a omei-kwawtli ye tonan aya chalmeka iwan anotle itla onkan kinmakaya in axkawake tlatkiwake, iwan wel mochi kitemowaya in testamentos, kittaya yniqu itech kimatia in tlein sesen mimikke okixexelotiake. o sen yahke kenonamikansannokonyapitsa ya in oseloakakikis, sa onkwawtsatsitikak in notemalakak, ipan tekpili. nima ye miskikatl, walteyaka xalpanekatl. chikwasen karpamimichtin inik moyaomanilike in chalka iwan mexika, sa onkan in manka in yaoyotl in chalko; ye oyuh matlakxiwitl momikili in wewe kakamatsin. aw in tlatoani motekusomasi tenochtitla kiwikatinemi in itskwawsi tlakuchkalkatl tlatilulko in kintlakawaltiaya spañoles. aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl tlamato i nesawalpili tlahtowani tetskoko, iwan tlamato in totolapaneka in wexotsinko in ye mochi wexotsinka iwan sosolteka; in mamaltin kintemakak in awitsotl in ompa kwawnawak, inka momamal in diablo ikal. "na ya nopa nihneki". ikwouyo nochi iuki, sayoh ke taki tiltik wan xoxoktik. totlamachtilkawan amoka wel okinekia mokawas chantis momochko malakatetikpak. amo onyeya kaltin kintetlakewiske; amo inyeya pantsin. nian aka tlatepalewis. nochtin temachtikes amo okinekia mokawaske. onkwan on omonemili okintlakehke kaltin. ye yiman on opehke mokahke temachtikes momochko malakatetikpak. chikweyi tlamachotilistli oasiwaloya ompa santa marta; achi wewekaton in kampa titlakwake. nochtin okinekia asitiwe isihkan. okinpewaya kawatin; onkwan on tlamachaxiwas. otonasia keman chikweyi tepostlamachotiloni yowali. iwan tlakatsitsintin tlen okinekia kiposoniske tepitsin atlaposon onkwan on kiske tepilwan iwan tesiwaw okichiwaya tlitl. ¡achi kwaltsin omohtaya! nepa, nian tlapopoka; nepa, nian mototonia kokonentoton ika siwame. noka tlaka yawe kitemoske atl kampa yewan ye kimati. okseki okontemoaya kwawitl. kimatsatsayatsaya ompa kwawtlatli, inon wawawki kwawitl, onkwan on amo popokas. tlakayo osiaowaloya. oaxiwak, omosohke soyapetlame onkwan on nesewilos. noka tlaka atlaposonia iwan tlatolonia tlaxkali iwan tlakwali. san niman onetekoya. aw in ilwikak kimotokayotili hierusalem, aw in tlaltikpak kimotokayotili inik nowian semanawak babilonia; aw in ipa in iksekkan ompa moyetsinotikate in sanktosme iwan in angelosme, aw in oksekni in ikokan ipan nemi in ayektin in akwaltin in tlatlakowanime. noponi oyektok orno ihtik kema kiitak in chili mokixtilia ikwitlaxkol, ikwitlapil iwan moihseki; san niman mopohpoa ika kwechawak tatapahtli; no iwki moihseki in tlalkakawatl, almendra, ahonholí, bolilo, in tlaxkali, in awakakwauhastlakapali; moihseki in xonakatl, axox; in okichxuchikwali motlewatsa ika chiyawisotl. mochi inin motesi itlok in okse tlanahnamiktli iwan yeka in chiltextli inik mochiwas moli. ixkich in chiltextli senka wehyi, ahso ika kintlamakaskeh yei poali tlakah ahnoso okachintin; yuhki, mokwi ixkich in monekis iwan tlapixkan motlalia in okachi. tlen mokwas motlewatsa ika pitsochiyawisotl iwan motlalilia poyox ahnoso waxoloistayutl. wiksi ome ahnoso ome iwan tlahko kawitl ipan. intla chikwasen tlakah tlakwaskeh mochiwa ome tekontontli chiltextli. intla tlakwaskeh chikwasen tlakah moneki ome tekontontli chiltextli. kenin mochiwa amo mochipautani. teipa yaya nopa molini molini nima ye unkan ipa momana witsilayawitl napowalilwitl; unka mopopoloke i mexika, seki yake chalko, seki yake wexotsinko, seki matlatsinko. in ihkwak in ye iw nepa chikwepowali ipan matlakxiwitl onkan ahsiko inik onkan kalakiko mexika in kowatepek inawak tulan in ipan se tekpatl xiwitl; ihkwak onkan momikiliko in wei teopixki tlamakaski witsilopochtli, inik san niman ipan omotenew se tekpatl xiwitl ok yewatl onkan kiwalalike in sano wei teopixki teomama kwawtleketski inik okwawtlahto inik okinyakan mexika in san ixkichika senpowalonkaxtoli ipan exiwitl. amo se kichipawa. axkan lunes sankto in ik 24 mani metstli marso de 1614 años, ye kin ihkwak in in nikan ihtik siudad mexiko oansiko okalakiko in omotenew tewktitlantli embaxador in ompa hapón owala, san fransisko teopankaltitlan motlaliko se kaltika; inin omotenew tewktitlantli embaxador, in iw nikan mexiko machistik yuh mihto, ik kiwaltitlani in intlahtokaw emperador hapón umpa yaw in roma kimottilis in sankto padre paulo kinto iwan kimomakilis intetlakamachilis in itechpa sankta iglesia, inik christianosme muchiwasneki muchintin hapón tlaka. pero axkan inon yotla non baratu:ra axkan ye mochi patiyo. ya axkichiwa kwenta para kintlamakas. motewksoma ilwikamina nepapan tlakah kinyaochiwili iwan senka yuh kimiekili mexikah intlahtokayo. newatl don fransisko ximenes gobernador in ipaltsinko su magestad in axkan nemechnawatia in tewatl algwasil pedro akol iwan eskribano migwel hernandes ankonkalakitiwi in ichan pedro nali iwan in inamik niman ayak amechtlakawaltis yuh nitlanawatia. aw okimilwike kitoke in kolwake "mexicayé, ka tiyaokisaske, tikinpewaske in xochmilka; inka momalis in amoteokal". aw no iwan ye oyuh nepa etson- || 55v -xihuitl ipan epowalxiwitl ipan matlaktlomome xiwitl omotlakatilitsino in totekwiyo hesuchristo. san niman okimati telpokatl ke inantsin yaw monamiktis. ye yiman teopa kalakis opew yeyeka; iwan omopachok in teposton itlaktsinko topixke. kimolwilia amo tikinmosenkawilis ikan siwatontli kipia notelpochton. in topixke amo omotlaneltokiti. okimosenkawilik iwan oyake ichan siwatsintli ompoyon otetlaitilo. ichan telpokatl otlakwalo. iman ye tlakwalos omopachok teposton wan kilwia ¿tlican otimonamiktik? ye weyi totelpoch iwan otimitspanoltiani tonehuan. in xiwit saj, pero ipa in kwowit in kitokaj. in tepostli okachi kwakwaltsin ye in platino. axan inkwak onisako otihkakia' walaya n rebolusio. in mochiwa kahfentah wan kampa amo weyi tauitekij. iwan nikitowa [occentetl kali]... waltitika atenkopawik a...[omotamachiw inik] wiak onmatl aw inik patlawak [yematl]... nikmaka in nonamik omito. mah amo okwilowa, . in ike achtopa no sentetl ixpan konketsaya in xiwtewktli in tletl; niman ye no sentetl ixpan konketsaya in yakateoktli. ka tlatsintla, in chiapas, onka miak cafencuameh. ma kwali mopaka in xelwasnanakatl, in yepasohtli iwan chili; ipan kaxitl motlalia pitsochiyawisotl inik totonis ika ahmo wei tletl; moteteki in xelwasnanakatl. chili iwan yepasohtli; motlalia ipan pitsochiyawisotl, motlapachoa iwan ma wiksi. yewan towan tlahtohuah. aw in provinsial motlali itoka frai estevan de alçúa. no ipan in itlamian in metstli omotenew in nikan mexiko owalake omentin san fransisko de paula teopixke in motenewa mínimos. tlalnamiki. ika ome litro atl mowikxitia in pitsonakatl ika axox, xonakatl iwan istatl. ihtik in okse komitl mosiyawa in chilakachtextli ika ome tekontontli atl iwan ipan sokikaxitl motlalia in pitsochiyawisotl inik totonis; motlalia in chilakachtextli, motsoyonia senka kwali, san tlamach motlalilihtiw in istayutl kan owiksik in pitsonakatl inik ahmo motelolohchiwas; in “cihuacuacuahuenenepilli”, in ye kwali tlapaktli, no ye motlalia, motlalia in nakatl, motlapachoa iwan mowikxitia ika ahmo wei tletl. aw nimann ik ye kinnotsa in diablo witsilopochtli, kimilwi "macamo ximotekipachokan; mochiwas in tlein kitlani maxtlaton". tlanankili “ma in mochiwa, ka tel ye ik tiwi, nochpochtsé malitzé”. aw mochi kiyawak kiwalaske kikixtike kinokike in atl, tlapixke in anokike onkan; aw in ikwak in itla anokilok kalitik, niman in tlalpantli i nowian kalitik kakokke kiwekapanoke. . niman ye ik wal kisa in teotekomatl: yewatl in kakawatl kihtowaya teotekomatl. ikwakun ye poko a pokito yetomantenerotaya' tikatka libre titekitiske. ix tekpatl xiwitl, 1280. mochiwa saj, ixwa in iteyo. chiwknawi tochtli atle mochiw. se tekpatl ik poliwke miskika. aw in oksentetl kwawtekpa itstikak yoan in ioatllo [sic] ontetl yoan kaltsalanyo atenkopa kistika tonatiw ikalakiampa itstikak unkan okatkaya se español itoka fransisko de kastro español texedor okimototokili yehoatsinhwes gobernador aw in yehoatl maria geronima iyoma otlatzatzacu yoan nowian onenen in ioatoalko yoan kalitik. teipa tonili yahki tani motalilia in itakka, ompa mismo xochiyowa. san ok onkan onenewaya in chichimeka in tonaliitlatlayan inik konnemiliaya anoso konnemilitinemia in intlamesewal in intepewalpan in ma ahka omkan motlali. yahkeya. tlen 19 tlanawatihkayotl. amo akah tekiwah tlahtoltlanawatihketl welis kiketsas akaya kipano expoali matlaktli iwan ome kawitl, keman pewas imako elis tlahtlakohketl, tla amo onkah amatlatilantli tlen tlahtlakoltehtemolistli kampa moihtos: tlen tlahtlakoli quicahuiliah, kanin mochihki, kawitl iwan tlenon ika mochihki, iwan tlahtoli tlen kiixnextis mochichki tlahkia iwan se amatlanawatili ki ihtowa nompa eli tlahtlakoli iwan maonka tlemach tlen ki ixtextia nompa akin kinekih ki tlatsakwiltiseh kichihtok ke tlah mo kalakih in iwaya sekinok quichihuaseh. tekiweh kanih on mo tlateilhwiyah san welis ki tlahtlanis tekiwehtlatsakwiltihketl ma ki tsakwakah se kentsi kemah kiitahka sekinoh ohtli iwan yon ika inoh ax moechkawia tlahtlakohketl kanih ki tlatsacuiltsinequih, ki tlatehtemoliah itlahtlakol, ki mokwitlawiah akih ki ixpanotok, ke tlah tlen kiitakeh tlahtlakolchihki ke tlah nochimeh iuampoyouah, iwan nohkia kemah nompa ki tlatehtemoliah ki notsah sehkoyok ika seyok tlahtlakoli ke tlah ki tlatskwiltihtokehya pampa san kineki kichihki seyok tlahtlakoli. wahka tekiweh te titlanis ma kitsakwakah se kentsih nimantsih, nochipa mochiwas ihquinoh, san kemah mo sehkotiliah miakih tlahtlacolchihuaseh, san kinehke quimictiseh, te ahuiltihqueh, te kaltsahkeh kanahya, tlahtlakoli kani ki tekiwihkeh tlenweli ika tekokoseh tlahkia ke tlah tlahkia tlen toponi, nohkía kemah eli weyi tlahtlakoli tlen kehani kitokaxtiya amatlanawatili kiixpano to tlaltikpak, akahya ki tsakwilia ma mo kwalchiwa ke tlah chikawalistli. amatlanawatili kiihtos kemanke tekiweh welis kin makawas tlakameh tlen kipiah amatlatilantli tlen tlahtlakoltehtemolistli. ni kawitl kani moneki ki ihkwiloseh amatlatilantli tlen tlahtlakoltehtemolistli welis mowekawilis san keman motlatlanilis tlahtlakoani, ken kiihtos tlahtoltlanawatili. keman mowekawilis kiketsaseh tlen ika kitlatlakawia welis tetlatsakwiltis tlahtol tlanawatili. tekiwah tlen imako kaltlatsakwali kampa kipixtokeh tlahtlakoani, tlen amo kiselis amatl tlaixkopinkayotl kampa ixnesi amatlatilantli tlen tlahtlakoltehtemolistli wan tlen ki ihtos ma ki tsakwakahya kentsi, ke tlah tlahtlanilistli tlen ki ompawia kawitl tlen ki tokaxtia ni weyi amatlanawatili, moneki kimatiltiseh tlasenkahketl tlen inin tlahtoli saniman keman asis tonatih iwan, tla amo kiselis amatl tlen nikan moihtoa panos eyi kawitl, welis kimakawas tlahtlakoani. nochi ohtekitl motokilis pampa tlahkia panok ke tlah tlenweli tlahtlakoli ki ixnextihtokeh ipan amatlatilantli tlen tlahtlakoltehtemolistli. tla ipan ohtli tlatehtemolistli ipannesis seyok tlahtlakoli amo iwikal tlen sanok ki tehtemolia, moneki kipewaltiseh seyok tlatehtemolistli no iyoka, maskeh teipah kena weli kin sehcotiliseh, tlah ihkino weli mochiwa. tla kipixtokehya teipah amatlatilantli tlen tlahtlakoltehtemolistli ipampa mo sehkotilihkeh miakih tlahtlakolchihkeh se tlahtlakolchiketl cholohtewa ke tlah kiwikah iichpah seyok tekiweh ipan seyok tlaltipaktli, wahka san panoh mo ketsaltis tlahtlakoltehtemolistli wan nohkia ayoh nehnemis kawitl katli mo ixpolos iteki tlen tekiweh kitlahtakoltemolia. nochi axkwali tlahtoli tlen keman kinilpiseh noso quintzacuaseh, nochi tlakwatotonili tlen mochiwas iwan amo tlen xitlawak tlanawatili; nochi altepeko tlaxtlawili, ipan kaltlatsakwali, nochi yewa axkwal nemilistli tlen moxitlawas ika tlanawatilmeh iwan tlatsakwiltilistli tlen tequihuameh. aw in axkan tlaxilakaleke san sebastian iwan san pablo kinkixtisneki inik kichiwaske kowatekitli iwan semilwitekitl kinpixawtiw. aw in tla yuh mochiwas ka i kitlakawis in itlayekoltilotsin totekuyo dios iwan teotlanawatilistli. "pues san tikinmakwitlawis v tochtli xiwitl, 1250. yuh kihtoke mochintin in españoles: "ca otechsentlahtalwike in techmiktiske totlakawan in totliltikawan"; inik senka kinmawtiaya, inik niman okixketske in ipan in omotenew semilwitl kapitán general kichiwke in telpochtli don fernando altamirano, inin ixwiw in don lwis de velasko markés de salinas in oppa visurrei omochiw nikan mexiko. tlahko kilo kalwahsa xoxowki inin xiwpan omomikilitsino tlahkwilokatsin in itoka don fernando de alva ixtlilxochitl noponi monextik sintli, kiihtowah se siwatontli itoka fransiska gonsáles cháves, notia ichan san lorenso tlakoyuka tlakpak momocho malakatepek, owiloak salasar. yokimiktike karransistas inamik iwan yewatl amo kana omomawti kintoka sapatistas ipan on lano salasar. aih weli ka ocholo. inin siwatsintli okitsonwike ika se riata isihkan okitekaxkixti riata inin techicocoh. ye yiman on ocholok owala mexiko. matlaktlomei tekpatl motlatokatlali i wewe motewksomasi. aw inik oppa ontlachix in ikpak tototl, ene kittak, iwki on in ma akame, mokeketstiwitse, tepewtihutse, moyaochichiwtiwitse, kinmama mamasa. in nikan siudad mexiko a seis dias del mes de mayo de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años axkan ik senpowali onmatlaktli tonatiw inik tsatsiwa kali tlali in ikal marianan chane sankt ipolito teokaltitlan san no onkan mani monamaka in tekpoyotl okitenew in chiwknapowali onmatlaktli pesos kitema in se tlakatl español inik kipatiyotia in kali aw in ikwak otsatsiwak ik niman owala in lwis savalos español okito nikaxiltia inik nikkowa kali niktema matlakpowali pesos wel noyolokakopa in iw nikitowa iwan inik nikaxiltia in matlakpowali pesos in tomines yuh nikitowa imixpan testigosme diego peres español iwan tekpoyotl iwan lwis de la krus. no ikwak momikili don augustín baptista tekwanipan. aw sanno ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl in kis mowikak in ichan tekamachalko in don fransisko ximénes hwes governador katka tenochtitlan, in tlahtokat makwilxiwitl. aw in akali ok ye koyoaka umiquania’”. mochiw, nikan mexiko san monomawi in tlatlak, kwetlan, ayak ma kitekawi, san monoma tlekawi in ikal witsilopochtli. mitoaya, itoyok itokayokan tlakatekkan. in kwowit sesek. ta achto xikalaki wan tel tomotsohtsowitekis yewantin i in achto tlalmasewke in achto onoka in tepetlikpak tlamasewtinenka. aw in nanakatl neokyo in kikwaya. in intech kisa in nanakatl in onkan mihtotia onkan choka. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. —a'mo de dios ahmo. se itoka oxomoko, tlahko xonakatl in ahmo wel wehyi tlasohtlaskia por parte de nehin tiempo. ini temoan tomin in lisiana kinye kiwikak inokomadre kitemowa porke ahmo onka nian nian tlen kipia yolkame niantlin ahmo kipia' nia ichan ahmo kipia' pero san inewan toton. maninemi aw iwan ya yepowalxiwitl ipan se xiwitl in ipan 4 tekpatl xiwitl, 1548 años, in omomikili don frai hwan de sumáraga obispo katka mexiko, in teoyotika tlahtokat tenochtitlan wel ixkichkaw senpowalxiwitl ipan se xiwitl. itlanahnamik: aw san ik onkis in paskwa rresuresión, san ye ipan ye itlamian in metstli abril nikwel omentin sant fransisko padreme mowikake in yankwik mexiko, kinmowikilike 20 suldadosme, ikwak mochi ya in ixkich ompa monekis: in kartilas kimomachtiske ompa tlaka, iwan ya kornedas chirimías sakapoch iwan se órgano iwan kampanas, iwan istak amatl klavos iwan oksekitlamantli in ompa monekis; moch ya iwan keskintin kinwikake offisialesme in tolteka in kinmachtiske ompa tlaka in ika iskitlamantli tekitl. aw in iknawkan [sic] ka ye in kitowa egipto, aw masiwi in san tepitsin ka oksenka ye kwalkan yekkan in ipan inik senka tlamochiwyan senka tlaselia, ka ye iw kichiwa in iyayo in itlaawililis atoyatl in motenewa nilo; aw yewatl ipan in in katki in wei altepetl in motenewa gran siudad del kairo, ka in ok ye wekaw katka kitokayotiaya babilonia, ka oksenka yewatl in wei tachkaw oksenka tlapanawia inik nowian semanawak. in ipan axkan semilwitl hweves a9 dias del mes de henero de 1566, in tewantin alkaldes don pedro dionisio, toribio vaskes in tikpia hustisia in ipanpatsinko su magestad in axkan audiensia otikakitiloke se tlakatl mokokowa kitlali itestamento ompa tikimoniwa algwasil hwan kwetli iwan eskribano kristoval de sank matheo kontlalnamiktiske inik mosenkawas. kwaltia iwan mitoa in ipan hin se koatl senka kikwalittaya in puchteka in ostomeka in iake in nenemini in veka kalakini in tonalpan katka in tlapoalpan yewatl kitstivia um pewaya in weka. pedro hernandes iwan nonamik maria barbola iwan hwan peres nikan tichaneke santiago tlatilulko itech tipowi tlaxilakali santa ana kwepopan niknomachilistika amixpantsinko tinesi in antotekwioan antlatoke tewatsin hwes governador iwan amewantsitsin alkaldes ordinarios in ikatsinko rei nwestro señor ma xitechmokakilikan in toknotlatol inik nikan amixpantsinko tinesi in tewantin tamoknomasewaltsitsinwan ka tosenyolokakopa inik tiknamaka tokal totlanekilistika ayak ma aka techkwitlawiltia aw ompa mani in ipan tlaxilakali sankta ana kwepopan. aw iskate in i mochintin walake, in ittawan walmochiwtiake in ikse itoka chikawastli, in ikome itoka teotlama xiwtlapoka, in ik-ei itoka nexewak, in iknawi itoka chalotl, in ikmakwili itoka tsiwaktli, in ikchikwasen itoka matlalkowatl; yewantin in in kiwalwikatiake in ekatsin chichimekatewktli, in ittawan walmochiwtiake. nochi in tataman pahpata se kikwa. "ombre hwanito nimitschiya". nitlalia in desayuno para nomochachitos nikinkahsilis xkwalakan ixos. aw in oyuh motlali inin altepetl amakemekan chalko, in satepan senka wei in itenyo in iwitsyo in iyawayo in itekwanyo omochiw. aw e walmotlalia in akamapich makwilakatl xiwitl ipan i motlali; sa mexika in ipiltsin in akamapich. in kikwaliah tein ixiuyo selik, in komalko kixkah wan kikuaj. ix tekpatl xiwitl, 1488. "ca inikein mexicah, amo tlakah san tekwanime". . niman ye ompa in tonatiw ikisaya mihtowaya tlapkopa nawpa in kontlasa iesso. kokotsin, tepitsin, konetsin, nochpuchtsin. ka otokonmokwili, ka otokonmanili in ihiyotsin in mokonetsin in tlakatl in motekuyotsin. ihkwak motlahtokatlali in don thomás de sant martín ketsalmakatsin; yewatl kitlahtokatlali in markés, ihkwak ya kastila. in ipan in iknawxiwitl in atle mochiw kwaloni. inin ipiltsin katka in hwan de sausedo mestiso konkistador, aw in ikal moch itech opow in iteikkaw ihermano migwel lópes. xiii pregon.- a veinte dias del mes de hebrero de mil e kiniento e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in ipan tlaxilakali kopolko okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal in itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak tlanankili testigo hwan garsia. ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. se kilo bisté wan ya kitemo wehweyi kwawitl para kiteike nopa in mistoton awnoso chichimeh aw in teopixkatlahtoke in inpantsinko omochiw omomamal teokali frai pedro de pila konmissario, frai bonaventura de paredes provinsial, frai pedro de la krus gwardián, frai fransisko de ganboa gwardián sant joseph, frai hwan de torkemada temachtiani, iwan frai fransisko hormendia presidente; yewantin in in imixpantsinko mochiw inik mochali teokali. pehki kichichiti. yuh semilwitl in tlatsitsilikak sant augustín inik pahpakowak. no achtotipa impan tlatlakah inin omomat: otsinnehnemoa-ya inik kalakia ihtik in temaskali (ihcuac inin yankwik), kimmach intla ahmo yuhki kalakoas mikoaskiani. onkak ome taman: seki mochiwa weweyak wan seki ohololtik. nima ye kiwikats, imatitech kona; niman i komitik in konkechkoto in kopil, konkwili in itsonteko yoan in iyolo i xikipilko kontlali. tlen 21 tlanawatihkayotl. nochi tlahtlakoltemolistli ki chiwas tekiweh kan yon on mo tlatelwiya iwan in topilwa, nochimeh in teki kichiwase iwan ki seliseh tlen yeineh tlah yainoh iteki. tlen temaktilis ke tla amo in iixpa tekiweme tlen tetlatsakwiltise elis san tekiwe kan yon on motlatelwiya. amatlanawatili kiihtos kemanke weliseh akinweli ikaya temaktilis iixpa tekiweme tlen tetlatsakwiltise. tlen tetlatsakwiltis, welis kiolinis iwan kiihtos keski tlaxtlawas san welis kiihtos tekiwemeh tlen tetlatsakwiltise. itechpowi tekiwa tlen tekitihkayotl kitlalis tlatsakwiltilistli tlen tlahtlakoli tlanawatilme iwan tlen tlamokwitlawiani, nochi yewan san tomin tlatsakwiltilistli noso tlailpiltilistli amo kipanos sempoali mahtlaktli iwan chikwaseh kawitl ke tla tekitis kin palewis iwampoyowa; tla tlahtlakohketl amo kitlaxtlawas tlen kixkawiliah tlahtlakoli, mopatlas tomin tlaxtlawili ika tlatsaktli, tlen amo kipanos sempoali matlaktli iwan chikwase kawitl. tla nompa tlaixpanotok amatlanawatili tlen tlanawatia in waya tlamokwitlawianih eli tlahtlakoani san miltekitiketl, tekichiwani noso tekitiketl, amo welis motlatsakwiltis ika tomin kipanos tlen kitlani ipan se tonatih. keman intechmotlalis kwesoli tekitini tlen amo tomintlani, tlatsakwiltilistli kitlalise pampa tlaixpanotok amatlanawatili tlen tlanawatia in waya tlamokwitlawianih eli amo mo neki panos tlen kitlani se tonal iteki. tekiweh kanih onmo tlateilhwiya welis kitlachilis sekinok ohtli ki tekiwis kema kiwikas tlahtlakohketl iixpan tekiwe, nochi ichihkayo iwan kitlachilis tlen kineki tlanawatilistli. in tekichiwani tlen sentlanawatiloyan welis, ika itlahtoltemaktilis tlen wehkapa tlahtokan, se iwan se tlamantli, kikwalitas itlanawatihkayo tlen semanawak tlatsakwiltilistli tlanawatiloyan. in nelkwali altepeyotl nemilistli imako tlen sentlanawatiloyan, iyolo weyi altepetl, tlatlanawatilme iwan altepetlalme, kin sehkotilia amo matlahtlakolchiwaka; tlahtlakoltehtemolistli iwan kitokilise se tlahtlakoli ixkiska quitlatsacuiltiseh, nohkia tlen san kiixpanos sekinok amatlanawatili, san ke kiihtowa amatlanawatilistli inixkotia kampa yewan tlanawatia ken moixnextia ipan amatlanawatili. in tekichiwalis tlen kaltlanawatilmeh tlamokwitlawianih tlen nelkwali altepeyotl nemilistli monawatiseh ika ohtli tlen melawak, tlen moneltoka, kwali tekichiwali, neltekichiwali, kwali nemilistli iwan kitlepanitaseh nochi tlen moneki kipiaseh nochimeh tlakameh tlen kinemilia ni weyi amatlanawatili. in tekichiwalis tlen kaltlanawatilmeh tlamokwitlawinih elis in tekiwa tlahtol altepechantli, mo nechikoseh in tlanawatil iwan neltekichiwali. tekiweh kanih on mo tlatelhwiyah iwan in tekichiwalis tlen tlamokwitlawianih tlen eyi iwehkapanka tlanawatilmeh mopalewise san sehko iwan ihkino kwali tlamokwitlawise nochi ni altepetl iwan kichiwase tsontekomitl tlen weyi altepetl ika tlamokwitlawise, yainih pewas mo tlatskilihtos ipan ni tlanawatili a) ki mokwitlawise kenihki calaquiseh, tomin, kin machtiseh, mamokawaka, kin patiyoseh, kin kwalitaseh iwan kin makase inin ama tlen kalaktokehya altepetl kimokwitlawise. inin tekitihkayotl iwan innemilis tle nitlemach tekitl ki chiwase tlen sentlanawatiloyan, iyolo weyi altepetl, tlaltlanawatilme iwan altepetlalme san tlen yainoh inteki. b) ki chiwase se tlahkwiloli kani ixnesis tlahtlakolchiwanih iwan tlen tekitini ipan in tlanawatil ki mokwitlawise altepetl. amo kalakis se akah ipan ni tlanawatil ki mokwitlawiseh altepetl tla ax kimakatokeh imah iwan amo moihkwilohtok pan ni weyi amatsontekomitl. k) ki titlanise tlahtoli ki tekiwiseh tlen ika kitlanawatil ki mokwitlawiseh altepetl iwan ihkino ayok ma tlahtlakolchiwaka. d) ki ihtose kema tepalewiseh tlen nompaya incha, iwan kimilwiko in ititlawa in akolwaka tekokoltsi, konilwia “ca tekwaliwa in tlakatl i kowakatl in tekokoltsi, ka komiltalwia ‘tla kikakika i mexika i tlatilolka a e i tonewa a e chichinaka in iyolo, in inakayo motolinia; aw sano iwi newatl a otonewak a ochichinakak i noyolo. aw in okonchiwke in inkal mexika, niman noseppa okimilwi in kwawtlix in mexika "ximoteocaltican, tamechmakaske in iyolo yes"; aw niman okipewaltike in inteokal mexika. aw is nele axkan, tlakatle totekuyoe yowale, ehekatle, moyokoyatsine, titlakawane ¿ ken kineki in moyolotsin, kesin toconmonênequiltia? ¿cuix ye otikmomakawili in mokwitlapil, in matlapal?, ¿cuix ye ixkich, kwix ye iwki, kwix sa yas?, ¿cuix sa poliwis, in masewali, kwix tlamis in tlatkitl, in tlamamali?, ¿cuix kawtimanis, kwix yowaltimanis in atl, in tepetl: kwix aokkan yes? ¿ kwix kwappachiwis, kwix tetemis, in moknoaw, in motepew: aw in mochiyaloka in motetel, in motsakwal imanka, kwix xinis, kwix moyawas? tel ka chalchiwitl ii tekpatl xiwitl, 1208. miak tlakah yomohkamikeh ika tlatlatskweponi. lahmo kimiktiske in lechonwan. axkan sábado in ik 19 mani metstli abril de 1614 años, ihkwak nikan mexiko ome kapítulo kichiwke in sant augustín teopixke in ikse kapítulo onkan kichiwke in inteopan sant augustín, yewatl onkan kitlalike provinsial mochiw in padre maestro frai fransisko muñus, inin nikan powki tlapachos ipan provinsia mexiko in ipan ixkich itlatititsal muchiwtok; aw in ikome kapítulo mochiw onkan in teopan kolegio san pablo, no onkan okse provinsial kitlalike ompa powki umpa || 247 itlapachol mochiwa in ipan ikome provinsia kipia michwakan, ka umpa walake inin teopixke san pablo okichiwako kapítulo itenkopatsinko tlahtowani visurrei don diego fernándes de kórdova markés iwan audiensia real tlaka tlahtoke oidores, ipampa senka mochalaniaya in teopixke in ompa tlaka ipan omotenew provinsia michwakan. —para ayatoto. titahyowi. pewa 27 (uaujkilit) wan tami 55 (uitsti) : eleuterio salasar. istatl, ixkich in monekis ihkwak tlalpoloke in mexika in tekwantepek iwan amaxtlan. ¿o aik in xopan kichiwa?, nikan san ninotolinia, san ye ni kwakwawtsin, ha tamonawiyaske, ha tawelamatiske, tokniwan. ¿ca nikkwis in yektla xochitli, in yektli yan kwikatl? yotlachipawak. . ka ok ye nokontlalkawia in amaxochtsin in amotlaxilakaltsin aw in amatsin in amotepetsin. grimm iknihtin axkan lunes in ik 4 mani metstli agosto de 1614 años, ihkwak wel ipan ilwitsin sankto domingo, in owalatwik omomikili in doña augustina de gusmán siwapili kuyowakan in inamik don konstantino chakali michwakan tlahtowani. tak sesek. ixwa isemila. para motequipanozqueh. itlatlahko xiwitl mokwitia ichikwasenmetspa xiwitl. aw sanno ipan in in omotenew lunes sankto, no ihkwak teotlak yankwikan tlayawaloke in tlakanechikoltin in onkan okitlalike yankwik inkofradía in hospital san lásaro atenantitech in itetsinko powi san roche; kalaki tonatiw in kiske san okkeskintin, iglesia mayor ahsiko inik tlayawaloke. kema kiihtohki ichpokero san muchintin walmoyakapachotiake istak kanaok ika kintlayeltiaia in mimikke in ye iyaia, in ye potoni. muchintin walakxipanwitiake, kiwalkiatskitiake. aw inin achto audiensia omito in otlapacho in ogovernadortik yexiwitl, ixkichika inik asiko yewatl ipan xiwitl de 1530 aw yuh itlawelitaltsin yuh kimonekilti in toweitlahtokaw kinmokixtili mochintin in katka oidoresme, aw niman okinwalmotitlani in inyeyampa oksentlamantin, ma iw momati yewatl in lisesiado vasko de kiroga, iwan yewatl in lisesiado alonso maldonado, iwan yewatl in lisesiado fransisko sainos fiskal del konseho supremo, iwan yewatl in lisesiado hwan de salmerón, iwan presidente mochiw in onkan audiensia in ipan tepacholistli in governasió inik nowian ipan in nweva españa in yewatsin don sebastián ramíres de fwenleal obispo in ompa sankto domingo aihtik. akinakin in xiwit sesek. . "ca is katki o nech momakili in totekuyo itlachiwaltsin iaxkatsin: ah ka so ok wel ninemi? aso ye nitlawelilokati aso teixko teikpak ninemi? yuh titlanawatia in ipaltsinko su magestad ik nikan tiktlalia in tofirma don lwis de santa maria don lukas kortes alkalde tomas de akino alkalde paso ante mi migwel de los angeles eskribano. aw in masewaltin intoka katka xochteka olmeka kiyawisteka kokolka nawtlamantin; aw senka tlaweliloke katka tekwannawaleke kiyawnawaleke tekwanime katka. monamaka itakka; ixiuyo no monamaka, pero solo komo tetekouiliaj. ipan in tlakat in wewe tesosomoktli askapotsalko. axkan viernes ik 22 mani metstli mayo de 1609 años, ikwak nikan mexiko onmopewalti inik mowikak españa in yewatsin visitador lisensiado diego lanteras i veláskes, in visita nikan kimochiwiliko onxiwitl ipan tlako xiwitl. iwan in popokatetepe, oktepitsin istatl, ixkich in monekis onkán yeka moparkas ka totonki ati. kiitah kiwalika sintli onkak ome taman: se taman eliwis wewehkapan moskaltia, in ikwouyo ahahcholtik wan mapapatawak. wan se taman mochiwa pihpisiltik wan tepitsin mososowa. onkak tein kwali wan tein simarrón. iii akatl xiwitl, 767 años. tlasohkamati wel miak, amonimayana. yalwa ika yowalpa awel onikoch iwan semi okwalkan onimen. —maske pero lá ohkión mikmochiwililia lisian ximonakas wilanili. tsikataol no kwaltia pahti, se kipayana in taol wan se kiketsa kalah mah kimaka in sereno ika se kaxahpas se kipanoltia ika xalasoh wan se tayi okyowa. keman tenamikis ya amo se tayis ok. in tayi akin amo weli moxixa, komo amo kahsih in masaowat, yehwa ya tsikatsin kikuechouaj. seki kihtowah sesek wan seki kihtowah totonik. aw in omotenew in teokwitlapanitl omeka ipan kinamik in markés kwawsesewitsin inik asiko. . kitoaya "ma tewika in telpuchtontli in kwautla in sakatla in teniyokan in tokayekan, okonmihtalwi motahtsin. nepa noponi ahsito. xipohlimah onkán yemokawan pakyotl yeyititiwa onkán de yeka mopehpena. "bueno, wan ta tlaskamati para ya ta xa itech hueyoh, komo se kineki se kikwas kokok, se kikwecholia chil wan xitomat wan se kikwa ya ika taxkal. aw in ikome ichpochwan migwel de san mateo tikomekatltewktli se inantsin itoka maría, inin okimonamikti in hwan chrisóstomo kastro tekwanipan chane. in asito ipan in in omotenew ome kali xiwitl in tenochtitlan, onkan ixwatikaka in tenochtli ikpak moketstikak in kwawtli onkan tlakwa, in ipan asiko inik motokayotia in axkan tenochtitlan kwahtliitlakwayan. chalchiwtetsilakatli ihkakawa, xochiayawak kiyawitl on kistok in tlaltikpak. ninokawa,¡ah notecu!ah nikitowa ma niyaw, ma ninokimilolo, ni kwikanitli, ma iwi. aw inik ye nemi nikan || 126v in ihkwak in ye yuh nepa ye matlaktlomei xiwitl inik walew in ompa atenko in ipan chiwknawi akatl xiwitl; aw inik ye onkan tsakwaltitlan tenanko inik motlakatekolokalti, aw inik tlemamal san kinamikti matlaktlomei xiwitl, inik wel mitowa in matlaktlomei akatl xiwitl. pedro. quinotzah, quitemoah, tla xi walmowika tlamakaski se atl itonal. ka ye axkan oyekoke tlamakaske. axkan nikkawako tlamakaski 5.tlazopilli chikomekoatl. ika nehon taltikpaktsin, 51. ye tikkwitiwetsis immalakatl, in tsotsopastli, iwan in atl, immetlatl, iwan immolkaxitl, in chikiwitl; ahmo san timomamaitkities, ahmo moma mopantetemis. aw in ihkwak in akin tikmonamiktis in kwawtli, in oselotl, ahmo ixko, ahmo ikpak tinemis. in ihkwak tlein michiwalanis, in mitstekiwtis, in tlein mitsnawatis, niman wel tiktlakamatis, tikpakkakakis in itlahtol, ahmo niman tikkwalankanamikis, ahmo niman tixtomawas, ahmo tikkwekwepilis, ahmo iwik timilakatsos. intla itla ik mitstolinia, ahmo no onkan tikilnamikilis, ahmo ik tikmoxiktis, ik timotlanektis intla iknotlakatl. onkak eyi taman: kostikpesma, yawipesma wan istakpesma. hwebes a xii de oktubre, ikwak mopits ye yowa in kampana sant joseph, español in kichiw, yewatl in wei kampana sant josepeh, ipan motlatolti frai gerónimo de sárate. ye nonisiximatin chalchiwitl,ya in makistli... nikan ipan in motlahtokatlali in popokatsin atlawtekatltewktli tlahtowani atlawtlan tenanko, inin san kwawpili; aw ikwak tlakat in ipan in xiwitl in ipiltsin in itoka kakamatltewktli xokoyotl. newa onik ihkwilwi nomaiknin sente amatl. aw ka yuhkih in inik tekimakoke altepetlipan tlahtoke. . "totecu e, otikmosiawilti, otik mihiyowilti ka aokmo timaxitis in ompa timowika, ya ye itlalpan in tlakatl in tetsawitl witsilopuchtli; tehwa tikmattok kwali kani mokawak, kiniontlamaka nopa inikni tlen ne san 100r ... in ikwak tenawati tonatiw ye ilpitok motekusoma yoan in tlatilulko itskwawtsi tlakuchkalkatl. kwaltia in xiwit. tlatlanilok ken kimati in iyolo in itechpan inik moteilwia ana papan iwan marina susana iwan balbora marina iwan mensia marta kwix neli in kinkwilia in ikal iwan in intlalma kito ka inik nikmati in tlale kale katka [f. 114r.] itoka chimaltsin ixochimakaw katka in moteuksomatsin aw in momikili ayamo walwi in españoles. in ipan in ayak tlahtowani katka in atlawtlan tenanko. no totonik. aw niman kinnonotsato in kulwakan pipiltin tlahtoke kimilwike ka otikimanke in mexika pipiltin otikanke in witsiliwitsin in intlahtokaw mexika iwan in iweltiw iwan tetskakowakatl iwan simantson aw niman yahke tlanonotsato in mexika ompa kalakke in kulwakan aw niman kihtoke in tlahtoke in ihkwak otlanonotsato in tenuchtlenamakae ka ye kwali makamo mikikan in mexika ma impan walasiti in imikniwan aw in ihkwak okimatke in mexika amosiske san kihtoke ka monisiakatisatl iwitl amatl in ipan otechiw iwitsilopochtli ka otlenamakak ka tiktekako in tlachtli in patoli ka kisatiwi i noso i tixkwamol in totentsonwan in isti i noxwiwan in kisatiwi in kitotiwi intla ok kisatiw in tesyo in ihkwak tlayowali mochiwatiw in kulwakan aw inin masentetsintlipatsin tlixitechmomakili ¡ ma amotsin, ya xontlasakan! xochipili ikwik ome axoxtlantli inihwanti sintokah wan sintokah ikwak kimikti; aw chiwknawxiwitl in ipanpa tlahtokat in inantsin in kowasakatsin in amakemekan in iwan kowatsintewktli mamalwasokan ichan. maximotlalikan, inantekiwahke, amiyahke, maitlekax ipan anwalcholotin, anmotlatiske, ika awetsi i chikwakol in amokolton in axayaka. aw san chikwasentetl metstli in onmonek akali in nabío inik achto neska, nekokkampa ik tepanawiloya; in nikan onewaya mexiko tlaka ik onpanawiloya inik ompa wia in tetskoko, aw in ompa tetskoko ompa || 53 ik waltepanawiloya in ompa walewaya tetskoko tlaka ik wel walpanawiloya inik nikan walwia mexiko, inik yewatl ika amo wekaw panoloya in akali. otlan in tenochtitlan para mah moskalti, ikwak kimokawilike sant fransisko teopixke, in ompa missa konmitalwiaya. el lisensiado aler de vilagómes 7 —yehuantin wel neltik in itlatol in umpa tlachixke in umpa mapiloke. yuh kitoa yewantin in umpa tlachixke ketsalkoatl, ik ontetl itoka ehekatl, iwan totek, anoso anawatl itecu, iwan tlatlawikteskatlipoka, no yewantin in motenewa mimixkoa, in amo san tlapoaltin, iwan siwa nawin: tiakapan, teicu, tlakoyewa, xokoyotl. inwaxka. in ipan lunes a xx de mayo de 1596 años, inik omochiw tlayawalolistli in ipanpa inetlekawilistsin totekwiyo dios; amo onkan wilowatsa in sant fransisko, ye ompa wilowak trinidad iwan in sant augustín, aw in ikomilwitl martes de la kassa provesa teatinos korte kiyawak katka in wilowaya. aw inik wala tlahtoli ipampa inik wel omaxitiko in ihtik altepetl; aw in ikwak ohasiko tlahtoli nikan mexiko senka papakowak iwan tlayawalolok in iglesia mayor. aw in tlalmanalko in tlapiaya in iwki tlahtokapowia itoka xaltemoktsin tlakwilotewktli, in ikome itoka yaotentsin. mochiwa mas kampa amo tameuaj,in kajfentaj, yek tetehko itech in kahfen. elki yahki para ya kwali kamati aw no iwan in ipan in omotenew viernes sankto yowatsinko, ihkwak ikopah otlayawaloke in sanktiago tlatilolko tlaka kofrades in itetsinko powi totlasonantsin imikilitsin motenewa nwestra señora trásito; onkan kimowikilitiake andastika mowetsiltihtiw, ipan chikome tsilini. in a iskixochitl, kakawasochitl ma onnemahmako. kiwalnextiliah noponi xochitl ne ichpokero para aw inik tlamiktiko inik polakiko weyapan, san ik kotoniko ipampa in tepanawiaya; amo wekaw in onmonek in nabío, ininn iaxka katka in don hwan de alvarado governador tetskoko. ihwanti ma kikamowika ichpokero. kwalika. ipan inon teposihpotokalmimilol mostla tiquizazqueh. xkineskayotili nopilwan. in xiuhamatl, in xippoali in temikamatl, ipan makwili akatl xiwitl (1991) george bush, wei tlahtoani ompa tlatlahtokayopan in sepanka, kiyaochiwa saddam hussein, wei itlahtokaw mesopotamianiwan kipoloa babilonaltepetl. nin pero yehwa lola okikaw. kiitak noha elki. sábado a xxvii de noviembre de mil 604 años, ikwak motamachiw in atl in nikan awatsalpan motenewa; mekatika mopow, kiyomawiko nawatlahtoke hwan grande, fransisko de leiba, iwan mexiko tenochtitlan governador don herónimo lópes mestiso iwan alkaldesme, iwan tlatilolko governador don hwan baptista iwan alkaldesme, iwan chinampaneka kulwake, xochmilka, kwitlawaka, miskika; inik motamachiw ipampa atenamitl motekak. amo niah nikohkolis. mah amo ehekawilo, aw inin omotenew wei tlahtowani motewksuma onkatka omentin ipilwan; aw in ihkwak ye momikilis niman ye kintlahtokatlalia in omotenewke omentin ipilwan. kwaltia . aw in ik katka in puchtekatlahtoke in intekiw mochiwaya wel yewatl in tiankistli kimokwitlawiaya ipan tlahtowaya in masewali in ik ayak tolinilos xihxikolos ika nekahkayawalos miktilos. pero temowti in len tipanoke axan inikankatki in rebolúsion akmo itla' wik axan yehwan yotlapatiowak ikan del tokomersio yepatiyo. makwili elotl aw in nikan mexiko in iskitetl wewei teopankali ihtik, in sankto domingo senka molonia meyaya, senka tentimoma in ihtik atl; aokak || 54 wel onkalakia iwan aokmo wel missa onkan mochiwaya, ipampa wel yuh mitos ka sa tlakasitimania in atl itlakapan in teokali; ik kimokixtilike in sanktíssimo sakramento, aw sa onkan klaustro in mochiwaya missa. okito in testigo ka wel melaoak in nikitowa ka wel axkaoa katka in itoka hwan kwawtsetseltsin aw ka nixpan in kinamak kikowili in angelina de la krus kimakak makwili peso. aw in tepetl yuhki .... || pus igwál ohkion ayatilaktli mokawanihki tomaktik in ayatilaktli. tewan otikmankeh se kwali kali in ixtlawapa. aw sa niman no ikwak in ipan semilwitl iwan xiwitl in omotenew tlakpak niman owalake in testigos. iwan nikitowa oksekni mani tlali iswatepek akatlyakapan inik wiak xxx aw inik patlawak xx in i nikmaka in fransisko garsia. ii akatl xiwitl, 987. ompa motemachtili in totatsin frai helías de sant hwan baptista kalme totatsin; inin mochiw inik tlayawalolok ipampa kokolistli, inik moyolsewitsinos totekwiyo dios iwan yewatsin in tlasosiwapili sankta maría. tlen 4 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlakatl iwan siwatl seha inpatih ipan tlahtol tlanawatili. inin amatlahtol tlanawatili tlapalewis mamokwaltlali iwan mamoyolchikawa chantli. nochi tlakameh iwan siwameh intechpowi kimatiseh iwan welis kiihtoseh keskih konemeh kineki kinpiaseh iwan tla ehechka noso wehkawas tlacatiseh. nochi tlakameh iwan siwameh intechpowi kinmanawiseh ika kokolistli. in tlahtol tlanawatili kiixtlalis tlahtolpamitl iwikpa moselis tekitlapahtikayotl iwan kiihtos kenihki mopalewiseh sentlanawatiloyan iwan nochi tlaltlanawatilmeh ipan nochi tlapatihkayotl, ken moihtowa ipan xvi tlatlapantli tlahtoli tlen 73 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili. nochi tlakameh iwan siwameh intechpowi kinialiseh kwali tlaltipaktli iwikpa welis moyolchikawaseh iwan nelkwali chanchihuaseh. nochi chantli itechpowi kipias nelkwali iwan kwakwaltsin kali. in tlahtol tlanawatili kiixtlalis tlatekiwili iwan tlapalewili tlen ika welis mochiwas inin tlanekilistli. in okichpilmeh iwan siwapilmeh intechpowi kipiakipia tlakwalistli, kwali tlakayonemilistli, tlamachtilistli iwan kwali tlahtlalkawalistli tlen ika kwali moscaltiseh. in tatawan iwan konetlapalewianih kipiah tlanawatili kitlachiliseh melawak mochiwas inin tlatechpowilistli. in kaltlanawatiloyan tlapalewis tlen ika monekis iwikpa mamotlakaitakah konemeh iwan makiasikamatikah tlen intechpowi. in kaltlanawatiloyan amo kin owi makas tlapianih iwikpa welis tlapalewiseh mamochiwa tlatechpowilsitli tlen conemeh. nochimeh tlakameh ki piah in tlatechpowili ika ki pias tlaiyokalistli wan yolpaktos ika nochi tlen te tlanehtia se altepetl ipan ni tlamantli, nohkía weli ki chiwas nochi tlen amatlayakantli tlaiyokalistli. nopa altepetl ki ixnextis ipan tlemas ohtli welis ma ki ixmatikah wan ma mo xoyawa in tlaiyokalistli, mo neki ki tlepanitaseh nochi tlen ihiyoka ki tlamatilistli tlen no ixnextia tlemach ipan wan ki yoltiah kin tlepanitaseh in nemilis. amatlanawatili ki ihtos kenihkatsah elis ohtli tlen ika nelia nochi weliseh ki chiwaseh ipan in tlaiyokalistli. "na nisenkawas", kiilwi, "ni kani modetenero, sente noknin weyak ipantalon maakia iwan oksente amo weyak maakia. inik 5 tlamantli nikitohoa nikpieliya ikakawaoh magdalena sa nikan chane tlatilko 2 pesos yoan 6 tomines moxtlawas itech kisas in tla omonamakak notlal xokomekatla. achiwanime. aw in tisaapan kulwakan inik ompa onoka in mexika senpowalxiwtike onmakwili. miak otik yekitayah noso se tonali oixpolo. in ikwouyo amo kwaltia para kalkwowit, solo para kwoutatil. in tlachinolxochitl, chimalxochitl,onkwepontok. nimitsnotlasohkamatilis xinechmomakili de teskatekomatl chichiwalatl. in ixwa, pewa mowilana wan xochiyojtiuj, paxiini xochit, mochiwa ya in ayojkonemej. iuki kitokaitiah por in ihwak se kiki xtilia in iewayo wan pewa se kikwa mokaujtiuj itech iteyo pané seki tsonti. mosoa mosoas para n tilawis, tlahmo ohkion, ken otitlatwik nonantsin. nikan tinechpia. aw itla yuhki on epowali ipan se xiwitl in okinyakan mexika;
