aw yese wel neltilistli in ihkwak in ye iw nepa senpowali ipan se xiwitl omomikili in toskwekwextli, aw ye no ixkichkaw tlahtokati in wewe witsiliwitl senpowali ipan se witl in achto intlatokaw mexika. don hwan bawtista de gauña, governador inik omotamachiw in tlali inik wiyak matlaktli maitl aw inik patlawak matlaktli onse maitl aw in ipan ikak in kali sentetl xochimilkopa itstikak in itepots yematl ipan senmitl aw in inakas nanmatl ipan semomitl aw in ichinanyo nawtetl tonatiw ikisayanpa itstitemi inik wiwiyak matlatlaktli maitl. kiwalwike in tlatoke “ca ye kwali, tla xiwia. onkán yeka nayatl la tilma’tli mopochinas in ichkatl mopaka mopochina mokawa. in nes ye tlatla in tlaketsali. in itek, walkisa in tlemiyawatl, in tlenenepili, in tlekwesalotl. xiii akatl, 1583 años. inin sa wel oqu isel i wala in tsiwtlakawki in yaopol; oyuh ye se xiwitl ipan tlakoxiwitl wala in tsiwtlakawki, in kikaso in itawan itoka kwawkes iwan estekon. chiltaxkal entonses owahsiko oksé lado se distansia. in seki kitokah wan seki mochiwa saj, kampa kitamota iteyo no ixwa.newín paratani ixwa sah in isemila, pos ta ichayohkan. axkan sábado in ik 14 mani metstli de febrero de 1615 años, ihkwak oseppayaw in intech nowiyan tetepe, in istaktepetl itech iwan itech popokatepetl, iwan itech tepetl itoka silkwaye in ayotsinko nepa katki chalko, iwan itech ketsaltepetl in tetskukopa katki. se wei yepasohkilmaitl istatl, ixkich in monekis timikini in xiwit. sasanili iwan ihtoloka vi tekpatl xiwitl, 1212. okse ometeotl ikwik sábado ik xxiiii mani metstli de marso de 1601 años in ikrustsin temakixtiani ompa wala sankto domingo, onkan kimokechiliko in kwawtlapechtikpak in onkan teittitiloke in tlateotokani in atlaneltokani; ixkichtin ompa senkiske in teopixke inik chikwetetl hórdenes, walmotekpantsinotiake inik kimanilito sankta krus, teopixke kiwalmonapalwitiake iwan sesario ik kiwalmopopochwilitiake in krus. ka yuh kitowa, anepantla aitik in onoya in ompa walake, san ok nawkalpoltin in achto in ompa onoya asteka in ikse kalpoli itoka tlakatekko, in ikome kalpoli itoka tlakochkalko, in ik-ei kalpoli itoka kalpilko, in iknawi kalpoli itoka tolnawak; inin ome kalpoli satepa poliwiko in itoka. ipan ome kali xiwitl (1689) sor hwana inés de la krus kipanitlasa iamox in motokayotia "castalida tlaatemilistli". yewatl wel wei in nawali okikwepato ompam sipiapam niwintia ya,iwintia noyolo nitlayokoya para ya moilwi tlatlahka ka in iksekkan katki onkan san iksen netechantikate in europa, in onkan tlakamacho wei tlahtowani in motenewa inik kinotsa gran duke in itokayokan moskovia. nimewa nehwatl. iteyo kwaltia no se kikwa iwan tapalol, komo pionakat se kikwecholia, achto se kitewatsa. wan se kipihpixka wan kemah se kikwechowa ya wan se kipantalilia ya in pionakat. no kwali se kikwa iuki tatewats saj. aw in ye ohtlatoka in ye yaw painalton niman ye ik kinwika in tlaaltiltin onkan ki wal namikia in tlaamawiaya innakastlan kowatlan onkan momanaya in tewitwalko. in iuki kitokaitiah por in itakka kwaltsin, pané koskat chihchichiltik wan ohololtik. .yoa ichan yoa ichan. ostomekatl ayave ostomekatl xochiketsal kimama on tlatoa cholola o ye mavi noyol tein kwali, amo kachi onkak, sayoh kampa kitokaj. —don kulo (julio itokatsin in nakanamakak), onechmolwili nonantsin kimmach tinechmomakilis ikechkwawyo. no kipehki ahachi ahachi kintlalili mochiwa milah wan kampa tetaj. "axkana amo xinechkwase para axkana ikaya para atol se kiteki in kapolin oksik, se kiwalkwi, kipatah wan kinelowah iwan tixti, kitsopeliah wan kimanaj. aw in omotenewin, inik otlipan kiwalmowikilike inik walayawalolotia, ka makwilkan in otlipan kitlalika kwawtlapechtli túmulo in ipan kimosesewilitiake inakayotsin mikkatsintli arsobispo, iskikan onkan responsos ipantsinko kihtoke || 177 in kapila tlaka klérigos. tlakwaka axkan viernes in ik 28 mani metstli de disienbre de 1612 años, in iknawilwitl paskwa navidad, in itlakatilitsin totekwiyo hesuchristo, wel ipan ilwitsin pipiltsitsinti sanktos inosentes, ihkwak omakoke eskabulario iwan in kapila in motenewa hermanos konbalesientes in kimokwitlawia hospital de los lokos sant ipólito tlalkospan; 12 monetoltike professión kichiwke imak in intiachkaw hermano mayor, ipan missa yowatsinko, ixpantsinko visurrei iwan mochi audiensia real tlaka oidores. axkan sábado ik 29 mani metstli henero de 1611 años, || 139 ihkwak kapítulo mochiw nikan mexiko san fransisko; yewatl provinsial mochiw in padre frai hernando durán kwitlaxkowapan ichan kriyoyo. "para nama axfikawiliah ma yowi ipan baile aw in ipan xiiii desiembre de 1600 años, hwebes, okseppa se kimoskalili piltsintli in sant diego, senka no mawisolok in piltontli in moskali. inik tlanawati ye motataka aotlih, in iw kitowaya in iw momatia wel ompa kitlasaskia, ompa kitstiltitiaskia chimalwakampa in nikan mexikopa waltemo ome seppayawatl. okichiwtiake in utli in nenemilistli in ik okitlamatatakiliake in tloke in nawake in ik ixilan itoskatlan omamamayawtiake. aw in on ad tlaaltiltin ye omosenkawke omoyawchichiwke in tlaamawike. nikan ipan in ikwak kinpewke tsiwkowak tlaka iwan tetsapotitlan tlaka. .ni yoatsin motepeyokpa mits val itta motew (noyol se)viski in tlakatl achtoketl tlakwava aya in yoali, in ehekatl, wel se mawistik tlakatl. ix akatl xiwitl, 1475. neoatl don estevan de gusman hwes de residensia por su magestad yoan tehoantin talkaldesme in nikan siudad de mexiko tixpan ohoala moteilwiko itoka ana nensioatl inamik bartholomen mosikohoa ichan sochimilko. ¿ach ken tlatlaka? ipa se taman saj. 90 aw iwan ye chikwasenpowalxiwitl ipan yexiwitl in ipan vii tochtli xiwitl, 1486 años, in omomikili tlakatl tisosikatsin tlahtowani tenochtitlan, in tlahtokat chikwasen xiwitl; aw san niman ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl motlahtokatlali in tlakatl awitsotsin tlahtowani tenochtitlan. timitsnotlatlahtia xinech momakili inon tomin ka tewatsin onech titlanilihkeh in ik 5 sano siwatsintli itoka atotostli, wikok totomiwaka, yokichwi muchiw tochintewktli. se vii kali xiwitl, 1421. temakixtihkatsin, in kilwiah talxoxompe, tak por in eliwis wewehkapan moskaltia. tehwa nikan nimitstaliti yewantin in in weweintin in asiko tenochtitlan, tewanme asiko in okomentin in itoka xokoyotl iwan tsintlatlawki; ik matlaktlonnawi in asiko chimeka mexika. san ma eli nopa elotl aw intla ka ok tle ikwach in ik kikixtlis ompa popoliwia in inakayo in witskalko. iwi in mochiwaya in ik tlaamawiloya. ma iwian xon yatiw. tle tikmati, nopiltsé? yowali tlawana is. ipan in tlakat domíniga in inamik lukas de kastaneda, kwaresma ipan domíniga de passión. aw inik wel tikneltiliske in in ixkich tlakpak omotenew imak titotlalia in hustisia in ika tonakayo iwan totlatkitika iwan tikinmaka towelitilis in ihweswan totlatokaw su magestad inik kineltiliske in otikchiuke totlatol iwan tikitowa in saso tlein topalewiloka mochiwaskia in ipan omotenew aok wel ik titopalewiske. ipan in in sekintin wewetke kimachiyotia in motlahtokatlali akamapichtli achto tlahtowani tenochtitlan. yeh yewantin in pehpenaloya ahmo san tlahpaltontli in onkan monekia wel yewantin in tekiwake in tiahkawan in okichtin. aw in ikwak oyuh kimasikakakiltike in iewatsin hwes governador iwan alkaldes niman isiwka imatitech konmanilike in mokalkowiani nowian kimonenenemiltilike in ixkich ye mani kali iwan itlalo aw inik mani kali ontekistimani sentetl xochimilkopa itstikak aw ontetl tonatiw ikalakiampa ik omotamachiw matlaktli varas nowianpa ixkich aw nawkampa otlatepacho no nawkampa estagas omomaman. ¡tlenzan tlamawílispan in konstitusión tiankisko! in tlalnantli tekpan. ixkwak kipia omakwilpoali metroh. inin weyi teopan. in teopantli amanteka tlachiwali okachi kwakwaltsin inwikpan inochtin semanawak amerika. itlak in tekpanko okse weyi tekpantli ye okimankeh inik toyekwikak. kema! kikwalnextia in mexihko itokaitl “hueyi altepetl tetecpantla” ka okimotokayoti von humboldt ye axkan makwilpoali xiwitl. in onkan tewktlatoloyan audiensia okimottilike okimokakiltike in itechpa tlali in onpa tlalistakapan inik moteilwia migwel de los angeles iwan fransisko martin iwan ipilwan. para motekipanoskeh nopilwan. nikan nikneki nikitas, aw sanno ipan in in omotenew se tochtli xiwitl in mosetochwike chichimeka akulwake tetskuka, san monetechwike in moyaotlake ipan, ye iw senpowalonchikome xiwitl tlahtokati in tlakatl kihnatsin tlaltekatsin in iknawi tlahtowani tetskuko akulwakan. ka amo onikitak apantli ih tik oniwetsiskia. nochipa xochiyohtok. aw in toskwekwex konan in iichpoch, unkan kitlakatetemikti ik moxtlaw i pantitla ipanpa kokolistli, chikwei kali xiwitl ipa; nawxiwtike in unka. aw niman [i]nic otsatsik okitekakiltin ayak onesiko ihoan ayak motlapalohoan in ma okachi miek kitema in ma kipanawi lx pesos tomines. nia niktekimakas in tekipano man mits walwikili naranhayotl el iwan notlakwal. xikitanepa wits nomaiknin hesús figweroa, ¿ticnequi man timitsixma chilti ? ¿quentamia, hesús? man timitsixmachilti alfredohtsin sánches, se kwali nomaiknin. ma in chalchiuhitl nikmatia, aw in ikopa motlatolti ipan martes; in kimonawatili in atl in ipan in semilwitl inik katka, in ixkich tlaltikpaktli ik tlapachiwtimanka tentimanka ika in atl, san aitik katka in ipa in itlakpa in tlaltikpaktli, aw in ipampa yuhki in katka tlaltikpaktli amo ka wel mochiwaya inemian in tlaltikpak tlaka inik no yeika onkan tlamochiwas onkan tekimakok in mitowa monewa elementos iwan || 5r in ixkich in okseki tlamantli in tlachiwali. aw in tlakochkalka in onmatlakwiliaya in insiwawan, imikanpa in kinmochiliaya in imatlakwiskon; aw in omokwakwawiliaya in inpilwan, imikampa in kimontleminiliaya in inkwawtsin. in axolotl mochipawa iwan kwali mopaka; mokixtilia in ihtik ewa; in chili, tomatl, xonakatl iwan axox mokwakwalatsa, satepan motesi metlapan ahnoso ipan tepustlatsoaloni iwan motsoyonia ipan kaxitl; ihkwak ye kwakwalaka motlalia in axolotl in achto ye omotetek, in chilmoli makahmo sasan tlaayotili, motlalilia istatl. imixpan mochiwan topile diego yaotl pablo kowatepetl pablo apanok iwan ixpan migwel temilotsin iwan imixpan ana teyukchon, hwana teyukcho ana xoko marina papan maria teyukchon ye ixkich aw in ikwak omik xiii mani mayo de 1551 años ik momatis onitlakwilo gaspar de akino santa maria nochan. nika in toli akatl ikoyoka ewaia kimamatiwitse inawatil. kaxtiltlahkwilo in motokayotia "el greko", ipan yei tochtli xiwitl kihkwiloa "itetoquiliz in konde de orgas". ¡cemi kwali! wel nechpaktia anmowan nias. ¿quenin tiaskeh ompa in xochimilko? in nohpali moteteki iwan mowikxitia ika istatl. mowa in elotl. champiñon nanakatl mochipawa iwan moteteki; xonakatl moixtlapana. ipan kaxitl motlalia in olipahchiyawisotl. motlalilia xonakatl, champiñon nanakatl iwan elotlayoli, inin ixkichkaw in ye atik; in nohpali in ye tlawikxitili. in ye tlapaktli, moixika, in yepasohtli in ye senka tletetektli, ye motlalia ipan kaxitl iwan motlalilia istatl iwan ma wiksi. ye ikwak pew in sa kwawtlatolo nikan tlatilulko; yewatin i in okipixke altepetl tlatilulko, in iskitin i mochiwke tlatoke chichitsin tlakatekatl omotlatokalali; in omik walmotlali kisemitowatsin tlakatekatl; in omik walmotlali tlakatekatl; in omik walmotlali tlachkalkatl tlakatekatl; in omik walmotlali totosakatsin tlakatekatl; in omik walmotlali tlakatekatl; in omik walmotlali itskwawtsin; in omik walmotlali tlakochkalkatl; in omik walmotlali teyolkokowatsin; in omik walmotlali tlakochkalkatl; in omik ik onka tlami kwawtlatoke in kipiske altepetl tlatilulko. no ikwak onkan tlaminke in chichimeka, onkan kiminke tlatlawki oselotl; niman onkan sakapechtli onkan kitekake in oselotl, in axkan motokayotia sakapechko. nimitschiwilis". aw i xoxowiltitla, in tepeyakak, ayak mikal, san tikpixke in titlatilulka in otli; in ikwak onasiko imakal san imostlaok kikawke xoloko, omilwitl yekaliwak witsala. inantsin nowan wilowa. 107. iwan in wewentsin, in ilamatsin, iwan in iknotlakatl, in nentlakatl, in ahmo awiya, in ahmo welarnati, in itech ommotkkatinemi in ikwitlaxkoltsin; in vmpa onkistinemi in tekoko, in tetonew, in techichinats. in ahwalnksini in ikochea, in inwkka, iwan in imixtlan ommotekatinemi; in imixayotsin kimatentinemi, in imistitsin kitlankwatinemi, in immatsin kimokoskatitinkmi in tekwatla, in techinantitlan, in tekaltech in iknopilotl, in iknotlakayotl in kimuchiwilitinime. in sakatitlan, in kwahtitlan kimosiawiltitinemi, in kimihiyowiltitinkmi, in chiltsintli, in istatsintli, in kiltsintli, in nopaltsintli, in kwawtsintli, in atsintli in kimotemolia, in kimokwilia. iwan in kimonentlamachtilia in tiankistla, in nanawistla; in tonewatinemi, in chichinakatinemi in iyolotsin, in inakayotsin; in itentsin wawaktinemi. in vmpa onkistinemi in iknopilotl, in iknotlakayotl; in kitstinemi in kokok, in teopwki; in itech ewatinemi in tekoko, in temamawti; in itechpa omuchiwtia in tloke nawake. wan neka no itstoskí ne seyok rancho. agosto ipan in asiko agustín kano in kinkawato tlaxkalteka yankwik mexiko; san komposterio kinkawato onkan walmokwepke, iwan sekintin kinwalwikake chichimeka, teanako tenechikoko in nikan mexiko. achtopa, amomelak in tlen motenewa; niman mankamo moneltokakan in tlacah. nian otikitakeh ihkwak oya. masewalme eltoya moneltokayayah san niman ipan semilwitl iwan metstli iwan xiwitl in tlakpa omotenew otoyake in ipan tlaxilakali yopiko in onka ikak kali itepotsko otsatsik in pregunero diego astaxochitl iwan mochintin imixpan tlaxilakaleke gaspar de san pablo, pedro hernandes, hwan de la torre. ayak okinankili ayak okontlekawi expa in otsatsik. ante mi lasaro de san hwan eskribano. ipa se taman saj. kwaltia mochiwa saj. kani walkisa nehin chawis. aw ye kin ihkwak in ipan in omotenew in viii akatl xiwitl ipan in osenkisako in san tlako in imasewalwan tenanka in ompa kinwalkawtiaka in atenko ayotsinko inawak: in ikse kalpoli tlailotlake; in ikome kalpoli atlawteka, inin atlawteka in intlahtokaw in itoka ilankweitl atlawtekatltewktli, san onkan mokaw in atenko intlan in oksekintin onkan mokawke atlawteka, kinpachotikatka; in ik-ei kalpoli tlakatekpan tlaka, inin ye ipan asito in intewktlahtokateyakankaw in itoka kwachipasoltsin tlakatewktli; in iknawkalpoli amilka, i yewantin in ye no ipan asito in intewktlahtokateyakankaw in itoka teksismitl amilkatltewktli; in ikmakwili kalpoli tewktipan tlaka; in ikchikwasen kalpoli || 57v tepaman tlaka. ... —sa yekwa kwakwali tikinmokakawilia. nihpensarowa nopilwa mewaske nikinkahsilia. x tekpatl xiwitl, 1268. ika on amo okimotlasotiliaya basurto. inin tlaka ti weyi tepatiki ipan toxolal. okitlania ome peso, ome peso iwan nawi, makwili; tla techanmikas omotlaniaya matlaktli peso. ikan kwali tepatiki amo oteyolkokokwaya tlaxtlawalos. vi kali xiwitl, 1277. miaktin in teukwitlatl in chalchiwitl in kwachtli in ketsali i ye ixkich tlasotli auktle ipa motak, sa tetepewi. . ka miek in oankikakke in nanyotl in tahyotl in ik o amihilpiloke in teyo in kwawyo in atl itstik sesek tsistikatstli amotech opachiw. aw in yehoatl tlamani onkan kon anilia inimal, wel yewatl in kon ana ayak wel temalkwilia ano ak san temal in kon ana. in okonan niman kiwika in ichan. mah amo kimatoka kimichin, amoka okimatia tla ompa oya ika ompa on ichpokatl okitaya papanototol ika iyixpa. amoka ipan omomatia tla ostopa yeyekame ompoyon. ikwak okitake ichpokatl ye kokoxke. ichan yotlakwalania tlilkan ihki on ipan omochiw. taltikpaktsin xkinaxkatili nopilwan. . niman hisiwka yaotlanawatiaya in ik ompa yaokixowas, yewantin teyakantiwia in ostomeka, tlaixketsaya in puchteka tlahtoke aw in tla itla ik kintekipachoske tlaxilakaleke in tla kamo kitlakamatiske inin notlanawatil tlatsakwiltiloske hustisia inpan mochiwas iwan kin[tlatsa]kwiltis totlatokaw visorrei. x tochtli xiwitl ik poliwke kwawtinchatlaka, unkan anok in tlatoani tewktlakosawkatsi yoan yichpoch tepexotsi; yoan unka popoyomiktiloke i mexika in koyoaka, mopiloa tonatiw. xokot pero ohkion kichiwa mochtin kitohke pus non kichiwa mokonew. kiihtowah miyak kiihkwenihke noha. kwawtamii owachan,oseloi owalichan,wexotsinko. newatl ni don lwis de sankta maria nigobernador por su magestad iwan tewantin alkaldes don antonio de sankta maria, don martin de san hwan in tiktokwitlawia hustisia in itechkopatsinko in toweitlatokaw su magestad i nikan audiensia. san wel ye in asokahmo niyekkakkos; intla nose ye onikakkos akasohmo nineltokkos. ka tel mostla ye teotlak in ye onkalaki tonnatiw, nikkwepakiw in mihiyotsin in motlahtoltsin in tlein ik nechnankilis in teopixkatlahtoani. i tochtli xiwitl, 1298. xiwalo nokone xochiyowa itech marso. e iw xiii xiwitl inik walmogeloke tlantilolko xaliyakak in ipan se kali xiwitl. nia nik ixtlawas in tlawikali iwan ye nia. xinechmopahkayowilti ka in yeniasneki. inin iman yonomat nochan nias iwan sowapa monemohtilo tla amo nonasi mahnel chikweyiman. ¿quemanon nopakilismochiwas nochan timitsnotilis? ye iman tiwalmwikas titech motilikin ixkichka miak memetstin yopanoqueh. nimitstatawtia ika miak favor: aw niman seme in yewantin angelosme okinmottititsino in ichkapixke in ixtosowatikatka in onkan intlan inpan in imichkatlakochiltiayan, || [11v] in itlan ikwatlan in se yaokali wekapan in kitokayotiaya héder, in onkan kampa in yewatsin hakob kinmotlakwakwaltiliaya in ichkatsitsinwan in ikwak tlaltikpak monemitiaya, aso ontsontli ipan matlakpowali ixkich ik neikxianalistli kitstika inik weka in belén, ye nipa tonatiw ikisayampa itechpa iwikpa, aw inik kinmomachistili yankwikan in iwalakatsin in iwalalitsin in temakixtiani semanawak, iwan in onkan kani omotlakatilitsino in onkan kimottiliske iwan kinmiximachmachiyomakili inik kimiximachiliske. nikinpia yeyi nosiwaikniwan iwan orne no okich ikniwan. in ok keski mokaw akokolko motekato atlitik. aw iwan ye kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan yepowalokaxtoli ipan se xiwitl in ipan 3 akatl xiwitl, 1235 años, in kikaw teyakanalisyotl in tsinpan, in teyakan onxiwitl; aw sa niman ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl motlali in tlasotsin in teyakanas. iwan in axkan noteilwia amo nowanyolke otlatlanilok in testigo keski xiwitl nemi kitowa ye napowali onmatlaktli xiwitl imatika okikets krus. pasó ante mí migwel xwares eskribano. aw tel amo intlalpan san ipanpa in kitlachkwitlas inwan in yexkich kawitl tlatek inik kimakak sorida aw in axkan moteilwia amo no intlalpan. wan ihkino nopa temohka nopa pilokichpiitsi ika nehon nitahtani senka okinkokolike in nepapan tlaka in tepaneka, onkan okichiwke i yaoyotl ihtik in ixtlawatl; aw in ihkwak in omochiw yaoyotl, awel okinchiwke in mexika. "cane kana ichan q.n. in unkan ichan ayopechtli unkan kitlakatilia in koskatl in ketsali, unkan yoliva tlakativa. aw ka senka walka inik kimowekapanilwi welakpakka in tlakatl, ka nel iwki kimolnamikilitsinoke in imeixtintsitsin teotlakatsintsinti in divinas personas, i omotlatoltitsinoke "yn iw mochiwas in iw kisas in itlakakiska in itlatlaliloka, in iw mokopinas in sa wel iwkatsintli teutl dios". amo ipampa ximotekipacho, ye isiwkan tisewis. ximosewi tlapechpa ihkion noihki timopahtis. mach xinechpahkayowi, yeniah, noteki nechnotsa; mostla amonipoliwis oksepa niwalas iwan imanon nikneki ye kwali timitsnextis. testigo. andres sanches ichan san sebastian sakatla in ixiwtlapowal yehepowalxiwitl okichiw huramento inik otlatlalkoltilok ipaltsinko dios iwan sankta maria iwan sankta krus. —awita. nikan ipan in, in wel melawak, inik onkan asiko inik motlaliko in tisatepek in wewetke in chichimeka in estlapiktin in teotenanka. yewa amwelpaki ika iteki. achtopa mapipitsowa in okikak in tekwanotsani niman ye elsisiwi. on tlalkwa mochintin in ixkichtin siwa onkan onoke iwan in ikalnawaktlaka in kikakia mapipitsolistli kitoaia in ipan axkan domingo a v de septiembre, ikwak masewalok in onkan kwanpatlaniliskwawtitlan, ik motlanawatili visurrei; michkwikatl in mew. miyaki tekitih in kwowit. axkan sábado in ik 4 mani metstli abril de 1615 años, ihkwak yowatsinko in opew ye tlatsilini iglesia mayor, inik okimotlalili deskomunió provisor itokatsin kastro in inpan alkaldes de kortes, impampa omentin kintlatsontekilike hustisiatika piloloskia omentin españoles, se korona kipia se teopan kikixtike; aw eilwitl in inpampa deskomunió intech katka omotenewke alkaldes de korte, semilwitl in tlatsilin ipan omotenew sábado iwan ipan domingo iwan ipan lunes, ye yowa mokawako in oiw ontsilin orasión. imixpan in tlaxilakaleke in onka amanalko migwel iyakamekatl, fransisko kwanmoxkatl, pedro tampatsa, anton ximeo, pedro tepotsitolok, pablo yeka inonkan tepixke amanalko. mochiwa saj. in oktli semi welik. eltó sintli ¿canin ka mosiwatemachtikan? mahtlakpoali gramo galeta maría in oumitl akolnawakasi ye omotlalia tesosomoksi, ye walsiwatlani sawatla yichpoch ixkosawkasi istakxochitl; ye mopilwatia yakapa epkoasi kwakwapitsawak, ikome akolnawakasi tetoka, ik 3 teyolkokowasi, ik 4 mastlato, ik 5 kwakwawsi, te 6 mokiwisi. kenin mochiwa otitlaxtlawake otiahke. onkak ome taman: uitskolantoj, yon nikawín mochiwa. in kolantoh mochiwa mas newín parahko wan nikawín no mochiwa sayoh mah se kitachipawi. kitepewah in semilita. kikixtiliah in xiutsitsin mah moskalti. aw i newatl onikmasew itechkopa in istaksiwapili, ka nonkwa oniktlali i nokwawtlaamaw. makwili kali xiwitl ik poliwke amasteka yoan xochtlantlaka. namantsi ya tipoliwiseya nikan ipan in in momikiliko in wewetewktli in chichimekatewktli tlahtowani amakemekan, in tlahtokat onpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtoli onse xiwitl; aw san niman ikwak in ipan in xiwitl in motlahtokatlali in ipantlakwaloktsin chichimekatewktli mochiw tlahtowani amakemekan; inin ipiltsin in wewetewktli in chichimekatewktli. timomachilia kanin chantiwa federiko sánches? pero kwak noso se biaxe kwak wahsito yonipanok de atl onkán yonipanok. ipan in in onkan matlaktlomomexiwtike mexika in apasko. motewika. in ones imomesti kinpiloke masatla unepantla. se kilo kwitlakochi niman walmoman san oqu iwkan; ayatle ipan mochiwa ayatle i wikalo mochiwtok in iw axkan tlaonok, in xiwitl in kwawitl in manenenke ipan nemi. se xonakatl ahmo wehyi aw no iwi oksenka miek in inkal masewaltin in aktiwets in papachiw, ik kikawke. taltikpaktsin de mi alma, antlanamakaskeh niman ik nokwel ye waltemo in kittas; onasiko niman in ye kitta in tolteka tsakwali in katki onkan tepetsintli ikampa i mani atl. achto timotlakwaltis, ximomahtekihtsino. "yzcatqui tlahtoli in kenin ixpoyawak in tonatiw iwan in metstli. achtopa kisas, otecht. lahpalo. axakak. mihtoa in ok yowaya, in ayamo tona, in ayamo tlatwi, mosentlalike, mononotske in teteo in ompa teotiwakan. kitoke, kimolwike tla xiwalwiyan, teteoé, ¿aquin tlatkis, akin tlamakas in tonas in tlatwis? xiekan. aw in kali yoan itlalo itepanyo monamakas sempoali mokwis yehoatl kimanas in nopilotsin ana xwares ka nel itlalpantsinko in ipan ikak kali aw in atentli ka nel imaxkatsin ka muchi kisenwika. in okittak in senka wel mihmati in senka wel kwika in kiwikaltia inehtotilis teponastli. in apismikilistli in teosiwilistli in amikistli in atetsokoakilistli in siammikilistli. ahvia! keyamikan xi nech iva temoketl a itlatol an nik ya ilwiketl tetsawpili tekoli kimomaxakwalwike inik tlekwawitl kimonanilike. aw in ihkwak okikakke okimatke in mexika maltin, amo siske, san kihtoke "camo tisia, ka tisatl iwitl amatl in ipan otechiw in witsilopuchtli; ka otlenamakak, ka tiktekako in tlachtli in patoli. momostlatika kana nakpa onyahtinemia inikpak kaltepacholi inkalwan in kalehkapoh iwan ipan in nawak xochimiltin. aw inik motlaliko tenochtitlan in mexika, ye iw onpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolomome xiwitl nikan kate in amakemeke in totolimpaneka iwan in tsakwaltitlan tenanka. in en la siudad de mexiko tenochtitlan a veinte i sinko dias del mes de setiembre de 1586 años in newatl alkalde migwel de los angeles hustisia tiktokwiltawiya in itechkopatsinko rei su magestad oniwala in nikan ipan tlaxilakali nekaltitlan onikimakako posesion in itoka petro hakobo iwan in inamik maria nikan nekaltitlan chaneke. in akolih sesek. aw ye onkan inpan asiko ye kate in atentlipan i nonowalka in teutlixka in chalka in axkan ye mitowa tlalmanalka, ka yewantin achtopa asiko in onkan omotenew in atentlipan, in onkan ipan asiko chalchiwkali in ihkak inik axkan motokayotia chalko atenko. kenin mochiwa aw in akwawitl iwan ayawali ompa kitkitiw in ipuchkopa. nawi axoxtlantli no ihkwak momikili in kawaltsin in iakachkaw in toyaotsin; san yewatl kimikti in toyaotsin, ipampa ik tlapinawti ye tlawana. ka mochi ankittaske ka nel notekiw ik oniwaliwalok". kinimaka ika pamitl. nehin weyi kwawta, tlatsopeliloni, ixkich in monekis amo se kichipawa. tla yewa yeskia. ipan in in osenmanke in chichimeka wewetke in ompa astlan, ikwak sekintin omotonkwepke, sekintin motinikwepke, sekintin kwexteka mochiwke in ipan in xiwitl omotenew chikwei akatl; amo wel momati in kenin in iwki in inpan mochiw wewetke. se pedaso, aw in kinkawtia ipilwan in tlahtowani tisosikatsin matlaktli omome in ikse itoka yaotsin, in ikome itoka amakemetsin, in ik-ei itoka imaktlakwia, in iknawi itoka teskatlpopoka, in ikmakwili itoka mawkaxochitl, aw in okchikome amo wel momati in intoka tlahtokapipiltin. aw in iglesia mayor teopankali ihtik san kwalkan katka, ye kin ye pewasnekia in molonisnekia atl. kiski in se tochtli xiwitl. ipa se taman saj. aw in akin texixikolistika kitlakosnekis ki[xi]tinis in tlanawatil audiensia real senka tlapanawia tlatsakwiltilos in iw ka hustisia ik nikneltilia nikan niktlalia notoka iwan firmas melchior dias alkalde. pasó ante mi eskribano pedro de san diego. aw ipan in in xiwitl in pew in ya tepitonawi altepetl amakemekan, inik nexexelolok in ompa witsilak in amomolokko. in kali kanin tichantih wel tlakwalkan. in monamaka kwesalan, kikowa miak tokniwan. tsilintika in wehkatlahtolastli, gwilermo, xikonkakiti akin tlanotsa. ome taman onkak. aw ma ok yewatsin kimomachitia, ma ok yewatsin mitsmoyeyekalwi, mitsmotamachiwili, ka teutl, ka tlahtowani, ka wei makoche, mamalwase, ka wei tepotse. ka yewatsin dios wel monantsin, mottatsin; in senka tlapanawiya inik wel mitsmokwitlawitsinowa, inik mitsmotlasotilia in ahmo mach yuhki inik nimitsmotlasotilia in newatl in nimonan, nimotta. ipan etsontli onkaxtoli onsempoali onnawi xiwitl, oasikoh nikan méxiko matlaktli omome teopixkatitlantin in itech powiah iteopixkanawatil san fransisko. inteopixkawa yewantin imikniwtsin martín de valensia katka. don fernando kortés okis kinselito yuhkin ixtililonih, yuhkin mawissohke tlacah, imixpan in mexicah. tak iuki kitokaitiah por in witstik iyekapayo. amitla, otlanankili inspektor, amo tlaxtlawaske kokone ikan momachtizque. mah xochiyowa, itlanahnamik: ikwak kipiloke akolwaka pili nesawalkentsi atenantitech; ikome mik nawtla tlatoani itoka kowalpopokatsi, kimiminke, in okomiminke ye nemitikan tlatlak. xiii tochtli atle mochiw. kitosneki, panwoaya, onká onečanako' para cha nobia oniya. in amantekatl asik: ixe, yolo. q.n. ka otonak ka otlatvik ma mochiwa yaoyotl ma tlamalo tlapolivis niktemaka in kwavivitl se ichpokatl katka itech se asienda de íchpoch se riko. xi tekpatl xiwitl, 1204. domingo a 28 de marso, ikwak yowatsinko tlawiskalpan in sant hoseph teopan in osenkixowak in onetekok, in owalkis totatsin frai hwan de santiago, niman ye ik tepewia imekaw ika in tewiteki inik waltekixtia itwalko, iwan kwawtika tewitek. aw in kali in itepots vi matl ipan se mitl in inakas ix naumatl yewatl kikowa fransisko kwawiseki aw in ye mochi kali in okikoh vi kwasentemani ik omosenonotske in iteikaw itoka ana mosel iwa inin chawana itoka hwana inik kimonamakilia in ikal ipan metstli xvi dias del mes de mayo de 1553, don diego de san fransisko gobernador de mexiko don pedro de la krus alkalde diego de san hwan alkalde. in amo monamaka. tikpiaskeh inimekes siwantoton okwikaya se pipiltontli okitlakentiaya itsotsoma kename totatsin san migwel. inin pipiltontli amotla omokwikatiaya; san wel ye okipiaya tlen mitotis intsalan pastoratin. itsotsoma okiwikaya noihki ikorona iwan ye witswan kename totatsin san migwel. inimekes kokone okipiaya tlen mitotiske nochi in semilwitl. ikwak ilwitsin toteotatsin oyaya mokwikatiske nawi hora watsinko ika in kandelawan; san niman omitotiaya. keman chikweyi tlamachotiloni watsinkopa okinwikaya tlaiske ichan mayordomo isoltik. iwan nima tlayotlaike oksepa oyaya ompa teopa; oksepa mitotia. noka pewa misa, inon moteochiwtsinoa yeyi totopixkes ixpantsinko teotl. akí komiensa en ké año nasió el señor. in yewantin in in nikan omotenewke tlahtoke ka ok yewatl kintlahtokatlalitewak inn omotenew in inttatsin tesosomoktli; aw san niman ipan in in xiwitl i motlahtokatlaliko in maxtlatsin in askapotsalko. no welik in ixochiyo komaltamal. . aw in tlasotilmahtli kin makak in omotenew iwan tlasomaxtlatl in innetlawtil mochiw. kin ikwak kimolpiliaya in ikwak wewei ilwitl kistiwia in ipan tlakaxipewalistli. tonses oksepa walpano oksé distansia* tlayewaloa kike in mono awkweli walpano kana. in tewtli in popoka ya milakatsoa 32. aw iwan ma tikmokwitlawi in tlakatlahtoli, ma yuhkin timakiskowatl, tichikimolin timuchiwtinem; ma kana tetsalan, tenepantla timotekatinen, ma kana titenetechew, titeixnamik; ma yuhkin tekontew, kaxtew, titenetechalani. ma titexixitini, ma titemomoyaw. aso wel mani i molkaxitl, in chikiwitl; aso wel oniwa, onkwalo in atolatsintli, i wapawakatsintli; aso wel onok in petlatl, in ikpali, aso wel nkmako in xochitl, in yetl. ma no tewatl tokontlas in ahkwali. in ahyektli. in tewtli, in tlahsoli. ma tewatl tikisolo, tikkatsaw in petlatl, in ikpali, in ikniwyotl, in kowayotl, in netlakamachilistli. ka intla yuh tikchiwasin. ka ahmo ve titlaeakisas. ka tiktsawktias in kemmanian. kinotsa itlanahnamik: mochiwa kwowihtik kampa onkak xonokwopalak. aw ka nokwel ompa kinpewato in chichimeka in totolimpaneka; iksen ik onkan momoyawake inik motlalito in kampa xochtlan in kiyawistlan, in kampa onoke in tekwannawaleke in kiyawnawaleke. vii tochtli xiwitl, 1278. in chalawih amo monamaka. yei axoxtlantli kitsahtsili ipapá, kiiluij. fwersa. aw niman okitlatokatlali in markés, okimilwi “yn axkan aweweintin antlatoke, ximotlalican”. ma ok sewi in iyolotsin teotl markés. ¿ye otiksalo motlamachtil? totonik, ta yek wakkatik. niman ipam xiwitli ipam inin xiwitli walmowikakke san fran [cis] ko teopixke okalake tewaka/n/ frai hwan de sarase iwan hwes hwan medel {en el margen iskierdo no ikwak omokwakteki ini tlatowani d{on} herna{n}do iwan mochintin masewaltin no ikwak omopewalti teokali {en el margen iskierdo años= 1534= 3= tochtli= sanos tepisin dasinda tewakám. aw iwan ye matlakpowalxiwitl ipan yepowalxiwitl ipan matlaktlomei xiwitl in ipan xiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1336 años, in momikiliko in wewe akamapichtli tlahtowani kulwakan, in tlahtokat matlaktlomei xiwitl. axkan domingo ik 12tia metstli de disiembre de 1610 años, ikwak ye teotlak chikwasen tsilini in okalakiko monhastin in onkan monasterio sankta mónika nawintin iwan omentin nofisias; ikchikwasemin in onkakalakiko kochetika || 133 i walake, umpa walkiske in wei monasterio konsepsió ayotikpak onkan fundadoras mochiwako in monasterio sankta mónika. 1. nopiltse, nokoske, noketsale, otiyol, otitlakat, otimotlaltikpakkixtiko in itlaltikpaktsinko in totekwiyo. omitsmoyokolili, omitsmopikili, omitsmotlakatilili in ipalnemowani, dios. aw mixko, mokpak otitlachixke in timonanwan, in timottawan; iwan immawiwan, immotlawan, immowayolke omixeo, mokpak tlachixke, ochokake, otlaokoxke mopampatsinko inik otiyol, inik otitlakat in tlaltikpak. moketsaliskixochintsetseloa in ikniwyotl. pero naxan akmo axan kachi akmo choloa akmo mach sankilwis in lá tinechmiktis xnechmikti pero para nikisas nehwa ahmo nikisas nehwa monikisas. ¿canin anmetztayah? kesankwa' ikseki tlaka okihtake. yewan okipolohkeh nochi intomin. ka amo tlakasemeletok ka tekwanyotok motekwanyotitok amo tlaka onok in sakatl in tlakotl. neskiani ahmo wel moneki in tokonihtoskeh yewatsin in temachtikatsintli leonportila okimotlaxilotili totlakanechikolis mochipa ompa moyetstika iwan intla kemmanian ahmo ompaometsta yewatlo ipampa itekiwtsin in mexihkotlahtolitkatsintli ipan unesko iwan senka wehka metstaya nian por tlakawatiw niantlen kipensaroa piltontli solo dios tleka koma niantle kilnamikis. in ipan in in yewantin amakemeke ikwak kitlamiko inik kwawkixtike inik kwawtemowike kwawtla; in chalka in intekiw mochiw in kitemowike, in nonkwa san inneixkawitl mochiw amakemeke vii mil in kwamimili morrilos in kitekke ipan in xiwitl || 63 omotenew de 1607 años. amo nikmati keyéh iuki kitokaytiaj. aw inik tlahtokat nikan amakemekan senpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolomei xiwitl, inik asiko ikpak chalchiwmomostli amakeme; aw inik motlahtokatlali in ompa atenko inik momikiliko in nikan amakemekan, inik mosenpowa in ixkichkaw yepowalxiwitl ipan chikwasen xiwitl inik onmomikili. ka san ye no yuhki mochiwa in tonatiw ixkwichewalis, ka onkan ixkwichewa ixmatlalewa in wel ixpan momana in metstli, aw in onkan amo ixpan momana amo ixkwichewa amo ixpoyawa amo ixmatlalewa. aw inik walamasewaya, ka akaltika in kiwaltemaya in imakxoyaw in onkan itokayokan kinewayan ostotl, onkan kate itoka chikomostotl, in onkan satepan walkiske asteka; ka mochipa yuh kiwalchiwaya, in imakxoyaw kiwaltemaya onkan. se xonakatl in antokniwan ma xachokakan, aya ma xokonmatika ika ye tikkawke mexikayotl. in tonatiw in metstli amo sa sen ilwikatl itech in kate onoke, ka sesentlanepanoli itech onoke in ilwikatl, ka in tonatiw iknawtlanepanoli ilwikatl in itech ka; aw in sesentlanepanoli ilwikame sesentlamantli ik momalakachowa. in oyuh omik walmotlali in itoka witsiliwitl in ipan viii tekpatl xiwitl, ipam motlali. . in manel sententli senkamatl intlahtul wel ipan moholpihitikatka in tlatkoni in tlamamaloni. pos sayoh kikwaliah itakilo, por ke para pahti amo nikmati, por ke kemeh amo okachi onkak, pos amo se kixmati, por ke nikawín amo moweyichiwa. sekinok tlamantli inik motlatokantlali xi kali xiwitl amo wekawak, sa matlakpowalilwiti in oka katka. tlen 46 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlaltlanawatilmeh tlen sentlanawatiloyan welis san iniwantih mosencahuaseh, ika ikniyotl tlahtoli, tlen kanin monepantiah, san amo welis mosenkawaseh tla amo kiselis tlahtoli tlahtokan tlen wekapan. keman amo welis mosencahuaseh, akahya tlen iniwantihya welis moixpantis ipan tlahtokan tlen huecapah, tlen motekiwatlalis ken moihtowan ipan 76 tlanawatikayotl, tlatlapantli xi, tlen inin amatlanawatili. tlahtoltlasenkawali tlen wekapa tlahtokan ipan inin tlamantli nochipaya elis iwan amo akah welis kiolinis. in suprema korte tlen hustisia totlalnantsin, welis kiixmatis iixpan tlatelwili ipan tlanawatiloyan, tla akahya motelwis, tlen kwalantli mochiwas ipan tlasenkawali tlen wekapa tlahtokan. ye yipan tika in opehke kalakiske ompan momochko malakatepek inimekes kikwitiaya otomites iwan sapotekas. inimekes siwame okiyolaliaya inamiwan yewan. tlaka oyaya intlak sapatistas. noihki otlatoaya otomite iwan oksekintin siwame otlatoaya mitoa sapoteka. iwan tlaxkali okikwitiaya chúzcuta. okseki tlatoli otlatoaya; newatl amo nikaki kwali tlen kitosneki inon tlatoltin. iman sapatistas oyatinemia ika ompa miake tlatoltin. otikakia mononotsa; molwia iwan san yewatsin toteko dios momachtiaya tlen kitoa. xinechkaki, nonantsin, onka se kwakwaltsin pelíkula o inpa sine olímpika. wel miak nikitasneki. tlapalchihchitok iwan in inemilisyo chopin. onkan in, kipanoltiskeh oksente mexihkapelikula wel kwali okichichihkeh katlatonalan. tiohueh, nonantsin, timitstlatlahtia. ye kana ome semana amotlen sine tiahticateh. nikitta in xochitl inkiihtowah intechtekipanouaj. ¿cuix ye no weweyoinin netlatolis in nokwapilwa? kenin mochiwa ayawistli moteka, ma kikistla in ihkawaka, nopan pani tlaltikpak. in nikan siudad mexiko tenochtitlan a beinte i noeve dias del mes de hulio de mil e kinientos i setenta i siete años in mwi magnifikos señores alkaldes pablo xwares pedro geronimo in kimopielia hustisia in itechkopatsinko su magestad in omotenew kwidad imixpantsinko onesiko hwan garsia chane san sebastian awantoko. wan se tekitl inkinekih se tochtli xiwitl in tletlalito tepantonko in ixkwekwenotl; inon tletl ye nawilwitl tlatlatitika in ixkwekwenotl mexikatl. kwali mopaka makwili xitomatl, satepan senka moteteki ika xonakatl, axox iwan almendra; inin almendra achto mosiyawa ihtik in achiton atl in ya posontas; mokixtilia in ikakalo iwan no moteteki; ipan temolkaxitl motesi in komino, pimienta, ahwiyak klavo iwan kanela. ipan kaxitl motlalia nawi xumali pitsochiyawisotl, motsoyonia in xitomatl ika mochi in omotetek, motlalilia in nakatl iwan tlein omotes temolkaxpan inik kwali tlewakis; motlalilia istatl. in kwitlaxkoinanakatl, in ye tlapaktli, motlapoa iwan motemitia ika pitsonakatl iwan mochi in ye omihto, mokimiloa ika kwawtlatsoaltotoltetl, motsoyonia ika senka totonki pitsochiyawisotl. in xitomatl, in omokaw, motesi ika xonakasentlatektli iwan ome axoxtoton; intla moneki, wel motlalilis achiton chili inik tepitsin kokok yes; ihkwak ye tetlamakos motlalia ihtik in istaayoton; makahmo molini inik ahmo xixitikas. se tsitsikwewalton kanela tlahko kwarto avelana itech mana in ka tlewatl, motlayah iskalwia, in ken ami iyelis itlalchielis, motlalis. se wei xonakatl noso istagas. ok no iwiyantsin ye yatiwits mokokotiwits in omotenew señor sebastián viskaino, kikokoke inik onkan akapulko kimiktike kixilia in haponti, yuh machistiko in nikan mexiko, ipampa in ixkichtlamantli umpa ipial walmuchiwtiwia in tlein tetech axiwaloni in tetonaltiloni, kiwalmahmakak umpa wei tlahtowani emperador inik kinwalmotlapalwia kinwalmotonaltilia santo padre roma moyetstika iwan toweitlahtokatsin rei españa moyetstika iwan nikan mexiko moyetstika tlahtowani visurrei; in innemaktsin in intonaltsin mochi yewatl ipialtsin walmochiwtiwia wel imak kiwalali inik nikan kaxitikiw, aw in amo yewatl kimakak amo yewatl ipial walmochiwtia in omotenew embaxador. ikwakon pobres tlaka omihmihke miak chiko i grande pero ikan kokolistle ikan kokolistle gripa omosewi asta ipan laño beinte entonses mosewi in rebolúsion wan in kokolistle omosewi isas wan ikwakon omosewi in rebolúsion. wan yeka tiwalawih chikwei axoxtlantli in antokniwané,tla ok xokonkakikan:ma ak aso ayak in tekunenemi. itlanahnamik: xochiyowa itech enero wan febrero. aw in mexika no ikwak kipewaltike in ye kipatlawa tetenamitl in onkan hospital kaltitlan sant lásaro, itenkopatsinko mochiw in tlahtowani visurrei; ik kinmonawatilika in mexika ipan kalketsaske in ikwak tla okipatlawke tetenamitl. aw i ye yuhki tekwalewitike asitimoketsakon tiankisko. viii tekpatl xiwitl, 1604 años. tlahko xonakatl ahmo wehyi xochiyowa marso, abril onkak ya kapolkonemeh wan mayo pewa chichilewi ya. mah namkchmakakan ika namoahtapal. xa itech ehekat, ¡ manel xochitl, manel kwikatl! vii akatl xiwitl, 1291. xochiyowa kemeh itech hulio, para todosantoh onkak ya, tepitsin achto pewa taki de todosantoh wan panowa todosantoh no pewa tami ya. amo monamaka kwesalan. nikan ipan in in asiko inik motlaliko in wewetke teochichimeka totolimpaneka itstlakosawke amakemeke in onkan itokayokan tepotoniloyan atentlipan chalko; in ihkwak in oyuh nepa yetsonxiwitl ipan onpowalxiwitl ipan se xiwitl omotlakatilitsino in totekwiyo hesuchristo in ihkwak onkan tepotoniloyan omotlaliko in amakemeke chichimeka. in testigo otlatlanilok keski xiwitl nemi kitowa yepowali onmatlaktli xiwitl nikan imatika okikets in krus. pasó ante mi migwel xwares eskribano. axkan nikan nimitsmaktili, no ihkwak in onokwel walkalakke in tlapechwake, inik tlalmanalko onemito, unpa ponwia; yewatl kiman in padre frai lwis de uñade vikario iwan frai lwis regino presidente. ye yiman opapanok kana yeyi noso nawi metstli. ipan chikweyi metstli de notlan otlamimihtito otechilwi karransista tla amo nanyaske ika méxiko titlikechiske nochtin caltin. otechkwito iwan otechkahke méxiko. sekintin tlaka onekawalo ika san gregorio atlapulko; okseki walake ikan xochimilko, ka otlaixmatia. x tochtli xiwitl, 1346. chilwak aw in onkan katlitike || 47r kitlakwaltike in kimoteotiaya in istakkwawtli, inik axkan motokayotia kwawtliitlakwayan in ompa in tepetikpak. nima ye teyolkokoasi kontlatokatlali akolma; aw nima ye kontlatokatlali mastlato koyoaka; aw in kwakwawsi kontlali tepechpa; mokiwisi omotlali kwawnawak. teipa kikamowik tlen kiitato ya yani noha tihchihki. inik 7 tlamantli nikitowa onkan nokamisa sentetl iwan no sarawelas monamakas ik ninotokas aw i notilma sentetl [f. 17v.] kimololos in nonamik in itoka maria salomen aw in tixeras niknamakas no iwan notech monekis. monamaka por bulto oso por kaha. i ye unkan amaxak in ixkich yatikatka, auktle tochimal tomakwaw auktle tochimal auktle tinkwani, yuh seyowal in topan kiaw. ayohwachtli aw oksenka wel momawisowa inik okis ilwichiwililokatsin mexiko in omotenewtsino sant ignasio in ayemo isenyo in ilwichiwililokatsin omochiw, ye niman weilwitl in omochiw inik ikatsinko opahpakowak; inik senka miekintin satepan okinextike in tlaweliloke okimomawispolwike intlakwiloltika in akike konsasalowaya pwertatitech in onkan iglesia mayor yowaltika. se kikwa, se kikwalia iselo kemeh yon witskilit se kikechkotona. in newatl migwel de los angeles nimotetlayekoltikatsin in ipaltsinko totekuyo dios oksepan axkan mixpantsinko ninopechteka in ipaltsinko rei su magestad nikitowa ka ik otikmokakilti in ipanpa mili in onpa tlalistakapan in kimotlaltia fransisko martin iwan in ipilwan okimotilito in pipilti in tikinmixkechili. plnolatoli newktlatsopelilili para mah wetsi natsin. i nikan siudad mexiko tenochtitlan ax[sik] viernes a v dias del mes de hulio de mil kinientos i sesenta i seis años. in tewantin alkaldes migwel sanches, fransisko xwares in tiktokwitlawia hustisia in itechkopatsinko in toweitlatokaw sakra sesarea i katolikas real magestad. aw yehika ipampa ka ye okipanawi in onkan ipan hora kitenewke omochiwaskia inik otlayowaskia, mochi tla- || 146 -catl konakopaittaya in tonatiw, aken ka aken mochiwa, wel masitika iwan tlanextia, yese aokmo chikawak topan moketsaya in itotonilo, aokmo tetlatiaya; wel se tsilinin nopew in sa yuhki kokoxtikatka tonatiw, ankase ik opew in ye tlayowas. kana ika timotsotsonas, ika timowitekis in wewerttsin, in ilamatsin ahnoso kokoxkatsintli, ahnoso piltsintli, inik ahmo motechtlamis. ahnoso kana itla chiwalo, ihtolo, tenewalo, inik ahmo titetlakawaltis, titetlapololtis, inik ahmo titetolinis, titemosiwis in ipampa ahmo monehmatilis. mach ipan apiastla se kwali maltia mochekaltia iwan motonaltia x tekpatl xiwitl, 1372. mahtlaktli ome xokonochtli in ipan nawtsontli omeppoali onnawi xiwitl don diego osorio de eskobar, in akin wei iteopixkatsin pwebla moyetstikatka, titlano méxiko yuhkin itlahtokateixiptlatsin inin yankwik hispantlali. ipampa ik mosentamachiwa in tlali matlakmatl ipan onmatl inik patlawak aw inik wiya chikonmatl ipan senyolotli inik onasi in onkan xomolaktika onkan omomaman sesen estakas in onkan tlatlantika tlatamachiwali tetika otlamomotlak inik oneltik inik okonan posesion. ayok mokakiliyah aw in ikwak ye tlanawi mokokowa in ilamatsin maria xoko niman kito kan nel omomikili in nopiltsin maria anan in tla se onka noxwiwtsin ka nikmakatias in kali ihoan in itlalo. yeskia. nik mati nesi amo nechacicamatih. aw axkan sábado ik 31 mani metstli wel itlamian hulio de 1610 años, ikwak teopankalmamaliwak in motenewa la kassa professa, ikwak motlapo inin yankwik teopankali in onkan ikokkan moyetstikate la kompañía de hesús teopixke; ikwak kimotlalilike ik mokalaki in sakramento, onkan kimaniliko in iglesia mayor wei tlayawalolistika wei ilwichiwalistika. in okonkwik tlatoli wisnawak tiachkaw toweyo, nima ye ik yaw kimakas in tlatoli tlatilulko tlatoke, tetlan unka mewititika in tenochka intlatokaw kwawtemok. i tla nechmopolwis yakachtopa yewatl in anima niknomakilia in totekuyo dios yeika ka iyaskatsin ka itlachiwaltsin in tla kiwalmanilis ma kiwalmanili satepa yewatl i nonakayo nikmaka in tlali ye ika ka tlali mokwepas aw in axka domingo xi del mes de hunio de 1595 años in ye niktlalia i nodesdamiento [sic]. ome axoxtlantli . san no iw otlamaniti otlaohtlatokti wel okimawisoti in puchtekayotl in ostomekayotl. yetamechkawtewaske serka tiaske de topantion wan namehwanke namokawa’. ipan chikwasen akatl xiwitl kokoxtli, kolwakan itlahtokaw, okinchiwili yaoyotl xochimilcah. kien sabe para kenke kwalanih kil inin ik kinkawaskia ipampa inik kinmachtiskia wel kimixtlamachtiskia in inpilwan tliltike in ika mochi tlamachilistli, in ixkich kimomachiltia inik no ok yewantin kil teopixkatiskia, missa kichiwaskia in kakatsak kokone, iwan inik sekintin kil oidoresme mochiwaskia, || 189 sa se in ixkichtlamantli in intlatekpantlawikilis españoles kil moch kinkwiliskia, inik no yewantin tliltike ipan yaskia no ik tlamanitiskia. modesayunaroa'. o nen notlakatl,o nen nonkisako teotl ichan in tlaltikpak, aw in tla aka tlachalanis tixpan walas in ikwak onmotsaw tepantli yuh titlanawatia inik amo tlatlakawis inik wel mochiwas. tiktlalia in totoka iwan tofirmas. axkan sabado a 21 de hulio de 1571 años. fransisko de la krus alkalde thoribio lukas alkalde newatl fransisko moisen eskribano. nikan ipan in omomikiliko in wetsin ahnoso yewatl i nonowalkatl in ikchiwknawi tlahtowani kulwakan, in tlahtokat senpowalxiwitl ipan se xiwitl. wan i melio wan in dose sentabos naxka i toka pero katka non melio wan kwartiya; tlaxaxantilme kiniwikili ipan in iketetl okilpike in inxiw in mexika; aw yak imixpan, san ok ineixkawil in mexika in wewetke in chichimeka ye onkan in atlitlayakyan. senka kitekipacho in tlaokoltlatsilinilistli kikak, nowian mantok inik tlaokoyalo netekipacholo nemawtilo iwan tlatlawtilo in totekwiyo dios inik techmopalewilis; yehika in ipan in ikoppa mochiw tlalolinalistli onkan kakistik, in tlein kakistik mochi tlakatl yuh kikak yuhkin se karreda chachalkatia inik motlalo inik kakistik, in kampa walkakistik kwix tlilitik kwix noso ilwikakpa ka amo wel momati, yese wel kakistik in iwkima itla motlalo, ik nokwel yewatl ipampa in senka nemawtilok. wan na sikiera inimopaniko aw in ikokkan onkan in tlapachowa yewatl wei tlahtowani in motenewa in kitowa gran chan, emperador inweitlahtokaw in motenewa tártaros. iiii kali xiwitl, 1613. ix kali xiwitl, 45. aw niman kilwike in siteka "yn axkan nikan ye tiktokamaka i moteow, aokmo itoka mixkowatl, ye itoka sitekatl; ik tikwepilia in itoka inik nesis in sitlan otimokwepako". xiii tochtli xiwitl, 1206. antlanamakah inin nikteixpantilia axkan kaxtolimokixtii in xonakatl tiktsinewaske sa wilohkeh kwali ka noka newatl nikinmachiltis in okseki nopilwantewatsin timomachitia tlen timayitis . aw in ye iwki in ommotlatlawtike in om mosepan chikawake, niman ye ik ki wal moxelwia on tsontli konkwi in kwachtli tenochka, aw no on tsontli konkwi in tlatilolka. ah san ninetlamati, nikitowa maka niya ompa ximowayan. tlasotli noyol. in newa, newa, san nikwikanitl, teokwitlayo noxochiwakayo. ika se kichiwa atol: achto se kioya wan iyolkwouyo pitsawak kemeh se imahpil, pané elot. para pahti ihwak yon se chawisti, mah se kimana iwan limahxiwit, xokoxiwit, pinawits wan yehwa ya in xilexxiwit, se kimomolotsa wan mah ika se malti. aw niman ye kiwaliwa in tepetonko; kilwike "oncan xomotlali on". tlatsintla. otsonkisako in matlaktlomome xii tekpatl xiwitl de 1608 años. niman nimixpantsinko onesiko regidores pedro geronimo, pedro de sant fransisko okinmokakitili in intlaneltililis in testigos seseyaka omotokayotike in tlaxilakaleke in iw otlatolmelawke in itechkopa ilamatsin maria xoko inik wel neli ixkoyan in ikal inikitlalpan mochintin kineltilike ihoan inik neli in aokak onkan in tepilhoan omochimomikilike ihoan inik neli monamakas in kali in iw kineltilian in testigos. miekpa siwatl kakoya chokatiw, tsatsitiw, yowaltika senka tsatsi, kitotinemi onotechkimokawili inik oniwala san hwan amanalko in ipan tlaxilakali aw onikimakak posesion in itoka diego yaotl, bartasal xochitl iwan fransiska tlako iwan isabel tlako. "nama na nitlalis tlitl wan tlahki [...] kwalanis. ome taman: tein kwali wan simarrón. in ipan in xiwitl ye oyuh ye nepa senpowalxiwitl ipan onxiwitl pewaloke in chalka, inik mochi amakemekan, inik ye no nikwel motlalike tlahtoke in amakemekan iwan tlalmanalko. aw in isiwaw amo ixpan, aw in ihkwak oilwilok in okimatki in iwki ipan omochiw inamik, ik senka kwalan motekipacho in mekawitekok, inik niman ipampa audiensia real omoteilwito. in ipan siudad mexiko a 16 dias del mes de desienbre de mil e kinientos i ochenta i seis años yewatsin alkalde migwel de los angeles hustisia kimokwitlawitsinowa in ikatsinko su magestad walmowikak in nikan san pablo tlalistakapa in isoheto in ipan altepetl kimotamachiwiliko in tlali mili in imiltsin mochiwas. aw yese inn onkan namechnemaktia in onkan namechtenewilia ka tetlalpan ka ye nowian onowak, ka aokmo kana kaktimani; aw yese ka senka wekawtika in akike in amokotonkawan amoxeliwkayowan in asitiwi. se kilo tochnakatl aw no iwan san moch senowala in intlahtokatekiw omomentin omotenewke tlamatinime, no ikwak owala in tewantin timasewaltin in topalewiloka techwalmotitlanililia in toweitlahtokaw rei don felipe tersero, iprovisiontsin kiwalmotitlani in itechkopa in mimikkatsitsinti in intestamentos kichiwtiwi, inik ayak kitlakos in || 69 tlei intlanekilis kitotiwi, iwan in kenin tetlamamakatiaske. ix tochtli xiwitl, 1462. aw ye ki satepa mitos motenewas in iw nenke achto totatsin adán iwan in achto tonantsin eva, iwan inik mopilwatike moxinachoke i nowian ipa semanawatl, || 1v in ipan onkan kawitl iwan ixkichika ... inik tlein ipa xiwitl mochiw in apachiwilistli in nowian in ipa itoka noé in mitowa motenewa diluvio. tlaltikpak in nikán; ¿oticac inon tlakakalatstli niman ik se tlakatl omotlalotikis in teteu, ik konixwiwiwitekito in tochin in yewatl tekusistekatl, ik konixpopoloke ik konixkomiktike in yuhki axkan ik tlachie. aw in omotenewtsino doña isabel ka ye kin imostlayok ipan miérkoles teotlak makwili tsili in ik 20 mani metstli mayo in otokok inakayotsin onkan monasterio konsepsió, imixpantsinko in iwayolke i ye españoles omokwepke kintokayotia andradas. inik nikmati ka mochipa newatl niktotoka ka timayekawan aw kin ye makawilxiwitl in ye tikimitta in ye kimokwikwilia in pixkitl aw in axkan mochipa konpixka aik kikawa in iskich kawitl in tlakpak tenewtika ixkich in nikitowa notlatol ik nomatika niketsa krus thomas xakin. 1 tekpatl xiwitl, 1584. "bueno, para tla tiineki tomokwise nikani". ye yuh sempowalxiwitl umatlaktli ose omik i mexikatl in chapoltepek, in kisako i nonowalkatl in timal tepewtiwits; untetl in ketsalkali kotlatoktia, untetl in kwawxikali, kinotstiwits in itew tlakatekolotl. kikechpostehki nopa pilokichpiitsi talet tlen 41 tlanawatihkayotl. in altepeyotl mosennawatia ika tlahtoli mani ipan sentlanawatili chicahualismeh, kampa yewan tlanahuatiah, iwan tlen tlaltlanahuatilmeh, kampa iixkotiah intlanawatihkayo, tlen kenihki moihtowa ipan inin amatlanawatili sentlanawatiloyan iwan tlen inaxka tlaltlanahuatilmeh, tlen amo keman welis kitlahtolkwepaseh tlen moihtowa ipan tlahtoli sentlanawatili. in tlayankwilili chikawalistli tlen tepantlahtoani iwan weyi tekiwakayotl mochiwas ika tlaselnemilistli tlaixwasantli, xitlawak iwan ehechka kawitl, ika inin tlaneltokilistli i. in tlahtol nechikolismeh nochi yewan kinkwesos altepeyotl, in tlahtol tlanawatili kiihtos kenihki mokalakiseh ipan ohtekitl tlapehpentli. in anawak tlahtol nechikolismeh intechpowi welis mokalakiseh ipan tlapehpentli tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh iwan altepeko tlanahuatilmeh. in tlahtol nechikolismeh kipiah tlanawatili tlaoliniseh mamokalaki altepeyotl ipan nemilistli sentlapalewili, tlapalewis mamosennechiko anawak tlaixnextilistli iwan ken nechikolistli tlen altepechanehke, kichiwaseh inin altepechanehke makiasikamatikan tekipanoseh ipan chikawalistli altepeyotl, ken itlanotsal amatekitl, tlahtolmelawalistli iwan tlayeyekoli tlen ipan moteteoniah iwan semihkak tlapehpentli, tlasennawatilistli, ichtakapan iwan xitlawak. san altepechanehke welis inselnawatilis moihkwiloseh ipan tlahtol nechicolismeh. ii. in tlahtol tlanawatili kinelchiwas nopa tlahtol nechikolismeh mamopialikah sehka tlapalewili tlen ika welis tequipanoseh. ipampa inon, intehpokwi nochi tonal mopialiseh tlamantli tlen ika mokamowiseh iwaya altepeyotl, ken moixnewia iwan motekpana tlahtoli ipan tlanawatili. ipihuiyah, in tlahtol tlanawatili kimanextis tlahtol tlatamachiwali tlen ika motomin palewiseh tlahtol nechikolmeh iwan keman calnehnemiseh, iwan moneki kinelchiwaseh tlen tlapalewili altepeyotl ma achi ixnesi iwan amo tlen wala teaxka tlapiali. in altepeyotl tlaxtlawili tlen tlahtol nechikolismeh tlen kipiaseh amatokayotl keman panotosa tlaixtlalistli, sentika motlalis tlen kinmaktiliah tlen ika nochi tonatih ika tekipanowah iwaya tlen ika welis kitemoseh tlaixwasantli keman onkas tekitl tlen tlaixtlalistli iwan kin maktiliseh ken nikan moihtowa iwan tlen kiihtos tlahtol tlanawatili; a) in altepeyotl tlaxtlawili tlen ika mopalewiseh ipan tekiyotl tlen nochi tonatih kichiwah moixtlalis sesen xiwitl, motekiwis tlen achi amo miak ipatih tlen tekitl tlaixtlalistli tlen kiixyeyekos organo superior de hustisia tlen instituto federal elektoral, tlapowalmeh tlen wakapah tepantlahtoanih iwan tepantloanih moixtlaliseh, tlapoalmeh tlahtokan nechikolismeh tlen tlaixnextiah ipan tlahtokan sentlanawatiloyan iwan kenachi wahkawa tekiyotl tlaixtlalistli. in 30% tlen nochi tlapoali tlen eliti itechpowi tlen saniman omoihto, moxelos inixkotiah tlahtol nechikolismeh seha tlapoali iwan 70% tlen omokawa moxelos inixkotiah san kenihki tlapiwili tlaixwasantli tlen kinechikoseh ipan tlaixtlalistli tepantlahtoanih saniman echkatika. b) in altepeyotl tlaxtlawili tlen tekiyotl ika monechikos tlaixwasantli tlen keman onkas tlaixtlalistli, sehka ipatih eliti tlapoali tlen altepeyotl tlaxtlawili tlen itechpowi se iwan se tlahtol nechikolistli tlen tekiyotl nochi tonatih mochiwa ipan inon xiwitl. k) mokwepas se tlapiwili tlen tlahtokan nechikolismeh kitekiwiseh ipan se xiwitl tlen tekiyotl itechpowi tlamachtilistli, tekitlamachtilistli, atepetomiyotl iwan tlahtoltekitl tlatehtemoli, iwan noihki tlen tekitl amochtlachiwali. in tlanawatili kiixtlalis tlahlamikilistli tlen kenihki itlamiyah tlen tomin kitekiwiseh tlahtol nechikolismeh ipan tekiyotl tlaixtlalistli; kiihtos ken achi miak tomintlaliseh tlen iniwaya tlatskitokeh iwan ohtekitl motekiwis tlen ika kiwikaseh iwan kipihpiaseh tlen kanin walah ye axkan nawi metstli ipan augusto ik senpowal onmakwili mani in metstli in kimomakake tomines no ikwak kitlalike inin nenonotsal imixpan mochiw in tlaxilakaleke tlatilko onkan ikwiliwtika in intoka inik neltitika. in kikwepilike itlatoltsin tlatowani kwawtemoktsin: “tlacatlé tlatowanié, kwix titomasewaltsin?; in ka timitstawilkixtilia. aw i yewantin in chichimeka in totolimpaneka inik yahtiake, kimilwitiw in kimoteotiaya "ma kana anmotlaliti; namechnawatia ompa titlamatiwi in onkan ihkak in inteow akxoteka in akolakatl nawaltewktli". ipampa in kitokayotike chalchiwmomostli in tepetsintli, in axkan ye itoka amakeme. a iknopilotl ma ok timaliwi, monawak, titeotl. in tein istak mochiwa kampa yeski, mochiwa nikawín wan ne atpoliwikopa wan ne kwesalampa, mochiwa kahfentah wan itech ixtawat. pehki kikokototsa kikokototsa temohti ika tlatlatskwepontika. in ikwak axiwako walteyaka achto wala i matlakoatl; amo mitika amo chimaltika namikok, ye nawi xiwitl i san ok yuh katka askapotsaltonko. 82. ka wel ik tonixpopoyotis, tonkesnekwiliwis, tommatsikoliwis tla ok in nepa, in satepan ka ye otontlatlakamikkatik, otonnenpoliw, omitsmokwilili in totekwiyo in omitsaatlamachtiaya, in omitskwekwenotiliaya. san ye kwali, san ye yektli, xikintlakamati immonawan, immottawan, in tekitika, in tlakoyotika, immitsmoyakanilia. ka ahmo no awiya, ahmo no paki; ka no tonewatinemi, chichinakatinemi in inyolotsin, in innakayotsin. intla ihkwak, ahmo tikimmotlakamachitis, intla san imixko tewas, intla san tikinnanankilia, intla san tikinkwakwatiwetsi, ka ok walaki in intonewis, in inchichinakis, in inneamanalis, in innetekipachol, in innemosiwilis in ipampa in ahmo motetlakamachilis, in moteixkonemilis. no ipan in ihkwak tlapaliwkat in itoka weimak in ompa tototepek in metstitlan; in imontha mochiw itoka teton aw in isiwaw mochiw itoka mario. aw in oksekintin wewetke wel no ipan in in omotenew se akatl xiwitl in kimachiyotia kikwilowa inik onkan kalakiko in motenewa sinkalko chapultepek in tlahtowani weimak. yeka ipan novesientos chikweyi iki in otechtitiaya ke tinemiske kwali. tlahko kilo arros ixtlan sesentlakah manik se atekoatsintli. in mochiwa kampa eski kahfentah oso milaj. aw inhi “ma iyoka kiwalalika tenochkatl, ma iyoka unpopoliwi. yei axoxtlantli mah amo nechtatilikan inchayohkan wehweyi tepeyohkal tahpiani. ipa iuki tiktokaytiaj. aw sa siwa in tlamake in iskika tasitikatkan, iwan chiwnawtla iwa tesotlalnamakoya iwa atenatitech; iskika in tlamalotl in omito. weyak "kena, kena welis tihchiwase nopa [kali] tla . aw in oyowak in oasik tlahtlapitsalispan niman ye ik kipewaltia in amaxotla. i nikan ipan in motlahtokatlali in itoka malatsin in kolwakan tlahtowani. inikein kaxtilteopixke iwan oksekintin in owalake sanyeno ihkwak, senka tlamatinime katkah otechiwilike nemachtilkali, otechmachtike. otekwatekike. noyuhki masewaltin kimpalewike. itech nehin titsin, ompa onowalko altepenawak in itoka sentla, mayatlakah kiyaochiwki don femando, aw yewatl in, wel kimpewa yehika ok senka temiktiloni katka iyaonechichiw tepewani in amo imaxka mayaonohualcah. yoan niktenewa ok seki honka nawtetl tsomiikpatetl asul yoan chiwknawtetl kiltik tsomiikpatetl aw chikwasentetl amo tlapalo tsomiikpatetl yoan chikiwtontli ikikak [f. 7v] ichkatsomitl asul wel kiski in iski tlamantli i itech powis in noxwiw hoana maximiliana. nantli okihkwilo sente amatl mach ayemo kititlani toh. kemanian nech waltlalhpalowa. aw in atlixokan tlamelawa otli wei ateskatl weyatl mochiw; aw in inchan españoles nowian molon in atl, ik senka omomawtike, miekimtin ik mokalkawke ik kitlalkawike in altepetl mexiko, ik nowiampa altepetlipan yahke, ompa motlalito. inik ye noseppa okitsatsakwato in onpa mexikatsinko atenamitl, in tlatlapowtikatka in kitlapoka yexkan; in onkan walkisaya atl nikan mexikopa walwia, ik kikaxawaya. vi tochtli xiwitl, 1498 años. ninentlamatia,¿ak aso aik ik? aw in yewantin omotenewke ilpiloskia san ik waliwaloke kimilwike "ayatle xikchiwakan ma ok nenemin pleito". in kwowit kilwiah ‘texokokouit’ por in yek takwawak wan ixiuyo no iuki ya kemeh xokoxiwit. aw yniqu intech asiko in altepetl kwikwitskamaxtlatl, iwan kihto "quahuitl nikkawtias in onkan tlatlas kalmekak"; inin kimilwi in atonaltsin chichimekatewktli. hoksepa otikintlatlanike in tlaxilakaleke niman okitoke in makwiltin ka wel yewa tlale in itoka katka totol in imomextin hewaya in tokwiltekatl aw in pablo makwex amo tlale oyuh kitoke in tlaxilakaleke sa kimokwili in tlali inik onkan omokalti. nesi in tlakwaloyan tlapanko ka. ¿timonequitia titemoskeh ¡capan temamatlak, noso tikanaskeh in ehkawilwastli? walewake motlaliko akolnawak, unka mik in tlasotsi, unkan umotlalia toskwekwex. aw sa wel piskantsin, sa yuhkin se sitlaltepitsin, akitsin itonameyo walneska, in sa itlok inawak itenko walkistikatka in ixkwichewaka in ixpoyawalis in ixmatlalewaka, inik oixtlilewatiwetska tonatiw. tlaketski awile, kamanale, tentlamache, tentoltekatl, kamatoltekatl. no ikwak wilowak in pantlan. nomaiknin mowan yah. aw in yewatl in kwawitsatsin ipan in in xiwitl onkan onxiwti in texkalko omemasak, in walitstok in ipan ixkich ik itlalmasewalpan; || 124r onkan tlamasewtoka iwan in wewe itskwawtsin. aw in iw kitowaya in tlahtoke in anawaka "yn tonan in tota in chalkatl!", ankaso in ye wekaw mochi tlakatl nikan walmotlahtokatlaliaya i nowian tlahtoke, in okik ayamo makokwia in ayamo mokwekwetsowaya in mexika. tewan otiahkeh in nechka altepetl. in painkalko amo wehka ka. kwali mopaka in sosoltin. ihtik in xoktli motlalia ome litro atl; ihkwak ye kwakwalakatok ye motlalia in solnakatl ika in xonakatl iwan axox, ma kwali wiksi. ¿cuix tikinnelotinemiske in masewalti aw in hin ma toka moskalti, ma timuchintin timikikan. 5. iwan in kanin ixpan tikisas in ixiptlatsin in totekwiyo, ahnoso itlasowan, ahnoso krus wel tiemawistilis: ixpan timopachos ahnoso tiniotlankwakolos. aw intla wel yewatl in totekwiyo lesuxpo in inakayotsin (in iihtik moyetstika in sankto sakramento) ixpantsinko tikisas, tlapanawiya inik tikmotlatlawtilis in ika muchi moyolo, ka moteow, ka motlahtokatsin, ka motemakixtikatsin, ka motlasottatsin in ihtik moyetstika in sankto sakramento. iwan wel tiemawistilis in itokatsin in totekwiyo jesu christo, iwan in ilwitsin wel ipan timosenkawas. niwala ika méxiko tlahko xonakatl ahmo wehyi . asan axkan nokwakwilo atl iyolo nech val ya vikatiake xali itepewyan. nimotatawtia ika miak favor ika nehin orasiones. xii tochtli xiwitl, 1530 años. san ihki, san ihki. amo wel kwali. amo kwali nikochi, ipampa in kwahsiwistli nopan wits ihkwak sewa, wel miak nechpasolowa. xinechanalikixti asta ne atlahpenas se etsikitsin, inik mihtowa || 19r motenewa ompa poktlantito tlapalantito, kihtotia okseppa mokwepakiw okseppa kitlalikiw in ialtepew tulam in okixixitinilike, ka yuh mochipa okimokwititiake in chiwknawintin otlahtokatiko atlihtik mexiko tenuchtitlan in satepan, oksenka yewatl in motewksomatsin xokoyotl in ipan asiko españoles, inik san kwaltika yektika kimonnamikke inik achto ahsiko kalakiko mexiko tenuchtitlan, in momatke mexika yewatl in kapitán hernando kortés in ketsalkowatl owasiko. yeilwitl motlali inik tlamiminalok iwan kavalotlatlalochtike in onkan kurral in españolesme tlahtoke iwan akatika mominke; aw in intlatki in innechichiwal kontlalike inik mosenkawke, senka mochi tlasotli senka miyek ipatiw in intech kontlalike mochintin tlahtoke. otinechmonahnahuatilih. onechpaccazelih, aw okiyekkak; yese inik onechnankilih iwkin ahmo iyoloh omahsik, ahmo monelchiuha. nelí. otontekutli ikwik axkan sábado in ik 7 mani metstli de febrero de 1615 años, ihkwak nikan mexiko onpewke matlaktin hapón tlaka, ompa wi in inchan hapón, nikan mexiko opochtekatiko. mach tomin notech moneki. ahkopechtekatl, newa xinech walwikili naka tlewatstli, tzoyopatatah, istayohkilitl, yemoli iwan kafen. ¿tlen oktli timopilia? nikilwia skiera para hotlatek kwen nihkwalihta. . aw in ik konkwiya yewatl in itstlaewali witsawki witsmalotl koyoli nochestli tlalxokotl tlawitl tochiwitl ayamo tlatsakwali. awiltilo ipalnemowani. ni yaotsin, ¿aquin okiwalwikak in tenewalistin? aw kamo san tlatlaketsali, amo san kamanali noso sasanili, ipan machos ka neli wel neltilis ka mochintin yuh kineltilitiwi i ye wekaw wewetke mexika tenuchka iwan in tlahtoke in tlasopipiltin: ka onkatki chikomostotl, chikokkan in koyonki texkali tepetitech tepetlamimiloltitech in katki, inin tepetlamimiloli yuhki in atenamitl mochiwtok inik itech walmotsotsona in ilwikaatl teoatl wei ateskatl in kiyawalotok wei altepetl astlan. aw yeinti in ipilwan kinkawtiw in se tlakatl itoka atlatsin inik ome tlakatl itoka katka kokoltsin ayamo mokwatekitiwi in imomexti in ikei tlakatl itoka martin masapolkatl katkakiye sempoalxiwitl in momikili aw kinkawtiw ichpochwan yeinti yewantin in omotenewke marina susana iwan barbara maria iwan mensia marta aw ye ixkich kawitl in onkan kate ye yepoalxiwitl in axakan moteilwia in teixwiwan onkan in axkan in inamik katka in omotenew martin masapolkatl katka itoka ana papan. aw tel amo notlal inik nechmakake in wewetke siwayotikan notlatsin nitlal nawitsin katka in onka siwamontli nechmakaki in notlatsin onxiwitl in mokokowayan in yolokakopa mochiw. aw i yewantin in kipixtiake akxoteka in oiw kitta in, ik niman ye walmotlalowa in kinnonotsaske in chalka, kimilwike "aquin ye wits in tekpoyotl otik-wikake okimin, niman okoton in ikech". tlakaso, nikan nemi, ye nikkaki in inxochikwikatsin, iwkin tepetl kinnahnankilia. tlakaso itlan in meya ketsalatl, xiwtotoameyali. onkan mokwikamomotla, mokwikanankilia wan onkán mochawa inlá monekis pipikawak in ayatl pikawak mantiw in ichtli yeyi ichtoton mantiw wan in lá monekis tomawak pus kachi mimiak. i ye yuhki in ounalkis, niman ye ik wi i koyowewesi, topantemoksi, temilosi aw in kwawtemoksi; konkawako in kwawtemoksi in unkan katka kapitán, don pedro alvarado, malinsi. inintsin santa marta totlasomawisnantsin. ikwak amo okimomisatiliaya ilwitsin, okimokakawiliaya yeyekakoa. iwan tlakwali otlalwikisaya iman on kiawia nian amo tlapetlania, nian amo otlakwakwalakaya. in ait keyéh iuki kitokaitliah por ké in koyokopa ya in itokai. tepetomakwowit tlahko kolesxochitl 4 tochtli xiwitl atle mochiw. iwaxkawan. ¿cuix ok seppa ye tonnemikiw? in yuh kimati moyol san tinemiko. chiltekpin yon se tawana, para kruda se tayi agwa freska. tehwa taltikpaktsin niman kikwitiwets in tlatoli, kipakkaseli, kito se kilo mulatochili aw in onkan ikpak tepetsintli, ka niman ahtle xochitl in imochiwyan, ka texcallah, netzollah, huihuitztlah, nopallah, mizquitlah; aw intla xiwtohtontin mochihchiuhani in ikwak in aw wel moyekixkwapetsowa inik moyekixkwaitsxima, wel inkwayolonepantla konaxitia inik mixkwapetsxima; aw san inkanawakan onpewtika inik ye moch inkwexkochtlanpa tlayawalotok in intsonkal, weyakatsoneke in kechpan ahsi inik moweyakatsontia kiyakateki, yuhkinma ichpopochtin ik nesi in ipampa ik motsonkentia, aw in achi weyak intson in kwexkochtlan yuhkinma inpiyoch kisetilia inik kilakatskokolilpia; aw yniqu inkwayolonepantla kaxitia inik moyesitskwaxipetsxima, wel yuh ipan nesi korona kiteka in imikpak, yehika in inkanawakan iwan inkwexkochtlan weyak in intson tlayawalotok. se kilo tomatl amo mochipautani. reyes moteoxiwwewew xiktsotsona ya, xochiahakwinta i metl, i moxochikoski, mahsi astatsoniwa, timotlak ya i tikwilo. otokonkwik in anemyuhki, in atemakoni, ixilantsinko, in itsokatlantsinko sepoatok, kwelpachiwtok. ixpan ikak petlakotl ketsali in ikpak mani yuhki ma kitsontekontia teokwitlatl in ik tlakwiloli iwan ye mochi tlaso iwitl iwan ketsali in itsinkwe yetikak. nikan ipan in in ipiltsin dios in momikilitsino, in kimomiktilike in totekwiyo hesuchristo in hudiosme iwan in phariseosme, inik techmoma- || [12v] -quixtilitzinoco i nowian semanawak titlaka in timasewaltin in titlachiwaltsitsinwan. ye ikwak tenemaktik, ye ikwak nemasewalmakok. aw niman kikak kimattasiko in don christóval kolón almirante || 111v in kenin yewantin masewaltin okinmiktike in senpowali onkaxtoli ipan ei tlakatl in onkan mokawka in i mochtin kapitán diego de arana. aw inik motamachiwa in ipan mani kali makwilmatl ipan semomitl tonatiw ikalakianpa yewatl in otlikapa kaltitlanpa aw inik tlawiyakia matlakmatl iwan semomitl witstlanpawik tepantlatsakwali inakastlan onaksi aw inikoliwtika yematl xomolko onasi ah no yematl in ontlamelawa ikaltech onasi in anan hustina yewatlin amotech powis iwan intech powis in amopilwan in wel naxka notlatki onkan mani in ipan tlaxilakali omotenew. yewa itoka rosamaría. ma tikinkwaka tlen ni miktoke o kani nonkak at. in ipan siudad mexiko ik kastolomei mani metstli de marso de 1592 años nikan ipan sant hwan yopiko onkan otsatsik in tekpoyotl inik aso aka kikowas in kali tlali in itlatki mariana k pesos in itenyo aw in ikwak otsatsiwak se tlakatl señora otlanankili okito newatl niknokowis in kali in axkan montenyotia ixpan testigo tekpoyotl. in chikweyi iwan tlahko yowalpa. xiii tochtli xiwitl, 1466. aw sa ixkich iyoloko in altepetl sa tepitsinika in tlali mokaw in amo apachiw, in iw omotenew, ka ixkich tlakatl okittak iwan kimati in mexiko tlaka. kwaltia titlano hwan de grihalva ipan matlaktli omei tochtli xiwitl inik yewatl ma kittas in yankwik tlali. iixiptlawan motewksoma kwakwawpan tlachixtokke. se kwawitl tikonchiwase para axowi xvii pregon.- a veinte i seis de hebrero de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in tlaxilakalpan apanowayan okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal in itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak tlanankili testigo phelipe garsia. ante mí fransisko maldonado eskrivano. in ikin in kani, semi kinamakah in ekatekos. nikan amo onkak. aw iwan ye onpowalxiwitl ipan chikwasen xiwitl in ipan vi akatl xiwitl, 1563 años, in omotlahtokatlali tlakatl don lwis de sankta maría nakasipaktsin governador tenochtitlan. in amo xochiyowa. aw in ipan mochiw in ixiptlatsin arsobispo don hwan servantes aw in provisor itoka doktor ortis. aw in totlal in ixkich inik mani inik patlawak senpowalmatl ipan chikwematl aw inik weyak honpowalmatl ipan chikwematl honpa onase in akalotitech ini kiawalotika in atl inik ka wel taxka ka wel totlatki in tlali ka topatrimonio towewetlal. pahpayan elotamali osenkwalok in tonatiw ipan matlaktli omei akatl iwan sisitlaltin oneske yuhkin yowaltika. sanyeno ihkwak omik in axayakatl tlahtoani. xokoyoli iwan silantrilo a ver tlan kixikose mochiwa sah wan amo mokwidarohtani. ix tekpatl, 1592 años. ipanpa in ikal in onpa manka makpalxochititlan mochi kixitinike in tetl in kwawitl mochi nikan wala in tlaxilakalpan sakatla honkan imatika konketske in kali in pedro nanali iwan in inamik aw yewatl in axkan ye kikwilisneki in imikkawepol san ixkichi nikitowa notlatol. paso ante mi migwel hernandes eskribano. aw in tlakateusi iteikkaw yaokwistli ye omotlatokatlalia mesikatsinko; in ik-eixtin ewa ye omotlatokatlalia kwawtitla itoka tesosomoksi. in oyuh konketske kwawtematlatl tiankisko, ye ikwak konkawako i yaomik akolnawakatl xochitl tenochtitlan icha, ye yuh senpowalilwitl kikatinemi; in kikawako tiankisko tlatilulko motlami, amo motenochkaito. mah weiya, ¿yohualehcoc in kanika oyahtinemia moknitsin? tinemia moknitsin? aw in oyuh walmotlanawatili in owalmofirmatitsino visurrei, ik niman tlanke in kisaloke momustli, kisenkawke aw in kimolwichiwililike in moteochiwtsino sankta krus yankwik nikan teopan san antón ipan domingo espíritu paskwa in ik 26 mani metstli mayo; yewatsin kimoteochiwili in senka mawistililoni padre ye omotokatenewtsino frai augustín del spíritu sankto, senka tlamawistililistika tlayawalolistika in kimokechilito onkan omotenew ipan omochiw yankwik momustli. ipan orne akatl xiwitl okaxilti ke mexikah oksepa imaxka xiwtlalpili; ik kilwikixtike yankwik intlew tenochtitlan. onkan yemoichiki yemoixpohpoa yemoixpohpoa yerno ichiki yekwali. 2 akatl xiwitl, 1611 años. "ah, wahka ihkino taí kehni tihchiwa. ik niman ye kinotsa in tliltekatsin chichimekayaotekiwa, ye kilwia "ac tewatl, kampa otiwala?". sagradísima tierra antonio martín markés. tlananaltsa inin kichiwa in chichi ihkwak kitenmahmawtia okse yoleatl anoso ihkwak tetenmahmawtia yuhkimma ihkwak itia kikwahtok iwan kinmawkamiktia okseki chichime in kineki kikixtiliske itlakwal aya in mahmana, tlatsiwi. komo kostik mitzmacatih. "tlake pachaniko noatipa? aw in tlaka kitsowisnekis in okiktonnemi in tla tinotsaloske in ye umpa titstiwi tikitoa ka ipan titlatoske kamo ken mopan in timotlakowiani ka tehoantin tiktentsakwaske in akin tlatosnekis in ixpan hustisia. "yeka nimitsilwi na xinechpalewi". tlatsopeliloni, ixkich inmonekis aw in ax[sik] inik moteilwia ka ichpoch in atlixeliwki in itoka maria teikwicho aw in axkan ka ye iskich kawitl kipia aw amo nikmati kenin ye monamiki inik ye moteilwia sa ye ka yuh nikmati ka yewantin nemakeke mochiwke in itawan katka ka iskich nikitowa nikan nikchiwa krus.[f. 7v.] en bianko in sakat. xochiyowa marso, amo wehkawa xochiyohtok, sayoh se semana. newatl don hwofan] de san hwohan] olwatekatl ka nomakxochiw iwan nokniw doña gitolana no imak nochis kwawtli oselotl tochtli tlaoli sakad inik otitenamike aw onkan otimokwatekike in nokniwsin okiseli inekwatekilistli omotokayoti doña angelina maria gitolana= olwatekatl iwan ok miyakintin topilwan omokwatekike ya ipa omotiaü in altepetl motenewa méxiko okinmotidanili yewasin arsohobispo iwan wirei omochiwtikatka yankwikam ex[elentisi]mo don fraihwan de su/e/marraga ik momatis iwan ik molnamikis in ok ompa tistiwi iwan kitakiwi topilwan iwan toxwiwan in akime totech kisakiwi moskaltikiwi. ¡ipal nemowa! kakamatsin ikwik wahkahki itstó. yewa amo kwali omomat. xipohlimah tilawak in iewayo wan oksé kanawak iewayo. ye omotenew onkan wekawake in xikko in i mochtin in inmasewalwan akxoteka; aw in tlakatl in witsnekawal in inewan isiwaw in itoka akxomokwil onkan kichiwke onkan tlakat in xikko in inkonew in kitokayotike toteositewktli. aw in ika ye nemechonnotlatlawtilia makamo xikinmoxikawilikan in onikinnamakilti nokal ma ipan ximotlatoltikan. kiatlakwilti nopa komitl. yewatsin onkan tsontekomatl muchiw in senka mawistililoni padre maestro frai antonio de heredia, ipan ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1564; aw in yewatsin sankta theresa de hesús in kinmotlalili kinmokaltili imonhastsitsinwan deskalsas in san hosef onkan in ipan altepetl ávila. aw no iwan in ihkwak in okiw matlakpowalxiwitl ipan onpowalonmatlaktli ipan nawxiwitl ahsikiw in kapitán don fernando kortés, inin satepan markés del vale omochiw, inik tepewakiw nikan ipan tlali motenewa nweva españa. aw in ikwak omokalti niktlakawaltiaya amo kikawa san mochipa nechawaya aw in axkan ye kikwiske amo tikiximati amo ken niknotsa ipanpa in ninoteilwiko onkate in notestigowan in kimati inik notlal aw inik naxka walaske. texwapali noponi kiwikato para kitemas iomiyo yemotepewa non muchiwas asta los sinko meses para yomuchiw onkan in tlatekos monechikos in semiya asta mektli nobiembre. amo kichipawah komo kahfentah yetok. nochi in nanakat nochi tatamamej. nochi ika toyolo. para xienexti kani mokawak, aw inik kintentlapikiko yniqu istlakatiko in kweskonpixke, kilwiko in tlahtowani in witsiliwitsin iwan in kwatlekowatsin iwan in itskowatsin, kimilwike "yn axkan tlahtokehé ankimokakitia, in yewantin in tlahtoke in chalko senka moxikowa in amowiktsinko, amo ommokaktoke". "pues tohwanti timitstlahtlanilisnekih para in kwaltia para atol wan para pahti. newatl melchor dies algwasil mayor iwan eskribano migwel hernandes hotiwalake in nikan in ipan tlaxilakali san sebastian sakatla inik tikmakako posesion in pedro nali iwan in ipilwan iwan in iweltiw otikimonkalakike in intlalpa inik motamachiwa in tlalmantli inik wiyak kaxtolmatl omome iwan se makoli inik patlawak chikonmatl kaltech onasi. aw inin: “tle timailia? ma sa onchimalmanalo iwan ma onmakwawximalo; ye timitstonemachtilia, tlatowanié; ma itla topan mochiuh”. aw iwan ye nawpowalxiwitl ipan nawxiwitl in ipan 7 kali xiwitl, 1525 años, in omomikiliko in tlakatl don hernando kwawtimoktsin, san kinpiloke itech pochotl inewan in don pedro tetlepanketsatsin tlahtowani tlakupa; san tentlapiktli in kitsawktiake, yewatl kintlatsontekili in markés don fernando kortés. nochipa miak onikonkwalitak in awiltechihchikan. xikwalmalakachotih ika namotapetanilot. xochit nochi iuki, saj. iximacho in ixkich semanawak intenyo nawkwikanime in intoka "in moyome". in no monamaka. abril onkak ya in kapolin. wan mayo pewa ya itakka. en veinte i siete dias del mes de enero de mil e kinientos i setenta i ocho años otoyake in ipan tlaxilakali yopiko onkan imixpan san hwan otsatsik diego astaxochitl pregunero in aso aka kikowasneki kali ma kilwaltlekawi in ipatiw aw ayak okinankili aw exkan otsatsik. testigos: diego sanches hwan de la torre. ante mi lasaro de san hwan eskribano. yomotsakwak kiawitl. miak totlapaltizqueh. techilwia nomochacha tiawe tumpaxaloti otiwia' michoakán, morelia. aw inin in intlatol inik mononotsaya in nowian tlahtoke; aw niman kimatke kikakke i nikan tenochtitlan tlahtowani in witsiliwitsin iwan in kwatlekowatsin tlakochkalkatl iwan in itskowatsin tlakatewktli in iw kitowa in anawaka. monamaka kwesalan wan sakapoastan. . yewantin in in wel kim om powke in immalwan mochiwwke in aka kahsik sen tekpantli in aka kahsik kaxtuli. ma yuh kimokakiti i totekuyo teutl: ‘ma iyoka kiwalalika tenochkatl, ma iyoka unpopoliui’”. aw iska intoka in omotenewke nawintin teomamake in kiwalmamake witsilopochtli in ikse tlakatl itoka kwawkowatl, in ikome itoka apanekatl, in ik-ei itoka teskakowakatl, in iknawi itoka chimalma. mochihki eyi pedaso. aw no iwan in ipan in omotenew martes sankto teotlak, ihkwak yekene wel no kiske in ikseppa || 209 otlayawaloke in sanktiago tlatilolko tlaka in kofrades in itetsinko powi inik mopoliwiltika eilwitl teotl dios hesús piltsintli in motenewa niño hesús perdido; inin omotenew kofradía no iwan yewatsin itetsinko powi in totlasomawisnantsin sankta maría del rrosario. in nohpali in ye tlaixtlapantli mokwakwalatsa ika istatl iwan xonakatl. sanahoria motextilia, kolesxochitl mokwakwalatsa yese makahmo senka wiksi. ipan kaxitl motlalia in olipahchiyawisotl, motsoyonia in xonakatl in ye kakanatsin yawaltlatetektli ika sanahoria, iwan nohpali in ye oixikak iwan ye omixawi; satepan ye motlalilia istatl, laurel iatlapal. ma kwali wiksi. ika in tekit motohtoka in itanemililis tein ne keman ya kwalkwi in taler de tradisión oral, in taler kineki mah mokepa in masewaltamachilis inimako in maseualmej. in taler kiixnextia in masewaltamachilis ika in amaixmeh ixkanaukeh tein kwali nochi kiixmatiskej, amo miak in ihkwiliutiwits pero kiwalkwi toni nochi momatilani. nochi kemeh in techilwihkeh in tahtol, iuki nochi in tikihkwilohkeh wan ihwak tikepkeh koyokopa tikihkwilohkeh kemeh nikawín titahtowah koyokopa, ika in tahtolmeh tein kachi tikuij. in okontlalike niman konkwike in imitak, aw ik niman ye tlakwaskia in asteka in ikwak niman inpan postek in wei kwawitl. ipan in xiwitl ihkwak moxtlaw matlakmatl tlaoli, chikonxiwpan; in kikwiko hwes fransisko de saragosa, chichikoome tomin kitlali in sesen anegas, xviii pesos i moxtlaw. kenotimoyowilti, nonantsin. ¿ kentimowika? yahki. aw in ikwak oiw okimokakilti niman omotlapo in kali yoan omokalaki in kalitik yoan oksepan omotamachiw in kali san sentekistimani tonatiw ikisayampa itstikak inik patlaoak in ixpampa namatl ipan senmolikpitl aw in iyomotlan inik wiak ematl ipan se molikpitl yoan itwalo yoan in kin omotekat tepantli yoan muchi itlalo umpa onasi atenko. in ipan axkan ik 18 mani metstli de hulio de 1608 años, ikwak makoke possesión in sant augustín teopixke axkatiloke in kali iwan tlali onkan in itokayokan awatonko, in san ye ipan tlali atsakwalko; in onkan omowetsiltike in omotenewtsinoke sant augustín teopixke inik onkan mokets in iteopankaltsin señor sant sebastián, onkan ye no insenteopan mochiwako in mexika atsakwalka. . aw in xiwtotome iwan chalchiwtotome in onkan ki wal kwa yewatl in itsamatl itlaakilo. iwan no ihkwak motlapacho ipan kali aktiwets se señora iwan ipilwan; amo mikke inik inpan kalitik kaltechpa san tlamach inpa monakasikmantiwetsiko in kalkwawitl, inik kimopalewili totekwiyo dios. xxx pregon.- a veinte i uno de mayo de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in tlaxilakalpan teskatsonko okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal in itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak tlanankili testigo hwan fransisko ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. in tlekwesalotl ¡pan echekatl owi. . maske mas tikitasneki, xwel tikitas. kwaltia vi akatl xiwitl, 1459. nikan tamechtokawiliko, ya mokweso pampa axmitskawato aw in malintsin owalkis, kilwia in mexikatl: “tleyn taxtika, notlatsin mexicatl?”. yewa amo kixmati in noknin. aw intla ye okonmutstilitikis rei inin embaxador, ka niman ik nepa yas roma, in iw omotenew, ixpantsinko ahsis kimottilis in sankto padre. tihmakas tlen ne ormigas. aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl yankwika kwikako in nikan mexiko in amakemeke; yewatl kewako in siwakwikatl, kikwikatiko in axayakatsin. aw in axkan ik 7 mani metstli marso de 1609 años, ikwak pew in ipan iski akalotli nikan mexiko in omoyekti onowian mosokikixti itenkopatsinko in tlahtowani visurrei don lwis de velasko; aw yewantin okichiwako in tekitl inik nowian senchinampanekatl, iwan yewantin chalka in tekitiko mexiko. teipa pehki tona axkan sábado in ik 22 mani metstli hunio de 1613 || 225 años, ihkwak moman tiyankistli in totlasonantsin visitasión iwan mihtowa nwestra señora de la biedad wewetlan, in onkan moyetstikate teopixke sankto domingo. in wel yektli on kwikatl ihkawaka, konewa ye ikwik tlapalteuksitsin. wel awia ixochiw, tsetseliwi, xochitl kakawaxochitl. axonka tlen titlakwase. ya mohmostla michitlakwali, michime tlen aw ik niman kontokatia tlatokilitiw se kavalo tomawak, in nowiyan itlakapan sowtia inik kimiliwtia luto wel kiwilantia, iwan ikximanekwiliwtia kistitikke inik chocholotia omotenew kavalo kantiake; yuh mihto wel yewatl in iaxkatsin katka in ipan monemiltiaya omotenewtsino teoyotika tlahtowani
