arsobispo visurrei. xii tochtli xiwitl, 958 años. aw in omotenew doña augustina de gusmán mikki ka chilapan tlakatito, inin kuyowakan ewak in inantsin umpa kiwalitlan in don augustín ixkwinan tlahtowani chilapan, inik onkan tlakatito omotenew axkan omomikili doña augustina de gusmán. in kanin tlatlami kwaxochtli onkan xokonmamanaka estakas yuh titlanawatia in ikatsino su magestad inik tikneltilia nikan tiktlalia totoka iwan tofirmas axkan lunes xxix dias de disiembre de 1572 años. migwel sanches alkalde pedro geronimo alkalde. por mandado de los señores alkaldes. newatl fransisko ximenes eskrivano. tla nitepahkayowiani nieskia, nomaikniwan nikinpiaskia. teh nopa ya tlikoli nopa tihkwa inik onpialo tlaloyan, tepetl, inik onpialo in isel teotl. xochimitletlewatok mochalchiwkankakal. 18 in ipan axkan sábado a xx de hulio de 1596 años, ikwak motlayawalwi sakramento in monhas regina seli, ik mochali momamal in yankwik teopankali; matlakilwitl in tlanepantla moyetstikatka sakramento, aw iskilwitl momostlaye missa mitowaya. in tlatoltika kimonmononochilike konitoko tikakiltia in hustisia ipampa alvase[a] techkawtia in omomikili in itoka isabel maria yuh kitotia tiktsonkixtiliske in itlatol tiknamakaske in ikal in itlal ipampa ka ok yoma kinamakaskia in ikal in itlal seki kikwitia in tomines in ipatiw kali. se kwali tonali, fransisko. ¿canin tia? tein mateado, mohmorado exot wan pehpetaktik kachi in et. no nana kipaktia kinititix in ichpokameh nochi tlen kwali. itlanahnamik: —sa'on ye'on namech onkan satepa niahtinenka itlan in dóktor pus non melawak. ipan in ihkwak ipan ik xxix mani metstli abril owilowak in ompa tlalmanalko; waltenots in alkalde mayor don christán, ipampa onkan imissatsin mochiw in reina inik omomikili umpa españa. nimitstatawtia ika miak favor itskwawtsin in ikonetsin se witsilopochtli tlenamakak ochikawakawapawalok in ihkwak ok telpokaton ye okalak kalmekak itsalan in isenkalwan otlanonotsalok in kenin mohwanaltis in tlaltikpako ikoltsitsiwan kitenewiliaya senka mawihsotika miek wewetlahtoli in tlahtoli in teyolchikawaya in tenemilischikawaya mochipa kilnamiktaya in tenonotsalistli in tlamatilistlahtoli yehika san achiton nemiskiani in tlaltikpak kilnamikia in ikalmekaktemachtikawan in ihkwak inintin kinonotsaya itechkopa in itskoatl in motewksoma ilwikamina iwan oksekih tlahtohkeh in inmawistlachiwal okilnamikia in imohtlatokilis in ikolwan in ihkwak ohtokakeh in oahsiko nikan malakachtepepan iskatki inikeon kalpoltin intokatsin: matlatsinkah tekpanekah chichimekah malinalkah kwitlawakah xochimilkah chalkah wexotsinkah no iwan ikseppa pewaloke in chalka. wahkini kiilwi xinechmotlakaitili, mopaltsinko kwali yes. tein kwali, no kilwiah gasparilo wan tein amo kwali. tein amo kwali yeh witsiyo wan tein kwali se kikwa ixochiyo. ye yiman in okalahke sapatistas ompan amilko. okintlakalke achi miak bombas ika ametraladoras kan okitlakalke ome tlamachtilkaltin. ye yiman tika on miaktin federales omotlalpachoke ikwak oxitinke kaltin. inimekes tlamachtilkaltin; sente itokan konsepsión arenal iwan de pipiltoton aihmo nikilnamiki tlen itoka. ipan inin tlamachtilkali otlalpachihke miake federales ikan soldaderas. ya sikiera se metstika xochiyohtok hasta chikawaya iteyo. mochiwa saj. matlaktlomome tekpatl xiwitl ik poliwke achioteka. aw in ixkichkawtika ik nemowak, inik aotatakok inik motlakowiltek tepetl inik motlapoko inik tlamiko iyowi atl chiwknawtetl metstika ipan kaxtolonawilwitl. inon. wan mochiwa marseño mochiwa siete meses. tekitiyan in yunta katka barato muchi sasan patiyo. in kalehkapoh inkal amo quinamacazquiah, tla tomin quipiazquiah. inik onkan motlaliko inik axkan motenewa sitepek, kin yewatl tlatokayoti in tsiwtlakawki in yaopol, ipampa in itoka tsiwtlakawki. nonantsin omokwalankakakiti in notlahtol iwan axkan moprendahwanolnotlaweltsahtsiti xkmokawilikan ma ompa mokawakan sesean tomin oksekkan motilma tlen san tixkwawtik masiwki notilma ma ompa ka milakatso inon ammo nechtekipachoa aw in ihkwak on kis itekowanotsalis in on tlakwalok san imostlayok in ik seppa tlakwalo atliwa teiyemako texochimako sa tlapehpetli in kinotsa in atlia tlakwa. yoan niktenewa nawsotl tlilkemitl ye achitiwa itech powis in noxwiw hoana maximiliana aw in tsomitilmatli istak yuhki paño yetiwa itech powis in nomon felipe de santiago in ose sotl istak tilmatli ye no achitiwa itech powis in noxwiw ines fransiska aw in ok no se sotl istak tilmatli kwawnawakaiotl ilakatsiwki itech powis in noxwiw hoana xokoton. yewa okpa onechitako. —tikimopialia kokwehti. tlen 133 tlanawatihkayotl. inin amatlawatili, in tlahtokan tlanawatilmeh tlen tlahtokan sennechikolistli ipan moyolitiseh iwan nochi tlahtoltlanawatilmeh tlen iwaya mocualmatiseh, mokwalchiwas iwan mokwalchihchiwaseh ika tlayekanani tlen totlalnantsin, iwaya itlahtol selistli tlen wehkapa tlahtokan, yewan eliseh in weyi tlanawatili tlen sennechikolistli. in tlahtol tlasenkawalmeh tlen se iwan se tlaltalnawatili mosenkawaseh tlen omoihtoh ipan amatlanawatili, tlanawatilmeh iwan tlahtoltlanahuatilmeh, ihatsah tlahtoltlanekilmeh tlen tlaixnamiki welis onkas ipan amatlanawatilmeh noso tlanawatilmeh tlen tlaltlanahuatilmeh. in nanakatsin solo mochiwa ne weyikwoutah pero amo kachi se kiahsi, iksá saj. entonses ompa wasiko kitemoaya i papan ixkich oakmo ihka okihtek oya techinkwawtlahtli; temoaya' tropa muchtin wan akmo keman okihtek. amo xkinmohmowti nopilwan. miak wan tixti no iuki se kichiwa, se kipata itech at wan no se kitsetselowa. ¿acá owaia? xa itech atekomit, aw in tla tiseme titotlatolkepaske niman amo neltokos ka san wel tonenonotsalistika in tikchiwa in iw titechmaka in motomines san no iw timitsmaka in totlal ka wel taxka. ah tlamis noxochiw, ah tlamis nokwik. in nokonyayewa san nikwikanitl. xexeliwi, ya moyawa. domingo a xxvi de oktubre de 1603 años, in tlahtowani visurrei don hwan de mendosa i luna markés de montesklaros itech powi komendador sanktiago, ikwak maxitiko mokalakiko in ihtik altepetl mexiko siudad tenochtitlan, ye makwili hora in maxitiko, kiwalmowikili isiwaw itoka doña anna mexía manrrike virreina. aw yuh kichiwke, ik niman ye wi in kinnamikiske, aoktle in- || 50v -ic wetstiw in inmiw in intlawitol, sa yuhke in yahke. in akin yuh kichiwas senka tlatsakwiltilos in iw ka hustisia inik tikneltilia nikan tiktlalia in totoka iwan tofirma a xxviii dias del mes de marso de mil e kinientos e sinkwenta i siete años. don kristoval de gusman [rúbrica] don lwis de santa maria alkalde [rúbrica] tomas de akino alkalde [rúbrica] pasó ante mi hwan pablo eskribano. tla tamiki, xiatli. aw in kinkawtia ipilwan yeintin: in ikse itoka akxitsin, in ikome itoka wewetewktli, in ikei itoka tlakochintewktli. ii tochtli xiwitl, 1338. iuki kitokaitiah por in taki mahyá pipiotsitsin, iuki tamatisneki wan iteyo mahyá no olot. —para in trigu itek motlalis trigo tlaoli tlaoli tek motlalis, españolita, o sebadita. iskatki in kenin kitekwepkayotilia in tetelpuch inik nonotsalo onkak ome taman. se yehwa ya in morado wan se istak. aw no kitlatlawtito in tlahtowani || 105r rei ingalaterra, amono kinek. aw i yewantin in teochichimeka totolimpaneka niman ye no kitlatia in tonali in in nepantla tonatiw. mahtlakpowali gr. waxchili inkisisión sankto ofision in omochiw, in kimochiwilike yewantin inkisidores, ipan kastoli onnawi kwaresma nesawalo in auto omochiw. tlaixpiya. aw in ixkich tin yoliske tlakatiske in intechpa kisaske in inpilwan imixwiwan kinkawilitiaske ik kinmosemaxkatilia in ipaltsinko rei nwestro señor inik semikak intech powis in intlal in inkal. in sesek. aw in oyuh mowikak ketsalkowatl in ikisayampa tonatiw, ok nen kontlahtokatlalika in tulteka in ompa tulan, in itoka matlakxochitsin tlahtowani mochiw, aw ken tsonkisako aokak kimati. ¿queniuh walahtok? yewan temachtiloyan yahueh. porke kitemoah nifamiliares, tein nikawín mochiwa, yeh mapatawak wan tein mochiwa kwoutah yeh mapisiltik. in akin kwikwikaya hikwak in ye miek iaxka italtki in ye kitta in inekwiltonul inetlamachtil, in ye okitlaokuli totekwiyo. aw no wei in okiyawaloke yewantin in, iglesia mayor ahsiko, tlayakak mantiake in timasewaltin. onalmasalo satepan oniwiya kawahkalko onitladapechi iwanonitekitito nochi in semilwitl ammitla okse oniknemili san tlen opanok yowahtsinko omosdati san kwakwalkanton oniwia nikinmohtilito notahtsitsiwan inkochiantsinko tlen 64 tlanawatihkayotl. in tepantlahtoanih iwan wekapah tepantlahtoanih tlen amo yaseh ipan se nechikolistli, iwan amo motlahtlakol kixtiseh noso amo motlahtlaniseh makin makawa tlahtokan kampa tlatzquitoqueh, amo kiseliseh intlaxtlawil tlen itechpowi tonatih tlen amo asiseh ipan in tekitiloyan. ipan in in xiwitl ya altepetl askapotsalko; aw san ok onpa kwawtla motlalito in maxtlaton iwan in askapotsalka. kinilwi. in ilwakak okachi tlachipahtok keh yalwa. aw inik tlamiko metstli omotenew hulio, senka chikawak in manka kiyawitl. in tlatekki mah amo technexikoli opanoke miek metstli kintepan onikmiximachili ahkin omochiwtsinoko in nosiwawahtsin in ayammo mahsie in ichpokatl san kaxtoli se xiwitl in okipiaya iwan newatl ioppa ixkich axkan kema ye nipahpaki ¿ca ye tommoneltok teowa san kwateotl? wan no kwali se kikwa exokwetax tein selik. aw ini nokonitowa monamakas i nokal mochi in itlalo ihoan ichinanyo ontetl misa ik topan mitos in teixtin newatl maria xoko yoan i nopilotsin maria anan ihoan nomikkamon migwel oselotl exkan moxelos inik misa topan mitos. newatl don fransisko ximenes gobemador hwes in ipaltsinko su magestad iwan alkade hwan garsia in axkan titlanawatia in ipanpa kali inik moteilwia pedro nali iwan in inamik ana xoko inik mixnamiki in imikkawepol in itoka maria tiakapan in okikwiskia in kali in okikwitlakoyonike ipanpa in axkan titlanawatia in keni katka in ye nawxiwitl makwilxiwitl anoso ye matlakxiwitl san iw yes itech powties in kokoxkatsintli pedro nali iwan in inamik anan xoko. axkan domingo in iksemilwitl mani metstli de febrero de 1615 años, ihkwak senka chikawak osewetsiko in aik yuh mochiwani nikan mexiko, oksenka ompa in iskikan chalko mochi sekwalok i nochisnopali in okitokaka || 268 itenkopa se hwes español topile in kimokwitlawiaya; ye otlatsikoka ye omoskaltiaya wel tlaltitech okiwikak inik okipolo setl. amo monamaka. iwan ikwak umpa walwia in la china in don rodrigo en blanko imachtsin in tlakatl don lwis de velasko visurrei in axkan motlahtokatilia, aw san weyapan poliwiko, in iw machistiko. muchin yolime onka tlen momanteneroske para kipiaske hwersa tlamamas kimamas kwawitl. tlahko kilo kapolyolotl tokonotlapalpowa in nenemis tlatikpak. . aw in oahsiko nikan mexiko niman ye ixpan kitekilia in awitsotsin in ixkich okikwito in ostomeka. isisna no pankiski ya noponi no onkan kitlatike tonali in axkan motokayotia tonaliitlatlayan, ix osomatli, se akatl. nikan ipan in in momikiliko in wekontewktli atlawtekatltewktli, in tlahtokat chikwasen xiwitl in tenanko atlawtlan. in amo monamaka, pero yon tekoseh kemaj. nahmo solo nečinyektaroaya' nečinyektaroaya' primerito den nemokalti tlankon den la nele' tlenon itoka in soatl mate' ramira o tlenon itoka timomachitis den ompa nan mokalti tlankon den kapultitla ahmo den ikaltitla nokniw den nokniw ompa mopapankon. ipan chikonawi akatl xiwitl omochiw chikawak in tlalol lin. namantsi ayohkana wahka tiitstose aw iwan ye chiwknawxiwitl in ipan iiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1600 años, in owala tlahtoli || 103 perú, yuh omachistiko nikan mexiko ompa omomikili in teoyotika tlahtowani el lisensiado don alonso fernándes de bonila arsobispo mexiko; aw in itech katka mexiko arsobispoyotl chikwasen xiwitl ipan chikwasentetl metstli, aw ixkichkaw ipampa governador mochiwtikatka in nikan mexiko in don hwan de servantes arsediano. ximotlakwalmaka. . aw in okonsenkawke niman ye ik muxtlawa in yowalnepantla. achtopa onkan ixpan kimanilia in tetl itech powi. . iwan kixtentlilkomolowa kitenchichilowa tlawtika, iwan kitisawawana in inakayo iyamaneapanalis yetihkak isiakakpa kikixtilia. .campa ye nonyas, kamp a ohtli niktokas? aoai ayao ayao ayao ayao tlalokan tlamakaski kiavi inteteu in noyol, nichokka, se kimomolotsa wan mah sewi in at ika mah se malti. maka kimimihktia pur inkičiwilia' maldad. man tonawiakan, antokniwan, maonnekechnawalo nikan. ¿tleca ye tlahea oehkok in patlanalastli tlen ipan otiwala? moh. kiitak waltemo se xiwitl moneltokayaya para ma ahsiti ilwikak tlen ne vi tekpatl xiwitl, 1160 años. komo kahfentah ixwa oso komo milah se kichipawa. san nikintemoa nachiwa, o yahkin teuktli, xochiketsal, yahki tlapaliwketl, ilwikaxoxowik ichan. tinemiskeh .otlacatqui senteutl tamiyoanichan in xochitl ihkakan in se-xochitl in otlakatki senteutl atlyayawikan in tlakapilachivaloyan chalchimmichvakan. imotlaliske mach in se chaparrito bigotudo tlehkoya ikpak in texkali wan seki tlasintla kate. nima ye ik moyawa in imakal in tlatilulkatl, ipa mikal in otli nonoalkatl ikoka masatsintamalko mikal. i tekpatl xiwitl, 24. ihkwak tlakapa walwilowas xitemolwili otitetlahpalocoh. in ihkwak in ye iw senpowalonmakwili xiwitl ye nemi tulam in topiltsin akxitl ketsalkowatl. mahtlaktli kwawchili in ye wakki aw niman no nechmakatia in notatsin in ixkich kawitl ye tikpia ye onpowali xiwitl aw axkan ye techkwilisneki in itoka maria tlako isiwaw in toltekatl amo ma itlal amo ma iyaxka aw ka nel nikitlani in ispan hustisia ka onkate in kimati in testigosme in kimati. paso ante mi migwel de los angeles eskribano ¿ kwix onka nikimittas? ¿lmixco nontlachias in nonan, nota? ¿ln kwix nechalmakaske in kwik, in tlatol? nokontemowa atle onteka, techiknokawke in tlaltikpak. kanke tlanis. kemah se kipiya sikiera eyi tonal wan kemah se kimana ya para tsohtsopek kisa wan kemah se kiwika ya kwesalan. nawi xumali pitsochiyawisotl ya kipixto se konetl. kien sabe kanika yahke. santo angel de nwestra gwarda. amo xitlatsihki; timitstlalwia towan xiwala, tosentlalia kana chikweyi noso mahtlaktli telpokameh iwan ichpocameh, tiknemilia tipaxíaloletiweh inon kwahtla kikwitia “desierto de los leones”. amo wehka tinehnemiskeh kwali tasiskeh ompa konvento iwan satepan tawiltiweh ipan sente ixtlawatl okachi nepa oncateh. xii kali xiwitl, 1205. in okinechikoke muchi amatlakwiloli, nima ye kitsowalpepechoa ik onka kimamatepetike, kitsowalpepechoke tsowali kitsontekontike, yankwika unka kinextike. in kwamekat. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. niman ye ik tlenamaka nappa in koniyawa in tonatiw ikisayan nawkampaixti yuh kichiwaya. wehweyi malakach mochiwa kampa mochiwa. aw in ikwak in oiw konmokakilti in señor governador in intlatol niman motlanawatili inik walaske tlaxilakaleke tlatlaniloske ika huramento konmelawaske in intlatol niman owalake in tlaxilakaleke tekixkipantlaka iwan xiwitonkotlaka diego hernandes balthasar lwis migwel de rosas pedro noñes fransisko martin fransisko de la krus hwan de la krus hwan garsia. aw in puchteka wewetke yewantin tenamike in xochitika in yetika in amakoskatl xiwteskayo aw in ichkeketsali pepeyokyo metskwitlatika. notahtsin ammono mosalwi motlapowis momachitiaya wel kwali in miltekitl iwan ipan kwawtlahtli san ika kinmohtiliaya in kwawtin ye nomachitiaya kahdewan kitemakaske kwali wapaltin tlaxamaniltin iwan wepantin in melastike iwan ammo kipia kwawixtli yewatsin momachitiaya in kwali miltekitki kimatiitla kimopolwiaya san kan ika nokwik ika yanokonilakatsowa a in wewetitlan. wel melawak ahmo mixpoloayah in ahkikeh kinemiliayah newatl ahmo nikpiaya mochinon tetech monkki in ihkwak aka tepan ihkatas immanon ok nitelpokatl san ome ahnoso yei xiwitl onikaxilti in oninosiwawti itloktsinko in monantsin iwan ninopanoltiaya yuhkin mopanoltia in kin omonamiktihkeh ompa tochan senka netkkipacholistika tlatehtemoaloya in ika nemoas ipanpa in axkan ompa tikimoniwa algwasil mayor fransisko ximenes algwasiles hoan akikaw bartolomen rocho migwel mimich iwan eskribano migwel mimich iwan eskribano migwel de los angeles yewantin in kimomakaske in posesion in itoka maria tekwichon iwan in ipilwan bartolomen tekokowa martin iknotlakatl inik isemaxkaw ye mochiwa. ka ixkich inik ninoteilwia in amixpantsinko in antlatoke ma senka xinechmopalewilikan ixkich ini i notlaitlanilis in amixpantsinko isabel hwana. iwan topixke kinmoteochiwilia ika tlateochiwalatl. achi chochokoa iwan neteochiwalotiwits. ikwak kixoa in itik teokali amo nekwepalo, san tsinenemowalotiw iman yokixowak in itik teokali ma tikitokan ipan sementerio. ye yiman on kwali nenemoa iwan nekawatlalilo. onkwan on ye wiloas ipan texolal. kixoa chalma ipan chiknawi tonali enero. newatl don fransisko ximenes gobernador hwes in ipaltsinko su magestad nikan nixpan owala ituka ana xoko chane san sebastian sakatla okito nikkakiltia in hustisia itechkopa in tokal tomestin in nonamik inik tikketske in ikwak kechposawalistli manka kokolistli mochi tikkowke in tetl in kwawitl in iwan xamitl in ipan popoliw kastoli pesos iwan senpetlatl ichkatl. in kalehkapo nochi itlatki okipolo. neh nikixehekowa totonik. wan ihkino nama nimitsmakilis wel xikkaki nochpuchtse, nopiltse ahyekkan in tlaltikpak, amo pakoaya, amo welamachoaya; san mihtoa siawkapakoaya, chichinakapakoaya in tlaltikpak. noponi oyektok tlahko xonakatl in ahmo wehyi 267 vi akatl xiwitl, 1615 años. sanyeno ihkwak, omiktilok tihwanaltepetikpak lwis donaldo kolosio, in akin okitkikka ipan altepetlakah inseknikisalis motokayotia "pri" "tlan inimayanah xitlakwaka iii akatl xiwitl, 1287 años: ipan i momikiliko in chalchiwtlahtonatiw tlahtowani wixtoko, inin amo wel momati kampa tlali kampa altepetl ipan i momikiliko. komo se sinko minutos kitlapoto in tokniwan tein tekitih itech in taler nochi maseualmej, ome eyin sah amo. in tokniwan nemih san migwel tsinakapan, ompa tekitij, ompa nemih wan ompa taneltokaj. yehwan kiololohkeh wan kihkwilohkeh nochi in tamachilis. in tamachtihkeh pierre beaukage yeh kininextilih keniuj in kichiwaskeh in tekit tein kitokaitihkeh etnosiensia, kihtosneki masewaltamachilis; in koyotsin no tewantik in tekit kampa monekia tapalewis. ika in tainamikilis tiknekih mah moelkawa yon moihtowa ika witsa se koyot wan onkakeh tein kipalewiah wan tein kimakah in inintahtol; itech nehín tekit, nochin iuki titekitikej, amo akah okachi kimatik. in koyotsin no kisentilih wan kiwatsak in xiwit wan no kikixtihtinemik in tahtol, no tahkwiloh wan tein nikan kayomeh tekitikeh no kiitakeh in tahtol tein mokixtih wan no ika timonojnotskej. ixnesik ya itech se amaix, yon tekit tein mochiuj kampa moitak keniuj xehxeliutokeh in xiutsitsin, kwoumeh wan okwilimeh tein nikawin onkakej. xihwika ne ayatl", ihkini kiilwi. in tlakatl in tliltekatsin in chichimekayaotekiwa achtopa kichiw ipiltsin itoka tsiwtekatsin; inin, ye omito tlakpak, itech kis in inweltiw tekwanipan tlaka. ome xonakatl ahmo wel wehyi nikan opew, in ipan ome tochtli xiwitl (1910) wei yaoyotl iitik anawak motokayotia "revolución mexikana", in yuh omaltepetlali fransisko i. madero. xiktemo in monana. ipan in toxiw molpili; ikmakwiltetl kilpilike in ixiw in mexika wewetke. mila san wel tetechmoneki in chichime yewantin ammo san tla xotia ammo san tewikatinemi toktla kwawtla yewan no tetlapalewia miek intla kemmanian aka ammo kipia sente san niman kixtemoa kihtlanilia ma kitlakwili ahkin kimpia in konechichi toton iwan kimowaxkatia kwalimihtos inseki tekitl in kichiwa in milakatl anoso in ichkapixki iwan okseki miltekitkatlaka ahweli kichiwaskiani intla ammo kipiaskiani inin yoyolin axnihmati tlake itoka ne altepetl... onitlasohtlaya testigo. pedro heka ichan atlixyokan omonamikti aw in ixkich kawitl ye nemi ye xx siwtia omakok huramento inik otlatlakoltilok inik amo istlakatis ipaltsinko in totekuyo dios inik ontlanankili testigo niman okito ninomakixtiko ipaltsinko in totekuyo dios inik nikmati ye nawxiwitl in nikmiltia. testigo martin hakobo namike itlaxilakaltia san martin ateskapan makok huramento ipaltsinko in totekuyo dios iwan in siwapili sankta maria iwan in imachiyo sankta krus onkan tlatlakoltilok inik melawak kitos in tlein tlatlanilos in tlamelawak kitos ikimotlaokolilis in dios in tlakamo miktlan kitsakuktias. aw in yewatl yuh kito inik melawak kitos. nima ye ik owi tlatilulka kanato, unteaka witsnawak tiachkaw toweyo. niman omkam okikwateki se i{n} tech {entre líneas: telpochtli itoka d[on] nikolás baptikta de san bartolomé iwan d[on] fran[sis]ko hwáres de san hwan aw inon siwapili inon omokwateki itoka d[oñ]a maria de la krus nikam chañe sankta krus wikoltepek xochiwakam iwa{n} okse ikniwsin sa tepan iya otlakatki isiwap{i}li itoka d[oñ]a christina toribia de san hwan aw ixkichtin tlamawisoko in altepetlipan tlaka || 30 iwan in españolesme in nowian kate senkisako in estasia tlaka. 32. atomat o miltomat o kokostomat vi tochtli xiwitl, 1290. aw in ye iwki, in ye ilwitlamacho, in ye netotilo in ye kwiko, in ye kwikoanolo, in kwikatl, iwkin xaxamakatimani. in ye inman, in otlainmantik ink temiktiske in españoles. niman ye ik walkisa omoyaunchichiwke. kwoutsapot inin wel amo kwali. ¿ihuan amo otikmonextihtsino itla pahtli tlenika timopahtihtsinos? aw no ikwak ipan paskwa navidad i walmowikake monhastin in ipilwan sankta klara in axkan onkan moyetstikate petlakalko; ompa walewake ompa katka achtopa in trinidad, glerikostin in kinpachowaya achtopa. nepa mokwapatih se ahmo wei xonakatl . aw in yewantin tlahtoke in ki motlawtiaya yewatl in tlatokatilmahtli tehtekomayo xawalkwawyo iwan tlawkechol yehkasewastli in kin motlawtiaya in ixkichtin kipachowaya altepetl in tlahtoke. aw san niman ik iw weix makok in atl, tlaapachiw in nikan mexiko iwan inik nowian chinampa in inawkampaixti; iwan senka nowian tlaxikak in techachan, senka netolinilok. —tlenkwa nankimochiwililia ayatl. iuki kitokaitiah por in wehkawak onkak wan amo niman palani, wewehti saj. "pero ya ne toikniwa inihwanti tlahiiyowiyah "bueno, tlaskamati. aw in ihkwak in mochiw, ye iw nepa kaxtolonnawi xiwitl tlahtokati in tlakatl koxkoxtli in onkan kulwakan. xa itech karretera, tosewikan itsintla inon ixkwaxilankali iwan mantikchiakan man pano kiawitl. wan axonka nopa tlitl. ¿azo tle neli? tlen 30 tlanawatihkayotl. in mexikayotl tlachialistli mopialia ika tlakatilistli noso ika amachiwali. a. yewan mexikameh ika tlakatilistli i. tlen tlakati ipan mexihko tlaltipaktli, amo moneki moihtos kanin walowih itatawan. ii. tlen tlakati ipan seyok tlali, ikonewan tlen mexikameh itatawan tlen tlakatkeh ipan anawak tlaltipaktli, tlen itata mexika tlakatl tlakatketl ipan anawak tlaltipaktli, noso inana mexika siwatl tlakatketl ipan anawak tlaltipaktli; iii. tlen tlakati ipan seyok tlali, inkonewah tlen mexihko tatameh ika amachiwali, tlen itata mexihko ewanih ika amachiwali, noso inana mexihko ewani ika amachiwali, iwan iv. tlen tlakatiskeh iihtiko se akali noso tepostototl tlen mexihko iaxkawan, welis tlen yaotekayotl noso tlanamacanih. b. yewan mexikameh ika amachiwali i. kiawak ewaneh tlen kiseliseh ipan sekretaría de relasiones exteriores amatlatlachiwali. ii. in siwatl noso tlakatl kiawak ewanih tlen monamiktiseh iwaya tlakatl noso siwatl mexicameh, tlen mochantlaliah ipan anawak tlaltipaktli iwan tlatemaktiliseh amatl tlen kiixnextia tlahtol tlanawatili. in ihkwak in, ye oyuh nepa kimochiwilitsino in totekwiyo dios in semanawatl ye kaxtoltsonxiwitl ipan kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan onpowalonkaxtoli ipan nawxiwitl; no iwan ye yuh nepa matlaktsonxiwitl ipan makwilpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolomome xiwitl mochiw in apachiwilistli semanawak in motenewa diluvio, inik poliowak semanawak, in ihkwak ipantsinko || mochiw in tlakatl in tlaachtopaittowani propheta in itokatsin noé. kwaltia para tapalol, se kikwa in ixiuyotsin, niman se kiixmati, kwaltsin ahwiak. iman qujmanaya, qujnpepenaya in siwa in chipawake, in kustik innakayo in kustike. aw in sekintin sioa inik motetlasaltiaia, misokiwike, iwan tatapatli in kimokwetike tsotsomatli in kimowipiltike, san moch tsotsomatli in intech qujtlalique. in ye se xiwitl in oasikoh techkatitlan, omotlahtokatlali tenoch. wan para siwameh tein mokokowah komo amo wel nemi in ipili, kimaniliah mah tayi. kenin mochiwa xopan kala itek,in tonteyawiltiya. ¿tlen opanok? iwan in onpa walpewtika iwan inik tsonkistika aw inik kipwke otsontli ipan onpowali teopankalteposko pewtika onkan tlami xalmimilotikpak onkan ikak wei wexotl. asta kimaka kihtos mach yokikwenti íamilito den weyapa. ipan in lunes ik 4 mani metstli de febrero, ikwak missa ipantsinko mito in sankto padre sixto kinto, san hoseph in missa ipan mito; mochintin onkan mowikatsa in teopixke sankto domingo, sant augustín, teatinos, kalmenitas, deskarsos, mersenadios, iwan onkan mowikatsa visurrei. ye makwililwitia in teiknoitoto in kolwaka; i wia tlatlatlawtito estlooselopan, in tlatlawtiloto tlatoke akxokwawtli, kuxkuxtli, chalchiwtlatonak, achitometl. motenewa, mitoa ka yuh nawtlamantli mochiw nemilistli ipan iik makwili nemilistli —non akmo solo ye'on ohkiyon nelehwel tito:ka'. tahsiko a las dose de la noche ahsiko ompa tokawke čankunko nokomadre ompa tokawahko. okseppa kitoke in teteu: aw in hwan diego quimonanquililih, quimolhuilih: notewkyo e, siwapile, nochpochtsin e, makahmo niktekipachos in mixtsin, in moyolohtsin, ka wel nosenyolohkakopa, nonyas, nokonneltilitiw in mihiyotsin in in owala kimilwi “ac amewa? ka nekwaliwa in acolnauacatzi”. inin istaksiwatl tlanonotsalo mach okonmotitlaniaya momepilis; okimixotiliaya kwakwetin, metoton, kawatin. kenon omometstekitiliaya. wan ikan siwapili, kwali konetl, mawistiksiwatl, kwaltsin; nochi ixaxayakatsin kwakwaltsin siwakonetl. aw in iknowewetke in iknoilamatke kin ihkwak kalakia in ichkichtin tlanotsaltin. nechilwia ohkión nikilwia kwalani tlenkwa ki kwalania pero wise impipiltoton. mochiwa saj, ixwa sah in semilita. aw sanno ikwak in mochintin walmosenwikake in españa, in senka mawistililoteotika tlahtowani doktor hwan gutiérres flores inkisidor menor itemanawikatsitsinwan in senkiskakwaltlaneltokilistli la fee in nikan mexiko no ihkwak in maxitiko, yniqu inewantsin onmotlalitsinoke in yewatsin ye wekaw nikan moyetstika inkisidor mayor gutierre bernardo de kirós. yewan amo tech ixmatih. onkan otlakat pedronila hwana baptista, inin konmomekati se español itoka hwan sánches; onkan otlakatke omentin mestisoti in ikse itoka aniga, in ikome itoka diegwilo, kwitlaxkowapan kate. —kačikitoton. se tonali tiahke para oroapa ompiko titlamalakachoto. amo se kitoka, mochiwa saj. mah kwalkwikan natsin, i tochtli xiwitl, 50. wan taol papatawak, ika in taol kisa in taxkal amo tihtixtik, tein parahko taoltsin pihpitsawak wan taxkaltsin kisa tihtixtik. monamaka. ipan in in sekintin wewetke in kimachiyotia inik onkan kaxtoli onnawixiwtike in chapoltepek in mexitin. kwakwawtsin iknokwikatl kiski in x tochtli xiwitl. onkan otlamiko hotlika sant pablo tlalistakapan inik owalmopowtia tlali mili yewantin otlapowke in omotenewtsinoke tlakpak pipiltin iwan don alonso de sant fransisko iwan algwasiles hwachin migwel iwan fransisko. don fransisko de la krus migwel sanches pablo xwares.pasó ante mí migwel xwares eskribano. aw in tla welitis tlaknopilwis in notlalnakaio makitias habiton de san fransisko nikan kalitik mopia makwili pesos temakos wentsintli nikchiwa in kampa ye nimakos. aw in oksekintin wewetke ok exiwtika in kiwaltemowia, yewatl ipan kimachiyotia in i se tekpatl xiwitl, 960 años, kilmach ipan in in motlahtokatlali in omotenew xolotl ahnoso tochintewktli in onpa chikomostok, in anoso oksekkan in iw kimachiyotia tetskuka. aw ye omihto ipan ome akatl xiwitl inik asito kulwakanonkan motekato tisaapan in kulwakan tlahtowani inik se itoka wewe akamapichtli inik ome itoka chalehiwtlatonak inik ei itoka achitometl inik nawi itoka koxkoxtsin in tlahtokati in kulwakan xochiyowa itech febrero wan marso, taki mayo wan hunio. nikan ipan in momikiliko in xiwitltemok in ikkaxtolomome tlahtowani kulwakan, in tlahtokat matlaktlomei xiwitl; aw sa niman ipan in in omotenew xiwitl onkan walmotlahtokatlali in tlakatl koxkoxtli in ikkaxtolomei tlahtowani mochiw kulwakan. aw no ikwak mokalakike teopixke in istakalko sant mathías, in motlalitsinoto itoka frai fransisko reinoso, achto wel mowetsiltito yankwikan tlalmasewato in ompa. aw in axkan: tle tikmomachitia ? ma iyolik xokon motokili in otli, ma itla tokonikxinamik. vii kali xiwitl, 1213. ye neli in ayaxkanniknopiltiwa in tlaltikpak. nochi mochiwa kitokah plantitas. mochiwa saj. tinemiskiaya . achitsin texamoyawaltsintli kim ititiwi in onkan noxakaltonko in unkan nitlahtulchie in totecuyo/' inik ome tonatiw onmanka nawi oselotl in itonal katka. in axkan komilwitl viernes a primero de setiembre de 1564 años in newatl alkalde don martin de san hwan nikpie hustisia oniwala nikan ipan tlaxilakali tlachkwititlan onikintlatlani in tlaxilakaleke itoka hwan damian martin tlakokowa kitowa wel yewatl tlale in itoka tototl iteikaw tototl in ichinan v tetl. ayohtlatlapa in ipa iuki itokai. nahkilnamiki' para name’wan kennannemiske oksehpa. ipewyan in xupantla ihkwak ye kiawi omochiaya ma tlawelkiawi seppa anoso oppa yuhki in atl kiwilanaya nochi tlen pitsotik iwan kichipawaya in atlawtli satepan omotlapoaya in akwemmitl yopanoya in atl iwan ka okiawia yexpa anoso nappa ye motemitiaya in atlalili nikawín semi mochiwa miak. nikan ipan in san ye ok onkan onok in tlakatl kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli onkan wekawak in omotenew texkalko omemasak in ikpak tepetsintsintli amakeme, onkan matlaktlomeixiwti. in nanakatsin amo kwaltia para pahti sayoh se kikwa. tehwa kwawtawewentsin ik kimokwilike inik semikak onkan moyetstieske; inin teopixke yewantin in motenewa deskarsos ipilwantsitsinwan in totlasonan sankta maría del karme. nikanka moamamachiotsin. iii tekpatl xiwitl, 1300 años. tlanonotsali in totonik. ka yewantin in kintokayotia mimixkowa in se itoka xiwnel, in ikome itoka mimich, in ikei siwatl inweltiw. aw axkan sábado ipan ilwitsin sant markos ik 25 mani metstli abril de 1609 años, ikwak nikan mexiko omokixti omowikak kwitlaxkowapan in don hwan de servantes arsediano mexiko, ik mowikak inik ompa makos teoyotika itlahtokayo inik obispo muchiw waxakak. titlanilo nikan méxiko yuhkin itlahtokateixiptlatsin inin yankwik hispantlali, don hosé sarmiento i valadares, ikonde motewksomatsin iwan tolantsin. yuh tikmelawilike in tlatowani tokdor soridan in sa kimakake wewetke aw amo tikmati in aso tlaleke in axkan ye mochalania aw in ok achto moteilwike siwatsintli in lanmatsin aw amo no tikmati in kapan owala in yewatl in kinamikia. tewan amo nochi ticneltocah. ixiuyo wan imai no kikwih ihwak motema se siwat. kwaltia niman okikawako; aw inik teomama amo kikaw, ka wel yewatl in in okiwalnotstia in diablo ixiptla witsilopuchtli inik nowian owalnentiake in mowipan in ixkichika, || 60v inik onkan in owasiko omotlaliko chapultepek, inik onkan okasike okimiktike in ipan in omotenew se kali xiwitl. nama ayok wahkapa kampa noha ne eltok kampa tawelita wehkapan moskaltia wan mochiwa wehweyi in exot. yek onkak, kemeh nikawín atpoliwikopa. in ipan siudad mexiko a veinte i nweve dias del mes de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años ik tsatsiwa kali tlali in onpa mani teokaltitlan sankt ipolito kitenewa in tomines in iski powali pesos ik patiyowa aw niman onkan se tlakatl owala español newatl nikkowas in kali niktemas in iski ik motenyotia aw niman onkan oksepa otlanankili lwis savalos okito niktema chikwepowali onmatlaktli peso testigo diego astaxochitl. yewantin in imixpan otitlanamakake in tlakpak titenewtika inik aokmo sepa titotlatolkwepaske mesa ipan in otokwike in tomines sempowali pesos iwan matlaktli pesos iwan 1 pesos in ipatiw in kali in tlali in chinamitl inik otoyolopachiw etk. taltikpaktsin de mi alma. chikompoali iwan mahtlaktli gramo axox axkema kipano atl, ya tlakonana yawi. chikwasen awakakwauhastlakapali axkan domingo in ik 20 mani metstli abril de 1614 años, ihkwak teotlak ye no senpowalomome hapón tlaka omokwaatekike in onkan teopan san fransisko, yewatsin onkan okinmokwaatekiliko in teoyotika tlahtowani arsobispo mexiko don hwan péres de la serna. ¿aocmo miktlani?, istatl, ixkich in monekis ye ikwak i ye no momimiktike tenochka, i kimolwike “catlique topilwa? aso ye sepa kontlasaske, ase oquichtizque?”. ihwak tamewah milah kiuiuitaj, kan kikawah mah onkak, kitsonpachoti in mil, yehwa ika kiuiuitaj. nikawín miak mochiwa. ihkwak tlakati in konetl, ipan chikwei ilwitl ye motema in nantli. yawih kitlanewiskeh in temaskali (ahmo nochtlakah quipiah). in ihkwak ayahmo motlekwiltia, ihtik motlalia in popochtli iwan seserahtoton, tlahtlaniwa ken itoka in temaskali iwan quinotzah, quilhuiah: “xiquihta, hosé (intla inin itoka), nikan nimitstlalilia in popochtli iwan sera, nimitstlatlawtia, nikan tiktemaskeh inin kone-atsintli, xik-wapawa kwali, ma totahtsin kimixotili, ma mochipa kimopalewili, aik ma kemman ipan wetsis in kokolistli, ma nemi miek xiwitl, ma pakta muchipa. timochin-tin tipahpakiskeh intla kwali kisas in inemiliz.” immanon mokwakwalatsa in atl ika teyawitl iwan motema in nantli ika ikokoneton. niman ipam inin xiwitl oksepa walmokwepke ni sam ichan san bartolomé iwan san christowaltlaka iwan san hwantlaka iwan imak in tlatoke tetekwettin san bartolomé mochi imach mochi masewaltin xonakatepet iwan san hwan tepamkotlaka tlawel kijneliaj. in xokoyolin kachi tohtomawak, tekoseh pisiltik wan pesohxokoyolin yon tsikitsitsin. antokniwané ikike ya onoke, ixiwkechol kakawaxochikalitek in. ma ok xik walakokwi ketsalkwemitl, ma ya ma nikimonitwa chalchiuwilakapits, wewetskatikate xochinteponastika, mononotske aw aso yewan tepilwan in teteuktin in kontsotsona in konoolinia xiutlakwilolwewetl, xochinkala itek. ma xikakikan a ihkawaka, ye tlatoa xochikwawitl imapan, motsetselotikaki in teokwitlaxochikoyol ayakach witsil in kechol monenkawtsin teuktli. sakwaehkasewastika on mososowtinemi, patlantinemi xochiwewetitlan. in ik momelawaka kaki yewantin in momekatiani in tetlaxinke in ichteke in oholama pahpatowa in tlawanke in xokomikke yewantin in kimimakaxiltiaya. chilakachmoli ika tochnakatl san niman notahtsin onechmotsahtsilili tlen tikochi ixitlahtlachial ayokmo nikochtok oninewtewak onitetlahpaloto ken otlatwililok san kwalyotika tlasohkamati timonekiltia totahtsin onitetlahtlan notahtsin san omihtilwi ximotlali oksepa okitekakilti ik otsatsik nowiyanpa tlaxilakalpan aw ka ayak onesiko in nikan chaneke mexiko in akin kikowas ihoan ayak omotlapalo in ma okachi kipanawi lxxx pesos. axan otiake onkan ohkion tiahke. nowaxka. aw in ipan 1596 años amo kis amo kaxawak in kokolistli, san ye iwi totokak; wel ixpoliowak in telpochtli in ichpochtli in tlapaliwi in wewentsin ilamatsin piltsintli konetsintli. iuki itokai por in mehmekohtik et. xoxoktik nopa tetl aw senka miekpa otsatsik nowian tlaxilakalpa okitekakitin aw ka ayak ones in san nikan chaneke mexiko in akin kikowas aw sa tepan onesiko hernan peres español okito epowali pesos niktemas in ipampa kali. kwaltia aw in tliltekatsin chichimekayaotekiwa mochiw, iwan tlahtowaya itlok katka in iteikkawtsin tlahtowani atonaltsin, ya yewatl in in asiko chalchiwmomosko amakemekan. ipan in onkan senpowalxiwtike in totolimpaneka in amakemeke iwan tsakwaltitlan tenanka inik ye kate nikan, inik asiko chichimeka tlahtoke atonaltsin chichimekatewktli iwan kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli. kenin mochiwa aw in yehoatl angelina de la krus kitlalitia itestamento kitotika in unkan niwetstok in kali tonatiw ikisayampa itstikak yoan in unkan monoltitok ixiptlatsin totekwio yoan muchi itlalo [f. 6v.] ithoalo yoan in unkan onok tepantsintli iski ik patlaoak iski ik wiak nanmatl inik wiak itstok kwawtepek senmatl inik patlaoak ka nikkowili in itoka hwan kwawtsetseltsin ye axkan sempoal xiwitl onmatlaktli nikmakak makwili peso. iwan in ipan in xiwitl yankwik iwan ipan yankwik metstli henero ixkich ipan okwaw in chalka in nikan mexiko kikalakiko yewatl i morilos. ipan tonali ihkwak moteochiwas, no motokayotia. ahsi in teopixki temaskalko, kiteochiwa ika popochtli iwan kitokayotia ika in kixtianotokaitl kemen hosé, xwan, lwis iwan oksekintin. yese, in teoyotikatahtli achto kitlamawichihchiwah in temaskali ika xochitl, chinaamatl, kilakatsoa ika xochikuskatl iwan kimahmana in xochitl isehsekak, ika kampa calacoah. no itech moneki in teoyotikathatli kitemakas, kitetlakwilis galetahtoton, newktli, pahchichik iwan tlakweponis. okwili titonetechkwake; in ikwak tlepan kimontlaliaya i ye ikusi inakayo unkan konkwik tleko kikwaya. ik chikwasemi in ipilwa akolnawakats. amo se kichipawa, amo moneki se kinechmachpias. xochiyowa achá enero hasta febrero. in onkan momachtia pipiltsitsintin in nikan tlaka i nowian altepetlipan walwi okimolwili ma xikmomachilti ka sekintin otikin (tohua) [sic] [sobre la palabra del paréntesis dise okin]pawilike nikan mexiko topilwan otikinmachtike in kwikatl, tlapitsali inik techpalewiske in domingotika iwan wei ilwitlipan in ipan prima iwan visperas. in tlachinolxochitl, chimalxochitl, aw in kwaxochpan tlaka in atlawteka, in sa ye iwan ompa powke amakemekan, in intekiw mochiw morilos in kwawtla kikixtike nawi 4 mil; aw inik mochi mosenpowa in amakemekan tekitl mochiw in ye mochi matlaktlose mil in morilos in nikan wala mexiko. aw in momikili ayamo walwi in españoles aw san kikawtiw itelpoch itoka katka martin masapolkatl aw in momikili kin axkan ye sempowalxiwitl kinkawtiw ichpochwa se tlakatl itoka marina susana inik ome tlakatl itoka barbara marina inikei tlakatl mensia marta aw ye ixkich kawitl in onkan kate ye sempwalxiwitl onkaxtoli in axkan moteilwia in teixwiwan. . aw in ihkwak in ye itlakawtiw in inemilis in aokmo kwali in iyolo in sa iwki nentlamati san istlakatilistika tetentlapikilistika tetlanawalchichiwilistika in kintlatsontekiliaya in nawalostomeka in tiachkawan in ik kimmiktiaya se kikwa in itakilo. kwaltia ximopanolti. in tlatsakwali itlamian ixkwaxilankali mapochko ka. ximokalaki. in aso ayotl, niman yuh motlalia in tekuli, in ikakalo inik molinities, itik pawalitstika in itsontekon, molinitika, in ikech iwan yu ima, in yuhki ik mamasontitika. senka omopechtekak in kwawtli, tihtemotih pero tlen weyi michi". xochiyowa abril wan teyowa agosto, ihwak chikawaya ya in iteyo. sano ikwak walmotsawk i wexotsinka; nikan totla neka wexotsinkatl, ye nosepa tekalakilok inik yekene quiualtzacuh. in chikome kakaloh kwaltia mochiwa kwouhihtik, komo milah oso kahfentah kiteximah por in weyi kwowit mochiwa. ipam hin inik senka tlapanawia amixpantsinko ninoknomati in nanmomasehoaltsinmayuhxikmonekiltikan ka ipalewiloka in omomikili maria salome iwan in tesitsin maria xwares ka niktemachia in amotlatokayotsin. hwan hernandes. amo xiki in tsokwilatl. amo mochipautani. ayak kimati intla atenkisako, anoso kowatl okitolo anoso akwespali okikwa in anoso michin kikwak in temilotsin. ye otiknextihkeh in tlatsakwaltlapo in otikpolo. mochiwa milaj. aw inin yewantin i nonowalka in teotlixka in chalka, ye omito, yewantin achtopa motlaliko, achtopa asiko in onkan atentlipan; aw in imitak walmochiwtia in kiwalkwatiake || inik walake ka yewatl in tonakayotl: in tlaoli in etl in wawtli in chian in chili in ayohtli, ka kiwalkwike. aw in oyuh walkiske ompa inchan astlan iwan inik no niman onkan okisako chikomostok, niman nikan ye walnenemi; iwiyantsin ye yatiwitse, ok ye no motlatlalitiwitse, nowiyan in ipan ixkich tlali kiwaltokake in ohtlipan kinnotstiwis in omotenew komendador in ikontlamantli itekiw umpa perú muchiwas, kil iwelitsin ilisensiatsin kiwika okimomakili in komendador mayor general don frei fransisko de la pressa i mota moyetstika kastro aw tlani temoke, inpan kiwalmotsawke imomextin. kinwalnotstia in inteow itoka witsilopochtli. ma moyektenewa in dios tetatsin iwan dios tepiltsin iwan dios espiritu santo nitlaneltoka a dios ixkich motewksoma, nikan kinsiwamakak. ti maweweyak, mahyá matekpantok kemeh kahfen ixiuyo. vii tekpatl xiwitl, 1304. amotlen itechpa onikmat. in ipan lunes ik viii mani metstli de henero, ikwak momikili oidor balderama; ikxiposawak kitekilike in doktoresme inik patis, aw aokmo wel patik ik momikili, sankto domingo motokak. in itech istaktepetl wis amakemekan, walkisa onkan ayapanko, walmonamiki inik sa settitiwis tepopola walkisa; iwan se popokatepetl itech waltemo in atl, kitokayotia tetsauhatl ipampa i mochipa tetsawatiw ik kisa, inin san xopantla in walmoyakatia, onkan waltenepanowa i kala amakemekan, inik moch onkan walkisa omotenew tepopola. ximoxelolti intsalan in orne xochimeh. aw in kitokilia wel yewatl in tekwachtli napowali ipatiw katka in kakawatl. manitlanamaka in temohti kiawitl. aw axkan viernes ik 7 mani metstli agosto de 1609 años, ikwak omotlapoto mexikatsinko || 121 in atl in onkan tsawktikatka sekni ika tlatsakwilotl pwente mitowa. wala. mahtlaktli ome tenochtli ik niman kiwaltokatia in tlahtowani yakawetskatsin teowatewktli, ik no niman yewatl in tlamakaski ketsalkanawtli teomama iwan okchikwasemintin pipiltin in onkan ahsiko in chapultepek; onkan in sexiwti- || 62v -que in moch ipan in se tochtli xiwitl. aw sano ipan in in xiwitl in momikili in tlasolyaotsin tlahtowani wexotlan; aw san nimann ikwak motlahtokatlali, kontlalike in itoka kwitlawatsin tlahtowani wexotlan. ipan in pew in ye kwawtlatolo in kolwakan. ipan yei tekpatl xiwitl omikwanikoh tsompanko in onkan nawxiwtike. aw inik amo weka kitstika in astlan in teokolwakan, ka no intoka in asteka teokolwake. xiii kali xiwitl, 1297 años. o kenke tihchiwase nama? kwaltia in tekit kichiukeh seki tokniwan tein ipa ika nehín tekitij. in tokniwan motokaitiah taler de tradisión oral, iwan mopalewihkeh se koyotsin kayot kanadá monotsa pierre beaukage; in koyotsin tekiti itech se nemachtiloyan monotsa universidad de montréal, yeh ompa ualeuj, kiwaltitan in departamento de antropología. komalko mototonia in waxchili, moihseki in xonakatl iwan axox; in chili mosiyawa ihtik in atotonili, satepan motesi metlapan ahnoso ika tepustlatsoaloni ika xonakatl iwan axox. tleko motlalia in kaxitl ika pitsochiyawisotl iwan ihkwak ye senka totonki motlalia in chiltextli in ye achto omokwachwi; kwali mopaka in okonanakatl iwan ihkwak ye posontok in chili ye ihtik in motlalia; in chili makahmo wel ayo nien ahmo senka tetsawak; motlapachoa, ma kwali wiksi. se itoka tlaltetekwi, se itoka xuchikawaka. tekimakistli nochipankiski iixtiyol. inik tepew ketsalkanawtli in tenantsinko iwan aotla. aw san nima ikwak in ipa semilwitl omotenew in tlakpak in ipan metstli ihoan xiwitl in newatl diego leonardo eskrivano ihoan regidor mayor pedro geronimo ihoan pedro de san fransisko otiwalake in nikan ipan tlaxilakali sant hwan yopiko inik tokomakako in posesion hernan peres español inik otechalmiwalike señores alkaldes. ¿catlehua in xochitl okachi timokwalitilia? in xochistak. [al margen iskierdo oneltik omakok 2 pesos] inik 7 tlamantli nikitowa nechmakas home pesos kinmakas in nopilwan itoka hwana tekiwa ixwiw. aw in magdalena sentetl krusifixus iwan hontetl totlasonantsin santa maria itech powi in nopilwan iwan hontetl kaxa itech powi in nopilwan iwan home metlatl iwan chikontekl tekomatl intech powi in nopilwan. aw onkan mochiw in nekalilistli in ipan ixtlawatl in kitowa kitenewa la vega real, in ipan ipewyan metstli abril in ipan in xiwitl omotenew 95. aw inik asiko inik ompa walewake in chikomostok kinewayan inik tlayawaloke ye nawpowalxiwtika ipan onxiwtika inik motlaliko onkan chalko atenko. otechwalmotlalili walmotlamiti molpihtsino mochipa imaktsinko isigarrohtsin px xinechmotlapohpolwili ye nikan metstikate notahtsitsiwan noteotikanantsin topale omihtilwi noteotikanantsin otechilwi nan noteotikakone timitsmohtilikiwe mach titechmonochilia kinmach yotlanankili mopilohtsin miak tomin nik pía inik notlakowis. ta no awakat, sayoh wehweyi. ma kamo semohnika motepustko makamo semmohnikampa moteputsko xik wal ketstiw in mokxi (quitoz neki "macamo xi tsintlaksatiw) . ahkan o nech tlati in totekuyo aw ma ok tlawiskalpan nikinnochielia in tonanwan in totawan im puchteka in ostomeka in iyake; aw in xakali ikwak onxitini in tonapachiwke sa yuh omanka iwan in chinamitl aw in onkan omokalti in pablo makwex ye xxv siwitl iwan kichiwa in chinamitl yakachto konteka in chinamitl yokichtiw in itoka anna xoko aw in iokichtiw itoka katka i machok aw in axkan aokmo kichiwa in chinamitl in itoka machok sa kimixkawia in pablo makwex yuh nikmati wel yewatl tlaleke in anna xoko. in atomat, xiwit. inik okittak, inik yewatl don christóval kolón wel kipakkaseli, yehika in iw omito omotenew ka sanno yuhki in itekiw. . aw in ik kikwilowa amatl kitentia kiyakantia kixtelolotia iwkin in tlakatl ik tlachie in ik kixiptayiotia tletl. probes pipiltoton nečalye'waloa' niwala tia. tekiwaka tlali... xl... xl... xl... xl... xl... xl... xl... xl tokwiltekatl akoltsin yankwitlalpan mikito lx. aw i yewantin in chichimeka in totolimpaneka yuhke katka inik tlaminia aik nenkisaya in inmiw in ontlaminia, in ilwikakpa konminia in kwawtli in anoso tlein tototl; aw intla onenkisato in ilwikakpa in inmiw, inik walmokwepaya ye walamintasia in tlalpan kwetlachtli ahnoso mistli ahnoso masatl ahnoso kowatl ahnoso tochtli in kiwalmintasia in inmiw teochichimeka. viii tekpatl atle muchiw. aw in klara kikwis in romana iwan chikwasen metlatl niknopielia aw inin ka nikitowa oome kikwiske in metlatl in imeixtin in nopilwan intech powis. nima ye ik walmotlalia ipiltsi chikunkiawitl, in isiwaw unpa wala xaltoka itoka xikomoyawal, yichpoch upantsi chichimeka ye in impa axiwako. in ihkwak in ye iw nawxiwitl tlahtokati in ikome itoka yowalatonak in ikkaxtoli tlahtowani kulwakan. in no xochiyowa, pero amo nikmati kemanian. i akatl xiwitl, 1519 años. porke ya kikwesiwi para ya kineki yas kampa semi kintlasohtla in teixwiwan. nonotsalistli tlanki nopa nakatl wan ihkino nopa kiilwi aw inin tisosikatsin ok no yewatl kitlahtokatlalitewak in itoka witsnekawaltsin tlahtowani akxotlan chalko, inin ipiltsin in itoka atlawtsin tekwachkawtli, aw ye ixwiw in toteositewktli katka; aw ka || 106r ixiptla mochiw inin in istakoyotsin in tekwachkawtli katka. aw in okonmanako niman ik no ye wal temo in xiwkowatl. amatl itlaken yetiwits in inenepil kwesali tlatlatiwits. ik senka chokaya, wel ixpoposawak ixkwatolpoposawak. aw in yeh itech onasi mikistli, san teixpampa yewak, cholo, toktitlan kalaktiwets, ipan omixew ik mokweptiwets in toktli omf mani, maxaltik in kitokayotia milakaxolotl. omosenkwik tlaoli; okseki tlakatl okisenkwia kwauhitl iwan omonamakaya. iki on ika onepalewiloya onkwan amo tlamis isihkan tomin, noka ka kinextis tekitl. oksekintin siwame okimanaya tlaxkali iwan okwikaya tiankistli xochimiiko kinamakaske. ipan tika on tonaltin kosa otlanamakoya. okseki okitlalike tlakwali, noihki onkwan monamakas: atoli, tamali. ye yiman tika on kosa oyaya méxiko kaxtilteka xochimilko iwan kosa otlanamakoya. iki on ken onepalewiloya noka onextekitl para tlaka. aw ye omito in tlakpak, in ikwak in owasiko in chichimeka in asteka in kolwake, in ikwak in otlachichiwke in tenochtli itsintla; ka san ok tolxakaltsintli in inxakal in onkan mochantike. iwan se siwatl itoka chimalma ompa kiwalwikake in astlan; chikokkan walkistiake in asteka inik walnenenke. makwilpowali in mosuldadoschichiwke, in arkabus kitlastiake, in kimoyakanilike sakramento; in ipan tlayawalolistli mo- || 128 -chiuh yewatl in kapitán mochiwtia in don pedro odalola oidor. yei tepiton patlawakchili nikan ipan in in tetlan walkalake in tlalwakpaneka, chikwasen altepetl: in ikse askapotsalko, in ikome ...ca, in ikei koyowakan, in iknawi ..., in ikmakwili kwawnawak, in ikchikwasen wexotla, kowatlichan iwan tetskuko. ompa walmopewaltito in xuchimilko, okimottilito atl in kenin mani, ik niman ompa mokixtito in tulyawalko, niman mokixtito kwitlatetelko, niman ik ompa mokixtito in ayotsinko, niman mokixtito chalko atenko, niman mokixtito chimalwakan atenko, niman mokixtito in ipan wei alte- || 266 -petl tetskuko; iwiyantsin in mowikatia inik nowiyampa kimootstilitia atl, inik niman sa ik ompa mokawtsinoto in sitlaltepek, in kimottilito in ompa mochiwa atatakilistli. kostikpesma . iwan tlamachkweitl tlahmakwipili iwan chikwematl tilmahtli ilakatsiwki iwan kakawatl. axkana komo achtó yawiyaya aw achtopa yewatl motenewa in itlahtoltsin in kimotlalilitiw in tlakatl in don domingo hernándes ayopochtsin, in iw kimomachiltitiw ka nel itlakamekayopantsinko; aw satepan mitotiw sanno yewatl itlahtolo in onmotenew oksentlamantli ik kimotla- || 134v -llilitiuh ik kimotekpanilitiw in itlahtoltsin in tlakatl don hwan de sandoval tekwanxayakatsin teowatewktli tlahtowani tlailotlakan teowakan; in iw kimomachiltitiw. vii akatl xiwitl, 1239. makwili tekpatl ik poliwke kwitlawakeka. chiwknawi tochtli xiwitl ikwak poliwke kweskomaixtlawake. de se kitoka nojnelmej, kemah se kimewa, pero de sepa wehweya, amo ok. kichiwilia maldades mochipa kintlapanilia kaswelas ihtek walmoxixan in kaswela ihtek in komida. ma moyektenewa in itokatsin i totekwiyo dios ka onikkak in motlatoltsin in tinotekwiotsin in tisiwapili iwan tewatsin in tinokichtiwatsin don pedro dionisio in oipanwalikwiliwtia in amamatsin in itechkopa in notlal iwan nokal in onkan mani tonatiw ikaltitlan. kwali mopaka in xitomatl iwan moteteki ika in xonakatl; axox iwan komino motesi ipan temolkaxitl; ipan kakaxton motlalia in pitsochiyawisotl ma kwali totoni; motlalilia in xitomatl, xonakatl, in ye tlatetektli, komino, axox in ye tlatextli, yepasohtli, ixkichkaw in ye kwali otsoyon. motekilia se litro iwan tlahko atl; motlalilia in nanakatl, istatl; motlapachoa iwan ye mowikxitia ika ahmo wei tletl. ¿quezquih ipilwan in sowapa? chikweyi piltsintsintin. walewake umotlaliko in kwawtitla; ye unka miki sitlal, unka umotlali tekuhilama. kemeh agosto onkak ya, pero ayamo chikawak, chikawaya itech septiembre. moowa in elotl iwan mowika tlatesiloyan, yese achto motlalilia in anis ahnoso kanela, tlein monekis, in ika moahwiyalis; in ihkwak motesis makahmo motlalili wei atl inik tetsawak mokawas. ihkwak ye tomak ka in textli, inin moyexkampanakasemachiyutihtiw,immanon ye motlalia komalko ika ahmo wei tletl. ahso tlapanawia mowikxitis ipan sokikomali. achto ahso kwali yes motlalis tepitsin tekixkitl ihtik in tlahko tekontontli atl, ahso makwili minuto. satepan molinia iwan ma sewi ahso ok makwili minuto, satepan ye nesi uye omoxayokwitlayoti iwan in aaton ye motlalilia in textli iwan satepan ye moatilia. achto ahso kwali yes motlalis tepitsin tekixkitl ihtik in tlahko tekontontli atl, ahso makwili minuto. satepan molinia iwan ma sewi ahso ok makwili minuto, satepan ye nesi uye omoxayokwitlayoti iwan in aaton ye motlalilia in textli iwan satepan ye moatilia. "ah, bweno. icha mohmostla sa itstok in nanakat chichiltik. sempoali iwan yeyi iwan mahtlaktli iwan yeyi, ye sempwali iwan kaxtoli iwan se. viernes in ik 9 mani metstli oktubre de 1615, ihkwak omotlalitsino yankwik provisor yewatsin in doktor pedro león i plasa, aw in kastro provisor katka owets, sann onxiwitl in otekipano; visita chiwililok mochintin in onkan ofisialti españoles in audiensia arsobispal inik senka teka mokakayawa itenkopatsinko in arkobispo don hwan de la serna. aw in ikikak in kali sentetl tonatiw ikalakiyanpa itstikak tlapankalo inik ontetl kali san no tonatiw kalakianpa itstikak. ome kilo kamohtli iwan ompa walkiske walake in ixkichtin tlachichiwke offisiales iwan tlalchiwke; iwan kiwalakalakike in mochi in ixkich nepapan in kwakwaweke in ichkame in tentsoneke inik moxinachoske onkan; aw sanno yuhki kiwalwikake in tlaoli in trigo i sevada iwan in okseki in iyacho nepapan kilitl. welis ye ipan sekundaria temachtilistli ye otipewkeh sekintin in tikmawisihtayah in tomasewaltlamatilis masiwki ayahmo tikmatiah kexkich in ipatiw in ipaltsinko sente totemachtikatsin in wehyi kimomachitiaya in tonawatlahtol techmoyolapaltiliaya inik ahmo tokonkahkawaskeh in iwan ahmo tokonkawkeh tewantin in tontlakatkeh ompa santa ana tlakotenko milpa alta inik san tewantin tlamachtilkali kampa titomachtiayah in ipa se taman saj. aw inike omotepostokak ik niman onkan okimokakiltike informasion in okitemakake in fransisko martin iwan ipilwan iwan onkan kimokakitike in mersed inik kimotlawtilike kimomakilike in migwel de los angeles in iw ikwiliwtika ipan amatl ipan xiwitl de mil e kinientos ochenta i seis años. ma tisatl iwitl xitechmomakili ma pantsintli xikmakanan in okichtiw kihto in siwatl amosiske in kulwake ma konkwike atl i kixpake in tlekwawitstli inik tlawitektli ik mosake konkwike tekoli ik mixyayawaloke sa monomawike meltekke ye yiman tika in okimokitskilike teopixke. omotlatitsinotaya ipan sente kali iwan okimokixtilike. otlanonontsaloya kename se tlatiwani tepatike itokatsin basurto kwali okimixmachiliaya topixke ipampa ompa wekaw omochantili. omotelwilik: ixikitskikan in topixque! iiii tochtli xiwitl, 1418. waxchilmoltamali in amo mochipautani, ta yehwa ya tatsompachowa, tahtalpia ika in kahfen. kimilwi in teteu: oniknekia man xipewa in nehnemilistli. iskatki itlahtoltsin in otlahtokatlaliloke aw niman ya wilowa in kinkawaske in tlahtoke in aokwantsin iwan || 88v in kowasakatsin iwan in tositewktli. ipa iuki sah kitokaytiaj.in xiwit mahyá yon tekolomet.ome taman: tein nikawín mochiwa, yon amo semi wehweyi wan yek kohkostik wan yek tsohtsopek, pero amo kikawah in okuilimej.mochiua kajfentenoj, kwoutah oso kaltsintan.tein ipa nikawín mochiwa.kampa kitokaj, siempre mochiwa; amo kimewah komo kwoutah in ihkak.amo xochiyowa, yehwa niman matsah in pankisa.semi kikwah yon ayotochimej. tein parahko, mochiwa wehweyi. se kitoka itsontekon matsah wan ixwa. istatl. ixkich in monekis tehwa nimitstahtania ika miak favor, aw in ye pewaske mihtotiske kwikanime achtopa on tlamanaya in ixpan witsilopuchtli. konmana in inwen: in xuchitl in yetl onkan konteka in apetlak kwawxikalko. xvi pregon.- a veinte i sinko de hebrero de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in tlaxilakalpan tlokalpan okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal in itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak otlanankili testigo estevan martin. in xokoyolin sesek. kan tiyehkok ye nikan, imixpan o teteuktin, timawistlachiwala, moneketsa. in mexihko mokaxtilantlahtowa; in brasil portugwestlahtoli. in siwatekalehkan ika nantli omononotstaya yomonahnawati. konetl aw omotlalike imomexti tlatoke. ixwa kampaya wetsik in iteyotsin. yahki in maiknihtli tlen yetikmati yeoehkok. wan iyolo kikwih domingo de ramos, itech san ramitos kitetiochiwaltiah wan iwan tayewalowah wan no ika tachihchiwah tiopan, ika in iyolo kixijxitiniaj. . ma ok nikkaki in tlaskaltiloni in tlakawapawaloni ma wal wia in wewetke, ma nikkaki in intlatultzin. au in tlatilolkatl ye ispoliwi, i kwachik in otomitl i yaotekiwa ye ik mike in tlekikistli in teposmitl. onkak eyi taman: istakchichimekoj, tiltikchichimekoh wan mekojchichimekoj. xikalawakat maweweyak ixiuyo wan ahwiak mahyá limahxiwit. oyeya se tlakatl amo wel opakia iyolo kikwas xoletl. san iyolo okilwiaya ah kimati kwali xoletl tikwaske noso ahken miquiz. iman tika on otlato tlatiwani amo ximomawtikan, amo ximomawtikan: xoletl tikwaske nochi cuali. noponi pehki isistat wan momahkahki aw kwawtlapechtli moman in sant hoseph temimiltitlan tlamelawyan; tlaixpan ixkichtin mowikatsa in teopixke in iskikan moyetstikate teopixke, iwan tlahtoke visurrei iwan oidores iwan siudad tlaka alkaldes hordinarios, ixpantsinko mochiw in konmissario iwan provinsial. ni kim ilnamiki. nik kwikailakatsoa kowayotli.in tekpan nikkixtis, an ya tonmochin,kin ikwak tonmochin in otiyake ye miktlan. yoan niktenewa honka chikwasentetl yamanki istak ikpatetl yoan chiwknawtetl yapaliktetl yoan ontlatetektontli kwapachikpatl yoan nawtetl tsomiikpatetl asul yoan achiton kostaltika kah ichkatsomitl sa no asul amo wel kiski monamakas itech powis in santisima trinidad in iteopan pochteka yoan ome alawakapetlatl yankwik mokawatiw ixpantsinko mosowas in santisima trinidad. in itakilo se kikwa. iwan nowiyampa omotlananamikiliaya in ipan sankto offiko inkisisió; iwan in tlahtoke arsobispos, obispos, oidores, no kenmanian okinmonanamikiliaya itlamachilistlahtoltikatsinko. ikwak tontotsonpantike in titlatilulka, yexka i manka tsonpantli i manka teutwalko tlila, ik onka sosotoka in intsonteko totekwiowa; ik oka yakakolko, no unka sosotoka in intsonteko in totekwiowa yoan untetl kawalo itsonteko; ikeska sakatla siwateukali ixpa, sa ineixkawil in tlatilulka. no iwan inin tlayawalolistli inik wel mo- || 22 -chiuh no yewatsin iwelitilistikatsinko in tlahtowani don gaspar de súniga i asevedo konde de monterrei visurrei; itlaitlanilistika mochiw in hernando de san martín chane san pablo iwan osekintin tlaka, aw in iwelitsin konde xuchmilko in kikwito ihkwak umpa moyetstikatka. mochiwa ahatautenoh se kiita oso tejtepejxitaj. x tochtli xiwitl, 1294. ye iw xvi xiwitl tlatokanti i machistiko kastilteka atenko. tinemiskiah ik chikwasentetl iwan no omentin yahke tlapitske tlatsotsonke mexika se sant pablo ichan itoka augustín kano, in ikome itoka domingo sánches san hwan ichan. otlakatki yautlatoketl. aw ahmo teka timokayawas, ahmo titechichichas, ahmo titeaaxixas, ahmo teikpak timomapopowas, ahmono itla iwan tiktekwaltis in tlein kwaloni ahnoso iwaloni. ahmo itla iwan tikteitis in tlaili, in ahmo kwali tlaili. ahmo sokitl tetech tikchiwas, iwan in tlein ahmo kwali ahmo tiktekwaltis, in ahmo iwaloni ahmo tikteitis, inik ahmo tiktlatlakalwis in totekwiyo, inik ahmo itsontlan, ikwatla tias, yehika ka senka mawistililoni in itlachiwaltsin in dios. ya elki se piltoktsi nochtlakatl aihmo okawatemoke otlamelawaya hasta asiske ixitlantsinko toteotatsin chalma. melawak oasia teopa; amo sikiera omosewiaya. san niman kawatemoya iwan okalakia itik teokali kampa mawistik topixke omochiwiliaya misa. bweno, nopa san tlahtoli ipan inin xiwitl motlahtokatlalia benito hwáres yuhkin mexikatlahtoani. intlamo in kwouyowa pero amo takwawak in ikwouyo, ta yemanik kemeh yon nexkokokiswat. in ipan altepetl siudad mexiko a desinoeve dias del mes de hunio de mil e kinientos i setenta i seis años in mawistililonime señores alkaldes don migwel sanches pedro heronimo in kimopielia hustisia in itechkopatsinko su magestad. yes. . niman ye ompa in imayawkanpa tlali mihtowaya mimixkowa in tlalpan: no nawpa in kontlasa iyesso. sa ompa ommokawa in ik nawkampa ommihso. nimitsaxkatia nikan mah nochi tein aw axkan hwebes in ik 11 mani metstli abril de 1613 años ye teotlak, ihkwak nikan mexiko mokalakiko inik walmokweptsino in yewatsin senka mawistililoni in ye teopixkatlahtowani omuchiwtsinoto klérigo don pedro de otálora presidente audiensia real mexiko, inik ompa omowikaya omoteochiwtsinoto la siudad de los ángeles kwitlaxkowapan in ika epístola iwan ika evangelio iwan ika in missa okimochiwili; san oppa ika in okimoteochiwili inik se kwaresma okis in obispo don alonso de la mota i eskobar, ka yuh walmotlanawatili in sankto padre inik san eilwitl || 216 teochiwalos. iwan ipan kis ipan mochiw wei mayanalistli apismikilistli; aw inik ompa atenkisato in atenko itokayokan madera in onka asito, sa kexkichtin in momakixtike, senka mochtin mokokowa inik mochintin momikilike. poyoxelchikiwnakatamali ika nohpali tlaskaltekas seki otlatoaya masewalkopa, seki kaxtilankopa. noihki chalka otlatoaya masewalkopa. amekeños noihki tlatoaya masewalkopa kename tewan titlatoa. ii tekpatl xiwitl, 1416. aso neli ye motolinia masewali ye ika nekakayawalo; ma walwia ma motekaki in inchan tlatilulko, in ixkich intlal ma ipa motekaka tlatilulka. in axkan ipan ik 21 mani metstli de hunio de 1608 años, ikwak owalkalak in don hwan baptista hwes governador mochiwako nikan mexiko tenochtitlan; inin tlatilolko walewak, ompa hwes governador katka, inin malinalko ichan. xxi pregon.- a siete dias de mayo de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in kopolko okitekakiti inik monamaka ikal itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak otlanankili testigo hwan pablo. ante mí fransisko maldonado eskrivano. kitlanantehki intepalewilis sempoalan itlahtokaw iwan oksekintin totonakapan intlahtokawan in akike welsenka kelewiah momakixtiske in iwikpa mexikatlahtokayotl, asikoh kaxtiltekah in tlaxkalan yeseh amo oseliloke achtopan in yewantin. wan mohmostla kiniontlamaka ya san nama mehor ma mokwapa ne se rancho se tsitsikwewaiton kanela aw in ixkwekwenotl yehoatl kiwalyaka in kolwake inik walkalake kitlatlawtito tesosomoktli. okimitalwi in ika teonnawatilia iwan otetlakwawnawati okitlakwawnawati in se alkalde i nikan altepetl in itechpa in mexika in nikan mexiko ma kinkalaki iwan ma kinnemakti ma kinpalewi in yewantin omotenewke martin iwan baltasar indiome in ipan in inemak in iposesion in omotenew tlalmantsintli in ika kiknopilwiske ka nel inmaxkan ka nel inmasewal. aw ik 3 yeilwitl mani metstli septiembre, in achi okis in tlapakiyawitl inik sesemilwitl iwan sesenyowatl kiyaw, aw ik niman onkan pew in ye kistiw in sa ye tlapixalkiyawtimani. xii kali xiwitl, 1361. aw inik ankikowa inik ankipatiyotia matlakpowali pesos achtopa otikkwike chikonpowali onmatlaktli pesos tonewan otikselike in diego peres español ipanpa aka no poder onikmakak yewatl okinenemilti in notlatol in ipanpa nokal aw in axkan sa onpowali onmatlaktli pesos in onokonkwik ixpan hustisia ik asi matlakpowali pesos in achtopa otikwike aw ka ye inamik in kk pesos aw in tla kenmanian itla nikitotiw aokmo nopalewiloka mochiwatiw. ihyoye, nokonen. tlen san nipahpaki. xinechkawa timitsmatenamikis. yeke manon ayokmotimitsita. ye makwili metspa otitechkahten. amo tasikamati tlen san tekipacholi tinechmaka in ika tia. tla kena tinechseli wahka tiitstose sentika. in tlatokayotl konpewalti matlakowatl, in isiwaw itoka askweitl yichpoch kwitlachtepek tsiwaktlatonak, chichimeka tlatoke in inpa axiwako. aw in señorati mochintin mochokiliaya in ye kinkawaske innamik-wan, ipampa yuh mihtowaya san yewantin in okichti españoles miktiloske, aw in señorati san kawaloske, kinmosiwawatiske in tliltike; senyowal in amo kochke ixtosoke, nowiyan tlatlatike in inchachan omotenewke españolesme, san iw tlatwilike in amo kochke. aw ipan in desiembre de 1595 años in momanako kokolistli sawatl salanbió inik mikowak, wel totokak in kokolistli. kimaka nitewikak inomama kimaka sanehwa noseselto nimamatinemi noniño niwik nikanas sa'o. aw no ipan in in xiwitl in momikili in siwapilatowani xiwtostsin tlailotlaktewktli, in ichpochtsin tlahtowani kwawitsatsin, || 82v aw inik tlahtokat tenanko chiwknawxiwitl; aw sa niman ipan in in xiwitl in motlahtokatlali in itelpochtsin itoka itstlotsin tlailotlaktewktli mochiw in tsakwaltitlan tenanko amakemekan. aw wel iw kimolwihkeh intla okseppa walas, mokwepas onkan, quitzitzquizqueh, iwan chikawak kitlatsakwiltiskeh inik ayokmo seppa istlakkatis, tekwamanas. niwinti, nichokka, niknotlamati mochipautani keman nohnel. axan todo santo titlapapahka kantochikihwan tokanastas ikatilmahti ikakokomahti para wasikiwe animitas para ahmo techiwikaske. iwan imixpan diego poliwis fransisko aikwelitolok hwan kowatl marina xoko,mariana papan, marina xoko, fransisko papan martin nawalix testigos mochiwke. aw sa niman ipan in in omotenew vi tochtli xiwitl, in oyuh momikili in tlahtowani totoltekatl tsonpachtli, ik niman mononotske in tenanka, kihtoke "ca omomikili in totlahtokaw okatka in tlakatl in totoltekatl tsompachtli tlailotlaktewktli, iwan in ixkichtin wewetke otlamowak in omomikilike. nikawín amo semi mochiwa. mochiwa mas ne temimil, sakapechpan, pesmaapan wan ne kwitaxkolako, ompa semi onkak. aw in okseki tlali in iyanka ipan onmokalti in aixtlawatl muchiwtok axkan; ach ken ipan muchiwatiw in ikin kanin kemma in ok ompa ye tonitstiwi akike in españoles ipan mokaltitiwi. ¿toni chawis kipiya? konitoa “a wei inik teka omokakaiaw in tenochkatl; no tonewak in iyolo in atlipan tepetlipa tlatoca”. san ye onnentlamati i noyolio, nitlahpaliwiketl ni nesawalpil. solo iselotsin kit kwaltia pahti. aw in yewatsin tlatowani [entre renglones: tachado mitalwi] sempowali onmatlaktli tonatiw inik ontsatsiwas yuh omotlanawatili in akin achi miek kitemas tomines ka yewatl makos aw in akin amo miek kitemas amo makos yuh motlanawatili in akin kexkich ik kipatiyotis ipan neltis. inhin mochiw chikwasen tochtli xiwitl ipa, i mik timal. onikpiaya. ﻿cetzontli wan mahtlakpwali kihtowah totonik por in no kwaltia ika se kinaltia siwameh tein yekin mopalewihkeh ika pili. talkwechaktsin, in ipan axkan sábado a xxvii de agosto de 1594 años, in wewetlan visitasión ikwak mokalakike in sankto domingo teopixke inik ompa motlalitsinoto itenkopatsinko sankto padre iwan in rei, amo san nikan makoke, kastila wala tlanawatili. istatl. ixkich in monekis in axkann ipan ik 2 mani mayo de 1608 años, ikwak onmopewalti omokixti nikan mexiko in yewatsin teoyotika tlahtowani don alonso de muta obispo xalixko gwadraxara omoyetstikatka, aw san onmokexkichkawititikis in nikan mexiko. niman ye mononotsa, ye kimolwia "campa in tiyaske?; intla tikalakikan tetlan in wexotsinko, ka toyaopan; aw intla nose tokwitlawik titokwepakan intla tiwiyan in amakemekan, kwix amo sa temak tiwewetsitiwi?". . aankimokwiliske aankimokakitiske in nihyaka in nopalanka ka nikan amixtsinko amokpatsinko o no seppa nitlachix aw o no itech nompachiwiko nika tlawel tlapetani niman ik moyaomanilike, matlakxiwitl omome in san ok xochiyaoyotl mochiwaya; san iyoke in masewaltin mikia, aw in pipiltin amo mikia, yehika itoka xochiyaoyotl. tenonotsalistli itechpa in xochitl, in kwikatl aw san ixkich nikitowa imixpam testigos baskis baptikta iwan sebastian baptikta onikchiw notestamento ipam mierkoles ik 12 tonatiw mopowa de abril aw xiwitli de 1638 años^ = nixpam newatli d[on] diego de la krus eskriwano. se kitoka. tlakpak in naranha wel vitaminahyo. se akatl xiwitl ik mikiko kwawtlatowatsi tlatilulko tlatoani, umpowalxiwitl ose tlatokat tlatilulko. tlaokolwahwaloa kemmanian ipampa san ihkwak ye wehka teotlak anoso ok yowak tochkwalo techalokwalo in tlatlaolton iwan ahweli ompa ipan imil yes tlaxotihtas in miltekitki kinihkwak yewatl ompa kilpitewa kikawtewa ichichi inik kinmahmawtis inontin yolkame ken ka kinmahmawtia ihkwae ye tlapoyawti in ika in chichi san isel ompa mohta pewa tlaokolwahwaloa kemmanian no tlaokolchoka iwan ikanin in totochtin in techalome ayokmo mopachoa ayokmo motlapaloa kalakiske ihtik in toktlahtli momahmawtia ika inon chichi ichokilis iwan ayokmo kikwa in tlatlaolton in tlakad san kiwikilia in chichi momostla itlakwal in atl iwan ichichichi ompa kikawa miek tonali kemmanian ixkichkaw in yowehyiyak in tlaoltoktli onkak se taman saj. . "ca nikan anmoyetstikate ka onokonchiwato in tetlamamalistsintli in tetopil in tekakax o itlan nonakito kikalakiyah tixtli nikani para iksi. in xochimila itlak kali ka. amo nineki nimikis nineki nikaktewas yankwik xochikwikatl yankwik masewalkwikatl. kwaltia axkana sampa xitepehtoka in talseboya. o ya niwalasik xochinkwawitl imapan, nixochiwitsil, ninoyakawiltika in ik nompatika tsopelik welik noten. yewan ipalnemoani ye xochitika tontlatlawtilo. ye tontopechteka, san nimits awiltia xochiwewetitlan. atekpanekatl teuktli. on pialo wewetl, on pialo ye onkan xopan kalitek, mitsonchia ye mokniwan, yaomanatsin in mikowatsin, in ayokwatsin. ye xochitika on elsisiwi in teteuktin. ne wehweyi mares. itskóatl okimmakixti mexikah inwikpa tekpanekah iwan okimpopolo nepapan altepeme yuhkin koyowakan, teokalwayokan, tlakopan, kwakwawkan, mixkoak, atlakwiwayan, kwawximalpan, kwawtitlan, akolwakan, miskik, kwitlawak, xochimilko, chalko, tlatelolko (ihuan itlahtokaw in itoka kwawtlahtoa), kwawnawak, tsakwalpan, itstepek, xiwtepek, yowalan iwan tepekwakwilko. niman ik pew in kitehteki, wel mochi quinechicoh, kikwexanten. namantsi ma titekitikaya tlen ne agwaseros tekitij. tekwa nikan ipan in onkan momikiliko in itstepek in ekatsintewktli in chichimekatewktli in intlahtokaw in chichimeka in totolinpaneka in amakemeke inik walake, in tlahtokat kaxtolxiwitl inik ompa walkiske chikomostok kinewayan; aw san niman ipan in in xiwitl motlahtokatlali in itoka wewetewktli chichimekatewktli in intlahtokaw totolinpaneka amakemeke, sa ya ok onkan in itstepek ik katka. in wewetke, in tlamatinime nawintin, kenin mochiwa sanno ihkwak motlayawalwi asupsio, in okimowenchiwilike tlatkiwake amakemeke. achá totonik por ké kampa wetsiti amo niman palani, asta kwali waki wan pewa palani. ipa iuki kitokaytiaj. xiutsin. nawi ikpaltin omomankeh iyowaloyan ahkopechtli. wal pewa tenochtitlan, niman ye tlatilolko kisaya, nonoalko, popotlan, masatsintamalko, chapoltepek, tepetotoka, masatlan: kiwalnepanowaya in ohtli in ik walamelawa xoloko, ik wal kalakia tenochtitlan. kenin mochiwa se tlakatl kinehki tlayis in ipan metstli febrero iwan marso abril iwan xiwitl, ikwak makwilkan onpewke in soldadosme a la china, galifornia, yankwik wewe mexiko, lavaanna a la florida iwikpa sant hwan de lúa; ik makwilkan in yaokisato kastilteka. ye onpowali xiwitl ipan nawi xiwitl inik tiktsitskia in posesion tikselilitikate ka onkate testigosme in kimati walaske konitokiwi. mochiwa parahko kampa taseseya. 81. iwan ximotetlasotili, ximotetlatlawtili; ma teixko, ma teikpak tinen; san motolol, san momalkoch xikchiwtinemi in teixpantsinko, in tenawaktsinko; in tepaltsinko ik titlasotlalos, ik titlakamachos. ma tikteewalti, ma tikmotokti immoma, immokxi; intla senka ye wel tikmuchiwilia in tlakoyotl, in tekiyotl. ma mixko, ma mokpak tikman, ik tikaamanas, ik tikmosiwis in dios, ik isomaltsin, ikwalantsin, ipan tias in ipalnemowani, ik wel kiwalmotlaxilis in itew, in ikwaw, in isomal, in ikwalan, in itlawel. ix tochtli xiwitl, 1358. inik in semi nochipa motitlani in siwatekipano ontlakowa otnpa tlanamakoyan. yolokwepalistli ma ipampa in itetlasotlalitsin xikmotlasotlayekoltili, inik mitsmoknelilis, inik tlakawas in iyolotsin, inik mitsmomakilis in itenemaktsin, immolwil, immomakkwal, immihkaya, immonenka. inik wel tiheas. inik wel tinemis. inik ahmo mixtitlan, tlayowaltitlan tikalaktinkmis. .huiya! sivatontla xa tenonotsa aiyawkalkatl owiyavatlan xa tenonotsa. aw i matlakowatl in askweitl ye mopilhoatia, ye kichiwa chikonkiawitl. ik onmotlalike ye kate in toltsalan in akatsalan in mexika; ka tekokokayotika in onmotlalike, chokistika san omotlatlamaliaya in atlan. in ma xonkwikka se kikwa in nanakatsin taamanal wan tatewa itech komal ika istat. aw inik wel neltis in niknemilia in notehiknoittalis ma xiaw in ompa in itekpanchan in mexikko obispo, aw tikilwis in kenin newatl nimitstitlani inik tikixpantis in kenin wel senka nikelewia inik in nikan nechkalti, nechkechili, in ipan in tlalmantli, noteokal; wel moch tikpouhilis in ixkich in otikittak, oticmahuizoh, iwan in tlein otikkak. kwikapapalotl, nama imohwanti san inimokawase in ah tiktlasotla in melchikiw in motsontekon in ik tikmotla in texkali in atlawtli in ixtlawatl. xoxowki chilmoli ika katarinahnanakatl iuki kitokaitiah porin ihtipachtik in itakilo. aw onkan intenemak-wan mochiwka tenanko in pochtlantsinka chalka, ka tenanko powke katka, kitlaekoltiaya in siwapili silkwetsin. no mochiwa kampa kaltsintah komohkón kikawah mah onka. axkan lunes in ik 2 mani metstli de febrero de 1615 años, ihkwak nikan siudad mexiko onmopewalti in teoyotika tlahtowani don frai hwan sapata i sandoval obispo, ompa mowika in ipan siudad chiapa, ompa kimopielis in altepetl; san ei metstli ipan tlako nikan mexiko metstikatka inik niman omowikak. kwaltsitsin in ixiuyo wan chichiltik wan in iteyo kemeh kapoltsitsin. in ipampa noyolo kimatia ahtle wel nikchiwaskiani yolsewkayotika oninokwep in nochan iwan aik ma kemman inon onikilnamiko san wewehkawtika niknemiliaya in notahtsin onechmolwili iwan welis sempoali makwili xiwitl ipan ye nopan omochiw se mawistik tlamantli onikmokochihtili in notahtsin in nechmahwiliaya in ipampa ahmo onikchiw in yewatsin onechmonawatilihtewak ahso ahmo motech moneki in tomin leika ahmo tikkixtihtika kan onimitsilwi tlatlanawatiltin: oktepitsinika, kwali yowaltin. axkan hweves in ik 23 mani metstli oktubre de 1614 años, ihkwak nikan mexiko onmopewaltihke omentin teopixke san fransisko deskalsos, mowika hapón ompa motemachtiliske. noihki tlaka okimasia mamasa, totochtin, teporingo; noihki yepatl ika tepatiloya inomekes nekokoloya itech toyeso. okinkwakwalachiliaya; amo okitlaliliaya istatl. kiltekisiayo kokoxki inon tlen ikowisia yepanakatl iwan kikwas tepitsin nakatl. noihki tlakamo tsopiniaya ika akoxa iwan itech iman okalakia ika in yolkatl in nakayo noso ikwitlaxewayo. san kitlaliliske san kampa oyeya akoxa iwan okikixtiaya. iki on ik okimpatiaya achtokopa. okachi itstik aw no onkan in iknawpa kilpiliko in inxiw mexika; ikpak wets in tlekwawitl in tepetl i ye itoka tekpayo, ipan in tlahtowani wewe witsiliwitl. intla ome kaltis ontetl solin in kimiktia, aw intla ei intla nawi kaltis iskitetl solin kimiktia. in ixwa saj, komo se kikwa wan se kitamota in iteyo. komo kahfentah ihkak, nochi se kimewa. aw in tlalmantli inik patlahoak v maitl aw in atentli makwili maitl in iwikpa chinamitl aw inik wiwiyak in iyonteixtin chinamitl chichiwknawi maitl in onkan tlatlantika estakas. kitokayotiayah axolotl wewehmexihka ok wel mani intla tikinpalewiah in oumik matlakowatl walmotlali in ipiltsi chikonkiawsi; nima ye kiwalsiwatlama xaltoka yichpoch chichimekatl upansi, i siwatl itoka xikomoyawal; ye mopilwatia ye kichiwa teskapoktsi, akolnawakatsi, san omesti ipilwa. tasohkamatik. ach ka no in on aso se ya in ipalnemoa ach ka no in on aso tle neli in tlaltikpak. ma kwel achik aya ma ok ixkich kawitl nikinnotlanewi in chalchiwtini, in makistini in tepilwan. xtahtanitih ne natmalin aw ye kin teotlak lunes in otokok inakayotsin onkan iglesia mayor; onkan motetokiliko in teoyotika tlahtowani don hwan péres de la serna arsobispo mexiko iwan mochintin in kabilto tlaka onkan otetokako iwan omentin oidores in onkan okimotokiliko. kwaltia ka ayak i masatl kimonekiltia, ka ye otitlamake se okichtli se siwatl in oticacique”. aw in ye oyuh kitlalten, satepa okikwawtsotson, miek in kwamimiltotonti onkan okikwawtsotson inik chikawas tlali, inik wel ipan ye mokaltia; san oksentetl in ikal onkan okonpewalti ye kichiwa itienda yes. iuki monotsa tak por in oksi yehyemania. in iknawi ipiltsi siwatsintli xiwkoyolmakistli, unpa wikok in kecholak, inamik mochiw itoka matlakaltsi. mochiwa kajfentaj. newa amotlen onikpolo. oantlanamakakeh kwouxilot inin wei tlahtoani okimpopolo noyuhki in tekiskiak chanehke iwan omik ipan matlaktli tekpatl xiwitl. axkan sábado ik 3 mani metstli de oktubre de 1609 años, ipan ivisperatsin san fransisko, in omomikili i notlasoikniwtsin padre helías donado powki itlatekpanalpantsinko in señor sankt fransisko, toktok onkan in sant hosep mexiko; inin xochmilko ichantsinko, senka wekaw in omotlamasewili ika hábito, newatl domingo de san antón muñón in ikniwtsin onikatka. ahwel niksentlamis inin notlahtol intla ahmo nokompowas sekih tlaxeliwkayotl in ipan wewe mexihko semanawak monemiliaya itechkopa in tlamatini yewatsin in temachtikatsintli leonportila miekpan kimotenewia yese axkan iwikpatsinko nokonihtoa se kilo textli aw in axkan ikomilwitl martes sankto teotlak, ihkwak yekene wel okiske in kofrades españoles in itetsinko ponwi in ipilwantsitsinwan señor san hwan baptista, senka mawistik inik kiske inik tlayawaloke; onkan kiske in teopan monasterio monhas motenewa san hwan la penitensia moyotlan, aw tlayakak mantiake in mexika in onkan tlaka tekikaltitlan tlaxilakaleke. san noiwan se tekontontli pinoli in ipan nawtsontli ommatlaktli omeppoali ipan matlaktli xiwitl, mosentlalike in ompa altepetikpak vatikano mochtin weweintin iteopixkawan nowianyo teonechikolistli. yewatl on iximacho yuhkin "inic se inesentlalilis in vatikano". kaldito no kwali se kikwa akoloj. mah amo tawaki, inik ye mowika sentetl kikechilia in ixakaltsin kwawtemoktsin, nononkwa moxakaltitiwetske, sentetl tlatilulko xakali no sentetl in tenochkatl ixakal kinkechilia, nonkwa motlalitiwi. ¡ ma nemaititotilo ya! tonalwetsian yoixpoli in tonali. aw in wewe witsiliwitl ompa mik in kulwakan, ompa kimiktike in kulwake; in tlahtokat senpowalonchikwexiwitl inik kinpacho mexika chichimeka. mah amo tetewaki in taxkaltsin, in in tlekok niman ye ik wal temo in tetewpowali onkan kiwal mana in itlakwayan witsilopochtli nawkampa in kon iyawa. yewan ye wehkapa omochanamacaqueh. pehki tlehkok tlehkok aw niman otlanawati in xochitewitli okito okinmilwi xikiktakam in amewantin nikan ankate ximimatikam in tewatl in titemilotli iwan tewatl in tiistlapalteowa amo kemaniam no yuhki amopam mochiwas in kenin omochiw ipam inin tlakatl inin tlamawisoli ka sa no yuhki /ypa[n] o a/{entre líneas: o}mochiw in tepexik owala ka no yuhki amopam mochiwas ka ye ik sa semi nitlatowa ayaemo ok {entre líneas: k}pa nikakis inin tlatoli ipampa inin tlali ka yene chikawak in wei tlatowani moteuksomasin san kiwikaltitikisa in ik tetsonkwitikisa. intla ome intla ei intla nawi tlaaltili iskipa iw kichiwa. iki on otiwaltemoke ka ikpak tehwewentin. okitikisako ika san lwis akweskomatl. yompoyon onexexelolo seki tlakatl. seki owalwiloak hasta san gregroio atlapulko. tlen yotlaixmatia ika xochimilko owalake onetlalilo tlanamako. wel in iw ipan kakistia atl inik tetekwikaya yuhkinma kana tepexik walmotepexiwia, yuhkinma kexkich amo wel mihtos motenewas ik patlawak wei atoyatl, inik temamawti mochiw itetekwikalis atl. kwaltia onmotskalo in tonatiw, ok tlaka. iwkin teskatl ikpak mani, malakachtik, tewilakachtik, iwkin sapottikak. in totonik. nawi xumali pitsochiyawisotl in ipan axkan kwaresma ik 16 mani metstli marso de 1606 años, no ikwak momikili in don bartholomé fransisko xochikentsin alkalde katka nikan mexiko, inin ipiltsin in don pablo xochikentsin katka. ometsontli wan mah tlakpwali akmo nian ika sien pesos ahmo kwikak ini mandado den plasa ke era un kwixanklito. aw ka makos, aw intlakamo amo wel tepachos amo wel tewilanas, amo wel itlatititsaltlapachol mochiwas in okseki altepetl in yewatl on weitsontekoaltepetl muchiwtika in onkan ka arsobispo motenewa metrópoli, iwan amono wel tenechikos amo wel tesentlalis in teotlaneltililisnenonotsalistli konsilio ik muchiwas, iwan amono wel onkan teteochiwas in teopixkayotika in ipan arsobispado yniqu iw teoyotika tetsonteko onkan sankta iglesia; ka in aki ye omuchiw arsobispo ka niman kimitlanililis in palio sankto padre, wel yewatl yas anoso itepantlahtokaw iprokurador san kititlanis, san ixkichika chikwasen metstli kiwalwikiliske palio, aw inin ka wel i asika itson manka in arkobispoyotl. kampa onkak amo semi mochiwa in kahfen, totonik tak por ké kiwatsa in kahfen. anmowaxka. inin omotenew tlahtokasiwapili infanta doña isabel tekwichputsin de mutewksuma wel ichputsin in wei tlahtowani katka mutewksumatsin xokoyotl in ikteomeka in iwki intoka in nikan mexiko tenuchtitlan tlahtoke katka; aw ipampa inik nikan motenewa wei tlahtowani katka motewksumatsin xokoyotl ka wel ixwiwtsin in omotenew siwateupixki doña isabel de mutewksuma in axkan omomikili ipan semilwitl omotenew. ompa milpa alta amo onyeya atl. owilaloya nochkalko tlapakos seki tlakatl. owilaloya noihki tlapakos ika san gregorio atlapulko; okseki ompa tekomik. iki on otechpiaya tichichipawakes. tatatsintli omewaya keman nawi tlamachotiloni ika se kawayo wan kwitlaxtli oyaya kikwiske atl ompa nochkalko. yewatl on otikia iwan ika otlakwalchiwaloya. opapanok iki in tlen omotetekipano. ye ni wala, antokniwan in:nokonkoskasoya,niktsinitskamana,niktlawkecholiwimolowa,nikteokwitla ikwiya,nikketsalwixtoilpisin ikniwyotli. ipan in in xiwitl in kitlalike intlalmomos mexika. aw se tlakatl tlamatini, anoso tlalmatini nowiampa, itoka henrriko martínes, nawatlahto inkissisión in mexiko, yuh kimomachistia kilmach okimittato in ompa ipan se provinsia europa itokayokan kurlant, inmasewalpan in polonia reyesme in tlahtoke, in ompa tlaka in ipan omotenew altepetl kurlant, kil towanpowan in ompa tlaka; kilmach san wel no tiwke, in iwkin tonakayo sanno yuhkin in innakayo ompa tlaka, kil in iwkin toyelis in nikan nweva españa titlaka kil sanno yuhkin in inyolo in inyelis in ompa tlaka, wel kinnenewilia in chichimeka inik weweintin tlaka. aw ik otlatlatokkilok wan nama ma mitspalewi moswerte magdalena, tel ne notex kiamana nopa isistata para kipixtok noponi. ye yiman tika in imak totatsin porfirio días; tlaka san omotsotsomatiaya ikoton iwan ikaltson. iwan okitoaya prefekto noihki namechilwia namewan aihmo nikneki nankistinemiske ika kaltson. nikneki ye namomachtiske
