kenin yeske ipan in xolal. tla onkate kokone nankititlaniske tlamachtilkalko iwan nankipatlaske namotlake. tla amo nankipia tepilwan san xihpatlaka namotlaken. ahken amo tlaneltokas se metstli motlakalilia; onkwan kinchaske. ye kwali ye nekowilos tlaquemitl. yoan niktenewa in ompa san mateo techichikilyakak mani nomilkoal nikowili bartolomen xilotl koatlan chane nikmakak sempoali ochikwasen pesos inik motamachiwa tonatiw ikisaian itstok inik wiak napoalkwawitl aw inik patlawak nekok ixkich kikwaxochnamiki in imil don migwel garsia inin itech powis in nomon hernando ximenes. . ha no ak kintokatiw in ixkich tlakatl im pochteka wewetke im puchteka siwa. seki kilwiah nakasburokilit. aw in ikomentin onkan atenko kinchiw ipilwan totoltekatl tsompachtli itoka xalapetstsin okichtli, no inin ok- || 39v -cecni kitechiwili in tlahtowani se inantsin mochiw. ipanpa sankto domingo teopixki wei sankto, iwan mietlamantli in kimomakili totekwiyo dios welitilistli inik kimochiwilia tlamawisoli; in kenamikatsintli sant diego sanno iwki yewatsin. i mokiwix in ipan xii tekpatl xiwitl. in nanakat. karransistas amo mitoaya kalakiske. okito in testigo ka wel melaoak inik onokonan huramento inik onitlatolmelaw in nekok kampa ka [tachado: moteilwia] nikimiximati aw in akin tepanawis yea hustisia kamo ken nopan melaoak in onikito in ye ninemi tlaltikpak ye sempoalxiwitl yoan nawxiwitl don gaspar de mendosa nixpan fransisko milan eskribano. yon komo pewa tihtilewi yon mah se kiteki wan mah oksi kalihtik, por in semi kikwah okuilimej, komo se kikawa ayotochimeh wan chechelomej, amo kikawah mah kwali oksi, pewa tilewi, kitekih wan kitekij. in kwowit kilwiah teswakapolkwowit, ipa iuki kilwiah saj.onkak eyi taman: se mapisilik wan se mapapatawak, sayoh achi eskinadoh in kwowit. wan se yehwa ya in teswa kapolin.onkak ñipa kalikampa.xochiyowa itech agosto.oktubre chikawaya ya in iteyo, ihwak nokta ika kininkitskiah yon koyoltsitsin.amo se kitoka. amo mochipautani. onkak miak ne kalikampa. nonantsin omitsilwi. ikanikan. in sesek. aw in yewantin in in kweskonpixke ka amoma amakemeke, aw ka ye ompa tlaelpan tlaka, in itech chikonkiyawtepetl ka tlailotlake. aw no ihkwak in oiw kwalok tonatiw, nimann ik pew in nikan siudad mexiko miyek tlakatl oichtakamikke in timasewaltin iwan españoles, in kimixilia; wel yuh tlamiko in xiwitl de 1611 años in ichtakamikowak. ome patlawakchili teyewatsin pero kena motlapachohkí aw inik ompa walewake inik walkiske inik walmakalakike in onkan neakalakiloyan itokayokan de palos de mogwel, ipan viernes ik 3 mani metstli agosto in ipan omotenew xiwitl; aw ik niman ipan walkiske in tlali in itokayokan en la gomera. ikome unpa ya kwawnawak chikomolosi, yokikwi mochiw teistlakoasi; in ik-ei itoka ketsalxilosintli wakakalsintli kiwalitla toltitla tisawasi; in iknawi tlakuchkwesi ye kiwalitlani seolintewktli ostotikpak; in ikmakwili koatonalsi ye kiwalitlani xiwyaotewktli tiankisteko; moselsiwasi walitlanok waxtepek, yokikwi mochiw tepakiskasi; i xokosi walitlanok chalko pochtla, yokichwi mochiw akasitli. wan okpa oksehpa oksé wal kisaya poniente wal kisaya poniente walkisaya mochi nawi sitlalti ohkión monamikiya. aw nowian walmowikake in teopixke iwan in tlahtoke visurrei oidoresme yewatsin in visurrei don gaspar de súñiga, maldonado presidente, don fransisko delo, don hwan funsega, sanktiago de rriego, el doktor vilagrán, el lisesiado don pedro de otálora. aiki itla tikilwia' pero yehwa kwalani. niman ye ik yaw in kapitán, || 115v ipan otlekok in tsowali okittak in iwki in kichiwaya; okiwitek ixayakapan in diablo ixiptla. "kena, tlaxikowah titekitih aw no ikwak in ipan in motlatokatlali in totekixtsin tlahtowani opochwakan chalko. ye iw matlakxiuhitl in opeuhalok in atl in tepetl mexikko, in ye omoman in mitl in chimali, in ye nowian ontlamatkamani in awahkan in tepewahkan, in makasan ye opew, ye xottla, ye kweponi in tlaneltokkilistli, in iiximachokatsin in ipalnemmowani neli teotl dios. i tekpatl xiwitl, 1324. nikan titechtekipanoti aw niman kikakke in anawaka ik moyolsewike, ayokmo kichiwke in yaoyotl in kitowaya in kichiwaskia in inpan mexika. iwan okseki ipassiontsin in tlayawalo teotlak in ompa walewake in teopan, kisako konsepsión monhas ayotikpak, ik niman kisako visitasión monhas, ik niman niman kisako san fransisko teopan, ik niman san ignasio la kasa professa kisako, ik niman onkan in iglesia mayor kisako, onkan ik mokwepke, ik niman kisato teopan sankto domingo, niman san lurenso kisato monhas, ik niman umpa in inchan ahsito. mehoranahxiwit aw sanno ipan in in omotenew ipan semilwitl hwebes in owala tlahtoli umpa españa, kitemachistiko inik omomikili in toweisiwatlahtokatsin doña markarida de austria reina españa okatka in inamiktsin toweitlahtokatsin don felipe tersero rei españa. in tesenyelisteko ayemo asi. iiii tochtli xiwitl, 1470. amo akah kichipawa. mokwetlani ka nokonitowa ma noso iyokan kontlali tenochkatl, ma yoka opoliwi; ayatle nokonchiwas, ok nokonchia in itlatol: ken kitoske, keskilwitl kontlaliske? ka iskich kimokakitika i notlatol’”. in okonkake in iskich in tlatoli kiwatkik akolnawakatl xochitl, nima ye ik mononosa tlatilulko tlatoke, komolwia “quen ankitoa, ken amononoza?”. aw in ihkwak in ye se xiwitl onkan oasiko, ye onkan kate popotlan inawak tlakopa in mexika chichimeka; inik yatiwitse inik motetekatiwitse yewatl kinwalyakana in itoka toskwekwextli. vii tekpatl xiwitl, 1512 años. walewa umotlaliko tlilak, motlalmomostike, matlakxiwtike ose. wel notekimati saniman ia tlahtoli niksalos. se kilo pitsonakatl in kali se kalnakasko ka xa itech weyiat, 276 hweves in ik 28 mani metstli mayo de 1615 años, ye itlamian inin metstli in owakiko in atl nikan ixpan mani iteupankaltsin totlasothatsin san antonio abbad. se taman kilwiah chichiltalkamoh wan se istaktalkamoj. se kinamaka tamanal ya ne kwesalan. . san no kin nenewiliaya in iwki pipiltin san no yuhki in pochteka in ik mimatini in ik tlanemiliani. kapítulo ikontlamantli. amo xikihtlanili tomín, wel nexikoli. . wel ixkich tlakatl oya in tenamikito yewantin oteyakantiake in tletlenamakake in tlamakaske, niman yewantin in teteuktin in achkakawtin. ihkwak otiyayah mila no iwki tichualchihuayah, tiknexpachoayah in awax, kamohtli ahnoso elotl. inin senka iknotlakwali inik in papas iwan awax san tiktlaliliayah istatl iwan chili, yese immanon senka nikahwiyakamatia in totlakwal. aw kin onkan in i ye kimiwa in chalka akxoteka in kinwalwikake in tokolwan, in kinwalwikalti tlahtowani toteositewktli in tekwachkawtli tlahtowani akxotlan chalko. san kitokan tochin teuktlapaliwketl, in kwexteka meyetla. chamako yoya yuchulo akmo ka respekto yakmo axan a lugar de respeto xugada wan yanok ipapan imaman akmo kipialia respekto se entiende. atlan, akaltika, in walake iwan senka miek in apachiw in akalak in inkal españolesme, ik mokalkawke; iwan seki miek in aktiwets in papachiw inkal, san tel yewatl in xankali tsitsinsiyawak inik walaaktiwets. kaxtoli wan se aw yewatl tiknamakiltia español in itoka paskwal hernandes aw inik techpatiotilia ixkich techmakas napoali onmakwili pesos aw ka yewati inik amixpantsinko tinesi in antotekwioan antlatoke matikiknopilwikan in amotlatokatepalewilitsin ka iw kineki in toyolo inik mochiwas pregones in ipampa tokal ka nel taxka totlatki ka ayak ma aka tiktlaelewilia ka nel toyolokakopa inik tiknamaka. ik nikchiwa notestamento aw in nonakayo san paktika aw in nosialis in notlalnamikilis amo kenka san paktika aw nikchixtika in mikilistli in ayak wel ixpanpa yewa in ayak wel kitlalkawia. tlasohtlas in mochiwa saj, amo se kitoka. kinekih para ni ilwikak... inihwanti ya puro nakatl kikwah quimolhuilih: noxokoyow, inin nepapan xochitl yewatl in tlaneltilistli, in neskayotl, in tikwikkilis in ohispo. nopampa tikilwis ma ik kitta in notlanekilis, iwan ik kineltilis in notlanekilis, in nosiyalis. no se kikwa se kiewayohkixtia wan se kitema itech se kubeta kipiya at iwan kwounex. satepan se kiakixtia, se kipaka wan se kitema iwan emol wan se kitalilia akolin wan nakaswiyo wan se kikawa mah moloni ya. mah amo kitatikan. viii tekpatl xiwitl, 1344. . aw in ketsalpatsaktli ompa mali mochiw in ayotlan: aya tle katka in nikan mexiko kin ikwak nes, in ye mamalo tlatilolko konmotlatkiti in awitsotsin. latečselilia' intosentabo intihtlaxtlawian yunta. viii kali xiwitl, 5. kemmanian sekih ahmo yolpachiwia itechpa in okitenewkeh in tlatsontehkeh iwan pewaya in momakah in tlakpak tlakah inwikpa in tlakxitla tlacah. immanon, satepan nien ayokmo momatiah ahkiwan inwikpa moteitquitihuetziah, momacayah, monetechalaniayah. immanon ixkichkaw in kiawitl mokalaktiaya wetsia mochi in xuchikwali tlalpan iwan panoya in atl in kiwikaya mochi in ye owets tlalpan. in pipiltoton no ompa tetsalan, yuhkin kikimichtin quiaheoquihtinemiah, chohcholohtinemia. in yuh omokwep in tepewani, mexikaltepepan wel miek kwalankayotl onkatka. xochipetlatipan tokon ya ikwilowa in mokwik in matlatol nopiltsin oo ti nesawalkoyotsin. amoachi kena, komo tsakti tsakti ni tlali. in okontlali niman noseppa ye no ikpak tleko in amakeme, ye noseppa walmotekato i texkalko in omemasak, san ok ompa onoka. isiwi okimilwike in sen- || 63r -hueytlalhuacque in xaltokameka, okimilwike "campa anmowika?". wel achto yewatl in nanima imaktsinko nokontlalia in totekuyo dios ka okimochiwili iwan niknotlatlawtilia ma nechmopopolwilili in notlatlakul inik oniknoyolitlakalwi in ixkich kawitl nikan tlaltikpak oninen inik nechmowikilis in ichantsinko in ilwikatl itik in ikwak okitlalkawi in naniman in nonakayo. ik expa otipowaloke ikwak omochiw wei kokolis. nikam omosintokak in itechpa atheska osomatli. tepexik owala ipam inin xiwitli. tlapalteuksitsin ipan in in onpa walkiske inchan astlan in mexitin asteka chichimeka in axkan ye motenewa tenuchka. aw iwan ye matlakpowalxiwitl ipan nawpowalxiwitl ipan chikwasen xiwitl || 83 in ipan xiii akatl xiwitl, 1323 años, ipan in tlamiko inik kwawtlahtolok in kulwakan kaxtolxiwitl onse in ayak tlahtokat. wahkahki. in ikse itoka el lisesiado chápes fiskal mochiw in ompa audiensia gwadraxara in xalixko; inin españa chane, aw nikan mexiko ye ochanchiwaya inik nikan itekiw oipan asiko. .xoh! onkan mekatlan notekuvan é iksotl mimilkatok chikweyokan navalkali navali temoketl aya wiya! tsonimilko kwiko tipewke aya tsonimilko kwiko tipewke mochiwa kampa atauj wan kampa milaj. ihkwak wala almonte teatewitekiko, katewitekiko don hernando kortés siwailakatsin iwan don pedro tlawankatsin panowayan. amo inwan ximonelo, in amo kwali tlacah. ipan in sábado a xxviii de henero, ikwak kapítulo mochiwato in xochimilko, ompa mosentlalitsinoke in teopixke; yewatl kimochiwili in komissario yankwik frai pedro de pila, ye iw nepa ome metstli makok inik konmissario mochiwtsino. kwali kamati wan tlalnamiki. newatl yonpakate nocahhuan. x kali xiwitl, 1593 años. tlakaso ayaxkan in wewetiwa, tlakaso ayaxka in weweyotl. in iuki kitokaitiah por in panwihwitsyoh in itakka. . niman ye ik konkwi. ompa itstimoketsa in tonatiw ikisayan: no nawpa in koniawa nawkampaixti iw kichiwa. kwatitla nama noha. aw inin omotenew tlahtoli, in saso katlewatl achto kichiw inik yaskia in atonaltsin, in kwix ye otlalmasewke in kwix ye okiketske in ixkich inkwaxoch in inewan kwawitsatsin, aw in kwix noso ayemo kiketsaya yese san ya yewatl ipan in in omotenew xi kali xiwitl, inik yaskia atonaltsin; aw yese wel yewatl moneltilia i tlakpak omitoka, achtopa kiketstiako in ikwaxoch in ihkwak yaskia kwawna- || 123v -huac in atonaltsin chichimekatewktli, in ikwak walmokwepato tetotolko ka sa onmotlaliko. no miki de amik. kikixti nopa tenantsi "bueno, san tlen... tetigo.- pedro daniel iknookichtli nichane 'ciudad makok huramento etk. tlatlanilok intestigo ilwilok kenin wel tikmati inik moteilwia maria geronima in inamik hwan de eskalante inik mixnamiki antonio hoseph yoan in inamik magdalena ines ak tlale katka ak axkaoa katka in umpa otioalake. aw in kinwalyakan in tlahtowani walmochiwtia itoka totoltekatl tsompachtli tlailotlaktewktli; yewatl kiwalmamatia in inteow diablo in kitokayotiaya nawyotewktli in xipil, ipial walmochiwtia. se malkochtli kiltonili kwouxokot okseki kikwih ika kipantsakwah in vivero de kahfen. aw no iwan in ihkwak in in onkan no kalakiko kulwakan in mexika, ye oyuh nepa sentsonxiwitl ipan matlakpowalxiwitl ipan onpowalonmatlaktli xiwitl ye katki i wel itsinekan ik motlali altepetl kulwakan, yniqu ipan okalakiko mexika. na ya niya. nikan nestika in yakwikan inik okilpike in inxiw in wewetke in atlitik in mexiko in tenochtitlan, anoso tenochtli onkan ikak, in inesewiayan in kwawtli, inik ye motenewa tenochtitlan; in onkan owitsa in techyawalotok yankwikan onkan otlekwawtlaske in wewetke, aw onkan no kikwiko in tletl in techyawalotoke tlaka. kosatoli san iya mani,ompa ye kweponi a yaoxochitl, i ya nokonilnamiki a kan nichoka. xochiyowa abril wan mayo teyowa. "pues kien sabe kani san kinkwi ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. kema xikihtol kema kwali ka nanmokakitia iwan axkan okse tlamantli nikneki newatl ximohtilikan inintin kokone san noxilan kate iknotsitsin ome taman onkak : tein tsikitsin, wan tein weyi. otikwepaloko kana ipan nawi xiwitl ompa ipan toxolal. nochtlakatl owiloak ika teyolo, moktas tlen tewaxka tlaltin, xolaltin, kaltin. aw inik nikan tixpan omoteilwiko onkan onok in imakal in itoka gabriel yaotl iwan in inamik maria tiakapan aw onkan no tlaixnamikia amo ma itlalpan san onkan kinama in atl ipampa ka mochi intlalkowal in itoka diego yaotl iwan in inamik isabel tlako. kionik keme' ik tokamak kionik ohkión in tomawan kitoa. aw axkan sábado ome tsilini ye teotlak ik 24 mani metstli hulio de 1610 años, ikwak ipan ipesperastsin sanktiago apóstol, ik teopankalmamaliwak ikwak yekaw in iteopankaltsin tlatilolko, umpa in makoto yankwik teopan in ipan omotenew pesperaspan in ikomiendatsin sanktiago in telpochtli don fernando altamirano, in inkonew in inpiltsin don hwan al- || 126 -tamirano iwan doña maría de dirsios, in ichpochtsin tlahtowani don lwis de velasko markés de salinas visurrei in axkan moyetstika motlahtokatilia, ka ixwiwtsin in omotenew telpochtli don fernando altamirano kapitán de la gwardia; inin in omotenew enkomienda ka yewatsin kiwalmomakili in toweitlahtokaw in ompa moyetstika españa don felipe tersero. onkwan on nochipa kwalkan okitlapoaya tlamachtilkali. ikwak onipew momachtia temachtikes oyekoya ompa milpa alta. keman chiknawi tlamachotiloni wan tlako. san nowian omonemili kename inin tlamachtilkali weyi oyeya, okitlawkeke ken kaltin kan chantiske temachtikawan. xexelihka oyeya. wan se kital i lia in tajpixkej, yehwa ya in kowat wan neli motachiwa ika in tatok. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. ahmo melawak xknte de nikan i tiera solo yeye'on okatka den époka tiempo de mala hora. kitlaololtia kitlatepewaltia kitlamamaka in ik mochi iwan kitlatiske. in oiw onpoliw tlahtokayotl in itech wewe witsiliwitl, ka nel noso aokak mokaw ipiltsin okichtli ahnoso ichpuchtsin, ka mochintin omiktiloke in yaok; sa isel mokaw in akulnawakatl, yese oksekni in mo- || 65v -tlallito askapotsalko mexikapan, ka yuh kimokwitia in tepaneka. 24r i tekpatl xiwitl, 1116 años. salvador del mundo, kwaltia san yewan aw in ipantsinko mochiw kalitik gwardián frai hwan de salas, aw in provinsial frai hwan de laskano, kommissario general frai pedro de pila, fiskal fransisko sandoval, síndiko iwan governador don antonio valeriano, don hwan martín, alkaldesme don antonio de mendosa, gabriel xwáres, aw oiw momikili in antonio ximénes. ohti yetoqueh? kapolyolotl ix tekpatl xiwitl, 1592. yuh omotlanawatili in tlakatl tlatowani señor governador inik okimoneltilili nikan okimomachiotili okimotlalili in itokatsin in ifirmatsin omochiw nikan siudad de mexiko. antonio valeriano. pasó ante mí migwel xwares eskrivano. aw wel nimitstlatlawtia, noxokoyow, iwan nimitstlakwawnawatia, ka wel okseppa tias in mostla, tikittatiw in obispo; aw nopampa xiknemachti, wel iw xikkakiti in nosiyalis in notlanekilis, inik kineltilis, in kichiuhas noteokal nikihtlanilia, iwan wel okseppa xikilwi in kenin wel newatl nisemikakichpochtli santa maría in niinantsin teotl dios, in ompa nimitstitlani. aw niman yewatl kinextia in totolin: aso nawtekpantli anoso makwil tekpantli. —yekipia dose años nikantikate yotikaxiltihke dose años ipan mektli agosto. witswaukilit tlen 121 tlanawatihkayotl. ipan se iwa se tlaltlanawatili tlen sentlanawatiloyan nelkwali momatis iwan moneltokilis tlachiwalmeh tlen altepechantli, tlahkwiloli iwan tlasenkawali tlahtolchiwalmeh tlen nochi sekinok. in tlahtokan sennechikolistli, itechpan sentlanahuatilmeh, kiihtos kenihki monextis tlachihualmeh, tlakwilolmeh iwan tlahtolchihualmeh, iwan tlen yewan tlaolinis, motetonis ipan inin tlahtolpechtli i. in tlahtol tlanawatilmeh tlen se tlaltlanawatili san welis motlepanitas ipan itlaltikpak, ipampa inon, amo welis tlanawatiseh kiawak. ii. in tlapihpialmeh tlachiwalmeh iwan axtlachiwalmeh monawatis ika tlahtol tlanawatili tlen kayotl kampa mani noso eltok. iii. in tlatsakwaltilmeh tlen kiihtoseh tlasenkawalmeh tlen se tlaltlanawatili itechpan tlen melawak tlatechpowili noso tlapialmeh tlen axtlachiwalmeh tlen mokawa ipan seyok tlaltlanawatili, san welis mosenkawas ipan inin, keman ihkinon kiixtlaliseh tlen yewa itlanawatilwan. in tlatsakwiltilmeh itechpan itechpowi se tlakatl san welis mosenkawas ipan seyok tlaltlanawatili, keman inin tlakatl tlen kitlatsakwiltiah melawak kitatakatsoa noso ipampa chanti, tlaxitlawali tlen kiihto, iwan tla nochipa kinotstokeh mahyowi moixnextiti ipan tlasenkawalpa. iv. in tlachiwalmeh tlen itechpowi altepechantli tlen moixtlalia ipan tlahtol tlanawatilmeh tlen se tlaltlanawatili, welis ipatih elis ipan sekinok. v. in tokayotl machiotl tlen ixtlamachtilismeh tlen kikixtiseh tekiwakemeh tlen se tlaltlanawatili, ipan tlaskis itlanahuatilhuah, motlepanitas ipan sekinok tlaltlanahuatilmeh. ok senpowalxiwitl in unka tepacho toskwekwex; ok ye teyakana toskwekwex i wala kopil tetikpak icha, ye yuh yeilwitl kintlakatekolowia kiwalpolowa kopil. iwan no ihkwak tlakati in konetl in tahtli kitemaka in xopakatl. inin kihtosneki in tetahtsin kimmaka mochintin ahkiwan kihtlanilia techichik, newktli iwan okseki tlamantli. toni ika titeweliaskeh wel kinkwiliaya in inkal kinwalkixtiaya kinnamakiliaya, in ipatiw san mochi kikwiya frai herónimo de sárate, kihtowaya "missas ik nikinchiwilis in mimikke"; aw ayak kittaya iwan ayak kimatiaya in kenin kitechiwiliaya mikkamissa. piahtika. in oumik walmotlali akolnawakatsi, osiwatla tenayoka tekwanitsi ichpoch itoka kwetlaxoch; ye mopilwatia, ye kichioa utsiliwitl yontetoka tepankiski, ikome epkoatl, teeka siwatl tlatsotsoniskatl yuntetoka moxotsi, iknawi chalchiwnenetsi, ikmakwili tiankiskatsi, xokoyotl tesusumoktli. nikan nopilwan witseh in amo kwaltia pahti, sólo para se kikwa, se kimana, welik chilposontsin wan komo se kineki kaldito. mah kwaltsin ixwa. wan no se kikwa tamapatal mah se kipoyeli oso tatsoyon. entonses modeskomponeroa rápido komiyaya i nekwtli pero in lá por igwales nekwtli wan newatl nekwtli san bweno. nika win no mochiwa, pero amo semi, mas mochiwa newín paratani. no kwaltia se kichihchiwa atol wan se tayi. in ikamohyo kikwechowah wan kikolarowah wan ika kimanelowah tixti wan kimanah wan kitsopeliah wan mah se tayi. kema axan nopapan textlatetekike pero. inin topaltsin tlakatewktli okichiw se ipiltsin itoka kornerio ramíres, inin okinchiw omentin inpilwan: in ikse itoka diego ramíres, in ikome itoka mateo ramíres. inik niman ipan ohtli sankto domingo kimokixtilito, kimonamiktilito in ohtli inik niman sa tlamelawka okiwalmokwepilike sa okiwalmotlamelawaltilike inik onkan kimokixtiliko ikiyawak in iportales markés del vale, inik niman onkan okimokalakiliko mikkatsintli iglesia mayor; wel ihkwak onaki tonatiw, inik onyowak in kimaxitiliko. in kwali tlaketski tlatolwelik, tlatolawiyak, tenxochitl. sasanilatlatole, yektlatole, kamaxochiwa, xochitl, welik, awiyak itlatol, tekpilatole, yamankatlatole. inin kwahitl wel tepitstik. tepitsin aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl kalaliloke in wexotsinka. in onkan ihtik kisako asteka mexitin, insisiwawan || 29r kinwalwikake inik waloomekiske iwan inpipilwan kinwalwikake. axkan lunes in ik 20 mani metstli agosto de 1612 años, ihkwak omomikili in don balthasar martín chane san pablo sokipan, san atlaka katka, amo kampa tlahtokayotl itech kisaya; inin yewatl in governador katka askapotsalko, san kikawaltike in igovernasión inik niman konpatlato don antonio valeriano telpochtli, in iw omotenew tlakpak. aw ka yewatl ik okwalanke inik walkowatekitia in nikan tenochtitlan inik ye kiwalchiwa in ikal in diablo witsilopochtli, iwan in tlahtokakali in ye kiketsa; ik omoxiwtlatike i ye sianmiki, ik okichiwaskia yaoyotl in inpa mexika. ya kwali kimatis nopapá aw in tla walas in yewatl in itokan pedro lwis ka nel okimotlachkwitlaxili in achiton tlalmantontli aso itlan onkimotlalilis in pedro lwis aw in kinokomonamikti in magdalena ka senka tlawelilok aik ma itla onechtlaokoli atolsintli ka chane [f. 10v.] aso kiwikas yewantin kimati. -¿amo ankimati in tlein onokonittak, iwkin akame mokeketstiwitse? mah nochi xikintayokoli nopilwan, xinechmotlapohpolwili ammo tlen ika oniwala onimitsmotlahpalwiko ma totahtsin dios techmopili ammitla ika oniwala in ixwa sah talixko. yon xiwit kikwih para tapalol: sempwali wan ome in ayoh mochiwa kampa chiltokah oso etokaj. ¿tlen tonali mostla yes? ¿can it ya nemia tikwikanitl? ma ya wel moketsa xochiwewetl, ketsaltika wikontika teokwitlaxochinenepaniwtikak. tikimonalwiltis in tepilwan teteukton in kwawtli oselotl. chikwasen solin i.- pregon: san niman ikwak in omito in ilwitl in kawitl in xiwitl in metstli san niman umpa otonyake in umpa ikak kali tesontlalnamakoyan otsatsik in tekpoyotl hwan ximenes okito akin kineki kikoas in ikal okatka maria salome yoan isitsin maria xwares chaneke s. martin ateskapan aw in kali nikan ikak tesontlalnamakoyan tlapankalo otenko otlanankili hwan de kastilo español okito ma newatl nikohoa niktema [ma]cuilpoualli peso testigos felipe de rosas hwan de santa maria algwasil fransisko a primero de agosto de mil e kinientos i noventa i seis años. aw ik niman ointech moketske i xochmilka, ye tlama i mexika ye kimasi in xochmilka, sa moch kinakastlasa; moxixikipilkentike aw ompa kontlastiake in innakas in xochmilka. aw ka ik ayamo wel mochiwin yqu itlakaw ik san mokaw in ipampa ik tsatsiwak in wel iskilwitl ipan ik se semana sankta inik akan tlayawalolos, iwan inmanel no ipan xuchipaskwa de resurektión amono wel tlayawalolos, iwan amonoyak wel mowitekis in españoles iwan in timasewaltin in ipan iskilwitl omotenew semana sankta, pena motlali in akin dúniga ik kanaske onpowalonmatlaktli pesos ixtlawaltilos. no ihkwak tlakat in mikkakalkatsin. nikan ipan in inik onewak in tlahtowani kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli in iwan in wewe itskwawtsin atlawtekatltewktli in onkan chalko atenko anoso ayotsinko, in onkan tlahtokatke inik mochi kwitlatetelko senpowalxiwitl onmatlaktli inik onewake onkan atenko. nawi axoxtlantli aw ye iw nepa kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan senpowalomatlaktli ipan se xiwitl kate in askapotsalka inik asiko mexika in tenochtitlan inik mosentlaliko. nekiyeontsatsia in achkawtsin, in ye motelchiutsin, tokniwa,kilmach yeok yowak. makwilpoali gr. chilpitsawak ahnoso kwawchili komo se kineki exot tein xoxowik, sekimana wan se kipoyelia wan niman oksi wan se kikwa ya. aw omito motenew nawtetl in kimaman inesawalkal, aw mitoa, motenewa inikwak nenka ketsalkóatl miekpa ika mokayawasnekia in tlatlakatekolo, inik tlakatika moxtlawas, in tlaklamiktis. aw aik kinek amasis. sea senka kintlasotlaya in imasewalwan in toltka katka. san mochipa yewatl inextlawal katka in kinmiktiaya in koatl, tototl papalotl. ¡otlacatqui yautlatoketl! ipan in tlahtowani michwakan in itoka kamakoyawak, ikwak pewaloke. tenonotsali axposteki. i nikan audiensia tixpan owalake gabriel yaotl inamik maria tekwikchon onka chane san hwan amanalko okitoke ka tiktokakiltiliko in hustisia in ipampa in tokaltsin in itepots yematl aw inik wiak namatl. itech nehin hora, onkak ome taman: xipohlimah wan lima-limón. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. in tlapacho audiensia makwilxiwitl. xopan kwika ti no inin xiwpan kimiktike hosé fransisko rwis massieu, in akin katka se yewantin in kiyakanayah in pri. kilmach se temiktianime katka altepeteixiptla in itoka manwel muños rocha; aw kintepan mexikatlahtokayotl kinextili ka raúl salinas de gortari, iikniw in tlahtoani, tenawati ma miktilo hosé fransisko. ¿cani mokawak? in ipan omotenew lunes in metstli iwan xiwitl, ikwak se piltsintli kimoskalili in sant diego, wei tlamawisoli in mochiw; in ikwak omomikili, niman kiwalwikak in inantsin in teopan ixpan kimotekili in sant diego, senka chokistika kimotlatlawtili in itlakotsin dios sant diego. aw in oipan kisato akatitlan ihkak in tenochtli, … momanako in yaoyotl in tetenko, in ye mamanah onmotekato sakatepek, noseppa ommotekato texkalnepantla. sanyeno ilwitl, in yuh kaxtilantonalamak in monextia, kilwikixtitikatkah in kaxtilantlakah itetlapalolis teotitlantli in tlein ika kitlaixmachti ichpochtsintli malia ka yewatsin yes in teotlinantsin. aw yewatl in in tomines aw inik ye neli in okikawako sempoali yoan ik opalewilok in mikkatsintli yoan ka imixpan omochiw testigos pedro de san migwel yoan ambrosio de sanktiago yoan diputados yoan pablo garsia. . ka o tik kwike, ka ok tik anke in amihiyotsin in amotlahtultsin, in amoxilantsinko in amotoskatlatsinko kwel pachiwtia in ilpiltika; unkan tlatoka i siwatsintli ye achto kontlekawike, tsatsitiw mochokilitiw, kiwalitoa “colhuaqué, a ye niaw in inemanian in kan teutl, i notson in nisti moch tlacaquiçaz”. aw in ipan martes in ik-eilwitl yewantsitsin in teopixke fransiskos kimochiwililito missa sankta iwan no se temachti. aw i ye yowa inik walyowak, ye nowiyan otlatsitsi- || 280 -licac in iskikan teupan in iksen mexiko, in iglesia mayor iwan monasterios, oksenka ompa sant augustín; iwan nowiyan kwawitl kitlahtlatike in intlapanko españoles iwan seki inkaltempa kitlahtlatihke, iwan in seki monasterios kowetes okitlatlaske, iwan no yuhki miekintin masewaltin mexika yuh kichiwke kitlahtlatihke in intlapanko kwawitl. aw ka onkan kimokentike in amoxtli. inin kalohtli wel weyak. niman okinots in tlenamakak tenuch, okilwi "tla xiwalaw, tenuché, iska || 59v in iyolo tlasiwki kopil, onikmikti; xik-waltoka in tultsalan in akatsalan". ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. inik chikontlamantli nikitowa se tlakatl nokonew katka itoka sebastian ambrosio kikawtiw ikal otlikapa in iewatl yuh kitotia monamakas aw in axkan nikitotiw yewatl kimokowis in agustina pedronila kitemas epowali pesos aw in ikwak okiten epowali pesos teupan ikalakis misas ik chiwililoske in omomikilike makwilti in yewatin tetatsin tenantsin tekoltsin tesitsin bastian ambrosio kin onikito neltis in ikwak onimik amo itlakawis. ipan chikome tochtli xiwitl (1642), rembrandt kihkwiloa yektsin itekiw in tlein iximacho yuhkin "yohuallapializtli". ihkwak otlanes ayawtli momanaya momahmanaya ipan in wei ateskatl totahtsin tonaltsintli ahmo monekiltiaya moteihtitilis oksehpa in iteotikayektilistsin tepetlahtli ipan mohtaya itia in temahmauti in teilnamiktiaya in miktian chanehkeh in totomeh kwikaewaya yese axkan inkwik tetlaokoltiayah in kwawtli iwan in oselotl ahmo kwalneskanesia in tewatl iwan in tlahchinoli okiololohkeh in wei altepetl in ehekatl yuhkin itstik nekimiloli kintlapachoaya in nakayo in ahkikeh omiktilohkeh in itleko in teikalilistli inontin tekwantikeh teyaochiwkeh inmikilis ahmo kahsik in okahsia ye wehkaw in ihkwak in itlaweyikachiwalis in mexihkah kahsia nawkankopa san iskich inik onimakok huramento amo nikmati in ak ye tlale iwan amo no nikmati in itlakamekayo ik nikan nomatika niketsa krus. ante mi fransisko garsia eskribano. na nihpowas ne kentos porke nihmati kentsi ixkichtin walake in chinampaneka, xochmilka nawtewktin, ixkich wala in intlawis in ipan masewako, iwan in mexiko tlatilolko ofisialesme iwan tlakopaneka in masewako, senka tlamawisoke in tlahtoke iwan obispome. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. mowikxitia nohpali in ye tlatetektli ika atl iwan istatl. karpamichin kwali mopaka iwan motlatlapana; in waxchili moihseki, mosiyawa iwan motesi ika xonakatl, axox iwan xitomatl. ipan sokikaxitl motlalia in chiyawisotl iwan motsoyonia in chili in ye tlatextli; mokawa ma achitonka tlewaki; motlalilia in nohpali in ye tlawikxitili, in yepasohtli, iwan tlatsahkan in karpa michin. mostla oksepa nikitas. —pus non kema pero inlá tlalich inlá keni pero ahmo kilnamiki baya ahmo yetechmanteneroa. aw in omotenew ik tlayawalolok, inik walkixowak sankto domingo teopan ik niman onkan walwilowak in iglesia mayor, kimokixtiliko in inetokilis ixiptlatsin christo. in onkan initlamikowakan in masewkatsin, in in tlakawepan. wan nehin omitsin, aw sa niman ipan in in ix kali xiwitl in momikili in tlahtowani in wewetewktli in chichimekatewktli, in tlahtokat yepowalxiwitl ipan chikwexiwitl in kinwalpachotia in amakemeke; aw sa niman ikwak motlahtokatlali in ipiltsin in itoka atonaltsin chichimekatewktli mochiw onkan in chalko atenko. yewatl kitlatlalwia kitlatawtilia kitowa in no mochipautani, kampa tamewah wan kampa amo, xiutah walaktos. in mexihkatl in kelewiah inik itech iyolo ahsis in itlayawaliwkan mochiwa kinextia in ipan wewe nemilistli in achtopankayotl in ahwel pohpoliwis itechpa in itlahtoloyelis baltasar kotolkatl ichan kowatla omonamikti epowalxiwtia ye on makwili i ye nemi huramento okitennamik in ika bara de hustisia inik amo istlakatis ilwilok wel xokonmelawa in motlatol in tlatistlakatis ka diablo kiwikas in moyolia maniman aw in tla wel tokonmelawas motlatol ik mitsmotlaokolilis in totekuyo dios iwan tonantsin santa maria mochipa ichpochtli. wel okichiwke in kiwilanke ye in kweptli tlatlatlalili; oipan ikatia in astatl, aw in kowa yolmani tentiw in chinamitl. tetsavistli iya mixtekatl se in mokxi. pichavastekatl tlapo moma. axonka sintli señor de los trabahos. owekaw kana kaxtoli tonali kokoxki. weweyoka iwan amotla okichiwiliaya tlapatli. ika ipan gwerra oyeya tepatikes amo tepatike. ika in omik karransista. mochiwa saj. ix tekpatl xiwitl 1280 años ipanin in onkan walmikwanike mexika in chapultepek onkan ompowalomeixiwtike in mexika in chapultepek yewatl kinwalyakana in tlahtowani wewe witsiliwit nikikneli". in otepew axayakanowian,matlatsinko, malinalko,okwilan, tekwaloya, xohkotitlan. 30. ma aka in kihto, ma aka in kinexti, ma aka in kimotekiwti. makamo tewatl in tikihtos, in tiknextis. intla tikmotekiwtis, inik ahmo tikmonamiktis in owi, in etik, in temamawti, inik ahmo onkan tikmotlalilis in xixtli in kwitlatl. ka intlakamo yuhki otikihto, in otiktenew ka ye titlatlakaololos, inik onkan senka titolinilos, tipinawtilos, titentsatsayanalos. titakatsin, siwatsin, in xiwit. se kikwalia itakka, se kimana, pero amo miak se kitekilia in at por ké yeh moayotia wan amo se kitsopelia. kani tinechkawili nopa tihkwahki?", kiilwi nokwel kilwi "cuix ye titlawelmati i nikan, in aso kachi tokontokasneki; sa te tikmati, ka ye naxkapan ye nokokokapan in otiwala". ii kali xiwitl, 1377. ñeka ichpokatl itechpa in no chi kimati. ¿cuix ahmo nikan nikah nimonantsin? ¿cuix ahmo nosewalotitlan, nekawyotitln in ticah? ¿cuix ahmo newatl in nimopakkayelis? ¿cuix ahmo nokwexanko, nomamalwasko in ticah? ¿cuix ok ma in motech moneki? ka yeppa weyatlawake tlatlamani wei in ateskatl in kitokayotia metstliyapan wel kiyawalotikatka aw iwan senka kinkokoliaya senka kintlaelittaya in mexitin, okinpopoloskia okinpewaskia. nikan yotlan notlatol ipan momochko malakatetikpak, altepetl tepetsalan, tewtli iwan kwawtsin, intsalan méxiko iwan tepostlan. kipiah in ipan siudad mexiko tenochtitlan nweva españa || 17 inik nowian, axkan ipan miérkoles sankto ikmatlakilwitl mani metstli de abril de 1596 años, in itik altepetl san fransisko san hoseph kapila, in kimoyakanilia ixkich monesterio inik mexiko, onkan omochiw omotlali sentlamantli sankta kofradía, yankwik tlayawalolistli ipilwantsitsin in sankto frai diego; ompa wala in roma, kinwalmomakili in sankto padre. kitsohtsontektoke aw in tlahtowani itskowatsin in kinkawtia ipilwan omentin: in ikse itoka tesosomoktsin; in ikome siwatl, amo wel momati in itoka. otitlasohtlak iwan sekih tlatepacholi, okseki kemmanian ye tlamiktili, imostlatika mochintin ixkomoltikeh ika nesosotlawilistli ye moyoltekipachoaya iwan okachi moyolkokoayah ahkiwan otlatwihkeh teilpiloyan. ixochiyo istak. no moatikan. in kwamekat. ompa walake in motenewa miktlampa norte, inik walake kiwaltemotiake i nemilisawiakaxochitlalpan motenewa paraiso terrenal, kiwalitotiake "tictemohua in tamoanchan", in axkan ye mihtowa "tictemohua in wel neli tochan"; ka yuh kimilwi in inteow in nemilisawiyakaxochitlalpan paraiso terrenal ompa katki witstlampa amilpampa. inik walkiske in xikko in chichimeka in intlan chalka, in onkan katka xviii xiwitl in atenko. tlakaktok ipwerta . aw in yewatl nonotsalo amo kitekokomati amo kitlawelchiwa, senka yeh mopechteka wel kiknelilmati kinchokisnankilia kim ilwia yese ahmo san inon ihkwak ye tikpiaskiani inon kali in tikihtaskeh kampa tikanaskeh in metstlaxtlawili iwan immanon itepalewilistsin itenahnamikilistsin leonportila ye otechontemakixti kenin omochiw yewatsin omononohtsino intlok in unesko tlakah intlok in sep tlakah iwan yuhkin ye otikpixkeh tlen ika titlayektiliskeh ihkwak mochi in yolyamanilistliye opanok satepan ye otekitiwak in omotsinti iwan omopantlas miek in tlakanechikoli tlahtolnextilamatl iwan miek amoxtli in omohkwilohkeh ipan miek tomasewalahtolwan satepan welmelawak ahmo mochi tsopelik noihki oksekintin tlakah momostla witseh san tlemach konwal maihtohuah. aw inik kintokake in mexika in yankwikan in kulwake, onkan motlalito in nextikpak, sexiwtike in onkan in ipan in se tekpatl xiwitl, yewatl kinyakantiwits in tenochtsin. yewa momostla ipan kali ka. . "ma xi mewiltihtia moselokichtlé ka ik moyolotsin pachiwi ka otlaltitech nonahsiko; aw intla atenkisako, amo nesiskia?, amo ihitoskia i nikan?, imalnel noso altepetlipan amo nesiskia? san iwi inik mopoliwiltito, ayak kimomiktili; sa yewatl in tlatoli kimokakilti inik tetekoske anoso wiwilanaloske inik momawtitsino temilotsin. nikan nikwalwika se tlako ton pantsin. aw iskate in i mochintin walake in intawan in intewktlahtokawan walmochiwtiake in tlasopipiltin: in ikse itoka tlawipilatonak, in ikome itoka tonakachimal, in ik-ei itoka aopochtli, in iknawi itoka kwatomawak, in ikmakwili itoka totonwitstli, in ikchikwasen itoka xipechimale. ix kali xiwitl, 1605 años. nikan tehwan tiktalitih nehin mopaka in pitsonakatl iwan motsoyonia ika pitsochiyawisotl; sekni moihseki in chili ika xonakatl, axox iwan xitomatl; mochi inin motesi iwan ye motlalilia in nakatl iwan in nanakatl in ye tlatetektli; motlewatsa ika istatl iwan ma kwakwalaka ika ahmo wei tletl ixkichkaw in ye tlawikxitili. in akin oksepa texixikos in tla nesis sen[ka] wei i hustisia ipan mochiwas xx pesos in tomines inik ontlaxtlawas itech powis in ikamara su magestad. axkan sabado xi dias del mes de noviembre de mil e kinientos i sesenta i kwatro años. inik opoliw in tlili amo iwan tenewtika, don martin de san hwan alkalde don antonio de sankta maria alkalde paso ante mi migwel de los angeles eskribano. ipan in in inxiw molpiliko wewetke. aw axkan lunes ikomilwitl xochipaskwa || 215 de resurreksión in ik 8 mani metstli abril de 1613 años, ihkwak owalatwik otemiktilok in kársel de korte, ei tlakatl in omiktiloke ome españolti se alkaide in ikome bastonero, in ikei tlakatl mulato yewatl in kintlatlaliliaya tepostli krilos in tlatlakoleke kinkalakia onkar kársel. waltlamotlak itek in texkali kan igaíote kikapanili ipan ikonteko kisinkoyokek asta tlasintla wecito' yeka yokimikti. in mochiwa nikahkwin, kampa kaltsintan oso kajfentaj. niman sokipan inchantsinko, in onkan oasikoh ipan se akatl xiwitl. aw ye omotenew tlakpak in onkan in chikomostok ka achtopa yewantin onkan okisako in kulwake iwan tulteka, iwan inik ye mochtin inik ye sennikan semantonawak tlaka timasewaltin in titotenewa nweva españa titlaka. ihkí kiihkwenihke. xii tochtli xiwitl, 22. in tlakwali kwakwalakatika ipan tepostleknilastli. in no se kitoka wan kemasá kampa se kikwa no ompa ixwa in iteyo. in kin moyawaya in inmak pohpuliwia in xuchitl in yeti in tlakwali in kakawatl aw in tenamiki in tekalakia in tetlalia. axkan viernes in ik 25 mani metstli abril de 1614 años, ihkwak teotlak wel ipan ilwitsin san markos evangelista, in teoyotika tlahtowani arsobispo don hwan péres de la serna onkan iglesia mayor okinmomakili teoyotika techikawalistli konfirmasión, kikwike in omotenewke tlakpak in yankwike nikan christianosme omochiwako hapón tlaka; in yewantin in epowali iwan ei tlakatl in konfirmasión kikwike, se inpilo in konfirmasión kikwik, aw yewatl kimopalewili in lisensiado valesilo fiskal del rei de lo sivil teoyotika tettatsin padrino muchiw. noponi walahki kiijtouaj. aw kinotsitiwi in inteow. tlawel kitlasohtlayaya san i[x]kich in nikmati in itechkopa tlali in chinamitl in onpa tlachkwititlan ik nikan nomatika niketsa krus. ante mi fransisko garsia eskrivano. viii kali xiwitl, 1513 años. matlaktlose tochtli atle mochiw. iwan in don fernando kortés markés del vale okseppa makok || 109 yankwikan yewatl in itekiw mochiw in tepacholistli in governasió in yaopan, ik omachiyotilok inik kapitán geral mochiw. sah seltik. yokimomiktilike notatsin iwan ye yiman on nonantsin wel omochokiliaya. topan okalake in karransistas iwan san okinmosemixohtilike. nonantsin omopiliaya ya kolpatsinko se señidor iyaxkatsin notatsin. nemihtika nochi kwali moyektlalia iwan amotlen teisiwiti; tel ihkion okachi tepakti. nochi tlamo polihki nopa sintli. la mano awelito la mano awelita wan yepano'. se tochtli atle muchiw. aw niman omochichiwke iwan nopilwan okitemoke sisiwtin iwan tochime iwan totolime aw niman oatiake ompam tlaxkalam otitetlapaloto otiktotlapalwike in tlatowani s[eño]r d[on] markes kapiktam kortees otikmomakilike in kexkich otikwikake in xochitl nepapam aw in yewatl senka okitlasokama iwan onechtlatlan{i} kampa nochan aw niman onikilwi tlatowanie ka ompa nochan itokayokam tepeteopam ka senka onechtlasotlak aw niman onikmotlatlawtili in s[eño]r markes ipampa nopan motlatoltik makinmotlatlawtili in teopixkasisintin ipampa nikneki manimokwateki aw tel nopam otlato in yewasin s[eño]r markes aw i{n} newatl amo nikmati in tlein notoka yeski wahkino kiilwi in tlakahse otemok ayawewetitlan, ye nemi in kwikanitl san kiketsalintoma ya, kexexeloa aya ikwik ipalnemoa. aw inik ye kipia in ikal in itlal kipia sentensia sa ye kimotlachikawililia mwi magnifiko señor dotor seinos oidor ik nikan niktlalia nofirma. paso ante mi fransisko ximenes algwasil mayor migwel de los angeles eskribano. akin inglestlahtoani nowiampa in tlaltikpantli kwali yas. in ipan siudad de mexiko a trese dias del mes de oktubre de mil e kinientos ochenta i nweve años i yewatsin alkalde pablo garsia iwan pipiltin tetewktin don migwel sanches don fransisko de la krus hwan de sanktiago mowikake in imilpan sant pablo talistakapan itenkopatsinko in tlatowani governador don antonio valeriano hwes. xochiyowa itech abril wan mayo tamixochiyowa. mah wetsi nehin atsin. amo kwali kawitl kichiwa. ii tochtli xiwitl, 1234. talkwechaktsin, don migwel kesalmasasin, eskribano rubrikado ipan tepuskaxitl motlalia yei xumali pitsochiyawisotl iwan motsoyonia in xaltemetl in ye omotlahkotek, in achto ye omopak; motlalia xitomatl ika xonakatl iwan axox, ma tlewaki iwan ye motlalilia awax ika nohpali. ihkwak ye tlamakos moihseki in chili iwan mokokototsa ihtik in tokakaxton intla moneki. aw in mexika in itoka witsilatl in ipilwan omentin: in ikse itoka askaxotsin siwatl, in ikome itelpoch itoka tewtlewak. notatsin omonemitiaya ipan kwawtlatli iwan nochtin xoleme okinmixmachiliaya. se tonali owalmikili tochan chilnanakatl iwan se tlakananakatl. inimekes ome xoleme okwalikaya mikilistli ipampa okimamatokato koatl. wan omikilik onkwan techmotitiliskia onkwan tiquiixmatizquc xolet: tlen kwali mokwas iwan tlen okwikatsa mikistli. omotetekilik ika tepostlatlatekoni ipan se wepali wan otechmolwili xiwalaka, xikitaki iwan xikixmatikan tlen amo kwali xoletl iwan tlen kwali mocuax. inin xoletl tlakananakatl iwan chilnanakatl oxoxokeke iwan satepa oxoxokeke kiltontikes. ayakr ayak, ayak, nel on tinemi nikan. amo wel se kiixmati in ixiuyo por in nochi iuki saj, se kiixmati ika itakka. iii tochtli xiwitl, 1326. kipixki ¿toni kikwaskeh nopilwan? oksé tonali oksepa yemonečikoa' wan yokiske in kolexiantes. kaxtolpwali in omik walmotlali ... itepewal: askaposalko, akulwakan, tlakonpa, atlakwiwayan, teokalwiyakan, miskik, kwitlawak, xochimilko, koyowanka, kowantlichan, istapalokan, kwawnawak, xiwakan, kopala, yowala, tepekwakwilko, tetenla, kwawtla, tekalko, patlanala, tepeyakak, ostotikpak, tlaola, awilisampa. nikan owalkisako. in ipan etsontli onkaxtoli onsempoali ommatlaktli onnawi xiwitl, mochiw inik chikwei heliketsin, in itlahtokaw wewe anglitlali, omikwania in iwikpa wei iteopixkayo roma iwan ye isel omotokayotia yuhkin "huei iteopixkaw inteonechikolis anglitlaltecah". san intechtekipanowah aw no ikwak || 113v in ipan in xiwitl in masewaltin in onkan tlaka wei aitik wei atlalmanpa, aw kin iquaqu in inik nesia yuhkima neli wel teikniwan, ka san motlapikiaya aw wel kimelawke inik teyaowan wel monextike; aw mosenkixtike monechikoke inik ye kimixnamiki in españoles. in mawistli moteka, ya titlaxikohke tinemih wan axkana tikahsih tlen niman ik onka kontokak in inakayo kopil, in axkan itokayoka akopilko, yewatl ik tlatokayoti in kwawtliketski. amo mochipautani. in mexika walmokwepke aw inik mosenpowa inik tlahtokat wewe witsiliwitl senpowalxiwitl onchikome, in ipan in ik miktilok kolwakan. sanyeno ihkwak okaxiltike in mexikah okse imaxka xiwmolpili. anka yankwik intlew kilwikixtike. amaka aw ik niman yewantin kimontokatiake in mulatoti, in ko- || 168 -fradía kipia tlayakatitiwi. tehwa moixkotsinko moilochti nehin kristiano. nikan ipan in momikiliko onkan in kanin itstepek in ekatsintewktli tlakitskaliwki chichimekatewktli, in intlahtokaw chichimeka in totolimpaneka amakemeke inik walake, in tlahtokat kaxtolxiwitl inik ompa walkiske chikomostok kinewayan; aw sa niman ipan in in omotenew || 27v xiwitl onkan walmotlahkatlali in itstepek in itoka wewetewktli chichimekatewktli mochiw in intlahtokaw totolimpaneka amakemeke. inin don diego lwis de motewksoma iwitltemoktsin ye ixwiwtsin in tlakatl katka weitlahtowani emperador motewksomatsin xokoyotl; aw in yewatsin don diego lwis de motewksoma iwitltemoktsin in ompa españa okinkawtia inamik wel española in siwapili itoka doña fransiska de la kweba iwan ipilwantsitsin chikwasemin mestisoti, yehika ye omito in innantsin ka wel española, nawi okichtli, ome siwatl: in ikse itoka doña maría miyawaxochtsin, in ikome itoka don pedro desifún de la kweba de motewksoma; aw in oksekintin amo wel momati in intoka in ipilwantsitsin don diego lwis de motewksoma iwitltemoktsin. ompa kinextiah welik xochikwali tlen ika mopaktia iwan moxayacanochehuah. non tosepan palewiya' kwak ahmo kinekin tomi. aw in yewantin in ye tlamanixti in teananime in pawake in teixamike mochintin motlawtiaya. in se kikwa kemeh kapolin, se kipipina wan iteyotsin se kikwa etaxkal. kwatitla. iuki monotsa tak por in bolitas. no ikwak xitinke in totomiwake, tepa moyawake. aw ipan paskwa navidad itlasotlakatilispantsinko in totekwiyo dios in pewke chalka in ye kiwalkawa morilos mexiko. xi akatl xiwitl, 1503. porke nochi tawaktok ya, niman onasike in tenanko texokpalko, onkan omotlalito; inik kimasewke tlali in iwan ik tlatokamakake tenanko. inlá timikas ximika ximotelwili maske tiotlahkan. más ke takan witseh nosiwamowan, mah mokwatewihto elot, newatl algwasil mayor fransisko martin nunbrado de su magestad in axkan itenkopatsinko in audiensia real inik oniwala in inpan tlaxilakali san hwan tlachkwak inik nikinmakako posesion in itoka hwan kwawtli inamik maria itelpoch migwel popoyotl inamik isabel hakobia inikinsemaxkaw ye mochiwa in inkalkowal in intlalkowal chikome in estaka in onikkekets in onkan tlatlantika in tlali in kali in iw ipan tenewtika in karta de venta atle onokonpanawi sa ye iskich in omonamakak sempowali pesos iwan matlak pesos iwan 1 pesos. achiyok sayayá kitlehkoltiya. in ipan in xiwitl onkan kichiwa matlakpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolonnawi xiwitl in omowikak. . ixkich in inmixkoyan intlatki in nawalostomeka in ik konkwia in ixkich omotenew: in aposonali tesakatl mochiwaya iwan tenkoli in intech monekia in wewei okichtin in wewei tiakawan in aokmo kimasia yaoyotl; in aoktle ipan kittaya, in owel imixmahsik in iw yawtia in iw tetlamaltilo. kenin mochiwa tiezqueh. tatatin amo san niman otlaneltokake. okinankilike inspektor; axkan titechmolwilia tikinkahkowiske iwan tikinmediaskowiske ichpokame, ikan amo tikpia tomín weles amo isihkan titlaneltocazque. inin tlaka ikwak karransa onene iwan ompoyon oyeke tropa de amaro itropa iwan ompoyon okipiaya se kwartel. amo tikmatiske tlika okitlalilike inin otli espinaso. okisaya inin otli ixitlankopa tewtsin inin otli iwan ikwak omomomotlaya karransistas ika sapatistas. ipan in otli okimasike in soldados kox weles awelo tsikwinia; ikan otlatlawelkwitaya ipampa yokimasia sapatistas. okitenewaya inimekes karransistas: ¡ahueli titsikwiniske itech! nesi se ikwitlapanxiloyo xolopiktli. iwan nian techasiske iwan techmimiktiske ipampa inin otli kosa tlaixtli. san in len modaxilis kixirkos yas plasa motewihtiw kiwikan ni kargita ki mamatiw pero nikan yektlahkwa para chichikawis. in kwowit sesek. nelehwel yakmo kimati' nelehwel yeka. in omakatlalike niman ye momamimiktia, yuhki innawatil yuhki innepowal, nokwel onmokawa, san iwki inik mawiltiaya. aw inik ompa walewake in kinewayan in chikomostok inik tlayawaloke inik ipan in xiwitl asiko ye napowalxiwtika iwan onxiwtika inik motlaliko. aw in yekaxitl kineskayotia in chimali ipampa in iopochkopa kitki, san in akasik kimantiw in ik kitki. kenin mochiwa aw yese san niman aokmo welitike inik makoske, inik moteilwiaya; aw ok hustisiatika nawatiloke in atsakwalka in okik mottas monemilis in kenin mochiwas in pleito, achi kexkichkaw in okiw kawtikatka. ¡amo xiktati, nikan ipan in in mikiko in wewe tesosomoktli tlahtowani askapotsalko, in tlahtokat epowalxiwitl. kaxtoli chilpitsawak se kikwa in itakka, se kixihxima, se kitehteki wan se kikwa. . sa wal mokwepato aokmo tle okichiwato yaoyotl, sa tekitl kim on anato. san tik moyawain putuma xochitli,in kakawa xochitli. para kwali mah seliya in toplantita. ¿catlehua in moknin mokokoa? in xoko. nikan onkak olipan. 70. ¿cuix tontlachia in tikampa, in toteputsko in kenami wits in xalteyo, in ehekayo, in katlewatl inik nikan tematlak? ¿tetzonhuazco in takiske? ¿auh inin kwix ik noka tahawiyas, noka tipakis, in nimokwaw, in nomoselow? ¿auh iskin nikan nopan tikmanas, immochimalawis, nikan nopan tiktekas immomakkwawtlawis; nikan, notech tikpachos in totonki, in yamanki, aw in itstik, in sesek, in teiskali, in tetlachialti? ¿auh ahnoso nimitskwetlaxilwis immomatsin, immokxitsin ka ik tinechommayawis, ka ik tinechontlasas, in nimokoski, in nimoketsal? ¿azo nikkakis, akanosomo nikkakis in tsiwaktli, in tetewitl, in tinechommotlalililia? aw in sankto domingo teopixke kin yewantsitsin otlatokayotike inik axkan motenewa de la piedad, ipantsinko mochiw in don lwis de velasko visurrei. . aw in ik onohke in kwawtlahtoke in onka kwawkali senka momawissotitoke, konakitoke in teokwitlatentetl iwan xoxowki tesakatl iwan chalchiwtenkololi iwan aposonaltesakatl iwan aposonaltenkololi wian xoxowki tenkololi. komo kahfentah moskaltia kichipauaj, kampa kwouhihtik amo kichipauaj. i mosempowa tlatokat wewe motekkwiksumatsin xxvii xiwitl. amo xinechmahpewa. nikan ipan in mikiko in chiawkowatl tlahtowani katka in chiapantsinko in wexotsinko. tla kimatiskia tlen mela wak, wel okwalaniani. konitoko niknonamakilia nokal san sentetl tonatiw ikalakiyanpa itstikak iwan in itlalo iwa in ichinanyo ontetl in ixkich in ipan nika yewatl niknamakiltia netlasotlalistika in itoka sensilia ximenes iwan in ipilwan alonso dias iwan hwan ximenes iwan in fransisko ximenes españoles ixkich techmaka ompowali pesos in tonenonotsal omochiw. xiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1336. aw oksekintin wewetke kimachiyotia ipan in in pewaloke in xikipilka, tolokan inawak. yewa otlakolchokataya. kitoke in temiktike “cuix tiwalpilotiake? ye isempoalok i yekene totech mopiloke totech moketsako toxcatl”. "xitlachiyati kenke para ikayato nopa tlen ka iskatki ankimanilia ankimokwilia ka ixko ikpak nontlachiasneki in tetsawitl in witsilopochtli v kali xiwitl, 717 años. in iw kimotekakiltilia i yewatsin sankto tomás de akino "yn tlapani im itech ka kipia in tlakatl in tlasotli wei in imawischiwaloka, aw in itik amono tle poliwi, aw ye oksenka ipampa itechpa in yolilistli in ánima in asika tlamachilise; ka itech ka wei yniqu inenewkatsin yniqu ipatilotsin in itechpatsinko in totekwiyo dios iwan iwayolke in angelosme, aw inik angelosme iwayolke aw ka nel spíritu ka yolini mochipa semikak, in iw no ye ipampa no itechpa yolilistli in ánima in iwki yewantin iwan in itechpatsinko in totekwiyo dios iniqu inenewkatsin yniqu ipatilotsin, in kenin iwki inik senkiska wekapa weyotsintli inik teutl ka yewatsin tlahtowani tetekwiyo, onka iwelitsin inik motlanawatilia inik motetekimakilia in ompa ilwikak iwan i nikan tlaltikpak iwan in ompa miktlan". no ipan in onkan kichiwako in ik-etsonxiwitl motlakatilitsino totekwiyo hesuchristo. nitlahpia kanyi niwik. kwali mopaka in texokotl; niman motlalia se litro atl tleko iwan ihkwak ye achi kwakwalakas ye motlalilia in texokotl; ompa mokawa mahtlaktli minuto, satepan ye mokixtia iwan moewayotlasa. satepan, ihtik in atl kampa omosiyaw in texokotl motlalia kanela, tlatsopeliloni, oksehpa motlalia in texokotl, ma kwakwalaka ixkichkaw in ye textik in texokotl, iwan in newktli atik ahnoso tetsawak, kenin monekis. tachipahuaqueh, aw achtopa ik tsatsiwak nowiyan in ihtik siudad mexiko, in yewantin españoles ik nawatiloke in akin kipia chikwasen tliltik kinnamakas in nawi, aw san oome in mochi tlakatl kipias itliltikaw; aw in akin amo kitlakamatis hustisia in iw tlanawatia, kikwilis in omotenew nawi inik aoktle onkisas tlatkiwa. in sesek. aw intla okimah mopia testamento, intlakamo kititisneki intlakamo ihsiwka konnextiaya ixpan, ka ik teilpiloyan tetsakwaya no ik tepinawtiaya; inik sano nepanol onmostlakawiaya mexika, in akin tlein kitemachilia konilwitimani konnextilia in frai herónimo de sárate, inik wel kitemos inik wel kitechiwaltis pani motlalis nesis kinextiliske, in saso tlei itech kittaya testamentos in mikkatlatkitl, inmanel senka ye keski xiwitl omomikili mikki, intlanel ye omoneltilili itlahtol in tlein itestamento itech okitlalitia in imikkanenawatil, okseppa moch kitemowaya kiteixtlawaltiaya. amo machia tlen ipan opanok. mochiwa kampa eski, semi tahtalpia komo kahfentsin kitsonkemi. aw in axkan kawitl ipan moyetstikate in ipan in senkiska kwali sankto tetlatsontekililistlahtokaikpali in senka mawistililoni señores lisensiados don alonso de peralta iwan gutierre bernardo de kirós. yawih moihtó in tlakanteontsi tlantokat xvii xiwitl. ¿o ach akok nesewis? amo tlanankili siwatontli. opew san niman yeyeka. okiwikak ipan oyitik yekamalakatl; okintlekawitl ikpak tepetl kampa momati chanti teposton. san nen tekitl, xonawiyakan, xonawiyakan, tokniwan. ¿ha tamonahiske, ha tawelamatiske, tokniwan? teskakoatl kimamaya witsilopochtli. san gabriel arkángel, se kwali teotlak, nomaiknin, ¿ kenotimopanolti? aw no yewantin in chichimeka in totolinpaneka in amakemeke, in ikwak asiko inik walake onkan axkan amakemekan, ka okno kimitstasiko okno inpa asiko in omotenewke masewaltin; aw ka ye kin yewantin kinpewtasiko ka ye kin yewantin kintokako in amakemeke inik kinkwilitasiko in imaltepew iwan in intlal katka. . aw in ik ki wal kwepkayotia in anawakatlahtoke in xikalanka in simateka in koatsakoalka yewatl in wei chalchiwitl in ololiwki kikiltik tomatik; xonakat aw in tlamantli ik omoteilwitinenka i nonantsin hei metstli aw ixkich oneltik in tlatoli ik niman omakok sentetl tlatokatia nawatili sentensia ye niknamaka in tlalmantli yewatl niknamakiltia pedro dias español inamik sensilia ximenes ipilwan hwanilo inik ome alonso. yunka tlemokwas yetipake' yunka intosemiya para tomasewiske. iwan imixpan fransisko sanktoval fiskal iwan pedro hakobite yewantini aw inik nikneltilia nikan niktlalia notoka iwan nofirma fecho ut supra. migwel de los angeles alkalde por mandado del señor alkalde pasó ante mi bernardino xwares eskribano. ipan chikome tekpatl xiwitl kitsintike mexicah, altepetl in motokayotia mexikaltsinko. yewatl in inawak istapalapan ok axan moketsa. kampa ihkatokeh no mochiwa kampa xopamilowah oso kaltsintan no ewa. ye omito, senpowalxiwitl ipan onxiwitl in kaktimanka in ayak tlahtokat in amakemekan. tlanankililistli in teichpuch ik kinankila in inantsin iwan kiknelilmati in itenonotsalis, in ileiskalilis. aw in ihkwak in ye oyuh nepa exiwitl tlahtokati in kwawtlix in ikmatlaktlonnawi tlahtowani kulwakan. ipan in in toxiw molpili. in axkan ipan ik 12 mani metstli de hunio, ikwak omomikili in don herónimo lúpes hwes governador katka nikan mexiko tenochtitlan, inin mestiso xaltokan ichan; aw inik ohwesgovernadortiko tenochtitlan matlakxiwitl ipan chikwetetl metstli ipan senpowali onse tonatiw. —čikitoton ika wehweyitlen okahsia de xente tlen okahsia de xente muchi kimiktiyaya' in wan satepan pus yotemowti in len otiktake inon tiempo rebolúsion. axweli nimoketsa. xinechmowalwikili ome tewilotl ika chipawak tepachichik iwan orne ihtakatl ika xamon noso kehso iwan sekintin aaeitunanaeh. ihyo, ernesto, ¿quenin ka in mosenyelis? tewatsin timomachitia ka in motahtsin nomaiknin oyelowaya. tosepan nemachtilkalko otiwiah iwan nochipa kwali otohuicaqueh. para mah no takwakan nopilwan, isiwkayampa mokahki nohkí komo nama tona. pehki moihtó san magdalena. san nikimonilnamiki in itskoatl, notlayokol itech asi a noyol. ¿quen man intikawke in kwauwewetsin, yaotsin? ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios 1608. aw in yewan in tlaxilakaleke in intoka martin de san hoan xiwnel, tomas xakin, diego yaotl, fransisko akaseka, bartasal yaotl, pedro eka aw yewantin onotlaneltilike onokitoke ka ye neli ka intlal in itoka atlixeliwki aw ka nel ipilwan in itoka maria tekwichon oyuhtikake in titlanawatilwan hustisia aw inik oneltik inik otikmakake in itlal teispan okimotlak in tlali. para ihkí axinkinekih intlaxikose. kema sampayok noha kema ipankiski i tochtli xiwitl, 50 años. "na nikilewi para na nikilewi para nitekitis. aw yewantin inin in chikome kalpoli i masewaltin in kiwalkixti, aw no seseyaka kinpieya sese inteowan; inik mitowa motenewa ka oknosekintin in kiwalwikake in inteowan. aw ye sentsonxiwitl ipan chikonpowalxiwitl ipan se xiwitl axkan in wewetke mexika asteka chichimeka inik ompa walolinke walkiske astlan teokulwakan inik owalnenenke nowian otlihpa owalnentiake inik niman onkan asiko in kanin kwawitl senka tomawak in awewetl in inpan postek. aman poko onkak, ne keman tel onkaya. aw nikan ka intlahtolo in tekwanipan tlaka wewetke in okik ayemo walasia in nikan tekwanipan amakemekan. .o ya potonilok in navikakopa akatl xamantoka xoh! masatl mochiwka teutlalipan mits ya no ittako yewa xiwnel yewa o mimich a nontlase' nikia porke de tehwa de mota'kun. in teteu inan, in teteu ita, in weweteutl, in tlalxikko onok, in xiwtetsakwalko in makitok. in xiwtotoatika, in mixtsatsakwaliwtika, in weweteutl in ayamiktlan, in xiwtewktli. aya yese ye nikan, tlala ikpak,antetekwita, nopilwan, a noyol kimati, kiwintia ye noyol. onkán yemihkiti motlarlilia ohtlame moxiyotia mokwakontia. in se kiteki in xochit wan se kikohkopinilia imaxiuyotsitsin wan se kitsimpihpipina. ne pesmaapan ihkayah makwil kwoumeh wan sehsemeh pewak kitatatsiwiah wan nochin uakkej, nochin maxiinkeh wan pojpostekkej. aw i yehoanti tsatsitinenke in otlika in kaltsala in tiankisko xipanok, tetlyako tlako siwakoatl, motelchiw in ikwak wisnawatl, xochitl akolnawakati, itspotonki aiximachok teskakoakatl, anawakatl tlakochkalkatl, akwasaka, kowaiwitl, wanitl, okis, mixkoatlailotlak in aska tewkalkatl, tentlil; yehoantin i in sasitinenke in iskich kitenewtinenke in omito in ikwak walkalake tlatilulko. xa itech ameyal, aw inin ilwitl mochiw oksenka yewantin kichiwke in viskaya tlaka españolesme, ipampa ka insanktotsin in omotenewtsino. walewake umotlaliko okosakapa, no motlalmomostike, makwilxiwtike. in ipan axkan sábado a xix de marso, in ipan ilwitsin sant joseph, ikwak mochali momamal in vandera chichiltik tamasko, in itech ikwiliwtok itech mikwilo tlachinoli teoatl kitentokatok, iwan in tlahtoke in otlahtokatiko mexiko, mochi tenochtli imak ikwiliwtiwi tlatoke; iwan kwawtli tlahtokayotl konakitika, aw ipan metstika in totlasotatsin san fransisko, iwkima kavalo powi, ikrus ymaqu ikak iwan in yamatsin kimosowilitika. kenin mochiwa xiii kali xiwitl, 1193. xikneskayoti. 88. kan ka, san xikkwi, san xikkaki in nanyotl, in tayotl, in ahmo mach yuhki in chalchiwitl, in teoxiwitl, in yuhki toptentok, petlakaltentok immoxilantsinko, immotoskatlantsinko. in otinechwalapoiwi, in onkan otinechontlachialti intla owikan, intla owimamani. in yuh sotok, in yuh mantok, in yuh wipantok, in yuh newiwixtok in koskatl, in ketsali, in nepapan iwitl. vii tekpatl xiwitl, 1460. aw iwan ye nawpowalxiwitl ipan chiwknawxiwitl in ipan 2 tekpatl xiwitl, 1520 años, in omomikili tlakatl motewksoma xokoyotl tlahtowani katka tenochtitlan, in tlahtokat kaxtolonnawi xiwitl; aw san niman ipan ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl || 92 motlahtokatlali in tlakatl kwetlawatsin tlahtowani tenochtitlan, ikwak ompa temi tlaxkalan in españolesme. nikan ipan in motlahtokatlali in tlakatl kakamatsin tlahtowani tetskoko, ipiltsin i nesawalpiltsintli. kwaltia xikpiakan. inin se mexikatl kimosiwawati itoka opochtli istawatsin, onkan tlakat in ikome akamapichtli in tlahtokatito tenochtitlan; yewatl konpewaltito kontsintito in tlahtokayotl, inik yewatl oitech kiske itlakamekayowan in ixkichtin mexiko tenochtitlan tlahtoke onemiko, yese inin omotenew akamapichtli onkan tlakat in kulwakan. ihoan no tikintotlatlawtilia i mwi poderosos señor presidente yoan oidores in nikan motlapielia siudad de mexiko san niman namo kikawaske in totlatol san wei hustisia ik titlatsakwiltiloske ipampa ka otikneltilike ika eskritura karta de venta konpias hernan peres español ik tikneltilia tomatika tiktlalia tofirmas ihoan sekintin amo tikiximati amatl san tomatika tiketsa krus. no ikwak umpa ya in mariskal la china. chiknawi akatl xiwitl ipan i xitinke in chichimeka i metstitla onokan inik yake imaltepetlalito in axka uk ka metstitla. aw in iw machoka nikan mexiko ka atlan weyapan omomikiliko in don rodrigo inik ompa walewaka manila, aw ya sexiwtika inik axkan onesiko inik okalakiko mexiko; aw inik kalakiko sa kan okisel in nikan mexiko, san ok otlipan kinwalkawtikis, iwiantsin yatiwitse in nikan witse habún tlaka in ompa kinwalewiti habún, in oyuh atenkisako onkan al pwerto akapolko, san niman kiwalyakatitikis in don rodrigo. walewake umotlaliko atlitlalakya, i motlalmomostike, yexiwtike. santa tamboratoton. "omonauatili in tlakatl totekwio. . .! sas se imapil ik on tlalkwaya. aw in yewatl ilwichiwaya. testigo intoka migwel inyakamekatl incha san pablo tlachkwititla omonamiktin aw i niman omakok hormamnto inik testigo mochiwan aw in ixiwtlapowal in ye nemi yehenpowal xiwitl in ye nemi aw niman otlatlakoltilok inik amo istlakatis in ipaltsinko dios. nechkapa yehwa konkali kwaltíamotlatewak. amo se kitoka. sekpa oyeya sente kwali tlakatl okimpiaya chikóme ipilwan, no chi okichtin, iwan okinek man teotl kimomakili sente sisiwanton. melawak, teotsin okimo makili; noso otlakat semi amo chihchikawa, kenameh kokoxki, iwan omolwiayah san niman mikis ipampa inon tahtli okititla sente ikonen man kanati chipawak atsintlai tlen ika ki kwaatekis keh in piltsintli. in pipiltontli okitokakeh ikniwan, iwan ihkwak ye okitemitihkeh in akomitl opehkeh kamanaloah molwiah akin okachi welihki tsikwinis ye yewa ki wikas in akomitl. amo machia kenin owalwets in akomitl iwan otlapan; in pilantoton intech omosempanti weyi nemohtilistli iwan ayak okinek teixtla intatah momanatin, impampa melawak, semi tlawele oyelowaya, achi ihawak okitaya welis ye mikis tesiwakonen iwan amo mokwaatekis. inon xolopihtin pilantoton, omolwilok yo owalmokwepanih yo wehkahkeh welis san mawiltihtinemih iwan ye okilkahkeh tlen onikin tekimakak; ok tepitsin opanok iwan kenin in pilantonton amo owalayah niman okachi okwalaniwak iwan intechpa okintelchin; iwan omihtalwi mah teotl kimonekilti kakaloh man mokwepakan! kimach okitohkeh ihkwak ye omokak chekatikpak welihki seawits ihkweyokalistli; tlanexilko omo ixnextilok iwan okitakeh chikome semi tliltikeh kakaloh kalikpae opanokeh wehka oyahqueh. san nenka niman onoyolkohkoltilok omo yoltekipacholok mach inin tetsawitl ayokwel omopohpolo. in nantsintli no omoyoltekipacholok, ye omomikiliskia; mach in sisiwanton iknopiltika open mo wepawa. iwan momostla nesi san ika yewa in tatahtin omoyolewayah akinomeh aik amotlen oquinonotzqueh, amitla okilwihkeh tla kemanian okimpia in ikniwan; ixkichka se tonalpa, amo poliwi sente kamatlats, okinonots, okimachilti in sisiwanton ka yewa itlahtlakol in itolinilis in ikniwan, semi yolkohkoltika okitemoto inana iwan okitlahtlani kox melawak tlen oquinonotzqueh: imanon ayokwel itla omotlapacho nochi tlen opanok okimachiltih okilwi nochi tlen melawak iwan yewa amo tlen ¡tlahtlacol; mach sisiwanton wel moyolnonotsani, ka tlen nochi tlen oquilhuihqueh, omolwi yewa iteki kin temotin in ikniwan ipampa kin makixtis iwan tetsawitl kixitonis, ixkichka ye imanon ayokmo tlen nesewilistli okipix. se tonalpa san ichtaka okalkix san okiwikak sente maxitlatstli oquitlacolihqueh, sente tlaxkali se tepostlatekoni iwan iateko okitemiti ika atsintli. ihkin sasokampa, nepa ika nikan nochi in tlaltikpak on tlachiato amikia, omayanaya, ihkin owihkan on panoto mach in angelestin nochipa okixotihkeh iwan amotlen ipan omochin. se tonalpa, okitak ka san nenka wel motekipanoa, niman open choka, ihuaq ixpan omonexti sente ilwika angel akin okilwi moikniwan tikintemohtinemi ipan teskatepetl cateh, ka ome tonalpa ka tlakpak wehka tinehnemis. xik ana inin omiton yewa kwali ki tlapoa initsakwal teskatepetl. in sisiwanton omoyolen, niman isihkan otsikwin, teskatepepan oasito, ihkwak ye ixtlan tlatsakwali oehkok oki tlaposnekia ika in omiton okon makak in ángel, mach... ¡ ihyo tlaweliltik! ¡ohtlipa okompolo! semi wel omoyolkoko; weyi yolamanalistli itech omosempantiwets; satepan okinemili momahpiltekis iwan okitasnekia tla ika imahpilomiyo welis kwali kon tlapos in tlatsakwali. kimach ye omomahpilkoton okitlali in omitl ipan tlatsakwalotl san niman omotlapo. in sisiwanton niman okalk&k; mach sente tsatsapa okitsakwili oki tlahtlani tlen okinekia. nokniwan in chikome kakaloh nikin temowa. okinankili in tsapa. yewan no tekowan paxialohticateh; mach ayokmo wehkawaskeh ye wal mokwepaskeh ye onikintlakwaltlali; iwan melawak ye okitlali chikome kaxitl in ihtik okitlali tlakwali iwan tlaili; inon yowalpa tetepitsin okonan iwan in nochi tekomatl tepitsin okik; ihtek in chikontetl tekomatl okitlahkal in mahpilxitlatstli iwan okalak okse kalxelolpa. amo owehkan niman okikak se weyi awits ihkweyokalistli ye yewan chikome kakaloh oehcoqueh. wel yeomayanaya iwan niman ahkopechpa omotlalihqueh. mach inochtin insepan 28 in ipan semilwitl domingo ik xi mani metstli de febrero de 1601 años, in itlasopilwantsitsin sankta klara siwateopixke ikwak mowetsitike in ayotikpak yankwik monasterio, in ichan siwapili doña katharina de peralta iknosiwatl, ik tlawenchiw in ikal ipampa amo pilwa, yehika inik teopantli mochiw in ikaltsin; chikwasemintin in walmowikake monhastin, se itokatsin doña ana sotelu de motewksoma in fundadoras mochiwako, aw yeppa sekintin onkan kate motenewa beatasme. ipan nawtsontli ommatlaktli onsempoali onnawi xiwitl mochalia wei kwikapikilistli motokayotia "inic chikonawi sentlapitsalistli" in okiyokox kwikamatini ludovikotsin van beethoven. akin wel ¡ztlacatini amo yekitalo. omik inon tatahtli mono tatahtli ye'on omik weno. otinemikeh aw in axkan ye ixkich. ye ninokixtia in nimonan, in nimotta. ye nimitsapana, ye nimitstetsilowa, ye nimitstisawiya, ye nimitspotonia. ma san kana tokontlas, ma kana tokommayaw. in axkan san ye ixkich in tikmokakitia. ma mitsmoyolotili, ma mitsmolnamiktili in tlakatl, totekwiyo, dios. newa i ikniwan onikin nankili. sino ke hasta keman dios kihtos. mah amo ehekawilo, inin omotenew doña maría de kastila tsonatsin ka ye no ixwiw ik kinotsa in tlahtowani kwawsesekwitsin. tisokatsin noyuhki seki in altepetl okipopolo iwan omik ipan nawi akatl xiwitl. se kichipawa. techyiaiknokawtewaske,¡tlayokoxti, o antepilwan! .xiuhmaquiztla iteamik kochina kochina kokochi ye nikmaololo nikan in sivatl nikochina ika nehon nikan namechtatawtia itech nehin hora. kwawtenkostli semi monamaka in nanakatsin. xochiyowa in marso. kiilwi para akmo nixikoa nisikwinis. ¡xiquehcoltican nikan! kemanian ye oniteitak ipan ohtli. onechteixmachiltihkeh techan tlakapa servantes. semi pilhuah. amo wel kixowa ipampa miak tekitl techan onka. ye yiman waloanaske; ye nochtlakatl, tlaka, siwame ika pipiltsitsintin wiloa teopa. san noihki motlatoltia topixke ¡ma se kwali otli namechmakili in toteotatsin! onkwan on se xiwitl ipan in totaske totlapaloske iwan tikmotlapalwiske inintsin kwawtechmopilkititok; topampa omomikili. iwan ma yewatsin namechmoteochuilhuili. iwan se siwatl in kiwalwikak, amo wel momati in itoka, imekaw katka in tliltekatl; walotstita in ihtik walyeta siwatl in piltontli, ipiltsin in tliltekatl in iachkawtsin katka in atonaltsin. xoleme noihki okisaya nanakame, tlakananakatl. omotisia, omotlakaliliaya chilchotl iwan tepitsin yepasotli, itsintla ailkwawitl otlakatia oksekintin xoleme kinkwitiaya chilnanakame. nekxipakihlis tlatwli iskatki itekiw in tetlatemolistli nikan méxiko ipan nawtsontli omompoali onchikonawi xiwitl. aw in yewantin mexika in ipan in xiwitl in ye yuhki in omosenkawke in iyaotlatkitika. aw in unka kitlalike imomos, tolxakali kitlayawalochtike, much kinkowanotske in tlatoke. —tepecinko ompa tlakpak santepek tlakwakwaltoton sanweliwi pahpachiwke ichkame. tlanin san tóbyas tihtoka. v tochtli xiwitl, 1614. otitlanamakayah in ipan axkan ik 8 mani metstli de disiembre de 1605 años, ikwak omachistiko omikowak in a la china, ye iw nepa se xiwitl in ipan ilwitsin katka sant fransisko in omochiw yaoyotl; amo senka miektin in mikke españolesme, aw ye oksenka tlapanawia miektin in mikke in miktiloke in ompa tlaka masewaltin in motenewa sangreyes. mochi kitkike, ammo inon ammo tewan san tikneki ma tokonihtakantosiwamon topahpakilis mochiwas in timitsihtaske ika mosiwaw xikixtemo ahkin mitsyolopachiwitis nikan tikteihtitiki tokonihtaske ahkin walas aw yehika ipampa kitotiwi in wewetke teotenanka ka in onkan teotenanko ka ye kin yewantin in teixwiwan in teikkatotonwan in temintonwan in tepiptonwan in kimawisotike in intlapial in intlakimilol in diablo nawyotewktli in xipil, in kimoteotiaya; in itech monekia kostik teokwitlatl chalchiwitl ketsalitstli teoxiwitl in tapachtli, aw in nepahpa iwitl in xiwtototl in tlawkechol in tsinitska in ye ixkich in tlasoiwitl, in iteo- || 34r -tlacanezca katka in imawisneska. in iskowantsi in tlatokat matlaktlomei xiwitl. aw iwan ya yepowalxiwitl ipan matlaktlose xiwitl in ipan vii tochtli xiwitl, 1539 años, in omotlahtokatlali in omogovernadortlali yankwikan in wel achto in tlakatl don diego de alvarado wanitsin tlahtowani tenochtitlan; ompa kanato in ekatepek ompa tlahtowani katka achtopa, san se xiwitl in ayak tlahtokat inik niman motlali. nikan ikwiliwtok in ikwepka inin tlahtoli in kastilan tlatolpa onmotenew: in itsonteko in ipewka in kitotok in kitenewa in wewe mexika xiwtlapowali; in tlein xiwitl ipan omotlakatilitsino in totekwiyo dios. 24. ¿can yas in kweitl, in wipili? ka tlaselia, tlatsmolini, tlaxiloti, tlamiyawati in tlaltikpak. ahmo temosiwikan, ok ye itloktsinko, inawaktsinko ximokalaki in totekwiyo, ma ok yewatsin tlamatkatsintli. ¿in kenin mostla, in kenin wiptla? aso ye nikan ihkatiwits in temoxtli, in ehekatl inik mitsanas, inik mitsitskis. intla kweitl, wipili itlan tikalakisnekis, titechilwis in timonawan, in timottawan; ahmo san tiemotlalilis, ahmo san tikmihtalwis, ka tinank, ka titawa, ka titkiwa, timamalo. para in diabetis, se kipanaltia ika limón se piotet wan se kikawa kalampa mah moserenaro nochi in se yowal. itknonotsalis, iteiskalilis in tettatsin, inik kinonotsa in ipiltsin in ihkwak ok tepiton. "tezcatzonco moyolkan q.n. teskatsonko oyul in tochtli in ik yas okiyokox okivik in notew okito niktlasas nikmamalis in mixkoatepetl kolwakan id est niktopevas. yei tlakah oquipehualtihquch okimayawihkeh ye tlakohkolisenka oeskisaya okinemili kimotstilihtaya in tialtsintli in itechtsinko no kisaya in atl san wehkatika okimihtak in tlalok iwan witsilopochtli inteokalwan in ye xitinkeh ayokmitla iwkatik axkan ye semihkak kochiskiani axkan ye ipan ahsiskiani in semihkak tlayowali ok itech ones in ixwetskilistli yuhkin konetl axakan yes itloktsinko in tonatiw yas in tonatiw ichan kiwikas in iikniw mixkolotsin nawi xiwitl ipan ye ome witsitsilin yeskeh xiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1284. achtopa kinmixpantito in omotenew tlakatl koxkoxtli ihkwak onkan tlahtokati, iwan in itlahtokayowan in wewe akamapichtli iwan in ikome itoka achitometl iwan no in ikome itoka chalchiwtlahtonak, kinnonotsato inik imak motlalito altepetl kulwakan; inik niman okinselike ompa okintlalmakake ompa okinkawato in itokayokan tisaapan, onkan senpowalonmakwilixiwtike. ika nochin namoorasiones kikwito wan kikonanki kixima. axonka tlaxkali se kitoka. iwan kito in testiko in toltekatl in isiwaw katka ono honpa tlachiwaya aw amo tikmati keni konkwik sa no sa timotlapololtiya aw sa ik otikmatke onkan yamawa aw amo tikixmati i siwatl iwan aik onkan otikitake ka mochipa topial in tlali ya ixkich i nikmati. ayak neli in tlaltikpak ¡ta xitechtlamaka!" no kwaltia kwoutatil, kwaltsin kwowit, masiso, kwali tata. aw ye ixkich kawitli in onka kate ye sempoalxiwitl onkaxtoli in axkan moteilwiyan in teixwiwa tlatlanilok imixnamiki in gaspar karilo español in inamik iwan marina iwan fransisko kwix ma yewanti kaleke tlaleke kito ka hamo ka san kintlanewtike in tlaxilakaleke kalmaxalolkatl iwan xalakatl iwan xiloxochkatl. aw intla kaok tle mokawas is xochitl in yetl in tlakwali in kakawatl in ihkwak apewalko ik kittaya in wewetke aok tle imasewal yes aok tle ilwil yes in yewatl tetlahtlakwaltia iuki kitokaitiah por in mahyá yon owat in sahsaliutok, yehwa ika kilwiah owakilit. iwin im poliw i mexikatl tlatilulkatl, in okikaw in iaw in itepew. no niknokawalok in tenawak tlaltikpak. aw san ya yewatl ipan in in omotenew xiwitl in yaoyawaloloke in kimikalke in mexika in onkan chapultepek inik nawalpoliwke; kinnawalpoloke, matlaktli altepetl in intlachichiwal mochiw. namantsi nochi xihchiwa pedasitos wan kimeuaj, toktli ma eli. in ipan in xiwitl omotenew yewatl governador in tlakatl don hwan baptista malinalko ichan, aw alkaldes san ya yewatl in telpochtli don antonio valeriano in ixwiwtsin wewe don antonio valeriano katka askapotsalko ichantsinko iwan don migwel wetsin akatla chane, alkaldesme sant hwan moyotlan tenochtitlan, iwan don melchior san pablo chane. aw in yewatl itoka xomimitl mahawiltito in ompa kampa kinamikito in kolwakan tlakatekkatl; kitsitskike, niman kiwalwikake. aw in yewatl quimonanquililih: notewkyo e, siwapile, nochpochtsin e, ka ompa nonahsis mochantsinko mexikko tlatëlolco, nokontepotstokka in teoyotl, in techmomacquiliah, in techmomachtiliah, in iixiptlawan in tlakatl in totewkyo in toteopixkawan. inin xiwpan kimiktiah ipan altepetl dalas, hohn fitsgerald kennedi, wei itlahtokatsin tlatlahtokayotl in sepanka. leonportila iwan in nawatlahtoltlakanechikolistli ompa santa ana tlakotenko milpa alta nimitsmaktilia nehin kali tein tikchiwkeh axkan. makimatikan in ixkichtin in kitaske inin karta de venta ka in nehoatl don balthasar tlilankalki yoan nonamik hwana tlako tichaneke in ipan in siudad mexiko sanktiago tlatilulko totlaxilakaltia sankta ana xopilko tikselia totlanekilis wel toyolokopa timitsnamakiltia totlal tolpan mani techichikilko tlalitik in tehoatl angelina martina san no nikan tichane in ipan in omotenew siudad de mexiko sanktiago tlatilwíko motlaxilakaltia san martin tlilhoaka telpuchkaltitlan. in kakawatsin onkak ome taman: itlanahnamik: aw ik niman yewantin kimontokatiake in pipiltsitsinti iknotlaka in wapawalo san hwan de letrá in motenewa kolegio de los niños, kiwikake in inkrus teokwitlatl plata tepitsin. xkintayokoli, aw ixiptlatsin mochiw in frai hwan de torkemada, gwardián mochiwtsino tlatilolko. aw in witsiliwitsin iwan in kwatlekowatsin iwan in itskowatsin niman ye kinnonotsa in tlatilolka iwan in tepaneka, kimilwike "yn chalka senka moxikowa in iwik im mexikayotl". ipan in in xiwitl in walmikwanike in chapoltepek in mexika chichimeka, ikpak motlaliko in tepetsintli; ikwak intlahtokaw mochiwtiwits in tlakatl wewe witsiliwitl chichimekatl. "nosisna, tlake tihkwa? ik niman ye koniwa in intekpoyow in kimittas in wewetke chichimeka in totolimpaneka; aw i yewatl in tekpoyotl inik yah, okno sekintin akxoteka in kipixtiake. 64. nopiltsine, notelpuche, otikmihiyowilti, in timotekitilia, in timotlakotilia aw iskin nikan at omitsonmotlachialtili in tloke nawake, in ipalnemowani. at nikan semilwitl, omilwitl, mitsonmonemiltilia in totekwiyo, dios. at ok semilwitl, omilwitl, mitsonkwawtilia, mitsonoselotilia; at ok nikan tonoselonamiki, tonkwawnamiki, ka ik tipitsalok, ka ik timamaliwak, in kakaxtli, immekapali. ¿cuix tokonpowas, tokommanawis in pilotl, in koneitol, in kwawyotl, in oseloyotl, inik tikwawti, inik toseloti inik onkan tikikitsilti? istatl, ixkich in monekis aw no ipan in in xiwitl in ikwak poliwke tlatilolka; amo wekaw in kimonpew axayakatsin. kwikatika oo tokontlapalaki in nemis tlaltikpak. no se vende, kien va por leña, si pasa por el potrero, alí rekoge este hongo. —in tlauli in tlaolkuntl i motoka de mes de marso. aw in yewatl in kwawtli in okimittak in mexika chiwknawi tekpa xiwitl atle muchiw. monamaka itakka. aw in kwitlachtepek tlatokati itoka tsiwaktlatonak; in isiwaw itoka yoalsikatl, in ipiltsi tochintewktli. onemia ka yuh okimoneltilili in sankto padre paulo kinto, in iw itech nestika ome ibulatsin in kiwalmowikilike tottatsitsinwan de la kompañía de hesús teatinos; intlaitlanilistika mochiw oksenka yewatl i nokniwtsin diego lópes kwawtlakwilo in wel ye tlatsintile kimotlalili inin ome omotenew kofradía fundador mihtowa, aw in ikome tlakatl itlaitlanilistika itlapalewilistika mochiw yewatsin in ompa governador don melchior de soto, kinmotlatlawtili in omotenewtsinoke tottatsitsinwan la kompañía de hesús ini kimokwilito roma. ik akan wel motlalike, aokkan welasaloke san nowian owaltotokoke. kisako in tula, kisako in ichpuchko, kisako in ekatepek, niman chikiwtepetitlan. aw in unkan in, chapultepek onkan pehultiloke in mexika in yaochioaloke, aw niman ik onmikianike in mexika in kolhoakan. yuh oneltik in ispantsinko señor governador yoan hweses ikimoneltililia kimotlalilia in itokatsin yoan in infirmatsin onkan omoyektili kitohoa albaseas. antonio valeriano, fransisko martin alkalde thoribio lukas, migwel sanches hwes. pasó ante mi diego leonardo eskrivano. newa in amitla nikmati. tlatlahtoltin . aw intla wel itech tahsis in altepetl in ompa titlamattiw ma xokon kwitiwetsi in tepostli in kwawtekilistli in tlachpanalistli in tletlalilistli in tlawilistli in tlatsehtselolistli in tematekilistli in tekamapakilistli; iwan i keni senka moneki inik tekittiwas in ipan inik motlalia altepetl siudad iwan inik mochiwas molinos iwan in oksekitlamantli moneki inik wel mochipa yes altepetl, aw senka monek inik tekitiske mochintin in amo tleik nechalanilistika in amo tleik neixnamikilistika tekitiske; aw ik motekipachoke in pipiltin mawistike tlaka, ik pewke in ye kiteixpanwia in ye kiteilwia don christóval kolón almirante, aw inik motlatlalili kitenew inik kichiwas in itla tetlatsakwiltilistli, aw inik onkan konanke in kwalantli somali inik ye kixnamiki, in oksenka yewatsin padre frai boil sant benito teopixki. aw in yewatl in itoka totoltekatl tsompachtli tlailotlaktewktli tlahtowani in walteomama in kiwalwikak in kimoteotiaya diablo in itoka nawyotewktli in xipil, sa yewatl in mokaw in kinpachotikatka in kinyakanaya in oksekintin chichimeka katka. tlahpaloli kwali tonaltin; kwali teotlaktin; kwali yowaltin. tla nitlanamakasya kiaya aw in topatiw mochiw: in ipatiw mochiw in telpochtli in tlamakaski in ichpochtli in piltsintli; i ye ixkich masewali in ipatiw mochiw sa umatekochtli tlaoli, sa matlaktli axaxayakatlaxkali tekixkisakatlaxkali sa senpowali topatiw mochiw. aw sa niman ipan in in omotenew xiwitl ix akatl i motlahtokatlali in tlakatl mayawtsintewktli tlahtowani wixtoko tekwanipan. in ochpanako, tlatlanilok in testigo ilwilok inin sempoali peso ak okiten okito in testigo ka wel melaoak in nikitoa ka yehoatl okiten in inamik hwan de eskalante in maria geronima okikalaki teupan in tomines itech opow in ianima angelina de la krus ye axkan kaxtolxiwitl inik ka wel melaoak inik onokonan huramento inik onitlatolmelaw. porke ihwanti kitlasojtlaj. ﻿titlazotlazquia sábado a x de oktubre de 1598 años, ikwak ik tsatsiwak tiankisko in ipampa sokikamdelero angelesme iwan in tlapopochwiloni tlatemetswili in aso sankto anoso sankta iwan in ihetl itech kitlalia; mochi tekawaltilok, ik motlanawatili in kimopialia sankto ofisio inkisidor, deskumonión ik wets, kawaltiloke in sokichiwke. aw yewatl ikchiwknawi visurrei mochiwtsinoko in tlakatl don hwan de mendosa i luna markés de montesklaros, in mokalakiko mexiko ipan yewatl xiwitl de 1603 ik 26 mani metstli oktubre, in otlapacho ika ixkichkaw aw ixkich ik walantika in ipan yewatl xiwitl de 1607, inik mowikak umpa visurrei mochiwtsinoto in perú; in otlahtokatiko nikan mexiko yexiwitl ipan chikwetetl metstli. imin ye opoliw in mexikatl, tlatilulkatl. in okikaw in iaw in itepew. ye onkan amaxak in ixkich ye tikatka. aoktle tochimal, tomakaw, aoktle otikkwani. yuh seyowal in topan kiaw. martes in ik 19 mani metstli mayo de 1615 años inik walyowak, ihkwak omomikili in siwapili doña isabel de mutewksuma siwateupixki monha omoetstikatka omopowiltiaya itlatekpanpantsinko in totlasomawisnantsin in itlasomawischipawakanenakayotilistsin sankta maría nwestra señora de la konsepsión, in onkan monasterio ayotikpak ipan tlaxilakali siwatlan, yuh yewantin kitokayotiaya i ye wekaw tlaka katka mexika wewetke; inin omotenewtsino siwateupixki ka mes- || 274 -tiça, intech kis wel imichputsin in gosalo gano español konkistador inewan inamik doña isabel tekwichpotsin de mutewksuma tepetikpak siwapili iwan mihtowaya tekaman siwapili. noixiko nikilpis para ya nihmachilis kema nihki santiagome noihki omitotiaya yeyi tonali iwan omomagaya. kenon mi toa kaxtilankopa omodesafiaroa noso omotlatlatoltiaya. iman omotlatlatoltiaya sente kitoa. xinechitititi ¿campa ka morreino? ¿campa motlanekilis? nianka kate mahometanos achi mitstlaniske ika nochi mokristiandad. iwan san niman omomagaya ika espadatin. ikin omitotiaya. ihkwak otlalania kristianos iwan mahoma otlapoloaya owetsia ipan tlaltikpaktli. oaketstaya iwan omikia. opewaya in tepostlatsilinaltin otsilinia iwan tlatsotsonkes noihki okitsotsonaya kosa tetlakolti. tlen okitoaya inin mahoma opewaya choka iwan kitoaya ¿campa oyeya notsonteko? ¡amo onihmatiaya kename nechtlaniske cristianos! "uajka tlen tihchiwase nama tlatsopeliloni, ixkich in monekis in ahkwakopa mochiwa sah wan de nikan komo se kitoka mochiwa;
