se kitoka se kwoutsin. iiii kali xiwitl, 1509 años. sempoali nohpali yotiwalmowikak yotimomachitiko in tetlahtol inin tlahtoli ye tomak tikpia kema yeka yeka onikilwi tlen tewatsin otinechmotlatlawtili nikilwis saninon timomachitia tlen yewad onechmankili ahkimati tlen omitsmolwili vii kali xiwitl, 1369. 2 akatl xiwitl, 1247 años. aw inin i mochiwin ka yowalnepantla, aw in tlatlalchipawak ye kate akwenko in españoles; aw ompa semilwitl in kiyaoyawaloke. aw yewatl iknawi visurrei mochiwako in don martín enrríkes de almansa, wel inewan tlakati in in markés de alkañises; in otlapacho ika ixkichkaw inik pew achtopa metstli noviembre || 110 in ipan xiwitl de 1568 aw ixkich ik walantika yewatl ipan xiwitl de 1580, inik mowikak umpa visurrei mochiwtsinoto in pirú; in tlahtokatiko nikan matlaktlomei xiwitl. aw nowian tletlalike in inkaltenpan kastilteka, aw nowian witsa in altepetlipan tlaka; aw in kastilteka mawiltike motlatlaloke in yowaltika. don femando kortés okimat ka ye wekawtika mochantiayah mayatlalpan in omentin caxtiltecah. ik ye kinek onkan kimmakixtis. vii tochtli xiwitl, 1278. in tlatokatke newan itiachkaw san sexiwitl; in oya onxiwitl in ayak teyakan, sa kaktimanka. tehwa nikan timokawati tikon lamatsin, aw no iwan i wel yankwikan onkan ik wel achtopa onkan ik waltsintik inik ye tlahtokatiwa kulwakan ye chikonpowalxiwitl; aw no iwan san wel ixkichika in in omotenew chikonpowalxiwitl in itlawilanalwan mochiwke in tlakpak omotenewke chikwasen altepetl: in xuchimilko, in kwitlawak, in miskik, in kuyowakan, in okwilan, in malinalko, in ipan in sesentlahtokayotl katka ichikwasemixtin kitlakamatia in tlahtokatachkaw kulwakan. istatl, ixkich in monekis in ihkwak in ye iw kaxtoli ipan exiwitl onkan tlahtokati in atonaltsin in chalchiwtepek in intlan chalka akxoteka. aw intlakamo tekolotl kinnotsani in mexika inik ye no mochi kawke inik mokwepke; ka kimilwi in tekolotl in mexika "ca poliwis yas in chalkayotl!", aw ka yewatl ipampa in in ye no mokichketske in mexika. aw kimotlatlawtilih inik ma sa ye kimotitlanilih inik kittatiw in tlahtoani obispo, in aw san niman ipan in in omotenew xiwitl in owalkalak in nikan mexiko in tlakatl don hwan baptista hwes governador mochiw in tenochtitlan, malinalko ichan, in axkan moyetstika tlahtokati; inin iksenpowalonmatlaktli ipan ome i ye intepachokawan mexika tenochka in ye ik ompa walkiske in ye ik ompa walolinke in inchan in ompa wewe mexiko astlan kinewayan chikomostok, in axkan kitokayotia yankwik mexiko. 89. aw ka niknotlakatl, ka nimasewali, ma san nikchoka, ma san niktlaokoya; maka nikan, maka nikkwi, ma san kana axixpan, kwitlapan, nimitsontlaxili, nimitsonmayawili immochokitsin, immixayotsin, ka oninokwiltono, ka oninotlamachti ipaltsinko in totrkwiyo, iwan in tewatsin otinechmoknelilitsinko. ma tlaltitkch ximowetsititsino, ok xikmosewili immoyolotsin, immonakayotsin. nimitstatawtia no se kikwa in kilit iuki xoxowik. san nen tekitl,xon awiyakan xon awiyaka, tokniwan. ok ayemo, mach saniman niksalosneki. intekitij". kitlali welta aw in nonakayo itech nikpowa in tlali yehika ka itech okis ka tlali ka sokitl aw in ikwak tla onimik in nonakayo onpa motokas in toteupan in tokapila in san hoseph onpa nechmomachiotilis in teupixki in notekoch in notlatatak. in ipan axkan sabado a unse dias del mes de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años in tekpoyotl otsatsito in ipan tlaxilakali kolwakatonko okitenyoti inik monamaka in ikal in itlal in mariana aw ayak tle ik otlanankili testigo diego astaxochitl. tus xiwalmowikakan axkan kaxtoli immanon tikkixtiske in xonakatlken timihtilwis ivitli makok q.n. onkan kitema in tisatl in ivitl. mewakaya 40. aw ka tel ok nipiltontli, nikonetontli, ok nitlalololowa. ok nitapalkamawiltitika; ok naxix, ok nokwitl niknawiltia; ok notenkwalak, ok noyakakwitl nomak niktekwiya. ka ayamo senka nitlachia, nitlakaki; ayamo senka ninoskalia, ayamo ninihmati. aw kitowaya ka nextli in kinchiw, in kinyokox inteow kitowaya. itech kitlamaiaya in ketsalkoatl chikome ekatl itonal in kinchiw, in kinyokox. inik se tonatiw onmanka in itsinean. nawi atl in itonal, mitoa atonatiw. in ipan in ye ihkwak in mochiw in atokoak in anenestiwak in tlaka michtiwak. in oksé taman no monotsa mimientaj, pero kilwiah okich por ke amo taki, amo kitemaka kwoutahkilot. ¿toni neh mosta ika nimotekipanos? nechpachanito nepa aistero para ma nipoliwiti aw iwan ye matlakpowalxiwitl ipan onpowalxiwitl ipan chikwasen xiwitl in ipa 1 se akatl xiwitl, 1363 años, in omomikiliko in tenochtsin, in teyakan in kwawtlahto tenochtitlan senpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtoli onnawi xiwitl; aw inik mosenpowa in ixkichkaw okwawtlahto tenochtsin inik ompa kitlalike tisaapan kulwakan yepowalxiwitl ipan nawxiwitl inik onmomikiliko; in oiw momikili ok yexiwitl in ayak okwawtlahto san okaktimanka in tenochtitlan. koyolchilmoli ika tochnakatl amo se kitachipawia. aw in hwan diego niman ik kitlekkawih in tepetsintli, aw in oahsitoh ikpak, senka kimawisoh in iskich onok, xottlatok, kwepontok, in nepapan kaxtilan tlasohxochitl, in ayahmo imochiwyan; ka ne{ wel ikwak in motlapaltilia is setl. wel senka awiaxtok iwki in tlasohepyoltohtli, inik yowalawachyohtok. aw in tachkokolwan in wewetke, in ok tlateotokanime in motenewa gentilesme katka, atle wel kimattiake in itechpa in, ik ipampa in omotlapololtitiake. inin ipanok ka yipan novesientos chiknawi iman on newatl nilus himénes onikpiaya kana matlaktli xiwitl. tsopelik kamohtli aw in omoman chimali. inik tixitinke aw in ixkichkaw okinmopachilwike atsakwalka senpowalxiwitl ipan yexiwitl, inik san kimonmokawiliko in ipan in omotenew xiwitl. ome tochtli xiwitl ikwak mixnamike chololteka, tepeakakalke. inik kiske sa much kikwitlakoyonike in kali in kin kiawak nowia sa pipieloya; in itoke ye untlami in kisa. no ika kichiwah tamal wan miak taman atol: istakatol, xokokatol, chikolaatol, pinol wan totopoch. kwalika, okse tonali ika niwalas. ¿ye itla timomachitia kenin ka mopiltontsin yahtinemi ika weka tlali? i tochtli xiwitl, 1246. 6. iwan tikintlahpalos in itlachiwal in kampa kate in ahnoso kana tikinnamikis in pipiltin, in tlahtoke iwan in tepan ihkanime, in teoyotika tkyakanke, in tepachowanime. in padreme; aw in wewentsin, in ilamatsin iwan in yenotlakatl, in nentlakatl, in ahmo awiya, in ahmo paki. yewatl inik siawketsalo, inik tikinsiawkktsas, ahmo san iliwis in tikinsiawketsas, wel kwali tlahtoltika. ahmo yuhkin tinontli ye tinemis. intla wel tikchiwas, ye titlakamachos, tiyektenewalos, ve tikwalihtolos. in ihkwak in ye iw chikonxiwitl onkan kate in amalinalpan askapotsalko in mexika; aw ye no ixkichkaw tlahtokati in ikome itoka yowalatonak in ikkaxtoli tlahtowani kulwakan, ye chikon- || 40r -xiuhtia. ye unka chapoltepetl ikatya aiyo ikwepka; ikwak topa mochiwa yewaya, se in tochtonali xiwin tlatkik yewaya chokistli yewaya. aw in ihkwak in in ipan in omotenew vi tekpatl xiwitl ye iw nepa kaxtolomome xiwitl kate tulam in mexika asteka inik yatiwitse; ye iw chikwexiwitl kinwalyakana in akasitli in kwawtlahtotiwits. kanela tlatsikwewali, ahso anis, ixkich in kikwi tomahpil ipan in in onkan tlapitsawayan chalka tlalipan motekato in mexika, kiwikake in intlahtokaw wewe witsiliwitl. in amaix yehwa in tein teonka ixnesi, tein kiixnextia toni in onkak ininawak in masewalmeh tein nemih nikawín kwesalampa, wan tein nemih itech in okseki xolalkonemeh tein powih no kwesalan, pwebla. .—macamo nimiki, teteuhé. sábado in ik 10 mani metstli oktubre in ipan omotenew xiwitl, nokwel senpowalonchiwknawi tlakatl in tiyakawan soldadostin onoyahke in ompa omotenew akapulko. mokwaiyawitiw in ik tleko in ikpak witsilopochtli. sa sepa in kiwal yawalowa. san pedro ya yahki tekititi. nikan ompewa wei yaoyotl iitik galitlalpan. kema awelito. se kilo iwan tlahko textli yewan tetlasohtlah intemachtih. in okiaw ayak tokak in tlaoli in chia in awawtli in ayotli; ayak kitokak, sa nowian iixwak in tepetitech in otlika. amo mochipautani. xictemotih. in oiake tesosomoktsi unkan ka tewitwalko, newan kate in inansi kwetlaxotsi. in amo kwaltia para pahti. viii tochtli xiwitl, 18. se kilo wawtsontli wan kema, kema kikalaki ika noponi ipa ne kahón. aw inik kintisawike ye in tenextli inik tlaawitektli tlekwastli elmomosko kimomiktike. walowii tlen neka anali. nias ninonowalkatl, ninotsatsilia ‘ma ik walakia nexewake owaiyo awaiya y’”. kwaltia kiilwitehki iixwi nikan mokawati ichan, ikwitlapa. monamaka ikamohyo tamanal oso xoxowik. in mochiwa kwowihtik, pero no itech tiempo saj, kemeh abril wan mayo, kemeh aman hulio amo teyi. kien sabe kani kinkwi. amo kasan nechpaktia. kin onkan inn onpew in eskan omotenew sant pablo, san sebastián, sankta maría in oome motlalike alkaldesme, itenkopatsinko || 125 in tlahtowani visurrei, ipampa in tekitl mopapatlaske in kichiaske in tlein tekitl. inihwanti nopa kipantixkiya nopa sintli aw yewatl ikchikwasen visurrei mochiwtsinoko in don álvaro manrrike de súniga markés de vilamanrrike, in otlapacho ika ixkichkaw in ipan xiwitl de 1585 aw ixkich ik walantika yewatl ipan xiwitl de 1590, inik mowikak ompa españa; in tlahtokatiko nikan makwilxiwitl. anmowaxkawan in amo kwaltia para pahti, solo itakilo se kikwa. wan wahkino nopa kinkwesohke nopa onkán yokisayo ye serka wik in rebolúsion ye serka wik wahsiko nikan mochin repúblika mochin repúblika yokisako rebolúsio. owiptlati onahsito ihkwak yoimmantik nitlakwawiteki nikihtoa tlen nenmayitia chanehkeh ammitla ximopanolti tlasohkamati onikahkalkata onitlasewik axkali timohtilis tinokone omihtilwi tinokone ikanin yoni kahsikamat oniknemili ye nechmoneltokitia ipilohtsin omihtilwi . ka iwi in okitlaltemolike in tetsawitl witsilopochtli achtopa yewantin kittaya kimawisowaya in ixkich anawakatiali, xiwit. ipa se taman saj. ¿ma aka ka siskia noyol ak? san yuh niyas, xochiwikontikak ye noyolio. ye ketsal neneliwi, inomeh. . in iwki topko petlakalko on tlachieya in san ok ichtaka kalakia in nowian anawak in ik nawalostomekattitinenka." ninotlatlahtiak xinechmaka inin xochimeh. michime. ¡xicadivinarocan! iwan okseki miyek tlamantli mochiw, in iw ye onnesis mottas in ipa achto amoxtli, in ikwak in ipan kawitl in ayamo ayokmo wal...wak i nika tlaltikpak, in ayamo walmonakayotitsino umpa i neli dios itlasopiltsin temakixtiani, iwan tlein ipa xiwitl motlakatilitsino. se kikwa. tlanonotsali . ixkich in ompa konkwia puchteka in ostomeka in ompa xikalanko in ki wal itkia in itech powia in awitsotsin. itechkopa in enformasion kichioasneki maria geronima in inamik hwan de eskalante español ipanpa kali yoan tepantli okixitini yoan in inamik yoan ipanpa in oquitzacu in onkan inkisayan yoan inkalakian in inkalitik. aw no ikwak mochiw in tlahtokatilmatli tlawtonatiw, ikontetl oselonakasminke xiwtilmatli ik tlapantiw chalchiwtlatenyo, iwan kaktli; iw mito kimottilis in prínsipe rei don phelipe. mochiwa saj. anemiskeh en la siudad de mexiko a seis dias del mes de hebrero de mil e kinientos i setenta i ucho años in mawistililoni señor don antonio valeriano governador hwes ihoan señores alkaldes don antonio de mendosa fransisko martin in kimopielia hustisia in ikatsinko su magestad ihoan hweses. nochi tlen tlamantli tlahtoli kitekiuiyaj. kenke eme para itstos. no kemeh xokot, sayoh in mapisiltik. kenin mochiwa kakatekwowit lka moknin tlamawisalkyan xia. itlanahnamik: para achiyok nikinitskis nopa wehweyi nikan nesi kenin kaxtiltekah tenawatike makamo namako nikan méxiko in pisyetl. mochiwa kampa eski wan mah se kitamewi ihwak tsikitsin. awiya! istak xochitla o ya moxocha yewa tonan a teumechave mokisikan tamoanchan awiya! oho ya teutl ka teukontli ikpak tonan aya itspapalotli nikawín mochiwa, komo se kitemowa se kahsi sikierah se tamatsoltsin. walachia ihkwak inana ontlapatska iwan inpiomeh kintlamaka. ahkin omaxitiko itloetsinko nonantsin ammo momachitiaya in masewalahtoli ahweli motenonochiliaya yuhkin tewan ika titononotsa ipampa ammo nikan otlaeatiwak nochan omosalwiko nomontahtsin okimiximachili isiwawahtsin oksekan kanin ammo tlahtolo tomaekwalahtol ompa omotlaeatili iiehpochtsin ompohihon omoewatekik omopix in teotikatahtli ompa no ok oppa nomontahtsin okimopilwahtili isiwahwahtsin omotlaeatilihkeh nosiwa iikniwtsitsiwan seppa ihewak innewantsitsin kana omoikaya omixkwawitek in tepustlawilanali kan yewantsitsin owiloaya omomikilihkeh chikwei tekpatl ik mokets tetenamitl in atlitik. wan mokwouyotia kemeh se pulgada, ikwouyo xoxoktik wan chiltekpin no xoxoktik. ihwak chikawaya chichilewia. okiske chololan in chontaltin; innepantla popokatepeme nalkiske. wehka inkwitlapan kikawke amakemekan, tlalmanalko, ayotsinko, kwitlawak, tetskoko, istapalapan iwan mexikaltsinko. satlatsakkan, okalakke iitik wei altepetl mexikotenochtitlan, in kanin don fernando kortés iwan motewksoma in xokoyotsin omonamikke in kanin wei tlahtoani iwan kaxtilteyakanki monawatekke. in tsikataol se kioilia in xinach wan iwan se kitokati, kihtowah yehwa ya in takat, kan miak se kioilia. se kikwa nochi ika iewayo, amo wel pixki. "ma timotlanika. aw no ipan in in ome kali xiwitl in kimomamakake mexika in tlali askapotsalko, in okik ayamo ompa onyaotlatowaya chalko amakemekan in maxtlaton; aw ka ye kin ikwak in okonmat in okonmomamakake in mexika in tlali askapotsalko, ka yewatl ik motekipachi inik ompa yaotlatoto maxtlaton in chalko amakemekan. amo kachi onkak. kwaltia wahkino ya pilweyi eltok ne inik makwitlamantli nikitowa on mani nomil onpa san pablo apepetsan itlan mani mimil lwis tewan inik wiak senpowali onmatlaktli inin patlawak senpowali inik nikmaka in nochpoch ana newan in inan maria tiyakapan amo itlakawis in notlatol. axkan lunes in ik 8 mani metstli septiembre de 1614 años teotlak, wel ipan ilwitsin itlakatilitsin totlasonantsin sankta maría de la natividad, in momikili alonso rodrígwes delgado fundador in okichiw hospital del spíritu sankto in akalotenko inawak san ignasio la kasa proffesa; inin ihospital onkan kinkawtia in hermanos de waxtepek motenewa konbalesientes, in kimokwitlawia hospitales. nima ye i kwikoanowa i mesika in iw kichiwaya i semilwitl; san ok wel mochiw in ikomilwitl kwikoanoke, ye ikwak mike in tenochka in tlatilulka. tlake elis?" istatl, ixkich in monekis axkan viernes in ik 28 mani metstli hunio de 1613 años, ihkwak nikan siudad mexiko otsatsiwak nowiyan kaltsalan itlanawatiltikatsinko in tlahtowani don diego fernándes de kórdova markés visurrei in ipampa ik aokak masewali tlamamas ixkwatika; in iw muchiwtiwits kinmamaltia wewei kwawchikiwitl iwan in saso tlei wewei tlamamali okinmamaltiaya frailes iwan españoles, in weka okiwalewaltiaya kimama kiwalkawa nikan mexiko ahnose nikan okiwalanaya, in senka yetik ik kiwika senka kintolinia, inik okonaxitiaya in kanin altepetlipan tekiwtilo masewaltsitsinti konkawa. istatl, ixkich in monekis newa nochi in yowali oniyekoch. aw kano yuh nikasikaitta i newatl ka no nonpewas iwan itechpatsinko in totekwiyo dios; oksenka yewatsin iwiktsinko. pexontok in tokafenkon, wan tonilihki noponi kwaixko wan kitlachilito aw inik otlanankili in testigo okito ka nikmelawa in notlatol in ipanpa in tlali in onkan mani kowatlan ka itlal katka in akamapichsin ka onka mamanka in i-[f. 3r.]cal aw in ixkich inik mani ka onpa onasi in akalotitech iwan itech walasi in temaskaltontli in oxixitin. para nechchiwilikan favor. se malkochtli ayoxochitl chokistlaya, ixayotl in pixawi, sanye onnenawatilok,witsilak teowa, kikwito noponi aw sanno ipan in in omotenew metstli in ik 18 mani de oktubre de 1603 años, ikwak owalake oasiko in ihtik altepetl mexiko in yewantin teopixke kwatesontsitsin in ipilwan beato hwan de dios in kimokwitlawia hospitales, in axkan onkan kate hospital in desmaparados. na nihneki xinechpalewi pampa na... kiitstokeya koyome, masewalme wan ne sintli yekyektsi kiwalika kinkwiliah ok onkan in tonatiw in xiwitl wets. yeteietia, ompa walpew in tonatiw ikalakiampa; aw ompa itstia in ikisayanpa. iwki in tlexochtili pipixawtiw. weka mokwitlapiltitiw. aw in oittok se[n]ka tlakawakak, iwkin oyowali onmoman. el lisensiado antonio rodrígwes 4 entonses satepa okichis asta sepa dios kwantos años. xi tekpatl xiwitl, 1412. mopoayan sentabo desde pewa se u:me yeyi nawi makwili chikwasen čikurme chikweyi chiknawi matlaktli matlaktlisé matlaktlimome matllaktlimeyi matlaktlanawi kaxtoli kaxtolonsé kaxtolimome kaxtolomeyi kaxtolonawi sempwali. aw sentetl onkan katka tetl, ik niman ye kamakenihikwilowa, tekpatika kixinke in tetl; inik kitokamakake altepetl, inik axkan motokayotia amakemekan chalko. kenin mochiwa mochiwa de mayo a septiembre. in aka konmottilia atlan mikis. in aka konmottilia yewatl in iwian yokoxkan monemitis ipan mikis. para nikan nimomaka kwenta semi fwerte ahwiak. xoxowkichilmoli ika axolotl iwan qu1ltonilli xii tekpatl xiwitl, 1452. domingo a vii de disiembre de 1597 años, ikontetl domínika adviento, in yewatsin frai hwan de kastilo ik motemachtili kimotekakitili inik momikilike teopixke in ompa a la china chikwasemintin sant fransisko ipilwantsitsin deskalsos teopixke. iwan wipili, yewatl in potonkapipilkak texikalikwiliwki iwan ixkwawkali wipili tenmalinki. tlen 115 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlaltlanawatilmeh quitequihuiseh, tlen ika monahuatiseh, tlanawatikayotl tlen kisas altepeko, nochi ixnesiseh, masewalkopa, ipan motetonis tlalxexeloli, iwan tlahtokan nechikolistli iwan tekichiwalistli altepeyotl tlanawatiloyan, ika inin tlahtolpechtli i. se iwan se altepeyotl tlanawatiloyan kiyekanas se tlahtokan tlen kitlapehpeniseh chinanko ehuaneh, iwan motlakayotis tlayekanani tlen altepeyotl, regidores iwan síndikos san keskih kiihtos tlahtol tlanawatili. tlanawatili tlen kimaktilia inin amatlanawatili altepeyotl tlanawatiloyan motekiwis ipan tlahtokan san yewa itechpowi iwan amo onkas seyok tlatlahko tekiwa tlen inin iwan tlanawatiani tlen tlaltlanawatili. in tlahtokan tlayekananih noso presidentes munsisipales, regidores iwan síndikos tlen tlahtokan altepemeh, tlen kintlapehpeniseh chinankopa ika tlamatlalantli, amo welis kintlapehpeniseh tlen saniman seyok kawitl. in tlakameh tlen amo xitlawak quintlapehpeniseh, noso kin tokatlaliseh iwan kin tekimakas akahya tekiwa tlen ika tekipanoseh tlen itechpowi inon tlanahuatilmeh, san katlia ihki tokayotl tlen kin macaseh, amo welis kintlapehpeniseh ipan saniman kawitl. nochi in tlanawatianih tlen motocahtihqueh, keman yewan kinelpiaseh intequih, amo welis kintlapehpeniseh ipan saniman kawitl maixnesikan san tlapatlanih, iwan tlen ixnesih san tlapatlanih kena weliseh kintlapehpeniseh tlen saniman kawitl kampa ixnesiseh kewak kinelpiaseh tlanawatili san amo tla tequipanohtoseh. in tlanawatil tekichiwaneh tlen chinankopa, tla kikwalitaseh ome tlen eyi imawan, welis kinkotonaseh tlahtokan altepeyomeh, kiihtoseh ixpolihtokeh inin tlanawatilmeh iwan kiixkotonaseh noso kipatlaseh akahya tlen imawan tlahtokan, ipampa tlehtleya temahmati tlahtoli tlen tlanawatil chinanko tematiltia, tla tlen sekinok imawan temaktiliseh neskayotl iwan monohnotsaseh tlen ika nelkwali tlasenkawali. tla akahya tlen imawan kikawas itekipanolis, welis mokalakis ipatlani, noso mosenkawas ke kiihtowa tlahtol tlanawatili. tla moihtos ixpoliwis se tlahtokan noso ipampa tlakahtewaseh noso poliwiseh tlen achi miakeh imawan, iwan tla ken kiihtos tlahtol tlanawatili amo welis kalakiseh tlen san tlapatlanih iwan amo welis mochiwas yankwik tlapehpenilmeh, in tlanawatil tekichiwanih tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh kintokatlaliseh tlen chinanko ewaneh in tlahtokan tlen altepemeh tlen kitlamiseh kawitl tlen intechpowi; inin tlahtokan kiyolitiseh tlen keskih imawan tlen kiihtos tlanawatili, tlen yawan moneki kinechikoseh amatlanekili tlen monekilia iwikpa eliseh regidores; ii. in tlahtokan tlen altepeyotl mopialiseh tlakayotl tlanawatili iwan kitekiwiseh intlapial ken kihtowa tlahtol tlanawatili. in tlahtokan tlanawatilmeh kipiaseh tekiwakayotl iwikpa kiixwasaniseh amatl, ken kiihtoseh tlanawatilmeh tle ipan pamitl altepeyotl kikixtiseh tlanawatil tekichiwaneh tlen tlatlanahuatilmeh, in pantli tlen tlamokwitlawili iwan tlanawatili, in tlahtolchihualmeh, amatematilmeh iwan tlanawatili tlen tekichiwalismeh tlen mowikatias ipan intlanawatiloyan, tlen kiyekanas tekichiwalistli altepetlahtokan, kiyektlalis pamitl oktekichiwalistli, tekitilistli iwan altepeyotl tekitilistli tlen intechpowi iwan mamotemachi tlapalewili tlen altepechanehke. tlen intechpowi tlahtol tlanawatilmeh tlen moihtowa ipan tlatlapantli tlen onpanok imako kiixtlalis: a) in sentika tlahtolpechtli tlen tekitiloyan tlahtokan altepeyotl iwan tekitiloyan tekichiwalistli, noihki ipan motlalis tlehtleya tlen ika momanawis iwan tlachiwalmeh tlen ika moxolewas kwalantli tlen tekitiloyan iwan santlacameh, ipan motlatskiliseh seha ininpatih, tlatematiltislitli, tlakakilistli iwan tlaxitlawalistli; b) in tlamantli tlahtolmeh kampa monekis mokwamachiliseh ome tlen eyi tlatlapantli tlen axweli kitlani xochitlah kitkitiwits kiiluiaj, kiihto nopa wewe tlakatl: . "notlatzitzinuan e, puchteka e, ostomeka e, oankimihiyowiltike; ma xi mowetsitikan, ma xi moceuican. niwaloakoya san no yuhki xochitl ipan momati in tlaltikpak. in mochiwa saj, pero komo se kitoka no mopilowa. den peso non itoka onkan se peso non se peso itoka axkan itoka un peso nokatka orne peso axkan dos pesos. tle' nian nechtlahpaloa maria matekwa kwalani tlenkwa kikwalania. tlatisewa, tlatlapalmiktia, tlalayowalotia. tlanenkwilalia, tlaixtomawa. wan ihkino kitentlapo sanamoka niwewetska, namokol,anmosiwatlawisan,mosiwachimal. in ipan axkan lunes a veinte dias del mes de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años in diego astaxochitl otsatsik in ipan tlaxilakali texkalkokolko okitekakiti inik kinamaka in ikal mariana chikwasenpowali kitema se tlakatl español lwis savalos au in ikwak otsatsik ayak tle ik otlanankili testigo fransisko de mendosa. itilmatitech in kwawtemoktsin, koanakotsin, tetlepanketsaltsin, san yeixtin walmantiake. febrero 22 de 2006 in ipan axkan viernes a xvii dias del mes de hunio de mil i kinientos i sesenta i nweve años in tewantin alkaldes don diego de mendosa hwan garsía in tiktokwitlawia hustisia in ipaltsinko su magestad tikakitiloko in itlatol [mococo]hua antonio kwawitenkatl  in ipan tla[xilakali] kwitlawaktonko inik kitlalisn[eki itestamento] niman tokoniwake eskribano f[ransisko garsia i]wan algwasil yewantin okikakito in itlat[ol in mok]kowa aw in tewantin audiensia titlanawatilwan nikan ka in otikake in itlatol mokokowa. in ipan axkan martes ipan imilwitsin reyesme ik 6 mani metstli de henero, ikwak kimasewitike in tlahtowani visurrei don hwan de mendosa i luna; nowian walake in altepetlipan tlaka in masewako mitotiko. welik taixkal itech komal wan no welik tamanal. ipan in in ikseppa toxiw molpili. kitlachiltinemi wel owatsintik awitseh in chichiwalxexelo iwan pantsinxexelo inik kikawaskeh tlen quinamacah. . in akin otlahtlako in puchtekatl in ostomekatl amo tewik kiwika, san yewantin monoma tlatsontekiliaya motlatsakwiltiaya momiktiaya. viii tochtli xiwitl, 1422. yewatl in in ik kinmawistiliaya in tlahtoke. aw in kitokiliaya san mochi sokitekomatl. inin kin ikoppa onkan akapulko katenkixtiko in imakal haponti; san muchi || 243 tepustli in kiwalitki iwan eskriturios iwan seki tilmahtli in nikan kinamakaske. ¿tlen anmotlacualtiznequih? ai tlaxotla tenamitl q.n. quitopeu in intenan in akike yauchivalo. miak nechyolkokoa, nonantsin: noso awel timitsnotili. onia ikalman noknin onikmakato sente tlanawatili. . . • chikome mares kwando iwan nanenkeh in hesús. quipiazqueh. ¡ xikana in mochimal: xochiakontsin! wan na notata rei wan na axnechmachtihtok wahkino kema ya tiotlak kema yatí ne tonati ii akatl xiwitl, 1195. nikan kopewalti in ye tlahtokati in wewetewktli tlahtowani amakemekan. sagradísima tierra antonio martín markés, para ahmo palainis porke tehchiwilis falta. se kikwa in itakilo. ipan inin novesientos matlaktli xiwitl yomomanaya tiankistli kwali. nochtin tlanamakakes yokwikaya xochikwali, achi kwakwali tsotsomatli weles ikan ye miaktin totlamachtikatsitsintin yomewalwiaya ompan momochko. ¿aquin okonihto? aw sanno ihkwak in omachistiko in kenin españa yewatsin rei se iwayolkatsin okimixkechili umpa prínsipe de eskirachi inik yewatl visurrei okiwalmochiwili onkan walamelawa pirú, inik onkan tlahtokatis kimopatilis in onkan tlahtokati don hwan de mendosa i luna markés de montesklaros, mowikas mokwepas in ichan españa; inin achto nikan mexiko tlahtokatitikis visurreititikis inik ompa nikan mowikak pirú umpa konmikwanili in rei. xkinaxkatili. matlaktlomei tochtli xiwitl ik poliwke tepeyakakalke, unka mik tlatoani chichtli; inka moman tsonpantli inka momamal kowakali tlatilulko. intla tikmawisos in iwki hin nopiltsé ma titlapinawti ma titlakwekwetlaxo ma timosiwatlamachti se kitoka iteyo, ixwa wan mah se kichipawa. in kolostetlayokotli, teiknotlamachti.tikchiw. axkan viernes in ik 13 mani metstli setiembre de 1613 años, ihkwak nikan siudad mexiko ahsiko kalakiko se tottatsin san fransisko kwatesontsin, umpa wala in yankwik mexiko ahnoso wewe mexiko; inin tottatsin ik wala san walmochtakatitlan kiwalwikak intlahtol in ompa motemachtilia oksekintin teopixke san fransisko, ik walmoteil- || 228 -huia ixpantsinko tlahtowani visurrei in kenin senka kintolinia umpa governador, inik se okalkaposwi tottatsin kikxipopostek iwan sentlapal kimapostek, inin tottatsin kokolok itoka frai herónimo de pedraso. in xochiyowa kemeh itech abril wan mayo, porke in tiempo wel aman kosecha. inik sentlamantli wel achtopa yewatl in nanima imaktsinko nokonkawa in totekuyo dios ka itlachiwaltsin yoan ka itlamakixtiltsin makimoknelilis in ikwak okitlalkawi notlalnakaio ma kimowikilis in ichantsinko in ilwikatlihtik. mochiwa milah ihwak yon taeloti. se kitoka in taoltsin wan moskaltia ya. se kitamewia wan se kitalwia wan mochiwa ya. mochiwa milaj, achto mokopina olot wan elonanakat mochiwa ikespan olot wan tsayani nen totomoch wan seki elonanakat pankisa kampa xilotson. tatsalan sah mochiwah in elonanakat. kasá ika semi mochiwa sinanakat wan kasá ika amo mochiwa. ta kihtowah se kitawelia komo se kikwa nakat ihwak se tatoka, yehwa ika mochiwa sinanakat. in nanakat amo xochiyowa pero ikwouyo kemaj, miltsin. in mil xochiyowa abril oso mayo. "tlaskamati, ta tibwen hoven aw inik nikmati onseppan ik moteilwike in ixpantsinko sorita in itoka pablo makwex aw inik makok tlali inwan chinamitl kan sa kimotlachkwitlaxili aw in chinamitl inik moteilwin san yeppa makwiltetl in kimakak sorita. aw iwan ye iw nepa sentsonxiwitl ipan chiwknawpowalxiwitl ipan yexiwitl in onkan tlahtokayotl kulwakan inik onkan kalakiko mexika, ik en blanko tlahtowani onkan in koxkoxtli. .in tlasopili chikomekoatl ka nikan kwalkan ma hiyitities ka ye omokawike tlamakaske. amotsin, amo nikamapowa. titekitik wan tiksufriro, aw aso neli in ixpantsinko oasik in tlatoali intotlatokatsin señor dotur seinos in wel nika in tlakamo notstitika ka ixpantsinko onasiskia in totlatokatsin. kehne tla elki weyi tepetl ik kinnankili, kihto in tsiwtlakawki in yaopol: "ohuannechmocnelilique, tlahtokehé chichimekayé; ka namoma ka namokxi niyas, ka nitska ka niyopoch nias in al- || 129v -tepetl". oksekin kihtowah ome taman: kriolo wan manila. ik nima wel onkiske, nima ye ik kiwika i nonoalko ayawkalko, unkan kapitán yoa malintsi yoan tonatiw i sandowal; unka senkistimani in altepetlipan tlatoke. se kilo iwan tlahko tamaltextli ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. tlen 93 tlanawatihkayotl.- tlen sekretarios tlen despacho, kema sanok motlapos ahachika nechikolistli, kiyolmelawaseh tlahtokan sennechikolistli kenihki eltok nochi tlen inin tekichiwalo. katliweli tlahtokan sennechikolistli welis kin nohnotsaseh nompa sekretarios tlen altepetl, nompa prokurador general, tlen direktores iwan administradores tlen entidades paraestatales, iwan ahkin tlayekananih tlen órganos autónomos, iwikpa ma kiixnextikah inin amatlapowali tlen kin tlahtlaniseh ma tlahtokah san tlen melawak, kemah mo kamanaloseh ika se amatlanawatili noso tla kema kiixtomaseh se tlahtoli tlemach in tekichiwalo noso ihukpa ma tlanankilikah tlemach kamanali noso tlatsintokalistli. in ome tlahtokan, keman se tlen nawi tlatlapantli tlen itlacayotipah, keman tepantlahtoanih, iwan tlahko, keman tlen wehkapa tepantlahtoanih, kipiah tlanawatili kinyolitiseh tekichiwanih iwikpa mochiwas tlatehtemoli kenihki tekitih tlen moihtohki kaltlanawatilmeh tlen moselnawatiah iwan kaltekitilmeh tlen kinpalewia sentlanawatiloyan. tlen kinextis tlatehtemolistli momatiltis tekichiwani tlen sentlanawatiloyan. nopa tlen in teki tlahtokan sennechikolistli weliseh kintlahtlaniliseh amatlapowali noso amatl anke tlayekana ipan se dependensia iwan entidades tlen weyi tekiwa tlen ni weyi altepetl, ika tlatsintokalistli mo ihkwilohtos ipan se amatl, yainoh mo neki kinin nankiliseh ma amo pano 15 tonali pewa kemah ki selihqueh. ni tlanawatiltékitl mo chiwas san keh wala ipan amatlanawatili tlen sentik tlahtokan sennechikolistli wan in amatlanawatiltlatilantli. pamitl tlen iv: tlen poder hudisial —tlenkwa' kichiwilis in yehwa. anquipiazqueh. aw in onkan miktilok kopil in tepetsinko, ik axkan motokayotia akopilko. in sesek. matlaktlose akatl atle mochiw. aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl in momikili in osomatsin atlawtekatltewktli tlahtowani atlawtlan tenanko, in tlahtokat matlakxiwitl; aw sa niman ipan in in xiwitl i motlahtokatlali in ipiltsin itoka wetsin atlawtekatltewktli mochiw in atlawtlan tenanko. ok senka iskatki ik nimitsnotsa, ik nimitstsatsilia in tinotlakachiwal, in tinopiltsin: ma senka tle tikmati, ma tikimawilkixti in totekuyoan, in intechpa timokixti. ma tewtli, tlasuli ipan tikpixo in in tlilo, in tlapalo, in pilotl, ma itla ik tikawilkixtli. ipan in xiwitl otlalolin ipan ik 10 mani abril ipan martes, in ikoppa mochiw ik 26 mani abril; wel totokak niman oppa mochiw tlalolinalistli. yei axoxtlantli itech marso xiini in iteyotsin. aw in okisato painalton niman ye ik temanalo tetekpanalo in ixpan witsilopochtli in unkan apetlak nawpa in kinteukalayawalochtiaya. kwalkan se kichkwati wan komo onkak at, se kipakaya. kitekih ihwak chikawaya wan kikwah no kwaltia tamanal, pero moneki miak. in tapiyalwaxin wan sanfransiskanoh mochipautani, siempre se kikwidarowa, solo pisilwaxin amo mochipautani. san ik wal moyawalotikisa kwawkaxitl kitkitinemi onkan kontentiw in tsontli. ik niman okonkwik in tenuch i yolotli, niman okimotlalochti in onkan okitokako in tultsalan in akatsalan, yuh mihtowa onkan in axkan iglesia mayor. aw niman ik konpewaltike in ye motlatlamalia in ipan in omotenew yei tochtli xiwitl, 1326, i nikan toltsalan in akatsalan; aw chikwexiwitl in kan ok motlatlamaliaya. wel kwakwaltsin in ichpokatl. iuki monotsa tak por in kostik ikamohyotsin. nima ye ik walachia omoketsako tlatenpa, sa walmixmawtia i walachia poktli ewatok. tiiknotlakah iwan tococoxticateh. niman mononotske, mosentlalike, in totonik porke yek wakkatik. nochipa tonal tekitih wan nopa kahón tlehkos tlehkos tlehkos asta nepa nima ye ik yaotlatoa “tepanecaé, ma tikinmontopepeniti! kwix ok mieki i mexika in istlakatikate inik ye yaotlatoua?”. inwaxka. chilakachmoli ika bisté in ihkwak in ipan omotenew se tekpatl xiwitl, ye oiw nepa senpowalonkaxtoli ipan nawi xiwitl tlahtokati i nawyotsin in ikome yuhki itoka in, omochiw in ikchikome tlahtowani kulwakan. aw in ik exkan tlatotonia ompa in iopuchkopa tlali mihtowaya witsnawakatlalpan; no nawpa in koniawa in itlema. ix tochtli xiwitl, 1202. in tekwanitsi ichpoch muchiw kwetlaxotsi, isiwaw muchiw akolnawakatsi askapotsalko. mach ni amiki. iswatl iii.- pregon a noeve de hebrero 1587 años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in teskasonko okito monamaka ikal itlal isabel maria okito in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak tlanankili testigo pedro migwel. ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. ome tochtli xiwitl ik poliw ostotikpaktlakatl, unka mik seolintewktli; atle mochiw. aw in martin mexikatl in inemak in mili ompowal wiyak inik patlawak sempowali ka yuh nikmati ka yewekaw in kinmomakili don pablo xochikentsin yepowal xiwitl aw mochipa kichiwa in inpilwan fransisko martin iwan lorenso thomas. in nanakat. yewa amo pahpakiskia tla amo kipiaskia tomin. se yewan omosiwawti ika teopixki okichiwilihkeh wehyi ilwitl okitlamawichihchihkeh ikal ika xochikuskame wehyi tlakwali omochiw iwan miek tiaka okintlalwihkeh oksente se siwatl san otlachololti no ne oniknemili ninosenkawas in nika ipan altepetl siudad mexiko a veinte i dos dias del mes de novienbre de mil e kinientos i noventa i seis años onkan in ichan ikalitik itoka hwan mosel miek tlakatl ixpan onkan, okatka wetstok in itlapechko okito itlanekilistika iwan yiolokakopa in kichiwasneki in itestamento in itlanekilis aw ipanpa in newatl nieskrivano inik nokontlalis nokonchiwas in itestamento nima miek tlakatl ixpan onikpewalti iska yewatlin. wan de waki no yehwa, awel nikinpia. ye'on yuweyak asan tlenon yas itoka. in amo xochiyowa. aw ik niman walewake in mexitin, chikonkalpoltin i walewake aw in ikse kalpoli yopika, in ikome kalpoli tlakochkalka, in ik-e kalpoli witsnawaka, in iknawkalpoli siwatekpaneka, in ikmakwilkalpoli chalmeka, in ikchikwasen kalpoli tlakatekpaneka, in ikchikome kalpoli iskiteka. ipan santa ana tlakotenko itlakpakyo kampa kate in pipiltoton tlamachtilkali iwan xawen kin ammo wehka oyeya se tlatskakwawitl in okitokake ye miek xiwitl inin kwawitl ammo wel wehyi oyeya ikwawmawan ammono wehweyi yese miek xiwyo in pipiltoton itech momatia mawiltiske iwan in wehweyi in ammo wehka ochantia anoso ihkwak ika ompa panoya no kinpaktiara ompa itsintla monechikoske mononotsaske mach nopatiw? in san ninokixtis, kenmanian, ka san niyas, nipoliwtiw. ninokawa, ¡ah notecu! —o k t li noso xochikwalayotl okachi kin pactiah. . tonakayutl nikmasew: asan axkan nokwakwilo atl iyolo nech val ya vikatiake xali itepewyan. chalchiwpetlakalko nonixka in yuhkima sentetl semanakawatontli mochiwtikatka. man tewa xie. in okachi tomawak yoan niktenewa in ompa santa krus mani kali yoan achi itlalmaio aw in kali xochmilkopa itstikak yeppa ikalnemak in noxwiw hoana maximiliana onikpialiaya aw in axkan nimomakixtia makonkwis ka itech powe. inik nawik tonatiw nawi ekatl itonal mitoa ekatonatiw, ipan in ekatokoak omatiwak kwawtlakin tepewato in onokka tlakasomatin. xiii tekpatl xiwitl, 36. kinkwakonko nias pero nikilnamiki nias non tlenkwa' nikahmo. in kalendulah tlapalccziiqueh. 2 tekpatl xiwitl, 1520 años. e iw xxv xiwitl tlantonkanti in ekaw tlantilolkon teokali. no moneki mah se kichipawa. yonankikake ¡nantatatin iwan nannanatin! tla kalaki semana iwan tlatsoyo walas konetl tiktokaske ma yaw ichan. wel miak namechtlatlawtia nankichiwaske tlen namechilwia. onkwan on nian kisaske kokonentoton noihki temachtikes noso totopixke noso lisensiados iwan okseki kwakwali tekitiske kana okseni. nochin tlen momachtikiw ikwak ye telpokatl noso ichpokatl amo tetekipanos kampa tisis nextamali, tlaxkalos wan itech tlapaktel yetaz. . niman ye ik wal kisa in itwalnepantla. achtopa on tlatlasa in ilwikak: kontlasa in iesso. aw ka tlakwaw ye inka senka moneki in iw mochiwas i yewatl in, yehika ipampa ka senka wel ok yewatl in tlayokoyani in kimochiwilia in itsinpewaloyo in inelwayo i mochi in ixkich tlamantli in nepapa onkatki, aw ka yewatsin in totekwiyo dios. || ye ik tonasis onkan tekomatla, in ipan siudad mexiko a veinte i tres de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años in ipan tlaxilakali texkalkokolko onkan otsatsik in tekpoyotl in ipanpa kali monamaka in onpa mani teokaltitlan aw in ikwak otekakitilok ayak otlanankili testigo hwan de la krus iwan tekpoyotl. mochiwa milaj. aw i ye ihkwak in innawatilpan inik kinnawati in kimoteotiaya in chichimeka, aw niman wel yewatl inohma i ye ontlamini in tlahtowani in atonaltsin chichimekatewktli in ilwikakpa, aw san nenkisato in imiw; aw inik walmokwep ye tlamintasiko in tlalpan in kimintasiko tlatlawki oselotl. ¡ mayan tlayokoxti, o antepilwan! in tlapitsali. max, satepan aw no ikwak tlakat in aokwantsin, sanno teonka in iwki intoka. xinechmaka kwenta, istatl, ixkich in monekis inik nepalewilok istak oktli, hehelokiltik tletlematsin miya in ipan istak oktli ik patiwaya; aw wel senka mikowak, in sesemilwitl wel miek in motokaya. in se kichipawa. mochipautani. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. . aw in ye yuhki motesenkawalok ye ik tlaonok in kin makas puchteka, in ik kin wewechiwa 86v ix tochtli xiwitl, 1410. aw yuh mito, intla wel kichiwani yaoyotl intla welitini, ka yewantin otlahtokatiskia; in iw machistik, in ipan in yankwik tlali nweva españa motenewa ye okitlalika intlahtokaw, se tliltik in tlahtowani in rei mochiwka itoka don en blanko, aw no se tliltik siwatl siwatlahtowani reina || 117 omochiwka, itoka en blanko. chikomekoatl ikwik "axkana moseltik pampa na no nimitspalewis mah amo tawakto, ...xiuhtica inik tetlan walkalake ...quitillique in mexika. teipa noha kinehke kitokase sikera semiya tlatsopeliloni, ahso newktli.ixkich in monekis ahmo onka nesesidad tlahmamahtinemis in yulitl san ahsi tlatemowia wan kwaltlaxtlawia ini teko. nawi xumali pitsochiyawisotl komo kitamota, kwando kimayowik in tilmatli nesia aso on tsontli anoso etsontli in popoliwia. aw in maxtlatl aso sen tsontli in nesia. yewantsin konitkitiwitse iteokwitlachimal. . in ihkwak kalake in tsinakantlan in puchteka in ayamo pewalo tsinakantlan: in ik kalakia amo nesia in aso mexika in ik mixpolowaya den oksé siglo pasado in yewik in rebolúsion pero ayamo walahsia nikan. takwawaket aw in axkan iknawilwitl hwebes sankto teotlak, inik otlayawalolok onkan teopan kapila san hoseph san fransisko, inik mochipa yuh mochiwani sesexiwtika in wei tlayawalolistli. tihtlapos amo tihtlapos titlasohtlas domingo a xiiii de oktubre, ikwak mokalaki kimotlalilike sakramento in sant hosep tlamayawkampa; ik senpew in ye ompa missa kitta kastilteka, iwan ik pew inik moxitini teokali sant fransisko. itechpanin newatl onikilnamik sekih tonali ipan in otikmotokilihkeh in notahtsin kenin inintsin onechmonochili yalwatika yowali in omomikili iwan onkchommolwili se ichtakayutl welis ipampa kimochikotlamamatiliaya in oksekintin ipilwantsitsiwan in ye kimmixmachliliaya in innetlaikoltilis in ipilwantsitsiwan in achto okimmopieli itloktsinko in achto isiwawahtsin iwan yewatsin kimonemiliaya in newatl welis nienonemitiskiani tlanamakah w in tehoantin in talkaldes ka neli ka tixpan in otlalnamakake yoan in tlalkowki yoan tixpan in omopow tomines aw titlanaoatia aiak niman motlapolos kikwilis in tlalkowki in akin kikwilis in san tentlapikilistika kimotlaltisnekis ik ontlaxtlaoas makwili pesos ipan tiankisko tlayaoalochtilos ipanpa ka tikiximati in don balthasar tlilakalki ka wel itlal. itlanawkayo se kilo chichiwalayotlatetsawtli panela tokawnetlahtolpehpechtilis wel mihtos ye topan omochiw nikan iwan kiawak mexiko in kenin ye omonexti in ye omopatiyoti in towewetlamatilis awel onok atikamtik. nima ye ik onewa motlalito tewktola se tekpa xiwitl ika, in unka katka motlalmomostike. kwaltia ayak wel on, ayak wel ikniw in ipalnemoani, san in notsalo. tikneskayoti totahtsin hesukristo. x tochtli xiwitl, 46. tokoltsin kinmopilia mahtlaktli kawayohtin iwan chikwasen wakaxtin. nikan inin in ixiwtsin totekwiyo hesuchristo onkan ipan in chiwknawpowalxiwitl ipan chikonxiwitl kichiwako in ye ixkichika ompa ik owaltsintik altepetl kulwakan inik kitlaliko wewetke chichimeka kulwake. san ye noihki. x akatl xiwitl, 1203. nesi tekitiwah inka makinah yancuiqueh. iuki monotsa tak por in yon botontik. iwan ikwak nekoronaros in yenkwik mayordomo ahken tlalwikixtis se xiwitl. yon iuki kitokaitiah por in kwakwaltsin in kapolin : iukeh ya kemeh yon totolimeh . tein wehweyin ya ininíxtololo. tlake onka nama. inimekes barrio okipiaya se nemilistli ipantsinko toteotatsin. tlanonotsalo kename ikwak asis ilwitsin santa krus mohtas tlilkwis kename ikwak xotla se kali. iwan ahken okitaya iki on kipiaya tlen kimachotis iwan keman tlakoyowali kitatiw kampa ka tlamachotili. amo timatiske kox melawak, kox amo melawak, tlen otechnonotsaya kename inintsin toteotatsin omotenextiliaya tomin. iki in ika aka omokwepaya tlatkiwa. iki in otlanonotsaloya kename san kimotsatsililiske noso kimotenewiliske yewatsin, santa krus, kimomakilis tlen kineki. akasomo achtopa o ik titlatekak otitlasenkaw in ixkich tetech moneki. ma tontlachiekan in topko in petlakalko ka nel yewatl in ik tiueuetque. iskate nekok kitlalike intlatol in pipilti traitoles in tlatilulka kinawalpoloskia altepetl; nikan motokatenewa in iskitin: tekowatl mexikatl amaxak chane, ekatsitsimitl sankta ana yakakolko chane, tepoko sant martín chane, kalmeka sant martín chane, soniwi tekpantsinko chane. makwilxikipwali nima ye ik ikawaka in kolwake, mexikatsinkopa itstiwi, inik ye unka walmomana mikali akatsintitla. iwan i tonakayotl chili xitomatl ayohtli iwan kiwalkwike no imihtak walmochiwtia in mexitin asteka. in monotsa ahkopaxitomat. aw in axkan domingo in ik 29 mani metstli setiembre, inik ye nawilwitl omaxitiko nikan mexiko in yewatsin omotenewtsino teoyotika tlahtowani don hwan péres de la serna arsobispo, ihkwak in otlayawalo, in bula axkan ipan ilwitsin san migwel archángel umpa omanato teopan san fransisko, niman yewatsin umpa in yomatsinko yankwikan kinmottititsino in muchintin nikan altepewake; aw itloktsinko mantiake in doktor sausedo arsediano iwan doktor don hwan de salamanka chantre, kapa kitlalitiake. in se kitoka wan kasá no ixwa saj. kenin mochiwa tlatsilini nama". kwali kixinki porke nehwa notakewalwan nikan tequititih, ¿ye otimosalolti in kaxtilan tlahtoli? kwaltia iuki monotsa por in itakka tiltik, in tsapot nochi tiltik in iihtik. aw in ipan hwebes sankto, in iskikan teopan ik mexiko inik tepetlakalko kimotsakwilike sanktíssimo sakramento, inik walyowak, san nowiyan tsawktikatka pwerta teopan; akan tlapotikatka seyowal, ka yuh katka tlahtokatlanawatili ik tsatsiwak ya tlatwinawak in motlatlapo in ye ipan viernes sankto tlatwiko. para ompa nitanohnotsas. kenin mochiwa iii akatl xiwitl, 39. nawakatl xiwitl inik moman tlatokakali, in oumomikili matlakowatl. rusotlahtokayopan motlahtokatlali teutonsiwapili in itoka inik ome katalina. xi moketsa titokniw xokonkwi moxochiw wewetitlan. ma melel kisa inka xi mapana ketsaloko xochitli omako mani san teokwitla kakawa xochitli. aw in okmakwiltin onkan mokawke in atenko in oselotltewktli iwan in kwahpitsawak iwan in wewe nekwametsin iwan in yoltsin iwan in wewe hekatsin. inimeh. tlasotlaskiaya tamian mayo, ne pesmaapan tahko elot, ne tonalix kachi elot wan ne tasalolpan, ayamo elot. ayamo mokoikopina inxilot yekin mochiutok miawat. amo wehkawak semi, kaxtoltika wan mochiwa ya in xilot, motomawa wan elot ya. ihwak chikawaya ya pewa kosawia, uaktiuj ya, kemah se takelpachowa ya. sempowal tonal satepan mah se tapixka ya. notlayokol itech asi a noyol. ik niman konmotokilitia se krus wiyak kwawxihxipocho ahnoso kwawtsotsokolo, se istak paño itech pilkatia; ik niman konmotokilitia in lignum krus, in wel ye itech momikilitsino totekwiyo dios, andastika kimonapalwitiake in teopixke ika palio kwachkaltika kimokaltilitiake. . aw im pipiltin san no ikwak in kimilpilitiwia in tlasotilmahtli in mawistik in ikwak iskitetl wewei ilwitl kistiwia in ik tasi se xiwitl. aw okseppa okihto in kwawtleketski, okilwi in tenuch: "tenuché, itla ye wekaw nikan tikate, niman tiyas titlachiatiw in tultsalan in akatsalan in onkan otiktokato in iyolo tlasiwki kopil ken tlamamanitiw; yuh nechilwia in toteow witsilopuchtli onkan ixwas in iyolo kopil, aw tewatl tiyas in titenuch in tikittatiw onkan oixwak in tenuchtli, yewatl in iyolo kopil; onkan ikpak moketstikak in kwawtli kikxitsitskitikak kitsotsopitstikak in kowatl || 60r kikwa. axkana misotlak, ya elito weyi iihti. yewa onwala maski kiawi. porke noponi kiwalika nopa arrieros nopa kenin kin iwti onokonnamik itlahkwiloltsin leonportila 99. aw in sa yuhki tokonkwikwitika immitonaltsin, immekawilotsin. in sa ommisawitika, in sa onatotokotika in mitsin, in moyolotsin; in sa tommotlakmamawtitsinotika, in sa tommoteputsmamawtitsinotika. in aokmo umpa yaw in tokommanilia, in tokommokwilia, intokommitia, in tokommokwaltia, in atsintli, in atolatsintli, in tlapankatsintli. in sa yuhki motentsinko, mokamaktsinko pilkatika, in sa yuhki momaktsinko katki immoyolotsin. inik ayaxkan, inik aiwiyan in tewkyotl, in tlahtokayotl in tokommuchiwilia; inik tikmopalewilia in iatsin, in itepetsin, in ipetlatsin, in ikpaltsin dios. —a'mo saye nikinmikti in koanakame nikinchipaw onká opanok techtonahtihke techmakake se sowatotoli totonal wa intokopa. iki otlanankili inspektor: amo, amo tlakwalikas. tla melawak kitekipachos momachtis onkwan tikmakaske amatl iwan nochi tlen kinekis. onkwan kinmatiske; ika teotlak kititiske tlatsomas, tlatetekis iwan okseki tlamawisoltin. san yewatl walas chipawak in tsotsoma, chipawak itsonteko. amoka kwalikas yolkatl ikwak tikpak iwan tlakahwis; amo walas sin kahtli. iki in motitiske kename nemiske ikwak ye huehueyi. mah se kitamewi no. ¿ kannelpa tonyaske in aik timikiske? ma sa nichalchiwitl, in teokwitlatl, o sa ye no nipitsalos, nimamaliwas in tlatilan, o sa noyoliyo, a inyolo in kokowa, ni kwakwawtsin ni notolinia. kitemo kampa kochiyaya xochitl noyolo kwepontimani ye tlakoyovale yekok ye tonan, yekok ye teutl tlasolteutl a inin techtlahpia ika yowali. in amo kwali kwikani nanaltik, isawakkon, isawaktepetla. yolomikki, yoloaskakwalok, atle iyolo kimati. niman kinankili, kihto in yaopol: "otinechmocnellili, otlakawki i moyolotsin". totsotsoma opaltik. se mono se chango yowahsiko kipia kola wan tohmiyo piltontli. no matike no se kinse peones kintlali wan kena no tomotsohtsowitekis "pobres ne sopilotes pobres. aw in iw kimitalwitiw in don domingo hernándes ayopochtsin, in tlakatl kwawitsatsin in oksekintin ipilwansiwa ye nikan kinchiwtasiko yeintin ikchiwknawin, in okeintin in nikan tsakwaltitlan tenanko tlakatiko in ikse itoka silkwetsin, iwan ipann itoka matlaltsin ikontetl itoka katka, yese inin yuh macho sa isel i nikan tlakatiko; in ikome itoka xiwchiwatsin, inin san iw momikili amokan monamiktitiw; in ikei itoka xiwtostsin sa xokoyotl, ya yewatl in siwatlahtowani mochiw tsakwaltitlan tenanko, in iw nesitiw in ipan xiwitl in kikwik itlahtokayo. in kolwaka onoka mexika sempoalxiwitl; unka mosiwawatike unka mopilwatike, ye iksenpowalxiwitl ye tlakwalania. seki kikwih iyat, atomat oso xitomat, ihkón tepahtiah komo se momoutihtok. antonio martín markés, maría madre trinidad, tlakonanki yahki aw in ihkwak in ayak tlahtowani kulwakan san kwawtlatolo, ye iw nepa matlakxiwitl kwawtlahtowa in kulwake. v akatl xiwitl, 1211. iwan otlan tlaxexelolistli premios san aka iman on omoxexeloke medayatin kano ikwilaktaya kename kaxiltia se siglo méxiko in centenario. tlamia in tonali in sentenario ika tlakwalistli. achi kwaltsin tonali oyeya; otonataya kosa. onkwan on ompew kwikatl: ¡oh santa bandera de heroikos karmines! suben a la gloria de tus tafetanes la sangre abnegada de los paladines, el verde pomposo de nwestros hardines ¡las nieves sin mancha de nwestros volkanes! si tornan las luchas de ayer a tus plantas sobre nwestros ohos de sombras kubiertos, rekwerda, bandera, la sangre abnegada de los paladines, el verde pomposo de nwestros hardines, ¡las nieves sin mancha de nwestros volkanes! wan ne san hwan ya axtekitiyaya in iwki yewatsin totekwiyo dios ka intsinpewkayotsin i mochintin in ixkichtin in tlaltikpak tlaka yehika ipampa inik yewatsin tlachiwale tlayokoyale, aw sano yuhki i yewatsin adam ka achto tlakatl san oqu iseltsin ka intsinpewkayo i mochintin in ixkichtin tlaltikpak tlaka, yehika in itechpa tlakamekayotl. in yatika. tihmitis, lisiana. inik viiii tlamantli nikitowa ok no honmani nomil in onpa apepetspan inik wiak senpowali ik patlawak matlakmatl omei inik nikmaka in hwana antoña monetechana in lurenso imil amo itlakawis in notlatol. aw ye no ixkich kawitl kipixkatinemi in imil in itoka maria in ichpoch atlixelkatl aw in ye ixkich kawitl in ye nawxiwitl mochipa kimokwikwilia in inamik toltekatl aw mochipa yewatl kitoka in itoka maria ixkich nikitowa notlatol ik nikneltilia nikan nomatika niketsa krus. pedro heka. kwesiske inkinkwitiwetsi oyowali, yekesiski in kamilakatsoa tewtli. non yetoka tlaumewilo, onkán yotiaumewilok yeweyak in semiya, onkán yepewan xiloti. aw inik wel otikittake mochi tlakatl nikan nweva españa titlaka inik ixkichiwelitsin totekwiyo dios, in san iseltsin wel moch kimochiwilia itlamawisoltsin, in tlein kimonekiltitsinoa kimochiwilis kimoteittitilis nikan tlaltikpak, ka kimochiwilia in kenin wel kimonextilis; ka in ihkwak ik ye pewa ye tlakosawia, in ye mixtlapachos ika metstli tonatiw in motenewa ye kwalos, in ilwikatl ka nowiampa mixtli ik tsawktimanka, akan wel walnesia, aw san iyokan san ixkich in onkan yetiw tonatiw san mixkanaktli in onkan wel ixpan ixko kikisaya. opewiko in ixtlawatl itek. atl ia ixtla,ihtek tlachinolakweyotl,topan ik posonipilia ixtlilotonkochotsin, aw in okoniyaw niman ipan kiteka in tetepowali onkan mani niman ik tlatla. kitlanki noponi . aw ipampa in senka kintlasotlaya in awitsotsin: wel iwkinmah no ipilowan kinchiwaya; mowikxitia in awax ika istatl; sekni mowikxitia in nohpali in senka ye omotetek, no iwki motlalilia istatl. ihkwak inin ye kwali tlawikxitili, mopaka, ma ixika; xitomatl, xonakatl, axox no senka moteteki, no iwki in silantro mopaka, moteteki. 130 axkan lunes ik 20tia metstli setiembre de 1610 años, ikwak omomikili in tlakatl don migwel sánches wetsin akatla pili; sa isel okatka yniqu itechpa okistikatka in itlakamekayo in tlakatl katka in wewe tlakayeleltsin siwakowatl kondeestable mexiko tenochtitlan, aw in omotenew mikkatsintli yewatl oitech tlamiko in akatla pilotl, kisentlamitiw. 3 tochtli xiwitl, 1534 años. ma kana itlatsin techtlaokolikan, ik tokontotlapalwiske in wei teoutl tlatowani kastila moyetztica’”. in amechtlayekoltiske in amechtlakalakiliske in amechmakaske in amo san achi in amo san kexkich, in walka tlatkikayotl; aw kilwi in diablo in ketsalkanawtli "ca akan niktemakas || 81v in tlatkikayotl, ka san nantis ka san tatis in kemanian". ma ok an ikniwtiwa. 97 aw iwan ye onpowalxiwitl ipan motlahtokatlaliaya san onxiwitl in kaktimanka tenochtitlan. inin okichiw in don felipe páes de mendosa tlamaokatltewktli, inin okimonamikti in doña pedronila de torsia; onkan otlakatke in don fransisko páes de mendosa, don pedro páes de mendosa, don diego pes de mendosa, don felipe páes de mendosa. nikan kalkwepakan, kampa momostla ompa nia. ikompa tiohueh. in tokniwan tein powih itech in taler tatsintokakej, kiihkwilohkeh in tahtol wan kipatakeh koyokopa. susana krus, tein kiyekana in programa de siensias ambientales de la universidad autónoma de pwebla, techpalewih miak mah tikinixmatikan intokaiwan in xiwit wan kwowit. ximokakiti tokniwtsin notextsin omotlahtolti nan yonechmononochili totahtsin axkan tewatsin iwan okseki tlaka nan tikate titixnehnewiliske ika mosemihtos tlen mochiwas itechpa ahkinon ye kineki mosenkawas iwan intla ammo kitlawelkakilia mach ixmantas aiya yao! xochitl ikakan ompa ye niwits tlamakas ekatl a tlapkoyoale aiya yao! ah ivi in ti nosi teumechave tlavisko ya kale inik 4 nikitowa nechmakas chikome tomines itoka migwel kwitlawakatl san no honkan nemi in tesontlalnamakoya in tla okistlaw iwan misa ye nopan mitos. kwaltia aw ihtik respekto; okipiaya' axkan yakmo. kitlananki wan kikamatlali wan peiki nikinkixtis tlen wehweyi". kiski in ix tekpatl xiwitl. aw iwan ye kaxtolxiwitl in ipan xi tochtli xiwitl, 1594 años, in omakok in kiwalmakak in iwelitilis inik igovernador mochiw don hwan de servantes. aw in oksentetl tonatiw ikisayanpa itstikak in itepots yematl ipan senyolotli in inakas senmatl ipan senyolotli aw in itwali inik motamachiwa onmatl. in se kwali awiltechihchikan ka pakilistli mochihchicahuah. kachi kwa 1 i xinechmaka se no bastón de sien kintatales. wahsikiwe teotlak. viii tekpatl xiwitl, 1448. aw in owalmokweptsino in omokalakiko nikan mexiko in omotenewtsino señor lisensiado don pedro de otálora ye ipan metstli de disiembre, in sa ye ipan ye itlamian in omotenew xiwitl de 1614 años, wel ipan iksemilwitl ipewayan in ikse imissatsin in iakilantotsin totlasomawisnantsin in mochiwtiw, in chiwknawi i ye itlakatiliswalalispantsinko totekwiyo dios, in iw mochipa sesexiwtika mochiwtiw; okimoneltililito in presidente itekitsin. ximokwiltono, ti tlakawepan, tinoweyo, kwaxomotl, kwaxomokwextekatl. ipan in tlamiko inik kwawtlahtolok in kolwakan, kaxtolxiwitl ipan se xiwitl in ayak tlahtokat. inhin ixkich kimamakato kapitán imoma motekusoma, sa ye yqu ilotis in kapitán; yewatl itekiw mochiw in kwetlaxtekatl. se kilo katarinahnanakatl iwakawan pepe iztaqueh. tliltikeh iwan coztiqueh. mah weiya, ki'toa' mach sé kwento oya de akel tiempo. se kikwa. komo amo teyi in tomat, se kimolta. manitlasohtlakan iskatki amokokokaw, in tlawistli in oamechpieliaya in amotlatokaw, in chimali tlawistli in tekwekwextli in ketsalalpiloni in teukwitlanakochtli in chalchiwtli, ka ye ixkich amaxka amotlatki. wan komo se moteki mah se kimolonti wan mah ika se kiixpaka. kwix ichtaka aankimotiliske. nikita ka onotlapololti. ok kwalkan; ok kwali tacizqueh. nikan ipan in poliwke kaliimanyan tlaka matlatsinka; wel inomah ompa wiya in axayakatsin mikalito. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl omotenew de 1605 años, senka omochiwke in mimichtin, in xoxowiltin in amilome, iwan no senka miektin in omochiwke tokame in kaltitech in nikan mexiko. in ipan axkan domingo ik ix mani metstli de hulio de 1595 años, in tlasosiwapili de moserate in moyetstika ipan tlaxilakali tekixkipan, ikwak walmikwani in iteokaltsin in ochpantenko wei otli ipan in tlamelawa sankt pablo ohtli, in iw nestika axkan. in no kamohyowa wan ompaya in itsmolini. nikan ipan in temiktike in matlatsinka, kinmiktike in mexika in kalpixke iwan siwatekitke ipampa in tlakalakili. mah amo kimatoka ihkochin, ipa se taman saj. isiwkan nikan ipan in omikiko in kwawtlatonak in tlahtowani katka kolwakan, in tlahtokat matlaktli onnawi xiwitl. in weyi siwakonetl kichihtika kiltlakwali ika kilpat la h u a k, ximalisanahoria,ayotontli iwan xitomatl. pewa xochiyowa kemeh marso. in istak ixochiyo. sayoh ait kemanian xochiyowa. i tochtli xiwitl, 1454. konilwia “ma kimokakiti tlakatl, ka okimokwili ka okimokakiti in tochokis in tonentlamachiliz”. kiihtowah inihwanti kinekih kikakise, kiijtouaj. newa nochipa nikita. taltikpaktsin de mi alma, antonio martín markés. aw in ikwak okimokakilti ik pachiw in iyolotsin niman motlan[a]watili mochiwas in eskritiura iwan posesion makos in motlakowia in español yuh motlanawatili ik nikan kimotlalili itokatsin ifirmatsin don migwel garsia alkalde. pasó ante mi migwel monise eskrivano. mah miakiya, iii akatl xiwitl, 1443. aw san no onkan kittake in onkan tetepewtok x tochtli xiwitl, 1242. "ca aya tle in ikwalan tloke nawake, ka on ka in nomaceual. ikwak ipan in ompa ya in don andrés de tabian motelchiwtsin, aw ye ik walmokwepaya onkan momikiliko in astatlan, onkan se chichimekatl kimin; in okwawtlahto motelchiwtsin tenochtitlan makwilxiwitl. ipan in senka totokak kokolistli. tikanatiwi tlatlamemel: kenin mochiwa se kimolontia ika kahfentsin wan mah se tayi oso mah se kitikoixka wan mah se moihtikalakili komo se moihtikokowa. kwaltia para se kichiwa pelotilas para in nemoutil, se kikwi in ixiuyo wan ikwouyotsin. no tepahtia ihwak tekwi in ehekat. no kwaltia para mopaka ika in siwameh ihwak mal yetokej. mochiwa kwoutah itech tiltsapokwowit oso kakatekwowit. ewa saj. amo kachi onkak. nikan || 27r ipan in motlahtokatlali in tlasolyaotsin tlahtowani mochiw wexotla. ihkini yahki yahki asta atipa yato. . aw is ka in totilma, kololtlapiltilmahtli aw in tomaxtli kololtlapilmaxtlatl. in kename nochi motas in kename otitlalmasewke. domingo a xii de noviembre de 1600 años, ikwak ilwitsin kis in san diego, wel mawistik inik tlachichiwalok, aw kimotlalilike tlaixpan in inemilistsin in otlika ixtlawakan; ilwikak tlaxkaltsintli kinwalmomakili in totekwiyo dios angelesme, kiwalkwike onkan kimokwaltike in ixtlawakan. tlawiika, tlahutlatoktia, tlatlalia, tlatekpana. semanawaktlawia, topan, miktlan kimati. 65. aw nopltsine, notelputsine, ye tiuhq, otimixpetlawalti. ¿cuix ok nikan tlali, tapalkatl, tikmawiltia? timotolinia ka ye tiwkiin; immaka san titeskatl ka otixpetlawalok, aw immaka san tixochitl ka otikweponaltilok, aw in titlaixpetlawal. in titlakweponaltil. aw iskin nikan mopan ommonots, mopan ommosentlalia, nikan mopan konkawa in kweitl, in wipili. kwaltia inin tenonotsalistlatoli okitekpan okisenkixti in domingo de sant antón chimalpahin amakemekan chane. nehwa nikisati, nehwa niyati mah poliwi nehin; kwaltia xelwasnanakatl ihpotoktlawikxitili kwaltia se kilo pitsonakatl niman ik kimolwilitoh in tlahtoani obispo in tlein oquittacqueh, iwan in kenin kimottilisneki in maseuhaltsintli ye iskipa walaw, iwan in ye wel wehkaw in ye ik aso onkan tlatlahtolchixtok inik kimottilisneki. sekin kihtowah xochiyowa febrero, por ké abril teyowa ya; oksekin kihtowah xochiyowa septiembre. kampa se kimattok kipiya se mokowilia komo se kikwasneki. onkak ome taman: se istak wan se chichiltik. ome xumali pitsochiyawisotl aw oksekintin wewetke kimachiyotia ipan in in xiwitl in onmikwanike kolwakan in mexitin. in nonakaio itech nikpoa tlali ka nel itech kis aw in nanima inik wel palewilos inik amo ompa wekawas purgatorio nikan katki wentli nikchiwa in iglesia nikan santiago mitos misa. aw no ikwak walmowikak in ipann omotenew xiwitl ikwak maxitiko in mexiko in don frai alonso de muntúfar arsobispo mexiko. satepan otiahke ok sinkwenta nikilwia monka akin kikobraro ok sinkwenta pesos. x akatl xiwitl, 1463. toni ika tinemizqueh? vi tochtli xiwitl, 1602 años. onkak se taman saj. aw iwan ye senpowalxiwitl ipan makwilxiwitl in ipan 1 tekpatl xiwitl, 1584 años, in omochiwtsino bisitador general in ipan nweva españa, niman governador visurrei omochiwtsino in teoyotika tlahtowani don pedro moya de kontreras arsobispo mexiko, in ipampa inik omomikili visurrei. chikwasen iwan tlahko owatsintika mewa katalina. ¿ticpia moapalewil? xiktlapo. yewatinn in in traitorles in iskitin tetla neke nekok kitlalike in intlatol; onkalakia tenochtitla, nowel kalakia nikan tlatilulko. in momal in ok onaktieske kichiwaske inik senka yektika kwaltika ... tikchichiwaka i ... i neltilistli in ixkich onkan in welitsin i totekwiyo dios. aihmo omokaw in federal ika xolalpampa. ye yiman tika on sapatistas otlekoke ipan tepetl tewtsin. okinchololtike federales ika san gregorio, xochimilko mate okimaxitike ompan churubusko. aw in onkan kakanako imakal, mahtlaktli nohpali in ye neli ayaxkan in kokok tlaokoltika. aya ti ya tinemi iwiyan. iknokwikatika nokonketsalmalina in tekpilotl ni motenewatsin, teukyotl tlatokayotl telpolowatl telpolowatl teuktli, ti noche tinemi xopan kalitik. a iwian xochitl, a iwian kwikatl nochian kokoli mochiwa ye nikan. kiwik ayatl. moneki tocepantlapohpolhuizqueh. inawaktsinko sempoalan pewalo in narvaes; aw achi mochintin iyaokiskawan osetixke iwan don femando. ﻿nehua melahkayopa onitlahto; mach yewa amo okinek nechasikamatis. ihwak waki ya in sinti kioyah wan kinexketsaj, mochiwa nextamal, kikwechowah ika metat oso ika molino. kitikoketsah in komal wan kichiwah ya in taxkal para se takwas. iii tekpatl xiwitl, 1300. in nohpali mixtlapana; ihtik in kaxitl motlalia in pitsochiyawisotl iwan motsoyonia in tememetlatl ahnoso in ieltapachtotonwan in poyox ika xonakatl ye tlatetektli; motlalia in nohpali, in ayahmo tlawikxitili, iwan yepasohtli, moistawia iwan motlapachoa; ihkwak ye tlawikxitili moteki in chichiwalayotlatetsawtli, motlalilia, iwan motlapachoa inik atis; in chili, in ye senka tlatetektli, ye motlalilia tlatsahkan. miérkoles a 4 de marso de 1598 años, ikwak momikili in tlahtowani provisor doktor ortis de hinohosa, ye tlapepentsintli katka inik obispo moyetstieskia kwawtemalan intlakamo momikiliani; aw senka wekaw in tlahtokat in provisortik. nawi xumali pitsochiyawitsol wan ihkino wahka pehki kikaki motsohtsowiteki . aw in okonkwito nikan kiwalitke tlatilolko. aw in owalake niman ik mosentlalia in tenochka puchteka iwan tlatilolka puchteka. aw in tlahtoani obispo in oiuhquimocaquitih, niman ipan ye in iyolohtsin ka yewatl in ineltika inik iyolohtsin mahsis, inik kimoneltililis in tlein ik nemi tlakatsintli; niman motlanawatilih inik niman kalakis kimottilis. testigo. migwel atsakwalkatl chane atlisokan ya onpowalxiwitl ya onkastoli i nemi huramento makok inik otlatolmelaw kito in testiko ya neli melawak i nikitowa in notlatol in axkan ik moteilwia in tlali in iw nikmati ka wel yewatl itlal in atlixiliwki in axkan moteilwia ka ipiltsin. nimitsnotlatlahtia sinechmomakili ome in painpepeyoktin. ¿caninca in tlakoyoktli inik nikintlalis amaihkwiloltin? aw inike ye onkan momaniltia milpan in tlatoke niman kimitalwike mamopowa aw niman mopow i nika tlalkwawitl in mosenpow matlakpoali ompa ipan senpoali ompa asito in atl onkan kisa tonatiw ikisayanpawik itechman in imil katka don martin hernandes. momawtitiwits.aw san okitlawtike in isiwawan axayaka. aw sa se xiwitl in kimitstia in mexika inik kinmokalakili in kala in kolwakan; nawxiwtike inkal tsawktoka, in aokkan neske, in iw machok opoliwke in mexika. ve tikmati tlen kihtosneki inon onechmolwili ximochia ok titelpokaton ammo ihkiihon san ika nimitskawas ihkwak timosiwawtis nimitsihtas axkan ximochia intla ammo titetlamatkakaki ahso timonenkawas inin tsonteko inepapantotome intlasototome aw inin omotenew ilankweitl atlawtekatltewktli amoma wel ompa yah in tsakwaltitlan tenanko chikonkowak amakemekan, san onkan mokaw onkan tlahtokat in atenko intlan in onkan mokawke tlahko in tenanka chichimeka. arrosatoli ikompa nitekiti wan nama san yayá kwatitla. aw in tlahtowani don gaspar de súñiga i asevedo konde de monterrei konpatlato in ompa perú in don lwis de velasko visurrei katka in ompa perú ompa tlahtokatia; aw in oiw konpatlato aoktle itekiw mochiw, aw ik niman walpew walmokwep in sa niman ipan in xiwitl omotenew wala in nikan ipan nweva españa. noteawi ka inana oya panohtli. in no kitaliliah emol ika ome imai para mah ahwiaya. in witskilit amo weli se kichihchiwa iwan emol. axkana axakak kikwa. ipa se taman saj. inik makwiltetl tetsawitl wan no iwan emol tatsoyonil mah se kipankokotochili. aw inin tlali in omotenew ka wel totlal ka wel taxka in niman ayak wel mitskwilis ayak mitselewilis ka nopilal in nehoatl ni don balthasar tlilankalki ka unkan nechkawtiwi in nokolwa in anachkokolwa wel totlanekilistika yoan wel tosialistika in timitsmaka totlal. xii tochtli xiwitl unka mikiko tesosomoktsi askapotsalko tlatoani; in oyuh omik i mastlato kwiowaka tlatoani katka san komokwili in tlatokaiotl, san ik omotekpak kiwalolini i yaoiotl. walaokoya moyolo. aw in ipilwan kinkawtia in tlahtowani witsiliwitl in tlahtokapipiltin makwiltin: in ikse itoka teotlatlawki; in ikome itoka wewe kwitlawatsin, inin ompa tlahtokatito in itstapalapan; in ik-ei itoka wewe motewksoma ilwikaminatsin; in iknawi siwatl itoka yaosiwatl, inin ompa kiwalmitlani in kowatlichan tlahtokapili itoka toyaotlankatsin, inin ipiltsin in wewe kwixtekatl tlahtowani kowatlichan, aw ik ompa tlakatito in itoka wewe tepolomitsin, aw masiwi in ompa kichiwato in inantsin i kowatlichan, kamoma ompa ne, ka san nikan mexiko nemiko itlan in itlatsin || 90r wewe motewksoma ilwikaminatsin; in ikmakwili in ipilwan witsiliwitl sano siwatl, amo wel momati in itoka. chichilwauhihtakatl ankin ye onkan i xochitl yiawaliwkan. yei tochtli xiwitl ik wel popoliwke xochmilka yoan kwawtinchantlaka, inka momamal in tlatilulko teukali kikets kwakwawtsi. wan tečtlankwakecaya' wan toresaroaya' wan yatechresaro tomaistro tikana' in iman wan tihmaka’ lamano titenamiki' niman in tomaestro. tlen kiilwi yaya nopa elki. tlen san yektik in xiwipatlawak. yotiwalmoikak kwali kaomokixti ok mokwitlalpihtsinohtaya walmotlahtlapolwi ximopanoltikan otechmolwili ammo san noyoka niwits nowan mowikatse notahtsitsiwan oteotikanan tsin kwalika kwali ka ximopanoltikan nochi, kilit kwamekat, sayoh waukilit wan tomakilit amo kwamekat. kenin mochiwa ¿cani mokawak niespíritu amo ximoyolkoko nonantsin. ye tikmati, intlakah tekitiskeh kampa intonal kintlalis. iwikpan inon amo tlen mochiwas. noso kwali tikmati, ka amo tlen nech polowa. amo tlen ittla nech polowa. kemanian techpolowa itlasohtlalis in nantli, iwan ihkion momostla. tinemih, noka asi oksepa in tonali tlen ipan tosenyelis tokwepaskeh iwan mahnel se semana itlak tocahuazqueh. kiixkah in ikwouyo. no kwaltia para tapalol, se kikwa in ikwouyo. seki kichihchiwah ika kwakwounakat. no kwaltia ika se mokakampaka komo se tempalani. nima ye ik mononotsa i mesika “mesicaé, ma titlachpanati in askapotsalko, ma tiktlatlawtiti in tlakatl acolnauacatzi”. inon kwakwawton oyeya ipan se tlateli kanin wel kwali mohtatlakotenko ohtin in teokali in telpochkali in oksekintin altepeme kiyawaloa toaltepetsin iwan okachi wehka tlawkopa in popokatepetsintli in istaksiwatsintli ompa kampa yewatsin totahtsin tonaltsintli mochipa yowahtsinko mokixtia iwan techmomanililia i tonalmeyotsi tsih wan wan seyok kwentos tlen ne agwaseros chechelomeh semi kikuaj. in ketsaliskixochitl, in ye tlawkechol, kakaloxochitl, in san moxochikwach petlapan. tiyaonok ye onkan. teokwitlapetlatl ipan tiya onok, ketsalostokalko, tlakwilolkalitik. inik achi tlalwakpan amo senka atlan i walake in onkan owalkiske in axkan motenewa mexika tenuchka. aw in ikwak oyuh kimasikakakiltike in iewatsin hwes governador iwan alkaldes niman omotlanaoatilike inik mochiwas pregones sempoalpa omatlakpa inik tsatsiwas inik kimoneltililia nikan kimotlalilia intokatsin iwan infirmatsin. aw no iw kichiwke in sankto domingo in tlalpantli, san ixkich kitlaltenke in kapila mayor iwan in itlakapan, in ipanpa no onkan ihtik molonia atl; aw sanno iw mochiw in la kompañía de hesús. se popochtsin, tenonotsall iuki monotsa por in pitsaktsitsin, pané talkwitaxkol. kwoutahgranadas mah amo kitilana se kwalkiera. domingo ik xix de oktubre de 1603 años, in tlasosiwapili in monextitsino atisapan ikwak kimokawilito in ompa a la werta sant kosme sant damián, semikak ompa moyetsties; tlayawalolistika in kimokawilito gwardián frai fransisko de ganboa, ixkich tlakatl ompa mowikaya. aw ipampa in axkan otinnonotske kimokowia in kali in tlali in yewatl isabel xilotl iwan in ikonew hwan lopes ixkich techmaka makwilpowali pesos iwan matlaktli pesos in ipatiw mochiwa in kali in tlali. kwali yes kenamo yuhki ximochiwili ximohtili nikan yeloa okseki tlaka immanon yomaxitihkeh notlahtsitsiwan itlahyes netsontekonewalos kisa kristobal kolon ipan matlaktli omei tekpatl xiwitl in iwikpa motokayotia "cuacuahuitl iakalkixowayan" in ompa ka kaxtilalpan, aw in oyuhpanok ei iakaltika ome metstli, satlatsonko oasiko tlalwakpan in itoka gwananhí, nikan in yankwik tlalpan. yei iakal motokayotia "cihuaconetl", "tlapalacalli" iwan "xanta malia". amoxtlakwilol in moyolo,tokwikatikako,in tiktsotsona in mowewew,in tikwikanitl. "ah, pero na ¿kenijki nihchiwas? in mochiwa kwoukespan wan tehtekespan. sekin kihtowah tsopek iyolo mahyá owat. ¡ tamemeske, tasakatiwi yenel! aw yniqu ipampa in motlanawatili inik san ye molnamikis ik neyolnonotsalistika mottas in se kwaxochtli inik nipa tlanepantla in amilpampa tikitowa iwan inik tonatiw ikalakiampa, aw iwan in mochi in ixkich tlali iwan in provinsias nipa in onka in tonatiw ikalakiyampa ka itech powki yes in itepewalis in itlahtokayo in ikorona in kastila iwan de león, aw in ipan onka in omotenew omito in tlanepantla in amilpampa inik tonatiw ikisayampa itech powki in tlahtokayotl in portugal; oyuhki in inik kinmokwaxochmakili tlahtoke in santo padre in okkanpa inik tepewaske. in tewantin algwasil pedro garsia iwan eskribano migwel hernandes otiwalake in nikan ipan tlaxilakali sank sebastian sakatla tikalakiko in ichan in pedro nali iwan in inamik okonanke in posesion okalake in inchan iwan tixpan omopepecho in kali in onkan okikoyonika. ak san ninomati. moneki tokak iwan totzotzomapatlazqueh. aw in ihkwak ipanti in metstli ixpan momana in tonatiw, wel ixkichika in kexkichkapa ik motstikate, ka ik kitsakwilia in itlanextilis iwan techtlayowilia in tewantin, inik amo wel tikittaske in itlanex in tonatiw —yn iw axkan ipan viernes || 143 otikittake otikmawisoke otopan mochiuh—; in tonatiw aw ik ixkwichewa ixpoyawa ixmatlalewa in tonatiw, maso neliwi in aik kikawa in itlanexyo ka nel tlanexmeyalotl. nikan ipan in mikiko in achitomekatl in tlahtowani katka kolwakan, in tlahtokat senpowalxiwitl onse. nikan ipan in i momikiliko in totoltekatl tsonpachtli tlailotlaktewktli, in tlahtokat onkan || 73r kwitlatetelko matlakxiwitl aw in tisatepek kaxtoli onse, inik mochi mosenpowa senpowalxiwitl onchikwasen in kipacho tenankayotl; aw sa niman ipan in in xiwitl i motlahtokatlali in ipiltsin itoka kwaltsin tlailotlaktewktli mochiw, onkan ye tlahtokati in kwitlatetelko. ye yiman okiske sapatistas; otlekoke oksepa ika kwawtla. achi miake karransistas omihke. ye yiman on oksepa omachix ika yoyahke sapatistas ika tepostlán, yautepek iwan kwawnawak. ompoyon keski tonali aihmo omokwepke; aihmo tlamiktiske. owekaw oasiko oksepa sapatistas. omonamihke kwawtlanepantla sapatistas ikan karransistas. ompoyon omomomimihtike. omihke sapatistas, omihke karransistas. ye yiman tika in, itik tetepe okintemoaya sapatistas. onkwan milpa alta aik okinextike. ye yiman on otlekoke karransistas hasta ika kwawnawak. oksepa ompoyon okimimiktike karransistas. iwan siwame iwan tlaka en kwawnawak onekaltsakwaloya. wan ipan otli yan omokwekwepotsaya. nawpa iloke in onkan chikomostok in kiwaltemiliaya imakxoyaw in kimoteotiaya. nehwa mosta nikisati. in tlatokat chikunkiawitl sempoalxiwitl unchikwase. in masewaltsitsinti ompa kitatakaya se tepetl in kikwitlakoyoniaya, in amo wel mochiwa mowitia inik ompa kisas atl omotenew in nikan techyawalotok in kapachosneki siudad mexiko; ik mokaw ayokmo omochiw in motatakas, yuh omihto ipampa ka senka miekintin in masewaltsitsin weka tlaka wel ixkich sinkwenta mil in onkan omomikiliko atatakoyan. iwan ikwak omotlaewalwiaya toteotatsin iwan topixkatsintli, kano asia eskina, ompoyon omosewitsinoaya in santísimo. iwan topixkatsintli omoteochiwtsinoaya iwan omotlateochiwiliaya. iki in omochiwiliaya ipan nawi eskina de in xolal. ¡coza noihki mawistikatsintli in toteotatsin! ikwak sapatistas otlekoke ika tepostlan achi miake sapatistas omike ipan se xolal itokayoka amantlan. okinmimiktike sapatistas; ompoyon omik sente general itoka marselino muños iwan okse itoka reyes muños. sa mokawako, ayak kiwalwikak; san imamatlakwilolo kiwatkike nawinti, se choloke sa yei unasiko koyoake. nantli tlakwalchihkan ka nima ye ik mononosa, komolwia “quen anquitoa?”. iwan kimokakilti in intlatol tlalistakapan wewetke migwel hakobo, frasisko ximenes, martin hakobo, thomas hakobo, migwel pablo, migwel hernandes, kitoke senka yewekaw in ka pachiwtimani amo wel kimati amo melawak in kitoke san falso testigos. mowaxkawan. kiwaltokili akulwa, walteyaka masatl. miak mochiwa. nima ye choka tenposonki, kikentikak in itlatokatilma; nima ye kimilwia “mexicaé, oantlaknelike, ayamo nika yes, san ok umpa yes in azcapotzalco”. itlanahnamik: tehwa taltikpaktsin, aw in omoyetstiako inik omotlahtokatiliko nikan mexiko inik ye nowian ipan nweva españa yexiwitl ipan chikwetetl metstli. titlasohtlaskiah 7v aw yehika in tlaltikpak tlaka ka san tekitl ixkich itoltekatlachichiwkatsitsinwan in dios; in iwki yewatl ipan powke innenewka in teposkwawtlatekoni in itoka sierra iwan in tepostlatetsotsonaloni in itoka martilo iwan in tepostlaixkwikwiwaloni tlaixmanaloni in itoka eskoplo, toltekatlachichiwaloni inik mochiwa mosenteka mosemixmana in iwki yewatl on in se yoloasikamachise in toltekatl maestro, in kitlali in kitlalikamotstiw in itoltekatlachiwatl in itlamachiyotil, aw ka yewatsin in totekwiyo dios; aw i tlaltikpak tlaka in iw omito ka itoltekatlachichiwkatsitsinwan, ka san tekitl itechpa itstiwi in ixkich tlamantli in itlachiwaltsin in itlayokoyaltsin, inik yehika tlasenteka tlasemixmana in ixkichipa tlachiwali. wan tihwikas se moateko para axkana tiatlitiyas inik asiko chichimeka in amakemeke in ikpak tepetl, onkan tlemamalke in atonaltsin iwan tliltekatsin. ipan yei kali xiwitl, kitlahtokatlalike tenochkah in chimalpopoka inik ei wei tlahtoani méxiko. iteyakankayopan chimalpopoka mochiw omaltepetlalike in chalcah. inikein okimmomotlakke tenochkah in walayah ipan nawi akali iwan okimmiktike makwili yewantin. chimalpopoka okinyaochiw tiwets chalkah iwan oksepa kimpopolo. in ikwouyo amo tata por ké semi ayoj, sayoh kwaltia para kolal. para nanochin namehwan. aw in ihkwak onkan in kalakito kulwakan in mexika, ye oiw nepa in wel itsinpewyan okimochiwilitsino totekwiyo dios in semanawatl ye kaxtoltsonxiwitl ipan sentsonxiwitl ipan nawpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolomei xiwitl. mahtlaktli peso. vii tekpatl xiwitl, 1200 años. iuki kitokaitiah tak por in mopahpampilowa in iselo oso por in tsilinia ihwak se kitsonkwahkwa. oiwin mochiwin inik mihtowa "oqualoc tonatiw" in ipan in omotenew semilwitl viernes, nikan omochi motekpan in itlahtolo in iw omochiw, inik nikan kittaske iwan kimatiske in ixkichtin in kin ye tlakatiske in kin satepan ye nemikiwi nikan tlaltikpak, in akike amo ikah yuhki kittaske, aw kemaka in ikin kanin kemma sekintin in akike yuh kittatiwi, yese ok wekaw ok miyek xiwitl kisas in ihkwak okseppa in ikin nokwel ipantitiw in san ye iw || 150 no mochiwatiw, ye kin ihkwak okseppa ye no yuh kittatiwi kimawisotiwi in iw mixtlapachos tonatiw in motenewa kwalos tonatiw, in iw axkan ipan in xiwitl tikate otopan mochiw. in kanin motlamachititihuh komo waki no kwaltia para kwoutatil. manitetlasohtla ipa se taman saj. nohpali ika elotl iwan champiñonnanakatl iii kali xiwitl, 1209. ome taman tein nikan mochiwa mateado wan pitaleño. i nowian altepetlipan tlahtoke iwan in mexiko tlatilolko sant fransisko teopixke kinmowikilike, onkan teochiwaloke nawatiloke in chiwknawtlan, in visurrei no onkan kinmonamikilito. tlen 7 tlanawatihkayotl. amo akah welis kikotonas tlamakixtilistli kampa moihtowa welis se tlahkwilos iwan kinextis tlakwiloli tlen miak tlamantli. amo tlen tlananawatili iwan amo akah tlanawatiani welis saniman axquicualitaseh, iwan amo welis tlatlaniseh tlatlanewilistli inaxka tlakwiloli iwan inaxka tepos amachiwani, iwan amo welis kikotonaseh amachiwani, tlen amo kipiah nepanyotl nemilistlil; san moneki kitlepanitaseh yolchantli, nelkwali nemilistli iwan altepeko yolsewilistli. amo keman welis moichtekis tepos amachiwani kewak yewa itlahtlakolpa. in tlahtol tlanawatilmeh tematiltiseh san keski tlahtoltlanawatili monekis tlen ika welis mokotonas tlahtoli amatlapowali quincahuilseh, kintsakwaseh amatlakwiloli tlanamacanih, tlasasacanih, iwan sekinok tekintinih ipan kaltlanamakatiloyan tlen kampa kiski amatl tlatelwili, san moneki achtowi monextis tla melawak intlahtlakol tlen yewan. nikan ipan in senka mochiw in kwaloni in tonakayotl; iwan senka mikowak in kokolistika. itakka pané pantsihtsitsikiltik, mota pané uitsyoj, pero amo uitsyoj, iewayotsin saj. nawi xumali pitsochiyawisotl kaxtoli wan orne anenikwik i(d est) amoka nen nonikwik in ketsali in chal-chivitl in ixkich in notlatki. aw in ayemo wekaw in omonemiltike tlaltikpak yewantin okatka in amoxtlayektekpananime; in senka ixtlamatini in itoka selio rodiginio in ipa in iyamaw okikwilo itoka lektiones in amoxtli onkan kinextia in keni wel onka toweinawatil tomamal in ixkich in kexkich tlamantli ipa in iwki yewatl ipa tlachiwalistli, sa san kexkich nepapa senchiwalistli in kenin iw ipa tlakwilolistli, peowas itechpatsinko dios inik yewatsin dios. martin felisis chane sitlaltepetl ya senpowalxiwitl omome i nemi huramento kimomakili in hwes inik otlatolmelaw kito in testiko ya neli melawak i nikitowa amo nistlakati ka i nokomati in onpa sitlaltepek tlatowani katka omomikili aw in axkan in ichpoch in atliseliwki kimotlatlawtilito inik onkan tisakamoko sentekpantli on matlaktli in sakamoko aw in kitetlastlawi siwatsintli in ichpoch atliseliwki nautetl tlatentli in kimakak tlatowani. v kali xiwitl, 1289. x tekpatl xiwitl, 1320. mowaxkawan. pwes nama axkana naí nipolihki. amotlen nech tlapololtia ipan nopahkayotl. "pero nama nicholohtok, nicholohtok". xiii kali xiwitl, 1297 años. aw in ikwak onikak senka ik opachiw in [840] noyolo aw in yewatl in omotlakowi pedro hakobo iwan inamik maria in omotenewke ye tikimaka karta de ventainik mochipa semikak intech powis in tlali kali inik ayak texixikolistika kinkwilis kintolinis. kenin mochiwa ayok mokakilihke tlen moiluiaj. ipampa in amo kimakak in amo ses in tlakatekolotl, san yewantin kinmakak in itoka xochpoyo, iwan in itoka in tetsawkwakwili, iwan in itoka i nawtene, in itawan yeske. makwilpwali ipan metstli disiembre ka mochi kikwa, kipohpoloa in setl. mah amo nechtatilikan itech talokan tahpiani, aw in yewatl hwan diego niman ik yah in itekpanchantsinko in tlahtoani obispo. aw in oahsiko ixkich itlapaltililis kichiw inik kimottilis, aw wel owitika in okseppa quimottilih, iikxitlantsinko. motlankwakets, chokka, tlaokoya inik kimonohnochilia, inik kimixpantilia in iihiyotsin in itlahtoltsin in ilwikak siwapili, inik aso sansen neltokkos in inetitlanis in itlanekilistsin senkiska ichpochtli, inik quimochiuhililizqueh, inik kimokechililiskeh in iteokaltsin in kanin omotlateneuhilih, in kanin kimonekiltia. in chilxoxowik se kitoka, se kichipawa para moskaltia kwali. nimosewis. ipampa inik axka tikchioa inin eskritura inik timitsnamakiltia in tehoatl paskwal hernandes tiespañol nikan mochan siudad motech powis intech powis in mopilhoan moxwiwan in akin ose motenkopa kipies in kali ka wel yaxka in noxwiwtsin in omomikili in onkan mane tesontlalnamakoyan in tonatiw ikisayan itech asi in wei otli in tlamelawa sankta katalina in xochimilkopa mitskwaxochnamiki yoan in kalakian in tonatiw sa no itech asi in mokal in timotlakowia ti paskwal hernandes ti español in kwawtepekke kaltsalantontli. aw sa onxiwitl in kitstasiko in panowayan tlaka in atonaltsin in chichimekatewktli, in iw niman ye onnesis. tlen 68 tlanawatihkayotl. in omeh kaltlahtokan sentika mochantlaliseh iwan amo welis sehkanok yaseh tla amo momatiltiseh kemanihki iwan kenihki mopatlaseh, sentika momatiltiseh kanin sentika monechicoseh. tla sentika kikwalitaseh monechicoseh, iwan amo kikwalitaseh kemanihki, kenihki iwan kanin asiseh, weyi tlanawatihketl kixolewas axkwaltlahtoli, kiixtlalis se tlen omeh ipan eltok tlahtoli. amo akah kaltlahtokan welis kikotonas nechikolismeh kipano eyi tonatih, tla amo kimati in okse kaltlahtokan. teyewatsin . ye iwi in in ik teoknenemia in ik kiweilike in altepetl in mexikayotl ipampa ka nowian tsaoktikatka in anawakatlali; kampa onkak mochiwa de ome taman. inik ye nentlamati tlatoke ye ipa mononotsa “y ye nosepa tixpoliui”. aw yewatl iknawi inkisidor mochiwtsino in lisensiado fransisko sanktos garsía, aw satepan ompa mochiwtsinoto obispo in yankwik i motenewa del nwevo reino de galisia gwadraxara xalixko. onkak ome taman: metstsonkilit wan kekexikilit oso kwapitsokilit. para axkineki, para ma tiaxtihneki nopa ak aso yo ok ik noka xi wal choka; noka xi wal iknotlamati, san ti nokniw, san ye niyaw, san ye niyaw ye ichan. viii akatl xiwitl, 1383. mosiwaiknin kwakwaltsin. in tlakatl kwawitsatsin ye omotenewke tlakpak in iskintin in ompa kinchiw atenko ipilwan, in itech kiske tlakatl siwapili silkwetsin iwan in ikalpanpilwan. aw inik tlamatinime katka, iskatki in okichiwke in ikin quenmah, tle ipan xiwitl amo momati; in ihkwak owasiko in onkan imixpan in ome weweintin tetepe in istaktepetl iwan popokatepetl, ikpak ahsiko motlaliko se tepetsintli in imixpan ka inin omotenewke ome weweintin tetepe. sesenwiptla nonantsin ipan miak tiankistin yahtinemi inik kwikats nochi tlen moneki. aw in oyuh pewaloke tlatilolka ik no poliw in tlahtokayotl. axkan sábado in ik 23 mani metstli agosto de 1614 años, ihkwak nikan mexiko tlakpak in tlahtowani visurrei kimomakili in tlakopan governasión don diego kortés wanitsin inik ompa governador muchiw; inin wel iteikkaw in tlakpak omotenew mikkatsintli don antonio kortés totokiwastli governador katka tlakopa, inin oyuh momikili san
