ichikweilwiyok in konan iteikkawtsin governasión. 2 kali xiwitl, 1325 años. nehwa nonnechpahtike nganin nopahti. kenin mochiwa kema, notlahsomaiknin, ompa nesewiloyan la venta, nochipa onkateh ixtlawatlakah inkawayowan kintlakewiah seseniman. aw hwebes a xviii de henero, ikwak mowikak don álvaro manrrike de súnika visurrei markés; mowikak españa, in tlahtokatiko makwilxiwitl. . ka okichiwke in itekiw in motlatsitsinwan in mexika in puchteka in oztomeca. miérkoles in ik 9 mani metstli septiembre de 1615 años, ipan matlaktlonse tsilini tlahka, in opew ye tlatsitsilika ompa teupan sant augustín iwan kolegio san pablo iwan sankta krus kontsinko iwan san sebastián iwan totlasonantsin nwestra señora de las mersedes iwan la kasa profesa, ik omotemachisti in kenin san nikan se masewali mexika siwatl ikonew kin sexiwtia piltsintli ipan tlakoxiwitl kipia in owetska posoko in aolwastonko in piltsintli okichtontli, aw onkan tlamawisoltika okimopalewili okimoskalili in san nikolás de tolentino, sa yuh mostla ilwitsin; aw in omotenew piltsintli ka wel mikka, ka ome hora iwan tlakohora in miktoka, inik niniman okimoskalili omotenewtsino sankto. ahvia! san aka tel nech ya pinavia ah nech ya ika vel matia an notata in nokwakwilo oselokoatl. melio wan kwartiya i tokan naxan nwebe sentabos okatka itoka melio wan kwartiya. inik ontlamantli niktenewa honka ontetl hiwitetl tliltik yoan oxikipiltontli ik ka istak hiwitl molonki seki popoiawki aiamo tlatsawali yoan ontetl tlaltepostli owel isoliw otenkokoton monamakas itech powis konfradia del santisimo sakramento. in ipan siudad mexiko sanktiago tlatilulko axkan lunes ye omilwitl mani agusto de 1599 años in tewantin hwes governador iwan alkaldes ordinarios in ikantsinko rei nwestro señor tixpan onesiko yewantin pedro hernandes iwan inamik maria barbola iwan itex hwan peres chaneke sarikta ana kwepopan in itechkopa inik kinamaka in ikal oyuh techixpantiko oiw techkakistiliko inik kinamaka in inkal in senyolokakopa inik yewatl kinamakaltia español in itoka paskwal hernandes otechixpantiko in tewantin hwes governador iwan alkaldes ordinarios in ikatsinko rei nwestro señor ka nel in tlanekilistika inik kinamaka. iiii akatl xiwitl, 1327 años. imahtlakan se pero mahtlaktli centavoh. ipampa inon nochipa itla mocohuiliah. in prólogo, kiyektalih isauro cháves tomás. se kilo tomatl aw i ye ik walmikwani omaka xiwitl inik omotlaliko tlatilulko, ye ikwak onkoto in tetlamamakaya tlakakalakiaya askapotsalko. mochiwa saj. tehwatsin tikmati kampa tikpiya nat, kiyokoya in ipalnemowa, ki yawal temowiya moyokoyatsin, nima walewak i mexikatl, kiwalyaka tlotepetl; aw i mikwake kinpachoa talatl, i matlaktesakawake imachkaw asix. impal wei iteopixkatsin méxiko in itoka teikniwtsin hwan de sumárraga iwan itlahtokateixiptlatsin mendosa, omopewilti nikan méxiko in teposamoxihkwiloloni, ipan etsontli onkaxtoli onsempoali onkaxtoli omei xiwitl. aw iskate in tlakake koyoake, tlakopaneka, askapotsalka, tenayoka, kwawtitlankalke, toltitlankalke, chiwknawteka, tetskoko koanakotsi, kwitlawak, tepechpan, itsyokan; ini sa moch ewanti in tlatoke in kikanke in iw kitoke intlatol in tenochkan. "ca otisenkisako in ye tixkich in ye timochin in tawa in titepewa in tipuchtekatl in tostomekatl; is mano ye iwi mane yolika in tikinpatia i. in ikwak momomostike omaka xiwitl ipa; ikwak no molpi in ixiw. tein kwali kitokah se ramitah wan tein amo kwali ixwa sah iteyo. kwaltia kinpia yeyi pilantoton iwan yeyi siwantoton. pilantoton mokwitia hwan, felipe iwan karlos. siwantonton mokwi tia margarita, anamaría iwan konswelo. tosantamali ika waxchili aw ka tenonotsalistli teixtlamachtilistli in itechpa achto amoxtli in isenkawalischiwaloka inin amoxtlachiwalistlakwilolistli; ka nika yuh moneki itech in sesentetl amoxtli ma on ye pewka tenonotsalisteixtlamatilistli, inik yehika inik kelewiske kanaske itech momatiske i yewantin amoxpowanime in kipowaske amoxtli, kitaske in tlei seseyaka sesentetl ipan onkan momati. tlen 59 tlanawatihkayotl. in tepantlahtoanih tlen wekapa iwan tepantlahtoanih tlen sentika weyi tlahtokan amo welis ompa kintokatlaliseh tlen saniman kawitl tlanawatili. in senadores iwan diputados tlen tepatlanih welis motlapehpeniseh ipan seyok saniman kawitl ika inelaxka tlanawatili, tlan amo kiyekantoseh tlanawatili, tlen senadores iwan diputados neltlayekankeh amo welis kintlapehpeniseh tlen saniman kawitl tlen kewak tepatlanih. iskintin hi impilwa tesosomoksi, in kimoyaw nowian altepetlipa. kilmeh no ikwak walmowikak krusifixo in ompa monextitsino totolapan sant gwilermo; sa iw wiptla de ramos sant pablo maxitiko, aw satepan walmowikak in sant augustín. ikwak makxoyatlaliaya in chalka in atenko. pos ¡in ihwe malaj! amo keman xochiyowa. . niman ye no seppa kalaki in ichan, ixpan moketsa in tletl. niman ye ik konkwi in amatl, kahkokwi nawpa in koniawa in iwikpa tletl kilwia in ik kinotsa . no ipan in kwali tonali in se kali, anoso chikome kali in ik motonalpowiliaya iwan in ipan wewei akalotlih nowiyan ye yaotlapialo tlachialo in kampa ye kisakiwi tliltike in kinmiktikiwi españoles, ipampa yuh mihtowaya umpa walaske in ilwikaatenko in weyatenko akapolko omotlalike simalonti tliltike, iwan sekintin bela krus walaske in tliltike simalonti omokwepke in nikan mexiko cholowa in okinkawtewake intekwiyowan. aw in ikwak achi omosewike inin inchachalakaya || 112v iwan in oksekitlamantli in teamanalistli in teyoltekipacholistli in kichiwaya masewaltin in aitik chaneke, ik niman kinemili inik yas oksekni in kinextitiw tlali in itokayokan hamaika. aw in akali motekako texopa, yeilwiti i nekalistli, unka tekwalewitike. ka tik kwas ka tik is in nikan ik ti mits nonotsa a ixkich ik ti mits on apana ti mits on tetsiloa ako ti mits ilpia in timonanwan in timotawan ti mits tlatlawtia. teyewatsin tokos higoxkwahitl, limonkwawitl, tolaxnokwawitl iwan awakakwawitl, iwan ika amo miak xiwitl panos ye mopilis se kwali pixkistli. san niman in popokatepetl; noihki se wei tlatiwani. ompon omokochititok wan isiwawatsin ikxitlantsinko metstok. itokatsin istaksíwatl noso mahntsin. v kali xiwitl, 1497. solo kinamakah ihwak kichiwah garsas ya. axkan itech nehin tonal in wawtsontli moteki iwan ma kwakwalaka ika istatl; ihkwak ye tlawikxitili, ma ixika. mokwawtlatsoa in totoltetl itewilotka ixkichkaw in ye newktlatepitswatsali iwan ye motlalilia in totoltetl ikostika; in chichiwalayotlatetsawtli moixtlapana; motlaxkalchihchiwa in wawtsontli iwan ika in chichiwalayotlatetsawtli motsoyonia. sekni mochiwa in chiltemoli ika xitomatl, xonakatl, axox iwan chili; mochinin motesi, motsoyonia iwan motlalia in wawtlaxkaltoton ihtik in chiltemoli. aw i nowepol in itoka hwan ekapitsak niman ye mokokowaoke achtopa kikwitlakoyoni in okimotlanewi in tokal amo tikitake in kenin kikoyoni tokal aw sa tepan tikitake inik ye mokokowa nowepol aw in axkan ye omornikili in nowepol. weyi kwesoli nechpanok noponi. . aw in san nenmayan in amo ilwitl in kim olpiliaya tilmahtli in puchteka tlahtoke in tealtiani aw in nawalostomeka in tekowanime sa yewatl in iksotilmahtli xixipetstli mochipa yewatl kikentinemia. ix akatl xiwitl, 1267. (auh ka niman wel ikwak pahtik in itlahtsin, in iw satepan machistik). niman kalak in teskakoakatl chacha; kiwalilwi “ma ok mowikaka i mexika, ma ok mononotsaka in tepaneka, ma ok kichiaka i notlatol niquinonotzaz”. iwan tostlan niktemakak nokoskin imachis in martin tsapotla tiachkaw itla ikitlaokoliske in nopilwan ma wel sa makwil peso kimakaske ye ixkich i notlatol nikitotiw newatl ni martin de lasaro moyotla nochan okatka iskatki iwan in towewekal kixelwis i nopilwan i noweltiw se kanas in wepantli se kanaske i topilwan iwan in tetl kixelwis ixkich konkwis ixkich kikwiske i nopilwa ok ik tepantlatsakwili kitekaske i nikan iwan kwiske chikwetetl onkan notilmatsin sa ye kimatin i nonamik iwan in anto ka ikonew se tlakatl noteikaw o peso kimakaske itoka ana tlako. . "ca ahmo notlatwi in on nik wal itkik ka intlatki in tonanwan in totawan puchteka in oztomeca. xiii tochtli xiwitl, 1310. in konitotewak in tochiwitsin. miak in kwartiya mokoaya pero axan yakmo mochi ye... iwan mexikatsinko ohtli in atenamitl mochiwtok mowekapano motlalten motlachkwitlas, onkan tekitiko in kwawnawaka in iksentonayan tlaka iwan chalka amakemeke; se metstli inik nenke, ye itlakoyok metstli mayo in kitlamiko ohtli mexikatsinko. "ah, na nomoilwi moomiyo nihkwa achton topixke amo niktokamati itokatsin inintsin topixke ikwak yewatsin ometstaya ipan teopantli omotektitili kenin ka netokos. onkwan achtokopa san ika petlasoli; okimokimilwia miki wan iki on owilaloya ika kitokaske. yekyektsi kiihtowah sintli kiwalika. in ipan omochiw in testigo pedro de sanktoval hwan de gusman español yoan melchior hernandes, diego ketsalmitl, fransisko hwan iwan algwasiles pedro heka, martin kwawtli, pedro hawexotl yewantin okimamanke in estakas inik omoneltili posesion. aw senka kimotetsanwike in askapotsalka. otikittake in kali inik mamani nawtekistimani yewatl otlatamachiw algwasil mayor gabriel de la krus inik motamachihoa inik wiyak in itepotskali xiii maitl aw in inakastlan inik patlahoak v maitl. axkan martes in ik 3 mani metstli marso de 1615 años, ihkwak nikan mexiko onpewke onpowaltin in portugwestin; itenkopatsinko visurrei ompa wi yaotlapiaske iweyatenko akapolko, ipampa omachistiko nikan mexiko onkan owalake in tlaweliloke in motenewa landenses iwan pichilínkes ichtekke weyapan nemi. yu nechpachilwihke tepostli yu nechkikichton weweyakton. aw iwan ye senpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolomome xiwitl in ipan 2 tekpatl xiwitl, 1572 años, in omomikili don frai alonso de muntúfar arsobispo mexiko, in teoyotika motlahtokatili kaxtolonnawi xiwitl. nasió el señor, según la kwenta del martirologio romano, a los sinko mil i siento i noventa i nweve años despwés de la kreasión del mundo; i a los dos mil i novesientos i sinkenta i siete despwés del diluvio; i a los dos mil i kinse del nasimiento de abrahán; i a los mil i kinientos i dies de la salida del pweblo de israel de egipto; i mil i treinta i dos despwés ke david fwe ungido por rei en la sesenta || [10r] i sinko semana, según la profesía de daniel; i en la olimpíada siento i noventa i kwatro; a los setesientos i sinkenta i dos años despwés ke se edifikó roma; i a los kwarenta i dos del imperio de oktaviano. ix tekpatl xiwitl, 1176. no iwan, in iw kihtowa ipan in iamoxtlakwilol in itoka beroso, in se tlahtoli katka in mokwekwepako onkan babilonia, ihkwak in onkan tlahtokatia in itoka nemroth, ye oyuh nepa chikonpowali ipan nawxiwitl 144 años mochi in apachiwilistli in omotenew diluvio, inik poliowak ipantsinko omotenewtsino noé profeta. para titacuazqueh, nikan ipan in i wel poliwiko in tulam tlaka imaltepew, ihkwak in pew i ye kiwalkawtimani in imaltepew in tulteka inik momoyawake inik nowiampa yahyake, ompa mimikito, iwan seki maltepetlalito in iw kichiwke chololteka, ka inxeliwkayowan in tulteka. aw inik ompa senka wekawake inik ompa katka teochichimeka asteka mexitin in astlan wel ixkichkaw ontsonxiwitl ipan matlakpowalxiwitl ipan matlaktlonnawi xiwitl, 1014 años, in iw nestika in inxiwtlapowal wewetke mexika, in okitlalitiake inik niman ompa owalkiske owalpewke owalewake owalolinke in astlan. ahmo nikilnamiki intla immanon okse amatl iwkatik inonikpow yese tlen wel kwali nikmati inon tlahkwilolionechtlapatili in notlachialis itechpa in wewe mexihko aw niman ik walmoma in metstli oktubre. in wiwiloh tlalpan patlanih. wasitiwe okseki pus ahtle komida porke yokichiwili maldád yewan chaparrito bigotudo kichiwilia maldades. xochiyowa febrero wan marso. maso neliwi in mokokoa in notlalnakaio in kokolistli amo nechtlapololtia in nosialis in notlalnamikilis paktika hakenka yoan nikchixtika in mikistli in aiak wel ixpampa yeoa nikan niktlalia notlatol i sa tlatsakkan notlanekilis inik palewilo naniman yoan in noxwiwan yoan in niwktsitsiwan inik amo motoliniske aw in in niktekpana. aw ik noseppa pew in ye nestiw in ye mixtlapotiw, yniqu ixpan ye kistiw ye kikawtiw in okixtsakwilika ye mikwanitiw in metstli, inik yekene noseppa wel tlanesiko; topan in mochiwin wel ipan yei tsilini ye teotlak, in iw mochi tlakatl ipan omochiw okittak. otinemiah ahvia! an notekiva navalpili ak intla neli motonakayow tik ya chiwki tla ka achtoketl san mits ya pinavia. astakaxtlatlapantika,ye on malintikak in ketsalxiloxochitl:imapan onnehnemi,konchihchichintinemihin teteuktin, in tepilwan. rayos kichiwa ixochiyo ihkontsitsin, pané kahkaltik, xochiyowakwaltsinmokehketsasehséwipantok kwaltsin, pané akah kiwipana wan tasemati xochitsin, tsinkahkaxania, xiini, mokawa ya iyolxochiyo, yehwa ya eski akolij, mochiwa exot ihtik ya yetok akolij. ihwak chikawa ya kosawia wan kitekih ya nochi ika ikwouyo wan kiwipanah wan kikehketsah mah waki ika tonal wan motehtentapowa ya exot, ihchayaka wan kisowah se koxtal wan se manta wan kimahmagah in exot mah kihkisa ya initeyo. se pakiwipan ahwanika ohpa kitsetselowah wan se kiwatsa ya iteyo para se kewas ya. in ipa se taman sah mochiwa. iwan timohtilis axkan mixpantsinko oninohtitiko tewatsin nan timopilia in moxochitsin ahkiwatsin nikan tikmoxilawilihtika itechtsinkakopa nikneki nimitsmolwilis se tlahtoli ipampanon oniwala nikfirmaroa in tlatokatlatoli newatl: yeh totalmanik no amikmiktok, ketsal xiwikoatl iwan ma mixko, ma mokpak tikman inik omitsmoknelili in dios. intla ye titlawelilokatis, intla ye teka timokakayawas, ka ye timokwas, ye tetech timokwa, ye tikaamanas, ye tikmosiwis in totekwiyo, aso ok wei mitspanitlalis. kenin mochiwa xopitsananakat onkán niaw nikawas. ma yokuxka itlan xon makilti in tlaihiyowilistli. ma ixkich motlapaltsin. tle tikmomachitia, nopiltzé?” iiii akatl xiwitl, 1171 años. ii akatl xiwitl, 1299. ompa noihki onka matsali, plantano iwan mango. inik onkan tlahtokamakak tsakwaltitlan tenanko, iwan ik tlatokamakak chikonkowak ipampa i kowatl in onkan tlapieya; aw in onkan kittak mani atl, itoka kwawatl. . aw in ixkich in tlamasewalistli in yowaltamachiwalistli in ixtossolistli; tepetlachili ahnoso kwawchili sano ikwak kastolxiwitl in intlapix; walmotlali siwakpopokatsi tlakatekatsintli. se kikwalia iteyo; se kikwa tamanal, welik kemeh et. nikan ipan in in omomikili in kwaltsin tlailotlaktewktli, in kipacho tenankayotl onpowalxiwitl onmatlaktli ipan onxiwitl, aw sa niman ikwak motlahtokatlali in ipiltsin in itoka kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli; chapantika inik motlahtokatlali, in iw kitowa wewetke. aw axkan domingo ik 28 mani metstli wel itlamian febrero de 1610 años, ikwak ipan matlaktli tsilini tlaka, in nikan mexiko omokixti inik onmopewalti inik ompa mowikak a la china in teoyotika tlahtowani don diego páskes de mergado arsobispo de manila, inin klérigo, kinmowikili matlaktlomomentin sant augustín teopixke in ompa motemachtiliske a la china. omotlalitoh akalwakan ipan matlaktli onse tekpatl xiwitl iwan sanyeno onkan onenke ixkichka se akatl xiwitl. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. yewa istladatilis otetlasowili. tlen 10 tlanawatihkayotl. altepechanehke tlen sennechikolistli mexihko totlalnantsin intechpowi kipiaseh tepostlatopontli ininchan, tlen ika momanawiseh iwan mopalehuiseh, san amo welis mopialiseh tlen kiihtowa tlahtol tlanawatili tlen sentlanawatiloyan iwan noihki tlen kitekiwia ehérsito, armada, fwersa aérea iwan gwardia nasional. in tlahtol tlanawatili tlen sentlanawatiloyan kiihtos katlia ihki tlamantli, tlayeyekoli, amatlanekilmeh iwan kanin tlalpan welis kinmaktiliseh makitekiwikan tepostli altepechanehke. iwan wel ipan motlali in omotenew sábado in ilwitsin yankwikan ik mochiw i tlasemiknopilwiani sant ignasio de loyola fundador de la kompañía de hesús viskaya ichantsinko; inin wel yewatsin achtopa intatsin wel yewatsin yankwikan itlapewaltiltsitsinwan itlanextiltsitsinwan in la kompañía de hesús teopixke in motenewtsinoa teatinos. aw in wewe aokwantsin chichimekatewktli iwan in kowasakatsin teowatewktli in tlahtokatke onpowalxiwitl onkaxtoli ipan se xiwitl; aw in kwawtlewanitsin tlailotlaktewktli in tlahtokat onpowalxiwitl ipan chikwexiwitl in tenanko; aw in popokatsin atlawtekatltewktli in tlahtokat atlawtlan senpowalxiwitl ipan exiwitl. tlanawatikayotl 88.- ni kaltlanawatiketl tlen ni mexkotlali kwali amo itstos ipan ni mexihko tlaltipak ixkixka chikome tonati, san moneki achtowi tlayolmelawas kenke amo itstos tlen kámara de senadores noso tlen kintekimakahtokeh nochipa, iwan nohkia tlayolmelawas tlen ki asitos tlen ika yahki kanahya. tla amo itstos achiyok tonati tlen pano chikome tonal, wahka monekis kin tlahtlanis iwikpa amo itstos tlen kámara de senadores noso tlen kintekimakahtokeh nochipa. onka se mahchikoli ipan ahkopechtli. in amo okachi onkak, wewehka saj. in siwatsintli, in ilamatsin. ye yiman on oyahke ika kwawtla in sapatistas. okinkahke ipan xolal in karransistas. ikan chiknawi tlapoali in yowali otemoken in sapatistas iwan oksepa okinchololtike in karransistas. oasike ika san san gregorio atlapulko, ika xochimilko. iki on oyeke wekatika. oyaya karransistas, tlakwekwepotsaya; sapatistas otlanankiliaya noihki otlakwekwepotsaya. se tonaltika okalahke karransistas iwan sapatistas oksepa ocholoke. ixwahka noponi in ixkich kawitl manka tolteka tlatokayotl, pwes ika nehon tamechtahtaniliah favor. nikan ipan in in tetekoke in chalko tlalmanalko pipiltin: in ikse itoka chichikwepotsin, in ikome itoka nekwametsin, in ik-ei itoka totomiwatsin, in iknawi itoka omakatsin, in ikmakwili itoka makwiltsin. semi mochiwa kajfentaj. iwan yuh mihtowa, in ihkwak onkan in kisako mexitin in ihtik texkalostotl ahnoso chikomostotl, onkan intech kinewako mochintin in mexitin, in sa wel yuhkeimma tlawanke ipan mokwepke, awik wiwi, ixiwintike; aw yewatl ipampa in inik mihtowa motenewa kinewayan. kexkich xiii akatl xiwitl, 1167. ya ne pehki yahti pero ayok nihmati . aw in ompa kalakia anawak amo mochi tlakatl ikalakian katka ipampa ka ikowapan katka in awitsotsin; ika yon nimotatawtia 3 kali xiwitl yankwikan i yaotlatoke kwawnawaka, inik walixtokawa kwawnawaka tsakwaltitla in chalko. aw ka yehika ipampa ka tiaske in axkan, ka titotekatiwi ka titotlalitiwi iwan titepewatiwi tikinpewatiwi in ipan nowian semanawatl in ye onoke masewaltin. antlanamakaskiayah "bueno", kinilwi se akatl xiwitl ipan kisato spañoles in tekpantlayakak; nima ye ik wits in kapitá. in amo wehkapantia, talpantsin saj. in xiwit. komo kipiya abono kampa se kitoka no kwaltsin miak mochiwa, kwaltsin motalia, moolochowa. onkán yemokwakontia; onkán moxiyotia onkán yeka yemihkiti onkán kokopastli sa'ón. niman ik ompewke, ¿tlen tonali yalwa? pus nehwa ni rei. in mochiwa parahko, nikawín no mochiwia komo se kitoka. aw in testigo inik otlanankili kitowa ka nikmelawa i notlatol in ipanpa kali inik neteilwilo axkan in okikwitlakoyonike ka wel yewatl imatika konkets in pedro nanali aw in tetl in kwawitl in yaxka in siwatsintli anan xoko in ikal honpa mankan in makpalxochititlan. pehki ipa san hwan se mamahpikton silantro wan momahkahki ipan atl noyuhki in ipan 1917 xiwitl, kilmach, monexiti in senkiska ichpochtli in itoka maria imixpantsinko eixtin ichkapixkakokoneh in ompa fatima altepetl, in itech powi lusitania. hwebes ik xvii mani metstli de hunio, ikwak motlayawalwi in sakramento, aw amo wel mochiw amo wel mohtlatokilti, san kalitik in motlayawalwi in iglesia mayor; inik awel mokixti ipampa senka kiyaw, wel totokak in kiawitl iwan senka sokititlan katka chiw. titlasohtlanis se kilo masayelnanakatl wan kanachi ángeles, ok senka yewan in istak tetepe, seki kihtowah tenamiki mah se tayi in emolat tein tiltik emolat ihwak amo ya poyek, tenamiki para kemeh yon se moihtiestalia. ayoikana welih monawatiyah para ma tekitika. xii tekpatl i kiwaltsake in chalka. itla timitxtlahtlaniskia. nikan ipan in kinpewke in tepeyakak tlaka, ok yewatl tepew in wewe motewksoma ilwikamina. mah amo kimatoka nehekatsin, aw niman ikwak ipan semilwitl iwan xiwitl in omotenew tlakpak otlanankilike in wewetke inik se tlakatl testigo martin lasaro teskakowakatl chane kowatlayawkan namike huramento okichiw inik otlatlakoltilok in ixpantsinko dios iwa totlasonantsin santa maria iwan i nika in imachio in krus etk. in kwowit mochiwa weyi. . aok ak kalaki siwapan ha no ak wal mokwepa im ma wal nakastlachie. tlahko kwarto nwes inik ayak satepa motlatolkwepas inik texixikos in akin yuhki kichiwas chikomilwitl ilpities karsel iwan kixtlawas x pesos tomines itetsinko powis in ikamara su magestad inik tikneltilia nikan tiktlalia totoka iwan tofirmas. omochiw nikan audiensia real. migwel sanches alkalde pedro geronimo alkalde. por mandado de los señores i los alkaldes fransisko ximenes eskrivano. san isel in motlapatiliko nikan mexiko, iwan san omemetstiko inik nikan mexiko katka; in mokwepke inchan kaxtolomome, nikan mokawke yeintin mexiko. melawak melawak yese yomahmachix ye kana timokalakia melawak tel ximokakiti ammo nechpaktia in tenemilis in se kikwalia ixiuyo. in kemeh eskia kwamekat, pero semi bweno. aw machitsin nikan tokonitokan in kenin owalake in atentlipan i nonowalka in teotlixka in chalka. okaxiltike mexikah okse imaxka xiwtlalpili. ik yewan okilwikixtike inik se yankwik intlew tenochtitlan. sanyeno ihkwak temokke in chapolme iwan in milan kwalokke. tinemiskia ixkosawki ikwik in asiko panowayan tsonkoyametl, || 140r toteknochwetsin, tewktlakosawkatsin, yakatomawak iwan tsonistaltsin, kwawixkaltsin, tsiwtlakawki okse. nieskia. newa amwel nokahyan keh notahtsin. ¿ kox otiknamakilti mokawayo? amotsin, amo yewa oniknamakilti, tlakamo itahtsin. seki koyome kihtowa niyolkatl samolwi nitlachixtok; ni tlahtoli amo melawak nokia nipia notlalamikilis nipia nonemilis: ipati notlahtol, yeyektsi notlahtol. o so ninikwilo, in kwekwetsoka ye nomaton, ye nokwel, ye nokwel. se kitoka semila wan motaktsontalia. aw senka mayanalok inik mexiko iwan in nowian; welasotik in tlaoli, in se tomin sa akiton katka aok wel sentlaxkalchikiwitl, sa iwki se kakawatl momatia se tomin. miek teteoh ammo kiselihkeh ipampa senka omahmawiaya satepa se okihto newatl ninotlekowis . aw in ihkwak in oasihko tochtepek senka mawistililo kin onkan kikawa in innechichiwalis in ik omotlauhosatinenka, aw no onkan kikawa in innexin. ayemo walasi. inik mostla tik chiah. in xochiyowa, pero amo nikmati itech katin metsti. atle chili kinamikia san iyo istatl kipoktiaya. wel ixkichtin kikwaya in iwanyolke. nikwalita. ika mahtlaktli sentavo inin kalmimiloli tekk wikah ixtla kaltsakwali kampa nitemos. achtopa xitlehko. ma tikchachalantimayaw, ma iliwis tikman; san iwiyan, san iyolik tikmanas iwan ahmo tixtomawatias, ahmo tisikatias, ahmo tiwetskatias; ahmo mixtlampa, ahmo monakastlampa titlachixtias; ahmo titeixtotokatias, ahmo tsixko titlachias; san titlamelawkaihkatias, san titlamelawkatlachixtias in ihkwak teixpan timowikas ahnoso teixpan timokixtis ahnoso timotenamikilis. inik onkan tikmokwilis in tleyotl, immawisotl. inik ayak mitsolinis, inik ahnoyak tiktolinis. inik san nepantla yes in kowayotl, immawisotl. achto ma kwakwalaka in ome litro atl ika mochiwas in atoli; in textli moatilia ika ome tasa atl, mokwachwia; inin motlalilihtiw in atl in ye kwakwalakatok; sekni motesi in michiwawtli ahso ipan metlatl ahnoso ika tepustlatsoaloni ika kanela tlatsikwewalton, inin motlalilihtiw in atoli iwan san teki molinia inik ahmo motelolohchiwas. motsopelilia ika asúkar ahnoso newktli. ¿amo timotlalisneki iwan towan timononotsas? nexkokokiswat mexika tlatokayotl aw in oiw onmomikili in tlakatl in witsnekawal tekwachkawtli in onkan xikko, aw san nimann ihkwak onkan walmotlahtokatlali in omotenew in itlasopiltsin in itoka toteositewktli tekwachkawtli mochiw, aw tle ipan xiwitl in in kikwik itlahtokayo amo wel momati; onkan ye tlahtokati in xikko in toteositewktli, aw inin amono wel momati in keskixiwitl in onkan tlahtokat xikko. axkan lunes in ik 7 mani metstli abril de 1614 años, ihkwak in upew in nikan mexiko in ye kipopowa in ye kisokikixtia inik nowiyan ipan iski akalotli ihkak onok nikan ihtik siudad mexiko, itenkopatsinko tlahtowani visurrei, inik nowiyampa altepewake owalake okichiwako okiyektiko akalotli. in okseki tamameh kitokaj. san nikxochimalina in tekpilotl, san ka in nokwik ika nokonilakatsowa in wewetitlan. ok nokonkowati nikan wexotsinko in ni tlatowani in tekayewatsin, chalchiwtin, san ketsalitstin in nikinsenkixtia in tepilwan. san nixochimalina in tekpilotl. aw niman ompa yahke makisato asolko, intulkaltsin kikehketsato. "kuatitla tiwalahki konetl. se naranha iewayo nesi yoehkoko in teposkalmimiloli. tiwalahke tipaxaloko nika atlanwihteki timikwalmikilihke nikan. amo se kichipawa. seki kihtowah xochiyowa itech marso, okseki kihtowah xochiyowa mayo por ké hulio onkak ya. calyoyolcameh,huehueyi iwan tsitsikitsitsin, miak mohuepahuah. in sesek ta semi ahayoh no. yokisalo' oksehpa yekipanoltia oksé raya para oksé letra yektitia' yekimomachtia yulik kasitiw yulik kasitiw ini wan onkan yolik iwan kwale kaxilitiw nilkksion asta kampa kimomachtia. nochi rancho kinpatlili initlanawatil. in ikwak konkawako niman ik moman in chimali, aukmo nekaliwa aokak ano. amo mochipaujtanij. nechinama . ahmo kinektiahke in mawissotl in tenyotl san imahayasultsin yetinenka senka kimakasia in teihtuli in teyektenewalistli, —bueno pus ingeman kikwaske molito niwalas mochinehwa. amo mochipautani. 93. ¿cuix tawiyas, kwix tiwelamatis ahmokwitlaxkol motechommotktkkas? ahtokommihiyowiltis inik tomasewaltian. ka sa achitsin mayasoltsin yetinemis; tommototonewtinemis, okichpili, notekwiyo. nimitstlasas, nimitsixnekwilos, aonkan nimitsonnenemitis, ahye nimitsontoktis, in nemowani, in yelowani, in nekoni, in elewiloni. ¿quennel? ¿ahnel nimitsonnopinawtilis in kenman teixpan in ahmo ninimatis? ¿cuix tikkokolchiwas, tokonnekawalistlamatis in kemman inik noso ontlasotis immolotsin, monakayotsin, notekwiyo, okichpili? notetla okachi tlatkiwa keh ikalehkapo. testigo. fransisko mimich ichan atlixyokan omonamikti aw in ixkich kawitl ye nemi xxxv siwitl omakok huramento inik otlatlakoltilok inik amo istlakatis ipaltsinko in totekuyo dios inik otlanankili testiko niman okito inik nikmati inik amo nistlakatis in ye xxx siwitl mochipa konpixka in itoka atlixeliwki ichpoch in axkan moteilwi nikmati in imil. aw in yewatl in wei tlakatekolotl niman kimottiti inik okitlakanots in witsilopoch tlakatekolopixki tlasiwki itetlaekoltikaw, kilwi "nomacehualé, witsitlé, ka wel neli ka senka tinechtlaokoltia senka in amochintin in annomasewalwan atenka mesitin. ye yuhki unkan konkwachkaltiko kapitán tiankisko momosko; ye ikwak no kiketske kwawtematlak in unka momosko, in unkan tiankisko matlakilwiti nekalistli. kwaltia oquipixqueh. tisini. aw in yewatl tlahtowani kwawsesekwitsin tlamaokatltewktli teokwitlapane katka atlixko tlamato; in yuh omito, wei tiyakaw. miak piome, xtechwalkwilikan ne itech weyi at. axkan hwebes in ik 14 mani metstli agosto de 1614 años, ihkwak nikan mexiko machistiko wala tlahtoli waxakak inik ompa omomikili teoyotika tlahtowani don hwan de servantes obispo waxakak, inik ompa teoyotika tlahtokatito san makwilxiwitl ipan etetl metstli ipan kaxtoli tonatiw inik niman omomikiliko. xinechtoluka! entonses motlalilia molito se kwanaka ka mole arosito kanin tlaxkal. intechtekipanowah amo kwaltia para pahti, wan komo wahkapa eltok, achka ilwikatl. kwaltia in amo senka mimati ik mitotia in ipatiw sen kimili on matlaktli. ipan inin xiwitl kitlalike yuh tlahtokateixiptlatsintli nikan yankwik kaxtilan tewktli in itoka hwan rwis de apodaka, noiwan iximacho yuhkin ma saton ikonde. newa melahkayopa onikilwi amo nechpaktia. aw in chalchiwitl amo ikwiliwtika satepan owalnes kasako katka weitepol san patlachtik niman okolwik pedro flores sasdre epañol. wan ihwanti yo masewalme axkema welito para nima ye kiwaltokili xochmilkatl, walteyaka kwawkilastli. in iuki kitokaitiah por in kwaltsin, mahyá yon wewehcho ixilwa. in ountlanke miki xochmilka niman ik patla, sano unpa itstia i waltemok. aw nikan otim{opa}lewike nikan ipan toyehuyotepew itokayokam tepeteopam nikam otimotlani/a/ya iwan tewayokamtlaka otimochikaawke otimopalewike iwan newatli nixochiteuktli nikwawtli nioselutli ikwak inon niman owalake tepexiktlak/a/ ateska osomatli otechitlaniskiya yowalnepamtla owala inin nawalo mom/a/yawiko omochiw se konesintli ipam omopwawki ik okitlanisya in xochiteuktl kwawtli oselotli aw in yewatli niman okima in den in mochiwas aw niman tlanawati okikto xiwalwiyan nopilwanne tla xitlakakikam tlein nepa sahsi xikisakam xikonanati xihkwalwikakam nikam aw niman oyaqu{e} okiktake se konesintli omkam wesktw niman okiwikake ixpam in ipan in ye witsilmetla ihkak in diablo in kitokayotia teskatlipoka, in inteow katka in tlakochkalka chalka; in yaoyotl kintoka. kwitachilxiwit niman ye witse onkan kisako in diablo in onkan tsakwaltsintli itik. kiilwi in kaxtilan xochitl okachi kwakwaltsin keh in violetah. ik niman kimowikilike kimokixtilito in la kasa professa anoso san ignasio, nimann ik kimowikilike kimokixtilito san fransisko, ik niman kimowikilike kimokixtilito visitasión monhas, inik kimokwepilike; ik niman wilowak kimokixtilito konsepsión monhas ayotikpak, ik niman kimowikilike kixowato san lurenso monhas, ik niman okseppa umpa kimokalakilito kimokawilito in teopan sankto domingo. nikan yowahsiko yehwan n rebolúsio. v akatl xiwitl, 1419. iwan omentin kinnotsaya in teixamikawan in kinmokwitlawiaya in tlaaltiltin siwa wel imixpan mikia. ¡xtechtayocoli natsin! ti tloke ti nawake, ti mits awiltia nikan. antle moknopilwia monawak, ipalnemowa. achá sesek. se malkochtli chichilwawtii ixiwyo nikan ipan in in omomikiliko in ikome itoka chalchiwtlatonak in ikmatlaktlomei tlahtowani kulwakan, in tlahtokat matlakxiwitl; aw sa niman ipan in in omotenew xiwitl onkan walmotlahtokatlali in itoka kwawtlix in ikmatlaktlonnawi tlahtowani mochiw kulwakan. san ompa ommokawa in inchan on tlamana. onkan in itwalnepantla ixpan in wewetl in onkan onok sakapechtli; mwi magnifikos señores martin tepokatli, tomas opochmakwex, hipolito melchior xochitl, martin kapopoliwis, tochan san sebastian tsakwalko omixpantisinko tinesi in antlatoke in itechkopa in tokal in onkan omotlali pedro witsiltewka ka tokonitowa makisa ma san ok tlanepantla omoka ma okonnelti in keni yu ikal ka no tokonneltilisken tewantin ixkich inik tikitlani hustisia xitechmochiwililikan martin tepokatli, tomas opochmakwex iwan hok tisekintin. miak mochiwa. 52. intla wel moka nemi, ka ye wel mokwexanko, momamalwasko tikmotlalilis, ahmo yuhkin tewatl timokwawpowas, timoselopowas. ahmo san ken tikchiwas in tlin mitsnawatis inik ahmo tikyolihtlakos in totekwiyo, iwan iyewatl inik ahmo mitstolinis, san iwiyan, san yokoxka, tikilwis in tlein ik mitstolinis. ahmo teixpan, tenawak tikpinawtis, ka intla tikpinawtis, ka niman yuhkin tewatl moyolo, mokwitlaxkol, in teixpan tiknemitia, in tikwilana. xochiyowa. ipanpa in iw titlanawatia i otikmelawkaitake in tlatoli in ipan informasion inik tikneltilia nikan tiktlalia in totokan iwan tofirmas homochiw nikan siudad mexiko a xxviii dias del mes de setiembre mil e kinientos e sesenta e nweve años fransisko ximenes hoan garsia alkalde. pasó ante mi migwel hernandes eskribano. aw onkan katka in ikwak in ipan omito omotenew atentli in don christóval kolón, ye omotenew wei tlamatini in itechpa tlali iwan in atl in kenin ka. kimilwi "xiquintequilitih se innakas xochimilkah in amewan ma xikimilpiekan. niman xinechwalwikilikih nakastli xikipilko". kwikatl anyolke, xochitl ankweponke, antepilwan, kinkwiliah sintli. ma ka aik nipoliuhi". aw in ikwak in oyuh kimokatike [sic] in señor governador hwes yoan alkaldes hweses niman ikwak omotlanawatilike in onkan in tlachalanitinemi in pedro masaken ihoan ines tiakapan ihoan magdalena ihoan anan monsel in onkan chaneke sant hwan yopiko intlaxilakalpan ik nawatiloke inik no kitemakaske in testigos inik kixnamiktiske in omochiw informasion chikwasen tonatiw makoke in dermino. wan axkana nipoliwito in kwikoanowa san pepetlawtinenka, san iskich inkwechi ixixiw intempilol inkoski imastaxel inchochol. kan yenika ninochokilia, namokol, in ni axayaka, nikilnamiki noweweikniwan,in kwepanawas, in tekale, in xochitlawan, in yewatikak. tikpia. wan kiilwi in tal kakawat iuki kilwiah por in neli kakautik. niman ye ik kitotoma in otlatopilii intla se intia ome intla yei intla nawi kaltis iski konana yewatl in wel kwali in wel xokpale, nikanka in tlakwaloyan. ihkatsa itstoke. otitlasohtlaya in ayekohtli mopaka iwan mowikxitia ika ome litro atl, xonakatl, axox iwan istatl; ihkwak ye tlahkotlawikxitili ye motlalilia in chicharrontlali iwan yepasohtli; motlapachoa inik ye wiksis. motlalilia chili in ayekohmoli yese achto motsoyonia ahnoso san mihseki; ken monekis. wan na tlaskamati noha inin xiwpan miktlampa, in onkan tlalpan motenewa kalifornia, temachtia in itawkayo teopixkatsintli in itoka hunípero serra. iii tochtli xiwitl, 1222. asta noponi tlanki newa amaka nikixmati. pero tlakatl, pilyehyektsi pilokichpiltsi ye oiw nepa matlakxiwitl ipan se xiwitl ye tlahtokati in omotenew oselotsintewktli, yniqu ipan asiko omotenew wewe tsiwtlakawki yaopol in onkan tekwanipan amakemekan chalko, inik no onkan motlaliko wixtoko. aw in oyuh konmotokilike onkan iglesia mayor, ik niman kixowak nekwepalok umpan tekpan palasio, mokweptsinoke umpa in audiensia real tlaka oidores iwan in oksekintin hustisias kimokwitlawia, kinkawato in omentin omotenewke imachtsitsinwan omotenewtsino mikkatsintli arsobispo iwan in ibangetsitsinwan kawaloko; iwan no tekawako i motenewke soldadostin, inik walmokwepke ye kiwalkechpanotiake in imarkabos no iwan ye kiwalakoktiake in imalansas iwan in invamderra in inkwachpan. ya nepa ahsito ya ayok kichiwa kwenta in oiw omik walmotlali iskowantsi, i motekwiktlali ipan i tekpatl xiwitl. amo ximoneltokiti in tleninon tlakatl okonihto. niman onkan ones ixpantsinko hwes gobernador in itoka magdalena ines inamik antonio hoseph okito kamo wel momakas posesion ka naxka notlatki nikpia in amatl inik naxka. aw kitlakamatke in mexika in wei teopixki witsiltsin; niman ye ik onkan motlalia in atenko tlatlamaya, onkan ik motlaekoltiaya in atlan mochiwa. aw san newan mani in martin mexikatl in inemak in mili ompowal wiyak inik patlawak senpowali ka newatl nikinmilchiwiliyaya tikonkawiyaya pablo hernandes omomikili ka yewekaw in tikchiwa ye ixkich kawitl yepowatl xiwitl in makoke tlali mili in martin mexikatl iwan lorenso tikokyawakatl ka yewatl kinmomakili in don pablo xochikentsin tlatowani. ika ninemolkon, titlanamakaskiah "pero axkenihki inik tlamachiyotito chichimeka. talkamoh moatilia in textli ika ome tasa atl; mokwakwalatsa in ome litro atl ika tlatsopeliloni iwan kanela tlatsikwewalton; ihkwak ye kwakwalaka ye motlalilia in textli in ye tlaatilili iwan in ye omokwachwi; san teki molinia inik ahmo motelolohchiwas; in kowatlankapoli, in ye chipawak, momaxakwaloa ihtik in tlakwachwiloni iwan san tlamach ye motlalilihtiw in atoli in ihkwak ayahmo kwakwalaka inik ahmo papachkas. tlen 57 tlanawatihkayotl. itechpan se senador tlen teaxka moixtlalis se ipatlaka. . nikan timits maka in tlakawapawaloni in tlakaskaltiloni in kwawitl tetl in wel pohpokatok in wel chihchinawtok motech nokonpachowa; itlanahnamik: se kitoka iteyo, achto se kiapachowa wan kemah se kitoka. kimach onkan ipan ohtli onikitak in momaiknin. kiitak wala aixko. tosannakatlatsoyonili in temaskali in nekkwat tahko totonik wan tahko sesek; akin tayi komo ihtichikawak, amo teh kichiwilia wan akin amo ihtichikawak, kikwi kalanemilis oso ihxoch. nikan mopouha, motekpana, in kenin yankwikan wei tlamawisoltika monexitih in senkiska ichpochtli santa maria dios inantsin, tk???wapilahtohkatsin, in onkdn tepeyakak, moteneuha gwadalupe. kipiaskia. kenin mochiwa onkan ye tlahtokati in tlakatl toteositewktli tekwachkawtli; aw amono wel momati tle ipan xiwitl in onkan walmikwani in onkan ik motlaliko chalchiwtepek atentlipan chalko mochiw. aw in ihkwak in in ompa kulwakan okimiktike wewe witsiliwitl, ye iw nepa epowalonmatlaktli ipan exiwitl ye intlahtokaw inik kinpacho chichimeka in mexika; aw inik mochi mosenpowa in onen tlaltikpak makwilpowalxiwitl wel kaxili, aw yehika ipampa ka tikmati ompa motlakatili in tisayokan inik walatiake mexika. aw ik niman yewantin okihtoke in texkaltepeka, || 59r in malinalka iwan toloke "ma san yowaltika in tikinmiktikan mexika, ka senka chikawake". sepayawi. mah welili nehin planta. ome xumali pitsochiyawisotl kan ... m ... ik ... aw san ... wal ... || inik okinwalatokti wei ayeyekatl, inik aso yewatl onkan okitlasako in imakal in ihtik owalyetiake in wewetke in iyatenyok in astlan tlali, inik onkan owatenkisako chichimeka inik onka motlaliko. aw iwan ye nawpowalxiwitl ipan makwilxiwitl in ipan vi tekpatl xiwitl, 1524 años, in omaxitiko padreme sant fransisko matlaktin omomentin teopixke; aw no ikwak ipan in in omotenew xiwitl onkan matlakpowalxiwtiko in mexika inik kate tenochtitlan. tlensan kinpaktia in pilantoton ihkwak tlakatih kwahkwakohneko kawayo. coconeh, ichkameh iwan pipitzomeh, ka okse nomowepawah pipiomeh ka in nantli kinixotia. istatl, ixkich in monekis aw in yewantin in tlakopaneka ipan in in xiwitl i walmokawke in imak mexikatl, inik tetlan walkalakke; iwan in kolwake tetlan walkalakke in mexiko. q.n. ximeva ximeva in tipiltsintli xi val meva in kin otitlakat tipiltsintli. aw in ihkwak in ipan in omotenew iii kali xiwitl, 1209 años, inik onkan ahsiko tisatepek in omotenewke chikweintin wewetke in estlapiktin teotenanka kwixkoka temimilolka iwipaneka sakanka, ye oyuh nepa etsonxiwitl ipan chiwknawxiwitl motlakatilitsino in totekwiyo hesuchristo. ka ixkich in tikmokwilia ik pachiwia in moyolotsin in tawa in titepewa in tipuchtekatl in toztomecatl. kwaltia aw in axkan hwebes a veinte i sinko 25 días del mes de henero de 1590 años, ipan ilwitsin la konversión san pablo, ikwak maxitiko mokalakiko nikan mexiko tlahtowani in ikome itoka don lwis de velasko visurrei, inin ipiltsin in wewe don lwis de velasko visurrei katka ikome nikan mexiko. aw in pedro lwis ka onomomikili ompa kwawchinanko inin testigos konitoa ka wel nikmati ka wel imaxkan in kali in momextin kimokechilike in inamik katka. in ipan siudad mexiko a dies i siete dias del mes de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años oksepa onkan otsatsik in tekpo[yo]tl in ipan tlaxilakali tekpankaltitlan okitenew in iski ik patiyowa in kali in ikal mariana in onpa mani teokaltitlan chikwasenpowali pesos aw in ikwak okitekakiti ayak otlatenyoti testigo pedro xwares iwan tekpoyotl. pus imeyolohtli den mero meyolohtli ye'on in yek iistake n ayame kisa'. aw ka ye oxikawka ye opanawiloka in mexika in onpan chalko, aw ye chokaya i motewksoma in iwan siwakowatl tlakayeleltsin; ya melakwawaya inik ye walmokwepaya in tenochka, aw okimonkawato yeintin tlasopipiltin mexika, onkan yaomikke in akolko in ikse itoka tlakawepan, in ikome itoka chawakwe, in ik-ei itoka ketsalkwaw; inin mikke inmak in chalka. niman ye kilwia ka ye kwali, xolé, ma ok tikpowakan in kwali tonali. iii tochtli xiwitl, 1274. san nikan temok i xochimikistli tlalpan, asi yewa ye nikan, in tlapala kichiwan, tonawak onoke. mochi motlapachoa kanin tlaxkal wan se kaswela yankwik motlalia wan se xoktli yankwik motlalia muchi yankwik según kihtawise animitas. i kali xiwitl, 1285. tehwa nikan timokawas, yon san magdalena axakak?" in tlatoltika kimononochiliko yuh konitowa tikkakiltiko in hustisia ipampa tiktonamakilia tokal totlal onkan mani in ipan tlaxilakali omotenew otitopakkanonotske in katharina de san hwan española ixkich techmakas napowali pesos inik otikchiwke tonenonotsal otechmakak senpowal onmakwili pesos in señal omochiw ipampa tikkakiltia in hustisia ixkichin in itlavtlanilis in tlanamakani. ipan in nelohnemilisitli in teyoltekipacholi amo tlami. vii tekpatl xiwitl, 1252 años. ahsitito tlahko xiwitl ya kwali neinemi aw in yewatsin alkalde inik kimochiwiliko posesion kimoneltilili nikan katki itokatsin ifirmatsin in xiwitl in metstli tlakpak omotenew fransisko de la krus alkalde andres garsia regidor in ixpan newatl migwel monise eskrivano aw in axkan inik moteilwia ka imaxka ka intlal ka intlatki ka kinkawilitia in intatsin in tlali inik amo nistlakati ka huramento onikchiw in newatl migwel achitomekatl ipanpa ik nikan nomatika niketsa krus. migwel achitomekatl. unpa walayoa matlakoatl inik kitlatlawtiko inik kitlaniliko in iichpoch chichimekatl tsiwaktlatonak, i siwatl itoka askweitl; ye mopilwatia kichiwke chikonkiawtsi, san iyo. onkak ipa se taman saj. kawalipox no moneki mah se kichipawa. ye ixkichkaw opoliw inik onkan motlaliko kulwakan mexika. in ihkwak mochiwin ilwitsin yankwikan sant ignasio de loyola, ye kin oyuh nepa onpowalonkaxtoli xiwitl momikilitsino in ompa roma itsontekonpa in semanawatl. aw inin nokonitoa monamakas in kali teixtin misa ik topan mitos newatl maria xoko yoan nopilo maria anan ihoan nomikkamon katka migwel oselotl. machmotlapo se peña ompik omotlapo kwawti motlapohke puro oyameme. aw in ipampa inik senka mawistik in ikal katka i nawyotewktli in xipil ka ik tlakoko in ompa tulam iwan in ixkichika in inetlamachtil; ik kiyolkoko in topiltsin akxitl ketsalkowatl in ompa katka tulam ipampa i nawyotewktli san isel in onkatka in ixiwkal in ichalchiwkal in iketsalkal in itapachkal in itlapaltewilokal, chalchiwtlaketsalo chalchiwtlaixyo in ikal katka in inteow teotenanka. 2 tekpatl xiwitl, 1260 años. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. nesawalkoyotl ikwikawan ma san sentlamik xokon mattiw xokon ixkawitiw in tlaihiyowilistli. ak itla mits masewaltis mits ilwiltis in tloke nawake. aw kiyomawito in tlahtowani visurrei don lwis de velasko, ixpantsinko in motlapoto; iwan no yewatsin onkan ixpantsinko mochiw ikwak onkan maxitiko in yewatsin senka mawistililoni teoyotika tlahtowani arsobispo don frai garsía gwerra teopixki sankto domingo. 108 aw in onmomikiliko markos de agwilar san ome metstika, aw ipatka ixiptla mochiw in ika ixkich iwelitilis ok ye itech motlali in tesorero alonso de estrada, ompa ichan in ipan altepetl de siudad real, in otlapacho ixkichika inik wala in españa in achto ik motlaliko audiensia. taltikpaktsin de mi alma, xii akatl xiwitl, 1231. in aka konmottilia tekowas tlakawa yes. in aka konmottilia tetlaximas tetsohtsonalos tetepacholos. aw in ikeilwitl axkan lunes santo in ik 16 mani metstli abril, ihkwak yankwikan otlayawaloke teotlak ipan ome tsilini, in ompa walkiske inteopan in sankta maría kwepopan tlaka; inin prossesión kitlalike in kofradía intech powi in animasme purgatorio tetlechipawaloyan moyetstikate. in kwikani o ka ye ixkich. in iskintin okitoke ka ye neli ka wel imaxka in balthasar sanches iwan in iteikkaw kinkawilitia in intatsin katka pedro sanches yuh tlaneltilike in tlaxilakaleke aw in ikwak in oiw konmokakilti in señor governador in intlatol tlaxilakaleke ik senka opachiw in iyolotsin ik niman omotlanawatili in ikatsinko hustisia motlanawatilia in intechpa balthasar sanches iwan in iteikkaw kinmomakilia lisensia inik wel kinamakaske in intlal in ikal in inchinan inik kimoneltilili nikan kimotlalili in itokatsin in ifirmatsin. antonio valeriano pasó ante mi migwel xwares eskrivano. nomaikniwan ye nikan nochan cateh, iwan ika nokalmimilo tipanoskeh timitzantiquizazqueh. ¿queman ye kwali tikisas? iwan okisaya mitotikes. inimekes mitotikes kinkwitiaya santiagome, atzcame iwan "danzas. iki in kwali otlalwikisaya. ika teotlak ometeketsaya se kwawitl, keman chikweyi tlamachotiloni, teotlak akan kikwekwepotsaske telpokame ika miak tlakwekweponaltin. inimekes telpokame miaktin ma tikitokan nochtin tlen ipan barrio santa marta, nochi telpokame owewetsia ika tomin, onkwan on kwali kixtlawaske. inin kwawitl okikwitiaya kastilo. kampa nochi tlen okimewalwiaya santa marta, nochi on tlaka siwame wan pipiltsitsintin owalwilaloya tlachalos, ikwak opewaya tlakwekwepotsaya in kastilo. nochipa noso sesenxiwitl okitlikechiaya keman matlaktli iwan se tlapoali tepostlamachotiloni yowali. tioweh inwan tomaiknihun. newa on nietas. kitentlapo asta ne ateno. tehwatsin timero tidweño de nehin at, yetok presente nehin mokonetsin, . aw in teteoktin in achkakawtin ixxixikol in kommahakitiake iwan imihiyetekon in kimahmamatiake; niman ye kilwia in ketsalkanawtli in temistsin: "cuix itla tikmonekiltia?". vi akatl xiwitl, 1199. yukonanato yukonpatlato ikan karga yukonpatlato saninka tlehwa karga tlakwawitl o moriyitos kwika' o tablas o tekwinali saninga tlehwatl. ni arrieros kikixtiah nopa sintli". mah amo mochihkoltilikan. iwan kitowa [oc sentetl kahli tonatiw ikalakianpa itstikak... iwan kalixayo inik omotamachiw in itepots nanmatl aw inakas hematl iwan senyolotli in i moch nikmaka in nonamik omito ana tewkchon amo itlakawis notlatol. ah san xochikakawatl in pusontimani, yexochitl in tlamako. intla noyol kimati, kiwintia ye noyolia. aya yese ye nikan, tlala ikpak, antetekwita, nopilwan, a noyol kimati, kiwintia ye noyol. itlanahnamik: in lá pikawak in ayatl non san yeyeyi ichtoton mantiw wan in lá monekis tomawak pus kachi mimiak in lá pikawak in ayatl pos nelehwel non sanyehyeyi ilototon yeyi ilototon mantiw para yek kwakwalton ayatl komo keme manta, mantita kisa ohkión. .tla ixtotoka ye kanawtsin in ye kanawtsin in. aviya itsipan a momavilia aviya itsipan a momavilia aveya itsipan a nomavilia. amo monamaka. yewatl in kimakaya nochpalaxochio iwan yakawiak maxtlatl iwan kaktli. aw in siwa inkwe inwipil in kintlawtiaya tealtianime, iwan kixawa kinpotonia tlapaliwitika. aw sa omomikilitasiko in ipan omotenew xiwitl ix kali in tlahtowani wewetewktli in chichimekatewktli, in tlahtokat yepowalxiwitl ipan chikwexiwitl in kinwalpachotia amakemeke; aw san niman ikwak in ipan xiwitl omotenew motlahtokatlali in ipiltsin in itoka atonaltsin chichimekatewktli mochiw in onkan chalko atenko. nikan ipan in in ompa walkiske chikomostok in teochichimeka totolimpaneka itstlakosawke wewetke, aw ye kin nikan okikwitasiko in iknawtetl intoka inik ye motenewa amakemeke chalka. axkan domingo ik 12 mani metstli febrero de 1612 años, ihkwak ye otsonkis missa wei in onkan kapila san hoseph san fransisko, ok achto tetsakwalok amoyak wel walkis kiyawak; aw in ihkwak ye otetsakwalok, ik niman kalihtikpa in walkis frai herónimo de sárate, omopepetlaw, mekatl in ikechtlan okitlali ik okiwaltititstia in onkan fiskal. senka wel kinkwitlawiltiaya in ik wel mihtotiaya in onkan tiankisko. nononkwa kinmanaya in intlakawan in tlakanekwiloke. 2 kali xiwitl, 1273. aw in ye wel ihkwak tetlakwaltia ipan in kwali tonali ahso sesipaktli, ahnoso chikomeosomatli kipowtiw in ik in kwalkan yes sem ilwitonali, ahmo san kiliiswiaya. tewan ixtlawapa tikateh iuki kitokaitiah por in ololtik. se kilo mimichtin ye tlatlapantli aw niman in ichikomeyok in ipan domingo in ik 5 mani metstli febrero ye yowa, in okimotlapolwilike postema in omotenew motlali itskaltsinko arsobispo in kimokokolwia, temali in onkan walkis, yewatl inik momikilisneki. "in kexkichkaw manis in semanawatl, aik ixpoliwis in inteyo in itawka in mexikotenochtitlan". mokwaatekiske inik no teoyotika sakramentotika ipilwantsitsinwan yeske tonantsin sankta iglesia romana, muchipa kimotlakamachiltiske teoyotika tlaneltokilistika; aw in ihkwak tla ye okinmoselili in semanawak teoyotika wei semichkapixki sankto padre tosentepachokatsin totesemtenekwitlawikatsin, ka no yewantin ichkatsitsinwan yeske, kinmottilis kinmiximachilis in amo yaxkatsitsinwan in amo kinmiximachiliaya, in san kampa opoliwtinenka kwilotla sakatla ixtlawakan tepetla omasattitinenka, in axkan mokwepawi iwikpatsinko inik kimiximachiliske in wel neli ichkapixki semanawak imaktsinko motlaliske, inik no kinmopialis kinmopachilwis kinmokwitlawitsinos in ika ipan melawak setilistlaneltokilistli sankta fee kathólika, inik aokmo seppa kimanas diablo kinmaxkatis in ika || 245 tlateotokilistli in tlakatekolonotsalistli, in iw axkan nomah ipan kate, masiwi in ye miektin umpa onkate christianosme. wewe bartolome lx mixkowatlailotlak lx eswawakatl tewtli lx lorenso tikoyawakatl lx bartolome yaotsin telpochtli lx thoribio vaskes xl chichimekatl xiwitonko kinamakilti tliltik xl. . aw in ye yuhki, niman ye ik kisa in itwalnepantla in onkan mani amatl. noihki ichpokame okintlakewaya metstekitiske. ikan amo okimatia ke nemoa méxiko mexikatlaka, okintlaxtlawiaya achi tepiltsin. amo ken axan, metstekitskes kitlani weyi tomin. inimekes ichpokame san okintlaxtlawiaya makwili peso kana matlaktli. ompoyon amo panoaya tlaxtlawili. aw inmanel ok nen moteilwiaya omotenew diego senete, sa nipa walwets, aokmo kakililok in ineteilwil. la motoka tibwen hoven. aw in omotenewke gaspar karilo español in inamik iwan marina in ita katka itoka kwata amo nikmati in kampan ichan aw in fransisko san onkan montle amo no nikmati in kanpan. aw no ikwak in ipan in xiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1492, in tlamiko yaoyotl in granada, ik niman kimomakilike in inwelitsin in tlahtoke don fernando iwan doña isabel || 109r reyes españa in don christóval kolón. kipehpenke tlahtlachichintinemi tlahneoktinemi in tiankisko onkan mihtotitinemi. kiwika chiltlaxkali aw niman ik ye onwi i wel onkan tepetl ixpan chalchiwmomostli, ka yewatl onkan walteyakan in tlakatl tliltekatsin chichimekayaotekiwa, konixtetsotsonako kwawitl; inik axkan motokayotia kwawxayakatitlan. xrosiarokih nehin totalmanik —katka chocholoaya. nompewa nonkwika, nikwikanitl ma temako xochitl, ma onawilo, ika ontlamachtilo in tlaltikpak. inin tlahtoli ka amo wel melawak momati, aso yuhki anoso amo yuhki; yese wel melawak in iwki tonakayo in ompa tlaka no yuhki in innakayo, inik yewatl ipampa tenenewilia in ompa chaneke kurlant. noponi tlipitski. oneimah inik onasiko in chichimeka in inpan axiwako in tsiwaktlatonak in kwitlachtepek tlatoani; nima ye tenayoka tekwanitsi; sawatla ixkosawkatsi; kwawaka tlalolintewktli; nima ye xaltokan upantsi; nima ye sitlaltepek tlawiskalpotonki; nima ye tekpayoka wawkil, nima ye tlotlitewktli; nima ye koatlicha tsontekomatl akolwa, in isiwaw itoka tsonpachtli, in ipiltsi tlakoxi yontetoka tsontekomatl. satepa yeweya pus yeweya yemoskaltia yepikawi yetikičíki' motlapana nelehwel yekitlapana nosso onkan yekixtlalia onkan. yetikichiktiwi maske ahmo miyake yeyintoton nawi kangeski yowpikawke. kwekwechkwikatl por eso den penka kasi moyék wahsoma para ahmo tliltik kisas ahmo komo kokostik yek chipawak. vi akad xiwitl 1251 años ipanin in onkan nawxiwtike mexika in tepetsinko ¿aoc tlamanneki? aw nikam nikitowa nehuatü notoka dfon] hoseph de san hwan nixochitekutli niquauhtü niocelotü nikam ik nechmosonkixtilia in totekuyo dios nopam okimotitlanili in itlatolsin ka senkak oniktlas/a/kamachiti ip{am}pa keski in tenawatiawsin oniknomasewi in tlaü {y}paczinco ipam /m/atlactli iwan se xiwitli= 11 años inkwak wala tlaneltokilistli nikam ninomikili nikam nikikawtiw noxwiwan tekutin dfon] ba{l} tesar de san hwan iwan nikitowa nikawa se tlaü yaxka teopam se kawaleria kampa yawi otü tewa/... / omkam oniktokaya mili iwan yetü iwan chiü ya{x}ka teopam san owi kichiwaske nopilwan amo akin kimoaxkati/s/ ka yaxka teopam omka se se tepesintli itoka polkatepesintli niman tlamelahu{a} inawak xilotepesintli. in sesek porke tel ayoj. aw in oyekawiko teokali matlakxiwitl omei in omochiwako ik omomamal. yei axoxtlantli ah ka sa tinemiiwan ti wal paki in tlaltikpak. aw ke ya no kimolwike san yowatsinko tlakwalispan || 97v in ye nokwel tetlan walkalakke in iski altepeme omotenewke inik ye no kontsitskike in tekitl in tenochtitlan, amo tewanme in chalka. ¿oc no iwkan kenonamikan? semi ye tlahea ipan inin weyi altepetl otieheoqueh. man tiktemotih kalohtilistli ipan kaloltilkali t o i x p a n ka. onech ilwihkeh neli wel kwali in iwan kenin kan se tonali nikan tokawasnekih okachi kwali tokawakan amo wehea in nesewiloyan. aw inik tetekimakok in ipan iski altepetl omotenew in chinanpanekatl, ka wel ixkich nikan kichiwako in itekiw in iksen chinampanekatl. nepa kikwito kimosentlamachtitsinotika in totekwiyo dios in intlantsinko in isanktostsitsinwa, aw in ipampa in ipan in amoxtli wel onkan powki in ipan in inemilis tlaltikpak tlaka ma motlali in inemilistsin adam achto in ayemo akin aka okse tlakatl patriarka wei tetatsin tlakamekayotika, aw ka nel mochintin mochiwke ipilwan aw no yewatsin mochiw intatsin in mochintin tetawan; aw ka yuhki in i momachiyotia i tlein itechpa yewatsin adam iwan itechpa eva, in kimikwilwi yewatsin moisés propheta in ipa in itsinpewkayopa in tlakamekayotl in mitowa motenewa génesis, iwan i tlein okno okimikwilwike in sano itechpan in oksekkan imixkoyan in teotlamatinime in doktorestin. tohwanti ya tijkuaj. wan kilwis in imaman ipapan yekitlapalohtiw yekitenamiktiw inimaman kitlahpaloa kihta yoniwala. komo kitokah enero satepan se metsti xochiyowa. axkan domingo in ik 17 mani metstli noviembre de 1613 años, ihkwak in omachistik in nikan mexiko in yewatsin teoyotika tlahtowani don hwan peres de la serna arsobispo mexiko omentin klérigos san pedro ipilwantsitsin kinmiwalia, sesen in ompa ipan ome alte- || 234 -petl. iwaxka. mochiwa inin xiwpan ipan altepetl mexikotenochtitlan inik kaxtoli onnawi olimpikayo neawiltiloni. se kwamekat inin xiwpan galitlaltekah kiyaochiwah méxiko. yewatl on iximacho yuhkin "ipampa newkpantsin yaoyotl". in onkak eyi taman: tekosej, kwitaxkolxokoyolin wan pantohmixokoyolin. yewa kwali kochis ipan in tlapechtli. aw in tlali in chinamitl san kimoneixkawiti in kontemakak itoka nenkis aw in konmakak yewatl in pablo makwex in komakak ye xxv siwitl ikwak tlatokati in don diegotsin de san fransisko aw onka omokalti. inik chikuntlamantli tetsawitl aw in axkan motlapachilwitika ikoppa motlahtokatilia in ipan in nweva españa in tlakatl don lwis de velasko, in mokalakiko mexiko ipan yewatl xiwitl de 1607 ik 15 mani metstli hulio; ompa walmewiti in askapotsalko, ompa mosewitsinotikatka inik ompa wal- || 112 -mohuicac pirú, wel kwali inik kimonamikilike in ikoppa omowetsitiko itlahtokaikpalpan mexiko. kikaki xaxamaktsi kikwahtika. aw in ikwak in omakok in mili niman ye ik kisakamowa wel akatitlan katka yewatl kipetlaw in tlali in atlixeliwki in ixkich kawitl mochipa okipiaya. inin xiwpan galitlamatini in itoka rené deskartes, kihkwiloa iamox in motokayotia "discours de la methode". tlen 33 tlanawatihkayotl. mochiwah kiawak ewanih tlen amo kipiah nelkwali tlamantli tlen moixnextia ipan 30 tlanawatihkayotl. mopialiah tlatechpowili tlamanawilistli tlen tlatemaktilia pamitl tlen i, achtowi tokayotl, tlen inin amatlanawatili; san weyi tekichiwani tlen sentlanawatiloyan kipias tlanawatili tlen ika kikixtis ipan anawak tlaltipaktli, saniman iwan amo monekis achtowi moixpantis, nochi kiawak ewanih tlen kiihtos amo kwali senyetoseh nikan. tlen kiawak ewanih amo welis mokalakiseh ipan tlahtoli tlen itechpowi totlalnantsin. pamitl tlen iv: tlen mexihko altepechanehke aw in techpew mexiko tlahtowani itoka wewe motewksoma ilwikamina, aw itlan tlatsontekia in ikwak in itoka siwakowatl tlakayeleltsin. taltikpaktsin de mi alma. atolkamoh tla xiktlatlani in takxotekatl ka motlan in onok, kwix ye nikan in walamattia, in at ye nikan walamattia. tlahko kilo tliletl iwan nikitowa hok sentetl kali tonatiw ikisayanpa itstikak in itepots onmatl aw in inakas omatl inin nikmaka nomon hoseph mawitoka a[mo itlakawis notlatol]. "noermano, uta, ne towelti tlawel yon xiwit. amo monamaka. ipan in in yankwik xiwitl iwan in yankwik metstli henero, ikwak opew in ye tekitiwa in ye ochichiwalo in ompa hekatepek sant christóval, wel on- || 40 -can in itokayokan akalwakan, itenkopatsinko in tlahtowani visurrei don hwan de mendosa i luna; mochi tlakatl onkan tekitiko in anawakatl in techyawalotok, san inneixkawil mochiw in altepewake, amo tewanme in mexika. yuh kitowa, in achto ayamo miyak katka innetlapololtilis in iwki axkan ipan in xiwitl kopewaltike in wei netlapololtilistli, ik okimistlakawiko tlakatekolotl || 68v in yewatl in kitokayotiaya tetsawitl witsilopochtli; kikakia in tlatowaya in asteka, aw iwan kinankiliaya, aw in amo kittaya. aw in iknawkampa kistika in iknawkampa xeliwtika in mexikayotl tenochkayotl, in sant hwan moyotlan, in sant pablo teopan, in sant sebastián atsakwalko, in sankta maría kwepopan, inik nowian omotenew in iksen ixkich mexiko tenochtitlan || 55 ka nowian tlaapachiw. ipa se taman saj. aw inhi “azoc wel ankichiwaske san ik untlapoyawa xiquiçaca!”. onkán in lá nixixkoa mopapán tipewaske tawiltiske totlatlamotlaske wan nihtlamotlas den texkali asta tlasintla. in istak teokwitlatl okachi kwakwaltsin keh in chichiltik tepostli. 49. ma monewiyan tikmokwalti in moma, immokxi; ma moyolo monan, motta tikchiw, ka ik tiwalkisas, ka ik timisolos, timokatsawas, timotlilos. aw no yuh titechpinawtis imma yuhki tatl, imma yuhki titlakwali, ka san monewiyan, monohma ik timonenelos in ahkwali, in ahyektli. akiawtsin aw inik walewke se tekpa xiwitl, ikmatlakxiwitl onawi inik walkiske chikomostotl; inik walewake in oasiko ketsaltepek, unka nexexelolok. taltikpaktsin nimotatawtia kitachiltinemi. viii tekpatl xiwitl, 1188. otinemik ya axtekiti tlahtlanilistin. se chiktehtsi. xa itech titsin, noawelita san tóbyas kitohwa xtokakan namehwanke xtoka paskasio. kiyawnawaleke tekwannawaleke, mixtli ihtik yetiwia in ompa ontekwaya in chalko; senka kimimakasia in chalka akxoteka, awel walasia in ixtlawakan. aw kenmaché ok tlapanawia weilwitl mochiwatiw, in ikin kenman kimonekiltitsinotiw totekwiyo dios inik mochipawtsinos inik kimosenkawiliske inik sankto senmawisomakos inik tlamis in ikanonisatoyotsin motenewa, yehika ipampa in axkan intla san ok in yektenewalokatsin ibetifikasioyotsin general yniqu ilwitsin omochiw, aw ye niman wei in ilwichiwililokatsin omochiw mexiko, in ayak okse sankto yuh ikatsinko omochiw seppa nikan mexiko. inik 4 tlamantli nikitowa hoka nokwe kwetlaskweitl yakwik monamakas home pesos mokwis nomisa ik nopa mitos iwan hokatki notlatsoptsomitl tlatoskitl ye okatki in itlamayo tlatetektli monamakas se peso iwan nawi tomines mokwis in ipatiw yes misa ik nopa mitos itekopatsinko in dios espiritu sankto ye iskich in oniktlalia i notlatol. sampa yahke kiilwito titlaxikoiki anoso michin in mochiwas, niman yuh moxima in tekuli, inik moximakayotia iwan motlatlalitia, in patlama, in motlan ioan in yuhki ok ikwitlaplil maxaltika. anoso chakalin, anoso kwetspalin, mochiw motlalia in ima inik moxima tekuli. in anoso ka tewatl motlayeyekalwia yoyoli, anoso teokwitlakoskatl, yekawis chayawakayo tenko yolo, tlatlatlamachili tlaxochiikwiloli. tlen inana ikwaxanko kalakito in omik nima walmotlali tlakanteontsi ipan vii tekpatl xitl. nawi xumali pitsochiyawisotl aw sano ipan in in omotenew se tekpatl xiwitl onkan ipan walpew in ik-exkanpa ye tewktlahtolo i ye tlahtokatlahtolo; in tlahtowani kulwakan in itoka yowalatonak yewatl san ye tlahtokatawkaw mochiw, in onkan kulwakan kiyakatitikakatka in itlahtowayan. aw iwan ye kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan senpowalomatlaktli ipan ome xiwitl in ipan vii tochtli xiwitl, de 1278 años, in mikiko toskwekwextli, in teyakan onpowalxiwitl; aw san niman ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl kitlahtokatlalike in mexika in wewe witsiliwitl intlahtokaw mochiw, inin ye onkan in chapoltepek kitlalike. v tochtli xiwitl, 1406. inin oyeya se siwapili ompa tepostlan. se momostla oyaya tlapakas achi miak tsotsomatli. ompa atlako otlakwaya. okiwikaya itakatl; onkwan on tla yomayana otlakwaya. in omik tlakanteontsi tewtika tlasultika iwa mik in tewtlewankantsi, no ikwa mik in chimalpopokan tenochtitlatlan tlatowani katka. in chalchiwtli tete ika, ketsalipoposteki, a noweyotepilwanitsin, tlen 81 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlapehpentli tlen tlayekanani xitlawak mochiwas ken kiihtos tlapehpentli tlahtol tlanawatili. wel senka tlamasewke iwan motlatekipanilwiani in inma- || 265 -ticatzinco tekitini, aw in tlein seseyaka kimixnextilia konmotlalilia in ompa intlasentlaliayantsinko motenewa komunidad yniqu insepanyantsinko intetsinko moneki. pero yehwatl gobierno gobierno yeyuhkin yokinkwli inon respekto. xili itstó. tsimpatlawak, kwapitsawak: wel inepantla in ilwikatl; wel iyolo in asitikak ilwikatl; wel ilhikayolotitech asitikak. aw ipan nawi kali xiwitl okiyaw iwan miek onkatka in tlakwali. ompa mochiwa miak. aw yewatl ikome governador mochiw in yewatl el lisesiado lwis ponse, ompa intechkopa kisa itlakamekayowan in tlahtoke dukes in ipan altepetl motenewa de arkos; mochiw hwes de residensia, in kiseli in onmotlali ipan itepacholis in governasió ikomilwitl mani metstli hulio in ipan xiwitl de 1526, aw amo wel kitsonkixti in itetlatetemolilis in residensia, yehika niman onmomikiliko san kexkichkawtika. alwewenoh makwilpwali wan se viii kali unka momikili in tlatoani tlatilulko kwakwawtsi, yepowalxiwitl in tlatokat kwakwawtsi. nikan ipan in in xiwitl inik nikan pewa nikan motenewa inin tlahtoli in intechkopa inik asiko in kenin okalakiko i nikan mexiko tenochtitlan in wewetke in chichimeka mexitin, inik tlalmasewako nikan tenochtli imankan in asiko wewetke, in walteyakanke matlaktin: in ikse tlakatl tenoch yewatl in walkwawtlahtotia, in ikome awexotl, in ikei xomimitl, in iknawi oselopan, in ikmakwili akasitli, in ikchikwasen tesakatetl, in ikchikome kwatlekowatl, in ikchikwei kwawtleketski, in ikchiwknawi kosiwatli, in ikmatlaktli axolowa. v kali xiwitl, 1185 años. yoan niktenewa in ompa xochimilko in ipan tlaiakatl makwilwakan onok nochinankoal chikontetl kwawtlakopa i itskok inik wiwiak hoompoalkwawitl mamakwiltakatl aktika nikowili in omik pochtekatlailotlak katka fransisko kiaw yoan in axkan honka inamik maria tiakapa ompa chaneke nikinmakak matlaktli omome pesos monamakas aso san no yewatl kiwalkoas in tenamik ma san kikwepas in iski nikinmakak tomines aw in tla moxikos ma san tlako xeliwis in kimanas nikan intech powis in nowaiolke. nehwa nitahtani ika miak fa vor wan ika nehin orasiones. totolixkapol oyuh ye matlakxiwitl asiko in tekwanipan tlaka in asiko i nonowalka i poyawteka. yewantin in in omotenewke in eintin in tlatokatke otlipan in intlahtokawan in tekwanipan tlaka, in okik ayemo walasia. kiilah tlapopoka ika tlani inin xiwpan wits teyakanakiw méxiko tlahtokateixiptlatsintli in itoka tewktli baltasar de suñiga i gusman. yewatl katka imarkes in valero iwan iduke in arión. vii akatl xiwitl, 1291. ye yiman tika on se tonaltika karransistas okinkixtike in chachantsinko tlakapipiltototon keman kaxtolxiwka yomen oksekin matlaktli iwan ome iwan yeyi xiwitl okipiaya, kokoltin, telpokame, chichikawaske tlakaiwan okinmimiktike nochtin ipan tiankistli. nonana onechtlahtlani tla onimayanaya. axkan sábado in ik 6 mani metstli septiembre de 1614 años, ihkwak teotlak ipan chikwasen tsilini in momikili senka mawistililoni ixtililoni padre doktor pedro de morales de la kompañía de hesús teopixki omoyetstikatka, iwan kimotokayotiliaya el pontífise chikito yehika ipampa ka wei tetlaokolilistli hubileos kimotenemaktiliaya ipampatsinko ika itokatsin in sankto padre in nikan mexiko; in saso kampa moyetstikatka inteopanchantsinko onkan kimotenemaktiliaya hubileo, in ihkwak akike intech moneki okimitlanililiaya, in akin sankto itetsinko kiponwa ahnoso altar ánimas itech kipowa in inpalewiloka porgaturio tlaihiyowitikate, mochi itechpa in okimotemakiliaya in hubileo. tlasohkamati wel miak. ¿canin kinxelowa in amah nechikolpain huitzeh? kiewtsin teuktli. kentikalakia in amakeme. aw no iwan in ihkwak in ye nawxiwitl tapaltetelko inawak ayotsinko kate in teotenanka chichimeka kwixkoka temimilolka iwipaneka sakanka, i ye no ik monotsa chalka. aw inin omotenewke akxoteka ka yewantin in wel achtopa in okimotokayotike chalka, aw yehika ipampa, yuh mihtowa, chalchiwkali in ipan oahsiko, nikan ipan tlali chalko ok yewantin in tulteka kiketstiake in opoliwke. "bueno, nihwikas pampa ne nochichi aw sanno ikwak kinpewke tochkalko tlaka. yewan oquinemilihqueh. mochiwa miak, pero ne kuoujtaj. aw in okimowelkakiti in tlatlatlawtili, niman moskali in piltsintli; in omoskali, niman ik pew ye ik tlatsitsilikak, ixkichtin kimottilike in teopixke iwan kastilteka. se lado xmoixpetaniti, ipa se taman saj. . "mexicah e, puchtekah e, ostomeka e ka okonchiw in itekiw in tetsawitl witsilopochtli itiok wel itech tahsiske in taw totepew. iii tochtli xiwitl, 1326. in kwowit. istatl, ixkich in monekis niman ye ik yaw momayawis in tleko. aw in itech asito totonilotl, in amo ixnamikistli, in amo yekolistli, amo ihiyowilistli, inik senka wel oxoxotlak tlekwili, owelwalantimotlali, owelmotlatlali in tletl. ik san ommixmawtito, onmotilketsato, waltsinkis, waltsinilot. ye noseppa yaw tlayehekos ixkich kaana ik momotla, kimomaka in tletl. aw ye kin ikwak opewin in ipan in xiwitl in ok ompa titstiwi in akin iwki kichiwas in san tlapik missa kihtos niman tlatilos in ompa sankto ofisio la inkisisió, ka iw walmotlanawatilia in yewatsin in tosenkiskaweiteopixkatsin sankto padre in ro- || 46 -ma moyetstika; yewantin kinwalmonawatilia inkisidoresme inik yewantin kimochiwiliske hustisia nikan mexiko ka intekitsin in; inin omochiw ipan kwaresma. mehor xinechmamaka para tla inkinekih ma ¿auh in amo sanio nikan tontiximatiko in tlaltikpak? se kiski se sopilote amo xikintawelita nopilwan. xonakatl wan wetsis atl. ya tikitah ya wahkahki eihtakatl, awaxihtakatl, kalwahsa ihtakatl yukinma sa tisepantlawanke otochiwke, inik titomawtia in tikitta kali kemman in mochi ye pachi in tlaltitech ye yaw, yehika senka miyek in waltepewia tetl in xamitl kaltikpak; nowian techachan tlali tepewia, nowian itlakaw in kali in tepantli, moch kwitlatsayan inmanel yankwik kali in kin moch omochiw omokets, mochi oksenka yewatl moch itlakaw tsatsayan. in ye ahkasomo newian tikmitlakalwis nonekwilol, tsontikitstos; xiwkechol xochitika, nihtik nimitstsonakis, onka yetos: motenchalohtsin nimitsmakochiwis. testigo.- viktoria lopes [f. 7r.] española viuda vesina de la siudad de mexiko makok huramento etk. tlatlanilok in testigo ilwilok kenin wel tikmati inik moteilwia maria geronima in inamik hwan de eskalante inik mixnamiki antonio joseph. se kikwidarowa kwanto tsikitsin, komo amo mosenkwamekapachowa. istak ixochiyo. o ka yuhki in inik tepan asiko in tlahtowani in kwawitsatsin in tlailotlaktewktli; inik melawatika in itlahtolo in iaxilis in ihekolis inik tepan asiko in amakemekan. kichiwilihke se kaión para noponi ma itstos komo yankwik se kitoka wan kemah moweyitalia ya wan taki ya in uitskonemej. . (chicomolotzin) xa ya meva xi misotia a ka tonan ti tech iknokavaski ti ya via mochan tlalokan mosentilihtoke nepa para tekitise. kenin mochiwa wan nopa ichpokero kwesiwi para iselti itstok. nitlapakato wan nechwalantewak onechwalikak de nikan. x tekpatl xiwitl, 904 años. neh mosta niyaw. makwili tliltik pimienta chikomolotsin xa ya meva xi misotia a ka tonan ti tech iknokavaski ti ya via mochan tlalokan. kwesalan no monamaka. kitotiwi ka yewantin teteu impalnemoa, yewantin techmasewke ¿in ikin in kanin?, yowaya. aw kitotiwi, ka yehoantin techmaka in totochka in tonewka. aw in ixkich in ioani, in kwaloni, in tonakayotl, in tlaoli, in etl, in oawtli, in chian. yewantin tikimitlanilia in atl, in kiawitl inik tlamochiwa tlaltikpak. no yehoantin mokwiltonoa, motlamachtia, axkawake yewantin tlalkiwake. inik muchipa semikak tlatsmolintok, tlaxoxowixtok in inchan, in kanin in kenamika tlalokan aik tle maianalistli umpa muchiwa, atle kokolistli, atle netolinilistli. aw no yehoa kitemaka mokichchotl, in tiachkauhiotl. aw inik machiyotika in xochipali nitlapali amo itech ononasik in kali sa yewatl in tlali in onikimaxkati in ixpan in tlaxilakaleke onikinnots pedro xwares, migwel hernandes, alonso hernandes, pedro sanches, hwan gernaldo, tomas hernandes, pablo mateo, hwan antonio, martin sancho. panoaya ika san pablo ostotepek, san niman san salvador kwawtenko, san migwel tupileho. ipan in xolal nochtin nenenkatsitsintin omotlaliaya tlatotonilos. ompoyon momasewiske se tlaxkali, noso se pantsin ika tepitsin atl aposon. iki on ik otlayia towampowan. ye nonnokwiltonowa, on nitepiltsin, nesawalkoyotl. niknechiko koskatl, in ketsalin patlawak, ye nonisiximatin chalchiwitl, ¡in tepilwan! ixko nontlatlachia, nepapan kwawtlin, oselotl, ye nonisiximatin chalchiwitl, ya in makistli. in xochiyowa kemeh itech marso. wan ya nopa kichí, kiijtouaj. se kilo tomatl nama nihpowas tlen ne chikomexochitl inik xi nikitowa noyolokakopa onmani notlalman inik patlawak hematl ipan senyolotli inik wiak chikwasen matl notlalkowal iwan in kaltepiton xochimilkokapa itstikak nikmakak 8 pesos aw in axkan nikitowa nikinmaka in nochpoch ana iwan in inantsin maria intotolwan onkan kimanaske. kaxtoli wan nawi ¿in akin iwaxka inin kali? notata iwaxka. aw no ikwak kinnotsaya in iteankawan iwan ipawakaw in kimokwitlawitinemiske in tlaaltiltin in ikwak mikiske; ixkich kawitl kinpixtinemiske. en akela misma hora bienaventurada en ke nasió el señor se hiso fiesta en el sielo, i todos los ángeles vinieron a adorarle i rekonoserle por su prínsipe i señor i reparador de sus silas i de las kiebras ke los malos ángeles avían hecho kon su kaida. mahtlaktli ome nohpali omewtsino in tlakatsintli omotlahtlapolwi okimotleniakili isigarrohtsin iwan onechmokalakili vii tochtli xiwitl, 1330. kwaltia in iuki kitokaitiah por in pané se xoktsin mochiwa. awitsotsin tepewalistika kimmomiekili tenochkah intlahtokayo. okimpew nepapan tlakah yuhkin molanko, tsapotlan, xaltepek, teochiapan, tototepek, koskakwawtenanko, koyukan, wexolotlan, akapulko, xikochimalko, tekwantepek, wewetlan, iswatlan, komitlan, witstlan, xolotlan, masatlan, kwawtlan, tlakotepek, miskitlan, iwan oksekintin. 16. iwan ma kana titekwakoyoni, ma kana titetopew, titemayaw ka ye axixtli, kwitlatl tikmotlalilis. iwan ma kana iliwis titlahto, ma titetlahtolpanawi inik ahmo titlahtolkotonas, ahmo titetlapololtis, ahmo tikteilkawaltis in tlein kwali tlahtoli inik nenonotsalo. aw intlakamo melawak kitowa in tewatl wel timoyeyekos intla tikintlahpatilis in akike hukweintin tlahtoske. intlakamo motlahtowayan ahmo tewan titlahtos, ahmo tinawatis, san timokawas. aw intla no tewatl motlahtowayan, ahnoso titlatlanilos, san melawak inik titlahtos, ahtle tikistlakaihtos, ayak tikchikoihtos. wel tiknehmachilis immotlahtol inik titlanankilis, ahmo yuhkin tixolopitli, ahmono yuhkin timopowani. inik titlahtos, inik titlanankilis, san tekpilwetsis immotlahtol ye timawisolos. kema tlatomonki tlitl kenin mochiwa nikan ipan in ye etsontli xiwitl in omotlakatilitsino in totekwiyo dios. —manipa'ti abér saye kwale nitlahtos sanikan ihteki in kañada de maxala tlalpan kalatelko onkan kate seki tlakpak tlalpan kaltelko noyuhki todabia saye komo sién mageyes. don hosé de santa maría, alkalde menor timits ilwia inik tikmatis. || 134r aw niman ik onmikwanike in kulwakan in mexika, san ya yewatl ipan in ome akatl xiwitl. —bweno wan keski biaxe timotlachikilia ntonali. in kwikkaxochitl in tikxeloan chalchiwtli, makistli, yatikneneloa in patlawak ketsali, e iw xxi xiwitl tlantokanti in opew in yaoyo in tlatilolko inik omixnamike in axayanka; im pew nenekalistli omopilowa tonatiw. komo se kitoka mochiwa miak. newatl don fransisko ximenes gobernador hwes in ipaltsinko su magestad in axkan nitlanawatia in ipanpa in tlali in onka mani sank sebastian sakatla in okikwiskia in itoka maria tiyakapan aw in axkan nikixnawatia ayokmo sepa konixtokas in tlali in okikwiskia iwan nitlanawatia moxitinis in itlatsakwal. tlen 38 tlanawatihkayotl. in techpowi iwan tlakaitalistli tlen altepechanehkeh moixkotona i. ipampa amo moxitlawa, iwan amo temaktilia amatl, tlen tlehtleya tlananwatili teixkawilia tlanawatikayotl 36. inin tlakotontli wekawas se xiwitl iwan nohkia kiixkawiliseh sekinok tlatsakwiltilistli tlen nohkia kiixnextis tlahtol tlanawatili; ii. ipampa ixnesis kipia tlahtlakoli ohtekitl tlen moneki quitzacuaseh, iwan pewa mopowa keman asik tonatih tlen kemah kitsahke; iii. keman tlamis se kwesol tlakayotl; iv. ipampa monehnenkachiwas noso mohmostla moiwintis, moihtos ken kiixnextiseh tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh; v. ipampa kicholwilis tlasenkawali, tlen keman kisas tlanawatili makiilpika iwan tlamis keman mokotonas tlatsakwiltilistli; iwan vi. ipampa kitlatsakwiltiliah kampa kiixkawilia tlahtlakoli tlen kikotona tlen itechpowi. in tlahtol tlanawatili kiixtlalis tlahtoli tlen keman ixpoliwis, iwan nohkia tlen keman moixkotonas sekinok itechpowilistli tlen altepechaneh, iwan kenihki welis sampa moaxkatis. in ome taman: tiltikawakat wan xoxokawakat. ihkwak ye ototonix in temaskali ihtik aka kalaki, ki-kixtia in tlekohkotokkwawitl, tlen ok popoka, iwan kitla-xilia in atsintli ipan tlexihkotesontli ika tlekonexkisas. wan kimawalxohtehki wan kikawato se weyi tlen 18 tlanawatihkayotl. san kemah onkas tlahtlakoli tlen itlanekilis ma ki tsakwakah wahka onkas kenihki kitsakwaseh se kentsi tlahtlakohketl. in kayotl tlen inin tsakwalistli seyok tlen motekiwis iwikpa kitlaxtlawah tlatlakoyotl iwan wehka mocahuaseh. tlen ki yekchiwah kanih tlaxtlawaseh tlen tlahtlacolchihtoqueh, moneki mo kwalkawaseh in tlanawatiltéki, pan tekitl, kin nextiliseh in tekiowi, tlamachtiiloyan, chikawalistli iwan ma mawiltikah iwan ihkinoh ma moxitlawakah iwan kin palewiseh tlen kin tlatsakwiltihtokehya ma kalakíkah teipah in iwaya iwampoyowah iwan ihkinoh kimokwitlawiseh ma ayoh tlahtlakolchiwas, no ki tlachiliseh tla onkas sekinok tlamantli tlen ika kipalewiseh pan amatlanawatili. in siwameh kitlaxtlawaseh tlahtlakoli ipan kayotl wehka tlen kampa yetoskeh tlacameh. ni weyi altepetl, in altepemeh iwan in iyolo weyi altepetl welih mo senkawaseh iwan ihkinoh tlen tlaxtlawah in tlatsakwil pampa tlahtlakolchihtokeh iwan tlah yainoh itekih ma kitlamiltikah in tlatsakwil ipan chantli tlen in axka akinweli tlen yainoh in tekitlanawatil. in sentlanawatiloyan, tlaltlanawatilmeh iwan iyolo weyi altepetl quiyectlaliseh, kampa yewan tlanahuatiah, se asitok tlachiwali sentlapalewilistli tlen mokawiliseh ahkia weyi tlahtlakoli kipiaseh ken kiihtowah tlahtol tlanawatilmeh iwan asitok matlaktli iwan ome xiwitl iwan amo asi kaxtoli iwan eyi xiwitl, kampa melawak motlepanitas tlatechpowilistli tlen kiasikaita inin amatlanawatili tlen nochi tlakatl, iwan noihki tlen sekinok tlatechpowilistli tlen kiihtowa nowa tlakameh moskaltiah kin tlachiliah. in tlakameh tlen ayamo kipia matlaktli iwan ome xiwitl, tlen tleweli tlahtlakoli kichiwa tlen ihkon kiihtowa tlahtol tlanawatili, san welis kin kwaltlaliseh iwan kin chanpalehuiseh. in tekichiwalo tlen tlachiwalo ipan se tlanawatiloyan inixkotiah caltlanahuatilmeh, kaltekichiwaneh iwan tlanawatianeh tlen melawak kixmatih sentlapalewilistli tlen conetelpocameh. welis motekiwis tlahtoli tlen ika quinyecanaseh, kinmanawiseh iwan kinpatiseh tla ikinoh moneki, tlen ika mosenpalewis iwan mosentlakakilis tlen intechmonekis konetelpokatl. tlen sekinok tlamantli sentlapalewilistli moneki kiixtlachiliseh inin tlachiwalo, tla ikinoh moneki. ipan nochi tekichiwalistli tlen ininpan motlalis conetelpocameh, moixtlachilis tlanelchiwali tlen melawak tlanawatili, iwan noihki isentlanawatil tlen tekiwakemeh kichiwah tlatitlantli iwan tlen tetlatzacuiltiah. inin tlatsakwiltili moneki iwaya moixtlalis nemilistli iwan motemos oksepa mochantlalis konetelpokatl, iwan noihki nelkwali moskaltis iwan motlalamiktis. in kaltsakwalistli san motekiwis keman melawak monekis iwan amo wekawas, iwan welis mokawilis iniwaya konetelpokameh tlen kipanotokeh matlaktli iwan nawi xiwitl, tlen tekichiwani axnelkwali nemih ihkino quiitoseh. tlen tlaxtlawah in tlatsakwil tlen mexihko ehuaneh, tlen kintsaktoseh sehkanok tlaltipaktli, welis kinwalikaseh ipan totlalnantsin iwikpa kitlaxtlawaseh tlahtlakoli ken ixnesi ipan tlachiwali ma kalakikah teipah in iwaya iwampoyowah tlen ixnesi ipan inin tlanawatikayotl, iwan tlen tlaxtlawah in tlatsakwil tlen sehkanok tlali tlahtlakolchihkeh kiihtlakoh weyi altepetl ke tlah san tlahtik altepetl, welis kinwikaseh tlali kampeka walowih noso chantih, ipan motlatskiltiliseh amatlahatoli tlen weyi semanawak tlen mochihtos itechpan inin tlahtoli. kin panoltiseh tlen kin kaltsaktokeh elis san tla kinekis iwan ki ihkwiloseh makichiwaka. tlen quintlatzcuiltitoqueh, kenihki tleweli tlamantli moixtlalia ipan tlahtol tlanawatili, welis tlaxtlawaseh tlahtlakoli ipan kaltlatsakwiltiloyan tlen echka mokawa ininchan, ipampa ihkinon kalakis teipah in iwaya iuampoyouah. ni tlanawatili amo kiitstokeya porke kena itstok iwan ye yuh matlakxiwitl tlahtokati in wewe achitometl in ikmatlaktli tlahtowani kulwakan. ka ihkwak ipantsinko nikan mexiko motlahtokatilia i yewatsin tlakatl exselentíssimo señor wewe don lwis de velasko in ikome visurrei mochiwtsinoko mexiko, aw no yewatsin ipantsinko in teuyotika tlahtowani su señoría don frai hwan de sumárraga i wel achto san ok obispo moetstikatka nikan mexiko teupixki san fransisko, aw no yewatl ipan in tlakatl don diego de san fransisko tewetskititsin governador nikan mexiko tenuchtitlan chane katka san pablo teupan xuchititlan. oniltelwiko no maman mochi nopapan para ma kilwitiw n dweño ahmo kinkakawas. nexkihiiswat oso exkihit tla xikimolwili in tetewktin alkalan motlapielia, yuhki xikimolwilika ‘ca ye tiwiko kastilan. bweno, nama yahki nopa... kaxtoli chiltomawak nimann onkan kontlalike itsintla in intlalmomos, ipan kontlalike in diablo witsilopochtli. tepetomat niaw kosina wan nimakilia nitlatlachpana. itakilo amo weyi, tsikitsin. aw in ahsiko in inawak tepetsintli in itokayokan tepeyakak, ye tlatlalchipawa; konkak in ikpak tepetsintli kwikkowa iwkin nepapan tlasohtotomeh cuiccah. kakauhani in intoski, iwkin kinahnankilia tepetl. wel senka teyolkima, tehwelamachtia in inkwik kisempanawia in koyoltototl in tsinitskan iwan in oksekin tlasohtotometh in cuiccah. axkan yewatl ipan in in ome akatl xiwitl, in iw kihtotiwi kitenewtiwi wewetke tachkokolwan toxiwmolpilia; in onpowalonmatlakxiwtika ipan onxiwtika yuh mochiwtiw in molpilitiw in inxiw wewetke, inmakasan temalakatl inik yatiw inik mokwekweptiw inik momalakachotiw. ipan chikonawi kali xiwitl omomikilitsino awitsotsin in tlahtokatsintli. kikamatlali. xoxoknanakat —o'tlame mo:tla!ia' istagahti primerito mo:tlalia' ohtlame mo:tlalia'. iwan kimitalwia okseki ka wel kwali ik kinamikiko in inenewka in chiwaloke semilwitl ipa in totome iwan in mimichtin, inik wayolkayotl intechpa ka in patlantinemi iwan in matlanelowa atitlan; ka yuh kimitalwia in sant augustín iwan in itoka ruperto abbad. kampa neh dios nechiekawilihtok. matlaktli kali i kis in atl, ik pani motete chinamitl. sa nepa ¡pan inin ohtli monextia. ira chichiton kalixpan ka. nikan anmonemitiske, aw in ekatsin kaxitike kastila, wel kimotlapalwito i wei tlatowani emperador, ka hamo miktilok. se kikwa itakka. paskwal hernandes nikan nochan siudad amixpantsinko ninesi in [...] tsin hwes gobernador yoan alkaldes oridinarios in ikatsinko to wei tlatokatsin nwestro señor namechnotlatlawtilia nikitoa ka in yehoatl kali in ompa mani tesontlalnamakoyan in ikal katka maria salome aw ka onikowili in maria xwares yoan migwel xwares chaneke san martin ateskapan. testigo. thomas xakin ichan atlixyokan omonamikti aw in ixiwtlapowal ye lv siwitl omakok huramento inik otlatlakoltilok ipaltsinko in totekuyo dios inik amo istlakatis inik otlanankili testigo niman okito ninomakixtiko ipaltsinko in totekuyo dios inik nikmati in ixkich kawitl in ye xl siwitl mochipa yewatl konpixka in itoka atlixeliwki in itatsin siwatsintli in moteilwia axkan in itoka [espacio en bianko]. kahxilia muchipa monechikoa in kapolyolotl ompa mila, itsintlain kapolkwawitl; yese no wel mokowas tiankisko ipampa in milakameh ompa kiwika iwan kinamaka in ye tlachipawtli, in ye wahki. no iwki mokwi itech in kapol kwawitl in ihkwak ye wiksis in kapoli; intla inin mochiwa, mopaka inik mokixtilis in inakayo iwan motonalwatsa ahso se semana; satepan moihseki yese makahmo chichinawi; moihkwania, ayokmo komalko yes iwan moahwachia ika istayo atl, mokawa ma waki iwan ye mokwa in ihtik ka. in painkalko xikinmowikilih in amatlahkwiloltin. pané itech abril posoni nikmediomati. aw i mexika iweltiw se utstli unka mixiw in atlitik, kitokayotike in tlakat axolotl. nokoya ye, noyol kimati, owiwinti ye noyol, noyol kimati aw san ye no ipan in in omotenew metstli oktubre de mil 604 años, otekimakoke in nawkame chalka itenkopatsinko in tlakatl visurrei. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin
