totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. au ie unakis tonatiw nima e ik tetlakawaltia in tekwiktlatoke, inik ye tlamattinenemi; intekumpa in traitores im pipilti in kinawalpoloke altepetl, in itlanawatilwa itoka mixkowa tlailotlatekutli. in sesek tak, ta teijtikokoj. newa otimitstitlani in in amoxtli, ipampa nikihto wa motechmenekis. ¿tlen otitlahtlanik? teka noteawi onitlahtlan. aw in ikontetl kavalo kimontokatia, sanno yuh chichiwtia kimiliwtia lutotika, no iwan ikximanekwiliwtia no kistitikke no chocholotia in iw yahtia oksentetl omotenew kavalo; aw inin ikontetl kavalo ipan yatia se español, tepostlawistika kotatika moyaochichiwtia motenewa armado, ik yah kiwikak kitkitia in vamderra motenewa kiyon san wel tetepitsin, itech ikwiliwtia in iarmastsin rei, yewatl in kastilo iwan león in itlahtokatlawistsin. na yeka nikinilwi ni kwatini ma aw no iwan inik mitowa motenewa in chikome kalpoli in mexika in walake ompa astlan: aw in ikse kalpoli yopika, in ikome kalpoli tlakochkalka, in ik-ei kalpoli witsnawak, in iknawi kalpoli siwatekpaneka, in ikmakwili kalpoli chalmeka, in ikchikwasen kalpoli tlakatekpaneka, in ikchikome kalpoli iskiteka. probe den techgoal kawiliaya totlatlaulton no axan tlenon koma baya skiera. niman ipam inin xiwitl oksepa walake theopixke frai hwan de sarade nikam otlamki pleitos in sa semi omotlalike in theopixke gwardiam frai rotriges iwenewiktas. ipam inin xiwitl omotlali inin theopam nikam atlwelikam walneikwanilok ompam theowakam tiasintla nixpam newatl notoka d[on] baltesar de san hwan iwan ixpam ompa theowakam omotlali aw kampa wis otli san diego itoka fransisko gaspar aw ka wil tokayotiyaya kwetlaxwaiwan gwardiame frai nikolás de korwera. ¡namehhuan xichualcuitih, xiktemotih piokwitaxochit no san noma newatl, nech on itowa inyalwa, tlachko on katka, konitowa, konilwiya komo se kineki, se kikwiti in ikilo. ta seki kikwah in ikilo. ihwak mani ya amo tsohyak ok. tlatsopeliloni, ahnoso pilonsilo, ixkich in monekis sempwali wan yeyi nikan nestika in ikwak pew i walmokeketsaya in ilwikatitech in tlanextli in iwki mixpanitl; aw nowian owalitok in semanawak in techyawalotok, nowian onetetsawilok i tlanextli in walmokeketsaya. pobre xónas nosobrino onechmamatinenka nechmamatinenka. ¿cuix nixiwchimali, ok seppa nosalolos? tlatsopeliloni, ixkich in monekis in xiwit. in xiwit. aw niman ye ik yewatl unkan ontlatoa, onmixketsa in tekusistekatl, kito ik onkwan milpa alta omotiaya okseki mowentikes. walewa ika ompa wehkatlaltin, kename ameka, tlaskaltekas, pwebla iwan chalka. nochtin on ika ompa opanoaya sesen xiwitl ikwak oyaya noihki kimotlapalwiske mawistik teotl chalma. opanoya seki metstli febrero okseki metstli mayo iwan okseki opanoaloya ipan metstli agosto ipan sempwali iwan chikweyi. ontlalwikixtiaya ompa chalma. iwan tlen septiembre oyaya otlalwikixtiaya ilwitl san migwel. maka ok tle xik yokoka. axkan ixpantsinko in hustisia inik tsonkisa i ipatiw mochiwa in kali tlali in ye mochi ompohauli onmatlaktli pesos ik mosenpoa iseseme okikwike siwatsitsinti klara kaxtoli pesos okikwik i maria in tepiton kastoli pesos okikwike inik iyolo opachiwitiloke ipampa ka tepilwan san sempowali pesos in teopan okalak imisa inpan omomikili alonso tokatl. iwan nikitowa nikimixketsa alvaseas in ipan tlatoske in nanima pedro pinka, diego tlakokowa, fransisko garsia, domingo hernandes, migwel yaotl [f.18v.] aw nikitowa onkan ninotokas in san sebastian nikan kate testigos inik onokontlali notestamento pedro teles, fransisko ximenes tepixke tetawan. aw sano ipan in in xiwitl in kinpew in wewe motewksomatsin in tlatlawkitepeka, poliwke. in iw kimitalwitsinowa sant dionisio, "çan ya iw mokawke in iw chiwaloke in iw yokoyaloke in iw setilistika tlaka". huaxch1lmolli ika okonanakatl anmewantsitsin anmococohtzinohuah. se tahtayi kemeh elochilposon. se kinamaka plasa. in sesek. ome kali xiwitl in ipan asiko mexika. yeyi pexontok nextamal itech bote. asta oloixko kikwili. in ipa mochiwa saj. iwan nikintlatlakoltia in pedro nali iwan maria tlako kiwapawaske in ipiltsin katka hwan hosoma in ixkichika mowapawas ka nel inpiltsin yuh niktlalia inin notenawatil inik nikneltilia nikan niktlalia notoka iwan nofirma a xvi dias del mes de marso mil e kinientos e setenta años. fransisko ximenes. paso ante mi migwel hernandes eskribano. ompa ixpan on moketsa in tletl niman ye konkechkotona in solin, ikama kontlasa in tletl. in kwitlaxkolnanakatl ahnoso sesenton, kesotlatemitili o iwi in in kiwalkixtike inakayotsin onkan tekpan palasio in omotenewtsino mikkatsintli teoyotika tlahtowani don frai garsía gwerra arkobispo visurrei, inik niman umpa kimotlakololtilito inakayotsin in kalnakasko inawak san ilefonso kolegio de saminario, ka san ok konmotlamelawaltilike inik onkan nekololoto; inik niman tlanipa ohtli kimotoktilike inakayotsin inin, ik kimowikilike ka mopapatlatiake in ixkichtin teopixke nepapanme iwan tlahtoke inik kimonapalwitiake mikkatsintli. xi tochtli xiwitl, 1334. nima ye kwawnawakatl, walteyaka pechitl. ix tekpatl xiwitl, 84 años. amo xochiyowa. ix.- pregon a desiseis dias del mes de hebrero de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in tlaxilakalpan teskatsonko okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal in itlal isabel maria okitenw in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak tle okito in ixpan in testigo hwan iknotl, ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. xii tochtli xiwitl, 1270. xiii tochtli xiwitl, 1258 años. in turasnoh mochiwa kachi newín parahko, ne san hwan taihtik, ne san antonio xochitepek i nikan siudad de mexiko tenochtitlan axkan lunes a veinte i sinko dias del mes de setienbre de mil e kinientos e sesenta i kwatro años in newatl don lwis de santa maria governador por su magestad iwan tewantin alkaldes don antonio de santa maria don martin de san hwan in tiktokwitlawia hustisia audiensia. in ipan nawtsontli ommakwilpoali ommatlaktli onnawi xiwitl (ce tochtli xiwitl), tlamatini in itoka david gabriel fahrenheit kinextia totonilistamachiwaloni. amo mochipautani. kwowit wan no tsapot. aokmo senka wiyak aokmo senka wilatstik aokmo senka nowian on tlatoa aokmo nowian kinemitia aokmo san ilwistlatoa aokmo san iliwis tlatetoa. kin ik unkan tlakake in tepa in teskatlamiawal, kin unka i ye choka, kitowa “tlacaço, timexika in otechanque”. . aw intla ompa akah siwatl okitekak isiwka ika mosentlaliaya kitsaoktiwia kitlahtlatia ki miktia. nochipa kipiah tlen ipan mononotzah. pinoli, ixkich in monekis aw no ipan in in kimachiyotia in wewetke chalka in momikilike in tlahtoke omentin: in ikse itoka amiwatsin tlahtowani itskawakan, in tlahtokat kaxtoli omei xiwitl, aw in ikome itoka witsilpopokatsin tlahtowani opochwakan, in tlahtokat matlaktli onnawi xiwitl. ¡ya anentlaxiye! iuki monotsa por in ihwak chikawaya itakka tapani wan potoni in iihtik mahyá ichkat. axkana kiwalik nion se achi awtsin, tlahtoane! iwan oknosentetl in ipan aw ... kitowa iwan inka tlawa... tlei || 6r itla sentlamantli. viii akatl xiwitl, 1591. xii tekpatl xiwitl, 1348. ¿quenin quimotlatzontequilililiz? okito se karransista ¿quenin kimomagwilis noso quimocueponiliz? tlen 51 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlahtokan tlen tepantlahtoanih mosentalis iwaya tlen kiixnextiah totlalnantsin, kintlapehpeniseh eheyi xiwitl. iixkotiah se iwan se tepantlahtoani, motlalis se ipatlaka. ipan toxochimil onka se fresnokwawitl. in iuki kitokaitiah porintaki mahyáexotsitsin. in tomin san tomah pohpoliwi iwan kenin ye se tepitsin tlapatiowas amo nikneki se amo kwali nechikolistli nik chiwas. xi akatl xiwitl, 47. kani tihkwise nopa siya?" ni ayohkana kintlastlaj". aw in ipan in tlayawalolistli prosessión senka wei yankwik tetlaokolilistli hubileo onkan onkatka moknopilwi wala roma; aw niman senka miekintin in españoles in onkan okiske in omowitekke in okinokike imesso. ipan inin xiwitl tlakati in kkkp. i ye yuhki in oyake tlatilulka tlatoke intitlawa, niman ye ik intech moketsa tenochtitlan tlatoke in kintlatoltia, ye ikwak kikxitlatike in kwawtemoktsi. aw no iwan ipampa in atl ik nekwapanchichiwalok, nowian sa yewatl ipan wilowaya in kwapantli; iwan nowian in kaltechtli motsintlaltenanyoti, pitsatsitsinika otlih ipan powia ipan wilowaya. nikinkixtiiki motenewa oselotonatiw ipan mochiw tlapachiw in ilwikatl in tonatiw in ihkwak amo otlatokaya. kan nepantla tonatiw mochiwa niman tlayowaya, in onotloyowak, niman tekwaloya. aw ipan inin kinametin nemia. konitotiwi in wewetke in netlapalolis katka ma timowetsiti, iksen wetsia. kwix atle ik tonewa in iyolo tlatilulka in iw opoliwke inik inka omocacaiauhque?”. axkan hwebes teotlak ik 16 mani metstli de disiembre de 1610 años, ihkwak ye chikwasen tsilini nikan ihtik siudad mexiko ahsiko ik kalakiko aso wel kaxtolonnawi tlakatl in habón china tlaka; se pili intewkyo in kinwalwikak enbaxador intewktitlan in wei tlahtowani emperador habón. kenke para kena ne tihchiwa? ximopanolti. in ipan hunio de 1598 años, itlamian in metstli, ikwak kimokawili in itekitsin gwardián frai alonso urbano kalitik gwardián moyetstikatka, aw in konmopatili itoka frai hwan de salas; aw in frai alonso urbano mowikak wertas sant kosme. nikan ipan in neske in mexitin in onkan chapoltepek in weimakko, ye yuh chikwasen xiwitl tlahtokati in malatsin kolwakan tlahtowani. aw niman kimitalwi "ma nikchiwa ma nikyokoya in ilwikatl in tlaltikpaktli". wan amo kanah kintakawiliah rikos paratakwaskeh nopilwan. ka i yewantin in in kinwalkixti in kenin kinwalwikak tetsawteotl mexitin, aw ka yuhki in in omochiw: ka i yewantin in onkan wel chanchiwtikate i wel maltepeitotikate in onkan tlahtokati in onkan in astlan chikomostok i wel yewantin asteka || 21v chikomostoka, in onkan wei sentlahtoani mochiwtikatka itoka motewksoma in kinsenpachowaya asteka iwan in nepapan tlaka. talkwechaktsin, in totonik. yewatl in kinmaka in omotenew in intech powi nawalostomeka in amanepaniwki iwan tlasomaxtlatl yakawiak. aw in omochiw yaoyotl yewatl kapitá markés kiwikas kastila, iwan tenochka i wikoskia. aw inin omotenewke mimikke, inik tlatsontekililoke hustisiatika mochintin xexeloloskia inik innakayo miixtlapanaskia, umpa onmopipiloskia mochi in ipan iski wewei ohtli ochpantli walkalaki mexiko. san niman ikwak in ipan semilwitl in omito tlakpak in metstli iwan xiwitl ixpantsinko in señor hwes governador iwa newatl eskribano fransisko lyíaldonado in tekpoyotl diego astaxochitl otsatsik in nikan tekpa iwan in ipan tlaxilakali wewekalko okitekakiti inik monamaka in kali in ipan axkan semilwitl mochiwas remate in akin achi miek ki[m]anas tomines sa niman makos in kali. ¡tla ok tonkwikakan! ken o kenin nitlanamakas tlahko kwarto pitsochiyawisotl ewah koyome. chikwasen soltin nikan ipan in kinpewke tolokan tlaka matlatsinka, yewatl tepew in tlahtowani axayakatsin. . kimmopatilotiaya in iw moxima tsinakantlan tlaka, mosimatekaxima iwan mopiochotia iwan mochontalxima san no yuh moximaya in puchteka kintlaehekalwiya; fecho en mexiko a xxix dias del mes de marso de mil e kinientos e sinkwenta i sinko años. don estevan de gusman, [rúbrica] migwel dias alkalde, [rúbrica] alonso migwel alkalde de su magestad, [rúbrica] por mandado del señor hwes i los alkaldes, martin pauper, [rúbrica] ipanpa ana nensioatl ik ochikawalok in iwewetlal in onka tsokipan. aw i nikan tetlatiloyan napowali no kikwis in hernanto iknoxochitl oksekin sakatl ok onpowalo aso wel kichiwas ye kimatin aw in tola napowali chinamitl senpowali petlawatok nikmakatiw i nonamik. —a primerito yehwan onechinyektaro saniman okpa otiahke kilwia kilwike in dóktor inikompadre ahmo itla nihpia nokonew san tonewantoton in lisiana kitowa' nene' kilwian dóktor le disen al doktor no tiene familia mi komadrita.. .nomas va a buskar sus sentavos para vienes... pero axkana kikwah motewanyolkeh ixtlawapan nemih. aw in nikan tenochtitlan inik tlamiko atenamitl iwan in otlih tlamelawa atlixokan ye itlamian in metstli de disiembre in ipan xiwitl omotenew. . in ikwak kampa tlakamacho in kowanotsalo in ik onoke tekpantoke tlayawalotoke sentlapal inkal mayetika in puchteka tlahtoke aw no sentlapal inkal mayetika in nawalostomeka in yaopan teyawaloni san tlatsaoktoke tekpantoke in telpupuchtin. amo mochipautani. x akatl xiwitl, 1307. in ihkwak in inik onkan ahsiko inik onkan motlaliko tisatepek in omotenewke wewetke teotenanka kwixkoka temimilolka iwipaneka teochichimeka, onkan onewake in tisatepek inik niman ye onwi ye onkalaki in tlawak in axkan ye mihtoa kwitlawak; onkan konmasewato in chinantsintli ontlatsonilpito, yewatl teyakantia in omotenew tlahtowani totoltekatl tsompachtli tlailotlaktewktli. san inmak kitetekatiake in imarkabos, iwan no sesen lansas inmak kiwikakaya, san tlalpan kiwilantiake amo wel kakokwia; aw inin omotenewke soldadostin ome in invamderra in inkwachpan kiwikake, san tlalpan tlaltitech kiwiwilantiake amono wel kakokwia. techmakake se boteya techmakake onkán yotiwalahke. xi kali xiwitl, 1165. in tekoseh noyan onkak. mochiwa tekespan, mochiwa saj. miak onkak. aw ka sano yewatl ika in chalko inik omoknoittowaya tlahtoke mexiko, aw san ik kwalanke in chalko tlahtoke inik kintekitlalwito, aw ka yehika ipampa ka ayemo itepewalpan in mexikatl tenochkatl, ka san ok ikowapan katka. ilwikak yati. para kwali moxiyo ahkokwis ahmo mihtos ahwele in tomaktik impakiotl wan nosonxiyotl wan pikawak in ilo ahweli tomawak xixiyomama wan ahweli motlapos para n kwak moxiyoahkokwi. xihmakawati". ma kin onia in amopilwa, kano ye miktla tekpanekatl ye akasitli; amopan tsopis yauyotl, topa milinis in tlachinoli oooowayé. aw in tlalkowki yoan in tlalnamaka in ontlamanixtin nikimiximati yoan nikan chaneke in ipan in tlatilulko santiago. in ipan in xiwitl sa ye onkan onok in kwawitsatsin in ikpak amakeme inewan in isiwaw in itoka silkwetsin siwapili iwan in imichpochtsin in itoka xiwtostsin. ika nehon inik sa ye no ye ik yaw wisnawak tiachkaw toweyo in kikwis in tlatoli. ompa momochko yexpa xiwitl owilaloya newentilos itlawtsinko in toteotatsin itokatsin chalma. inintsin mawistik teotl okonmotlasokamachililiaya ipampa tlaka mokokoa, siwatl noso pipiltsitsintin. san ika okimotenewiliaya osewiwaloya. ipampa on wel miak tlakatl okimaxilike ika devosión. iwan ika on yexpa tlaka xiwitl oanaloya. seki tlakatl omowentiaya kandelerotin; seki tlakatl okixihkimiloaya achi miak xochitl. onkwan on asiske ompa chalma kimotlapalwiske teotl kimotlaliliske, kimopatililiske xochitl inon yewahke iwan kitlaliske inon selik ixitlantsinko in toteotatsin. nochtlakatl okwikaya saso tlein ompa ixitlantsinko, noihki sirios. ye on oyaya mowentiske. in kwakwawsi kiwalitkitia in kalpixkantli xochikalko, in kalpixki itoka maniatsi. aw no ipan in in sekintin kitowa in kwalok tonatiw. nima ye ik kiwika in imalwa, ikawakatiwi in tlapewia, yqu ipan kisako masatl akatitla nenemi. "kena, pero na axnimokawas nirei tlakonanki yahki. inin testigo ka otlatlanilok kwix kimati kwix ixpan inik netlalmakok konitowa testigo san ixkich nikitowa in ikwak netlalmakok tikwalwikake in atokoktsin katka kiwalantikiske in tetewkti moyoteka sant pablo tlaka san sebastian tlaka santa maria tlaka inik kimomakako tlali mili. niantlen para mochiw kwawpahsoli ahkweli walpani. solin istayutl motawan tlakwaloyan cateh. ye mota sente sitlali. kikwih para kwakwounakat, kitaliah in chilposon. no kwaltia ihwak tekokoh se iihtik, mah se kimana wan mah se tayi. yoltepitstik inik vi nikitowa onkatki nofresada ontetl nikmaka in nokonew itoka maria kimokentis. axkan ipan semilwitl viernes a dies a dias del mes de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años ik matlaktlose tonatiw inik tsatsiwa kali in ikal mariana in onkan mani tlaxilakalpan teokaltitlan okitenyoti in iski ik patiyowa aso aka kineki kimokowis makitta testigo hwachin kano. . aw in telpuchnemi wel ixkichtin kinsentlalia in ilamatke in iwanyolke in siwatsitsintin in iiawian. yewa chanko yowalpa ya ipan in in ikwak ipan metstli in ik xxii mani hulius ipan ilwitsin sankta maría magdalena ikwak asiko in aotli sant hwan. in oyuh omik kwakwawsi walmotlali in ipiltsi tlakateutsi. aw inik tlamiko metstli agosto senka chikawak in manka kiyawitl, inik senka tlaapacho mexiko. techwikake onkan yoniwala' satepan yotiwalahke de yotitlakwato chan padrino onkán pus yeka. —onkán tiwalmikak akmo timehkuno. in ikwak nimikis nikneki ho[n]pa motokas in iglesia san sebastian teopan. [al margen iskierdo omonek omochiw]. xochiyowa itech marso wan abril kipiya itakka. aw in axkan ik 5 mani metstli noviembre de 1607 años, ikwak ye no nikwel okinmonawatili in visurrei in nawkame chalka inik ompa kwawtekiske kwawkixtiske in kwawtla kwawtemowiske, yewatl kinmotekitili in kwamimili in motenewa morrilos. xmechmomakili in plantano. ma nitetlamakati ne atitla. . (chicomolotzin) xa ya meva xi misotia a ka tonan ti tech iknokavaski ti ya via mochan tlalokan . niman ye ompa in imaopuchkopa tlali mihtowaya witsnawaka tlali no nawpa in kontlasa iyesso. inin tlamachtil okachi ihiwiantik keh in oksente. istatl, ixkich in monekis aw inin tetsawitl witsilopochtli okinots in inteyakankaw in intepachokaw in inkwawtlahtokaw in asteka, in onkan katka onoya in ipan in itik wei altepetl siudad astlan; in kwawtlahto itoka istakmixkowatsin. aw in ihkwak i ye wel immah i ye walewaske, senka wel ok tlawiskalpan tlaixkwekwetsiwi tlatlawilotl, yewa eilwitl itlawiskalpan in kintsatsilito tototl itoka witsitsilkwikwitskatl, iwan yeyowal in kinnots in kintsatsilito mexitin, kihtowaya inik tlahtowaya tototl: "ma tiwian, e kwal- || 23v -can e immah, e tlatwis ye tonas, witsilé, witsilé, witsileletlé!". in nikan mexiko siudad a nweve dias del mes de abril de mil kinientos noventa i dos años in diego astaxochitl tekpoyotl onkan otsatsito in ipan tlaxilakali kwepopan okito aso aka kineki kimokowis kali monamaka onpa mani teokaltitlan nawtemani akokalo se tlakatl español kitema makwilpowali pesos ayak otlanankili testigo antonio peres. innamakoyan moneki mokowas: tsoka, kafen, istatl, tlawewelik, tsopelkalata iwan kilitl, yekchiawa, atikchiawa, kwakwaxotlali, okse, okse. teh titechtamaka, no siwaiknin xochitla ka ika notata 29. aw in tlein owi mixpan mihtos, muchiwas, ahmo niman tikihtos, ahmo niman tiktenewas, tikpantlasas. intlanel aka mitsilwis in tiknextis, in tikihtos, ahnoso aka mitstlatlanis in ipampa mixpan omihto, omochiw, .ahmo tikilwis, ahmo tiknextilis, intlakamo ak kimati. ¿cuix yuhkin tixilotl, timiyawatl, tikwitlatsayanalos? ¿cuix mihtik tlachiaske ka yuhkin topeo, petlakalko, immihtik, immokwitlaxkolko ka wel ilpitok, ka wel tsawktok? keh ixtlawapa itata iwan pewa kixmati nochi xinachtli, xihuimeh, cuameh, iwan nochi tlen ipan itlal itata momaka. tlahkoxuxumalton orégano aw in onkan tlatowa in pedro masaken ihoa ines tiakapan ka amo itlatwayan san kelewisneki ipanpa naokak tlakatl inin testigos konitwa ka ye ixkich nikmati inik amo nistlakati nomatika niktlalia nofirma. thomas de akino. notata nochi in kali ye oki. tlakewi. milah amo kikawah por ké weyia wan tatampawia. notemakixtihkatsin hesukristo, mahtaktiomeyi mil ángeles patriarkas, nikan ipan in in sekintin wewetke kimachiyotia in omikiko i weimak tlahtowani tulam, in tlahtokat senpowalonkaxtoli ipan onxiwitl; no ipan in onkan walmotlatokatlali in topiltsin akxitl ketsalkowatl in tulam, in ihkwak in ye iw senpowalonchikwei xiwitl onkan || 18v monemiltia tulam in ketsalkowatl. xiii tochtli xiwitl, 1414. nima ye ik kikwawtentoka; in oasik chalko nima ye ik tepewa, unkan tlawawa in timal. iuki kitokaitiah por in tohmiyoh nochin in xokoyolin. in ahkin iaxka in temaskali kitemaka tlakwali alos-moli, ayohwachmoli, yemoli, kemmanian tlemoli ika yeta-mali ahnoso awaxtamali. kemmanian no motemaka in tepachnewktli. aw no ikwak kinpewke akatlan tlaka. xx pregon.- a kwatro dias del mes de mayo de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in tlaxilakalpan kopolko okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal in itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak tlanankili testigo migwel hernandes. ante mí fransisko maldonado eskrivano. aw in ikwak okimokakilti omotlanawatili ma ok keskilwitl mochie tlatoli aso aka itla kitokiw aw in tla ayak walas niman isiwka makos karta de venta iwan posesion in lwis savalos ipampa ka okiten in tomines matlakpowali yuh omotlanawatili ik okimotlalili in itokatsin iwan in ifirmatsin fecho en mexiko ut supra. antonio valeriano pasó ante mí migwel monise eskrivano. xiii akatl xiwitl, 1427. aw tenanko mochiw in atenko; ik niman onkan moteokaltika, onkan kiweilika in ikal in kimoteotiaya tenanka nawyotewktli in xipil. onkak ome taman. nochi iuki in monotsa, sayoh ome kolor: xoxowianipawa wan tiltianipawa. sesen aw inik nikmati inik amo sa nistlakati ka no honpa nitlalchiwaya in kalpolalpan aw mochipa onkan nopan kisaya in atlixeliwki iwik kitkitiw inik okipetlaw in tlali in axkan ipan moteilwia in itoka maria aw ka neli ipiltsin in axkan moteilwia iskich in nikitowa notlatol nikan nomatika niketsa krus. paso ante mi migwel de los angeles eskribano. ¡xitlakonana! ta ximokawa tirei. ¡maya nikintoka in intepilwan, maya nikimonitkili toxochiw! —ome kokwehti tikimpia' kineki in edmundo mačtikinkunamakiltiske tikuna makiltiske tle. in ihkwak in oyuh se xiwitl onkan kate in tekpayokan in mexika asteka. tiwalpanu:ke méxiko para teskoko. ¡ma san moketsakan,nikniwan! aw niman in ixpantsinko wikos in akin texixikos in kimopielia hustisia san ik notlachikawililia hustisia inik nitlanawatil oninochiw axkan mierkoles a tres dias del mes de marso d[e] 1563 años. fransisko ximenes algwasil mayor bartolome rocho algwasil paso ante mi migwel de los angeles eskrivano. aw sano ipan in in xiwitl in pewaloke in akolwake in tetskoka; aw masiwi in pewaloke, ka san chikwe oras in onmanka yaoyotl inik sew, san tlakwalispan || 94v in walkalakke mexiko in tetskoka, aw san yewatl kichiw in nesawalkoyotsin inik pewaloke tetskoka. amo onkak miak kwouxiwit por ké kampa ihkak ome, oso eyi, kitatatsiuiaj, yehwan tein ahko mauiltiaj, yehwan kilwiah santos ankelos. in nanakat ome taman: wehweyi wan tsikitsitsin. nehoatl don kristoval de gusman governador por su magestad ihoan alkaldesme inikan siudad de mexiko tenochtitlan nikan tixpan owalake nikan ka itoka diego yaotl inamik isabel tlako yaotlika okatka w in axkan kimokowia kali onpa mani in pochtlan amanalko. aw inik otlamiko inik otsonkis pleito, in hustisia ka okinmakak in tlali masewaltin inik mochipa kipiaske onkan ipan moketsinotikas in sankta krus, ayak akin wel onkan kinkixtilis. . in on tlatlak niman ye ik tlatataka in san no onkan itwalnepantla onkan kisentoka in kalitik otlatlak amanextli san kisololowa amo no ye in tleko nextli. testigosme imixpan omochiw in onkan chaneke tlaxilakaleke iwan algwasil hwan martin diego astaxochitl yewantin otlatamachiuke iwan okitetsotsonke in estakas iwan españoltin hwan de kastilo bartolomé de la werta. nepaka in kwaxiloxiwitl yeyi metro weyak ki pia. mah mochiwa wehweyi elot. aw no niman onyake onasike in mexika in kinmiktiskia in tlahtoke, aw sa ontlatlachiyato oyake in tlahtoke chalka aokake. nikawín mochiwa miak. amo se kichipawa. walkisa tonatiw in techpewke, in iksen nawi altepetl chalko amakemekan, tlalmanalko, tenanko, xochmilko chimalwakan. toyoliatsin? is sahso keski tlamantli in ixkich omito in tlamas, in tekwawkatis in telpuchiyakatis in yaumikis in motlakamatis in tekowas in kwikwikas in tealtis in tetlaximas in mokechmekanis in atlan mikis in ilakilos. iiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1288. ik okimistlakamatke, okihtoke sekintin españolesme "ca san istlakati, in tlein kimomachistia?, aso san otlawanke, aso san imiwinkakopa in tlein okihtoke tlamatinime in astrólogos in tlein mochiwaskia; axkan in imma ipan otlatenewke, ka amo mochiwa". aw sanno iw kichiwke in ompa la kompañía de hesús in teatinos, iwan no kiyawak kiwalaske kikixtike kinokike in atl in kalitik katka, no iwan in tlalpantli kakokke kiwekapanoke. san rafael, nawakatl xiwitl i kontsinti teukali tenochtitla. tlein kimakaw wee, tle ikokokaw in tlamakaski axolowa? ye tisaatl imanka choka iyolio kan poliwis imasewal aiyo. tokwitlapan wits sente kalmimiloli. aw ik niman onkan maxitiko in la siudad de los ángeles de la pwebla kwitlaxkowapa, ye yowa, sanno mochtakakalakiko in onkan inik niman mosewitsinoko ichan obispo don || 229 alonso de la mota i eskobar; kin yewatl in onkan kimoteochiwili, onkan kimomakili in teoyotika itlahtokayotsin inik arsobispo muchiwtsino, san kalihtik ichan in omotenew obispo, ipan ilwitsin exaltasión sankta krus, ka sábado ipan motlali in ik 14 mani metstli omotenew setiembre, in teochiwalok. in amo monamaka. na nimexikano". oksé tonali biernes a las dose mihkwania nxochitl istak motlalian xochitl chichiltik para tlakwaltekiltoton. aw in ye oyuh kimonmamatekke, ik niman piloloke yewatl itech in omotenew tlayoloko tlanepantla mani ye wekaw tepilolkwawitl in onkan tekpan kiyawak; iwan xexeloloke in innakayo, iwan in intsonteko kinkokotonilike aw onkan ikpak in omotenew tepilolkwawitl kintlalike, iwan in inmakpakpal kintetekilike onkan itlan iwan tepilolkwawtitech tepostika kitetetsotsonke. makwili xumali pitsochiyawisotl x kali xiwitl, 1073. temilotsin ikwik ipan inin ikpali ximotlalihtsino. in ikwak totekwiyo dios in achtopa itlakamo walewa yewatsin itechpatsinko in tlachiwalistli, aw onkan in ik peowak wala in owikan in ipa semanawatl, i ye kimonochilia in totekwiyo dios in ipa in itsitsinpewkapa in ixkich in kexkich tlamantli in tlei mochiwa. aw in sant augustín in ihtik teopankali atle molon in atl, san kwalkan katka, ipampa senka kiwekapanoke inik kitlaltenke in ye nepa onxiwitl ipan tlakoxiwitl in ikwak no tlaapachiwka mexiko. inik ye kinamaka in iewantin pedro hernandes iwan inamik maria barbola iwan itex hwan peres kwix wel in axkan in tlatki niman otlanankilike in tlaxilakaleke okitoke ka wel melaoak inik titlanankilia ka imaxka ka intlatki ka ayak ma aka kitlailewia ka nel in tlanekilistika inik kinamaka. xochimilan piltsitsintin kita keh se yektlalpan. aw in chalko amakemekan tlahtoke in toyaotsin chichimekatewktli in iwan kakamatsin teowatewktli in onmotlalito in intlahtokayopan, niman ye mononotsa in akin tlahtokatis in tsakwaltitlan tenanko iwan tekwanipan iwan panowayan iwan in atlawtlan in iskikan in; aw in omononotske in okinpepenke in akike tlahtokatiske onkan in ipan omotenew iskialtepetl amakemekan, aw ik niman kinwaltitlanke i nikan mexiko in ixpa tlahtowani awitsotsin; aw ye onnesis in intoka. inin tlakamiktilistli nauhilwiti ko. ye ixpan kontekilia ye tanatitia. xikipilko onkan okimetswitek se otomitl, itoka tlilatl. ipa sayoh se taman. viii akatl xiwitl, 1331. nima ye ik mikali, ik unka much tlamake i mexika, aka ome aka yei kasik. in ik kichiwa itekiw: in teiyemaka imayawkampa in kitki in yetl in ik kitsitskia onkan inepantla pepecholo amo ipan in akatl. in xolopitli toltekatl: tlailiwiswiani, mokakayawani, tlaixpachoani, iixko kisani, tlailawiswa, teka mokaya, ichteki. nikan ipan in in tlakat in tepiltsin in itoka nawyotsin in onkan kulwakan tlahtokapili, in satepan intlahtokaw yankwikan mochiw in kulwake, in iw niman ye onnesitiw; aw in ayayak inpilo katka kulwake senpowalonmakwili xiwitl ahnoso senpowalonchikwasen xiwitl. poko onkak. . aw in kwachtli niman ik mokowa in tlahtokatilmahtli iwitika tetekomayo iwan xawalkwawyo tilmahtli iwan iwitika tenewawanki iwan tlahtokamaxtlatl yakawiak iwan tlamachkweitl tlamakwipili. kiwikaltia amapatlachtli kitototikak ketsalyakawitstli, chichilikpatika in ki kwikwitlalpiaya in konakiaya innakasko. mochiwa kampa weli saj, amo okachi. ka mochipa kichiwa iwan kayak ma kimotlaltia ka wel intlal innemak in intawan kakin ikwak kikawke in apachiw axkan ye onxiwitl ye no kwele kichiwa in itoka migwel de los angeles amo nikmati in aso kimokowi. aw in oyuh walnawatiloke, ik niman iwikpatsinko visurrei kinmowikili in padre frai augustín del spíritu sankto in omotenewke hwan morales iwan in oksekintin inik yewatsin visurrei don diego fernándes de kórdova markés de gwada kimitlanililike, iwelitsin lisensia kinmomakili inik wel kiketsaske sankta krus in onkan ipan omotenew ohtli, inik kimixnamikia omotenew siwatl. xiktotoka se lado mah yowi, ¿ kanelpa tonyaske amo mikowa? ik michoka, noyoliol ximelakwawa, ayak nikan nemis. san kakawaxochitika, tlapapawitiwitse, ye onkan in xochiahawiya aitek. sayoh in limah imahtsakalwan mopampilowa. kwaltia in pahti kwaltia para tempalan, se mokampaka ika iayo. aw yewatl onkan walteyakanaya in wei teopixki tlamakaski witsiltsin tlasiwki, wel yewatl in kimottitiaya kitlakanotsaya in diablo; in seppa walwia in kiwalittaya in akxoyatl, sa sesenmantok in akin kiwalsesenmanaya. aw in oya maxtlaton, niman ik walkalakke in tepaneka koyowake in mexiko, kitoke "ma tikinmiltikan ma tikinkaltikan in mexika". iuki kitokaitiah tak por in makwil in imatsitsin. aka sentetl siwakali in itepots nanmatl aw in inakas yematl inik ontetl in kali in itepots omatl ipan senmitl in inakas onmatl ipan senyolotli. aw nikitowa momakaske kwinanime vii tomi in anoso okitla monekis ik mochi i notech monekis v pesos aw ome pesos nikwenchiwa i santiago ixpantsinko i sakramento. q.n. in notew seki tlatlakotian in mochiwa in itonakayow aw in tlein tlakotian achto muchiva muchi tlakatl achto mits valma ka aw in ikwak ye omochiw muchi ok sepa n omuchi tlakatl mits valmaka in motonacayuh. tlahkoxonakatl ka mokichnenekia in mokiwixtli tlatowani tlatilolko, inewan in itoka tekonal; intlakamo yewatl kwakwawtsin in inpan tlato ka wel popoliwiskia. aw atle kihtotiwi in wewetke kwix yewatl ipampa in yniqu itokayokan chalchiwtepek in onkan motlaliko akxoteka, inik okimotokayotike chalka; amo melawak momati. yewa ikampa kwawitl ornotlatihtaya. se mamahpikton yepasohtli itech mar, yakmo yahkweli walpanoya mono wal kahsitaya para kahsis in imaman kikwas ikonew. ik niman kimilwike "acameque, kampa owawalake in nikan owamotlaliko? tamechmiktiko, nikan tamechmiminaske, otechwaliwake in tlahtoke in chichimeka, otlamachiyotilok otlatsonilpilok. . aw amo sanioke in kim om pewaya in kim on ihkalia san wel kim on ololwiaya in ye ixkich anawakatl. in ik kim on ihkalia in onkan tsaoktimanka kwawtenanko. aw no ikwak moman in yankwik retablo. ah san ninetlamata, nikitowamaka niya ompa ximowayan. tohwanti ya tijkuaj. yewa semi tekitki. tihchihtok ne notlake", kenihki kiilwia. nima ye ik onewa nextikpak, unkan kitlalia intlalmomos inik ye unka kitlatlatia intana inchikiw; unka motlatlatlatilike matlaktlomei aka xiwitl ika. nama ya niwalahki", ihkino kiilwi. iiii akatl xiwitl, 1067. tla xokomotili iwi on inik nikan tipopoliwiske iwan yewatsin teotl markés iwan tewatsin, nochpochtsén malitziné”. aw yekene in ikontlamantli in onkan inik otlatokamakako okitokayotiko in imonoyan tamoanchan; kitosneki "ye onkan in wel neli tochan in nemilisawiyakatlalpan paraiso terrenal". aw in tlahtowani walmochiwtia in kinwalyakan itoka hekatsintewktli chichimekatewktli tlakitskaliwki, yewatl in kinwalpachotia in wewetke chichimeka totolimpaneka. ¿quentiquita, tlanakis in texohtliltik? iwan ipan in i sekintin kitowa in walkiske chikomostok in mexika inik motlaliko onkan. in kahfentet se kitekwatsa komalko, se kikwechowa wan in kahfentatix se kitalilia itech at tein molontok wan ¡maj se tayi ya! se kinamaka kampa kikowah kahfen kwesalan. in mochiwa komo se kitoka kaltsintan. aw in omotlakowi senka kimotlachikawililia in ikatsinko su magestad ye kimomakilia karta de venta konpies in okixkichika nemiske iwan in ipilwan inik mochipa semikak intech powis in tlalmantli aw in tla aka texixikolistika konkwilisnekis in itlalkowal kimotlalilia pena ilpilos in karsel ik tlatsakwiltilos in ika melawak hustisia. aw in hwan diego in oiwkitehittitih in kanin kimonawatilih in ilwikak siwapili moketsas iteokaltsin, niman ik tehnawatih in ok onahsisneki in ichan, inik konittatiw in itlahtsin hwan bernardino in welanawtok in ikwak kiwalkawtewak semeh kinotsaskia teopixkeh in onkan tlatelolko inik kiyolkwitiskia, kisenkauhaskia, in kimolwilih ilwikak siwapili in ye opahtik. aw ahmo san isel kikawkeh yas, ka kiwikkakkeh in ompa in ichan; aw in oiuhahsitoh kittakkeh in itlahtsin ye wel paktika, niman ahtle kikokoa; aw in yewatl senka kimawisoh in kenin in imach walwikko, iwan senka mawistililo. kitiatlanih in imach tleika in iwki chiuhalo in senka mawistililo. aw in yewatl kilwih in kenin ikwak ompa walewak in kinochililiskia teopixki in kiyolkwitis, kisenkauhas, in onkan tepeyakak kimottilitsinoh in ilwikak siwapili, aw kimotitlani in ompa mexikko in kittatiw nehin kiawat. notew achalchiwmama in sesek. okito in testigo inin ka wel melaoak inik onokonan huramento inik onitlatolmelaw in yeninemi tlaltikpak ik umpoal xiwitl onkaxtoli aw inik nikneltilia notlatol nikan niktlalia notoka yoan nofirma don gaspar de mendosa migwel de san pedro nixpan fransisko milan eskribano. ihkwak tlakati in konechichitoton san wel kwekwetsorne awiltsonkwitlatike san rnawiltihtinemi ihkwak yopanoke kaxtoli anoso sempoali tonali in otlakatke ye mokechkwakwa ye pewa tlawahwaloa entonses yeka yuwalpanok. inik ye mochi tlakatl walkis in inchachan inik mokaltsakka in momalwiaya; españolesme iwan sekintin timasewaltin ye nowian nenemowa in ohtlipan ik mexiko. matlaktlose tekpatl atle mochiw. kenin mochiwa wan nopa ika ocho días noha xochiyowa itech metsti agosto. itlanahnamik: ka in ihkwak ayemo tiwalasi in ipan in viernes ka achtopa kihtoke tenemachtike in yewantin tlamatinime in españolesme, in wel kimati in ilwikatitech tlamatini in motenewa astrólogos, kihtoke "ca in ipan viernes tasiske in ik 10 manis metstli hunio mixtlapachos in tonatiw, tlayowas; matlaktlonse tsilini pewas tlakosawias inik tlayowatias, aw ipan ome tsilini tlamitiw, inik okseppa tlanesitiw in ye teotlak. aw senka ixmixnamiktsinoke; niman onmopewaltike in kastilan sant fransisko teopixke moteilwitsinoto, aokmo welitike. niyahti niyahti aw in ikwak yuh kimokakiltike pipilti iwan alkalde niman motlanawatili yuh kimitalwike ok kimokakiltis in tlakatl tiktononochiliske ka itetsinko katki yewatl kimochiwilis ka san ok tikittako. pero rei ya asta momakakapatsa wan ika isiwa in ipan viernes sankto, ipan xx de marso de 1598 años, in sant pablo tlaka ikwak kimonextilike in totekwiyo dios in motenewa de nwestra señora de la soledad; ikwak konpewaltike inik yankwikan tlayawaloke ipan 3 hora teotlak, itenkopatsinko i maestro doktok don hwan de servantes arsediano mexiko iwan governador ikatsinko in teoyotika tlahtowani don alonso fernándes de bonila arsobispo mexiko. amo xitayokoya, . in kampa kaiakia ostomekatiske kitkitiwi in intopil, aw in amatl itech powiya tlanautsontektli oltika tlapeyawali. nawipwali onemik wehweyi michime. kinekih kiixmatise kani eltok nopa xinachtli. ne ika tlanipeka noha yawi. newa onikilwi ka amo. kampa eski mochiwa. amo se kitoka. tlahkwiloa itomamaloyan kaxtiltlahtokayotl in itawkayo diego veláskes de silva. . yewatl iwiak ketsali iwan totokwitlapiltik ketsali iwan chilchotik ketsali iwan xiwtototl iwan tsinitskan. in ikseppa kilpike ipan in inteyakankaw in inkwawtlahtokaw tlamakaski witsilopuchtli inteopixkatlahtokaw walmochiwtia ahnoso mochiwtiwits; in ihkwak in ye iw nepa yekwel ixkichika ye senpowalonchikwei xiwitl ompa walkiske in inchan astlan mexitin, in ihkwak in ye iw nepa senpowalxiwitl tlahtokati in itoka kwawtexpetlatsin in nikan kulwakan itstapalapan inawak. || in kilit. aw in okonmonamikiliko sakramento, niman ik kimoyakanili inik kimokalakilito ichantsinko in onkan yankwik teopan la kassa proffessa motenewa, inik inewantsin onkan kimopieliske yankwik teopankali inik axkan ye mitowa sant ignasio in teopan. tla timonekitia man pohpoliwi in asido úriko, achtopa moneki ayokmo timokwaltis nochi inon tlen miak asido úriko kichiwa, keh nakatl, pantsin iwan totoltetl. ximiti miak limonayotl, iwan sekin xiwipahtlaposon keh sarsaparrila iwan oksekin, iwan san tepitsin semana timotilis tlen kwali. noihki temachtikawan okinmilwiaya nankitlasotlaske namotatsitsiwan ipampa yewan motekipachoske ikan namechtitlaniske tlamachticalco. ihki on otechnonotsaya inspektor; onkwan on toyolo oasia nochi tlen itlatol otechnonotsaya. nasareno, aw in tlalan onok, aw in tla kenmanian aka kitlatolwis in ye ompa titstiwi ka ninotsalos niknankilis in tlatoli ipan nitlapopolos niktsonkixtis aw in tlakamo yuh nikchiwas ka san nimitskwepilis in motomines in xxx peso in otinechmakak iwan mochi kostas iwan in ixkich ik otitlachichiw in onkan kali. ayatlami in itlatol in tesosomoktli. ¿aquin kaxtilantlahtowa? nomaiknin. amén. aw inin intlahtolo teotenanka nikan nesi motta, ka senka miekxiwtike in onkan teotenanko kwixkok temimilolko iwipan, ka okittake in topiltsin akxitl ketsalkowatl ka ihkwak onkan okatka in tulan, inik okinyaochiw okinahnamikke no yaoyotika in teotenanka, inik amo wel okinchiw okinpolo. unkan ipan temok in kwawtli, ikpak moketsako xakali in inteukal yuhki xakaltapasoli i kitlaliko, ikpak i moketsako kwawtli. aw in la kompañía de hesús ye kin satepan domingo in motlapo teopankali, ipan ilwitsin katka in ichpochtli sankta úrsula; ka sa tsawktikatka inik ye no yewantsitsin teopixke omotlayekchichiwilike in tlalpantli || 60 okimakokwilike, inik no senka tentimanka atl teopan. in totonik. i lwego uno delos aparesió a los pastores, ke estavan velando sobre su grei, kabe una torre ke se lamava héder, donde hakob avía apasentado sus ovehas, komo una mila de belén hasia el oriente, i les dio la regosihada nweva de la venida del salvador del mundo, i del lugar en ke avía nasido i donde le halarían, i las señas para konoserle. tlan inkinekih imohwanti innechpalewise ipan in in yankwik xiwitl ipan ipan yankwik metstli henero, ikwak makoke in alkaldeyotl in don diego lwis de motewksoma atsakwalko chane; inin ipiltsin in tlakatl in ompa omomikilito españa don diego lwis de motewksoma iwitltemoktsin. tlen 132 tlanahautikayotl. in chikawak calmeh, in nechicolcalmeh, in kweskomalmeh iwan sekinok tlamantli axtlachiwali tlapialmeh tlen kiixtlaltos tlanawatikayotl tlen sennechikolistli tlen tlapalewis ipan altepechantli, kikwilis tlanawatili tlen chikawalmeh sentlanawatilmeh ken moixtlalis ipan tlanawatili tlen kiixnextis tlahtokan tlen sennechikolistli; tlen teipan tlakowas ipan mexikatl tlaltipaktli tlen se tlaltlanawatili, monekis makikwalmati tlanawatil tekichiwani tlen itechpowi. "kena titlachiliah para kena timokweowah mosentiliyayah wan kena isiwa. aw ipan in in xiwitl in momikiliko itstlotsin tlailotlaktewktli tlahtowani katka tsakwaltitlan tenanko amakemekan, in tlahtokat epowalxihutl ipan matlakxiwitl; aw omentin in kinkawtia ipilwan: in ikse itoka wewe chimalpahintsin, in ikome itoka kwawtlewanitsin. in tlamatini, komo se totonia se kimana ixiuyo wan ika yon at se maltia. el lisensiado pedro swáres de molina 8 ik senka onemawtilok in nikan siudad mexiko; inik san niman imostlayok ipan miérkoles matlaktlonse tsilini tlahka in onpewke tiyakawan soldadostin ahsonpowalonmatlaktin, san mochintin palasio nemi, in oyahke tlapiaske weyatenko akapulko iwan ompa kichiaske in omotenew la china akali inik asikiw. chalka teyaoyawaloke chapoltepek. xinechmolwili tleka amo owala. ¿at ya nech mikitlani? inimikise". nikawín amo mochiwa miak. aw in motekusoma tlaketsaltitlan motlastika kecholikpali in ipan ka oseloewatl in ipepech yetika. a ipa netlalilo piltsintli kosolkonok yekawalok yewa ankaso neli kiwetskilia tesosomoktli; kwakwapitsawak iyao kana yani, etc”. aw in ihkwak walolinke inik onkan chikomostok walewake inik nikan walake, ka nowian kwawtla tepetla atlawtla teokontla xiwalakatla tsiwaktla nekwametla sakatla kwilotla ixtlawakan. iuki monotsa por in xokok in itakka. tlahko kilo xitomatl oya yeva vel mamavia q.n. san ok momamawtiaya in ayamo mochiva yawyutl. aw in akin ye miekpa iloti ye miekpa mokwepa in ye on itstika in iwkan inentla inemia in owikan in temamawkan in tlaihiyowilistitlan, san kexkich in kilwia sa ye ekawki sa ixxeekawki sa tlayeekoli sa tlawelittali sa tamachiwki sa tlakwalittali sa ipan kwali sa ipan tlawelittali sa ipan tlayekoli. nikilwia mano' tokniw nesi ma kikaki. onkateh nochi in tlapali, noso okachi miaktin chihiltikeh iwan coztiqueh. aw no onkan onpowalxiwtike in in amakemeke totolimpaneka iwan tsakwaltitlan tenanka inik kate nikan amakemekan. xi kali xiwitl, 1581. aw yese tla ok achitsin achtopa tikitokan, inik wel teyolopachiwis, in kexkich inik wei in teowatl iwan in tlaltikpaktli. i kali xiwitl, 1285 años. no amiktami nehon hwan antonio trinidad, x tochtli xiwitl, 1606 años. in se kikwa in itakilotsin. ixkich on onikito inik neltis inik atle itlakawis nikinnotlatlawtilia in kristobal riberio mayordomo de la kodradia yoan wel yuh nikneki inik no yewatl yes in eskrivano hoan de san silvestre inik yewantin ipan motlatoltiske in ixkich oniktenew yoan yewantin noalbaseas nikinchiwtiw nechmopalewiliske inik isiwka muchiwas neltis in iskitlamantli itech niktlalitiw notestamento. v tekpatl xiwitl, 1380. tlahkoxonakatl ahmo wehyi nawakatl xiwitl ik motlatokatlali nesawalkoyotsi, ki yewatl kontsinti konelwaioti in tekuhiotl tlatokaiotl akolwaka; yewanti kwawtlatoatsi, iskoatsi, kontlatokatlalike in akolwaka. noknin okikaxtilantlahtolkwep in amoxtli. mahtlaktli xokonochtli . aw in ye yuhki niman ye im ixpan motlalia kintlatlawtia kimilwia in otontotekako nikan tlatilulko, san ok tiyoke; ayamo motekako in totekuyowa christianoti, san ok ik techyolalike in koyoaka ixkichkawitike. in tewantin alkaldes don fransisko de la krus, thoribio lukas hustisia tikpia in ipaltsinko su magestad in axkan titlanawatia motsakwas in kaltsalantli in onkan atl okonkwiya in chaneke kotolkotlaka yehika melawak otikasikaitake in tepantli ka tsawktikatka in ye kexkich kawitl ayakmo wekaw in okontlapoke. se kikwalia in ikwouyo, kipixkah wan kimanah iwan et. ihkwak ye kiwika in mixiwki ichan, ipan ohtli kisehsemmantiwih in tekapolxiwitl in ika omoxiwwihkeh ahnoso sakatl in omosow; intla yuhki mochiwa ahtle ahmo kwali ipan mochiwas in konetl. . aw motolinia in amomatitech ankimonantiwi in telpopochtsitsintin: ma kontetlalilihtiwian in teikpaltsintli in xiwpepetsintli in sakaikpaltsintli. inik nikan tispan okimomakake in ipatiw kali okonkwik i migwel awiyeni iwan in iteikaw ana mosel iwan in ichawana hwana ik neltia nikan tiktlalia tofirma inik kimokowia in kali fransisko kwawiseki. ipa sempowali omei 23 mani metstli marso i chiwalok yokoyalok in adam. kenin mochiwa oiwin in kalaliloke wexotsinka. kani ne kionkuij? mochiwa newín kwoutahpa. tlen 69 tlanawatihkayotl.- kemah pewa motlapowa nechikolistli tlen achtowi tonalteki tlen seseh xiwitl tlen nompa in teki weyitlahtokan, ni weyi tekiwa tlen ni weyi altepetl ki ixpannextis temaktilis se amatlapowali, kampa tematiltis kenihki yowi altepeyotl tekichiwalo sentlanawatiloyan. keman motlapos san kemaya nechikolistli tlen tlahtokan sennechikolistli, noso setsi ikaltekichiwaloyan, tlen tlayekanketl nochipatekipanoli tematiltis tlen katli tlamantli tlen ika mochiwa tlahtolnohnotsali. in ihiyoka kaltekichiwaloyan ki ixtohtontias tlen amatlapowali iwan welis ki tlahtlanis ne weyi tekiwa tlen ni weyi altepetl maki weyili tlen wala ipan amatlapowali ika tlatsintokalistli tlahkwiloli iwan kinin nohnotsas nochimeh sekretarios tlen altepetmeh, nompa prokurador tlen nochi ni weyi altepetl iwan tlen elih direktores tlen entidades paraestatales, ni yowanti moechkawiseh iwan nohkía ki ixnextise inin amatlapowali tlen kintlahtlaniseh makiihtokah san tlen melawak. nopa amatlanawatili tlen tlahtokan sennechikolistli iwan inin amatlanawatiltlatilantli kiyolmahtoseh ni tlanawatiltekitl. tlawiskala moketsa ya, o tlahtowaya sakwankechol chimaltenantikpak, tlakochtenantikpak. iwan moxotastli sentlapan inimakechtlan kontlaliaya umpa in iopuchkopa (iuhquin manibulo). niman ik tlaiwa konnotsa in tonalpowki san ikatka in tetonalpowiliaya onkan motlayekwaltiaya. san ye se tlakatl kwali weyi chihki momatis iwan mostla kenameh se weyi iknotlakatl momatis. ik niman kontlahtokatlalike in ... . || aw kastilan kimokwilito inik arsobispo mochiw, aw ompa in kiwalmakak in iwelitilis inik ipampa governador mochiw in arsediano in nikan siudad mexiko, in okik ixkichkaw visita kichiwato perú. in oneske i mexika, nima ye ik kinawatia, kimilwia “mexicaé, tla ok amewanti, ka ye unka i nemini xochmilcatl”. 4.- iwan nikitowa i noxwiw i migwel witsitl in onpa nemi sakatla nikitowa itla kaokmo walas aw in inantsin ana tlako i mochi kali aso aka ik imak momikilis ka onechtekipano iwan nikmakatiw ome nometl iwan kwanakame nemi xv ka niktlapies. ma seme nikan walkisaskan sesenteutli,pan momatikotinikan chalko. nokoltsin omokowili inin kal mantli ye sempwali iwan mahtlaktlixiwitl. omoxtlawi ka imanon makwiltsontli mahtlakpowali iwan mahtlaktli teokwitla pesoh. axkan ye okachi patio, ipampa tomin amowel momalwia keh imanon. iswatl niman no kitoke in asteka "canin tamechwikaske, in iw antechilwia?". mah amo tayokoxtiakan nopilwan. aw inik onkan kársel de korte kinwalkixtike, kinkwawtlapechwike iwan kavaloti inkwitlapiltitech walilpitia in inkwawtlapech inik kinwilanke, inik onkan kimaxitiko tepilolkwawtitlan tlanepantla inepantla in okseki tepilolkwawitl onkan mani chikwetetl. tlawehkan walahke kitlachiliko nika se kilo pitsoomisihsikwili aw iwan ye kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan yepowalokaxtoli ipan onxiwitl in ipan 2 tochtli xiwitl, 1234, in kikaw teyakanalisyotl in sitlalitsin, in teyakan kaxtoli onse xiwitl; aw san niman ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl motlali tsinpan in teyakanas. axkinehki kitlachilis nopa iixwi. ipan nawtsontli onchikompoali ommatlaktli xiwitl, omomikilitsino mawistililoni kwikapikki in itoka hohann sebastian bach. aw in otlanke miki in mamaltin niman yewantin in tlaaltiltin sa on tlatsakutiwi in miki kinyakantiw in tealtianime. wel wehkawtika in otlahtolchixtikatka, aw in okittakkeh ye wel wehkawtika in onkan ikak, motololtitihkak, tlatenmattihkak, in aso notsalos, iwan in iwkin ma itla kiwalitki, kikukxanotikak, niman ye ik itech onahsikkeh inik kittilikeh tlein kiwikkats, inik inyoloh pachiuhis. aw in okittak in hwan diego ka niman awel kintlatilis in tlein ki iki on okinamikiliaya in general sapata. okinchiwaltiaya nochi altepeme kinamikitiwi in general. miak tlaka iwan siwame ika xochitl iwan musikatin tlatsotsonaske iwan okikwekwepotsaya in kwete ikwak kalakis iwan kitsotsonaske diana. . in akin otlahtlako kimiktiaya kitlahtlatia in onkan kwawkali iwan in saso kampa, aso wel ichan in ompa konmiktiaya kontlahtlatiaya. axkan domingo in ik 24 mani metstli noviembre || 235 de 1613 años, ihkwak onkan teopan sant augustín omakok palio in senka mawistililoni teoyotika tlahtowani maestro don frai diego de kontreras arsobispo in ompa aihtik sankto domingo la isla; yewatsin onkan in yakolpan kimotlalililiko in palio in senka mawistililoni teoyotika tlahtowani don hwan péres de la serna arkobispo mexiko, senka wei tlamawistililistika in kimotlalilili. — atl. inik sentlamantli nikitowa in onkan niwetstok nokal tonatiw ikalakiyanpa itstikak kwawakatl in itlapachiwka iwan in ikpak ka akokali nikmaka in nonamik in itoka maria tiyakapan san kiwika in tlali in ipan ika. onkan tlakat in bonifasio de sant benito; inin okichiwtia se ichpochtsin itoka beatris, inin konmonamikti || 144r fransisko de sant hwan miskitekatl tlaltekawake; onkan okichiwke otlakat in diego kwahelotl, nemi. 132 axkan lunes ik 15 mani metstli noviembre de 1610 años, ikwak nikan mexiko kalakiko in don rodrigo de vivero, umpa wala habún a la china inawak; aw inik yahka umpa a la china, in onkan itokayokan manila, onkan governadortito in omotenew don rodrigo, inin imachtsin in tlahtowani don lwis de velasko visurrei. —o tlakwele, tekusistekatlé, xon wetsi, xon momayawi in tleko! nopa isisna nopa yetok kema moketstehki in no monamaka. sanno ihkwak kitlaliah yakkiskayakanki in itoka porfirio dias yuhkin wei tlahtoani nikan anawak. nikan yetok: se taxkaltsin. i witsiliwitl mexika intlatokaw wikok in kolwaka yoan ichpoch chimalaxotsi; xochmilko wikoke simatekatl tewwa, teskakowakatl, tospaxoch; matlatsinko wikoke siwatsitsinti; kwawnawak wikoke kowatsontli yoa siwatsitsinti; chalko wikoke wisiltekatl yoan siwatsitsinti; akolwaka siwatsitsinti wikoke; xaltoka wikoke tepantsi, teskatlamiawaltsi, walcholoke amo mike, unkan tepan asiko kolwaka; askapotsalko siwatsitsinti wikoke; masawaka wikok yaosol, walcholo unkan tepan asiko kolwaka. wan okpa satepan yeweyi miltoton yeweyi oksé oksé arado mokalakia. . "o nech moknelili in tlakatl totekuyo ka wel nahsis in ompa niauh. ikayon tihneki kokone kisaloske se kwikatl achi kwaltsin kan yolewas namoyolo inon tonali. ipampa on tihneki walaske siwantoton ika istak intsotsoma iwan kikwitlalpiske ka se listón kan walas ke inon pantli. pipiltoton kwalikaske in pantalonwan istake, inkotontoton noihki istake. itech ima walilpitas noihki listón kename pantli. ika yewatl on kwikatl mokwikatiske. ¡ican kaxilia se sientos xiwitl mexico! in kwowit. see tootlaakatsiin, xkeeman tlamis. uel'yehuantin in tiakawan in okichtin in kiyauchiwaya tlaaltiltin amo san tlayeyekoli wel iwi in yawtiwa. in tlaaltiltin inchichimal inmamakwaw yetiw. kwali mopaka in kamohtli, inin mochiwa ika xelwastli ipampa senka tewkimilawtok. mokwakwalatsa in atl iwan motlalilia kanela tlatsikwewali iwan tlatsopeliloni ahnoso pilonsilo; satepan ye motlalilia in kamohtli iwan mokwatlapachoa in xoktli kampa omotlali intlakahmo ahmo nohwiyampa wiksi. mokawa ma kwakwalaka ixkichkaw in kamohtli ye textik. kwali, tlasohkamati wel miak. iwan tewatl. ¿quen taamia? ompa otemak-wewetsito in wewetke in mexika; ompa oixpoliwito otlamito in kwawwewetke in yaotsin, in kwawewetsin, in witsnawatl, in wewetke in pipiltin. || 39r iwan onkan ye kinwalwikake in inpilwan wewetke tenanka in ompa otlakatke kwitlatetelko in ikse tlakatl itoka xilokechtli, in ikome itoka xipechimale teomeka in, in ik-ei itoka mekawatsin, in iknawi itoka koyolnakoche, in ikmakwili itoka wewe itskwawtsin; inin ye telpupochtin in onkan walmikwanike in atentlipan tapalkatetelko. nonantsin onoitstilok. onikpix. kwaltia . niman yewatl in akatik chalchiwitl niman yehewatl in tlakanawali chalchiwitl in wel tlapaltik ketsalchalchiwitl in axkan tikitowa ketsalitstli; iwan kitowa okseppa ipan metstli ik ix mani oktubre domingotika in opew popokaya sitlali. komo será ohkión tihchiwa nehwa ahmo nihkwalihta. nech waliwa teotl,newa ni xochwatsin,newa ni temilotsin,newa ye nonteikniwtiako nikan. aw atlan poliwka ye ik walwia nikan mexiko, mochi poliwiko in itlatki, aw ompa kinwikak in ayehekatl in habún ompa atenkisato; inik ipan kalakito in wei tlatowani emperador in onkan tlahtokati habún, onkan monotske onkan kimokniwti in don rodrigo, iwan onkan kiwalanewti kexkich itlatki i kiwalkwik nikan mexiko don rodrigo, iwan keskintin okinwalwikak in ompa tlaka habún. inik kiwalwikake nenekok kiwalaantiake, yoa se teposmitl se tlekikistli i kiwalpixtia in okonkesako kopalnamakoa. kimonilwia “ca atlitik unkan in acocolco”. viii tochtli xiwitl, 1318. tlein ik uallaque?’”. niman ye mochintin texixili tepustopiltika, iwan tewiwiteke tepusmakwawtika sekintin kinkwitlaso, niman walmotoxawa in inkwitlaxkol, sekintin kinkwatsatsayanke, wel kitseltilike in intsontekon, wel itseltix in intsontekon. nopa welis ne axkwali tlakatl. aw sano ipan in in omotenew matlaktlomei akatl xiwitl onkan in atlitlalakyan kitlamiko in iteyakanalis in akasitli, inik teyakan in okwawtlahto intlan mexika kaxtolxiwitl; aw sa niman ipan in in omotenew xiwitl ye nokwele yewatl onkan walmotlali in itoka sitlalitsin inik teyakanas, san ye ok onkan in atlitlalakyan kitlalike mexika. inin xiwpan wei iteopixkatsin méxiko in itoka hwan antonio de visarron i egwiarrieta kitlalike yuhkin itlahtokateixiptlatsin yankwik kaxtilan. aw in oiw ahsiko in omotlaliko onkan kwitlatetelko in wewetke tenanka chichimeka, ik niman onyahke onkan kalakito in miskik, ye ipan asito ye ihkak ye mani in miskitl, in axkan ik motenewa altepetl miskik. onkak ome taman: kwaltia ¡ akan machotika tlaltikpak! ome kilo xiwtoktsin nwestro señor hesukristo. aw in oiw momikili, kin imostlayok ipan martes ye teotlak, ivisperatsin ipan sant fransisko, tlayawalolistika in kiwalmokixtilike i- || 48 -chantzinco, onkan kimotokiliko in inakayotsin in iglesia mayor, altar mayor in motokiltitok. xokonketsa in nonexkon senka niman xokontokio. xikwalkwi, o xikwalkwi in nompaka, o xinechwalmaka, in konetsintli, te xontlahteka tiwan. kwaltia in iknawi ichpochwan kwawsesekwitsin tlamaokatltewktli teokwitlapane itoka atototsin, inin umpa kiwalan kaltekoyan tlahtowani itoka itskiyawtsin tlakochkalkatl. mochiwa sah in nexkokokiswat, pero mah se nehmachpiya para kwaltsin moskaltia. aw i yewantin in mexitin in intlahtokawan asteka senka kintoliniaya senka kinmotlakawatiaya; in momostlae kinmakaya in ixkich atlan || 30v mochiwa, in michin in kweyatl in tekwitlatl in iskawitli in okwiltamali in axaxayakatlaxkali iwan in akosilin awawtli, aw niman ya yewatl in kanawtli tlalalaka tokwilkoyotl atsitsikwilotl apopohtli yakasintli; ka senka ik kintoliniaya, in ixkich kimitlaniliaya im sa yeye mochi in apipixkan in atotolin imiwiyo, niman ye iwan tlawkecholiwitl. yaoxochioktika, iwintitiakia nopilotsin, kosawik kwexteka totee. se kitoka enero, febrero oso marso, tepitsitsin sah kitekah itech sehsé tekoch para amo se mimimiak ixwas. aw yewatl ikmakwili arsobispo omochiwtsinoko in don frai garsía de sankta maría de mendosa i súniga teopixki sant herónimo, in otlapacho ika ixkichkaw in ipan xiwitl de 1602, oiw ye nepa onxiwitl momikili in lisensiado don alonso fernándes de bonila, aw ixkich ik walantika yewatl ipan xiwitl de 1606 in momikiliko; don frai garsía de sankta maría de mendosa i súniga in teoyotika motlahtokatili mexiko nawxiwitl. inik oneltik inik otikinmakake posesion estaga in onka in omokets in onkan tlatlantika in intlal atle ma otokonpanawike sa ye iskich in omakoke in iskich in intlal. onmantok in tokonyachiwaya ipalnemoani. ¿can on tiwi?, ¡in tokniwan! ¿ inik neltik? oyakawa atlo yan tepetl o in mexiko, in poktli ewatok ayawitl. el doktor don markos gwerrero 6 aw yewatl ikmakwili visurrei mochiwtsinoko in don lurenso xwáres de mendosa konde de koruña, in otlapacho ika ixkichkaw in ipan xiwitl de 1580 aw ixkich ik walantika ipan ik 29 mani metstli hunio in ipan xiwitl de 1583 in momikiliko, aw satepan wikok in inakayo españa; in tlahtokatiko nikan onxiwitl ipan chikwetetl metstli ipan senpowalonmatlaktli ipan eilwitl. tlakatle, totekoe, in mahan piltontli; konetontli, in atl, in tepetl: aso okikak, aso omononots: aso oinoma, iyomotlan, inakastech man: aso okonmolwi in kexkich, ako oinoma kwawitl, tetl, kimomakak kimotokti aso omawak, omononots: inik momaktsinko mosiyawpowtok, in mosiyawketstok, in tlatetotok. ya tinechilwi wan na axnihmati an in ikwak unpoliw kwetlaxtekatl nima ye nemalpoalo in imalwa tlatilulko; tehoa mopowke sentsontli umatlaktli, sano yehoatl kiwalitkik i malpowali chichimekateutli. yei xumali pitsochiyawisotl in tonaltin wel otonixtlahuapaquizqueh. ihwanti axkana kinekih san tlaixpiyase axkan nimitstatawtia taltikpaktsin. xiii akatl xiwitl, 1531 años. ik kitsintike satepan tepewanime sanyeno onkan se altepetl in achtopan okitokayotike "tocihuatecuhtzin in tepenahuiliceh", aw ok kintepan "cualnezcaaltepec". tlake tihchiwa nikani? aw ye nawpowalxiwitl ipan matlakxiwitl in ipan 1 akatl xiwitl, 1519 años, in oasiko españoles, in omotlaliko nikan ipan totlal in motenewa nweva españa. in sesek. asta nopan motitilana nechmayaw wan asta kikikikkian nomawan. tleko motlalia in atl. ma kwakwalaka; mosiyawa in pinoli inik atis, kwali mokwawtlatsoa, mokwachwia; ihkwak ye kwakwalakatok in atl ye motlalilia kanela tlatsikwewalton iwan ika molinilo ahnoso kwawpalax molinia in atl iwan san tlamach motlalilia in pinoli. in ye tlakwachwili; san teki molinia inik ahmo motelolohchiwas; ma kwakwalaka mahtlaktli minuto iwan mihkwania, ayokmo tleko yes; motlalilia in newktli iwan ye kwali mis. in ok tonnemi tamokolwa, i patlawak in tatlaw, in totlakoch, ik tikimawiltike in tonawak. ome axoxtlantli tlen 123 tlanawatihkayotl. nochi tlakameh iwan siwameh intechpowi kipiaseh nelkwali tekitl iwan ipati ipan altepeko; ipampa inon, moolinis mamoyoliti tekitl iwan mamonechikokah tlen moneki iwikpa ininteki, tlen kiihtowa tlahtol tlanawatili. in sennechikolistli tlahtokan, san amo kiixnamikis tlen nika tlahtoltlaketsalmeh moneki kiixnextis tlanawatilmeh intechpa tekitl, tlen yowanti tlanawatise a. iwikpa in tequitinih, miltequitinih, kalihtik tequitinih, tlayekchiwanih iwan sentlalistli, nochi tekipanoli i. in tekipanoli san mowekawilis chikweyi kawitl. ii. in tekipanoli tlen tlayowa san mowekawilis chikome kawitl. axwel mochihuaseh: tekipanoli tlen pitsotik noso temahmatih, tepostekitl tlen tlayowa mochiwa iwan nochi tekitl tlen mochiwa panotok mahtlaktli kawitl, tlen ayamo kiaxitiah matlaktli iwan chikwaseh xiwitl; iii. axwel motekiwis intekih tlen konemeh tlen ayamo kiaxitiah matlaktli iwan nawi xiwitl. tlen kipanotokeh inin xiwitl iwan ayamo kiaxitiah matlaktli iwan chikwaseh xiwitl welis tekitiseh axkipanos chikwaseh kawitl. iv. keman moaxitis chikwaseh tonati tekitl moneki kiyekmachilis nel amo miak, se tonatih siakawalistli. v. in siwameh keman iihtipan kinemiltiah konetsin amo welis kichiwaseh tekitl tlen moneki motetiliseh iwan achi temahmatih iwikpa kwali nemilistli tlen tlayolitia; moneki kiyekmachiliseh se siakawalistli tlen chikwaseh samano tlen keman ayamo asi tonati kiixtlalihtokeh asis konetsin iwan chikwaseh samano tlen keman asitohka konetsin, iwan moneki kiselis asitok itlaxtlawil, kipixtos itekih iwan tlen itechpowi tlen motlaniltok ipan itequih. ipan kawitl tlen tlachichitiah kipiaseh ome siakawalistli tlen axnochipa ipan se tonatih, tlahko kawitl tlen se iwan se iwikpa kin tlamakaseh inkonewan; vi. in tepitsin tomin tlaxtlawili tlen moneki kiseliseh tekitinih elis tlen seha noso tlen ixtlamatinih. tlen achtowimeh ipatih elis ipan tlalneskayotili tlen moixnextis; tlen ika ome motekiwis ipan pamitl tlen moixnextis tlen tomin tekitl noso ixtlamatilismeh, sekinok tekitl noso sekinok tlapehpeniltik tekitl. in tepitsin tomin tlen seha tlaxtlawili moneki kiaxilis tlen ika kintlakwaltis ichanewah se tekitiketl, ipan pamitl tlen tlatekiwili, tlen altepechantli iwan iyokalistli, iwan iwikpa temakas tlanekili tlamachtilistli tlen iconehuah. in tepitsin tomin tlaxtlawili tlen ixtlamatinih moixtlalis kikwitinemiseh tlen kenihki tlaeltok ipan miak tlamantli tomin tequitilismeh. in tepitsin tomin tlaxtlawilmeh kiixtlalis se tlasennechikolistli kampa monechikoseh tlainamikinih tlen tequitinih, teaxkameh iwan tlanawatianeh tlen welis mopalewis ipan iyohtsitsin nechikolismeh tlen san tetlaihiliseh tlen moitas melawak moneki iwikpa nelkwali tekichiwas. vii. hiikpa seh tekitl moneki seha tlaxtlawili moselis, iwan amo moitas tlenon itlakayo, iwan kanih ewani. viii. in tepitsin tlaxtlawili amo welis mokotonas, mopiwis noso mokwilis. ix. in tekitinih intechpowi kiseliseh tlen ipiwiyah kitlaniseh caltequitilismeh, tlen moyektlalis ken moihtowa ipan inin tlanahuatilmeh: a) se anawak nechikolistli, kampa tlatskitoseh tlaixnamikinih tlen tequitinih, tlen teaxkameh iwan tlanahuatianeh, kiixtlalis porsentahe tlapiwili tlen moxelos inixkotiah tequitinih; b) in anawak nechikolistli kichiwas tlatehtemolistli iwan tlaixpowali tlen monekis iwan kinamikis iwikpa moixmatis nochimeh tlamantli tlen anawak tomin tekitl. noihki kikwilis tlen moneki mochiwas iwikpa moolinis tepostekitl yolchikawalistli tlen totlalnantsin, tlen melawak moneki kiselis tominchikawali iwan tlen moneki oksepa kitewiseh tominchicahualmeh; k) yewa nechikolistli welis kiihitas in porsentahe tlen moixtlalihtos keman eltoseh tlaixpowalmeh iwan tlatehtemolismeh tlen inik senka ye apachiwi inik nowiampa ipan ye wits atl, kwawkopa waltemo, senka kimotekipachilwi in tlahtowani visurrei in altepetl mexiko inik atika ye poliwis- || 38 -nequi; aw in ontlah in okonchiwke in okonpahpatike mexika in ixkich omotenew tetenamitl, ik ye nokwel sentlamantli motlali in intekiw tenochka. inik 2 tlamantli nikitowa hokatki nochina hakatenkoh onok hontekistok nikitowa in tla nechmopolwis in totekuyo dios nikmakatiw in itoka hwan fransisko. no nixpan omochiw in newatl eskribano tlatoltika konmononochilike yuh konitoke tikkakiltia in hustisia ipanpa omomikili in itoka katka huliana de san migwel onkan chane katka wewekalko. san achika axkan kan domingo ik 14tia metstli nuviembre de 1610 años, ikwak yankwik missa okimochiwili i notlasotatsin frai augustín del spíritu sankto iteopixkatsin in totlasotatsin señor san antonio abbad, nikan iteopanchantsinko siudad mexiko; aw yewantsitsin padrinos mochiwtsinoke in senka mawistililonime padres hwan de tovar redor kolegio san gregorio iwan yewatsin sanktiestevan, aw in omotemachtili yewatsin in padre gaspar meneses, imeixtintsitsin la kompañía de hesús teopixke. tlatlanilok in testigo ilwilok inin sempoali peso ak okiten okito in testigo ka wel melaoak in nikitoa ka yehoatl okiten in inamik hwan de eskalante maria geronima ye axkan kaxtolxiwitl inin ka wel melaoak inik onokonan huramento inik onitlatolmelaw. amo mochipautani, ta kwoukespan mochiwa. neskiani tlen techyakawiltekiah ye tlapololi ye otitosentlalihkeh tosehseyakayolamachilis in otikkwepkeh in timochintin toyolamachilis intla sekih tlamantli ahmo tikkwalihtaya ye omosentlali in totlahtol iwan immanon san techpoloayah tlen intla ahmo tikahsiskiani wel xitiniskiani tlein san achiton ahnoso wehyi ye tomak onyeya tikpiaskeh in kali kampa tiyeskiani ¡amo ika xitlahto! anemiskeh xiii akatl xiwitl, 23. aw in nikan mexiko in iskikan ipan ohtli omotenew ik yaotlapialok sábado sankto tlamiko, inik kalakke inchachan in soldadostin mochiwka. px ye wehkaw onechmolwili nonantsin mach yeimman nikixtemos in notlaixnamik namewantsitsin yonanmohtilihkeh ken yonikihkis ken yonitetlatlawti okkan ammo okinehkeh newad ahweli nitechiwaltis axkan yoniknexti se ichpokatsintli iwan mechmonochilia nanmoikaske ichan nanmotlaneltililitke olopio aw inik onikpolo in tlakpak onkan no ninotlapololti aw nikan niktlalia in wel neltilistli in maria xoko ilamatsin in ipilo itoka katka anan tlako wekapa ipilo aw niman no wala migwel oselotl okimonamikti anan tlako aw niman onkan otlakat maria anan aw niman no kimonamiktiko in pedro lwis chane kwawchinanko san se in ikonew okichtli itoka estevan omomikili aw sepa okimonamiktin in itoka magdalena aw niman no momikili in pedro lwis kwawchinanko ik niktlalia nofirma diego leonardo eskribano. onkak se taman saj. anis, yexpan ixkich in kikwi tomahpil inik satepan yewantsitsin intech mokaw in tlahtoke españa don fernando iwan doña isabel katólikos, inik kimopalewilike in itechpa in kelewiaya. inik totomiwakanpa itstia. miek tonali achto techahchan ye pewaya in nemanililistli; inin senka tepahpakiltiaya yehika pewaya in tlasempakilistli ipan tlahko metstli hulio iwan tlamia in ye in ipewyan metstli agosto; onyeskiani pahkayotl iwan wei tlakwali atoli, tamali, tlemoli. kema 17. iwan ma tikmokwitlawi in awilahtoli, in kamanalahtoli ka ahmo kwali, ahmo yektli, ka san teawilkixti, tetlawelilokatili, ahmo iwiyan yektli, tetlas, temayaw in atoyak, in tepexik, in tsonwasko, immekak. kitenamikti in tetl, in kwawitl. iwan ma tikmokwitlawi, ma itech timoma in tiankistli iwan in apan, ohpan ma timokets, ma timotlati; onkanka, onkan nemi in wei iteiya, in itekwaya, in tlakatekolotl. yewatl in tesiwaw, yewatl in tetlakaw, in teaxka, in tetlatki, in tekwe, in tewipil. onkak se taman saj. in ipan siudad mexiko tenochtitlan axkan ipan semilwitl viernes a xxix dias del mes de marso de mil e kinientos i setenta años in newatl melchior dias alkalde por su magestad onechwalwiwali in mwi magnifiko señor doktor sorita in nikan ipan tlaxilakali santa maria ispan kopolko inik nikalakiko in martin tenoch iwan in baltasar kwawxinki in onka mani in itlal in kopolko. kwaltia niyayaliski ichokayan. ahvia! nawxiwtika in topan nekavilok ayok inematian namehwan kiawteyome, aw niman walmoketstewak in temilotsin, i momati ekatsin aso maxisas. in no se kimewa. aw in hukitli itstolkatl atle kito; aw in sokiatl anotle kito; aw in awexotl anotle kito. in saso tle in inpan mochiwas muchi onkan konittaya in anoso anawak mikitiw. o ilakotsiw ya ommoxochiw,mopapaloow. tlawel tlapetlani mowikxitia in poyoxnakatl ika tlahkoxonakatl iwan yei axoxtlantli; motesi metlapan ahnoso ika tepustlatsoaloni mochi in tlanahnamiktli; ipan sokikaxitl motlalia in pitsochiyawisotl iwan motsoyonia in ayohwachtli; inin motlalilia mochi in omotes, in ye tlakwachwili; san teki molinia inik ahmo motelolohchiwas; motlewatsa ixkichkaw ye tepitsin wakki, motlalilia in istayutl; motlalilia istatl intla moneki. aw axkan sábado ik 18tia metstli setiembre de 1610 años, ikwak oteochiwalok ika missa in yewatsin notlasotatsin frai augustín del spíritu sankto itechtsinko powi totlasotatsin sant antonio abbad; san se inewan ikwak onoteochiwalok ika epístula in frai thomás de libera santo domingo teopixki amakemekan chalko ichan, ipiltsin markos de libera ixwimontsin in tlakatl don hwan de sandoval tekwanxayakatsin teowatewktli tlahtowani katka tlailotlakan amakemekan chalko. ¿o ach anka titlatokaw yewan teotl? xantetl ipan tlatetsotsontli, in atlakomoli sa teneneixkawil. chimaltitla in pieloya in ok nen aka moteik sekilisneki. in oksé taman tikiluiaj: tosankwaewat. in tewantin alkaldes don lwis de pas domingo hernandes in tikpia hustisia audiensia otikkake inin petisión tontlanawatia in iw katka kali tsawtikatka in ikwak ayamo mako amatl in itoka pedro witsiltewka inik motlapo in axkan tontlanawatia timitsonnawatia in ti pedro xikkawa in kali ayokmo itech tasis kin ikwak in tla oneltik mokal timakos sentensia iwan posesion. se mamahpikton yepasohtli ¿ tle itech pewalos? den itek in akontli nikatka nitlapaktoka wan satepa onechwalikak. 2. aw in axkan achitsinka otiwalachix, otiwalmoskali, otiwaliskalowak, otiwalchamawak, yuhqimma titototsintli kin ye timotlachopinilia; ihkin otiman, otiskalowak, otimoskalti, otimowapaw yuhkimma kin ye tiwalkisa immokakalotsinko, yuhkimma kin ye timotlasokentia, yuhkimma kin ye kisa immokwitlapiltsin, immatlapaltsin, yuhkimma kenteltsin tikoolinia immomatsin, moexitsin, immotsontekontsin; yuhkimma kin ye timoyeyekowa inik tipapatlantinemis. kinexkawihto asta ilwikatl, kiijtouaj, noponi. aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl motlahtokatlali in mikkakalkatl tlahtowani tekwanipan chalko amakemekan chichimekatewktli mochiw; kin isel in iwki itoka mochiw, ompa in in mexikatl ompa kontlahtokatlali in awitsotsin tlahtowani nikan tenochtitlan. || 142v kawaloti kwakwaweke sepayawmikke iwan ichkame. nikawín no mochiwa, pero sayoh amo tiktokaj. ixiuyo xokok kemeh tiltsapot. se kitoka. tlen 43 tlanawatihkayotl. tlen ahachi ipan tlatskitokeh sentlanawatiloyan tlen tlaltlanahuatilmeh: agwaskalientes, baha kalifornia, baha kalifornia sur, kampeche, koawila, kolima, chiapas, chiwawa, durango, gwanahwato, gwerrero, hidalgo, halisko, méxiko, michoakán, morelos, nayarit, nwevo león, oaxaka, pwebla, kerétaro, kintana roo, san lwis potosí, sinaloa, sonora, tabasko, tamaulipas, tlaxkala, verakrus, yukatán, sakatekas iwan iyolo weyi altepetl. kimach imechtlahpalose". in ika itokatsin tetatsin iwan tepiltsin iwan spiritu santo in axkan nikitowa notlatol inik niktlalia notestamento in newatl martin hakobo nikan nochan sankta maria asunpsion ipan tlaxilakali kwepopan inin nikitowa notlatol ma wel kimatiske in akike kitaske inin namaw inik niktlalia notestamento. wan kihtowah newín paratani no kikuaj, kichkwah in itesyotsin, mahyá yon se taxkalxikal wan welik kemeh eskia kwakwounakat, kimanah in itesyotsin wan kikuaj. aw ka sanno ipan in omikwilo in oksenka wel in ixkich teowamoxtli; omotlali in moponwa in ye wekaw wewe tlapowalistlawikalistli amoxtli katka, iwan in yankwik tlaxexelolistlapowalisamoxtli. in totonik. aw in ipan motlastika kwitlachikpali in ipan tlachixtika in ikpak witsilopuchtli. rábano aw in ipan lunes a 20 de abril de 1592, ye noseppa walake otsilin nawi ora, iwki hekatepostli walmoketstiake sa senmantiake; nowian yahyake sant migwel tlakopan, atlakwiwayan, kuyowakan. in sowapa in akin teka tlahtohtika, ye semetspa omikwak. —maske pero ahmo kwalika saye tewa'kun tikimopielia saye tikinmodirihirwis tewa'kun de lei. in ateskatl okachi wehkatla keh in atoyak. mochiwa kuoujtaj: texayakatitan wan atekohkomolkopa wan pesmaapan. ihkwak ahsiko in tenanka, in asiko kwawitsatewktli tlailotlak. ka ye iski xiwitl inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. aw inik aokmo wel mowekatlanowaya aotlih, yewatl ipampa inik amo wel kichiw inik nepa kitlasaskia atl; san konkaw, kimawkaittak inik amo wel ompa yaw atl. in tlakase otemok wewetitlan, ye nemi in kwikanitl san kiketsalintoma aya kitsetseloa ikwik ipalnemowa. in kiltsin sesek kemeh tomakiltsin. aw iwan ye chikonpowalxiwitl ipan nawxiwitl in ipan xii kali xiwitl, 1465 años, in opewalok chalkatl nawkanme, in ipan yewatl wewe motewksoma ilwikamina. nikan ipan in poliwke in tlachkiawka. yuh oneltik in ixpantsinko señor gobernador yoan alkaldes yoan hweses. okan omoyekti kitohoa albaseas hoan de san hose pedro hernandes diego leonardo eskrivano fransisko sanches martin gano thomas de akino. hwanito. aw oseki in amo nika mokaki tlatoli; san onka poliwtika in tlatokayotl tlatilulko. iskate in chaneke in achto tlalmasewke, in achto onoya in ayamo walwilowa, in tlatlamachiotitinenke in tepetikpak i xokotl ikpak i tlamachiotitinenka tlakoxinki itoka. wan moneki xihmakawati amo xihtlapos". nima ye ik waltsatsi “uallaz pilli!”. se kali xiwitl atle muchiw. aw kan iwian walotlatokatia inik nikan motlaliko tonatiw inepilowayan; in ikwak kalakia tonatiw in onpoliw, niman walnesia in popokaya sitlali, walmoketsaya ikwitlapil in itlanex senka wiak, san iwkin ayawpoktli in walmoketsaya inik walnesia ipokyo. in amo akah kitoka, ipa ixwa sah wan komo se kineki, kwali se kitokas, no mochiwas. ipan in in xiwitl omotenew ipan otlamiko in itlakatilisxiwtsin temakixtiani ohasik nawtsonxiwitl, ik onpewa in axkan yankwik xiwitl seissientos i uno años. inin ichpochtsin katka in tlakatl don hwan hewakayotsin pili, onkan ichantsinko katka in tekpan in itokayokan tlailotlakan tekalko itech powi in altepetl tenanko texokpalko tepopola chalko. tikin tlasohtlas in motatawan. ipan in in sekintin kitoa asiko. tlanankililistli in tkpiltsin ye kinankilia ittatsin. amo monamaka kwesalan. ekimit tein kwali se kikwa ixochiyo, se kimana wan ihwak oksi ya se kiayohkixtia wan se kitsoyonia ika piotet wan no kwaltia se kimanelowa iwan emoltatsoyon. i tekpatl xiwitl, 1376 años. nikan ipan in poliwke in kwawnawaka; in okimonpewke, se xiwitl in tekitke tlakalakike in ichan tlahtowani itskowatsin. ipan matlaktli omei kali otlawak iwan omayanalok. miaktin amo kinpaktia. walchimalpanoke i mesika i wewetke tlakuchpanoke, i ye unka o in akatsintitla iyao. axkan hwebes in ik 29 mani metstli mayo de 1614 años, || 252 ihkwak ipan in omotlaliko in itlasoilwitsin santíssimo sakramento, san ik onkis in in ilwitl san ikeskilwiyok inik niman nikan ompew yahki in ompa ik yaw españa in omotenew tewktitlantli embaxador chane hapón; inin ik yah san kinxelotewak in imasewalwan, ixkich kinwikak no ixkich nikan kinkawtikis in haponti inik nikan tiyamikiske tlanamakaske puchteka. timitstemouaj". . ma ok nik wal chiwa in temahtekilistli in tekamapakilistli in sakapepechtsintli ka omonexiti in tlahkohkowaltsintli in istlaewaltsintli in koyoltsintli in witsmalotsintli in nochestsintli in tlalxokotsintli. aw in omotlahtokatili rei onpowalxiwitl omei, en blanko in okimopachilwi altepetl semanawak. senka tlaweliloke katka, ok tewanme tepewke in tsapotlan in tochpan; aw okitoke "tacizque in anawak, atle ipan tikittaske in kexkich". sant fransisko padreme in nikan amakemekan motlaliko. tel nopa kentsi mahmawi mati welis kenihki eme. se kwarto sanahoria aw niman omotlapo in pwerta aw niman otonkalakike in anan tepi niman onenen in ipan tlali otlamomotlak ika tetl aw in kali sentetl siwakali tonatiw ikalakianpa itstikak inik ontetl kaltepiton xochimilkopa itstikak. inik ontlamantli nikitowa in ok no honikak nokal tesonkali no akokalo tenanyokampa itstikak nikmaka in nochpoch in itoka ana tepi sa no kiwika in tlali in ipan ikak iwan mochi nisenmaka in onkan kalakowayan nekok koyonki akokalo mochi konsenkwis in ana tepi iwan in tlali in ipan ikak iwan in itwalo ispan mani no nikmaka mochi. aw in axkan ipanpa in tiktlalia in tosentensia in ipaltsinko su magestad ik mako in chinamitl in itoka anna xoko in mako nawtetl inik wiwiak xxiii matl iwan ok achiton tlali in iyomotlan mani in kali yewatlin in ye mako in anna xoko ik semaxkatilo itenkopa hustisia aokak kitlakos. aw no onkan in ik-expa kilpiko in inwewexiw mexika in apasko; ikpak wets in tlekwawitl in itoka tepetl witskol, ipan mochiw in inteyakankaw mexika in itoka toskwekwextli. yei axoxtlantli wan axakak san hwan bautista yuwahsik in tokistli oksehpa para tokas itlatlaolton; kitokas abitas frixolito ikan tlen dios kimokawlia de semiya. se kwarto waxchili san ik nemi in tlanekutinemi in tlachichintinemi. xiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1388. v.- testigo. fransisko konma ichan kowatlan omonamikti eepowalxiwtia i ye nemi huramento okitennamik in ika vara de hustisia inik amo istlakatis ilwilok xokonmelawa in motlatol in tla tistlakatis ka diablo kiwikas in moyolia manima aw tla wel tokonmelawas motlatol ik mitsmotlaokolilis in totekuyo dios iwan tonantsin santa maria mochipa ichpochtli. nima ye ik kimaxilia in tototl i michi in kwiatl, akakwawtsintli tlakopopotl inik yake tlachpanato tletlalito askapotsalko in ichan tlatowani akolnawakatsi. chikomekoatl ikwik chikwei akatl xiwitl ik momamal in teukali tenochtitla, inka momal tsiwkoaka; unka mik masatltewktli, nehoan ichpoch. toltekah iwan tlamatinime iwan omolwiaya tatatsitsintin: amo timonekiltis motelpochtsin noso mochpochtsin onkan temachtis noihqui? in totonik porke komo se totonia wan se kikwa techiwilih daño. ome xumali silantro xinachtli ipa se taman saj. yewa imaikniwan okinmitak xiii akatl xiwitl, 1583. otomachtiaya okpak semilwitl iwan ahken amo kwikaya ikak kename on petlantas, noso amo mamowik, amo motsokwaswi, okititlania ipan tlamachtilkali kan momachtia pipiltoton. ompa pipiltoton okixopapakaya, okitsokwaswiaya iwan ikahhnwan noihki okintlapalwiaya ika kikwitaya bola. ika se tatapatli okipopoaya kan kisas tlapetlanali. iki on ika otechtitike kename ika tinemiske. ikan tepinawtin kename pipiltoton otetskwaswiaya oteamowiaya. tla yokinmamawike okinwikaya oksepa tlamachtilkalko konsepsión arenal. nama ne tonal domingo en la tarde xi tochtli xiwitl, 1438. . kichistikate in kenman om pewaske. aw mochi kinechikowa in ihtakatl in pinoli. aw in kikaltema amo semilwitl, san yowaltika. tlasohtlaskeh wan ikwouyo no se kitatia. inik sen damantli nikitowa amo nikpia noaxka nodatki in den nikinkawilis nopilwan iwan nokniwan iwan in ixkichtin in notiakamekayowan aw san ixkich se tlali kipiya yei kabalería nochidi iwan mexkali kipia kimokwidawiske ipam kitekipanoske in t[o]t[ekwi]o dios iwan toweitlatokasin in rei inin tlali omoteme kipia daltepamtli kampa motokayotia tetlankochko kimapilwia tekamachali yawi kampa motokayotia hwan tenchango maría tenchango yawi chiapam dakolowa temalakayokam yawi xochiakalko iwan atlichichipiko sebastian baptikta onikchiw notestamento ipam mierkoles ik 12 tonatiw mopowa de abril aw xiwitli de 1638 años nixpam newatli d[on] diego de la krus eskriwano. omakam nekimidi yawi ipam tlaltepamptli san andrés motokayotia xiloxochitli kwawtidan iwan waxkwawtidan. okachi kwali xinechmomakili se tepachichik. temok kwikapewkayotl . tlamakas ekatl a tlapkoyoale tetsawteotl notekuyo teskatlipuka kinankilikan sinteutla se kikwa tamanal oso piksatamal. mah amo nechtatilikan inchayohkan tepewani, kwando lá komunpia' se ratito peso yokontlan. chilakachmoli ika tsompachkilitl aw niman onkan otokontetetsotsonke estakas ome akalotetechpa in onkan tlatlami kwaxochtli aw inik otikinmakako posesion ika tetl ontlamomotlake iwan otikimonkalakike in ichan in intlalpan in inchinanpa in imixpan in omotenewke ipan karta de venta. selia, mimiliuhi, ma ohkión ma ohkión kichiwtinemi inichpokato. ¡malintzin, malintzin! kimolwilia in teopixki, ¡ximehua, ximewa! ¿tlen tikchiwa? ¿tlica ticochi? mah amo kimatoka se moyot. aw yuh kinnankili i nikan mexiko tenochtitlan tlahtoke in kowatsintewktli "yn iw kichiwas". aw ka wel nehoatl onikitak wel nixpan yoan imixpan testigos in tlatsintla tokontenewtikate inin omopow tomines yoan inik okiselike in tlalnamaka sempoali in chikwasen pesos wel inmatika in okonkwike in omotenewke tlalnamakake aw in angelina tlalkowki niman wel no yiolo ik opachiw in tlali pakka yokuxka in okimomakake ik yiolo opachiw. a ka iwin mopoloa i, in motsontlawitsoa, in awik motlasa, in akan weli kichiwa a in itlanko, in ikamak tlali a ka otlayowak, ka iwki in oiwin tioak, ka sa kan wetsyo aw sa ken mopoloa o, ka san niman aok temachiskamamani, ka owelayoowak, ka aokak teka ka san ye mapismikilia in oapawaloni, in iskaltiloni, in konetsintli in chichiltsintli in aya kimomachitia. ach atel ye neli, a oko[n]kawili in nantli; in tatli a wewekwitlatl in kitsakwa. onewaloya keman nawi tlapoali watsinkopa onkwan on axiwas chalma keman chikome tlapoali. istatl, ixkich in monekis chichiwalayotlatetsawtli in ye tlatextli entonses okihto nikikolkonton no mexor kachikwali mayaw. kwaltia in tomiyoh se kitoka bweno itech masetas. ipanpa ninoteilwiko ye nechkwilia in itoka pablo makwex aw in ika in totlakamekayo in tokol itoka tokwiltekatl mopilwati matlaktin kichiw aw sa se in mopilwati itoka tlakochin aw totatsin in newatl anna xoko iwan hoksekintin teixwiwan onkate. iki melawak tlen omonemililike mawistik tlaka; iki on otlanankili ke nochtlakatl. aw intla kana oyaomik kitlalilia ieuiĭo kewilotia kewilotlalilia ixiptla kichiwilia. inin "euillotl. in san ik tikamana, in kenin konitowa toyolo. ayak wel so itlan kisa, in on tlatowa tlaltikpak. nima ye ik kiwalatokatlalia in kwakwapisawak epkoasi in tlatilulko, nima ye walsiwatlani koatlicha yichpoch akolmistli wisiliwitl, i siwapili itoka akxokweitl; ye mopilwatia yakapantli tlakateutsi, ik 2 yaokwistli, ik 3 tesosomoktli, ik 4 xiwkoyolmakistli, ik 5 atotostli, ik 6 epkoasi, ik 7 wakalsintli, ik 8 matlaltsi. xiyonanakat oso ixtoh mi nanakat in ipa se taman saj. —ne'wa notoka ni gregorio romero i grasias. axkan lunes in ik 2 mani metstli hulio de 1612 años, ipan ilwitsin visitasión, inik kimotlapalwito totlasonantsin sankta maría in itlasopitsin sankta isabel, ihkwak mochali inik yekaw teokalmamaliwak in onkan yankwik teopan nwestra señora del kolegio de las niñas; inin omotenew teokali wel amo wekaw in omochiw, san iwki in walixwak inik moyankwili inik kichiwke kofrades del sanktíssimo sakramenkto. in iyolo mochiwa melaktik, ompa xitintiuj imaxiuyo, hasta tamixitini nochi, sepa pankisa okseki. xiii kali xiwitl, 1505 años. ne amelko. ye nikan ayak kitlamitewasin xochitl, in kwikatl,in mani a ichan ipalnemowani. iwan in mextlatl yakawiak iwan kweitl tetenaskayo chikokweitl iwan wipili xochimoyawak anoso xoxoloyo. aw ka ye ipampa in tlatsilinia in senka chikawak manka kiyawitl, ik kiyawtlasaloya; in ikwak mokakia tepostli inik nowian mexiko tlaokoltlatsiliniloya, || 58 ka ik senka tlaokoyaloya netekipacholoya in mexiko. in arros noihki itechmoneki miak tlatotonialistli iwan miak tlakwechawa. motolinia i masewali in ok omokaw in atlitik in kihyowitok; ma noso titletlalika ma titlachpanaka, ma intlan titokalakika in tlatoque’”. tlen chompetlame omepwali ipa de niixpetanik ihkón monotsa. domingo a xxix de setiembre 96 años, ikwak pew inik tlayawalolok in iglesia mayor, iwan in nowian teopan iwan monhas; inpampa tlatlatlawtilok in omiktiloke christianosme in atlitik, luderanos in temiktike iwan ingleses tlaka in temiktike, aw ipampa i nowian inpampa tlatlatlawtilok. se kichipawa. in ipan lunes ik 2 mani metstli abril, ikwak yekaw in kampanario san hosep, ikpak kiketske in krus tepostli iwan tlatenexaltilisotl xoxoktik, in iw nestika axkan; inin yewatsin kimochiwili in frai fransisko ganboa gwardián sant josepeh. se tonalpa timitsnotlahkwilwis iwan timitsnonankilis nochi motlahtlaniltsin. tlen 23 tlanawatihkayotl. amo
