tlenon tlahtlakoli tlahtolmatilistli welis kipanos eshpa tlaixnextilistli. amo akah welis ompa kiixpantiseh tlen ika sehka tlahtlakoli, tlen melawak welis kimakixtiseh noso kitlahtlakoltiseh ipan tlahtolmatilistli. moixkotona tlahtoli tlen kiixpoliwiltia tlaixnextilistli. kenin mochiwa pesmameh wan kwouxiwit ﻿inochtin okixmatkeh iaxka inna. na. — ihyo teotl. —cente otzahtzic— ¿yah kenin kwali nikan oasiko inin mahpilxitlatstli intla tosiwaiknin okwalwikani tech onawahtekiskia, tlen ika motohtamas intotlatelchihyo iwan kixitonis in tetsawitl.ihkwak in tlahtoli okikak in sisiwanton, ka ikwitlapan tlatsakwalotl omania, okalak iwan okin nawahtek in ikniwan. saniman tlakah omocuepqueh. mostlatika inchan omohoankeh ka xikipiltin ika tlasohtlatkitl tentiweh tlen teskatepeihtik okitlatiaya. inchan okalakitoh okinyeknawahtekeh intawan iwan ihkion omotlaxtlawi in yoltekipacholistli omochin ihkwak in sisiwanton ichan okis. tle tikmati tle tik momachitia, tleh tik matkatsintli nopiltsé? ma iyolik xi mowikatiw xi kim on tlalkawi in mawiwan in motlauan.” niman kilwike "campa in ok ye tias? ka ye ilwikaatenko in tonoke; ma ximokwepa, ka nowian onowak. aw i yewantin in akike tlakwiloke in senka ye wekaw mochipa pewaya itechpatsinko ikatsinko in dios inik yewatsin dios. tonwewetstoske tsono, tonpakits, pakis tsono,niktlatlamachiwas.makamo, makamo, maka no tlaximayawi, xolotsin, titlatowani, axayakaton. mochiwa saj, amo mochipautani. aw axkan miérkoles ik 2 mani metstli setiembre, ik ya yeilwitl pahpakowa kwakwamiminalo in onkan omotenew seral kiyawak, in ihkwak owala kurreo ipan makwili tsilini ye teotlak in okaxitiko in okiwalwikak tlahtoli españa in okimachistiko, onkan itlatlachiantsinko in visurrei don lwis de velasko in ipantsinko asiko in kastila wala tlahtoli inik okimomachistiliko, in kenin yewatsin toweitlahtokaw rei don felipe tersero in ompa moyetstika españa ye okimomakili ye itech okimopowili in tlahtokayotl in markesyotl in ipan altepetl de salinas in don lwis de velasko, umpa markés omochiwtsino. aw in tekowanime ye yuh yetiw in iyollo kitki in tilmahatli in maxtlatl kweitl wipili in ahmo senka kwali. ompa kinmaxtlatia kintlalpilia kinkwetia kinwipiltia in ik kinwalwika. . in kampa yewatl yaokixowas wel kin tlakwawnawatiaya in inteyakankatka in nawalostomeka itoka kwawpoyawaltsin. niman ye ixpan tlamelawa in unkan ka in tew in ostoxneka itoka iyakatekutli. niknam a k a s nokalmimilo inik nokowis noauto yankwik. nima ye ik walmotitlani i mexika kinonotsaske kolwaka tlatoke, kimilwia “totecuiouané, ka otlamake i mexika, inpan ocholoto i xochmilca”. aw in tla niman amo kinekis kikoas ma konixtlawas in okixitini sentetl kali ma kana ok sekni monamakas in keski ipatiw mochiwas nawkan powis inik sekni itech powis in nanima inik okan itech powis kofradia del santisimo sakramento inik hexkan intech powis in nikan moetstikate san fransisko padreme ik nesis intlakwaltsin inik nawkan in onkan nitokos nitlawenchiwa iskikan newiwixtias in wentli mokawas. aw san niman no ipan in semilwitl in xiwitl in tlakpak omotenew niman otiwalake i nikan ipan tlaxilakali san sebastian awatonko in tewantin regidores martin kortes don antonio de mendosa iwan eskribano hoan de san fransisko aw algwasiles sebastian lopes felipe lwis hwan kano inik otiwalake tikmakako posesio pero dias español inamik sensilia ximenes iwan ipiltsin hwanilo inik ome alonso dias. se kitoka iteyotsin. okikištiko' kimiktihke. motlapo gran temawti kokoa kikakwilihke in mono para ahmo walpanos kimahsis motelkekke in yolkame wan ahkweli wal panoya. in weyi xochitla noihki miak mixotix. ipan matlaktli tochtli xiwitl kitlahtokatlalike mexikah motewksomatsin xokoyotsin inik chikonawi itlahtokatsin tenochtitlan. komo se veinte metros iwexka kipixtó. ipan makwili tekpatl xiwitl, in anglitlaltekah iwan wei ehekatl iwan in kiawitl kitlapoloke miek kaxtilanakali in satepan omotenew "amo pololoni in yaokiskaakalan". kihtowah abwelitos in ixochiyotsin moraditoj. tien san kwaltetsin in siwatsintli. no ikwak in mottak sentetl sitlali akolwakanpa, yuhkin tlatlaya. in kokolitsintli wel owi iwan temahman. itstoke noponi in ipan siudad de mexiko a veinte i dos dias del mes de mayo de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in mawistililonime hwes governador alkaldes konmokakitiko inik otlamiko termi[no] inik senpowal onmatlaktli tonatiw otsatsiwak ayak otlanakili ayak tle kito san ixkich in napowali pesos omotenewtinen ayak okimonekili yuh konmokakitike in tlatoke. in chimali kwekwepalok i ye tepantonko i yewaiya, ukawalok koliwaka; ika tolinke ye timexika chokistli ewaya. ¿ tle in ximowayan ? moyolohwik moyolohwik satepan se kimolontia wan kwanto moloni ya in atol se kitsopelia ika panélaj. teteu innan ikwik se kwarto waxchili anmewantsitsin anmomayanaltiah. mochiwa semi ne paratani kampa takawani. aw in ipan hwebes in ikmakwililwitl yewantsitsin in teopixke mersenadios kimolwichiwililito sankta, no se temachti. tewtli in popoka. aw iwan ye nawpowalxiwitl in ipan xi kali xiwitl, 1529 años, in opew nenamiktilistli nikan mexiko inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. san chikompa titlatsilinise wan ya kwali. nikawin no kitokah atenohkopa. aw ken kikak ken kimol in itoka temistewktli, inn in ipiltsin in tlahtowani in wewetewktli chichimekatewktli, onkan kinamikito in tsakwaltsintli itik in diablo; inik kinamikito in kimakak chalchiwkwawyawaloli inik kitlatlawti, kilwi "noteohué notlahtokawé, otontekitito otontlakotito, tel ka matsin ipa ka motepetsin ipa". amo mochipautani. amo nikmati. aw sanno ipan in omito xiwitl 1585 años no ikwak maxitiko visurrei don álvaro manrrike de súnika, kinwalwikak in padreme karmenitas, ipan metstli a 17 noviembre. iwan okwalikaya pantsin onkwan xochimilko iwan san gregorio atlapulko, se chikweyi tonali owalatlanamakaya. san onepapatlaloya; seki walaya domingo tlanamakaske, lunes, martes iwan miérkoles. okseki tlakatl tlakwali oyeya tiankistli isihkan omokwepaya ompa ipan in xolal momochko malakatetikpak. okseppa mochiwa nikan anawak inekxitotopewilisneixnamikilis in semanawak. aw chikwetetl in yankwik tepilolkwawitl inka mokets tliltike; ikchiwknawtetl mochiw in yeppa ya wekaw ihkak tepilolkwawitl tlanepantla moketstikis, yehika in omotenew chikwetetl yankwik tepilolkwawitl ik kimanke san kiyawalochtike. aw intla noso on ka iyawitsin anoso ikultsin anoso isitsin anoso iteikaw anoso itiachkaw yewatl kitlekawia in ohome iwitopili in ikpak witsilopochtli. tomas de san migwel chane atlisokan ya onpowalxiwitl i nemi huramento omakok inik otlatolmelaw kito in testiko ya neli melawak i nikitowa i notlatol in axkan in ipan motlatolewiya tlali yewatl wel itlal in atlixeliwki aw ichpoch in axkan moteilwiya ikwak makok i weimolan onpeuwak aw inik nikmati notlatsin katka in okipiyaya tlali itoka xiwtemo iwan sochmitl yewantin kichiwiliyaya in tlali aw in axkan tikpiya in tlali oseki tikpetlawke. totlasotlaya' pobre nodifunto. xiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1492. witskolantoh in ipan motlahtokatlali ye omotenew vii kali xiwitl, 1369; yewatl kontsinti in tlahtokayotl mexiko tenochtitlan, ye tlahtokati. nehin taoltsin, in semi bweno se kikwa tamaltsin. se kipisilowa wan kimanelowah iwan tixtsin wan kipikih ya ika iswat wan se kikwa tamal. . aw in okonkixtiwetsiko in tlapanawi niman isiwka kiwikatikisa in iakal in walatwik atle mantok. xilwananakat in ik konitotewak in tochiwitsin, in ik nonitotewak in koyolchiwki in totonik. nikan ipan in ohtlipan momikiliko in kwitlachtewktli in intlahtokaw tekwanipan tlaka, in iketlamantin nikan okimotokayotitasiko amakemeke chalka, in ihkwak in oyuh ye nepa ompowali ipan ome xiwitl ompa walkiske in inchan astlan || 52r chikomostok; in omotenew kwitlachtewktli in tlahtokat ohtlipan inik kinwalyakan tekwanipan tlaka no ixkichkaw in onpowali ipan ome xiwitl. aw inin || 84r akamapichtli in kimosiwawti itoka ilankweitl, inin ichpoch in tlahtowani kolwakan in itoka xiwitltemok. iwan mochi inin wel omochiw ipaltsinko in totemachtikatsin in itechikawalistsin in itenahnamikilistsin in mikeltsin leonportila vi kali xiwitl, 1589. owiah niman in mexitin motlalitoh atlakwiwayan. yewatl on omochiw ipan makwili tekpatl xiwitl. x tekpatl xiwitl, 1580. onkak eyi taman: monamaka kwesalan wan sakapoasta. aw ye itechpa onasia in xokoyoltepek motenewa, in okachi nikan wal in tlali, aokmo wel mowekatlanowaya ye tepatlapan in tlani, in onkan kiketsaya aotlih in onkan yaskia atl. wan in motepewa sebadita para nkwak ahtli tlemomaktis in yulitl para kikwas. kimach tepitsin nikan mexihko niyetok. aw sano ipan in inik kinyaoyawaloke inik kinnawalpoloke in mexitin in chapoltepek, inik nawkanpa wikoke, inik no yewatl wewe witsiliwitl onkan kasike, kiwikake kolwakan, ompa kimiktike; in iquaqu in mochiw ye oyuh kaxtolxiwitl omei tlahtokati in koxkoxtli in kolwakan. in walmokwepato in sitlan, inik noseppa ye witse onkan kisako in wexotsinko; niman kalpampa ik waltemoke, inik onkan asiko in itokayokan otlatepek in kwawtenko, onkan motlaliko. kitsahtsili imamá inon san nenka tlahtlanilistli. kwaltia aw no ipan in in xiwitl in kinpewaltike xochmilka yaoyotika, in mexika ye teyaochiwa. kexki tomin timopilia? —ken ahmo nitlachias solo nixkokoxoka ken ahmo nitlachias kcnkwa' ninenemis. iax den ma ye ompa nikalaki ammo nechpaktia in tenemilisl okachi kwali ninohkwania ammo nikneki in tlahwalchilistli teixkomakilistli melawak onkate siwame tlen mitsmochiwililia mitsmotsakwiliti iwan ken ka timokixtis san ika tomin ammo tlahyes nien ayammo kiximati in nokal okachi kwali ninohkwania 42. in axkan nokonetsin, kokotsin, nosiwapiltsin, otimoyoliti, otimotlakatili, otimokixti, otimowetsiti in noxilampa, in notoskatlampa. ka omitspik, ka omitsmamal, omitschik, omitskanaw in mottatsin, immotekotsin. aw ma tikaamantinen in tlaltikpak. ¿quen tetloktsinko, ken tenawaktsinko timonemitis? ka owikan, ka temamawtikan, ka ayaxkanyotika inik nemowa. inik ichalowa in tlaltikpak. ka wel ontlami in teix, in teyolo iwan in teakol, in tekwitlapan, in temolik, in tetetepon. inik achitsin kimotemakilia, kimotemahsewaltilia in itleyotsin, in imawisotsin, in itotonkatsin, in iyamankatsin, in itsopelikatsin, in iawiyakatsin in tlakatl, in totekwiyo. inin sa wel kitsakwiko tlayawalolistli inik nikan kissako, ka achto muchiw nowiyan in iskikan nikan tenochtitlan ik tlayawalolok; aw sanno san fransisko kisato, inik mokwepke inchan sanktiago tlatilulko. xoxowki chilmoli ika okonanakatl aw in itepotsko in atenkopa mani tlali yoan ipan hikak kali hakokalo yionteixti tonatiw ikisaian itstikak yoan hitwalo intech powis in omentin pipiltsitsintin niwktsitsiwan simon pedro yoan iteikaw bernaldina. nonantsin okimolwilik inspektor, mawistik tlakatl, wel miak nimitsmotlatlawtilia ma mokawa nosiwanton. kosa kitekipachoa momachtis. ye kiixmati tepitsin letras. kwaltia chikome panwets, panwets xochitl, kwepontikak xochitl, ixpan ipalnemoani. mitsnankili itototsin yewan san katiktemo. in sesek. mahtlaktli iwan tlahko owatsintika. mochiwa kahfentah kampa se kitoka oso itsintan se weyikwowit. ii.- testigo. migwel garsia ichan sank sebastian sakatla in ixiwtlapowal yehepowalxiwitl iwan kastoli omeixiwitl okichiw huramento inik otlatlakoltilok inik amo istlakatis ipaltsinko dios iwan sankta maria iwan santa krus in kilit. nima ye kilnamiki ye umokwepa in imikanpa in ixkich inpa omochiw tlaihyowilistli in chapoltepek in kolwaka. ya misotlak elito ixpolontik elito in okitlahtokatlali in ipiltsin, niman ye kinawatia kilwia "xihuallauh i tinopiltsin, nimitsnawatia xokonmati in kwilotl in sakatl in tlali in okimasewato in tlakatl kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli iwan i mokoltsin okatka in its- || 127v -quauhtzin atlawtekatltewktli in ompa tolteka tsakwaltitlan tenanko. no iw kichiwakon teuktlon, timaloaye kan ketsalmakistla matiloltika ya konawiltia isel teotl. kwalanki inana, kiilwi ipan yei tekpatl xiwitl mochiw inik se immotlalilis pantitlan, in onkann noiwan owets kokolistli. innakayo mexikah tsatsayantikatka. ichpoch pero ahmo kahsike ikwahkon. ipampa in axkan namechnotlaitlanilia namechnotlatlawtilia maxikmonekiltikan in iw nitlaitlani amixpantsinko ka nikitlani hustisia niktemachia in amotlatokayotsin paskwal hernandes. titlanamakaskia sanyeiman otasiko, axkan mopan otitlahtohuayah. in akokohtli kipia ome tlakoyokoktoton nganin mihyowana wan nganin mopachoa. senwets inik nowian altepetlipan, inik tlantika semanawatl itlaltekpan in tekakiltilok inik mochiwas momanas; onkan tikpewaltike in totekiw alkalde fransisko de la krus, regidor mayor thomás de akino, merino pablo ximénes tekikaltitlan. in ipan in mochiw, ye omito, domingo ye teotlak, ik kixonwak in palasio; aw imostlayok ipan lunes in mochiw in horra imissatsin, aw nowian walake in altepetlipan moyetstikate teopixke, in ipan motlatlatlawtiliko in wei tlahtowani rei. ix akatl xiwitl, 1319. no onkan in owala in ihtik omotenew hapón akali in señor sebastián viskaino español vesino mexiko, in onwiya otlachiato umpa habún in keninamikan, kinwikaka in ompa witsa axkan ya yexiwitl oksentlamantin haponti in kinwalwikaka don rodrigo de vivero in ompa governadortito ipan siudad manila china. no se kikwa tatewats se kipoyelia wan se kitewatsa komalko. ¿ ken kineki noyolo, ipalnemowani? ¡ma ok melel on kisa! a iknopilotl ma ok timaliwi, monawak, titeotl. ¿at ya nech mikitlani? in kwowit tak totonik, ta tata maski xoxowik. nima ye ontlaiwa in kuxkuxtli inik mexika konitowa “nixonexca nitlamapiki, ka axka yowa anpopoliuizque”. tlen 129 tlanawatihkayotl. keman amo onkas kwalantli, amo akah tekiwa tlen yaotekayotl welis kichiwas sekinok tekichiwaslitli san tlen melawak iwaya moixtlalihtok yaotekayotl. san onkas komandansias militares nelitstoseh iwan senitstoseh ipan kastilos, kaltlachikawalo iwan kaltlaahokwilmeh tlen tlatskitoseh ipan sentlanawatiloyan; noso ipan kampamentos, kwarteles iwan ostoko, tlen kiawak chinanko mochantlaliseh iwikpa asiseh tropas. yewa tonan a teumechave mokisikan tamoanchan. awiya! istak xochitla o ya kweponka yewa tonan a teumechave mokisikan tamoanchan. inik momikilike krustitech kinmamasowaltike, itech kitetsotsonke in inmatsin, aw in wel momikilike in ipan altepetl itokayokan xabón, iwan oksekintin christianosme ompa tlaka in xabón in imochtintsitsin momikilike, kinmosepanmiktilike; itenkopa mochiw in ompa wei tlahtowani xabón. iwan okito ma ok onmochiwa ka ok niknankilis in tlatoli apelasion nikchiwas ayamo ik mako ok newatl nikmati yuh kito in fiskal imixpan in ompa wewetke iwan imixpan in moteilwia newatl nixpan eskribano. ante mí migwel monise eskribano. aw in kali yoan itlalo itepanyo monamakas sempoali mokwis yehoatl kimanas in nopiltsin ana xwares ka nel itlalpantsinko in ipan ikak kali aw in atentli ka nel imaxkatsin ka muchi kisenwika. iiii tochtli xiwitl, 1262. axan maski se biexito kipanawitewa' al kontrario en ves de kitlahpaloske bwenamente kontopewtewa' in biexito. in itakilo no kwali se kikwa kaldito oso chilposontsin, se kimanelowa iwan nakat oso akoloj, nochi weli, se kichiwa kemeh se kinekis, weli se kikwa iuki sah taamanal. ¿ach akok wits? ye ikwak ixpoliw in tlatilulkatl, wei oselotl wei tiakaw; ik omosema i nekalistli, ye ikwak no kontlaske. titlanamakaskia viii tochtli xiwitl, 1578. kanin in ayauhitwalko in xochitwalko in onkan ka in chalchiwmomostli in omexaltenko? ompa in titlamatiwi, aw san tonkistikisa in nikan in omechalko". tewa tia tochan. para asan yakmo asan yakmo ohkion itoka naxkan ye puro kanén kastiya mopuwan tomin akmo keme okatka yaya ika mehikano. tlasesekayotl kinotski. mehor nama san innemise no ihkí yaha mah timotekipanokan no. newa san tepitsin ni inglestlahtowa. san nopa tlahko tonal kimatihki itata para ya 108. at ye no tewatsin mopantsinko okikawtiake in tetewktin, in tlahtoke, in tlatkilistli, in tlamamalistli; in tlakaskaltiloni, in tlakawapawaloni. ma motlantsinko tikmakili immomatsin, immokxitsin; ma timakochtlatsiw; ma titeputstlatsiw; ma tikinxikkaw, ma tikinteputskaw immatsin, immotepetsin; ma xokommoknelilitsino. ma kokolistli nimitsnokwitilitsino, ma temoxtli, ma ehekatl nimitsnokwitili, nimitsnekawiltili, ka timotlakotilia, ka timotekitilia. ka miek immotewktekitsin, immotlahtokatekitsin, in tikmomachitia. inik tikmotkilia, inik tikmomamalia immatsin, immotepetsin. ka ye ixkich. in sententsin, in senkamatsin in ik nikpachowa immomatsin, immokxitsin, immelchikiwtsin, immotsontekontsin. ma ximewititie, nopiltsintsine. nimitstatsintokiti . aw ye ixkich in ye mochi in omotenew: in ketsali, in teokwitlatl, in chalchiwitl in ixkich tlasoiwitl ok senka onkan omiekix otlapiwix. axkimatih kani kikakatsose. nima ye kitemolia motekusoma in kenin kilwikistilia intew; nima ye kimilwia “quenami? ma xiktlalika in keskich itlatlatkio, ma xicchiuaca”. inon kawayo wel patio. in tsiwtekatsin iwan matlaltsin ka ya yewantin intech kis in mistliyawtsin, in konmosiwawti in tenanko tlahtowani katka itoka itstlotsintewktli; ompa walya in tekwanipan in mistliyawtsin, onkan tlakat in kwawtlewanitsin tlailotlaktewktli tlahtowani katka. axkan martes in ik 29 mani metstli abril de 1614 años, || 248 ihkwak wel ipan ilwitsin in mosentlamachtiani san pedro mártir, owala tlahtoli españa in ipampa yewatsin rei kiwalmopatilia in nikan itlachixkatsin fiskal del rei okatka el lisensiado valesilo, aw ok yewatl itlachixkatsin fiskal del rei de lo sivil kiwalmochiwilia in gardós de valensia alkalde de korte okatka. kema yaiki axan yoksetik yomokambiaro. neka tototl matlaltik. sayoh in xokoyoltaol morado in iewayo. mochiwa kampa eski. in ik tlaiya in ik tlaiwaloya puchteka kaxitl in ik temakoya atoli aw in kwachpani. nemiskiah kemah se kikwi tahko panelah wan ika kochilo se kixihxima wan se kimapolowa ika yehwa ya in iteyo waukilit tein ipa takwechol kolochmapolowa mah sentsopeya wan kikwah ya. aw i ye yuhki amo mowelkaki, ye no ik pew i yaoyotl. tlen 65 tlanawatihkayotl. in weyi tlahtokan monechikos ipan 1º tlen septiembre metstli tlen nochi xiwitl, iwikpa mochiwas tlen se itehkia nechikolistli, ipan 1º tlen febrero metstli tlen nochi xiwitl iwikpa mochiwas tlen ome itehkia nechikolistli. ipan ome nechikolismeh tlen weyi tlahtokan ipan motlalis tlen ixtlamachtilistli, tlayeyekoli iwan tlaixwasantli tlayeyekolmeh tlen tlahtol tlanawatili tlen ixnesis iwan tlaxolewali tlen sekinok itechpowi tlahtolmeh ken moihtowa ipan amatlanawatili. ipan se iwan se kawitl tlen itehkia nechikolistli in weyi tlahtokan ipan motlalis nochi tlamantli tlahtoli tlen moixtlalia ipan iyolkayo tlahtol tlanawatli. alawakseknanakat —tleno ayowa onka notia. in ipan axkan ik viii mani metstli oktubre de 1605 años, ikwak maxitiko nikan mexiko in yewatsitsin || 44 padreme sant augustín deskalsos in kintokayotia regoredos. kana yeyipoali peso, mach amo ika ximotekipachohtsino testigo. i.- hwan kano ichan san hwan tsapotla in ixiwtlapowal ye onpowalxiwitl onkastoli okichiw huramento inik otlatlakoltilok ipaltsinko dios iwan sankta maria iwan sankta krus. in amo kwaltia para pahti, solo para se kikwas, se kikwalia ixiuyo wan ikwouyo komo sehselik. iteyo no se kikwa, yeh se kiwatsa mah kisa iewayo se kiewayohkixtia kemeh kahfen wan se kiixpitsa. xolotsin, nokonetsin, titlatowani, t'axayacaton, san timonenkawan, nowik timomahmana, tonmokichitowa, ¿ kwix nonmati, ikimiximati ye moyaowan, nokonetsin ? kwaltia yewa amotlen kimati. iuki kitokaitiah por in kitemaka papayas. ma iwian inmatitech xi kim on antiw xi kim on aantiw, xi kim on ololotiw xi kim on tepewitiw xi kim on senkixtitiw xi kim on nechikotiw in moteiikawan. in iuki kitokaitiah por in no iuki ahwiak kemeh xantiaj. miyake keskinoso ahmo nikilnamiki keski ome boregati wan yeyin kwikolelohti yeyin kolelohti tele tlakwa' yeyi kolelohti. para nanochin, tlanamakas wahki nopa atl isisna. mochiwa milah oso kajfentaj. wei tlayawalolistli in omuchiw axkan. aw sanno yuh kihto in kwawitsatsin: "ca ye kwali, tlahtowanié, ka otikmitalwi; intla no sekintin nopan kalakikiwi no ompa inwikpa nikimoniwas in topilwan, ompa kintlayekoltitiwi in tekwanipan". onkán ye nipewaltia nikihkiti yeka nihpehpena mochi areglado nihyekoa. ma kwakwalaka in tomatl ika chili, xonakatl iwan axox; ihkwak inin ye tlawikxitili ye motesi metlapan ahnoso ika tepustlatsoaloni; ihtik in sokikaxitl motlalia in pitsochiyawisotl, motsoyonia in chilmoli iwan ye motlalilia in tlaxamanilnanakatl, in ye kwali tlapaktli, iwan ye mowikxitia. sesen minoto kwakwaltsin. aw ik niman walmoma in metstli de disiembre de 1607 años. aw san ok ye onkan in mokwepako in ontlatokamakako; aw nokwel noseppa yahke in tonaliitlatlayan, ok onkan makwilxiwtike. rei ya nopapá. walewake motlaliko tolpetlak nepopowalko, motlalmomostike, ye exiwtia unka miki tekuhilama; nima ye ik omotlalia tlasotsi, makwilxiwtike. iiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1444. inik chiwalok yokoyalok semanawatl iwan in ixkich tlamantli tlachiwali in kimochiwili totekwiyo dios in ipa chikwasemilwitl aw ik asiktlanki in kimochiwili adam. axkan lunes sankto in ik 1 semilwitl mani metstli abril de 1613 años teotlak, ihkwak ikoppa otlayawaloke in sankta maría kwepopan tlaka in kofrades in itech powi animasme, in ompa kimotlalili inpalewiloka in padre frai diego mexía, in ika imekanelpiayatsin ikordontsin totlasottatsin san fransisko kinmopalewilia kimonmokixtilia in ompa tetlechipawaloyan purgatorio; ka yuh nestia onkan inik tlayawaloke || 207 kimowikilike andasko san fransisko kinmokixtiltiw in animasme in ika omotenew imekanelpiayatsin in ikordontsin in onkan omotenew tetlechipawaloyan itenkopatsinko in totekwiyo dios. inik ye mochi in mamaltin in otsetseliwtoka i nowian in altepetlipan, i nikan mexiko in tlalwaktlipan in chinampa in akolwakan in matlatsinko || 106v in mamaltin in ye mochi kinnechikoke in kinsentlalike; in mosenpowke onxikipili tsapoteka, yexikipili in tlahpaneka, onxikipili in wexotsinka, aw yexikipili tsiwkowaka ipan sentsontli ipan matlakpowali, anoso matlaktekpantli mitowa; aw ka ixkichtin in in tsetseliwtoka in pieloya i nowian in altepetlipan in techyawalotikate. tlen 73 tlanawatihkayotl. ni kongreso ki pia i tsontekoh ipan: i. iwikpa kinselis yankwik tlaltlanawatilmeh ipan sentlanawatiloyan; ii. tlakontontli. iii. iwikpa kichiwas yankwik tlaltlanawatilmeh ipan nepamitl tlen moneskayotihtoka, san moneki 1o. tlen tlatlapantli noso miak tlatlapantli kinekiseh mochiwaseh tlaltlanahuatilmeh, monekis kipiaseh kaxtoli xikipilmeh altepechanehke, nopa tlen amo nelmiak. 2o. ma moixnexti kampa weyi tlahtokan melawak kipia miak tlamantli tlen ika welis mopanoltis ipan tlahtoli nemilistli. 3o. mamokakilikan in tlahtokan tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh intlali mokalakihtok, kampa moihtos tla kwali noso axkwali moketsas se yankwik tlaltlanawatili, iwan monekis temaktiliseh amatlapowali ipan chikwaseh metstli, pewas mopowas ipan tonati keman kintitlaniliseh amatl tlen itechpowi. 4o. iwan noihki mamokakili tekichiwani tlen sentlanawatiloyan, iwan yewa kititlanis amatlapowali ipan chikome tonatih tlen mopowas keman quitlahtlaniliseh. 5o. mamomatlahanakah ome tlen eyi tlatlapantli tepantlahtoanih kampa kiseliah yankwik tlaltlanawatili iwan noihki wekapah tepantlahtoanih ipan tlen yewan intlahtokan. 6o. itlahtol tlaxolewali tlen weyi tlahtokan makinelselikan miakintin tlahtokan tlen tlaltalnahuatilmeh, achtowi moitas amatl nechikolistli, iwan tla kikwalitah tlahtokan tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh inaxka tlali. 7o. tla tlahtokan tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh tlen inaxka tlali, amo quicualmahtoseh, in tlahtoltlasenkawali tlen moihtowa ipan tlatlapantli tlen onpanok, moneki mochiwas ika intlahtol tlen ome tlen eyi tlen nochia tlahtokan tlen sekinok tlaltlanahuatilmeh. iv. tlakotontli. v. iwikpa mopatlas inincha weyi chikawalistli tlen sentlanawatiloyan; vi. tlakontli; vii. iwikpa kiixtlalis tlapalewilistli tlen monekis tlen ika moaxitis tomin tlanekilistli; viii. iwikpa tlatemaktilis tlahtolpechtli tlen ika tekichiwani welis kichiwas empréstitos tlen ika tlapalewis totlalnantsin, iwikpa kikwalitas yaya nopa empréstitos iwan iwikpa kiixtlalis iwan tlanawatis mamotlaxtlawa tlen tlawika anawak tlaltipaktli. amo tlenon empréstito welis mochiwas san tlen monekis ika moketsas tlachiwalmeh tlen ika kipiwis tomin tlen altepeyotl, iwan noihki tlen mochiwas ipampa mokwaltlalis tominyotl, in tekichiwalmeh tlen mokwepani iwan tlen motlatlanis keman tlehtleya kwesoli kiihtos weyi tlayekanani tlen totlalnantsin ken moihtowa ipan 29 tlanawatihkayotl. iwan noihki, sesen xiwitl kikwalmatis kenachi motlanewis tlen moneki motlalis ipan tlahtol tlanawatili tlen tomin moselia, tlen kinekis tekiwakayotl tlen iyolo weyi altepetl iwan tlaltlanawatilmeh tlen altepeyotl, ken moihtowa ipan tlahtolpechtli tlen itechpowi tlahtol tlanawatili. in tekichiwani tlen sentlanawatiloyan sesen xiwitl kimatiltis weyi tlahtokan nechikolistli kenihki mochihki tlen tlawika tekiwa tlen iyolo weyi altepetl kimaktilis amatlapowali tlen kenihki kiitski tlaxtlawili. in tekiwa tlen iyolo weyi altepetl nohkia kimatiltis nechikolistli tlen tlaixnextilistli tlen iyolo weyi altepetl, keman tlatemaktilis altepeyotl tlaxtlawili; ix. iwikpa kikotonas tlanamakilistli tlen se tlaltlanawatili iwan seyok tlaltlamatili mamochiwa ika tlatamachiwali; x. iwikpa tlanawatilchiwas ipan nochi totlalnantsin tlen chapopohtli, tepostetl, atl tlen tlamaneloli, tlatopontli, tlatopontli tlachiwali, tlamawisol tekitl, tlanamakilistli, mawiltilistli ika tomih, tomin tlatlanewil, tlawili chikawalistli iwan iwikpa kikixtis tlanawatilmeh tlen itechpowi 123 tlanawatihkayotl; xi. iwikpa moyolitis iwan mopoliwiltis altepeyotekitl tlen sentlanawatiloyan iwan monextis, mopiwis noso motemowis itlatemaktilis; xii. iwikpa tlatenochilis yaoyotl, tlen keman kimaktilis tlatolpowali in tekichiwani; xiii. iwikpa aw ikwak provinsial in frai hwan laskano, aw in gwardián yankwikan mowetsiltito in mokalaki itoka frai diego redón, iwan oksekintin teopixke. iskate i much tlaka. . puchtlan, awachtlan, atlawko, akxotlan, tepetitlan, itstulko, tsonmolko inin chikwasen petlame sesenme teyakanke tlapachowa. —nian se mextli ilwikapa monextia. aw x tekpatl xiwitl, 1242 años, ipan i momikiliko in kwitlachtewktli tlahtowani wixtoko inik nowian walnentiake, inik walatokatitia otlipan 22 xiwitl. aw in kinteittitike onkan in selar kalixkwak, wei kwawtlapechtli onkan moman; iwan in onkan motlalike tlahtoke visurrei oidoresme, aw in onkan motemachtili a la china arsobispo itoka don frai ignasio de milas. .nech iya ikinokawketl. ma niyavia ma niapolivis ni yoatsin chalchiwtla noyolo ateukwitlatl nokon ya ittas ipan itla melastik iwan ixpehpeltik mosohwa in textli, welis se sentímetro tilawak; ipan textli mopetlawia in etextli, ahso in awaxtextli ahnoso in kalwahsatextli, satepan ye mokwi tlen aki tomak, ye motamalpiki iwan ye moihpotokwikxitia. temawti tlalolin okiwitek in altepetl mexikotenochtitlan in ipan nawtsontli onkaxtoli onnawpoali ommakwili xiwitl. owets wei kakali iwan miekintin tlakah omikke. in iw nikmati ka inik patlawak senpowalmatl ipan chikwematl aw inik weyak honpowalmatl ipan chikwematl in itlal in akamapitsin in axka mexiko tlatowani don lwis de santa maria ka itatsin katka in akamapitsin iwan in itoka don martin momawti ka omextin ipilwan katka. ka mowika, ka mokweptisinoa, aw san niman ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl motlahtokatlali in ipiltsin itoka nesawalpili tlahtowani tetskoko; inik motlahtokatlaliko ye chiwknawxiwtia. in motokayotiah astekakalpoltin, okimokawilitoh inwewetlaltsin itokayokan astlan, aw niman ik omopanoltikoh wei kolwakan. para motekipanoskeh nopilwan. imixpan omochiw testigos: pedro flores español, fransisko de fenevides español anan de leon español a, fransisko hernandes algwasil manyor iwan mochintin imixpan omochiw in tlaxilakaleke in tlakpak omotokatenewke. aw inik momikiliko, ye iw nepa matlakxiwitl kimokawilika imak in don hwan martín in igovernasiotekitsin katka wewe don antonio valeriano, ka mosewitikatka inik onmomikiliko. aw niman yahke in tlahtoke in chichimeka in atonaltsin iwan in tliltekatsin in amito, aw i keskiyok in ye tleko in tsiwtlakawki in yaopol in amakeme ikpak, inpan mokalakito in atonaltsin chichimekatewktli iwan in tliltekatsin chichimekayaotekiwa; ipetlakaltsin kimamatiw, in tlei in iteow katka onkan onotiw. laño 1980 para ye'on yenomaka kwenta yonika*xilti nobenta años, nobenta años nikahxilti ye'on yenomaka kwenta in den siglo pasado wan de nin siglo. makilikan xikilnamikikan kanik nanyaske nantlachatiwe in kwawtla. . aw ka is ka in tokokokaw in otikmahsewke intelchikiw in totsontekon ipatiw omochiw. para mochiwa wan abrileño non solo kwatro meses yomuchiw in tlaoli de abril abrileño. tlen 39 tlanawatihkayotl. in anawak sentlanawatikayotl mani ipan inelwayotipa altepeyotl. nochi chikawalistli tlen altepechantli moyolitia ipan altepeyotl iwan mochantlalia tlen ika mopalewis yewa altepeyotl. in altepeyotl nochi tonatih kipia xitlawak itechpowi kixolewas noso kipatlas tlen kenihki mochiwa tlanawatihkayotl. kwaltia onkán yewál motemowia de nohtlame. aw niman owala istlapalteowa yowalnepamtla amo tikiximati kampa owala aw in yewatl okitowaya ichan masisitlan ostok. niman owala themilotli nepamptla tonatiw okinwalwikak totome awawilome ik okitlapalo xochitekutli. in xipohlimah ipa se taman saj. tlahkoxonakatl ahmo wel wehyi nima e ik choka in timal, au in timal nima e onka kwikapiki, e kewa “timal, timal! niyol nikwawipila newa timal. aw iwan kinwalwikaske in insiwawan, nikan mosewikiwi". aw san ye kene tlatsakwia tekwachtli e powali on makwili kakawatl ipatiw katka. pané nochi in tiempo xochiyohtok. semi intla sentechichiton okimikti otechyolkokoh otikpolohkeh silvia. ma kimatikan in in akike kittaske amatl: in iksekkan ka europa, in ikokkan ka asia, in ikexkan ka afrika, in iknawkan ka nwevo mundo, inin kitosneki yankwik semanawak. kwel san xon awiyakan, ma ya walmoketsa a inyolo in kokowa. in tlamasewali ipan tonka, teuktli kan kwateotl, chalchiwtlatonak. aw in ihkwak in ye oiw nepa nawpowali ipan ome xiwitl ompa walkiske in inchan astlan chikomostok, inik tlayawaloke, inik onkan in motlaliko intlan chalka akxoteka in atentlipan, inik no yewantin oksentetl tokaitl okikwitasiko inik no okimotokayotike chalka in amakemeke. 8r nikitowa i newatl don hwa bawtista de de gauna, don hosé del kastilo, don hosé de santa maría, tixpa omonexitike in tlato istlakossawke don gregorio de los angeles, don migwel de los angeles, don hernando siwailakasin, don hwan bawtista, don migwel kesalmasasin, in ikwak omotepantotopewaya in tlailotlake, iwa tlatoke istlakosawke ikatika in kwawtlatli istlakosawkan. tehwa más ke tikitas newin . ma ompa popowto ma ompa ixtlauto in iknopilotl in iknotlakayotl. aw in yuh konitoa tlatlanonotsa tesasasanilwia, san nenewki in itlachielis mochiw, inik tlanextiaya; inikwak okimittake teteu in san nenewki in itlachielis, niman ye noseppa ik nennotsalo, kitoke ix tekpatl xiwitl, 1072. yese inin omentin amo neltilistli in nikan tlakatiko, ye ompa tlakatke in atenko, in iw omito tlakpak itech kiske in siwapili silkwetsin in isiwaw katka in tlakatl kwawitsatsin. in mochiwa itech kwapalak, kwouhihtik, kampa kuapalaktaj. nikan ipan in i walewake chikomostok ahnoso ihkwak ahsiko in onkan wexotla in tochintewktli inewan motlaliko in itoka akulwatewktli sanno chichimekatl, ipampa ye- || 24v -huatl inik motenewa akulwakan in wexotla iwan tetskuko. tlakayo okalakoak onkwan méxiko; noihki otlanamakaya, okseki opantlasenkwia. okseki okisenkwia kwawitl; okixexeloaya iwan ikaltempa okinamakaya. aw i mexika in kwauchpame yoan matlaktesakawake uk unpa unkawaloke uk wekawake. in yektlaxelolis tlakwali nemilispa itech moneki. in ipan in mani yaoyotl chalko. tlakapa martínes omikwak. makwili tlakatle totekuyoye tlokehe, nawakahe ka ye kitimaloa, ka ye kimotlamachtia, ka ye kimokwiltonoa aw ka ye kitlamachtia, in kwawitl, in tetl, in mosomaltsin, in mokwalantsin: in neli mach in pôpocatoc, in chichinawtok: in itech tikmotlalilia, in itech tikmopachilwia inik ipan tikmopixalwia, in ipan tikmotsetselwia in akatl in awachyo aw inik itech tikmopachilwia, in atl sesek, in tsitsikastli in tlankoliwki. ika ome litro iwan tlahko atl mowikxitia in tliletl. in ye kwali tlapaktli, ika xonakatl, axox, pitsochiyawisotl iwan istatl in tenochtli inok kipia in iewayo achto mopohpoa kwali inik mokixtilis in iahwayo yehika senka tekohkolti in ihkwak ika titotspinia, moixtlapana iwan motlalilia in etl inik wiksis. iximacho inin imawkatlahtlakol yuhki "chollollan itlakamiktilis". ik sentetl aw in tlei nikan in intechpa mitowa in insenkiska in insenkawaloka in manenenke, ka nel intech moneki intech powki, aw inik kinankilia in iwki itechpa in tlakatl in inemachilistika, aw in iwki in itlamachilistika aw in ima inik mopalewia in inechichiwalistika kinextia inik kitlapachos in inakayo iwan inik kitsitskis in itlawis in iyaotlatki inik momanawis. aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl, in iw kitowa sekintin wewetke mexika, ipan in in chikwasen tochtli in tsintik yaoyotl, i pew in momah inik kinpewke chalka; ye omito, ipan vi tochtli xiwitl in tsintik yaoyotl, aw senpowalxiwitl in tsawktikatka in chalko. in nikotsapot se kipipina, semi tsopek. itlanahnamik: itakka se kikwa se kipixka wan kemah se kimapata para se kikixtilia in iteyo wan mokawa in ipachyotsin. aw iwan ye kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan yepowalomatlaktli ipan se xiwitl in ipan vii akatl xiwitl, 1239 años, in kikaw teyakanalisyotl in tlasotsin, in teyakan makwilxiwitl; aw sa niman ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl motlali in toskwekwextli in teyakanas. xi tochtli xiwitl, 1074. ma ok achitsinka in tetlok, tenawak. ¿aix yes, o aik nawias, aik niwelamatis? ¿ln kan on nemia noyolo? ¿can wel nochan, kan wel nokal amanis? san nitolinia in tlaltikpak. timotolinia, noyolo, maka xinentlamati tlaltikpak ye nikan. o an ka iwki notonal, kimatia. aw niman onkan kinnots in kimoteotiaya, kimilwi in atonaltsin chichimekatewktli iwan in oksekintin totolimpaneka chichimeka "yn axkan makwili ikpak nalis nitlakwas in iska tepetl". ihkon kemeh tehwa tikwaltitanik, titenantsi", ihkino kiilwi. xochitika 00 tontlatlakwilowa kwaltia maamana in ihkwak ye totonia in siwaehichi in okichehichime san kihnekwi iwan ye mochipa kitokatinemi miek tonali ayokmo ahsi inchan mochanihkwania nien ammo tlakwa mochantia in okichchichime ikaltitech in siwachichi intla in okichchichi mochipa kitokatinemi iteko axkan ipampa in siwachichi kikahkawa ayokmo kiwika mila miekpan san kohwanaltia iteko sankikwarnana iwan san niman mokwepa itech in siwachichi san kemmanian teotlahkan anoso ipan domingo oninawiltiayanochan indok in nokniuwan iwan ipan ohtli intlok in nokupixwan aik oniwia tlamachtilkalko nien notahtsitsiwan aik intechtsinko ones melewiliskiani niksalos in tlapowaiistli san nikilnamiki seppa kin tiyaskiani titekitiske nonantsin okimolwili notahtsin kinmach seki kokoneken ne ye yaya momachtiske iwan kwali yeskiani no ne ma ninomachti notahtsin ammitla omotlanankilili san omoikak kinmohtilito in kawahtin intla yokimatlitihkeh iwan ompa omokawtsino itech in kawahkali ahso monemiliaya ken mayitiskiani inda nias tlamachtilkalko ipampa immanon ye miek nikmopalewiliaya aw iwan ye senpowalxiwitl ipan nawxiwitl in ipan 2 kali xiwitl, 1585 años, in omochiw sankto konsilio in teoyotika nesentlalilistli in nikan mexiko, inik tlayawalolok. in sesek. itlanahnamik: aw kil in ixkichtin siwateopixke in monhastin motsakwiltitoke monasterios mexiko, kil mochintin kinkixtiskia in ichpopochtin kinmosiwawtiskia in tliltike, kil oksenka yewantin intech tlahtowaya in omentin ichpochwan tlahtowani don lwis de velasko markés de salinas pressidente del konseho de indias in españa. in kwamekat. kipalewihke para kipehpenki. in oumotlali nima ye kimana tlatokakali yoan kikwani in tiankistli, unka kiman in axka mani. axkan domingo in ik 5 mani metstli oktubre de 1614 años, ihkwak in opew in ompa totlasonantsin sankta maría del karme in ilwitsin ye kimochiwililia in omotenewtsino tenantsin la madre sankta || 260 theresa de hesús virgen karmelita deskalsa; inin ye omito ayemo isenyo san ok beatifikasión, inik kimolwichiwililia yniqu ikatsinko moteilwikowanochilia ipilwantsitsinwan teopixke karme. axkan viernes a xvii de febrero, ikwak nikan kiske chachapoltin tlatilolkopa walitstiake; ye tlapoyawa kan nowian senmantiake inik yake. aw in yewantin in onimechilwi in chichimeka ka sanno yuhki kichiwaya, ipampa ka okinmachtike in tlaxkalteka. amo kwaltia para pahti, sayoh se kikwa in ikamohyo in tein istak kikixtiah wan kikwah xoxowik, tsopek in ikamohyo. mah amo keman kwawnexwetsto, aw imomextin in inamiktsin in ompa momikilike imomextin, ompa toktitok in innakayo; aw chikokkan in okipacho altepetl: kaliimanyan, tlatilolko, xochmilko, kwitlawak, akolman, mexiko, ikchikokkan in tlatilolko, oppa omilochti ikoppa in in axkan ompa omomikili. oksekni aw in axkan ka ixpantsinko nonixtlapachtlasa i nitlatlakohoani amo nitlapolohoa senka tlachixtika inaniman ye nokonpehoaltiya in nodestamento. yei totoltetl ayohwachmoli tlen 50 tlanawatihkayotl. in chikawalistli tlen tlahtolchiwali tlen mexikameh sentlanawatiloyan moixtlalia ipan sentika tlahtokan, tlen moxeloa ipan ome tlahtokan, se tlen tepantlahtoanih iwan seyok tlen wehkapah tepantlahtoanih. tlaxexeloli tlen i tlen kenihki motekiwetlalis iwan mochantlalis sentika tlahtokan talkwechaktsin, pero ya yawi se itoka chikometepetl —inganin pus in altotonga pero nehwa ahmo nias. aw i yewatl itoka diógenes laersio in ipa innemilis in tlamatinime in mitowa motenewa philósophos, i ye kitos kitenewas in itsinpewkapa in tlamachilistli philosophía nimann ik kompewaltia in kiteittitia kitenextilia in keni yewatsin teoixtlamachilistsintli in totekwiyo dios, in kichiw tlatolpewkatenonotsalistli in ipan iamaw onkan kihto; aw ka i yewantin achto in iw tlamanitike in iw kichiwaya ka teopixke katka gentiles in tlapalewiaya in ixkich tlamantli ka teoyotl ka nel tlamachilistli akotlakpakka iwan wel tlekotika, || 6v ka itla wel tikitstimotlalikan i nawatili tlaltikpak in totech powki inik titlaka, ka imanel yewantin tlateotokanime in gentiles anoso yewantin christianostin in tikimita ka itechpatsinko pewa in totekwiyo dios, ka nel yewatsin tsinpewkayotsintli itepechotsin in ixkich kwali yektli. teteo mosentlalike in teotiwakan kani moilochti, ye in tlayili ipan in tlaltikpantli okachi tepakti. onkak ome taman: ikwouyo kwaltia para wapal. . aw in intlatki ayak wel kittaya in kexkich in aso sem akali senka kitlatiaya kitlapachowaya. kwalanih iniikni yon axkinchihki kwenta tixpan owalake doña maria de don diego, don pedro dionisyo, ompa chaneke san pablo teokaltitlan kitoke ka tiktokakiltiliko in hustisia in itechkopa in tokal sentetl tonatiw ikisayanpa itstikak in itepots namatl aw in iyomotlan yematl iwan yetetl in chinamitl tonatiw ikalakiyanpa itstitemi inik wiyak matlakmatl iwan nanamatl iwan tlalmantli inik patlawak matlakmatl aw inik wiak matlakmatl iwan se matl in ye mochi inik machiyotimani kostik tlapali. in ipan in xiwitl onkan sexiwti in onkan omotenew walmotekato in kwawitsatsin in texkalko omemasak; onkan walitstok ik onkan tlamasewtoka. in amo kwali tlaketski tlatolchochopok, tlatolkampax; tenkwappol, tenkwawitl. tlahelaketsa, tlahelatoa, awilatoa, amo mamawti. aw in teukwitlatl kikistito kwitlawaktonko icha itspotonki; in okonkistiko totekwiowa, ye nosepa kiwika koyoaka ilpitiwi. iuki monotsa por in iihtik in tsapot istak. ihwak tsikitsin se kimewa. neka tlapalatl xoxoktik. achi kwali axonka. ihkwak ye oticalquizqueh, nonana iwan siwatekipano insel mocahuah. aw ik niman yewantsitsin kimonmotokilitiake in senka mawistililoni teopixke hermitaños in itlasopilwantsitsinwan totlasomawistatsin sant augustín obispo hiponia wei iteotlamatilismatkatsin in sankta iglesia; ahso wel nawpowalonmatlaktin in onkan momaniltitiake omotenew ik tetokok, se in krus manka kimowikilike, nekok itlok mantia ome siliares, iwan se kapa kimotlalilitia iwan nekok itloktsinko mantiake ome diágonos almátikas kitlalitiake. yaonotlaweliltik, in axayakatl, in amo monamaka. ihiwian inin sisiwanton. onkán mihkiti yetik moyekoa. nepapan xochitl mah amo teh kitekipacho, yei axoxtlantli yewan aw in oiwkimottilih in tlahtoani obispo iwan in ixkichtin onkan katka, motlancuaquetzqueh, senka quimahuizohqueh; quimotztimoquetzqueh, tlaocoxqueh, moyoltoneuhqueh, iwkin ahkoyah in inyolloh, in intlalnamikilis. ipan nawtsontli omompoali onchikwei xiwitl, in teopixki migwel sánches kipanitlasa iamox itech inetenextilis senkiska ichpochtli in itoka gwadalupe. aw yewatl temilotsin amo kikakisneki in kisalowa makamo yaw in kapa yasneki; kiwalittake atlan owalmomayaw, atlak xowitektiwits, tonatiw ikalakiapa itstiwis. ka yewatl ipampa in yniqu intepantlahtokatsin okimochiwilike españoles iwan tewantin timasewalti mexiko, oksenka yewatsin in tlahtowani arsobispo visurrei i sankto tepantlahtokatsin okimochiwili in ipampa sa mokokotsinotinemi, wel ipan motlahtolti inik pielos itlasoilwitsin, ok makwililwitl tasiske in ilwitsin yes in tsontek onkan audiensia real, kimosepanwilike in oidoresme inik patrón mochiwtsino, yehika amo kisasneki in tlalolinalistli, san momostlaye in tepitsin ik tlalolini; inik ompa walpewtika in omotenew senka chikawak ik tlalolin inik axkan sábado ye matlakpan tlalolini, san mostlatika wiptlatika mochiwtiw. tla newa nieskia. axakak para aki temana tleya i tekpatl xiwitl, 1168. aw yoan tepantlatsakwilo muchiwa ixamitl intech powis fransisko ximenes yoan inamik hoana hernandes teskatsonko chaneke san kixitiniske. sayoh se taman. in ipan in siudad mexiko a 25 de mayo, ikwak wala asiko in itlahtolotsin arsobispo don pedro moya de kontreras inik omomikili in ompa kastila; aw in iw mokak tlahtoli in ipan karta in walikwiliwtia in momikili ipan de febrero. nikintlamakas nochichiwan nikinkahsilia muchtin. tlakatki nopa pilkonetsi aw iskate in i mochtin ye omotokatenewke tlakpak in tetewktin katka in atenko in ikse tlakatl itoka mekawatsin amilkatltewktli, in ikomentin itoka kowamilkatltewktli, in ikeintin itoka chalchiwtsin tlakatewktli, in iknawintin itoka hekakwikani tlailotlak, in ikmakwiltin itoka tepomekatl tepaltochtli tekiwa, in ikchikwasemin itoka akacholowa tepamekatl. mahtlakpwali ¿in akin teka otitlahto? aw inhi “coluaquehé, sa tikinpopolowa i ye yuhki in onenonotzaloc”. na nihmachili para ta timexikano. axkan sábado ik 21 mani metstli henero de 1612 años, ihkwak notifikasión okichiwilito san hoseph san fransisko in frai herónimo de sárate kapelán san joseph; yewatl onkan notifikasión kichiwiliko in señor fransisko franko eskrivano audiensia real, intlanawatiltikatsinko in señores oidoresme in iw mochiw, ipampa kiteilwi in maría lúpes chokolanamakak tetskoko ichan, yese nikan mexiko tlatilko omochantiko, ye nikan moyotlan ponwi. ipampa in inik okitokamakake tepetsintli chalchiwmomostli; inik onkan ontlamasewaya onmoxtlawaya in omotenewke ulmeka in xikalanka in xochteka in kiyawisteka in kukolka. in iw kitotiwi in omotenewke wewetke, kilmach ye kin ihkwak in omokwepako nikan okseppa in atonaltsin, ye kin ihkwak in inekwepyan, in iw konitowa amo wel semilwitl, inik niman ye tlalmasewa ye tlalikwilowa in imomextin omotenewke tlahtoke; ye kimasewa in kwawixtlawatl in kwilotl in kakatl in tepetl in atlawtli, in ye mochi in ixkichtlamantli in iw omotenew tlakpak. aw in ipampa aokmo yuhki mochiwasin, pena ik kinmotlalili in tlahtowani in frailes iwan españoles, yuh nawatiloke in ipan tekpoyotl tsatsik, sa kavaloti in kintlamamaliske ohtlipan in tlein kanin kinwikiliske; yuh wala yamatsin isedulatsin, yuh walmotlanawatili in toweitlahtokatsin rei don felipe tersero in moyetstika españa. xxviii pregon. a diesiocho dias del mes de mayo de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in ipan tlaxilakali teskatsonko okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal in itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak tle kito testigo pedro hernandes. ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. kwaltia itskwawtsin inik okihtak in kimakataya in iikniw okwalankamewatikets yolokokole posonini okatka okipewalti in kaxtilanyaotekiwa ompa ipan kalmekak okimachtihkeh ken ika teihkalis san ika imawan yuhkin okichiw ahmo okitekipacho in momatsayanas ika itepuskimilol in iyaow niman okitlamanali in tonatiw okitlachialtihtaya in iyol in iyao iwikpaktsinko in totahtsin ihkwak in mitl okitlanalkixti yuhkin se yoleatl ayaxkan omewatikets okimokixti in mitl iwan ika okitlanalkixti in ikechkwawyo in iyaow in axkan domingo ik 2 mani metstli marso de 1608 años, ikwak momikili in tlakatl don hwan de alvarado governador katka tetskoko. i nikan siudad de méxiko tenochtitlan axkan martes vii dias del mes de abril de mil i kinientos i sesenta i siete años in tewantin alkaldes don lwis de pas, don martin hernandes in tiktokwitlawia hustisia in itechkopatsinko in toweitlatokaw sakra sesarea i katholikas real magestad i nikan audiensia tixpan owala anan tepi onkan chane san hwan moyotlan. iwan intla aka ipantsinko mokalakis wel tikmokwitlawis intlakamo moskalia, intlakamo tlachia. in akin mokichwi, tewatl tikilwis in kenin ihkas, in kenin nemis tlaltikpak. iwan wel tikmokwitlawis in tlein iwas, in tlein kwalos, in aso mochan in tlein ik tlatotonias, in tlein ik tlayamanias in amonextitlan, in amotlekwilan. ayaxka okontemaka in xochitl iwitl ipalnemoa. tlake kitsakwili para ayok walahke. . ma iyolik xokon toka in teotlali in ixtlawatl: aso kana mits popolos in totek, in tloke nawake in ilwikawa in tlaltikpake. no nikilnamiki ihkwak otiyaya mila ahnoso kwawtla; kemmanian tiknemiliayah ahso ok kwalkan tihualtemozqueh, iwan ipamopa ahmo tikwikayah totlakwal, kemen ihkwak otiyayah ticuahcuahuizqueh, tinanacatemozqueh, ahnoso ihkwak tiyayah tiococuahcuahuizqueh. miekpan ahmo isiwka tiknextia tlen tictemoayah, tihuehcahuayah, yese intla tikihtayah nanakatl ye titlepitzayah, tiktlaliayah wehyi in kwawitl, san isiwka ye onyeya tlexochtli iwan satepan ye tiknexpachoayah in nanakatl; tlen okachi nechpatiaya yewatlo in itoka masayeli; niktotoniaya notlatlaxkal iwan nikkixtiliaya in ixipichyo iwan ye nikakia ihtik in nextli; san sekih minuto ipan ye sentlamahmania in ahwiyak, wel neli inin pano ihkwak monexpachoa in masayeli; ye tonechicoayah, tikyawaloayah in tleamanali. oksé tonali mosoa para wakis ahmo komo kiera mosoas ihteki in sekwistli porke xayaliwi in tilmahtli kwak tlatlatotonia ikwakon. mochiwa solamente parahko. mah amo kimatoka se moyot, inik niman mononotske mixtlatike in i mochtin oksekintin tlaka wei tlamatinime atitlan, in iwki iwelitilis. "¿nelí? in kwowit. toni kipiya. nikan nehin kampa tinentok. 57. nkssotse, notlapalotse, ka onimitspits, ka onimitsmamal. aw ka ik mixko, ka ye mokpak nontlachia, immaka san titeokwitlatl, ka ik tiwki in otipitsakolk; ok tixtexyotiwits, aw ye tiwalixpetlawas. immanose san titototsintli, ik timiwiyotis, ye timatlapaltis. ma kana teixko, teikpak, tonpapatlantinen. aw san iwiyan tonpapatlantinemis in itlok, in inawak in pochotl, in awewetl, ma nen kana tikkwapostek, ka ik tikmakwetlawilis, aw ye tiwalachias, aw imapan timosewis. tikintayokoli axkan, hwebes a 24 de febrero in ipan ilwitsin sant mathías apóstol, ikomilwitl nesawalo kwaresma, ikwak wei tlayawalolistli mochiw, ompa walpeowak in sant herónimo onkan walwilowak in de monserate tekixkipan, inik tlayawalolok onkan kimotlaliliko in ilwikak siwapili de nwestra señora se monserate, kimonapalwitika in itlasokonetsin; wel osenkawalok in otlika kwawtlapechtli, motlatlali in otlika ochpanko tolkwatektli vanderas. niman ik kontlakolwih in tepetl itsalan ontlekkok yenepa, sentlapal tónnatiw ikisayampa, kisato inik isiwka ahsitiw méxikko inik ahmo kimotsikalwis in ilwikak siwapili, in momati ka in ompa in otlacoloh, ka awel kimottilis, in wel nowiampa motstilitika. se kilo xolenanakatl mahtlaktli tepetlachili, ahnoso chilkwitlaxkoli in sukichiwki ichtik, popuxtik, popuxtli sukitl. inik se tetsawitl aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl in motlahtokatlali in itoka xochpoyontsin tlahtowani opochwakan chalko tlalmanalko. ya nopa moihtó no se kwento. xtechkwalkwilitih natsin. ka wel niknochikawakaneltokitia ka muchi nikneltoka in kimoneltokitia tonantsin iglesia romana yoan ipan nimikis in tlaneltokilistli yoan niknotlatlawtilia inik amo kimomakawilis naniman in wikpa noyaowan inik amo nechtlapololtiske. ok nonkowati nikan wexotsinko. i nitlahtowani, ni tekaewatsin, chalchiwti san ketsalitstin, i nikinsenkixtia in tepilwan. nikan ipan in motlahtokatlali in tlakomiwa tlahtowani mochiw in wexotla. "uan tlen inkiihtowah nama? mochi in tlatekipanolistli in ok nipiltontli ipan oninomat itianechmakaya yese san tepiton iwan inin senka nechyolpatsmiktiaya mah amo kimatoka naskat, aw in ikwak domingo ipan kastili onnawi mani oktubre, ikwak tlayawalolistika mowikak in tlasosiwapili sankta maría mopitsinowaya sant joseph. in tomiyoh xochiyowa. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. xaxkanakan antes kanas in markos den difunto markos lakahmo non yehwa kanas axan. moatilia in textli ika pitsochiyawisotl iwan istatl; in etl ahso awax, ahnoso kalwahsa, tlein omopehpen. mowikxitia ika istatl iwan xonakatl; ihkwak inin ye tlawikxitili motesi metlapan ahso ika tepustlatsoaloni ahnoso texoaloyan. ipan in kali wel tlakwalkan. itlanahnamik: aw in don hwan de sandoval tekwanxayakatsin umpa kalak in tlalmanalko, kintlatolmakato in ompa tlahtoke kimilwito "tla xikmotlalikan i notiachkaw don thomás ketsalmasatl; ma san itla ik xikmoyolalilikan ma kinkawa in imasewalwan, ma san ye amechmotlayekoltilikan". se kikwa in papaya, se kitetehteki. aw in ikwak ya oninokwateki ompa tlaxkalam ye niman oniwala nikam nochan tepeteopam aw in ikwak onechiktake i{n} nopilwan senka opapake senka omoyolalike in ikwak onechitake i/k/oniwala senka onechpapakiltike niman onikinmolwili nopilwane tía xiwalwiyan notlasopilwane tla/x/ikkakikam namechilwiyan masann ipanpasinko in t[o]t[ekwi]o dios xikmokakitikam in axkam ka ye owala in semikak yolilistli in ineltokakasin in t[o]t[ekwi]o dios i{n} nekwatekiliktli masan ipampasinko in t[o]t[ekwi]o dios maka yekmo ximotlapolotikan maxikmoneltokitikam in t[o]t[ekwi]o dios in kenami newatl onitlaneltokak masa no yuhki in amewantin xitlaneltokakam. noihki panowayan tlachpanahtika. nama nimitstemilis ne wahtli mochiwa nikawín, yon chilwehweyi no mochiwa, pero yeh okachi mochiwa newín paratani. komo kemeh seki kwahkwali mopilwan tikintayokoli, ¿canin onyaya? san kinankiliya toxochayakach. axkana kikawili inana para ma kintlachili axkikawili nopilwantsitsin yowih tlatsilini wan kikahki nopa rei. in kwowit. aw in isiwaw tlahtowani totoltekatl tsonpachtli itoka xiwtostsin, in siwapili tewan wala. ¿ic sanio nikan i iska anmoxochiw? yei axoxtlantli ye nikan ik xochimikowa, iii tekpatl xiwitl. axtitlakwase". ixtawat no mochiwa tepitsin, pero amo okachi se kiahsi. orne iknimeh mococoah. aw in namechnamakiltia in nokal nawtemani ontetl wistlanpa itstimani iketetl kalpepelton kwawtemimilo ik nawtetl amilpanpa itstikak inin mochi akokalo aw in ipan mani tlali wel itlalo. ipampa axkan motlanawati-[f. 4v.]llia in kali semikak itech powis in melchior de parada español ayak sepa konixtokilis ipampa ka ye wel iaska itlatki kiten makwilpowali pesos inik okipatioti kali. onkak se taman saj. kanela tlatsikwewali sampa noha, ya achi atlahteno, sampa noha tlahko kwarto almendra mitekpa on kisa otlasohtlak in ikwak tiwaltokwepaske timitstemoske; ma nen amo tasi, ma kana tealtepew ipan timotlali, wel tasitiw in mocha, ka ye otinawatilok ka mitsmotemolis in teoutl kapitán marqués”. aw nikan powtika inik walake in intlamasewkawan in tekwanipan tlaka, in kinwalyakan itoka tsiwtlakawki yaopol tsonpawa; yewatl walteomama kiwalmama in inteow katka itoka sitekatl. ayohwach xmechmotlahpalwiki ihkwak ayemo tlahtlayowas. in weyi atlantli okachi wehkatla. iwan no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl omotenew ikwak ompa momikili in la china in onkan manila in governador, momikili ompa intepachokaw katka in ixkichtin christianosme in ompa onoke. ixiuyo no kikwiah ne keman, kinchiwayah xiukalmeh ika anaixiwit. mochiwa milaj, oso maski kahfentah se kiahsi. aw in setsin omehtsin in motolinia in iknotlaka in nowainyolke; ma ni kin sentlali, ma ok nikin moniximati. se kitoka iteyo kemeh kanones. aw ye kin imostlayok in kimottilike tlahtowani visurrei, aw inik nikan mexiko katka inik motlaliko rei in kintlakwaltiaya. kimach in tlamawiskalko onhualahqueh. ah tlamis nochipa nikilnamiki in iman pahpakilistika otipanokeh techantsinko inin tlakapa. mimixkoa inkwik xiii akatl xiwitl, 1479. makwili akatl xiwitl amonotle mochiw. se tulokan konmotlalilia klérigo, inik no umpa teoyotika sakramentotika kinmokwitlawitiw españoles, ka no senka miekintin in onpa onoke; sa se inik ye nowiyan in iskikan ipan wewei altepetl in itlapacholpantsinko arsobispo mexko in motenewa arsobispado. tehwa titahpixke itech nehin kwawta, iwan kixxima san kintlahtlatsontekilia iwan ix xochikoski im im ikpakxochiw kinmonakiaya iwan chimalxochitl iwan yetl in ipam mitohtinemi tlachichintinemi tleneoktinemi. kwaltia kenin in ikwak kisako yakal istakalko kisako, ye ikwak tetlan unkalak istakalkatl; no unpa walikatia, niman unka motekako akali akachinanko. nama eltok ne blanko, amarilo, negro. seki chichime in ihkwak kiwika inteko tochahsis ompa kwawtla san kihta ika kampa in tlamotlani kimelawa itlakweponaltepus iwan ihkwak yokwepon san kistewa yawe kanaske in tochmikki yewan yawe kahkokwiske tlahko kilo awax in ye wakki in ipan axkan hwebes ik 13 mani metstli de marso de 1597 años, ikwak sankt ipólito tsatsiwato; aw inik tsatsiwato ipampa inik tikinnemitiske kwakeweke molati iwan temamani iwan karnerostin iwan kwanakame totolme, iwan nekapatilos nechichiwalos, espada daga mopias aw moch lisensia, motkitinemis inik chikawas, ayak san nen i iw nemis, inik ayak ika mokayawas, iwan in kowatekitl in ipan semana sankta iwan paskwa resuretión ayamo mochiwas, ok moka- || 20 -huaz kin ikwak in okis paskwa mochiwas kowatekitl. noponi san ye ipan in in omotenew se tekpatl xiwitl iskikan ihtik walkiske in ikchikokkan koyonki texkali ostotl; ka iski texkalowi ostotl mochiw in iskikan ik koyonki tepetlamimiloli, ipampa inik mihtowa motenewa chikomostok. ika ome litro atl mowikxitia in tochtli ika axox, xonakatl iwan istatl; ihtik in okse komitl mosiyawa in chilakachtextli ika ome xalohtoton atl, motsoyonia ixkichkaw in ye tepitsin wahki; motekilia in istayotl kampa owiksik in tochtli, makahmo ayo; motlalilia in nakatl, ma kwali wiksi. amo kachi monamaka, pero nikawín kikowah in iteyo. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axka ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios 1608 años. .tetoman a moyolkan a tlamakaski in tetometl. asan axkan ye ketsaltototl nik ya iskaltiketl in opuchin notew tsohyak kemeh epat. aw in tla walas in pedro lwis in nokimotlachkwitlaxili achiton tlalmantontli aso onkan tepantsintli kimotlalilis nikmaka. aw in kinokimonamikti magdalena ka senka tlawelilok aik ma itlatsin onechtlaokoli atoltsintli yewatl kimati aso kiwikas. ihkwak oasik ome akatl xiwitl yaoyotl onkatka. ompa omomikilitsinoke, tekpatsin, witsiliwitsin iwan tetepantsin. inon tlali manis magadad simaro yaxkam d[on] hwan de san hwan themowa inon atlawtli omka mexkali temowa yikixochikwaawtitlan in onkan inadad yawi yei mil iwan semsondi mixkaloteus. itlanahnamik: . in yewantin nawalostomeka achtopa konkwia in ixkich omotenew in ompa mochiwa. itech in kitekito amakemeke, iwan kaxitiko atenko in onkan ayotsinko, in san inneixkawil mochiw in amakemeke; in nikan wala mexiko kwanmimili morrilos ixkich vi mil. mah kwaltsin matapani, wan ihkino axonkayaya serilo. ipan ix xiwitl makwil kali kanato in tolteka in yewatl ketsalkoawatl inik kimotlatokatike in onkan tolan iwan inteopixkaw katka. iii akatl xiwitl, 1235. mochiwa saj. ixiuyo kwaltia para ika kipikih in tamal oso ika se kipiki taxkal. satepa kititlania' sita chikonihtati namoxwiw porke yotlamikti. onkan asiko ichpokero ya kwali kochtok ¿ha tamonawiske, ha tawelamatiske, tokniwan? aw okito in tisosik, okimilwi in tlahtoke "tla xiwalwian in antlahtoke, ma kenmanian topan yaotlahtoti; aw nikitowa i newatl: `canin onos in tensakatl in tlalpiloni in nacochtli?'". viii tekpatl xiwitl, 1240. in ketsalaxomotsin ompapatlantia, noxochiweyotsin, in tlakawepantsin, se kitoka newín kuoujtaj, moahokwi sah chiktehtsitsin kimoyawah iteyotsin. aw sanno ihkwak in in ipan omotenew semilwitl sábado in otokok inakayotsin in omotenew tlakpak don antonio kortés totokiwastli telpochtli tlakopan governador katka, aw san omentin siwatsitsinti tepitsitsin in ipilwantsitsinwan okinkawtia; inin tlahtowani wel ok yewantin intechpa okisako in iskintin otlahtokatiko tlahtoke tlakopa, inik ompa waltsintitika onkan tlahtokayotl. nechtsotsomotak se kikwa in iteyo. ik ye no yewatl ipampa in omopahpati onowian mochi motsatsawk in atetenamitl in okwikwitlakoyonka; ompa walpewtika in moyektili inik mopahpati in koyonakasko, niman ye sant sebastián, niman sant pablo, niman ye mixiwkan, niman ye akachinanko. ipampa in axkan tiktlalia pena in techkopa in gabriel yaotl yoan in inamik maria papan aokmo sepa onkan tlatoske anoso tlaisnamikiske ipampa kamo intlalpan ka wel yewantin tlaleke in itoka diego yaotl yoan in inamik isabel tlako. ipan matlaktli omome akatl xiwitl temokke chapolme in kipoloke milan okseppa. ¡choquizilhuitl, in yewa ya ixayoilwitl! yewiptla. ka amo tikmati anoso ye ik sen mits ixkawa in monanwan in motawan; aso ye ik sen tiaw, aso ye kana tonwetstiw aso kana atlawtli ixtlawatl itik timakiltitos timopopoliwititos; matohmiyohxokoyolin ¿tlen tikneki? anemiskeh ipa se taman saj. aw inik moyaochichiwke, ik tlamiko in xiwitl. in amo pahti. aw neh in omotenewke español diego senete iwan inamik ye muchi kimaxkatia in tlali, inik ye kinkawaltia omotenewke tlaxilakaleke, kimilwike "xiquixtican in amokrus, ka ya taxka in tlali ipan moketsinotikak, otikowilike in frai herómino de sárate". se kolotsin, tein mas weyi moskaltia kemeh dies metros de wehkapan wan tomawak kemeh se tanawal mas. . ma kana xi popoliwi kwawiti itik texkali itik; ma onka wilanto in mayasultsin in momaxtlasultsin; amo niteixmati in sowapa teka timotlahtoltihtika. in totonik por ké kampa mochiwa in itampa amo teh mochiwa. tlen 98 tlanawatihkayotl. keman poliwis se ministro kipanos se metstli, in tlayekanani tlen totlalnantsin kiixtlalis tokayotl san tlatokpa tlen ministro imako tlahtokan tlen wekapa, moitas tlen moihtowa ipan 96 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili. tla poliwis se ministro ipampa momikilis noso seyok tlamantli tlahtoli ika senkisas, in tlayekanani kiixtlalis seyok tokayotl imako tlahtoka tlen wekapa, ken moihtowa ipan 96 tlnawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili. in amatekikawali tlen ministros tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia san welis moselis ika tlehtleya malwili tlahtoli, imako motlalis tekichiwani iwan tla yewatsin kiselis, kititlanis ipan wekapa tlahtokan kampa kikwalmatiseh noso amo. in tlamakawalismeh tlen ministros, keman amo kipanos se metstli, welis tlatemaktilis suprema korte tlen hustisia tlen totlalnantsin; tlen kipanos inin kawitl, welis tlatemaktilis tlayekanani tlen totlalnantsin ika ikwalitalis wekapa tlahtokan. amo tlen tlamakawalistli welis kiixpanos ome xiwitl. aw niman walnes in karta de venta konmokakiltike aw ikwak iyolotsin pachiw in alkalde aw satepan kitoke in omotlanamakilike ka sa ixkich inonmakatiw posesio ka otikwike in tomines onotechmonek inin omito tlatoli imixpan testigos klara lopes iwan ipholita lopes hwana de suñiga no mixpan in newatl diego hernandes eskrivano. aw ma ok omosawa in noweltiw in chalchiwtlikwe". ihkwak ahsia ilwitl ompa tekospa ahnoso miakatlan tewan senka tipahpaquiah, topahpakilis mochiwaya. titonechikoayah sekih telpocameh, titononotzayah, tisentlaliayah totlhatol itechpa ahkiwan kiwikaskeh osno inik timenapalitehtequizqueh, inintin ika titlaizqueh; senka techpaktiayah ticepanyazqueh; kemmanian titlachaliayah, ahso totakak, ahso tokoton, ahso topantalon. onkán yemoxiyotis pero noso nohki pikawak in xiyoti. ai yotlatlak in tlaxkal. necateh. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. wan nopa tenantsi kwalani para noponi, para okachi tomin kipia ka tlen itechmoneki. kenwak yeka ni kinehki sasampa ma tiyaka in sesek. oka yewantin in in altepetlipan tlahtoke in kikakiko in intewktlatol in motewksomatsin iwan siwakowatl tlakayeleltsin, nikan kinnawatike nikan kinmakake in intekiw in tlein kichiwaske, in itech monekis in inteow in witsilopochtli. ka ye kin onkan in kikwike in wewetke teochichimeka estlapiktin inik okimotokayotike teotenanka, ka in achtopa intoka katka san okixkich inik notsaloya estlapiktin, inik ompa walewake astlan chikomostok. ye teotlak chikwasen tsilini in kikixtike ichan, wel mawistik yuhkin hwebes sankto inik kiwikake inakayo inik kitokato sant fransisko; yewantsitsin kinapaloke in iskikan teopixke in provinsialesme iwan priorresme, iwan onkan mowikak ye kiyakatitia in teoyotika tlahtowani don frai garsía gwerra arsobispo, iwan mochtin in kanonigosme in kabildo tlaka. in otemo tlatsintli in onkan itlakwayan witsilopochtli. ihkwak momikili in siwatlakolotsin in isiwaw in toyaotsin chichimekatewktli. inimekes mawistik tlaka iwan siwame okichiwaya itakatl ika tamali, tlatlayoyo iwan popoyek. okimamaya patli tla ka mokokos ipan kwawtlatli, ye on kimakaske. ika on netlaliloya patli hasta para kawatin ikan sewa kimasi itik kokolistli. niman ipam ilwisin san bernabel okwalos tonatiw wel otlayawak semanawak mochi sisitlatin oneske. niman ipam inin xiwitli omochikawke d[on] baltesar de san hwan iwan diego hernadon iwan mochi masewaltin oyake méxiko okitlatlanito welilistl{i} ipampa amo momati thewakam ka ye wel miyek m{o}mikilia masewaltin iwan omochikaw in teksiwatli d[o]ña agostina de la krus de san hwam. ye yeyi iman timitsnochilihtika. elotlaolatoli ika kaneala in kwowit kwaltia para kalkwowit, para kalewal oso tankayot. nimitsmaktilia nehin taxkaltsin 143v in ikchikwasen ichpochwan tlakatl kwawsesekwitsin tlamaokatltewktli itoka sanno chimalmantsin, inin konmonamikti in chalchiuhhecatzin tekiwa. nikan nimitsmaktilia nehin orasiones en la siudad de mexiko a sinko dias del mes de hebrero de mil e kinientos i setenta i ucho años in yewantin mawistililoni señor don antonio valeriano gobernador hwes in ikatsinko su magestad kimopielia in hustisia ihoan señor don migwel sanches thoribio lukas hweses in ipan testamento kimokwitlawia. istatl, ixkich in monekis . in tekomatl yewatl in ayotektli ohontetl in kin tlawtiaya teyakanke aw in kitokilia sa sesentetl in kin makaya aw kiwikaltiaya matlatlakpowali in kakawatl iwan teonakastli mamakwilpowali iwan sesen akwawitl. in tlatokat xi xiwitl. in amo kwali tlahkwilo yolokimimil, tekwalani, tesiwtlatli, tenenko, tenenenko. iwan onkan ikatsinko tlamawisoli kimochiwili in itlasotsin señor san nikulás de tolentino in ipan señora; yuh mihto inin señora in ihkwak okimah ye tlalolini iwan in okittak ikal ye ipan wits, in ye ipan aktiwetsi, in aokmo wel momakixtia, onkan kimotsatsilili inik kimopalewilis. aw in tlalmantli kawtika namatl in atenko ik onasitika sa nekok ixkich in tlamelawa koyowakanpawik namatl in tepantli aw inik postektika tonatiw ikisayampa se matl aw inikoliwtika homatl i sa no ikisayampa tonatiw aw inikoliwtika homatl ipan semakoli in tepantli kali in onkan ik tlekowa tlapankalko in iw nestika itech pintora in tlamachiotl onkan sesen estakas omomaman. se kitalilia no in chilposon oso kaldito. apenas konihta sé tekiktika yokikwilito' niyonta tlen iktekitis akwtleyi yokonkistlihke inon rebeldes akwtleyi tlenika titekitiske. koatepek omochiw xiwtlalpili ipan ome akatl xiwitl iwan mexikah okilwikixtikoh sanyeno onkan, inik se yankwik intlew, in oyuh okiske in iwikpa astlan. nochi in pisil waxin no morados, sayoh ke yeh simarrón porke amo tatok. tewkan, tewkan, titlawika in nawatiloka notekiwakayo, teskatlanextia. wahka noponi tlipitski nopa tenantsi otlasohtlaya yewa inglestlahtoli kwali omomachtiskiaya, noso otlatsiwik iwan awel otlasalo. aw in yewatl omotenew maría xukoatolnamakak senka kintsatsatsilitiwia, amo wel mihtos motenewas in ixkich akwali ayektli tenkwikwitlatlahtoli ik kimawatiwia, senka kinmawispolotiwia, ka nel siwatl; aw amo san isel inin siwatl, iwan imon in moteilwike. in no kikouaj, ta welik. || 5v in kimochiwili iwan sisitlaltin ompa in kimotlalili chikweteilwikapa, aw in metstli kimotlalili ipa in achto ilwikatitech, aw in tonatiw itech in iknawtetlanepanoli ilwikatl in kimotlalili; aw wel onkan imonekyan in kimotlalili, wel kwalkan inik motlali in ilwikatitech in nepantla in ixkichtin in ilwikame inik yehika ipampa inik tesepatlanextilis. newa sa yalwa ika teotlak onikitak. tlahko kilo tomatl in se kipaka achto wan se kichiwa rebanaditas, oso kemeh se kinekis se kikwas. aw in itoka mateo aketsal niman otonyake in ichan onkan owalnes in itatsin itoka martin kosa iwan in inantsin anna tiakapan aw in ikal sentetl tonatiw ikalakiapa itstikak iwan sentetl xochmilkopa itstikak aw sentetl tenanyokanpan itstikak in otikitoke in sa nopan semilwitl naw in mochi kali ixkich in otikitake audiensia titlanawatilwan in kali otikitake in iskitetl. aw in tlalkawaltitika namatl ipan senyolotli inik oneltik onka otikmamanke estakas in onkan tlatlami kwaxochtli aw in tewantin inik otikchiwako posesion tikneltilia nikan tiktlalia totoka iwan tofirmas axkan lunes xxix dias de disiembre de 1572 años. hwan mentes algwasil migwel garsia algwasil mayor pedro hakobo regidor. aw iwan inmanel no umpa kimoyakaniliaya inik ye onpa kiwalmokalakilisnekia in ixkopa teopan in ompa katki wei pwerta, in wel onkan ikatsinko tlalilok wei tlakwilolpwerta in wel tlasenkawali ik tlakwiloli in wel ikatsinko kichiwke tlakwiloke intlanawatiltika in omotenewke kabildo tlaka kanónigos, in onkan kitlalike kimanke pwerta ixkwak anoso ixko, in onkan ik kimochialiaya onmokalakis teopan arsobispo, kimolwiliaya inik ye onkan mokalakikiw, aw amono kimonekilti, san niman amo kimoselili san niman amotle ipan kimottili in teoyotika tlahtowani, inik amo onkan ik mokalaki. in amo kwaltia para pahti. omaka xiwitl unka molpi ixiw mexika, atle muchiw. xtokaka n ixos namehwanke ixos ñamo tla 1 de namota'kun. axtle tihtlachilihtok tlen kichiwa. amo se kinamaka. niman ye ik nechokililo in ichan tlaka nechokistlapaloa in ye muchintin puchteka wewetke puchteka ilamatke. ¿tlen itlapowal tonali ticpiah? yewa onechnonots se tetlakolti tenematilis. ontlanamakaskeh niktlasohkamatis o kachi pantsin tinechmomakilix. amo se kichipawa. sekni kiteka in itetlamamak tenochkatl, sekni kiteka in itetlamamak tlatilulkatl. in axka in itlal katka in akamapichtli in itatsin katka in axkan méxiko tlatowani in don lwis de santa maria iwan in itoka don martin momawti ka omextin ipilwan katka in akamapichtsin aw in axkan inik moteilwia ka imaxka ka intlatki ka intlal ka kinkawilitia in intatsin katka inik amo nistlakati in newatl ni martin tekaawia ka huramento onikchiw ipanpa ik nikan nomatika niketsa krus. martin tekaawia. iskate in asiko in mexika in chichimeka katka in ompa in akaihtik in tolitik, in tlatsonilpiko in tlalmasewako in kokokayotika. mochiwa kwoutah kampa kuapalaktaj. sesek. entos ahsito ompa pus tumba ese serro xihtlamotla inin tepetl. in monotsa takwawaket, tak por in tahtakwawak in et, ta maski kimanah amo oksi. iskatki ye nikpewa[l]tia wel achto yewatl i naniman imaktsinko nokontlalia in totekuyo inik nechmomakixtilis inik nechmopopolwilis in notlatlakol inik nechmowikilis in ichantsinko in ilwikak in ikwak naniman okitlalkawi nonakayo. se kilo “cihuacuacuahuenenepilli” se kilo masayelnanakatl teukwitlakemitl! ximokentiketl in alotl ika tlaixnextilolpa ocholo. onkak ome taman: tein wehweyi wan tein tsikitsitsin. axkan domingo in ik 10 mani metstli noviembre de 1613 años, ihkwak onkan weiteopan iglesia mayor mexiko oteochiwalok, makok in teoyotika itlahtokayotsin in senka mawistililoni maestro don frai diego de kontreras inik arsobispo muchiwtsino, inin teopixki sant augustín. laurel xiii kali xiwitl, 1453. in ipan viernes sankto a 12 de abril, ikwak pew tsintik in yankwik kofradía in suledad sant joseph, innenonotsaltika mochiw in teopixke provinsial frai domingo iwan gwardián frai bonaventura iwan tivinidores; yewantin inmasewal mochiw in mexika, wel ipan tlahtoke frai gerónimo iwan || 3 frai fransisko de ganboa. in ipan axkan domingo ik vi mani metstli de disiembre de 1598 años, ikwak ye teotlak maxitiko in imomiyotsin deskalsos padreme in momikilike xabón in ipan tlali a la china, ye teotlak in maxitiko teopixke kinwalmonapalwike kaxatika walonotia; aw in ixkichtin teopixke nikan moyetstikate mexiko, ixkichtin kimonamikilito in omaxitiko sant diego. kenin mochiwa aw in ipan vísperas, onkan machtiloke in españolesme, yewatl motemachtili reinoso san fransisko. 2 tochtli xiwitl, 1130 años. itlanahnamik: onkak ome taman: aw in ye tlatwitiwits in owal cholo wei sitlalin, in ihkwak ye achi tlawiskalewa in ye tlachipawa ihkwak isiwka kontokatiwetsi in tlenamakak nextli in xochitl in yetl. in newatl diego tlakochkalkatl nochan san sebastian kotolko in axka wel noyolokakopa inik ninosenkawa in nikan tlaltikpak niktlalia notestamento in ixpantsinko in totekuyo dios i achtopa in naniman niknomakilia in totekuyo dios ka nel tlamakixtiltsin inik kiwalmanilis aw in nonakayo ka tlaltikpak powis. in se kitoka iteyo.wan siempre mochipautani. in ixiuyo kikwih para kali ika kipantsakuaj, amo moneki sintas, ihkón kwaltia kiixtapanaj. unka kipiloke wisilopochko tlatoani makwilxochitsi, nima ye kolwaka tlatoani pisosi no unkan kipiloke; yoan kwawtitla tlakatekatl yoan tlilankalki kinpelokwaltike. onkak ome taman. ikomentin katka in tlahtoke i nikan tsakwaltitlan tenanko ik konkawitikate in tlahtokayotl, yese onkan weikan katka in tlailotlakan in iyeyampa kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli; inik mitowa in tlakatl kwawitsatsin rei katka, iwan in oksekintin in itech okiske tlahtoke in tlailotlakatetewkti in tlailotlakatlahtoke. san yuhki tlakwiloli ah tonpupuliwi. san yuhki xochitl in san tonkwetlawi ya in tlaltikpak. in nikan siudad mexiko tenochtitlan axkan sabado x dias del mes de desiembre de 1563 i newatl ni don lwis de santa maria gobernador por su magestad yoan tewantin alkaldes don lukas kortes tomas de akino in tiktokwitlawia hustisia in itechkopatsinko in toweitlatokaw su magestad in nikan audiensia. sempoalchikonxiwtike koatepek, iwan omotlalikoh tolantsinko ipan ei tekpatl xiwitl. nikan nimitskaltaliti ¿tleca amo timomachtia? aw iwan ye chikwepowalxiwitl ipan chiwknawxiwitl in ipan xiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1440 años, in omomikili tlakatl itskowatsin tlahtowani katka tenochtitlan, in tlahtokat matlaktlonnawi xiwitl; aw san niman ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl in motlahtokatlali in tlakatl wewe motewksoma ilwikamina chalchiwtlatonak tlahtowani te- || 88 -nochtitlan. aw in wei tlamakaski teopixki in okiwalmama iwan in okiwaltlakanotstia diablo tetsawteotl itoka witsiltsin; inin satepan ohtlipan okitokayotike witsilopochtli ipampa opochmaye katka. tanto kemeh tehwan aw in chiwknawtekatl ikpak ik tlamachiotitinenka itoka wetsi. xoxopan xiwitl ipan tochiwaka. aw niman okinnawatike in kolwake in chikwei altepeme; aw in oyuh kimilwike, senka ik tlaokoxke in chikwei altepeme inik okinnawatike. se kilo kwitlaxkoinanakatl —oya tlamepopowato. istatl, ixkich in monekis aw iwan ye chikonpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtoli xiwitl in ipan 1 tochtli xiwitl, 1454 años, in ikwak nesetochwilok, mayanalok inik nowian ipan nweva españa. ¿ac tle on ayuh kimati on, tokniwan?, kokoya noyolo, kwalani. ayoppa tlakatiwa, ayoppa piltiwa, ye se kixiwa in tlaltikpak. nika itstok no nana iwan siwatekipano katalina momostla tochan tekiti. ti nech kokolia, ti nech mikitlani. ya elito pilokichpiltsi. kenin mochiwa || 140 aw inik nikan ikoppa motlahtokatiliko mexiko yexiwitl ipan matlaktetl metstli ipan senpowalonchikwasen tonatiw. nikan ipan in in yaki altepetl in amakemekan, in konnalkixtike in mexika inik techpewke; aw san tlakwalispan in tokniwan mochiwke in mexika. xinemikan in kwowit, weyi mochiwa. achto ma kwakwalaka in atl; in textli moatilia ika ome tasa atl; mokwachwia iwan motlalilia in atl in ye kwakwalakatok. in kapoli mopitsinia ipan tlatsetseloloni inik mokixtilis in iayo iwan inakayo, ye moteka ihtik in atoli iwan senka molinia inik ahmo papachkas ika kwawxumali ixkichkaw in ye tlawikxitili. viii kali xiwitl, 1201. ma nokpakxochiwi aw maso neliwi in ixkich tlamantli in okseki tlachiwali in ipa || 2r in kimimachiltike in kimosepawilike in ichiwaloka in imeixtintsitsin teotlakatsitsinti personas, aw yese ok achi walka wel oksekan sentlamantli. in newatl eskribano kristoval de sank mateo itenkopa in hustisia inik niknawatia axkan lunes martes mierkoles inik ontlakikixtis pedro ketsal in onkan ka ichan aw kitowa in pedro utsiltewka amo wel nikisas ka nel ikal in nonamik onimakok amatl itenawatil doktur seino nokonnamiktis in tlatoli nikchiwas informansion tontonamikiske san ye amo wel nikisas in ikwak mierkoles in ke mowikas testigos wel nikneltilis in ikwak tlakamo yaske notestigos ik nesis san tlawelilok ik nikneltilia nikan nomatika nikketsa krus. lunes a sinko dias del mes de abril de 1568 años. pedro witsiltewka, martin damian algwasil chane kotolko. inik oniktlakakitiko pedro witsiltewka nikan ninofirmatia newatl eskribano kristoval de san mateo eskribano. kiwika chiltlaxkali wan michime ma tlakwaka techiknokawke in tlaltikpak. ¿ kan ihkak in ohtli miktlan itemoyan, kan ximowayan ? kinilwi para tewatsin ka opochma timowikas, amo ka yekmapa. ome xumali pitsochiyawisotl nechtsotsomotlak ne tsikame kiitake san xochitika in mochiwa newín paratani ne xaltipan wan mas para tani 56v 2 kali xiwitl, 1273 años. se taman saj. kowatlankapolatoli chiktehtsi, aw x akatl xiwitl, 1255 años, ipan in onkan moyaomikiliko kaliimayan in kwawtsintewktli tlahtowani wixtoko, in tlahtokat otlipan 14 xiwitl. anemiskiah ka neltilistli, in iw mochintin kihtowa in itechkopa tlakwilowa, ka ompa itsintla in katki in kitokayotia ekinosial; aw inik walatiake inik walmotlatlalitiake in ikin kenma san intlan in senka weweintin in wewekapan in senka wiwitlatstike tetepe in kanin kimittaya, ka nel yuh okiwalmatiake ka senka weikwawtik tepetl ikpak in paraiso terrenal. oniknemili nechihwaltsaskiani yese mochi okis oksetik inken nohtik oniknemiti onechilwi ma ninochia kinmach moyolnotsaskiani chikome tonali ipan onechtlanankili axkan san onechpoloaya in okachi owihtik niktemachiltis nochan aw niman inkwak tikilwike ma noso xiktlali testamento san okito kwix onpa anechonmayawi san niw tikawke ixkichin inik omonawatitia in maria xoko ik nikneltilia nomatika nikketsa krus ihoan in pedro masaken ihoan ines tiakapan ka amo intlatuwayan san kelewisneki in kali ipampa moxiktia in aokak tlakatl gaspar de san pablo. kimaka nechwika pipiltoton. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. aw inhi “a ye niaw nechka onokonkaw nochpotsi; ma ok toconanati”. mahtaktiomeyi mil ángeles apóstoles, i mexika ikopa iloke; in oyake akan kitake in tesosomoktsi, yewatl walkis in teskakoakatl chachasi, kimilwia “ca kimitalwia tlakatl: ‘oquihyouique i mesika, ma motlalika. ipan weyi kali onkateh kwakwalsoli ikpaltin. in tlakatl amo nikah ka, oksekni ximotemoliti. ¿quen konchiwas noyolo yewa? istatl, ixkich in monekis inik etetl tetsawitl . ayak mopowas ayak ik mokichitos in ixkichtin tomalwan omochiwke ka san otitlaltemoliko in tlakatl in tetsawitl witsilopochtli. entons inepaka kihto pus axan in chaparrito bigotudo pus axan tlenon taiske nikan tlenon tikwaske. aw in newa nikittoa san achika, san yuhki in eloxochitl, ipan titomatiko in tlaltikpak. in taler de tradisión oral kitsintoka, kihkwilowa, kixpowa wan kiyeknemilia toni in techilwisneki inintahtol in maseualmej. in okikak yekene ik wel kimonilpi tepostli kimontlatlalili; kiwalilwia malinsi “ca konitoa kapitán: ‘ma wia, ma kinonotsati in intlatokawa onechmoknelilike. niman oyaotlato in tlahtowani kwawtlix, okinnawati in mexika okimilwi "amehuantin ayakatiaske". in tenochtintla inik motlali tlatoani e w sexiwitl tlatolo in tlatilulko; konpewalti tlatokayotl tenochtintla intoka tlakoten iteikaw in kwakwapisawak, sano onpa kitlani in askanposalko, san iteikaw pisawak. kwaltia para se kichiwa agwa freska, no kichiwah paletaj. aw sanno ipan in in iskilwitia omotenew metstli oktubre, ikwak owala tlahtoli in la china omachistiko ye okitlanke in españolesme in altepetl in onkan itokayokan maluko, ye itechtsinko ponwi in yewatsin toweitlahtokaw rei don felipe tersero in ompa españa moyetstika; iwan yuh machistiko in onkan tlahtokatia maluko in rei mochiwtikatka kasike in christianosme. nikawín mochiwa miak. kihto "ca nitsiwtlakawki niyaopol". noha ome atekomitl kitemitihtok nopa mochiwa saj. san ye on iximatis aw inik senka wekawtika ikaka in awewetl inik tlaakili iwan inik postekiko inpan mexika in ixkichkawtika ontsonxiwtika ipan matlakpowalxiwtika ipan chikwexiwtika. kinekij, nochi kinekih sintli para kitokase. postehtli. . aw yuh teixpan manalo in mulkaxitl in chikiwitl, in iw teamako. wel xi motlachielti in katlehoatl achtopa mokwi in ik teixpan neketsalo. wel xik mottili in iw tlatecpano. pesmaolol tlen 9 tlanawatihkayotl. amo welis mokotonas tlen se itechpowi mosennechikos noso monechikos ika tlehtleya kwali tlahtoli; san welis ihkinon kichiwaseh altepechanehkeh tlen totlalnantsin, tlen ika welis mokalakiseh ipan tlahtoltekiwakayotl tlen totlalpan. amo tlenon tepostlatopontli nechikolistli, intechpowi mocuayehyecoseh. amo welis moihtos mokawa kiawak tlanawatili, iwan amo welis moxolewas se weyi nechikolistli iwan nechikolistli tlen kiixtlalihtok kichiwas se tlatlanilistli noso tlatemaktilis se tlahtolkwalantli ipampa tlehtleya amo kwali tlachiwali imako tekiwa, tla amo moihtowa axkwal tlahtoli iixpah tekiwa, iwan tla amo mochiwas weyi kwalantli noso teixpanos tlen ika kimahmatis noso kitetsopas matlaxolewa ken yewan quinequih. ma mostla ma wiptla nech motlaokulili in totekwiyo, ma nose nitlapolo, ma ni tlaatokti, ma nitlachitonili in tlakatl in tokwiyo; niman ompa kintlamelawaltike in ixpan in intlakatekolow in kulwake, inik onkan kinmiktike ixpan in diablo. maso wilowa ma kimanati in tlahtoke, ma motlaliki in onkan in inchantsinko; aw in yewantin in onechistlakawiko in tlapalpopol ma kinmiktiti in kexkichtin in i mochintin in omotenmakake, ma mochintin kimmiktiti, ayak mokawas". aw yewatsin in teoyotika tlahtowani don frai balthasar akobarrobias || 180 obispo michwakan teopixki sant augustín mochichiwtsino kapa kimotlalilitia iwan mitra, iwan in itlakaichkapixkatopiltsin bákulo kimotkilitia, iwan ome itloktsinko mantia klérigos kapa kitlalitiake. aw in yewantin pedro masaken yoan in ines tiakapan ihoan magdalena anan monsel atle okitoke mochintin imixpan tlaxilakaleke omochiwtinen in omotokatenewke i tlakpak ihoan ipan in pregun inik omochiw yuh oneltik in ixpantsinko mawistililoni señor governador alkaldes iwan hweses ik okimoneltilike okimotlalilike inin firmatsin. antonio valeriano, fransisko martin alkalde, migwel sanches hwes, thoribio lukas hwes. pasó ante mi diego leonardo eskrivano. nima ye ik kisa yoaltika, tekuhilwitikan kiske; ye ikwak i mike toltekaakaloko, unkan tikintlatepewaltike. aw no yewatl ipampa inik kinwalwikak habón tlaka kikwiko in iski mil pesos itlanew don rodrigo. aw in tla neltis domas opuchmakwes inikinkal martin tepokatli in ika formansion kin ikwak makoske sentensia iwan posesion san ok nepantla moketsa in kali in akin kitlakos totenawatil niman ilpilos. axkan mierkoles a xxxi de marso de 1568 años, don lwis de pas alkalde don martin [sic] hernandes alkalde [rúbrica]. pero tohwanti tihnekiyaya san titekitise chilpitsawak, ahnoso chilkwitlaxkoli owiah noyuhki mexikah omaltitoh in temaskalko. aw in okikakke in kolwake niman ik achto walpewke; inin in omotenewke chikwei altepeme in kolwake kimonkawke in onkan wei kwawitl itsintla in inpan postek. aw in ikwak otikake in informasion niman ompa otiyake i ipan tlaxilakali in tlachkwititlan tistelolotika otikitato in tlali in chinamitl. . aw in okikakke melawak tlahtoli in puchtekatlahtoke niman ye ik kinyakana in ixpan tlatowani awitsotsin, ixpan kitekilia
