in ixkich omotenew in ompa mochiwa tsinakantlan kilwia axkan miérkoles ik xi mani metstli en blanko de mil 602 años, in tlahtowani visurrei don gaspar ikwak tlatilolko mowikaya ipampa kowatekitl kimonemilili, inik poliwiskia ipampa senka ik motolinia in mexika tlatilolka; achi wekaw inik mochiw tlahtoli, pregones ik mochiw kakitiloke in kastilteka, aw amo wel mochiw amo wel poliw. tla nikpiaskia tomin. nikpiaskiaya se kalmimiloli. nima ye ik kinonotsa kolwaka tlatoke, imixpa kontepewtitlalike i nakastli. xalxokot in ayahawilo xochitli, ika yewa amelel on kisa. kema kiitak noponi wala aw in oasiko in ichan in nikan mexiko tlatilolko niman isiwka konsenkawa in itech monekis in puchteka tlatoke in nawalostomeka. onkan yeniwik. in tlawelilok tlatekki tlatetesoani, tlatlachachakyachoani, tlatetekultsowani, xolopitli, tlahtlakoa, tlaitlakoa, tlatlatetekwitsoa. ipan in in pewki xochiyaoyotl, aw in ihkwak makatlaliaya in tlakochkalka in i mochintin in chalka in ixpan in diblo. inik vii tlamantli nikitowa onikpieliaya imili in itoka pedro de gande piltontli onpa mani in san pablo apepetspan onpowal wiak senpowal patlawak in axkan ka san no nikpielia nikmakatiw amo kenmanian kixtokiliske in nopilwa. nekateh sowameh kwaltetsitsin. wan amo wel moskaltia in toplantita no. aw kwix nose san ika in iteyolotilistsin, kwix san iteyolewilistsintika in totekwiyo dios inik ompa kampa owalake, inik weyapan akaltika walmotlalike, inik walnenenke atlan ilwikaapan, inik ompa atenkisako in omotenew in ompa astlan aihtik, anepantla omotlaliko? aw inik momikili in lisesiado lwis ponse, nimann omotlali in ipan tepacholistli in governasió in iteniente markos de agwilar, ompa ichan in ipan altepetl de éxiha. no monamaka. oiw ye nepa walkiske matlaktlomome xiwitl in ompa astlan in ipan in omotenew xii akatl, inik niman walnenenke onkan walewake in omotenew chikomostok kinewayan. in alkalti nikam sam bartolomé diego her[nande]s yhu{an} okiximke margarikta iwan inamik itoka b{ar}tolome martin okipiloke okiwiteke okitlasintokilike amo kipiya intlatokayo ik oq{ui}pixauhtiuhque iwan {y}n ikolsin itoka alonso maltonado okinamakak masewaltin makwilpowali niman okimatke alkalte iwan regidor iwan fiskal d[on] baltesar de san hwan okima okiwikakkiya méxiko. aw sam nika nawi tonatiw niman omiki. senka yekene kinkekelowa in tlakochkalka. in totonik. in ipan ik vii de oktubre, ikwak analok kwitlaxkowapan itoka don antonio, ipiltsin katka don karlos kinto itiachkawtsin in don pelipe rei españa, intlan nenka portugal tlaka; aw i walwikok nikan mexiko ipan lunes a xxix días oktobre, itech tlan yaoyotl kichiwasnekia, nikan otsakwalok korte. i ye ixkich nima ye ik monechikoa; i ye yuhki in omonechiko in ok keskich ones, nima ye ik kiwalisketsa in intechiwkaw tlapaltekatl kwexakaltsi, tekpanekasintli witsilsi, wisnawak tiachkaw toweyo, kwitlachkoaka posonsi; yehoantin i in kikawato teukwitlatl koyoakan. aw kaxkan domingo ik en blanko tia metstli noviembre de 1609 años, ikwak yah in don hwan baptista hwes governador katka mexiko tenochtitlan ichan malinalko. ichan ixtlawachane serní nochip* kipia se weyi xochimili. no markos ahmo kachikwali para tehwa xkana in tlali xtoka. aw inin ik pew yankwik teopixkatlatekpantli horden in itetsinko powi san antonio, ka hospitaleke onkan pahtililo in tlekokolistli ahnoso itletsin mihtowa san antonio intech ka; inin ye omotenew yewantin kitsintike kipewaltike omentin tlasopipiltin kavaleros umpa chaneke in viena fransia in ikse ye omotokatenew itoka don gastón iwan ipiltsin itoka don girondo. onkak se taman saj. aw in yewatsin alkalde in okimochiwiliko posesion inik kimoneltilili iskatki itokatsin ifirmatsin ik senpowali omome in itlapowal metstli de marso de mil e kinientos noventa i tres años. [tachado: diego peres español] don migwel garsia alkalde hwan martin algwasil. nixpan newatl migwel monise eskrivano. amo se kitoka, ta pos kwoutah mochiwa. xkintakawili mah tekitikan in amo pahti. in nanakat. aw in tlahtowani atonaltsin chichimekatewktli iwan tliltekatsin chichimekayaotekiwa iwan oksekintin totolimpaneka chichimeka niman ye kimiwa ye kimilwia in tewikalti owalmochiwtiake chalka akxoteka "ma ximowikakan, ma intechtsinko xomaxitikan in tlahtoke in toteositewktli in tekwachkawtli `ohuantechmocnelilique ka antonanwan antothawan; aw no iwi in tewantin in tichichimeka in titototolimpaneka ka no titetlasotlani ka no tamothawan no tamonanhuan'. ka nikkwis in yektla xochitli, in yektli yan kwikatl. ikwouyo pitsawak wan imaxiuyo mamahmaxaltik wan kitemaka in kamoh semi wehweyi. ipa se taman saj. aw in wewe akamapichtli in iwan isiwaw ixxochitl onkan kichiwke in ikome itoka akamapichtli, in tlahtokatiko achto mexiko tenochtitlan. mah wetsi inawak in totalmaniktsin yehoanti kimonilwiko inik mochichiwas witsilopochtli; nima ye kitlalia i witsilopochtli moch ik chichiwtika in iamatlatki, aw in ixkich itlatlatkio muchi i kisenkawke. kenin mochiwa aw inik momikiliko, ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. makwilpowali gr. chilpitsawak q.n. aawia in otlamalok in kwavivitl ik movava. este kanik kisako poniente biya a kontra den gobierno a kontra. ¡ yenapilolotsin iknokonmemeya! satepa yokipoliwkachiwka akmo kimatia kanin katka. más ke tein niwelis ya. ipa se taman saj. noiwan pepenalo inik matlaktli onse pius (achille ratti) yuhkin wei itlahtokateopixkaw in nowianyo teonechikolistli. aw in oiw konmiktike kwawtleketski in weiteotenanka, aw in mexika ik niman yahke ahsito tlalkokomokko, niman yahke asito atisapan, niman yake ahsito tlantsinko, niman yahke ahsito tlenamakoyan, niman yahke ahsito wewetlan, niman yahke ahsito akweskomak, niman yahke ahsito atlixokan, niman yahke ahsito teokulwakan, niman yahke ahsito tepetokan, niman ik yahke ahsito witsilopuchko, niman yahke asito in ipan altepetl kulwakan, niman yahke ahsito kawaltepek, niman yahke ahsito wixachtekatl imapan, niman yahke ahsito kwexomatitlan, niman yahke tlapitsawayan motlalito sekintin in mexika. niman ye ik kinpowilia in ixkich omotenew in popoliwis. ipan se tekpatl xiwitl, omotlalike mexikah techkatitlan in kanin onenke ixkichka nawi akatl xiwitl. sasokanin inhin akolnawakatsi yewatl tlatokati in ikwak asiko mexika, ye tenawka. kitokato ne kwateno. nawi akatl atle ipa mochiw. axkan hwebes in ik 26 mani metstli setiembre de 1613 años, ihkwak ye yowa inik walyowak maxitiko san mochtakakalakiko in nikan siudad mexiko in senka mawistililoni teoyotika tlahtowani doktor don hwan péres de la serna arsobispo mexiko, inin klérigo samora ichantsinko; ayak kittak in nikan tlaka mexiko inik walmokalaki ichantsinko ayak kimonamikili, aw in walatwik viernes ye ichantsinko moyetstika, san ok motsawktsinotikatka ayemo moteittititsino. ix kali xiwitl, 1293. se mamahpikton yepasohtli xikahsiki mo tlaxkal wan xonewa axan mihchian mobiexa. aw in tonatiw ikalakiampa itech onasi in mokal in otimotenew kalkowki aw in xochimilkopa itech onasi in akalotli aw in tonatiw ikisayampa itech mani in wei ochpantli tlamelaoa siudad. okseki xochiyowah kemanyeski, amo yetok tiempo. aw in martes, wel ok tlatlayowatok, in ompa walkis ichan in hwan diego in kimonochilia teopixki in ompa tlatelolko; aw in ye ahsitiwits inawak ipam inin /x/ihuitl ye chikwasepa tipowalo owala d[on] {h}ernando hwes. amo xikwalani, 97. in itewkyotsin, in itlahtokayotsin, in tokommotimalwililia, in tokommochamawililia, inik ye ipan timotekitilia, timotlakotilia, inik tokommopachilwiya in ikwappetlatsin, in ioselopetlatsin. ik onok in kwetlachtli muchiwtok, in ahmo tlaka onok, in sowtok, in patlawatok in itlan aktok in isti, in itlan, in iteiya, in itekwaya, in teakokisaya, in totemoya; in tsonwastli, immekatl, in tlaxapochtli, in itstli, in tetl, in kwawitl, inik kixamania, inik kiposteki in wel chalchiwitl, in wel teoxiwitl. aw ik niman ye mononotsa in chalka in iski kalpoli, ye kihtowa "aquique in in chichimeka?, ka senka tlaweliloke; in iw nemi, ken intlan tinemiske? kwix intlan titolotiaske ka in iw nemi?; kwix tewantin timitskawan timopochwan tiyeske in tichalka in takxoteka? ma ompa tikimiwakan in intlan in tekwannawaleke in kiyawnawaleke, ahso ompa mikitiwi. v tochtli xiwitl, 1458. san okkeskintin in onkan tewan kiske, yehika ipampa kimixnamik kintsakwili in frai herónimo de sárate kapelán san hosep, amo kinek in onkan tewan kisaskia mexika moyoteka in san hwan la penitensia, yehika in onkan kinmokixtilis- || 208 -quia in yankwikatsitsinti kinmochiwilike mexika in imixiptlatsin san hwan baptistatsin iwan imikilitsin san diegotsin, in ye wiptla ipan domingo de ramos katka in ihkwak onkan san hoseph kinmoteochiwilike. in ixochiyo pané akoyotik, amo pochiktik. in tepankaltech xochimila tikinpia geranioxochitl chichiltikeh iwan chichilistalehkeh xiii akatl xiwitl, 1271. x aktl xiwitl, 995 años. antonio martín markés. pero nama nikilpis niman i kowikake in imixpan tlatoke masatl; kihita in akan kenami. pero in sanfransiskanoj, ait kemanian xochiyowa por ké yeh onkak mas itech noviembre in itakka. niman ye ik yaw in tlenamakas in itwalko kitkilitiwi in soli. ixiuyo se kimana iwan chichikxokoxiwit, xokoxiwit wan ika se maltia. yahkweli panók porke motlapo alaguna. aw in oyuh kimittak in awitsotsin, niman kinmakak in tlahtokayotl. v tekpatl xiwitl, 1276. kwak yepewalo tlahchiko mowikan kwitlaxtli mowika akokohtli mowika se ayatl para tlamamalos ikan kwitlaxtli nekwatl mowikatlachiktetl. se kilo pitsonakatl kwaltia in ixkosawki ichpoch itoka istakxochitl isiwaw muchiw tesosomoktli in askapotsalko. aw ye itlamian in in matlaktlionse tekpatl xiwitl in itech asito yaoyotl in altepetl in amakemekan, iwan inik nowian provisias chalko. nikan pew tsintik inik ye pielo in ilwitsin sankto thomás de akino sankto domingo teopixki, ik tsatsiwak in nowian kaltsalan inik tekakitilok, inik ixkich kawitl aik opieloya yniqu ilwitsin kisaya sesexiwtika sankto; || 11 aw in axkan ik pewa in sesexiwtika ilwitsin kistias wei pielos, kiwalmiwali itlanawatiltsin in sankto padre in moyetstika roma. ichkatsawa inana. in newatl pedro witsiltewka onikkak inin tenawatili nikitowa okiyolik onkikisas in intlatki siwa in iw katka yewekaw sa sa no yuh yes. aw nokonnankilis in tlatoli inin motlatol ispan onikito eskribano. inik niknektilia newatl eskribano nikan niktlalia nofirma hweves a primero de abril 1568 años. wel nonoma ichan onikkakiltito in tlatoli. kristoval de sank mateo eskribano. sayoh se kikwa itakilo. nochi xochitl kisentiliah aw ipanpa nitlaokoya ka nikan mopopoliwitis in kapitán markés iwan tehuatzin”. sesen akin aw ik niman kihtoke in chalka akxoteka "ca ye kwali, xiwalmowikakan, ka nikan in ihkak in ankimotemolitiwitse". ikniwkwikatl —in xwan in edmundo pero... ¡namehhuan xichualcuitih! aw in yewatl in tlotlitewktli kamo poyawtekatl, ka xakalka, ka nompa iwik nemito imichpoch in poyawteka; ye wel niman kwimokwitlawi in tlein intlahtol in poyawteka, inik teomama mochiw; inin sa ye ipan in chikome tekpatl xiwitl, 1304. i tochtli xiwitl, 1298 años. in okiwilanke chinamitl ye no kintekitia, kimilwia “mexicaé! kimitalwia in kolwaka tlatoke ma inpaltsinko kanati masatl in akan tlamintli, ma kana seki kitlaxiliti in iyomio. . ka hakan wel onech tlati in tloke nawake ahso kana oniteatlatsikwinalwi onitesokimotlak: inik nok%nts¡n. xa itech ohti, ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años; in tlahtokat mexiko 14 xiwitl. in xochiyowa agosto. aw senka wel totokak in kokolistli, wel mikowak; ixkichtin momikilike in piltsintli in ye kwaltsin in mokeketsa in mowilana in telpochtli in ichpochtli in tlapaliwi in iyoloko tokichtin iwan siwa iwan in wewetke in ilamatke, wel ixpoliowak inik mikowak iwan kastilteka. ahmo por kilo in totla'ol sinko sentabos kwartiyo. tlen 61 tlanawatihkayotl. in tepantlahtoanih iwan wekapan tepantlahtoanih amo akah welis kinkotonas tlen ika intlahtol tlayeyekoseh keman kichiwaseh intekiwakayo, iwan amo keman welis kinixko ihliseh ika yewan. in tlahtolyekanketl tlen se iwan se tlahtokan kiixpias makitlepanitakah axkayotl amatlanawatiloyan tlen itechpan motlatskilihtokeh iwan amo akah makiixpano kaltekichiwali kampa monechikowa iwan tequichihuah. ¿ kwix ok neli tlaka ? ¿cuix ok neli tokwik? ¿ tle noso ika aya? ¿tle wal kisa in onkan tinemi? in onkan tikate, timotolinia, tinochniw. tla nimits on wika tla okan xonika. nikan ipan in omikiko in tlakatl i nesawalpiltsintli tlahtowani katka akulwakan tetskoko; aw se xiwitl in ayak tlahtokat tetskoko. sehko nohkí kipixtó kwitlatsayantok nopa tlali ix tekpatl xiwitl, 1228 años. ayamo tewán tiki'toaya' tlenon in wik inon rebolúsion tlenon ki kontenoroa in rebolúsion pero ahmo tihmatia' tlenon ipampa wan satepan kwak yokisakon rebolúsion kwak in den in siglo yokalak de nin siglo. mochiwia kwoutah kampa onkak awatahsol. yewa okintsakwak intlatsakwali ihkan tlanexilotl. aw in tewantin no yuh tikitoa ka tiksemaxkatia in kali nawtetl ihoan no tikmaka in posesio in otikpiaya semikak tiknemaktia no ihoan no tokonitoa in tla aka satepan in techtlatolmakas in tla achi miek i tomines techmakasnekis san niman nayokmo tikseliske yuh titonetoltia in ixpantsinko hustisia. mochintin nowian nenke in kaltsalan kohotokake in mexiko; xayakatl konakitinemia iwann amatl, amatlakwiloltepitoton kitemakatinemia in onkan ipan ikwiliwtok in tlein nepapan tewetskiti tlahtoli in okikwiloke in san kiyoyokoxke in san kipipikke in san kiyoyolowike tlatlaketsali tlahtoli. domingo ik xxi mani metstli hulio de 1591 años, yankwika motlayawalwi sakramento in sant antonio abbad in xoloko; aw inik motlayawalwi intlaitlanilistika mochiw in kapelán hoseph méndes iwan in padrón diego de muñón, kimotlatlawtilike in maestreeskwela iwan provisor arsobispo ixiptlatsin. wan den paran yoahsiki in ora kinkakawa' yekisa' yekinawatia in maistro kon permiso maestro asta mustia tiwise onkán. xi tekpa xiwitl unka momikili witsiliwitsi tenochtitla tlatoani, sempowalxiwitl omome in tlatokat. mochipautani. mah amo ehakawilo, in amameh ayemo niquinceliah. ayokwan nochi totatsitsiwan ika yomotlalitsinoke. aihmo tlatechpoloa; ye yiman ye wits kaxtoli iwan se tonali septiembre. ipan metstli disiembre mitoa nochibwena achi kwaltsin omochiwaya. amo oyeya techan motlakatilis toteotatsin sino kada barrio okiwikaya se teotatsin iwan ixpan pwerta prinsipal teopa kinmosakilis. ika koros alta wan siriales okinmonanikiliaya topixke kan ok in okinmotlaliliaya altar mayor. ompoyon ometstaya nochi de tlen chikome barrio wan otlatsotsonaya músika. ikwak kinmokalakiliaya teopa achi kwaltsin oyeya. achi miak kohetes omotlakalia. oyeya xochitl. tlahtoltin . in setsin ometsin in nonka in nehka in nawi in nomach in nowaiyolki ahso nikan nech mopohpulwis in nech motlahtlatilis in tloke nawake. ka yewatl in anquimocaquitia. inewan iknimeh wel omotlazohtlayah. mochalchiwteponas,in moxiwkecholkikis, yuh tokon ya pitsa, san ye ti yoyontsin. kitoke “cuix tocha?”. vi kali xiwitl, 1173. "uan tlaketl, wan kenke kena ma kitokaro? in mahtlaktetl walixtokok,walkokoliloya in atl in tepetl, i wexotsinko, tsiwaktlan, tsakwalotok, in tlakochawayotok in wexotsinko. aw niman otikimonkalakike in inchan iwan tetika otlamomotlake inik okonanke posesion aw inik omotamachiw in tlali in ipan ikak kali in kixowayan poerta ikak in tonatiw ikalakiyampawik homatl ipan se yolotli onkan se estakas omokets aw inik koliutika koyowakanpawik homatl ipan se mitl aw in kali in tepantli koyowakampawik makwilmatl ipan se mitl. ix akatl xiwitl, 1163. kwaltia . aw in yakateoktli inemak konkentia in otlatopili aik tlatla in amatl in iskipan moxtlawa san mochipa konkentia. ye otimitsnotlahkwilwiani, mach amo nikmati kampa timochantilia. san in walchichiwtia in kiwalwikak, ik niman san iw chichiwtia in ipan iteokwitlapan; itlawis kikawato akolwakan, kimakato i nesawalpiltsintli tlahtowani. ualauij". in kilit. chikwasen tekpa xiwitl i kimiktike ikewakatsi ye tlatoani yeskia tenochtitla. axkan martes in ik 24 mani metstli marso de 1615 años, ihkwak nawintin forsados onkan temak wetsiko in kulwakan, yewantin in tlakpak omotenewke in ohtlipan choloto in kinwikaya la china; aw ik walmokwepaya san ichtaka yowaltika in nikan mexiko kalakiskia, onkan kimittak in kulwakan teniente. x akatl xiwitl, 1411. iwi kecholikoskatl wiwitoliwi in tlaltikpak. anemiskiah anis, ixkich in kikwi tomahpil in tepachnewktll au i tekpayokan onoka, i wawkil, in tlotlitektli, in ikopa yake i motosawika i kowatlikamak i wawkilicha; ewatl ompa tlatokayotito in tekpayokan ewak chichimeka. x akatl xiwitl, 1359. 66v aw no iwan in ihkwak in in onkan okalakiko kulwakan in mexika, ye oiw nepa sentsonxiwitl ipan matlakpowalxiwitl ipan matlakxiwitl ye katki i wel itsinekan ik motlali altepetl tulam, in satepan i ye kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan onpowali ipan omexiwtika in ipan i akatl xiwitl, 1051 años, in okimopopolwiko totekwiyo dios. inik onikmakako posesion in martin tenoch yematl inik omixnamikia maria papa aw ye konkwi in axkan in tlali in martin tenoch iwan in baltasar inik patlawak in otitechpa vi matl ipan se yolotli aw inik weyak in tonatiw ikisayanpan xv matl itech onasi in tlakochkalkatl in ikalnakas. xii kali xiwitl, 9. onka ompa, ipan toaltepew, in tlalayohtli in momaka mila iwan mokwa yuhkin ayohtoton in namaka tiankisko. monechikoa ipan milahtli in ihkwak ye mochiwa; kwali mopaka iwan moixtlapana, mowikxitia ihtik in istayutl ahnoso poyoxistayutl ahnoso ihtik in chilmoli. in ikwak walkisaya wel se xiwitl in walmoketsaya. ipan matlaktli omome kali in pew. aw in niskalitikpa mani tlali yoan ipan hikak kalsoli xochmilkopa itstikak yehin wapalkweskomatl ompa mani intech powis in noxwiwan ines fransiska yoan iwkton hoana xokoton. bweno kema mamá okihto in piltontli kwalikak peroaxan. iiii tochtli xiwitl, 1262 años. aw inin xikinmopalewili iwan xikinmonawatili in merinos in tepixke inik amo kintekitiske in kowatekil. aw kamo niekintin in topilwan san sebastian tlaka ka san chikomentin. yeka nama tiwalawih iiii tekpatl xiwitl, 40. nopa wewentsi ya kiihto in kitokaitiah waukilit por ke kampa mochiwa seko sah wan tel miak in iteyo mochiwa, yeh ika kilwiah wauti, wan iteyoyekpisilitos. aw nimann onkan kinkwepili in intoka in asteka, okimilwi "yn axkan kaokmo amotoka in amasteka; nimechmaka yankwik amotoka, ye anmexitin". inin atsintli amo kwali momati. wan tlaskamati ini yeh tochintewktli wexotla tlatokat; aw in iweltiw askweitl isiwaw muchiw matlakowatl askapotsalko. kwando kitaliskeh se planta de taol, aw ipam inin xiwitli inkwak owala in markes kapiktam kortees aw niman otikma ka ye owala iteoyosin in t[o]t[ekwi]o dios ye okiwalwikake in kastilamtlaka aw in yewatl ini xochitekutli ini kwawtli in{i} oselo ti ok nikam nika nocham itokayokam tepeteopam aw niman onikilnamiki noyolokakopa oniya onitenamikito ompam xalapam onikinmotili miyekintin teopixkasisintin miyekintin tlaka kiwalwikak iwan temachtia iwan tekwatekia aw i{n} newatl i{n} nixochiteuktli niman oniqu/e/lehui ima ninokwateki aw niman oniwala oksepa i{n} nikam nochan tepeteopam senka onikinonoski i{n} nopilwan. aw no onkan kiniwti tlayakak kinmanke kiyakatihtiake inik tlayawalolok in timasewalti in mixteka tlakanechikolti, in oinnemaktik in okonanke in kapila katka tliltike in okixtililoke inkofradía umpa kipiaya, aw inik niman yewantin oinnemaktik omakoke inin omotenew kapila in omotenewke mixteka inik onkan okitlalike inkofradía in itetsinko powi totlasonantsin rosario; inik otlayawalolok axkan yewatsin okimowikilike omotlayawalwi in omotenewtsino san achi tepitsin in totlasonantsin rosario imaxka masewalti. aw in omentin imachtsitsinwan omotenewtsino mikkatsintli in arsobispo, in ikse yewatsin in padre frai herónimo gwerra sanno sankto domingo teopixki vikario atlakowayan, in ikome yewatl in kapitán de la gwardia, luto kiwilantiw tlanepantla ihkatiwi, senka tlaokoxtiake inik kimotepotstokilitiake intlasotlatsin, kinnepantlaketstiake in omotenewke oidores; aw iwan oknose tlakatl in onkan intlah ikatia tlanepantla no luto in kiwilantia, kitkitia yewatl se kwawpitsaktli weyak in ikwak tlanepanoli tlakrustlalili, onkan itech pilkatiah sowtia se tliltik tepitsin kamixatsintli, itech ikwiliwtia in itlakamekayotlawistsin in iarmastsin omotenewtsino mikkatsintli arsobispo visurrei. ye otlanankilihkeh mach in amatl ayemo oconceliayah. se kichipawa konamo xiumiki wan amo moskaltia. noteki amo nech kawa ika in no kalmimilo ika nokawas. kamohmeh wan talkakawat aw ik 10 mani metstli septiembre inik mosenpowa, inik pew sesemilwitl sesenyowal manka kiyawitl in tlapakiyawitl inik kisako inik tlamiko, kaxtolilwitika in kisako in ipan in omotenew metstli septiembre inik ompa pewtika ipan metstli agosto. ka yuh no okihtotiake in wewetke mexika tenuchka in kin nikan otlakatiko, in sa onoilwiloke in sa onokakitiloke in aokmo nowel yewantin okatka i wel yakachtopa owalkiske in kanin chikomostok kinewayan, in kanin ilwikaatl ixeliwyan inik walpanoke. niman ihkwak ipan in onkan kitlalike mexika inik kinyakanas tenochtsin; inik niman okwawtlahto in onkan tisaapan kulwakan, yewatl onkan kintlali in tlakatl koxkoxtli. sanno ihkwak pepeno gwadalupe viktoria yuhkin inik se wei itlahtokaw in méxiko. tlahkoxonakatl se kikokolia ika tapalol. wan no kikwih ika kimpaktiah piokonemeh ihwak chaktij: kimanelowah ika tixti wan kinintejtenakiaj. i kali xiwitl, 1233. achto se kipixka, nochi se kikixtilia in ipanewayo wan se kikojtontiuj. okiske wei kolwakan iwan itsintla weikwawitl, in kwawmayo katka, mocehuicoh. ompa momostli konketsakoh noiwan otlacuacoh, aw kilmach witsilopochtli tenawati ma yewantin moxexeloah. kihto para in toplantitas mah taceliyah. yewan kipia se sisiwamimiston istak. wei iwan senka tesiawiti in tekipanolistli in ompa otikchiwkeh in nokniwtsin inik otitlaxitinkeh mochi otikchiwkeh san mamatakahtsin ahmono tiknekia aka techihtas inik ahmo techtdwiskeh in otitlaxitinkeh ompa teaxkan tlali komo se momoutihtok, tekwitok tal oso at, tetaliliah axox kampa se sah saliutok wan se itoskatampa wan se ikechkochikan wan mah se moteka wan se mitonia wan tenamiki. wan akin kwali tatempachowa, kiixtekwi wan ika tatempachowa. entonses onka tle monamakas inekwtli. kwaltia kawalipox tein iselti mokehketsa, pero yeh wehweyi wan amo miak in ewa se saj, wan kawalipox tein pisiltik, in yeh miak in ewa. "anomatia q.n. (quitoz neki) nixpan in omito yauyutl inik otepevalok tsokatsontla amo nomatia in mito yauyutl. owat se kikwi se kichiwa panelaj. noha yahki nopa ichpokero, noha kitlaitlani tomi. aw in ikwak ompewke, motlapana mokixtilia ni yolo mokawa keski tonali orne mektli para mawaki sihton para ahmo tekamakwalkwa nekwal. i tekpatl xiwitl, 10064 sik años. oksente xiwtontli itoka tlaloreganilo; noihki mopipiaya ikwak sewa aka motikokoa. okiposoniliaya iwan tototonki okipiaya tlen kis kokoxki. se xuxumalton orégano san kipolouaj. in kiketske aso ye kastolxiwitl in itech saliwtika kali in tlaketstli ye iw nikilnamiki aso ye senpowalxiwitl iwan x tli xiwitl yewatl kiketstia in tenantsin katka itoka madalena tlaxilakaleke in [tachado: kiketske] tew aw in xamitl kikow. i akatl xiwitl, 1311. oya. konetsi noyol in choka ah san xochikakawatl in pusontimani, yexochitl in tlamako. wise nopilwan. kosentlakatl kinpiah iyoltspacholtin. ik timonemitis in tlaltikpak ma tinenkawa ma tisemilwiti ma achi tiktoka inin timitsilwia. niyas ninonowalkatl, ninosasilia ‘ma ik walake, nipewaki owai you awai yain; iska ikwepka ayaooo wiaa aiyao. kaxtoli seki kihtowah xochiyowa marso, oksekih kihtowah agosto. aw sanno ipewayan in in omotenew metstli hunio de 1615 años, ihkwak ompa kuyowakan inawak san hasinto || 278 sekni werta omotlalitsinoto in tlasoteupixke in itlasopilwantsitsin totlasomawisnantsin nwestra señora del karme in motlakxipanwilia ahnoso mokxipetlawiltihtinemi motenewtsinowa deskalsos; in onkan motlalitsinoto iwerta katka in kuyowakan tlahtowani katka don hwan de gusmán itslolinki, ye ipilwan ixwiwan in okinnamakiltiko werta in omotenewtsinoke teupixke, in onkan inkolegiotsin kimochiwilike, ik motlatokamakilike san ángel mártir, in onkan kimomachtitsinowa latín telpopuchtin teupixke. san kwesihke. wan todosantos, yek oksi ya itakka. moneki motenewas in itokatsin yewatsin maría lwisa olivares, ahtokpanekatsin, mochantilia kampa sehsen xiwitl mochiwa in “molilhuitl”, yewatsin petra martínes, tlakoyokanekatsin, yewatsin gabina galarsa, yewatsin elvira hardines, tlakotenkatsitsintin iwan innewantsitsin, yuhkin oksetsitsintin, senka kwali kimiximachiliah towewetlamatilis. in kwali tlamatini, tisitl, piale machise, temachtli. temachiloni, neltokani, neltilistli temachtiani, tenonotsani. nama kena yon se tlaxkali axkana kikwahke". . in ik tinestiaske in ik tahsiske mexiko yewatl in aposonaltentl iwan ketsalkoyolnakochtli iwan xawaktopili iwan koxoli yekasewastli. iwan ikwak mixnamikke teopixke deskalsos iwan sant fransisko in ikwak mochalaniaya in itechpa komisario, aw senka achi wekawak in innetekipachol moteilwiaya in audiensia. unpa tonoke titlatilulka tiyautlapiato i wexotsinko, tikinpia in tlaxkalteka. o anki ye onkan tlaxkala chalchiwtetsilakakwikatoke, in wewetitlan. xochin poyon, poyon, xikotenkatl teuktli in tisatlakatsin, in kamaxochitsin, kwikatika in melelkisa, xochitika ye on chielo itlatol iselteotl. x kali xiwitl, 1385. kani moilochti nehin hosé alkántara. achi ye kexkichkawtika in motlaliko in vikario, ok mochix ye kin ipan kis inik mochiwako kapítulo sant augostín; yewatl achto in vikario mochiw in atsakwalka in padre frai augostín || 66 de sant pablo, yese san ok onkan moyetstikatka in sant augustín. aw maso neliwi in ye nokwel wekawak in atitlan, ya ompa in tonatiw ikisayampa; aw inik senka wekawak in ipan in inetekipachol, inik anene inik wekawak. ik tlatlapana kwawyotl oseloyotl: in motlakwilolpan san ti ya nemi ye nikan tlaltikpak. istatl, ixkich in monekis niman omikwanike ehekatepek in mexicah, ipan ome tekpatl xiwitl. ompa nawxiwtike in yewantin. ahmo xpia kwidado mama ahmo xpia kwidado de non tias tikisas de nikan solo tiawe tawiltiske no papan kwak asikiw wan. ¿tlen iman ticateh? kikuaj. itlanahnamik: ﻿ihpaquiztica ototonaltihqueh, ka wel ihkwak ye miak to manelohqueh, pahtepakti. tonana tochan tekitiwa iwan siwatekipano tenahnamiki tlahtoltin tiyaske ye ichan, ni ta xihwika asta nepa ateno xihmakawati. tak totonik, ta amo weyi ayoh wan niman xiintiuj in ixochiyo. nikawín onkak in istak xalxokot, in tsinakaxalxokot amo okachi teyi. nehwa nikilnamiki kwalkan nimewa. aw inik mochiw ilwitl in tlayawalolistli ye omito, iglesia mayor in kimaniliko in sankramento inik kimowikilike otlipan, onkan kimokixtiliko in seral kiyawak ixpan purtales onkan se mochiw kolokio; niman kimokixtiliko sant augustín teopankali ixpan onkan pwertatitlan ikome kolokio omochiw; niman ik nepa kalnakasko onnekololok, niman hospital del espíritu sankto kimokixtilito, iknawi kolokio onkan mochiw. kwaltia wel ik mochtin opahpakke owelamatke in nikan tlahtokaaltepewake; aw niman walmowikaskia in teoyotika tlahtowani, san niman onkan walmewaltiskia in itekpanchantsinko inik walmikwanitsinoskia wei tekpa palasio, atle onmantoskia in iw konmonekiltiaya, aw yese in siudad tlaka san nima amo yuh okinekke inik ompa mowikak, ok ompa konmotsikalwike inik ompa ok motlatlatolchialito atlakowayan imasewalpan in markés del vale, unkan vikario mochiwtika imachtsin itoka frai herónimo gerra, ok ompa itlan moyetstikatka, in okik tlachichiwalo || 151 mosenkawa in ixkich monekis ik namikos. mah wetsiki itech totaoltsin. tohwanti san titekipanouaj". aw in ikwak in senka ye miyek itlatki in o wel kiknopilwi in tlaltikpakkayotl in san niman aoktle kimamimiktia. ayak motlapaloaya, in okse onmixketsas; san muchi tlakatl momawtiaya, tsinketsaya. kema motsontlananki kitlachili ya wahkapa aw inin silkwetsin matlaltsin onmonamikti tekwanipan, kiwalan kimosiwawti itoka tsiwtekatsin tsompawakatewktli tlahtowani tsompawakan; ompa tlakamekayotl kontlali i matlaltsin in tekwanipan, ka yuh powtika in wewetlahtoli in chichimekatlahtoli in tenankayotl. initlaxikowah initekitij. aw inin tlaxkali ikwak moteochiw, in iw yewatsin sant nikolás de tolentino moteochiwtiw itlaxkaltsin, sexiwtika sanno iw mochiwas in ipan ilwitsin sant diego. aw in don christóval kolón ik omakalaki kinwikak in ixkich tlakatl in welitike inik kiwikak ei akali inik tlalnextitiwi; aw inik onkan kis in ipan altepetl isabela iksenpowali onnawi mani metstli abril in ipan xiwitl de 1494, inik katentokak in iyatenyotlalma altepetl in itokayokan kuba. in amo pahti. mochiwa kampa milaj. kiilwi. teotlahtoli titlanamakaskiah xoloko kimonamikilito in ixkichtin teopixke augustinos, fransiskos, dominigos, klérigos, teatinos. aoh sa nopilotsin in kimokowiya otitopakanonotske itoka lurenso diego ihoan in inamik itoka hoana petronila ihoan ikoneoh itoka fransiska aoh in ipatioh in omochioh i notlalma chikwei pesos ihoa nawi tomines wel nomatika in anokonkwik. in kwamekat saj. se konetsi nesis 61. aw i ye tewatl otitlachix, otimoskali, ma wel tewatl xontkkeketsilti. aw motolinia in omitsontepewtewke, in omitsonchayawtewke. ¿cuix okseppa mitsonkwaltikiwi, mitsonitikiwi in tsopelik, in awiyak, in teix, in teyolo? ye kene, ma tikihto tlein kihtowa in wewe, in ilama. ¿ca ahmo tlei? ka san nimitspachilwiya immoma, in mokxi. at yuhki, at ahmo yuhki, in nimonan, in nimotta. ¿zan ik tinechmayawis, san ik tinexopewas in nimonan, in nimotta? chalchiwitle, ketsale, ma iwiyan, ma yokoxka in ipaltsinko in tloke, in nawake. makamo ixkiskakopa, ixtomawkakopa. in nikan in semilwitl, in omilwitl, in at ok mitsonnemiltia in ipalnemowani. amo monamaka. ye matlaktsonxiwitl ipan epowali ipan matlaktlomome xiwitl omokwekwep in epowalonmatlaktli ipan etlamantli tlahtoli; in ompa babilonia oxexeliw onkan omoyawak. pero eltó atl miyak. aw atenko ipan tlaxilakali i walyetia tlahtowani panowayan. aw in oyuh motlahtokatlalike in tlahtoke chalko, ok nawilwitike i nikan mexiko in motewksawke; aw niman ik onewake yake ok konkawtiake in tisosikatsin. kwalika. ¿tienon tikwasneki? ayokmo wel nikilnamiki tlen opanok. chikwei ahnoso mahtlaktli nohpali in ok konetik oanquipixqueh. in tlahtowani walmochiwtia itoka totoltekatl tsonpachtli tlailotlaktewktli; yewatl kiwalmamatia in inteow i nawyotewktli xipil, ipial walmochiwtia. techmakake tomolito yotiwalahke. aw iwan kil intla nel kinpilwatiskia tliltike in señorati, intla okichtin intech kichiwaskia inpilwan in ye xeliwki innakayo; in motenewa mulatos moriskostin tlakatiskia, kil niman kinmiktiskia, amo wel nemiskia amo wel kinwapawaskia. mitoa in ok yowayan, in ayamo tona, in ayamo tlatwi, kilmach, mosentlalike, mononotske in teteo in umpa teutiwakan, kitoke, kimolwike pehki tlatomoni aw sa intepantlahtolistika in españoles nikan chaneke vesinos inik kintonke inik sa matontiake kinwikake seral umpa kimilpiskia. . aw in ikwak okikak in tlatowani awitsotsin in o impan wal motsaok in nawalostomeka niman otlaiwa. yewatl oiwalok in moteoksomatsin; tlakochkalkatitia ayamo tlatokatilo in ikwak. ye yuh sempowalxiwtia. ik unkan hin nesi mitoa ka yewatl tonatiw yeskia in mestli tekusistekatl intla ye achto onwetsini tleko, ipampa ka yewatl achto mixkets inik muchi tlasotli ipan tlamasew. kininotsa nopa peones. kampa semi kwoutah amo mochiwa, in okachi mochiwa kampa panian. in lá ohkión tinechmaka esperansas pus tlyaske wan ticholoske de nikan para ahmo nikanias itech inin kweba nehwatl de rikos ino papanwan oyahke asiendados wan asan nechwalikak ini mono. vii tochtli xiwitl, 1174. ipan chikonawi akatl xiwitl poltekatl in itoka tewktli inikei hwan sobieski, in kinyakana iyaokiskawan eutlokpa, kimpewa in otomanekah ipan itawkayo inekalilis vindebona. itech maría nikolasa trinidad. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. inik chikwasentlamantli tetsawitl neminis nowian nonnenemi, nowian nontlatowa, nikwikanitl. in ketsaliskixochitl san ye on tsetseliwtok ye wapapalokalitek. in wehkwentsin semi yolik nehnemi. aw in mexika timasewaltin atle itlan kinmawtiaya, san tlatlachia iwan tlatlakaki, san kinmawisowaya in españoles in iw mopolowaya in innemawtilistika, yniqu iwki makamo wel yaotiakawan ipan neske. xikohtenkatl ikwik tlahko kilo selpatik chichiwalayotlatetsawtli tlen 124 tlanawatihkayotl. in tekichiwalismeh tlen amo xitlawak kinmaktilia inin amatlanawatili tlen tekiwahmeh sentlanawatiloyan, mokwamachilia san intechpowi tlen tlatltlanahuatilmeh. chiwknawi kali xiwitl anotle mochiw. aw inik motlahtokatlalike, ye oyuh nepa exiwitl tlahtokati in awitsotsin, aw no iwan ye yuh nepa senpowalxiwitl ipan exiwitl ya in altepetl in chalkayotl, iwan inik kaktimanka in ayak tlahtokat tsakwaltitlan tenanko iwan panowayan. in kosamalotl ipan se askat. inik v nikitowa onka nometl makwili ome itech nikpowtiw in nokonew in itoka maria yewatl inimemetlapilo aw imei monamakas in ipantiw iwan misa ik nopan mitos. . yewatl in in kinchoktiaya in ik nentlamatia in puchteka wewetke. senka wel kin nawatiaya in ik amo kitlaawilkixtilis in amo kitlaawilmachilis totekuyo. monamaka ne kwesalan kemeh yon witsselik wan tein chikawak. onkak se taman saj. mochiwa tepejxiyoj, kwoutah wan owihkan. niman kiwako in ipiltsin in kimixiptlatitia itoka ilankweitl in itelpuchtsin, in motlahtokatlali ipan in in omotenew ome kali xiwitl. mochiwa saj. tlisehtok nochi. in se kitoka, tawelita mas kampa talwakpan in tapiyalwaxin wan sanfransiskanohwaxin. nikitoa ni nesawalkoyotl: ¿cuix ok neli nemowa oa in tlaltikpak? an nochipa tlaltikpak, san achika ye nikan. tel ka chalchiwitl no xamani, no teokwitlatl in tlapani, no ketsali posteki. an nochipa tlaltikpak; san achika ye nikan. wan nopa atl ya miyak amo mochipautani. ihkwak ahsiko in tekwanipan tlaka in ompa ohtlatepek, kimanato tliltekatsin; in walahtokato tsiwtlakawki tsonpawakatewktli, aw in iteopixkawan: in ikse itoka kwetlaxtli, in ikome korapitsak, in ikei ixkotl, in iknawi kwawnawakatl. onkan in porfirio días ahmo techkaw otimihke ika apistli solo dios kani okwali kaya in totlaol para techmantenero in gobierno ahmo techkaw otimimihke ika apistli. kaltsintan mochiwa yon istak wan chichiltik. seki kitokaitiah pawa wan seki chininaj. —ke nahmo yekipia, nimotlenkwa iki kiyekanaske tekitlaka nosomelawak. ye yuh makwilxiwitl tlatokati tesosomoktsi in poliwke kolwake, matlaktliomome akatl xiwitl in ipan poliwke; nawxiwitl i yowatimanka kolwaka. yoan niktenewa akalotenkopa mani notlalkoal yoan ipan mani kali yoan achi itepantlatsakwilo tonatiw ikalakiampa itstikak nikowili pedronila sakwan nikmakak matlaktli pesos inin itech powis in noxwiw maria salomen. ometsontli mahtlaksepwali wan makwili yaí tlahkwilotok". aw in ihkwak in in intlahtokaw atlawteka in omotenew itoka ilankweitl atlawtekatltewktli san onkan ka in atenko ayotsinko onkan tlahtokati. in mochiwa kampa eski komo se kitoka. xachokaka kan ompoliwis i masewali aiyo. imaxiuyo kemeh yon tsiwahkaltiokwowit, maweweyak, sayoh ke in tsiwahkaltiokwowit kachi matihtilawak wan in tsontsapot achí medio mapitsawak wan makanawak. kampa semi kwouhihtik amo mochiwa. kiilwi. ipan makwili akatl xiwitl omik wewemotewksoma in itoka ilwikamina. ik niman omotlahtokatlali axayakatl inik chikwasen itlahtokaw tenochtitlan. aw in ilwikak siwapili niman ik kimonawatilih inik ontlekkos in ikpak tepetsintli, in onkan kanin yeppa konmottiliaya; quimolhuilih: xitlekko, noxokoyow, in ikpak in tepetsintli, aw in kanin otinechittak, iwan onimitznahnahuatih, onkan tikittas onok nepapan xochitl. xiktehteki, xiknechiko, xiksentlali; niman xikwaltemmowi. nikan nixpan xikwalwikka. in nanakat. tlen 53 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlaltipaktli tlaneskayotilistli tlen 300 altepeyotl sentika tlaixpehpentli elis tlen tlaxexeloli tlen nochi tlakameh tlen totlalnantsin iwan altepeyotl tlen nikan moihtowa. in tlaxexeloli tlen sentika altepeyotl tlaixpehpentli iniwaya tlaltlanahuatilmeh, mochiwas itechpan tlen san iyotsiya amatlapowali tlen altepechanehke, san motlachilis ma amo mokawa akahya tlaltlanawatili amo asis omeh tepantlahtoanih tlen miakintin. iwikpa motlapehpeniseh tlen 200 tepantlahtonih tlen tlahtolpewalistli tlaixnextilistli iwan tlatekpantli tokayotl tlaltokayotl, mochiwas makwili tlalyowali tlaixpehpentli ipan nochi totlalantsin. in tlahtol tlanawatili kiihtos kenihki mochiwas inin tlaltipaktli tlaneskayotilistli tlen inin tlalyawaloni. tlatsopeliloni, ixkich in monekis iwan in nikan siudad mexiko tlaka in tepachowa regidores españoles aokmo okimonamikilike in omotenewtsino teoyotika tlahtowani arsobispo in iw owalmochiwtiwia inkatsinko in iskintin arsobisposme achtopa nikan mexiko omotlapachilwiko inik walmaxitiaya yankwikan, ika palio kwachkaltika okinmonamikilike; aw in axkan kaokmo yuh namikoske in arsobisposme, in iw axkan owalmokalaki omotenewtsino teoyotika tlahtowani doktor don hwan péres de la serna. mokowah kikiltin keh kolex, kilpatlawak, xitomatl, xonakatl, apio, axo, patatah, yelotl, lentexa, totoltetl, yetl, nelwakokok, keso, iwan miak xochikwali. in asiko mexika ye chikwepowalxiwitl omatlaktli tlatokatiwa askapotsalko, ye nawi tlatokati askapotsalko. ihkwak inin ye omochiw mokalakia in yamankasakatl, mosohwa iwan ye kwali kalakoas, netemalos. aw ik niman ye mononotsa in chalka, ye kimolwia "aquin ye wits inik technonotsa in techilwia in toteow in kihtowa `oc wits in akin anquichia'?; aw ahso yewatl in okisako in tikchia, ma kan iwiyan tokonnamikiti". aw in ontsonkis missa, oksekni kimotokilike in iyomiyotsin, iwan kinmotlakwaltili in ixkixtin teopixke. xi kali xiwitl, 1217. in mihtoa amoxwake. tlen 91 tlanawatihkayotl. iwikpa welis tekipanos se sekretario tlen despacho moneki mexika tlakatl ika itlakatilis, kichihtos nochi tlen itechpowi iwan kiaxitihtos sempoali iwan mahtlaktli xiwitl. iwan se siwatl in kiwalwikak, amo wel momati in itoka, in inweltiw tekwanipan tlaka; yuh kitowa, ichpoch in omotokatenew in tsiwtlakawki in kiwalwikak. omotenew altepetl; aw in san iyokan in san ixkich nikan amakemekan in mokaw masewali sa ixkich onxikipili, in motlalike in ikmakwilkan kistika altepetl amakemekan. tepetlatl. ipam inin xiwitli /o/hualaque toteopixkawan klerigos= s[eño]r antonio moskedad ihoan s[eño]r hoseph de ka/s.../ iwan s[eño]r thadeo wel yewandn yankwikam hu{a}laque. kwando pewas walewas nehin ehekatsin ika nikan walewa, ipa se taman sah in xonakat. tlen 54 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlaixpehpentli tlen 200 tepantlahtoanih tlen tlatolpewalistli tlaixnestilistli iwan tlatekpantli tlatemaktilistli ika tlaltokayotl, mochiwas ika inin tlapechtlahtoli iwan noihki tlen kiihtos tlahtol tlanawatili i. se tlahtol nechikolistli, iwikpa welis kiihkwilos tlaltokayotl, moneki kinextis melawak motlaskilihtok iniwaya tepantlahtoanih tlen tlaixnextilismeh kentsih miakintin ipan mahtlakpoali weyi altepeyotl tlaixnextilistli; ii. nochi tlahtol nechikolistli tlen kiaxitis nel amo miak ome por siento tlen nochia tlaixwasantli tlen tlaltokayotl miakintin tlalneskayotilistli, itechpowi kiaxkatiliseh tepantlahtoanih san kenihki kiihtowa tlahtolpewalistli tlen tlatamachiwali tlaixnextilistli; iii. iwikpa tlen tlahtol nechikolistli kisenkawas nochi ome tlahtoli moihtoh, san iyokatiah iwan ipiwiyah tlen amaixnextilistli kikixtiseh itlaixnextiliswan, kimaktiliseh itechpan tlahtolpewalistli tlatamachiwali tlaixnextilistli, san kenihki tlaixwasantli kikixtis ipan nochi anawak tlali, tlapowali tepantlahtoanih tlaltokayotl tlen itechpowi ipan miakintin tlalneskayotilistli. ipan tlatemaktilistli motokilis pamitl tlen kenihki ixnesih tlaixnextilismeh ipan amatokayotl. iv. amo akah tlahtol nechikolistli welis mopialis kipano 300 tepantlahtoanih itechpan ome tlahtolpehualismeh. v. amo keman ipan nochi tlamantli, se tlahtol nechikolistli welis kipias se tlapoali tlen tepantlahtoanih tlen kiaxitiseh porsentahe tlen iasika nochi tlahtokan tlen kixpanos chikweyi tlapoali tlen porsentahe tlaixwasantli kinechikos tlen nochi anawak tlali. inin tlapechtli amo moixkotilis tlahtol nechikolistli, tlen tlatlanis ipan weyi altepeyotl, kikixtis se porsentahe tlen ikpalmeh iasika tlen tlahtokan, achi wehkapan tlen tlanechikoli porsentahe tlen anawak tlali tlaixwasantli mochiwas ipanoyah chikweyi por siento; iwan vi. iixpan tlen moihtowa ipan tlahtoltlatlapantli iii, iv iwan v tlen onpanokok, in tepantlahtolmeh tlen tlatamachiwali ixnextilistli, tlen mokawas tlen teipan keman tlatemaktiliseh tlen intechpowi tlen tlahtol nechikolistli tlen ixnesis inipan tlahtoltlatlapantli iv noso v, moaxkatis sekinok tlahtokan nechikolismeh tlen kipiaseh axkatilistli ipan se iwan se miakintin tlalneskayotilistli, xitlawak iasika ika anawak tlaixwasantli tlen inin tlayakapan. in tlahtol tlanawatili kichiwas tlaxitlawali tlen inin tlachiwali. para se kikwas se kitehteki itakka wan se kikwa. wel nikneki, senka nikelewia, inik nikan nechkechilis kemeh aman amo onkak. nikintayokoli nopilwantsitsin. makwilpa in chiknawi, ompowali iwan makwili. ipan in in ye kinotsa in ketsalkanawtli in diablo in teskatlipoka katka, ye kilwia "quetzalcanauhtlé, ma ok tiwian, ma ok tiktlalkawikan in altepetl in || 138v chalko, ye nelalasi inik nikwalani; ma ok ompa tiwian in kuyowakan, aw ma ok onmosawa i noweltiw in chalchiwtlikwe!". kimomakili in tomiyo yewayotl, in amono yewatl iwitl in ketsali in pepetlaka in iwki teokwitlayo in iwki keni yewantin totome, iwan i manenenke in tlaltikpak nemi amo istitl amo pipitsawaka weyak tlantli || 2v in tlankochtli in kimomakili inik momanawiske; aw yehika ipampa in mochi i yewatl in maso neliwi in intech ka manenenke in kinkwalnextia, aw itla yuh itech yeni in tlakatl amo kwalnesiskia. aw niman yewantin in kimontlautiaya in ye mochintin in siwa in tealtianime in kimontlawtiaya kweitl: yewatl in iyolo iwan tlatskalotl ilakatsiwki, —wanuhki ahmo kilnamiki mikmomantenerwis má tekiti pus tlenkwa kilnamiki ye tlakatl. sesek eski, por ké seki kinisoneutiah oso seki kinijtikokouaj. tahyowikan, ni chichimekatl aw wel yewatl wel iyelpan itlakapan wel itlakotian in kinwalminili in inteokal in xochteka in ulmeka in xikalanka in kiyawisteka in kukolka; in onkan kalaktiwets in onkan moketstiwetsito in imiw tlahtowani. se kilo okonanakatl tlanonotsali kwali mopaka in nanakatl, moteteki; in yepasohtli no mopaka, motseltilia; in xonakatl moyawalteki. ipan kaxitl motlalia pitsochiyawisotl, motsoyonia in xonakatl, motlalia in masayeli iwan yepasohtli, motlapachoa inik ihpotokwiksis. in textli motlalilia tepitsin istatl iwan tepitsin atl inik san poxaktik mokawas; mochiwa in tlaxkali iwan ihtik motlalia in masayeli, in ye tlawikxitili; satepan ye motsoyonia ahnoso wiksi komalko, kenin monekis. kemmanian motlalilia kokok chiltemoli, intla moneki. pero despwés ahmo okpa se distansia owelpanohke. se kilo poyoxnakatl xokon mimakasi in iknowewe in iknoilama in awel nesini in ikochka in inewka iwan in motolinia. xiii akatl xiwitl, 1375. se kikwa, se kitsotsonia ika manteka. san nokonelewiya,san ninetlamatia... domingo a 27 de hunio, ikwak motlayawalwi in sakramento in sant fransisko; iwan sant augustín, sankto domingo iwa tlatilolko in tlayawalolok. masayelnanakatlatemitiltlaxkali yehika ipampa in yewantin san hwan tlaka moyoteka kinwalixnamike, kontradisión kinwalchiwiliaya in san pablo tlaka iwan san sebastián tlaka; aw in axkan san sen otlachikawililoke i san sebastián tlaka inik welayawalotiaske sesexiwtika, inin ka achtopa yewantin ye kisaya. se ome tonalme. in axkan ipan ik 29 mani metstli mayo de 1608 años, ikwak owala tlahtoli in ompa españa omachistiko omomikili san okixixilke in don fransisko || 68 de velasko koregidor katka in madrid; inin ipiltsin in tlahtowani don lwis de velasko visurrei in axkan ikoppa motlahtokatilia nikan mexiko moyetstika, aw ininn omotokatenew ipiltsin in omiktilok ompa españa nikan mexiko tlakat, nikan ya nikan tepiltsin kriyoyo mitowa. axkaniman nochi tlalchi pachantok yovali tlavana is. ¿tle ika timonenekia? xi ya kimotlatia teukwitlakemitl. satepan ye otonyowaltlakwalsenkahkeh tiaskeh tontlamalakachotiweh ka in nepantla weyaltepetl. ¿quentimotilia? yewa inik sentlamantli nikitowa notlatol in yewatl nokal yetemani inik sentetl tonatiw ikalakianpa itstikak siwakali inik ontetl kaltepiton tonatiw ikisayanpa itstikak kalixayo in iketetl san tonatiw ikalakianpa itstikak iwan korraltepito aw in ipan ka ilamatsin in tlali iwan taxka. nonana se kwali tlakwalchihki; kiyekmati nakamolchiwas, noso noihki tlayekkimolchihkamati, ka in okachi owi. momostlatika santlemach moneki ipan tlakwalchiwaloyan. in kimili, in tlakimiloli kitki, wan nikan namechaxkatiliti namotahtoltsin. axnihmati kani nemito. kwanextli. ¿quexqui minotoh kipia se imanin? ihkini motsehtseló wan ya tepewih michime aw in yewatl in in omotenew malinali in okittak in tlahtowani kwawitsatsin, niman ye konkwi i konittak ik mikwixtok in kowatl, iwan ye kitta in itech chikontetl in i- || 124v -cuitlapan inik mokwikwilo; ik niman ye no kontekak itlan i malinali. nanakameh .cacavatla motlakenvia ah vetsi inin. ni tlapanekatli kwekwexin. ni ketsalkoatli kwekwexin. san ekatl itsivepani san ekatl itsivepani. aw niman ik wawak in toktsintli in nowian chinampa. aw no ikwak maxitiko in padreme sant fransisko deskalsos in moyetstikate werta iwan witsilopochko. aw in ihkwak in ye oiw nepa senpowalonchiwknawi xiwitl kiwalantikiske tsompanko in mexika in tlakilxuchtsin, yewatl kinwalmakakka ichpuchtsin in tlawiskalpotonkitewktli tlahtowani tsompako; aw in omotenew siwapili tlakilxuchtsin ya yewatl inantsin mochiw in wewe witsiliwitl, ka san se mexikatl chichimekatl in ithatsin mochiw. kwartiya temito wahtli. ¡xtechcualcuilican natsin! aw yewantin akalantlaka okiwaltekake teponastli iwan ketsaltemanli inik masowalo netotiloya. onkak ne kalikampa wan kampa tepetaj. omotlahtokatlalitsino in tisokatsin inik chikome itlahtokatsin méxiko. yewatsin san nawi xiwitl omoteyakanili. mochiwa iselti wan komo se kwelita se kitoka kaltsintan. noyoloh pakini. . aso wel nech on mohtlatoktilis in tloke nawake. ka yewatl in ankimokwilia in anquimocaquitia. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. xa no momowtihtok, tlahko kilo xitomatl testigo.- martin lwis chane kowatlayawkan iknohokichtli huramento okichiw inik otlatlakoltilok in ipaltsinko dios iwan totlasonantsin santa maria iwan in ika imachio in krus etk. xinechmaka kwenta kani moilochti, inik patlawak nanmatl aw inik weyak kastolmatl inik ye tokontatamachiwa inik ye tokonmaka posesion in maria rodrigwes in señora nawkanpa estakas ye tokotetetsotsona inik ye tokontlalmaka señora inik onkan mokaltis in itlalpan altepetl miek tlakatl españolti imixpan mochiwa in onkan chaneke desada idienta katka. i kali xiwitl, 1129 años. xolo, xolotsin, ti tlatowani, t'axayacaton, nel tokichtli, is makonel titlaihtoli. ¿ kwix nel ah ok tikwahkwawitiw ? ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. in kimomakilike ei in kastila akali tlayaochichiwtli, iwan chikwasenpowali in itewikalikniwan españoles tlaxtlawiloke, iwan mochi in ixkich akalko monekis; iwan ik kitokamakake inik general walmochiwtia, ka kinwalpachotia in españoles. aw nikan momikiliko sant fransisko, in kimotokilike umpa sant hoseph altar mayor ixpan. aw in siwakali in yepa ikak ka nel itech powki intech in pedro nali ka nel atle kitotiw in tetatsin aw in ika ye nikintlamachia aso ye nechtlaokolis in totekuyo san ixkichi in nikitowa notlatol. pasó ante mi migwel hernandes eskribano. nima ye chalkatl, walteyaka chichimekatewktli. se kikwa ixochiyo wan ikechselotsin. anmewantsitsin anmopiliskeh kwali ohtli iwan tlachipawak yes. san nitlotinemi in tenawak. san ye ika nichoka, ¡nicnotlamati! no niknokawalok in tenawak tlaltikpak. aw i yewantin in chichimeka totolimpaneka no yahtiwitse nenentiwitse, kihtotiwitse kipowtiwitse in inchichimekatlahtol, iwan kitlatlawtitiwitse in inteow katka diablo. emekat nama tiwalawih ika nochi toyolo ekimit pero non okatka barato in yunta okitlaniya nawi tomin in yunta. v tekpatl xiwitl, 1588. ikwouyo kwaltia para kwoutatil. newa nech ixmati nochi ii weyaltepetl. chiawakilit .aviyal xi val meva ayavia xi iva xi val meva aya koskapili. xi val mexa yawktli pia nodifunto axan sahwan nopilwan. tenonotsalistli inik kinonotsa in tokichti in teoyotika inamik, in isiwaw ma elto komo ipa eltó. ayak xikitlanili nakatl xikitlanili mochi ma kwalika para así mismo ahsikiw kwak yahsikiw akmo onkan tikate yoticholohke para tiaske ichan noawelito. ik tikneltilia tiktlalia totoka iwan tofirma axkan hweves a 18 de abril de mil e kinientos i setenta i un años. fransisko de la krus alkalde thoribio lukas alkalde. nixpan newatl fransisko moisen eskribano. ma kan kwel tontlaelewi in tlaltikpak, ma san kwel tontlamatisnek, in mihtoa, in kwitlatitlan, in tlasultitlan. aw tla nel timokwepas, ¿cuix titeutis? ma ye timisiwkapolo. aw niman ye mowika, aw in yewatin akalantlaka wel otlasenkawke akxoyatika, konmonamikiliko ketsalyekasewastli ik komokaltiliko, komololwiko xiwtilmatli iwan xiwkaktli iwan chayawak koskatl kostik teokwitlatl iwa ketsalistli koskatl, makwextli ketsalistli chalchiwitl welasotli. seki kihtowah in nochipa xochiyohtok wan nochipa teyohtok wan seki kihtowah xochiyowa enero. mochiwa kampa se kitoka, kampa tainamik, newín paratani kampa takawani. iuki kitokaitiah por in yemanik in exot. yewa yalwa nochan owala. noteokwitlaamoxkakal, ipan matlaktli omome kali xiwitl, maltin lutelotsin, in itech ikalakoayan se iteopantsin teutontlalpan kisaliw amatlahkwiloli in ika kitepanotlaya nappoali onkaxtoli itetlatsowililis iwik tetlapopolwilis. se kikwa itakka, ika se kichihchiwa tapalol. se kitalilia teyi sah tapalol, se kitewatsa komalko wan se kikwechowa itech metat wan se kitaliliayon tapalol: emol, xilimej, xokoyolemol, witsti, nochi ika akolih se kikwa. ome kali xiwitl ik mik axayakatsi, matlakxiwitl omei tlatokat. aw in omotenew in wentli in xochitl in yeti in tlenamakak nextli mochi onkan kitokaya in itwalnepantla. v tochtli xiwitl, ii. aw otlanawatiyaya kinosakiwi kin tekipanoske aw san nika tikinmomotla en el margen iskierdo tikintotoka aw okinwaltitlanki se alkalde toka hwan amolakatl oksepa nikan otikwiteke aw inik omotamachiw in itepots hematl aw in inakas matlaktli brasas inik omosentamachiw in itwalo in onkan kalakowa iwan onomotamachiw in itlalkowal hwana fransiska in iyomotlan mani in ikalnemak martha in tonatiw ikisayanpa. aw in yewatl hernan peres español itelpoch hwan peres otikinmonkalakike in onkan in inchan okiwaltsatsakke yaka inin powerta aw in onkan nokatka itik otlapiaya itik kali otikinwalkixtike itoka magdalena ihoan anan monsel ihoan oksekitin siwatsitsintin ayak ma onka notlato in itechkopa in kali ihoan chinamitl ontetl. mah amo keman nakasikawetsiti in kafenkomit, se kwali yowali. ¿tiquinmopiliah ome kwahkwaltin kalxexeloltin inik newatl inwan inin nomaiknin? inik 6 tlamantli nikitowa i wentli mokawatiw seh pesos san sebastian iwan nikitowa ix kwawakatl ik motlapachos in kali. [al margen iskierdo ixtlawis 2 pesos 4] aw in tetsotsonki pablo itskwin yewatl kimati ome pesos iwan 4 tomines. aw in nawi tomin nikmakas ana tlako iwan xankopinka motemakas makwiltomin. xalkapolin nikan ipan in in omomikiliko in teweweltsin tlahtowani katka kwawnawak; niman ikwak motlahtokatlali in ixiptla in itoka itskowatsin. komo neh nikan nimitsmaktilia, ikwak kwalok tonatiw, senka tlayowatimoma, neske in sisitlaltin; oyuh ya makwilxiwitl tlakat in ikome aokwantsin. mah amo tonalmiki, 2.- iwan nikitowa i mochi nokal nikmakatiw i noxwiw migwel witsitl ka itlatsin kimokechilitiw itoka katka tochtli mochi itech powki itla walas aw in itatsin ka oka no kiketstiw itoka katka itskwitsin mochi itech powki ayak tle kitos itla walas ka opa nemi sakatla i migwel witsitl. niman ik atentli kitokatiake, mochi de tehwanke ntlale kitowa. aw ka yehika ipampa ka ye kin ikwak i walake in seseyaka asiko in ipan motlaliko in sese imaltepew in axkan onkan ipan kate onoke, ka ye kin ikwak tlatokamakatasiko in ipan imaltepew in chikwei altepeme omotenewke, ka ayemo niman intoka katka in axkan intoka mochiwtika; ka san wel ok intoka katka chichimeka teokolwake in ikwak inpan kisako asteka in onkan onoka in kolwakan || 70r onkan chaneke katka. se kitoka in ikwouyotsin. se kimewa para kwaltsin moskaltia. xinechmopahkayowilti nonantsin. onechilwihkeh tewatsin timopilia se kalxeloli timotlakewilia. ipampa inon otimitsnotiliko tlamelawak. in ompa kampa okistinenka ipan altepetl in ompa kanin motlapialia klerigostin in motenewa benefisiados; in ikwak intlan kalakia in okik in aso okkana ommowikaya itech mokawtiwia inik ok yewatl inyeyampa mokawaya teoyotika kinpalewiaya. kwalika, kwalika, mach amo nochi tlakah kin paktiah in pahtli. keh sowameh kintlahyeltia nochi tlen tekokotlati keh in tekila. no amiktami nehin maría nikolasa trinidad. aw inik kiske españoles oyake aw onkan oixpoliwke in tolteka akaloko, ik otenke in akalotli, aw miek in onkan poliw in intlatki in kastilteka; kaxtoltekpantli in onkan ixpoliwke in españoles, ixkich i wexotsinka in tlaxkalteka; onkan seki opoliw in kisesenkixtika in kostik teokwitlatl, aw sa kexkich in kikixtike in tetlawikalwan in wexotsinka in tlaxkalteka. tetat nohki pehki kwalani wan nopa wewetlakatl mochiwa kajfentaj, pero aman wewehka ya sah onkak, no mochiwa kwoutah wan kwowihtik. se kilo pitsonakatl in ompa chilahtokayopan augusto pinochet okimikti in wei tlahtoani salvador alende. nimanonkan on awiya ixochikwapilwan, ixopankala itewkwan. kwaltia aw in yewatl in ilankweitl niman ye kimixiptlatia in ipiltsin in itoka itskwawtsin; kitlahtokatlali kikawili in itlahtokayo in atlawtekatltewkyotl. ya ne kiilwiah para kinekih kitokase tlenon tak onkak ome taman : iksot wan itahtai yon iksot. inik onkan katlitike kitlakwaltike in kimoteotiaya. amo, tlasohkamati. iaxke mahtlaktli xiwitl onikaw in tlachichinalistli iwan amo keman noyolkokoa. ye imanon iwan axkan nipaki ninemi iwan nonemilisyotl okachi omen. ipan matlaktli onse xiwitl omotlahtokatlalitsino in itskoatsin inik nawi wei itlahtokatsin méxiko. aw in oksekin wewetke in iw kitowa, yaopan in momikili kwateotsin tlahtowani. ¿tle tlatkis, tle tlamamas? in sesek eski por ke amo waktani. ye otlayowakyeyehse in tonalmitl in tlatsawktiwits ye omotlali kampa monamikih in tonali iwan in ilwikatl se pitsawak tatapahtli ye okikimilo mochi in mani in nekawalistli yowaltlahtoani tepan motlalia san kemmanian in tototl ipatlanalis in chichi itlawahwalolis kikokolwia in yowalpahkayelistli . nonkwa kikixtia in imihiyo in intlahtul in inteukyo in intlatokayo in intlatsontekilis: in iuki kilwiah por in yon pané panxahxalyoh wan iihtik no pané xalyoj. in se kitoka. sa' yehwan niyolo mokawan ma pilini se tiempo ma pilini memeton para ahmo palanis. papalokilit mah amo kimatoka kiawaehekat, ome litro atl kwaltia kwel san xon awiyakan, ma awal moketsa moyolo, san in kokowa. san nikewa nokwik ni kwakwahtsin wal asik. on ya noketsa nikwikanitl. iskatki in tlahtoli inana. okachi kwali mankamo towan wala inin tlakatl. aw in ipan axkan domingo, ipan ilwitsin in tlasosiwapili inik kimotlapalwiko ángel sant gabriel in motenewa anunsiasión, ik xxv mani metstli de marso de 1601 años, ikwak omochiw in sankta iglesia ihustisiatsin i motenewa auto sankto ofision inkisisión; onkan in tekpan kiawak portales motlali kwawtlapechtli in onkan motlalitsinoke tlahtoke inkisidores iwan visurrei iwan oksekintin tlahtoke iwan teopixke. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. aw in ipan domingo in ichikweilwiyok yewatsin in teoyotika tlahtowani don hwan péres de la serna arsobispo mexiko in kimochiwililito imissatsin sankta theresa de hesús iwan motemachtili, || 261 sa motlatsakwili yewatsin yniqu ilwitl kimochiwili. onkan senkiske in tlahtoke || 156 in audiensia real tlaka, onkan itlantsinko sepanpaktikate in arsobispo visurrei; in kwakwawtlatlachia inik onkan okseppa inpa omochiw tlalolinalistli ye teotlak ipan yei tsilini, in ikoppa omochiw ik mokwep ik okis in tlalolinalistli. aw in oyuh kittato in onkan moketstikak tsiwtlakawki yaopol, walmokwep wala in tliltekatsin kinonotsako in iteikkawtsin in atonaltsin chichimekatewktli, kilwi || 129r "aquin onikittato, san wel isel i moketstikak, atle maitla itech wetstikak, san iyo ipetlakal in kimamatikak". titlanamaka moimahkahtiwala momahkahtiwala mosewiko. nikan ipan in in omomikiliko in itoka kwawtlix in ikmatlaktlonnawi tlahtowani kulwakan, in tlahtokat chikwexiwitl; || 53r aw san niman ipan in in omotenew xiwitl onkan walmotlahtotlali in ikome itoka yowalatonak ikkaxtoli tlahtowani mochiw in kulwakan. in aka konmottilia ihichtekis no tetepacholos. in aka konmottilia tekwatepachos kitsakutias. inimekes siwame ika tlaka nonkwaka sapatistakayotl iwan nonkwa oyeya tekitl. tlaka ika siwame omomamaya ika xoktin ika piltsitsintin iwan otlekoya kwawtla. okonkixtiaya okonelwatl ma tikitokan yewan in okiteititito tlen itech monekis okonelwatl. tlaka oyaya ika tepostlakweponili ikan oyeya intlak sapata. amo xikwalani. aw iwan wel ikwak otlakat otlachiwaltik se yankwik sitlali, owalnes in iwikpa tonatiw ikisayapa, ka kineskayotia in otlakat otlachiwalti in isitlal in hakob, in iw kimachtopaitalwitia yewatsin profeta balaán, inik yewantsitsin yeintin tlahtoke inik kimottiliske in se sitlali ik molinitsinoske in inyeyantsinko kimotemolitiwi in oknose sitlali in ompa katki tlapachiwtika in tlatapalolkalixko in belén, inik yewantin hudiosme iwan yewantin tlateotokani- || [12r] -me in motenewa gentilesme, iwan no yewatin in ichkapixke iwan no yewantin in tlahtoke, iwan no yewantin in motolinikatlaka iwan no yewantin in tlatlaime in motlamachtiani, in yewantin san onkan tlanawak katka iwan in weka katka, nextililoske in ak yewatsin motlakatilia inpanpa mochintin. se kikwa in kapolin ihwak oksik ya. ipan ik ohkan tlatlanexilotl. aw ik niman walmoman in metstli agosto, sanno iwi in ipan senka chikawak in mani kiyawitl; inik mottak senka ye tleko ye temi ye peyoni ye moteponasowa in atl inik nowian sen mexiko tenochtitlan, ye apachiwi in altepetl. nikan amo mochiwa. nawi kali amotle mochiw. newa amo onikitaya san yeyewa tlakatl. axkan san nontlahtos itechpa in ihkwak itla tlasempanawiaya in omochiw ihkwak otiyeyah inawaktsinko in temachtikatsintli nikawín mochiwa. yuh kimitalwike imixpan testigosme in ompa chaneke migwel hakobo fransisko ximenes iwan dario karransa español eskribano de audiensia hwan de karransa español iwan algwasil phelipe ximenes diego astaxochitl iwan wewetke kowatlayawkan tlaka aw no nixpan newatl eskribano migwel monise iwan in moteilwia. ante mí migwel monise eskribano. .in masatl kolivakan iivitla ipotoka aya awiya! ye tonaketli yawtlatoka awiya! ye tonaketli yawtlatoka ma vilano tlaka senpolivis mah amo kwika at, nawistin tekoiyatsin konilwia “nopiltziçiné tlatowanié, ma xikmokakiti, ka tiktomako i mokoski i mokesal i siwapili in acxocueytl”. onkán nihkitis. aw yese amo niman isiwka kimomakilike in inwelitsin, maso neliwi in tetech kimokawiliaya tlahtoke inik kittaske kinemiliske in tlein kitlani, in aso wel mochiwas; aw yese amono wel kittaya kinemiliaya in intech kimokawiliaya in tlahtoke, inik sano ye kitlakowaya kitsakwa in tlatoli. "colivacan mavispan tlakati chana q.n. (quitoz neki): in tlakatl id est uktli umpa ichan in kolwakan. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. okachi tlamatini wan in treinta sentabos. wani mikmakas dos machos xkintlamamalti wan xkwika i adiós. aw is ka i kimonawak mokiwitsi tlaxkalteka, wexotsinka, chololteka, aaiye ayayi. antlanamakaskiah mah amo keman tasewto, axkan ikome viernes kwaresma in ik 21 mani metstli febrero de 1614 años, ihkwak teotlak nawi tsilini ipan tlako hora, in onkan teopan sant augustín okis yankwik okse tlayawalolistli prosessión, in momekawitekke españoles ipilwantsitsin in mosentlamachtiani san nikolás de tolentino; inin kofradía yewantin okitlalike in kakawanamakake kakawateros españoles. ¿tlein onikchiw? ininohwanalti istayopan, in ok senka wehka. tlen senka nechyolpatsmiktiaya in nikimihtaya nokawahwan ye senka ciammihqueh. senka etik in intlamamal iwan onehnenkeh okachi wehka, ahmo kemen muchipa. in tliltik nokawahyo mitoniaya yuhkin ipan okiaw, tlahtsomiaya tlalpankopa in kitemoaya kampa moahketstekas. iwan newatl tla onikihtani tlaxkaltepitstli inon senka nikwelikamatini. aw niman in yewantin in chichimeka achitsin omoskalike; niman okimoteotike in tonatiw, ka in ye ok ye nepa in ayamo walasi in tlaxkalteka ka atle inteow katka, ka ye onimechilwi katle kimatia. tlahko kilo chilakachtextli ika xon awiyakan iwinti xochitli, tomak mani. in sesek. aw ka yewatl ika inin in itlatol witsilopochtli ka niman okinkixti in istakmixkowatsintewktli ye chikome kalpoltin in onpa onoya astlan. teixtlamachtiani, teixkwitiani, teixtomani. tenakastlapoani, tetlawiliani. teyakayani, teutikiliani, itech pipilkotiw. in san ka iskixochitl in ketsaliskixochitl pixawi ye nikan, xoppan kalitek in tlakwilokalitek, san nimitsawiltia. kemeh noyan onkak, amo akah kinamaka. aw no in ihkwak in ye onpa monemiltia in tsakwaltitlan tenanko amakemekan, ye iw matlaktlomei xiwitl onkan onmewalti in atenko in ipan chiwknawi akatl xiwitl in tlahtowani || 58r kwawitsatsin. in ipan siudad de mexiko a seis dias del mes de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años in ipan tlaxilakali istakalekan onkan otsatsik in tekpoyotl in ipanpa ikal monamaka in mariana in onpa mani sankt ipolito teokaltitlan aw in ikwak otsatsiwak ayak otlanankili testigo hwachin xwares. onkak makwil taman: chichilet, mistonet, exoyeman, tiltikemekat wan takwawaket : in amo teyi nikan. tlen 106 tlanawatihkayotl. itechpowi in poder hudisial tlen sentlanawatiloyan, ken moihtowa ipan tlahtol tlanawatili tlen iwikal, kixolewas tlahtolixnamikilistli tlen, ika tleweli tlanawatikayotl, ompanos inipan tribunales tlen sentlanawatiloyan, inin iwaya tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh noso iyolo weyi altepetl, inipan tlen se tlaltlanawatili iwan seyok noso tlen se tlaltlanawatili iwaya tlen iyolo weyi altpetl. sanno ihkwak omochiw itech in rusian in motokayotia bolcheviquicniuhyaoyotl. in kixelotika in itlekatsin, manel iwikentel popokatika. amokeman timotlakoyaltia. .otlacatqui yautlatoketl in kwalkwi de nikan sakapoala wan anal de xokoyolo. ohoxih kiyanankilia in koyolyantototl.onkwikatinemi, xochimana. ometstaya ompa momochko se topixke itokatsin hwan de polo, mexikatlakatl. okimpiaya ome iknewa se itokan konchita, okse elenita. yewan in omochantiliaya ompa teopantli. inintsitsin kwaltin mawistik siwame omotetlakoliliaya tlakwali tlen iknotlakame. nikmattok ipa kilwiah pawakwowit por in yon kitakiltia pawa. aw inik okonanke posesion nowian tetetika otlamomotlake in kalitik iwan itwalko ayak onkan otlachalani san pakka yokoxka in omakoke tlalkitskilistli aw in onkan tlatlantika tlapowali estakas onkan omotetsotson makwilkan in omaake sesen kalnakasko. iii kali xiwitl, 1365. ipan in poliwke in amaxteka. okichiw in iw mochi omotenew ipetisión kikalaki onkan akwerdo, onkan itech in ipetisión kimokakiltike tlahtoke mochi in ixkichtlamantli onkan kapila san hoseph kichiwa inik tlatolinia, moch kimokakiltike kimomachiltike, senka kimomawkaittilike in tlahtoke; inik niman omotlanawatilike oidores inik notifikasión ochiwililoto frai herónimo de sárate in axkan ipan omotenew sábado in onkan kapila san joseph, inik aokmo onkan itekiw yes kapila, kalakis kalihtik motsakwas konvento, aokmo yewatl kinmokwitlawis in mexika, iwan inik aokmo yuhki kichiwas tetolinilistli tepinawtilistli in temekawitekilistli, in iw inpan kichiwaya mexika in nesito tlakpak. aw in okikak in mochi itlahtol, inetitlanis, iwkin ahmo senka monelchiuhtzinoh. quimonanquililih, quimolhuilih: nopiltse, ma okseppa tiwalas, ok iwian nimitskakis, wel ok itsinewkan nikittas, niknemilis in tlein ik otihuallah, in motlanekilis, in motlaelewilis. 3.- testigo pablo matian ichan toltenko omonamikti aw in ixiwtlapowal wel lxxx siwitl omakok huramento inik otlatlakoltilok inik amo istlakatis ipaltsinko in totekuyo dios. chakaikamoh niman ye toxkatl itlamian, niman ye kitowa in kapitán: "tleyn inteow ma kichiwakan!". kehnopa eltok namantsi. "axkana kwaltia in ipan in siudad mexiko sanktiago tlatelulko ik sempoali onmatlaktli mani metstli de hulio de mil e kinientos i noventa i dos años in yehoatsin don gaspar de mendosa hwes gobernador in ikatsinko teweitlatokatsin rei nwestro señor oixpantsinko nesiko inin makwiltin testigos. wel miak onotsontekokwalo ika in tlachiwali. onkán yuxilot non yemasisarotiw in tlaolkuntli? asta kampa mochiwan tlaolkuntli. aok ik kawa in xuchikoskatl in ikpaxuchitl in chimalxochitl in yetl. semilwitl in moxochitia. se kitoka. aw in omotenewke gaspar karilo in inamik iwan marina in ita katka itoka kwata katka aw in fransisko san nonkan montli in kenmaniyan onkan motepantisnekia in omotenew kwata san mochipa kitlakawaltiaya in teixwiwan in omotenewke marina susana in balbara marina in mensia marta yehika ka inchan intlalpan. aw in tsiwtekatsin iwan in isiwaw in matlaltsin mopilwatike, nawintin in kinchiwke in inpilwan: in ikse itoka akoltsin; || 135v in ikome itoka tsilintokatsin; in ikyei itoka xonekwiltsin, inin tlahtowani mochiw in tsompawakan; in iknawi itoka mistliyawtsin, siwapili in. itlanahnamik: matlaktli akatl ik poliwke kwetlaxteka, tlakatekati mokiwitsi tsonpantewktli; amono yewan tenochka, san ineixkawil i mokiwixtli, sa waliloke in tenochka. in ounasiko nima ye ik motlachkwiteteltia; inka wets tlekwawitl chapoltepek axiwake kwawake se itoka ato imal i xiwtewktli, in teska imal tekolixtli. aw iwan ye senpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolxiwitl in ipan iiii tochtli xiwitl, 1574 años, in omakok teoyotika itlahtokayo don pedro moya de kontreras inik arsobispo omochiwtsino mexiko. san ye tokonkantiwi aw in oksesekintin wewetke in iw kihtotiwi ka ye kin nikan atentlipan okikwitasiko in akxoteka itech in onkan mani wei ateskatl, ka im mochintin ye wekaw tlaka katka wewetke in ok tlateotokanime ach tle ipampa in kitokayotiaya atl chalchiwmatlalatl, iwan i wei ateskatl kitokayotiaya chalchiwtlikwe; oyuhki in, yniqu itech kikwike akxoteka iwan teotenanka in atl inik okimotokayotike chalka, yuhkima kihtosneki atentlipan tlaka ahnoso chalchiwma- || 38v -tlallatl itenpan tlaka. niman kito in markés iwan malintsin: “xiquimitaca aquique”. in xiwit wan in no kilit. aw in akin nontlachalanis in tla nesis x pesos tomines inik ontlaxtlawas itech powis in ikamara su magestad inik amo itlakawis in itlanawatil hustisia ik nikan tiktlalia in tofirma. fransisko martin algwasil mayor paso ante mi migwel de los angeles eskribano. iwan im ikxik kitlalia in tsitsili yewatl in oseloewatl itenko kitekaya koyoli, om tlapalixtli in im ikxik kimiilpiliaya; "nama ta achto tikalakiski in toltekatl ipan chikwase tekpatl xiwitl oyake tolpetlak in onkan omotlalike ixkichka matlaktli omei akatl xiwitl. viernes a iiii de mayo de 1601 años, ikwak momikili oidor itoka don fransisko telo, sant augustín in motokak inakayotsin. xicmahchanatih. xiquixtitih. no iwki tiyolpatsmiki ihkwak senka wei tekitl tikmochiwilia iwan in ahmo kwali kawitl kinenkixtia; ahnoso ihkwak tikmotemolihtinemi in nanakatl iwan ahmo tikmonextilia; ahso kemmanian wehkawtika tikmohtilia, ompa ka in nanakatl, ahso xoletl, ahso itla okse, tikmohtilia senka wehyi, welis nawi, welis makwili kilo, timomaxakwalohtsinoa; toyolo chichinacah, intla timayanah tikilkawah in apistli. tikmonemililia “zan ika inin iwan welis okachitsin iwan ye wel nonyas, ye wel ninocuepaz”, iwan timopahpachohtsinohtiw, ahmo san isiwka, san iyulik, iwan ihkwak ye tikmomatokilia ¡zan niman momaktsinko kakayaka!, ye tlaihtlakawtli, achto timisawihtsinoa, tikmoteopowia in mixtsinin moyolohtsin; iwan tlakpak, ilwikakopa, totahtsin tonaltsintli ye mopilohtsinohtiw, neskiani mihsiwitia. in ipan in mani yaoyotl chalko. in ik motlayekoltitinenka in nowian altepetl ipan kalaktinenka, san onkan walakwepaya in tochtepek. tlen 1 tlanawatihkayotl. ipan mexikameh nechikolismeh tlaltlanawatilmeh nochi tlakameh kiasikamatiseh tlamanawilistli tlen mani ipan inin amatlanawatili, nochi yewan amo welis molokotsos iwan mokotonas, san keman nesis tleweli tlamantli iwan tlahtoli ipan amatlanawatili. moixkotona tlakawentli ipan sennechikolistli mexihko tlaltlanawatiloyan. in tlakawentilmeh tlen walawih kiawak iwan kalaki ipan totlalnantsin quiasicamatiseh, ipampa inon, makixtilistli iwan tlamanawilistli ken kiihtowah tlanahuatilmeh. noihki moixkotona nochi tlapinawaltilistli tlen walah ipan tlakamekayotl, tlakayotl noso siwayotl, xiwikawitl, axnelkwali tlakayotl, masewalyotl, kokoliskayotl, teotlaneltokilistli, tlahtolyeyekolistli, yolkisalistli, tlanamiktilistli, noso seyok tlamantli tlen amo kitlepanitas tlakaitalistli tlen kinekis kiixkotonas iwan kiixpetlas tlen intechpowi iwan tlamakixtilistli tlen tlakameh iwan sihuameh. titlasohtlaskeh yei xonakatl ahmo wehyi ka nikan imixko im ikpak titlachia, tikim on iximati. aw in ipan viernes in ikchikwasemilwitl yewantsitsin in teopixke in itewikaltsitsinwan hesús in tokayotilo de los padres de la kompañía de hesús, yewatsin motemachtili in inprovinsial. aw i xaltoka tlatokati upantewktli; in isiwaw askatlxochitl, in iichpoch itoka xikomoyawal. sesen iman kwakwaltsin. ixkich in onikito notlatol inik onikchiw notestamento inik nosenkawa in ipaltsinko dios inik amo aka itla notech kitlanis inik tolinilos nonamik aw inin notlatol inik amo ilkawis itlakawis in iski tlamantli onikito nikinixketsa noalvaseaswa inik se hwan peres, alonso peres, baltasar vaskes kokolitok iwan migwel de los angeles imixpan testigostin hoan garsia, migwel damian, martin hakobo, pablo garsia, fransisko vaskes axkan domingo a xix dias de hunio 1577 años. martin hakobo [rúbrica] pasó ante mi kosme de luna eskribano [rúbrica]. tohwanti titekitih wan santika tihkwah tosi tlen vii kali xiwitl, 1317. 93r ... itoka in axolowa niman ye kimilwia in ikniwan: "ca onikittato in tlalok, ka onechnots ka kitowa `oquimihiyohuilti, ka owasiko in nopiltsin in witsilopochtli; ka nikan ichan yes, ka yewatl ontlasotis inik tinemiske in tlaltikpak ka tonehuan'". ompa nochan, momochko malakatetikpak, tlaka tekiti iwan siwame tlaxkaloa, tlakwalchiwa. onkwan on yekos tlakatl ye mayana nochi tlakwali sa tekichia. ihki in ika nemia nochantlaka. 36. ahmo tle ye tiwalmoxikos, immikantla, immotepustla, ka mowik onekixtilok, onkntlaewalok; ka nel ahmo tikan, ahmo tikkwik in chokistli, in ixayotl, aw ka nel ahmo motech otikpacho in kolotl, in tsitsikastli, otikwakwaltiloya, ka san otiktlas, otikmaxopew, otikikxotlak inik timoskaliskia, inik titlachiaskia. ka san tetl, kwawitl ipan otikma. in kilit no totonik. inawkan xexelolxiwitl mo kwitiah primavera, verano, otoñe iwan invierno. nokonkakon kwikatl nokon kaki in tlapitsa xochimekatl ayokwan teuktli. san mits ya nankili, mits ya nankili, xochinkalaitek in akiawtsin in tlakateuktli ayapankatl. sempoali sentavoh san ihki,iwan ika itlaixmatil sempoali iwan kaxtoli centavoh. man yewan yekan. in amo xochiyowa. ixiuyo se kitalilia tapalol, se kitehteki wan se kipantemilia emoltatsoyon, kwaltsin mah momoloni wan yek yemaxtik se kikwa. se kwarto pasa aw in ixkich tlakatl kochia inkamapa in oyuh kimatke tlalolini in senka chikawak, mochi tlakatl ik mewtewake in inkochian in onkan kochia kiyawak kikistewake; in españoles iwan señorati san moch iw kikistewake in kenin kochia, sekintin san tlakamisawia, seki petlawtiwitse in itwalko walkiske, sekintin niman otlihpan momanako. ipanpa inik otitotlatito, siwapilé malitzé”. sempoali pitsawak pimienta —a'mo asta axan maske akmo miak in nenekwaton saye nikimichiki chichikiton. . iwan in xochitapachtli in wel kostik iwan ayotektli in wel kostik iwan in oseloayotektli iwan teukechol, sakwan iwan chalchiwtotoli iwan tekwanewatl: iehoatl in tlatlawki oselotl. aw ka onikwalkwik in hekotorio inik mopia in tlali ma xikmokakiltikan in antlatoke aw in ikwak sepa mokokowaya i nonamik ye nawxiwitl aw ikwak tikwike in itomines señora san mopipixawkakwik ka nel iwki in kokolistli in amo nesi inik poliwi in tomines. nikanika yawi v kali xiwitl, 1445 años. iki in nochtin tlaka yomohtitiaya tlen kwali iwan amo kwali xoletl. onkwan on aihmo ka okwikaya ichachanton xoletl tlen okwikaya mikistli. iwan ye yiman motlatlania ¿quen ika tikiixmatiske xoletl inon kwikats miquiztli? amo monamaka. manosok ixkich tlakatle, totekoe, tlasopile, tlasotitlakatle manosok sentetl, ma ok itlayekol: ma ok xikmopantili, xikmotetewtili manoso iloti, ma kwepi im meleltsin, in mokwalantsin: ma sewi in mosomaltsin, in motlaweltsin: ma omeleltsin kis. kwix tel amikowas, kampa san ye nel nen onwiloas, ka totekiw in mikistli, ka techcenmâceuh: aw ka mikistekitiwako in tlaltikpak: ka ontokos, ka itech onaxioas, in motechiwkaw: in miktlantekutli, in kwesal, in tsontemok: in akan weli kichiwtok, in walamatatakatok, in techwalamiktok, in techalteosiwtok, in techwalnenesiwtok. nimitsmaktilia nehin orasiones ika nehin nochi noyolo. la tihpia' toyunta wan in lá kahmo tihtlanehwa in toyunta. wan ta tihtlachilis kani san kinkwi ne michime", inik 1 tlamantli nikitowa i nixkoyan naxka i noneixkawilaxka in chikwe pesos ik nitokos iwan orasion iwan aso sentetl misa nopan ik mitos. —wilak tlapialoto. se kome el kelite. in kwowit. kenin mochiwa mochiwa miak. aw ye tsatsi in impiloa in intewktlatokawa, kitoke “totecuioané, mexikaé tlatilulkaé! at okestelsi; san tokakalpixka, amoma axitiske in kalpixkantli in tlali. "¡ma yeka ihkí xihchiwa!", kiilwi nopa isiwa. noha tiwalati". san niman ikwak in omito semilwitl in metstli in xiwitl in yehoatsin don geronimo lopes hwes governador yoan geronimo de soto sebastian de san fransisko alkaldes ordinarios in ikatsinko to wei tlatoani rei nwestro señor in no[...]tsinko ompa omowikake in ikalkohoalpan paskwal hernandes español in okinkowili maria xwares yoan migwel xwares chaneke san martin ateskapan in ikal okatka maria salome. axkipí wan tiotiak mosewihke kampa tekitiyaya ipan yewan ye okilkahkeh inehtolwan. ¿ye owalehkok moknin? granada tlatanilok ye kexkichkaw in nemi kito ye yepoalxiwitl aw inik neli iten itlatol in ixkich nikan omokwilo ipampa se krus imatikan nikan kiketsa ipampa amo kiximati tlakwilolistli nixpan in oninotenew eskrivano nombrado. fransiskode luna [rúbrica] lorenso del agwila [rúbrica] anton krusate eskribano nonbrado [rúbrica]. matlaktlose tochtli xiwitl ik poliwke chiapaneka. aw senka kitekipacho in don christóval kolón almirante inin omito inik amo kwali omochiw, aw inik akmo tlen wel ik kichiwa onkan in ipampa in, aw niman ik ya kiwikak in kastila akali oksekkan atenkixowayan in san ya no atenko, in onkan okitlali wei altepetl siudad kitokayoti la isabela. nima ye kiwalitoa koyowewesi tlakuchkalkatl: “tla kiwalnosaka teua”. || 136r aw ye senpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolxiwitl ipan se xiwitl kate in amakemeke in totolimpaneka iwan in tsakwaltitlan tenanka, i walake i panowayan tlaka. amo nikmati kemanian xochiyowa. in mochipautani, moneki mah se kinehmachpiya. olipahchiyawisotl in no se kwamekat. . in ye yuhki in on tlaakaltemalok, niman ye ik tlanawatia in ye om makalakiske. teixpan on motlalia kitowa bweno, mokowihke nopa kampana in kwowit no kwaltia para kalkwowit, para kalewal oso taihtiyot. otlan altepetl ye yiman tika on tatsitsintin opakia iwan okitoaya ikin in san kwalkan walaske kokone. kema kwali momachtiske, kwakwali kokone kisaske ipan inin tlamachtilcali. ye niwala, antokniwan, nokonkoskasoya niktsinitskamana, niktlawkecholilwimolowa, nikteokwitla ihkwiya, nikketsalwixtoilpis in ikniwyotl. ahvia! xi yah moteka a in yoyawtlan ayawchikavastika vikalo tlalokan kwaltia x kali xiwitl, 1281. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. yeka niyekchihtok motlake. aw in yewatsin in santo augustin in teopixke in omotlakowike ye kinmomakilia inin karta de venta konmopiyaliske inik mochipa semikak intech powis in tlali in kali in chinamitl inik ayak texixikolistika konkwis iwan okimotlalili [tachaco: ke] inin pena in akin kitlakos kikalas [sic] ik tlatsakwiltilos in ika melawak hustisia chikomilwitl in ilpities karsel iwan komixtlawas v pesos tomines itetsinko powis in ikamara su magestad. in amo kwaltia para pahti. aw nowan in ihkwak in in onkan okalakiko kulwakan in mexika, ye oiw nepa sentsonxiwitl ipan matlakpowalxiwitl ipan senpowalonnawi xiwitl otlakat in kwawtsonyotl wewe nawyotsin tlahtokapili kulwakan, in satepan yewatl kitsinti in tlahtokayotl kulwakan, iwan no onpa itlakamekayotitech walkisa in satepan in chiwknawintin omotlahtokatiliko mexiko tenuchtitlan. || komo mixtli eltó. inik ye kita kwawtliketski kinotsa tlakatekolotl, kilwia “quauhtliquetzqué, tle taxtok? ye amechontlakixtilia kopil, ye eilwitl in amekwalpolowa; xokonotsa tenoch”. sasokanin kinextis tlakah tlahtowani ipan intlahtoli. axkan miérkoles ik 12 mani metstli henero de 1611 || 137 años, ihkwak ik onyowak ye matlaktlonse tsilini, san isiwka ixtomamikilistika momikili, amo kokolistli inik momikili señora leonor marín patrona in teopan san antón, iknosiwatsintli in ilamatlakatl inamiktsin katka in señor diego de muñón, patrones okatka in iteopanchantsinko señor san antón abbad mexiko xoloko, ithatsitsinwan moyetstikatka in senka mawistililoni padre frai augustín del spíritu sankto iteopixkatsin iwan fundador in iteopixkatlatekpanpantsinko in ireligiontsin señor san antón, in axkan onkan ye no yewatsin patrón mochiwtsinotika kimopialia in iteopankaltsin sankto san antontsin, onkan kinmochilitika in ikin españa walmowikaske in teoyotika inhermanotsitsinwan teopixke in motenewa kanónigos reklares iwan ik monotsa komendadores de san antón. kilwi in tliltekatsin: "tle motoka?". —okatka kema pero kwake yelowakan awelito pero kidefenderoaya pero kikwawian edmundo yeki defenderoa nawelito. se kitewatsa komalko, pero se kiyewaloltia komalkohkotol por ke iteyo in waukilit tsihtsikwini kemeh akolin kawani. satepan tewaki se kikwechowa wan se kitentsakwa mah amo ahwiak kisa. san aehitonka ammo motlahtoltiln semilwitl otechkimilokoika iitstik iwan tetsitsilkaihiyo ahso ipampa in sekwistli anoso ipampa yometstaya tsapotikatsintli nokupixtsin mowiwiyokiti yuhkin se kawahsoli in sasan okitekipanoltihkeh ikohkotoktsotsomahtsin ahweli kimototoniliaya masiwki onikmohtili moyolyamanitihtaya ewix ipampa kin axean mowelitiliko motlaehialtis itepotskopatsinko itelpocheayotsin lxtelolohtsitsiwan opepetlakaya oniknekia itla nikmolwilis yese tlen oeachi kwali oninotentsawk iwan onikmoehili ma wel yewatsin mosenkwili itlahtoltsin omokixtili se tempohpoalsoli omixpohpowtsino iwan yuhkimma omotlahtolti tehwa, aw in okonaxitiko niman kwawkalko kitlalia, in ye yowa, aw in otlatwik kinwalkixtiaya. ye chiknaliwi iwan tlahko imán; ka sempoali iwan mahtlaktli minoto ye tasiskeh ye otikpanohkeh portales iwan witsilopochko; ompa moh kwameh xochimilko; mohtowa ka inon alamoh amo kana okse tlaltikpak oncateh. yotaciqueh. nikanka in klub. tioweh tikin anakan ome akaltin. inpan ome chikwasen calaquizqueh. ipan inin akali okachi tsitsikitsin onmotlaliskeh ome pilan tonton, kwali titlaneloske kana yeyi imanin iwan miak fitlamawisoskeh achi in tlahko tonalpa. ayoxochtlatemitiltlaxkali vi tekpatl xiwitl, 1472. tlakopan umotekako tekpa, aw i ye ixkich chiwknawtekatl, xaltokamekatl, kwawtitlankalkatl, tenayokatl, askapotsalkatl, tlakopanekatl, koyoakatl, muchinti nika walkalake; chikomilwitl in techikaliko, san onkan onoka tlakopa. aw niman kinnots in tlasiwke, in tlamatinime, kimilwi iwan kin tekiaukaximaya iwan kim ikpakxuchikoskatiaya iwan kimmaka chimalxochitl iwan kwali yetl inmak kintekilia. ﻿huan. aw in axkan onkan tlatoa pedro masake ihoan ines tiakapan san kelewisneki. aw in ikoppan omonanahoati maria xoko ilamatsin konito i nopilotsin maria anan mosel ka nel imak in ye no newa in ikwak tla monamakas in kali ma itlatsin tlaokolilos. ¡xicaquican!, ¿tlein yekichiwa in tekiwake?, "viztla q.n. nomak temi nochikavastika in ik nitokaya in ik nitlatatakaya. aw niman tetlamakok, motlakwaltike in tlatoke. mah moskalti xkintaselotili nopilwan nehin tein nimitsilwihtok. wan xitsakwase nopa kahón. ¿tlen opanok ¡ca mokalmimilol ka axkan yeyi
