metstli otimokowi? ¿oc kwali nehnemi? okitlalihkeh sente xomali intlak sesen kaxitl, se tlatekontli iwan se tlacualqultequi. aw in axkan onkan tlachalania in pedro masaken ihoan ines tiakapan ihoan leonardo eskrivano. e yuh v xiwitl tlantokanti in omixnamikke tlatilulko mokiwis ipa vii kali xiwitl. iii akatl xiwitl, 1339. in ipan in ihkwak wel nowian chikawak kaltsalan otepew sepayawitl, in aik yuh mochiwani sesexiwtika; iwan in itlamian henero ihkwak wel chikawak omochiw in ehekatl, nowian okitlalan in kwawitl iwan texkali okixixitini in ehekatl. okachi tlatkiwa ya tikitak noponi kiahsito noponi chikometepetl molinia in tlali. wal seselia, wal itsmolini in toyolo xochitl in tonakayo. "¿uan kenihki nihchiwas na noseltik?", kiilwi, chokistli moteka, ixayotl pixawi onka a in tlatilolko. in atlan yahke on o in mexihkah ye siwa neliwi ika ye wiloanon. xontlakakikan:ye waltemo ya in tota teotl. aw in yewantin in amakemeke in chalka ka san ok kinechikowaya in sintli itech kipowaya in witsiliwitl iwan in itskowatsin, ka yewatl in kipiaya in kweskonpixke; eintin in kweskonpixke in ikse tlakatl itoka tosmakwex, in ikome itoka xokwawe, in ikei itoka tlaltekatl. aw in temiktike san timasewaltin ilpitikatka ichtekke yeintin, kinekia in onkan choloskia kársel de korte, kitlatlapotikawtiaskia in tlatsakwilotl intla wel mochiwani, aw amo yuh kimonekiltitsino in totekwiyo dios, atle nes in lave in tlatlapoloni ohtlikapa inik kitlaposkia inik kisaskia, inik sa onkan omokawke oanoke ontsakwaloke yekene; aw inin aik yuhki seppa omuchiw in iwki okichiwke yewantin in, inik onkan in senka ik otechtlawelilokamatke in españoles. yaonawak ye onkan axkan miérkoles in ik 4 mani metstli setiembre de 1613 años, ihkwak nikan tlani sentlapal ohmak wel ixpan in iteopankaltsin notlasottatsin san antonio abbad xuloko o- || 226 -quipehualti tepechtli inik onkan ye mokaltia yewatl español itoka antonio barreto portugwés; inin omotenew tlali ipan ye mokaltia san kikow kikowili sanno español itoka diego senete, ka achto yewatl in in yaxka katka in tlali. . aso nokonawilmatis in amihiyotsin in amotlatoltsin? aso kana namech on nolkawilis nemech on notlaxililis in nitlapaltontli in nitlawelilok ? mah amo kitatamota. ne ok, in nokonew, ne ok nokonew. xokonawilti, xik tokwilewi. ¿ahzo ti kwawtli, toselotl, in timittowa nokonetsin? ¿ahzo moyaowan inwik tikwekwenoti? ma ok o nokonexiw, xokon awilti. amo mochipautani. nikan nimitsmaktilia immanon ixkichkaw axkan in notlaelewilis in nikiximatis toyalwayotlahtolo omochiw okachi tlasemanani no iwki in itech omochiw in tonawatlahtol iwan inin nechpalewihtiwits innikteihtitis in nonawatlahtolkwepais manel san achitsin ixtililoni seki kilwiah sesek wan seki totonik. walewake motlaliko atotoniltonko, motlalmomostike, sexiwtike. oninemik mochipautani por ké semi moneneki. ipan nawi kali xiwitl okalakke altepeyoloko méxiko agustin de iturbide iwan iyaokiskawan. yuh omochiw itemakixtilis anawak in iwikpa wewe kaxtilan. notia komo ke si fwera nonankon tlenkwa awktle nonankon notia nitewalyewalohtiw. se kitoka iteyo. kenin mochiwa nimitstemo de asia. timokokó. tlen 62 tlanawatihkayotl. in tepantlahtoanih iwan wekapah tepantlahtoanih tlen kipiah tlanawatili ipan kawitl tlen intekitiloyan, amo welis kichiwaseh seyok tekitlanawatili noso tekitl tlen sentlanawatiloyan noso tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh tlen ika kiseliseh tlaxtlawili, tla amo kipia amatl tlen tlahtokan kampa tlatzquitoqueh; wankinoh tlamis itekichiwalis tlen keman mowakawilis ipan seyok itequih. seha tlatamachiwali motekiwis iniwaya tepantlahtoanih iwan wehkapah tepantlahtoanih tlen tlaixpatlah, keman yewan tequichihuaseh. keman moixpatlas inin tlanawatili mopolos tekiwakayotl tlen tepantlahtoani noso wehkapah tepantlahtoani. aw in ikwak okimottili okimokakilti in alkalde don migwel garsia hustisia kimopielia in nikan mexiko niman motlanawatili in ipaltsinko su magestad in omotlakowi ini mosenmakilia semikak itech powis ayak kikwilis kikawaltis in kenmanian. in tosiwamis itsintlan ahkopechtli ka. no iwan ye yuh nepa makwilpowalxiwitl ipan matlaktlomei xiwitl ompa walkiske in inchan chikomostok in chichimeka totolimpaneka amakemeke chalka. kenin mochiwa in monamaka. moatilia in textli ika achiton atl. pitsochiyawisotl iwan istatl; momatsayana in nakatl iwan ika iswatl in ye tlapaktli. in ye oixikak, ye motamalpiki motlalia ipan iswatl ome xumali textli ika nakatl ye tlatetektli iwan senxumali chilmoli, kwali mochi moneneloa. mokimiloa iwan mowikxitia ika wei tletl. aw i nehoatl nitlamatiw kwawximalpa; intla onika nitletlalis, tinechitatiuh”. hwebes a xiiii de agosto de 1597 años, ikwak walmowikak in tlasosiwapili sankta maría de los remedios in moyetstika totoltepek; ixkich tlakatl ompa yake, in tokichtin in siwa in kastilteka in señoratin. se kikwa sah in kamoj. ihkon no nehwa no nikneki xikinaxkatili nopilwan. niman ayak onkan otlachalani inik okonanke posesion aw inik neli in testigos omochiwke nikan motokayotiya petro itskol holian martin antres leonardo tepixki fransisko melchior gaspar fransisko de san hosep bernardino vaxkes algwasil lwis flures merino hwan martin. moyeyeyan, xolotsin, iwian xokonkochi, xonyayamani, nokonetsin, titlatowani, t'axayaca. aw in kali onikito tlakpak i sakatenko mani ye in ikaltepotsko hikan don baltasar iswawakatsin katka yoan nikitoa inin notestamento in tla kemanian imixpan nesis in kimopielia hustisia ma kimoneltililiske ka yewatli i sa tlatsakka notlanekilis. yahki kiilwiti iikni pedro. —ca ye kwali, teteoé, oannechmoknelilike. ne kokoxke. newatl don hwan ximenes gobernador hwes por su magestad in axkan nixpan onesiko in itoka marina tiakapan okito niknankilia in tlatoli inik nechteilwia nowepol pedro nali iwan in inamik anan in itechkopa in ikaltsin katka nonamik in omomikili hwan baptista in iw kintlamachitiwi in innantsin aw in insitsin inik kinxelwitiwi in kali. "uan san ta mochichi aso ye ipampa yaoyotl kimmawtili, mexikah kitenewke ernesto sedilo ponse de león yuhkin yankwik wei itlahtokaw anawak. yewatl omotlahtokatlali in ipan tetsakutika imets toxiwpowaltsinko. welik in ixiuyo, kwaltsin ahwiak, mahyá kolanto wan semi xoxoktik aw ika inin in tlahtoke reyes don fernando iwan doña isabel kimolnamikilike inik mokwepas don christóval kolón, iwan okseki tlakatl kinwalwikas inik motekakiwi || 111r motlalikiwi in onkan atentlipa, in san ye motta mana in itlanekilitsin sankto padre. kiiitouaj, para postehtli. tepankiski mitoaya q.n. yewatl kichiwa yauyutl. i newatl hwana a[n]tonia nikan nomatika niketsa krus inik nikneltilia i notlatol hwan hernandes eskrivano palthasal garsia fwe testigo de lo dicho lurenso maltin anton garsia antonio de sopwerda don migwel welnestis. ume tekpatl inik yake xaltokameke motekato tlaxkala. amo monamaka. aw in axkan nitlanawatia hok monemilis in tlatoli iwan hok kimokakitis in mwi magnifiko señor itata. ye makwili iwan tlahko imán. newa wel kwali nomati. aw in axkan sábado ik 15 mani metstli in omotenew setiembre de 1607 años, ikwak pew in ompa amakemekan chalko in aotli ye motataka; itenkopatsinko in tlahtowani don lwis de velasko visurrei inik mochiw inik ompa tekitiwak kinawkanwike in chalka. aw in sekintin in ok inyolo kimati kalaki in onkan inyeyan; motlalia kaltitech aok momihtotia san onkan wal tolotimotlalia. xaxantiah iii tochtli xiwitl, 1430. okachi mochiwa kampa kajfentaj. aw in ilwikatl, in iw kimitalwia miyekintin teotlamatinime doktoresme iwan mitowa in ipa teotlaneltililistli in konsilio lateranense, mochiw ipampatsinko i yewatsin papa in itokatsin innosensio tersero, ipantsinko i mochiw konsilio inik moneltilia ka kimosepanchiwili in totekwiyo dios in ilwikatl no niman ikwak kinmochiwili in angelosme tlachiwaltin senka mawistike chipawake. in tikwikanitl.xopan kala itek,in tonteyawiltiya. otlasohtlayah ik matlaktli omei leon (gioacchino peksi), motlalia ipan iikpaltsin in pedro. inin wei tlahtokateopixki okihkwilo in tenyo amatlahkwiloli motokayotia "rerum novarum" impaltlatekipanoke. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. yahki kwatitla. okseppa kilwi in || 128v tliltekatsin: "auh tlein tikwa, tlein mitak mochiwtiwits?". in patatah ibwan kamohtin noihki ika tlalitstiayan momacah. amo semi onkak, sayoh kampa kitokaj. 11. aw iwan ma ika tiwetska, ma ika timotopew, ma ika tikamanalo in wewentsin, in ilamatsin, ahnoso kokoxkatsintli, in tennekwiltsin, in ixpopoyotsin, in ixpatsaktsin, ahnoso makwekwetsin, matsikoltsin, matohpoltsin, ahnoso wilatsin, xotepoltsin ahnoso imatsin, ikxitsin kiwilana, ahnoso nontsin, nakastapaltsin, yolotlawelilokatsintli, ahnoso tlatlakamikkatsintli, ahnoso in tlein kokolistli itech ka, ahnoso yewatl in akin tlahtlakoltika mokokowa, ahnoso mixpan otlahtlako, in tlein okitlako. aw ik noseppa || 37 nekwepalok kalakowato in ompa walkis tlayawalolistli. ipan in, in sekintin wewetke in iw kimachiyotia, in motlahtokatlali akamapichtli in tenochtitlan. nama ximakwitlawi ta san pablo oyek tonali se karransista okinekia kimotemowiliske tonantsin la asunsión. kintsatsilia okseki tlaka onkwanon kipalewiske kinmotemowiliske tonantsin. yewatsin motlaixotilia ipan toxolal iwan wekapa metstika. ihkwak tla ilwitl kinmotemowilia kana sempoali tlaka iwan kinmolpilia ika nelpilontin chichikatikes; onkwanon amo tlatskotoni. iwan in karransistas okitoke tiktemowiske inin xenola, tikixtiliske in korona, pipiloltin iwan itzotzoma. amo ipan omomatia tla yetikatsintli in tonantsin. manxinemikan aw ye omitoke ye omotenewke in ipan i tlakpak san mosenmatoke in tlahtoke reyesme mexiko, aw ka yuh nesi amo wel tiknonkwatlaliske, amo wel tiknonkwakixtiske inik mosemitos inik mochiwas imemoriayo in ipan in in governadoresme iwan visurreyesme in ye otlapachoke in ipan in nweva españa in ye ixkichkaw ipan yewantin christianosme imaxkapan. in newatl pablo garsia alkalde hustisia nikpia iwan don migwel san simon don martin kortes iwan algwasil martin hernandes iwan diego hernandes eskrivano otiwalake in nikan ipan tlaxilakali san sebastian sakatla tikinmakako posesion in sensilia ximenes iwan in ipilwan alonso dias hwan ximenes fransisko ximenes. aw iwan ye onpowalxiwitl ipan nawxiwitl in ipan viii kali xiwitl, 1565 años, in omomikili tlakatl don lwis de sankta maría nakasipaktsin tlahtowani tenochtitlan, in tlahtokat yexiwitl; aw yewatl in oitech tlamiko inik mexika tlahtokatepilwan in tenochka tlahtokatepilwan in aokmo yewantin tlahtokati tenochtitlan, iksen ikwak kotoniko in intlahtokatepacholis. aw in ipilwan kinkawtia chikwasemin: in ikse itoka mikistsin; in ikome itoka maxiwatsin tlahtowani, aw amo wel momati kanpa in tlahtokatito inin; in ik-ei itoka yowalpopokatsin; in iknawi itoka kwawtsitsimitsin anoso ketsalkwawtsin; in ikmakwili itoka || 91r ixkonan; in ikchikwasen siwatl, amo wel momati in itoka tlei. aw in okikakke in omononotske tlahtoke mexika, niman no pewke in okinkalalike; aw ompa xaxamakaya ompa onixpoliwia in tetewktin in tlahtoke, || 103r ompa okikwia in pipiltin in tensakatl in xoxowki in kostik in istak tensakatl aw in tlasotilmatli. —namotlačikilia. okinmokixtilito inchachantsinko nochtintsitsin tlakame. amotla omokalaktiaya. iman tika on okinmomiktilike notatsín, notiotsitsiwan. setsin notíotsin chikahke tlatiwani iwan oksetsín ye tokoltsin. yomomikilitaya ikwak okalake kalitik karransistas iwan inintsin koli okinmanalike ikan tlali okimomochilike. aw iwan in sa ye no ipan in viernes sankto ye tlatwi in okiske in otlayawaloke sanktiago tlatilolko tlaka in motenewa nasarenos, no iglesia mayor ahsiko iwan san fransisko kisato, inik mokwepke. kwali se kikwa ikechselo wan no welik kemeh waukilit, mah se kiixka wan welik. xkinmaka lisensia, santlen wel otechpasoloh yewa in tehtli ixtlawapa omen. aw okno iwan nikan tiktlalia tikikwilowa in intlahtolo in estlapiktin || 42v teotenanka chichimeka kwixkoka temimilolka iwipaneka sakanka. aw iwan ye matlakpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolomei xiwitl in ipan iii akatl xiwitl, 1391 años, in omotlahtokatlali in tlakatl in ikome witsiliwitl tlahtowani tenochtitlan. ipan in ikwak kis mowikak kitlalkawi in altepetl mexiko in visurrei don martín enrríkes inik mowikak perú; in tlahtokat matlaktli omei xiwitl, kwali inik tlapachoko mexiko. aw in inpilwan omentin in okinkawtiake inik se itoka ana tepi inik ome maria tlako aw ipan kitlalitiake testamento ini kinmakatiake in kali ontemani iwan itlalo in ipan mani in okinmakatiake in inpilwan omentin. no kikwih para kitamahxitiliah ika yon pelotilas para nemoutil. aw iska intoka in tlahtoke i nikan witsa mexiko in ikse nesawalkoyotsin tlahtowani tetskoko; in ikome akolnawakatl tsakwalkatl tlahtowani tlakopa; in ikei itstlo- || 96v -llinqui tlahtowani koyowakan; in iknawi xilomantsin tlahtowani kolwakan; in ikchikwasen tepankiski tlahtowani tepetenchi xochmilko; in ikchikome kekecholtsin tlahtowani tekpan in san ya ompa xochmilko; in ikchikwei tsompantewktli tlahtowani kwitlawak; in ikchiwknawi xochitlolinki, inin sanno kwitlawak tlahtowani, ka ometikatka in tlahtoke; in ikmatlaktli ketsaltototsin miskik tlahtowani. ka yewantin hi in achto unoka, in inpa axiwako chichimeka tlatoke. kiilwi niman ipam inin xiwitli yakwika otipowaloke wala hwes fi.a [ncis]co ximenes nikan san bartolomé tixpan tewantin dfon] baltesar de san hwan alkalde ordinario iwan dfon] martin hwáres kortes de san hwan fiskal tixpam opowaloke masewaltin ipam omotlali totlakalakil oome tomin. kaxtoli waxchili tinemiskiayah mochiwa saj. aw ye iw nepa matlakpowalxiwitl ipan senpowalonkaxtoli ipan ikose inik ompa walolimke inik ompa walkiske yankwik mexiko astlan in mexika, inik nowian walkiske walnenenke otlihpa, inik onkan tetlan motlaliko kulwakan mexika. achkwan tikittoa i ayak imiw, yayak ichimal. chiwknawi kali atle mochiw. x akatl xiwitl, 1255. nikan ipan in in asiko in motlaliko in wewetke chichimeka in onkan askapotsalko in axkan onkan motenewa askapotsalko tepanekapan, in ihkwak in ye iw matlaktlonse xiwitl tlahtokati totepew || 18r in kulwakan ye iw nepa. 191 aw yewantin in achi wei intlatlakol intech mihto yeintin in tlanepantla piloloke, aw in oksekintin san kintlayawalochtike in itech omotenew yankwik tepilolkwawitl; inik kinpilotiake mochintin kwaltika kimonochilitiake kimotsatsililitiake in intemakixtikatsin totekwiyo dios, inik momikilike mochintin mosenkawtiwi moyolkwititiwi. ma kwakwalaka in atl ika in elotlayoli, senka chipawak, iwan kanela, iwan tlatsopeliloni; moatilia in textli ika ome tekontontli atl; mokwachwia, motlalilia in atl kampa ka in elotlayoli, iwan ma kwali wiksi. xeliwka inik mowikxitia in michwatsali; nikan san tikixketsah ontlamantli in mochiwa ompa tochan. kemmanian san moihseki komalko iwan iwki mokwa ika chiltemoli. ok sentlamantli ihkwak mowikxitia ihtik in waxchilmoli; intla inin mochiwa sekni ma kwakwalaka in tsompachkilitl (yuhquin omotlahtolmelaw itechpa in kilitl) iwan motlalia ika michwatsali ihtik in chilmoli in kwakwalakatok, iwan ye mokwa. “ca ye kwali, mexikatl; otitlanellti”. lakahmo nitlatekis ka mili o ka n sebada. aw san niman ipan in in omotenew x tochtli xiwitl in onkan ohtlipan onkan walmotlahtokatlali in kwawtsintewktli, intlahtokaw mochiw in tekwanipan tlaka in okik ohtlipan walnenemi. iwan se tlalmanalko waltemo in atl, mochi onkan walkalaki in chalko atenko, inik senka onkan waltlatemiltiaya waltlatlapiwiliaya inik nowian chinampa, inik senka ye tlaapachowaya. ika nehon nikan nimitstatawtia ikwak owala mexiko okinwalmamatak itik wakali ome palomaxtin. iwan yoyaya ika tepostlan oksepa ika kwawtlatli. omosewitl piltontli; ikan yaw siawtaya tepitsin omotekak. welis amo kwali okitsatsa wakali. okiske palomaxtin. wan omotlalike se ikpak teopantli tepostlan iwan oksente ikpak tepetl kan chanti teposton. aw in oyuh kimonpewke in askapotsalka iwan in tlakopaneka, aw niman ye kitowa in akolwakan i kowatlichan in siwapilatohani in itoka .... || na nihneki xihchiwa se kali in ik kichiwaya siwa achtopa on kwachkawaya sesentetl in ichtilmahtli kitkia in kontiaokuliaya kwikwikas in ik ipan on tlatekaya. aw iwan ye chikwasenpowalxiwitl ipan chikwexiwitl in ipan 2 kali xiwitl, 1481 años, in omomikili in tlakatl axayakatsin tlahtowani tenochtitlan, in tlahtokat matlaktlomei xiwitl; aw san niman ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl motlahtokatlali tlakatl tisosikatsin tlahtowani tenochtitlan, yewatl senka ipan otlahto in ikal witsilopochtli inik panwetsis. alvaseas techkautia ipan titlatoske inik niman inik misa inpan mitos omentin in inamik katka itoka diego xwares kitlalitia in itestamento onkan kitotia inik tiknamakaske in ikal in itlal. in kwowit. wel amo kwali in totolar katl. tein tiltikchichimekoh wehweyi exot wan istak ixik wan ipanewayo mekohtik. witsti (espinoso o chayote) in kwowit. in sesek, por eso kininamiki in tein tempalankuij. ipan in inawxiwixti in amo kiyawiloke chalka; au so mach amo, san tlakwilolkiyaw. nikan ipan in in omomikiliko in nawyotsin in tewktlamakaski tlahtowani kolwakan katka. aw in ikwak in oyuh kimokakiltike in mawistililonime señores alkaldes senka okimopakkaselilia kimomakilia in inweltsin yewatl itech kimokawilia regidor mayor pedro heronimo ihoan pedro de sant fransisko regidor ihoan newatl diego leonardo eskrivano otechmonawatilike ika in inmandamientotsin ik okimoneltilike okimotlalilike in intokatsin yoan in infirmatsin. fransisko martin alkalde migwel sanches hwes thoribio lukas hwes itenkopatsinko señores diego leonardo eskrivano. in ipan xiwitl de 1592, ikwak motlali in tlakalakili nanawi tomines oome tomin; san tlawenchiwalistli mochiw in iwikpatsinko rei, in kimomakiliaya in sordadosme. ayak kiyokoyan ipalnemoa. tlahko kilo kamohtli kalmilolpa nikalakiskia tla niwelitiskia. tiktlalwiskiaya in senyelis tla tikmatiskiah kiyekseliske in totlawil. axkan "¡amo xikochi! hnama xicholos!", kiihto. iuki monotsa por in iteyoj. itlanahnamik: ometsitsi itstoya achto, oninotlatsontekili itechpa in nawatlahtoli in ayokmo motenewa. ¿tlein monekia nikchiwas? ahso tikinwalwikaskeh oksehpa tochan. iwan inin tonawatil in tinahuatlacah, moneki oksehpa totlok yezqueh. totlok nehnemizqueh. ma totlahtol oksehpa tiktowaxkatikan, kemen okimowaxkatihtsinohkeh tokoltsitsiwan, ipampa yewatl totech moneki. ika xonawiyakan iwinti xochitli, tomak mani. ma on te ya akiloto xochikoskitl. in tokiappankaxochiw, tla selia xochitli kweponia xochitli. onkan nemi tototl, chachalaka, tlatowa, wal on kimati teotl ichan. ¡ chimalpopoka! ¡ ni axayaka! ¡anonohuaco tepilwan!, ka nawi i kimonkwikwitiweske i ye kimiktia; yakatia komiktike kwawnochtli tlakateko tiachkaw, kwapa wisnawak tiachkaw, tlenamakake amantla tlenamakak, tlalokan tlenamakak. in tewantin balthasar de luna algwasil mayor iwan algwasiles hernando estevan matheo tosiwi geronimo meneses iwan regidores pedro garsia markos xwares iwan newatl fransisko moisen eskribano hotiwalake in nikan tlaxilakalpan san sebastian sakatla posesion tikchiwako inik tiksemaxkatiko in tlali in chinamitl in hoseph ramires iwan inik onkan kinamakas atl. achtopa in ikchikwei ipilwan kwawsesekwitsin itoka papayowatsin tlakochkalkatltewktli, inin okinchiw omentin ipilwan: in ikse itoka markos, in ikome itoka migwel maldonado. inik x tlamantli nikitowa onmani mili onpa wewexokiwpan notlal ik kixiptlayotika in lukas tlakatekatl in axkan amo nikneki in nikkwis san nikkawa. aw in tlali yewatl in onikmakak maria aw inn imil tlakatekatl kipia anton tepal. kinekih aw in ikwak tla omonamakak kali in ipatiw yes tomines misas ik topan mitus teixtin aw in ye imak nonewa nopilotsin anan mosel man onkan tlaokolilos in ipatiw mochiwas kali. mochiwa wehweyikwowit. etamali, awaxtamali, kalwasahtamali pampa ya kichihki puro pwerta wan ventana. xiii kali xiwitl, 1349. se kwarto chicharrontlali kan ka in tiktemowa in itotonka in iyamanka in tloke nawake. aw in omotenewtsinoke teopixke san fransisko se in krus manka kimowikilike, nekok itlok mantia ome siliares, iwan se kapa kimotlalilitia iwan nekok itloktsinko mantiake ome diágonos almátikas kitlalitiake. aw in testigo kitowa amo ken nikinnotsa in moteilwia san nikmelawa i notlatol in ipanpa inik neteilwilo kali in wel yewatl in okikwitlakoyonike ka wel ikal in kokoxkatsintli in pedro iwan in inamik ka onpa wala in tetl in kwawitl in xamitl in onpa atlixokan. xochiyowa febrero wan tein mopo-lowani xochiyowa mayo. . niman ye ik kisa in itwalnepantla onkan kontekpana in inextlawal in itech powi tlali kitoawaya tlalteoktli iwan se kowatl in yewatl in ohtli (melauac), iwan tlakotsontli sakatsontli. "kena", kiilwi. sempoalimakwili nohpali tlahtolpewalistli lunes in ik 1 semilwitl mani metstli hunio de 1615 años, ihkwak okipewaltiko i ye kikwawtsotsona wei aohtli in xuchimilkopa wits in ixkich ik patlawak ik katki, nikan kisa i wel ixpan iteupanitwaltsin totlasothatsin san antonio abbad nikan xoloko. oso xa tiopan mokawak, aw onkan tekwalok i wala in tsiwtlakawki yaopol; ye kihtowa "tla nitlachia kani otekwalok". matlaktli tochtli xiwitl mayanke; in atlan onoke i ye ixkich atlan chaneke i michi in kwiatl axolotl, etk. ipan in kitlamiko in iteyakanalis in sitlalitsin, in okwawtlahto in kinyakan mexika kaxtolonse xiwitl; aw sa ye ipan in in omotenew xiwitl onkan in atotonilko nokwele yewatl onkan walmotlali in tsimpantsin inik kinyakanas mexika. ¿aquin ka mokalxelolpan? nosiwaiknin. o ayak tlakwawak kichiwan tlaltikpak. vi akatl xiwitl, 1355. niman ye walmoketsa in teomama in itoka ketsalkanawtli, ye tlahtowa ye kimilwia in chalka "tle amai, chalkayé? wele ye anmonelchiwa; kwix amo san tonawatil san tonepowal in toneakatlaliaya titomamimiktiske? aw i- || 137v -n axkan in ye anmonelchiwasneki, aw in at ye yuh in at ye anmonelchiwa; ok wel ximononotsakan!". aw no ipan in || 73v in xiwitl in omikiko in malatsin tlahtowani katka kolwakan, in tlahtokat kaxtolxiwitl. "ca nikan tonka nopiltsé, nopiltsiné, notelpuchtlé, notelputsé, telputstsé: ka otikimontemo otikim on tsatsili otikim on nenonotsalan in monanwan in motawan in puchteka in ostomeka in yake. iswatl san wakito nochi. in ipan altepetl siudad mexiko a seis dias del mes de hebrero de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años i mawistililoni tlatowani don antonio valeriano hwes governador iwan alkaldes martin xwares, migwel de los angeles in kimopielia hustisia in itechkopatsinko rei su magestad imixpantsinko onesiko isabel maria inamik domingo garsia ompa chaneke santa maria teskatsonko. in welik kaldito, tatsoyon wan akoloj. xi akatl xiwitl, 1295. kbiknahwi imán. v kali xiwitl, 1237. yei tochtli xiwitl ipa ik poliwke akolwake. kakawaxochitl ok yewatl kitekatia in eswawakatsin katka onmokets tlachkwikali in onkan ikak iyakal gabriel amo nikmati in ken ka chinamitl san in ik in nikmati in ye iskipowal xiwitl kipia in ipanpa in testigo amo nikiximati inik nikneltilia nikan nomatika niketsa krus. ante mi kristoval de san mateo eskribano fransisko xwarex alkalde. kema nimikmakas ixo wan xiyaw a ber kamik tihnekis porke in lá kahmo onkán tinechchwilihtok tantas kosas tinechendrogarotok. ye on ya niwala, ye on ninoketsa, kwika nonpiktiwis, kwika nonkwixtiwis, antokniwan. nechwaliwa teotl, newa ni xochwatsin, newa ni temilotsin, newa ye nonteikniwtiako nikan. nawi man nikwika tokimil. xochiyowa mayo. ihkwak timonekitis. istatl, ixkich in monekis yewa estados unidos onwalas. tasohmawis tepixkatsin hesukristo, aw inik okimoneltililike okimotlalilike intokatsin iwan in infirmatsin fecho e mexiko a 17 dias de hebrero 1582 años migwel sanches hwes difondo pablo garsia regidor mayor fransisko hernandes algwasil manyor damian dexoatl algwasil don antonio regidor ante mi hwan de san fransisko eskribano nombrado. xiwit saj. tehwan tikixmatih se taman saj: chichiltik. nikan ipan in ikwak chikawak sewets, inik mayanalok; makwilxiwitl in atle mochiw kwaloni, ikse xiwitl in. nikawín amo semi mochiwa. ¿in akin teka otitlahto? teka noknin. aw in ipampa nikan iwan || motlalia momachiyotia in tlein ipan xiwitl tlalpolo vespasiano herusalem, ik momatis in yekwel iskixiwitl onkan kate astlan in omotenewke wewetke chichimeka, inik ayak ik motlapololtis, inik ayak kimotlahtoltis inik ayak wel kihtos ka yewantin in wewetke in kinpoloto herusalem vespasiano, iwan yewatl ompa kinwaltotokak in yewantin wewetke in weyapan walake akaltika, in onkan kisako in axkann ompa motenewa yankwik mexiko; ka in akin intla ka yuhki kimotlahtoltis in ka wel istlakatis, amo melawak in tlein in akin kimotlahtoltis intla ompa aka intech techontlamis in hudiosme in kinpoloto vespasiano, yehika kamo ikwak onkan motlaliko in astlan in omotenewke wewetke chichimeka, ka ye nepa in motlaliko. manoso ye ixkich, ma otimawiltitsino tlakatle, totekwe, tlokehe, nawakehe, tlaltikpakehe, moyokoyatsine, titlakawane ma kisa in poktli, in ayawitl: ma sewi in tletl, in tlachinoli ma momanan tlali, ma tlato ma mososowa in kechol, in sakwan: ma mitsnotsa; ma mitstlatlawti, ma mitsiximati. chichimekatl aya nokonilnamiki, sannichoka. amo mochipautani, ta pos kwoutahtatok. in chichinakistli ayaxkan in tlaltikpak, techochoktikan, teelelaxitikan, kokok teupowki macho aw itstik, sese, ehekatl kistok, mopetskotok. aw no kimah in wewe ketsalmasatsin chichimekatewktli in amakemekan tlahtowani, kihto "oyaqui || 86r in tositewktli in tekwachkawtli; aw i newatl, kwix nikan newatias?; ka tiwan in tikpia in chalkayotl, ma sa oknoachi nokontoka". in chichilkostik. hweves in ik 21 mani metstli mayo de 1615 años, ihkwak yowatsinko chiwknawi tsilini, nikan siudad mexiko ommopewalti in senka mawistililoni teoyotika tlahtowani maestro don frai diego de kontreras arsobispo teopixki sant augustín; nikan mexiko motlakatili nikan ipiltsin i wei altepetl, ompa mowika ompa motlalia itekitsin in aihtik sankto domingo la isla, ompa kimopielis in sankta iglesia, in iw kiwalmotlachikawililia sankto padre de roma iwan in iw okimoknelili in iw okiwalmonawatili toweitlahtokatsin don felipeh tersero rei españa. viii tekpatl xiwitl, 1292. ¿quen wel?, istatl, ixkich in monekis san totlahtol se tanexilotsin, molini .cana ichan chakayoliva. xi val meva xi iva xi val meva yankwipili. xi val meva. ikan miaktin tlaka ompa okochia kwawtla. iwan se tlakatl ahken okiwikaya in tlakwal amo asito. yiman tika on kitoa nochtin: tiawe tiktemoa xoletl. ok topilia ome noso yeyi tlaxkali. yaw pewas timayanaske iwan antlein tlen ika tikwamanaske totlaxcal. íhole wahka ihkino moiluiyaj: aw san niman no ipam i semilwitl in metstli i xiwitl in tlakpak omotenew niman otiwalake in tewantin don migwel sanches pablo garsia regidor mayor, eskribano hwan de san fransisko algwasil damian texoatl otiwalake in ipan tlaxilakali tsakwalko. taltikpaktsin de mi alma, xochiyowa mayo, mayo miawatitok, tein kitokah enero itahkotian mayo pewa ya in xilot. san ik nonkwikatok. ¿ tle in ankitoa antokniwan, tlahtoa ye nikan? xochitwali mani, ompa ye ya wits tepilowan in koyolchiwki, chokistika in on kwikatiwits, xopan kalitik. a iwian xochitl a iwian kwikatl nochian kokoli mochiwa ye nikan. matlaktlomei akatl atle ipa mochiw. ¿azo tle neli? ¿ahmo itla topatiw ? san ye xochitl on nenemoya, elewiloya. xochimikowa, awiliskikowa tlakawepantsin, in ixtlilkwechawak. tlaltikpak in nikán . iwan kimomachtiaia in intlahtul in ik nawalkalakia san niman ayak wel kimittaya in aso mexika tlawtika in mosaia. notlatlahtia ximolwili man ‘yacan. xa itech ehekatsin. ompa niknotsati. miekpa motenextiliaya tlaka, tlakanetsolti, ontetsontekomeke, san se in intlak. ompa kima[n]wikaya in tlilan kalmekak, ompa kimittaya in motekusoma. in okimittak niman poliwia. kenin mochiwa in opew ye kwawtemowilo in iskikan chalko, yewatl tekiwtiloke in chalka in kwamimili in motenewa morrilos, senka ik motolinike; ompa kanato ompa kikixtito in ixila istaktepetl iwan popokatepetl. aw in akolmisi iweltiwa achto walitlanok in kwawnawak pilisiwasi, walsiwatla tlaltekasi. imawistililonime señores hwan martin, don martin hernandes, pedro heronimo, pablo xwares, walmowikake in nikan in tlaxilakali wewekalko posesio konmochiwiliko konmosemaxkatiliko in ikalkowal intlalkowal in melchior de parada español. kwaltia aw nikinnotlatlawtilia in algwaseas i nopan tlatoske inik se itoka pedro ilkawalok inik ome itoka ana leon yewan in nopa tlatoske in ika naniman inik no yuhki ipan mochiwas in ikwak mikiske oka ye ixkich inik ninomakixtia ipaltsinko in dios. tlatlanilok imixnamiki in gaspar karilo in inamik iwan marina iwan fransisko kwix ma yewati kaleke chaneke kito ka hamo ka san montli in omotenew fransisko. tlatlanilok in gaspar karilo in inanmik iwan in iyawi marina kwix ma itawa inkal kito kahamo san kitlanewtike in tlaxilakaleke xalakatl kalmaxalolkatl iwan xiloxochkatl inn ita katka itoka hwan kwata umpa wala in tenochtitlan. aw inik otlanankili in testigo okito ka nikmelawa in notlatol i nikmati in ipanpa tlali in onkan mani kowatlan tlaxilakalpan in itlal katka in akamapichtsin in ixkich inik mani in nikmati ka onkan tlantika in onka ikaka temaskaltontli oxixitin. amo nineki nimikis nineki sampa nimoyolchikawas oksepa kwali nimonelwayotis amo kema nineki nitlakatewas. okimonochilike in nawkapaixti pipilti pablo garsia alkalde don migwel sanches don fransisko de la krus pablo xwares okimottili in iw tekpantika in iw nemakok tlali in iw owalapowtiake wewetke kowatlayawkan chaneke. senka ik ne- || 273 -içahuilloc, ik netetsanwilok in nikan ipan siudad mexiko. ika nekkwat se kichiwa atol, se kikwi tahko at wan tahko nekkwat. pero tlawel nechkokó noixi. eyi pedaso elki. nawi tekpatl atle mochiw. aw inik iw mochiw chalanalistli innepantlatsinko katka in teopixke klérigos, dominigos, fransiskos; iwan deskomunión katka, yewatl iw kichiw in don hwan de servantes ikwak governador mochiwtikatka ipampa in arsobispo. in atomat sesek. ihwak palani xiwit, ompaixwa ya. nima ye kowixkatl, i walteyaka tlekwilwa. aw inik nenka inik tlatekipachoke in onkan atenko; senka kipopowtinenka inik chichimeka, in tlein kittaya in kichiwaya in chalka in atentlipantlaka no niman yuh kichiwaya, senka tlaweliloke katka tlawelilokattitinenka, tolakaltika kalakia in atlan inik ontlaminaya, senka tlamattinenka in onkan. kaxtoli chilpitsawak ahnoso kwawchili aw in intsonteko onkan senpowalonse tonatiw in kakatka tepilolkwawtitech, aw ye ikomilwitl mani metstli mayo hwebes ipan in kintokako onkan hospital de la miserikordia. in totonik. ipam inin xiwitl otipowaloke nik{an} san bartolomé teomtepetki otechpowako s[eño]r hwes iwan s[eño]r alkalte mayor d[on] hwan de serwande inon tlali magadad simaro yaxkam d[on] hwam temowa inon atlahutli omka mexkali temowa ikkixochitli in onkan yadad yei mil iwan semsontli. wan ta axtimokwitlawia?" el lisensiado don fransisko deleos 13 in topixke hwan de polo omochilwiliaya yeyi misa ipan domingo iwan ika semana ome ipan makwili tlapoali watsinkotika. nawi tlamachotilistli otenotsaya teteachka. ikwak tsilinis makwili tlapoali ye yiman on mokixtiaya topixke ika itsotsomatsin onkwan ye pewas moteochiwas misa. ipan semana oyeya ome misa wan se rosario ipan teotlaktli chikwasen tlapoali. kwaltia ix akatl xiwitl, 695 años. kiski in ome kali xiwitl para mopalewiskeh nopilwan. in mochiwa saj. aw sa ye no ipan in in omotenew viii akatl xiwitl in onkan nawxiwtike mexika in atlakwiwayan; onkan kinextike in atlatl inik tlaminaya yaok, aw in ipampa onkan in kinextike kixinke atlatl ik ontlatokayotike atlakwiwayan. kimantok ome atekomitl kenotimopanolti, ernesto. ye sexihtika amo totah. ¿canin otimotlatihtsino? aw in testigo okito in niwalnoskali onka in iw anna xoko atle nikitak kali nikitoa in itlal in machok iwan chinamitl v tetl kitek in machok. inik 6 tlamantli nikitohoa oniknopieliaya temakixtiani krusifixo nikmaka i nokonew in itoka hwan [al margen iskierdo omakok] aw in oyuh tlatwik in ipan in omotenew semilwitl viernes, atle konmotekipachilwi in tlahtowani don frai garsía gwerra arsobispo mexiko iwan visurrei mochiwtsinotika; atle konmitalwi, || 155 in ma tlatlatlawtilo in manoso tlayawalolo, ma mihto letanía in ipampa yuh omochiw senka temamawti tlalolinalistli, yehika ka yuh intech ka wei tenawatili wel intekitsin inmakasa ichkapixke. . aw in ye on ahsitiuwi yaonepantla achtopa on tlatitlani on tlaiwa on tlanonotsa on teitowa. onkan asiko onkan motlaliko in kwawtenko in itokayokan otlatepek. xochiyowa itech enero. ipan nawtsontli onkaxtoli omeppoali onchikonawi xiwitl ipan chikonawi kali xiwitl, in tlakatl asito ixkichka in metstli. sisitlalteposakalteyakanki in itoka neil armstrong, in akin achtopan okiska iwan oksekintin tlakah in iwikpa inin tlaltikpaktli, otemok iwikpa isisitlalteposakaltsin iwan onehnen ipan metstli iwa itokayokan kinewayan; inik motenewa kinewayan, yuh mihtowa, in ihkwak onkan kisako mexika intech kinewak, yuhkin achi yolokokoxkatke. aw inik nenke in kwawtekke chalka mochi in ipan metstli noviembre. in itech ka iwan in tlakatl nemakixtiliswelitilistli nemachilisneyokoxkayotl inik wel nemakixtiliswelitilistika, in ipampa san iyomanewikilistika iyomaneittalistika in amo yakakin ipan yas kikwitlawis inik kitepotstokas in kwali yektli nemilistli in anoso in akwali in ayektli nenemilistilistli; iwann itech ka sano yuhki in tlakatl ixtililoka iweliuyotl inik yewatl tsinpewkayotl. axolotl ammo kweyatl ammo kwetspalin ammo itstikyehso nesi salamandra aw in okimonnonots in ikniwan, niman ik yake tlachiyato in ompa in kittato in tenochtli; in okittake niman ye tlatlachpana in itsintla tenochtli, ye tlachichiwa in mexika. "ah, pero nopa na nikininawatí —bueno, ye'wakunko yakmo namotlaxkalowike. niman ye kompewaltia in ipan tlatowa in ik mochiwas in ikalitik amo san kexkichtin in mochiwa tamali. motamachiwa in ik wewei. aw in ye yuhki inikwak ye omomanako onteixtin, ye no kweleh awel olini, awel otlatoka, san momanke, motetenmanke. ik ye noseppa kitoke in teteu: iwan amo wel momati akin tsatsitinenka nowiyan ihtik siudad mexiko tetsatsiliaya; amo nel aka telpochtlawelilok español inik nowiyan kalnakasko kihtotinenka "ca ye oahsiko in tliltike, aokmo weka nemi, ma neyaochichiwalo!"? inin akin tsatsitinenka, ye kin ipan chiwknawi tsilini netetekispan inik sa ye katka, inik yekene wel momawtike españoles, motepetlatsatsakke in inchachan inik senka momawtike. noihki okitlakalia ipan kwentlatin tokaske tlaoli, yetsintli iwan awax. yewatl on momasewitaske nochi in xiwitl noka yawe kitomoske tlen kinamakaske tupileho, san pablo ostotepek iwan san salvador kwawtenko. okitokaya miltin, chicharonmiltin, kolextin iwan okitemowiaya xochimilko. nochi owalnamakaya. ika on okisentlaliaya in tomin kemanian ik okikoaya kawatin. kemanian ik okikoaya tlaltin. kemanian ik otlalprendanaya. iki in ik opapanoya towanpotsitsiwan. mah kwaltsin matapani, viii tochtli xiwitl, 1266. in ipan axkan martes a desisiete dias del mes de marso de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años otsatsi [tachado: k] wak tekpankaltitlan inik monamaka ikal mariana in sankt ipolito teokaltitlan mani nawtemani akokalo itwalo aw in ikwak otsatsiwak ayak otlanankili testigo diego xwares iwan tekpoyotl. ok se xiwitl kipolowa inik kaxiltis yektlasaloli. niman siensias kímikas momachtis. in ixmatili wel miak kikwalita. mochiwa sayoh kampa kitokaj. tlen 107 tlanawatihkayotl. nochimeh tlahtolixnamikilismeh tlen moihtowa ipan 103 tlanawatikayotl motetonis ipan tlahtoltekitl iwan sekinok tlahtoltlaxitlawali tlen kiihtos tlahtol tlanawatili, ke moihtowa ipan ya inin tlahtoltlapechtli i. in tlahtolsenkawali mowikas ken kiihtos tlen quiixpanotoqueh; ii. in tlatsakwiltilistli nochipa elis, san ipan motlalis altepechanehke, kinmanawis iwan kinpalewis ipan tleweli tlahtoli tlen ika quintelhuiseh, iwan amo tlasentematiltis tlen itechpowi tlahtol tlanawatili noso tlachiwali tlen ika mochiwas. ipan tlapalewilistli moneki mopatlas tlen axnelkwali tlatelwili ken kiihtos tlahtolpamitl tlahtol tlanawatili tlen 103 iwan 107 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili. keman akahya moixpantis ipampa tlehtleya tlahtoli kitlahtlakawis tlen iaxka noso nelkwali moaxkatihtok itlali, atl, sakapetlatl iwan kwatitlamitl tlen chinanko tlen kihtowa inaxka noso kipia amatl kampa moihtowa komontlali, noso tlaltekitinih noso comontequitinih, moneki monechikos nochi amameh kampa ixnesis tlen ika mopalewiseh nechikolismeh noso tlakameh tlen nikan moihtowa iwan moilamikis tlachiwali tlen monekis iwikpa nelkwali moihtos tlen tlali itechpowi, iwan noihki itlachialis iwan tlen kisas ipan tlachiwali tlen moixpantia. ipan tlaixpantilistli tlen moihtowa ipan tlahtolpamitl tlen onpanok, amo ipatih elis ipan tlalnechikolismeh noso calpolmeh, noso tlaltekitinih iwan comontequitinih, kikotonas tlahtoli ipampa amo tekichiwase noso ixtlamis kaltlanawatili, ipampa inon welis se iwan seyok kisas tlahtoli tlen ika mopalewis. keman moixpantis ika tlachiwali tlen kitlahtlakawis tlen sentika intechpowi nechikolistli iwan noihki amo ipatih elis tlamotsinkixtis noso tla kiselis tlen yewa kichiwa, san kena ipatih tla kikwalitaseh ipan sentika nechikolistli noso tla tlen ika ome itechpan kisas. iii. keman axmokwalitas tlachiwalismeh tlen tribunales hudisiales, tekichiwalismeh noso tlen tekitl, in tlamanawili san welis mochiwas ipan inin tlamantli tlahtoli a) itlaixnamikpah sentlaxolewali iwan tlasenkawali kampa ixtlami se tlateilwili, tlen kampa amo welis panos se tlatelwili tlen ika welis moxolewaseh noso mopatlaseh, welis tlahtlakoli mochiwas inipan noso, mochiwas keman tlahtoltekitl, iwan kin tlahtlakawis tlen kipalewiah tlen moixpantia, iwan kiasi tlen kenihki mosenkawas; san nochipa tla pamitl tlen altepechantli kitelwiseh tlahtlakoli ipan tlahtolpamitl ika tlahtoli tlen moihtowa ipan tlanawatili iwan motokahtis kewak tlahtlakoli ipan ompa tlaixnextili, tla mochihki tlahtlakoli ipan achtopan. inin amatlanelkimeh amo motlahtlanilis ipan tlamanawili keman onkas tlaixnamikilistli ipan kwalantli tlen tlachiwali tlen altepechantli noso tla kitlatlakawis nelkwali tlaeltos ipan chantli. b) itlaixnamikpah tlen tlahtolsenkawali kampa tlen mochiwas axwel mokwaltlalis, tlen teipan keman mosenkawas, keman motlamis nochi tlahtoli tlen monekis, iwan k) itlaixnamikpah tlen tlahtolchiwalis tlen kitlahtlakawis sekinok tlen amo itechpowi tlasenkawali. iv. ipan pamitl tlen tekitikayotl in tlamanawalistli ipatih, iwan noihki, ipan tlasenkawali tlen kichiwas pinawalistli tlen amo keman mokwaltlalis ika tlehtleya tlapalewilistli, tlasenkawali noso tlanawatili tlapalewilistli. amo monekis motlamis inin tlahtolmeh keman tlanawatili tlen kiixtlalis tetlanekilis, iwikpa mamokotona tlachiwali tlen tenekilia, miakintin amanekilismeh tlen itlanekilis tlahtol tlanawatili reglamentaria tlen hwisio de amaparo kinekis tlen ika welis kikotonas tlahtoli; v. in tlamanawili tlen kiixnamikis tlasenkawali iwan tlaxolewali tlen kitlamiltis kwalantli, welis tlahtlakoli mochiwas keman mochiwas tlahtoltekitl noso keman tlahtlakol senkawali, moolinis iixpan tribunal kolegiado tlen sirkwito tlen xie. a nonpewa nonkwika, ni makwilxochitl, san nokonawiltia in ipalnemoa, . san pani kimana kisennapalowa in ik konmana tleko in unkan itwalko. aw in onpa tlapia in milpan in mokolwan ka notsaloke yewantin kitoke kitenewke in iw katki mili in san kawtimani i moyoteka tlali inik kichiwa huramentotika kineltilike in intlatol in ixkich kawitl san kawtimani iwan sesentlaka imatika kiketske krus in ipan amatl. onkan ten ayitiw onkan den timikas se molino onkan nihmanas in tlaxkali onkan de nihmanan tlaxkali ahkmo itla nais. —nokokoaya kwak ni fandango teresa de xaltenko. wan xiktakayoti, yawi tlaltitla se tepiton kolesochitl okitlakewke in san esteban blas kitlakkwke para kikopinke xamitl para tihtlasaloke n chachanton porke chichikiton chichikiton katka. tlahko kilo tliletl nikan ipan in in motlahtokatlalike in aokwantsin chichimekatewktli iwan kowasakatsin, masiwi i san ok yewatl in inantsin siwatlahtokamakok, in amakemekan tlahtoke. ye yiman tika on ometstak tlatiwani husto sierra, sekretario edukasión. omotemakiliaya amoxtin ika momachtiske kokone iwan amatl ika tlakwiloske. amotla omokoaya. nochi on okitemakaya ompa tlamachtilkalko iwan san yewatl yaske chichipatike kokone. tlen primer año, segundo, tersero iwan kwarto san yewatl omomachtiaya otlapoaya wan mokwikatiaya. tlen mitoa kinto wan sexto omomachtiaya amatl iwan tla siwantoton okinmachtiaya tlatetekiske, tlakwikwiloske kwali tsotsomatli ika mákina. otechititiaya noihki titlakwikwiloske itech amame. noihki otechnonotsaya totemachtikaw kenin ika omochiwaya pantsin. viii akatl xiwitl, 1331. onkan ixpantsinko wala moketsako itoka ana hustina iknosiwatl chane in ipan altepetl mexiko itlaxlakaltian sant ipolito teokaltitlan itlatoltika kimononochiliko kitoko niknokakiltiliko in hustisia ipanpa sentetl nokal tonatiw ikisayanpa itstikak itwalo onkan mani in ipan tlaxilakali teokaltitlan in axkan noyolokakopa niknonamakilia ipanpa naxka onechkawilitia in nonamik katka itoka pedro xwares kimakatia in inantsin katka itoka anan sanches omomikilike imomextin. nikpia kaxtolpa omompowali. itlanahnamik: inik ayak moxikos yuh motlanawatili in ipan imawiskatsin inik pili inik tewtli inik kimochiwili mersed in ixpan tlakpak tenewtika in intoka. ante mí fransisko xwares eskribano. aw in ipan 29 de mayo, ikwak pew in itepos mikkatepostli inik nowian tsilin in ipan ixkich teokali mani mexiko; in ihtik altepetl kaxtolomei tonatiw in tsilinia kampanas. pinoli, ixkich in monekis in pipiltsitsin mah amo kitatamota kan in taxkaltsin por ké temohmoutia yon okwilin. sampa kikonanke tlayih tlayih noha se tonati. i tekpatl xiwitl, 856 años. aw ikin, ¿ kanin in ie notsalo, in ie tlatlawtilo, in ie neteutilo?, in ye mawistililo. ka senka ie wehkaw, ikin ye tolan, ikin ye wapalkalko, ikin ye xuchitlalpan, ikin ye tlamowanchan, in ye yoalichan, ikin ye teutiwakan. ka yewantin nowian semanawak kitetekatiake in ipetl in imikpal, yewantin kitemaka in tekuyotl in tlatokayotl, in tlelotl in mawissotl. kimaka sannehwa niwik noseselto kimaka nikwalantewa nomaikiniwan. nikan ipan in in omikiko in tsiwtetl in kolwakan tlahtowani, in tlahtokat matlakxiwitl; aw sa niman in ipan in in xiwitl motlahtokatlali in xiwitltemok in kolwakan tlahtowani. iiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1184. iknokwikatl tlauhtonnatiuhchimaleh, kateh tlen ne istak michime aw mochintin ompa atatakato in ixkichtin in nawkanme chalka masewaltin. san tokochitlewako, san tontemikiko, ah neli, ah neli tinemiko in tlaltikpak. amotlen okachi ipatin. iwan ma iliwis tepan tikalak; itla vmpa motechtlamis. intla ihkwak impan tikalakis immowanyolke wel tikimixitilis, wel tikimimakasis, inik ahtle motechasis in ahkwali; ahmo tiwetskatinemis, wel tikimixtilis, tikimimakasis immowayolke. inin neixtiloni xochimilan ontlachia. wel nechpaktia ¡pampa nikwalita sakaxoxoktik iwan kwakwaltsitsin xochimeh; mosewiah ixtelolomeh ka ontlachia tlakwakwaltsin tlamanik. in tlatokat tisuntsikantsi v xiwitl. wel miak niktlasohkamati tlen ye otinechmolwili. newa amo wel nechpaktia nonemilispatlas. mach kwali nochikawas inik ayokmo miak nitlaihyowis. okito in testigo ka wel melaoak in nikitoa ka wel axkaoa katka in itoka hwan kwawtsetseltsin aw i nixpan in kinamakak kikowili angelina de la krus kimakak makwili peso. aw oksenka nikan mexiko in ipan owaltemok in tepetitech atl, inik senka ipan otemiko ik poliwiskia in altepetl; aw inik nowiampa waltemoya in wala miekiliaya in atl, wel wei inik makok, aw miekkan papachiw xixitin in kali iwan ahapachiw akalak in kali, ik mokalkawke in chaneke; iwan in otli nowian popoliw, iwan in chinamitl wel nowian poliw. ¿ tlen mach? ipan nikmati motlatoltsin, neyokoltsin t'axayacaton, nik xochimalina, nikxochilakatsowa. san niktokwilewilia, san nikikixwia. ya tla nokonawilti in noyekoltsin, t'axayacaton. aw in ikwak ayamo walwi españoles onmanka xakali sa sentetl aw in tochinan mochipa tikchiwaya aw in pablo makwex in kitek chinamitl ye axkan xx siwitl aw in onkan omokalti i totlalpan ye xv siwitl. kaxtoli chilpitsawak ahnoso kwawchili ipan nawtsontli ommatlakpoa li ommakwili xiwitl kihkwiloa goya ome tenyo in itekiw in motokayotia "cihuatlatziuhqui in tlakentili" iwan "cihuatlatziuhqui in tlapetlawtli". i nikinopepewia a ye ixkich kawitl in tlaihiowia, in akan imihyo quicui”. . aw in yewantin wewetke im puchteka in ostomeka ok wel yowan in kalake ihkwak in kowatlan tlawitekoya. (in axkan in ipan prima.) se kilo naboxiwitl ika inin kalatsakwali tikalakikan, amo ika neka. makwilxochitsin ikwik inin tonali, okihto inspektor tatatin iwan piltsitsintin, nankilnamikiske ikwak kaxiltis se siglo ikwak aihmo otechmoxopechtike in kwitlaxkolistake inimekes kimilwia españoles. tlanonotsalo tokoltsitsiwan kename kwitlaxkolistake okitotomaya tepostli totonki iwan okintlatlatiaya masewaltin noso mexikatlaka. ipampa in nikneki nochtin pipiltsitsintin. iwan namewa nankitlaliske ipan namoyolo tlen tokoltsitsiwan omopapanoltike. weyi kitosneki kaxtoli iwan se tonali septiembre. ¡caxiltiz se sientos ikwak omotlan guerra! kwaltsin xikmatapana nehin semilita. onkan tlakat don pedro tlawankatsin tlamaokatltewktli, inin tlahtokat panowayan matlakxiwitl in oyuh momikili ikoltsin kwawsesekwitsin. aw sano ipan in in xiwitl in kinpew in axayakatsin in tepetikpak tlaka, i tonaliimoketsayan tlaka, i masawake in ye motenewa xikipilka. e iw oxiwitl tlatokanti in chalkayaotl moma. aw sanno ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl in oyah kastila in tlakatl don gastón de peralta visurrei, san exiwtiko in nikan mexiko tlahtokatiko; aw sanno ikwak || 99 in ipan omotenew xiwitl in owala in asiko mexiko in tlakatl don martín emrríkes visurrei, inin atle enkomienda kipiaya. sesenmotah bweno onkán in ye para nokseki yomo sewi in setl akmo tlasewesia. waika kitekili atl. aw in ikeilwitl ihkwak momikili in señora. aw iwan ye makwilpowalxiwitl ipan chikonxiwitl in ipan x tochtli xiwitl, 1502 años, in omomikili tlakatl awitsotsin tlahtowani katka tenochtitlan, in tlahtokat kaxtolomei xiwitl; aw san niman ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl motlahtokatlali in tlakatl motewksoma xokoyotl tlahtowani tenochtitlan. xochitika oo tontlatlakwilowa in ipalnemowani. in xiutsin tawelita kampa taseseya. 15. aw intla teka timokakayawas, ahmo ye titlakakisas. in chiltika, in puktika tikitstias in tlaltikpak. in ihkwak timikis, maxix, mokwitl itlan taktias; moten, monenepil tiktotopoistias. aw intla xikimmawistili in itlachiwalwan dios, san iwiyan, san isemele, in timomikilis. ma iwiyan, isemele ximonemiti; ma tixtomawatinen, ma tisikatinen. katalina kisalosneki tlakwalchiwas. ka ye namech on notlalkawilia, ma ipan anmotlatoltiske in tlachpanalistli in tlachpanali in tlachpanaltsintli in tlakwikwilistli in tletlalilistlis. niman ik kiyokuxke in tonalpoali, san ik sen on kisa mochichiktiw in tlakatl totekuyo. nikan ipan in in owasiko markés del vale in don fernando kortés, ye omotenew ipan se akatl xiwitl ipan semilwitlapowali se hekatl. achi timokokowaya para ta xochiyowa ihwak mochiwa ya in pahpata, ihwak yoli ya in rasimo. sa niman ikwak asitiwetsiko tenochtitla; in asiko kecholi, semilwitonali chikwei ekatl. kenin omonextihkeh nawatlahtoltlahkwilohkeh ipan seminario de kultura nawatl in nanakat. . aw in o kim om makake niman ye ik kiwalkwepkayotia in anawatlahtoke pero mohmostla ya inihwanti axmosewiah tlanesito, axakak. "axnijmati na aw inik ompa katka anowel onkan maxixaya in itlan popokatepetl, okno nepa in onmaxixaya ye okachi weka inawak atlixko, ik axkan motokayotia kwitlaostok; ikokkan kitlalike inneska intoka imelnamikoka in xochteka in ulmeka in kiyawisteka in kukolka. kiwaltsatsilia in malitsin, kilwia “can tiaw, temilotsin? xiwalmokwepa xihualmohuica!”. aw in akin satepan motlatolkwepas anoso tlachalanis niktlalia pena chikomilwitl in ilpities karsel iwan mekawitekos xxpa iwan konixtlawas pena v pesos onkan powis in ikamaratsinko su magestad yuh nitlanawatia aw inik nikneltilia nika notoka iwan nofirmas fecho en mexiko ut supra pablo garsia alkalde ante mí diego hernandes eskribano. ankateh —a pus non welika pero ohkion kichiwa ichpokaton. vii tochtli xiwitl, 1382. nikan ipan in tepew in wewe motewkkoma, in ateskawakan tlaka kinpew. in ichpokameh nochipa pahpaquih. iuki kitokaitiah por in kwouhet. vii tochtli xiwitl, 1174 años. tlen 63 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlahtolkalmeh amo welis pewa monechikoah iwan amo welis tekichiwah tla amo hualohuih, in ixcotiah, kipano tlahko tlen nochi tlacameh; tlen monechkawiseh tlen inin iwan okse tlahtokan moneki monechikoseh ipan tonati tlen kihtowa tlahtol tlanawatili iwan kin nawatiseh tlen amo walowih mawalakan ipan sempoali iwan matlaktli tonati, iwan kin matiltiseh tla amo ihkon kichiwaseh momatis amo kinekih kiseliseh tlanawatili, saniman kinnotsaseh teixpatlanih, tlen yewan moneki moixnextiseh ipan seha kawitl, iwan tla amo quichihuaseh, moihtos kaktok tlanawatili. tlen kaktos tlanawatili tlen tepantlahtoanih iwan wekapah tepantlahtoanih tlen sentika weyi tlahtokan tlen moixnextiseh ipewayah amatekichiwali, iwan noihki tlen panos keman tequichihuaseh, motequihuiseh: tlen kaktos tlen tepantlahtoanih iwan wekapa tepantlahtoanih tlen sentika weyi tlahtokan tlen ika miakintin tlatamachiwali, in tlahtokan tlen itechpowi kikixtis sansempa amatlanotsali tlen kenihki moihtowa ipan tlahtoltlatlapnatli iv tlen 77 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili; tlen kaktos tepantlahtoanih tlen kin tlapehpenihke ika tlahtolpewali tlen tlaixnextili tlatamachiwali, welis motekiwis ika tlayeyekoli tlen tlaixnextilmeh seha tlanechikoli tlen ixnesis ipan amatokayotl tlen itechpowi altepeyotl, sateipan keman kimaktiliseh tepantlahtoanih tlen itechpowi; in kaktli tlen tepantlahtoanih tlen wekapah tlen kin tlapehpenihke ika tlahtolpewalistli tlen tlaixnextilistli tlatamachiwali, welis motekiwis ika tlayeyekoli tlen tlaixnextilmeh tlen seha nechikolistli tlen ixnesi ipan tlatekpantli tokayotl tlen nochi anawak, sateipan tlen keman kimaktiliseh tepantlahtoanih tlen wekapah tlen itechpowi; iwan kaktli tlen iasika tlen tepantlahtoanih tlen wekapah tlen kin tlapehpenihke ika tlahtolpewalistli tlen achtowi axmiakintin, welis motekiwis ika tlayeyekoli tlen tlaixnextilmeh tlen seha nechikolistli tlen iwikpa tlaltlanawatiloyan tlen itechpowi mohkwilohtos ipan ome pamitl tlen amatokayotl. noihki momati tlen tepantlahtoanih iwan wehkapan tepantlahtoanih tlen poliwiseh mohmostla ipan matlaktli tonatih, iwan amo tematiltis noso amo kitlahtlanis makimakawa tlahtoltlayekanketl tlen tlahtokan itechpowi, tlen ika welis tematiltis, axwel monechikos iwan mochias ipan seyok kawitl, iwan ihkon monotsas iixpatlaka. tla amo onkas tlasentilistli iwikpa welis mosewiseh kaltlahtokan noso tlen ika welis tekipanoseh tlen keman mosewitosehya, saniman kinnotsaseh tlen teixpatlanih iwikpa mamoixnextikah saniman matequipanocah, iwan mochias ma asi sempoali iwan mahtlaktli tonati ken achtowi moihto. motlahtlacoltiseh, iwan kiseliseh tlatsakwiltilistli tlen kiihtowa tlanawatili, ahkia kin tlapehpeniseh iwikpa tepantlahtoanih noso wekapah tepantlahtoanih, tlen amo monextiseh, iwan amo motlahtlakol kixtiseh tlen ihkinoh kiihtos tlahtokan tlen itechpowi, amo asiseh ipan intekih ipan kawitl tlen moihtowa ipan achtowi tlahtoltlakwiloli tlen inin tlanawatihkayotl. nohkia motlahtlacoltiseh, tlen tlanawatili kitlatsakwiltis, in tlahtokan nechikolismeh tlen anawak tlen kintokahtlaliseh tlaixnextilmeh ipan se tlapehpentli tlen tepantlahtoanih iwan wehkapah tepantlahtoanih, tlen tlakameh kin tlapehpeniseh kiihtoseh ma amo yakah kichiwatih intlanawatil. mochiwa saj. sayoh kasá kitokah in semilita, ta welik. in sesek. aw masoneliwi in mokokowa in nonakayo ika in noyolo in nosialis in notlakakia in notlalnamikilis akenka san paktika aw nikchistika in mikistli in ayak wel ispampa yewa in yak wel kitlalkawia akah ye nikpehoaltia inik in nikitowa. otikpiaya. kiwalyakantikiske in tlatoke, kiyakantiwia, yehoatl kimawti i wewe motewksomasi i senkisato in tlaxkaltekatl, i wexotsinkatl, in chololtekatl, in kwetlaxtla. au in tlaxkalteka tenayokan onokan onka in itech tlaxkaltekatepetl; au i wiskiloke ompa yake in tliliwkitepeke. in xokot xochiyowa febrero wan marso. tlahko kilo textli inik mochiwa tlaxkali in iuki kilwiah por in wehweyi in itakka, mahyá xikaltsin. nakatl kiuikaj, michinakatl wehweyi. nemi nopa michi. in ma temakon ketsalokoxochitl,nopiltsin,titlahpaliwketl,in ye nixoxoya. para mah amo kwalanikan . aw in okikak in inteinyo in awitsotsin in ye witse in puchteka in ostomeka in owia ayotlan, niman otlanawati in ik namikoske. in weyi altepepan awel se moaltia. makwilpowali gr. chilpitsawak in temachtiani miak tlamachtiltin okinpix. viii.- pregon a katorse dias del mes de hebrero de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete in pedro awexotl otsatsik in teskatsonko okitekakiti inik monamaka ikal itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak otlanankili in ixpan testigo hoseph klemente. ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. tlen 37 tlanawatihkayotl. a) amo akah mexika tlakatl nikan tlakatini welis kikwiliseh itlakatililis. b) in mexika tlakatililis tlen ika amatl welis poliwis ika inin sekin tlamantli i. ipampa ika iyolo kikwis sehkanok tlakatililis, ipampa mopanoltis ika se tleweli altepeko tlatekiwili kewak kiawak ewa, ipampa kitekiwis amatlapanoltili tlen kiawak, noso ipampa kiselis noso kitekiwis tokayotl tlen pilimeh tlen ika mopachtekas ipan kiawak kaltlanawatiloyan, iwan ii. ipampa mochantis kipano makwili xiwitl sehkanok tlali. k) in mexika tlakatililis mopoloa ipampa i. moselia noso motekiwia piltokayotl tlen sehkanok tlanahuatianih; ii. ipampa tetlanehtia ika iyolo altepetekiyotl iwikpa sehkanok tekkiwa iwan amo ika itlanawatil sentika tlahtokan noso sentequichihuanih; iii. ipampa kiselis noso kikiwis machiotl tlen sehkanok walah iwan amo itlanawatil sentika tlahtokan sentlanawatiloyan noso tlanechikolis sentekichiwani; iv. ipampa kiselis tlen seyok tlali tekiwa machiotl noso tekichiwali iwan amo achtowi mokixtis amatl tlen sentika tlahtokan sentlanawatiloyan noso tlen tlanechikolis sentekichiwani, san ipatih eli tlen tlakwiloli tokayotl, tlen tlamatini iwan kwali tlakayotl tlen weli moselia ika tlamakixtilistli; v. ipampa tlapalewis, kitlahtlakawis totlalnantsin, se tlen sehkanok ewa, noso tekiwa tlen seyok tlali, ipan tlahtoli kampa tleweli motlatlania totlalnantsin noso iixpa semanawak tlasenkawani; vi. ipan sekinok tlahtolmeh tlen kiixnextiah tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh. in tlahtoli tlen ixnesi ipan tlahtoltlatlapantli tlen ii onasi iv tlen inin pamitl, in sentika tlahtokan kiixtlalis ipan tlahtol tlanawatili tlen itechpowi, tlehtleya tlamantli kampa tlatemaktilistli noso amatlaxolewali momatis tlatemactiliah, keman onpanos tonatih tlen kiixtlalis tlahtol tlanawatili, san moneki monextis amatlatlenekili tlen tlakatsin kikwesoa. no ixpan in inamik katka hwan ekapitsak otlamomotlake in inchan inik oneltik tlatoli ipanpa in nikan tiktlalia totoka iwan tofirma, a xxix dias del mes de setiembre de 1569. amo kimati in tlakwilos ipanpa in nikan [tachado: kichiwa] niktokayotia pedro garsia algwasil. paso ante mi migwel hernandes eskribano. maneloa apantsala in axolotl wapawa motlakwaltlatlalilia yowalpan tonalpan kintemowa mikalke tlatilulka siwa, tewiwiteke tlamamake; tlawistli onaktinenke, in inkwe moch kakokistike inik wel tetokaya. nian kimati geni kate pobre nokniw namonka akin tlapias. kenin mochiwa ihkon xikintayokoli nopilwan, aw inin eskritura otikchiwke nikan mexiko audiensia ispan eskrivano nonbrado testigostin imixpan tlaxilkaleke sebastian hernandes matheo xwares algwasil iwan estevan de sant hwan eskrivano. in oyuh tlamake nima ye inik untlaiwa i kolwaka tlatoke, kimilwito “ma kimokakitika in tlatoke. tekayewatsin amo mochipautani. wel mawiltiani oyeya iwan miak opaxialowaya. ka ixkich ik tikwepa. ik tinankilia in amihiyotsin, in amotlahtoltsin totekwiwane. ka yuh okatka inawatiltsin yuh kimowelitilismakili in sankto padre en blanko in ihkwak umpa mowikaya roma inik prokura- || 256 -dor de indias mochiwtsinoto, ihkwak umpa kiwalmomakili in bula in brebes okimopieliaya inik wel omowelitiliaya nikan ipan nweva españa. in tewantin alkaldes don fransisko de la krus thoribio lukas hustisia tikpia in ipampatsinko su magestad in axkan titlanawatia in itechkopa hoseph ramires ayak kontlakawaltis ayak ik konixnamikis in ikkwak namakas akaltika atl in onkan tlaxilakalpan san sebastian sakatla yehika ka senka wel totech moneki in atl. in matsalayotl wel welik. wahka kitl moiluiyaj: sihtlinakatl aw in otlika on mitl xaxmantok, tsontli momoyawtok. kali tsontlapohtok, kali chichiliwtok. wan kipixtok se iwelti tlen dies años aw masiwi in tlahtokatke in kweskonpixke, yese ka san masewaltin, ka san kichtekke in tlahtokayotl. ipan in xiwitl ipan metstli marso, ikwak osewiko in kokolistli matlaltotonki in manka senka chikawak, ik mikowak in nikan mexiko, se xiwitl in manka. san ok onkan asiko in in ipan ipewyan tekpatl xiwitl; aw se xiwitl in kaktimanka, in amo nekaliwak. cequjntin niman kinkamatlatike sekintin kinkamaikwiloke. sekintin kintenikwiloke. kaxtoli wan yeyi o yewatl in in itlahtolo xiwitl in ipan motlakatilitsino in totekwiyo dios hesuchristo in semanawak temakixtiani; yewatl in inik onpewa in ikse xiwitl in itlakatilitsin in neli ipiltsin dios. san teokwitlakoyoltototl: o wel yektlin amokwik, wel yektli in ankewa. ye ikwak no nenanamakok mayanalistika. in ikwak tlanes, in ikwak tlatwik, in axkan onmantiw olintonatiw nawi olin in itonal ik makwil inin tonatiw mami ipan tlalolinis, mayanalos. inin tonatiw itoka nawiolin, inin ye tewantin totonatiw in tonemi axkan, aw in ineska nikan ka ka inik tlepanwets in tonatiw in teotexkalko onkan in teotiwakan. ye noye itonatiw in topiltsin, in tolan, in ketsalkoatl. tein nimitsmaktiliko, tekosehxokoyolin vi kali xiwitl, 1433. aw ka nokonosia ken kitos. inon se tlakatl amo yolewia iyolo achi omoyolkokwaya ika mopawis ika xoletl. mawistik tlakatl, in okitlali tlakwali, kitoa ximotlalikan; tiawe titlakwa. amaka miquiz. nochtin tsatsi tla tikitakan, tla tikitakan, tlen otimotlalili. ome xumali pitsochiyawisotl para no motekipanoskeh nopilwan. yewatl achto katka in don fernando kortés markés del vale governador hustisia mayor i kapitán general, in tlapacho wel ixkichkaw inik kitlaniko tlali in ipan xiwitl de 1519 ixkichkaw ik asik in ikomilwitl mani metstli hulio in ipan xiwitl de 1526; in tlapacho chikwasen xiwitl ipan chikwetetl metstli. aw no ikwak omoyankwili in iglesia mayor teopankali. in ipa se taman saj. nochi mochiwa ampo win wan kampa tatekoch. manihki, yowala piltontli. "tlen san puro omohwanti". komo miki itech ne talmanik? aw inin sempoali pesos yuh okitoke in albaseas ka ipatiw kaltsintli in kikawtiw angelina de la krus mikki okikow in ana xwares san no onkan chane in santa ana witsilan in inamik fransisko xwares albasea in iw kitotia mikki inik san yehoantin kikowaske iteixwiwan. kimihtiski para noha kitlakawalti ¡nicnotlamati!, ﻿ticahuiliah in xochimili inik ka mowepawaskeh iwaa momacazqueh. momostla. innikiyakawa, san nikitta nochan, xochimamani. ¿mach wei chalchiwitl, ketsali patlawak kintepan, ipan matlaktli omome xiwitl, mochantilikoh istakalko, yeseh ompa san yei xiwitl onenke. xi tochtli xiwitl, 1282 años. axkan martes v dias del mes de mayo de 1551 años iskatkin notlatol nikitotiw i newatl i ni martin de lásaro in nokal amo ipa mawaske in nopilwan in siwakali iwan in akokaili iwan in tlaketsalchayawak mochi itech powki in anton topilaneuk aw in onkan niwetstok i nika teikak itech powki in hernanto iknoxochitl aw in tlanepantla ikak in tlaketsalchayawak itech powki i nonamik aw in nomil in kowatlayawkan napowali ik tlapiesken in anton [topilaneuc] iwan in askapotsalko napowali ok ye itlasakamol yetiw in inantsin no itech powkin in anton. aw masiwi in chikawak ono nikwel mochiw, aokmo senka ixkich ik chikawak in iw achto yowak omochiw, ka sa onkistikis sa kexkich inik tlatlako; ihkwak kwitlatlakotsayan in iteopankaltsin san hwan baptista moyotlan i motenewa san hwan de la penitensia. axkan domingo in ik 28 mani metstli oktubre de 1612 años, wel ipan imilwitsin in sant simón iwan san hudas tadeo apóstoles, ihkwak nikan mexiko tekpan palasio ye ipan chikwasen tsilini teotlak, inik onyowak, in omokalakiko in tlahtowani don diego fernándes de kórdova || 197 markés de gwadalkásar komendador sanktiago visurrei lugartheniente del rei nwestro señor governador i kapitán general de la nweva españa; iwan kiwalmowikili in inamiktsin in siwapili itoka doña mariana riedre markesa virreina de la nweva españa. kwalika, tewa altepenepantla tia iwan newa noihki. tikanakan in kalmimiloli iwan tosepan tiakan. axkan lunes kwaresma in ik 17 mani metstli marso de 1614 años, kin ihkwak ipan in nikan mexiko ahsiko okalakiko in omotenew señor sebastián viskaino vesino mexiko, in onwiya hapón in okinkawato omotenewke oksentlamantin achtopa nikan mexiko onwitsa hapón tlaka, yexiwtika in omokwepako señor sebastián viskaino inik okinwalwikak okseppa sekintin hapón tlaka || 244 iwan se tewktitlantli ye omotenew embaxador wei tlakatl in walmotitlani. ayak wel so itlan kisa, in on tlatowa tlaltikpak. in ok tlateotokilispan, yuh mihtowa, san nimann ayak wel mokekelowaya in iwikpa inin altepetl amakemekan chalko; ayak wel iwik ewaya, ayak wel kimixnamiktiaya in nepapan tlaka in kikokoliaya, in kikakia itenyo imawiso. nikan nimitstatawtia ika... —nian xmochokili tlenon para timuchokilitinemi kachi timotlamikonoa. kada wiptle mopahpakan baril para ahmo deskomponerwis inekwtli. magdalena mochi osema mektli septiembre ipan 29 de septiembre primerito techmokastigarwi san migwel de los milagros wan ipan 30 de septiembre san herónimo. axkan sábado ik 2 mani metstli mayo de 1609 años, ikwak pregón mochiw in nikan mexiko ik tsatsiwak inik omotlali yankwik okse visitador || 119 itoka don hwan bilela, umpa walewak in gwadraxara in xalixko ompa presidente katka, ikwak kikaw in itekiw in okse katka visitador in itoka lisensiado diego lanteras i veláskes. nikan nik wal wikak nonawalteskaw in ixsewalpopopokatimani, iwan nikin on wika in makwiltonaleke,.semilwaleke ki mon tsawktiake in motlawan tlamakaske tlilpotonke inin barrio itoka santa krus. noihki otlachikia ika nekwatl kename santa marta. okipiaya nekwatl onkwan mokwepa newtli. se kitehteki wan se kimana iwan nextamal. aw inik waltlahtokattitia, inik nowian walnentiake, yepowalxiwitl ipan chikwexiwitl, inik ompa walmotlahtokatlali in itstepek. aw iskate otikinminke tochtsintli masatsintli, ma yqu intech xonmaxitikan". in axkan in itlatki katka in akamapichtli in itatsin katka in axkan mexiko tlatoani in don lwis de santa maria iwan in okse tlakatl in itoka don martin momawti ka omextin itechpa kiske in akamapichtli ka intatsin katka aw in axkan intlal inik moteilwia ka imaxka ka yuh nikmati ka in newatl ni baltasar kotolkatl inik amo nistlakati ka huramento oniktenamik ipanpa ik nikan nomatika niketsa krus. baltasar kotolkatl. totlaol palani xuyawi tanto in tíasuli palani akmo kikwa'in yolime yepalanki yakmo. monamaka maski amo akah kiwika kwesalan por in pinauaj. noso melawak moneki miak tlen kwalwikah nehnentlanamacaqueh. wan na nikatekis ne orno", ihkini kiilwi. ome pesoh iwan sempoali iwan makwili centavoh. mochintin wekawtika chokaktikatkah aw niman omoxexeloke. iskatki niktenewa monamakas akalotenkopa mani notlalkoal yoan ipan mani kali ye tsonmoltsin ikal katka yoan in kiwalkalteposmamatimani kali muchi notlalkoal honkanta ana gutier[r]es sentetl okixitini in kali yuh nechilwi muchi kikoas in tlali yoan ipan mani kali sa makwiltetl inik titononotskenechmakas epoali pesos ayatle nechmaka aw in tla moxikos ma sa nel ompoali pesos kitemas. kwaltia yei totoltetl se mamahpikton silantro aw in imayawkan ompa ki wal kwi in kwawxochitl. in yewatl in in chimalxochitl kineskayotia in chimali. in teskatlipoka itlatlatlawtilis in ikwak mayanalistli motekaya tlan inkinekih para nekwikase, ipan se siya ompa kinwalmimiloto kinwalmayawito in mokiwixtli iwan in itepotso, aw sanno tlatilolko ichan itoka ketsalwa || 101v in kiwalmimilo. estufa electricah, estufa gasolinah iwan chapopotl iwan sente tepostlawik. sitini tikintekitilia inik wiksis pantsin iwan tetexwelik. in ipan tlaxochimako metstli, mochin altepewake okiske tetenewatoh in ipan ixkich anawak. ahkopa aw nikan kate nikimisketsa noalvaseaswan in kimokwitlawiske in nanima iwan in mochi oniktekpan mochi in ixpan nelties yewantin thoribio fabian inik ome migwel hagobo santa krus ate[...]kolekan icha aw in testikoti in imispan onitlatik nite[...] ma nikan motokayotikan. hwachin de bargas thoribio fabian migwel hakobo santa krus ichan migwel de san diego siwatsitsinti testikoti maria susana siwatepiski katalina de la krus ana antonia. newatl onitlakwilo thoribio alexandro matheo xwares. . ka is katki in amokokokaw in amelchikiw in amotsontekon ipatiw omochiw. ayak amech kawaltis ka nel amaxka amotlatki ka oan ki mahcehuato. . xiwtotoewatl tsinitskan ewatl xiwchimali teokwitlayaka papalotl in kontlalitiwitse iwan teokwitlanakastepostli in innakastlan pihpilkatiw wel pahpatlawak in mahkulpan wal asi iwan ketsalpanitl sakwanpanitl machonkotl. sano yewatin koyolokokoltito in axayakatsin, konilwito “ma sa itla konitta in moquihuis”. el doktor antonio de morga 11 aw inik neli tixpan omochiw nikan tiktlalia totoka iwan tofirmas omochiw nikan siudad de mexiko a tres de hunio de 1577 años. hwan hernandes algwasil. paso ante mí migwel xwares eskrivano. kexkich in ye neli kilwia in amo nell'on san no moneneki in ipalnemoani. inik asiko panowayan tlaka ipan atonaltsin. aw i no yuh konmokakiltike in tlatoke ik niman omotlanawatilike inik walaske in tlaxilakaleke aw niman owalake pablo garsia pedro de gante merino martin hernandes balthasar anbrosio pedro hopoch pedro masewal okonitoko ka ye neli itlalman in kimonamakilia kikawilitiw in inantsin omomikili itoka magdalena tekwihchon. aw in ixkichika ayemo tlamia ineteochiwalistsin kwaresma ixkichkaw umpa moyetstikatka kwitlaxkowapan; iwan umpa kiwalmihtalwitewak la kompañía de hesús in yankwik missa, inik niman walmokweptsino walmowikak in nikan mexiko kimochiwiliko in itlahtokatekitsin inik pressidente. inin ohtenko in mamani kali, aw tlanepantla in okonketstiwets itienda omotenew antonio barreto; wel amo wekaw in okonchiw, san ixkichika ome metstli in onmokalti. nikitta moxochiw, kwaltia v tochtli xiwitl, 1510. pepenalo teyakanakiw yuhkin wei itlahtokaw mexiko hose lopes portilo. ikontetipa . aw in san masewaltin intech moneki yewatl in itsnakochtli teposnakochtli iwan amochitl iwan itstlaewali neximaloni iwan witsawki itstli iwan tochomitl iwan witsmalotl iwan koyoli. kenin mochiwa aw in oasito tochtepek in yewatl tealtis niman ye ik kalaki in ichan tlatilulka. kimamalia in kitetlawtis iwan in akakwawitl. axkan martes in ik 4 mani metstli marso de 1614 años, ihkwak ye noseppa ahsiko kalakiko in nikan ihtik siudad mexiko in yewantin hapón tlaka pipiltin, tlakavalowia inik kalakiko ipan matlaktlomome tsilini nepantla ka in tonatiw. no tata iwan no nana rumaniatlalpan otlacatqueh. . "ca nikan ammoyetstikate, piltsitsiné; amokxitsin sehsepoatin ma ok tamechtotlalwilikan, ma ok tonyatiwian. xikiskalti aw in siwa san no yuh kisenkawa. kimonakia in kwali wipili, in kwali kweitl in kwali kaktli aw in xochitl in yetl in xochikoskatl in ikpakxochitl; nima ye ik walewa, pilawanon kisako tlapekwaka; iskali matlakpowaltikan kisako umotlaliko tetskoko, unkan unpowalti. vitsilopuchtli yaketl ako in ai in ohvihvihvia. anen nikkwik toskemitl ken ya noka o ya tonak aw iwan ye matlakpowalxiwitl ipan nawpowalxiwi ipan makwilxiwitl in ipan omotenew se tekpatl xiwitl, 1324 años, in motlahtokatlali in tlahtowani wewe akamapichtli tlahtowani kulwakan. magdalena. inekwtli mopia inekwtli itek se báril weyi de kwawitl para chichiya i nekwtli. i kali xiwitl, 1181. vi kali xiwitl, 1329. aw in hin: ma kwele timaliwi ma xokon timalo in tlaihiyowilistli, ka ye tokonmatis ye tokonixkawis ye tokonsenmatis in netolinilistli iii kali xiwitl, 845 años. ama omik. san yewan chantlaka inomekes kwalkan yawe kwentla inimekes okinmiktike. sente tlachikero ika inekwa, sente xiwkwike, sente kwakwahke ¡yehuan on okinkitske mikistli ipan otli! in tlahtoani wel kwali ipan iteki otlahto. ik ye konitowa “totecuiouané, ka timexika, ka tewanti timexika i xaltoka taxiwake, otiualcholoque”. aw axkan sábado ik 1 mani metstli agosto de 1609 años, ipan sant pedro de ad vinkula ilwitsin, in otsonkisako ipleito in yewatsin padre frei augustín del spíritu sankto in itechkopa inik motlasenmachiltis ika itlakentsin in ihabitotsin totlasotatsin señor sant antón abbad; okimotlachikawililike okimomelawkaittilike in yewantsitsin kwitlaxkowapan obispo don alonso de la muta i eskobar iwan provisor melchior markes, yewantsitsin okixitinike in pleito nikan mexiko arsobispado in ixkich ik okixnamikke, in itoliniloka omochiw in omotenewtsino padre frei augustín del spíritu sankto, ye melawak in axkan ye iteopixkatsin in totlasotatsin sant antón abbad. tehwatsin monawak aw iwan in oiw onkan motlaliko kulwakan mexika in ipan omotenew 2 akatl xiwitl, ikwak onkan kinpewato in xochmilka, san mochintin kinnakastlaske in inmalwa mexika. para mah seliya, kistehke kitlachiltinemi. "bueno, na nimechmahmakas nochi pareho", v akatl xiwitl, 1523 años. chikome tekpa xiwitl ipa ik nekeketsalok tosak ikwak wiloaya sola. kučaradas wa píldoras nechmaka kada 4 horas nikoniya onkan yonechinyektaroke. otlanakili in ekatsin, okito “cuix amo temawti in ikwalantsin in tlakatl teoutl markés, ka ye kimopilwia in tlatowani kwawtemoktsin iwan ometin tlatoke?; ipampa otitotlatito. xochitl iwan kilitl milchiwah ika pakilistli akalpapano kemen tenochtitlan sa ye netlapalolo in tehpilwan, in akoliwake, an antepane ka. itlanahnamik: inin xiwpan okitlalike teopixkakoyotl in itoka richelieu yuhkin inik se wei tlahtokateixiptlatsin in ompa galitlalpan. tlakatl in, senwelitini katka. 114r iiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1496. inin testigo otlatlanilok kwix kimati in ipan tlali mili in ompa tlalistakapan akike intlal kitowa testigo ka yewatl tlale mile in lorenso tikokyawakatl in nikmati in inemak napowal wiyak inik patlawak senpowali maitl tonatiw ikalakiyampa itstok. "ah, nokniwa kwalankeya waktiyahki. nikan sayoh onkak tekosej. mochiwa tepehxitampa, kampa tahtakwechauyan. antlanamakaskiah se kichipawa komo kaltsintan, konamo amo mochipautani, moskaltia maski xiujtaj. ken ni piltatatsi nimanehnentiyahki. kwali tihretiraroske de eskwela porke sampara tlamiktia wan tlamiktia kada ratitos kachi kwali ma kisa de no eskwela yakmo yas porke lakahmo kwanto delito kipia. 69. ¿can nel tinechommotlaxilis? ¿can nel tinechommokawilis? ¿in at yuhki, in at ahyuhki in nimokwaw, in nimoselow? ¿cuix ik nikan tommokwetlaxos, tommososotlawtsinos, anka san yuhki in nimoknopil, in nimomahsewal? aw intla ok semilwitl, omilwitl nechonnemiti in tloke in nawake, in ipalnemowani, dios, ¿azo ye newatl in teixko, in teikpak in nimitsnemitis? ¿auh aso newatl in petlatl, in ikpali, in nikxopewas? ¿azo onikis in nixkwakwalachpiltontli, in ahteixko, in ahteikpak nitlachia? ¿mazo tikihtowa nenmacho in tlaltikpak? ka ahmo neli in nenmacho. aw in tetek itoka totomitl, ka konteka; aw in tewktlato itoka wewetepos san cholo. ximoyolixmati iwan ximoyolek kwepa, imanon kwali mopan yas. no iwan ye yuh senpowalonnawi xiwitl onkan kate in astlan mexiko in wewetke chichimeka. aw in ikontlamantli inik amo isiwka kimomakilike in inwelitsin tlatoke inik walas nikan, ka yehika ipampa no ikwak mania yaoyotl in ipan in xiwitl in ompa granada; inik san kilwike "ma ok tlami ma ok tsonkisa in yaoyotl granada, aw niman mitos mottas in monetekipachol, yehika ipampa oksenka poliwi in tomin". wan monamaka. iii tekpatl xiwitl, 1196. in nixopankechol, o iwi in in omochiw ontlamantli tlamawisoli nikan ipan tlaxilakali ye omotenew xuloko akatla iteopankalnawaktsinko notlasottatsin san antonio abbad mexiko in ipewayan in omotenew metstli mayo; aw in ipampa nikan oniktlali onikikwilo newatl don domingo de san antón muñón kwawtlewanitsin, ipampa ka wel nixpan in iyontlamanixti omochiw, wel onikittak. nemis tlen 104 tlanawatihkayotl. intechpowi kiixmatiseh in tribunales tlen sentlanawatiloyan: i. tlen nochi kwalantli tlen altepeyotl noso tlakokoli kwalantli tlen panos ipampa mochiwa iwan motekiwiya tlanawatilmeh tlen sentlanawatiloyan noso tlahtolsenkawali tlen sentlanawatiloyan tlen kichiwas kaltlanawatiloyan. keman nopa kwalantli san kintlatlakawis tlen san tlacameh, welis noihki quiixmatiseh, kitlapehpenis tlen ixnesi, in tlasenkawanih iwan tribunales tlen axweyi tlahtlakolmeh tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh iwan iyolo weyi altepetl. in tlatsakwiltilmeh tlen iyohyok welis momanawiseh iixpan wekapa tlen tlaxitlahketl itlanawatihka tlen kiixmati tlahtoli ipehuayah; i-b tlen tlahtolmeh motlahtlachilia iwan moixpantis ipampa amo kikwalitas sentlaxolewali tlen tribunales tlatelwilitekichiwali tlen moihtowa ipan tlatlapantli xxix-h tlen 73 tlanawatikayotl iwan tlatlapantli iv, tlakotontli e) tlen 122 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili, san tleweli tlamantli tlen kiixnextiseh tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh. in tlaixtlachilmeh, tlen kiixmatiseh tribunales kolegiados tlen sirkwito, kitlepanitas in tekichiwalismeh tlen kichiwas tlanawatilmeh tlen 103 iwan 107 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili kiixtlalis iwikpa motlatlachilis nelxitlawak tlapalewili, iwan ikwapya tlaxolewali tlen kisenkawaseh tribunales kolegiados tlen sirkwito amo mochiwas tlatelwili noso seyok tleweli tlamantli; ii. tlen sekinok tlahtol ixnamikilistli tlen itechpowi weyiatl; iii. tlen sekinok tlahtol ixnamikilistli kampa mokalakihtos sentlanawatiloyan; iv. tlen sekinok tlahtol ixnamikilistli iwan tlachiwalismeh tlen moihtowa ipan 105 tlanawatikayotl, tlen yewan san kiixmatis suprema korte tlen hustisia tlen totlalnantsin; v. tlen moyolitis ipan se tlaltlanawatili iwan se noso sekinok nechka chanchihuanih, iwan vi. tlen sekinok tlahtoli tlen intechpowi tlatskitokeh ipan kwerpo diplomátiko iwan konsular. in okontlalike nesawalkoiosi i kitlaokulike kalketsato i mexika. iii tochtli xiwitl, 1170. in kwikapikki nechyolkokoa, aweltimitsmakas. aw inin atonaltsin in kimosiwawti san ikkaw in siwapili itoka xilomiyawtsin, ichpochtsin in mapiwatsin. ipan matlaktli onse kali xiwitl (1581), motlakatilitsinoa tlachko, ompa tlalwikapan, in itawkayo tlahkwilo in itoka don hwan rwis de alarkón. aw in wewetke no kineltilike in tlatoli kitoke ka wel neli ikal itlal in okinamakak aw in tewantin hustisia tikpie in iw otikake in ik senka toyolo opachiw tikintlachikawilia in ika in nepakanonotsalis in imotlamanixtin tiktlalia tokarda te venda kipies in omotlakowi. aw in axkan itlamian in ik 30 mani metstli noviembre de 1607 años, ipan ilwitsin sant andrés apóstol, ikwak okipewaltito in aotlih ye motataka in ye motlapowa in ye motlakowilteki tepetl in motenewa sitlaltepetl; in onkan no pew wewetokan inik motatakak motlapo, inik ompa kisatiw atl in nikan no tlaapacho mexiko. no ihkwak tlakat i nekwametsin tlalmanalko. mah no onka aso, noso, awnoso nokoya ye, noyol kimati, kiwinti ye noyol, noyol kimati ii tochtli xiwitl, 1182. nikanka in oktli, notabtsitsiwan, ¿ltla okse anmonequitiah? nikan nimaktia taltikpaktsin nehin semilas. inin wei tlalmatinin iwan wei amatini, inik mitowa motenewa kosmógrapho, ka mochintin kinmachtiaya in atlan nemia in marineros. iwan okomentin dukes in intech mokawaya, amono kinekke; yehika ipampa in iw kittaya in san motolinikatsintli, ik atle ipan kittake. maske totlahtlanewihke tikanke ntlali tlase' nečpayo' kowiyani in difunto kwak ipan semana santa. onkan tlakat in migwel de san mateo tikomekatltewktli, inin konmonamikti itoka maría ichpochtsin in christóval tlalpitsatsin wei tiyakaw katka xochipilan tlalmanalko tlaltekawakan chane. non kinye kalaki onkan kampa kisalohtiw a e i o u. kan ka ye ichan, oselokakawewetl komontok, in tetsilakakwikatl, onkawantok ye onkan. se kilo xitomatl aw yewan tlanelttilike in ixpantsinko in tlatowani sorida inik naxka aw yeintin katka i notestikowan aw onse mik in axka aw in okaten sa ommentin in imixpa mochiw aw nikan motlatokatlali kwawtemoktsin tlakatewtli xokoyotl ipan matlaktli akatl. iiii akatl xiwitl, 963 años. axkan itoka treinta mexikano non sempwali wan matlaktli treinta sentabos naxkan i toka asta kampa maxiltis in sinkwenta sentabos. ikwak tlahtokatia in omotenew visurrei nikan tenochtitlan in ikwak ik no apachiowaka mexika, onpowalxiwtika onchiwknawitika in axkan in ono nikwel iw mochiwako inik ye no otlaapachiwiko. aw inik niman ye ontlaiwa in tlahtoke in kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli iwan in atonaltsin chichimekatewktli, || 130v ik niman yahke in intitlanwan in tlahtoke; mochintin in intitlanwan in intewkyowan moyaochichiwtiwi tlawitoltika mitika matsopetstika, intlawitol yeta iwan imikon inik, niman intech asito. mah amo kimatoka se askat, ma ik timitstokwalaniliti, ma xitechmomakili i motlasopiltsi in epkowatsi in kwakwawtsi, ka motlalpantsinko in otitotlalico”. aw in tekwanipan tlaka atle okitlanke kwawtlatli, ka san ixtlauktli in okitla in kwisintli. aw ik niman ya walewa ye walolini in wewetke chichimeka asteka in chikome kalpoltin, ye omito tlakpak, ontsonxiwitl ipan matlakpowalxiwitl ipan matlaktli onnawi xiwitl inik katka onka anepantla aitik in ipan wei altepetl siudad in itokayokan astlan; yehika in onkan ikak in wei askwawitl inik yewatl ipampa motenewa astlan. ahwiahxiumeh aw no iwan in ipan in omotenew hwebes sankto in sanktiago tlatilolko in wei semaltepetlayawalolistli ik mochiw, no onkan ahsiko in iglesia mayor iwan san fransisko kisato, inik mokwepke, ka no ixkich kiyawaloke in ixkich omotenew tlakpak ik tlayawaloke in itetsinko powi niño hesús perdido iwan rosario mopia tlatilolko. wan in lá miek kachi nekwatl nekwtia wa in lá miek kachi nekwtli chichiya. axkan sábado ik 10 mani metstli setiembre de 1611 años, ihkwak pieli omochiw in ilwitsin ik okis señor san nikulás de tolentino sant augustín teopixki patrón omochiwtsino in nikan ipan siudad mexiko in ipampa tlalolinalistli omochiw chikawak in omotenew tlakpak ipan metstli agosto mochiw, in onkan kimochiwili se tlamawisoli san nikulás in ipan se señora motlapachoka. iewayo no pahti in kwowit, mah se kimana wan ika mah se mokampaka komo se tanokwilti. ikwakon yotikatka libre titekitiske. aw iwan miekpa in kinpewaskia, awel kinchiwaya, senka tlapaltike katka in mexika. aw in tlale katkan intoka tototl aw amo nikmati in aso tlakasekayowa in axka mixnamiki aw oksen in moteilwiyayan in kiwaltotokak tlatowani kilwi xikiwalwika motestigowan aw in pablo makwex oneske in itestigowan yuh kimonawatilin in mixnamikia in omik siwatsintli. mochalia inin xiwpan senka tenyo netotilistli motenewa "imatezcauh in kanawtin" in kiyokoxka kwikapikki in itoka piotr i. tchaikovski. se kali xiwitl atle mochiw. wan asikiw yekwikak in itlatlaolton kwal mamatiwik in bwíito yekwal mamatiwik ini tlatlaolton n para nitekuwan yekimomehsewiske. mexikano". yei axoxtlantli, tsitsikitsin nopa masewalme kinkwiliah ken ne sintlaoyali omepwali wan maltlaktli inin tlayawalolistli senka miek in tetlapopolwilistli indulgensias onkan itech kiknopilwia in akike onkan intlanekilistika tlayawalowa in kimowikilia niño hesús. noteawi amo ixtlawapa onyelowak tlakamo in weyaltepetl. tewa kwali otik ixmat inin tlakatl. imohwanti inkwalanih noponi niitstok". iwikpah kwikani nikotsapot inik se tlakatl itoka fransiso lasaro inik ome pedro de la ratore ini momextin intlaxilakatian kowatlan inik ei itoka gaspar xwares ichan kotolko inik nawi itoka fransisko martin kwitlawaktonko ichan. aw inik chiwase makwili itoka martin alo[n]so, aw inik itoka fransisko hwan imomextin intlaxilakaltian sakatla, aw inik chikwase tlakatl itoka matheo sanches tomatla ichan, aw inik chikwei. itoka gaspar xwares in san pablo kontsinko oka yewatlin ini mitsnokakiltilia. michtamali ika nohpali yewa amowel omotekipacho ¡pan inin tekitl. 1 tochtli xiwitl, 1610. wia! ni chalmekatl, ni chalrnekatl nesavalkaktla nesavalkaktla olia kwatonala olia veya veya makxoyaw in okon anilike in iyolo niman ye ik kiwalmimilowa in mamalti san iyo in inakayo kiwalmimilowa kiwalasa kiwaltetekwichoa. tlatsintli wal wetsi itokayokan apetlak. testigo hwan damian ichan tlachkwititlan omonamikti aw in ixiwtlapowal ye
