lv siwitl omakok huramento inik otlatlakoltilok inik amo istlakatis. ahso i pampa in notahtsin ammo momachitiaya ken ika tetechmoneki momatis in tlapowalistli ahso ipampa ye nitlapalewiaya ika tipanoske san niman omolkawili in noneiskalilis ayokwik ida omihto itechkopa nien newatl ammo kemman onikilnamik ikwik axayakatsin, méxiko tlatowani san titotlanewia yekintsin sayoh se ihkak. "ye choca' kayamo inemak. chalikan yeniaw nunisiaw sači' tomá nosewi. domingo a 23 de febrero, ikwak iglesia mayor mosenkixtitsinoke in teopixke in iskikan moyetstikate nikan inik mexiko ipampa iw mokak mito owala ipañotsin itamachiwka in imikkakimiliwkayotsin totekwiyo dios in motenewa sávanas ompa wala in roma. ye sematlmania momasewal aiyo pipilti totekuwa aiyewaya, okawalok koliwaka; ika tolinke ye timexika chokistli ewaya. x tekpatl xiwitl, 1424. san niman omaniliaya mekapali iwan hacha. omikiliaya itakatl para ome tonali, newtli noihki ome tonali, atsintli ika moposonilis ikafentsin ompa kwautla. noka moxexelwiaya kwawitl onkwan on metekechilis horno onkwan kisas tekoli. iman yometekelik omokawtsinoaya se yowali iwan semilwitl. onkwan on mohtilis tla otikwik noso osew horno. ipampa iki on kimati kichiwas horno; tlikwi iwan sewi; iwan tla osewia notatsin omomektlikechiliaya. ipan inin ahkopechtli onka tliltik iwan chichiltik tlapalatl. nikan ipan in i motlahtokatlali in itoka wekontewktli atlawtekatltewktli mochiw in tenanko. amo kwali inik mikke intenkompa in askaposalko maxtlanto, no ikwak mik in tewtlewakantsi, iwan ikwak mik in tlatilulko tlakateotsi in tlatilulko, teutli tlasuli ik mikke. taltikpaktsin, nika itstoskí amo monamaka kwesalan. xochiyowa itech mayo. aw in ompa achtopa in kittato in tliltekatsin in yaopol in tepantikpak moketstikaya, ik axkan motokayotia teotepanko. aw niman ikwak motlanawatili inik okseppa mopowas in tlali mili iwan notsaloske in wel kimati inik nemakok tlali ika huramento konmelawaske in intlatol. omohwanti ininkwalanih para sansehko iwan chili mochi petlatika kikeketsaya iwan istatl kimanaya aso on tekpantli anoso e tekpantli. iwan tomatl kikowtiwia ik sesemilwitl ik tomakowa aso sen kimili in tekwachtli. tinemiskia aw yese in wel ye tachkaw, inik wei inik tlateomania serimonia in ika arsobispo itto, inik mawistililo ka yewatl ika in palio kitlalia kinemitia, aw amo san ixkich yewatl isel in kiwalwika, ka sanno iwatl in patriarcha iwan in motenewa primato; aw ka in ixkich ik wei in palio ka ayak akin wel kimotokayotis patriarcha ahnoso primato ahnoso arsobispo intlakamo achtopa kipias in palio, amo wel ipampa ik kichichiwas in iteoyotika iteopixkatlahtokatekiw, inmanel san obispo tlateochiwali, amono wel teotekitis. xii akatl xiwitl, 1387. aw in okchikwasen omotenewke tliltike mimikke kinxexeloke, ik semixtlaw kintlapahtilike inik mochintin insepanyan xexeloloskia, oksekitin inik tlatsontekililoke mochintin in san otokoke, ye omihto; aw ye omotenew, sa chikwasen tlakatl in mimikke kinxexeloke kinpiloto in ipan omotenew iski ohtli wewei walkalaki mexiko. in ikchikome ichpochwan kwawsesekwitsin in itoka amo momati, inin konmonamikti in tlakochkenkatltewktli kwahelotsin. wan kema motlaniitak wan kikwachachak ye ipan in i ye mononotsa, ye iw kaxtoli ipan ei xiwitl onkan tlahtokati in chalchiwtepek chalko in atentlipan in toteositewktli in tekwachkawtli, in mochtin in chalka akxoteka ye kitowa "aquique in in nikan totlan kate in chichimeka, in iw nemi, || 53v in kinyakana in intlahtokawan in atonaltsin chichimekatewktli iwan in tliltekatsin chichimekayaotekiwa?". aw onkan momikilike in xikko in tlakatl witsnekawal tekwachkawtli in inewan isiwaw in itoka akxomokwil; aw amo momati kex- || 48v -quich kawitike keskipowalxiwtihke inik onkan katka xikko in witsnekawal in inewan isiwaw akxomokwil siwapili. nikan kateh in calxexeloltepoztzacu a 1 t i n, notahtsitsíwan. se kwalii yowali iwan ixkichkamostla. kwalanyotl, kokolotl, ma so ilkawi, ma so pupuliwi, yekkan tlaltikpak. patlaani weka, waan wumpa toponi. oanemikeh amo, armando. . . amo nikmati tlen nikchiwas, onolwi mostla san nikochis iwan amo kana nias. aw inik tlayawalolok, wel motlayakanilitia in hesús piltsintli krus kimokechpanilwitia; aw amo iwan onkan mokixti amo iwan onkan motlayawalwi in totlasonantsin rosario, yehika kitenwike in españoles in kimopialia rosario onkan teopan sankto domingo kofrades, amo kinekke inik no kinwelitiltiske tlatilolka. ma xontlachia mihkan,yahkin tehkonewa, ik tikneltilia tiktlalia in totoka yoan tofirmas fecho en mexiko a 9 dias del mes de hebrero 1578 años gabriel de la krus algwasil mayor pedro geronimo regidor diego leonardo eskrivano. mah amo tonalmiki. nikinkakwa nochkakan. tlen neka postehtli. in no xiwit. tlatlanilok imixnamiki gaspar karilo español in inamik iwan marina iwan fransisko kwix mayewatl tlaleke kaleke kito ka hamo ka san kitlanewtike in tlaxilakaleke in kalmaxalolkatl iwan xalakatl iwan xiloxochkatl. iwan senka chikawak oyehekak, omilwitl in owets seppayawitl; in ipan domingo owalatwik ye- || 269 -quene nowiyan in iksen chalko oseppayaw in intech tetepe, sa tel kexkich in onwets ayokmo senka chikawak, yese san ye iwi senka chikawak in oyehekak. axkana tsalantiya. xochintlaltikpak, ontiyanemi. aso san mokokoneyo miknopilo timaitia? ma aonkan tinen. akasomo titenamik ma awel tikchiw; vii tekpatl xiwitl, 1200. itlanahnamik: kwaltia makwili tochtli xiwitl ikwak yake ikpatepeka. ikwak ipan in kalakke sant sebastián domingo possesión makoke teopixke karmenistas ipan 19 de enero; inik mokalakike tlayawalolistika, onkan oneowak in || 18v sankto domingo. ticpiazquiah. san sampa kinimak. in tak totonik. kaxtoli chilpitsawak yuh konihtotiwe in wewetke inik amo semikak tichokatinemiske, inik amo titlaokulmikiske in timaseoalti, yehoatl techmomakili in totekuyo, in wetskistli, in kochistli aw ye in tonakayotl in tochikaoaka, in tooapaoaka aw yekene ie yehoatl in tlaltikpakayotl, inik nepixolo. pero nsowatl pos kimatia okipix in ikonew den mono. wahka kena kiilwihkeya iniikni in ye iwki in okisenkawke ewilotl in ikwak ye chokililos oyaomik ok semilwitl in ka in iewilo ikalpulko semilwiti in ka semilwitl in ewatika; nikan niktaliti, ika expa kipanolti ipa metlatl para ipan ohtli ononexti ompoali inwan mahtlaktli sentavo. amalinalpan chikwexiwtike in mexicah. tloke nawake iteokwikatl mah weiya, in itepewal: tekwawkoskak, oksetepek, toxiko, ekatepek, tsilan, mantlantsinko, masaoankan, ekantlapechko, matlapachko, oksentepetl, tlatlaukiikxik, san onka tilmantlan, yexochitla, ateskawakan. mochichi tlakwahkwani. tle okitake iwan okseki okinonotske tlen ipampa omokokoke iwan okseki omopepetotske. ika ín aihmo se tonali tla okichiwke okalakia teopan iwan omotlankwaketsaya omoteochiwaya. o xa nexikol kokolis kipiya. in weyi kali. in semanapa tekisewilistli ticpiazqueh. "xinechchiuilis se favor. amewan in amotemowa, xiwalwia, amechnosa teutl capitán”. "avia axalako tekpan teutl q.n. axala in teupan teutl. iwan i nohwan ipan nawtsontli omeppoali xiwitl (matlactli omome tekpatl xiwitl), omomikilitsino mawistlahkwilokatsintli in itoka domingo fransisko de san antón muñon chimalpahin kwawtlewanitsin. . aw in omotlali awitsotsin niman ye ik ki tlamahmaka in ixkich mali omochiw, in ketsalpatsaktli, ketsalpanitl, sakwampanitl, xiutotoewatl, tsinitskan ewatl, machonkotl, xiwchimali, teokwitlayakapapalotl, teokwitlanakastepostli, in ixpan kontekilike. ix tekpatl xiwitl, 1332 años. amo nineki nimikis nineki nikitas yankwik tonati iwan yankwik tlanextli. . ma iwian xon motewikilitiw, ma tetech xokon itstiw in iw wilowa in iw otlatoko; kikištilia' nitohmio por intohmio sasan kiwiwilana' kan itohmiow. taltikpaktsin de mi alma, topale yuhkimma omotlanankilili notextsin yese kenin yeh ne tinechmotlahdania newatl ammitla nikmati xikmonochili mokonetsin ma achto yewatsin techmomachiltili ineikoltilistsin ma wel yewatsin mihtilwi tlen monekiltia mochiwilis ka ye ka aye inekawilis i tlamantli, ... ipampa inik kichanewalis iwan mikiske yewantin christianostin ka tlapan ... in on wei nawintin tlali. pero nochi motewiah chiktehmeh no kimoyawah in iteyo wan yehwa ixwa. .nitlanavatia in tlalokan tlamakaski nitlanavatia ayao ayao ayao ayao. ayao ayao ayao ayao tlalokan tlamakaski viii.- diego sanches tepixke ik tlanankilia konitwa ka wel nixpan nomochiw inik omonanawatitia in ilamatsin maria xoko yuh konitotia ka nel sa nosel ka ye nonomikilis inin kali monamakas in ipatiw mochiwas misa ik topan mitos newatl maria xoko ihoan i no i nopilo [sic] maria anan ihoan nomikkamon migwel oselotl teixtin misa ik topan mitos. aw in axkan ipan ik 29 mani metstli hunio, ipan ilwitsin sant pedro iwan sant pablo apostolosme, ikwak mokixti ipan se tsilini in kitlalkawi wei altepetl siudad mexiko tenochtitlan in yewatsin tlahtowani visurrei don hwan de mendosa i luna markés de montesklaros, ompa mowikak perú. . ixkich in in ik mochichiwaya in imixkoya intlatki in puchteka in ostomeka in teoknenenke. yawaltik kitlali nopa nakatl para ma ayok otitlanamakak aw okseppa onkan kinnots in diablo witsilopochtli, kimilwi in asteka "xiquimonanacann on in wei komitl itsintlan wewetstoke, ka yewantin i akachto tekitiske". nima ye ik ikawaka i muchinti mesika; kimonololwiko, nima ye i kitoa “mexicaé, ka nel onimik? amoka niaw xaltoka, masawaka axka makwili anpopoliwiske. in chikonkiawitl i xikomoyawal ye mopilwatia, ye kichioa teskapoktsi, newan akolnawakatsi. tekayewatsin aw in otlatwik niman kimitalwi “ma tiwian, ma tikiwalapaloti in tetewktin akalan tlaca”. aw niman ye kintlamaka. aw in on tlakwake aokmo kakawatl in kinmakaya san atuli tlatempitsawak puchtekayo kaxik in ik kinmakaya tisatika tlakwilolo. porke tlanitlasohtlaskia aw sanno ikwak in ipan in omotenew metstli oktubre de 1607 años, ikwak owala tlahtoli in ompa españa omachistiko nikan mexiko, ye se xiwitl sanno yewatl ipan in omotenew metstli oktubre de 1606 años, in ipan omomikili in yewatsin tlahtokapili don diego lwis de motewksoma iwitltemoktsin, in ipiltsin tlakatl don pedro de motewksoma tlakawepantsin; ye omito yuh machistiko, ye se xiwitl in omomikili. in kwaltia para tapalol: se ayowachtsin, in kwowit. aw iwan ye matlakxiwitl ipan nawxiwitl in ipan xii akatl xiwitl, 1595 años, in omowikak || 102 perú in tlatl in ikome itoka don lwis de velasko visurrei, in tlahtokat tenochtitlan makwilxiwitl ipan matlaktetl metstli; aw san niman ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl in owalmowikak in omaxitiko mexiko in tlakatl don gaspar de súniga i asevedo konde de monterrei visurrei. x kali xiwitl, 1229. nokalehkapo kipia sente kakali. axan onamechmolwili inon kwento onamechomolwili nikihtak inon tiempo porke nehwa nihpiya ochenta. aw in ikwak okimokakilti in tlakatl tlatowani hwes governador niman motlanawatili in ikatsinko su magestad intech kimokawili in pipiltin inawkampaixti san pablo san sebastian santa maria tlaka iwan san hwan tlaka. in piltontli itoka adolfo. keinopa kichihke. in ipan axkan viernes in ipan ilwitsin totekwiyo dios motenewa || 9 trasfigurasión, ik 6 mani metstli agosto, ikwak kimotlaliliko in sakramento in onkan sant hwan baptista de la penitensia, ik senka kimoknelili in ialtepetsin totekwiyo dios, ik kimomawisotili kimotenyotili in moyotekayotl. aw in ikoppa mochiwin tlalolinalistli teotlak, ik niman tlaokoltsilin nowian in kampanas in motenewa tsilin blekarias in iskikan monasterios mexiko, inik ye mochi nowian tehteopan wel nowian tlaokoltlatsilinilok in ipampa tlalolinalistli, unkan achto pew in iglesia mayor tsilin kampanas; aw in ipampa yniqu iw nowian tlaokoltlatsilinilok in mexiko, ik senka tlaokox motekipacho in kikak tlahtowani arsobispo visurrei, ka noso wel paktikatka || 157 intla in tlahtoke in kwakwawtlatlachia. aw ye sentsonxiwitl ipan kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan chiwknawpowalxiwitl ipan matlaktlomome xiwitl axkan in achto ik pew tlahtokayotl in nikan kulwakan. in nikan ipan altepetl siudad mexiko a treinta dias del mes de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años axkan ik sempowali onchikome tonatiw inik otsatsiwa kali in tekpoyotl okitenew in chikwepowali onmatktli pesos in ipatiw ye mochiwa aw in ikwak otekakitilok okseppa onkan owala in lwis savalos okito niktlalia niktema chiwknapowali pesos yuh okito ixpan testigo tekpoyotl iwan fransisko flores. xochiyowa itech abril. nikan ipan in in omomikiliko in awitsotsin; aw sa niman ikwak motlahtokatlali i motewksomatsin xokoyotl. tik kawtewaskeh in kiltsin xochiyowa marso. . aw in ihkwak kampa ittoya in mexika in nawalostomeka niman miktiloya, tetsawmachoya aw san teokisaya. mihtoa in ihkwak oasike mexikah in tlalwakton in tlein ikpak wei ateskatl onkatka, akatlan okittakoh se kwawtli in akin tenochpan ikaya iwan kikwaya in koatl. in tlaxipewali in masatl, ik kitlapaloko in axaya. nikan ipan in i momikiliko melawak in itskowatsin tlahtowani tenochtitlan, in tlahtokat matlaktli onnawi xiwitl; in ipiltsin inin in akamapichtli. maría madre trinidad. inik 4 tlamantli nikitowa oniknokowika wapalkweskomatl nikmakak 3 pesos inin nikitowa monamakas in ipatiw mochiwas ik ninotokas in tla oninomikili. aw inin omotenew don rodrigo de vivero ka poliwka weyapan inik walwia nikan mexiko; yuh machistiko in axkan ye se xiwitl ipan de 1609 años inik ye chialoya aw ayak kisako, satepan yuh mihto aso poliwiko in akali, aso tlapaniko kana weyapan, anose oipan polakiko in ika tlatkitl, in iw mochiwani kenmanian. in nikan ipan wei altepetl mexiko a veinte i siete dias del mes de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años i yewatl diego astaxochitl ompa otsatsito in ipan tlaxilakali sant sebastian tsakwalko okitenew inik kinamaka ikal marianan español in kikowa kitema chikonpowali onmatlaktli pesos aw oksepa onkan otlanankili okito niktema niktlaia chikepowali pesos yuh okito testigo fransisko daniel. ipan chikome tekpatl xiwitl tlamatini in itoka alexander graham bel kiyokoya "huehcatepoztlahtolcaconi" noso "huehca teposkakistli". aw iwan ye onpowalxiwitl ipan makwilxiwitl in ipan vii tekpatl xiwitl, 1564 años, in omomikili tlakatl wewe don lwis de velasko visurrei; ikwak tsin- || 98 -tic in tlakalakili nikan mexiko. axkan lunes in ik 22 mani metstli oktubre de 1612 años, ihkwak nikan mexiko ahsiko kalakiko in el lisensiado don hwan fernándes de velasko i horosko alkalde de korte mexiko, umpa wala españa; inin yuh omihto kriyoyo, nikan yahka mexiko inik okikwito itekiw omochiw. aw iwan ye matlakpowalxiwitl ipan nawpowalxiwitl ipan nawxiwitl in ipan 2 kali xiwitl, 1325 años, in omotlaliko nikan atlihtik tenochtitlan in mexika; matlaktli omomentin in asiko, ye omito in ikse yewatl walkwawtlahtotia walteyakan in itoka tenoch; in ikome itoka kwawtliyolki, inin no walte- || 84 -yacan; in ikei itoka tsonpantsin; in iknawi itoka awexotl; in ikmakwili itoka iswaktlaxkitl; in ikchikwasen itoka okomekatsin; in ikchikome itoka chikopachmani; in ikchikwei itoka ahatsin; in ikchiwknawi itoka tensakatetl; in ikmatlaktli itoka akasitli; in ikmatlaktlose itoka kopil teomama; in ikmatlaktlomome itoka xiwkake teomama. inwaxkawan. ipan nawtsontli ommakwilpoali ommatlaktli omei xiwitl (matlactli omei kali xiwitl), mochiwa ultraiektikpak, ompa batavian, itetokaihkwilolis nenonotsali, in ika tlami kaxtiltlahtokakontetokilisyaoyotl. kampa teh tiyetok, itlakayotipa kisaj. se xonakatl senka kipopowtinenka inik chichichimeka, in tlein kichiwaya kimilwiaya in atempaneka, san kalakia in atlan inik ontlaminia. in kwikaamatl, in tlapisali. aw in inka oksentlamantli in kimatika in noyolo, iwan oksentlamantli onechmolwilitiake in dios okinmowikili wewetke, ka wel onikpix intik in noyolo in intlatol; aw kimitalwitiwi ka in ikwak oasiko in owalake in chikwetlamantin in ye onimechtenewili masewaltin ka nikan okimittake inpan oasiko okontlamantin masewaltin i nikan okatka. in ipan axkan martes a xxiiii de oktubre de 1595 años, ikwak mowikak in tlahtowani visurrei don lwis de velasko, yei hora tsilini in mokixti in kimotlalkawili altepetl mexiko inik mowikak perú, in otlahtokatiko makwilxiwitl ipan matlaktetl metstli. aw no iwan in ihkwak in ye oiw nepa matlakpowalxiwitl ipan chiwknawxiwitl ompa walkiske in inchan astlan chikomostok in mexika asteka teokulwake. . aw in ik kikwilowa in oli ik kiso koyolomitl. niman ye ik kontlekwinaltia tlatlatinemi in ik tlahkwilowa. 14. in yuh tikihtosin, ¿acazocmo tatlamati, aso ye sentlamantli ipan omitsmixewili in totekwiyo, in yuhki yewantin yakachtopa inka otiweskak in inka otimotopew? ipa mochiwa saj, amo akah kitoka. ixwa iteyo, no teyowa. amo moneki se kitamewi, ixwa maski xiutampa. ixkich sanipa se kiahsi. xochiyowa keman yeski, ihwak chikawaya ya, amo se tiempo saj. in trigo iwan sebada motekipanowah tlalitstiayan aw ik kikaw onkan in don christóval kolón in kapitán itoka diego de arana, itlan kinkaw senpowali onkaxtoli ipan ei in españoles inik kikakiske onkan tlatoli iwan in tlein motlatitok in ipan tlali; aw inik yewatl niman mokwep in iwan oksekintin ikniwan españoles, iwan matlaktin in masewaltin kinwikak, iwan seki in tlein mochiwa in ipan onkan tlali, iwan in inexilo kostik teokwitlatl in kastila, inik ompa onasik ipan viernes in ikkaxtolilwitl mani metstli marso. ma niknokóskati senxumali istatl ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. an ki neli ye kimati in ipalnemoa no yuh kichikwako teuktlon timaloa ye san ketsalmakistlamatilotika konawiltia iselteotl. aw iw mitowaya intla wel ok mokweptsinowani in ompa españa ka ikamalerotsin mochiwtsinoskia in toweisiwatlahtokaw reina doña margarida austria in inamiktsin in axkan moyetstika toweitlahtokaw don felipe tersero. kixipehki itsonteko wan pehki kiyehyekti kwaltia inik 3 tlamantli nikitohoa nechpielia nomachioh ana pose wei patlahoak ypatiuh3 pesos aoh in tla okixtlaoh misa ik nopa mitos. ihoan nikitohoa nechichtekili nokwe itoka sakovo yankik korcha aoh kimokwitiya in sakovo kitohoa nawitsine nikixtlahoas ixpa alonso hernandes. . aw wel kinahmiktikatka in ye ixkich ye mochi tiankisko monamaka in yuh patiowas. wan na no nimitstemilis ika tlahko xiwitl ya nesi para kena nesis se aw kitlalia in totoka in eskrivano in tehoantin talkaldes aw nopanpan in teteuktin augusti galego regidor hwan aoachtekatl pochtlan yoan sekintin siwatsitsintin ines tekwichpuch maria tekwichon ana tiakapan migwel damian alkalde moisen tospololkatl alkalde augustin galego regidor angelina martina tlalkowki martin hakobita eskribano. ¿tlen otikwalwikak ihtik po tepetsintli tepeyakak, ik ikxitlán kistika ohtli tonnatiw ikalakiyampa, in onkan yeppa kisani quihtoh: intla san nikmelauha ohtli, manen nechwalmottitis in siwapili, ka yeppa nechmotsikalwis inik nikwikkilis tlaneskayotl in teopixkatlahtoani, in iw onechmonahnahuatilih. ma ok techkauha tonetekipachol, ma ok niknonochilitiwetsi in teopixki, motolinia in totlahtsin ahmo san kimochiyalitok. amo nikinixmati noteixwan nian no teawan ipampa nemih ipan okse weyi tlalnantli. ome litro atl chilxoxowik oso chilpitsa kwaltia mochi kimotekitiaya in wewei hustisia tekitl, in amoyak okse teopixki yuhki nikan okichiwako in iskintin ye kiwalpia kiwalmokwitlawia kapila san joseph. yewa kipia miak tomin inik weyiatlananeo yas. .mach o ya moteka piltsintekutli yoa ichan yoa ichan. piltsintlé, piltsintlé tosivitika timopotonia tlachko timotlali in moilkarwas nochi tlen amo tepakti, miak tlakah awelkichiwa. iswatl ¿ipan tlen xiwitl otlakatiwak? aw in pedro lwis ka san tlawelilok ka amo kitowa in motolinia ilamatsin ihoan in no kimonamiktis siwatsintli atle ma itla intlatol onkan kitus kemania aw in pedro lwis in tla nemis in achitun tlamankistika onkan kimotlalilis tepantsintli ipanpa ka kimotlachkwitlaxili aw in kali monamakas misa ik topan mitos in ipantiw mochiwas in tla onimomikili teixtin ik misa mitos. no kwaltia pahti. ahmo yoki yopew tlamimihktian piltontli xwan del oso ompa. okipix. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. tiotlak kampa tlamito ihkí noha nopa kiski in x akatl xiwitl. aw in ihkwak ipan in omotenew vi tochtli xiwitl, 1238 años, ka ye iw nepa nawxiwitl tlahtokati in ikome itoka chalchiwtlatonak in ikmatlaktlomei tlahtowani kulwakan. san kwahnextli pachantok isisna. aw niman yake in titlatin tlatilulka; aw in omaxitike akalan niman kintlapaloke i tetewktin, akalan tlaka kimonnonotske in iw omotlanawatilia kwawtemok. otitlasohtlayah in ipan siudad de mexiko a onse dias del mes de henero de mil e kinientos i noventa i tres años in yewatsin don antonio valeriano hwes gobernador ixpantsinko walmowikak in yewatsin senka mawistililoni totlasotatsin hwan de sandoval de la kompañia in kimokwitlawitsinowa kolegio de san gregorio. gaspar de pablo merino ik tlanankilia konitwa ka wel tixpan omochiw inik omonawatitia in ilamatsin katka maria xoko in iw konitutia ka nel san nosel ka ye nonomikilis inin kali ka wel tonetolinilis san tumextin i nonamik katka tiktokechilike ka nel ayak ma se tlakatl noxwihoan in tla se onka ka nikmakatiaskia. tlen pilfsiltsi piltsiltsi kikwih para kichiwah ponche, ixiuyo kwaltia se kichiwa in yerbitas, yeh no pahti wan teuintij. aw umpa españa iwan ipantsinko kistikisas in toweitlahtokatsin rei don felipe tersero kimottilis iwan tlamatkayelistli pas kimomakilis, ipampa in intlahtokaw tlahtokati emperadorti hapón inik kinextia ikniwyotl tlamatkayelistli, semihkak kiwalalia in iwikpatsinko omotenewtsino rei moyetstika españa inik aik moyaochiwaske san mochipa motlasotlaske, inik wel nikan mexiko puchtekatikiwi tlanamakakiwi habún tlaka. itla yankwik nochipa okachi ipatin iwan amo ¡non tlen ika yotequitqueh. axkan mitoa panutla in amo kwaltia para pahti, sólo se kikwa. tlen 3 tlanawatihkayotl. nochi tlakameh intechpowi kiseliseh tlamachtilistli. in kaltlanawatiloyan –sentlanahuatiloyan, tlaltlanawatiloyan, weyi altepetl tlanawatiloyan iwan altepetl tlanahuatiloyan– temaktilis konetlamachtilistli, ipewayah tlamachtilistli iwan telpokameh tlamachtilistli. in konetlamachtilistli, ipewayah tlamachtilistli iwan telpokameh tlamachtilistli, mosennechikoa ipan itlapech tlamachtilistli tlen nochipa motechnekilia. in tlamachtilistli tlen temaktilis kaltlanawatiloyan tlapalewis manochi moyekchiwa intlakayo tlakameh iwan siwameh iwan kinyolmatis makitlasohtlaka totlalnantsin iwan mamopialikah semanawak ikniyotl, ipan sennemilistli iwan sentlapalewilistli. i. ken tlasenmaktilia 24 tlanawatikayotl kampa moihtoa momakixtis teotlaneltokilis, inin tlamachtilistli axkanah ipan motlalis teotlahtoli, ipampa inon axkanah mokalakis teotlaneltokilistli. ii. tlayeyekoli tlen kiyekanas inon tlamachtilistli ipan motetonis yankwik ixtlamatilistli, kikotonas axkwali tlahlamikilistli, san molwi tlapalewikayotl, axkwali tlaneltokilistli iwan axkwali tlaixyeyekoli. iwan no ihki a) mochiwas sentika tlanawatiloyan, tlen kiihtosneki tlanawatiloyan amo san tlanawatil pamitl iwan san tlanawatil tlahtoli, yewa melawak ipan motlalis tlachixkayotl tlen ika mosen palewiseh ipan tominkayotl, tlasentilistli iwan altepeko tlaiyokalistli; b) elis nochi anawak ipampa –amo akah mokwalanchiwas iwan moiyoka quixtis– kiasikamatis nochi tlen tech kwesoa, tlen kenihki titekiwiseh topialis, kenihki tihmanawiseh tomakixtilis tlahtoli, tomakixtilis tomiyotl iwan kenihki tihmanawiseh iwan timiakiliseh toiyokalis, iwan k) tlapalewis matimosenhuicacah, tlen ika welis moyolchikawas momachtiani, tlen ika tlatlepanitas, iwan tetlakaitas iwan kitlasohtlas ichanewah iwan nochi altepechanehke, noihki ipan motlalis kiyeyekos inelwayo ikniyotl iwan nochi tlen intechpowi tlacameh, welis kikotonas tlapalewilis tlen san sekin tlacameh, teotlaneltokilis, tlanechikol tlacameh, tlen siwayotl, noso san inseltlacameh. iii. iwikpa melawak mochiwas tlen moihtowa ipan ome tlahtolpamitl iwan ipan ome tlatlapantli, tlahtoani tlen sentlanawatiloyan, kisennextis weyi pamitl iwan tekipamitl tlamachtilistli tlen konetlamachtilistli, ipewayah tlamachtilistli iwan telpochkameh tlamachtilistli iwan kaltlamachtiloyan tlen nochi totlalnantsin. ika inon, tlahtoani tlen sentlanawatiloyan, kintlakakilis tlen kiihtoseh tekiwakemeh tlen tlaltlanawatiloyan iwan weyi altepetl tlanawatiloyan, iwan no ihki tlen kihtoseh altepechanekeh tlen tlapalewitohkeh ipan tlamachtilistli, ken kiihtos tlahtoltlanawatili. iv. nochi tlamachtilistli tlen temaktilis kaltlanawatiloyan amo tlainamaloh. v. ipiwiyah tlen temaktilis ipan konetlamachtilistli, ipewayah tlamachtilistli iwan telpokameh tlamachtilistli, ken moihtowa ipan achtoh tlahtolpamitl tlakwiloli, in kaltlanawatiloyan kiolinis iwan kipalewis nochi sekinok tlamantli iwan tlachiwali tlamachtilistli –ipan motlalis ipewayah tlamachtilistli iwan wehkapan tlamachtilistli – tlen moneki ika moyolchikawas totlalnantsin, kipalewis yankwik tlatetemoani tlamatilistli iwan tekichiwali tlamatilistli, iwan kiyolchikawas iwan kiixnextis toiyokalis. vi. in tlapianih welis temaktiliseh nochi tlamantli tlamachtilistli. ken moihtos ipan tlahtoltlanawatili, in kaltlanawatiloyan tlatemaktilis iwan kitilanas ipatiloyan amatl tlen tlamachtilsitli mochiwas ipan tlamachtiloyan tlen tlapianih. tlen itechpowi konetlamachtilistli, ipewayah tlamachtilistli, konetelpoch tlamachtilistli iwan kaltlamachtiloyan, tlen tlapianih monequiliseh: a) tlatemaktiliseh in tlamachtikayotl ken kiihtowa ohtli iwan tlayeyekoli ixnesi ipan ome tlakwilolpamitl iwan ome tlatlapantli tlahtoli, iwan noihki amo kwaltia para pahti. tlen 32 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlanawatili kiyektlalis tlapechpowili tlachiwali tlen tlanawatil mexikayotl kinmaktilia mexihko ewanih tlen kipiah seyok tlakatililis iwan kiixtlalis xitlawak tlahtoli tlen ika amo mochiwas kwalantli ipampa ome tlakatililis. in tekichiwali tlen tlanawatilmeh tlen moixnewis, ipampa ikinoh itlanawatil inin amatlanawatili, monekis elis mexihko ewani itlakatilis, kinmaktiliseh tlen ahkia kipiaseh inin amatl iwan amo kikwiseh seyok tlakatilistli. inin tlahtoltsakwali nohkia motekiwis tlen tlehtleya tlen ihkinoh kiixnextiseh sekinok tlanawatilmeh tlen sentika weyi tlahtokan. keman san tlaeltos, amo akah tlen kiawak ewa welis tekipanos ipan yaotekayotl, noihki amo welis tekipanos ipan tlamokwitlawiani iwan temachpan nemilispan. iwikpa welis tekipanos ipan yaotekayotl keman san tlaeltos iwan ipan tlamotlayotl noso ehekapan chikawalistli nochipa tonati, noso kichiwas tletleya tlanawatili noso tekipanoli ipan yewan, moneki elis mexihko ewani tlakatililis. nochi inin tlamantli monekis mopialiseh tlen tlacatecameh, tlen patlanih, teachcameh, tepostopehuanih, teposchiwanih iwan, nochi sentika, iwikpa tlakameh tlen kioliniah weyi akali noso tepostototl tlen ika momanawia mexika pantli noso machiotl tlanamakatiloyan tlen mexikayotl. noihki monekis iwikpa tlen kichiwaseh tlanawatili tlen tlakatekatl akalpan iwan nochi tekiyotl tlen kampa patlanih tepostotomeh. in mexihko ewanih achi kwali kinseliseh iwan amo tlen kiawak ewanih tlen sehka innemilis, iwikpa nochi tlamantli tlatekiwili iwan nochi tekichiwali, tlanawatili noso tekipanoli tlen tlanawatiloyan kampa amo moneki altepechantli. pamitl tlen iii tlen kiawak ewanih 2 tekpatl xiwitl, 1312. aw no ikwak ipan in omotenew xiwitl ompa wilowak in weimolan || 93 akalan; ikwak poliwke pewaloto, ikwak yektlaliloto in weimolan tlaka. ome axoxtlantli ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. pexontok in toemolkon, iiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1496. in xiwit saj. axkan domingo ik v mani metstli de oktubre de 1603 años, ikwak mowikak in tlahtowani visurrei don gaspar de súniga asevedo konde tetskoko motlalito, onkan kimochiyeli in yankwik tlahtowani visurrei don hwan de mendosa i luna markés, onkan motatsinoke in tetskoko. aw in ikwak oyuh kimasikakakiltike in iewatsin hwes governador iwan iewantsitsin alkaldes ordinarios niman ye iwka ompa omowikake in ompa mani kali okimotilito aw in ikwak in onmaxitike niman okinmonochilike in tlaxilakaleke iwan in onkan chaneke okinmolwilike tlaxiwalwia totawane ken kimati in amoyolo ken ankimati in ipampa in kali. aw in tlatilolka atle onkan kichiwke, ipampa in inchan no ochichiwke in tlamelawa tepeyakak kitekipanoke, iwan in ixkich altepewa i nepa chaneke. se kiahsi nikawín xaltepek oso nikawín paratani. yoyolxaxaltik mochipa motelpochkawa intla mokwitlapilteki noso moxotequ okse mowapautia viii tekpatl xiwitl, 1448. 2 kali xiwitl, 1585. pero san tonili axakaki. newatl ni don diego de san fransiso gobernador mexiko itenkopatsinko in por su magestad noeva españa y[u]an alkaldes nispan owala i migwel aweyeni kimonamakilia in itatsin in ikal katka in ipatiw mochiwa xxxvii pesos. . ompa konketsa kikakaxtlahxilotia ompa popwliwia in inakayo. no iwan ye iw nepa senpowalonmatlaktli ipan ome xiwitl ye motlahtokatilia in tlahtowani atonaltsin chichimekatewktli in intlahtokaw amakemeke itstlakosawke. in mochiwa saj, amo teyowa, in ait keniuj, tak kiewaltia sah in tal wan ixwa. || 75r nikan ipan in omikiko in itoka kwawtlix i tlahtowani kolwakan, in tlahtokat chikwexiwitl; aw sa niman ipan in i xiwitl motlahtokatlali in yowalatonak telpochtli in kolwakan tlahtowani. kemahkatsin, erikson tikpia. in tonatiw iwan in metstli. tikwake i tsonpankwawitl in tekixkisakatl i xatetl, i kwetspali, kimichi, teutlakili, okwili. axan tehwan nohki techtlalwi ka orne pantoton in edmundo. in kwowit. aw iwan ye onpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolomei xiwitl in ipan vii akatl xiwitl, 1551 años, in owala in oasiko mexiko in wewe don lwis de velasko visurrei. aw iwan ipan in in omotenew metstli henero, ikwak okikaw in aotlih kittatakaya español ileskas in onkan amanalko; ikokkan tlatatakaya, atle wel kichiw. itlanahnamik: aw san ye no ipan in in omotenew semilwitl miérkoles iwan in ipan omotenew inik owalyowak, ihkwak omomikili in hwan grande español nawatlahtowaya itlantsinko tlahtowani visurrei; senka owewetitia iwan miek xiwitl onawatlahto in intloktsinko oksekintsitsin tetewktin tlahtoke visurreyesme in iskintin ye walmowika nikan ipan nweva españa walmotlahtokatilia. motlalilia' kandeleros nwebos motlalilia' pupuch kumitl mupupuchwia ayekawi onkan yepewa' kompadritos ya titlakwaske. ipa mochiwa saj, miak mochiwa. ipa se taman saj. ye senpowalxiwitl ipan chikonxiwitl kate in amakemeke iwan tenanka || 131v i walake in tekwanipan tlaka. aw in axkan ikyeilwitl in ipan miérkoles sankto, senka yekene mokomonike momawtike in ipan ik walyowak in españoles, senka tlayowak mixtika iwan kiyaw. amo weyia; wehkapantík kemeh durasno. chiwknawi tochtli xiwitl amotle mochiw. aw iwan ya yepowalxiwitl ye onkaxtoli ipan nawxiwitl in ipan xii tochtli xiwitl, 1530 años, in opoliwke in opewaloto teokulwakan tlaka. mokamowi aw achto kimonkakiltitikiske in tlalmanalko tlahtoke in itoka kwateotl tlahtowani itskawakan, in ikome itoka toteositewktli || 96r tlahtowani onkan in akxotlan kalnawak; aw in amakemekan tlahtoke yewal in itoka wewe aokwantsin chichimekatewktli tlahtowan amakemekan itstlakosawkan, in ikome itoka kowasakatsin teowatewktli onkan tlatokati in teowakan amakemekan, aw in tsakwaltitlan tenanko amakemekan tlahtowani itoka kwawtlewanitsin tlailotlaktewktli, aw in atlawtlan tenanko tlahtowani itoka popokatsin atlawtekatltewktli, aw in tekwanipan amakemekan tlahtowani itoka ketsaltototsin. in sepowtok in sepoatok in kwelpachiutok in iwki ketsali in wel witoliwki in wel yaki aw in iwki chalchiuwitl in ololiwki in wel patlawak in iwki teoxiwitl in tlamatiloli in wel kwekweyoka. xi akatl xiwitl, 1451. . aw in yewatl tetatsin tenantsin san ixkoyan in kitlatlawtia in impiltsin kilwia tein inakayo kwaltsin kostik, yehwa ya se kimana. yek kostik kisa in tapaloltsin, pané piotexochit, yek ahwiak wan yek chiawak, kemeh iayo pió se kimana ya wan se kiakolwia wan se kitalilia mimientahxiwit. ye kim on kawtewas in mowanyolke ye tontlakawtewas in mochan in mokalitik in mokiskan in moyolkan in mokechtetson in momanawal in momatetson; in altepetl kampa nemih notawan semi weyi. viii akatl xiwitl, 1279 años. pipitayah aw inin omotenew siwapili doña ana sankto domingo in tokoto inakayo, in ompa toktoke inamik iwan omotenew ittatsin katka wewe don lwis de velasko. mochiwa kaltsintan, komo se kitoka. ye ik pew okichiwke okitlakatilike in tsowali, in okipantlaske in ipan in ikpak in iteokal in witsilopochtli. ¿quenin tika? se kilo xiwtoktsin tlanenelolnohpali makayak konakopaittas, ma wel nepialo iwikpa, ma nekaltsakwalo, amoyak wel nenemis in otlipan, ipampa in ihkwak amo kwali in ehekatl kistos; iwan no ixkichika ayak tlakwas ayak atlis anoso kochis, in ixkichika okseppa tlanesitiw inik nesitiw tonatiw". se kíololowa wan se kikwa kemeh kapolin wan iteyo se kiwatsa wan kwali se kikwa iwan tixtsin kinelowah kemeh tayoyos. amo mochipautani. aw no ikwak mito in ixkichtin teopixke in san fransisko, sant augustín, sankto domingo aokmo yewantin motemachtiliske i nowian altepetlipan, yewantin kalakiske in klérigos; iwan in altepetlipan tlaka tlahtoke nowian tlakwepako tlanankiliko in inpanpatsinko teopixke. makimatikan in ixkichtin kittaske inin amatl in kenin newatl marianan nikan nochan in ipan altepetl siudad mexiko notlaxilakaltia sankt ipolito teokaltitlan ika in nowelitilis in nosiyelis iwan in notlawelmachilis inik wel nichiwa in eskritura in ixkich onkan tenewtika aw amo nikkwepas in notlatol. se chilwaktsin, inin xochikwali amo akis ihtik poxahtli. iwan nikitowa mani mili tekpayokan in kalpoli kalpilko ompowali inik wiak aw inik patlawak xx powali in i nikmaka in nomon omito. . oniwala nitlamakaski ni nawaltewktli xoxowki tlalok, asta amelipeka yetok. newa yeononahnawati inka nomaikniwan. tsontsapot timitsnotlatlahtilia xonmokpawili. techilwi in atokotsin wel xikittakan in kwaxochtli yuh nikmati yepowali onchikome xiwitl in nemakok tlali itenkopatsinko tlatowani don pablo xochikentsin ompa walpewa techichilko onpa tlami tonatiw ikalakiyampa onpa ikak teokali sant pablo. aw in oyuh konmokakiltike señores alkaldes senka ik opachiw in iyolotsin aw in omotlakowi niman okipow in itomines senpowali onchikwasen pesos aw niman imatika okonkwik in otlanamakak imixpan in tlaxilakaleke in tlakpak omotokatenewke iwan no nixpan i newatl eskribano hoan de san fransisko. ye on ya niwala, ye on ninoketsa, kwika nonpiktiwis, kwika nonkixtiwis, antokniwan. aw inik senka omomawti omotekipacho in tlahtowani visurrei don hwan de mendosa i luna markés de montesklaros. in xiwit monamaka. 101. ka yuhki in tinepapan xochikwawitl timuchiwtikak; titsopelixtikak, tawiyaxtikak. immottetsinko tlachichina in nepapan totome, in witsitsiltsin, in sakwan, in kechol, in tsinitskan, in ketsaltototl. immomaktsinko mosewalwiya, mekalwiya. iwan ka momaktsinko mani in chalchiwxikali in onkanka in toxpalatl, immatlalatl, in ipan temi in akatl awachyo inik tepan tiktsetselowa. inik titealtia, inik titepapaka; iwan momaktsinko onok in tomawak xelwastli, in patlawak tsikwawastli inik titeyektia, inik titepepepetla. iwan ka momak onok in kolotl, in tsitsikastli, in sesek atl, in pitsawak tlakotl, in tiktekwakwaltia, inik titlakaskaltia, titlakawapawa. iwan momaktsinko onok in tsineakatl, in teoxali, in ketsalotlatl inik titlachiki, inik titlakanawa, inik titlapetlawa. kwaltia ye unpa mononotsato inik yaokalakiskia mestitla, unpa walmokwepato tola. . niman yewatl kiteki in itech powi se kowatl ohtli melawak. in ik kiteki san no ye in tlanawtsontektli in ik kihkwilowa amatl oltika kikowaihkwilowa kitlalia in itsontekon iwan ixtelolo, kikamatia, kinenelpitia, kikwechtia. aw in onaxiwak niman ye motlalia yqu isiwka teatolmako pinoli in iwak. ika chikwase tonal kitlachilito ya ixwahka okseki makwil taman: tekosej, pesohxokoyolin, kwitaxkolxokoyolin, eskinadohxokoyolin, noktaxokoyolin. pierre beaukage, in koyotsin wehkakayot tein tewantik in mochiuj in amaix, no kineki kinintasohkamatilis in tokniwan tein yetokeh itech prade a.k., tein kipalewihkeh mah moahsi iniwan tein tekitih itech in taler de tradisión oral. tehwatsin toxochitsin, amosasan ximotomintlahkalti inik amo timoiknotis. kwaltia mah wetsiki itech toplantitas, achto kemeh amo onkaya mas xochit, yehwa kiaketsayaj. in ikwak okimokakitike tlatoke senka okimopakkaselilike aw in motlatlakowia niman ikwak kompow in tomines sa ixkich senpowal onmatlaktli pesos in iasika ipatiw kali ik mosentlalia napowali pesos imatika konkwike in alvaseasme. nikan kilpilike in ixiw in wewetke in chichimeka mexika ikchikontetl. nixpan newatl fransisko xwares eskribano. mochi inin tlanawatili onikixkopin itech se yewekaw amasoli kename ka mochi ka in ifirmatsin in tlatoani don antonio valeriano iwan in iaxka in eskribano fransisko xwares axkan ipan in tonali 21 agosto de 1855 in newatl ni lisensiado faustino chimalpopoka galisia [rúbrica] kwitlawak nochan. chilmeh wan tomameh también al mismo punto nasió una estrela en las partes de oriente, ke signifikava aver nasido la estrela de hakob profetisada por balaán, para ke los reyes magos por la vista de la una se moviessen a buskar la otra ke estava enkubierta en el portal de belén, para ke a los hudíos i a los gentiles, a los pastores i a los reyes, a los pobres i a los rikos, a los ke estavan serka i a los ke || [10v] estavan lexos, fwesse manifestado el ke nasió para todos. in mochiwa kampa eski, ne xaltipampa semi sa ñipa in ihkak. aw in kwanmimili honpa wala in chimalwakan aw in ikwak oyuh mokets kali niman otechilwi in madalena tlaxikmoka[f. 8r.]quitican inin in kin onikkets kali ka itech nikpowa in hwan. monamaka ne kwesalan. mahtlaktli katarina chili walewake omotlaliko in sitlaltepeke, e onka kinamiki mitika chimaltika itokan tlawiskalpontonki; konan kimiktia in tlawiskalpontonki, kikwawsoke in isonteko, ki ewanti ik tlatokayontike i mexika inik sonpako ini kimake sopantli. xi tochtli xiwitl, 1334. tlen 8 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlanawatianih iwan altepeko tekitinih kitlepanitaseh tlen itechpowi tetlatlanilistli, tla yewa mochiwas ika tlahkwiloli, san yamanik tlahtoli iwan ika tlatlepanitalistli; ipan tlahtol chiwaloh san welis kitekiwiseh inon tlatechpowilistli altepechanehkeh tlen totlalnantsin. nochi tlen se motlatlanilis moneki moselis se amatl tlen tlanawatiani ipan yowi tlahtoli, iwan yewa itlanekilis kimatiltis amo wekawas tlakatsin motlatlaniani. xa itech aweyil, kwaltia in ipan siudad mexiko a veinte i uno dias del mes de marso de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años axkan ichikwaseppa inik tsatsiwa kali in ikal mariana omito omotenew in iski ipatiw itenyo makwilpowali pesos aw in ikwak otekakitilok ayak tlanankili testigo frai antonio peres iwan tekpoyotl. amo niknamakas ipampa in notechmoneki. nitlehkos wahkapa. ye kin ipan in owapachiwiko in tiankistli sankt ipólito, aokmo onkan otiamikoya. ka nel ye tiwiko kastilan. amanteka toyaovan xi nech on sentlaliski ikalipan yawtiva xi nech on sentlaliski in nikan ipan wei altepetl siudad de mexiko a veinte i tres dias del mes de noviembre de mil e kinientos e ochenta i nweve años in yewatsin tlatowani don antonio valeriano governador hwes hustisia kimopiyalia in itechkopatsinko su magestad. istatl, ixkich in monekis nikan ipan in inik onkan walewake in tultitlan i nonowalka in teotlixka tlakochkalka; aw san ya yewatl ipan in in omotenew se tochtli xiwitl inik onkan motekako chapultepek, yewatl kinwalyakan in tlahtoltsin teomama, kimama teskatlipoka. nikan ipan in i ye walamati i ye waleko in tepetikpak in tlakatl atonaltsin chichimekatewktli iwan || 43v in tlakatl tliltekatsin chichimekayaotekiwa iwan xochitsin kowayaotekiwa iwan mapiwatsin iwan in mochintin totolimpaneka chichimeka; onkan kitlatike tonali chiwknawi osomatli, chiwknawi ehkatl, se tekpatl. man yewa ye. kwaltia yalwa se kilo pasilachili in poyoxnakatl mowikxitia ika ome litro atl ika xonakatl, axox iwan istatl ixkich in monekis. in itsmikilitl motlakwihkwilia iwan kwali mopaka; ihtik in komitl ika ome tekontontli atl mosiyawa in chilakachtextli; ipan okse tepuskaxitl motlalia in pitsochiyawisotl iwan ihkwak ye senka totonki motlalia in chilakachtextli iwan molinia san teki. motlalilia in poyoxistayutl, in ye owiksik, iwan molinia san tlamach inik ahmo motelolohchiwas, motlalilia in itsmikilitl iwan tlatsakkan in poyoxnakatl, motlapachoa, ma kwali wiksi. aw i newatl algwasil mayor inik onikimaxkati i nikan nomotokayotike onikkekets estaka nawkan inik machiyotika in intlal. xikwalewalotih au in isiwawa moch no kipinawike kimawake, kimilwike tenochka “ca e amonoke, amo apinawa? aik siwatl amotla no moxauhtoca”. in biologa susana krus, tein kiyekana in programa de siensia ambientales de in universidad iberoamerikana (puebla) kininahsih miakeh xiujtokaymej. in biólogo herminio garsía váskes, akin kayot santiago yankwiktlalpan, techpalewih ika inintokaiwan nanakamej. yankwixtok no tiktemohkeh inintokaiwan in tatokmeh itech internet, sayoh ika amo tikahsikeh nochi, kemeh ixnesi itech in amaix nopa sintli tlen chipawak, kostik, yawik. san niwalayokoya, niknotlamati. se tekpatl xiwpan omotlalikoh koatitlan in mexitin. aw inik tsonkis ipan in ilwitsin sant lukas sanno iw tlayawalolok eilwitl: viernes, sábado, domingo. aw yewatsin tlatowani governador in iw okonmokakilti in itechpa tlali mili in iw tekpantiwits in sensentlakatl ixkich itech powki senka ikiyolotsin opachiw ik niman omotlanawatili in ikatsinko hustisia in yewatl migwel de los angeles iwan in inamik iwan ipilwan kinmomakilia in tlali mili. se kwali tonali, alfredo. wel miak nopakilis mochiwa, yewehkatika iwan kimach axkan timitsita. kwatesonowayan niasneki. mach achto nikonisneki tepitsin kafen. ¿amo nowan tiasneki? onieya. in tlalpan, ninososowa, aw sanno ikwak maxitiko in visorrei don lurenso xwáres de mendosa konde de koruña, inin anotle enkomienda kipiaya; in mokalakiko mexiko ipan metstli ik 4 mani oktubre martes ipan ilwitsin sant fransisko. ihwak oksi ya se kikixtia mah sewi, se kiteka itech se platitoh wan mah se kikwa ya ika taxkal. inik chikwetlamantli nikitowa in newatl ni hwana mosel in ixkich kalitik onok in nosiwatlatki san moch[i] intech powki yes in nopilwan ayak tle kikwilis aw wel yewatl itech nikkawtiw in nokonew in hoseph lopes yewatl kintlamachis. newa onikwa in manzanah. kwak yopilinke keski tonali kitataka' tlakoyoktoton. yewatl in kiwalkwatiake, in imitak walmochiwtia; amo tonakayotl, san yewatl i nakatsintli in imitak walmochiwtia. mochiwa saj. eyi pedaso elki nopa postehtli. aw i mesika matlakxiwitl omome i sa senkatka tenochtitla, ikomei ik walmoxeloke, se kali xiwitl inik omotlaliko tlatilulko xaliyakak. nikan tokatenewtoke in iskintin ichpochtsitsinwan tlakatl kwawsesekwitsin tlamaokatltewktli teokwitlapane. kwaltia onkatel mahtlaktli iwan orne metstli iwan mokwitia enero, febrero, marso abril, mayo, hunio, hulio, agosto, septiembre, oktubre, noviembri iwan disiembre. ome ke yeyi tlaka okitemoto xoletl, inon tsitsikitsin. iwan okseki omotlalike kikwikilia tlali tlen itech owalaya in xoletl. oksente tlakatl okitlalik tsitsintli; okse okipapak xoktli tlen ika posoniaya atlaposon ika tlayixke. inin xoktli ikan weyi iwan miake xoleme onyeya okixnenewilike kename itik on xoktli nochi xoletl kwali wisis iwan konewis onkwan tlakwaske nochtin. okipake in xoletl san niman iwan ye kwakwalaka atl okitetepehke itik xokti xoletl. onkwan on isihkan wisis. ye yiman konmati tla yowisik, ye yiman on ye kwali mokwas. okitlalilike chilchotl, xonakatl iwan yepasotli. onkwan on awiyak kisas tlakwali. aw aokmo wel iw omochiw, aokak omokwep in masewali, sa iw omokawke in onkan oikwaniloke; aw sa kana in omokwepke in kampa inyeyampa masewaltin. se akatl in xiwpan oasikoh don femando kortés inwan iyaokiskawan inwan inkapayowan. akalpan kiwalwikayah noiwan immatlekikis iwan okseki intlekikis. kan kwawitl nehwa ompa ni trabaxo ihta nitlamamatinemi. xinechmochili tetepitsin, niman niwalas. ye yiman tika in nochtin piltsitsintin okipiaya tlen yeske ixpan tlamachtilkali kemen chikome wan tlako tlamachotiloni yewatsinko, ikwak otsilinia in tepostli. ye yiman on piltsitsintin otsikwinia nochtin kasiske in lugar. welik ika kwakwounakachilposon. kwaltia komo se kaisi se kwowitsin achi selistok ihwak se kikowa mah se kitoka wan selia. domingo a xiiii de marso de 1599 años iketetl semana kwaresma, ikwak mochiwaskia horamento inik tlatennamikoskia in ipampa omotlahtokatlalitsino in tlahtowani don philipe tersero telpochtli rei españa iwan nikan nweva españa; aw ayamo wel mochiw, san iw xitinowak. in pitsonakatl mowikxitia ika se litro atl, motlalilia istatl. axox iwan xonakatl; ihkwak in nakatl ye owiksik, ayokmo tleko yes. in waxchili mokixtilia ikwitlaxkol, mototonia komalko iwan satepan mosiyawa; in xonakatl iwan axox moihseki iwan motesi ika in okseki tlanahnamiktli iwan in waxchili; inin motsoyonia ika yei xumali pitsochiyawisotl; ma kwakwalaka kwali ixkichkaw in ye tetsawak. tlasohtlaskia amo mochipautani. no se se kichihchiwa komaltamal, oso se kimanelowa iwan chil wan axox. in nanakatsin no kikowah yon koyomej. kihtowah kwali se kikwa tapalol, pero iksá tehwan tikpixouaj. nin mochin nehwel namosepan trabaxo mokniw kitohwa nehwa kachi niombre ke ombre niaw nitlakawas. iwan mitoa ok on mixewisneki kixkich kawitl in ik teixko on we wets —quitoz nequi— senka ye macho in ik ye wekawa ichan in ik aok kampa yaw. ihwak tsikitsin momeutani wan ihwak weyia sayoh mah se kikixtili in kwamekat. istatl, ixkich in monekis ¿quenin ya in monechikol?kwali, tlasohkamati. in omextin hin sesentetl intepew mochiw, in umpa ontlamasewtinenka nawyowal (mitoa yin axkan tetepe tsakwali itsakwal tonatiw, iwan itsakwal metstli), aw in ontsonkis nawyowal in tlamasewalis, niman kitlatlasato, kimamayawito in imakxoyaw iwan ye muchi ipan otlamasewke. in hin mochiw ye in neewalko, ikwak in yewalyowa tlakotiske, teotiske. tewa kani iksis xochiyowa de marso hasta mayo. nochpochtsin e, noxokoyow è, siwapile, ma ximopahpakiltili, iken otimixtonnaltih? ¿cuix tikmowelmachitia in motlasohnakayotsin, notewkyo i nopiltsintsin e? niktekipachos in mixtsin in moiblohtsin; ma ximomachiltitsino ka welanawtok se. momaseuhaltsin, notion, wei kokoyalistli in itech omotlalih, ka ye ik kah momikilis. aw ok nonisiwtiw, in mochantsinko mexikko, nokonnohnochilis semeh in itlasowan totewkyo in toteopixkawan, konmoyolkwitilitiw iwan konmosenkauhilitiw, ka nel ye inik otitlakatkeh in tikchiyakoh in tomikistekiw. aw intla onokonneltilito, ka niman nikan okseppa niwalnokwepas, inik nonyas nokonitkis in mihiibtsin in motlahtoltsin, tlakatl e, nochpochtsin e. chiwknawi akatl xiwitl ik poliwke matlatsinka. . ma kana sesemanto im momiyotsin aw in motsontsin ma kana momoyawato, in teiyokan in tokayehkan. aw nikitoa ka amo nel ilwilispan in nimitsmaka in nimitsnamakiltia in omotenew tlali ka san pakka yokoxka yoan ka ayak in maaka kitsowia kichalania in notlanamakilis aw in tla aka kenmanian kitsowis kichalanis in notlanamakilis ka newatl ninoteilwis in ixpan hustisia iwan newatl nitlapopolos in ipan pleito amo ke mopanyeske in otimotenew timotlakowiani. in asiko in ipan in omotenew in || 133v xii tekpatl xiwitl, 1296 años, ye yuh nepa ye matlakxiwitl ye tlahtokati in omotenew in oselotltewktli; inik asiko ipan tsiwtlakawki yaopol in nikan tekwanipan amakemekan, inik motlaliko. aw in akolnawakasi tlakopan omotlali, weika mekatsintli. mochiwa miak ne atepoliwikopa. amo kanpa tealtepew ipan yaske, xikintlasotlakan, ma nen ankinxikawti; ka wel namechtlakwawnawatia. in amimitl ikwik yuh mitoa in vel ichichimekakwik amo vel kakisti in tlein kitos in tonavatlatol ipan in nohpali senka moteteki, mokwakwalatsa ika istatl iwan xonakatl; ihkwak ye tlawikxitili moixawia, ma ixika; moitsoltilia xonakatl, xitomatl iwan silantro in ye tlachipawtli. in chilpitsawak no moitsoltilia iwan ihtik in komitl motlalia mochi in tlanahnamiktli; tlatsahkan ye motlalia in olipahchyawisotl; ihkwak ye tetlamakos motlamawichihchiwa ika chichiwalayotlatetsawtli, oregano iwan xitomatlaixtlapantli. kwakwapisawak in tlantokat xxxvii xiwitl. inik kinwalmotitlanilili in ibulatsin in ipampa inik kimochikoxelwia inik kimilochchikotlaxilia, in san inenomawilistlanekilitsintika in iw itech onka in ipan bula, in intech kimopowili in melawak in tlatokayotl in ipan in mochi in ixkich in okinextike iwan in ok ompa titstiwi in kinextiske, aw inik amo tleyqu inpan yaske in tlahtoke reyes in portugal, || 110v inik no kinextia ye keski xiwitl in ipan tlali in tonatiw ikisayanpa, aw inik amo tle onyes in pleitos in nechalanitinemilistli inik amo mochalaniske kenmanian intla monekis in intlan in innepantla in tlahtoke in kastila iwan portugal in ipampa in tepewalistli; aw kimomelawili in san ya yewatl ipan bula inik kimoxelwi semanawatl inik seseyaka sese yewantin tlahtoke in intech powki yes in kipewaske. aw san imikampa in onmomikili tisosikatsin, in tlahtokat tenochtitlan chikwasen xiwitl; aw ye akalko wi in chalko tlahtoke in kiwalmatke omomikili in tlahtowani tisosikatsin. tsitsikitsitsin nekah cuacuameh. seki kitokah wan seki ixwa sah iteyo. aw san akame san keskintin in obisposme onkate i kitlalia in kinemiltia san teiknelilistika in palio, in iw yewatl umpa obispo in itokayokan luka ipan tlali italia, iwan yewatl in obispo pavía ipan tlali lonbardía, aw in ipan tlali alemania yewatl in obispo itokayokan banberga, iwan in yewatl obispo umpa itokayokan ostiense intla wel yewatsin sankto padre imatikatsinko kimoteochiwilia, aw in fransia yewatl in obispo itokayokan edwense; aw amo wel kitlaliske in yewantin in obisposme inmanel yewantin arsobisposme in palio, intlakamo san wel onkan inteteopan in intlatlapacholpan. ye nonnokwiltonowa . ka nel ik omawissotoka in puchtekayotl in ostomekayotl in ik ayak otlawelilokanenka senka onemalwilok wel omopix in tlahtul pwechteka wewetke. kanihke san tionitstó kema kalakito kitlapoto nopa amo xkinmapetskolti. tekwani konilwia “ca unika in kopil; iska in itsonteko, xiktoka in tlatzinco”. aw akmo nechonmotlatolanilike in ok nen senkamatsintli ik nitlanankiliyaya aokmo kimokakiltike aw ka nikitowa ka nonetlawtil ka none [tachado: tlawtil] mak in mili in tlali aw inik nimakok huramentotika tlaneltilike in onpa tlaka ik ixkich kawitl san kawtika in ayak kichiwa ka hawelitis in nikkawas. in iw omotenew yuh chiwililoke informasión, kil ipan hwebes sankto in ihkwak tlayawalolo innewitekian in españoles kinmiktiskia, in iw kihtoke testigostin; ipampa inik senka tlamawtike ipan omotenew semana sankta inik amo kampa wel tlayawalolok. 8. iwan wel xitenotsa, wel xitetlatlawti, xiteixtili, xiteimakasi, xitetlakamati, xitetlasotla yehika ye tinemis, ye tihkas, ma yewatl yowi, ixopech tiktoka in ye onka, in ye onnemi in iwintitinemi, in xokomiktinemi, in imak chicha, immomatlemamali, in ikechtlan tlakwiya, in imak tlakwiya, in wel motsinilpia immokestlatsinia, immakopilowa, in tokwilechowa, in tsatsi, in oyowa, in yuhki mixitl, tlapatl, in yuhki oktli, nanakatl in okik, in okikwa in aokmo kimati in tetl, in kwawitl; kikwitiwetsi. in kiyeyekalwiya, in kaakolewilia in inan, in itta; in aokmo kixkopaitta, in sa iwiepa mokwepa, mihilakatsowa, in aoemo kimakasi, in aoktle ipan kimati, in sa iliwis oyowa, in tsatsi. in aokmo ikisayan in kisa, in aokmo inemian in nemi, in aokmo itlaksayan in tlaksa. in aoemo vmpa ixe, in aokmo vmpa nakase, in aok wel ka iix, iyolo. in aok yewatl in kwikatl, in tlahtoli in kewa, in kihtowa. in aokmo itsatsian in tsatsi, in tlahtowa. chalchiwtewktli iwan kwayawintsin ikwak momikilike, chalka imomextin, aw wexotsinka in temiktike. ma xikyokoya, xichoka, xiselnamiki in toteosi teuktli, ma ya walakia in nawalapan: itsmolinin ketsalwexotl. en el nombre de dios todopoderoso, ixtlawapa amotlen owi. in iknawtetl in tlali ka yewatl in in kitowa nwevo mundo, kitosneki yankwik semanawak, yankwik tlalpan; ka ye yuhki in iw motokayotia yehika ipampa in okseki inik katki ka wel sesekni sesentlamankistikate iwan weka kintlakawilitika in oksekintin yei tlali, in san niman aik in ye wekaw tlaka katka in amo wel neltilistika iwan in amo wel melawak tlaasikamachilistika okasikamattiake inin tlali. —uan ne masewalme? saniyo in kwikatl ika on pupuliwi in amotlaokol. kampa onkak, semi miak mochiwa de tepewi, ixwa in iteyotsin. aw in ikwak in otonasike niman ye kimotepotstokilia kimopowilia in iski powali iwan niman estakas kimomamanilitiake inik posesion kimochiwilike. nikan ipan in i motlahtokatlali in osomatsin atlawtekatltewktli in tsakwaltitlan atlawtlan tenanko. inewan niman otlanankilike in tlaxilakaleke yoan albaseas okitoke tlatoanie ka ye neli ka wel yiaxka katka in omomikili niman okseppa okinmotlatlanili kinmolwili kwix ie neli in okikow [tachado: in nikan ikak] ana xwares. aw no mowikatsa in tlahtoke, in visurrei iwan oidores kimoyomawiliko inik kimotlaliliko sakramento; mochi wala inandas in nowian suhetos, iwan in teopixke nekok motekpantsinoke inik walmowikakake. aw sano ipan in in omotenew xiwitl onkan momikiliko in malatsin in ikmatlaktlomome tlahtoani kulwakan, in tlahtokat kaxtolxiwitl; aw in omomikili inin tlahtowani aokak tlahtowani okitlalike in kulwake, ik niman opewke i ye kwawtlahtowa kulwake. in kwowit. iwan inteuxikol in konakiaya inmetspan tlami, ik tenposonki potonki aw in ik tlakwiloli texotli, tlili, tlapali, tsotsontekomayo omikalo iwan in ik mokwitlalpiaya xiwtlalpili. mochiwa ouasíntaj. ntlali yokitlasalohke ye'on baya kakachiton in tocha yowex axa ahkweli tihchichiwa oksé tlenon koma. nimitstahtaniliti, aw in tlaaltiltin ahkeman on kochi se yowal in nemi. aw in otlawiskalewwak niman ye ik kintlamaka in wei teokali temiktekilistli wan seki tewatsa tein oksi ya wan itokai chilsolot : ya waki ya. ii tochtli xiwitl, 38. . aw in ihkwak kasi xiwtototl amo wel imatika kitsitskia san niman isiwka kipitiwetsi kimomotsotikisa is sakatl ik kitsitske. aw ka yuhki in in opew yaoyotl; in kimoniwake nawintin in mexika pipiltin in chalko, iska intoka in motewktitlanke in ikse itoka teskakowakatl, in ikome itoka witsnawatl, in ik-ei itoka wekamekatl, in iknawi itoka mexikatltewktli. ome axoxtlantli ix kali xiwitl, 1241. aw in o inyolo om pachiw in puchteka wewetke san ik sen konnawatia kilwia ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. kwaltia ka yuhki hin in ye kitowa maxtlaton: "aquique i notlalpa in omotlaliko in onkan ye onoke, ma walwian; ma oksepa kiwalwikakan chinamitl, ik waltekpankalakiske. se kilo xitomatl ipan in domingo ik tlami metstli marso, ikwak kipewaltike in españolesme netoleke inik tlaxitinike, mestisos, chichimeka, tliltike, seki kastilteka, yewatl in iglesia sant fransisko teokali kixitinike. mohmostla. inimekes nenekatsitsintin noso mowentikes kisaya de in xolal malakatetikpak ipan ome tonali metstli enero; iwan oasia chalma ipan nawi tonali enero. iman on mosesewiske iwan san wel teopa yeske. iwan niman mitoaya reyes, iman on omochiwaya se ilwitl mawistik ompa chalma, ika yeyi topixkatsitsintin. setsin motlatoltis ipan púrpito iwan kinmolwilis: aw i newatl antonio tlawi nikkakiltia in hustisia ik niknamaka i nokal sentetl tonatiw ikisayanpa itstikak. domingo a 7 de hulio, ikwak tlayawalolok sankto domingo wilowak; ixkixtin in teopixke tlayawaloke inik chikweteokaltin iwan tlahtoke oidoresme, ipampa inik tlayawalolok ipanpa in ipiltsin rei inik wel maxitis kastila. yeyetlatekos ikan sebada wan onkan in lá monekis mobarbekaros in tlaltikpaktli yekwalimotokas abitas o sebada okpa oksehpa motepewas para ahmo modeskansaros in tlaltikpaktli para unyas tlen tomahsewiske. amo ximomohtikan ika in itlatsahtsil in amo kwali tlakatl. in onkan ontlapia in tekayewatsin,kesewatl teuktliontlapitsa, onkwika,san ka ye ichan ye wexotsinko. in tlatokat in axayakantsi xiii xiwitl. in iswat. kimonilwia i mexika wewetke “totecuiouané tlatokehé, tekwaliwa in tenoch, aw in istachiawtototl, awexotl, tenantsi. timokawati tikon tenan. ikamohyotsin tsitsikitsin, yehwa ya inalwayo. nochi iuki sah in imai wan ixochiyo, sayoh tataman ikamohyo se taman in ikamohyo ohololtik wan tsikitsitsin wan pané pampiktok chihchichiltik, mero kemeh axox chihchiutok, kipiya sehse nakas. wan se ikamohyo kemeh rábano tein weweyak, pochiktsin ikamohyo. mochiwa kajfentaj, kwoukespan tehko. pero okachi mochiwa newín paratani. monamaka kwesalan tein parahko kiualkuij, tein nikawín mochiwa, kikwah sah nikan. amo se kimewa. semi ticochiznequih. ¡xiquizcalti! teokwikatl wel kwali kemanian tonitonizqueh. aw no ikwak ipan in in xiwitl inik onkan onewake in tenanko texokpalko i kwawitsatsin in iwan itskwawtsin, inik niman asito in onpa in ikpak in tepetl in amakeme, inik ompa monamikito in oknoomentin chichimeka tlahtoke totolinpaneka tliltekatsin chimekayaotekiwa iwan || 75v in iteikkawtsin atonaltsin chichimekatewktli. aw iwan ye iw nepa matlakpowalxiwitl ipan yepowalxiwitl poliwke in tulam tlaka, inik momoyawake kikawke in imaltepew; || 82 yewatl kichichiw in diablo in yaotl in teskatlipoka inik poliw altepetl tulam. aw ye inpan in mochiw in tlatilolko temok chimali, kikawako in mexiko, aw niman kichiwke sentetl sanno yuhki. walewake omotlaliko chapoltepek, motlalmomostike. aw in ipan in yankwik xiwitl iwan yankwik metstli henero in ipan omotlalike alkaldesme mexiko san hwan moyotlan tlaka hoseph xwáres tlekwiltsin san antón akatla chane iwan sebastián en blanko atisapan chane; aw fiskal san fransisko mochiw in don antonio valeriano telpochtli tekikaltitlan chane; aw in san pablo tlaka alkaldesme mochiwke hernando tewkxochitsin tlachkwititlan chane iwan en blanko. aw in mokawtiake 7. iwan xikmotlasotili, xikmoknelilmachiti, xikixtili, xikimakasi, xikmawkaitta, xiktlakamati, xicchihuili1'' in tlein kineki in iyolo in nantli, in tatli, ka ilwil, ka imasewal, ka inemak; ka itech powki in tlayekoltilistli, in tetlakamachilistli, in temawistililistli. ka ahmo wel ye ihkas, ahmo wel ye nemis in akin ahmo kitlakamatis, in ahmo kitlayekoltisnekis, in ahmo kimawistilisnekis in inan, in itta; in san ixeo, in san yepak nemi. ka yewatl tokayotilos iknopilawelilok. yekene ma iliwis tinen, ma iliwis tichocholotinen, ma iliwis taaktinen in teixpan, in tenawak. san iwiyan, san isemel ximonemiti, ka ye kwali, ka ye yektli. ximoknoteka, ximopechteka, xitolo, ximomalkocho. aw in ikwak nesia tlakawakaya, netenwitekoya, neisawiloya, tlatemmachoya. nikan nehin orasiones, yewantin in motlakalike in kwowit.onkak ome taman: se chichiltik wan se kostik.mochiwa newín, sakapoastan parahko. ompaka kitokaj, moneki mah semi se kinehmachpiya.nikawín amo onkak.itakilo monamaka.xochiyowa itech marso wan abril. aw in onkan omotenew tepetikpak in tonaliitlatlayan, wel ixkichka onkan walmokets, ik niman ye walamina in senka chikawak tlapaltik in tlakatl tlahtowani || 44r in atonaltsin chichimekatewktli. ini vitsilopochtli ayak novivi i(d est): ayak nechnenevilia, ayak iwki in iwki. se xuxumalton anís oktepitsinika notahtsitsiwan. nia nitlehkos ipan sente taximetro ka isiwkan nech wikas kampa ka itla nechnequih. ieh ¿campa nel nosok tiaske? ka timasewalti, tipoliwini, timikini, yeh mah ka timikikan, yeh mah ka tipoliwikan, tel ka teteu in omikke. ma motlati in amoyolotsin amonakaiotsin, ¡totecuyohuane!, in axkan achitsin ik tiktlapoa in itop in ipetlakal in tlakatl totekuyo. ka achitsin ik tontlaxeloa, nesi otlakoyaya. xa itech at, sintli tekpichtok se pamitl. san mosisini. ¿tiah tikohkoltis in piltontli? xochiyowa abril, marso pewa. in ixtlawatlakatl kipia sente kawayo. iwan nikitowa in onka ka notilma nikitowa kinamakaske in nonamik iwan nochpoch aso itla ye kimokowiske ka yewan kimati. ihkwak onkan tlahtokatia in itoka nemroth in babilonia, ihkwak onkan momoyawake in masewaltin || 66r i ya sesentlamantli ik mokaki ika intlahtol; ik semanawak moyawake in babilonia tlaka. kihto "ca atle". aistero —ne'wa ichkame nikinpia wanlahmo yehwan lisiana in lá kahsin kompania yeyaw. ¡nemi san iwiyan, san isemelia! in axkan omotenew onkan omokalaki sakramento, senka wei tlamawistililistika iwan tlayawalolistika onkan kimaniliko in wei teopan kolegio de la kompañía de hesús teatinos. wan kena tlalnamiki. inik onkan waltemok istakkwawtli, yewatl in kitokayotiaya in wewetke chichimeka totolin, moketsako ipan in tlatlawki oselotl, kikwako. in no mochipautani. amo ikaya xinechtoluka para noha aw in ipan miérkoles in iknawilwitl yewantsitsin in teopixke augustinos kimochiwililito missa sankta, yewatsin motemachtilito in teoyotika tlahtowani don frai diego de kontreras arsobispo sankto domingo la isla aihtik. in sesek manxitlasohtlakan pero nopa tetetstik atl ya wala seyahtok. ¡axkema xipanos atitla! in oyuh kittake in in chichimeka totolimpaneka, niman kihtoke "tlacaço yewatl in in kis in kikwas in toteow in ikpak in iska tepetl in otikasike || 46v in tlatlawki oselotl". ka yewatli in okimomosemaskatiltiko in omotlakowike aw in okinmamanke estakas in otlatatamachiwke algwasiles martin kano, pedro hernandes inik okomochiwiliko posesion kimoneltililia kimotlalilia in intokatsin iwan in infirmatsin. fecho e mexiko ut supra migwel de los angeles alkalde martin kano algwasil pedro hernandes algwasil. pasó ante mí fransisko maldonado eskribano. nikawín mochiwa miak komo se kitoka iteyo. in ipa se taman saj. yalwa wel melawak owi tonali omochin ipan patlanalistli nowiampa altepepacholi. in patlanalastin mérida, keh tikita, awel omokwepkeh ika verakrus iwan mexihko iwikpan amo kwali kawitl. tewan ompa monterrei otechnawatihkeh itechpa awel tipatlanaskia, tlakamo ixkichka teotla makwilpan iman. onyek se teixtlalil iwan tepitsin owi in patlanalistli. otokinpanokeh ome aehekatl. otlapetlanaya, otlattlatskweponaya iwan temohti tlatsehtseloltin. noso tewa tiemati ka nochi inon nechpaktia. tetepitsin welihki moheamiiistli kemanian se kípias amo tekohkolti. mach nikan palewilistika, pakilistika tinechpia. in kapolpotehtli tikpiaskia. kemeh mochiwa kajfentaj, ihwak kahfenmewah kiolochteximah iwan xiwit. in oumik walmotlali akolnawakasi, kosiwatlaniko tenayoka yichpoch tekwanisi, i siwatl itoka kwetlaxosi; ye mopilwatia ye kichioa in wisiliwitl tepankiski, ikome epkoasi, nima ye siwatl moxosi tlasosoniskatl, nima ye chalchiwnenesi, nima ye tiankisnenesi, xokoiotl tesosomoktli yakateteltetl ipewki. ipa se taman saj. aw in ipan in omotenew viernes sankto san okkan in kimotemowilike krustitech in ixiptlatsin totekwiyo dios iwan kimotokilike in iksekkan onkan in nikan san hoseph san fransisko, san kalitik in mochiw, aw in ikokkan umpan sanktiago tlitilulko kimotokilike, sanno kalihtik in mochiw; iwan inik nowiyan altepetlipan akan tlayawalolok, san nekomonilok inik nowiyan yaotlapialok. xikwalkwikan nikan itech nehin pedro wan ne pablo. talmaniktsin, istatl. ixkich in monekis sa yuhke inik ompa kinwikak umpa atenkisato in ipan wei tlahtokaaltepetl habón, inik ompa san tlamatka yokoxka kiwalnamikke in habón tlaka, mottake inewan in tlahtowani emperador habón. notata iwan newa tontekiti chikweyiman. itech in arrosito, kwanto momolokatok in aros ompa se kipantalilia sikierah se kwoutsin tomilo wan sikierah ome kwoutsin orégano. timicontoyewalwite'wa' por intitotia lahmo tlenkwa taikiwe. i mexika in siwatlanito nawinti nawinti sik itoka mixkowatl yaotekiwa, in ikome kalaomitl, ikei itoka poyaw, iknawi tekoiyantsi. wewemexihkah kimawistiayah in tonakayotekutli axolotl vii tochtli xiwitl, 1070. nikan ipam inin xiwitli omochiw komgrekasiom otechololoke otiyake thewakam newa{tl} d[on] baltesan de san hwan iwan noeltiw d[o]na gos{ti}na de la krus de san hwan iwan alkalte diego her[nande]s iwan mochintin masewaltin otemoke teh{ua}cam mochi imakti san christowal iwan san hwan ahmo siawitiw nepik ohtli kampa siawi ohtli akmo tlaxikoa in yulitl porke ahmo yektlakwa. in ikwak oiw onkis in ineskalilistsin totekwiyo dios, in ipan x abril 1594 años in okis paskwa, san ikeskilwiyok niman ik omopewalti in teoyotika tlahtowani obispo don fransisko sanktos garsía ompa mowikak in tonalan, ompa motlali || 13 in itekitsin inik teoyotika motlahtokatilito tonalan, konfirmasión kimotemakilitia inik mowikak in onkan tlatilolko; aw in ixiptlatsin mochiw in kimopatili inkisidor mochiw itoka don bartholomé lubo kerrero. aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl in omomikiliko in totekixtsin opochwatewktli tlahtowani opochwakan chalko tlalmanalko, in tlahtokat senpowalxiwitl ipan chikwasen xiwitl. komo tayokoya, moraskwowit kena ma motemaka. wan ihkino, wan ihkino pahke yuhkin sewtiake mexika tenochka, in iw omotenew tlakpak inik senka kintoliniaya in kinmekawitekia iwan kinkalnamakaya; kapítulo in del medio ipan in in tekikaw. . iwan iwan sesem akali tlaoli, etl iwan chien in ik kawaloto inchachan. "tlacahuilome" kimottitike ipan yei tekpatl xiwitl. serne tlatemowanime momatih ka mexikah san okittakke kaxtiltekah in kapayo ipan motlaliayah. asosan kintokayotike "tlacahuilome" sisitlaltekah in akike impatlaniskaxik nikan aso in acicoh? nikan nimitstatawtia ika miak favor nikan pewa mexiko intlahtokayopan maximiliano iwan karlota. in xiwit. in onkak ome taman: in chichiltikxalxokot, yon no kilwiah tsinakaxalxokot wan tein istak. ma on te ya akiloto xochikoskitl. ¿queniuh timotamakaskeh iwan nikan mitowa motenewa in keski tlanepanoli in ilwikatl ini katki inik tlekotikate iwan inik waltemotikate, aw ka wel iwki inik kate in wewei xonakatl in itoka sebulas, inik nenepaniwtikate in ikakalo; yese maso neliwi i nenepaniwtikate, kamo wel momati in kesiskitsontli legwas in kesiskitsontli nesewilistika inik momamakawtikate in tlatik in ipa in iski tlanepanoli in ilwikatl; ka ayak aki wel kimati, ka sa yewatsin kimomachiltitsinowa in totekwiyo dios, iwan i yewantin tlamatinime in motokayotia astrólogos in kimati i ye mochintin inik kate in iski tlanepanoli in ilwikame ka matlaktetl onse, aw no iwan ka chikontlanepanolilwikatitech ka sesenteilwikatitech in kate in chikontetl sisitlalti in tetonalmaka in mitowa motenewa panetas .... kiski in se tekpatl xiwitl. “na ya keini nechchihki nosisna. se iyaokiskaw in kortés in itoka bemal días del kastilo, inin xiwpan ompa in ichantsinko kwawtemalan kihkwiloa iamox in itech itlalpololis yankwik hispantlali. tetetstik eli wan asta onkak. aw kilwi in teomama in ketsalkanawtli in diablo "tla xiktlatlani in temistewktli, kwix itla kineki". yei kali xiwitl ik motlatokatlali axayakatsi. aw in okik ayamo kimoniwaya in intewktitlanwan in chalko in motewksoma iwan siwakowatl tlakayeleltsin, ka achtopa kinnotske i nowian altepetlipan tlahtoke in ya intepewal in ya itech powi altepetl tenochtitlan; ka wel ihyoma in walake in omotenewke altepetlipan tlahtoke, kikakiko in intewktlatol in motewksoma iwan siwakowatl tlakayeleltsin. i mik toskwekwex newa mike in kwawtliketski; in oumike niman ik omotlali witsiliwitl. ipan in in xiwitl in mosentlalike mononotske inik kitlalike in intlahtokaw; aw yewatl kipepenke kixketske in akamapichtli tlahtokapili kolwakan. para timoyolcehuizqueh. kichiwaya yewatl in ixkich omotenew teotekitl, missa kitowaya, san tlapik ik tetlateotokiltiaya in kakokwia tlaxkali, in amo tlateochiwali, in amo neli wel yewatsin inakayotsin totekwiyo dios i motenewa sakramento; aw maso neliwi in kitowaya in ixkich teotlatoli, kamo powki, in okik amo itlateochiwal obispo. mah yowi ahko, in anchalka teuktin, ma xachokaka para ma waki. mochiwa sah aw in okonmonahnawatilih in ilwikak siwapili, kiwaltok moch tlapalo in amatl in ihtik tlatlak kamdela, wel onkistoka in tlapanko atenantitech; iwan vandera motetekak. inik achtopa kixtetsotsonako kwawitl yewatl in tliltekatsin, in axkan motoyotia kwawxayakatitlan. xii kali xiwitl, 1309. na nitekiti para nihneki nitlakwas aya tle nokwe, aya tle nowipil, nisiwatsintli, yewan ya nikan; kimanako yektli ye ikwik, nikan kimanako chimali xochitl. ¿ ken mach tontla, ye nichalkasiwatl, n'ayocuan? nikimelewia nosiwampowan, in akolwake nikimelewia nosiwampowan, in tepaneka. ¿ ken mach tontlaka ye nichalkasiwatl n'ayocuan? mochiwa kwowihtik, kajfentaj.nexkokokisuat mochiwa milah no. siempre mah se kitachípawili wan mah amo se kitenteki. in omik chikonkwawsi nima ye walmotlalia teskapoktsi. tleinn okke ankichiwaske?; ka chichimekatewktli atonaltsin iwan tlailotlaktewktli kwawitsatsin in otechwaliwake, ka ye imaxkapa in tlahtoke". itakilo sah se kikwa, se kipampixka wan se kikwa.in amo se kikwi para pahti. ikwouyo no kwaltia para kwoutatil. yewan okipixkeh kwaltetsin tsotsomahtli. tinemiskiah in ye kimokuwia iíekawdito len kimportaroa nikan itechinichan. tlen 135 tlanawatihkayotl. inin amatlanawatili welis mopiwis noso mopatlas. iwikpa in tlapiwilmeh noso tlapatlalmeh welis ipan motlalis amatlanawatili, moneki ipan tlahtokan tlen sentlanawatiloyan, mamomatlahanakan ome tlen eyi tlatlapantli tlen tlakameh monechicohtoseh, tlen kikwalitaseh mamopatla noso mamopiwi iwan inin makiselikan achi miakeh tlen tlanawatil chiwalisemeh tlen tlaltlanahuatilmeh. in tlahtokan tlen sennechikolistli noso in sennechikolistli tekichiwani tla inon monekis, kipowaseh tlamatlalantli tlen tlanawatil tekichiwanih iwan kiihtoseh tla moselihki tlapiwilmeh noso tlapatlalmeh. xochiyowa mayo wan hunio kohkostik ixochiyo kemeh ayohxochit. se kahón sansé se mopuwtiw in sentabo asta kampa maxiltis nawi tomi; nawi tomin sinkwenta sentabos. .atlavaquetl asan axkan ye ketsaltototl nik ya iskaltiketl. kema,ye makwilxipa niteixmati. in se yek tlakatsintli. se kwali tahtli iwan miak mopiltlasohtlalo. . achtopa kiteki in itech powi in tletl. kitowaya xiuteoktli, tlalxiktentika. aw in amatl kitekia tlayopitektli iwkin kwachpanitl ik tlatektli. in totekuyo, in tloke nawake. iuki kitokaitiah por in amo wehkapantik. semi welik tatsoyon oso kaldito. mochiwa saj. ye chikome iwan nahkan ti cateh. ya nitlahtlanis tomi mah moskalti, i kali xiwitl, 1337. xi akatl xiwitl, 1607 años. teutontlakatl in itoka kari bens inin xiwpan kikixtiko inik se nehnemilistespokali in isel moliniani. iteposyolo oliniloya ika techiawakatlatlatiloni iwan kiyokoxka gottlieb wilhelm daimler ipan nawtsontli ommatlaktli onnawpoali omei xiwitl. “o ka yuhki hi in tlatoli ankimotkilia motechiwkawa, ka konitoa teutl: ‘ma kilwiti in kwawtemok, ma mononotsaka ma iyoka kontlalike tenochkatl. se kilwiah tamalayoj, se kilwiah tenkwouhayoh wan noktaayoj. —noso saniman nisiawi. nama nitlawikak. in mokwatekike in wel ipan ilwitsin katka san ilefonso arkobispo de toledo; aw ye no nikwel in ikomilwitl in ipan lunes ye noseppa se tlakatl mokwateki in habón tlakatl itoka mochiw pelipe, teoyotika ithatsin mochiw in don gonsalo de monrroi. ¿ san ye te yeneli? aka san tlawanko, in ipalnemoani. ¿ln kwix neli kwix amo neli? ¿ ken in konitowa ? in ma ok on nentlamati in toyolo. 3. aw ken kommonekiltia in lpalnemowani, aso semilwitl, aso omilwitl, timitstotlanewiske, tikoskatlankwiske, tiketsalankwiske. ipaltsinko in totekwiyo aso tihkas, aso tinemis in tlaltikpak. ma ok iwiyan, ma ok isemel imxiwalmana in xiwalmoskalti. ma iliwistkwa, ma iliwistia, ma ok ye itloktsinko, inawaktsinko ximokalaki in totekwiyo inik mitsmotlaokolilis. . aw niman ye ik kinkwepilia in intlatul kimilwia inik nawtlamantli nikitowa noyolokakopa onmani notlalman inik wiak matlakmantl ipan senmitl ik platawak chikwematl nikmaka in nomach in itoka maria tewchon aso onkan motlachichiwilis aw in onkan oniktetokak okitech powkike in inemak nochpoch ana aso onkan itla kontlalis amo itlakawis notlatol. axkan timohtilis onikiximatia se ichpokatl ammo wel kwalneski neskiani ammo kipaktiaya moteikniwtis neskiani ammo kwali inemilis ayak omixtlapaloaya itech mopachos tei newatl kema se ichan tlakatl onechilwi kinmach onechkwalihtaya iwan inin onechyolewiti se tonali oniknamik oniknots yese nien ammo onechkak okse tonali san onechilwi okseppa aw onasike in yakapichtlan in chalka, ye choka in ixpan in tlakatekolotl ye kinotsa ye kitlatlawtia. aw || 114v inik wets tlekwawitl tewktepeka in inka momamal i wixachtla; nowian okwiwaloko in tletl in semanawak in techyawalotok, inik omawisotikatka in altepetl; onikan walitstoka in ye ixkich altepewa. newatli no toka nixochitekwitli nikwawtli nihoselotli nikam onitlakatki ip{an} inin tepetli itoka kwawtli iwan se noteikaw itoka xayakasin xochisin kwawtli iwan notlasin vtokam xochiayachtli tekwani vn tewantin nikam tikate otikkiske i{n} adi nikam sipia ipan itoka wikoli chalchiwitli kesali iwan okse atli ompa {te}ponaztepez amo wel otikkixtike ka san nikteskaw in tonatiw aw ik otechiokoli in {te}pexic ateska osomatli iwan mochintin imasewalwa in tepexiktlaka iwan no yeh{uan}tin otechkokolike in chololantlaka ka no iwan wexosinkotlaka in nanakat sesek, ta por in itech kwopalak in mochiwa. aw in don hwan veláskes in tlakotsin siwakowatl ompa kitlahtokatlalika in markés in weimolan, ye itech walyetiwia in tlahtokayotl tenochtitlan; ye walmokwepaya in tlakotsin, aw ye onkan nochistlan kwatsontlan in onmomikiliko. onkak ome taman: tein weyi wan tein tsikitsin. aw niman ye kimilwia in diablo witsilopochtli in mexika "yn axkan ye techmiktiske; xikkwitlakoyonikan in kali, ompa xikisakan!". okatka n tiempo baratura n tiempo de porfirio okatka por mwi patiyo in totlol mwi patiyo sinko sentabo por almo. nomaikniwan tepetikpak axochko onyahqueh. aw in ik ikaiak ye otlatoka, san umpa oninokaw in mestli; kinikwak in okalakito ikalakian tonatiw, ye no kwele ik walewak in mestli ik umpa mopatilike, motlalotike inik se seppa walkisa; tlasemilwiltia in tonatiw, aw in mestli yowal tekitl kitlasa, se yowal kitlasa, yowalteki. aw in yewatl mokiwix i teokaltikpak tlekoke iwan itepotso; iketsalpatsak in komakitikaka ikpak in ikal in intlakatekolow in kimoteotiaya tlatilolka, iwan in itepotso; aw inik ompa ikpak tlekoke in inteokal ompan tlekowayan inik tlaixnamikia, aw ompa inpan tlekoke in mexika tenochka. in sesek. i akatl xiwitl, 1467. istatl, ixkich in monekis kwaltia xiii akatl xiwitl, 1323. kwaltia noponi itstok. ipan in momikilike in tlahtowani katka itskawatsin iwan nekwametsin, sano ik momikilike in sawatl. aw in tlalmantli onkan omokalti in itoka pablo makwex ye axkan xxv siwitl in chinamitl ye no ixkich kawitl kichiwa in pablo makwex aw in machok konkaw in kitek chinamitl aw aik ompa [f. 8r] okichiw in anna xoko. aw inhi “oc xiwia ok awalaske, ma ok nicnonotza”. kwix onkaktimanis? ma moteka in petlatl in ikpali; ma motlali in piltsintli in konetsintli in itlasopiltsin tlahtowani totoltekatl tsonpachtli in itoka kwawitsatsin, ma tlailotlaktewkti". amitla yoan niktenewa hiwitl tlawkechol kaxtolpowali yoan tsinitska iwitl makwilpowali onkaxtoli yoan ontetl oseloewatl iwki tlaxaketatlalili in iski tlamantli in monamakas naniman itech powis. eloiswatl i akatl xiwitl, 1259 años. in nikan siudad de mexiko a siete dias del mes de mayo de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años i yewatsin tlatowai don antonio valeriano governador hwes nikan motlapachilwia mexiko tenochtitlan audiensia moyetstikatka onkan okimokakilti inik otlamiko senpowali onmatlaktli tonatiw inik otsatsiwak inik otekakitilok inik kinamaka in itlal in ikal in marianan. mah amo kwalantikan itech nehin tikomit. aw san niman ipan in in omotenew xiwitl onkan walmotlahtokatlali in itoka chalchiwtlatonatiw ik-ei tlahtowani mochiw in ipan tekwanipantlakayotl. onkan tlami in in intlahtolo in ulmeka in xikalanka in xochteka in kiyawisteka in kukolka in achtopa onkan onemiko chalchiwmomosko, in axkan onkan ye amakemekan. no tikintokaitiah itech in toamaix in tokniwan tein kimakakeh inintamachilis in tamachtikeh tein kayot kolombia monotsa, maría elvira eskobar, itech in xiwit 1973. in tokniuj kipalewiaya pierre beaukage yon tonalmej. kanin onka tetlasohtlalistli, amo onka teihyosotlalistli. nikan amo teyi. wan nikan namechmaktiliti namotahtoltsin. nikilwia yomokahkahke mano tokniw. ihkwak omokaw in mitl in chimali, teokali konketske iwan kitlatlawtilike kokoxtli ma walaw tetlamanilis. tlahtoani kintitlan iixiptlawan in okimanilike kwitlatl. kwalankayotika, mexikah kimmiktiah iixiptlawan in kokoxtli iwan mochintin kolwakah in monexitiah. ihwak pewa, nesi patiyoj. ilwiloke in tla melawak ankitoske ika mechmotlaokolilis in totekuyo dios aw in tla amistlakatiske san no yewatsin amechmotlatsakwiltilis tlanankilia in testigos tlaxilakaleke kitoke mochintin ka yuh mochiwas etk. in mikxi no pichavasteka iwan in mixteka. niman ompa kinmiktihke, aw sa mimikke in kimaxitiko nikan mexiko teotlak innawixtin in ipan in omotenew semilwitl martes. pahpata. itlanahnamik: nepakopa onitletleheohta itech in kwawitl mewitihtaya se tlakatsintli wehkatika ahweli oniemiximachili yese onikmohtili neskiani wewextikatsintli tlasotlawtikatsintli ammo wel wehka oninetekets wehkapa nikitstikatka nepekanan in tlamawisolyeyantli in ompa mohta tlanineminis xokonmamanakan estakas in onkan tlatlami kwaxochtli i xikimonkalakikan in intlalpan niman ayak amechontlakawaltis aw in tla aka amechixnamikis nikan towikpa xikwaliwaka aw inik neli nikan tiktlalia totoka iwan tofirmas fecho en mexiko. pablo xwares alkalde pedro geronimo alkalde. paso ante mi hwan de san fransisko eskrivano nombrado. aw inin san ya ipan in ix kali xiwitl onkan yankwikan tlemamaltasiko. ﻿canican. iwan intla se tlakatl ik opepenalok inik arsobispo omochiw nikan mexiko || 236 aw in itech powki nikan sankta iglesia, palio mako in nikan yankwik arkobispo omotlali; aw intla mopatlas nikan mexiko arsobispo, intla oksekni konikwanikan sanno arsobispoyotl ipan, intla ompa aihtik sankto domingo la isla anoso manila china, ka yuh mihtowa ka kikwitiw kiselitiw in ompa yankwik teopan sankta iglesia okse yankwik palio, aw amono wel mochiwas inik ye kikwitasis itech kimopowilis kitlalis amo ik wel teoyotika teopixkatlahtokatekitis in ipalio katka in okiwaltokili intla omomikili arsobispo okatka onkan, aw ka san wel yankwikan kitlanis okse yankwik palio. aw in yewantin okim on tsonkwike niman ik tsatsitikisa ihkawaka motenwiteki. in ipan siudad de mexiko katorse dias del mes de noviembre de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años imawistililoni alkalde migwel de los angeles ixpantsinko nesiko pablo hernandes merino hwan martin balthasar xwares hwan baptista nikan chaneke san hwan tlatilko. aw inin wei kwawitl in inpan postek, in iw omito in tlakpak in ompa ipewayan inin amoxtli, ka sanno yewantin intlaakil intlatokal in asteka; aw in ixkich kawiti inin kwawitl inik achto tlaakili iwan inik postekiko ontsonxiwtika ipan matlakpowalxiwtika ipan chikwexiwtika. kiilwikak, kíiluij, ke inana konito ka niknokakitiliko hustisia in itechkopa notlalman in onkan mani in ipan tlaxilakali in omotenew kimokawilitiw in nonantsin omomikili ipan kitlalitiw testamento inik monamakas ixkich itech powki in ianiman misa ik mitos ixkich notech powis. ikwohyo no kwaltia kwoutatil. manemi aw in okis nawilwitl ikwak mamowia in ichan. ik mitoa momikkaaltia in ik kompoloa konilkawa intlaokol. ye wei tiakaw i wei okichtli sa kani mokikistia sa itsotsomatsi yetinemi; no yuhki siwatsintli sa tsotsontekomayo in kimokwetia tlakwiloltsintli kimowipiltia. aw ayemo onasi || 81r in chalka in yakapichtlan, okwel kinawati in ketsalkanawtli in diablo, kilwi "quetzalcanauhtlé, ye witse techanaske in chalka; senka techtlatlawtiske, aw ye tiseyas, ma tiwiyan". wel se semana in chikawak osewets. aw in ihkwak in, in ipan omotenew se tochtli xiwitl, in ipan onkan atenkisako wewetke chichimeka in astlan; ye oyuh nepa kimochiwilitsino in totekwiyo dios in semanawatl ye matlaktsonxiwitl ipan yetsonxiwitl ipan onpowalonchikwei xiwitl, inik tlatsinpewaltik tlachiwaltik tlayokoyaltik in semanawatl; aw no iwan ye yuh nepa chikontsonxiwitl ipan matlakpowalxiwitl ipan chikwasen xiwitl mochiw in apachiwilistli i nowian semanawak || in motenewa diluvio, inik poliowak semanawak, in ihkwak ipantsinko mochiw in tlakatl in tlaachtopaittowani propheta in itokatsin noé; no iwan ye yuh nepa ontsonxiwitl ipan se xiwitl in ihkwak in motlali inik tlatlalili wei altepetl roma itsonteko in semanawatl. san niman ihkwak ye omokixtili in iewayo in tosan kwali mopaka, motlalilia istatl iwan motonalwatsa ome tonali. moihseki in xonakatl. in axox; in waxchili mototonia, mosiyawa iwan motesi ika xonakatl, axox iwan komino, ixkich in kikwi tomahpil, motsoyonia iwan motlalilia in yepasohtli ixkichkaw ye tepitsin tetsawak; inin moxahwilia in tosannakatl iwan ye mochihchiwa in tamali ika iswatl iwan ye mowikxitia ika ahmo wel wehyi tletl se kawitl. ahnoso se kawitl iwan tlahko. teka notetla. achtopa ni[ki]towa notlatol in tla ninomikilis
