in noyolia in naniman isenmaktsinko nokontlaliya ma kiwalmanilis ka itlachiwaltsin ka itlamakixtiltsin ma kimowikilis in ichantsin ilwikak aw in nonakayo ka tlali ka itlakwal in nokwilia aw in tla onimik nikan ninotokas in sankta maria de barrio kwawtepek. limah kitokaj, kitaliah iteyotsin. in. . aw no impan nes in tlasotilmahtli in senka mawistik tlapalekakoskayo iwan xomoiwitilmatli iwan wiutika tehtekomayo tilmahtli iwan mawistik tlasomaxtlatl tlahmachyo in iyak wel yakawiak in imaxtlayakayo. wan yaw in la magéi choloa sowatl noso ompa icha ahmo choloatlenkwa cholos. ma kimonekiltitsino in totekwiyo dios ma kimotlamelawaltili iwan ma kimochikawili miek xiwitl in ipan isenkiskatlayekoltilokatsin iwan in ipan in ipacholoka inin tlahtokaaltepetl, in iw mochintin in altepewake kelewia. mochiwa saj. tlahkoxonakatl kaxtoli koyolchili aw ye itlamian in in matlaktlionse tekpatl xiwitl in ya altepetl chalko in poliw, in kipoloto mexikan; onkan achto katka in chalko atenko altepetl, aw ipan in inik onmikwani inik ompa motekato chalka in axkan onkan ka altepetl tlalmanalko. kwaltia se ome. in teotl i mankan, yawe omposontimani, teoaxochioktika ya iwinti in mexikame. nama tihtsakwase xochiyowa abril wan teyowa agosto, ihwak chikawaya ya in iteyo. ayamo ipan timochiwas, inchichimekatl, in toteosi teuktli. ¿in kwix ok techmatikiuhin moteuksomatsin, in nesawalkoyotsin, totokiwatsi? vii tekpatl xiwitl, 1148 años. inihwanti kiniwika wan kemantsi san puro san monamaka ixochiyo se kiteki tein amo taki ipa xochit saj. yese ka yqu imomextintsitsin inthatsitsinwan mochiwtsinotikate in san antonio abad iwan san basilio magno, in ipan in se inteopixkanemilitsin tlasoteopixke mongestin i ye motenewtsinowa basilios, in ompa in ayemo no wekaw in ayemo miek xiwitl omotlalitsinoko españa; ompa owalmowikake in italia iwan fransia, oksenka ompa in miekintin onmoyetstikate in tonatiw ikisayampa motenewa en gresia iwan in ipan ome tlali motenewa armenias, in weikan iwan ipan tepiton armenia, iwan moskovia iwan ethiopía in itlahtokatlapacholpan wei tlahtowani in tokayotilo preste hwan. pinoli ¡ tlayenochtonwia! in tla ihkion xinechmopabkayowiti in timitsnotlalwilia tikoniskeh se teteskatekomaton in xotlalatl noso se tepachichik. ¿tlen timohtalwia? amo miak mochiwa. tela unkan kitake xiwchimali ketsalpayo ayo owia. teokwitla chimaltika ye on netotilo. nima ye kiwalilwia tlatoke “cuix amo yuhki ankitoa in antlatoque?”. inik nemonwak sokikixtilok se metstli ipan chikweilwitl. aw amo nikkwepas in notlatol in axkan wel sentetia in notlatol nikitowa iwan in nopilwan tikchiwa inin eskritura inik nimitsnamakiltia in nokal in notlal in tewatl lwis de sevalos tespañol iwan monamik nikan anchaneke mexiko ipan tlaxilakali teokaltitlan. in totonik. amo, tlasohkamati. in nantli teopan oyetok. kwaltia titlakatekatl, tikwitlachiwitl, weltoltekatik, teokwitlatika in tlakwiloli, ye awikoltsin konikwiloa, tikwake in tsonpankwawitl in tekixkisakatl in xantetl in kwespali kimichi teutlakili. in ipan iskikan in omotenew wewei altepetl, in kampa senka ye miektin onoke españoles in ye ompa chanonoke, nowiyan umpa intlan sesen klérigos kimonmotlalilisneki inik teoyotika sakramentotika kinmokwitlawitiwi españoles; ka san ik pewa in axkan omachistik inik san okomentin kinmiwalia klérigos, se tetskoko konmotlalilia iwan se tulokan konmotlalilia. moatilia in textli ika istatl iwan atl ixkichkaw in ye poxaktik; tleko motlalia kaxitl, motlalilia in pitsochiyawisotl iwan motsoyonia in xonakatl in kwali ye omotetek; in yepasohtli iwan chili motextilia, motlalilia in xonakatl ika kwitlakochi, ye kwali tlachipawtli; ye mo mana in tlaxkali iwan ye motemitia ika, motsoyonia ahnose mowikxitia komalko. makwili waxchili aw ¿inin tlein ok nikitos?, ¿tlein ok nimitsilwis, ken ok mach ie ami in nimitsmakas? ka oontlatlatlan in itlahtoltsin, ka oinowian mitsonmonemitili, ka onowian mitsonmahaxitili, kaoktle okimokawitsino. xinechintekipanowili. komo ya kimati keneme kichiwa mahtlakpoali gramo ayohwachtextli iiii akatl xiwitl, 1483 años. tlasohtlanis se kikwa ihwak exot: se kimana wan se kipoyelia wan se kikwa ya. okitoke ka yewatl kitemakak don pablo xochikentsin tlatowani mexiko ikwak in walwilowak kolwakan yepowali onchikome xiwitl in ikwak temakok ka tikwalwikake i atokoktsin katka. ih in ik-ei ipiltsi tesosomoktsi ye tlakuchkalkatl, in kontlalito kwawtitla. tlake ika tihkakatsose?" itlanawkayo se ahmo wei xonakatl in iuki itokai achá por in ikwouyo wan itakilo. inik tlalmasewke inik kiketske in ixkich inkwaxoch inik motepantike in omotenewke tlahtoke. in konitotewak in tochiwitsin. nikan amo moixmati, semi kiixmati ampowín xokoyolo. aw akin wel kimatis?; ka san iseltsin kimomachiltia in totekwiyo dios, aso melawak in toxeliwkayowan in ompa tlaka, asompa moxeloke asompa waltekawke in owalake in onkan atenkisako astlan. nimechmaktiliti onkan motenewa in tlatoli in wel iniolo intech kisaya inik kitlatlawtiaya teskatlipoka in kitokayotiaya yowali, ehekatl: inik kitlaniliaya nekwiltonolistli, inik amo motoliniske. yewantin, ik tlatlatlawtiaya in tlenamakake iwan wel kimokwitia, in ka yewatl, kitemaka in nekwiltonolistli in nesewilistli iwan in neyolalilistli, iwan in papakilistli ka yewatl kitemaka in ixkich in netlamachtili. aw inik nikan mexiko iglesia mayor inik yankwikan omochiwin ilwitl, yewatsin missa kimihtalwi in senka mawistililoni teoyotika tlahtowani arkobispo mexiko don hwan péres de la serna. in monotsa metstsonkilit. amo nikmati keyéh iuki monotsa. aw in ikchikwasepa in motlatolti ipa sábado; in kinmochiwili totekwiyo dios in ixkichtin manenenke in tlaltikpak nemi, inik ye mochintin sepa manenenke. in ichpokameh mostla chanko onyezqueh. aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl in oixpoliwito in kwawnawaka in ompa atlixko, senka miyek in ompa yaomikito; sann inneixkawil mochiw in kwawnawaka in yaoyotl. in ye miekpan masewalahtoltlakanenechikolok in owalwiloak miekkan ipan totlalnan masiwki se xiwitl ipan in omochiw in makwili makwipowalxiwtilistli ye otitosentlalihkeh in ipan inotiktokayotihkeh ahmo iknomatilistika wel melawak asosiasion de eskritores en lengwas indigenas semmanyan ye wel omochiw in ye wehka tikelewihtiwitsah ye'on yokis yekidepositaroa wan onkán yoyixwak in semiya yemulpia. teyewa amotlen onechmolwili. amo otlakwalok onkan techtlanawalis kename ye wits atlatlakamamanilistli. amo otimatiaya weyi kiawitl iwan de tlakatekolotl. aw ik niman in yewatsin tlahtowani visurrei don lwis de velasko pena kinmotlalili in ix- || 56 -quichtin españolesme, inik ayak kisas kitlalkawis in altepetl mexiko, ipampa in senka mochintin ye mokomonisnekia, senka ye momosiwiaya, ye mamanaya in ipampa atl, inik senka omakok omoteponaso omopepeyontimoma nowian. inin asiko in onkan motlaliko chalko atenko yewatl in tlahtowani in wewetewktli chichimekatewktli iwan ipilwan omentin: in ikse itoka tliltekatsin, in ikome itoka atonaltsin, iwan oksekintin wewetke. ¿ kan nelpa tonyaske in aik timikiske? inin || 99r imomextin onkan tlahtokatia in chalko atenko; aw amo neli in momikilike, san ompa onyake in amakemekan inik kintokake mexika in onkan chalko atenko. in xiwit. tein nimitsmaktiliko nikan. in kwamekat wan no et. yewa ikwasekawil okihkwani ipan ikpali. aw in oyuh moteilwito omotenew siwatl, ik niman se algwasil español kiwaltitlan in koregidor kimanako onkan in tlatekipanowaya in omotenewke hwan morales iwan bernabé de san herónimo, amo iwiyan in kimanako ka kinmamailpika imomextin. vitaminah, teiztah, xoxorki. litl, xochicuallih, xochikwalayotl iwan iskimeh technahnamikih toyecmatizqueh. yaokwikatl ik niman kontokilitia se krus manka tliltik bordado, istak teokwitlatl plata in ikrusyo; ik niman konmotokilitia se krusifixo senka tlasotli mawistik, senka miek indulgensias itetsinko moknopilwia. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. san ye konnankilia in nepapan kechol, axkan hwebes in ik 9 mani metstli mayo de 1613 años, ihkwak san isiwkamikilistika xuxowkamikilistika ixtomamikilistika momikili in sekretario martín de agurto, senka ik ika neisawilok. xa de repente itech ehekat mokawak. neh, newa, nomatka nappa in semilwitl aw makwilpa in yowaltika. inik seppa ikwak in walmonmana tonatiw. aw inik oppa ikwak in tlakwalispan. aw inik expa ikwak in nepantlatonatiw, aw inik napa ikwak in ye on kalaki tonatiw. in yuh ka san tiktlanewiko. mila". in ichkatl motekipanowa ika in amantlanateskapan, in tlalnanxexelol chiwawa iwan nwevo león. ma amoyolikatsi ma amihiyokawiliti! kanpa tiwalake? ka timexika ka titlatilulca”. in miak taman onkak yon witsti. seki kilwiah xinolahwits, seki kilwiah noktawits, tein wehweyi kilwiah machohwits, seki yon teltsikitsitsin kilwiah legítimo witsti. nochi mochiwa xohxoxoktik, istak mochiwayehwa in kilwiah xinolahwits. ihwak walewa ne talihtik keponi wan kemah weyi mochiwa, kemeh eskia se kandela mochiujtiuj wan kemah mopilowa ya itech in teisá wan kemah kampa tehko ya, pewa mowilana ya wan nochi sentakwi ya wan motaliiijtiuj ya in uitskonemej. imaxiuyo yehyewaltik wan maxahxaxakachtik, achi maejeskinajyej. in noyan mochiwa wan tawelita mas kampa taseseya. in se kitoka wan no mochipautani, kineki mah se kinehmachpiya. tak sesek, ta pané xokok. aw i mexika ye kastolxiwtia ye onawi xiwitl inik momikili akolnawakatsi, chikomakatl xiwitl in ipa mik; in tlatokat epowalxiwitl. aw in iw motlanawatili nenonotsalistika mochiwas ye mochi tlakatl itech powis in ixkichtin moyoteka in tekiti tlakoti in iwikpatsinko su magestad i noalkaldetike i noregidortike in okitekipatioke altepetl iwan in ok kimokwitlawitiwi tlatokayotl in ye onpa tistiwi. in mochiwa kampa yeski ikwak pewke in ye tekwa kokoyo in ompa chalko iwan inik nowian, iwan in tsotsopilo ye tekwa, in san nowian kwawtla tepetla sakatla in mihmikito in telpochtli in ichpochtli; ka sa yuhki in wewe nakayotl mochiw inik xoxolochaw in innakayo in telpochtli in ichpochtli katka, ka senka chikawak in mayanalok. kabesa o prinsipio, ke trata del kalendario mexikano. aw in ikwak oyuh kimokakiltike tlatoke hwes governador yoan alkaldes ordinarios in ikatsinko rei nwestro señor omotlanaoatilike okimixkechilike felipe de rosas algwasil mayor yoan newatl gwilermo krusate eskrivano yoan se pregonero tsatsis sempoali on matlaktli tonatiw amo domingo anoso ilwitl ipan san nemaya aw in ikwak tlamitiw satepan kimatiliske in akin achi miek ye tlatenyotis inin wel neltis mochioas. ika on weweyi tlaka aihmo okintlalike kokone san okinmamakaya tlen in waxka in xolochkwe, in koton wan inkahwan. ipampa miake kokone oyeya omonemilike inspektor ikan autoridades aihmo kinmamakaske ika tiwalotas ipampa tlatoske nochi in tlatiwanime iwan weyi tlatoli. opapanoke ikin sekintin metstli iwan totatsin porfirio días ika sekretario husto sierras amo omotekipachoaya ipampa wits revolusión. san onkwan okintlasotlaya nochi mexikatlaka ika mexikakokone. kampa oyeya nawi piltsitsintin okintlakoliaya tsotsomatli. tla siwanton okimakaya ikoton iwan ixolochkwe; iwan tla piltontli okímakaya ikamisa iwan se pantalón. in kamoh se kimana wan se kichiwaatol iwan tixti wan se kikwecholia chilwak, se kitalilia istat wan se kwowit epasot. yakmo yelowak ankitos notia notia komo tehwan komo ke sifwera no maman. ya nopa noponi pehki tlamina nopa itata aw inik tlachichiwtli in itlak in inakayo in tlakatl ka senka mawistik iwan inik senka mawischipawak mawisxayake, kinenewilia in saso katlewatl oksentlamantli in itla mawistik chipawak in amoma yewatl. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. in okikakke i nikan mexiko tlatoke, ik kintlahtokatlalike in kweskonpixke; aw niman ya wi kinkawaske in kweskonpixke, kintlalito in amakemekan: se tlakatl chichimekatewktik, aw se tlakatl teowatewktik, aw in yewatl in itoka in tlaltekatl tekwachkawtik ipatka mochiw in toteositewktli in tekwachkawtli. aw in axkan [f. 6v.] mochipa yewatl konpixka aw ikwak in tikechposawake in ye kimokwikwilia iwan mochipa kelimike in ichpoch atlixel in axkan moteilwia ixkich in kimati noyolo ik nikan nomatika niketsa krus. fransisko mimich. nwestro señor de los trabahos, se kikwa ixiuyotsin. para tapalol: se kimana, achto se kiyektia wan se kimana ya, kipantaliiiah akoltsin wan se chilito wan kwali se takwa ya. ma itstos ichpokero i ye yuhki in okilnamike intlaiyowilis mesika. nemi tlein wel neli otinehkeh in senka miek tlakwali ticteihtitizqueh, itechpa kenin tlakwaloya ye seki xiwitl; tlein kikwayah sekih tlakah iwan oksekih iwan kenin ok tlakwalo. yese, moneki tictenehuazqueh, otikpanawiltihkeh titlahtoskeh itechpa intlakwal in miltequitcatlacah. tewan timiltekitkeh iwan yuhkin miltekitkeh otikchiwkeh inin amatlakwaltlasentlalili in nikan tiquixquetzah. ahso kemmanian mochiwas okse amoxpantlaxilistli in ipan tiktlaliskeh okse okachi wehyi tlakwaltlasentlalili in axkan ahweli otictlalihqueh. in matlatsinkatl in toloka, in tlakotepek. in monamaka. yei axoxtlantli sebada motepewa mektli xulio. . in osenkiske in ye ixkich tlakatl iwanyolke iwan puchtekasiwa tealtiani niman ye ik tematekilo tekamapako. in newatl alkalde don martin de san hwan nikpie hustisia in ipaltsinko su magestad in nikan siudad mexiko tenochtitlan audiensia onikakitilok i informasión i ontlamanisti okikake in mixnamike. aw in ixkich mochiw sant fransisko, in ixkichtin nepapan ofisialesme mochintin sesentetl tlapechtli kitlalike, onkan kichiwke in intlachiwal; iwan onkan papakke mitotike in kwawtlapechko pochteka tepospitske teopantlaka kwawxinke, iwan sordadosme akalchimaltika kinnamikke in akaloko in ikiawak kastaneda. para nanochin. inihwanti maski domingo tekitih yewa kiokpawihtika itlamachtil. sa akaltikan untsatsito i “ça aukmo weli iyoka kintlalia tenochka, i ye iwki yekene ik totech moketske i necalliztli!”. xkinmaka penniso, tlanamaka sesek eski, por in amo niman waki. timahakis timokakalakis timokikixtis in awakan tepewakan. timotsotsonas timokakapanis —quitoz nequi— akasokantle wel on mochiwas; akasokantle onmakitis in motiamik in moknopilo. aw yewasin inmak onechquezq[ui] onechpepenili i {n} notoka niman onechwikak ixpamsinko in teopixkasintli onechtokayoti d[on] hoseph de san hwan iwan no || 57r -huayan; yewatl kinyakana in intlahtokaw wewe witsiliwitl, onkan nawxiwtike. nikan || 17r ipan in in sekintin wewetke kimachiyotia in motlahtokatlali in xolotl ahnoso tochintewktli in ok ompa amakeme chikomostok; in achto intlahtokaw mochiw inn akolwake tetskukoka ahnoso yewantin in wexotlaka imasikaw. —pero in lá yetlateteka kan tlali mikmomantenerwiske a fwersa de lei. ¡ninotolinia! in nikan siudad de mexiko altepetl axkan ipan semilwitl sempowali ipan chikomein imetstlapowali in marso de 1560 años hiei tsontli ipan kaxtolpowali xiwitl iwan hieipowali xiwtin okimasikaittak in impetision in yewatl tlasoteukpili in mawistlamatini in alonso de sorita in imawistlakakini in magestad tlasomawistlatowani in ipan nikan in iteuktlakakoyan. nochintin tlakah icnimeh, mach ayak kineltoka. tewatsin xikinmakili se kwali otli iwan se kwali nemlilistli pipiltsitsintin. onkwan on tlakayoh monemiske tatatin yewan wepawi iwan noihki mitswalmotepotstokiliske. yenin kitoneski kimititia otli tepilwan; ikwak ye weweyi kwal ilnamkikiske. ikwak titsikitsitsin totatsin, tonantsin, otechmowentilito ompa chalma. nikan ipan in onkan ahsiko in mexika in apasko. se kimana, se mochihchiwilia kemeh se kineki taamanal saj, akoloh oso tatsoyon, nochi yek welik kisa. yese ahmo miek xiwitl opanok in ihkwak ye ixnesia in kaxtilantlahtoli ye kipanawiaya in masewalahtoli wel neli ipan tlamachtilkali yehika immanon in ompa temachtilistli ye nohwiyampa ahsiah chokistlewatiw, yese ye onkan nepan netlasalo, ilwikatl itik kwikachokoa, ika wiloan kenonamikan. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. ye omito in ipan xiwitl kitlalike in intlalmomos yei tochtli xiwitl, anoso ome tekpatl sik xiwitl. aun ho iwan nikitowa onka kisas makoske alvaseas 4 pesos inik nikneltililia notlatol is niktlalia notoka iwan nofirma pedro hakobo iwan newatl migwel de san lwis eskribano. xiii akatl xiwitl, 1167 años. yexiwitl i san ok yuh katka inik chichimeka tlaihyowitinenka, iknawxiwitl i waltemoke inik motekpankaltiko axka ye unkan askapotsalko. 26. aso kemmanian kweitl, wipili, itech timopilos, ¿tleyn kikwas, tlein kis? ¿cuix ehekachichinas? ka tisewtin, ka tipahtin. in tikwawtin, in toselome. ahnoso sentetl, ontetl ixilampa, itoskatlampa wetsi in koskatl, in ketsali. ¿tleyn kis? ¿tleyn kikwas? ome tochtli xiwitl atle muchiw; nawxiwitl in aiak tlatoani katka tenochtitla. ka kinyakana in intlamakaskawan, ¡xichualcuican! yeyipwali aw inik niman owalyowak in ontsilin horasión ipampa nowiyan otlatsitsilikak in wel iskikan teopan monasterios mexiko, iwan nowiyan kwawitl okitlatlahtike in inkiyawak in intlapanko españoles, iwan kandelas sepo tlatlatlak luminarios. treintaiun sentabos; treintaiun sentabos non yehwan dos i medio. aw in ikwak okimottili in totlatokaw in testamento yehoatl okichiwtia angelina de la krus unkan kitenewtiwki [i]n kali aw ka ise[l]tsin in axkan moteilwia omotlanaoatili okimoneltilili in posesion ayak kitsinkixtis inmuchi ixkich nikan omotenew [tachado: in tepantli atenko asi] itoali yoan kali ontetl yoan itechyoko onasi akaloko onasi ompa akatitlan. kiahsiskia. kampa neh dios nechpixtok, nikan ipan in in omomikiliko in topiltsin wewe nawyotsin, in tlahtokat kulwakan onpowalonmatlaktli ipan se xiwitl; aw sa niman ipan in in omotenew xiwitl motlahtokatlali in itoka i nonowalkatl ikome tlahtowani mochiw in kulwakan. ix tochtli xiwitl, 1150 años. tlahtoltin aw in onkan kikechkotonke in tekpoyotl in axkan ik motokayotia kechwiltekkan. no nikilnamiki ihkwak sehpa, in pipilton onakakowato tiankisko in inantsin okitekimakak. miek siwatsitsintin tlayawalohtaya ompa nakanamakoyan, tekichixtaya noka in nakanamakak ihsiwilistika motekipachoaya. ihkwak yewatl in pipilton ye okitlahtlanihkeh tlen kinekia, san okihto aw in ikeilwitl in ipan hweves, okseppa senpowalonnawi tiyakawan soldadostin nikan mexiko onpewke, in om- || 282 -pa wi omotenew akapulko inik ahsiske i yaotlapiaske. "ma ka aik nimiki, in totonik. yese kimach otikpiaya sente yektik siwamistli, insenyelis angora. tlen 96 tlanawatihkayotl. iwikpa motokatlaliseh ministros tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia, in tlayakanani tlen totlalnantsin, tlatemaktilis eyi tokayotl ipan wekapa tlahtokan, tlen yewa, achtowi moixnextiseh tlen tlakameh quintocatlaliseh, kitekimakas ministro tlen ika moaxitis tlen poliwi. in tokayotl mochiwas ika ome tlen eyi tlamatlanantli tlen nochiya tlatskitokeh ipan wekapa talhtokan nopoya monechicotoseh, tlen amo panos sempoali iwan mahtlaktli tonati. tla wekapa tlahtokan amo kisenkawas ipan inin kawitl, kitekiwis ministro tlanawatili se tlakayotl tlen itokah ixnesi tlen eyi tlatemaktilihke, tlen kitokatlalis tlayekaanani tlen totlalnantsin; tla amo kiselis wekapa tlahtokan in eyi tokayotl, in tlayekanani tlen totlalnantsin kiiixtlalis se yankwik tokayotl, ken moihtowa ipan saniman tlakwilolpamitl. tla inin yankwik eyi tokayotl oksepa amo moselis, okiselis tlanawatikayotl in tlakatl tlen ixnesi ipan inin tokayotl, tlen kitokatlalis in tlayekanani tlen totlalnantsin. kema... kema cholos nopa telpokero. viii tekpatl xiwitl, 1188 años. —tla xi walwian, teteoé, ¿aquin tlatkis, akin tlamamas in tonas, in tlatwis ? ¿teca akin otimotlahtowaya? aw inik tlahtokat tulam onpowalonchiwknawi xiwitl; aw inik mochi mosenpowa in itsinekan ompa ik tlakat iwan inik mochi onen tlaltikpak in weimak epowalonkaxtoli ipan exiwitl, || 20r inik niman onkan okalakiko in omotenew sinkalko chapultepek. ka ye incha ma mouicaca’”. amo semi wehkawa, kemeh ome metsti xochiyohtok. aw in tlakateusi ipilsi akolmisi tlakatekatl mochiw; i kosiwatlani kwawaka yichpoch oselotewktli, i siwatl itoka miskixawalsi. ¿ye teneli? xochiyowa hunio wan hulio. xochiyowa marso, abril wan mayo. ¿o ach anka siawi, ontlatsiwi in yewan chane, in ipalnemoa? noseppa wi in tlakatl atonaltsin chichimekatewktli iwan itiachkawtsin tliltekatsin chichimekayaotekiwa iwan xochitsin kowayaotekiwa iwan mapiwatsin, tlekoto in ikpak in tepetl chalchiwmomostli. talmaniktsin, ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. v akatl xiwitl, 1263. onkak ome taman, se taman tiltik wan witsyoh wan se no iuki kitokaytiaj, sayoh yeh amo uitsyoj. aw niman ya yewantin in tliltike iwan achi keskintin in españoles iwan mexika sekintin in timasewaltin tlapalewike kinnapaloke in mimikke; in atle andas kipia san petlatika inik kinwikake kintokato. kanin tlakati' metoton chikitoton ikxitla meme wehwei entonses močitonia' chikitoton. tlen 119 tlanawatihkayotl. in chikawalismeh tlen sennechikolismeh kipiah tlanawatili kinmanawiseh tlaltlanawatilmeh tlen keman inchankalakiseh noso walas kwalantli tlen kiawak. tla onkas kwalantli noso tlapasolmanis iihtiko, noihki kin manahuiseh, tla ihkinon kiihtos tlahtol tekichiwali tlen tlaltlanawatili noso tekichiwani, tla yewa amo monechikohtos. se iwan se tlaltlanawatili iwan iyolo weyi altepetl, inixkawil temaktiliseh amo wekawas tlen tlahtlacolmeh, tlaixtelwilmeh noso tlatzacuiltilmeh, iwan no ihki tlatemaktiliseh tlehuelmeh, tlatekiwilmeh noso tlachiwalmeh tlen ika tlatlacohqueh, itlaneltokilis tlen seyok tlaltlanawatili tlen itechmonekis. inin malwili tekichiwali mochiwas, ika tlapalewili tlen itechpan prokuradurias generales tlen hustisia, ken moihkwilohtos ipan amatlapalewilmeh tlen ika inon, kichiwaseh tlaltlanahuatilmeh. iwikpa inon tlaasitilistli, in tlaltlanawatilmeh iwan iyolo weyi altepetl, welis kichiwaseh amatlapalewilmeh iwaya sentlanawatiloyan tekiwa, iwan yewa tlapalewis itechpan prokuraduria general tlen totlalnantsin. in tlahtlakol tlatemaktilistli keman motlahtlanis kiawak tekpan tlanawatiloyan momatis itechpan tekichiwani tlen sentlanawatiloyan, ika tlapalewili tlen tekiwa tlaxitlahketl ken kiihtowa inin amatlanawatili, in amatlahtolmeh tlen semanawak tlen intechpan moihkwiloseh iwan tlahtolpamitl tlanahuatilmeh. ipan inin tlamantli, tlaxolewali tlen tlahtolsenkahketl kititlanis mamochiwa, san ika inon iasika iwikpa kiitskiseh moaxitis expowali toanatih tlen mosentokilihtok. kenin mochiwa no moneki mah se kichipawa wan mah se kitalwi wan ompa ya taktiuj. kwalika in tlen kichiwa. in se kwali tlakowali. ye ihkwak sempoliw in tewkyotl tlatokayotl in tlatilulko; nikan motokayotia in motenewa kwawtlatoke. in akin chalanis in tlatlakos ik tlatsakwiltilos in melawak hustisia kaltsakwalos in karsel iwan ompowalpa mekawitekos teixpan yuh omotlanawatili ik okineltilili in itokatsin iwan ifirmatsin. antonio valeriano. ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. kiski in chikwasen akatl xiwitl. amo monamaka. ix tekpatl xiwitl, 1332. aw in tla imixpan nesis i hustisia kimotlakwitlawia wel yewatli in notestamento in noyolokopa nikkawtiw inik ninomakixtitiw nikan nomatika niketsa krus. kwikwikalis tlahtuli otiahkeh tehwa tikneskayoti, wikkats, ka ik quitolinizqueh, quitohtopeuhazqueh, nose ik quimictizqueh, tepiton kiwalnextih ka xochitl. mah xochiyowa ipa se taman saj. xiii kali xiwitl, 1609. san kemanian ihkion mochiwa. nonotsalistli aw i ye ixkich masewali ye ikwak kikaw in iaw in itepew tenochtitlan katka inik kalakiko tlatilulko, tokala asitimoketsako; nima ye ik motlaliko nowian tokaltitla totlapanko. onkak ome taman: se taman pisiltik wan se taman okachi wehweyi. mochiwa saj, ixwa in iteyo. nowaxka. v.- fransisko de luna ik tlanankilia konitoa ka wel tixpan nomochiw inik omonanawatia in ilamatsin katka maria xoko in iw konitotia ka nel sa nosel ka ye nonomikilis inin kali ka wel tonetolinilis tomextin i nonamik katka tomatika tictoqucihilique aw in tla se onemini noxwihoan ka nikinmakatiaskia. senka ik momawtike in mitika okikechkotonke in intekpoyow. aw in okonkawako xiwkoawatl niman ye tleko in ikpak witsilopochtli. in on tleko, niman ye ik tlapitsalo tekutsistli kikistli. in kipitsaya tlamakaske in ikpak witsilopochtli. ik niman ye kinwika in chichimeka in totolimpaneka in wewetewktli chichimekatewktli iwan ipiltsin atonaltsin kimololwitiwi in chalka akxoteka; onkan tewan yaw in toteositewktli || 51r in tekwachkawtli inik ompa kinkawato in onkan ihkak in akolakatl nawaltewktli. nimitstemas porke tlawel sannihki achi yewa ipoxak ikal oquicah. ten. niman isiwka mochichiwa in tealtin: konmakia iteuxikol, san no iwki in konmakia tlaaltili. aw niman kito in witsiliwitsin iwan in tlakatewktli in itskowatsin: "tla walano". neka kwameh huehueyih. in ihkwak in inik asiko atenko in wewetke totolimpaneka, ye oyuh nepa kimochiwilitsino in totekwiyo dios in semanawatl ye kaxtoltsonxiwitl ipan sentsonxiwitl ipan onpowalxiwitl; no iwan ye yuh nepa matlaktsonxiwitl ipan chiwknawpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolomei xiwitl mochiw in apachiwilistli semana- || -huac in motenewa diluvio, inik poliowak semanawak, in ihkwak ipantsinko mochiw in tlakatl in tlaachtopaittowani propheta noé. "ah, wahka ihkino ayok walase mahtlaktli imán yowalpa momostla noteka. aw ik niman asiko in onkan chalko atenko ipan ix kali xiwitl, 1241 años; aw inik mosenpowa in ixkichkawtika inik tlalyawaloke, inik asiko in onkan omotenew in atentlipa, nawpowalxiwtika ipan onxiwtika inik ompa walewake in inchan astlan, iwan inik onkan kisako chikomostok kinewayan. .tezcatzonco xokon i yeva istapalati () tla ok xokon i oktli ahoa. makwili tochtli xiwitl ik poliwke kowaixtlawake. tein morado se kitoka, pero tein istak amo se kitoka. itlanawkayo se kilo chichiwalayotlatetsawtli chiwawa in aso kana atlauhitik atlawkamak tlakopak tetl itsintlan kwawitl itsintlan timokochitis in aso kana timopopoliwitis mits tlatis totekuyo; kwali ta tiwalahki. in nikan siudad de mexiko a veinte i dos dias del mes de novienbre de mil e kinientos e ochenta i nweve años in yewantsin tlatowani don antonio valeriano governador hwes in ikatsinko totlatokaw su magestad in yewatl migwel de los angeles nikan chane mexiko san hwan onkan audiensia oksepa se petision okimomakili in ipanpa tlali mili tlalistakapan inik mixnamiki fransisko martin iwan in ipilwan. opehke karransistas oasito ompan toxolal. oksepa omokwekwepotsake karransistas ika sapatistas. okinchololtike sapatistas ika kwawtla nochi otli santa ana iwan san lorenso. omoktaya ken tlapopoka ika ocholoayan. amo tla oyeya mimikes nian karransista nian sapatista. in okachi weyak aw in oiw kimiktike wewe witsiliwitl in kulwake, aw sa niman ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl in 2 akatl, 1299 años, motlali in tenoch in teyakanas; ye omotenew ome akatl, inik kilpilike in ixiw in kulwakan, ompa in kitlalike. in kwowit. —tlenon timotokakonoa. oanquipiayah. in itlatokaw sa moch ewantin i tlatilolka in kololwitikate. xii tekpatl xiwitl, 1608. aw nikan powtika inik walake in intlamasewkawan in tekwanipan tlaka in kiwalyakan itoka tsiwtlakawki tsonpawa, yewatl walteomama kiwalmama in inteow katka itoka sitekatl in diablo. tlahko kilo pitsochiyawisotl omkan tiamkisko ikwak otlanki omitotike niman okonanke inon inawal ewatl okiteteke ika teistli okinmamakake inon xixipestike chichime okikwake okachi yoltepitstik no ihkwak nikan ipan in oyekaw in teokali san pablo, in san omotlapacho in iglesia. ma mikmotlasohtilikan dios nos libre micmopulwia'. no nana ilamahtika. aw inin noxokoyow, nochpuchtsin, konetsintli, tepitsin: ma iwian ma yokuxka, tonmonemitis in tlaltikpak. intla ahsi tikmotokilis, maka tle ik tonmisoloteoas. aw maka tle ik tikimontsontekonakokwis in motekuyowan, in tlatoke, in intechpa timokixti. aw in tewantin, ma mopaltsinko tontenioaske, tonitawkaioaske. tle tikmatkatsintli noxokoiow, nochpuchtsin, tepitsin: ma itlan ximokalaki in totekuyo, in tloke, nawake. ye iwi in in muchiwaia in ye wekaw in ik kwikwikoya wan itakilo tein chikawak, semi welik mah se kimana wan mah se kitsopeli ika panela. chikawak in tlalolin mochiwa ipan matlaktli kali xiwitl, in okik nesi in ilwikak wei tlamawisoli. chikometsontli wan mahtlakpwali se tonaltika otemoke sapatistas iwan okitlikechike prefektura iwan husgado sivil iwan seki kaltin. inin se kali tlatiwani tlatkiwa itokatsin lwis sevila. okimokalatitike. tetlakolti kwekwepotsaya tlaoli, awax, yetsintli iwan yolkame noihki otliwahke ipan on kali. okse tonaltika otemoke sapatistas ipan altepetl iwan okinkitskiaya tlaka ikan kintlamakatiwe kawatin iwan kimatlitiske. ye on okichiwaya sapatistas. xochiyowa itech mayo. . aw niman kitsakwiliko in puchteka yake kilwike in moteuksoma de tsikitsin ok siempre moneki mah se kichipawa. atsin niknotsa. iwan ikwak tlatsontlaliloto mexiko in totlakalakil tlaoli, kitlalika tlatsonkawali matlakxiwpa; kimoyektililike in tlahtoke, san se xiwitl in amo tewan yektiak ipan don andrés fransisko de sankta maría kalayoko chane nikan hwes governador katka. ka kisatiwi in tixkwamol in totentsonwan in isti in toxwiwan, in kikakitiwi in kihtotiwi, intla ok kisatiw in tesyo in ihkwak tlayowali mochiwatiw in kulwakan. in ikome motlali alkalde kin iyopa yewatl in don antonio valeriano telpochtli sant hwan || 64 moyotlan chane, inin ixwiwtsin in wewe don antonio valeriano. ¿toni nikwas neh? nokokoxkaiknin, tlen san mopahtis. ipan in in xiwitl onkan matlakpowalxiwitl ipan yepowalxiwitl kichiwke inik kate mexika tenochtitlan. ya mani yaoyotl chalko. 56. aw in axkan ahmo timotlatsiwititsinowa in nopampa, in ye no kwel ye tinechmolwilia, tinechmomakilia in ihkaloni, in nemowaloni. ¿auh in newatl tlein ik nimitsnotlakwepkayotililis? ¿tleyn ik nimitsnosewililis immoyolotsin, immonakayotsin? ka ok nipiltontli, ka ok nikonetontli, ka ok nitlalololowa, nitapalkamawiltia, ka ok niknawiltia in naxix, in nokwitl, ka ok nomak nikikwiya in notenkwalak, in noyakakwitl, iwan ayamo ommasi in nix, in noyolo. ikaya mokawatoya. dios nwestro señor ixochiyo mohmoradoh wan tsikitsitsin. kiski in matlaktli akatl, 1411, xiwitl. in topiltsin in se akatl ketsalkoatl nawtetl in kimama ikal, ixiteksiskal, itapachkal, iteksiskal, iketsalkal. in onkan tlatlatlawtiaya, tlamasewaya. satepan nawi iman titemonextilis. ye iw nepa chiwknawpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolxiwitl kate in mexika tenochtitlan yniqu inpan asiko españolesme. wan na nikatekis". in ikwak mike semilwitonali se sipaktli; inin inka momamal in tlachkwiteteli tenochtitla. xoxowki chilmoli ika xoletl chikintenanakat ka tel ixkich on in oti kimmakake in tihiyo in totlatol in iwki in tlakawapawaya in kwawtlaka in sakatlaka in puchteka in yake. towaxka. nima ye mopilwatia ye tlakati akolmisi san iyo okichtli, nima ye pilisiwasi, chikomoyolosi, ketsalxilosintli wakalsintli yontetoka, tlakuchkwesi, koatonalsi, moselsiwasi, xokosi. achá itech marso in xochiyowa, para todos santos chikawaya ya in itakka. mochiwa saj. tla techmakas nopa tomi kena tihchiwase", intoka pablo makwex iwan in inamik ana papan kitowan tiktokakiltilikon in hustisia inpanpan techkwilisneki totlal inwan tokal inwan tochinan chikwasentetl i nawtetl san tepitoto aw in ontetl wiwiyak san kiwikatinemi in totlal. atitla. in se kitoka wan moneki se kimewas, komo amo, waki. tlahko kilo textli tla nitlasohtlaskia se tenalistli yuhkin ihkwak choka in konetl okitlahtlachialtiokihtak se iikniw mixkolotl ahkin ok yoltok intlok in oksekih in ye mihkeh yewatl senka tlakohkoli ipampa in tepusmakwawitl in ika okimakakeh in iyaowan san mamatkahtsin itech omopacho iwan okiespohpow tlasohtlalistika okihtak yuhkin ihkwak kiniwti aka kinawahteki in ikone otlalnamik in papaya monamaka kwesalan. se kisentilia wan se tayi. maka mawi noyolo. ome xumali pitsochiyawisotl. ihkwak yah ketsalkanawtli in ompa koyowakan teyakapikito, in axkan motokayotia yakapichtlan. kiitskisnekiyaya tosiwaikniwan amo otlacuaznequiah. in ayaxkan walmokixtia immochichiwalayotsin, yehika in axkan in tlein tokommochiwilia, ka nopampa inik moxilantsinko, mokwitlaxkoltsinko, immottetsinko, omotekatinenka iwan in ahmaxkanyokatsin, immomalakapatiotsin, immotsotsopaspatiyotsin, in otinechmitili, in otinechmokwaltili, inik achitsin oniwaliskalowak, oniwalchamawak. kwaltia se kikwa chilposon oso taaman saj, komo se kineki kwali se kikwa tatsoyon. aw iska in siwapili timitsmaka ye mosiwaw, yuhkin mopiltsin tikchiwas in kowasakatsin". ma tisatsintli iwitsintli tocontitlanica”. walo atl", kiihto. aw in tsepanxowsiwatl niman ye kitowa "totecuiyo, tlein tiktokwaltiske?". kaxtolxiwitl onse in omotlahtokatiliko mexiko; yexiwitl inkisidor moyetstikatka aw niman ik kimokwili in teoyotika itlahtokayo arsobispo, matlakxiwitl in arsobispo moyetstikatka. . amo san nen walwia in iskikan tetsakwali kan onkan wal moxtlawtiwi walamasewaltiwi in ixtlawakan. v akatl xiwitl, 1471. aw in ye omosenkaw mochi ik namikos, ik niman umpa walmewiti in atlakowayan inik on omotenew sanktiago tlatilolko mowetsiltiko, inik onkan okimanilito axkan ipan omotenew domingo ik 19tia de hunio; wel ixkichtin kimanilito in tlahtoke, audiensia real tlaka oidoresme iwan alkalde de kortesme, iwan in ixkichtin siudad tlaka, inik ye mochintin kastilteka, niman ya yewantin in mexika timasewaltin, amo wel mihtos motenewas in ixkich tlakatl umpa kimonamikilito tlatilolko in wel ok ompa kimanilito. ipan nawtsontli onsempoali ommatlaktli omei xiwitl (matlactli onse kali xiwitl), mochiw inetlahtolkwepalis tlamatini in itoka galileo galilei, imixpan itetlatsontekilikawan. yewatl, kilmach, kimilwi "auh masiwi (in tlali) molini". aw ye omotenew san iw monoltitiw in andasko in inakayotsin, senkawtiw inik mochi chichiwtiw in teoyotika itlahtokamawisnechichiwaltsin ornamentos pontifikales: yewatl in iksentlamantli amito, niman ik in alba kamisatli, iwan makiltitiw in kassula morada iwan senka tlasotli in ikpaktsinko aktiw mitra kostik teokwitlaikpatika yektlamacho, iwan tlasoteyo epyoloyo imaktsinko onotiw in ichkapixkatopiltsin bákulo masitika kostik teokwitlayo in istak teokwitlatl, aw no iwi in imatsin haaktiw wandes iwan matsatsastli || 173 anilos, aw ikxitlantsinko mantiw in ibonetetsin, ikpak yetiw se istak borla inik nestiw ka maestro omoyetstikatka in ipan sankta theología, iwan in isomblerotsin wei kiltik sanno ikxitlantsinko mantiw. monamaka kwesalan, pero tein de parahko, tein de nikawín amo. no iwi tewikake no tlawtiloke tewan koskatiloke. yon axkichihki kwenta yeh kipiya problema onoixami ika atlitstik. xinechwalmalakachowilitih nisombra, aw niknokwekwexantia in nepapan awiak xochitl in wel teyolkima, awiak xochitl, in wel teyolkima, in wel tetlamachti nisihtoa ya manoso aka towan tiwalkalakini, ma senka miek in tikmamani. aw ka tel ye onimatiko, nitlanonotsathsis imixpan in tokniwan. nikan mochipa tikwaltetekiske in tlasonepapan, awiak xochitl, iwan tikwikiwi in nepapan yektli yan kwikatl. ik tikemelelkixtiske in tokniwan, in tlaltikpak tlaka, in tepilwan, kwawtliya, oselotl. 141r v kali xiwitl, 1497 años. kwaltia aw i makiske, in amo wel kimasike mexika in ikse yewatl in tenuch tlenamakak, iwan tensakatetl, iwan akasitli, iwan kwawkowatl, iwan oselopan, iwan iweltiw kwetlaxoch, iwan kwawtlix, iwan kowakotsin, iwan nakussiwatl ompa siwapili kulwakan, iwan ximatilulsiwatl, iwan nawyotsin. chikwasen aka xiwitl atle mochiw. wel yuh nemachok in mexiko ka opoliwiko opolakiko in akali in ihtik walyetiwia don rodrigo, aw ankase ye ayehekatl inpan mokets in weyapan inik ayehekatika atokotiake, aw in intlatki kiwalkwia moch atitlan kitlaske. v tekpatl xiwitl, 1328. axkan hwebes in ik 15 mani metstli mayo de 1614 años, ihkwak tlamiko in in nikan mexiko inik mopopow mosokikixti in iski akalohtli omotenew tlakpak; senka ik motolinike in masewaltin, sekintin onkan opewke in omokokoke mexika iwan sekintin altepewake, se ik momikili nikan chane san pablo tlachkwititlan. in chalchiwitl on ketsal pipixawtimania wiya no yuh ye kitowa in ayokwan yewa iwan in kwetspaltsin, nestik itsinkwahyo kwawitl aw inik kiyeyekoka atl in español, san onmotsotsonaya nepa kalyakak aw i nepamilpan aokmo wel onyaw, san walmokwepaya in atl. melak. in mochiwa kampa kitokaj, mochiwa den ome taman. in ikwouyo ahahcholtik wan mapapatawak. aw wel inoma in tlahtowani visurrei don hwan de mendosa i luna in ipan ontlahtowaya, in kimonmottiliaya tekitke inik mopahpati tetenamitl; akaltika in kimowikilitinenka, inik no iwan kimonemililiaya in kenin wel kimanawis altepetl mexiko tenochtitlan. nikan techpoloan kwawitl. wkin en krus kruskun. wehkape kwawta. ¿tlica tichoca? tlatlani in karransista. ¿ican okimitike monamik? xinechmaka señidor; noihki ikoton monamik nakis. tla amo tinechmakas nimitzmictiz. el lisensiado diego lópes bweno 12 aw niman owalake in tlaxilakaleke okineltilike kitoke wel neli ka itlalpan kinkawilitiake in isi in ikol wel iwewetlal yoan in ichinayo matlaktetl wel iw kineltilike in tlaxilakaleke pedro witsnaoatl, martin tlanaoaoa tepixke martin motok, gabriel kowatl yeoantinin in okineltilike. komo semi eliwis se totonia, se tasentilia : limahxiwit, xokoxiwit, chichikxokoxiwit, xipohlimahxiwit, pinawitsxiwit wan itskwinpahwitsxiwit, in amo pahti, sayoh para se kikwa in ixiuyo. se kikohkotona in xiutsin wan se kipantemilia xokoyolemol, konamo se kitalilia nakastekilit, ka welik kisa emol. seko sah kimanah wan kiakoluiaj. aw in ompa chikomostok, inik onkan kisako, inik onpan walewake inik owalnenenke inik ompa owalake, in tlahtowani walmochiwtia itoka hekatsintewktli chichimekatewktli tlakitskaliwki; inin tlahtowani wel yewatl kwawtsonyotl xinachtli omochiw intlahtokatlakamekayotika. aw in axkan ikmakwililwitl viernes sankto se tsilini ye tlatwitiw ok wel yowaltika, in okiske inik yankwikan otlayawaloke ika inetokilitsin totekwiyo dios in sankta krus kontsinko tlaka; san yewatl deán lisensia iwelitsin kinmomakili, ipampa pleito kintlalili kimixnamikia in hernando de san martín tewkxochitsin chane san pablo tlachkwititlan, amo kinekia inik nonkwa tlayawaloske, san kinekia inik onkan mosenchiwas in tsontekompa san pablo, inik moteilwi ixpan provisor doktor don hwan de salamanka inik amo kisaske nonkwa. iwan nikitowa hok sentetl kali xochimilkopa itstikak onkan onok tlaixiptlayotl ikpak ikak sentetl kali inik omotamachiw in itepots omatl aw in [inac]az senmatl iwan senmitl in i nikmaka [innona]mic omito. in kwamekat. ixpantsinko walake melchior dias martin sanches gaspar de akino chaneke santa maria teskatsonko in tlatoltika okinmononochili konitoke ka in yewatl omomikili antonio sanches technawatitia inik ipan titlatoske in animan inikmisa ipan mitos iwan tiknamakaske in ikal in itlal. iwan ikwak kimixtekwakwilotike in teokali in atenamitl in tekpantok tlapanixkwak, itenkopatsinko mochiw in totatsin frai herónimo de sárate; ikwak yekaw in temimilchayawak inik motlapacho in tlamayekampa. entonses kitohke bweno entonses kititlania' yas mayaw in eskwela. ¡tehhua xiktsakwili! ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. ipan nawtsontli onchikompoali omome xiwitl mochiw anglitlalpan wei itlachalilis kwikapikilistli motokayotia in "messiah", in okiyokoxka wei teutonkwikamatini in itoka george friederik hándel. achtopa kinchichiwa in itlaaltilwan kimmaka in intech powi in tilmatli in maxtlatl in kweitl in wipili in kwetentli konakia in itenko; titlanamakaskeh tlen 60 tlanawatihkayotl. in altepeyotl tlayolkayotl tlen moixnextia ipan 41 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili, ikwalitaka tlen kiihtos tlahtol tlanawatili, tematiltis ipatih tlapehpentli tlen tepantlahtoanih iwan wekapah tepantlahtoanih tlen se iwan tlapehpentli weyi sehka altepeyotl iwan se iwan se tlen tlaltlanahuatilmeh; tlatemaktilis amatl tlen intechpowi tlaixnextilmeh tlen achi miak moaxkatiseh tlaixwasantli iwan tlatemaktilis tlen wekapah tepantlahtoanih tlen achtowi nelkentsih ken moihtowa ipan 56 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili iwan tlahtol tlanawatili. noihki kiihtos ipatih iwan tlatemaktilis tepantlahtoanih ken kihtos tlahtolpewalistli tlen tlaixnextilistli tlapowali ken kiihtowa 54 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili iwan tlahtol tlanawatili. in tlahtolmeh tlen kiihtoseh ipatih, tlen tlatemaktilistli amatl iwan tlatemaktilistli tepantlahtoanih noso wekapah tepantlahtoanih welis kitsakwiliseh ipan kaltlanawatiloyan tlen tribunal elektoral tlen poder hudisial tlen federasión, ken moixtlalis ipan tlahtol tlanawatili. in tlasenkawalmeh tlen kaltlanawatilmeh tlen moihtowa ipan tlahtoltlahkwiloli tlen onpanok, san welis kiihitas sala superior tlen yewa tribunal, ika tlahtolkotontli tlen tlahtol nechikolismeh welis tlatemaktiliseh san keman tlahtlakoli kiixnextiseh welis kipatlaseh tlen kisato ipan tlapehpentli. tlasenkawali tlen kaltlanawatiloyan amo mopatlas iwan amo welis mokotonas. in tlahtol tlanawatili kiixtlalis tomin tlaxtlahuilmeh, tlanekili tlen kanin walah iwan kenihki mochiwas inin tlahtolkotontli. kema sampa noha kinechkawiski ihtik in ome litro atl motlalia xonakatl, yei axoxtlantli iwan istatl; ihkwak ye kwakwalaka ye motlalia in sosoltin in ye kwali tlapaktli; ihkwak ye tlawikxitili ye mokixtilia in istayutl; ye motesi in okse axoxtlantli ika in oregano iwan tepitsin istatl; inin textli moxahwilia in totomeh iwan motsoyonia ipan sokikaxitl ika ome xumali pitsochiyawisotl. seki yepasohkilmaitl no kwaltia para nexwitil wan para yon kouamej: nantli okinek in xochimila tlakwalmakas. yewa awel mowantsinko yas ipampa se imaiknin kichixtika. —pus ye'on kikonteneroayan in paran rebolúsion wan apistli apistli wala pero ahmo tipadeserohke tanto in apistli. okseppa kilwi in tliltekatsin: "auh kan tiyaw, kan titlamatiw?". monamaka kwesalan wan no nikawín. in ikse ichpoch itoka papaloxochtsin, inin kiwalan in don hernando de gusmán omakatsin teowatewktli tlalmanalko. kiilwi "kani tinechkawili nokone? ih iw nikmati inik patlawak senpowalmatl ipan chikwematl aw inik weyak honpowalmatl ipan chikwematl in itlal katka in akamapichtin in itatsin katka in axkan mexiko governador in tlatoani in don lwis de santa maria iwan in itoka don martin momawti ka omextin ipilwan katka in akamapichtsin. walewake ( 7r umotlaliko tlemako, no unka motlalmomostike; kin unkan kitlalike in kiwalyaka apantewktli, sa walwewechiwtia in kwawtliketski; uxiwtike in unka. aw intla omokaw ix xochitl in yetl in tlakwali in kakawatl in chikiwitl in mulkaxitl is sokitekomatl ik kittaya in ok seppa mochiwas tekwanotsalistli in ahmo poliwi. iuki kitokaitiah tak por in takwawak ke-meh tet. makwilmalinali, san ye onkanpoktlan, tlapalan, yekoyaochiwa o in mexika. aw i ye yuh unkan onoke tisaapa, nima ik wi kitlatlawtiske in kolwaka tlatoke, kimonilwia “nopiltzintziné, tamechtoyolitlakalwiske, ka achitsi tokontlalisneki tlalmomostli in unka oantechmotlaucolilique”. kwaltia se tonaltika amo molinike nian sapatistas nian karransistas. otekahke ma motokakan mimikes. de in, ipa se taman saj. aw inik nowian aw inik kaltsalan in altepeyotl mexiko, itlok inawak in otlih kokoton in tlani in kampa tlatlakomoliwtika in amo wekapanixtok tlalpantli, san tel yewatl in apachiw. mexikayaokiske iwan yaokiskayakanki in itoka saragosa, kimpewah galitlaltekah in onkan itawkayo motokayotia "inecaliliz in pwebla". ihkiya nopa asta nama kwatitla elkí kekexikilit oso kwapitsokilit namakok mochiwa kampa eski kajfentaj, ixtawat oso kwouhihtik. entonses owala' para kwal tlamotlatewa in sowatl listón pero sin ke mokwitlapantlachalis. sanno ihkwak titlanililoke nanawi tomin servisio, yaoppa tlakalakili. aw in yewatl, ¿cuix achi in mellelmah? ¿cuix noso pinawak? ¿cuix noso ik mizahuih? ompa walewak in tulan kiwaltepotstoka in ketsalkowatl, aokkan kittak inewan moyaochiwaya; iksen onkan kalakiko in sinkalko, in iw kihto sekintin wewetke, mati neltilistli yuh mochiw. aw in kinpewalti ye kinpipilowa christóval tranpipitl mulato, matlaktli tsilini ipan kwarta hora in tlaka ihkwak yankwikan kipalewi in ipiltsin yniqu inewan tepiloke onkan tekpan kiyawak. antonio martín markés aw in yewantin sankta krus kontsinko tlaka, ye o- || 212 -mihto, wel sa ok yowaltika in tlayawaloke inik ayak senka kimittas, yuhkin san ichtakatlayawalo, inik possesión konanke ika tlayawalolistli iwan inik atle pena kinwikilis, ipampa provisor in okik ixpan katki ineteilwil hernando de san martín tewkxochitsin. nima ye kilwia kwawtliketski “xicuica nochpotsi, ma ika timocacayauh”. ne ya yato, tlehkotiyahki okito in testigo ka wel melaoak in nikitoa ka wel axkaoa katka in itoka hwan kwawtsetseltsin aw ka nixpan in kinamakak kikowili in angelina de la krus yesempoali onmatlaktli xiwitl kimakak makwili peso. skiera para niyemanixtas ihteki. tasohkamatik. aw ka niman ik kiwalsow in istak itilmah, ik okikwexanotikakka xochitl, aw in iw waltepew in ixkich nepapan kax in kenin tlayekoltiloya in tonatiw in semilwitl, in seyowal aw intla ka ayak itatsin intla on ka ipiltsin yewatl kiwika omextin tleko ohome kitki in iwitopili. in ipan in onkan onok in kwawitsatsin in texkalko || 126r omemasak in ikpak amakeme, walachixtinemi in tsakwaltitlan tenanko. nikxikitta mikistli san ninotolinia. ¿quen nel nokonchiwas? ayano ya neli. a in antlayokoya, in ankwahkwalani. in manel ketsaltew in newan in ye tonmani, in manel kaskatew in ye tonkate, ayano neli a in antlayokoya, in ankwahkwalani. sebastian tonewa... aw pedro xwares, martin ximon martin...hin tewantin audiensia titlanawatilwan... tiktlalia totoka iwan tofirma. pasó ante mi fransisko garsia eskribano pedro sanches algwasil.i. wan se kiketsa ya atol wan tahko oksi atol se kipantemilia kwouhelot tamanal ya wan pewa tsatsayani wan se kitsopelia atol, mohmoloxtik kisa kwouhelot. ome noso yeyi metstli kipia nochtin tlen momachtiske in kwikatl. wel miak namechtlatlawtia makamo ka tlakotona nian se tonali. onkwan on kwali kisas kwikatl. amoka moixpolos, amoka motlapololtis iwan kwali kitos cuicatl. aw in yewantin nikan tlaxilakaleke amo yuh kimattikatka intla iwan okinnamakilti tottatsin tlali, san ik kwalanke in kikakke tlaxilakaleke inik onkan ye kinkixtilisneki inkrustsin, inik ye mixnamiki. kwikkatli kikaki akin onechnots kilmach yeilwitl i ye tekwalpolowa in copil”. ¡tlen san wel tsikitsin inin piltsintli! tlen san wel kwakwaltsin inin weyi altepetl. noyuhki mihtoa yewatl on, witsilopochtli imachiyo katka inik altepetl kitsintiske in onkan intech moneki semikak mochantiliske. inin wel neltilistli; in ipan xiwitl. istatl, ixkich in monekis ye nonnokwiltonowa,on nitepiltsin, nesawalkoyotl. 46. iwan intla tinotsalos ahmo oppa, ahmo expa, ahmo miekpa tinotsalos, san seppa; niman timoketstewas inik ahmo titlakwalanis, inik ahmo titolinilos in ipampa ahmotetlakamachilis. intla itla tilwilos, tinawatilos, titekiwtilos, wel tikkakis, wel tikmoyolotis inik ahmo tikilkawas, iwan wel tikchiwas, ahmo tikkwekwepas, ahmo tikiilochtis, ahmo tikxoxopewas, ahmo tikmamayawis in tlahtoli. intlakamo wel tikchiwas, san iwiyan, san yokoxka titlanawatis; ahmo san ik timokekelos, ahmo san teka timokakayawas, ka mitsmottilia in totekwiyo, sa neli in tikihtos in tlein ipampa ahmo wel tikchiwas. ye xik mosenmaka itlan xaki xik motlakwammaka ik xi motetsilo in tlaihiyowilistli. tokafen. iwan senka chikawak in yekene momanako kokolistli matlaltotonki in ipan in omotenew metstli marso, inik mikowak inik mochi ipan nowiyan nweva españa; in onpa ik walpewtika itsinekan in ipan in omotenew xiwitl, ixkichkaw nekokolok iwan mikowak, inik yekene axkan chikawak ye mochiwa kokolistli, momikilia in timasewaltin iwan españoles. inik ehekamah se tlakoyoktli toixpan ka. inik okse amameh ome tlakoyoktin mapochpan cateh. nawatlakah momachtihkeh ipan seminario de kultura nawatl onkan noseppa ye tlahtokati in totoltekatl tsonpachtli. inik omotamachiw estaka oniktetetsontson imixpan omochiw in onkan tlaxilakaleke kopolko merino pedro gaspar, pedro elias, gaspar kwawtli kwepopantlaka, pedro tesi, pedro kwetspal, pedro tepalekok, melchior gaspar, fransisko lwis algwasil martin nalpan, algwasil iwan regidor pedro de santa maria martin ximenes aw yewatsin testigos. sanyeno ihkwak otemachti iwan okimochiwili wei itekiw teikniwtsin bernardino de sahagún. aw yewatl ikei inkisidor mochiwtsino in lisensiado granero de ávalos, aw satepan mochiwtsinoto obispo in ipan altepetl i motenewa charkas in onpa ipan pirú, ompa momikilito. istak itohmitl, texoxoktik ixtelolowan iwan ikwitlapiltomawak iwan tlapochintik. komo se kitoka mayo, xochiyowa hunio. nepa eliskí nopa atl weyi de se kahfemewa iwan se kichipawa ya. mochiwa ahkwakopa, ne la galera wan xokoyolo. sente ahkopechtli itsintla kwawitl ka. ihkion nik chia. ye onech xihtlati inin amo kwali nemilistli ipan in weyi tlatsontekiloyan altepetl. inpan in notlamian nemilisxiwih san pahpakilistli niktemoa. tlensan ninekiskiaya in ixtlawapa niknextis. neh amo keman nikwa. axkan lunes ik 31 de agosto de 1609 años, ikwak okwakwamiminalok opahpakowak nikan mexiko tenochtitlan unkan seral kiyawak ipampatsinko ik kis in ilwitsin sant ipólito mártir patrón in nikan siudad mexiko. maria chane tlatilko kipie notomin vi pesos san no ikpatl ik kichiwa inin ma isiwka kixtlawas. aw in ipan omotenew domingo in itlamian metstli febrero, ikwak neske in alkaldesme nawkampa mexiko tenochtitlan, ye oiw yalwa sabadotika tlaliloke in san hwan moyotlan san ya yewatl in telpochtli don antonio valeriano iwan don diego en blanko in alkaldesme; aw in sant pablo yewantin motlalike in don migwel sánches iwan don bernabé en blanko; aw in sant sebastián motlalike yewantin in tlakatl don diego lwis de motewksoma iwan melchior en blanko; aw in sankta maría motlalike yewantin in matía en blanko iwan sebastián en blanko. viii tekpatl xiwitl, 720 años. aw niman imatika okimokwili okimotennamikili aw niman nixpan in neoatl neskribano yoan testigos tlasintlan titoteneoaske imatitech okimanili in maria geronima okimokalaki sentetl itik kali tonatiw ikisayampa itstikak. ma nihkixti ni tlamantli wan tihwikas aw yewatl ikome visurrei mochiwako in wewe don lwis de velasko, kavalero ompa intechkopa kisa itlakamekayowan in pipiltin in yaoyotl intekiw in ompa chaneke in kondestable de kastila; in otlapacho niman ikwak ixkichika in ipan xiwitl de 1550 aw ixkichika asiko yewatl ipan xiwitl de 1564, momikili mexiko, ompa toktitok in inakayo sankto domingo; in tlahtokat matlaktlonnawi xiwitl. in ika in imiltekiwtsin iwan okse tlatekipanolistli in kimochiwiliaya in ihkwak ahmo in milachialoya notahtsin wel okimonechikalwi san kwali in tlatkitl iwan kwalyotika kimopiliaya in ikaltsin yuhkin kateh in kwali miltekitkakali okimokowi iwan no okimonechikalwi tomin istakteokwitlayo tlakohkowaloni 0720 in ayokmo kimopowiaya sehsen ahnose ika se tepuskomitl kan yewatsin kimopiliaya in iteokwitlatlatlatiltsin inontin tepuskomitl in ika kinamakayah in chiltlachiwtli noponi monextik sintli. mah kwaltsin mowikakan aw sa niman ik omotlahtokatlali in axayakatsin, inin ipiltsin in tlahtokapili tesosomoktsin, aw yekwel ixwiw in itskowatsin in axayakatsin. —tle' akmo timotlachaltia. in kwowit. yewantin kitokayotike atlakwiwayan iwan inin altepepan kinextike atlatl iwan mitl. atlakwiwayan san nawxiwtike. kixima nopa elotl aw niman walmoman in metstli hulio, in ipan in mani kiyawitl. aw ik motokayoti in teopan la visitasión deskalsas. san nikitowa, san ni kakamatsin, san nikilnamiki in tlatowani nesawalpila. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian in ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. kontlachinolpipitstika in itlekatsin, manel iwikentel popokatika. . in ihkwak in ye om pewa anawak puchteka onkan moxelowaya in tochtepek: sentlamantli ompa kalakia in anawak ayotlan, no sentlamantli ompa kalakia anawak xikalanko. ihtik in atekochtli ammo san atl oahsia noyuhki motepewtitlaliaya teme tlasolali tlali ihkwak motemitiaya in atlalili kahxilia tlahkopa san tlali oyeya in itoka achitometl onkan tlahtowani in kolwakan, aw in ipiltsin itoka akxokwawtli ka no tlahtokat in satepan in kolwakan. ye ixkich tonekixtil tikchiwa ik timitskimiloa in timonanwan in timotahuan. onkanik owalkisaya in sitlali in sitlali popoka popoka la kometa. xkintatawti nakonime kiawteyome wan amo nikahsi. aw kiski in chikome tekpatl xiwitl. komo kanah ika tekokoj, semi kwali mah se kitsontewi axox wan se motalilia ika aseite wan ika xomet. nikán derecho monamikia' de nikán. aw iwan ye chiwknawpowalxiwitl ipan matlaktlonnawi xiwitl in ipan 1 akatl xiwitl, 1315 sik años, in omomikili in tlakatl in ikome witsiliwitl tlahtowani katka tenochtitlan, in tlahtokat senpowali ipan makwili xiwitl; aw sa niman ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl motlahtokatlali in tlakatl chimalpopoka tlahtowani tenochtitlan. se tekpa xiwitl poliw tepanekatl; ikwak mik askapotsalko tlatoani maxtlatsi, san exiwitl tlatokat askapotsalko. yewiptla onechtlahpaloko momaiknin. popotomekat "achi kwali nama na no ma nika motlanika nima ye i konitoa motitlanke “ca okimanili in kwawtemoksi, i siwakoatl aw i wisnawatl; a yewanti komati in kanpa ka, ma quinmotlatlanili”. iuki monotsa por in chichiltik. in mochipautani, moneki mah se kinehmachpia. seki kihtawah xochiyowa itech mayo wan seki itech enero.. kwawpetlapan,oselopetlapan,onewatika in amokol, in axayaka. walewake omotlaliko tekixkiak, motlalmomostike, uxiwtike. mano' tia nikilwia konke muchi nehwa. aw in ompa motlahtokatilito xalixko san onxiwitl ipan nawi metstli; aw in motokak inakayotsin iglesia mayor onkan in mikiltitikak sankto krusifixo. inin kali iwaxka inse nomaiknin. no monamaka. kema yawi kiitati ya cholo. tehwan tiamiquih. —tlesanunka' tlaxkali se rato oksepa nias se molino. ye nosepa ikwitlawik ya, sa ye no yehoatl in kitokake in unkan kiske ye no umotekato in tetskoko. se xiwitl kipia kaxtoli iwar yeyi powali iwan makwili tona li. in se kimewa sikierah naupa oso makwilpa para mah motohtomawa. boi ke nimikmaka se baraso machkitoa. inin tlakatsintli semi yolyemanki. nikan ipan in in omikiko in koxkoxtli tlahtowani kolwakan, in tlahtokat senpowalxiwitl ipan chikoxiwitl; onkan koton in tlahtokayotl. achtopan oyake wewe imaltepew chololtecah, in imikniwan mexikah catcah. nikan san ipampa ichikotlamatilis kaxtilyakanki, sanyenoyewatl tenawati ma miktiloh wel miekintin in amo tlahtlakolehke chololtecah. axkan sábado in ik 2 mani metstli febrero de 1613 años, wel ipan ilwitsin totlasonantsin purifikasión, ihkwak onkan teopan totlasonantsin sankta maría nwestra señora de monserrate tekixkipan omonetoltiko onkan professión kichiwako in tlakpak omotenew don lwis alsega ibargwen kavalero del hábito de alkántara, inik komendador telpokatsin, aw inik kichiwako onkan professión || 202 yewatl imaktsinko in padre prior frai bernardino de argedas teopixki san benito in onkan kimopialia teopankali nwestra señora monserrate; yehika ipampa inin teopixke monges in inteotlatekpannemilitsin in kinmotlalilitewak regla ipan monemitiske, inik kinmonawatilitewak in omotenewtsino intlasottatsin san benito patriarcha. tein chikawak ya in exot, kwali se kikwa taamanal. in ok nen aka moteikusilisneki, sa chimaltitla. aw ikwak nikan walkalak in chimaltewktli tlahtowani kalixtlawakan, nawxiwtiko in mexiko; aw sano yewatl okiwake in onokasito in imaltepew, kin yewatl kitlekechito in inteokal katka in kalixtlawake. amo xikelkawa nehin favor tein nimitstatawtia. pus kema yawnihkixtis tlenkwa' gana para akin oksé tokakiw para tehwanke akin xa satepan tehwan titokake. in ipan axkan mierkoles ik kastolilwitl mani metstli de noviembre de mil e kinientos ochenta i nweve años i yewatsin don fransisko de la krus don migwel sanches hwan garsia regidor hwan de sanktiago okseppa axkan okimottilito in mili in kimotlaltia fransisko martin. istatl, ixkich in monekis aw san ya yewatl ipan in in metstli omotenew oktubre, in opewke mexika tenochka itenkopatsinko in visurrei don hwan de mendosa i luna inik otekitke, inik kichiwke kipahpatike kiyankwilike in tetenamitl i nowian oitlakawka in okokoyonka, in iksen ikwak tlachiwtli in ipan tlahtowani wewe don lwis de velasko visurrei in ipan 12 tekpatl xiwitl 1556 años. aw in oyuh momikili in tisosikatsin, aw san niman ikwak motlahtokatlali in iteikkaw itoka awitsotsin tlahtowani tenochtitlan, inin sanno ipiltsin in axayakatsin. mohmostla 4. yehika ka yewatsin okimihtalwi, okimoyokolili, okimoyekalwi inik otiyol, inik otitlakat. ma tikmolkawili in kkmilwitl, in se yowal. xikmonochilitinemi, xikmotlatlawtilitinemi, xklsisiwtinemi, xitlaokoxtinemi. makamo iwiyan in kochistli, in netekistli, in xikmochiwili. ma ontlami immixtsi immoyolotsin in itechpatsinko in totekwiyo yehika ka mottatsin, ka omitsmochiwili. ya atl kiwalik. pehke san motlajtlachiliyaj. aw inin omotenewtsino mikkatsintli padre pedro de morales inik walmowikak españa ka oidor walmochiwtsinotia, umpa mowikaskia in nwevo granada pirú, aw nikan mexiko in kimoyolotiliko totekwiyo dios inik nikan mokalaki nikan kimokwili in hábito de la kompañía de hesús, inik onkan axkan okimopolwiko totekwiyo dios, okimowikili in ichantsinko ilwikak ka nel okimotlayekoltili; ma kimotimalwi. nikan ipan in momikiliko in ikome itoka yowalatonak in ikkaxtoli tlahtowani kulwakan, in tlahtokat chikwexiwitl. in ipewyan in nawpowali xiwitl ahnoso achto sekih tlakah okiyelismakakeh in masewaltlakanechikoli inik kelewiayah kichiaskeh in makwili makwilpowalxiwtilistli in ikatlachiwalistlaxehxelolistli in ipan tlasempanawia altepetl inik moteihtitis in masewaltlamatilistli ahmo mihki yehika wel melawak momehmelawa ika isenchikawalis iwan kipia iyolamachilis inik tenenewkawis inik ma mosenketsa in itlamatilis in ika ichikawalis ma tlahkwilolo tomasewalahtolkopa yuhkin san niman iwan satepan yolamachilistli in mochiwa saj. ¿ye ya tle in nolwil?, iwan in ipan in ipewayan in omotenew yankwik xiwitl iwan metstli henero, ihkwak opowaloke yekwel ixkich chikwasenpowali in onkate in españoles iwan españolas teoyotika nenke in okikwike in itlakentsin in iavitotsin totlasothatsin san fransisko, in kiyawak tlaka in omopowke in iexkan tlatekpampantsinko i ye motenewa la tersera orden de san fransisko, in san inchachan kipia kimonemilistia in tokichtin iwan siwa in iexkan tlatekpantsin señor san fransisko, in omotlalike nikan ipan wei altepetl siudad mexiko tenuchtitlan. okachi kwali ihkin. ihkwak se totonia, moneki amo tlakwas. ¿ yeotikimitak in mimistin iwan chichimeh aik tlakwah ihkwak mococoah? iwan ihkin ka sekin tonaltin oncehuih. ihkwak titotoniah amo kwali titlacuaxqueh, san tikiskeh naranhaayotl noso toronyaayotl. ihkwak tepitsin yetimayanah, santepitsin tlakwali iwan miak limonayotl. noihki moneki tokwitlaxkolchipawaskeh ka sente yamanki yamatstli, ihkion tikotonaskeh in kokolístli. aw ka nikan oimixpantsinko tinesiko in yewatsin hwes governador iwan alkaldes ordinarios inik tik[...] tomines in napoali iwan makwili pesos wel tomatika to[...] aw in ixpan testigos don hwan de la krus regidor mayor[...] hernandes regidor lorenso de pas regidor migwel hernandes aw inik kimoneltililia intokatsin in infirmatsin iwan in tewan titlanamakani nikan tiktla[lia] [to]toca iwan tofirma. iwan newatl neskrivano nixpan aw axkan ipan omochiw inin karta de benta ipan martes kaxtoliwitl omome mani agosto de 1599 años. diego de mendosa alkalde geronimo lopes fransisko sanches hwan hernandes alkalde baltasar martines alkalde migwel hernandes eskrivano. in ni axayaka sa nikiyatemoa. in techkawako in tesosomoktli, notlayokol a nokonayaihtoa yan sayio. nima ye kwitlawakatl, walteyaka yayawkixiwitl. aw kin oyuh nepa chikonpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolomome xiwitl in ipan i se akatl xiwitl, 1051 años, mowikak in topiltsin akxitl ketsalkowatl inik tonatiw ikisayampa itstia, inik ompa || 35r poktlantito tlapalantito, ka ok matlaktlonsexiwti in onkan katka tulam in oiw momoyawake tulteka sekintin omikke. wan moaxka chichime", ihkino kiihtok. aw in axkan in itoka pedro hakobo ixwiw iwan in inamik maria kikowa in kali in kitema in tomines sempowali pesos imisa ipam mitos in omik alonso tokatl iwan inamik. sakalimon aw in omotenew alkaide inik kimiktike san kikokotekke, niman onkan ik momikili; aw in okomentin san kinxixilke, inik kinmiktike yowaltika. sokiayotl tlen: in ik om pewa weka ok nowian kinemitia kitlatlattitia kitlatlachieltia in intlatoltika in iwkan kwawtla sakatla in amaxkanwia in puchtekayotl in ostomekayotl. i nomiw i notlawitol nimitsmaka, ka in onkan in senkistok i nomekaw i notapayol; aw in tlein tikiximati in nikan xikkwa, ka ye notlalikwilolpan ye notlatsonilpilpan". aw inin mochiw ipan ik 20 enero ipan ilwitsin sant sebastián. tekwanenepil oso nakasburokilit kwaltia tlaayahtok imohwanti intekitise. aw in ikwak okimokakilti in yehoatsin governador niman inomatsinko omowikak in ipan tlayakatl santa ana witsilan inik kimomakilis posesion in kalkowki ana xwares. wan tohwanti ya mero nima ye ik motemoa teukwitlatl, tetlatemolilo ye tetlatlanilo in asok aka achi teukwitlatl i chimaltitech tlawistitech okikwik okimopielti, in anoso itentew itenpilol in anosok aka okitla okikistili in itewa in aso teukwitlatl in anoso iyakamets anoso inpilol. hitekok ipan tlatlatsin teokali, san sakali katka, itokayokan tso[n]molko iteopan in xiwtekutli. ahmo tilawaya, san awachkiawia in iw tetsammachok: iw mitoa in sa san tonalwitekok. ahmo kakistik in tlatlatsinilistli. ait keyéh ihkón kitokaytiaj. sempoali nohpali aw sepan inik omoteilwike inixpan don lukas garsia hwes katka in onkan ipan omotenew siudad aw kanaskia in isiwaw in nomotenew kwata san mokokoxkanenek kimiltika kiwalahatiake in onpan moteilwike inixpantsinko in don hwan de los angeles governador katka in nikan ipan omotenew siudad aw san motlati in isiwaw katka in omotenew kwata. aw in axkan ka ye oniwia ka ye onitlachiato in kanin kwalkan yekkan, in sano yuhkan in in onkan no mani senka wei in ateskatl; moch onkan mochiwa in ixkich amotech monekis, atle poliwi, in nikan onka moch no ompa mochiwa; ka amo nikneki in nikan amechpopoloske. nima ye mestitla, nima yaotlato mikwaka; nima ... . wan asta nepa yato. kaxtoli chilpitsawak ahnoso kwawchili i tekpatl xiwitl, 1324. tlen onentaya aihmo ok asia misa. aihmo wel omotekipachoaya tlikan ye tlaka kasike. seki siwame motlaliaya mosewiske nokaw seki oyaya tiankisko tlakoaske tlen inon kikwaske tlakotonali. iwan omolwiaya topan otlakaktiak; ipampa on aihmo tihkake misa. ma tosewikan iwan san niman tiaske tihmotlapalwiske tomawistikteko idios. 2 tochtli xiwitl, 1286. ta litenantsi mochiwa saj. ixiuyo no pahti. ¿de kani nimopalewis? axkan kema, ika nochin fwersas noyolotsin. konitoa “ca kemaka. ane. achiwki mochi in nanakatl mowikxitis yuhkin inin. wahkapa kichihke aw in tlamiko inik kinpiloke omotenewke tliltike ye se tsilini, wel yei hora in kinpiloke. tlasohkamati, karlohtsin. tonochtin tipacticateh, amo ihkion nonantsin ka tepitsin mokokolo. ye inihkwak notahtsin omomikili wel tesesel momatilo. inewai. nokn i h u a n omosowahtihkeb iwan a x k a n gwadalahara chantih. 8 aw in ipan domingo a a 20 de hunio, ikwak yekene motlayawalwi motlatokilti in sakramento, inin san wel ok mixkawi in iglesia mayor tlayawalolok; aw ixkich mochiw in papakilistli masewalistli, xochilakatsoke, miek tlamantli mochiw inik motimaloke in mexika iwan tlatilolka, iwan amo san kexkich in andas tlayawalo iwan in vanderas. in tlatekki tlanononotsali, nonotski, nonotsale, tlaximatini. ihkwak mochiwas in burrito, ahso okachi kwali mochiwas ika xiwtoktsin. inin moihseki ika ahmo wei tletl, ahso okachi kwali ipan sokikomali. motlalia in wei kaxitl tleko iwan nikan motlalia in tlatsopeliloni; ihkwak inin ye atik ye motlalilia in tlaoli in ye tlahsektli iwan molinia tlasemmanka; mochia ma itstia iwan ye wel mokwas. wan i maistro techchistika para tonechikoske timochtin. aw senka mawistik inik tlayawalolok inik kinmokawiliko, nowian walake in teopixke in iskikan moyetstikate. kilwih in itlahtsin ka ye neli ka niman ikwak in quimopahtilih, iwan wel kimottiw is san no wel ye iwkatsintli in iw kimottititsinoaya in imach, iwan kimolwilih in kenin yewatl ok okimotitlanilih mexikko in kittas obispo. aw ma no in ikwak yewatl kittatiw ma wel m'¿ch ik kixpantis, kinohnotsas in tlein okittak, iwan in kenin tlamawisoltika oquimopahtilih. aw ma wel iw kimotokayohtilis tna wel iw motokayohtitsinos in senkiska ichpochtsintli santa maria de gwadalupe in itlasohixiptlatsin. aw niman ik kiwalwikkakkeh in hwan bernardino in iixpan tlahtoani obispo, in kinohnotsako in iixpan tlaneltiliko. xii tochtli xiwitl antle ipa mochiw. in ipan nawtsontli onchikompoali onchikwase xiwitl, titlano nikan méxiko, yuhkin itlahtokateixiptlatsin yankwik hispantlali, tewktli in itoka fransisko de güemes i horkasitas, in akin katka ikonde in revilagigedo. aw nikihtoa ya, tlakaso amo kwalkan in tlaltikpak ye nikan; tlakaso ok sekni in wilowayan, in onkan ka in netlamachtili. ¿ tle san nen in tlatikpak? tlakaso ok sekni yolilihximoayan. ma ompa niaw, ma ompa inwan nonkwikati in nepapan tlaxototome, ma ompa niknotlamachti yektli ya xochitl, awiakaxochitl, in teyolkima, in san tepakka, teawiakaiwintia, in san tepakka awiaka iwintia. san magdalena axkinchihki kwenta nikan tewtli mokets, ik mayanalok. mah quitatih. ¿quenin mokwitiah in mahtlaktli iwan ome metstin in xiwitl? vii kali xiwitl, 17. istatl, ixkich in monekis in kwali se kikwa taamanal oso chilposon oso komaltaixkal. san ye ik nochoka aya in ik no tlatsiwis in ipalnemoani. chalchiwitl tlapani, ketsali posteki. ti mokekeloa o antake antel ipan tech mati, —keme' yekemanon kwalikak manta nechilwia nech para nehwa. ¿quexquich ipatin inin kawayo? niman ye ik no seppa ki walalia kinonotsa kimaka intenyo inkwawyo in wewetlahtuli in atl sesek in tsitsikatsli itech kipachowa tlahko yahki para nikanika nepa wehutla. ya nesi para kena konewika titlanamakaskeh in ipampa ik ye konmatiskia nowiampa in altepetl, ipampa ka senka teisawi in manka kiyawitl in ipan ikwak in omotenew xiwitl, in amo mach iw mochiw in ye onxiwitl ipan tlakoxiwitl inik apachiowak inik kiyaw, in ipantsinko yewatsin mochiw tlahtowani visurrei don hwan de mendosa i luna markés de montesklaros. xinechmaka kwenta. ompa mowikaske kimasikaitilitiwi in tlali in mili in iw katki iwan niman kimochiwiliske hustisia inik tsonkisas tlatoli yuh motlanawatili in nikanka itokatsin ifirmatsin. antonio valeriano. pasó ante mí migwel monise eskribano. aw in ixkich notepostoton in notlatekipanowaya okatka ka nel ye ixkich kawitl in ninokokowa mochi omonanamakak onotech monek. tlahko kilo chilakachtextli pero nama tihkowase se kampana viii kali xiwitl, 1305. aw inin omotenew siwapili inik ompa yah españa, san kinkawtia yeintin in ipilwan: in ikse yewatl in don fernando altamirano komendador sanktiago, aw in okomentin monhastin onkan kate intlan || 219 in imawitsitsinwan in onkan monasterio totlasonantsin regina angelorum. in pahpakowak iwan in onkan tekpan tlapantenko, i nowian senka miek in onkan tlatlak sepo kandelas inik mochiw in motenewa luminarios; iwan no senka miek in onkan kitlatlaske kowetes, iwan inik nowian onkan tekpan kiyawak nowian kwawtlalilok tlatlak onkan in kwawitl. in omik oxiwitl ayak tlatokat; walmotlali awintsontsin in ipan i se ankatl xiwitl, i motlali. xii tochtli xiwitl, 1166. tlen 79 tlanawatihkayotl. in kaltlanawatiloyan fiskalisasión superior tlen sentlanawatiloyan itechpan tlahtokan tepantlahtonih, kipias iseltlanawatilis tekichiwalis tlen itechpowi tlanawatili iwan iwikpa yewa kihtos kenihki kisenkawas itequih, kenihki tekichiwas iwan kisenkawas tlahtoli, ken moihtos ipan tlahtol tlanawatili. ni iteki tlen fiskalisasión moneki mochiwas kenihki moihtohtok ika prinsipios tlen posteridad, sesenxihutiyah, xitalhauktlahtoli, definitividad, imparsialidad iwan konfiabilidad. inin kaltlanawatili tlen fiskalisasión superior tlen sentlanawatiloyan kiyekanas: i. kitlachilis sateipan amatl tlen kalakis iwan kisas tomin; kenihki moitskis, kenihki momokwitlawis iwan kenihki motekiwis nochi tlen itominpialis tlen chikawalismeh tlen kaltlanawatiloyan iwan kaltlanawatilmeh tlen sentlanawatiloyan, iwan noihki tlen mochiwas tlahtoli tlen ixnesi ipan amatekitl tlen sentlanawatiloyan, ika amatlapowalmeh tlen tlatematiltiseh ken kiihtos tlaltol tlanawatili. noihki kiixtlatlachilis amatl kampa ixnesi kenihki kitekiwihkeh tlaxtlawili tlaltlanahuatilmeh, altepeko tlanawatilmeh iwan santlacameh. iwan amo motlahtlakawis amatlapowali tlen moihtowa ipan achtowi tlahtolkentsi, ipan seki tlamantli tlahtoli tlen kixtlalis tlanawatili, welis kinnotsas tlakameh tlen kin amatlatlachiliseh tlen tleweli tlamantli kiitas moneki moixmatis iwan makimaktilikan se amatlapowali. tla inin tlanekilistli amo mosenkawas ipan kawitl ke moihtowa ipan tlanawatili, welis motlatlakoltis ken yewatl itechpowi; ii. tlatemaktilis amatlapowali tlen kisas keman kitlatlachilis kwenta públika imako tlahtokan tlen tepantlahtoanih achi mowekawilis ipan 31 tonati marso tlen itlatokilis xiwitl tlen keman monextis. iihtiko tlen inon amatlapowali motlalis tlahtoli tlen kisas ipan amatlatlachilistli iwan pamitl tlen kinextis tla mochihki tlen kihtowa amatekitikayotl, tlen kiihtos sasanili iwan tlaixnextili tlen kin amatlachilihqueh, iwan welis kimatiseh nochi altepechanehke. in kaltlanawatili tlen fiskalisasión superior tlen sentlanawatiloyan welis kiahokwis iteki iwan tlaixnextilmeh iwan kiixnextis keman tlatemaktilis amatlapowali tlen kiihtowa inin tlanawatikayotl; in tlahtol tlanawatili kiixnextis tlatsakwiltikayotl tlen amo kitlepanitaseh inin tlahtoli. iii. tlatemos tleweli tlachiwali noso tlailkawali tlen kanahya axkwali mochiwas noso axkwali nemis ipan tomin tlen asis, tlen kisas, tlen moitskis, tlen momokwitlawis iwan motekiwis tlaxtlawili iwan tlapiali tlen sentlanawatiloyan, iwan kichiwas kalpanoli, san kitlachilis amochmeh, amameh noso amameh tlen ahoktokeh tlen monekih iwikpa mochiwas tlatehtemolislti, ipan motlatskilis tlanawatilmeh iwan tlahtoli tlen ixnesi ipan kaltlatehtemolistli, iwan iv. kinextis tlahtlakoli tlen kitlahtlakawis hasienda públika tlen sentlanawatiloyan noso tlapiali tlen sentlanawatiloyan kaltlanawatilmeh iwan xitlawak kin tlahtlakoltis tlen ininpan wetsi tlapalewili iwan tlatsakwiltili tlen itechpowi, iwan noihki kiolinis tlahtoli inixpa tekiwahmeh sekinok tlatlacolmeh; kiolinis tekiyotl tlen tlanawatili moihtowa ipan nawi tokayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili, iwan temaktilis tlatelwili iwan tlahtolkwalantli, kampa moneki mokalakis tlahtoli tlen ixnesi ipan tlahtol tlanawatili. ni tlatsahkayotl iwan sekinok resolusiones tlen entidad tlen fiskalisasión superior tlen sentlanawatiloyan kwali kitose iwikpa amo ihki ika entidades tlen fiskalisasión iwan, tlaihkia monewi, ika tekitini tlen públikos tlen kintlaixpoliwiltia, saya ipan nompa entidad tlen fiskalisasión noso kampa tribunales tlen ika moyekana tlanawatihkayotl 73, tlatlapantli xxix-h tlen inin amatlanawatiloyan kenihki motlachilihtok ipan inin amatlanawatili. a ver, xihtlachilika se taman saj. achto mokwakwalatsa tomatl, chili, axox, xonakatl, mochi tlasentlali 11i; satepan motesi ipan metlatl ahnoso ihtik in tepustlatsoaloni iwan motsoyonia ika ome xumali pitsochiyawisotl, motlewatsa, motlalilia in xoletl in ye tlapaktli, ye chipawak iwan ye mowikxitia. yewantin kikalakia in chokistli in ixayotl in ichan omikito. ik kitemachitia in ik nawilwitl ilnamikos mikkawatiske in ichan tlaka. aw in tlaketstli ipan xiwitl de mil 531 años, aw in wewexiwxiwtlapowali matlaktlomei akatl; ye iw matlakxiwitl omei asiko in españolesme in ikwak mokets. iwan amo keskipa, aw ka san wel ye iskipa ipan yaske inik wel kitlaliske || 237 in iw kinmotlatlalilia kinmokwaxochtilia in itech kiwalwika itech yetiwits in iamatewelitilistsin in iamatlakwiloltewelitilisnemaktsin sankto padre, inik san ik sen kiwalwika palio in ihkwak kinmotitlanililia; aw in amotle wel onkan ik kipanawiske in iskilwipan machiyotok, ka ihkwak in kimochiwilitiwi missa in ika inteotlatkitlahtokanechichiwaltsin motenewa hornamentos pontifikal. kwaltsin xikselilti kwali timohtalwia; newa nech paktia kwalkan nasía iwan amaka neschias. in amo xochiyowa. señor san migwel arkángel, aw in tekpayoka itoka wawkil, umextin tlotlitewktli; i yewantin hi, wawkil, tlotlitewktli, sa yake in unpa mik, in axka yuh mitowa wawkilicha. nohwian tlatentli onyeya senka tilawak techinamitl okachi tilawak yuhkin ahmo kemman onikimihtak inintin mochiwkeh ika in tetl in omonechiko ipan miek xiwitl ipampa inon tlalmili oyeya ipan tetlahtli tetech monekia sehsen xiwitl inik ye pewas in tlalmolonilos ye tlatekipanolos in ika kakaxtli mahkokwia mochi in tetl in tlalkisaya yuhkin aka okitokak inin tetl mowiwipanaya ipan tlatentli iwan no ihtik in tlalmili kan mewatiketsaya senka wehweyi teocholtin wel kwali tlatekpantli in wehkautika neskiani se kaltlakechtli viii tekpatl xiwitl, 1292. ye yuh unpowali kate i ye walaiwa akolnawakatsi tlatoani askapotsalko walachia ye poktli ewatok akaitik; ye kiwaliwa teskakoakatl tlakuchkalkatl kakawitl, in kimitako mexika akaitik motlapopochilitoke. istatl, ixkich in monekis ok nemi in teotl tlalapanko yolkanesi kitokayotia axolotl is katki in kwikatl chikwexiwtika mevaya in ikwak atamalkwalistli in owalkistiake inik owalake. onka semiya para mosemiyaroa in nekwtli. inon okse kalohtli sesenkawel weyak. o iwi in in kiwaltsawk provisor, inik niman sa mixkawike in tlamasewke penitentes kiske in momekawitekke, inik iskikan teopan kikisato inik estasiones kichiwato. kwaltia aw no iwan in ihkwak in ye matlaktlonse xiwitl tlahtokati in tlakatl xiwitltemok in ikkaxtolomome tlahtowani kulwakan. xixinke, yahyahke; ye ik senpewtika in in kokolotl in xochiyaoyotl. nopa tepetl. okse teotl opinaw ka ik omokaw yuh omotlekowik iwan ometstonameyotik totekwiowane, tlatokee, tlasotitlakae oankimihiyowiltike. ka nikan amitsinko amokpaktsinko titlachia in timakwalti. aw in axkan tlein, kenami, ka tlewatl in tikitoske in tikewaske amonakapaspantsinko. ¿maach titlatin? ka san timasewaltotonti. yewa ye wekapa nomaiknin. inin tlakatl amotlen okihto. no se kikwi linderos. aw in ihkwak in ye iw ne- || 32v -pa chikwasenpowalonkaxtoli ipan onxiwitl walkiske in ompa inchan astlan in mexika; in ihkwak in ye iw nepa matlakxiwitl tlahtokati in malatsin in ikmatlaktlomome tlahtowani kulwakan. ye neli kokok ye otimaliwiko, in motlok monawak, in ipalnemowa. san nikintemowa, nikilnamiki in tokniwan. ¿ kwix ok seppa witse, semi nikinkwalita kwakwaltsitsin cuahxochimeh. kiski in xi kali xiwitl, 1269 años. chikwase akatl xiwitl amotle muchiw. nikwika noašnu'wan notenkonwan nochkawan. aw iwan ye chikonpowalxiwitl ipan se xiwitl in ipan 2 tekpatl xiwitl, 1468 años, in omomikili in tlakatl wewe motewksoma ilwikamina chalchiwtlatonak tlahtowani katka tenochtitlan, in tlahtokat senpowalonchiwknawi xiwitl. axkan miérkoles in ik 20 mani metstli agosto de 1614 años, ihkwak omomikili in el lisensiado aler || 255 de vilagómes oidor katka nikan audiensia real; in inakayo teopan sant augustín tokoto, onkan motetokiliko visurrei iwan mochintin tlahtoke oidores audiensia real tlaka. in oyuh omotlali kwakwawsi, yankwikan tepew i mexikatl i nikan chimalwaka atenko; inka motekpak in chimalwaka, inka tlekwawitl wets, ikwak molpili ixiw. aw in intlahtokaw masiwi piltsintli konetsintli ye nawxiwitl kipia inik tlakat, in ihkwak in iwan ye nawxiwitl tlahtokati in kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli. ¿quezqui tonali kipia se xiwitl? mah amo okwilowa, aw in ikomilwitl ipan miérkoles semilwitl in okiyaw iwan oseppayaw in omotenew itech tepetl tenan, iwan senka osewak in nikan mexiko. komino, ixkich in kikwi tomahpil aw wel kwali || 110r ik kiwalmonamikilike in yewantsitsin tlahtoke reyes don fernando iwan doña isabel kathólikos, aw senka mopapakiltike in ipampa in itenonotsalis imixpantsinko kitlali kinmokakiltili. iwan nikitowa oksen mani mili apepetspan ompowali inik wiak aw inik patlawak xx powali no nikmaka in hoseph mawitoka nomon. ik napa otipowaloke wala d[on] hwan de porlas= hwes othechpowako nikam waltlamelaw nikam san bartolomé nixpam newatl notoka baldesar de san hwan nika otlasinkak. amo xkinelkawa nopilwan, in no sesek. xxvi pregon.- a desiseis dias del mes de mayo de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in ipan tlaxilakali kwepopan okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal in itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak tlanankili testigo martin hwan. ante mí fransisko maldonado eskrivano. mah takayowa, x tekpatl xiwitl, 1476 años. kema tonilito kalakito aw sa on tlatsakwia in kakawatl. in ik kitki imayawkampa kiketsa in tekomatl: amo itenko kantiw, san no imakpal nepantla kiketstiw in ayotektli, no ihkwak motlakatili in tlakosiwatsin in ichpochtsin toyaotsin. yewatl in i nikan mixiwiko in motenewa mixiwkan, sanno yewatl in kitemato in onkan motenewa temaskaltitlan; aw in ikonew itoka kontsalan, oksekintin kitowa itoka kowatlikwe. ﻿¿tle yotitlakwa? iii kali xiwitl, 13. itlanahnamik: mowikxitia in etl ika ome litro atl, ika xonakatl, axox iwan pitsochiyawisotl. sekni, ika xoxokton mowikxitia in nohpaltlatetektli; in xokonochtli mopohpoa inik satepan mokixtilis in inakayo; kwali mopaka in yepasohtli, in nohpali ma ixika iwan mixawia inik kwali mokixtilis in nohpalalaktli; ye motlalia kampa owiksik in etl ika in xokonochtli iwan in yepasohtli ixkichkaw in ye kwali tlawikxitili. ii akatl xiwitl, 1507 años. no iwan in totekwiyo dios || 3v ka itsonkiska in mochi in ixkich tlamantli onkatki, aw sano yuhki i yewatl in tlakatl intsonkiska i mochintin in ixkichtin tlachiwalti i manenenke yolkame i nakayoke, yehika ipampa inik kinmokwitlawiske ka ik chiwaloke. aw iska in inmak walaktia, inik imak motlaliko in altepetl, inmasayewaken iwan teksiskoskatl tesistekwekwextli teksistensakatl iwan inkowakwik. yon mowilana kemeh in makwilkilit, pero amo iuki, yon niman se kita in imai mahmaxaltik wan tsikihyak. tlahtoltin no iwan mosepanteilwito okomentin: se sachristían nemi itoka hoseph gómes, in ikome siwatsintli itoka maría gostansa, sanno yuhki inpan kichiw, kinpinawti teixpan kinkets kinpepetlaw; in hoseph gómes ik teixpan kikets kipepetlaw kiteittiti kimekawitek, san kinanankili ika onkamatl tlahtoli. aw in iwits kichiwaya chalchiwtli, in iyakxoyaw ketsali aw in kitlenamakaya teoxiwtli, chalchiwtli tapachtli. aw in inextlawal katka kowatl, tototl, papalotl in kinmiktiaya. no yuhki mihtoa kimmach kemmanian seki tlakah iwan siwameh ompa yawih michtacahuizqueh. intla yuhki, ahkiwan satepan ompa motemah imikpak tlayowa, kochwetsih iwan ihkwak tlahtlachia kinkokoah intsontekon. inin teihtitia akameh ompa kichiwato impitzoyoh, ompa omopacmacatoh. aw onkan se tlakatl katka mamalwasokan ichan itoka kowatsin inxochipixkaw katka in amakemekan tlahtoke; onkan ye kimonnextia in tlasopipiltin, kihto "ca onkate in tlahtoke inpilwan; ka nikan nemitilo in kowasakatsin in itlasopiltsin in chichimekatewktli in ketsalmasatsin, iwan inantsin nikan monemitia; aw okse kinemitia in amakemekan itokayokan itstoloitik in monemitia itoka aokwantsin". . aw in tenochtitlan tlahtokati in awitsotsin ye ipan in kalakke puchteka ayotlan in anawak. ompa impan walmotsaok: nawxiwitl in kaltsaoktimanka in kwawtenanko. in iwkan in kwawtla in sakatla in awakan in tepewakan ka aokmo tle ik tontlapolotias aok tle ik tonixmamawtias tonixmimiktias aok tle mits tsikololtis aok tle mits ixtilketsas; otikonikeh se welik iwan tsopelkaitstik atsintli. in ipan axkan lunes ik 2 mani metstli oktubre de 1606 años, yei tsilini ye teotlak, ikwak momikili in teoyotika tlahtowani don frai garsía de sankta maría de mendosa i súñiga arsobispo omoyetstikatka in nikan ipan wei altepetl siudad mexiko tenochtitlan, inin sant herónimo teopixki. amo mochipautani. tlen 99 tlanawatihkayotl. in tribunal elektoral elis, san amo tlen moihtowa ipan ii tlatlapantli tlen 105 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili, weyi tekiwa ipan inin pamitl iwan nelkwali tlakayotl tlen poder hudisial tlen sentlanawatiloyan. iwikpa kichiwas itekiwakayo, in tribunal motekitilis ipan se sala superior iwan noihki ipan salas regionales iwan nechikolismeh tlen tlasenkawalmeh inixpa altepechanehke, ken kiihtos tlahtol tlanawatili. kipias tekichiwani tlen kiixmatih tlanawatilmeh iwan tekichiwani tlen ika kwali motekitilis. in sala superior monechikos ika chikomeh magistrados elektorales. in tlayekanani tlen tribunal kitokatlalis sala superior, kikwis tlen nopayo tlatzquitoqueh, iwan tekipanos nawi xiwitl. in tribunal elektoral itechpowi kinelsenkawas iwan amo welis motewis, ken moixtlalia ipan inin amatlanawatili iwan ken moihtowa ipan tlahtol tlanawatili, tlen inin tlahtolmeh: i.
