tlahtolkwalantli keman onkas sentlanawatiloyan tlapehpentli tlen tepantlahtoani iwan tepantlahtoani tlen wekapa; ii. tlahtolkwalantli tlen onkas keman motlapehpenis tlayekanani tlen mexihko tlaltlanawatilmeh nechikolismeh tlen mosenkawas ipan san se itekiwakayo tlen sala superior. in sala superior kichiwas itlamiya tlapowali tlapehpentli tlen weyi tekiwa tlen mexihko tlaltlanawatilme nechicolismeh, keman moxolewas, tla ikinoh monekis, kwalantli tlen moixpantis tlen yewa intechpowi, amachiwas kampa kiihtos ipatih tlapehpentli iwan tlen weyi tekiwa tlapehpentli tlen tlaixnextili tokayotl tlen achi miak kinechikos tlaixwasantli; iii. in tlahtolkwalantli tlen inemilis iwan tlasenkawali tekiwa tlapehpentli tlen sentlanawatiloyan, tlen seyok tlamantli ken moihtowa ipan tlatlapantli onpanok, tlen kiixpanos tlanawatlimeh noso xitlawak tlanawatili; iv. in tlahtolkwalantli tlen nemilismeh noso tlasenkawalmeh tlen tekiwameh kipia tlanawatili tlen sentlanawatiloyan iwikpa tekichiwaseh iwan kipowaseh tlaixwasantli noso kisenkawaseh kwalantli tlen onkas, tlen kitlatlakawis ohtekitl noso kitlatlakawis itlamiya tlapehpentli. inin ohtli san mochiwas keman amo motlepanitas tlehtleya tlanawatili tlen amatlanawatili, in tlasenkawali tlen motlatlanalis neltlahtoli iwan weli mochiwa tlanawatili ipan kawitl moixtlalihtok ipan tlapehpentli iwan noihki nelkwali mochiwas achtowi mochiwas ken kiihtowa amatlanawatili kampa kiixtlalia tonatih tlen kemanihki mosentiliseh tlayoltilismeh noso kiseliseh tlanawatili tekiwakemeh tlen kintlapepenihtoke; v. in tlahtolkwalantli tlen nemilismeh iwan tlasenkawalmeh tlen ipan nehnemiseh inin tlatechpowilistli tlen tlahtol tlapehpentli tlen altepechanehke tlaixwasantli, kiixwasaniseh itokah iwan motokah ihkwilos ika iyolo iwikpa tlatskis ipan tlahtoli tlen totlalpan, ken moihtos ipan amanawatili iwan tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh; vi. in kwalantli noso axkwal tekitikayotl tlen tribunal iwaya itekitikawa; vii. in kwalantli noso axkwali tekitikayotl tlen instituto federal elektoral iwan itekitikawan; viii. in tlasenkawali iwan tlatsakwiltili tlen inin tlahtoli; iwan ix. sekinok tlahtoli tlen kiixnextis tlahtol tlanawatili. keman se sala tlen tribunal elektoral kitekpanas tlahtoli kampa kiihtos amo ipatih tleweli tlachiwali noso tlasenkawali noso tlayeyekoli tlen se tlahtoli tlen inin amatlanawatili, iwan inon tlahtoli iwaya moixnamiki iwaya tlen moihtowa ipan salas noso sennechikolistli tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia, san katlia ihki ministros, in salas noso achi, welis kitelwiseh tlaixnamikilistli, ken kiixnextis tlanawatili, iwikpa sennechikolistli tlen suprema korte hustisia tlen totlalnantsin makinelsenkawa katlia ihki tlahtoli moneki mokawas. tlasenkawali tlen moihtos ipan inin tlamantli amo kitlatlakawis tlahtoli tlasenkawali. in noihki topixke polo okinmononochiliaya nochtin tlaka ika siwame kename motokas se miki iwan iki omochiw. se kilo textli in se mawistik tepetl inawak weyaltepetl monextia. tlahkotonali. okachi mochiwa newín xaltipampa, tawelita kampa takawani. moneki se kitachipawas. tein ihkak kahfentah no iwan se kitachipawia ya in kahfen. nikawin amo mochiwa semi, amo kiweyinamiki in tal; mochiwa pero pané amo oksi. kwaltsin mochiwa newín tanikwakopan. xochiyowa kemeh in mes de marso. yei xumali pitsochiyawisotl yotaciqueh. tetsilakatl ayotl kawantok amokali imanikan wexotsinko. ya in onkan tlapia tekayewatsin, kesewatl teuktli on tlapitsa on kwika, san ka ye ichan ye wexotsinko. xontlakikakan, ye wal temo in tota. ka ye ichan, oselo kakawewetl komontok, in tetsilakakwikatl on kawantok ye onka. iiii kali xiwitl, 1249. ma amotsin ya xon tlakkakan. mah techwalkwilikan, in on nemi nikan in tlaltikpak. amo monamaka. moichpokachihki in ipan siudad mexiko axkan hweves ik kastolose mani metstli de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años xakalpan otsatsik in tekpoyotl okito inik monamaka kali in onpa mani teokaltitlan in ikal mariana okitenew inik patiyowa chikwasenpowali pesos in tomines ayak tlanankili testigo tekpoyotl. aw iwan ye chiwknawpowalxiwitl ipan onxiwitl in ipan xiii akatl xiwitl, 1427 años, in omotlahtokatlali in tlakatl in itskowatsin tlahtowani tenochtitlan. inin kawayo oipatin setsontli pezoh. wan kiilwi chalchiw teponastlimimilintokan, on chalchiwtlakapitsowayan, in itlaso teotl, a in ilwikawa, ikampa tlatzacualü omotlati ¡n piltontli. kwaltia notata sanenka miak tomin itechpa inin tekitl okixtlan. nawi kali xiwitl ikwak poliwke amatlantlaka. wel otipahpakeh otawiltihkeh fútbol ompa ixtlawapa. istatl, ixkich in monekis sempoali nohpali noihki omitotiaya santiagome. inimekes itlaken oyeya se kapote chichiltik, in kwatlasekawitl de tepostli ika ikahwan iwan mediastin. kristianos okwikaya se estandarte ika se koros iwan mahometanos kiwikatse se pantli iwan san wel ye otlatoaya ipampa mahoma. iwan ohkan omoxeloaya. sekintin okimilwiaya mahometanos iwan okseki kristianos. ikwak opewaya momaga ikan machetes, omolwiaya,¿kampa ka morreino? ¡mahoma achi tlamakani! mitoaya xikita tewan tikristianos, tla toa in kristiano, iwan amo toteotatsin amo tlamakani kename mahoma. iwan okitentiaya machetetin ipan tlaltikpatli aw sano ye no ipan in in omotenew miérkoles sankto teotlak, ihkwak okiske otlayawaloke in sanktiago tlatilolko tlaka in kofrades in itetsinko powi imikilitsin totlasottatsin san fransisko; no senka mawistik inik kiske no senka kwepontiake, okseppa onkan ahsiko in iglesia mayor, no ixkich kiyawaloke in ixkich || 211 omotenew tlakpak in yalwa tlayawaloke in itetsinko powi niño hesús perdido iwan rosario i no tlatilolko tlaka. mohkwanis in ahkopechtli no 1 chi tlen amo kwali, moma ^ kas in tlakanakayotin yektla * kwaltin, in kihtosneki yekpaktilistli. aw inin omotenew tlahtowani ilankweitl atlawtekatltewktli kiwalsiwatlanike onkan in kulwakan; in onkan yah siwapili, amo wel momati tlein in itoka, ichpuchtsin in itoka wewe tesosomoktli tlahtokapili in onkan kulwakan. aw inik onkan kichiwke san pablo kapítulo, wel ixpantsinko tlahtowani visurrei in motlali provinsial, onkan omilwitl mowikatsa inik amo itlah ik monepanoltoliniske teopixke, kin iyopa yuh nikan omochiwin. se tlatsikwewalton kanela ome kilo kilitl ka yeppa ye wekaw onkan okatka, in ayemo onkan in kinwalkixtiaya mexitin, in diablo in chikomostok; ka yewatl in onkan kiwalamaniliaya in kiwaltlatlawtiaya onkan walmoxtlawaya ixpan in mexitin. kihto in yaopol: "ca akan nitlamattiw, ka akan niyaw, ka sa nikan niwalamattia". no mochiwa milaj. in totonik. tlasohkamati. xonmotlachialti man kinwikakan in petlakaltin iwan kimiltin ompa kaltechialoyan. newa nikinkowatinin amamachiotl. xochitlahkwiloa, tlaxochikwiloa, toltekati. iwan ihkwak senka mieyekintin pipiltsitsinti inik momikilike tlatlaxistli. wan nama yeka para kinehki in iw kimitalwia sant hwan damasseno "auh sano iwan yewatl in itlawikilistsin in itlamanitilistsin in totekwiyo dios inenewkatsin in iw no itech ka kikniwtla, in tetlatsontekililistli in mitowa hustisia iwan i teiknoittalistli iwan in tetlaokolilistli iwan i mochi in ixkich tlamantli in kwaltiwani yektiwani i yeni tetech, ka moch itech katka". aw in yewantin in in omotokatenewke in asiko atenko wewetke in imasikawan tekwanipan tlaka, aw nawintin yaka in tlayawaloto i mokwepato in ikse yewatl in teomama wewe tsiwtlakawki yaopol tsonpawa, in ikome yewatl in hekaxoktli, in ikei yewatl in wewe ixkotsin, in iknawi yewatl in chalchiwtsin. onkan mosentekako in teotiwakan, kwetawik. aw kil intla ye siwa intech señorati kinchiwaskia in motenewa ye mulatati muriskastin, kil amo kinmiktiskia, ye nemiskia kinwapawaskia, ipampa in ihkwak weweyaskia ka niman kinmosiwawtiskia yewantin in tliltike, inik wel walmotliltikakwepaskia in innepilwatilis in intlakamekayo in intlakaxinacho. ipan yei tochtli xiwitl tlatlahtokayotl in sepanka kinyaochiwa kaxtiltekah iwan kintlatlalochtia kopan, nekwiltonolakalkixowayan iwan filipinas. in teokwitlapitske ¿cani walewa, kani walkisa? aw inin in omotenewtsinoke omentintsitsin teopixke yewatsin okinmoteochiwili in senka mawistililoni teoyotika tlahtowani don frai garsía gwerra arsobispo mexiko, onkan in sankto domingo moteteochiwili mexiko. satepa kwak okisako pero yokwalikak ikonew yokiwakikak itoka hwan del oso. o tiyaskeh ichan. axkan viernes in ik 17 mani metstli mayo de 1613 años, ihkwak nikan mexiko onpew inik yaw españa in doña maría de dirsios iknosiwatl in inamik katka don hwan atamirano komendador sanktiago katka; aw inin omotenew siwapili inik ompa yah kiwalnots in ittatsin tlahtowani don lwis de velasko markés de salinas iwan pressidente muchiwtika in motenewa del konseho de indias in ompa españa, aw inik kiwalnots in ichpuch yuh mihto yuh machistiko umpa kinamiktis in españa. se tlatsikwewalton kanela itlanahnamik: aw ayak se ikonetsin kikawtiw inik onmomikiliko in omotenew siwapili doña augustina de gusmán, san mixpopolotiw. nama ma timotlanika", ihkino kiilwi ipanima aw in tewantin algwasil mayor fransisko ximenes yoan algwasiles bartolome rocho hwan akikaw migwel mimich yoan newatl eskribano migwel de los angeles niman otikmakake in itlal in itoka maria tekwicho yoan in ipilwan bartolome tekokowa martin iknotlakatl inik otikimonaxkatike in itlal teispan in onpa chaneke in atlixokan. iuki monotsaporin pané kwowit; aw in tlakpak omotokatenew mestiso in itoka don hwan péres de monterrei ka san ixiptla san kipalewia san itlakewal mochiwtika inik wel yewatl governador mochiwtika omotenew nikan mexiko tenuchtitlan; aw insalario, yuh mihtowa, imomextin okimoxelwiaya in omotenew hwan grande. tlahkoxonakatl, in ahmo wel wehyi aw in okik ayemo tikalaki ipan okse xiwitl, ma achitsin nikan tikitokan in intlahtolo in ulmeka in xikalanka in xochteka in kiyawisteka in kukolka, in achtopa kenin walake in onkan chaneke okatka chalchiwmomosko in axkan ye amakemekan. in tewantin alkaldes don pedro de la krus martin kano por su magestad i nika audiensia i tiktokwitlawia hustisia in itechkopatsinko in toweitlatokaw su magestad nikan tixpan owala maria tekwihchon onpa chane in san sebastian atsakwalko. nepa xiitstoka in okse titlasohtlaskiah tlen 80 tlanawatihkayotl. motlalia tlanawatili tlen weyi tekichiwani tlen sennechikolislti imako san se tlakatl, tlen motokayotis: “tlayecanani tlen nochi mexihko totlalnantzin”. x kali xiwitl, 1333. yuh machistiko itekpanchan ipalasio in mochantito, senka kitlasotlak kitlakwaltiaya iwan umpa ipal motlatlanewi in don rodrigo in emperador habón; senka miyek mil in itlatki umpa kiwaltlanewti i nikan kiwalwikak mexiko don rodrigo. aw ompa ipan asiko in itlahtokayo in imasewalpan askapotsalko, in kiwalmotitlanilili itlahtokayo yewatsin in towetlahtokaw don felipe tersero in ompa moyetstika kastila. komo in pilimeh kikwah yon pahpata gwineo, amo kinkwih ok kuitkouamej. iwan in ixkich chichimeka tlatokayotl in kwowit, istak, weyi kwowit mochiwa. aw in axkan ipewayan in omotenew yankwik xiwitl iwan ipewayan yankwik metstli henero ipan omakokwiskia yaoyotl okichiwaskia nikan mexiko in tliltike; inpan kichiwaskia in intekwiyowan in españolestin, okinmiktiskia, aw amo kimonekiltitsino in totekwiyo dios, amo kinmomakawili in españolestin miktiloske, ka niman machistik niman owanoke in tliltike. inik sentlamantli nikitowa ni hwana mosel onka kaltsintli etekistimani aw inin yeteixti tenanyokanpa itstimani inin wel naxka notlatki. aw niman ik walmoman in metstli septiembre, in ipan in manin kiyawitl. kampa ik oyaki ik ompa owala niman okasito se sotolkwawitli napa okiyewalo wel wekawtika okasike. niman owala in xochitekutli okito xiwalwiyam xikiktamka nikam kaki inin nawali itik toktok sotoli niman okikixtike niman okimistike okixtilike yolo okikwakke aw inakayo iwan iyomiyo omkam okisake itech inon sotoli ika se wei t/e/tli iwan okinsakwilito oksekintin ompa kwoyosin totosin tepetli mochintin okiwalwikake nikam tepeteopam nikam okwonike {sic} teokotetli inewiyam omomiktike sekintin okimistike ik otlanke. nochi misotlake. masayelnanakatlatsoyonili e iw xxi xitl tlantokanti in kunpew tepanowayankalki, sano yexiwyok in kunpew miskikatl; iwa itepewal i kwitlawak iwan xochmilkatl iwa kwawnawakatl: iskikan i in itepewal. ix tochtli, 1306 años. mochiwa nikawín xolal kampa kitokaj. kwakwaltsin xochimili. itlanahnamik: i ye kentel kisa kokolistli, nima ye ik walewa unpa kisato tepeyakak, achto unkan tlalpolo. komo se kineki tatsoyon, se kikixtia kwetawi sah mah amo pati. katarina chili, xitomatl iwan axox moihseki iwan motesi; ipan sokikaxitl motlalia in pitsochiyawisotl iwan motsoyonia in ye omotes; in mostansia mokixtilia in senka konetik iatlapal, kwali mopaka, iwan motlalilia in chilatl ihkwak ye kwakwalaka, motlapachoa inik kwali wiksis. in se kikwa ikilo wan itakilo. ikilo se kikechkohkotonati, se kimana wan se kipoyelia wan se kikwa ya. mah ompa kachi más miakiya de nehwa ya, 106. in nowiyan otlachiktiake, otlapetlawtiake, in otlasotiake, in otlawipantiake; in iwiyan, in isemele, in yokoxka otlatlatlalitiake in topko, in petlakalko. in wei insewalo, imekawyo in omuchiwtiake, in okiketstiake, in tomawak in pochotl, in awewetl, in itskalotikak, immalakayotikak, in ahmo tlakochkawtiake, in ahmo tlakochpachotiake, in ahmo tlatenkopintiwi. in iwiyan, yokoxka, in isemele, in imetspan, in imakochko in iteputsko, in okitlalitiake immokeketsa, immowilana, in tlalmawiltia, in tapalkamawiltia, in chitako, in kwawik onok. san yewan. san teokwitlakoyoltototl wel yektli in amokwik wel yektli in ankiewa anki ye onkan. in xochitl yawaliwkanin xochitl imanan amonkate in amontlatlatoa. ¿ o ach tikechol in ipalnemoa ?, ¿o ach anka titlatokaw yewa achtotiamewan ankistoke? tlawiskali amonkwikatinemi. tlahkoxonakatl in ahmo wel huheyi no kwaltia pahti : akin mopahwia ika venenoh mah se kitayilti sin ke istat. se kichipawa. vi tochtli xiwitl, 1342. mowaxka. in nawi tsilin ye ontlayawaloke, ye inchan kate in sankta krus kontsinko tlaka, inik amo kana ohtlipan monepanoskia in itlayawalolisnetokilitsin totekwiyo dios kisa san pablo in ipan makwili tsilini ye otlatwik; aw masiwi in pleito okintlalilika kontsinka in omotenew hernando tewkxochitsin, in satepan ka owelitililoke inik wel nonkwa tlayawaloske mochipa. itlanahnamik: ankimitalwia ka amo tiktisimachilia in tloke navake, in ilwikawa, in tlaltikpake. ankimitlawia ka amo neli teteu in totewan. ka yankwik tlatoli in ankimitalwia, aw ik titotlapololtia, ik titotetsawia. ka in totechiwkawa in oyeko, in onemiko tlaltikpak amo iw kitotiwi. ka yewantin techmakatiwi in intlamanitilis, yehoantin kineltokatiwi, kintlaiekultitiwi, kin mawistitlitiwi in teteu yewantin techmachtitiake in ixkich in tlaiekoltiloka, in immawistililoka, inik imixpa titlalkwa, inik titiso, iniktitoxtlawa, inik tikopaltema, aw inik titlamiktia. se kitoka wan kampa yetok weyi kwowit ompa ixwah miak kuoujxilokonemej. in kwowit kwaltia para kwoutatil. se kilo tomatl aw inin wei tlahtowani, masiwi ye popoliwia in wei altepetl tulam, amo isiwka kikaw in altepetl, ka ok omatlaktlonsexiwti in onkan i mochintin in oksekintin imasewalwan tulteka. axkan sábado in ik 1 mani metstli marso de 1614 años, ihkwak yankwikan nikan mexiko omopix piali omuchiw || 242 in ilwitsin mosentlamachtiani ángel kotodio totepixkatsin, itenkopatsinko itlanawatiltikatsin in santo padre paulo kinto intlaitlanilistikatsinko kimitlanililike in españa tlahtoke reyes don felipe tersero iwan in inamiktsin omoyetstikatka wei siwapili doña margarida de austria. tlahko xonakatl annemih ¿ye kemanon ipan in weyalteetl nemi in senyelis? aw ewatl ye motlatilolkatsasilia, ken ok nikchiwas? otlakawki niyolotsi, okimoknelili i mokekesa i mowilana. ¿que ski xiwitl tikpia? in owatl tsopelik ika weyi atlantenko okachi kwali momaka. pewa 111 (kajtsot) wan tami 139 (popoto) : lwis félix agwilar. omomama chikwe in kwawitl omotetetsotson imixpan omochiw in tlaxilakaleke yopiko gaspar de san pablo merino ihoan tepixke bartolome garsia gabriel xwares thomas de akino eskrivano fransisko de luna fransisko sanches diego sanches hwan garsia martin kano [f. 14v.] yewantin imixpan oneltik in posesio pakka yokoxka omochiw ayak onkan notlachalani. onmotetlakwilwililia inik ma inwelitsintika in sankto padre paulo kinto iwan yewatsin rei españa don felipe tersero inik ma kinmomakawilikan ma walmowikakan in nikan ipan siudad mexiko nweva españa, ma motlalitsinoki ma kimopieliki in omotenewtsino san antonio abad in iteopankaltsin i wel yewantsitsin tlasomawisteopixke motenewtsinowa isel iyoka nenkatsitsinti mongestin, i wel ipilwantsitsinwan i wel itlakawilowan in nikan tlaltikpak kinmokawilitia in ihkwak momikilitsino omotenewtsino notlasomawisthatsin san antonio abad i ye ixkichika en blanko. no kwaltia para kalkwowit, kikixtiah kalewal. aw inik ompa tekitiwak hekatepek akalwakan makwiltetl metstli, ipan tlamiko in metstli mayo. aw in axkan ipanpa niknotlaitlanililia in altepetl in hustisia inik nechmomakilis in tlanawatili inik aokmo sepa aka nechonkwilis ka nikitlani in ispan hustisia yuh nikitowa notlatol. inik 1 tlamantli nikitohoa i nehoatl i saber ana nikan nichane san hwan tlatilko in ipan tlaxilakali nikitohoa i nokal in omani ontetl sentetl tonatiw ikalakiyankopa istikak tlekopayo inik ontetl xochimilkopa istikak ithoalo aoh nikitohoa i nehoatl in tlanechmopopolwis totekuyo dios misa ikipa mochihoas in onomomimikilike i nonamiktsin in itoka martin karisto ihoan i nopilhoan inik se tlakatl diego karisto inik ome maria aoh in tla onimomikili ka nel ayak tle ma itla monamakas in kali onkan kisas inik ninotokas ihoa misa ik topa mochihoas ik ok keski mokahoas niman kalakis in teopan in san juseph. chichilsebolina pobre no tlakaw. mah nochi kiahsikan. mochiwa mas ne ahkwakopa. aw sano ipan in || 136v in x akatl xiwitl in momikiliko in tlakatl koxkoxtli tlahtowani kulwakan, in tlahtokat senpowalxiwitl ipan chikonxiwitl. in nikan ipan wei altepetl mexiko tenochtitlan a veinte dias del mes de marso de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años in tekpoyotl diego astaxochitl texkalkokolko otsatsik okitekakilti inik kinamaka ikal itlal in marianan in kali okokalo onpa mani sankt ipolito teokaltitlan okitenew makwilpowali pesos kitenma se tlakatl español aw ikwak otsatsiwak oksepa owala lwis savalo okito ka wel newatl nikkowas in kali ka nel otitononotske in mariana testigo diego peres. aw in axkan ipan ik 24 mani metstli oktubre de 1606 años, ikwak ompa in tsakwaltitlan tenanko amakemekan omomikili omopoliwilti in tlakatl siwapili nositsin doña martha de sanktiago amaxochtsin tenanko tepopola siwapili, onkan ichantsinko; inin inamiktsin katka in pili don domingo hernándes ayopochtsin tsakwaltitlan tenanko amakemekan ichantsinko. amo kwali ik miktiloke, ewatl kimikti in askaposalko maxtlato; tewtika tlasultika miktiloke, atsomapan tetepacholo. tlawel kenihki eme momaneharo ne peones". amo teh ika moyolkwi, aw san onkan konpik in ikwik in wewetitlan, inik kimichkwetike aw in siwa kimichmaxtlatike. aw sano ikwak in ipan in xiwitl in tepew in axayakatsin in itokayokan totonakapan kwaxoxowkan. kwalika, nikan nitemo. man xitlamawiso. ¡ kin oksepa totazqueh. aw sano ipan in in omotenew lunes in owaltlatwik omomikili in fransisko de leiba, inawatlahtokaw katka visurrei; inin senka tlamamawtiaya nowiyampa in toka timasewalti inik senka tlawelilok, wel teawani katka in ipan tlein tekitl mochiwaya, wel tentlawelilok kamachichi katka, ayak kixittaya, manel governadoresme amotle ik kinmawistiliaya, iwan senka teka omokakayawtia. aw in tlalmantli ye ixkichika onpowali xiwitl in kimopielia nonantsin magdalena tekwihchon aw in español inik otitononotske ixkich nechmaka sempowali on chikwei pesos achtopa otikwike ome pesos in ipan kokolistli ipanpa i nikixpantiliko hustisia. ix kali atle muchiw. nikan ipan in in mitowa motenewa nesetochwilok; mayanke in wewetke, wel nawxiwitl in atle mochiw kwaloni. ya moskalti moskalti para linderos se kitoka. i ekatsin kimolwilia “tleyn timalia, temilotsiné? kan tiaske, ka ye chikwasemilwitl ye nenemi acalli?”. inin kitsalito eilwitl wel yewatl in teopixkatlahtowani tlamakaski in itoka witsiltsin, inik yewatl walkwawtlahtotias walteyakanas. ihkion ¿cox teka titlahtowa. papasito san hwan bautista. in ipan in mani yaoyotl chalko. i newatl isabel hwana nochan santa maria kwepopan amixpantsinko ninesiko in antlatoke ankimopielia hustisia ka iskatki ankimokakiltia i noneteilwil in itechkopa in tlaltsintli niknonamakilia aw i nechkawaltia in magdalena iwan fransiska papan. ompa in weimolan kinpiloke; aw in itech katka tlahtokayotl kwawtimoktsin in tenochtitlan san makwilxiwitl. mokwakwalatsa in tomatl, chili, xonakatl iwan axox; ihkwak ye tlawikxitili ye motesi ipan metlatl ahnoso ika tepustlattsoaloni iwan san niman motsoyonia ipan kaxitl ika ome xumali pitsochiyawisotl, motlalilia istatl ixkich in monekis. sekni moatilia in textli ika in pitsochiyawisotl; moteteki in nakatl iwan ye mochihchiwa in tamali yuhkin omihto tlakpak. inihwanti kinikakatsó weiya, aw in ixkichkaw inik ompa katka in teotenanko in temimilolko in kwixkok makwilpowalxiwitl onkaxtoli ipan yexiwitl inik axkan ipan in xiwitl viii tochtli; ye tlahtokati onkan in tisatepek in totoltekatl tsonpachtli. aw ka sa sen in ipiltsin christiano omokwateki, don hwan awelitok. kenin mochiwa ok yewatl kintlalitewak in amakemekan tlahtoke in itoka toyaotsin chichimekatewktli mochiw, iwan in itoka kakamatsin xokoyotl teowatewktli mochiw; inin tlahtoke amakemekan. ka yewantin in in kiwalwikatiake in tlahtowani in tlailotlaktewktli, in ipilowan in itewktlahtokawan walmochiwtiake. san tonilwisolon,teotlatolin tikchiw,san kan timomikili in itech. tla amewan oanyeskiayab. "ximochiya, ximochiya hwanito". . aw in ompa kalakia xikalanko in kitkia itlatki awitsontsinsan ye no ye in ixkich omitoin tlahtokatilmahtli in tlahtokamaxtli in tlasokweitl in tlamachio aso tehteneskayo anoso chikokweitl iwan tlahmakwipili. o ka ye otikkak, noxokoyow, in nihiyo, in notlahtol; ma ximowikkatiw, ma ixkich motlapaltililis xikmochiuhili. ayohtli wan satepan kwak yewalmo mosewitiwik in rebolúsion ipan diesiseis años in yemasewitiwík in rebolúsion okisako gripa okisako n gripa. san nikan no ikwak in ipan semilwitl iwan xiwitl iwan metstli in omotenew tlakpak tewantin migwel xwares eskrivano iwan algwasil hwan hernandes techmonawatili in yewatsin in mwi magnifiko señor don antonio valeriano governador hwes por su magestad inik nikan otiwalake ipan tlaxilakali sank hwan tekixkipan inik tikmakako in posesion in señor sankto augustin iwan in teopixke. mah amo tonalmiki, aw in newatl alkalde migwel de los angeles hustisia nikpiya in ikwak honikak in intlatol in imontlamanixti in albaseas iwan in teopan tlatekipanowa in omotokatenewke tlakpak fransisko sanktoval iwan pedro hakobite iwan eskribano honikimilwi inin kali patiw kwix okikawato in albaseasme in sempowali pesos imisa itech powi animan. ¿quezqui tonali kipia se semana? aw inin san wel se xiwitl in ontlahtokat, motewksawtia in momikilito in ompa kwawkecholan; ye itlamian in matlaktli akatl xiwitl inik momikilito. in kwamekat. kwaltia iii kali xiwitl, 1209 años. ome tekontontli kapoli amo moneki semi se kinehmachpiyas. aokmo sepa amixtsinko amokpatsinko nitlachiekiw; ma ixkich amotlapaltsin xikmochiwilikan, ma iwia yokoxka xikinmotlakotilikan in amopilwan, makamo xikitolinika. sekin quin' pia sempoali iwan mahtlaktl iwan se tonali. febrero kipia sempowali iwan chikweyi tonal tin. na nimokawas nimaestro aw in ikwak okimokakilti i yewatsin alkalde niman okinmotlatlanili in tlaxilakaleke bernardo ximenes lurenso martin estevan de sant hwan iwan hwan martin kinmolwili kwix ye neli in okikawilitia in inamik katka in omomikili aw niman tlanankilike kitoke ka kemaka ka kikawilitia in inamik iwan in ipilwan aw ka ye iyolokakopa kinamaka ka nel imaxka. in itepewal: toltintla, kwawtitla, otompan, tolantsinko, akolman. yekintsin amo teyi ok semi, ixpoliutok ya. in nesi amo xochiyowa. kinamakayah ne keman. in okinnawatike ik niman ye walamati in itokayokan tsonpolekan, onkan motlaliko in totolimpaneka chichimeka, onkan sexiwtike. 6.- iwan nikitowa i nomikasiwamo kanako in itana kiwikatsa nowexiwa chaneke itstla amo tle notech kitlamis itla ninomikilis ik ninomakixtitiw. [f. 3v.] testigos axowaka chaneke diego dies thoribio heka migwel kwawtli. siwatepixke martha de san lasalo mensia marina. merinos: agustin de xoto sepastia thania pablo peres migwel hernandes ikalikak. nikan ipan in in yekene wel kokoltik yaoyotl in tepanowayan in askapotsalko, ikwak pewaloke in askapotsalka. onkan in sekintin tlakatke in inpilwan in wewetke chichimeka in ok yewantin walyahka || 38r in ompa itokayokan teotenanko in kwixkok temimilolko iwipa sakanko. || 46r aw ye kimolwia in chichimeka "cocque tikke!. se ichpokero itstoya. mochiwa mas ne pochotitampa oso tonalixkopa. se taman saj. inik 2 tlamantli nikitowa in nopilwan ana in okse itoka maria in omextin intech monekis ik wapawaske in xvii pesos intech monekis in tla kinemiltis in dios. o anki kan noche, nikxochiopawia, kwikatitlan nonkikisa. in no san tlatlalwia. kikekelo ikwitlapa. ne tlakwani miktoke nochi kinkuaj". in mochiwa kampa takawani. mochiwa eyi taman: nikawín amo mochiwa miak. in kwamekat. inin yewatsin noé ikoppa, yewatsin ikome kwawtsonyotl xinachtli mochiw intlakamekayotika in ixkichika in ihkwak ik chiwalok yokoyalok semanawatl, inik ompa yewatl itech walpewtika in wel achto tlakatl kwawtsonyotl tlakamekayotika xinachtli mochiw in achto tothatsin adán; in ixkichika, in iw omito, inik poliowako atl in apachiwilistli mochiw nowian semanawak, in amo mokaw in ixkichika onpowalilwitl iwan onpowalyowali in okiyaw, kipanawi in ipa in ixkich in senka wewekapan in itson in iwitlatstika in mochi tetepe. iuki kilwiah por in ikamohyo neli sah pixkitok; ihwak se kiichkwa in kamoh se kita ipa kemeh yon chakai ipanewayo. nimitsaxkatiliti motahtoltsin, ipan in in yankwik xiwitl iwan ipan in yankwik metstli henero, in owasiko in owala isedulatsin in itlanawatiltsin in toweitlahtokatsin rei don felipe tersero, in ipampa in kin nepa omochiw kongrekasión i nowian ipan altepetl, seseyaka sese in itlawilanalpan in itlatititsalpan motenewa isohetos, in kampa inyeyan imonoyan in masewaltsitsintin in kwaxochtli kitstoka in kwaxochpiaya, ikwaniloke mochintin tlaliloto itsontekompa in altepetl in inpopowian, aw ik senka innetolinilis mochiw in masewaltsitsinti. tlamatini xinechmokawilikan in nikihtos ompa santa ana tlakotenko kampa tiwitseh wewe momosko malakachtepek axkan milpa alta distrito federal ixkichkaw axkan senka mopihpia tonawatlahtol se kikwalia in xiutsin. aw i newatl gobemador in oiw nikkakin i tlatoli nitlanawati walaske in testigos a xvi dias del mes de setienbre de 1569 años. in iwki motsakwa in awakan tepewakan ka ok umpa on kisas: tisianmikis timosiappowas timosiwawketstias titonalsiawtias teekasiawtias tixtlaltsin timochiwtias tixtlalteppipixawtias mixkwatsin tlatlatias mitonaltsin tikmakwitias; nohpal tlahko kilo xoxowki awax, inok konetik . aw in ompew in ye yaw okinamikito in tlahtoli ka in ompa yaw in ayotlan ka on tlalpolohke in puchteka. seseppa tetlaokolwetekiti, inyekichiwa in yemexika. in iswat, semi wehweyi wan papatawak, ewa talpan wan kwoukespan mopilowa. ipa se taman sah onkak. nechtiski ika ome litro atl mowikxitia in pitsonakatl ika xonakatl, axox iwan istatl. ihtik in kaxitl mosiyawa in chilakachtextli ika se xaxalohton iwan tlahko atl; in tsompachkilitl mokwihkwilia in inelwayo, mopohpoa iwan mopaka; ihtik in sokikaxitl motlalia in pitsochiyawisotl, in chilakachtextli in ye tlamohmoyawtli; san teki molinia. in ihkwak ye kwali tlatsoyonili motlalilihtiw in istayutl san tlamach inik ahmo motelolohchiwas; motlalilia in tsompachkilitl iwan tlatsakkan in nakatl, motlapachoa inik wiksis ika ahmo wei tletl. axtlen kiwalik. chikwasen pitsawak pimienta ipam inin xiwitli odkikwanike inin teopam ikwak omochiw wei cocoüztli totonkayotli miyekintin omomiquiüque in topilwan otikwaltemowike in tosa{n}to san bartolomé nikam san hwan sa se omochiwako sa se omochiwako altepektli wei iwan ototikmot/e/kipanilwia in totlasomawisnansin sankta maria komsepsiom newatli notoka dfon] baldesar de san hwan nifiskal in sankta iglesia mayor iwan nialkalte ordenarlo otechn/e/maktiko sfeñohr markes okitlaokoli nokokolsin okatka dfon] hoseph de san hwan xochitekutli qu{a}uhtli oselotli. xochiyowa itech enero. okseki karransistas okinekia okikwepke teopantli kawakorral iwan okinkalake kawatin itik teopantli. ikan yopapano tlemach intlak okseki tlanonotsaya. amo xikinkalakika itik teokali, kwache tla namechpanoz. san niman ookinkixtike kawatin. ipan sementerio ompoyon oyeya okikwepke kawakorral. iixpantsinko mopechtekkak, kikak in iihiyotsin, in itlahtoltsin, in wel senka tehhuellamachtih, in wel tekpiltik, iwki in kimokohkonawilia, kimotlahtlasohtilia; quimolhuilih: tlaxikkaki, noxokoyow, hwantsin, ¿campa in timowikka? noso in nantli san tlahsohtilistika nochin kichiwa ipampa ipaktitlis senyelis. mah amo nechtatilikan inchayohkan wehweyi rayohtsitsin, aw ya yetsonxiwitl ipan kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan senpowalokaxtoli ipan yexiwitl axkan in otlalpoliw herusalem, inik motsonkwik in imikilistsin in dios itlasopiltsin hesuchristo, ini- || 74 -c ompa tlalpoloto vespassiano. inin omentin tlahtoke ik monotsa in chichimeka, ka san itewktlahtokawan katka in tlahtowani kwawitsatsin. talkwechaktsin, aw yewatsin señor governador yoan señores hweses omotlanahoatilike inikitech kawalos in yewatl hernan peres español ma kiwalitki i nopowali pesos i tomines ma niman mochi[f. 12v.]huaz eskritura venta. iipan se tlakomoli, westok waan nokweptok, para oksee lado. —ašan kinwikak ihkwawtla in noe kinwikak. iteyotsin no welik kemeh eskia ayohwach, se kitsontewia wan se kikwa ya. masiwtia o in kineki noyolo san chimali xochitl, in ixochiw ipalnemoani. elotamali wan axanakmo nekwtli akmo nikilewia katka maske nitlačkia' pero non saye nikoniya kwak nitlačikia'. wan wahka ihkino yahke yahke. monamaka kwesalan wan hasta nikan kiualkuij. ipan se tekpatl xiwitl (1896) tewktli pierre de koubertin kitsintia altepepan athenae, ompa in helenoyan, inik se olimpikayo neawiltiloni. sayoh in ixiuyo kwaltia para tamal oso ika se kipiki taxkal. in ixiuyo se kimana iwan chichikxokoxiwit, xokoxiwit wan limonxiwit, se kikwi mahmakwil wan ika se mometspaka tohtotonik komo se totonia wan texakwalowah ya refino se imetsko wan mah se moteka. onkan in in ipan in xiwitl poliw in motenewa xochiyaoyotl, inin manka onpowalxiwitl. ﻿tochan ticateh. se kilo ayekohtli . in oasike itwalnepantla niman ye ik kopaltemalo in tlehkwasko. kinmonamikiko in awitsotl teoktli kim ilwi aw iwan ye nawpowalxiwitl ipan chikwexiwitl in ipan 3 kali xiwitl, 1521 años, in motlahtokatlali in tlakatl kwawtimoktsin tlahtowani tenochtitlan, in ikwak in san ye ok tlaxkalan temi in españolesme. in okinonots kwawtemok topantemok: “tehuatl tiknonotsakiw in capitán”. wan despwés ipan den laño nobenta i'kwakun yewik in rebolúsion yewik yetkaki'. mah amo kimatoka se paharito, kaxtoli kwawchili ahnoso chilpitsawak in tlamatini tomawak okutl apokyo ﻿nehuatl no toka nixochitekutli nikwawtl nioselotli nikan onitlakatki ipan inin tepetl itoka kwawtli iwan se noteikaw itoka xayekasin xochisin kwawtli iwan notlasin itoka xochiayachtli tekwani in tewantin nikan tikate otikkixke inin atli nikan tikpia ipan itoka wikoli chalchiwitli quezaü iwan okse atli onpa teponastepes amo wel otikkixtike ka sann iteskaw in tonatiw. nawi xumali pitsochiyawisotl in yewantin i nonowalka in teotlixka in oasiko in onkan xalipitsawayan, kinwalwikak in diablo in san tlapik kimoteotiaya in kitokayotiaya tlatlawki teskatlipoka; aw in tlahtowani in teowatewktli walmochiwtia itoka kawetskatsin ompa motewktlali in tolam. kaxtliltekah okilpikoh in motewksoma; yewan kitsatsakwakoh iitik in itekpan axayakatl. aw iwan ye onpowalxiwitl ipan yexiwitl in ipan ix tochtli xiwitl, 1566 años, in okechkotonaloke omentin tlahtoke alonso dávila iwan iteikkaw gil gosales alvarado; yaoyotl intech tlah kichiwaskia, yuh mito makokwiskia, in ipampa kitsawtiake. in monamaka kwesalan. aw sanno ikwak axkan miérkoles in ipan sant bernabé ilwitsin ik xi mani hunio ikwak ommopewalti in teoyotika tlahtowani arsobispo inik mowikak kastilan, ye teotlak in omopewalti don pedro moya de kontreras. yehwatl yokimonamaki para ikalson in mihtotihke yokimonamaki. xikintlamakakan in machos xikintlapopowikan lechonti. ik unka tlatokayotike in axka masatla. istatl, ixkich in monekis newatl nilus noihki oniyeya ipan makwili xiwitl onomachtitaya, tlen axan kikwitia kinto año. onechtlakolike nokahwan, noxolochkwe iwan nokoton ipampa notatsitsiwan noihki ihnotlakame. nikan ipan in in momikili in tlakatl kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli tlahtowani tsakwaltitlan tenanko amakemekan, aw inik tlahtokat ompa tsakwaltitlan tenanko amakemekan epowalxiwitl ipan matlakxiwitl inik asiko inik kitlaliko altepetl; aw inik mosenpowa inik tlahtokat ompa atenko inik walake makwilpowalxiwitl ipan se xiwitl ik omomikiliko. entonses okihton piltontli axan in lá yomickawiliko' inon listón inon mochi entonses este mamá axan ahmo xmochiwa titonta axan xihtitlani ohsé kosa ino papan porke nopapan nelewel yiye'on mono. i tekpatl xiwitl, 1324. yekene intla namewantsitsin nannechmokawiliah niktenewas notepitontlahtol nawalahtolkopa ika ikaxtilantlahtolkwepalis iuki monotsa por in kwoutah mochiwa. aw in ikwak ye on asi yowalnepantla, niman ye ik kintlamamaka, kinchichiwa, kinsenkawa in tekusistekatl kimakake iastakon mimiltik iwan ixikol; aw in nanawatsin, san amatl, inik kontsonilpike konkwailpike, itoka iamatson, iwan iamaneapanal, iwan iamamaxtli. newa nikixmati inin pahtli ipan okse tlachiwali limón iwan tekila ika istatl, kenin ki kwali maiknimeh ompa tlawanaloyan. kipia weyi tlaselilistli. mokwitiamexihkayopenisilina. aw niman mononotske in tliltekatsin iwan in kwawitsatsin; kimolwike in iwan iwewepo in iwexiw: "motolinia in topilwan in tsiwtekatsin iwan i matlaltsin; tla xikmokakilti, ka ye walkisa in kalpoleke in atenka, ka xixini, iwan ka ye tikimitta". amo nlkasikamati in tlen tikihtowa ¿quenameh inin tlacah? in kwali tlacah. axkan miérkoles owalatwik in ikomilwitl mani yankwik metstli henero no iwan kin ikomilwitia yankwik xiwitl de 1613 años, ihkwak nikan mexiko omixiw in siwapili doña mariana riedre markesa i virreina de la nweva españa in inamik tlahtowani don diego fernándes de kórdova markés de gwadalkásar visurrei de la nweva españa, in ipiltsin otlakat siwatl itoka doña mariana manwel. q.n. xi val meva xi val meva in tipiltsin in tikuskatl in tiketsali. se kikawa kalampa se yowal mah kimaka sereno wan se tayi yehwa de kwalkan ika tsiktsin asokal. xiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1440. in nikan siudad de mexiko axkan lunes xxix dias del mes de disiembre de mil e kinientos setenta i dos años in tewantin alkaldes don migwel sanches pedro geronimo hustisia tiktokwitlawia in ipaltsinko su magestad in axkan tixpan howala itoka maria xoko chane san sebastian awatonko konitoko niknokakiltiko in hustisia ipanpa nokal niknonamakiliko ixpa in hustisia ik otitupakanonotske netlasotlalistika. no ikwak in wel itlakaw i toktli, wel nowiyan kosawis. ii.- testigo.- migwel sewanokatl ichan kowatlan omonamikti ye nawpowalxiwtia i ye nemi huramento okitennamik in ika bara de hustisia inik otlatlakoltilok inik amo istlakatis ilwilok xokonmelawa in motlatol in tla tistlakatis ka diablo kiwikas in moyolia in manima aw in tla wel tokonmelawas motlatol ik mitstlaokolilis in totekuyo dios iwan tonantsin santa maria mochipa ichpoch. ii tochtli xiwitl, 1442. wan kwak in yomosewi ikwakon okpa poko a pokito kokatka yomotlalitahke pata titekitiya'. kiijtouaj, pero kien sabe tla neli. titlanamakanis aw inik wel tikneltiliske hin in ixkich tlakpak omotenew imak titotlalia in hustisia inika tonakayo yoan totlatkitika in tikpie axkan yoan in oktikpieske yoan tiktomaka inin welitilis in saso akike topileke in ihweshoan totlatokaw rei nwestro señor inik yehoantin techkwitlawiltiske inik tikneltiliske in totlatol ka wel ipan tikmatiske ka hwes in techtlatsontekilia in otikchiwke yoan tikitoa in saso tlein topalewiloka mochiwaskia in ipan omotenew aokmo wel ik titopalewiske. no onkak xokot de ahsokal, yeh kemeh ipa xokot, sayoh semi tsopek. mah wetsiki itech notatoktsin, tlachikili yahki xxii pregon.- a noeve del mes de mayo de mil e kinientos ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in tlaxilakalpan kolwakato[nko] okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal in itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak tlanankili testigo pedro de san migwel. ante mí fransisko maldonado eskrivano. iwan koronista in itokatsin moisés propheta inik kimonawatili ma yewatl ik pewa i semanawatl; aw inik kimitalwia in ipa amoxtli in achto in tlatsintilispewkapa kimochiwili in ilwikatl in totekwiyo dios iwan in tlaltikpaktli, aw atle itla onkan ipa ik motlanamiktili ima itla oksentlamantika tlananamikilistlatoltika, aw ye onmottak ye oittalok in ixkich tlamantli in tlaneltililistli in oktakatl machiyotl. koatepek tekiva tepetitlan moxayavaltevevel ayak in neli mokichtivi ivi in. tlali kwekwechivia ak in moxayaltevevel? momostla nochipa san inon nikchiwa. se kwali tonali nokonen. ¿quenin otitlatwik? pehki kikaki ya iwa motlani xii tochtli xiwitl, 1478. aw in oya kuxkuxtli omanaloke i xochmilka, wel tlanepantla in kitlalike; nima ye ik waltemo tetstsowali, nima ye ik waltemo xiwkowatl, nima ye ik tetlekawilo, nima ye ik miki i xochmilka. no iwan in ipan in ixiwtsin in totekwiyo dios, ye oyuh nepa motlakatilitsino yetsonxiwitl ipan onpowalxiwitl ipan se xiwitl, in ihkwak inik onkan motlaliko in omotenew in atentlipan chalko in chichimeka in totolimpaneka in amakemeke. san xikintlaniitati tlake onka para ayok tlahkoxonakatl no kilwiah ihtikoyokilitporinamomahmasisoh in kwowit, ta melauj ihtikohkoyoktik. aw in ipan metstli in ik xxxi mani desiembre in wetsiko atl tiankisko akaxik; ikwak mochali in akaxitl in tiankisko mani, chikwasenxiwtika yekawiko. yanwik itsotsoma. tla nokalmimilo niknamakaskiaya, notechmonekiskia oksente nokowis noponi kitlanki. vi tochtli xiwitl, 1186. nokonewitika ikwik in tlatowani axayakaton, nik xochimalina, nik xochilakatsowa. aw i ye omatlaktlonsexiwti, ik niman oyah omochololti inik tonatiw ikisayampa oitstia; ompa oyah in ialtepepan tonatiw in itokayokan tlapalan, ompa kiwalnots in tonatiw. inwikpa yewantin iwan tewan in no iwki tikelewiayah in titlahkwiloskeh itechpa in semmawistik ipan in toaltepew in kwikatl iwan in tlahtoli itlapowalis in omoyelismakak ihkwakayahmo ahsiah in kaxtiltekah in okimonechikalwihkeh in teopixkatsitsintin otechihtiti in wei tlanexilotl in senka tlatsintiloni in ahmo tikiximatiah yese otechpalewi iniktikchihchiwaskeh chikawalistika in totekiw in senka tikowihtikaihtayah yehika tokommatiah ahmo tichikawakeh ahmo titlapaltihkeh inik tikchiwaskeh na nika niitstok ¡tlen san kwali tlen nikaki! mach yenikan tikateh ixtlan kafenamakoyan. ¿ye yewa inon kanin tinechwikasneki? amo okachi mochiwa, keman weli saj. se kilo masayelnanakatl ¿tlen tlawikas? welik iuki sah wan komo se kineki iwan emoltsin oso pitsonakatsin. in axayaka inik tetlatlawti inik kipolos altepetl tlatilulko, konitowa “ma ok techmopalewiliki in yaotiakawan in wel chichikawake, ka ye techpolosneki in tlatilulka. techmakas nopapá. aw in nanawatsin san sen in walmotlapalo, kiwalsentlami, kiwalankwa in iyolo, walixtetenmotsolo; amo tle ik mixmawti, amo mo kekets, amo motilkets, amo tsinkis; san niman onmotlastiwets, onmomayawtiwets in tleko, san ik senya; niman ye ik tlatla, kwekwepoka, tsotsoyoka in inakayo. yahki miyake kiitstokeya komo kwaltsin mah motekipanokan. . aw in oasihke anawak pochteka in yewantin kipachowa altepetl in tlatohke anawak niman ye ik kin maka in ixkich in omokokow: tlahko kilo xitomatl aw no iwan in ihkwak in ye iw nepa nawpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolomome xiwitl ompa waltekawke in astlan in mexitin asteka in axkan ye motenewa tenuchka. —ake'wa otlaxkalo. . aw in ompa altepetl ipan, in ahso tochtepek ahnoso anawak, xokonuchko in kexkich kitki itlatki amo no kimomachitoka, amo kimotlatkitoka amo kimaxkatoka, san kiteilwia in okimittake in yaowa imixpan walewa, teokwitlatl pepetskatiwits, in san ketsalpanitl itlaxopalewa, ken nopa elki. seki kilwiah xochiyowa itech enero; okseki, kemeh mayo wan hunio. inin ya exiwtika i ye mokwepa in chalka akxoteka inik yahke inchan atenko chalchiwtepek, ipan in ei kali xiwitl. tlawel axkipiyaj. komo se tonawi no kwali ika se mopahtia, yehwa ya in kilit wan ikwouyo. ¿catlehua okachi kwali momaiknitsin? fernando okachi kwali nomaiknin. kikwechowah wan kitaliliah se chilwak iwan mimientaj, ompa kimanah ya. in ok imostlayok in mikkailwitl kinekih kichiwase xinachtli ipan nawtsontli onkaxtoli onnappoali, ommatlaktli omei xiwitl, pewa itepanitlasalis kaxtoli amoxtoton in itech wewe tekpilahtoli motokayotia 'tlahtolnahuatilli". tosannakatl aw in yewantin in kweskonpixke iwan in oksekintin in kimotenpotika in anamo mikke senka momawtike, kitoke "ye wits in tekwachkawtli in tositewktli aw in amakemekan in aokwantsin iwan in kowasakatsin iwan in inantsin in siwapili in tlakosiwatsin teyakapan in tlahtoke". aw iwan ye nawpowalxiwitl onmatlaktli ipan onxiwitl in ipan x akatl xiwitl, 1515 años, in opoliw inik san ya in tlakatl nesawalpili tlahtowani katka akulwakan tetskoko, in tlatokat onpowalxiwitl onchikwasen; aw inik mosenpowa in ixkichkaw nen tlaltikpak inik tlakat ye onpowalxiwtika onmatlaktika ipan nawxiwtika inik san poliwiko inik san ya. niman ik, ipan matlaktli tekpatl xiwitl, omotlalikoh popotlan, in onkan owekawke nawi xiwitl. nesa ika ahko eltok tlitl. tioweh titsikwinikan, tochan techchia. satepa pus yeka yoki resibirohke in ichopoch satepa ye'on paka ye'on pa kipia. . aw in ikwak in ye mostla on ewaske, in ipan kwali tonali, niman ye ik mahmowia moxima in nikan mexiko, san ik sen. axkan nikneki niktenewas itla itechpa tlen onikchiw ipan amatl inawatlahotlkwepalis in nikan nesi. aw inin obispo yewatsin kimihtalwi i horasió in ipan omotenew ik vigilia mochiw; aw senka wei iwan senka mawistik in kwawteokali motlali onkan ihtik iglesia mayor, mochi tlakatl senka okimawiso, iwan san ye no ixkich inik otlayawalolok axkan in ixkich moyawalo in tlakpak omotenew, ihkwak tokok inakayotsin teoyotika tlahtowani don frai garsía gwerra arsobispo moyetstikatka. seki kitektinemih kampa onkak wan kinamakah sakapoastan wan no kwesalan. ihwak yon se monakastsakwi mah se kiixka wan mah se monakaschalanili iayotsin. nikan ipan in pew in innetetsanwilis in tulan tlaka, ye iw senpowalonkaxtoli onkan monemitia tulam in omotenew topiltsin akxitl ketsalkowatl. yemotekin sebada yemotlamaka momatlamaka para ahmo kipu:lus tlenkikwas para kon eso in kwak importariwi tekitiwas in yunta chichkawak ahmo ki pulowa in len kimomahsewis. in sesek. wiya! tsonimolko notavan é ya namech ma ya pinawtis. tetemokan notavan é ya namech ma ya pinawtis se akokoltsin, aw in atl in chinamitl mochiwa makwilmatl inik patlawak kaxtolmatl omome inik wiyak in onkan chinankwak home estakas omomaman se otlika imixpan omochiw in testigos pedro matlatsinkatl, anton ximenes gaspar chichtli, fransisko kwikaxochitl, tomas de san migwel algwasiles, pedro visente hwan lwis, agustin faustino yewantin in testigos omochiwke. in kan sesek nionno totonik. aw in yewantin siwa kinnamakaya san no iw kinchichiwaya. kim onakiaya in kwali wipili in xochimoyawak ahnoso xohxoloyo aw in inkwe yewatl in chikokweitl, ahnoso tehtennakasyo, ix akatl xiwitl, 1267. aw no iwan in ihkwak in in onkan kalakiko kulwakan in mexika, ye oiw nepa walkiske in inchan astlan chikomostok ye matlakpowalxiwitl ipan senpowalonkaxtoli ipan se xiwitl inik nowiyan tlali ipan walnentiake. nawi xumali pitsochiyawisotl 72. ka yewatl inik tiwewe, inik tilama, inik san ok iyo in ik nimitsontennamikilia immomatsin, immokxitsin. aw tla ok ik ninotimalotinemi, immokoski, immoketsal, aw immochalchiw, immoteoxiw, aw in motsonwatsal, immotetew. aw, intla ok nikan ik ninopipitstinemi, ik nonnaawiltitinemi. nottatsink, otlaokoxki immoyolotsin, otinechmoknelilitsino. iii.- testigo. hwan masatl ichan atlixokan namike in ixiwtlapowal ye onpowalxiwitl honkaxtoli okichiw huramento in i tlatlakoltilok ipaltsinko dios iwan sankta maria iwan sankta krus. chilakachmoli ika siwakwakwawenenepili de ke xkinmaka weyi in tokal. in kilit se kimana, se kitalilia tenexistat, tein selik ikwouyo achto se kipantema, komo se kimachilia oksik ya, se kipankalakia ya ixiuyo. martina kipia notomin kwatro pesos san no ikpatl ik kichiwa ma isiwka kixtlawas. nochi tlen mokonewa iniwa tikalakis. akin kiwelilia tayi. inik 6 tlamantli nikitowa omonamakak towewetlal in onpa sankta maria kwepopan aw onkan onimakok 11 pesos aw yewatl kipia i nawitsin in itoka angelina nitlantiw notech monekis ik ninotokas in ikwak in tla oninomikili. ka ipan kitlalitiw testamento i nonamik omomikili itoka martin hakobo ka nel yuh kitotiw in monamakas in tlali onkan moxtlawas tetlatki kimitlakalwitia aw ka miyek in kimoteitlakalwilitiw in tetlatki kanpa nokonnokwilis. wel ik iwintike aokmo ompa kalaki in ichan tealti, san ompa kinwika in kalpulko; ompa kimontlalia in aso puchtlan anoso akxotlan. kosawawa xochitl san ye on kalakilo sakwan kalitik. in ayamo walasi españoles, ok matlakxiwiti, sentlama[n]tli tetsawitl achto nes, ilwikatitech iwki in tlemiyawatl, iwki in tlekwesalotl, iwkin tlawiskali, pipixawtikaka inik nesia, iuhq[ui]n ilwikatl kisotikak. —in xwan. e iw exiwi tlantokant in kunchiw temalakatl tisuntsikantsin. tlen 28 tlanawatihkayotl. ipan sentlanechikoli mexihko tlaltlanawatiloyan mokotonas nochi tlen weyi tlaaxkatilistli, tlachiwali tlen weyi tlaaxkatilistli, kwatakantli iwan tlapopolwili tlen tlaxtlawali ken moihtowa ipan tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh. sehka inin tlahtoli motemaktilis tlen axmoneki mochiwas ipan axkayotl tlen yankwik tlachiwalistli. ipampa inon, in tlahtol tlanawatili chikawak tetlatsakwiltis, iwan tekiwehmeh nelkwali quitepotztocaseh, tlanechikolistli inmako san se ome tlacameh, tleweli tlen motekiwiya ipan tlakwalistli tlen kinekih quipatiyoquixtiseh; nochi tlahtolsenkawali, tlahtoltekichiwali tlen tlaeliltianih, yankwik tlachihuanih, tlanamakanih noso weweyi tequitlapalehuianih, tlen kitemoah momaquixtiseh, axkanah sentika momatlaniseh iwan kinnekiliseh tlen tlakowani ma miak tlaxtlawakah iwan, inochiya, nochi tlen ika welis motsonkixtiseh se ome noso eyi tlakameh iwan kintlatlakawiseh nochi altepechanehkeh noso oksekintin masehualmeh. in tlahtol tlanawatilmeh kipepechtiseh tlahtoli iwikpa monextis ken achi ipatih tlen tlatekiwili, noso tlachiwalmeh tlen moihtos moneki ipan sentika tlapialistli noso masewal tlakwalistli, iwan noihki iwikpa moixtlalis oksekin tlamantli nechikolistli tlen ika moxexelos inon tlatekiwili, tlen ika mokotonas tlen sekin sanmolwih mokalakiah tlen kichiwah mamokotona tlakwalistli, iwan noihki tlen tlapatioh. in tlahtol tlanawatili kin manawis tlen tlakowani iwan kinpalewis mamonechikokah tlen ikah welis momanahuiseh. amo welis weyi moaxkatis tekichiwali tlen kaltlanawatiloyan kisenyekanas ipan inin tlamantli tlahatoli tlawiwikani, wehka tlatitlantli tlahkwiloli; chapopohtli iwan sekinok tlamantli tlen tlatla; chapopohtli tlamaneloli; tepos xawantli iwan chikawalistli tlayoltilistli; chikawak tlawili iwan tekiyotl tlen moihtos ipan tlanawatilmeh tlen kikixtis sentika weyi tlahtokan. tlanohnotsali tlen wekapa tepostli iwan okwilin teposmimilolmeh nochi yewan itlanekilis tlen senyolchikawalistli ken moihtowa ipan 25 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili; in sentlanawatiloyan keman tlayekanas, kimanawis iselnemilis totlalnantsin, iwan tla tlatemaktilis masekinok quitehuicah, kipixtos noso kiixtlalis iaxkayo ipan nochi ohtlanohnotsali tlen kenihki moihtowa ipan amatlanahuatilmeh. in kaltlanawatiloyan kipias tlayolkayomeh iwan weyi kaltekitiloyan tlen monekis ika nelkwali kiwikatias tlen tlahtolpamitl ipatih iwan yewa iixkawil iwan tekitl tlen tlawel moneki kampa, ken moihtowa ipan tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh, iselti tekipanos noso iniwaya tlen altepetlakameh iwan tlasentlapialmeh. in kaltlanawatiloyan mopialis se tlatlahko kaltominpiali tlen moselnawatis ipan itekichiwalis iwan ipan itlatekiwilispan. itlanekilis tlen saniman, tlapalewis mamosentlali tomin tlahkowilispan tlen nochi totlalnantsin, tlayolchikawas ika yewa tlayekantli tlen senyolchikawalistli tlen itechpowi kaltlanawatiloyan. amo aken tlanawatiani welis kinawatis kaltomimpiali matetlanehti tomin. amo mochiwa weyi tlaxkatilistli tekichiwali tlen kiyekanas kaltlanawatiloyan, ipan tlatlahko kaltominpiali kampa mochiwas neltomin iwan mokixtis amatomin. in tlatlahko kaltominpiali, ken moihtos ipan tlahtol tlanawatilmeh iwan tlen ika mokalakiseh tekiwameh tlen intechpowi, kitlachilis tomin tlapatlali, iwan noihki tomin tlatekiwili, ipan mopalewis tekiwa tlen ika welis tlaxitlawas iwan kiihtos motlepanita tlahtoli. in tlayekantli tlen kaltominpiali inmako mokawas tlen tlakameh kintokatlalis weyi tekiwa tlen totlalnantsin, iwaya tlahtol selistli tlen sentika weyi tlahtokan noso nochipa tlasentilistli, tla ihkon moneki, tekipanoseh ipan kawitl tlen mowekawilis iwan mowekaitstias ken moihtowa ipan iseltlanawatili tlen itekiwakayo; san welis kintekiwa 38. intla wel timonemitis, intla wel tikchiwas inin nimitsilwiya in ihkwak tittalos, mopampa tetl, kwawitl kitoktiske in akin ahmo wel nemi, in ahmo kitlakamati in itta, in inan. nitlasohtla kikahtehke nopa tlatlaxtli. ik opew in yaoyotl, okwalamke in tlamakaske in telpopochtin; niman okinpewaltin in kapitán don pedro de alparado tonatiw inik ye kinmiktia in mokokolowaya in mitotiaya in atekaya in tiakawan in mexika. lmmanon ken ika nechpaktiaya nikinkukatinemis in ichpokame lea organilo nikihkistinemia leanon ohtli ammo eochia nien ammo kisaya in xotlapaktli aw in ikwak in tla omonamakak in ipatiw yes ixkich notechpowki yes ik misa nopan mitos in toteopan sank hoseph ixkich itech powki yes in nonantsin hwana antonia itech monekis. kipixki itlalnamikilis, kiihto ma nechmotlasopialili in totekwiyo dios miek xiwitl, iwan ma kimochikawilitsino miekanemilistika, in iw timochintin nowiyampa titlaka tikelewia, aw in oksenka newatl, nonkwa yuh katki okachi wel nonawatil nomamal, inik nikelewia don || 232 domingo de san antón muñón kwawtlewanitsin chimalpahin. tlen 16 tlanawatihkayotl. ayak welis kikwalaniseh itlakayotipa, itlaixmatkawa, ichantla, amatinimeh noso tlen tlapihpia tla amo onka se tlahkwiloli tlen kinawatihtos se tlanawatihketl tlen kinamiki, iwan kiihtos tlen tlahtlakoyotl ika quitlatsintoquiliah. nochi masewalmeh kipia intechpihulistli maki pihpiyaka intokayitl, kiasis, kiyekyenkawas iwan kiixpolos nompa, iwan nohkia kiihtos amo kineki, tla ihkino kiihtos tlanawatili, tlen kiihtos kema amo welis mochiwas iwan ihkina kiihtos kenikatsa motlatis nompa tlahtlahpixketl, iwan kitlalis ika seguridad nasional, iwan ihkina kiihtos orden públiko, seguridad iwan tlapahtili públikas onhkia tlen sekinok intokayitl. amo welis kikixtiliseh amatlatsahtilistli tla amo kiihtos tlen melawak tlanawatihketl tlen poder hudisial iwan tla amo onkas anke kitelwiya noso kiihtowa se amatlanawatili mochia se tletelwihkayotl, iwan kiihtos kenihki kitlatsakwilseh itlakayotipa iwan onkas tlahtoltlaixnextili kampa moinhtos kenihki panotos tlen kitlahtlakolwiya iwan monextis tla nehlia anke kitlahtlakoltia nehlia kichihtos tlahtlakoyotl. tekiweh tlen ki nechikos tlanawatil amatl kanih ki ihtowa akin ki itsquiseh, ki wikas nopa tlahtlakolchihketl iixpa tlanawatihketl tlen tetlatsakwiltía, nimantsi wan ya mo nechikos iixpah. tlah amo ki chiwas ihkino ki tlatsakwiltiseh san keh eltok pan tlanawatilamatl. akin weli tlakatl weli ki itskiski se tlahtlakolchihketl tla ki ita tlahtlakolchiwa ke tlah kemah sanok ki chihtok, wan ki wikas iixpah se tlanawatihketl tlen itstok echka, iwan niya, nimantsi ki wikas iixpa tlanawatihketl kanih on mo tlateilhuiyah. wan nimantsi ki ihkwiloseh nochi san kemah ki itsquihqueh. san kemah nimantsi mo neki, kemah onka se weyi tlahtlakoli kehaínoh ki ihtowa amatlanawatili iwan kemah ki mawilia mamo chololti wan ihkinoh ax ma ki tlatsacuilticah, nopa elis san kemah amo weli ki wikaseh iixpan tlanawatihkel tlen te tlatsakwiltia pampa kawitl, kanih itstokeh ke tlah san keh tla eheltok, wahka tekíweh tekiweh kanih on mo tlateilhwiyah mo neki, ika ya ipampa, tlanawatis ki itsquiseh, tlen ki ihtowa tlanawatihkeamatl ipan mo tlakxilis wan ki ihtos kenihki ki pewalti nochi tlanawatilis. kemah ki itah akahya tlahtlakolchiwa ke tlah kema mo neki nimantsi ki itsquiseh, tekiew tlen te tlatsakwiltia tlen ki selis amatla tlen ki tsaktokeh moneki nimantsi kiihtos tlah achiyok ki tsaktoseh ke tlah tlah ki makawaseh maskeh ayokmo ki senkawaseh amatlanawatili. tekiweh tlen tetlatsakwiltia, tlah ki tlahtlanis tekiweh kanih on mo tlateilhwíyah iwan tla eli kemah mo sehkotilíah tlakameh tlahtlacolchihuaseh, welis ki kalakiseh pan se kali se tlakatl, kanih ki ihkwiloseh kenihkatsah nopa kali wan keski tonali tlen ki ihtowa amatlanawatili, amo weli pano omesempowalih tonali, san tlah kehaínoh mo neki wan kwali kisas itlatehtemolistli, kin mokwitlawiseh sekinok tlakameh ke tlah tlahkía tlen amatlanawatili ki mokwitlawia, ke tlah kemah weli cholowa akih tlahtlakolchihtok tlah ki ixpanotok amatlanawatili. ni tonali weli mo ompawiya, san kemah tekiweh kanih on mo tlateilhwíyah ki ixpantis nohah ki mahtok kenke pehki kwatotonilistli. amo kemah weli panos nawi powali tonali ki pixtoseh se tlakatl pan se kali. nopa kemah mo sehkotilíah tlakameh tlahtlakolchiwaseh yowantih mo ihilwiyah tlah eyih ke tlah achi miyakih tlacameh, wan ihkinoh tlahtlakolchiwaseh nochipa ke tlah ahachika, san keh eltok pan amatlanawaliti tlen yaíno ki ihtowa. yon se tlahtlakolchihketl weli ki tsakwilihtoseh ne tekiweh kanih on mo tlateilhwíyah ki panoso omesempowali iwan chikweyi kawitl, iwan ni kawitl mo neki tlanawatiseh ma ki kixtika ke tlah ma ki wikakah iixpan tlanawatihketl; ni kawitl weli mo ompawis kemah onkan oknawxiwtike in mexika katka inik onkan motlaliko itsintlan mosewiaya in awewetl; inin kwawitl omotenew inpan postek mexika sanno yewantin intlaakil mochiw in as- || 76 -teca, in iw kitotiwi wewetke. itlatoltika kimononochiliko yuh kimolwili nimitsnotlatlawtilia in titlatowani niknokowi kaltsintli in onkan ipan tlaxilakali teokaltitlan aw in axkan nosiyelistika notlanekilistika inik oksepa niknomakilia se tlakatl español kimokowia aw ipampa inik mixpantsinko oniwala nimitsitlanililiko in mowelitsin inik timotlanawatilis ma ik tsatsiwa makitekakilti in tekpoyotl. kixnamokitimoketsa in tonatiw. niman ye ik kon iyawa in ixkopa nawkampaixti. yuh kichiwaya. ﻿cequintin tewilistli iwikpan silvia otlapolo, okiyektonewi oki momotso, ye iman okitak ka amo kwali ika mimiston motewis iwan axkan ye kinyekitah in yoyolcameh. antlasohtlaskiah postehtli kiilwiyaya ne tepetl weyi, ihkatok. "noikni, ¡xijpiya kwidado! vii.- pregon a trese dias del mes de hebrero de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in tlaxilakalpan teskatsonko okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal in itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak otlanankili ixpan testigo martin xwares. ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. aw in ikwak ye onasi ilwiw, nesawaloya; nawi ilwitl tlakatlaloya. aw iwan sanno iwi wel motenewa in teowamoxtlakwilolpan, yehika in ipan ikatsinko in totekwiyo dios in tlachiwaltik in yewatl achto tlakatl in adán; iwann ipan in motlakatilitsino in yewatsin christo totemakixtikatsin, iwan inik motlaihiyowilti inik motonewiti inik otechmomakixtili. aw inik nimann onkan asiko onkan motlaliko in itokayokan in itstepek, onkan nawxiwtike. tlake immochiwah noponi. aw in otlatwik in owel tlanes, ik niman moch nes ittalok iwan moch machistik in ixkichtlamantli okitlako tlalolinalistli inik nowian nikan ihtik siudad mexiko; iwan san ya iwi nemawtilotok sa tikmahmatikate in iw omochiw tlalolinalis yei tsili yowak, yuhkinn ipan titomati sa yayatimanin tlali, yuhkinma ye okseppa mochiwas in iw nemachotok. ipan in in sekintin wewetke kimachiyotia in momikiliko in witsiliwitl tlahtowani tenochtitlan; aw niman ikwak motlahtokatlali in chimalpopoka tlahtowani mexiko. tlen 74 tlanawatihkayotl. isentlanawatil tlen tlahtokan tepantlahtoanih: i. kinextis in bando solemne iwikpa tlatematiltis ipan nochi totlalnantsin in motokahtis weyi tekiwa tlapehpentli tlen kichihtos tribunal elektoral tlen poder hudisial tlen sentlanawatiloyan; ii. kiyekanas iwan kitamachiwas, amo kiihtlakos isentlanawatil iwan itekichiwalis, in kaltlanawatiloyan tlamokwitlawili tlen sentlanawatiloyan, ken moihtos ipan tlahtol tlanawatili; iii. tlakotontli. iv. ki tlalihtoke se xiwitl ni amatominkayotl tle ni ki tekiwiya ipan ni weyi altepetl, kenihki ki tlachilihke, mo kamanalwihke tla kixolewase ni in proyekto kititlanke ipan ne poder ehekutivo federal iwan sampa ki tlachilihke tla kwaltitohka iwan wehkawas mo tekiwis mo tsaktos. sankeni welis moihtos ni presupwesto ni erogasiones ika miak xiwitl ni seki tlachiwalistli tomi tlayehyekoli tlen mo ilwiyas eltok ipan ni tlatoltlanawatihketl tlayehyekoli ni erogasiones mo tlalihtoke eliskia tlamise yolik ki chiwaltihtoke ni in tomi. in tekichiwani tlen sentlanawatiloyan kititlanis kampa tlahtokan in amatlapewaltilistli tlahtol tlanawatili tlen tomintla nechikoli iwan amatlayeyekoli tlen tlatekiwili tlen sentlanawatiloyan tlawel wehkawas ipan 8 tonatih tlen septiembre metstli, iwan moneki tlaixnamikiti tekitlahkwiloani tlen itechpowi tlen tematiltis inin tlahtolmeh. in tlahtokan tlen tepantlahtoanih moneki kikwalitas in tomin tlayeyekoli tlen sentlanawatiloyan tlawel iwekawayo ipan 15 tonatih tlen noviembre metstli. keman pewas itekih ipan tonati tlen kiihtowa 83 tlanawatikayotl, in tekichiwani tlen sentlanawatiloyan kititlanis kampa tlahtokan in amatlapewaltilistli tlen tlahtol tlanawatili tlen tomin tlatenechikoli iwan amatlayeyekoli tlen tomin motekiwis ipan sentlanawatiloyan tlen tlawel mowekawilis ipan 15 tonati tlen disiembre metstli. amo welis onkas sekinok tomin ichtakaya, iyoka tlen melawak moneki, tlen inin tlamantli, ipan seha amatlayeyekoli; tlen kitekiwiseh tekitlahkwiloanih iwan tematiltis ika amatlahkwiloli tekichiwani tlen totlalnantsi. makwili párrafo.- (mo xolewa) chikwase párrafo.- (mo xolewa) chikome párrafo.- (mo xolewa) san welis ki chiwase achi miak kema kinextise katliya tlayakanketl tlahtoltlanawatihketl tlen tomi tlayehyekoli kitlalihtoke, mo tlahtlaniya ni tlanawatihketl yahayok kimati ika weyokapa tle ni kámara iwan ni tlawatiyani tle nochipa itstoke, mo tlalihtoke ika nochi ni sekretario tlen ni despacho ki mati kinilwis kenikatsa eltiyahtok; v. kiihtos tla weli noso amo weli motlatskwiltiseh altepeko tekitinih tlen kichihtoseh tlahtlakoli ken moihtowa ipan 111 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili. kiixmatis tlen tlahtlakoli kinkawiliseh altepeko tekitinih ken moihtowa ipan 110 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili iwan tekichiwas kewak nechikolistli tlen tlatelwia ipan tlaixpantilistli kampa inin tlakameh quinchihuiliseh. vi. ki tlachilise nikenikatsa yatiyatok amatl tle nochi weli ki ita tlen nese xiwitla, teilwiskiya kenikatsa yati ni amatl tomi, wan ki temokliskia, ki sepanoskia tlatoli tln ki nextitiyowi ipan tln ki yaltitiyowi, ki tlachilise wan axitise tlen mo yolilwiyaya tlen ki tlalitoke. ki nextiskiya kenikatsa yahti ipan kámara de diputados tlachke altepetl tlayakantih yamahtik, tla ki nextiya wan ki chiwa mamonexti ika i miahka kaniki yahtih in ama tomi tlen kisa wan kalaki,tlen yahwanti ki mati kenikatsa yahti ahachitsitsi, wan ax onkaskiya tle xitlawak wan onkaskia amatl xitlawak tlen ki selitoke wan tlen ki yaltitoke, mo tlaliskiya ni tlaneltokani san se in tlatol tlanawatiketl. wan tla kin tlachiliskia wan ki axitikia tlen yawanti ki tlalitoke, ni pil altekotsitsti weliskiya ki ihtose tlen achi kwali mo chiwaskia kanihki kwali kwalkisase san se tlahtoli. kiyektalihkeh in masewaltahtol: amo xikmaka. aw in okitak in kapitán, in malinsi, sa nima yee i kwalani, kitoa “cuix ye in in temolo? ye in kimotemolia i nikan toltekaakaloko ankintlasaltike. kwaatiyo. istatl, ixkich in monekis yuh kihtotiwi in wewetke. iteyakankayopan akamapichtli kipopolo kwawnawak (ompa tlalwikapan), miskik, kwitlawak iwan xochimilko. miérkoles in ik 14 mani metstli oktubre de 1615 años, ihkwak nowiyan teupan in iksen siudad mexiko otlatlatlawtilok otlayawalolok in inpampa omotenewke tlakpak toyaowan in teowatentli kitokatinemi in techyawalotinemi. . niman ye ik konmana in amatl in tleko. in okonman satepan konkwi in istak kopali yewatl in tsiwak kopali in wel melawak in wel yake in wel chipawak in amo tlasolo in amo tewyo. nikihtos kemeh seki nopilwan. ta nimitsilwis... ta axtimokwitlawi techtlawankanotske in michwakan, in samakoyawak, tiwitsmanato ye timexika nikan ipan in poliwke kwitlawaka, yewantin kipoloke in mexika. ixiuyo maahalaxtik wan ikwouyo mapihpitsawak. aw niman kinnots onkan in diablo in witsilopochtli, kimilwi "xiquinnahuatican in amechwika in chikwei altepeme in kolwake, xikimilwikan: `camo tiaske in kampa otiaskia, ka san nikan titocuepazque'". ix tekpatl xiwitl, 1228. || 144v aw in weweyotsintli tlailotlaktewktli tlahtowani tsakwaltitlan tenanko san cholo, motlalito tlakoyawalko, kinwikak umpa in isiwawan xoyak ikampa, amo kimottiti in markés. tlahtokomidita tleno timochiwili. iwan ikwak onkan teittitilok in isabel machada hudía ichpochtli, ichpoch katka in omotenew antonio machado sastre hudío; iwan onkan teittitiloke se klériko itoka plata iwan se monha iwan se beata. ihkwak ahsiko in chapoltek tlakochkalka iwan mexika. kwaltia eskrivano fransisko moisen iwan algwasil mayor melchior dias iwan algwasiles pedro xiwtemolok pablo senones otikimonkalakiko in inkalkowalko in intlalkowalpan in isabel xilotl in ikonew hwan lopes inik okonanke posesion san pakka yokoxka ayak otlachalani tetika okimokimotlake inin estakas itik okalakke in inkalkowal ipan onenenke in intlal. techmakas se tlikwawetstli onkán tlenon kwa' pero pus nihteteka ayatl ahmo pero yonikihto. na nokia ni tlakatl in ipan siudad de mexiko ik kastol ose mani metstli desienbre de mil e kinientos i ochenta i seis años in iewatsin senka mawistililoni don martin hernandes regidor mayor iwan alkalde migwel de los angeles hustisia kimopielia in ikatsinko su magestad iwan tetewktin pedro heronimo migwel de la krus mowikake in ipan tlaxilakali suhetos san pablo motokayotia tlalistakapan kimotepotstokilito in tlali mili motenewa kwawtlali moyoteka tlali. in tlakatsintli kimonekitia kimokowilis in kali, ye owilowak. komo kwoutah amo se kinehmachpiya,itech kajfentaj, se kinehmachpiya para iyekawil kahfen. tehwatsin tikmatis tlahko kilo xitomatl tehpan tiktsetseloa, iwan chientsotsol chiampitsawak kweskontika kikeketsaya intech monekia in ixkichtin kipalewiaya in ik amo apismikiske. aw yewatl ikome arsobispo omochiwako in don frai alonso de montúfar teopixki sankto domingo, in otlapacho ika ixkichkaw in ipan xiwitl de 1554, oiw ye nepa chikonxiwitl momikili in don frai hwan de sumárraga, aw ixkich ik walantika yewatl ipan xiwitl de 1572 in momikiliko; don frai alonso de montúfar in teoyotika motlahtokatili mexiko kaxtolonnawi xiwitl. nehín kwowit nikixmattok iuki kilwiah por in pané tomat in iteyo. yahkin kwappolokatl, in kwawtekolotl.ximowa in toteukwan: tehwa xikmatapana. se kitoka importa. yei tochtli xiwitl ik omotlatokatlali tisosikatsi tenochtitla. aw in tlakatl kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli onka wekawak in texkalko omemasak in ikpak amakeme; ye omito, san walwia in chikonkowak walachixtinenka inik onkan walmoxtlawaya. kwawaltsin neka sisiwanton. yeko kipanotiwitse nochi otli tlen achto kipanoke. in minas tlakwaske. ompoyon nochtin ke ikowiloak noihki tlakwalo, atliwa iwan kimatlitia kawatin. onkwan on kixikoske asiske ahusko. seki tlakatl kochia ahusko iwan okseki oasia tupileho. ompoyon onekalotiloya. san niman mayordomo yenkwik milpa alta kipia tlen kitetlamakas nochtin nenenkatsitsintin mowentikes. ompoyon tetsatsatsililo. tlen inomekes okochke ahusko yeyeko keman chikóme tlapoalistli watsinkopa. kimeteteketsa yeyi noso nawi tlaka; onkwan on awel panoske mowentikes keniman yotlakwake ma tikitokan almasalolo. in mayordomo yenkwik yewatl on techias tupileho. kitemaka tamali, tlaxkali, arros, tlimoli, yetl. tlatlaniwa; ¿quezqui tlakatl tikinmikilits? ¿nozo motlawtsinko witse? onkwan on ma mítsmakilikan achi weyi tlakwali, miak tamali iwan miak tlaxkali. tla aka wits kineki inewtli ma mamopacho, ma quitlani. onkan mokixtihke in motenewaya in kolegio mestisati, in onkan axkan ye motenewa kolegio de las niñas, i wel inawak itlok monasterio san fransisko, in imochtintsitsin onkan mokixtihke || 275 ka san ok señorati; aw inin omotenewke siwateupixke monhastin in ihkwak motlalike in inwan omentsitsin mestisati, ye omotenew ixwiwtsitsinwan in tlakatl katka mutewksumatsin xokoyotl. in testigo kitowa kan nikmelawa in notlatol in inpan nitlaneltilia amo ken nikinnotsa nikitoa in ipanpa in kali inik neteilwilo axkan in sa kwitlakoyontikak kamo nikmati in kanpa wala i tetl in kwawitl in xamitl. ximetsta. tla tewan otiezquiayah. kemahkatsin. ontlakpak. melawak. amo machia tleka ihkion iwan inik wehes chanehkeh amo quineltocah, ka miktlapan se wits ika tlatsintla, se kwali mitstilis. mach in tlaweheapa, nochi kihtowa. mexihko ipan weyi atlanti weheapa ki pía 2,300 metroh iwan monterrei san 550 kipia. iwan okse, miktlanpa amo ki pia nawi noso makwilmetspa xopanistli keh in ahkotlalnepantla. ompa monterrei nesi amo keman kiawi iwan miak ti itoniah. nikan in momostlakiawitl kin itstilia in yowaltin maski ipan verano iwan ihkion se tlakpak tlakatl kwali mitstilis maski ipan metstin hulio iwan agosto. ika nika ihkini ika ihkini yahto. aw in ipiltsin katka okichtontli homomikili aw in maria anan niman omomikili oniknookichtik in pedro lwis aw in migwel hoselotl aw ka sa nisel onkan month atle imatika okitlali in tepantli. muchokatiwis in tlatowa; ye ikwak kimakake in tlawistli in teukwitlaio in ketsalo. sayayá tekitih achiyok nikan ipan in in toxiw molpili; ikchikwexpa in kilpike in inxiw in wewetke chichimeka mexika in ixkich ik walake in ompa walake astlan teokolwakan. istatl, ixkich in monekis aw kil sa yewantin kinkawaskia in wel chipawake señorati in wel kwalxayakeke, in ye iyoloko siwa iwan in ichpopochtin, sa se in ye mochintin siwapipiltotonti in wel kwalxayakeke san yewantin amo kinmiktiskia, san kinkawaskia yehika ipampa kil kinmosiwawtiskia in tliltike. maski amo kiawi nia nikwikas nokiahpalewil. inik ei barrafo in yoan nikitoa in nokal in onkan in wetstok tonatiw ikisayampa itstikak in ixayak inik patlawak namatl ipan senmolikpitl aw in yomotlan inik wiak ematl ipan se molikpitl inin intech powis in noxwiwan in ipilwan fransisko xwares inik se tlakatl itoka kathalina inik ome itoka augustina inik ei tlakatl itoka elena agostina. kwali kisenkahke. otinemia niman ipam inin xiwitli otechtlamiskikia amo welitik in tewantin in titetekutin popokispam aw in tlatsotsoniskatsi moxosi in iichpoch akolnawakasi kiwalitla koatlicha tlatoani akolmistli wisiliwitl; ye mopilwatia ye tlakat ixkwekwetsi, ikome akxokweitl. aw in ipampa in ikontetl ipan kimotokayotilike in tlahtokapiltsintli prínsipe inik itokatsin mochiw domingo, || 43 ka yehika ipampa in onkan mokwatekitsino in ikwak piltsintli moyetstikatka in itlasotsin totekwiyo dios in tlasemiknopilwiani sankto domingo de gusmán in ihtik nekwatekilisakaxitl in vila in onkan kimokwatekilike; aw sanno onkan in okimokwatekilike in tlahtokapiltsintli prínsipe, inik onkan okimokwili in itokatsin sankto domingo, ka iw omachistiko in nikan mexiko. in sesek. aw in tlotepetl i ye kinawatia in kwauchpame, i matlaktesakawake, ye kimilwia “manoço tiuia”. inin kowixka amo intepewal i mesika, san ik tlawewechiwke in kwawnawak tlatoke, ik wewechiwaloke tlatilulko tlatoani tlakateutsi, tenochtitla chimalpopokatsi. xochiyowa xa hulio wan agosto. aw ka yuhki in in achto kitowa kitenewa inik yewatsin san iseltsin i neli teutl dios ixkichiwelitsin, san iseltsin nekwitiloni iximachoni mochipa semikak, ka wel yuh yes toyolo inik yewatsin kimochiwili in ilwikatl iwan tlaltikpaktli iwan in ixkich in kexkich tlamantli mochiwa in axka in ipa semanawatl; ka ixkich tlamantli itetsinko walewa, aw ka yewatl o ipampa inik tipewa in itechpatsinko in totekwiyo dios. in ipan in siudad mexiko sanktiago tlatilulko ik sempoalilwitia onnawi in metstli abril de 1591 años in iehoatsin don gaspar de mendosa governador hwes, in ikatsinko onesiko in nikan sektlapal ikwiliwtok karta de venta inik omakok in kali ana xwares chane santa ana witsilan. ipan in kommahmana in chimalxuchitl in xochikoskatl in ikpaxuchitl; aw onkan konmana in yekaxitl ontetl, onkan konteka in yetl tlahtlatlatok. 32 vii akatl xiwitl, 1603 años. todian xia, mitstemoa. ipan in ye achtopa inik ompa walkiske in inchan astlan in asteka mexitin chichimeka in axkan ye mitowa tenochka; ye yuh nepa ontsontli ipan matlakpowalxiwitl ipan yepowalonnawi xiwitl motlakatilitsino i neli dios itlasopiltsin hesuchristo, inik waltekawke mexitin. in sesek. se mamahpikton yepasohtli "—oanech moknelilike in oselokichtlé otlakawki in amoyolotsin. ak newatl, ak ninomati in nikan senkamatsintli nik iknopilwia? tlen 25 tlanawatihkayotl. itechpowi sentlanawatiloyan kiyekanas yolchikawalistli tlen nochi anawak tlaltipaktli iwikpa tlanelchiwas manochi moyolchikawa iwan monelwayoti, mahmotetili itlanawatihkayo totlalnantsin iwan isentika itekiwahkayo, iwan ika imiakilis tomin yolchikawalistli, in tlatekitilis iwan kachi kwali tlaxexeloli tomintlanili iwan tlapiali, welis mopialiseh tlamakixtilistli iwan tlakaitalistli tlen tlacameh, nechikolismeh iwan altepechanequeh, tlen kwalnemilis kimanawia inin amatlanawatili. in sentlanawatiloyan kiamatekpanas, kiyekanas, kisalos iwan wehka kitlachialtis tekitl tlen tomin anawak, iwan kitamachiwas iwan kipalewis tekitilistli tlen nochi motlahtlaniseh tlen imako tlamakixtilistli ixnesi ipan amatlanawatili. ipan tomin yolchikawalistli tlen nochi anawak tlaltipaktli moixnextiseh, ika miak altepeyotl tlatlepanitalistli, nechikolistli tlen altepeyotl, chinanko altepeyotl iwan nechikolistli tlen tlapianih, iwan amo kitlawelkawas sekinok tlamantli tomin tekitl tlen ika moyolchikawas totlalnantsin. in nechikolistli tlen altepeyotl mopialis, san iixcotiah, tlali tlen malwili tlen moixnextia ipan 28 tlanawatikayotl, nawi tlahtoltlatlapantli tlen amatlanawatili, iwan nochi tonatih imako eltos sentlanawatiloyan tlapiali iwan tlanawatili tlen kaltlanawatiloyan moyolitiseh. noihki welis tlatskis san yewa noso iniwaya nechikolismeh tlen altepeyotl iwan tlen tlapianih, ken moihtowah ipan tlahtol tlanawatili, iwikpa kichikawalos iwan kiyektlalis tekiyotl tlen yolchikawalistli. inipan tlalnamikilistli tlen sentika altepeyotl iwan tlaeliltilistli tlapalewis iwan kinchikawalos chantekitinih tlen altepeyotl iwan tlapianih tlen tominyotl, kintlanekilis makitlepanitakah tlen kinsenkwesoa altepechanehkeh iwan tlatekiwili, tlen ika nochi mopalehuiseh, in tlamantli tlen tlaeliltia, momokwitlawis tlen tlaeltok iwan tlen onkah ipan tlaltipaktli. in tlahtol tlanawatili kiixtlalis tekichiwali tlen ika moisiwiltis nechikolistli iwan kiweyilis tomin tekitl tlen altepeyotl: tlen altepetlali, nechikolistli tlen tequitinih, tlamapalewilistli, calpolmeh, chantekitinih tlen inaxka tequitinih, iwan nochimeh, tlen nochi nechikolismeh altepeyotl iwikpa tlaeliltilistli, tlaxexeloni iwan tlatekiwili tlen tlapiali iwan tlatekiwili tlen nochtin tlakameh monequiliah. in tlahtol tlanawatili tlapalewis iwan kimanawis tomintekitl tlen kichiwaseh san tlakameh iwan kichiwas makwali tlaeli tlen ika tekipanoseh tlen nechiskolistli tlapainih, tlapalewis mamotomin yolchikawa nochi anawak, ken moihtowa ipan amatlanawatili. iii akatl xiwitl, 1235 años. aw inin ohtli kimaxkatiaya in omotenew siwatl maría xukoatolnamakak, ipampa in moteilwito; aw yese amo neli in iaxka, ka noso otli. in on mosenkawtikis niman sewi in tletl. san tlayowaya in kinkwaltia tsowali nekutitlan konakitiw. in kinkwaltia naw kamatl ichtika in kixotlaya. mah no onka kwaltia nikan ompewa in innelwayo in intsintilispewkayo in intemoka in intlakatilis in intlakamekayo; in iw tsintitika in iw pewtika in motenewa in ingenerasión in mochintin in tlasotlahtoke in motenewa reyesme in dukesme, in tlasowewetke in ixkichtin in omotlahtokatiliko in nikan ipan altepetl chalchiwmomosko amakemekan chalko, itenyokan imachiyokan in totolimpa, kwawtlitenpa i sepayawtenko, in motenewa poyawtlan, xochitwalko ayauhitwalko, in istak solin inemian, in kowatl imomanayan, in oselome innemian, in tamowanchan xochitlikakan, in onkan omotlahtokatiliko in yewantin in chichimekatetewktin in chichimekatlahtoke iwan in teowakatetewktin in teowakatlahtoke iwan in yewantin tsakwaltitlan tenanko ... i ... tew ... || -pan iw in tsakwaltitlan tenanko, in tekwanipan, in panowayan in tlahtokayestli in tlahtokatlakamekayotl, inik omotlali in tlahtokawayolkayotl in intlakamekayok in tlasotlahtoke. in ipan axkan hwebes ipan ilwitsin sankta maría magdalena, ipan metstli hulio xxii días de 1604 años, ikwak momikili in totlasotatsin frai fransisko de ganboa gwardián moyetstikatka tlatilolko. ixkich olin, mokikkihke ikwakon yomokikkihke okichiw dies año.s rebolúsio. 41. aw in axkan san ixkitsin; ye nikkwepa immihiyotsin, immotlahtoltsin, in sententli, in senkamatl, impopoloni, in tsakwi, in tlalo, in tapalkayo; impipilahtoli, in kokonetlahtoli in ayawel onkisa, in ayawel onwetsi, in sententli, in senkamatl. ma ximewititie nottatsine. aw in omotenew inakayotsin tokok altar mayor tlamayekamkopa. ipa se taman saj. aw no iwan in ihkwak in oyuh nepa senpowalonmakwili xiwitl poliw in wei altepetl tulam, inik momoyawake tulteka, in ihkwak || 24r impan popokak se sitlali, itenkopatsinko mochiw in totekwiyo hesuchristo. aw niman in ipan imostlayok miérkoles in omotenewtsino don frai balthasar akobarrobias obispo, yewatsin kimihtalwi in missa, aw yewatsin motemachtili in don alonso de la mota i eskobar obispo tlaxkalan anoso siudad de los ángeles; inin ik walmowikake omentin omotenewke obisposme ka kimonmonochilike in tlahtoke oidoresme. seyok kinwaltitlanki noha niman kiwalkwilia in mapiltsalan kiteka in ik kichichina, kineskayotia in atlatl in ahnoso tlatsontektli, in yawtlatkitl in okichtilistli. se kikwa, se kimana wan se kichilposowia, se kitalilia chilwak wan tomat, se kimolontia wan se kikwechowa ya. se kipantalilia se ramita epasot wan kemah se kikixtia ya mah sewi wan satepan se kikwa ya, yek welik. timetstika in kwamekat. in ihkwak in ye iw nepa chikwasenpowalxiwitl ipan makwilxiwitl ompa walkiske in inchan astlan in mexika; iwan in ihkwak in ye iw exiwitl tlahtokati in malatsin in ikmatlaktlomome tlahtowani kulwakan. in ipan kawitl i ye kimochiwilis in tlakatl, kitowa in ipa teoamoxtlakwiloli mosepantlalitsinoke in iw keni yes. newatl amo ninehuaz, owalnankili malintsin. axan nian nochan, axan xinechewakan tla nanchichikawake, nonamik, inin tlatiwani, okinek nian nikochwetsis wan nian nikochtas, nikixotis nochtin xolal. onkwan nikintlalpoliw tlen kíske, tlen kikwaske wan nochtin nenanamikos tehwewentsin. ompoyon metstikate nochtin memepixke, tlen onechmixotilike wan axan kimixotilia metoton, inin metoton, ikwak pewa kiawis witse, ikwak wits tesiwitl; yewan in kinkwitia tlamatquez metoton'. tla yewan onyezquiayah. aw ik niman walmokwepke, san nokwel onkan walake in tisatepek, onkan motlaliko onkan wekawake. semila, . aw in ik nenka in puchtekatlahtoke in nawalostomeka wel sekni kiwikaya in intlatsontekilis: nonkwa motlatsontekiliaya . aw intla ka kan wel mits popwlos mits tlahtlatis in tlakatl in totekuyo ma wal timaliwi in ah kokok in ah poyek in itstayotsintli in tlaolpawatsintli. nimitstahtania ika miak favor nehwa. taol wan kwouhelot ¿ach kanon aso seyan ipalnemoa?¿ach kanon aso tle nel in tlaltikpak?makwelachik, in amo kwali tetsawitl "pobres sopilotes, axtlaike kikuaj". yewa nech ixmati iwan kixmati noknin. oksé nihkuwas pero nechilwia nikán nikwalikak manta para te'wakun. noknin amo kipia tomín. ihkwak onkan in tlahtokatia in koxkoxtli in ikkaxto- || 63v -llomey tlahtowani kulwakan. aw in tospanxochtsin yaomik xochimilko, aw in kowaxotsin yaomik xaltokan, aw in chimalaxotsin, ye omihto, newan yaomikke in ithatsin wewe witsiliwitl in ompa kulwakan; aw sa isel in akulnawakatl momakixtito askaputsalko, tlakotl ihtik onkan in mopotsa askame, kiwikake miyekintin in mexika, ompa motekato in askapotsalko mexikapan. wan nopa ipanima pehki wahki aw intla siwatl ka mochi konkwilia in tlasokweitl in tlasowipili aw in ixkich in xochitl in yetl: mochi konkwi in tlakanekwiloke. aw in kali on in ikak tesontlalnamakoyan aw notech tlakahoali inik nonamakas teopan powis yanima itech powis in omomikili maria yoan seki itech powis in tesi maria xwares chane s. martin ateskapa aw in axkan ka namechnotlaitlanililia maxikmixkechilikan se tekpoyotl inik tsatsis kitekakiltis in akin kikohoas. komino, ixkich in kikwi tomahpil amo wekawake; unkan i kitokayotike mexikatsinko yehikan unkan tekpichawke, unka mochokistlapaloke, unka mopowke. sano ikwak walmotlali i motewksomatsi. para mosta wipta por nehin rasón nimitstatawtiti xik mokwitlawi in tekamapakilistli in tematekilistli aw in tlachpanalistli in tlakwikwilistli. . aw in yewatl tlatkiwa amo kimomachitoka amo kimaxkatia amo kimotlatkitoka san kitoa kimilwia in kintlapieltia ichpokero ma itstos. okitoko ka niknokakiltiliko in hustisia in ipanpa in totlal onpa mani in itoka atlixokan inik patlawak matlakmatl aw inik wiak chikwepowali in iskich kawitl mochipa okimopieliaya i notatsin in itoka atlixeliwki. in nikan tikihiyowiko in tiksiawiko in tonewako in chichinakako in moyolo in monakayo in tinokwaw in tinoselow in tikwawtlakatl in tisakatlakatl in titoxonki in tiwasonki. senka timitstlasohtla, aw inik tikneltokas nikan ipan in in motlahtokatlali in kwawtlahtonak ikmatlaktlonse tlahtowani mochiw in kulwakan. in kilit. aw in tisaapan inik onoka in mexika senpowalxiwtike onmakwili, aw inik yankwikan in ye ik kipewaltia in yaoyotl in kulwake inik onkan kintokake in mexika, yewatl ipan in in xiii akatl xiwitl inik yahke. seki xiwitl ipan yokiwalikake chipawak atl ayokwikomokixti in tlali iwan ikwayolikpak in tlateli okitokake in tlatskakwakwawton inik satepan tetlailnamiktis in atoliniliskawitl inik atliwas oatlakwiwaloya wehka ompa itokayohkan nochkalko axkana ka yato. in no kikowaskiah komo onkaskia miak. nelí michime... pehki tokoxihtli. ipa se taman saj. in onkak kahfentah oso kampa se kitoka, pero in amo nochipa tatok, ixwa saj. yewan weyaltepepan ya. kema ahsiko icha kifemo nopa tetl in pitaleño amo semi wehweyia wan exot no achi pisiltik wan xoxoktik. muchi kiwinti in nemilistli in tlaltikpak inik ayak chokatinemi. aw maso yuhkan, i, maso nel iwi in yuh tlamai, in, tlaltikpak; ¿ kwix ik kako, kwix ik nemawtilo, kwix ik chokatinemoa ? kwelita kampa amo tetaj. iwan no ihkwak senka tlakimichkwalok. elito kwitlapanwitsotihke ihwanti axkipiyah ax tohwanti titlachilihtoke. talxoxompe oso xalxoxompe oso xaltotomat oso ihtlkoyokkilit yektli yan xochitl ¡ma nokpak xochiw ma ik ninapan!, in noxochiw, ¡ni chalkatl, ni siwatl! nikneneki in xochitl, nikneneki in kwikatl, aitsin in totsawayan, in toyeyeyan. kipowa [kema] kichiwa misa. itlanahnamik: in tokiappankaxochiw, tla seliaxochitli, kweponia xochitli. xoxowkichilmoltamali satepan yokilwi ohkion satepan kihto entonses este kema ixo nias. la kamo tlanayi sikiera nomemeyaluw nionimikmakak. tewanti alkaldes don lukas kortes tomas de akino por su magestad i nikan siudad de mexiko tenochtitlan in tiktokwitlawia hustisia in itechkopatsinko in toweitlatokaw su magestad in axkan ototechkimokawili i mwi magnifiko señor todor seinos oidor por su magestad i presidente de la audiensia real in weikan tekwiktlatoloyan inik otechmonawatili in ipanpa inik tokomakaske in itlal in itoka maria tekwicho ichpoch in itoka katka atlixeliwki. . aw in on ya altepetl in om poliw anawakatl niman itlan wal kalak in mexikatl. achto uejkauj kikwayah in ikamohyo. ikin okimochiwili topixki okimokitskilike, okimoxotlatlapachilike ixohpaltsitsiwan iwan okimonenemitilike in topixke. san moch ompa ye wits xochitl
