ikakan. tekwekwepalxochitl, in teyolo mamalakachoa itson yewan. kon mayawtiwitse kontsetselotiwitse in xochin tlamalin xochipoyon. ¿xochinpetlatl on aka? senka ye mochan, ye moxkalaitek, kwika yewa on tlatowa, yewa xayakamach. kiwintia ye iyol kakawaxochitl. chikwei tochtli xiwitl ipa inik netlatilok; inik oxiwtike chiwknawi akatl xiwitl, inik yexiwtike matlaktli tekpa xiwitl, inik nawxiwtike matlaktlose kali xiwitl. opachi nikneki sente chipapechtal. kitokaitiah limonkwowit por ké kwaltia para se tayis kemeh agwa freska wan taki tsikitsitsin. "tlake tihchiwa nikani, chikomexochitl? in kapolpotehtli, yewatl in xochikwali mochiwa ika kapoli in mokoa tiankisko ahnoso monechikoa ipan kapolkwawitl mila. intla monechikoa ipan kapolkwawitl moneki ye chikawak yes; inin nesi ihkwak ye senka chichiltik. kwali mopaka, mokixtilia in iyolo, motesi metlapan ahnoso ihtik in tepustlatsoaloni. in ihkwak ye tlatextli in kapoli ye mokwa yuhkin xuchikwalpotehtli ahnoso motlalilia pinoli iwan ye mokwa yuhkin xuchitlakwalistli. tlatsopeliloni, ixkich in monekis aw no ihkwak tlalpoloke in mexika in itstonpatepek chalko. aw inik otlanankili in testigo okito ka nikmelawa in notlatol i yewatl in tlali in onkan mani kowatlan ka itlal katka in akamapichtsin honka mamanka in ikal aw in ixkich inik mani in tlakawali ka onpa onasi in akalotitech aw onkan walasi i temaskaltontli ikaka in oxixitin. kwaltia ichkatl kitlalilito para ya x kali xiwitl, 1281. onkán satepa pus tlenon koma. in kwowit, pero amo semi weyi kwowit. tikimonawiltis in tepilwan,teteukti in kwawtlo, oselotl. asta atipa yatok. mah moskalti, nikán tečmolestaroaya' akmo očankatka' den pweblo muchi okiske mote'tepalwiyaya' itechin pweblos ikompik itechin sentro de méxiko itechin pweblos akmo bibiroaya' mochi okiske wan in karansa walaya okin tlatiyata in chanti nakin okahsia lwego lwego kimiktiaya. matlaktlomome aka xiwitl unka mik itskoatsi; matlakxiwitl omei tlatokat. tlahko kilo chilakachtextli aw san temok owesiko. aw ipam inon tiamkistl omkam okitotike itsonteko ipam caxtolpohuaü ipam yepoali iwan matlaktli. aw in yewatl in xochitekwitl ompa omotlali ikpak intepeteopam otlamawiko {sic} okitlali ikopil. niman ompam okse tiamkistli ixtlawak imawak kwetlaxkwapamsinko ompa omonamakaya in masewaltin ika makwili cacahuatü iwan kwawmekatika okimmekayotiayaya ik okixtlawaya tlakalakili. niman tlanawatiaya in xochitekutl kwawtli oselotli okintemowaya mimiyawatli in kitlapalotiw in moteuksomasin iwan sitli iwan tochtli iwan mamasa iwan tekwankokone ik tetlapalowaya. in xochitekwitli achtopa okintitlania in ipilwan ik ome tonatiw ik oyake. niman yewatle niman ye okitektewa in yoloxochitli kiwika ik kitlapalotiwiw in moteuksomasin. nokonen ix, tlawapa nemi mostla techtlahpalokin. nimitstatawtia ika miak favor: yei axoxtlantli yei xumali pitsochiyawisotl kisato nikan ipan in in onkan moyaomikiliko kaliimanyan in kwawtsintewkktli ikome intlahtokawan in tekwanipan tlaka; in ohtlipan walmomikilia, in tlahtokat matlaktlonnawi xiwitl. aw intla nose omikito yewan achto kakitilo in puchteka wewetke. intekiw in teyolmelawaske in teyolpachiwtiske. yei tekpatl amotle mochiw. axkan nankwika namopilwan tlakwalispa iwan nankinkawakiwe ipan ome tlamachotiloni teotlak kisaloske tlakwikwiloske, tlatetekiske, mokwikatiske. nochin kisaloske teotlak. okseki kwakwali tlamachtili kisaloske kename panotiwe ipan xiwtin. ihki on konetl ye kwika itik itsonteko nochi tlen omomachti iwan tla mostla, wiptla nanmimikiske tatatin, yewan ye kimatiske ke kitematomaske keski melio. ika on namechtlatlawtia wel miak nankichiwaske tlen namechilhuia. in sisiwanton ka oktsitsikitsin yekinahnamiki inana kin ixotiah yoyolkameh kemeh pitzomeh, aztameh, wewexolo, wiwiloh iwan piomeh. nelí. kimihti atinime. mocha sekin kilwiah nakaswiyo wan seki kilwiah nakastekilit. chikawak tlatsomotla san iselti mochihki nopa se konetsi . aw no iwan ma kana tontesokimotla tonteatlatsikwinalwi xi moteimakaxili xi motemawkaittili. axán yukinamak para mihtotihke yukinomakilti ai padre mió. aw kimolwilih in makahmo motekipacho, in ka ye paktika in ik senka moyollalih. . aw in kin ihopa yaske in telpuchtepitoton aya tle kimamaltia san ok yewatl in atliwaloni, kimamaltia in ayotektli. xochit se kiteki tein se kiita ke amo kwika itakilo. in sesek. titlasohtla ipanpa ka in sentlatol mochiw in moyoteka inik kimakake senka kinmotlachikawililia in ika hustisia ayak seppa aka konkwilis in okixkichika itla sentlamantli ik motlanawatilis in totekuyo su magestad san iw kipias aw in tla aka san moyokoyas ompa kalakis in amo tenkopa hustisia tlatsakwiltilos ika hustisia. ta ximokawa tirei pampa ta tlawel tihmati. aw in okichtli amo tle kichiwaya. no xkiniwanti nopilwantsitsin axkan nikneki niktlasohkamatis in ahkin wel neli okichiw inin tekitl, nosiwaw elpidia elena. yewatl okichiw tlen senkka yetik, okimmotemoli in siwatsitsintin in okimmotlahtlanili, in okimopalewilihkeh itechpa in ye wehkaw malakachtepek tlakwali. in amo se kitoka, mochiwa saj, ixwa iteyo. in kwowit, ta ihwak ewa alaxtsin. in xiwit. opanoaloya ika tierra blanka. san niman agwa de lobos. san niman opanoaloya agwa eskondida. onkwan nekxanalos tlen nenemoa; makamo nekawalo tlakwitlapa. tonochtin tomanaka; kwachi topan kisaske ichtehkes. ipan in agwa eskondida wel momati ichtehkes. ahken kineki atlis kwali kichiwas onkwan achi wewekaton ka agwa de cadena. in ihkwak in ye kin ye matlaktlomome xiwitl tlahtokati i yowalatonak tlahtowani kulwakan. niman ik waltemmok inik kineltilitiw in inetitlanis; konnamikiko in kwepohtli walamelauha mexikko. del diario, del diario tatlakwi para tikoniske para ntokomida. inik asiko in chichimeka in onkan tepetl ikpak, aw in ontlachixke in onkan kate in xochmeka in kiyawisteka in tekwannawaleke in kokolka; ik kiwalminke in inteokal itlakapan aw niman walkis atl, ik aokmo wel mokwepke in iskitlamantli in innawal. a bweno in lá ohkión pus tlenon pero nihchiwas ni modos yotimonamaki. nitlanamaka e yuh xxv xiwitl tlantokanti in mosentekwike mexika; e ikwak in kwawtika anotiake. aw yese in yewatsin arsobispo visurrei amo niman ik mokawtsino in kwakwawtlatlachiaya, masiwin sa tlaokoxtikatka in kikaki kampanas tsilini, amo ik tetlakawalti in tlamiminalo, san iw yowak in tlamiminalok; yese yuh omihto sa mokokotiw, kwel in kalak tekpan in ikochian inik tsonkis kwakwamiminalistli, onkan pewtika in in sa mokotinemi arsobispo in aokmo paktinemi. in sakwatsin, in ye tepantsin, siwakwekweltsin, in tsontekan ika, in elelhikiw ika, on teachtitoa intla ka nipa, yekkan ten, tlaxkala, noxoxochipoyonkwika. —tle'ye kipia seis años nikan namektikate. matlaktlomei kali xiwitl no sewets tekuhilwitl ipa, xilotomaktli sewechililok; yoan ikwak tlaloli, tsatsayan in tlali, xixiti in chinamitl. ayak pahpaki ipan in tlatikpantli. ya nopa kimelahki . aw in oahsiko inchan niman ye ik kinmottitia in puchtekatlahtoke in nawalostomeka kinnonotsa in iwkan otlachieto wel kimelawa in intlahtul in ixkich ompa mochiwa. se kilo okonanakatl axweli posteki. nowian nenke, akan tlakwalitake. iiyekapan kipia pistontsiin, iikwitlapan iichikotitotsiin. aw inik kimotokilike wel mosenkaw in inawkampaixti tetewktin iwan masewaltin; aw in tlatilolko governador, alkaldesme, regidores iwan ixkichtin tlatilolka wel kiwalsenkawke in kimotokiliko. mah amo tasewi. nawi tekpatl xiwitl, makwili kali xiwitl anotle mochiw. ipan chikwase akatl xiwitl wits teyakanakiw méxiko tlahtokateixiptlatsintli in itoka tewktli antonio maria de bukareli i urswa. aw inik otlanankili in testigo okito nikmelawa in notlatol in ipan tlali in onkan mani kowatlan in itlal katka in akamapichtsin in ixkich inik mani nikmati onkan tlantika in temaskaltontli ikak patlawak senpowalmatl ipan chikwematl aw inik weyak honpowalmatl ipan chikwematl. tikpias. nonovaliko nonovaliko po(yo)ma chimalokotitlan motlakenvia ah vetsi inin. no novaliko kwawinochitlan in plantita se kitoka itech maseta oso kaltsintan. teipa ne padre selestial wan kiitak para nawi kilo pilonsilo. amo monamaka. wan okseki pahpata sayoh se kikwa. iii tekpatl xiwitl, 1352. aw sepan ik omoteilwike in ipan don lukas garsia hwes de resitensia in ikwak nikan moyetstikatka kanaskia in isiwaw katka in omotenew kwata san mokokoxkalpiki kimiltika kiwalahanke inik onpan inik moteilwike ixpantsinko in don hwan de los angeles governador katka in nokimowikili in totekuyo dios. aw san motlati in isiwaw katka in omotenew kwata. se kitoka wan se kichipawa. yuh kichiwke i se kasik in ome kasik in ei kasik, iski nakastli kiwatkik walake. cualanih, amo mochipautani, sayoh mah amo akah tewiwitili. lwis kavalos [sic] 1592 años. in ipan siudad mexiko tenochtitlan a katorse dias del mes de marso de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años in mawistililoni tlatowani don antonio valeriano governador hwes in kimopielia hustisia in itechkopatsinko rei nwestro señor in onkan audiensia itewktlatoloya ixpantsinko owala itoka marianan iknosiwatl chane in ipan siudad mexiko itlaxilakaltian sant ipolito teokaltitlan. inihwanti kehní mayo, inihwanti tlayij, tlayij. mah namotech powi. in ipan nawtsontli onkaxtoli omeppoali omome xiwitl, mosentlalike okseppa in altepepan vatikano mochintin wewein iteopixkawan nowianyo teonechikolistli. yewatl on iximacho yuhkin "inic ome inesentlalilis in vatikano". sekni kichiw mokiwisi, in atepexosi unpa wala kwawtincha; ye inewa mokiwisi itoka kwausi kiwalokichitla mikakalkatl wexosiko; in ik-ei kwawtomisikwilsi sa unpa ikwitlawik ya, kwawtincha tlatokatito. tehpa elito san pareho elito. onkak ome taman: atlayawikan ni xochiketsali itlok ye niwits? ayamo tenkali ivan tamoanchan. oai ye kin tichoka aya se kimewa. itech mochiwa pawakwowit wan no itech chikikis. mochiwa newín parahko kampa taseseya. aw ya yewatl in in toteositewktli in satepan miektlamantli in inex in itenyo, in okichiwako wel tenyotika inik otlahtokatiko in ipan chalkayotl, senka otlamamawtiko, in iw niman ye onnesitiw in ipan in amatl. aw ye tlatlako kinemiltia, in okinyolotilike in inteokal in ika kwitlatl poxakwaiwitl kimichme. in tetlakol, in tokwik on. . aw in yewantin teyakanke puchtekatlahtoke tealtianime tekowanime intiamik katka tlatlahkotli aso siwatl anoso okichpiltontli in ompa kim on namakaya. ihkini kiilwi iixwi. sewelitini hesukristo, mochiwa semi newín ahkokopa itech milah wan kaltsintan. axan nikilwian lisiana nehwa ahmo nias keman fandango altotonga. atitla noponi mitskawaski para ika tetlamaski iniketetl kali tonatiw ikisa-[f. 5r.]yanpa itstikak no tlapankalo iwan in itlalo iwan hetetl in ichinanyo mochi ipan katki in pi[n]tura iwan in machiotl inik omoneltili in posesion aw inik okonmochiwiliko posesio kimoneltililia kimotlalilia in intokatsin iwan in infirmatsin. fecho en mexiko a unse dias del mes de otubre de mil e kinientos e ochenta i sinko años. hwan martin pedro heronimo don martin hernandes ante mí fransisko maldonado eskrivano. wan xiktakayoti. kiwikaltiaya in totolin in ipan tetlamakaya; tlani kitlaliaya molkaxik in chichinakatl: san pani kitlaliaya in totolnakatl in tetech monekia. no tewanti in kimanah iwan okseki taman para yon teihtipakah ihwak se moxwitia. -¡nonopilhuantzitzin, ye ik san ye twi! in kenmaniyan kitoa se tekontontli tlatsopeliloni thomas de akino ik tlanankilia konitwa ka wel tixpan omochiw inik omonanawatitia in ilamatsin katka maria xoko in iw konitotia ka nel sa nosel ka ye ninomikilis inin kali ka wel tonetolinilis tomextin in nonamik katka otiktokechilike ka nel ayak ma se tlakatl noxwiw in tla se onemini ka nikmakatiaskia aw ini nokonitwa monamakas in kali misa ik topan mitos teixtin. aw ye ontsonxiwitl ipan chikonpowalxiwitl axkan in motlaliko in walake nikan kulwakan in wewetke chichimeka in kulwake; ye inpan asiko ye chanonoke in xochmilka iwan in atlakwiwayankalke ye kate in axkan onkan onoke. ye kaltempan ka in manolo inka imaikniwan. ye nia nonantsin, oktepitsinika, amo xinechia, amonitlakwakin, nitlakwatin ompa klub español in xichimilko. ken anmopi noltihkeh nomaikniwan, ye nikan nika. tlen san kwalyotika anechilnamiqueh, wel miak niktlasohkamati in momawisohtsin. ¿canin tikneki notlalis, manolo? tikpiah tlalnanoktli iwan wehkatlal oktli. ¿tonaz, tlatwis? aw ye omihto, inin mochiw yewatl in kitenewtiwi tachkokolwan katka "tonatiuh kwalo"; inik motlapololtiaya, ka nel amo wel okimattiake in kenin wi in kenin mochiwa inik iski tlanepanoltitimani in ilwikame, inik otlatoka inik momamalakachotiwi inik mopapanawitiwi inik sesenteotlatoka, inik iski tlanepanoltitimani ilwikame. chikomaka xiwitl ikwak pew motlasultewwia wexotsinko; chiawtsinko pew toltekatsin tlatoani, in toltekatsi mexiko nika nemiko. mochiwa ne kuoujtajpaj: kalatsapotaj. xiii kali xiwitl, 49. nochipa mah takawanto. tlanihke wetsiko noatipa para nikani? asok seppa mixko mokpak tlachiaske in monanwan in motawan in mowanyolke ikwik nesawalpili senka tlamattinenka in kiyawnawaleke tekwannawaleke. aw in iw ka audiensia itlanawatiltsin niman owalake in testigos omakoke huramento. . kim on tlalito in intlan in tlahtoke in pipiltin. in onkan tekpantoke im mawistike in yaotachkawan in ayak in wiwi. kwaltia aw ka nokonitowa kamo ma nowanyolke ka masewalti tle ipampa in ipan moteilwia inokal ka nechkawilitia in nokoltsin siwaistitsin iwan i notlal ka wel naxka ka notlatki in ika wel ye onikwik in ipantiw in omochiw. kitokah iteyo oso kampa kahsih kwoukonet kiwiwitah wan kitokaj. aw sano yuhki i yewatl tlakatl ik chiwalok in ixiptlatsin in totekwiyo dios ipampa ka itech ka kipia yolilistli in ánima in masitika tlamachilise, yehika in iwki yewatsin totekwiyo dios ka sa wel setsin aw in iyeitilistsin wel sesekkan mokixtitikate in sesenme inik tlakatsitsinti personas, aw in ánima sanno se, aw yetlamantli itech ka welitilistli in iksentlamantli yewatl in tlalnamikilistli, ka ye kitosneki in itechpatsinko in ikse tlakatsintli in tetatsin; aw in tlamachilistli, ka ye kitosneki in itechpatsinko in ikome tlakatsintli in tepiltsin; aw in tlanekilistli, ka ye kitosneki in itechpatsinko in ikei tlakatsintli in spíritu sankto. tewktli a itsivak imavis. tla nech ya tetemili yeva nopiltsin mixkoatl ya tonan () yaosivatsin tonan yaosivatsin aw sanno ihkwak in yankwikan ahsiko wala nikan mexiko in yankwik korregidor wala españa itoka don alonso telo de gusmán; ihkwak kikaw in itekiw in don martín serón korregidor katka, kipatlatasiko. domingo in ik 5 mani metstli hulio de 1615 años, ihkwak || 279 ye yowa ye ipan horasión tsilini in omomikili doktor don hwan de salamanka chantre omoetstikatka in nikan sankta iglesia mexiko; inin ye wewe tlakatl omoetstikatka, wel nikan motlakatili nikan chane mexiko tenuchtitlan motenewa kriolo, iwan wekaw onomoprovisortilitia in nikan mexiko in intechkopa españoles. nikan momikili don hernando kortés siwailakatsin in ipiltsin aokwantsin. se tonali itlamian oktubre oniwia oninotlalito itsintlan inonewakwawton yowahtsinko otlakwawsewak iwan itech in tlahkotonali kin opewaya tlatotonia in tonaltsintli san istalektikatsintli omokixtiko ipampa in mixayawitl ixeopatsinko omotekake oniknemili kwali yeskiani nias ninototoniti itech in tlatskan ipampa nepakopa in tonaltsintli kwali motonalmeyotihtsinoa iwan ompa welis ye tlayamanixtaya inintin mo kwitiah lunes, martes, miérkoles, hweves, viernes, sábado iwan domingo. ﻿nicnemilihtica nias in tlatsintla amérika iwan ompa moneki in tlahtoli. in se kitoka. tenonotsali wel wei papakilistli omochiw, aik iwki mochiwani in omochiw; aw yewatsin missa okimitalwiko in tlahtowani kisidor. monamaka. in sesek. omokixtiaya topixke ika yeyi akólitos. se okwikaya in koros wan ome okwikaya sirios tlatlatiwe. iwan inomekes mowentike noihki okwikaya estandarte de kampa techan noso texolal. tekana se siwatl kimapixtik popochkomitl popokatas iwan kinmokalakilia topixke itik teokali iwan nenenkatstsintin omoteochiwaya. san niman motlankwaketsa ixpantsinko toteotatsin. seki ochokaya, seki omoteochiwaya, okseki kimotlasokamachililia tlen ipampa okimomakixtili. xochiyowa marso wan abril. ipan chikwei kali xiwitl, okiske in iwikpa mexikaltsinko iwan omotlalikoh nextikpak, in onkan nawxiwtike in yewantin. inik mosentlamantilike, yaokiske in ye mochi matlaktli omome xikipili ipan matlaktsontli, inik mitowa de sien mil hombres, in masewaltin in kixnamikke almirante; niman kis inkah inik kimixnamik intlak kis, in ye mochintin mikalke españoles matlakpowali ipan onpowali tlakatl, inin okachi tlatlakoke tlaixpoloke in amo mach iwki kichiwke in okachi in ixkich masewali. in ipan in ipewayan in omotenew yankwik xiwitl iwan metstli henero, ihkwak senka chikawak omomanako sawatl motenewa saranpió, intech motlali in inpilwan españoles iwan timasewaltin topilwan. san niman ikwak omotak ye yewatsin yompa metstika tetotopixki. aw sa niman ipan in in x akatl xiwitl in walmotlahtokatlali in chalchiwtlatonatiw tlahtowani wixtoko, in tlahtokat 33 xiwitl. ix kali xiwitl, 1449. in otlika onkan inpan asiko in tlatlakatekolo; wei komitl itlan wewetstoke, iwan sekintin miskitl itsintlan wewetstoke. ik motlanawatilia in itechkopa kali tlalmantli kinmosemaxkatilia in omotlakowike semikak imaska intlatki mochiwas ayak kimonixtokilis aw in akin tlatlakos ik tlatsakwiltilos in melawak hustisia kaltsakwalos karsel ompowalpa mekawitekos teixpan yuh omotlanawatili okimotlalili in itokatsin iwan firma. migwel de los angeles alkalde. paso ante mí fransisko maldonado eskribano. san se tlalochtli ya tlalimenki. aw in frai pedro de rekena mowikak kwawtitlan, kapilero katka nikan san joseph, aw in frai herónimo de sárate ya chololan; aw yewatsin walmowikak nikan san hosep in frai fransisko de ganboa iwan frai gaspar hortís de arísaga. tla nelí weyi eliski nopa kali eliski se weyi kali kiwamotla kosamalotepetl, konmotla alomeimatliyan, kiwatlmotla tekomalak; ye onkan mosesenmana in paraxessasin tepekkwatlikpilkak, tepepolko, tepetonko, pasiontitla, kwapalantla, kwawsonmetla, atlmeya, kwatlyatlawko texkali moyewaloa atl ik meya. ma tla iekasewas, teoaxochikwawkokoltika, ketsalipantika tonteawiltiko xopankala itek. niman walmokwep is san ye ikwak ipan semilwitl; niman onkan walamelaw in ikpak tepetsintli. aw ipantsinko ahsito in ilwikak siwapili is san ye onkan in kanin akattopa quimottilih, kimochiyalitika. aw in oiuhquimottilih, iixpantsinko mopechtekkak, motlalchitlas, quimolhuilih: notewkyo e, tlakatl e, siwapile, noxokoyow e. nochpochtsin e, ka oniwia in ompa otinechmotitlanilih, ka onikneltilito in mihiyotsin, in motlahtoltsin; masiuhi in owiwitika, in onikalak in ompa iyeyan teopixkatlahtoani, ka onikittak, ka oiixpanniktlalih in mihiyotsin in motlahtoltsin in iw —keski močkacikun. porfirio dias otlachtektewak in karansa otlachtektewak den banko de mexiko wan in seyo den tomin den tomi, el dinero wan okwikan para i tieía pero ompa apisako kwitlapa in malinchi ihka adelante de malinchin we:'ka malinchi we:'ka adelante de malinchin itokahkan apisako, siudad de apisako ompa okikakwilike in tren kwika in siya wan in seyo de tomin wan onkán ompa apisako inkimiktihke in porfirio. nima ye no unka moxakaltia wexotsinkatl, tlaxkaltekatl, nekok umak. inin andrés de los ángeles san tlakoxiwitl in alkaldetik, san onmomikiliko; ik niman yewatl konpatlak in pablo korrier chane en blanko, inin kitsonkixtiko in omotenew xiwitl inik alkaldetik. kintepewili ne se ne se niman no kitoke in chikwei altepeme "ca amo, totekwiyowané, ka tamechtowikiliske in kanin anmowika". nikan ipan in in owalewke in owalkiske in ompa imchan astlan in asteka mexitin teochichimeka in axkan nikan ye motenewa tenuchka. sayoh itakilo se kikwa. kema, in nokoltsin tepaktia in ahkokixtilistli, yewatsir semi miak tomin ika omoko h u i 1 i tepostlawilankeh maquinatlatocanih, tlapixcanih, san ihkion kwali tlapanawis mahkokixtis ipan in yankwik kawitl. niman asitimoketsako kwepopa; aw in koskakwawko unka moyekko tlateposmiminia koiowewesi nawinti. kikwahke miyak. mantlakwali wiksi. manmotlaxkalmana, manmochiwa pantsin iwan tetexwelik. in kilit, yeh ika kilwiah waukilit. domingo a xi de abril, ikwak kichalike in inkapila netoleke españoles in nasareno ipilwan; wel ipan motlali in de ramos inik moteochiw kwawxiwitl, hitik kixowak inik tlayawalolok. ihwanti kinekih ma itstos seyahtok in amo kwaltia para pahti. aw inik walpanoke, ka akaltika inik onkan kisako in itokayokan kinewayan ostotl, onkan ka chikokkan in koyonki texkali, motenewa chikomostok tsotsompa miskitlikakan; in onkan kisako in omotenewke in chichimeka totolimpaneka, san ya yewatl ipan in omotenew vi tekpatl xiwitl in onkan kisako. in ipa se taman saj. ma niman xontlatekpana in iw onyes in iw onmochiwas, aw iwan inik tikinmonwikas miyek tlakatl; motla onyaske in asteka, aw ma ixkich chikome kalpoli, yewantin in wel tlapaltike in chikawake in weweintin tlaka, ma walka ixachintin inik miyekintin in masewaltin. lima niman okwalkis in imon antonio hosephe onechilwi tlein tikmottililia kali onikilwi ka nikkowilia in hwan de eskalante niman onechnankili onechilwi tleyen in kinamakas hwan de eskalante kwix yaxka itlatki ka yaxka in inamik. inin sexiwti in intlan monemitiaya in totolimpaneka, onkan ipan kis in xi akatl xiwitl, 1295. . aw in ye ipan kwali tonali san niman hikwak wal totokatiwetsi in ik wel ipan wal kalakia in inchan: amo semilwitl san yowaltika in akaltika wal kalaktiwetsia. 73. nopiltsintsine, kwawtle, oselotle, kwitlapile, atlapale. ¿auh aso nikan momakechtlan, motoskatlan, onilpitinemis in sententli, in ontentli, in chalchiwitl in omitspialti? aw in semilwitl, omilwitl, inik onimitsnakastsompotoni in ye yuhki immimiliwki, in witsawki; aw inik onimitsonwitektinemia in tsiwaktli, in tetewitl, aw in semilwitl, omilwitl immonakastlan, immoyolotlan in onompilkatinemia in nimotta, in nimonan. 20r x akatl xiwitl, 1047 años. istaktsapot itla amo monamaka. ¿ tle tlaotlatoktis? xik tlaokoli aso kana maxtlasoltsontli ayasoltsontli. seppa onikmohtili yomaxitiko owalmowikaya ika seki mamalkochtin axkan kema onikihto mostla ok iwak niteihtati yeka yoahsiko in tonali in wel newatl nite notsaskiani iwan nan mihtotihtsinoa nanimaritsin ima ye ompa niyeskiani pastorí... pastorila... ma kwakwalaka in atl ika elotlaoli; motesi in chili ika temolkaxitl ahnoso tepustlatsoaloni, moatilia in textli, motlalilia in atl in ye kwakwalakatok. in yepasohkilmaitl, chili in ye tlatextli, istatl iwan makwali wiksi. onkak ome taman: kostikkwoutsapot wan chichiltik. in tlapakanisiwatl amo kwakwaltsin. "ya tipoliwiseya". in kwowit. “ah, ne kani san kinikwi mohmostla senka kwali mopixkiliaya achi mochipa in ihkwak otonakati iwanachi keskipan inik tietopiehskeh tosentsin ahmo san se ome senkolohtli in tikewatiketsayah sekni no kimopiliaya in pitsawak sentli iwan etl awax in ika ixiwyo in tiktlehkawiayah ipan kalkwaitl inik tonal iwan ehekawakis in iskitlamantli in onimitstenewili, intla yuh xikchiwa, ka wel onkan tinesis in tiwei tlawelilok. in ahmo ompa ka immix, immoyolo, ka wel tewatl in titlawelkawaloni. ka wel tewatl molwil, momaheewal muchiwas immixitl, in tlapatl; in oktli, in nanakatl in tikis, in tikkwas; inik tiwintis, inik timotlapololtis, inik aok tikmatis. in timomayawis in tlexochkwauheo, in tlekomalko, in atoyak, in tepexik. in timokalakis in tsonwasko, immekak, inik aokmo tiematis, inik tikmonamiktis in tetl, in kwawitl, in xixtli", in kwitlatl, inik teixeo, tsikpak tinemis, inik timochocholtis, inik timokwakwawtis, inik tiemonamiktis in tochtli, in masatl yowi; inik timokalakis in kwawtla, in sakatla intlakamo tikkwis, intlakamo tikanas in nanyotl, in tayotl, intlakamo tikmokakkanenekis immihkaka, immonenka, ye ixkich, ye onkan ye omochiw, omotlaweliltik. ka sa kan tiwetsitiw, ka sa koyotl, ka sa kan tekwani imak takitiw. aw in tlayawalo in mowitek in tlamasewke, aso ken exikipili in ye mochi mosenpowa masewaltin iwan españolesme; aw oksenka miek in mowitek españoles in amo masewaltin. kiitato noponi ya se ichpokero xiktakayoti, aw in ixkichkaw onkan katka in tepetikpak, mochipa ontlachiaya in ompa tekwalok. ¿ach ken tlatlamati? tein titayij. nochin tayocoxtoqueh, aw in ikwak in oyuh konmokakilti in señor governador in intlatol senka kinmotlachikawililia in ika hustisia inik ayakmo seppa motlatolkwepaske in ikin kenmania. simolotl in tepew in temiktiko makwilti in onka nenka kowakalko; in tlakanteotl in okunma inik kimiktiske, nima omotlalo cholowaya, san onka kontetepachoke in tekaman atsonpan, konxaxamanike. xiwalo xichichikiya nikani. asta ayi se tlamahtsoli kipehpentok wahtli nopa inik nawkan nikinmaka pablo katka kakawanamakak ikaltitlan mani tlali yoan ipan mani kali tonatiw ikalakiampa itstikak no intech powis in pipiltsitsinti noxwiwan diego de kastañeda yoan baltasar aw in tla isiwka momikiliske muchi monamakas in kali itech powis inanima in inantsin katka nochpoch ana tepitsin. monamaka, kiwalkwih yon parahko tokniwan kwesalan. nemiskiaya ye imán yowalpa titlacuazqueh. ¿tlen timohtalwia tla ¡tla tikonkwaskeh ipan tla kwaloyan kipia in tekaloltilkalko? ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. . vistla vistla nomak temi vistla vistla nomak temi sentli teumilko chikavastika m otlakechiska. malinala nomak temi aaw in okomentin tlatoke in ekatsin tlatekatl tlapanekatl popokatsin iwan temilotsin tlakatekatl teskakowakatl popokatsin, inin sa niman motlatito itikalake akali kastila; kikolewke ini wapali in ipan matiwi kavaloti, ixopetlayo ompan motlatito imomexti. namehwan namechaxkatiliti. in iw ittoya ompa tlapkopa in walmoketsaya, oyuh onkis yowalnepantla in nesia tlatwiliaya, ipan tlatwia, q[ui]n yewatl kiwalpoloaya in tonatiw. amo wel mochiw inik nononkwa mantiaskia, aw mochintintsitsin sobrepelis kimotlalilitiake inbonetestsin; aw amo wel mopowa in ye mochintsitsin klérigos onkan || 172 momaniltitiake omotenew ik tetokok ka senka miyekintsitsin, se in krus manka kimowikilike, nekok itlok mantia ome siliares, aw yewatsin kapa kimotlalilitia in senka mawistililoni señor doktor sausedo arsediano, iwan nekok itloktsinko mantiake ome diágonos almátikas tliltik kimotlalilitiake, imomextintsitsin rasioneros, aw inik ye mochintintsitsin kanónigos rasioneros mochintin tliltik manto del koro tabetán in kimotlalilitiake, in iw mochipa ipan kwaresmatika kimotlalilitiwi in ipan motenewa la sena. in mexika amo walgeliwtiake in asiko chapoltepeke, san ok senkante. aw ye otikktamachiwke in tlali iwan nopilwan amo ikwotlanki {sic} oksepa owala in nowiyan okiktako kampa tlamin tlali nikam owala otlamawisoko nikam tepeteopam yolopachiwiko kanpa tlami tlali mochi okimakatewak in tlatoke nikam tepeteopam xochitekutli kwawtli oselotli iwan mochintin masewaltin aw ipampa inon omoxikowaya vexosinkotlaka nikam owalake okitlamiskia in xochitekutl amo awelitik itoka kwatekalamsin /na/hui tonatiw nikam okatka okinchiaya yeniwam okipalewiskia aw san inewiyan omomiktike ikwak inon owaltemoke tepeteopam tlatoke aw san okinpepemke akike okitotokake newa in weyi altepetl nía. pos tak sesek. titlahtlamati. tlanechikolkilitl ika nohpali tla nikpiaskiaya tomin newa miak niahtinemiskia. kwaltia aw in ikomentin nikan owaltekimakoke yewatl in doktor gravahar oidor mochiw in ompa audiensia kwawtemalan; inin totepantlahtokaw katka i nikan mexiko audiensia real, inin wel nikan tlakat, wel nikan tepiltsin mexiko, ye kin isel yankwikan kriyoyo oidor omochiw, ye kin onkan ik pewa in in oidortiske kriyoyosme; san niman ipan in in omotenew xiwitl ya kwawtemalan in omotenew oidor. in ihkwak in yuhki kichiw, senka mochikawa kiteilwia audiensia real in maría lópes, yese san konkawako in ineteilwil amo kitsonkixti; inik no niman || 166 okseppa kipewalti omotenew frai herónimo de sárate in ye tlatolinia in ye tepinawtia, in iw omotenew achtopa kichiwaya. nikan ipan in kitlahtokatlalito in ompa tulam in itoka weimak in ipiltsin totepew tlahtowani kulwakan; in tetlahtokatlalito intoka nawyotsin iwan opochtli, in ihkwak in ye iw chiwknawxiwitl tlahtokati in totepew in kulwakan in tatli. . san iyoke in ompa wia in ompa kalakia in tlatilolka tenochka witsilopochka askapotsalka kwawtitlan kalke. san mochipa yewantin in wikalwan mochiwtinenka. entons wak motlaloa' wise wise satepa wasihko ganoso. ika nochin fwersas de noalma nimitstatawtia in xiwit. aw ik niman onkan onewake in akokulko in chapoltepek in mexika, san ya yewatl ipan in omotenew 2 akatl, 1299 años, in ikwak onkan kalakiko ipan altepetl kulwakan in mexika asteka, ikwak onkan tlahtokati in tlakatl koxkoxtli. —mhm. den dikwakon kwak nechmaka, e nobendísion para oksé tonali orne tonal 1 i akmo nikilewia asta la fecha yekipia seis años de akmo nikonini. inoyuhsempoalxiwtike koatitlan, mexikah oyake chalko kanatoh metl. ok kiyeyekoah koatitlan in oktli, in ayamo wi yewantin wixachtitlan. aw ini “tla ximowika, unpa xitlamatiw inn akweskomak, miek i mokow xokonkwi yoan motlema; intla otika titletlalis unkan mopan nasikiw. mikeltsin leonportila iwan masewalahtolmomachtihkeh inik 5 tlamantli nikitowa onikpieya ilakasiwki tilmati ipatiw 11 pesos 4 tomines aw inin amo notilma itilma noteikkaw hwana mostlawilis. tía mira inomaman iyetlamoa de korahe yehka sa'on. opanoke miek semilwitl seppa onikihtak ye yaya tesis aw no iwan in ompa teopan la kompañía de hesús in tiktokayotia teatinos, in ihtik sanno iw mochiw, senka no meyaya molonia, no senka tentimoma in atl; aokmono wel kalakowaya in itik teopankali, iwan aokmono wel onkan missa mochiwaya, no ik kimokixtilike in sanktíssimo sakramento, ik motsakka in teopankali. san kema kitolo. aw no ikwak in ipan in in vii tekpatl xiwitl in momikili in tlakatl in tlahtokapili in tliltekatsin chichimekayaotekiwa in itiachkawtsin in tlahtowani atonaltsin chichimekatewktli; yewantin achto kitlaliko in altepetl amakemekan. kipiya komo sesenta años... aw i ye kiwalitta in tekpoyotl yatiw nenentiw, onkan kiwalminke ikechtla in kiminke; aw inik kiwalminke niman koton in ikech. nikan ipan in in akolwake i kowatlichan tlaka iwan kowatepeka in tetsmolokan motekato, ik ompa yahke. i wewetsonaya wewentsitsi imihiyeteko imayakach yehoan achto kinpewaltike, unka kimatlatlaske kintentlatlaske, nima ye ik mikoa. kiski in x kali xiwitl. no kwaltia ika se kipahtia yon xiyomej. inik ixkichka onmaxixaya in omotenewke in xochteka in ulmeka iwan oksekintin. aw iwan ya yexiwitl in ipan x tochtli xiwitl, 1606 años, in omomikili teoyotika tlahtowani don frai garsía de sankta maría de mendosa i súniga arsobispo mexiko, in teoyotika omotlahtokatili tenochtitlan nawxiwitl. yewatsin achtopa inkisidor mochiwtsinoko in don pedro moya de kontreras, aw satepan mochiwtsino arsobispo in mexiko iwan governador in ipan in nweva españa iwan satepan mochiwtsino presidente del real konseho de indias. aw inin in keni in iw okimittak in senka intech tlamoneki in seka motolinitiwitse inik kiwalwika || 104v akali, ik kinsentlali kinpapakilti in ichan, in kinenemiltiaya akali. in ayoh kwali se kikwa tatsoyon ihwak selik wan no welik iwan kwakwounakachilposon. wan komo chikawak ya, no welik se kikwa mah se kitsopeli ika panela. kwalyotika testigo. migwel xixikitlok ichan san hwan tepetitlan omonamikti in ixiwtlapowal ye nawpowali onmakwili xiwitl okichiw huramento in itlatlakoltilok inik amo istlakatis in ipal[f. 15v.]tzinco dios etk. tlasohkamati wel miak. timits totlatlahtia xitech moixitih chikóme imán owatsinko. miak tekitl tik pih iwan tik patisnenekih sesen minoto in tonalpa. ¿tlen imán ika teotlak kisa in ta* posihpotokmimiloli ika tlakpak? itakilo tein selik no welik tatsoyon oso mah se kimanelo iwan kuakuouj chilposon. tlen 26 tlanawatihkayotl. a. in sentlanawatiloyan kiyekanas nechikolistli tlen tlachiwali sentika tlayeyekoli tlen anawak yolchikawalistli tlen kimakas tetiyotl, akasoltilistli, sentlaeltos iwan sentlapalewis ipan tomin weyilistli iwikpa makixtilistli iwan sentika tlahtoli, sentika altepeyotl, sentika iyokatilistli tlen totlalnantsin. in tlaasitilistli tlen anawak tekichiwali tlen ixnesi ipan inin amatlanawatili kiihtos tlanekilistli tlen amatlayeyekoli. ipan amatlayeyekoli sentika tlapalehuiseh. ika tlapalewilistli tlen miak altepeyotl nechicolismeh, monechikos tlen kinekih iwan motlatlaniah tlen altepechanehkeh iwikpa moixtlalis ipan amatlayeyekoli iwan amatekitl tlen yolchikawalistli. onkas se weyi amatlayeyekoli tlen yolchikawalistli kampa matlatskiseh ika tlanawatili nochi amatekitilistli tlen altepeyotl tekichiwalo sentlanawatiloyan. in tlahtol tlanawatili kitekimakas weyi tekichiwani iwikpa makiixtlali tekichiwalistli tlen tlapalewilistli iwan altepeyotl tlatlanilistli ipan anawak tlachiwali tlen sentika amatlayeyekoli, iwan tlalnamikilistli tlen ika mochiwas, motekpanas, momokwitlawis iwan motamachiwas amatlayeyekoli iwan amatekitl tlen yolchikawalistli. noihki, kiixtlalis tlayoltilismeh inixkawil tlen ohtekitl amatlayeyekoli iwan tlahtolpechtli iwikpa weyi tekichiwa sentlanawatiloyan kiyekanas tekitl ika amatlakwiloli iniwaya tekiwameh tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh iwan kin tlatlahtis iwan mosenkawas iniwaya san tlakameh teaxkameh tlen monemilis iwikpa moihkwilos iwan mochiwas. ipan tlachiwali amatlayeyekoli tlen nochi tlapalewilistli, sentika weyi tlahtokan welis mokalakis ken moihtoa ipan tlahtol tlanawatili. b. in sentlanawatiloyan kipias se anawak tlachiwali tlen tlapowali iwan tlaltlachiali iwan nopa tlahtolmatili moihtos inelpatih. iwikpa sentlanawatiloyan, tlaltlanahuatilmeh, iyolo weyi altepetl, iwan altepemeh tlanahuatilmeh, tlahtolmatilmeh tlen ixnesi ipan tlachiwali eliseh tlanawatil tlahtoli ken moihtos ipan tlahtol tlanawatili. in iixkawil kiyekanas iwan kixelos tekitl tlen tlachiwali imako elis ipan se tlayolkayotl tlen kipias iselnemilis tekitl iwan tlatenohnotsali, tekiwakayotl iwan iaxka tlapiali, kipias tlanawatikayotl tlen ika kiyekanas tlanechikolistli, tlaihitalistli iwan tlatematiltilistli tlen tlahtoli monechikos iwan moitas melawak mamotlepanita. in tlayolkayotl kipias se tlahtokan tlanawatikayotl makwilmeh ipan tlatzquiseh, se tlen yewan kiyekanas tlahtokan iwan tlayolkayotl; nochi yewan kintokatlalis weyi tlahtoani tlen totlalnantsin ika itlahtolselistli tlen wekapa tlahtokan noso keman mosiakawas tlanawatis sentekichiwani tlen sentika weyi tlahtokan. in tlahtol tlanawatili kiixtlalis tlahtolpechtli tlen nechikolistli iwan tekitilistli tlen anawak tlachiwali tlen tlapoali iwan tlaltlachiali, ken moihtowa ipan tlayeyekoli tlen asikamatilistli tlahtolpowali, tsalantik tlahtoli, melawak iwan iseltitsin; amanekilistli tlen moneki temaktiliseh tlen tlahtokan talanawatiloyan, ken achi huecahuaseh, iwan kenihki mopatlatiaseh ipan intequih. in tlanawatianih tlen tlahtokan tekiwekemeh san welis kin kixtiseh keman weyi tlahtlakoli kinpantis iwan amo welis kipiaseh seyok tekitl, tlanawatili noso tekichiwali, san mokixtiah tlen amo tekipanoh ika tlaxtlawili ipan kaltlamachtiloyan, tlamatilispan, iyokalispan noso tlapalewilispan, iwan kitlepanitaseh tlen moihtowa ipan nawi tokayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili. noyuhki ompewa inik ome wei iyaoyo in semanawak in tlein tlami ipan nawtsontli onkaxtoli omompoali ommakwili xiwitl. aw in omotokatenewke in iskintin mexiko tlahtoke in ilpitoya kuyowakan onkan kimonewaltike in ipan xiwitl omotenew inik ompa kinwikak weimolan akalan in don fernando kortés markés del vale; aw san nima ipan in xiwitl omotenew ompa kikwatekike in tlahtowani don fernando kwawtimoktsin in weimolan. ya nepa kipachanito atitla. kwaltia itlanahnamik: 78 aw iwan ye kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan nawpowalxiwitl ipan matlaktlomome xiwitl in ipan xiii akatl xiwitl, 1219 años, in kikaw teyakanalisyotl in akasitli, in teyakan kaxtolxiwitl; aw sa niman ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl motlali in sitlalitsin in teyakanas. ¿zan nelpan tonyaske? wel tetlakolti san inihwanti primero walahke. kwaltia aw san niman ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl 7 kali xiwitl, 1525 años, in okwawtlahto don andrés de tabian motelchiwtsin in tenochtitlan. nochi in eyi taman nochi iuki sah ixiuyo. yoan niktenewa martin vaskes ixohok ikaltitlan akalotenko mani nowewetlal inik motamachiwa tonatiw ikisaian itstok inik wiak matlakkwawitl onnawi aw inik patlawak kwawtitlanpa itstok nekok ixkich monamakas naniman itech powis. aw onkan atenkisako, in tlakwilolkali nowian tlapatiotiaya in altepetl ipan in mochiwaya tamali wal totolotiw in ik wal kalakia ichan. iwan in kwali ixayak in kwali inakayo in senka chipawak in ahkan kenami in ahkan tihtikiltik xihxipochtik kokomotstik kwatahkaltik kwametlapiltik kwachihtahtik kwaxomahtik kwakwapatstik kwaxikipiltik etk. in moch kiwika kitsinewtiw wewei kwawitl: aw ka onkan tikeskilwitis timatsakwas titlaihiyowis in mokwitlaxkoltika in monetekilistika. kwakwaltsitsin mokawayowan. —tlenon nanki mokwaltiyaya in lá ahmo itla omochiw. okno tewan onkann asiko in in tlamakaski teomama kwawtleketski; || 58v in ihkwak in oyuh ye nepa chikwepowalxiwitl ipan makwilxiwitl onkan kalakiko in kowatepek inawak tulan in ipan se tekpatl xiwitl, in ihkwak onkan kipewalti inik okwawtlahto inik okinyakan mexika in san ixkichika senpowalonkaxtoli ipan exiwitl, niman okikaw in iteyakanalis. kiyewtsin teuktli kentikalakia in amakeme. aw yewatl achtopa konpewaltin kavalotlatlalochtin in visurrei iwan okse kavalero itlok ikatia, kimonpewaltilike in oksekintin tlahtoke, oome mantiwi in tlatlatlalochtike. sanenka, yewa amo tlapatlas. ika nimitsaxkatiliti motahtoltsin. kihtos yekipia nobia nian kipian gani pero baya nontikitoa kión tehwatl tía nehwa nikinpia nokniwan ke nokompadres nikinpia nokompadres para se kasamiento. kin ikwak motlatokatlali totokiwatsi tlakopa; ki yewatl kontsinti konelwaioti in tlatokayotl. chikwei xokonochtli iii kali xiwitl, 1521 años. —kani wilak notio. nikan nimitsmaktilia nikan para ika nopilwantsitsin xa itech tanke de at, ahvia !mexico teutlanevilok amapanitlan nawkampa ye moketsketl ye kena ichokayan. ik kinnots i witsilopochtli, kimilwi ( 8v “macamo ximomawtika, ye newatl nikmati; nech temi chinamitl ankiwilanatiwi, namechititiz”. intsalan xochikwaltin okachi welik in kwahtotoloktli. aw in onkan ik katka in tisatepek senpowalxiwtike; aw in ixkichkaw inik onkan katka inik wekawake chikwaseppa onkan tlemamalke, in seppa tlema- || 35v -mallia nawxiwtika. yewa nochipa chipawak itsotsoma kipia. axkan miérkoles in ik 2 mani metstli mayo de 1612 años, ihkwak piloloke senpowalonchikwei tlakatl in tliltike okichti, aw in tliltike siwa chikome tlakatl in iwan piloloke, in ye mochi ik mosenpowa senpowalon- || 186 -caxtolli tlakatl in piloloke; oinpan neltiko inik otlatsontekililoke inpan yah in sentensia in ipampa yniqu intech tlan, ye omotenew tlakpak, kil makokwiskia kinmiktiskia in intekwiyowan españoles. aw yniqu iwki in inpan kichiwaya mexika inik kintoliniaya ik senka kitlawelilokamatia, aw masiwi in itechpa kwalania tottatsin mexika yniqu iw kinchiwaya, yese san kihiyowiaya san intech kipachowaya, ayak wel motlapalowaya in kiteixpanwis kiteilwis audiensia real, intlakamo san yewatl wel omotlapalo in omotenew maría lópes, okiteilwi imixpantsinko in tlahtoke oidores. aw in oksekintin wewetke in iw kimachiyotia iwan kinpiltsintia in witsiliwitl in iska intoka in ikse itoka wewe eleltsin, in ikome itoka wewesaka, in ikyei itoka sitlalkowatl, in iknawi itoka astakowatl, in ikmakwili itoka axikyotsin, in ikchikwasen itoka kwawtsitsimitsin, in ikchikome itoka xikonok, in ikchikwe itoka tlakakochto. nikan motenewa in yuhki ik tlachichiwa in yewantin teokwitlapitske. in tekultika iwan xikokwitlatika, tlatalia, tlakwilona, inik kipitsa teokwitlatl, in kostik, in istak. in kompeutitika intultekayo. kada timotalitih timahcehuatih. taltikpaktsin de mi alma, aw oksenka kinpanawia oksenka tlamiawayotia in nikan ipan semanawatl in tlali in saso kakatlewantin seme in okseki yexkanme tlali, [quinpanahuia in ...]. yeso yahki nopilotsin, kosawik kwexteka totee, tsapokweye, tatlakawepan motimalowa, ya kenonamikan. noyuhki mexitin okaxiltike okse xiwtlalpili tekpayokan iwan onkan kilwikixtike inik ei yankwik intlew. nikan ompewa ompa wewe kaxtilan wei yaoyotl in galitlahtokayotl kinchiwilito inwikpa teutontlaltekah ipampa kaxtiltlahtokakontetokilistli. tewktli in itoka felipe angitekatl, in akin iixwiw katka wei tlahtoani inik matlaktli onnawi ludovikotsin, okimpew iyaowan. yuh, okikwik yankwik itoka inik makwili felipe iwan okichali in wewe hispantlalpan "intlahtocamecayo borbonesme". tein tewantikeh in mochiuj in tekit kinintasohkamatiliah miak nochin tokniwan ininchankawan, nochi in tatahmeh wan nanahmeh tein inintokaiwan ixnesih tani, semi ika miak pakilis kitemakakeh in inintahtol, itech in xiwit 1986, ihwak kinintatahtanihkeh ika nochi in tataman kilit, nanakat wan takilot tein tikwah timaseualmej: aw yuh kikak in witsiliwitsin iwan in kwatlekowatsin iwan in itskowatsin senka kwalanke, kimilwike "oc ximotlalikan". nech iya ikinokawketl. aw in okonan niman ye ik kihilpia konketsa in onkan hikaya, konkentia in tlatkiyetikak in amatl ixpan kontema petlapan in otlatopili. kena, nomponi tiitstose kwali". ihkwak toxiw molpili. na niya nihkwiti atl". tenkowayoh kwaltia iuki monotsa por in medio nexkokok. in iswat. kitlachilito kwali tlantok tlahko kilo ayohtoton ahnose tsilakayohtoton tlapikini, tlasaloani. in kwali kwikani yektoski, kwali, yektli, chipawak in itski, temimiltik in itlahtol. yolo, tlayolotlahpiani tlalnamikini, atlailcahuhqui. xochiyowa itech marso wan itech itamian hulio pewa onkak ya itakka hasta agosto tami. xi kali xiwitl, 1269. in kan on tepetiwa. yewan onechtlahtlanihqueh. tlakwakwalachkiltonili axkan lunes in ik 28 mani metstli mayo de 1612 años, ihkwak nikan mexiko unmopewalti in padre frai || 195 antonio de olea el presentado, mowika españa umpa ichantsinko, inin ikompañerotsin in teoyotika tlahtowani don frai garsía gwerra arsobispo mexiko iwan visurrei moyetstikatka in okimowikilitsino totekwiyo dios. aw inik onikyektili miek in ipan onikpopolo notomintsin inik okelimikke aw ikwak in yekwaltilok in onikpetlawili i ye kixtoka aw yekene ka ok sekni mani in inmil kamo onkan nitlatowa kwix kin omoskalike in ixkich kawitl ohatsonyapachiwtoka tle ika in amo kitepotstoka. mochtin altepetlacah: in pipil tin, in masewaltin, omaltepe tlalike iwan okimikalikoh kaxtilantlakah 34. iwan ma kana tekwe, tewipil ye timotsotson, ye timowitek. senka ok moyolik, iwiyan, xonitstiw, xommomattiw. ahmo oppatiwa in tlaltikpak, san wel achitsinka, san wel ixkichkawitsintli in walnetotonilo in ipaltsinko totekwiyo. san ye onsenkisa in tlaltikpak. intlakamo, san ihkwak tlakawas in iyolotsin dios, in techmoskalilis iwan techmotlatsontekililis, yekene techmotlakwepkayotililis in yuh ka totlachiwal, in yuh ka tomasewal, toknopil. tatsintli de nichpokatl omotenikili itlak se kaxtiltekatl akin okimolwilik: mochpochtsin ya kipias se konetontli, nimitsmotlatlawtilia amo timagwilis; iwan konetl ikwak yekos tikmotlasotilis. weyiyas iwan timotilis tlen ipatiw piltzintli. nikan ipan in motlahtokatlali in itoka malatsin ikmatlaktlomome tlahtowani mochiw in kulwakan. aw in pedro heronimo kimomakili makwilpowali onmatlaktli aw in migwel de la krus kimomakili epowali aw eskribano itech kimopowili epowali. ka ik timits yolpachiutia ka nappa in titetlakwaltis. in ik seppa in titeyolmelawas; in ik oppa ikwak in tontlaixnextis; in ik expa ikwak in teteoaltis; in ik nappa ikwak in titlamiktis. matlaktlose tekpa xiwitl ik yake chalka ik mixtlatike, kwawtla i kalak. in ihkwak in ye iw senpowalonmakwili xiwitl tlahtokati in itoka nawyotsin telpochtli in kulwakan, aw no iwan in ihkwak in okiw matlaktlonnawi xiwitl walewaske in teochichimeka asteka mexitin chikomostoka in ompa inchan astlan chikomostok inik nikan motlalikiwi atlihtik mexiko tenuchtitlan. || axkan miérkoles in ik 22 mani metstli febrero de 1612 años, ihkwak omomikili in yekmawistikatlakatsintli teoyotika tlahtowani don frai garsía gwerra arkobispo mexiko iwan visurrei omochiwtsinotikatka in nikan iwan in moch ik nowiyan nweva españa teopixki sankto domingo; se tsilini ipan tlako hora tlakah in opew ye tsilini imikkatepostsin nowiyan monasterios. 84. ye kwali, ye yektli, in ihkwak itla titekiwtilos, niman yokoxka xikkaki, niman yokoxka titenankilis in kwix wal tikchiwas, in kwix noso ahmo weli. ahmo titeistlakawis, san melawak, san neli in tikihtos, intlakamo weli, in ahnoso wel tikchiwas; ahmo tiknkmamatkaihtos, inik asokse tlakatl tekimakos. intla muchipa yuh tikchiwas, in senka titlasotlalos. makamo san ye yuhkin xitlapixka; ye wel ximotlali, wel xitlaana, wel xitlatsiko, wel ximonelwayoti, wel xontlatekitepewa immomilpan, immokwenpan. ximeteka, xinopaltoka; wel ximokalti inik onkan tepaltsinko, tenawaktsinko tikimonkawtias immotlakaskaltilwan, immotlakawapawalwan iwan in cueyequc, in wipileke. immustla, in wiptla in siawis, in tlatsiwis im makoche, in teputse. testigo- martin hakobo chane sant pablo tlalistakapan namike huramento okichiw inik otlatlakoltilok in ipaltsinko dios iwan totlasonantsin santa maria iwan i nika in imachio in krus etk. aw iskate in chichimeka ka pepetlawtinemia, atle imanel se tsotsomatli kimokentiaya imanel siwatl imanel tokichtin, yese san wel iwki nakateme in iwki kenin omotlakatilike; ka san iwkin nemia manel se maxtlatl amo kitlaliaya, ka san wel iwki yolkatsitsinti ipan powia atle inyolo katka katle kimatia. kimaka nečtla'ilihta kimaka nichpokaton nečtla'ilihta. inin mochiw, is ka ikwikayo “tonilhuiçoloa in timokiwitsi, ye no yankwik tikmana a in ilwikatl o; i nawaltsonpa in tetsawitli nepapan tlakatl. kowatlichan ustoyoke. wan tlapetlani “nochpochtziné, amo nikinpowa; kwix hamo ninotlalowa? aso nikkwexkokwitek anoso onimetspostek anoso onikxopostek anoso onikmapostek noso onikkwatlapan; kwix nikwalita itla omik aw itlakamo omik? kwix tlapowali akin tlapowa? ka sa nitlawiteki; kwix nikmati itla omik itlakamo mic?”. ipanpa i yehoantin i pipilti miktiloke kitlaokuliaya ipan tlatoaya i masewali inik monechikos istak tlaoli totoli totoltetl, inik tetlan kinkalakiske masewali. in nohpali senka moteteki, mokwakwalatsa ika istatl iwan tlakwalkilitl; mochi inin sehsen tlaxexeloli. ihkwak mochi ye tlahkotlawikxitili, in nohpali mopaka iwan mixika. ipan kaxitl motlalia in olipahchiyawisotl; motsoyonia in xonakatl in ye yawaltlatetektli iwan chili ye tlaixtlapanali. ihkwak ye atik in xonakatl, ye motlalia in nohpali, awax, in ayahmo tlawikxitili, in ye tlachipawtli, iwan ahwiyak xiwitl, ma wiwiksi; iwan ihkwak ye omotsoyoni sempowali om mahtlaktli ahnoso ompowali minuto, ye motlalilihtiw in tlakwalxiwitl; achto sanahoria, iwan exotl; mahtlaktli minuto ipan, ye motlalia in kalwahsaxoxowki, in ayohtoton iwan kolesxochitl. . ka amo tikmati, yese ka ye ik tommomoyawi in atoyak in tepehxik ka aoktle momasewal yes aok tle mulwil yes. tlen 75 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlahtokan tlen tepantlahtoahih, keman kikwalmatis in amatlayeyekoli tlen tomin tekiwili, amo welis kiilkawas kihtos tlen itlaxtlawil itechpowi tlen se tekitl tlen ixnesi ipan tlahtoltlanawatili, iwan tla ipampa tleweli tlamantli moilkawas motlais ken achi motlaxtlawas, mokwamachilis ipatih ken moixtlalih ipan amatlayeyekoli tlen se xiwitipah noso ipan tlahtol tlanawatili tlen kiyolitih inon tekitl. wahka tla axtle, ki nextiliskiya kenikatsa mo tlepanitaskiya ipan ni tlachiyalistli ipan ni tlanawatihkayotl 127 ipan ni weyi amatlanawatili ika no tlanawatihka tlanamikilistli tlen mo ikwilowa ipan ni kongreso general. tekichikwani, tlahtol tekichiwani iwan tlasenkawani, ihkino ni mo itskitoke san seki kwamachiliya ipan ni weyi amatlanawatili kichiwa ma onka tlapalewihkayotl tle kisa ipan ni tekichiwani, weli ki tlamiltiskiya tlen yowanti ki tekipanotoke, ki temoliya kenikatsa kin mahmakase tlen nochi tekitini. ni tlen mo ilwiya ki chiwase tln ki kwaltlalise ipan kisas in tomi, ki temoliya ipan ni tlanawatihkayotl 74 tlatlapantli iv tlen ni weyi amatlanawatili wan sekinok kamanali tlen xitlawak ki tlaliskiya. mosentilihke 43. aw in tewatl ma timoxikkaw, ma timonenkaw, ma timoteputskaw, in tinokoski, in tinoketsal; ma ontlami immitsin, immoyolotsin iwan immakoltsin, immokwitlapantsin, immomolietsin, motetepontsin, intla itlan ximakiti in tlachpanalistli, in tlakwikwilistli, in tematekilistli, in teixamilistli, in tekamapakilistli. aw ma no itlan ximakilti in atl, immetlatl iwan wel xiktsitski, wel xikakokwi imolkaxitl, in chikiwitl. wel xikmana, wel xikikwani in teixpan, in tenawak. aw in omotenewke tlakpak, in onkan tlahtokatia in onkan in astlan chikomos inawak i wel yewantin asteka chikomostoka ka inmasewalwan katka in mexitin atenka; intlatlamakawan katka in otikintenewke tlakpak tlahtoke astlan. onikmolwili tlaximohtili kwix yonimitsmosotlawitili ika tinechmo texiliba ka tinechmotlapakilia in makwil taman nochi iuki sah in ikwouyo, nochi owat, sayoh in sinti tataman. tlahko mamahpikton tomilo mah namechtayokoli. konmotla kekechkasin, konmotla tepekwawistli, onmokwepa konnosna kawkiyawak, ontemo molino yankwik; konnosa kwahtekpak, konnosa sokisinko tel iwke mekan, konnosa chalchiwmik, iwa konosa ikpakatlankasin kanpa ka se wei tlaskan; konmotla kwautlapechtli, ik yekak onmokwepa konnosa in kwawixapan, konsakwa in tlalkostepetl iwan ome tepe yewattin, yoan onka ok ... .|| xikwalkwikan ka nel yewatl otiktemoli in tlakatl totekuyo ka tetl ka kwawitl itik motlachieltitika. aw inik niman satepan onkan owalkiske asteka mexitin in chikomostok kinewayan inik niman nikan ye walnehnemi, iwiyantsin ye yatiwitse. ipampa axkan tikkakiltiko in hustisia ones in kimokowis kali tlali itoka lorenso diego inamik hwana petronila in inkonew fransiska austin iwan diego santiago ixkich kimana senpowal onmotlaktli pesos ipampa ik tiksenkawa in kali in tlali tikneltilia in iw ka testamento in tonawatil ixkichin in intlaitlanilis omochiw in alvaseasme. kwaltia in yehwa in iteyo se kitoka; oso kampa kikwah ompa kitamotah in iteyowan ixwa. aman amo semi onkak kuoujtaj, por in aman amo kiwika in iteyo chiktehmeh por in tokniwan kitekih in iteyo wan kinamakaj. ome kali xiwitl ik poliwke koyoake; no ikwak koniwake tlatoke kwawtlatoasi, iskoatsi, mixkoatl in unpa koniwake ye ewatl in tlanelwatito xilotepek. kena nikahsito nopa michi kanowian teipa kwalanke. aw iskate in tlasopipiltin in i mochintin walake in ithawan in itewktlahtokawan walmochiwtiake in ikse itoka tlawipilatonak, in ikome itoka tonakachimal, in ik-ei itoka wewe aopochtli, in iknawi itoka kwatomawak, in ikmakwili itoka totonwitstli, in ikchikwasen itoka xipechimale, in ikchikome okse siwapili itoka xiwtostsin in tewan wala; yewantin in in kiwalwikatiake in tlahtowani totoltekatl tsompachtli tlailotlaktewktli in ipilowan walmochiwtiake. inik okonanke posesio itik okalakke in kali ipan onenenke in tlali tetika otlamomotlake ayak otlachalani ayak tle okito san pakka yokoxka omochiw imixpan pablo hernandes merino hwan martin balthasar xwares hwana baptista mochintin imixpan inik omomaman estakas no in ixpan mochiw fransisko saktoval fiskal diego lwis algwasil migwel monise eskribano. in kilit se kikwa iwan akolin. newa yexpa onikitak ipan ohtli. akattopa kimottititsinoh se maseuhaltsintli itoka hwan diego, aw satepan monexitih in itlasohixiptlatsin in iixpan yankwikan obispo don frai hwan de sumárraga. in tlahtokat tulan ketsalkowatl onpowalxiwitl ipan exiwitl inik moch mosenpowa inik onkan monemilti tulam; aw masiwi poliwiko altepetl tulam ok matlaktlonsexiwti in onkan tulam ketsalkowatl; se sitlali popokak in ipan altepetl tulam inik motetsawike tulteka. timiyake tiitstoke otlanamakak aw in okittake mexika in amo kwali in okinyolotilike in inteokal, niman okikixtike okimayawke, okitoke "amo yewatl moneki in, ka witstli ka iyetl ka akxoyatl in iyolo yes". iiii.- testigo. migwel achitomekatl ichan kowatlan omonamikti ye napowalxiwtia i ye nemi huramento okitennamik in ika bara de hustisia ik otlatlakoltilok inik amo istlakatis ilwilok in tla tistlakatis ka diablo kiwikas in moyolia manima aw tla wel tokonmelawas in motlatol ka ye mitsmotlaokolilis in totekuyo dios iwan tonantsin santa maria mochipa ichpochtli. mah kikawakan. michitlakwali, michi tlaxaxantili. mochiwa saj, kemeh in seki kikwah wan kitamotah ini teyo, ompa ixwa. ka nikan tonka, in tinopiltsin, in tinokoski, in tinoketsal, in tinotlakachioal, in tinotlatlakatililil, in tinesio, in tinotlapali, in tinoneiximachilis. yeyalwa niwia nepitl nitlachto n mili. nikan ipan in in sekintin wewetke in kimachiyotia inik onkan asiko in asteka || 70v in itsintla in wei kwawitl in inpan postek inik walake asteka. in kinextia kitemachitia ka ipampa tlamesewa in ikonew in intelpuch in okixkawke ixkich kawitl yuh kichiwtinemi in ik kisakiw. noponi tlami nopa kwento. newatl oninamakaya atoli iwan nakatamali tiankisko. iwan se tonaltika owaltemoke sapatistas ika texetako otli. okixtetsiko okseki ika tekpampa otli. se vwelta otlakwekwepotsake sapatistas iwan otsatsike ¡nemi sapata! ¡nemi sapata! nian ka namotata; ayemo miki. ¡nemi zapata! ye chikomilwitl nenemi in akali tlatotikate onkan monotsa. iiii tochtli xiwitl, 1366. wan yeka timitstlahtoke teskatl ihtik newa noyekmati. tak iuki kitokaitiah por in ololtik in itakka. monamaka. in metstli tonalkisayan ye omonexti. itsintla tlen 70 tlanawatihkayotl. nochi tlaxolewali tlen weyi tlahtokan mokwepas tlahtol tlanawatili noso tlahtoltematilistli. in tlhatol tlanawatilmeh noso tlahtol tematilismeh kimatiltiseh weyi tekichiwani iwan kiixwasaniseh tlayekananih tlen ome tlahtokan iwan noihki tlahkwiloani tlen se iwan se tlahtokan, iwan motematiltis ika inin tlahtoli “in sentlahtokan tlen mexiko sentika tlaltlanawatiloyan kikixtia tlahtol tematiltilistli (tlahcuiloli tlen tlahtol tlanawatili noso tlahtol tlahtoltematiltilistli”. in weyi tlahtokan kikixtis tlahtol tlanawatili tlen ika kikwaltlalis itlakayo iwan inemilis tlen yewa itechpowi. in tlahtol tlanawatili kiihtos kenihki mochiwas iwikpa monechisoseh tepantlahtoanih, san katlia ihki tlatskitoseh ipan tlahtol nechikolislti, iwikpa mosenkawas ika ininyolo tlahtoseh nochi tlahmantli tlahtoltlamikilismeh tlen tlatskitoseh ipan tlahtokan tepantlahtoanih. inin tlahtol tlanawatili amo welis mokotonas iwan itechmoneki tlatematiltis tekichiwani tlen sentlanawatiloyan iwikpa welis ipatih elis. tlaxexeloli tlen ii tlen tlaneskayotili iwan tlatekpantli tlanawatilmeh xochiyowa kemeh moskaltijtiuj, dependerowa de in tiempo kemeh se kitoka. ipampa inon tlaltikpak onka ekalistli iwan tlapololotilistli. xippe ikwik totek yowalawana te amikseuij. in oyake nima ye ik kiwalkixtia i mexika in tlein okitokako, in intlaolow mochiw akatl nakaswitstli awewetl; aw in kwitlatl in tlasoli in tewtli in ichkatl iwitl kate itwalnepantla kitokake. aw inin, san ixkich nokonitoa, nonekixtil nikchiwa. ma kana tokonmotlatlaxilili in ihiyotsin, in itlahtoltsin motekuyotsin. tochan tikpia in yektlahtoli • xikwa yektlakwali inik mopakilit * mokbiwas. san nimanehnentiyahki kwatlaixko san axkan tehwa, señor santiago apóstol, in omik nima walmotlali i witsiliwitsin; e yuh xxiii xiwitl tepachowa inik namoyaloke mexika ipan sen tochtli xiwitl, au in ok keski mokawke. inin xiwpan kimotlahtokatike in karlos salinas de gortari yuhkin wei itlahtokaw anawak. tlahkoxonakatl in ahmo wehyi yuh nikmati yepowali ochikome xiwitl ikwak in walwilowak kolwakan inik tlalmako sant hwan san pablo san sebastian santa maria inik nixpan mochiw tikwalwikake in atokoktsin katka yuh techilwi wel xikittakan in kwaxochtli. in et no welik wan no in ikilo wan ixochiyo. xii kali xiwitl, 1413. ¿yomitzin senkawilike mocahhuan? nikan ipan in tlalolin. nima ye ik semolini tenochkatl, nima ye i kinapaloa in witsilopoch, kiwalkalakike tlatilulko, kontekako amaxak telpochkali; aw in intlatokaw kontlaliko i yakakolko kwawtemoktsi. yawaltik nikan ipan in omomikiliko in totepew in ikchikwasen tlahtowani kulwakan, in tlahtokat onpowalxiwitl ipan onxiwitl; aw sa niman ipan in in omotenew xiwitl onkan walmotlahtokatlali in itoka nawyotsin in ikome yuhki itoka in ikchikome tlahtowani mochiw in kulwakan. axkan lunes ik 19 mani metstli de disiembre de 1611 años, ihkwak opew in omoman kiyawitl sewalatl, inik o- || 160 -ceppayauh in intech istaktepetl iwan popokatepetl, senka ik mokimiloke in seppayawitl, iwan inik nowiampa kwawtla in intech tetepe nowian intech wets in seppayawitl; nawilwitl in senka sewak inik kiyaw ipan hwebes in kisako sewalatl inik seppayaw. inihwanfi auetsiltiaj. intlatol konmononochilike konitoke tikkakiltiko in hustisia ipanpa omomikili in yewatl isabel anan. aw technawatitia inik tiknamakaske in ikal in itlal ipan kitlalitia in itestamento inik alvaseas techkawtia in ipatiw mochiwas kali tlali misa ikipan mitos ipalewiloka mochiwas in ianiman iwan seki ik mostlawas in kitepieliaya tomines. aw niman ye no onkan in tlakatiko in ipiltsin tonakachimal in itoka kwaltsin. mochi san nekawalisteixihta in yowasin ihkwak aka kimokawilihtewa in semanawak in ihkwak aka techommokawilia immanon topiltian ipan sekundaria tlamachtilkali ahtle mihtoaya itechpa in wewe mexihko neskiani se nekawalistilmahtli kitlapachoaya inon semanawaktli wel neli tlasemilkawali aw in oyuh ontlamin in tlahtowani atonaltsin chichimekatewktli ok nen kihtowaya in tlein innawatil in intlakatekolotlahtol in xochteka in ulmeka in xikalanka in kiyawisteka in kukolka, inik tekwannawaleke kiyawnawaleke katka okinkwilike, aokmo wel tekwanime mokwepke, ka ye oksenka yewantin in tekwannawaleke in kiyawnawaleke in chichimeka totolimpaneka in tokolwan. pero ya tlahmahtsi kitohtomili aw in akasitli ye kitowa "inyoyahué, tlokehé nawakehé!, ka yewatl in inik nichoka in nakasitli, in chapoltepek in popoliwtok in notatsin iwan in askatlxochtsin in noteikkatsin". tlahtoltin in kwowit. aw inin eskritura otikchiwke ixpan eskrivano nombrado in nikan ipan altepetl mexiko testigostin imixpan hwan martin bernardo ximenes estevan de sant lurenso martin antonio beromaris. xkintali nopilwan itech nehin kali, iwan ikwak yankwikan motlayawalwike in santo domingo ipilwan, wel mawistik in itlaihiyowilistsin totekwiyo dios inik motekpan. pero nama, na nihwikas. motlanawatilia itech kimokawilia pedro heronimo regidor mayor ihoan newatl eskribano inik ontlatlaniloske in tlaxilakaleke in onka yopiko in itechkopa in kali ma kitokan in tla kimati in aso onkate in wel onkan chaneke in onkan tepilwan inik amo satepa chalanis in tlatoli inik amo tle neteilwili mochiutinemis. aw inik kimotlalilike omotenewtsino sankto in onkan ikapilatsin wei tlayawalolistika; onkan kimaniliko in sant augustín in siudad tlaka, mochintin in tlahtoke visurrei oidores, inik mochintin omikwiloke onkan ikapilatsin sankto, in iw nestika axkan. se kwawitl kalixpan ka. inikentlamantli nikitowa in newatl ni hwana mosel in nokonew hoseph lopes nikmakatiw chikwasenpowali pesos aw in omentin maria geronima iwan martina lopes intech powis onpowali pesos aw inikei klara intech powis senpowali pesos inin onikito wel nikimaxkatitiw intech powis. ka nel toyaotilis in tostomeka ka wei in otikmawisalwike in tlakatl totekuyo in tewantin in timonanwan in timotawan. wehweyi kimantok temitok kichihki. ihkin omochiw: amo kimagayan siwakonetl. ikwak okipix konetl ye tlasotli. oweyak iwan omochiw telpokatl. istatl, ixkich in monekis amo no ome, yei, mixko mokpak matis: in otikittak in akin amiwan, amonewan anmopopoliwitiske ma tikkaw xiktsitski, itech ximopilo, ma nel iknotlakatl, ma nel iknokwawtli, iknooselutl, ma nel iknotiakaw, in anoso iknotepiltsin, in aso ye tlasiawi, ma ik tikihix: ka amechmimachilis. kenin mochiwa pero axkiahsiskí ilwikaktli. mochiwa ampón atenoh anal wan nikampa anal. . aw in ikwak in ye yaske in ye om pewaske achtopan ichan monechikowa in akin teyakanas in tachkawtias. mah kwaltsin seliya. vi akatl xiwitl, 1407. tlen 35 tlanawatihkayotl. itechpowi tlen altepechaneh: i. tlaixwasanis keman tlatequihuetlaliseh; ii. welis itoka kiixwasaniseh iwikpa kiselis tlanawatili, iwan kitokatlaliseh iwikpa sekinok tekitl noso tekipanoli, tla kipia nelkwali tlaixnextilistli tlen moihtowa ipan tlahtol tlanawatili; iii. welis monechikos iseltika iwikpa ika kwali tlatskis ipan altepetlahtoli tlen itechpowi totlalnantsin; iv. kiitskis tepostli ipan yaotekayotl noso anawak tlapipialistli, iwikpa kimanawis totlalnantsin iwan caltlanahuatilmeh, ken moihtowa ipan tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh; iwan v. welis motlahtlanilis tlen itechpowi ipan nochi tlamantli tlanamakatiloyan. inik walake wewetke in inpan postek otlihpan in itsintlan mosewiaya mexika. i tlatokat akamapich xxi xiwitl. tepankali. in axkan ipan ik 16 mani metstli de hunio de 1608 años, ikwak maxitiko mokalakiko nikan mexiko in yewatsin teoyotika tlahtowani don frai hwan || 70 de vale obispo teopixki sant benito; españa owalmowikak, san nikan mexiko mokixtitikis, ompa mowikak ompa itekipantsinko in gwadraxara in xalixko. mochiwa ampowín por ateno, mochiwa kajfentaj, kampa yemaniktal. x tochtli xiwitl, 1190. xinechmopahkayowiti. onik walwikasnekia, noso okikokoaya itsonteko iwan amo okinek ichan kisas. aw in yehotl angelina de la krus kitlalitia itestamento kitotika in unkan niwetstok in kali tonatiw ikisayampa itstikak yoan in unkan monoltitok ixiptlatsin totekuyo yoan muchi itlalo ithoalo yoan in unkan onok tepantsintli iski patlaoak iski ik wiak nanmatl inik wiak sematl inik patlaoak ka nikkowili in itoka hwan kwawtsetseltsin nikmakak makwili peso wel tomin. na miyake, na miyake tokaro tlamantli ka nikan tikkaki in mochokis in motlaokol in ye makwil in ye matlak in ye se xiw in ye oxxiw ik timotekipachotinemi. tlen 136 tlanawatihkayotl. inin amatlanawatili amo kipolos chikawalistli ihatsah keman onkas kwalantli moixkotonas itlatlepanitalis. tla onkas tleweli kwalantli ipan altepechantli, motlalis se tlanawatikayotl tlen kiwikas seyok tlahtoltlanawatilmeh tlen moihtowa ipan amatlanawatili, saniman in altepetl oksepa momakixtis, moixtlepanitas in amatlanawatili, iwan inin tlasenkawali iwaya tlanawatilmeh tlen omokixtihtos, quinixpantiseh, iwan nochimeh tlen ixnesiseh ipan tlanawatikayotl tlen kisas ipan kwalantli, iwan tlen tlapalewitoseh ipan inin kwalantli. aw in motamachiw in tlalmantli in tlamelawa tonatiw ikisanpa matlakmatl omome maitl aw inik patlawak makwilmatl aw niman onkan otikmamanke estakas in onkan tlatlami kwaxochtli. in kamoj. nikan. iwi in kelakwawaya in kichikawaya in ai amo senka ixtlamati in aso kin iyopa tevika motewikaltia in kampa ye on tlamatisneki, vii kali xiwitl, 1161. iskitin hi in ipilwa tlakateusi; sa moch moyawake iweltiwa akolmisi. texokot kitowa eh nehchia nechtlatlawelia nechtlatlawelian pikosowatl nechtlailihtaw newatl nehwa ahmo neki onkanias nikinawis ma nikonahsino notlaxkal onkan yeniyaw. in chichiton itsintlan ikpali ka. iuki monotsa por in tamatisneki kemeh talkamoj. in kwahtotoloktli amo momaka ika wehkapa tlalpan mexihko. titlatsilinise para tipaktise. aw in isiwaw mochiw wewetewktli itoka tsiwakxotsin, ichpochtsin in itoka chikawastli, in ompa wala chikomostok; onkan otlakatke yeintin inpilwantsitsin: in ikse itoka tliltekatsin teyakapan || chichimekayaotekiwa mochiw, in ikome itoka xochitsin kowayaotekiwa mochiw, in ikeintin tlakati itoka atonaltsin ya yewatl in chichimekatewktli mochiw sa xokoyotl. onkak ome taman: seki kostik wan seki istak. kwouxiwit tiltsapot see tootlaakatsiin, tlaakati istak, nemi xooxowki, waalmiki chichiltik. mochiwa milaj. inin omotokatenew in ikome akamapichtli in iw okkampa tetechpa kistika in intech in kolwakan tlahtoke iwan intechkopa in mexika, aw yewatl ipampa inik yewatl kanato || 83v akamapichtli inik intlahtokaw mochiw mexika. ¿quen mochi ompew? iskatki in tlahtoli in kitotiwi in wewetke amo se kitoka, ixwa saj. tehwa taltikpaktsin antonio martín markés. iwan no sentetl inkwawkal kipiaya in onkan teilpiaya akxoteka, in iw nesitiw tlatsintla. aw inin omotenew don antonio valeriano telpochtli fiskal katka in nikan san hoseph san fransiskko, in onka yewak ik mowikak askapotsalko; inin telpochtli ixwiwtsin in tlakatl wewe don antonio valeriano ichantsinko askapotsalko, in miyek xiwitl nikan omohwesgovernadortiliko mexiko tenochtitlan ipanpa in inamiktsin siwapili doña isabel de alvarado in ichpochtsin katka tlakatl don diego de alvarado wanitsin tlahtowani katka tenochtitlan. aw in iksen chinampa in kulwakan in kwitlawak, oksenka umpa in siudad xochimilko in tlatlakaw tlakoixtlapan in teopankali in wel tlaltitech ahsiko; iwan yuh machistiko in nikan me- || 154 -xico in ompa motlapachoke matlaktli tlakatl, in inchachan in inkal inpan pachiw in onkan kochia, in wel niman mikke in amo moyolkwititiwi. kemmanian ihkwak otiyayah tekospa otikisaya ika lapietal, otikanayah in ohtli in panoya ika kampa mopiliaya imiltsin yewatsin ton epigmenio baranda, ton klemente romero; ihkwak ye otiyeyah tekospa tlakaltentli ahnoso achto ye tiktekia in menapalitl, tikpehpenayah inon kaxtik, in ahmo wel wehyi iwan tikwikayah kampa tlalwikixtiloya. ipan techmakaske in atoli, senka welik kosatoli iwan ika inon tikiskiani i tekpatl xiwitl, 1272 años. xochiyowa hunio, hulio onkak ya chiltekpin. tlen 36 tlanawatihkayotl. iixkotiah altepechaneh tlen totlalnantsin: i. moihkwilos ipan tlaltokayotl tlen altepetlanawatili, kampa kiihtos tlapiali tlen yewa kipixtok, tlachiwali, tekichiwali noso tekitl tlen ika mopanoltia; iwan nohkia moihkwilos ipan amochtli anawak sentika altepechanehke, ken moihtos ipan tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh. in nechikolistli iwan nochipa tlatekiwili tlen amochtli anawak sentika altepechaneke iwan amatl tlen mokixtis kampa moihtos melawak mexikayotl altepechaneh yewan tekichiwali tlen melawak moneki ipan altepeyotl, ipampa inon, tlanawatili tlen itechpowi kaltlanawatiloyan iwan altepechanehkeh ken moihtos ipan tlahtol tlanawatili; ii. motokahtlalis ipan anawak tlapihpianih; iii. tlaixwasanis keman onkas masewal tlapehpentli ken moihtos ipan tlahtol tlanawatili; iv. tekipanos ipan tekiwakayotl tlen masewal tlapehpentli tlen sentlanawatiloyan noso tlaltlanawatiloyan, iwan amo keman san molwi tekitis; iwan v. tekipanos ipan tekiwakayotl tlen tlahtokan altepetlanawatiloyan kampa mochantlalihtok, tlapalewis ipan masewal tlapehpentli iwan tlen tlahtolsenkawali. porke sasan tapaxi. in omolnamikiko munomento motlali in kalitik sankto domingo, in onkan missa ipantsinko mitto, ixkichtin onkan senkiske in teopixke in missa resada ipan kimitalwike; iwan tlayawalolok in itwalko teopan, gonatika kimonapalwike in iyomiyo oidoresme in kinapaloke. oquipiayah. onkan kitepew sebada in kapitán de la gwardia don pedro serrano, wel yewatl in tlanawatiaya inik tlaixpoliw; ka wel mawiskan katka in chapultepek. oksepa okinkake ipan altepetl ye popolowi sapatistas. ika oksepa yomomanke iwan sankwal kantika kintlatlatoltiaya in federales. kinkweponiaya noihki; otlanankiliaya ika tepostlakweponili. ihkion oyeke kana yeyi nawi metstli; san otechmamawtiaya. in kwawitl okachi weyi keh in tlakotl. . ixkich in taxka in totlatki in toneokichitol yes: ayak wel kikwis in ixkichtin mexiko nemi im puchteka in ostomeka in amo walake in amo towan otlaihiyowike, san toneixkawil yez. aw kano yuh kichiwaya in itoka sila, itech tikpia tikana neixkwitili machiyotl: i momostlaye yowatsinko inik moketsaya ikochiyan niman wia kalakia oksekni kalitik xomolko, motsatsakwaya intla in itekwakwilwan in iteowan, onkan intech mokawaya kintlatlawtiaya in itechpa yewatl iwan in ipa in itekiw in inemosiwil iwan in ipan mochi in ixkich in tlein kichiwas in ixkich ipa semilwitl. aw in tlalkawatitika in kaltsalantli senmatl iwan semomitl inik patlawatika inik wiak makwilmatl aw in itepotsko kali sematl iwan se yolotli inik patlawatika nanmatl iwan senxokpali. in ikpaltin yankwikeh iwan kimach omochihqueh. ik makwiltetl in sesek por in ayoj. aw in christianostin semixkich ika akosentlakpak in kimokwititsinowa in kimiximachilia in dios in keni wel yewatsin. miak mochiwa. nawililama, namonan, nikawalilama nihkpichilama, ipan nonchiwa o nichalkotlakatl. nimitsawiltiko noxochinenetsin, noxochikamapal, nenetsin. ye no kelewia in tlatowani in axayakaton. aw yehika ka yewantin i wel akachto owasiko in xochimilka, aw in ikontlamantin owasiko ka yewantin in chalka, aw in ikyetlamantin owasiko ka yewantin in tepaneka, aw in iknawtlamantin owasiko ka yewantin in akolwake, aw in ikmakwilamantin owasiko ka yewantin in tlalwikka, aw in ikchikwasentlamatin owasiko ka yewantin in tlaxkalteka, aw in ikchikontlamantin owasiko ka yewantin in teotenanka, aw in ikchikwetlamantin owasiko ka yewantin in amakemeke. ihwak ixwa mokehketsa wan mo kechmekayotia wan ompa xochiyojtiuj ya, ompa ya mochiwa exot. ya axkana para san kikekeloya kichiwili aw in altepewake amo wel kalakke in anawak: san iyoke in kalakia in mexika in tenochka in mexika tlatilolka; inwikalwan katka in kwawtitlan kalke iwan witsilopochka. aw inik intech monekis ik motlanawatilike isiwka mochichiwas kaxtoli omome in kastila akali, iwan ixkich etsontli ipan kaxtolpowali in tlakatl yas, aw matlaktli omome klerigostin, iwan se teopixki san benito ka ivikariotsin ipampatsin walmochiwtia in sankto padre. ix aka xiwitl atle mochiw. aw in españoles, nowian nemi in tlatemoa in kalpolko, nowian ontlaxiltiwi in tlatemoa, in asaka ompa minaya, nowia nenke, kiskwalotinenke in iskikan kalpolko in tlatemoke. se kilo xitomatl in ye omahsik tewatsia inawaktsinko oninopacho onikmixilnamikili miekpan onikmohtili mila iwan keskipa otitonamihkeh ipan ohtli onikmotlahpalwi tleinmach otitononotske san tlamaeh omixyoyomokpolkweptsino okimopahpakiltili omomachiti ahkiwatsin notahtsin onikmotlahtlanili intla kana omoikaya omihtilwi mach omoikaya mokwilis in mikkaxochitl in momaka ohteneo ye nawi xiwitl in omomikili isiwawahtsin yese niknemilia okachi kwali nikyehyekos nikilnamikis in we yewatsin omotlatenewi aw i yewatl in itoka tekonewatewktli in tekwachkawtli in intlahtokaw akxoteka onkan kichiw se ipiltsin in kwitlatetelko itoka witsnekawal. ma ok totiximati. ninonpewa, niwelnkwika, ompa ye wits tolanitik, niwelikwika, otoskwepo, motoma xochitl. wel xikkaki ye mokwik: kwikaichtekini ¿quen tikkwis, noyol? timotolinia yuhkin tlakwiloli wel titlani, wel xontlapalaki at ahiwetsian timotolinia. semi pisiltik in ixiuyo, tsikitsitsin. wel kwali nik asikamati tlen tewatsin timohtalwia. oya istoria den ye'on den xwan del oso porke komo oya den mono konetl. omomahyuhihtac itech in mixkolotl in ipan in nekalilistli in ye miek xiwitl in okichiwkeh inwikpa in tlachkiawkatlakah ahkiwan mochipa kinyolkixtihtaya in ipan inon yaoyotl okinpanawihkeh in tlachkiawko tiakah senka miek tlakah okinmiktihkeh in mexikah immanon yewatl iwan iikniw okimahsikeh makwili maltin ipampa yewantin in ye kwawtin okatka okinchiwkeh tlakatekameh oksehpa in otenak in mixkolotsin inin okilkawti tlen kilnamiktaya itech omopacho oksehpa okipohpowili in itlakohkol vese axkan ye kiitstikanapalohtaya in miktlantewktli tlaltewktli in iapismikilis yekiwikaya in isetkah koatlikwetsin yuhkin se tetlasohtikanantsin kimoseliliskiani mixkolotsin ianimantsin inik kimomakilis in tonatiw in ihkwak ilwikak motlaohtokilis nawi xiwitl ipan ye mochiwaskiani in witsitsilin "tlan axmayanah meltihka. semi welik se kitalilia in habas. xi tekpatl xiwitl, 1204 años. ye ixkich: in tonekixtil mochiwa. nochtin in mowaxkawan amo kwahkwaltin. in tlahkwilo tlili tlapali tlilat, yalwil, toltekatl tlachichiwki, tlatekulaliani tlatlilani. in xiwit. ¿ ken mach in tinechiwnoyekoltsin ? ¿ma ka ok ik xi mochichiwakan, wel ah titlakatl? ¿ tlein tiknenelo ? ye noyolotson tikxochimalina, ye motlatol. notsawayan in mitsittoa, in nihkitian nimitsilnamiki, xolotsin. ¿ tie in tiknenelo ye noyolotsin? axkan ipa viernes ye yowa, in ik 25 mani metstli de hebrero de 1600 años, ipan ilwitsin san mathías apóstol, omomikili in tlayektenewali tottatsin frai sebastián de aparisio teopixki san fransisko kwatesontsin, kwitlaxkoapan san fransisko momikili. kwaltia tikin anakan in orne kalxexeloltin. ximotlatekimakiwi man kinehkawikan in petlakaltin. ¿canin ka in tealtiloyan? inimeh weyi kaltin ipan kalmantli onkateh ¿ inochtin mokoltsin oquinmanqueh? noknin se kwali iwan chikaktik piltontli. nehín mochiwa saj, in iteyo semi wehkawa ixwa por ké semi takwawak, kichiwa se xiwit para ixwa. se tekontontli olipahchiyawisotl se itoka sipaktonal, ainoyake,yewa tesosomoktsin, o yewan kwahkwawtsin. noka yawe tlaka tekitiske siwame noihki tlakoa ompa tiankisko kampa monamaka nakatl, yetl, tlaoli nochi tlen monekis kwawitl, tekoli, xochikwali nochi in itech moneki siwame ipan kali. yomokwepke siwame tiankistli kitlipantlalia tlakwali iwan wisi. kisaka atsintli ika se tikaxalotin noso teposkaxtin iwan tla yowala tenamik, tsikwini siwatontli kikoas newtli. imixpan in testigos hwan de morales, hwan del kaso español iwan mochintin in moteilwia. fecho en mexiko a primero de disiembre de mil e kinientos e ochenta i noeve años. por testigo hwan del kaso paso ante mi migwel xwares eskribano. ipan kalohtlipa weyi altepetl nipaxialohtinemi. iwan ompa momikilito in weimolan in don karlos okistsin tlahtowani katka askapotsalko mexikapa; aw inin tlahtowani okistsin san kokolmik in onpa ondora. aw in chinamitl yetetl inik weweyak matlatlakmatl aw in mokalnamaka itoka balthasar moknoteka iwan inamik itoka marina papan iwan yewan alonso tenechikowa baltolome kiyaw anan teihukchon anan tiakapan. tsatsatsi nochtin kokone, noihki tewan ¡nochi yompaka totsotsomahwan, kahtin ika mediastin! ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. makamo on tlayowatikas tlasoli on kistikas vel onkistos in noknoxalko; ma ok kon ixkawi in san iyo nokonkawtiw in nonantsin in notesitsin in noweltiwatsin in nawitsin, ka ika non notekipachotiw ika non tlaokoxtiw. xinechm'ocaquiti, ¿tleno kihtowa amatenonotstli? aw no iwan ye iw nepa matlakpowalxiwitl ipan senpowalxiwitl ipan makwilxiwitl in ipan vii akatl xiwitl, de 1075 años, inik ompa walolimke inik ompa walkiske in san onkan chikomostok kinewayan in mexika asteka, inik nowian otlihpa walnentiake, inik onkan tepan kalakiko kulwakan in ipan omotenew xiwitl ome akatl. ma ka aik nipoliuhi... aw in xochitli ka sa yewatli yuhki xoxowixtiwi in kaxititiwi in opam méxiko ka senka okitlasokamatia kamatia in moteksomasin semka okidasodaya in xochitekutl. niman ikwak okitlatlanili tepisin tlali aw in ikwak owalmokwepato owala iwan mochintin ipilwan niman omkam omokeski itokayokam kakaloapam. niman okito xiwalwiam xikitakam ka nikan tlami in todal nikam ik damelawa itokayokam temalakayokam. niman tlamelawa kwowayokam ixdawak omka se tetli. niman tlamelawa wechachokam omkam se tepesintli itokam masatepetli. niman damelawa xiloxochko kampa moxelowa otli pisawak ompa opanok se ixkokoxki ik damelawa kampa iktaya odi tlasalam. aw inik tlaminaya, aik nenkisaya in inmiw in ihkwak tlaminaya, intla ilwikakpa tlaminaya konminaya in wei tototl; aw intla onenkisato in inmiw in ilwikakpa ye walamintasia in tlaltikpak, kiwalmintasia masatl tochtli kowatl tekwani. yewatl in in tottatsin ikonpadre mochiw visurrei; aw in kwaatekilok piltsintli onkan in tekpan palasio kapila real. xkintayokoli nopilwan. yewa onechilwi kwali nikonis tepitsin chichiwalayotl,nakaayotl, xochikwalayotl iwan xochikwali, iwan san inon. mach kenin amo ni. mayana, amo noteki tla amo onka tlakwali. ye kontlatlawtia kontekilia in ixkich ik mexika, konilwia “nopiltzintziné tlatowanié, ka yewatl in otikmokwili in tochokis in totlaukol inik tonentlamati”. iuki monotsa por in inalwayo mochiwa mahyá se bola. ya kipixke nopa ichpokero aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl momikiliko in maktsin atlawtekatltewktli tlahtowani atlawtlan tenanko, in tlahtokat onpowalxiwitl ipan chiwknawi xiwitl. in oyekawiko teokali matlakxiwitl omome; aw ye iw nawpowalxiwitl ipan onxiwitl iwan ontetl metstli onoke in españolesme inik asiko mexiko nikan inik tlalmasewako. iwan governador don antonio valeriano, alkaldes fransisko de la krus iwan hernando garsía, don hwan martín iwan mochintin sant pablo tlaka pipiltin, regidores, ipampa ka oaxkatiloke omakoke in teopixke, ipampa mochi tlakatl tetl kikwik kinapalo, in teopixke in kontlalike tlatatakko tenexsokititlan. eloiswatl in ounasiko tenochtitla nima ye tikimamaka in totoli in totoltetl in istak tlaoli in istak tlaxkali; nima ye tateka nima ye masatlakwali tikalake yoan kwawitl. teyohpahpata aw inik yankwikan kiske in inik tlayawaloke senka niman mawistik wel kwepontiake, mochi yankwik in andas tlayawalo iwan estandartes kwachpanitl, in iw mochi tlakatl okittak; inik mochiwin senka ipan mochikawke in omotenewke diego lópes iwan governador. mochiwa kampa ixtawat mah tayuntahwikan oso mah tapikohwikan, kitokah ikechtayo. aw yese ye omito in iquaqu in wel okipan nemia in tlahtowani don fernando rei in yaoyotl ik manka in granada, aw yewatl ipampa inik miekkampa tetlatlawtito; inik amo san nennemis kitlatlawtito in portugal tlahtowani don hwan segundo, amo kinek. ika tlani kiitah tlapopoka nikan ipan in omomikiliko in itoka chalchiwtlatonak in ikmakwili tlahtowani kulwakan, in tlahtokat senpowalonmatlaktli ipan exiwitl; aw sa niman ipan in in omotenew xiwitl onkan walmotlahtokatlali in itoka totepew ikchikwasen tlahtowani mo- || 17v -chiuh in kulwakan, itatsin in in weimak. intsalan temeh in diamante okachi tepitstik iwan okachi kwakwaltsin. aw motenewa, mitoa yeewatl ik kinsiwtlati in tlatlakatekolo ik konkan kipewaltike inik ika mokakaiwahke iik kikekeloke, in okitoke in okinkke in tlatlakatekolo inik kitoliniske in ketsalkoatl. aw mitoa kani a in tlilan tlapalan inik ompa mikito. istatl, ixkich in monekis aw in yewatl in itoka kowatsintewktli in mamalwasokan ichan in xochipixki no kinawatike in witsiliwitsin iwan in itskowatsin, kilwike inik kinawatike kowatsin: "momac motepotsko tikkawa tiktlalia in piltsintli in kowasakatsin, ok tikiskaltis tik-wapawas, aw in tlein tekitl ok tewatl tikitos tixiptla, ok motech tikawa in teowatewkyotl, aw in kenmanian in oixtlamatito in piltsintli tikkawilis in ipetl in ikpal. momostlaye in kiwalittaya kwawitsatsin, in momatia aso akame in onkan tlatlatia, ankaso onkan onok kowatl in axalpan. iwaxkawan. inik san ima kiwalwikaltike i mexika. aw ixpan mochiw testigos diego peres español iwan fransisko xwares eskrivano iwan diego astaxochitl antonio valeriano. in motlakatilitsino in totekwiyo dios, in iw kiponwa tonalamatl in roma mopie in motenewa la kwenta del martirologio romano, ye iw matlaktsonxiwitl ipan ontsonxiwitl ipan kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan nawpowali onkaxtoli ipan nawxiwitl in ikwak tsintik in tlachiwaltik yokoyalok in semanawatl; aw ye iw chikontsonxiwitl ipan chikonpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtoli omome xiwitl in ikwak inik apachiowak, in mochiw apachiwilistli nowian semanawak in ipantsinko yewatsin noé; aw ye iw makwiltsonxiwitl ipan kaxtolxiwitl inik motlakatili yewatsin in abrahán profeta; aw ye iw yetsonxiwitl ipan kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan matlakxiwitl inik walkiske in altepewake in israel tlaka in ompa ik tlakochiwtikatka egipto; aw ye iw ontsonxiwitl ipan matlak- || [11r] -pohualxihuitl ipan senpowali ommatlaktli ipan ome xiwitl in ikwak yewatsin tlakatl in david mamatilolok inik tlahtokatlalilok, in ipan yepowali ipan makwili semana in iw itlaachtopaittalistlatoltsin in daniel profeta; aw [en blanko] in nechipawalistli in motenewa la olimpíada ye iw chiwknapowalxiwitl ipan matlaktli onnawi xiwitl; aw ye iw sentsonxiwitl ipan kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan onpowali onmatlaktli ipan ome xiwitl in ikwak in motlali inik tlatlalili altepetl roma; iwan ye iw onpowali ipan ome xiwitl inik tlahtokati inik emperadorti in itoka oktaviano. mochiwa nawi taman epasot: sorriyahepasot, chinahepasot, istakepasot wan yon chichilepasot. tonantsin amo nochiapa tlakowasneki. mana ya toxoch. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. komo se kitoka mochiwa. viii kali xiwitl, 1357. in kwowit. ihkwak kaltempan aka mopachowa niman pewa tlawawalowa. in tixpan opanok; ik tikneltilia in totoka iwan tofirma in ipan wei altepetl siudad mexiko tenochtitlan ik senpowali in itlapowal metstli de mayo de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años i yewatsin akalde fransisko de la krus walmowikak in ipan tlaxilakali san polito teokaltitlan kimoneltililiko in itlatokatlanawatiltsin governador hwes posesion kimomakiliko in español lwis savalos iwan inamik margarita de la krus iwan inpilwan kimosemaxkatiliko kinmosentlatkitili in intlalkowal semikak mochipa onkan yeske aik kikawaske in kenmanian
