iwan amo ak kimixnamikis kintekipachos ipanpa ka melawakayotika in okimokowike. tehwa tixochitsin. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. mayehyewaltik kemeh rabiahxiwit, ihkoni mokehketsa talixko, ikwouyo alaxtik wan semi ayoj. iwan itskaktli in kinmakaya in ipan nenemia. ahko. iksitoke kiniuikaj. in ipan axkan viernes a 15 de oktubre de 1604 años, ikwak tlayawalolok tlamasewalok in nikan mexiko, wel iwi hwebes sankto mochiwani; inik tlayawalolok in ipanpa atl, in oapachiw mexikayotl. inin maiknin kwali tlakatl oyeya. tlahko kilo tomatl san ipan kinmamakaya in kwali tilmatli in kwali maxtlatl in kwali kaktli in kwali kweitl in kwali wipili wel kinpepetlawa. itsotsoma tsokwitlatik iwan xoxolochtika. wan itakka no kwaltia ika se kichiwa se tayilis ika refino. ain maka yewatl, in noxwiw, kan namechkawaskis. ye yewa domingo a vi de mayo de 1601 años, ikwak nes in ixiptlatsin tlasosiwapili sankta maría, yewatl inik momikilitsino motenewa tranleo tepetlakalko monoltitok; viernes in kimoteochiwilike, aw in ipan domingo omotenew ixkich tlakatl kimotennamikili in ikxitsin iwan imatsin, tlahtoke alkaldes regidores iwan in ixkichtin timasewaltin. aw niman okonmokakiti in señor hwes governador in ayak aka okse tlakatl otlanankili nima kimochiwilia remate in kali kimomakilia in melchior de parada ipampa okonpow in tomines inmatika okonkwike. nechpaktia. ¿quemanon kwali nikanas? owalaya muchti a balasos momiktiyahya asta nenmiya yestli' tlalpa de xente de noikimihke miak. 50. aw intla aka kanapa tiknamikis in okichtlawelilok, intla mitskamanalwis ma tikwetskili, san timokawas, ahmo tle ipan tikittas, ahtle ipan tikmatis in itlahtol, in ikamanal; ahtle ipan tikilnamikis, in teisolo, in tekatsaw, in tlahtlakoli. sano ihkwak achtopa walake padreme sankto domingo nikan amakemekan. iii tekpatl xiwitl, 1456. chikwei tekpatl in xiwpan, omikwaniah mexitin wixachtitlan in onkan san nauhxiuhtiah. taltikpaktsin de mi alma nimitstatawtia, titlasohtlaskiayah oyuh tlakatka in in nikan tolteka tsakwaltitlan inik tenanko mochiw, inik onkan kitlali altepetl in tlalmasewki in chichimekatl in tlatowani kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli. monamaka. iwan ikwak kwalok tonatiw. kwikatl anyolke aw in imaltepew || 79v in intlal in inchan okatka, ye onimechilwi, amo nikan mexiko tenochtitlan, aw ka san unkan okatka itlan in tepetl in motenewa popokatepetl iwan in okse i motenewa istaksiwatl, aw ka onkan in onoya in katka in itokayokan chalchiwmomosko, ikpak in onoya tepetl in omotenew chalchiwmomostli, in axkan ye itoka in tepetl amakeme. dios kimopalewilia kitemos okseki karga; kana okitlanelihke oksé kosa kargita kentregarotiw. walewak walyakatia in askapotsalkatl, walteyaka matlakowatl. tetepiton cihuatontli, okito in inspektor, xikwikakan namochan se xiwitl ipan in nankwalikaske. ye tamechaniliske ma okwachi wepawi. tlakamo onkwan chocataz. aw in akaleke, in ixkich akale, san yowaltika in qujz, iwan tel semilhutl in qujzque yuhkin mokekestiwi inik wi. namantsi atl mochiwas pero miyak kampa san hwan bautista itstok. wan tehwatsin maría madre trinidad. tlasohtlalok i tochtli xiwitl, 1298. inin tlatoli ma iximacho ma wel neyolotilo, || 4v ka senka kwali senka mawistik in ihiyotsin in itlatoltsin in totekwiyo dios, senka yektli senka kwali in tetlamachtin in tekwiltono. in o inyolo on pachiw niman ye ik quilhuia:"telpochtl é, ka otokon tlachielike; in tloke nawake, nel iyolik xi moketsa ma momamimik ma mokximimik; in tewantin alkaldes don migwel sanches pedro geronimo tamechnawatia in tewatl regitor pedro hakobo iwan migwel garsia algwasil mayor iwan hwan mentes algwasil iwan eskribano fransisko ximenes niman isiwka xonwia in ipan tlaxilakali san sebastian awatonko posesio xokomakati in sensilia ximenes española xokonmakakan masowalistli tlalkitskilistli. mochiwa kampa yeski itech ixtawat, kwouyoh wan tapachiwis. 104. yekene, ma teka timokwawitek, ma teka timotsotson in ipan in itewkyotsin, in itlahtokayotsin dios, in omitsmoma kili in okwelachitsinka, in osemilwitsintli okipiako in iatsin, in itepetsin. in ye wakaw tetewktin, in tlahtoke in kitsintitiake, in kipewaltitiake in tewkyotl, tlahtokayotl. in aokmo walachia, in aokwalamati in imikantla, in inteputstla; in aokmo kisakiwi, in aokmo moketsakiwi im mustla, wiptla; in konchikawakiwi immoyolotsin, immonakayotsin, immitsommomakilikiwi in sententli, in senkamatl, in chokistli, in ixayotl inik tommelakwawas, inik tommochikawas in tinokoski, in tinoketsal. in ontetl tonali in semana mokwitia martes. iwan ikwak kinpewke istaktlalokan tlaka. nima ye ik kitoka, unpa kitstiltiwi in kolwaka, ik omosokiakito, san kemach konanke konkimiloke. ikwitlapa tlehkok wan kiitskitok kwali. tlile tlapale amoxwa amoxe tlili tlapaliwtli teyakanki tlanelotewikani tlawikani tlayakankiitech nechikawalo itech nenetsahtsililo temachtiloitech netlakaneko itech nenetlakwawtlamachotlayolpachiwitia tepachiwitia tlapalewia tisiti tepahtia non itoka sesenta sentabos non nawi tomin ika diés sentabos non ohkiyon itoka sesenta sentabos. setsontli inin mochi ik okineskayoti ka omakok in posesion ayak akitsowi testigos in imixpan omochiw hernando garsia sastre bartolome lwis antonio garsia aw inik nelti okimotemakilike posesion hwes governador yoan alkaldes ordinarios ik kimoneltililia nikan kimotlalilia infirmatsin intokattsintika yoan in testigos fecho a veinte i seis dias del mes de setiembre de mil e kinientos i noventa i seis años geronimo lopes geronimo de soto alkalde sebastian de san fransisko alkalde bartolome lwis in itenkopatsinko hwes governador yoan alkaldes gwilermo krusate eskrivano. yoan omakok in testamento in paskwal hernandes okimomakili hwes governador ixpan bartolome lwis. yon axkaneli axkana kikwa pampa nochi x tochtli xiwitl, 1294. ahu in kitstikate, in kipowtikate; in kitlatlastikate in amoxtli, in tlili, in tlapali, in tlakwiloli kitkitikate. ka yewantin techkitikate, techotlatoltia, yewantin kitekpana in yuh wetsi se xiwitl in yuh otlatoka in tonalpowali aw in sesempowalapowali. yewantin in tenis in inkokol, in mamal, in teotlahtoli. xochiyowa in enero wan tsapot onkak ya kemeh in abril oso mayo. akatl xiwitl 1247 años ipanin in onkan nawxiwtike mexika in tekpayokan onkan ye nappa kilpilikos in inxiw mexika ikpak wets in tlekwawitl tekpayotepetl ok yewatl tlekawtlas in toskwekwextli ixpan se tlahtowani yowalotsin i toka ¿ipan katlewa kalmimiloli kwetlachtlan tias? inon ka owatsinko kisas. yotlamik in kiawitl. tlen 44 tlanawatihkayotl. in mexihko altepetl yewa in altepeyolotl, ompa mani sentika yolchikawalistli tlen itsonteko tlen sentika mexihko tlaltlatlanwatiliyan. monelchiwas ika tlali tlen namah mopialia iwan mostla noso wiptla moihkwenis yolchikawalistli tlen sentlanawatiloyan, moketsas ipan tlaltlanawatiloyan tlen ixtlawak mexihko, monepantis iwan moweyilis tlali ken kiixtlalis sentika tlahtokan. aw in okitetekak in itlachkwiw nima nik motetlakewin inik kontlachkwitlaske antla katka inpan tlaneloloya inpa kisaya ankali in onkan ontlachkwitlas kimakake in wewetke katkan. aw in axkan nikitowa in iewatl in iakapantli itoka maria nikmakak in nikan walikak tonatiw ikalakianpawik wel nikaxkatitiw niknemaktitiw san tlamelawa aw inik ontetl nikmaka in klara lopes wel nikaxkatitiw aw inikei tlakatl in itoka maria lopes nikmakatiw iniketetl sa tlatsautikak kaltsalanpawik inin oniktenew in onikinmakak wel nikimaxkatitiw ayak kinkwilis in kenmanian. otlanankili in testigo kitowa inik nikmati in itechkopa in imakal onkan onok in imakal gabriel yaotl newan in inamik maria in onka kinamaka atl iwan in kiketske imakal inik tlaltsitskitikate ye axka onpowali xiwitl ipan nawxiwitl in mochipa onkan anamaka. viii akatl xiwitl, 1227. iwan mochi in kwawyotepetl nikmaka in tenanko noprimo chichimekatewktli kwawisasin, ka neltiwa otiktlankin, kamo aki kinkwilis. yewa san tepitsin tlatlani; mach nesi yekita miak tlatlanis. xitechmaka sikiera ni xinachtli eliko chipawak, blanko, wan amarilo wan negro. ¿tleca wel wehkawa insiwatekitki? oksepa xitlatsotsona. xii tekpatl xiwitl, 48. aw inik kinnonotsako in witsiliwitl tlahtowani iwan in kwatlekowatl tlakochkalkatl iwan in itskowatsin tlakatewktli, san kintentlapikiko in chalka in tlahtoke, yewatl in wewe ketsalmasatsin chichimekatewktli in amakemekan tlahtowani, aw in yewatl in chalko tlahtowani itoka toteositewktli in tekwachkawtli, in ompa katka in akxotlan in axkan || 85v mitowa kalnawak intlan in sant migwel. aw nikan tenewtika in intokatsin in iskintin tlahtoke oidores iwan alkaldes de korte in govierno ipan moyetstikatka, in wel kimixkawitsinotikatka tlahtokayotl mexiko, in okik ayak katka se tlahtowani visurrei, in kimochiwilike hustisia inpan omotenewke tliltike, kinmotlatsontekililike inik piloloke inik yuhki inpan mochiw in iw mochi tlakatl okimatki okittak: napowali pesoh ika moyekana. in yoyolimeh motekiahkokixtia intsalan sasayoltin iwan kin sempanawia. nima ye walmotlalia tesosomoktsi, ye usiwatlani tenayoka ichpoch ixkosawkatsi, i siwatl itoka istakxochitsi. ni sakatimaltsin, in tochiwitsin,ompa ye witsexochimekatl. in kwowit solo para se kitatia. ye yiman tika on otetemowike karransistas ika metstli hulio. otechkwito wan otechilwike isihkan nankisaske denamochan. tla amo nankineki nankisaske, kitosneki kename nankintlasotla in sapatistas. ¡ihuan walaske tlamimihtiske tohuazcahuan! vi akatl xiwitl, 1303. yewa nochipa imanin walehko. aw inik nikan mexiko kalakiko, senka kimawistilike in yewatl umpa pili in inpilo walmochiwtia habón tlaka. achtokopa de inin okimasiki sapatistas ipan lano salasar. ompoyon okinmewaloke onkanon aweli kisaske. nikan ipan in i ye tlatokayotia i ye tlalikwilowa i ye tlatsonilpia. in sanfransiskanohwaxin, mohmorado sentapal wan xoxoktik in seko. imahtlakan se litro mokwitia desilitro. kikakatsowah wan tlakuaj. ik ye kinotsa amatlamatke, iskinawatia kin kiyolotiliske in imomos mexika, inik tlayolotilike ika kwitlatl tlasoli tewtli malakatl ichkatl. itlachiaelis in itskwawtsin ahsia wehkawtika ikolwan itahwan isenkalwan omihkeh yuhkin in itlaweyi kachiwalis in tenochtitlan axkan in ihkwak tema e owets oksetik kihtaya tlein kiyawaloaya iyolo ipan ahsik tlein miekpan okommatkeh in iyaowan in wexotsinkah in chalkah in xochimilkah iwan oksekintin in iyolpatsmikilis yuhkin se wei tetl in kimamahtiwits san tlalnamikia pakilistika timitsnomakitskilia ipampa inin yektlachiwali otimochiwili. aw kinnankili kimilwi in tekwachkawtli in toteositewktli "ca omomikili, ka ye monamikti in momikili". nima ye ik walewak, ye nosepa kiwaltokak sitlaltepek. in oyuh kiwalnawatike nima ye mochokilia i mexika, kitoa “ototlauelliltic! ken ticchiuazque?”. . niman isiwka yowaltika ipan kalaki in iteyakankaw in ik kommottitia konyolpachiwitia in ipampa akan okipohpulo in totekuyo. kilwia ipampa inon totechmoneki okwalkan talmazalozqueh. aw in opahinatsin ye achtopa kichiwke ok otlipan miyawatototsin. ihkwak kin iwti otahsihkeh ipan seminario de kultura nawatl ye ompa oyeya sente tokniwtsin in otlakat ipan estado de gwerrero senka san achitonka oahsikeh oksehkan nawatlaltlakah welis makwili estadopa wel no iwki in distrito federal owalwiloak onyeyah gwerrero hidalgo pwebla verakrus tlakah menanakatl aw no yewatl in inyaowewew atambores chikwasentetl in onkan kiwikake kitsotsontiake, amo senka kakistia amo wel nawatia aw yehika ipampa tlilpali luto ik kikimiliwtia san ipan in kitsotsontiake; iwan ome onkan kipitstiake bípano ahnoso blaotas tliltike kakatsakti, amono senka kikakistilitiake amo wel kinawatiltitiake san kitlaokolpitstiake. konitoko in axkan ixpantsinko in hustisia otiwalake tiknamakako in totlal iwan tokal sentetl xochimilkopa itstikak iwan in chinanyo nawtetl tonatiw ikisayanpa itstinemi aw yewantsitsin ye techmokowililia in sankto augustin teopixke frai christoval de la fwente obrero mayor etk. nika kipixtó tein tsikitsin amo weyi moskaltia, mahyá kemeh se kapolin, amo mochiwa weyi. aw in alkaldes de korte axkan viernes ik 6 mani metstli mayo de 1611 años, ihkwak momikili in itstapalapan siwapili doña bálbara, ichpochtsin katka in tlahtowani don alonso axayaka ixwetskatokatsin. kenin mochiwa kitemiltehki noponi se kwartiya wahtli wan ya aw ya yewatl ik tlatsonilpike ik tlalikwiloke ik tlamachiyotike ik tlatokayotike; in onkan sakapechtli kitekake, ik onkan kitokayotike sakapechpan. inik patlawak senpowalmatl ipan chikwematl [f.2r] aw inik weyak honpowalmatl ipan chikwematl in itlal katka in axka in itlatki in akamapichtli in itatsin katka in axka mexiko tlatowani in don lwis de santa maria iwan in okse tlakatl in itoka don martin momawti ka omextin itechpa kiske in akamapichtsin ka intatsin katka. aw pregones ik mochiw, aw tlayayawalolok prossesión mochiw, ompa walpeowak in iglesia mayor inik onkan walwilowak sankta vera krus, ipampa ka ompa mopia in ixiptlatsin. in amo se kitoka, mochiwa saj, ixwa kampa xiini in iteyo. awaxmoli ika arros namehwan ke kwali nankikrusarohkeh aw san ye no yewatl ipan in in domingo omotenew, no ikwak momikili in siwapili doña maría serón, in ichpochtsin don martín serón tlahtowani xochmilko, mexiko in momikiliko; inin siwapili yewatl in chalko tlalmanalko siwamontli katka, in inantsin don alonso de la serda piltsintli, inin itlasopiltsin yewatl kikawtiw in don hernando de la serda telpochtli tlahtokapili tlalmanalko katka. nikan ipan in in onkan walmikwanike mexika in chapoltepek; yewatl kinwalyakana in intlahtokaw wewe witsiliwitl, onkan senpowalxiwtike in chapultepek. kampa wehkawak ihkak tomawak mochiwa, wehka mayayahtok. ix akatl xiwitl, 1215. mantlasohtla ihkwak owala mexihko awel oamapoaya nian otlahkwilowaya. yewa okikon inin mola ka mahtlaktli pezoh. para se kikwas mah se kitehteki. aw in ikwak oyuh kimokakilti hwes gobernador yoan alkaldes ordinarios niman imatitech okonanke in paskwal hernandes español in motlakowiani nowian okinenenemiltike in ixkich ika kale yoan nawkampa otlatepacho ika tetl yoan nonawkampa omoman estagas. kinyakanayah nawixtin pipil tin in kalpoltin. intokatsin katka teskakoatl, kwawkoatl, apanekatl, aw satlatsakkan chimalma. naxkan itoka okiyon ompara axan ume tomi yewan axan i toka beintisinko wan okatka non sempwali wan makwili sentabo. ka in yewatl metstli ixpan momanka in tonatiw, wel poliwka in itlanex tonatiw, wel kitsakwilika in itlanextilis iwan techtlayowilika; wel iwkan mochiwtiwetska in ihkwak chikwei tsilini ye yowa, inik wel tlayowatiwetska niman moch nestiwetska in sisitlaltin ilwikatitech, aw tel amo wekaw inik wel ontlayowaka, san wel achitonka, niman okseppa walnes in tonatiw. nawipwali wan mahtlaktli ikal kikwania wexotsinkatli, in tlaxkaltekatli, in chololtekatli, in kwetlaxtekatla, owaya owaya. aw in tlalkawaltitimani i ye mochi in omotamachiw makwilmatl ipan se yolotliinik patlawak aw inik weyak matlakmatlak se inik omotamachiw. in ikwak onawatiloke senka tlaokuxke; nima yake kitemoto i masatl, nowian nenke in akweskomak, in chapoltepek, ikawakatiwi in tlapewia, inik inpan kisato i xaltokan axiwaka i mexika tepa yoan iweltiwatsi teskatlamiawaltsi, in inpa kisato in akatitla in unka motlatiaya. in ipan matlaktli omei tochtli xiwitl pepeno yaokiskayakanki in itoka lasaro kardenas yuhkin wei itlahtokaw méxiko. in ma moyolo motoma, in ma ya moyolo akotinemi. i tewantin in titlaiwalwan hustisia iskichin in tixpan okito mokokowa inik tikneltilia nikan tiktlalia tofirma. pasó antemi kristoval de san matheo eskribano audiensia. axkan viernes in ik 24 mani metstli noviembre de 1612 años, ihkwak okis in insentensia revista in audiensia || 198 real mexiko, inik tlahtoke oidores iwan virrei okinmomakilike in intlal mexika tenochka, in ipampa moteilwike kochtokan i españoles okikwika in ikse yewatl in alonso d'ávilla wewenton, in ikome yewatl in molison; kinkawaltike aw in makoto possesión oksenka yewatl in isabel en blanko iwan inamik hwan de españa chaneke sankta maría kwepopan. aw in iw owalmopowtia in is iski tetechpupowi ka san iw tekpantika in tlali ka san ik ninomakixtia ipaltsinko in dios. ihkwak ipan in in tlakat in kakamatsin telpochtli tlamaoko. no ikwak ipan metstli in ik xxix hunius ipan ilwitsin sant pedro iwan sant pablo apóstoles in omomikili tlahtowani don lurenko xwáres de mendosa konde de koruña visurrei; kwali inik tlapachoko mexiko, ompa motokak in inakayo sant fransisko, in tlahtokatiko onxiwitl ipan chikunawtetl mestli. ihkwak ompa mila mochi ye omahsik seki tlamantli mokwa tlein ompa momaka. mokwa in awaxxoxowki, elotl, nanakatl, ixkichkaw in seki totomeh. achi muchipa tlepitsalo iwan ahmo mokawa sewis in tletl mochi in semilwitl. ihkwak ye tlakwalos monexpachoa in awaxxoxowki, ahnoso in ye wakki, in elotl, in kamohtli. satepan ye pewa mochi tlatskwekwepoka, ye sentlamahmani in ahwiyak. muchi tlakah semihkak kiwika tlaxkali iwan kemmanian limón, istatl in kitlaliliskeh in wiksi tleko. 1 aw in ipan axkan miérkoles a 29 de noviembre de 1589 años, ikwak possesión makoke in teopixke sant fransisko in onkan sant hwan itenkopatsinko in markés iwan sankta maría; ikwak gwardián moyetstikatka frai bonaventura aw in provinsial itoka frai domingo de arísaga. mochiwa saj. chiknawi aw inin ahmo san moyokoya in wi, nimitsnawatiya in tewatl algwasil mayor pablo de san hwan iwan migwel de san fransisko iwan eskribano bernardino xwares ika in hustisia nitlanawatiya xikimomakakan masewalistli tlalkitskilistli iwan ximonkalakikan in ichan inin tlalpan in nomotlakowike iwan xokomamanakan estakas in nokan tlatlami kwaxochtli niman ayak amechontlakawaltis yuh otitlanawatike in ika hustisia. ni tlachihtok tlake tlaskamati para ta kimilwike aw inik okonan posession nowian tetika otlamomotlak in kalitik in itwalko iwan san pakka yokoxka in omakok tlalkitskilistli ayak onkan otlachalani in ma okichiwili kontradision aw in onkan tlatlami tlapowali tlatamachiwali sense estakas onkan omotetsotson nawkan in omaaki sesen tlanakastla aw in xomolko atle motetsotson ipanpa ka ikaltech in omokalkowi. inik 4 tlamantli nikitowa in mikkakali konkawia in martha inik ome itoka magdalena isabel innemak mochiwtika. aw iwan ye chikwasenpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolonse xiwitl in ipan vii kali xiwitl, 1473 años, in opoliw in opewaloke tlatilolka, yewatl kinpew in axayakatsin. aw in yowaltika inik tlanamakowa inik sepa tlapoyawa; inik oppa netetekispan; inik expa tlatlapitsalispan; aw inik makwilpa tlatwinawak. xinechneskayotili kani mokawak, noxwiwa, in omoxkwinke, in nawitika iniman ik on weweti, chimali xochitl tomak onmania. nima ye matlatsinkatl, walteyaka tekpa. tlahkoxonakatl, in ahmo wel wehyi in xochitl, in kwikatl nimitsnotlasohkamatis xonmoilnamikili. in ipan axkan ilwitsin sanktiago apóstol ipan xxv de hulio de 1594 años, nikan motenewa in ipan axkan xiwitl tikate iwan wewexiwitl xi tochtli, ikwak senka wei netolinilistli topan mochiw; senka tlatonalwak, wel oihiyowi in tonakayotl, wawak tetein iwan seki sewechililok, ayaxkan in kiyawiko amo senka totokak, san tlasokiyaw tlakwilolkiyaw. tlen 114 tlanawatihkayotl. in tekichiwalistli tlen tlahtokan tlatelwili san welis mopewaltis ipan kawitl tlen keman altepeko tekitini kichiwas tlanawatili iwan se xiwitl teipan. in tlatakwiltilmeh tlen itechpowi mochiwas amo panos se xiwitl tlen keman pewas tlahtolchiwalistli. in tlaixkawilistli tlahtlakolmeh tlen mochihtos ipan kawitl tlen keman tlanawatiaya tekitini tlen altepeko, moneki motlahtlanilis ken kawitl tlami ken ixnesi ipan tlanawatil tlatakwiltili tlen amo keman elis achi kentsi tlen eyi xiwitl. in kawitl tlen itlamilis tlahtoli moixkotonas tla altepeko tekitini kichiwa seyok tlanawatili tlen moihtowa ipan 111 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlahtol tlanawatili kinextis sekin tlamantli tlen ika moixtlamiltis tlahtlakoli tlen tekichiwalistli moneki kiitas katlia ihki tlamantli iwan tlechketl oneli tlachiwali iwan tlailkawali tlen moihtowa ipan iii tlatlapantli tlen 109 tlanawatihkayotl. keman inon tlachiwalmeh iwan tlailkawalmeh melawak malwilmeh in kawitl tlen keman tlamis tlahtoli amo elis san kentsi eyi xiwitl. tokayotl tlen makwili tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh sentlanawatiloyan iwan iyolo weyi altepetl aw in tlayawalo andas sankta maría, tlatkitl krusifixo, palio ik kimokaltilitiake in totekwiyo dios, itloktsinko mantiake ichtekke krusifixos; niman iwan kion vandera tepiton, niman iwan krus manka, niman iwan vandera yei wewei tliltik tlayakanke. san nikkaki itopyo ipetlakalo, ¡ah in tepilwan! tiyoke timikini. timasewaltin, nawi, nawi, in timochi tonyaske, timochi tonmikiske in tlaltikpak. namehwan achiwanime, tlahko kilo chilakachtextli ok yewatl kitekatia in akali heswawa[ka]tsin katka aik ma omokaw mochipa kipia in ipampa nitestiga amo nikimiximati san nikmelawa in notlatol inik amo nistlakatis in ipaltsinko dios. nikan nomatika nikketsa krus. marta tewcho testiga. fransisko hoares alkalde. paso ante mi kristoval de san mateo eskribano. tahtli xochimilpan tekiti kichiwa. nochipa ximopahpakiti. ompa omodali odasosonki iwan oteponawaso iwan okwikak iwan okito axkam nikam niktoka se mexkali ik nikmachitia inin dali yaxka in xochiteuctü kwawdi ose{l)od. niman damelawa inawak isindan nopaltepekdi. niman damelawa xolosintepetli. niman okinamikito se wei texkali itoka atüzahuicxochitü. niman okinamikito quauhtütepectü. oksepa damelawa masatepet{l}. niman okinamikitoteponowastepedi. niman damelawa atü huicoüü chalchiwitli quezaü atüzinpitli. niman ipan se wei tetep/a/nd kimelawa ipan okotepedi. niman ye okinosa kakaloapan ye okinamikito. san niman no ikwak in ipan semilwitl iwan xiwitl in omotenew tlakpak i yewatsin senka mawistililoni in señor don antonio valeriano governador hwes in kimopiyalia hustisia in itechkopatsinko su magestad okisako ixpantsinko in balthasar sanches iwan in iteikkaw gaspar sanches iwan ini insiwawan marina tiakapan hwana tlako chaneke sank hwan tekixkipan nixpan newatl eskrivano. in kilit sesek. in ikwak omik nima walmotlali itoka chimalpopoka, i motlali ipan iii kali xiwitl. aw no ikwak in ipan xiwitl omotenew ikwak onkan kuyowakan wikaloke, onkan ilpitoya teposotoya in mexiko tlahtoke in kwawtimoktsin iwan motelchiwtsin iwan tlakotsin siwakowatl iwan okistsin iwan wanitsin; onkan kinxotlatike ipampa in kostik teokwitlatl in kipoloke españolesme in onkan tolteka akaloko inik choloke inik kintokake tenochtitlan yowaltika, inik yaka tlaxkalan ompa mopatito. in mexihkah opoliwke sanno ihkwak mexikatlahtokayotl okimmikti tlatelolko miekintin in momachtianime. amo monamaka, akin kineki yowi kikwiti kampa onkak. tlanonotsali teki sa inihwanti tekitih tlatsoyonilkilitl domingo de ramos a 4 de abril de 1599 años, ikwak mochali in letablo sant augustín inik moman senka mawistik magen, in iw nestimani axkan, moch tlakamani in sanktosme iwan in korona pilar. vii tochtli xiwitl, 82 años. hwebes a 5 de marso, ikwak netlatilok in tlekikiskalko in onkan mochiwa tlekikistli; altepewake kowatekitke in motlatike achi keskintin, wel temamawti in iw ixolokak innakayo; onkan kinwalwikake ospital real, seki patike iwan sekintin momikilike. in newatl migwel de los angeles nichane sant hwan tekikaltitlan mixpantsinko ninopechteka ik tewatsin senka timawistililoni titlatoani in tiemopielia altepetl i nikan siudad méxiko in itenkopatsinko rei su magestad niknankilia in itlatol in fransiso martin iwan ipilwan in ipanpa mili tlali in onpa mani sankt pablo tlalistakapan nikixtoka in kimotlaltia. iwan in mochintin kastilteka in inchachan in inkahkaltikpak iwan in inkakaltenpa amo san kexkichi in kitlatike kwawitl in nikan mexiko, iwan nokseppa nowian tlatsitsilikak in iskikan teopan aw inik nowian mexiko; iw mochiwin ka ik tlanawatilok ik pena motlali in ihtik siudad mexiko tenochtitlan. —en oras wahxowakiw. . in ixpan konmana yewatl in totultsontekomatl, mulkaxik yehtiw. niman yewatl in itech powi iyakateoktli ixpan konmana in tlakwali. tlachiktetl wan yeka mowikak i nekwatl. inik ontlamantli nikitowa in yewatl in nonamik in itoka maria salomen nikmakatiw xx pesos itech monekis amo itlakawis i notlatol iwan nikitowa in yewatl i notes in itoka hwan martin onkisas v pesos makos itech monekis yuh nikitotiw iwan kiwikas in mesa in hwan martin. ¿tlatohuatzin i nakapipiyol mach okkiwalya xochiaoktli i ya ye nikan nichoka? kantsilin ihkwak amo nikan katka mexiko in kommissario, kwawtemalan mowikak; iwan in provinsial amono nikan mexiko moyetstikat- || 164 -ca, nowiyan altepetlipan mowikak visita kimochiwilito. ika nehon iwan nikitowa mani tlali iswatepek inik wiak xxx aw inik patlawak xx ini nikmaka [noxhuiuh] in itoka diego helokoyol sa niktlao[kolilia] ...tzque in mochintin teixwi[wan]... ech nikisa in aso it... iwewet[ke] ...acatl in i. se mamahpikton yepasohtli martes a xxiiii de disiembre de 1596 años, ikwak theniente mochiw in tlakatl don hwan martín, kipalewi in don antonio valeriano governador, ipampa owewetix ochikawak iwan aokmo tlakaki, ipampa kipalewi in ika governasió mexiko; itenkopatsinko mochiw in visurrei. miak totolime, in temachtiloyan nika. nikan ipan in in akaltika in owalake in wewetke chichimeka in motenewa teochichimeka, in weyapan ilwikaapan owalake, in owalanelotiake, ompa kisako achto onkan motlaliko in itokayokan teokolwakan astlan; aw san walpepetlawtiake inik atlan walake, inik asiko onkan astlan ye omotenew, in ipan atenkiske se tochitli xiwitl. xochiyowa itamiyan in xiwit, xochiyojtiuj. kwaltia ihkón kitokaitiah por in talihtik mochiwa. aw no ipan in in xiwitl i motlaliko in kapoloak tlaka. silikipan chailtsin, aitsin, mawia. aw masiwi in iw kiwalmotlalili in itlanawatiltsin sankto padre in iw ikatsinko muchiwas señor don pedro de otálora, yese ka ye kin ipan domíniga in passión tlamiko in ineteochiwalitsin inik missa kimochiwiliko umpa kwitlaxkowapan de la kompañía de hesús; in aik yuhki oittok nikan mexiko se pressidente ahnoso se oidor klérigo omuchiw in iw yewatsin omuchiwtsinoko axkan omotenewtsino señor don pedro de otálora, iwan amo ik okimokawili in itekitsin inik san ya pressidente omochiwtsinoko audiensia real mexiko, ka yuh kimonekiltitsinowa in toweitlahtokatsin rei moyetstika españa. pero yupalan komo abono yetitlaxilia in totlal para oksé xiwitl tihkakakia' ohpan barbecho. aw inik yewatl noseppa watlmokwep sann inka in imasewalwan in onkan onoke isabela, inik onkan kimitstasiko seki tlakatl omomikilike iwan senka miyekintin in mokokowa iwan senka nentlamattoke moyoltekipachowa in ipampa in ixkich intech moneki inik tlaihiyowia in ittakatl. in ipan semilwitl omotenew sabado a katorse de marso de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años yewatl in tekpoyotl diego astaxochitl otsatsin okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal mariana kitenyotia in ipatiw mochiwas makwilpowali pesos aw niman otlanankili se tlakatl español itoka lwis savalos okito nikmakas in makwilpowali pesos testigo tekpoyotl. xiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1284. ¡anca ye mochan, in isel teotl! mostla amo yeskeh kalmi loltin ka onka tekisewilis tli. axkan momawisotsin notextsin okimolwili in notahtsinxinechmotlapohpolwili san inin nikihtos intla motelpochtsin ye monekiltia mosenkawtsinos xikmosenkawili intlakammo kana motlahtlanewihtsinos iwan inon ammo kwali yes xikmotlamaxiltilili iwan no tlen timochiwilis satepan nenamiktilistli xikmoxelwi vese tewatsin timotlasemihtilwis se axolotl ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. tiwalas —akmo timowelilili. aw niman kinwaliwa in ittawan in maxtlaton, kimilwiko in mexika "moztla anpopoliwiske!". . in omotonalpowike ostomeka yewantin kimati in ka tlewatl ipan om pewaske. miérkoles a 4 de febrero, ikwak mokwik nextli; aw in iwiptlayok viernes ipan vi de febrero, in ompa sankta maría la redonda ompa pew inik tlayawalolotiw viernestika, yewatsin kimopewaltili in frai lope iskierdo iwan frai diego redón gwardián. amo xochiyowa. ome litro atl in ewat kwaltia para pahti, para bilis, wan imaxiuyo no semi pahti. ¿can nikkwis in yektli xochitli, in yektli yan kwikatl? nikneki, nikelewia in ikniwyotl, in tekpilotl, achi kowayotl. niwalchoka, niwalinotlamati nikwikanitl tlaka ahnikwikas in noxochio, ma ik ninapatias kan ximowayan. a ikwiliw moyolo tlapapal xochitika tokon ya ikwilowa in mokwik in motlatol nopiltsin, ti nesawalkoyotsin. tonili yahki sampa tlachiyato san yayá niman ye onkan ye walachia in kiwalittaya nokwel sentlamantli, senka ka miekpa in nikan kiwalittaya in axalpan in tsakwaltsintitlan: in ihkwak i walkisa in tonatiw in ayawitl yuhki poktsintli moketstika, oksenka yowatsinko, yuhki tlemixayawitl in iwki in ayawkosamalotl in onkan moketsaya i kwawnepantla in kwawihtik. aw niman otlanawati okito xiwalwiyan nopilwanne tla xitlakakikan tlein nepa sasasi xikisakan xikonanati xikonanati xikkwalwikakan nikam. aw niman oyake okitake se konesintli omkam westok. niman okiwikake ixpam. aw in okitak niman otlanawati kitowa xikmiktikam inin konetli tlen kineki nikam sasitok nepa xiktlalwitekikam ika ikxi ye xuwitekikam in yoloxochikwawitli. aw in ikwak ayamo itech komkwatlawiteki inin isonteko niman otopomtikis inon yoloxochitli ik omkan okimokimanke omkam yaotli mochiwas aw yewantin ompa omotlatiaya ikpak se tepetli itoka okotepetl ompa omotlalika. ipan nawtsontli ommakwilpoali xiwitl omik wei kaxtiltlahtoani in itoka inik ome don karlos. tlakatsin in, tetsakutika weweintin kaxtiltlahtoke katka in akike itech powiah isenyelis teutontlali noso austria, aw yewatl aik okintlakachiw ipipilwan. in amo xochiyowa. aw in kali ka san toneixkawil i nonamik katka ka totlaihilyowilis ayak onka tlachalanis in towanyolke yuh nikinnonawatilia in tlaxilakaleke inin testigos konitwa ixkich inik omonanahoatitia in ilamatsin. axkan miérkoles in ik 9 mani metstli abril de 1614 años, ihkwak in onkan teopan san fransisko mokwaatekike senpowali tlakatl in haponti; yewatsin in padre kommissario kinmokwaatekili, aw in teoyotika tettawan inpadrinos mochiwtsinoke sanno yewantsitsin in wewetke tottatsitsinwan frailes fransiskos. vii tekpatl xiwitl, 1252. pasilachilkwitlaxkoli xkilwi ma mayaw oksehpa ma mikonali len miknesesitaros de nikan. ika nehon yahke inin senka tlawelilok katka; inik ya askapotsalko san temikkatlapaloto, inik ompa motlahtokatlali ixiptla mochiw in ittatsin omomikili; ompa onewak in koyowakan, ik ye tlahtokati in askapotsalko. xochiyowa enero. nomak on mani amotlen ika. nikan tihualahqueh. iwan ihkwak senka sewaya in temachtikatsintli leonportila mochipa otechmoyolalili mochipa okimoteihtitili yewatsin senka totlok metstaya ahmo yuhkin in tekpankaltlakah in ahmo kemmanyuhkin okichiwkeh kilwike “ca tewan in timexica”. aw in inpan mochiw pipiltin don migwel garsía ixtlawel, diego sánches, alkalde andrés garsía || 21 kowakwech, regidortin nikulás hernándes, mathías hernándes. aw in yewatl fransisko martin iwan in ipilwan kiwalwikake informasion san falso testigos amo wel kimati ka ok sekni in katki in intlatok in inmil in iw katki tlapowali aw in tla noso kitlanis in hustisia ma moteilwi. inik niman senka tepan kawan tepan aktimotekak inin in inik mochi nowian españa; aw in yewantsitsin tlahtoke reyes senka kimomawistililike in don christóval kolón, iwan ik niman kimomakilike yankwik tokaitl inik itoka almirante de las indias, iwan itlawis yarmas inik pili kimochiwilike, inik kitlali in kiyawalotok tlatoli in letras in kitotok: "ypampa in kastila iwan ipampa in león, in yankwik semanawatl okittak in kolón". xtahtanitih ne natmalin aw in ixkichkaw inik ompa katka in teotenanko in kwixkok temimilolko iwipan sakanko amo wel momati in kexkichkaw keskipowalxiwitl, ka senka wekawake. aw. in tewatl in tinotitlan, ka wel motech netlakanekkoni. aw wel nimitstlakwawnawatia, san wel isel iixpan obispo tiksouhas in motilmah, iwan tiknextilis in tlein tikwikka. in kilit kwaltsin mososowa itech in tatok. nima ye ik onolini asito cholola, yaotika namikok in timal; ik unkan axiwak unkan kwililok in imawisyo. tla nikpiaskia tominnikinkowaskiah in kwahkwaltin amoxtin. mostla. ayotochnakatl ontlasohtlakeh aw niman kimilwi "ca itoka mixkowatl". ﻿in temachtiani moka pakiskia tla nochipa motekí tik chiwaskia. aw kin iyokan teupan yuhki rrehas tepostli omotlali, in ayemo kan oksekni teupan yuhki motlalia. ya kitemohtiowih inikuñado yei axoxtlantli aw san niman ikwak ipan semilwitl mierkoles otiwalake in newatl pedro heronimo pedro de san fransisko regidores ihoan diego leonardo eskribano itenkopatsinko in señor gobernador yoan hweses inik otiwalake nikan ipan tlaxilakali san hwan yopiko. mochiwa kampa se kitoka, tein korriente mochiwa maski amo semi se kitachipawia. michmoli aw san pakka yokuxka in omochiw ayak ma aka onkan otlachalani inin ka mochi ye omoneskayoti ka omakok in posesion aw in newatl neskrivano onechmonaoatilike inik nikneltilis posesion. aw in ye teotlak niman ik tsatsiwak in tiankisko sant lásaro, mito aokak ompa tiamikis in sant ipólito, in mostla ixkich tlakatl nikan tiamikis; aw san keskilwitl in ontiamikok, niman okseppa ompa momanato in tiankistli in onkan mokaltitsinowa padreme deskalsos. nochayawtaya semilwitl iwan sen yowali. tlenon nanmochiwilihke de moli. aw ka wel tikmomachiltia in titlatowani ka motekopatsinko inik tiake iwan yewatsitsin in okimonwikili totekuyo don martin hernándes pedro heronimo iwan moksekintin motechiukawan inik tiktepotstokato. semi ahwiak in iswat por eso ahwiaya in tamal. in kalxexeloltin koyahkeh iwan wehkapa cateh. . "ca ye kwali ma iyolik xokon anakan in amokxi; maka tle xik wal mattiwia in amokalihtik in amotlekwilan; ipan se akatl xiwitl (1571), mochiw in itawkayo akaltika inekalilis lepanto, in onkan yaotekiwa don hwan de austria otomanekah okimpew. wan ihkí nopa mochihki inik niman nikan ye walnenemi, iwiantsin ye yatiwitse, ok ye motlatlalitiwitse nowian in otlipan. porke nosisna nechkawako nikani. mah matapani, ¿queniuh kiskaltis? ken ika nikmatis melawak in tlen timihtilwianeli nikihtoa ammo nitlastlakatlalia axkan oniwala mixpantsinko oninoketsako niknekiskiani nikkakis tlen tikmoyoeolia aw ne in ipampa okichti in inpilwan tliltike omotenew in itech kinchiwaskia señorati, kil in ipampa amo kinkawasnekia nemiske inik amo kinwapawasnekia, kil ye ik kimimakasia ipampa intla weweyaskia ma kenmanian itlan inpan kichiwti in intawan tliltike, intla miekiyaskia moriskostin, ma kilnamikti in siwatika in innanwan ka españolas, in intech kisa mawistik xinachtli mawistik tlakamekayotl in amo yuh mawistik kipia itechpa intawan tliltike, inik niman aso kinyaotlahtalwiskia ahso ik niman kinmiktiskia in intawan tliltike; kil yewatl in ik kimimakasia, || 188 yniqu iw kihtowaya kichiwaskia tliltike intla welitini intla wel mochiwani. aw in askaxotsin ka kimosiwawti in tlahtowani akxokwawtli, aw onkan otlakatke okinchiwke omentin inpilwan: in ikse itoka koxkoxtli, in ikome itoka xiwitltemok, aw ka imomextin otlahtokatke in satepan in kolwakan. pewa 1 (taol) wan tami 26 (tsojpijkilit) : pedro kortés okotlán. tsopek, pero tein ayamo yek oksik, xokok, semi xokok. para ma itstos noponi". aw kin ikwak in yowalnepantla kitlatiaya umpa in kitokayotiaya “teoithualco” kwawxikalko, tsompantitlan.. aw in fiskal amo tlapalowaya in kiwitekis, inik san iyoma yewatl ya mowiteki tottatsin; ik senka ikawakake in mexika in kittake, san ik mikawike kihtoke "tleyca in iw kimochiwilia in tottatsin?", aw san kitlakawaltike in tottatsin frai herónimo de sárate inik amo yuhki kichiwas, sa kaantiake in kalihtik kikalakike. in se kichipawa. tihtlaštlawiyaya' in yunta sesenta sentabos. ta tikinawatis itlanahnamik: intlatimitasneki in nealtiloyan, ikampa ixkwaxilankali ka kipia tlatotonastli iwan se weyi apastli ipan se kwali maltis. yotechkawlihke in semiya yomochiw ipan oksé xiwitl ipan oksé xiwitl ikwakon yomochiw in semiya osenwek pero akmo tanto akmo tanto. wi, totekwiwane, ma itla ankichiwaltihtin in amo kwitlapiltsin, in amatlapaltsin, kenok kilkawas, kenok kipolos. ma ok iwian, yokuxka, xikmottilikan, totekwiiwane in tlein moneki. ka amo wel toiolopachiwi aw ka sa ayamo tontokaki ayamo titonelchiwa, tamechtoiolitlakalwiske. ka nikan onoke in awake in tepewake in tetekuti in tlatoke in kitki in kimama in semanawatl masanok ye inio in otikkawke in otikpoloke in otonkwililoke, in otokavaltiloke in petlatl in ikpali ka sa onkan tonotiaske, ka tiktsakkutiaske, ma topan xiknochihilika in tlein ankimonekiltiske. nikan momikili in don pedro tlakawepantsin mexiko. kani walkisa nehin kokolis, nemiskia waxchilmoli ika ayotochnakatl aw in teopixke onkan kinmochieliko in san hwan; aw in tlahtoke mexiko alkaldes, regidores iwan in ixkichtin masewaltin tokichtin siwa kinnamikito ohtlika, iwan sekintin wel ompa sankta klara kinmanilito. aw inik teoyotika tlahtowani inik arsobispo omoyetstikatka mexiko yexiwitl ipan nawtetl metstli ipan senpowalonnawi tonatiw in axkan ipan ik omomikiliko; aw inik tlaltikpakayotika omotlahtokatili inik visurrei omochiwtsinotikatka san chikwetetl metstli ipan nawilwitl, in axkan ipan ik semilwitl miérkoles omomikiliko. ipa se taman saj. istatl, ixkich in monekis in chapoltepek in iw poliwke, ikwikatitech kilnamiki in intlaiyowilis; konewa konitoa choka tlaukoya in iw kilnamike “yn tlali tentlapa, topa machistik yewaya, topa matsaya in ilwikatl, topan temok ipalnemowani. ipam inin xiwitli de mili i kinientos i treita i seis años in iquac_odaltemachihualoz omokwaxochtlali iwan osakwili in kampa dan tika in isitio nikan iskixochikwawtitlan ikisayan eekatli akomtekatli chikomtakatli tlasotialpam kimapilwia asonpam tlakpak tepapadachko iwan iwan ikalakiam eekatli kimapilwia itlakotiam chiapa iwan kimapilwia temalakayokam iwan ik dako kimapilwia iskixochikwawtidan ik omkam monamiki in tlali ipam nomeros xiwitli tekpatli. aw inin omotenewtsino teoyotika tlahtowani don hwan péres de la serna arsobispo, inik nikan mexiko omaxitiko, niman okinmopatilitasiko in doktor don hwan de salamanka provisor españoles okatka, aw yewatl ik kipatlatasiko in itoka lisensiado kastro in inprovisor españoles omochiw. no monamaka. nama yon aisikih amo xikintlamakas". in kilit no se kikwa wan yehwa ya in ikamohyo. oka yuhki in, inik kinpewke in ipan in omotenew xiwitl in achtopa onkan chanonoya chalchiwmomosko tamoanchan. pero nama pero nama tohwanti tiitstose nikani. iki in notatsitsiwan onechmomachtilike. aw inik ompa senka wekawake inik ompa katka in astlan in totolimpaneka ontsonxiwitl ipan kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan matlakxiwitl, in iw nestika in inxiwtlapowal wewetke in axkan intoka amakemeke chalka. se mamahpikton yepasohtli mochiwa saj, iteyo tsikwini kampa ya ixwatik. aw ipan pew in sant fransisko teokali, aw opanwets in mowikak, aw sa ixkich in kapila in teokalkalkwitlapili in ayamo tlami in kimokawilitia. aw in noxwiw hoana maximiliana in itech powis tlekopatl ini akokalo no intech powis in omotenewke niwktsitsiwan aw in tla isiwka momikiliske in niwktsitsiwan monamakas in kali itech powis in ianiman in intatsin katka noxwiw bonifasio maximiliano ipampa in ikiw nikitoa ka wel ok pipiltsitsinti in nikikawtiw niwktsitsiaun. tlasohkamati. itla okse sowatsintli. ¿quipia wehkatlahtolastli in kali? pahke. inimekes siwame omakiaya koton iwan tsomikweitl kechkemitl iwan oyaya tlatiankisoske tiankisko. okichichiwaya in payo ke se rweda iwan okikwatihpanoya, kename motlasekawiaya ika payo. aw intla on ka isiwaw in tealtiani omextin tleko ohome kitki in iwitopili inmak tentiw ketsali in in imiyawahyo yetiw. oasik tonali in kaxtoli iwan se in metstli septiembre. oasito kokonentoton tlamachtilkalko. nochtin pipiltsitsintin ika ichpokatoton oasito tlamachtilkalko kakpipitska; nochtin. iwan nikan yoyekok tsotsomatli tlen kinmamakaske iknotlakakokone. ipan kaxtoli iwan se tonali septiembre otlaewalolo ika pantli iwan ixpan pantli omokwikatike kokone. iwan iman on okinxexelwike diplomas tlen kwalokiske ipan xiwitl. kstik in ixochiyo. sese o tiyaskeh ichan. aw inin tlasosiwapili yewatsin kimonextili in totatsin frai fransisko de ganboa. oktepitsinika, nomaiknin. aw yewantin altepewake in techyawalotoke in ompa tekitito in kichiwto tekitl; aw in amakemeke amo tewanme, in iw niman ye onnesis. ipan in nes in koswawaki in tlilkemitl in totoltipetlayo i nochpalaxochyo tilmatli; omentin in siwa intlanextil, wei chokistika in kichiwke; ipann in motewksomatsin in nes. ma ik teyolo pachiwi, ka oksentlamantintsitsin in ye nikan moyetstikate mexiko in inkatsinko titlahtowa, san wel ixkich innotsalokatsin teopixke la kompañía de hesús; in yewantsitsin in teopixke aso wel yepowalonmatlaktin in onkan momaniltitiake in omotenew ik tetokok, atle krus manka kimowikilike, san iw mokixtike san iw mowikake, iwan anotle kapa kimotlalilitiake, san iw mochintsitsin mantiake ika in insodanatsin iwan inmanteotsin in iw mochipa monemiltia, mochintsitsin sesen kandelas inmaktsinko. iiii tochtli xiwitl, 1314. ahmo nechkikikkia asta nečkukulwi'ka noman nin lado nečkululwi'ka. kwando kininkwi totonik in piomeh no kwaltia para pahti. mah weiya, omakatl xiwitl ikwak molpi xiwitl; ikwak poliwke tewktepeka. —tlapa'pako, itlachpanalo, tlaxkalolo kimanan tlaxkali, este, tlahton ayoa, tlachichinolo tlawahsomalo. ilwilok in testiko ya keski xiwitl kito in testiko ka oyuh se xiwitl kisako kokolistli wel nikitak in kwemitl onpa atlisoka aw onpa techmokwitlawiyaya in axkan moteilwia in siwatsintli atoltsintli tlaskaltsintli techmakak aw miyekpa in onkan tiwaltokalotiya in ichan atliseliwki aw senka miyekintin in onkan onewaya in osakamowaya ya kimoniwaya in totlatokawan in don gaspar don markos nochipa onkan walaya oncayu in i nikmati. kemmanian ihkwak aka tekitok ipan imil iwan ida ipampa moneki yas oksekkan yuhkih ihkwak toatlahkan tlahchikiti iwan moneki kikawas iaya itlaltepus itilma mochi in iaxka immanon kikawtewa in chichi tlaxotis inin ammo mohkwania moteka intech in tlen tlamantli mokawa ompa motiakwitlawia ammo kikawa aka mopachos iwan inda kihta aka ompa yahtinemi pewa tlawawaltsa ximotlatlachilti. yewa ichan ya. yei axoxtlantli ayohkana ya ne titlakwas. iuki kitokaitiah por in taki wan no por in itakka xokok semi. an ka kana setsin omonexiti in ikokokaw in tlakatl totekuyo. aw in intech kitealiske in tilmatli yewatl in koyoichkatl tetekomayo iwitika tenchilnawayo; amo akah kitoka. aw nikitoa ka senka ye noyolopachi in tinechmaka motomines sempoali pesos de oro komun aw inik mani in tlalmantli inik tlawiakia kwawtepekpa makwilmatl ipan senyolotli aw inik patlahoak in tonatiw ikalakiampa ematl yoan omistitl aw in kwawtepekpa itech onasi in ikal markos iskoatsin. tla xoniknotlamati ik niman konkwike in in tetech asia, ik niman ye witse ye kiwikatse in wewe tsiwtlakawki, iwan in siwatl in tlakaskaltia in tlakawapawa; ik kinwalwikake in imixpan in tlahtoke, kimixpantiko kinnonotsako in kwawitsatewktli iwan in chichimekatewktli in atonaltsin. onkán komo keme' nepaka igwal komo las kobihas lo hasen yo tengo mis ayates de veras nomás vete a traer, enséñale a la señora. aw ye itlamian inin omotenew metstli marso, ka nowian wakiko in atl in ipan aixtlawatl in onkan wewei ik momanka atl. tewan kwali topan oyek. tlanamakaskia in oomik kwawtlatoasi ye omotlalia in itlasi mokiwisi. mochiwa weyi. 33 in ipan axkan sábado ik xviii mani metstli de oktobre de 1603 años, ikwak mito kapítulo in ompa xochimilko; in gwardián frai fransisko ganboa mowikak tlatilolko, aw in gwardián mochiw itoka frai hwan de kastaneda. nikan ipan in kinpewke miskitlan tlaka iwan kwahpilolan tlaka iwan tsapotlan tlaka. tlipitski temaskalko aw in oyuh techpew mexikatl senpowalxiwitl ipan onxiwitl in kaktimanka in ayak tlahtokat in amakemekan; aw san yewantin yeintin tlasopipiltin in kipieya altepetl: in ikse itoka ketsalpoyomatsin, inin ipiltsin in wewe ketsalmasatsin chichimekatewktli; in ikome itoka kwawtlaltsin, inin ipiltsin in temistsin teowatewktli; in ikyeintin itoka yaotsitsin, inin ipiltsin aokwantsin chichimekatewktli; ka yuhki tlahtokapowtikatka. nikan mokawati ikosina, kortés iwan mochintin kaxtilantlakah iwan tlaxkaltekah omochololtike yowaltika. mexikah kinnextike, kintotokakke, kimpewke. ma siwtia o in kineki noyolo san chimali xochitl, in ixochiw in ipalnemoani. ¿quen konchiwas noyolo? onentasiko tonkisako in tlaltikpak. ¿zan ka yuhki nonyas in oompopoliw xochitl? ¿ahtle notleyo yes in kenmanian? ¿ahtle noitawka yes in tlaltikpak? ¡ma nel xochitl ma nel kwikatl! ¿ ken konchiwas noyolo ? onentasiko, tonkisako in tlaltikpak. onitlasohtlak aw inik omonemiltiko siwapili tlaltikpak yepowalxiwitl onmatlaktli ipann onxiwitl. kema kontlachili ya kipixtok tlaikwiloli in se amo kwali tekiotl. se kilo kwitlaxkolnanakatl tepechil komo ke witsyoh pero amo tahtakwawak in witsyo. onikilkan nikilwis. ma uk tonasika, ka sa nawilwitl in titlanapoualtilizque’”. aw in atonaltsin chichimekatewktli in iwan kwawitsatltewktli tlailotlaktewktli momiminke onkan in ikpak tepetl amakeme; in ipampa kitowaya in atonaltsin ayak kasiskia inik chichimekatl inik hehei kimotlaxilike in inmiw ayak wel mominke. axkan domingo ipan ome tsilini in ik 23 mani metstli henero de 1611 años, ihkwak teopan san fransisko omokwatekike omentin in owalake habón tlaka; wel tlamawistililistika in kwatekiloke, moch onkan neske, mochintin imixpan mochiw in ixkichtin nepapan teopixke mexiko onoke. in innemilistsin i yewatl in ipan iwki in. matlaktli akatl xiwitl ikwak walkalake wexotsinka, no ikwak tlalpoliwi istaktlaloka. nawi tekpa xiwitl mochiw ipa san ik walmoman in tonatiw ye kwalo, wel tlayowak, neske i sisitlalti. no kwaltia mah se kikwa para kwali tekiti se iihtik. aw in kenmaniya onkan motepantisnekia in omotenew kwata nochipan kontlakawaltia in omotenewke in ixwiwan in omotenew chimaltsin ye ika ka ichan ka in tlalpan san kitowayan [f. 113v.] in omotenew kwata nopilwane ka hamo niknokaltiya ka san nemechnotlapialilia aso kenmania tlawelilokatitiwi in nopilwa ka nikinnawatitias inik amo nochan. ipa se taman saj. in tsontsapot amo akah kitoka. se weyak ixkwaxilankali ohkan kixelowa in weyi kali. chikón ikatlatsintla se sigarro, tepatike okito aihmo sewis namonantsin. ¡xiquixtican, xiakan! aihmo wekawis miquiz. iwan no ipan in inik tlalpoloto mexika in panowayan inik yaoyotl kichiwato in amakemekan; san ok onkan walmokwepke in panowayan, ayemo asito in amakemekan. iwan tlatitlanke in omotenewke tlahtoke oidoresme inik nowiampa altepetlipan inik no amo kampa wel tlayawalolos ipan omotenew semana sankta, san nowiyan yaotlapialos in teopan ipan hwebes sankto inik kimotsakwiliske tepetlakalko sanktíssimo sakramento; san ixkich mochiwas, atle oksentlamantli iwan. mah amo ihkochiyowa, nikan ipan in tsonkisako inik kwawtlatolok in kolwakan, inik ye mochi kwawtlatolok senpowalxiwitl onkaxtoli || 74r iwan se xiwitl; aw niman ik omotlahtokatlali in itoka chalchiwtlatonak in kolwakan tlahtowani ipan in iiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1236. in tlawilastli pilkatika ikpak ahkopechtli. nochi tlasehtok. . in onkan yauchiwaloke. in kimonyauchiwaya tekwantepekatl, iswatekatl, xochtekatl, amaxtekatl, kwahtsontekatl, atlan omitlan tlakatl, mapachtepewa. inin omotenew mochi wewei. no kwaltia ihwak se tatasí mah se kitewatsa, mah se kipoyeli wan mah se kikwa. inik chikwasen tlamantli nikitowa notlatol honpowali onmatlaktli pesos nechpielia in techkatepeka ik nikchiwato kostodia sakramento ikaltsin aw yewantin in machis in governador don migwel iwan alkalde don fransisko aw inin itla nikan ittoske yewantin kitlaniske in migwel de los angeles iwan diego sanches aw in tla omoxtlaw makos in nonamik itech powis. xokon kwi moxochiw iwan in mekasewas. asta ya nopa niman ipam inin xiwitl omochiw yaoyotl oya tepetki. axtle tlen titokase talpanxoxokoyolin aw in tlahtowani don lwis de velasko visurrei || 131 sa motlatokilitia, itloktsinko iyopochkopatsinko ikatia in ixwiwtsin don fernando altamirano kapitán de la gwardia, sanno komendador sanktiago ipiltsin i motenew mikkatsintli. e iw sexiwitl tlatokanti in e mononosa in mexika tlatoke in tlatilulko, in tlakatekatl in tlakochkalkatl mixkowatsin, ka onkan nentlamati inik omiktiloke in itlatokawa in san tewtika tlasultika. wel miak okonkwalitak intekitl. entonses yoya yokimomakake ni bastón de sien kintales wan ni dos machos kargados kon kostales lenos de oro yoya adiós. aw nokonitwa in tlawalas aw [f. 10r.] in yehoatl in pedro lwis ka nel kimotlachkwitlaxili in achinton tlalmatli aso tepantsintli onkan kitlalis yewatl kimati aw in kin okonmonamikti magdalena san tlawelok aik tle ma onechtlaokoli ka chanen in siwatl aso kiwikas. amaka kimati tleka. okseppa konilwi in tliltekatsin: "ço mach atle tikkwa tlein tikwa, i newatl iska i nikkwa i nitak mochiwtinemi; aw in axkan nimitstlaokolia nimitsmaka in nitak. aw inin in ilankweitl atlawtekatltewktli kisiwatlanike in ompa kulwakan; in ompa wala siwapili, amo wel momati in itoka, ichpoch in itoka wewe tesosomoktli tlahtokapili kolwakan. in pipiltsitsintin temamamalo, tlachoqujztlehua. cequjnti mopapaqujltitihui, awieltitiviwi in okonnepanoto ohtli. el lisensiado álbar gómes de abaunsa 9 —bweno pero de wehka akmo timotlachaltia. anki so ye ichan ye nontlayokoya, tinonantsin, aso wel nitsawa, aso wel nikitia san nen ka nikonetl tson. nisihaupili, in ik nihtolo in nokichwa. o yewatl ipampa in in intlahtol doktoresme inik kinmonanamikilike tlahtoke oidores, in onkan omotenew akwerdo mochiw inik san otokoke oksekintin mimikke. wan xikwalkwitih in nanakat. inmanel okitsawktiake opiloloke, san okihtotiake "ma ikatsinko totekwiyo dios tikselikan in mikistetlatsontekililistli topan ye mochiwa, ka amo tikmati in tlein in totech tlami ye tiktsawktiwi". in okachi tlamatini kwaltia sanyeno ihkwak kittak intlal anawakah fransisko hernándes de kórdoba. . xi kin kwitlawiltikan xi kin tlakwawtsitskiltikan; ma ankisxikkawti in wapawaloni in izcaltiloni. xi kali xiwitl, 1269. in sesek. x kali xiwitl, 1437. ka aokmo moneki in kexkich ti mits kakitiske ka sa nikan achitsin ik ti mits on chikawa. inin tokaitl itech kikwike in tlenamakak tlamakaski in itoka tenuch, in owalkwawtlahtotia in okiwalyakan in kimaxitiko in kintlaliko nikan atlihtik mexiko, in ika itoka inteyakankaw okitokayotiko tenuchtitlan. in ikse tlahtoke, in wel intiachkawtsin mochiwtsinotika onkan audiensia real yewatsin el lisensiado don pedro de otálora presidente 1 nawi xumali pitsochiyawisotl witsol sesek in kamohtsin por in talihtik mochiwa wan kampa takwechautok. pero weyi tekwani. aw masiwi in onkan in chaneke ka ye momati ka san kalkowani, tel ye wekaw in onkan kate inik chankate, san ok tepitsin in kali ik katka. neka.. . in ahso itla okitlaokuli in totekuyo in kexkich in itlatki o wal yetia se kilo xolenanakatl kittak kenin walmotemmowih ikpak tepetsintli, ómpa walmotstilitok, in ompa yeppa konmottiliani; konmonamakiliko in inakastlán tepetl, konmoyakatsakwililiko, quimolhuilih: aw noxokoyow, ¿campa in tiyaw? ¿campa in titstiw? eltok atl. onkak ome taman: se tein istak wan se itahtai oso morado. axkan tehwatsin san hwan bautista, aw totech okiwalmokawili inik tokonmelawkakakiske in tlatoli aw techkakiltia kitowa ipanpa in onkan tanamaka onkan onok takal iwan in tlali in ipan ikak takal iwan ontetlin chinamitl inin tikkowilike in itoka ana tlako siwatl tikmakake makwili pesos ye axkan heisiwitl aw in ixkichika in ye tikpia in tlali in ipan ikak takal iwan chinamitl iwan in atl in onkan onok takal. yon ipa sayoh se taman. kitkike in tlamatilistli, aw ipampa in axka motlanawatilia kimotlalili karta de venta kompieske in omotlakowike inik ayak satepan texixikos aw in akin texixikos i on mochiwas in pena chikomilwitis karsel tepossoties aw sa tepan x pesos tomines konixtlawas in ikamara su magestad. onkan in yepowalxiwtike inik kate nikan in amakemeke in totolimpaneka iwan in tsakwaltitlan tenanka. aw itlamian in weitekwilwitl inik oyake in tepotsotlan; niman yowalnepantla in oolimke in oyake in tepotsotlan in itekpanchan in tlahtowani katka in itoka kinatsin, ye no yowan in yake españoles. ye kikawa in imaltepew ye wi ipan okseki altepetl, yehika ipampa in inkal in inchachan owakalak, iwan miek in opapachiw in oxixitin; aw imanel okseki kali in ok wel mamani, yese ka sa tlatlakasitimani in atl, inik mokalkawke masewaltin. noponi kitlanki. onkán yewaki. kil kinnotstiw in inteow. se kikwa in itakka, pero semi xokok. nelehwel ahkomalos tlatetekos tlateteko' tlahkomalo onkan yeka tlaplancharolo netlapatililo tlapako. se kilo textli aw inik wel tikneltiliske in in [sic] ixkich tlakpak omotenew imak tiktotlalia in hustisia in ika tonakayo iwan totlatkitika iwan tikinmaka towelitilis in ihweswan totlatokaw rei nwestro señor inik yewantin kineltiliske in totlatol in otikchiwke iwan tikitowa in saso tlein topalwiloka omochiwaskia in ipan omotenew aok wel ik tiktopalewiske. mas mochiwa newín parahko. x kali xiwitl ik poliwke tolantsinka. xii akatl xiwitl, 35. yewa moweyimati kwali okineltili tlen okinehtolti. ach in iw ka a xochitl, kan sanitli ketsali ia kemitl wilantok amoxkalitek. ye axkan xxv siwitl in ikal okonkets sentetl ikal tepiton aw in chinamitl ye no ixkich kawitl in kichiwa in ye xxv siwitl a ye kikawa mochipa kichiwa ayak aka kitlakawaltia in onpa tlachkwititlan. ii akatl xiwitl. .ca nikan tiktlalanwiske in tlamakaski chikomekoatl. tla kwele xi wal wian teskatl ixawal postokatimani ka ye mopan niktlalis se yewantin in itoka gonsalo gwerrero yeaxkan intlahtokaw katka mayatlacah. anka yewatl amo kinek yas in kanin kaxtilantlakah in kichixtokke. ipa se taman saj. aw in yewatl nomikkawe[swa]tsin in itoka maria tiakapan yeki mokaltia kitowa ka ye onechilwitia i nonamik hokatka ka naxka ka nokal ixkichi inik nikitlani hustisia. mah amo kitopewa, se kwitlatepoli san niman okalakia teopa tlen okwikaya mowentikes tlen kimotlakoliliske toteotatsin onemanaloya ka pochkopa ika tenemak: ahken kwika se sirio, ahken kwika veladoras, ahken kwika aseite mowentikes; ahken kwika xochitl, xochixaloktin iwan kikwitia manteles, tlen motlalia ipan kwawtlapechtli in toteotatsin.ikwak kalakiske nochtinin mawistik tlaka topixkatsinli mikats kinmonamikilis ika teochiwalatl. onkwan on kinmotlateochiwilis ika atl. aw in ikwak tlapoyawa, tlenamakoya tlapaloloya in yoali, mitoaya -ohualzouh in yoaltekutli, yakawistli, aw ¿quen onwetsis in itekiw ? kwaltia inik nawtlamantli niktenewa hoan awachtekatl ikalnawak mani notlalkoal nokowili martin witsitl i motamachiwa kwawtitlanpa itst[ik]ak inik wiak chikwasen kwawitl aw inik patlawak tonatiw ikalakianpa itstok nawkwawitl yoan ipan mani kali sentetl xochimilkopa itstikak sentetl tonatiw ikisayan itstikak sentetl tonatiw ikalakiampa itstikak intech powis in noxwiwan diego de kastañeda yoan iteikaw baltasar inik onkan nikinmaka notlalkoal nikowili migwel heka nikmakak epoali pesos inik motamachiwa xochmilkopa itstok inik wiak chikonkwawitl aw inik patlawak tonatiw ikalakiampa itstok chikwase kwawitl yoan ipan mani kali sentetl xochmilkopa itstikak sentetl tonatiw ikalakiampa itstikak no intech powis in omotenewke pipiltsitsinti noxwioan diego de kastañeda yoan in iteikaw baltasar. noponi wala se weyi sokiayotl aw itlok kinwalali in okomentin tlahtoke in ikse yewatl in tlahtoa- || 16v -ni tulam tlaopochkopa walmotlali i ye tlahtowa, aw in ikomentin tlahtoke in itlok kiwalali tlamayekankopa yewatl in tlahtowani otumpa i ye tewktlahtowa. xinechkaki tein nimitstatawtia. xochiyowa marso, abril wan mayo. ipampa in ompa kitsitskia imayawkan ka in yewatl in xochimako ka kixnamiktimoketsa in texochimakak, aw in ik ki wal kwilia in chimalxochitl iyopuchkopa. iwan owaltemoke in karransistas ika itsonteko in matech okwalikayan. okinkechkotonki. in matech tsontekomatl in reyes muños iwan otlatlania ¿ahquen kixmati itsonteko inin tlacatl? ayahka onawat. nochtlakatl okixmatia amaka onawat ipampa kwache temimiktiske karransistas. motlahtoltsin, ka niman ahmo niknokahkauhaltia manose niktekokokamati in ohtli, ka nonyas, ka nokonchiuhatiw in motlanekilistsin. kehna nopa kitokaro nopa masewali itoka 2 tochtli xiwitl, 1182 años. aw in ixkich kawitl inik omoteilwi nawxiwitl in omonamikia in itoka maria tlako inamik in itoka katka toltekatl okimotlaltiayaya aw ik omochiw informasión in testigosme yewantin okineltilike inik owel neltik ka ye neli ka yewatl yakatopa tlale in itoka atlixeliwki oyuh kimokakilti in wei audiensia real aw in omonamikia in itoka maria tlako in inamik toltekatl miekpa onotsalok onkan no wekawak in tlatoli. in se kitoka nahnawi xantiahtet wan komo iwan melonextet, kitokah nawi xantiahtet wan ome melonextet. bweno tlenon tikihtoa tlenon timotoka tehwa pwes nehwa notoka ni chaparrito bigotudo wan tehwa pus nehwa notoka ni hwan el oso. in kemah komo se kitoka momeutani. wan tlen ne seki welis masewalme pelenkosnanakatl ika xitomamoli nikanka sente piltontli chokatika. nikan ipan in in tlahtowani kwawtlix okimilwi in mexika "ximocaltican in onkan tisaapan"; aw in omokaltike mochi in ipan se tochtli xiwitl. nikan ipan in in omikiko in itoka chalchiwtlatonak in tlahtowani kolwakan, in tlahtokat matlakxiwitl; aw sa niman ipan in xiwitl i motlahtokatlali in kwawtlix || 74v tlahtowani kulwakan. oppa onechahsihkeh intloe otitononotstaya seppa oninoprendahti ka notima ihewae notahtsitsiwan inin omomaehitihkeh omotlawelkwitihkeh iwan oeachi ihewae intechtsinko oahsik in tlahtoli in itloe oksente ichpokatl ihkatik nopan omochiw yese ikanin san ika tomin oninoprendahti no omahmachix ye iehan onkalakia ihkwak oniknekia ninosetilis itlok inin ammo okinek ye achto onitetlatlawti iwan axkanokseppa ammo nitlaahsikamatia tlen kineki inintin onikihto intla ammo nechneki kwali ka iammo nikinchiwaltisl ikanin ammonitlapolos nitlaixtemos oksekkan isan nikneki se tlahtoli iwan intlakammo ammol kenin mochiwa yehika ipampa ye iw katka teyolo in mustla ipan martes sankto teotlak no omen yankwik tlayawalolistli prossesión okisaskia in onkan omotlali yankwik kofradías: in ikse kofradía yewantin kitlalike in españoles iwan mexika moyoteka onkan in monasterio san hwan de la penitensia monhas, ya yewantin in in tlayawaloskia ipilwantsitsin san hwan; aw in ikome tlayawalolistli yankwik okisaskia ipan in omotenew martes sankto yewantin in mexika tlatilulko sanktiago tlaka || 183 in ipilwantsitsinwan totlasomawisnantsin sankta maría del rrosario no iwan motenewa ipilwantsitsin el niño hesús perdido. ompehki kitenpowa tlake kichiwas, wahkaya aw sa ihsiwka sa ixtomak in ontlayawalotiwetske, ka ik niman inpampa walkis intlahtokatlanawatiltsin in oidores, motlatsontekilike inik san niman akampa se teopan tlayawalolos in ipan in semana sankta; aw inik san niman ipan in omotenew lunes sankto ye yowa, inik otsatsiwak nowiyan ihtik siudad mexiko inik akan tlayawalolos semana sankta. sesek por ké komo miak se kikwa tekwiltih estsompil. sanktiego ye mitowa amo korona kipiaya, san kwatesontsin motilon katka iwan portero iwan kosirotia, ixkich kimochiwiliaya i netitlanistekitl in tlatekipanolistli. kiski in viii akatl xiwitl. se tlanawkankixtili kilo xitomatl itsalan in nanakatl mokwa ompa malakachtepek, inin ahmo monamaka tiankisko. in tlatlacah, cihuah, yawih kitemoskeh mila iwan kinextia itech in itsinkwawyo in metl iwan oksetik inik mowikxitia intla ok konetik ahso wel san moihseki komalko ahnoso mowikxitia ihtik in chilmoli. intla ye chikawak achto mosiyawa iwan satepan ye mokwakwalatsa; kintepan ye motsoyonia ahnoso mowikxitia ihtik in chilmoli. nochipayok aw in okim on kwalti, niman ik kintsonkwitikisa. se tlakatl kipitstikisa chichtli kitotikisa "chich. in tetech monekis: achtopa ik tlateka in kakawawatl in teonakastli, in yeti in totoli in molkaxitl in chikiwitl in sokitekomatl in kwawitl anoso tlachinolakatl in tlatlas in itlan ikusis tamali muchi kikaltema. ahken amo ka iyolo oyaya chalma tlalwikixtis tla itla okipanoaya ipan tepetl. oninixkwep nikmohtilis in tlakatsintli onkan ok mewitihtaya tokwiltekatl kwachik xiwitonko español okikowili lx akxotekatl tekiwa tsapotla lx xakalkatl tekiwa amanalko lx fransisko papalotekatl lx tlamatsinko lx atlawko tiachkaw xiwitonko lx tepapanawitsin okinamakak lx.[glifo de templo] tonatiw ikalakiyanpawik. [glifo de kamino] aw senpowalokaxtoli xiwitl in san ok ompa sepan onoka sepan katka in astlan, aw san onkan kisako in chikomostok. in ayotsin sesek por eso kininamiki tein mopajuiaj. ka tiktaniliko; ma konmomachiti in iatsin in itepetsin, ma mowetsiti in ichantsinko". nikan ipan in in momikiliko in ketsalakxoyatsin tlahtowani kulwakan iknawi tlahtowani, in tlahtokat onpowalonmatlaktli xiwitl; aw ka niman ipan in in omotenew xiwitl onkan walmotlahtokatlali in itoka chalchiwtlahtonak ikmakwili tlahtowani mochiw in kulwakan. iuki kilwiah por in motehkoltia itech kwowit. axkan domingo ik 19 mani metstli hunio de 1611 años, ye teotlak makwili tsilini ipan tlako hora, inik omokalakiko siudad mexiko, sanktiago tlatilolko walmewiti in onkan ik walmikwanitsino, tekpan palasio mokalakiko in yewatsin tlahtowani don frai garsía gwerra arsobispo mexiko inik visurrei mochiwtsino in moch ixkich ik nowian ipan nweva españa; ye omihto, inin teopixki sankto domingo. san niman tenochkah kitlahtokatlalike in kwitlawak, in okinyakantikatka mochintin in altepetlacah, in mexikayaokiske. aw in ikwak miérkoles in ipan ivisperastsin sant andrés apóstol, hwebes a xxx de noviembre, ikwak omakoke in sant fransisko teopixke possesión inik wel imaxka yes teokali sant hwan, aw i wel ipan ilwitsin sant andrés onkan missa mito, iwan sankta maría kwepopan; in okinmakak possesión alkalde de korte servandes. tixpan owalake in tlaxilakaleke nekaltitlan pedro itskol iwan holian martin andres leonardo tepixki fransisko flures merino fransisko de san hoseph melchior gaspar bernardino vaskes algwasil tlaxilakalpan. kema nikmati. chantiwa ipan ohtli hosé moran kalapowali sempwalwanyeyi, tlakpak ontetl. mochiwa kahfentah wan kuoujtaj. xochiyowa achá itech marso. aw in matlaktli pesos okonasike in ichpoch inmatika in itoka anan iwan klara ik iyolo opachiw aw ye komaxkatiya in kimokowiya in ixwiw alo[n]so tokatsin in petro hakobo in okitenke tomines iwan omakok karta de pago in onka sank joseph. aw inin weweyotsintli amono wel yewatl inemak yaxka in tlahtokayotl tenanko, aw ka wel yewatl in yaxka inemak katka in tlahtokayotl in xiwtsin tlatkik in ipiltsin tlahtowani kwawtlewanitsin tlailotlaktewktli, ka yewatl tlahtokatiskia in tlailotlakan tenanko; aw inik yewatl motlahtokatlali weweyotsintli ka sann intlatlatlawtilistika iwan intepopololistika in ittatsin kakamatsin teowatewktli in iwan toyaotsin chichimekatewktli, inik senka ye welitia in ixpan awitsotsin ka nel achto motlahtokatlaliko i nikan tenochtitlan. kwali se kitokaitia notatsin ika nonantsin omitlawike ma íki mochiwas. tikawakiwe yewatsinko iwan tikanakiwe ikan tlakwatiw, iwan satepa walas momachtis ika teotlac. wan nika se kwitlatsayantok amo mochipautani. tasohkamatilis kwitlakochtlatemitiltlaxkali in san iskich tlalkawali ye mani inik omotamachiw inik wiak 7 matl aw inik patlawak nanmatl ipan semomitl otokonkeketske nawi estakas iwan nawtetl chinamitl inik otokonmakako posesion in iwka sentensia. aw in ikwak okimitak in s[eño]r markes semka opapaki ipampa ye mochintin omoquatequiqu{e} i{n} noxwiwan in siwapipiltin iwan ipampa okinapaloke onitlanawati newatli d[on] hoseph de san hwan aw ipampa inon onechmomakili merset ipampa mochi tlali nikam sankta krus iwan onikixpamtili in keskich onechmakak in tlali in motekusomasin mochi onikixpamtili okiktak s[eño]r markes au{h} ikwak inon onechmakak merset iwan m{o}chintin nopilwan masewaltin imix ixpam ipampa amo akin kinkakayawak kemaniyan in tlakamekayowan nikam nikinkawa in tlatlakwatikiwi i{n} nopilwan iwan noxh{ui}huan imaxkam inin merset mochi itechpoi in masewaltin. mostika se tayi in piotet. no in limonat iwan ome taman asokal wan nekti se kinintalilia in pilimeh inintenoh ihwak kipiyah kokomeh ininkanihtik. o yewatl ipampa in inik amo wel onkan omotlayawalwike sanktome in monasterio monhas in ipan in omotenew martes sankto; iwan in governador mexiko inik amo inpan mochikaw itlapacholwan mexika in miyekintin kinekia onkan tewan kisaskia san hwan inpampa se oidor anoso alkalde de korte kixnamik in omotenew governador. taltikpaktsin de mi alma, inin tlayekchihchihki pantsin okachi welik keh neka. tlaxkalan, wexotsinko. anyeskek. mochiwa komo amo se kimaxima. in totomeh kwawtikpak ehekapa santlemach kwakwaltsin tlacuicah; ihkin tetlasohkamatia in senwelitini tepalnemowani toteotsin. in xochiyowa itech febrero wan marso. iskate in imispan desdikos tlaxilakalake aton garsia lurenso maltin pedro elias palthasal garsia palthasal moisen anto[n]io rodrikes maria petronila iskate noyolokakapa nikinnawatia inik nopa tlatoske in itekopa in anima alvaseas anton garsia migwel hernandes pedro elias a[n]to[n]io rodrigwes españor lurenso maltin. eltó aw in okittak in obispo ka wel monelchiuha, ka niman ahtle meleltia, motsotsona, niman ik kiwa. noponi tlehkotok chikomostok kinevaki san niaveponi san in san in teyomi. tsivaktitlan kinevaki san niaveponi san in san in teyomi aw yewatl ik mochalanike ik san ixneliwke in ontlamantin teopixke; aw in oksekintin in iskitlamantin nepapan teopixke mexiko moyetstikate atle ik tlachalanike, san kwali mokixtike inik motekpantiake, yewantsitsin motlayakatilitiake in padreme deskalsos sant fransisko ipilwantsitsin, tlayakak mantiake inik kalakowak iglesia mayor. 13. ¿auh in ikin aso tlapanawiya in itech tonewatiw, in tokommonamiktitiw in tekoko, in tetonew, in temamawti, in teyisawi, in tekototso? ¿cuix ye kin ihkwak tiwalmoxikotiw, tiwalmomaniawtitiw? ¿cuix ye kin ihkwak tikwalihtotiw: “tlacazo, sa neli in kihto, in nechilwi in nonan, in notta; ma nikkakini, ma nikkwini in yuh nechilwi, makamo tepan nikamanalowani, maka nikintelchiwani in itlachiwalwan in dios, ma nikintlasotlani, ma nikintlatlawtiani, ma nikintlaokoliani, ma nikinpakkaittani, ma nikinyowaliani inik ahmo no yuhki nopan mochiwaskia in axkan ye nopan muchiwa, in onokonnomamiktiko, in itech ononasiko in tekoko, in tonew in techichinats, in itsonwas, in imekaw, in ikolow, in itsitsikas, in itew, in ikwaw in totekwiyo, in ye notech konteka, in ye notech kompachowa. onechan, oonetsitski , ¿campa nias, kampa nicalaquiz?” aw in ye kipixtikate tlali in ipan ikak imakal iwan ontetl chinamitl iwan in onkan onok imakal ye axkan onpowali xiwitl inik kitsitstikate tlali aik ma onkan otlachalaniaya in ipanpan in testigos ninochiwa amo nikiximati inik nikneltilia notlatol nikan nomatika nikketsa krus. migwel makwes testigo. ante mi kristoval de san mateo eskribano. tosiwatekipanoh itoka katalina. tayowa, tanesi, ¿quexqui xiwitl kipia mosiwaiknitsin? yewa kipia kaxtoli iwan nawi xiwitl. vii tochtli xiwitl, 1330. "magdalena, axonka yon se tlaxkali", kiilwi ma nelelkisa aw inik ompa kwitlaxitin atlawtli || 51 in askapotsalko in onkan kwawyawalolko, yewantin kitsakwato in mexika iwan tepaneka; ok yewatsin itenkopatsinko mochiw inik ompa atsakwaloto in tlahtowani visurrei don hwan de mendosa i luna, wel inomatsinko ompa mowikaya in kimottilito. ximewa, ye iman tiquizazqueh. se kikwa iteyo, welik, kwaltsin tsopek. in iw momatke kinmiktitasiske inik asitiwi. sano ikwak kiwaltsake in chiapantlaka, wepanato itsmikilpa, awewetl in kiwilanato itlaketsalo yeskia iteukal wisilopochtli; i no umotlatsiwkaneke kontlatike in iwepamekaw i kiwaltsake. kichihki tlaxkali nopa ichpokero iiii kali xiwitl, 1. chikwasen kali ika ikwak poliw kwawnawakatl. aw in tepetlixpan itoka ketsaltototsin. in ipan axkan domingo ik 23 mani metstli hulio de 1606 años, ikwak in ompa tsakwaltitlan tenanko amakemekan momikili in kimowikili totekwiyo dios yewatsin notlasotatsin moyetstikatka hwan augustín ixpintsin tewktli in itelpochtsin katka siwapili doña lwisa xochiketsaltsin. im mixteka in ik okiyaokichiwke okimanilito. in se tekpatl xiwitl in no yewatl ipan motlahtokatlali in tlakatl wewe akamapichtli tlahtowani kulwakan; inin ipiltsin in koxkoxtli. aw in yewantin omotenewke español diego senete iwan inamik mariana rodrígwes, oksenka yewatl in in señora, kimixnamikti sankta krus, amo kinekia imomextin inik onkan inkalnawak inkaltitlan moketsinotikas krus. sekinok tlamantli axkikwa. ma xokon kwa in kakawatl, in kakawaxochitl, aw ye iw tiwalasi ilwitsin in siwapili, aw in ipan domingo matlakilwitl onse mani metstli de setiembre, in maestreskwela mowikak in tepetlatsinko, yewatsin missa kimitalwi; aw in frai herónimo de sárate motemachtili, iwan kimitalwi inik ompa moyetsties tlahtowani maestreskwela, san ye ipan in in omotenew xiwitl de 1594 años. ka ompa in amakemekan tetekoke, inik nechalkanonotsalok; aw ka ipampa inik kiwaltlatlatolmakaya in motewksoma inik walyayaokalakia i nikan mexiko. iwan mikkaomitl ompa kikixtike, seme yewatl imomiyo in ikin kenma in onemiko nikan ipan tlali in kintokayotitiwi in kintenewtiwi wewetke tosiwan tokolwan kinameti tlakaweyake katka; aw inin ka seme yewantin imomiyo in ompa kikixtike atatakoyan onkan kiwalwikake in sant pablo, kimottili in visurrei. miyak motehpana mah amo akah mayanmikikan. istatl, ixkich in monekis yaí nemi nopa michi noteahuli; onkinpalo inmatlaken. . iwi in is ka ik sen kinnawatiaya. in on tsonkis tlahtuli niman ye ik neketsalo ye omotlali in senka vei tletl, xoxowik kopalxiali ixpan mani. onitlanamak wits méxiko teyakanakiw don lwis de velasko, yuhkin inik ome itlahtokateixiptlatsin inin yankwik hispantlali, ipan etsontli onkaxtoli omompoali ommatlaktli xiwitl. tepahwia komo tel miak se tayik. kenin toxochimilian itwali weweyintin, nochipa totechmoneki sente chichiton aw in yewantin in omotenewke habón tlaka inik nikan walake ka ya sekintin christianosme, aw sekintin ok tlateotokanime ayemo mokwatekiaya. ye, kwetlaxtlatelateka, ye ankitsakwa amostlakate amostlakatlatol, maso xikawaka amostlakate amostlakatlatol yyao!”. nikan umpeoa in imekayo tlatoke askapotsalko. mah amo kimatoka se askat, aw yewatl inik kinepechtekiliaya inik ixpan moknomatiaya inik kimokwitiaya ka inteow in tonatiw, ka iskatki in kichiwaya ka in ikwak itla okiminke, in aso tototl in aso tochtli in aso masatl imanel itla oksentlamantli, niman yewatl in mitl inik okiminke in san ya yuhki yeso in kikixtiliaya aw kakonkwia kittitiaya in tonatiw inik onkan kimokwitiaya ka inteow ka itenko in okasik in tlei okimin. ikwouyo tamati yon nexkokoiswat, pero sayoh in no taman taki, iiswayo weweyi wan iteyo pisiltik wan miak motalilia itech initakka. ye mopilwatia ye kichiwa kwawtlato. aso chikwei litro newktli niekawiltsin nehin hosé alkántara. iwan ikwak yankwika maxitiko in padreme deskalsos sant fransisko teopixke; san mokixtitikiske mowika a la china. ye yiman on inomekes tlatsotsona yawe techiaske; ikwak tikita ye walkoxoni gente ikpak tepetl san pedro. ye yiman on tlatsotsona. iwan tlen nenenkes kimamati witse totatsin chalma. kimonamikiliske ika popochtli, ika sirios tlatlataske, ompa santa marta teokaltsintli, ompoyon nochipa sesen xiwitl, ompoyon omokixtiaya, ompoyon omokalakiaya nenenkes. ixtlawatlakah miak siwakwakweh quinpiah. aw kilwi in yewatl witsilopochtli in istakmixkowatsin: "tla xiwalaw, istakmixkowatsé, in axkan ka moneki, senka wel totech moneki nimitsnawatia. tlahkoxonakatl "ya nopa tihnekih titechmakas nopa tekitl. xiii tekpatl atle unka mochiw. ihkion kwalika. ihkwak topan tlahkati wel tepasolo iwan nochi tlaihtlakawi. xinechpahkayowi san tepitsin, nia nikixtlawas tlen nitewikilia ipan in kalotilkalko. ¿amitla timokwaltisneksi noka tikateh ipan in tlakwalnamakoyan? xi kali xiwitl, 1425. kiwalitkitia in kwakwawtsi inik nika ye kimamakaya in ixkich konkakalakiliaya tesosomoktsi in tenochka, nika kitlamamakaya yoan tlatilulka i kontlamaniaya. senka iwian, in chichiwalatl se techihchikan tlaili. ¿tleca amo towan tiwits? tehwa yekintsin matlaktlomei tekpa xiwitl atle mochiw. vi.- fransisko sanches ik tlanankilia konitowa ka wel tixpan muchiw in ikwak omonanawatitia maria xoko ilamatsin in iw konitotia monamakas in ikal nawtekistimani ihoan in itlalo in otetl ichinayo misa ik topan mitos in i nopilo katka ihoan nomikamon migwel oselotl teixtin ik topan mitos misa. iuki kitokaitiah por in xoxowik kinamakaj. in se kikwa in ikamohyo kimanah wan kikuechouaj, ompa kemah kimanelowah iwan tixti wan kitaliah taxkal wan kemah se kikwa ya. ikwak okalake kwali kwali ipan xiwitl in sapatistas otlamimiktike. inimekes okinmiktiaya tlatkiwas ikan okitlania tomin iwan amo kinmakaya. ye yiman on okwikaya tlatiwani iwan okimiktiaya ika kwawtlatli. noihki okinmichtekia ichpokame. otlanonotsaloya ke okinwikaya ika kwawtla inka omawiltiaya. aihmo se tonali owalaya intlak itatsitsiwan. oixpoliwia ika kwawtla. kox okikwaya tekwani noso okintokaya, amo machia. in xiwit. tlahké san malti x tekpa xiwitl ik poliwke awilisapaneka. mochi en xenerál otlasenwek muchi opohpuliw in semintera nixpa okatka kichintoton yaya milpa okseki non in de temporal wan in de riego non yokatka inmasorka ye masiso in de riego in de temporal non saye tiemo. ¿toni kipasaroa? aw in ihkwak in ye iw nepa chikonxiwitl tlahtokati in ikome itoka chalchiwtlatonak in ikmatlaktlomei tlahtowani kulwakan. ¡amechana! kenin mochiwa tlatlanilok in testigo ilwilok kwix tikmati inik omakok posesion in hwan de eskalante yoan in inamik okito in testigo ka neli ka wel melaoak in nikitoa ka ye uppaniayan in mako posesion aw in antonio hoseph ka san omoyokox inik okixixitini in itepan hwan de eskalante yoan inamik yoan in ye wekaw inkisayan oquitzatzacu yoan in estakas okikikixti amo itenkopa hustisia. inihwanti no tianexilito kampa ininana itstó ne onkak ome taman: seki chichiltik wan se tein istak. mah quihualcuitih, amo nikmati tleka ayemo wits. nika . aw in ixkich omotenew in tlawistli in ketsalpatsaktli mochi kommakike in pochteka in ipan ompewke wel kim popoloke. ye'on okpa yemochiwas in totlaol len titoka para ahmo techpulos. wan isisnana ya noponi mokahki. . in kontlapielike yewantin in: tlakatekkatsintli, tsiwakpopokatsin, tlakochkalkatsintli itskwawtsin: omextin tlasopipiltin. . in tla san ye pochewa in amatl amo wel tlatla senka momawtiaya onkan kittaya in ahso kana kukulistli kikwitiw; in ikawayowan tokalehkapo weweyintin iwan chihchicahqueh. aw in ok v pesos nikitowa hetetl ipan mitoske no niman resposus i nopan santiago yewantin kimati i merinos ipan tlatoske inaniman [al margen iskierdo oneltik]. no iwki nikneki nikmotlasohkamachililis nonantsin in senka kwali, senka wei ipatiw itlapalewililistsin, noteikuwan rosaura iwan lilia; iwan havier galisia, notex, senka kwali tlakatl, senka tepalewiani, in kipihpia in intlamatilis in huehuetqueh, in newatl miekpan itech ninopachoa in nechtlalnamiktis, in axkan in nichanti nikan wei altepetl, in senka wei in ye onikilkaw. mochiwa kampa yeski, pero mas mochiwa kampa se tamewa para chilar, ompa mochiwa, amo moneki se kitepewas, ompa yeh mismo ixwa, itech in abono, ompa ixwa in kiltsin. xinechkixtika ahso wel kaxtolilwitl in momustlaye ik nenke tlapowaya oksekintin doktoresme teopixke klérigos in motlatsowilike, oksenka yewatl inewan monamikia in frai lwis sisneros komendador in totlasonantsin nwestra señora de las mersedes de redempsión de kaptivos, intepachokaw in istak hábito kimotlalilia teopixke; inin wel yewatl makoskia in omotenew la kátreda ipampa muchintin ipan mokwepaya, kimopalewiliaya in audiensia real tlaka tlahtoke oidores inik yewatl yes, kwali inik tlapow latintlamachilistika. moneki tíkin atlitizqueh. —komo a las seis. ¡xijpiya kwidado!", kiilwi iikni tiwehxiwtlakwatiwe onkán tiahke fitlakwato. xoxoktik in ixiwi kwawitl amo teh onkak mila, xi tochtli xiwitl, 1178. in ipan altepetl siudad méxiko tenochtitlan ik kaxtoli omome mani metstli de hebrero de mil e kinientos i uchenta i dos años. imawistililonime señores alkaldes don martin kortes hwan garsia hustisia kimopielia in ipaltsinko su magestad in omotenew altepetl. kilwiah tamalayoj, tak por in neli yek ayoj. aw in kitokatewak tonakayotl in axayakatsin, ayokmo yewatl kikwa in mochiw chalko xokoyoltepek; ya yewatl kikwa in itiachkawtsin in tisosikatsin. achto se kimana. in ipan in xiwitl san ye ok onkan onok in kwawitsatsin in texkalko omemasak in ikpak amakeme. tla timayana, xitlakwa. tlahko xonakatl ayahatl wetsi ya nopa nechkwilise ne tokone pwes yeka. imanon, in sisiwameh akinomeh amo kikwalitah in pahtli keh mochiwa, man ki ikan isel limón. melah.... kayopa kwali intech mochiwas. ma kenmanian tikmaxkatisnek, iska i nonetlatil i nomatla onok, inik nichichimekatl; in at wel tikchiwas ik ximotlayekolti. aw yewatl onkan inpatrón ihkwak mochiw in doktor don fernando de vilegas, kinpachos in monhastin onkan kalakiske, ka yuh yewatsin kimomamaltili in teoyotika tlahtowani don frai garsía gwerra arsobispo mexiko, yewatsin kimomakili in patronasko. aw in tla walas kwawchinanko pedro lwis nikmaka in achiton kimotlachkwitlaxili aso tepantsintli onkan kimotlalilis. aw in kinokimonamikti itoka magdalena ka senka tlawelilok aik ma itlatsin onechtlaokoli ma atoltsintli ka yewatl kimati aso kiwikas ka nelaik notla motlalia. aw sanno ihkwak in ipan in omotenew metstli henero omachistiko owala tlahtoli in españa inik wala akaltepiton naviobiso in kenin onkan walmowikaya teoyotika tlahtowani don herónimo de kárkamo obispo de troxilo pirú, kastilampa walmowikaya, aw san weyapan || 201 onmomikiliko; inin kriyoyo nikan tlakat mexiko, nikan mowikak inik yaka españa. aw in ikwak in omosenkawki in ikwak kimochiwiliske in hustisia no yewantsitsin kimoxexelwiske in tomines ihoan kinmomakilia in inwelitsin lisensia in hoan de la torre ihoan gaspar de san pablo yerederoshoan kinchiwtiw in omomikili maria xoko inik wel konnamakaske in kali in akin in achi miek kitemasnekis in tomines. aw inik okonmochiwiliko posesion kimotililike kimotlalilike in itokatsin iwan in ifirmatsin iwan martin xwares alkalde migwel de los angeles alkalde. pasó ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. aw in ipan missa yewatsin motemachtili in senka mawistililoni teoyotika tlahtowani don frai garsía gwerra arsobispo mexiko. aw niman okinmixkechili kinmonawatili i tetewkti pipiltin pablo garsía alkalde don migwel sanches don fransisko de la krus pablo xwares inik ompa mowikake inmilpan tlalistakapan. tomawak wan wehkapan moskaltia wan wehka momasohsowa. se kikwa iteyotsin, se kipipina mahyá kapolin. no techpalewih in tamachtihkeh karlos durán, tein kiyekanaya in herbario de in instituto de ekología a. k. wan kiselih mah titekitikan kampa kineutokeh in xiutsitsin. aw in yewatl in tlahtowani in tositewktli anoto kaxitiko in mexiko tenochtitlan, aw kilwi in tlahtowani in witsiliwitsin iwan || 87v in tlakatewktli in itskowatsin: "oticmihiyohuilti, tlahtowanihé, otimaxitiko in tenochtitlan; aw katlia in chichimekatewktli in ketsalmasatsin?". nitlachichinos. seki tonali ipan notahtsin omononohtsino itloktsinko in notextsin in yometstaya ompa nochan totlok mochantiliaya lea notextsin achto omotlakatili notahtsin omonemilili kwali yeskiani kimotlahtlanilis iyoltlahtoltsin itechpa in achto newatl onikihto yuhki okimolwili senka miyek in tlali kiwalpanawike inik nowian walnentiake, inik walotlahtokake. ik-etetl tonali eilwitl in onkan kitlatike ikpak tepetl, inik motokayoti tonaliitlatlayan; ik tlemamaltasiko in onkan in totolimpaneka chichimeka. tlehkoh ipan nopa tepetl. tlahtoltin iewayo se kipantema itech at wan se kitalilia panela, kemah se kikawa mah xokoya wan mochiwa tepache. ka yuh kinmonawatili in kimottiliko tlahtowani visurrei don lwis de velasko markés de salinas. kwaltia wan xochiyowa tahkoyowan. aw no ikwak ipan in xiwitl tlamato in nesawalpili tlahtowani tetskoko in wexotsinko, ikwak kasik in itoka xokoyotl wewetsin tlahtokapili ompa, iteikkaw in toltekatl; teokwitlawewetl in itlawis walmochiwtia in nesawalpili, aw sano teokwitlawewetl in itlawis walmochiwtia in wewetsin in wexotsinko. antlanamakaskeh noh. nikan ipan in || 102r in tlali kixotlak in axayakatsin in chalko amakemekan itokayokan xokoyoltepek iwan ostotikpak, intech powki intonal in mexiko tlahtoke katka. makwil xochitl ikwik kena wahkapa nepa testigo.- alonso sanches arriero español nikan chane siudad makok huramento etk. tlatlanilok in testigo ilwilok kenin wel tikmati inik moteilwia maria geronima in inamik hwan de eskalante inik mixnamiki antonio hoseph yoan inamik magdalena ines ak tlale katka ak axkaoa katka in umpa otioalake. aw sanno ipan in in omotenew xiwitl in onkan walmikwanike mexika in amalinalpan askaputsalko, onkan chikwexiwtike; yewatl kinwalyakana in intlahtokaw achto mexika in wewe witsiliwitl, in ihkwak in ye
