iw senpowalonchikwasen xiwitl tlahtokati. tlenon kwakikwaske nakwtleyi. oatiyahqueh. ka nikkwis in yektli xochitli, in yektli yan kwikatl. 66. aw iskin nikan mopilosneki, in tsotsopastli, in naw. sakatl. ¿auh iskin nikan kwix tokommati inik tiwi in tlaltikpak? ¿anca san yuhki ik titlakxitemowa? ak kimati immustla, wiptla in at ok no tewan intlakamo san iseltsin i yewatsin in kimomachitia in tloke in nawake. ¿cuix timotki, kwix timomama? ka titkiwa, ka timamalo. aw inin nopiltse, notelputse, ¿can ok mach in tiaw, kan ok mach in titlamattiw? aw immanose san yuhki in chalchiwitl, in teskatl in oixpetlawalok, oixkotlachialok, san no tiwki in tewatl otixpetlawak, otitlachiako. omixkotlachixke in akike mitsontepewke, immitsonchayawke. kema kiitak ya moskalti toktli komo para mah amo wehweliwi, "na nikitak para san malti wan san in totonik. oantlasohtlayah a ka tikmokwilia, tikmokakitia a ka tlasiawi, a ka tlaihiyowia in masewali, ompa onkistinemin tlaltikpak: timaliwi in iknopilotl, in iknotlakayotl, in nentlakayotl: aonmonamiki in ikechtlan, in ikespan pilkak, in itsotsomatsin: in ompa walaw ehekatl, ompa kitki, ompa kimalakakwa, ompa kimana akanin mokixtia, neli mach in toxomi, in oasomi inik kimixtemolitinemi in kochkayotl, in newkayotl: senkwawitl, semixtlawatl mantiw: awis nele kitimaloa, in kwitlaxkolpitsaktli itech motetekatinemi, itech ikoyokatinemi in ikoayotsin: neli mach in omisawtinemi, in sikwiliwtinemi. ii tochtli xiwitl, 1494. aw in ixkich atlakomoli nowian techachan mopia mexiko inik moliniaya yuhkinma ka umpa ihtik maltiaya, inik makokwia atl || 153 inik posonia inik tsotsopokaya ik mowiwitekia ik walmomotlaya in atlatekochkaltechtli atl. tamalayoj, yehwa yon yek pati in iewayo. nochi in xiutsitsin wan kwoumeh tein nikan ixnesih tikixtaliah ika eyi taman itokaiwan : se ika masewaltahtol, oksé ika koyotahtol, wan oksé itokai kisak itech in « sistema de klasifikasión botánika internasional ». in tokaimeh tikinahsihkeh itech se amaix, monotsa katálogo de plantas útiles de la sierra norte de pwebla, méxiko, por migwel ángel martínes alfaro, virginia evangelista oliva, mirna mendosa krus, gustavo morales garsía, gwadalupe toledo olaskonga i alfredo wong león, (méxico, instituto de biología de la unam, kwad. 27. 1 995). satepan este kireprenderwiliaya ahmo kineki saniman muchin yewatl tlakwawia. aw inik ompa senka wekawake inik ompa katka chichimeka asteka in astlan; ontsonxiwitl ipan matlakpowalxiwitl ipan matlaktlonnawi xiwitl, in iw nestika in intlapowal wewetke, inik niman ompa owalkiske onwalpewke onwalewake onwalolinke in astlan, inik no onkan okisako in chikomostok kinewayan, inik niman nikan ye walnenemi; iwiantsin ye yatiwitse, ok ye motlatlalitiwitse nowian in otlipan, amo isiwka in owasiko tenochtitlan, in iw nesitiw tlatsintla in tlein ipan xiwitl asiko. ii tekpatl xiwitl, 1312. se wei axoxtlantli ahnoso ome tsitsikitsin aw ik niman yewantin kimontokatiake in sanno motenewa hermanos in ipilwantsitsin beato hwan de dios, in sano kimokwitlawia hospital desmamparados; ahso san ken matlaktlomomentin in onkan mantiake, se in krus manka kiwikake, itlok mantia ome siliares, iwan se kapa kitlalitia yewatl in hermano mayor ahnoso fundador saserdote, iwan itlok mantiake ome diágonos almátikas kitlalitiake, no saserdotes sanno hermanos in itlatekpampa in itlasotsin totekwiyo hwan de dios. ika nehon titahtanih ihxitla in katka arsinaton den sebada katka nonoteka yonisohsotlaw. aw in teittitiloke kastolose san kolotin tlachichiwaltin, moch amakwawitseke tlatleikwilolo in kiwalmakitiake, moch tlahtoli in imelpan walikwiliwtia, yewan in omikke iwan sekintin ocholoke. w in teteu muchintin walatsontekke kitoke inana. masiuhi in ka wel nikmatiya kahmo imochiwyan x'ochitl in ikpak tepetsintli, ka san tehtexcallah, netzollah, huitztlah, tenopallah, mizquitlah, ahmo ik oninotsotson, ahmo ik nomehyolohwak. i akatl xiwitl, 1207. nemis ne ayahtli itech abril tami xochiyowa ya. —yepanos in fandango. 59. aw noyolotse, nonakayotse, in tlein nimitskwaltia, ipan xikmati in itlasotlakwali, in kwalo nikan tlaltikpak iwan wel motech xikpacho. makamo yuhkin titetl timuchiwas, ka ye tikmati, ka intla kwawak tetl, ka ahmo san seppa in tetsotsonalo inik tlapanis. aw in tewatl makamo miyekpa in tinotsalos, ka yolotli immihtik ka, in omitsmomakili dios. ma xiktlasomati. san ok ye ixkich immokechtlan, immotoskatlan, nimitsilpilia in nimonan, in nimotta. ipan a vii de marso de 1594 años, ipan lunes motlali in ilwitsin sankto in ipan in omotenew xiwitl. wan ihkino kiilwi in kamoj. mochiwa saj. wewehka tlawel tlehkolistli in ipan siudad mexiko a ucho dias del mes de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años in newatl nitekpoyotl nikan ipan tlaxilakali xiwitonko oniktekakilti inik kinamaka ikal in mariana chane sankt ipolito teokaltiltlan oniktenew in makwilpowali pesos se tlakatl kitema español aw ayak otlanankili wel nixpan in nipregonero. tlanki nopa kwentos. in ipan axkan viernes ik xi mani metstli de marso de 1594 años, ikwak possesión kimokwili makok in arsediano don hwan de servantes inik ixiptlatsin mochiw in arsobispo bonila; onkan in iglesia mayor makok, itenkopatsinko mochiw in arkobispo bunila, inin visitador mochiwato in perú. aw in ompa moyetstikatka a la werta sant kosme sant damián matlakxiwitl omei iwan chikontetl metstli in onkan ik walmikwanitsinoke yankwik teopan san diego wewekalko. amo mochipautani, se kichipawa tein se kitoka. ka nika mani in tlatoke tlaxkala, wexotsinko, cholola, chalko, akolwaka, kwawnawak, xochmilko, miskik, kwitlawak, colhuaca”. 8v amatl ini amo tlachikawilili in towei tlatokasin bisorrei don antonio de mendosa; iwa in kename nesitiw inpan in relasión in tlalmasewki in atonalsin iwa in tliltekasin iwa in tenanko kwawisasin iwa iskwawsin, ka mochi okitlake in ome tetepe istake weweitlastike, popotepetl, tlamakas, itwalko, xaltepetl, ixmatlatepetl, kwaposali, kesaltepetl, iwa okseki paraxes, temo ik ilamak ik tekixkitlalpa. aw in chikontetl inik kwikwiltik in ikwitlapan mamanka in kowatl, no ye ik tlatokayoti chikonkowak, ikyetetl in itoka altepetl; ayak ik tlatokayotia, san iyo ik motokayotia tsakwaltitlan tenanko. in tlali ka miak tlakwechawalotl ka sekwispan okiseli, motlaxoxokentia. wan monamaka kwesalan, kihilpiah sehsé manitoj. mochi tlakatl yuh ipan muchiwaya in ahkike kwikwikaya ahnoso momikiliaya kinkimilowaya in ik impan tlatekaya. aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl inik mokwep don christóval kolón in ompa españa, kinwikak in osekintin ikniwan españoles, iwan matlaktin masewaltin, iwan seki in tlein mochiwa onkan ipan tlali, iwan kiteittitito kitenextilito in kostik teokwitlatl in kastila, inik ompa asito ipan viernes in ikkaxtolilwitl mani metstli marso in ipan omotenew xiwitl de 1493. itlanahnamik: tetlakolti wel melawak in miak tlakah amo tlen inon quimatih, nian kikakisnekih inin asikamatil yek ihtoli. ipampa inon tetlakolti nowiampa tiquimitah: xayak ihistalehkeh iwan kokoxkeh tlacanacayoh. kinmolwili "tleyn tikchiwaske?; ka omotsontek ompa in españa, kamo nikan omochiw, ka ompa owala in welitilistli". amosasan, noso ika sente nomaiknin otokahkeh ompa kafenamakoyan totas keh iwan amo nik neki nech onchixtas. aw in yewatsin frai herónimo de sárate temachtiani sant hoseph no senka wel ipan motlatolti, ik motlatlakwawnawatili in papakilistli mochiwas; iwan kihto in korregidor mayor in akike wel mawistik kichiwaske motlaxtlawiske makoske tomines. aw no ikwak tlamato awilisapan in nesawalpili tlahtowani tetskoko, in kasito sano tlahtowani. mantlanamaka aw in ihkwak onkan motlalikol tepetsinko yewatl kikwaya in iskawitli iwan axaxayakatl iwan onkan xihxiyotke iwan onkan ilakilok se tlakatl itoka osomachixkatl nawyowali nawilwitl inik ompa okimatito in itlakatekolokwik aw kinasikatiaya in mexika kinmachtil in i kixtosowaya san ika koche in walake, ompa walkiske in sankta klara. amo sesek, in totonik. wan kwak yonikilkaw kwak akmo kwalika nekwtli nikihnekwi yakmo kwalika akmo niwelilia nihpapapaka kastañas wan de nwebo nihtekan nekwatl nihsemiyaroa. aw kexkich kawitl in ompa nenke, ixtlawakan, aokmo ayak kimati. aw niman ik walmokwepke in mexika, kinnots in inteow, kimilwi xivia, ximokwepaka in ompa anoalake. pachkilit oso tosankwaewat in koltin, in sitin, yewa tomin kipias. in altepepan roma pepeno inik motlalis ipan iikpal in pedro yankwik wei tlahtokateopixki (giacomo dela chiesa) in itoka ik kaxtoli benediktus. miyak onka nakatl aw kin ikwak intla omik tealtiani ipan kitlatiaya. ipanpa tikkakiltia in hustisia inik monamakas kali tlali ixkichin inin tlaitlanilis omochiw in alvaseastin iwan konitoke ka ye chikwei metstli in otsonkis in pregones in ipanpa sentetl kali in kikawtia huliana de san migwel ayakmo haka kikowa. in ipan axkan martes a sinko dias del mes de mayo de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años in tekpoyotl onkan otsatsik in ipan tlaxilakali yaotlika okitekakilti inik monamaka kali tlali in ikal marianan aw in ikwak otsatsik se tlakatl español amo momati in itoka onkan otlanankili kito in chiwknapowali pesos niktemas inik nikkowas in kali in tlali inik tsatsiwa axkan aw ok nikittas aso kwalkan aw niman oksepa on owala in lwis savalos español okito ka neli wel newatl nikkowas in kali axkan okseppa niktlalia chiwknapowali on matlaktli pesos yuh okito testigo tekpoyotl diego astaxochitl. tinechpankixti vi kali xiwitl, 1069. yese ahmo san inon ipampa no iwki niknekiskiani yehika welipan yehika nikan wei kalmekak moyetstikateh miek mawistik tlakatsitsintin siwatsitsintin ma kimokakitikan inin totlahtol ininwewetlahtoltsin in tlamatinimeh iwan wei kwikapihkeh seyok noha kipixtó komo se... padre hesús nasareno, nima ye i kinkwikewa konewaya “moconique akolwake, ye kiwalita chikwaloapa in tepalkapa mochimal petlantiwits. aw i wakaltsintli walitlanok tenochtitla, yokikwi mochiw iskoasi tenochtitla tlatoani. se axoxtsin, solo kenioh kwaltia pahti para okwilimeh kininkixtiliah in pilimej, mah se kinimaka mah kikwakan. aw san wel onxiwitl in ayak arsobispo katka nikan mexiko. tikpia. kanin aw in iskikan wewei teokali omotenew mexiko ka iskikan tlaxikak, iwan inik iskikan ihtik atl molon, inik senka tetentimoman i nowian teopan monasterios; ik niman kakokke kitlaltenke in kapila iwan itlakapan teokali sant augustín, iwan kakokke in altar mayor iwan in retablo. ipan inon tonali sekih tonawaikniwan in ahsiah seminariopa ye kwikapihkeh ye tlahkwilohkeh iwan ahmo san mokatiayah in kinechikoskeh in tlahtoli tekamak papano inin oksehkan senkasan miekkan mokakia iwan itech monekia in ahkin kimawisihtas in kitemakixtis inik moteihtitis in itlamatilis in wewe altepetl in miekpan ahkwalihtolo iwan ahmo ahsihkamacho ya yahki ne temaskali ikwitlapa aw nikan motokatenewa in iskintin in intlalmasewkawan in tekwanipan tlaka in onkan asiko atenko in ikse itoka tsiwtlakawki yaopol tsonpawa, in ikome itoka kwahpitsawak, in ikei itoka wewe nekwametsin, in iknawi itoka ixkotsin, in ikmakwili || 132v itoka yoltsin, in ikchikwasen itoka hekatsin wewe, in ikchikome itoka chalchiwtsin, in ikchikwei itoka hekaxoktli, in ikchiwknawi itoka oselotltewktli ya yewatl in tlahtowani walmochiwtia in wixtoko; oyewantin in in asiko atenko in imasikawan tekwanipan tlaka. ¿quemanyan ahsitih nopilwan wan tanto kemeh tehwa, inon ichpokaton ixpoch ino akinon rei okwikak. ¿timotlachichinaltia? seliya, kenin mochiwa inik ahmo niknekia nitlalkawas welis se metstli ipan oninohwanalti ixkichkaw in tlalmili in notahtsin onechmolwili inon wel kwali nikilnamikia yese in ihkwak ompa onahsito senka oninoixpolo yuhkin kin nikiximati ahmo itech onipachiw yuhkin nopan mochiwaskiani in aik nopan mochiwaya aw in omotenewke mimikkatsitsinti ye kin martes ipan tokoke in innakayo. ta wehkawa xotatok komo kwali kikwik in tit. ¿timo pilia okse kwayekawil? niman kilwi "camo nisia, ka san iw yas!". tehwa tipanok ne tiempo. altepetl apachiw ipan chikóme akatl xiwitl iwan miektin tlakali poliwke. in ipan nawtsontli onchikwasempoali ommakwili xiwitl, kwikamatini in itoka antonio vivaldi, kiyokox wei ikwikapikilis in motokayotia "in nawi xiwkawitl". otikpix. aw inik walmowikak, ye kin onkan in siudad de los ángeles kwetlaxkowapan i walmoteochiwtsinotikis in teoyotika itlahtokayotsin imaktsinko kiwalmokwilitikis in onkan obispo don alonso de la muta i eskobar, wel ipan ilwitsin san migwel. itlanahnamik: tlasohkamati wel miak. mostla ompa nies tlen iman yotokahkeh iwan man miak titlamahuizozqueh. ye nipa itstia itechpa in tewantin tikitowa amilpampa, inik kinextito atentli in itokayokan hamaika iwan okseki atentlali; aw in satepan in oipan kis miyek || 113r netekipacholistli in ipan in inik kinexti tlali. in kwamekat. aw inik techpatiotilia ixkichtech napoali on makwili pesos tosenyolokakopa inik ye tiselia tomines nomatika nokonki aw ayak ma aka techkwitlawiltia aw yuh tikin [borroso] ye inamik in ixkich timako tomines in tokal amo kenmanian titstiwi amo tikitoske in ka san toka onekakayewalok. owakilit moneneloa i san chalka, neliwi wexotsinkatl, i san tlailotlaki, weyi elotl elito. aw yewatl malinero okimitak ka tlaka, ka yewatl in ekatsin tlakatekatl tlapanekatl popokatsin iwa temilotsin tlakatekatl teskakowakatl popokatsin. ¿ kwix neli nemowa kenonamikan? ¿ kwix on tlaneltoka toyolo? tlen kwaltetsitsin xochimeh in xochimila. ika in chichiton max pahkayotika nemi. nima ye ik yaotlatoan kapitán waxyakak, yewanti wia akolwaka. tla amo onka tetlasohtlalistli onka ekalistli. miak tlakah kanowian pahpakilistli kitemoah iwan ayik quinextiah. pero tehwa tehwa amo xikwalani. tla nitlasohtlanis . aw in ompa tsinankatlan ye ompa in mochiwa in aposonali iwan in wel wiyak ketsali, aw sano ikwak tonalwakowak anoso tonaltlekiyaw, ayak tokak; hehekatika motsitsinew in wewei kwawitl. xochiyowa itech noviembre wan disiembre. kitlasohtlayaya inana aw in ilwiw kisaya ipan semilwitonali nawi olin matlakpoali omei ika. amo kwaltia para pahti. 54. intla yuh tikchiwasin inik onimitsnonots, inik onimitsiskali ik neli wel tinemis in tepaltsinko, in tenawaktsinko. ik mowikpa ninokixtia in niwewe, in nilama, in nitlakaskaltiani, in nitlakawapawani. inik ahtle nawaloka yes in kemmanian intla otikan, intla otikkak, intla otikkwik, intla moxilan, intla motoskatlan otikmopachilwi. omolwiltik, omomahsewaltik yewatl ik timonemtis; owets in kwali kwikatl, in kwali tlahtoli; intlakamo xikkwi, omuchiw, omotlaweliltik. san nen in timixtetsapolos, san nen immokwatetsaw tikittas, in tinosiwapiltsin, in tinokonetsin, kanel ahmo tikkwik, ahmo tikan in nanyotl, in tayotl, san mikampa, san motepotsko otiktlas, otikmayaw immotkiloka, immomamaloka. in semi monamaka ne kwesalan. tenonotsali e walaiwa in akolwakan in tlatowani in tekokoltsin, ewanti nonosaloko in tlatilolko tikokyawakatl topantemoktsi, teskakowakatl popokatsin, tlakatekatl temilotsi, tlakochkalkatl koyowewetsi, tsiwatekpanekatl matlalakatsi. para pilimeh ika se kininpoxpiki komo kininkokowa inipox. ipa se taman saj. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. —tlenon ipa namotlakwaltihke axan. in tewantin alkaldes hordinarios por su magestad tamechnawatia in tewatl regidores martin kortes don andonio de mentosa iwan eskribano hoan de san fransisko iwan algwasiles sebastian lopes felipe lwis hwan kano niman isiwka xonwiyan in ipan tlaxilakali san sebastian awatonko xokonmakatin posesion pero dias español iwan inamik sensilia ximenes. in tatsintikatka intokayonkan chikkwiknawtla, in tlatilolkan tsiwa iskich tlakatl tlama; sano iwi in tesontlalnamakuya iskich tlakatl tlama in tlantilolkan tsiwa, sano iwi antetenantitech in itokayonka; sa yncu moch tlamanke in tlatilolkan tsiwa, senka miek imalwa mochiw. iii.- testigo, martin tekaawia ichan kowatlan omonamikti eepowalxiwtia i ye nemi huramento okitennamik in ika bara de hustisia ik otlatlakoltilok inik amo istlakatis ilwilok in tla tistlakatis ka diablo kiwikas in moyolia manima aw in tla wel tokonmelawas motlatol ka ye mitsmotlaokolilis in totekuyo dios yhuan tonantsin santa maria mochipa ichpochtli. nesi okachi kwalii. ¿quexquich se tonalpa kitlani? tlakatl achtoketl tlakwawa; xitekitikan xipensarukan namehwan porke tehwan yetititlami'. aokmo kenmanian aka konixtokas in kali in tlali ka hustisia ixpan otokonkwike in tomines k pesos x pesos inik misa ipan mitos in omomikili iwan imixpan in tlaxilakaleke martin garsia migwel garsia fransisko ximenes migwel hernandes fransisko daniel pedro hakobo martin sanches migwel de los angeles martin kano mochintin okitake in tomines. para ya axkimati aki ya iwan mopixtok in kwowit witsyo. iwan omokwikak: surgir de humildes kunas i en santos ideales para vivir hasta los hechos: es obra de abnegados, es obra de kolosos, ke nasen para gloria i orgulo de los pweblos. mochiwa kwoutah kampa yon amo akah tatexima wan takwechauyan. testigo migwel tlakoch ichan tlachkwititlan omonamikti aw in ixiwtlapowal ye lx siwitl omakok huramento inik otlatlakoltilok inik amo istlakatis ipaltsinko in totekuyo dios. aw inik walmakoke ewatl isiwaw mochiw in kwakwawsin. mochipautani, se metstika satepan se kitoka mah se kichipawa. ompa innamakoyan katka in tlatlakohtin. yewantin kinmakaya in tlakanekwiloke katka. iii akatl xiwitl, 1287. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. tein ika timotequipanozqueh. e iw sexiwitl tlantokanti inik mononotske in tatilulko tlakochkalkatl i mochinti in tiakawa iwan i pipilti in ipampa inik omiktiloke intlantokawa. . aw nikan om pewa in sa kwawtlatolo in tlatilolko. nikan kate in kwawtlatoke in ipan om motlalike in ipetl in ikpal in konkawtia tlatowani mokiwitsin. ihkini kichihki kiapankixtito wahkino kwalanki ¡no xihmaka!" san ka ye ichan wewexochiwake, sa ketsalchimaleke, ye tlatileke ya, yolimale ya, anka kimittotia. ¿quexqui ixamatl kipia inin amoxtli? kaxtolpowali ixamatl. inin xiwpan bernini kitlatsonkixti wei iitwaltsin in san pedro. ixiuyo no ahwiak kemeh sebola, pero amo semi fwerte, tel fwerte in sebola. aw in tetlatsontekilianime in hustisia kimochiwilike inkisidores omentin in tlahtoke se tlakatl itoka el doktor don bartholomé robo gwerrero inkisidor mayor, in ikome itoka don alonso de peralta inkisidor menor. xa itech aichwal, ma kimonekiltitsino in totekwiyo dios ma kwali yektli ik mochiwa, ma tlasenmatikan ma inpan nelti in kwali yektli in teokwaltilistli in teoteyektililistli grasia, in iw kineki in iw kimoyolotia, intla wel neli insentlanekilistika ik wi ma kinmopalewilitsino ma kinmomakixtilitsino in totekwiyo dios, yniqu ixpantsinko wel yeske nemiske yoliske muchipa semihkak. xtechchiwilikan favor. aw in iwktsin newan tlakatke itoka martha iwan magdalena no kinmakatia sentetl kali kalixayo in itik kixnamiktikak tonatiw ikisayanpa in innemak mochiw inik momakixtitia in iwktsin hwana fransiska in iw ipan ka testamento inik okitlaxexelwitia in ipilwan. nikan ipan in, in iw kitowa, in onkan kisako in wewetke in chichimeka in asteka in mexitin in onka itokayokan kinewayan chikomostok; inik walkiske in itik chikomostotl, ka walohomekiske in iwan insisiwawan. in xiutsin. wan ya aisiko ya kiitako komo siempre se kihtowah tein chikawak mexkal kiixkwah iyolo wan ompa ihxikatok mosentilia pulke, wan yehwa se tayi. pero in tiempo den rebolúsion awel ahmo tikatka libre titekitiske. yeka axkiwelitake. xokoyolin se kikwa, se kikwa ikwouyo tein mokohkopina. .topan yas oai. niman ye ik tlanawatia in ichan puchteka. niman ye ik walpewa kitkitiwi in iwitopil yes. aw iwan ye sentsonxiwitl ipan matlakpowalxiwitl ipan senpowalomatlaktli xiwitl onkan kate kulwakan in kulwake inik onkan inpan kalakiko mexika. kwakun yetiwnečikoa' yekyektlalia' tlalia' montones okameyontitlalia' para wisin tlaolkuntli para ahmo palanis tihycktlapačoa'. ih. ye yiman tsatsi teekankí, ¿ye nochtlakatl omosenkawalo tlayi? tlen kawapawiloa ma yenetlalilo intsalan wakaltin; ikan yotlaiwak tokxanaske achi kwalkan tasiske. ompa agwa de kadena titlacuazque. oka iwin in walake in tekwanipan tlaka. koyolchilmoli ika kwitlaxkolnanakatl aw in iakulpan kontlatlalilia tlomaitl. yewatl in tlotli iamatlapal; nenekok in akulpan kon ilpilia, amatl in ik tlatsinkimiloli tlakwiloli tlapaltika tliltika texutika apestli ipan tlapipixoli. kena niitsto se kilo pitsonakatl 120 axkan viernes ik 17 mani metstli hulio de 1609 años, ikwak omomikili in itlasotsin totekwiyo dios in padre pedro sanches teopixki de la kompañía de hesús, nikan mexiko i momikili, senka ye omowewetilitia. in omik walmotlali moteksuma, x tochtli xiwitl in ipan motlali. "ah, wahka yeka iniualauij”. kwalani para ya kipachanito kanela tlatsikwewali okinxexeloke iwan in intsonteko onkan tekpan kiyawak tepilolkwawtikpak okinsasaloke; iwan in inmayekkamkopamakpal kintehtekilike, onkan itlan in intsonteko kisasaloke. ¿cani mokawak? ketsalpapalokalkan ompa ye niwits, nepapan tlahkwiloli ye noyol, in nikwikamitl, ye niktoma ya nokwik. achi iwik tonawia, achin ik tonpapaktinemi toyolo in tlaltikpak. ye ni yoyontsin nixchiyeyelewia nixochikwihkwikatinemi. nochtin pacticateh, tlasohkamati. in okachi weyi ye mosowahtis, iwan in okachi tsikitsin ye kisas nemachtiloyan inin xiwitl iwan pewas momachtis in tepahtilistli. pero nama, bweno, komo ya ika tomi pehki nima ye ik wi kanaske, kwawitik kalake, kwawtitech moketstikak in ichpoch xikomoyawal; nima ye kinotsa in ichpoch, kilwia “nochpotzé, xikwika in kwawtliketski, ka sa motla”. in itakilo monamaka ne kwesalan. aw in istlakatini ye ihkwak kitokayotike in tlatilulka kostemexi; aw yewatl istlakatini in kostemexi ye omomikilike tlatoke. xokokkapol oso noktakapol senka miak onkateh xiwitl, xochikwali iwan cuameh. niman ye mochinti tsatsitewake “macaçocmo nikan kiwalwikaka, ka yuhkin tonextlawal omochiw! ka otikamapowke ka otikopalpowke, ma sano ye kiwalki in itlatol in ocanato”. in kwamekat. kwemeh kintlahpohtika, kitokatika in xinachtli, ka kwepkayotika kipias se kwali pixkixtli iwan ihkin kipias tlen ika kitlakwaltis isenyelis iwan nochi in tlakamekayo. teswakapol viii tochtli xiwitl atle mochiw. san tokochitlewako, san tontemikiko, ah neli, ah neli tinemiko in tlaltikpak. xoxopan xiwitl ipan tochiwaka. wal sesilia, wal itsmolini in toyolo xochitl in tonakayo. seki kweponi, on kwetlawia. aw in omotenew embaxador inik nikan onpew inik yah españa, nikan kantikis mexiko kiwikak se español, amo wel momati in itoka, in hermano in doktor martínes, isekretario muchiwtiw itenkopatsinko nikan visurrei, ipampa kimati in intlahtol haponti ka ompa intlan onemito in ihkwak soldado katka. se wei ayohtli, ahso ome hilo tlapexowili in iuki kitokaitiah por in tsopek wan mochiwa panelaj. aw in axkan itenkopatsinko in tlatowani seinos tonesentlalil ye mochiwa inik ye tokontlaixiptlayotilia in inamik katka amador nangoro itoka maria rodrigwes inik ye tokonmaka tlali sa no onkan in tiankistenko. axkan domingo ik 3 mani metstli mayo de 1609 años, ikwak teochiwalok ompa makok in ipan altepetl de los ángeles kwitlaxkowapan in teoyotika itlahtokayo in don hwan de servantes, obispo waxakak mochiwtsino, in oiw makok teoyotika itlahtokayo ik niman onkan mowikak inik mowetsitito waxakak; inin obispo nikan tlakat mexiko, nikan tepiltsin, intech kisa in konkistadoresme. et san kinchokistlapaloa o anki witsnawakatl in san ye motelchiwtsin, onya o ankin ye mochin ha in tlailotlaki, ah in tlakotsin, ah in tlakateuktli in okihtsin. tlalok ikwik askapotsalko itlahtokatsin, tesosomoktli katka. ¿tlenon momachtisneki karlos? miaktin xochimeh potonih yoyolimeh iwan papaloh, nepa kanikan wal monextiah| iwan pahpakilistika cuah, tikpak patlantinemih mokwa. tlapachohtikateh ika miak xochimeh tlensan kwakwal. tsitsin iwan wel tlapalih. queh. no se kimewa. chilakachmoli ika itsmikilitl aw in ipan in omotenew se akatl xiwitl, 1051 años, onkan in kichiwako kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan onpowalxiwitl ipan onxiwitl in ompa wel itsinekan ik walmo- || 19v -tlalli altepetl tulan, inik niman ipan in xiwitl omotenew opoliwiko. kipawasi nonkwan kipawasi in tlaoli in ipan kitemakaya san ixko kitlatlaliaya achiton; mochiwa saj. se kilo poyoxelchikiwnakatl porfavor, tlakwaka kwaltia in nepapan xochikwawitl on ikak wewetitlan. ketsaltika malintimani yekxochitl motsetseloa. san ketsalpetlakotl ikpak ye nemi koyoltototl kwikatinemi, kinankilia teuktli, kon awiltia in kwawtloselotl. in sesek. yewa kipia miak tomin. aw yewatl in ekatsin tlakatekatl tlapanekatl popokatsin okilwi in malitsin: “cuix ninomawtia? kwix amo sanowi yaopan onimikiskia? ka tel ye ik niaw, siwapilé malitziné”. ka tlalpan tlatotoniayan ohkan kixeloa in xiwitl: xopanistli iwan xokowetskan. aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl ye noseppa kinyaoyawaloskia in mexika in kolwake, in wexotlaka, in kwawnawaka, in xochmilka, in askapotsalka, in tepaneka koyowake, yuh kitowa tewan in chalka. . amo inchan in wal asia aso itla anoso iyawi ichan anoso iweltiw anoso san aka ichan in ipan wal kalakia; q.n. (quitoz neki): umpa nocha in xochitli ikaka in nitlama- kaski ni makwilxochitl. ikawaka kwikatl, oyowali ewatiwits, ome xumali pitsochiyawisotl tlensan tlakayoh in kalohtlipa! tiensan miak tlakah ipan kaltepacholpa! ye imán asitika tlatsakwaskeh itechpa wel ohtotoka ipan ohtli. la weyi altepetl yeyi milon tlakah iwan onkateh miak ohnehnenkeh ipan kalohtin. ix akatl xiwitl, 1371. .o ye mavi noyol yekok senteutl ma tivia (). ostomekatl chakalhoa xiwnakochtla iteamik aw in unkan katka ixiptla yewatl: in motenewaya kwawxikali, unkan moketsaya in ixiptla. inik mikwiloaya in ixiptla yuhkin tlakaxawake itonameyo itech kistoya in itonatiw tlatki yawaltik wei iwitika tlatsakwali, tlawkechol inik tlatsakwali. onkan ixpan mochi waya nesolistli, in tlakokixtilistli, in tlamanalistli, in tlakotonalistli. yuh omtlanawatilike ik okimotlalilike in itokatsin iwan infirmatsin. antonio valeriano martin xwares alkalde migwel de los angeles alkalde. pasó ante mi fransisko maldonado eskribano. kwaltia kampa tlantok in ixkwaxilankali. aw ka umpa walpewa in techichikilko in yewekaw iskawitlaxkoyan tonatiw ikisayanpawik aw onpa tlami tonatiw ikalakiyanpa in onkan ikak teokali san pablo in iw onikwaltekpantia in tlali in ixkich techpopowi kamo nistlakati ka san nimomakixtia ipaltsinko in totekuyo dios. san ye ontlamachotok a in tepilwan, in pilin: satepan v akatl xiwitl, 1367 años. tlaseseya wahkino tlaminako tonati itlanahnamik: aw in kiyawalotoke in tlalwaktliipan tlaka in walachiya ye tlapopotstoke in atlitik; aw ka yuhkin in tsoyak yewatok in kiwalinekwi, ka mieyekintin inik mikke iwan poposawake. talkakawat .amo kin mostla amo kin wiptla. aw in newatl eskrivano nonbrado nikitoa ka nehoatl onikikwilo eskritura de venta yoan ka nikimixmati in okichiwke yoan testigos inik neltilia nikan niktlalia notoka yoan no firma omochiw sempoali on chikwasen metstli de setiembre de mil e kinientos i noventa i seis años. intekopatsinko hwes gobernador gwilermo krusate eskrivano. mochipa ixpan chokaya inik kitlatlawtiaya in tlakatekolotl tetsawteotl in ma kinpalewi in ma kinmanawi in imasewalwan; ka nel kimoteotia san isel, ka amono kinmoteotia in inteowan in asteka in chikomostoka ka sentlamantin. niman komamake chikwetetl akatanatli, niman ye mowika in tlamamake konkawanto in ompa katka xakaltsinko. in teopan okachi kwakwaltsin tlen onikonitak. . aw in is katki in imixkoyan itlatki katka puchteka tepeyo teokwitlatl iwkin tlahtokayotl konmakia in ompa tlahtoke, amo xinechkekelo ta chikomexochitl. ye kwali otoyeyantihqueh. ¡tienzan tlatotonia! nikan mexihko amo keman se mitonia; noso impan in metstin abril iwan mayo, kema. xik tlapo in tlaixnextilotl man kalaki in ehekatl ihkion ye kwali ticateh. amo nochi in kwahxiwitl sepan necih. in monotsa tepechilkwowit, por in mochiwa itech tepet. wei mawkatlakamiktilistika mexikah kilwikixtike inin inteokalchalis. noha mokawako otitlanamakaya ayok kiwelitake para ma itsto. in moch kitkitikak in innakayo in intlachielis: in ahmo ixmamawi, in ahmo ixmihmiki in akan mitsakwilia in wel im ixiktlan tlachie. ximotalwi notatsin. wan nepa kaninyaw tlakawatiw ika ni karga in lá otlakaw sanwiliwi ka markante. konitoke ka inin kaltsalantli ka yepa tsawktikatka in ik keski xiwitl aw kin yewatl kontlapo in anton de san fransisko kin ye makwilxiwitl in okontlapo itech powtika in anton de san fransisko ik senka otoyolopachiw in tewantin alkaldesme aw ipanpa in axkan titlanawatia san iw tsawkties in kin inin tsawtikatka. ii kali xiwitl, 25. —tičiwke papas moli ika chiles berdes ika moronga. ninemieskia aw in ikome kinmotlalilitasiko itoka lisensiado hwan agwado, inin ayemo kichiwa missa, in ihkwak toprovisor omuchiw timasewalti; inin imomextin españa kinwalmowikili in teotika tlahtowani arsobispo, no iwan in onpa españa kiwalmowikili maseskwela itoka don melchior aríndes, nikan mexiko powki in. yahki ya i wewehtsin, i chimali xochioktla ika iwintiwa ye onkan kwexteka, netotilo ya in atlixko se kwarto tlalkakawatl kwalika, ompa tiohueh. ximotlalihtsino, ernesto. ¿catlehua tepachichik timonekitia, tliltik noso chipawak? aw no ikwak ipan in in tepew in wewe motewksoma ilwikamina in kowaixtlawakan; aw no ikwak in ipan in tlalpoliw teposkololam tlaka, pewaloke. aw in timasewaltin sant fransisko sant hoseph senkiske, niman ye ik oneowa in kixowato; onkan ayotikpak ikiyawak in augustín gwerrero in monepanoto masewaltin in españolesme, inik onkan onsetiak tlayawalolistli; niman ye wilowa in kixowato konseptión monhas, niman sankto domingo, niman enkarnasió, sankta katharina de sena, tekpan kiyawak iglesia mayor. wel kwali tlakah in pipiltontin. aw ik niman ye mononotsa in akxoteka in chalka, ye kimolwia "auh akike o, akin ye wits?; tla kimonittati!". aw inik walkalakke ichkweitl ichwipili ichmaxtlatl chalchiwitl, san ok tepiton teokwitlatl. ipan nawtsontli onkaxtoli onsempoali omei xiwitl, fransisko vila miktilo. aw in testigo niman ontlankili kitowa ninomakixtia ipaltsinko in totekuyo dios inik nikmati in itechkopa in pablo makwex in niwalnos kali on mani chichikatl aw ipan ni tlatowani motelchiwtsin onkan onmokalti in itoka pablo makwex. kwaltia aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl ix xitin in chalko amakemekan tepetl in kitokayotia ixmatlatsin, inin nepantla aktika istaksiwatl iwan popokatepetl, aw senka miyek in kisako atl inik ix xitin tepetl; no iwan senka miyekintin neske in tekwanime, senka miyekintin kimkwake in pipiltsitsintin. e, tlahtoani e, ma xikmottili katli yewatl yes in ineskayo tikmihtlanililia, ka niman niyas niknihtlanililitiw in ilwikak siwapili onechhualmotitlanilih. onkan techkawke in padreme sant fransisko, san exiwtike in iskatka. xkinkwexanolti, xochiyowa itech abril wan mayo, para agosto onkak ya xantiaj. axkan hweves in ik 30 mani itlamian in metstli oktubre de 1614 años, ihkwak teotlak ye chikwasen tsilini omomikili in lisensiado antonio rodrígwes oidor katka nikan mexiko audiensia real; aw ye kin imostlayok ipan viernes teotlak in motokak inakayo san fransisko, onkan no motetokiliko tlahtowani visurrei don diego fernándes de kórdova iwan mochintin in audiensia real tlaka oidores, alkaldes de kortes iwan i yewatsin in arsobispo don hwan péres de la serna. yeka yoyekawi in tilmahtli. tlen 11 tlanawatihkayotl. nochi tlakameh intechpowi welis kalakiseh ipan totlanantsin, ipanquisaseh, nemiseh inahuactipah, mochanpatlaseh, iwan amo monekis amatlakwiloli, amatlapanoli, amatlamanawili noso sekinok tlamantli amatlanequilmeh. inin tlapechpowili tlatskitos ipan tetlatsakwiltiani tekiwa itlanawatil, tlen keman onkas tlatemiktilistli noso tlahtlakoli, itlanawatil tekiwa tekichiwani, tlen keman amo nochi nesis ipan tlanawatili tlen sehkanoh yohuih, tlen sehkanoh walawih iwan nochi ikwalnemilis totlalnantsin, noso axkwaltlakameh sehkanok ewanih tlen chantih totlalpan. kabalos. iwan, yuh mihto, ka san niman aokak kinkawaskia in okichtin españoles, in wewentsitsin in iyoloko okichtin in telpopochtin, sa se inik ye mochi okichpipiltsitsinti mochintin kinmiktiskia wel kinpopoloskia, inik aokmo yewantin tlapilwatiskia aokmo yewantin tlakaxinachoskia; iwan kil no kinmiktiskia in señorati in ye ilamatsitsin in aoktle innekoka, iwan inmanel kin iyoloko siwa iwan kil inmanel noso || 187 oqu ichpopochtin intlakamo wel chipawake, kil intlakamo wel kwalxayakeke mochintin kinmiktiskia, intla welitini san kintlapepeniskia. aw nikitoa axkan ye senmayan nimitskawilia in naxka okatka nimitsaxkatia ye maxka motlatki mochioa tikinkawilitias tikinmakatias in mopilhoan moxwiwan in motechpa kisaske imaxka in tlatki mochiwas aokmo kenmanian ninoxikos ninotlatolkwepas nikitotiw ka san noka onkakayaoalok amo ipatiw in nimitsmakak san nechxixikoke in ma nel kenmanian tlasotitiw kali tlali in ya ompa titstiwi aokmo ninotlatolkwepas ye senmanyan nimitsmakawilia. "kuatini, ya ximewakaya in kwamekat. kitekih ika garabato kampa maahsi por in wehkapan mopilowa itakka. nechka nima ye kolwakatl, walteyaka kwawtexpetla. —akin tía akin. inon nian tlen ipatin. kenin mochiwa tein chichiltik achi tepitsin tsopek in itakka.kitokah kaltsintan oso kajfentaj. inik itech yes in tlakwalamatlasentlalili in ye wehka mokwahtiwits ompa momosko malakachtepek, onechihtlanilihkeh in tlahtolpewalistli; onikpanawilti in sente wewentsin techmononochilis in itlalnamikililistsin, ¿ahquin okachi kwali? wel neli sente wewe miltekitki in senka kwali kimiximachilia tonemilis. nikan ka itlanankililistsin in wel onechmomakiliani saso in ahkin wewentsin itechpa onikmotlahtlanilili ihkwak ok nipipilton iwan ok nikmotlahtlanililia axkan in ye opanok miek xiwitl. in inmandamiento doktor sorita nawatlatolkopa. "para axkana tihwikas komitl wexotsinko ikwik mach ok achika, nika nontlapia i ye askapotsalko iyo owiya, etc’”. —solo diós komo ahmo nikoni ahmo mati kuškwalika o ahmo. ome tlahkoxonakatl ahmo wel wehyi ok sentlamantli inik mokwa in ayohtli, itoka ayohtlatlapa; inin mochiwa yuhkin nikan mihtoa kwali mopaka in ayohtli; moyexkampanakaseteteki iwan intla moihpotokwikxitia wel imman ihtik in wei sokikaxitl, tsimpatlawak, moteka in atl iwan motlalia in owatlapechtli, ahmo wel itech in atl yes in tlatlapechton; sekni mochiwa in senka tetsawak nekuhatoli ika pilonsilo iwan kanela in motlalihtiw ipan ayohtli noka wiksi. no yuhki kwali mowikxitis ihtik in texkali ahnoso ihtik in xoktli ika atl; intla yuhki mochiwa iwan ye owiksik, motlalilia tlatsopeliloni yese kemmanian ahmo itech moneki ipampa in ayohtli senka tsopelik. in ayohtli, in ihtik senka kostik, kemmanian ye achi chichiltik, senka tsopelik. intla in ayohtli ihtik senka ixtenextik, achi muchipa sesepoltik. inhin upa ixtiwia nepanixtiwia in tenochka in tlatilulka, iskipa intlatki yetiwia tototl michi kwiatl. aw axkan itlamian metstli hunio de 1609 años, ikwak otlamiko in iski akalotli ipan mexiko omoyekti omosokikixti, in ipampa atl in moyekti; inik nemowak nawtetl metstli. inik kinmomoyawke kinsesenmanke in masewaltin; aw amo san kexkich inik miek in mikke, iwan sekintin ilpiloke, aw in oknosekintin miyek in tlakochiwaloke. nesi chikome iman yowali iwan ontlami mahtiaktli iwan se iman. vi tochtli xiwitl, 1238 años. ye yiman on notatsin omaniliaya tekitl ke inon mitoa ika estaho. iwan onkwan kwali motekitilis omewtsinoaya yeyi hora watsinko; nikas motlatlalwis tlaoli, noso mepopowis, noso mometsontekixtilis. iwan ikwak asis chihnawi tlatepostlamachotiloni notatsin yomosenkawili se tarea; san niman omaxitiaya kalitik; yekan almasal. omamasalwiaya ika ye moli noso chilatl ika nakatl iwan omitiaya inenewtsin. mochiwa nikan por tonalixkopa, ompakawin tel onkak in tawelita kampa takawani. onemikeh okilwikixtike apasko inik ome yankwik intlew ipan orne akatl xiwitl, in oyuh okaxiltike okse imaxka xiwmolpili. nelí motlalohki yahki asta ateno aw i yewantin omotenewke in xochteka in ulmeka in xikalanka in kiyawisteka in kukolka, ye omihto, in onkan kiketske in inteokal in ikpak tepetsintli chalchiwmomostli, onkan ihtik mextikatka atl, aw yewatl in kimoteotike in atl. tonochtin tichochoka iwan otikmotenewilike chalma ika tonantsin gwadalupe. tla nankimosewiliske ¡toteotatzin chalma iwan tonantsin gwadalupe! sesen xiwitl tamechmotlapalwitiwe ika nochi toyolo. iwan tonantsin techmekanilitas. wel miak tamechtlasohkamachililiske ipampa tetlakolti tihpopolwiske tonantsin tokawaske tiknome. ¿ahquen tekitis, ahken kimoxotis piltsitsintin inomekes tziquitzitzin? ome tasa kowatlankapoli mochiwa saj. ipan in xochimila noihki in nantli kitoka nochi kilitl. 83r i akatl xiwitl, 1363. tlanamakaskiaya aw amo onnestikatka in se tlakatl. nanawatsin unkan tewan tlakaktikatka in nenonotsalo niman ik yewatl konnotske in teteo, kilwike timitstlahtlaniliah se favor. nokniw, nokniw yaya aso neli nokniw, san itlatoltsin san ik tontoneki ye ika nokonelnamiki o tamapoliwi. a iska in toxochiw. itakka se kikwa. tlili, tlapali, ohtli, teyakanki, tlanelo, teyikani, tlahikani, tlayekanki. ken in kinonotsaya in nantsin isiwapil itech nehin tonal, lunes a xi de oktubre de 1604 años, ikwak pew in sant fransisko in expa tlayawaloloya semilwitl: yowatsinko nepantla tonatiw ye teotlak kimokixtiliaya in sakramento. nikan chanka. in iw tlamanitia mochintin komendadores in ompa ik nowiyan moyetstikate fransia, italia, españa, in iskikan ik kimopielilia iteokaltsin in ihospitaltsin intlasottatsin san antonio abbad, ka nel ilwikakpa tlamawisoltika ik kinwalmotlalili iwelitilistikatsinko in totekwiyo dios, inik onkan otsintike opewke yewantsitsin in omotenewke tlasopipiltin teopixke klérigos komendadores inik monetoltia kimokwitlawitsinowa hospitales. x tekpatl xiwitl, 1164. seki kikwah in itakilo. aw in miskitl, in nopali, iwan okseki nepapan xiwtohtontin onkan mochihchiuhani, iwkin ketsalistli, iwki in teoxiuhitl in iatlapalo ik nesi; aw in ikwawyo, in iwitsyo, in iahwayo, iwki in kostik teokwitlatl ik pepetlakka. kwahkwaltsi tekitini kintemo inik iii nikitowa nechmakas yei pexo in martin aka ichan tesontlalnamakoya in tlaokistlaw misa ik nopan mitos. kimopouhililia in iihiyotsin in itlahtoltsin ilwikak siwapili, in inetitlanis; no iwan kimolwilia in ixkich oquimahuizoh, in okittak, in okikak. aw in oselopan niman ye kitowa "ynyoyahué!, anka yewatl inin inik otiwalnentlamatiake". xii kali xiwitl, 1517 años. amo se kinamaka. aw iwan ye onpowalxiwitl ipan chikonxiwitl in ipan v tochtli xiwitl, 1562 años, in omomikili tlakatl don christóval de gusmán sesetsin tlahtowani tenochtitlan, in ipiltsin don diego wanitsin, in tlahtokat chikwasen xiwitl. tehwa taltikpaktsin, akolih —kači kwalika kwak timotlahchikiliaya. yewantin in panwetske in wexotsinko ikwak in yahki chalkayotl, in iw nesitiw ipan xiwitl in ipan poliwke chalka. mochiwa ne kalikampa wan ne tahchiktekopa. —oc tewatl, ok kwel tewatl. nanawatsé, mayekwel! ipalnemowani mokekeloa, san temiktli in tokotoa, in tokmiw, on tlaneltoka toyolo, mokekeloa yewatl. in unkan kipiaya intlatki in itlaaltilwan katka innechichiwalis in ixkich omito in tilmatli in maxtlatl in kaktli in kweitl in wipili i ye mochi. michwatsaltepiton ticpiah. se kinamaka. aw iwan ya yepowalxiwitl ipan nawxiwitl in ipan 1 kali xiwitl, 1545 años, in toyakakpa estli kis; ipan ikwak moman in tiyankistli sant ipólito. kwitaxkolxokoyolin oyahqueh. mah wetsik itech totatoktsin. nikan ipan motlatokatlali in ketsalmamalitsin ahto tlatoani mochiw teotiwakan. onen tasiko, tonkisako in tlaltikpak. aw sanno ikwak mik in kwitlawatsin tlahtowani katka in wexotlan. aw aso yuhki akanosomo?; kamo wel melawak momati in aso tlaneltokaya in ikwak walolinke in ompa astlan, aw ka san in iw melawak momati yeppa tlateotokani inik motenewa gentilesme. ¿quezqui xiwitl moptlia mokoltsin? ikwak karransistas oyahke techkwito otewalikake tlaka hasta xochimilko iwan ipan sementerio otekalakike. tlen otiwalake ika yowali otikiske momochko malakatetikpak keman chiknawi noso matlaktli tlateposmachotiloni. nochtin tlen otiwalake ika yowali otiwalmomamakaya tlaoli, yetsintli, awax iwan itik xinachtli noihki omoten tepitsin tomin. iwan okseki ipan onekwitlalpilo. onkwan on tla tlaotekixtiliani yetsintli noso tlaoli amo nochi otekixtiliani. nawi axoxtlantli in totechpan ka. aw ye ixkich kawitl kipia kichiwa in inpilwan fransisko martin iwan lorenso thomas aw axkan ye onxiwitl in ayokmo kichiwa. kana nontlapolos nontlaatoktis nontlachitonis: ka ik pachiwia in amoyollotzin. noyol sewiski; "nelí, nimitsilwi amo xinechkekelo ix kali xiwitl, 1501 años. yei xumali pitsochiyawisotl moxeloan chalkatl,moneloa ye onkan almoloya, 28. aw iwan ma tikmokwitlawi in istlaktli, in tenkwalakti, ka ahmo iwiyan yektli, ahmo iwiyan kwali. ayak wel tetlok, tenawak ye ka, ye nemi; san axixpan, san kwitlapan tekixti, temayaw. ye kwali, ye yektli intla mixpan oihtolok, otenkwalok in kwali tlahtoli, in wel ihtoloni, in wel tenewaloni, in ahmo tlahtlakoloni. intla tikihtos, ahmo tiktsonewas, ahmo tiktlapiwis intlakamo iwampo ahmo tikwampotis. san ixkich in kexkich otikkak in tikihtos inik ahmo titlahtlakos. mokwakwalatsa in tomatl ika chili iwan axox, satepan motesi. motlalia kaxitl tleko ika pitsochiyawisotl, ma kwali totoni; motlalilia in chiltextli ika tomatl iwan axox ma kwali tlewaki; motlalilia in yepasohtli iwan in okonanakatl in ye kwali tlachipawtli; wehkawi ipan tletl ixkichkaw in ye kwali owiksik. aw in asiko in atentlipan yewatl in omotenew in tlakatl wewetewktli in chichimekatewktli iwan in omotenewke in eintin ipilwan: tliltekatsin iwan xochitsin iwan in atonaltsin; iwan in intlatsin in itoka mapiwatsin tewan onkan asiko, inin inewan tlakati in wewetewktli. kipia senka yankwik iwan kwakwaltsin se kwatlasekawil. inik motenewa chikomostok ka chikokkan in koyonki texkali ostotl; aw inik motenewa tsotsompa ka sanno || 22r walmotsotsonaya in akali itech in tepetlamimiloli onok in itech ka chikomostotl, in san itech walmotsotsona atl in akampa wel walkixowa itlakamo san onkan chikomostok. tkki n ati tiwalpanuke tiwalkiske de atl tikahsiko kamion ngani techia para ompa tiwalahke michoakán tikochiko? tech in otel. non nawi tomin ika dies sentabos wan in trese reales non yehwan. aw san ixkich ikan in senkamatl tlatoli niman walkis in tlanextli in weweintin in tonatiw iwan metstli, iwan in walcholowa tlawiskalpa in tetlanextilia sitlali, iwan in oksekintin tetonalmakani in motokayotia planetas sisitlaltin, iwan kinmochiwili in ixkichtin in oksekin in amo sa kexkichtin in amo san tlapowaltin, in senka tlanextia sisitlaltin in senka tlakwalnextitoke, in amo mach iwki, in ixkich nepapa xochitl in kinmotlalili ilwikatitech: in tonatiw wei tlawili inik yewatl yes tetlanextilis tlanextli in ipa semilwitl, aw i metstli tlawiltepitsin inik yewatl tetlanextilis tlanextli in ipa yowali. aw ye kin imostlayok domingotika i wel ipan ilwitsin sanktiago in ik 25 hulio, in pahpakowak in ilwitl mochiw tlatilolko inik motlapo teopankali; yewatsin imaktsinko yekaw in padre frai hwan torkemada in tlamiko. aw sa walatwi in kiwalwikake walilpitiake, kimoniilpiko kwawtitech ichan awitsotsi in akatlyakapa. ompa ye walmonetoltia, kitoke "totecuiyohuané, ma ixkich, ma owameleltsin kis; oitsinko ikpaktsinko tinenke in tlakatl totekwiyo"; aw inin: "ma titlakalakikan in onkan in ihiyotl ankomomachiltiske; ma tontlakwawtsotsonati ma tontlatetemanati, ma tonkalketsati; ka ompa totewk-wakan yes in mexiko tenochtitlan, in otonmaxitiko, in timexikatl in titenochkatl!". in ipan in martes a 21 de henero, ikwak tlaixmanalok in sankt ipólito tiankisko, wel mosenkaw in inawkampaixti; inik mexiko iwan tlatilolko mito akaxitl onkan momanas, iwan mokwawaki mowexoaki. mah amo kwalanikan, tikitah ayok wahkapa eltó komo in mochiwa kahfentah wan kampa kuamayouij, itech chalawihkwowit wan ayakachkwowit. aw yese || 107r sa se motlali tlahtowani in tsakwaltitlan tenanko itoka weweyotsintli tlailotlaktewktli mochiw, inin ipiltsin in kakamatsin teowatewktli; aw iwan omentin itewktlahtokawan inik mochintin kintlali awitsotsin: in ikse itoka xiwtsin tlatkik tlailotlaktewktli, ye omito tlakpak inin ipiltsin in kwawtlewanitsin; in ikome tewktlato itoka atlawtekatltewktli. kiski in 11 akatl xiwitl de 1607 años. kiniwaltitlanki ma tlachiyaki ni tlalchi tikselia in imixpan testigos tlatsintlan tenewtikate ye ik senmayan timitsmakawilia in omotenew tlali in tla miek ipatiw mochioatiw aokik tle tikitoske aokik titotlatolkepaske yehika ka wel titechmopalewilia i ipan tonetolinilis. aw in omotenew ixwiwtsin ik kitlalike in tlapiaske nikan ipan siudad mexiko, inteyakankaw imachkaw mochiw in ixkichtin soldadostin, motlalike in yaotlapiaske in ipampa makokwisneki in yaoyotl kihtowa tliltike iwan mulatoti inpan in españolesme; inik mochi tlakatl kihto ka ipan in hwebes sankto kichiwaske in intemiktilis tliltike. kenin mochiwa yewa maltihtika ika atotonki. yewa amo kixmati. in otepew in kwawnawak; nima e kinawatia, e kilwia i tlakatekolotl: “ticmati e iskich in titokniwa, e niauh”. wan kitsowiteki. in kwoutsin. iiii akatl xiwitl, 1275. michiwauhatoli kwitlatepoltochmoli in trigo mobarbecharoa in tlaltikpaktli wan satepa yemosemana in semiya. noponi mochihki. in ti yovalavana in ti xipe totek tleik in "y ketsalavevetl q.n. id est ye tlaketsalpatia ye tlaxokovia ye xopantla. aw in tlakwak ikwak in wia in tlatowani ichan tolnawakatl in nechmakak o[n]pan ichan imixpan martin chachal iwan saka[n]katl tolnawakatl imixpan in kowatlayawke aw in ye nowiani in mopowan in iskikan ka moch inyolokopan intechmomamakili in totlatokaw in don diego de san fransisko. mochiwa iselti, ixwa iteyo. sitlaltepek ipan axiwako tlawiskalpotonki chichimekan. amo mochipautani, kemeh itech kwowit in ewa. kinekia motlamachnemiliskeh ahki mowenmanalis inik tlatlapiwilis ipan semanawa metstli iwan tonatiw petlanaskeh sa iwi in mochiwaya in ye wekaw in ik tealtiaya in ipan panketsalistli. et se kikwa taamanal sah ika epasot wan no se kikwa tatsoyon oso akoloj. etaxkal no se kikwa. wan no kwali se kikwa piksatamal. ihwak selik exot, se kipixka wan se kichiwa piksa. semi welik in iayo se kimana. in amo se kitokaj, mochiwa saj. xochiyowa, ihwak pewa pankisa ya in pahpatatsin. ka ye se xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. —de wehka awel nitlacha wehka ahmo nikta. kilit, nanakat wan takilot tein tikwah mah amo kwalantikan ika niminkafenkon. seki mokamowiyah aw no ikwak tlalpoloto in mexika in itstonpatepek. itakka se kikwa. aw in ik okkan tlatotoniaya ompa in ikalakian tonatiw mitowaya siwatlan: no nawpa in koniawa in itlema. niman unkan asiko teutwalko, nawilwiti nekalistli. i wan oksé oksé sitlali wal kisaya in kometa ik sur. se kilo karpamichin aw iskatki ok onikelkawka nomakwis kipia in matheo abrian nechmakas 2 pesos aw nechaxtlawis nechmakas in 2 pesos aw kandela ik nopan tlatlas. inik niman ok nen kalaktiwetska teopan, onkan kinkixtiskia || 272 in omotenew teniente, inik onkan kiwalmotlake tepustlawitoltika pistoletetika, ik yewatl niman momikili in teniente; inin temiktihke ye omotenew yewantin, in españoles eintin iwan se tliltik ahnoso mulato. aw nikan ka oksentlamantli intlahtol kitlalitiwi oksekintin wewetke katka, yuh kitotiwi in. chikome tochtli xiwitl ikwak walkalak in tepanekatl in onoka kwawtla yetepek. tlahko kilo pitsonakatl in ye tlatextli mochi onkan kontlalia in ixpan iyakatekutli in ik onkan ittos in iwki intech kitlaliske tlaaltili. unkan ka kitemawisoltiaya in ik teyolwaia. i kotlalike kin ikwak e sekni omotlalike, in ixkich kawitl wateyakan tenoch sa senkatka in kwawkwawtsin in tenochka. axkan amo ohualahqueh, mostla onhualazqueh. niknechiko koskatl,in ketsalin patlawak, nikan ipan in in momikili in chimalpopokatsin tlahtowani tenochtitlan, in tlahtokat matlakxiwitl. katarinachilmoli ika naboxiwitl kampa amo teyi tatok. ii tochtli xiwitl, 1286. aw ye kinmomakili in tonantsin sankta iglesia in iteooktakanemilismachiyotsin in ireglatsin sant augustín in iteopixkatenemitiayatsin in teoyotika nehtoli, aw kiwalwika kitlalia yewatl imhabitotsin ipan powi in san ixkich ik machiyotinemi se krus ahnoso se tau xoxoktik; inin miek abbadías iwan prioratos onkatki || 251 in fransia iwan italia, in ompa in wel motlakamati mokwiltonowa, iwan in españa onkatki nepapan hospitales in onkan pahtililo kokoxke in ikokolistsin san antón, ka yewatsin kimopialia intatsin mochiwtsinowa san antonio abbad in omotenewke kanónigos reglares klérigos komendadores. kil ihkwak mikke iwan sekintin yahyake in tulteka, ipan ihkwak tlahtokati in chalchiwtlahtonak tlahtowani kulwakan; yese ayemo ihkwak in in poliwke tultekake, ye kin ipa tlatsintlan ye onnesitiw. kampa tehwa timoixpetania. ma san tontlapinawti, ma titechpinawti in puchteka in ostomeka in iyake in tealtianime in tekowanime. asta nechkokoaya se lado inoman nechkikikkitikak nechpahpachilwitikak inoman se lado noman, nin lado noman nechpahpachilwitikak para ahmo nolinis para ahmo nihmakas m: fe maleta. inik kimakak no techtlatlani in tlatowani soritan kito wel xikmelawakan in ye keski xiwitl kipia tlali in kitlachkwitlas aw inwan inik kitek chinamitl makwiltetl. iskinadohxokoyolin in teoaxochitl, in tlachinolxochitl ik iswayotimani, ika iwintiwa in tonawak onok. aw i yewantin in chalka ka kimilwiaya in inteowan katka diablosme "oc wits in akin ankichia". kwaltia wan ompa nitanotsati, ka inkalipan yautiwa ka tlatlas in inkal. . aw in ixkich kawitl nemitiwi anawak aik seppa mahmowia moxima, san yo mokechaltia amo polaki ixkich kawitl mosawtinemia. aw inik mowikak españa ompa mochiwtsinoto presidente del real konseho de indias, in ompa moyetstikatka ika ixkichkaw in ipan mowikak xiwitl aw ixkich ik walantika yewatl ipan xiwitl de 1592 inik momikili ompa españa; in ompa moyetstikatka chikwasen xiwitl. "hombre de san hwan aw machistito in ompa inkisisió in amo tlateochiwali, anok in ompa sankto ofisio ipan; aw in oittok in ka neli iwki, ik tlatilok. ome litro atl man se kwali yowali, nomaikniwan. ayemo walasi, inik tik chixtikateh satepan walas. in iuki kilwiah por in tel uitsyoj. tlawel techtlakasoló niman mowikake tlatoke eintin: kwawtemoktsin tlatilulko tlatowani, niman kowanakochtsin chane teskoko, in iei tlakatl tetlepanketsatsin chane tlakopan, iwa osekitin tlatoke. san niman okalakoaya nenenkatsitsintin nochi in otli kampa kate ome tsitsime. tlanonotsaloya kename tlakatl ye okipiaya isiwaw iwan ipilwan. iwan siwatl mate omik inamik. inin tlakatl okitlalwi siwatl kwikas chalma. kenin oyoleke, oyake. iwan ipampa otlatlakoke toteotatsin okinmokwepili kwawtin. mota kename monawateki iwan itsintla inin kwawtin pano tepitsin apantli. nochtlakatl tlenin owilaloya ken ihtitsin okipiaya tlen mitotiske ixpan in kwawtin. seki tlakatl okikawaya in kwatlasekawil. seki siwame ompoyon omitotiaya iwan okseki okitekia intsonwan iwan okipiloaya itech kwawitl. seki siwame okisiotomaya intsotsoma iwan okipiloaya itech kwawitl. mitoaya noihki okipiloaya itech kwawitl ixik konetl ika papaltelton. tla yomitotike iwan nochi yokipililoke, iman on oksepa nenemi ye motlasa kampa axiwas chalma. mitoaya kename ompoyon mokawa siawistli ompa itsintla inin kwawtin. xix pregon.- a tres dias del mes de mayo de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in tlaxilakalpa kolwakatonko okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal in itlal isabel maria okito in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak otlanankili testigo martin garsia. ante mí fransisko maldonado eskrivano. teyewatsin kipia yeyi powali iwan chikweyi xiwitl. omonamiktihkeh ipan nawitsontli kaxtolpowali iwan chiknawi xiwitl, achto teinkonen teyewa notahtsin; teyewa ye axkan yeyi xiwitl omikoak. in teawi tetlak nemiwa, in ye yeyi siwakonetl oquipixqueh. tewan welihki tlacacalata» tli oticoncaqueh. aw ka ixko ikpak on tlachiasneki in tlakatl in tetsawitl in vitsilopuchtli. setsin konkotonilisneki in ikokokaw in ikokow. "inkimachiliaj initlaxikowah ka ye nimitsnotlalkawilia, noxokoyow e, nochpochtsin e, tlakatl e, siwapile, ma ok ximoseuhitsino. niman ik ye in ichan moseuhito. aw in oasiko sant hwan kaltenko xochitika namikoke iwan kinxochitsetseloke, wel kinmawistilike in siwapipiltin; aw onkan walmowikake in tlahtoke oidores iwan visurrei, onkan machtiloke in ipan missa. mochiwa kajfentaj. oyuhki in inik momoyawake in chalka in amakemeke, inik axkan mitowa motenewa in amomolokko nexexeloloyan. aw akan tlawelmatke, ka senka weka in walewake senka wei in tlali kiwaltokake, wel iwiyantsin in owalatiake, ok owalmotlatlalitiake in ohtlipan; inik satepan amo isiwka in owasiko nikan tenuchtitlan, in iw niman ye onnesitiw tlatsintla in tlein ipan xiwitl ahsiko. komino, ixkich in kikwi tomahpil opanoya se aka okinekia panos in ihpak mimikes. noihki tlakayo tlachantlaka omimihki ikan san tlalwis omokwekwepotsaya. se ichpokatl ipan tlapantli ompa ihtik ikal okaxili tepostlakweponili iwan san niman omik. ihki on okseki tlaka omimikia. kanin onka kwahtlah iwan atoyatl, in pilantoton kinpaktia momostla maltizqueh. itokatsin malintsin; tenamik itokatsin mauro melo. noihki okinmomachtiliaya pipiltoton. itik on tlamachtilkali onohtiti nikiixmatis se, ome, yeyi letra iwan ihki kwilos noihki nitlapoas. semi sesek ta teamikseuij. testigo. migwel makwes ichan san hwan tepetitlan omonamikti in ixiwtlapowal yehepowali xiwitl onmatlaktli okichiw huramento inik otlatlakoltilok inik amo istlakatis in ipaltsinko dios etk. titečtlamaka' wan tikalake' ihteki de kin ganin tosewiske. asan tiwarsiko oksepa towantukwepke i’kwakun tiwasiko. se tochtli in ahmo wel wehyi akamaya ya misotlak ompa kemah matsiutok miak, pero amo semi mochiwa nikawín. aw no ikwak chapolkwalok toktli in chalko; yuhki in mixayawitl anoso yuhki in mixtli inik tetsawak inik wia. en la siudad de mexiko a nweve dias del mes de hebrero de mil e kinientos i setenta i ucho años in mawistililonime señores don antonio de mendosa yoan fransisko martin alkaldes hordinarios in ikatsinko su magestad in newatl diego leonardo eskrivano in nikan audiensia en mexiko. aw ka ixkichkaw onkan tlahtokat in atenko chalchiwtepek in atonaltsin chichimekatewktli in kaxtolonnawi xiwitl in intlan akxoteka. ometsontli mahtlaepwali wan se sábado ipan ik 5 mani de agosto in ipan ilwitsin kis sankta maría de las nieves motenewa sepayawsiwapili ikwak motlalitsino in de nwestra señora de monserate in ipan tlaxilakali san hwan tekixkipan. axkan viernes ik 6 mani metstli abril de 1612 años, ihkwak nikan san hoseph san fransisko walmokalaki in padre frai hwan masura, yewatsin kapilero mochiwtsino, kiwalmowikili in padre frai sebastián de karibai telpochtli temachtiani mochiwako san joseph; ihkwak kikaw in itekiw padre frai herónimo de sárate inik kapilero katka. inimeh. aw in tlahtowani in wewe witsiliwitl in ichpoch senka kitlaokolti in atle maitla itech wetstia, kilwi in tlahtowani koxkoxtli "ma itlatsin xikmotlaokolili i nochpochtsin, tlahtowanié!". yei xitomatl ipan in ihkwak momikili tsakwaltitlan tenanko migwel baptista de sárate; san ikximotsopini inik momikili. achtopa yewantin in akxoteka in onkan ahsiko aw satepan okinwaltokilike in teotenanka chichimeka; aw yewatl ipampa inik sa nikan mosentlalia mosemikwilowa in intlahtolo inmontlamanixtin. pero asan lá tneki ticholoske. iwan sekitoto ikxitl, sekiomitl. v kali xiwitl, 1029 años. in amo monamaka. in inemilis in ixtlawatekitkeh okachi tetolini. axan akmo nehwa nitlachihki solo diós koštla' kitekilia' koxahmo. san ompa ontlatlamaya, inik tlachiyato inik ompa tlawelmatito; in axkan ye mitowa tlatilolko. tepanawia in venustiano karransa mexikaikniwyaoyopan. yewatl kipantlasa ipan chikonawi kali xiwitl in axkan wei inawatil méxiko. aw sa omentin i wel kimanke, teomeka in tliltik inewan in español wel ayaxkan in kimanke ompa chaneke; san timasewaltin in teahsike, wel kinwiwitekke inik kimanke. itoka inin wei teopixkatahtsin, inik ome ioannes paulus. in se kitoka wan semi moneneki, amo kineki mochiwas. kwalika, newa oknias ixkichka tekpan tlamawis amanteko. onkan tepitsin nias nipaxialotin ika alameda, ininmawisopa iwan nepantlatika paxialolko. in semana kipis chikomeh tonali. yon istak, pero amo semi : pochiktik, tepitsin kostik. ma mokwapa intlanawatil". aw in testigo otlanankili kitowa ninomakixtia ipaltsinko totekuyo dios inik nik-[f. 7v.]mati in itechkopa in anna xoko in niwalmoskali onkan in ikol itoka katka tokwiltekatl aw onmanka in xakal sentetl iwan chinamitl. in okikakke niman ye choka; iwan in itskowatsin niman ye kitowa "can tikkwiske || 91v in chinamitl?". in oasiko in kwawitl itsintla nimann onkan motlalike; inin senka tomawak in kwawitl. nemiskeh iii tekpatl xiwitl, 1040 años. setsontli wan makwipwali inin chikwasen tlamantli nikitowa in newatl niknopielilia itomintsin [f. 14r.] isabel ana epowali omatlaktli pesos aw inin nikitowa yewatl itech nikkawtiw in nokonew hoseph lopes yewatl kitlamachis hwana kwatek chane amanalko kipie notomin kwatro pesos ik kichiwa ikpatl aw inin san no itech nikkawtiw in hoseph lopes. kaxtoli ahwiyak klavo sente xochimili ipan xopanistempan wel kwalnesi ka awel mahnel motenihtowa senka miak xochitl kweponi ipan ikwamawan mansanahkwawitl, kapolkwawitl, tlatokxokokwawitl iwan dorasnokwawitl. xii tekpatl xiwitl, 1192. iman on ometstak inin tiatiwani husto sierras iwan mitoaya sekretario de edukasión. omotekipachoaya inpampa momachtikes. onkwan on mochikawaske tlasaloske. ipan makwili tonali mayo otexexelwiaya premios, ikawiltoton iwan yeyi noso nawi amochtin achi kwaltsitsin. newatl, nilus, weyi onechtlatlakolike awiltoton iwan amochtin. sesenxihpa kwali onikisaya iwan onechmakaya se diploma. vi kali xiwitl, 1485. aw niman satepan okito in ana nensiotl ma ye ixkich ma ye opopoliwik in tetl in kwawitl aw sa iskich tikitoa ma nelti in onkan manik tokal yuh tikaki kitoa in pablo sehoanokatl ka amo totlalpan. v tekpatl xiwitl, 1276 años. nikan tlakat in toyaotsin tlakoyewa. san ye waliknotlamati in temilotsin, in tohtsi. kiihtowa ne bwen hoven. wan in pobresitos kwikaya' mwi weyi ni tomi kwikaya' un peso pero bien rekaudiado non ye'on in íikos okatka'. ilwikatl itek ikwak momomikili in siwapili in kowanentsin in inantsin toyaotsin; oyuh ye se xiwitl kwalok tonatiw. amo xochiyowa. ye ki wel ipan in in ahsiko inik motlaliko onkan wexotla in tochintewktli in tlahtowani walmochiwtia, tlalmasewako wexotla; kiwalwikak in isiwaw in itoka miyawatotosiwatsin, onkan okinchiwke in itoka manawaltsin, kil iwan in kiyawtsin. mah amo timikikan de mayan, in san kitlawana, chachalaka, in kecholpowan in tekpili, ya in kwexteka meetla. tiltik et aw in siwa in tlahtlaul yetiw sesen tsimpetlayo in kitki in kehkechpan kikehketsaya. kitowaya titamalkawaske. wan kiihto para [...] kiitato yuhkin aken momamamati, amo yokoxka tlaka, amo moknomatka tlaka, san iwkin kwakwawti ik nemi. istatl. ixkich in monekis se semana weyi moskalti nopa toktli. i nika ya itoa ye nimexikatl noselopa ‘quemach wel unka i ye motlamasewia in tetewkti akolnawakatl, tesosomoktli; at kemania kwala yektla intlatol in askapotsalka pipilti iyo. tlen 89 tlanawatihkayotl. itlanawatil iwan itechpowi tlayekanani, ye inin: i. tematiltis iwan kichiwas tlahtol tlanawatilmeh tlen kikixtis weyi tlahtokan sennechikolistli, iwan kiitas melawak mamotlepanitacah; ii. kintokahtlalis iwan inselti kinpatlas sekretarios tlen despacho, kinpatlas agentes diplomátikos iwan weweyih tekitinih tlen hasienda, iwan kitokatlalis iwan iselti kinpatlas nochi sekinok tekitinih tlen sennechikolistli, tlen intokah noso inpatlaka amo seyok tlamantli moihtos ipan amatlanawatili noso tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh; iii. kintokahtlalis ministros, agentes diplomátikos iwan kónsules generales, ika itlahtol selistli tlen wehkapa tlahtokan. iv. kitokahtlalis ika itlahtol selistli tlen wehkapa tlahtokan, in koroneles iwan sekinok weweyih ofisiales tlen yaotekayotl, armada iwan fwersa aérea nasionales, iwan weweyi tekichiwaneh tlen hasienda. v. kintokahtlalis sekinok tlanawatianeh tlen yaotekayotl, armada iwan fwersa aérea nasionales, ken moihtowa ipan tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh. vi. tlamokwitlawis masantlaelto ipan nochi totlaltipak, ken kiihtowa tlahtol tlanawatili tlen itechpowi, iwan welis kinawatis nochi fwersa armada noso yaotekayotl, tlen armada iwan tlen fwersa aérea iwikpa welis santlaeltos totlalihtik iwan kiawak tlen sentlanawatiloyan. vii. kinawatis gwardia nasional tlen seha tlanawatili, ken moihtowa ipan iv tlatlapantli tlen 76 tlanawatihkayotl. viii. kiihtos onkah yaoyotl ika itlahtol tlen sentika mexikameh tlaltlanahuatilmeh, san achtowi kihtos tlahtol tlanawatili tlen weyi tlahtokan sennechikolistli. ix. kitekiwetlalis prokurador general tlen totlalnantsin, san moneki kiselis tlahtoli wehapa tlahtokan; x. kiyekanas tlen kiawak tlahtoli iwan kichiwas semanawak amatlapalewili, iwan noihki kitlamis, kitelwis, kikotonas, kipatlas, kitlatlamanis, kikixtis tlahtoli iwan kichiwas tlayeyekoli tlen yewan amameh, iwan tlatitlanis mamoseli ipan wehkapa tlahtokan. ipan tlahtoli tlayekanani, in tlanawatiani tlen weyi tekichiwani kiihitas ye inin tlahtolpewalistli tlanawatili inselnawatilistli tlen altepemeh, amo mokalakis; kakwaltsin mosenkawas kwalantli; mokotonas kwalantli noso amo motekiwis chikawalistli ipan tlahtolmeh tlen semanawak; seha patilistli tlen estados; semanwak tlapalewilistli iwika yolchikawalistli; iwan tekitl tlen ika onkas yolsewilistli iwan santlaeltos ipan semanawak. xi. kinotsas weyi tlahtokan tlen amo nochipa nechicolismeh, keman kihtos sennechikolistli tekichiwani. xii. kipalewis poder hudisial ika tleweli tlen itechmonekis iwikpa welis kwali kichiwas itequih. xiii. kikwaltlalis kampa asih acalmeh, kiixtlalis adwanas tlen weyiatl iwan kampa monepanoa totlalnantsin iwan kiihtos kanin motlalis. xiv. temaktilis, ken moihtowa ipan tlahtol tlanahatilmeh, tlapopolwili tlen tlakameh tsaktokeh iwan in tlahtlakol itechpowi kaltlahtol tlasenkawali tlen sentlanawatiloyan iwan tlen axnel weyi tlahtlakoli, ipan tlen iyolo weyi altepetl. xv. temaktilis mawistik tlapalewili ipan kototsih kawitl, ika mokwaltlalis tlen itechpowi tlahtol tlanawatili, tlakameh tlen tlatehtemoanih, yankwik tlachiwanih noso tlayek chiwanih tlen tleweli pamitl tlen tepostekitiyotl. xvi. keman tlahtokan tlen wekapa tepantlahtoanih amo mosentilihtos, in tlayekanani tlen totlalnantsin, welis temaktilis tokayotl tlen moihtowa ipan tlatlapantli iii, iv iwan ix, ika itlahtolselis tlen sennechikolistli tekitiloyan. xvii. moixpoliwiltia. xviii. kitlahtolkwilis tlahtokan tlen wekapa, eyi tokayotl tlen kampa kisaseh ministros tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia iwan kitlatolkwilis tlamakawalistli noso tekikotontli makikwalita tlahtokan tlen wekapa. xix. moixpoliwiltia. xx. nochi sekinok tlen kinelkawilia inin amatlanawatili. kano ihkwak techkwiliskia kwawitl in onpa totomiwakan kwaxochpan españoles. 79. aw ma ye ok xokonkwitlawilti in kweye, in wipile, in imalakatekiw, in itsotsopastekiw, in iatekiw, in imetlatekiw iwan in sentetl, in ontetl in koskatl, in ketsali in oyol, in otlakat in ixilan, in itoskatlan in kweye, in wipile. ma ok ye impampa ximoskalikan, xitlachiakan; ok ye impampa, intechpa xitlachiakan; ma ok ye xikimmakakan, xikimilwikan in sententli, in senkamatl, in nanyotl, in tayotl, inik wel ihkaske, inik wel nemiske in tlaltipak, inik ahmo itsinko, ikpaktsinko nemiske in totekwiyo, inik ahmo ikwatla, itsontlan kisaske, iwan inik ahmo teixko, teikpak nemiske, inik ahmo amechpinawtiske. . aw in ikwak o yuh kimilwi niman ye ik kikwepilia in itlatol in puchtekatlahtoke in iskipetlame in ik sesenkalpulpan teyakana mahtlaktli nohpali ahmo wehyi iiii akatl xiwitl, 27. noyol sewiski "pipitla a itolok q.n. in ik tepevalok pipitla amo mikmati in ik omito yauyutl in cholola ik otepevalok amo nixpan in ik oyautlatolok. onkan momikiliko in tlakatl in tlahtowani in ekatsin chichimekatewktli tlakitskaliwki, in momikili ipan vii tochtli xiwitl, 1174 años; aw inik nowian otlipan waltlahtokattitia inik walotlatokake inik walnentiake kaxtolxiwitl. —a'mo. sesen akin kimati tlen kichiwa. ma ik tatlama ma ik timopow ma ik teixko teikpak tinen. aw nawpa in otlihpa in inpan toxiw molpili mexika inik walnentiake inik senka wekawtika inik onkan asiko kulwakan. xii tochtli, 1582 años. aw in tewatl timitsnamakiltia español paskwal hernandes in tla kenmanian aka ye mitstekipachostewantin tiknankiliske amo motlan ka san nel tekitl timotlakowia in tla tlein kitos in tlaixpantitiwi hustisia ka tewantin titlapopoloske aw ka timits[kwepi]liske in motomines. istatl, ixkich in monekis . niman ye ik kitiatlawtia quilhuique:"totecu e, ma xi mewiltitie, ka is katki in intsontekon in imelchikiw ipatiw omochiw im motlatsitsinwan puchteka iyake in nawalostomeka in teyawaloni yaopan. ompa ok metstaya towampohtsin san isehseltsin tetlaokoltikatsintli ken se tlakawalmilxahkali in ekapitsaetli yuhkin se awiltsonkonetl omawiltiaya kinwiwilantinemia nepanan in kwauhatlapaltin tlahtosneki teka motahtsin; mach aik tenextia. iuki kitokaitiah por in tetawelih komo se kiawiltia : kihtowah komo kiawiltiah okichpipiltsitsin kipostekih in imacheteh wan komo siwapipiltsitsin, kipostekih inimetamai wan motahtapanilia ininkaxwan wan in tasítas. inin amatl kimotilis in notekwiyotsin siwapili doña maria iwan nokichtiwatsin don pedro dionisio ompa siudad mexiko. aw in ixpan testigos don hwan de la krus regidor mayor alonso hernandes regidor lorenso de pas regidor algwasiles mayores pedro konstantino hwan hernandes hwachin de la krus bartolome baskes alkaide migwel hernandes algwasil aw inik kimoneltililia nikan kimotlalilia intokatsin iwan infirmatsin hwan hernandes, diego de mendosa, migwel garsia eskrivano. baltasar martin alkalde, geronimo lopes. ihkwak tlalhwes katka don felipe páes ipan tlahto matlak motlali v alwasiles, oixmanaloke in itopilekawan. wan in karansa san okimikti. tak totonik. mochiwa kahfentah wan tepejxiyoj. aw san awel motlapalo, in ye no itech onasi totonki, san awal tsinkisa, waltsincholoa, amo ontlayekoa ulnappa, tlaelnappa in yuh kichiw in moyeheko, san niman awel onmomayaw in tleko ka san ye unkan tlatenewali in nappan. aw in ontlakixti nappa; niman ye ik yeh kontsatsilia in nanawatsin, kilwike in teteu: sawel pilokichpiltsi. toronha antlasohtlaskeh wan axkikawilihki inana yo itata in kwowit kwaltia para yekawil de kahfen. niman kilwi in diablo in ketsalkanawtli "xoconilhui ma iwi onechikneli; nikan ka nikmaka notlahtokayo". yexpa in makwili, kaxtoli. in ipan axkan hwebes ik ix mani metstli de setiembre de 1599 años, ikwak wala in don herónimo lópes inik governador hwes mochiwako nikan mexiko, xaltokan ichan, tlatilolko tlapiaya; aw in don hwan martín nikan tlapiaya aw kompatlako, niman ik ya tlatilolko, ompa tlahtokatito governadorhwestito ompa. kiwikake ika nepa temesa aw axkan senka tikintlachikawilia ipaltsinko in su magestad aokak kitlakos iwan amo ak mokwepas in iyolo aw in tla aka kitlakos in tlakamo kineltokas ini tosentensia ipan mochiwas in melawak hustisia ipan tiktlalia pena x pesos ini kontlaxtlawas ikamara powis in su magestad iwan chikomilwitl ilpitos in karsel. tomawak nikan nikmachiotia newatli notoka d[on] hoseph de san hwofan] in kenin owalake in kastilamlaka nikam yankwik tlalpan motenewa noeva espamnia inkwak owalmowikak s[eño]r d[on] markes kapiktam kortes de kastilan ipam inin xiwitli nikan motenewa de 1518 años= in ikwak okalake ipam beii altepetli tlaxkalam. in ayamo walkisaya ihtik chikomostotl, kil wel kwali inneskalilis onkatka, mimatinime katka, aw onkan moch kipoloko in chikomostok inik moskaliani mimatinime katka. axkimelawah in tleintsi nokonnokowia i nokimilko i nokwexanko i nowia nemi i nechtlakwikulia. imixpan in tlaxilakaleke martin ayaxkan merino martin tlakokowa thomas de san migwel migwel garsia migwel de la krus diego iskakwaw tetawan migwel yekamekatl hwan damian chililikatl martin sipak iwan no ixpan pedro xochitlal. ipan chikwase tochtli xiwitl ompewa méxiko wei temakixtilisyaoyotl, ihkwak teopixki migwel hidalgo maltepe tlalia in onkan teokalpan moto kayotia "dolores". kemeh aman ya pewa xochiyowa, pero sayoh kemeh ome metsti. onkak mahtaktiomome taman: istakpahpata oso manilahpahpata, chichilpahpata, chichilpahpata tein kostik, piñahpahpata, peraspahpata, noktapahpata oso weweyakpahpata, machohpahpata, mansanohpahpata, rotampahpata, kwinohpahpata,mehoralitospahpata, keniohpahpata wan itspahpata. otlanamakakeh okseppa makalakike, iwan no tipahpakiah in ihkwak in titelpokatoton tikmatiah ye itech in tolwi techmowikiliskianih totahtsitsiwan ompa malakachtepek momosko techmokowilitiwih in tsotsomahtli, in kaktli in tikchaliskeh ipan iilwitsin tonantsin santa ana. kemmanian ok poloaya miek tonali in tlalwikixtilos iwan ye ahsia in “cahuahtoton", in tlamakacholoni, in “tonemc cuauhtemalacatľ’, iwan tewan ompa topachoayah, san tehcatayah, san tikmawisihtayah in ompa ayahmo quiyectlahtlaliayah. in ipa iuki kitokaitiah saj. se kilo tlaxamanilnanakatl iwan no yewatsin ompa ipan motlahtolti in atsakwalistli in tlahtowani don lwis de velasko in okik ayemo walmowetsitia nikan mexiko ipan itlahtokayo. viernes ik 4 mani metstli de hunio, ikwak pew moketsako in kiyawitl, aso he ome ora in moketsako, aw in walatwik visita general yekwel senka sokititlan mochiw. nikan ipan in melawak in momikiliko in wewe motewksoma ilwikamina, kitotia yewatl tlahtokatis in axayaka; in tlahtokat motewksomatsin senpowalxiwitl ipan chiwknawxiwitl, aw san makwilxiwitl in imasewalwan mochiwke chalka. aw sano ipan in in iiii tochtli xiwitl i motlahtokatlali kwawtlewanitsin tlailotlaktewktli tlahtowani tsakwaltitlan tenanko amakemekan, inin ipiltsin in itstlotsin tlailotlaktewktli; aw yewatl tlahtokatiskia in inyakapan in itoka wewe chimalpahintsin, aw san mokaw, inik mitowa motenewa wewe chimalpahintsin mokawki. iteyakankayopan pololo tlatelolko, iwan omik mokiwix intlahtokaw tlatelolcah. noihki totatsin presidente porfirio días iwan wei tlatiwani husto sierras kinmotetlakoliliske medayatin kan ikwilkatika in centenario'. aw in nehoatl sa niman onikinnokakistilili hwes gobernador yoan alkaldes ordinarios [...] katsinko toweitlatokatsin rei nwestro señor in itlatol paskwal hernandes español inikitsakwa in itlatol inik akmo sepa tlatenyotis omotlanahoatili okimitalwike manotsaloka in tesi in itoka m[borrado aría] xwares iknosiwatl yoan in tenamik okatka in itoka migwel xwares inamik okatka axkan ikal monama [sic] san niman ikwak ohoal[...] in ipan omito in ilwitl in kawitl in xiwitl in metstli. wel miak timitsnotlasohkamatilia, karlohtsin; newa nech kohkoltia in xoxotlalatl, mach se tepachichik amotlen nech chiwilis. onkan nemi tototl, chachalaka, tlatowa, wal on kimati teotl ichan. ayok mokakiliyah ipan in onkan chiwknawpowali ipan matlaktlonse xiwitl kichiwako in ik-exkan tlahtolok kulwakan iwan tulam iwan otumpa, onkann ipan in poliwiko in omotenew xiwitl in okokkan tlahtoloyantli onkan in tulan iwan otumpa, aw in kulwakan san ye ok onkan tlahtoloyan mochiw amo wel poliw. wan ayok nesi. "axneli tihpeipenas yon achiyok" inin omotenew vanderra tepitsin kiyon ka yewatl in kimoyakaniliaya in ihkwak mokixtiaya in ix- || 176 -quichica omotlahtokatili inik visurrei omochiwtsinotikatka mexiko, in okik mochikawaltitinenka omotenewtsino arsobispo, in iw mochintin kinyakana in oksekintin tlahtoke visurreyesme in otlahtokatiko nikan mexiko iwan in ok tlahtokatikiwi in wel ixiptlatsitsinwan toweitlahtokatsin rei in españa moyetstika. satepa kititlania' eskwela. aw in koyowewesi, in topantemoksi, kwawtitla mike. in no ayoj, ait keyéh iuki kiluiaj, ta no ayoj. in asike, in ekoke, aw ye yuhki ye kixowaskia kikixtiskia in ipassiontsin totekwiyo dios, aw yese in yewatl provisor don hwan de salamanka ok poliwia in iwelitilis in itlanawatil lisensia amo tle kitlanilike, inik san kiwaltsakwili tlayawalolistli inik amo wel mochiwas, iwan deskomunión kinwalalili in españoles inik amo wel kisas omotenew tlayawalolistli prossión; inik ok nen kitlaniliskia lisensia, sa ihsiwka provisor sa kinwalilwi in españoles ka aokmo imonekyan in axkan ik kisas itlaihiyowilitsin in ipassiontsin ilnamikoka totekwiyo dios, aw ka ye okis in wel inemakpan kawitl katka, aw ka ye pahpakiliskawitl in axkan ipan tikate, kaokmo wel mochiwas. ix tekpatl xiwitl, 1332. moyek masestirowa para chichikawak yas in kwak tekitis wan in kwak ahmo motlamaka in yulitl ahmo tlaxikoa para tekitis. iwan se tlahpoyawak ketsaltonatiw in ipan mantiw, inin ye wekaw mexiko tlahtoke kimokentiaya; moch ya. vi kali xiwitl, 1381. se kitoka iteyotsin. . aw in ihkwak on tetlalwito in on tennonotsato, niman yeh isiwka amaxotla kichiwa in inextlawal in itech powi in tletl iwan in iyakateoktli, niman ye ik moxtlawa in yowalnepantla. eyi taman: pisilowat, chichilowat wan istakowat. aw in tlahtowani koxkoxtli okinchiw omentin in ipilwan, in sekintin wewetke in iw kitowa in ikse itoka makwextsin anoso tesosomoktli, aw amo wel momati kampa in tlahtokatito inin; aw in ikome itoka wewe akamapichtli, inin ka ompa tlahtokat in satepan in kolwakan. intla noyol kimati, kiwintia ye noyolia. mahtlaktli ome nohpali ahmo wel wehyi tlamakaske achkakawti tiachkawa in temiktike, tewktlatoke in kwalanke inik miktiloke pipilti. iuki monotsa por in istak. in kwamekat, mowiwilana wan maxahxahkaltik, amo semi xoxoktik, medio nextik in imai. mihki nopa tenantsi ipal nemowa —bweno kin miktiyaya' o tlenon kinchiwiliaya rebolúsio. aih no ihkwak in osewiko in kokolistli sawatl motenewa saranpió. in ipan altepetl siudad mexiko a veinte i ocho dias del mes de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años i sant lasaro tiankistenko onkan otsatsik in tekpoyotl okitenyoti in kali ik monamaka in ikal marianan okitenew in chikwepowali pesos ik patiyowa in ikwak otsatsik ayak otlanankili ixpan testigo hwan peres. nikan tlami inin nenonotsali sasanili in ye wekaw ik tlatlanonotsaya wewetke in impiel katka. ties tlenkwa ahmo ninankilis solo yehwa itechka...ahmo kineki nawatis. in ipan in in ipan metstli hanwarius xxxi mani nekokolo; febrwarius xxviii mani nekokolo; marso xxxi mani, ipan sew in kokolistli. kiski in xi akatl xiwitl. aw san walmeilwitiltitikis in arsobispo in onkan moyetstikatka la siudad de los ángeles kwitlaxkowapa, inik niman onkan walmewiti ye walmonenemitia inik niman onkan maxitiko totlasonantsin nwestra señora sankta maría de gwadalupe tepeyakak, inik noseppa onkan owalmewiti inik omaxitiko nikan mexiko in ipan axkan omotenew semilwitl hwebes, inik san walmochtakakalaki, in iksemilwitl ipan omotenew viernes mosewitsino in ichantsinko, san motsawktsinotikatka ayemo moteittititsino. ye niknotlamati; zazoqucnin. amaka tech isiwitia. kwali titemoskeh ikapan mamatlak. temamatla tlehko iwan temo, se kwali techikawalti iwan temayanalti. onkak ome taman: olipan wan olipan simarrón. kana kana ichan ayopechkatl koskapantika mixiwtok. kana kana ichan ayopechkatl koskapantika mixiwtok, in san ok moyawake sa ok motlalinke in mexika xxx xiwitl inik motlantokantlali i kwakwapisawak ipan sen tochtli xiwitl; se xiwitl in san ok onpa katka askaponsalko, au ie inik wala tlantilolko ipa omakatl xiwitl in omotlalikon tlantilolko. makwilpowali gr. chilpitsawak amwehka achtopa desierto de los leones otiahqueh. in amo wehka in weyaltepetl ka iwan wel kwakwaltsin. nikolwan ni abuklitos kititlania' eskwela. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. axkan martes in ik 19 mani metstli marso de 1613 años, wel ipan ilwitsin san joseph, ihkwak opew in ye sewetsih chikawak in ipan ik nowiyan motenewa nweva españa, senka || 206 kipoloko in ixwaka toktsintli, iwan in nopali seltik mochi kikwa, iwan in xochikwali ixochiyo in ixokoyo mochi kitlako kitepek, san tel kana in wel kitlako xochikwali; aw makwililwitl in sewets in aik yuh mochiwani, san tel yuhkin tlakwilolchikawakasewets. aw in okmatlaktlomomentin chichimeka ayemo nikan motokatenewa yewantin i tlatilolko motlalito in ompa tlalmasewato; ye kin ompa motokatenewatiwi in ipan xiwitl inik ompa motlalito in tlatilolko. motenewatsin 71. aw in nikan ik tinechonnakastsonpotonia, in mimiliwki. aw in tinotlasottatsin, otlakawki immitsin, moyolotsin, in yuh otinechwalmokawilili in chalchiwtik, in teoxiwtik. aw aso nikan wel nitlayolokati, wel nitopti, wel nipetlakalti. aw aso ye wel nikan, nihtik ontlalilo in koskatl, in ketsali, kan nel ok wits inik nimitsonnosewililis immitsin, moyolotsin. in osenkisato kin ihkwak ik niman ye ontemo onkan onewak in ikpak amakeme in tlahtoani kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli wei chichimekatl inik onkan mosentlalito in tsakwaltitlan tenanko chikonkowak, inik niman onkan ye kiketsa in teokali in ikal nawyotewktli. || 77 ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. aw in testigo niman otlanankili kitowa inik nikmati in itechkopa in anna xoko in niwalmoskali on nemi in itoka tlakochin in itatsin anna xoko onmanka ixakal sentetl aw in xakali ikwak onxitin wetsiko atl. aw i poyawteka san ilotiko; onkan iloke ik axkan motokayotia ilowayan, inik motenewa axkan panowayan. san nikxochimalina in tekpilotl. pehki miyak eli. pero weyi tepetl. ikniwkwikatl itlanahnamik: unkan kis in espada tlekikistli in imaska totekwiowa in kintlasaltike. noihki okimotlalwikixtiliaya santa krus ika siriotin; ika sirialestin motlaewalwis in santísimo. "yeka tla inkwalanih para san mah matapani, konitoa tewa amatlamatki amateki “nopilçinçiné, ma xikmokakitika ‘tley nel tikitoske? ka sa nawilwitl in titlanapowaltiske. aw in ikwak ye kinwika inik mikiske in ixkichtin || 19 teopixke in nikan moyetstikate mexiko inik chikwetetl monasterios wel kimololwitiake inik kintlalnamiktike in tlaneltokilistika, kinyolkwitike. aw in sant hosep kaltitlan in onkan motenamikiliani teopixke; onkan kinmomanilike in sant fransisko iwan sant diego, wel paño in kinmokentilike inneolololtsin, aw aktiwets in tlapechtli postek in kwawitl, aw onkan itlakawke in sanktome imatsin postek in sant fransisko iwan in sant diego no itlakaw. ¿aquin tewan tin? titonetechkwake in ikwak tlepan kimontlaliaya. i ye ikwisi i nakayo, unkan konkwiktleko kikwaya. tiamictamih. inin siwapili alemañis, ka wel ompa chane in siudad alemañia, umpa kiwalmowikili isiwapiltsin iwan isekretariatsin walmochiwtiaka in toweisiwatlahtokaw doña margarida de austria reina españa omoyetstikatka, in okimowikili totekwiyo dios axkan se xiwitl ipan itlasoilwitsin san fransisko in momikili. xochiyowahulio wan agosto. ipan in nikan temiktike in xaltepeka, kinmiktike in mexika; aw sano ikwak ipan in xiwitl in kinpewato in mexika, iksen ikwak popoliwke in xaltepeka. mismo nikan nehwa, tlen 66 tlanawatihkayotl. ipan se iwan se kawitl tlen itehkia nechikolistli mowekawilis tlen keski kawitl monekis iwikpa welis motlachilis nochi tlamantli tlahtoli tlen moihtowa ipan tlanawatikayotl tlen onpanok. tlen achtowi kawitl nechikolistli amo welis mowekawilis ipampa moneki tlamis ipan 15 tonati tlen disiembre metstli tlen seha xiwitl, amo ihkinoh elis keman weyi tlayekanani tlen totlalnantsin kipewaltis itlanawatil ipan tonati moihtowa ipan 83 tlanawatikayotl, wankinoh nechikolismeh welis welis mowekawilis ipan 31 disiembre metstli tlen seha xiwitl. ipan ome nechikolistli amo welis mowekawilis kipano 30 tlen abril metstli tlen seha xiwitl. tla nochi ome tlahtokan amo kikwalitaseh kitlamiseh nechikolismeh keman ayamo asi tonati tlen nikan moihtowa, kisenkawas weyi tlayekanani tlen totlalnantsin. aw yuh mito yuh moma, ikpak walkiske in popokatepetl. niknamakaskia notlaken in tía wel amo sewaskia. in axkan ihtik kate kipia in kalmenitas, ka yewatl wel imaxka achtopa in masewaltin atsakwalka; san okinkwilike inik onkan in walmikwani awatonko in iteokaltsin señor san sebastián, onkan ye no ye kiketsako in atsakwalka iwan onkan omochiw in inmonasteriotsin padreme sant augustín, inik semihkak onkan moyetstieske kinmopachilwiske in atsakwalka. in akin yuh kichiwaya in in tealtiaya in kexkich kawitl tlaltikpak ok nemia ixkich kawitl kipiaya in itepetlakal. aw inik tlenamakoya 2 tochtli xiwitl, 1598 años. se taman saj. noihki newatl. sampa noha kimachilihki kikekelo aw inik niman in ipan viernes in ik 13 mani metstli marso, nikan mexiko onpewke oyahke onpowalonmatlaktli soldadostin tiakawan, se tlakatl kapitán mochiwtia komissión ki- || 271 -huicac inik nowiyan kintemoske in ocholoto forsados, in iw yatia itlanawatiltsin tlakatl visurrei intla okimittake choloke, intlakamo san iwiyan walmotemakaske, intla mokwekwetsoske niman ompa tepustlawitoltika pistoletetika kinmiminaske kinmiktiske;
