iwan kaxtolpowali masewaltin tlaminani kinwikake, kimantikiske ohtlipan in kinpalewiske soldadostin in kinmiminaske kinmiktiske in forsados choloke, ka iw motlanawatili in visurrei. ipampa in inik omeyolowa sekintin wewetke, in iw momati in achto ka kimoneltokitiaya i neli dios semixkichiwelitsin in topampa momikilitsino. in kwamekat. aw in tlalmanalko kintlahtokatlali in ikse itoka itskawatsin tlatkik itskawakan tlahtowani, in ikome itoka yaotentsin tlahtowani opochwakan. tixpan ones sentensia in ika mokalkowike in itoka diego yaotl inamik isabel tlako aw in tlali in ipan ikak kali inik motamachiwa inik patlawak chikomatl aw inik wiak matlaktli ose iwan etetl in chinamitl aw in tlalnamakake iwan kalnamakake itoka bartasal moknoteka iwan in inamik itoka maria papan ispa hustisia in tlanamakake. aw in atlawteka in intlahtokaw in ihkwak in sa ye ok ompa tlahtokati in atenko in ilankweitl atlawtekatltewktli; ye omito tlakpak amo wel wala i nikan tsakwaltitlan tenanko chikonkowak, san ompa tlahtokat in atenko. kiski in ix tochtli xiwitl. xochitikpakkwika in yektli kokoxki, ye kon ya totoma aitek. aw amo wel nikan mexiko in omochantiaya, yehika ka moch atl okatka ka tolkwawtla || 79r ka akatepexitl katka; ye kate in sentlamantin intoka katkaya chichimeka. aw yewatl kinamakiltia in español in itoka paskwal hernandes aw inik kinpatiotilia in inkal ixkich kinmaka napoali pesos iwan makwili pesos aw wel inmatika okiselike in tlanamakaki in tomines in ixkich omotenew. ﻿ind. perf. newa oniyetok. kwaltia aw in ihkwak in ipan in omotenew 2 tekpatl xiwitl onkan kichiwako senpowali iwan exiwitl i ye nemi tlaltikpak in tlakatl kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli, ye no ixkichkaw onkan tlahtokati in tapalkatetelko inawak ayotsinko in atentlipa; aw no ixkichkaw itewktlahtokaw ye mochiwtika in tlakatl wewe itskwawtsin atlawtekatltewktli. inin tlatiwani everardo okinmonochiliaya inon tlaka tlatkiwatoton iwan okilwiaya titechmakas tomin; ¡tlacamo timitzmictizque! in ipilwa kwakwawtsi chikwei, in iakapa tlakateutsi. yepasohtli ikilmamaton yeka komo nama onka. nimitstatawtiti, se kwawpoyox aw inik yake, masaxipohnanakat oso xipohnanakat tomakilit (yerbamora) ipan matlaktli tochtli xiwitl motlahtokatlalia yuhkin wei itlahtokaw mexiko in tepantlahtoani lwis echeverría alvares. noihki tochan tech walwikilia xochikwali keh naranjah, manzanah, perah, iwan ikox. in tomin okitlatkiwi mach amo okiyolpahpakiti. in neolinilistli nesia yuhkin nikan motenewa siwatsitsintin kihsekiah chili; motemowiaya in iswatl in ye miek metstli pilkataya; tiksasakayah kwawitl, mochi kwali mochipawaya inik tikinyolpachiwitiskeh ahkiwan walayah techtlahpaloskeh no ikwak kwalok in tonatiw, sa achiton in mokaw; senka neske in sisitlalti, inik senka nemawtilok. kitlachiltinemi nopa tenantsi tlahtoltin aw ka satepan in walpewke in walolinke. aw in kitemakak tlali itoka nenkis san kimixkawi itla in pablo makwex aw in ikwak konmakak niman ye kikaltia in konkaltike ye xxx siwitl mochipa no kichiwa in chinamitl ye opa in onkan mokaltia osepa kixitinika. anmoh. vi kali xiwitl, 1329. in nikan siudad mexiko tenochtitlan axkan sabado a xix dias del mes de agosto de 1564 años in newatl alkalde don martin de sank hwan in tiktokwitlawia hustisia audiensia nispan owala itoka anna xoko chane san pablo tlachkwititlan kitoko niknokakitiliko in hustisia in ipanpa towewetlal iwan tochinan makwiltetl. || 162 iwan tekalnamakaya in mikkakali in kanin mani tlatlaxilakalpan; mochi kitemowaya ika tlatlania, intla okilwito kanin mani niman kitekixtiliaya kinamakaya, intlanel kamo teopan powki intlanel onkate nemakeke in wel tepilwan ahnoso teixwiwan, atle ipan kimonpowaya atle ipan kimittaya. mah xochiyowa, iskatki in kenin ittatsin kinonotsa in itelpuch in ihkwak omonamikti porke nene' ke akmo nixikoa nisikwinis nepa weyapa. aw in ikwak oyuh kimokakiltike in inpetision in hwes gobernador yoan alkaldes ordinarios in ikatsinko rei nwestro señor okimitalwike in tlanahoatilike niman onkan tonomatka ompa tiaske in ikalkohoali paskwal hernandes posesion tikmakatiwi aw inik nelti inik [oqui]nahoatilique hwes governador alkaldes ordinarios ye kimoneltililia nikan kitlalia infirmatsin intokatsintika. fecho a veinte i seis dias del mes de setienbre de mil e kinientos i noventa i seis años. geronimo lopes geronimo de soto alkalde sebastian de san fransisko alkalde itenkopatsinko hwes governador gwilermo krusate eskribano. onkwan oasik tonali topixke kinmolwilia tlaka iwan siwame axkan namotekipachoske nankipiaske keski tomin ipampa ye kwali mochichiwaske kaxatin, ma san ke kolmenas kaxon. aihmo netokos miki ika petlatl. omotlanonochili topixke kename miki sagrado kename teotatli. ipampa on namechilwia ma iki on ka netocoz. kampa eski mochiwa nikan mitoa in kenin españoles kinmiktike, kimixtlatike in mexika, in kilwikixtiliaya witsilopochtli in onkan mitoaya teoitwalko. wan ya kiniontlamaka mohmostla. se kikixtilia in pahpata gwineo in iyolo wan se kimapatska itech at wan ika se mokakampaka para se mopahtia, yon se tantsintantemal kisa. yewatlin in nokal in notlal motech powis iwan intech powis in mopilwan in wel naxka notlatki onkan mani in ipan tlaxilakali teokaltitlan itech antika in mokal aw inik tikkowa inik tikpatiyotia senpowali onmatlaktli peso nomatika onokonkwik in ixpan hustisia aw ka ye inamik in xxx pesos aik ninoxikotiw. "ah, bweno. aw onkan in omonamikke yaoyotika in omonawaltotokake in tepetsinko, onkan imak in kwawcholowa ahnoso kwawtleketski owetsiko in tlasiwki kopil; okasik, niman onkan okimikti in kwawtleketski. newa ye ihkion nikchiwa, san tepitsin nitlakwa iwan nikita nesi nech yekchiwilia. axkan ayokmo wel nitotonia, iwan tsontekonkwalistli ye sesehtih mach okpoliwi ka yekwali nomatis. axkan hwebes in ik 18 mani metstli septiembre de 1614 años, ihkwak teotlak ik otsatsiwak nowiya in ihtik siudad mexiko pena ik motlali mochi tlakatl kwawitl kitlatis in españoles inchachan in intlapanko anoso inkaltenpa, ipampatsinko motemachisti inik yankwikan owala españa in iyektenewalistlahtolotsin wei sankta tenantsin la madre theresa de hesús inik motenewa beatifikasión, san ok ikatsinko okimochiwili in roma sankto padre paulo kinto; aw inik pena motlali in akin atle kwawitl kitlatis ichan matlaktli peso kixtlawas. nia nikpahkayowis. kenameh totatokwan. inik nawtetl tetsawitl ika yankwik chikawalistli in tlaltekitki kipewaltia itlatekipanoli. makwil tsontli yoan niktenewa ipan hotli san martin tlilwakan mani nowewetlal hotenko yoan mani kali ontetl motepotsmamatimani i ionteixti tonatiw ikalakiampa itstimani kalitwalo tienda muchioa itech powis in noxwiw hoana maximiliana. axkan xikihto moyolokakopa otitlanankili anoso aka omitschiwalti ammaka nechchiwalti kwali ka nanmokakitia iwan axkan okse tlamantli nikneki ixitlatenewa xikmelawa motlahtol yewatli mochiwas in motlaixnamik anoso kenin aw tokniwané, tla xokonkakikan in itlatoltemiktli xoxopantla technemitia, in teokwitlaxilotl, techonitwitia, tlawkechol elotl, techonkoskatia. in tikmati. ye on tlaneltokato iiyolo tokniwan. se kikwi ya, se kimana wan se kichilposowia. kihtowah uejkauj kikwiah inalwayo para tapal, ika kitapalwiayah mamal. aso kana tiktlantos in atl in tepetl, aso ye semmanyan mixko mokpak on tlatlachia. nikan ye kin ipan in in motlahtokatlalike omentin tlahtoke in ikse itoka wetsin tlahtowani mochiw in kulwakan; in ikome motlahtokatlali itoka nonowalkatl, wel yewatl in itech mokaw in tlahtokayotl, ikchiwknawi tlahtowani mochiw in kulwakan. aw in yewantin puchteka tlahtoke ahmo mihtotia, san onoke mopixtoke ipampa ka yewantin in tekowachiwa. in tlaketski inik tokonkwike in tomines imixpan in testigos diego hernandes balthasar lwis migwel de rosas pedro nuñes fransisko martin fransisko de la krus hwan de la krus hwan garsia. aw in ipan in omotenew ome kali xiwitl onkan onok in texkalko omemasak in kwawitsatsin tlailotlaktewktli, san ontlachixtinemi in tsakwaltitlan tenanko chikonkowak. in xalixko ye kana makwili xiwitl ohualahqueh. ixkich imanon nochipa chantih ipan san ye inon ohtli iwan san ye inon kali. oyowali ihkawakan, in kwowit. ipan nochi koneme, ichpokero wan telpokero, in xochiyowa hunio wan septiembre chikawaya ya initeyo. ¿quexqui segondoh kipia se minoto? pus in lá tipoderoa ándale wan kimachwahsito wan kimachkitoa tiahwe titlakwaske. aw iwan ye onpowalxiwitl ipan matlakxiwitl in ipan 2 akatl xiwitl, 1559 años, in omokets kwawteokali munomento in onkan sant hoseph yniqu ipampa tlatlatlawtilok in wei tlahtowani don karlos v emperador. xviii pregon.- a dos dias de mayo 1587 años pedro awexotl in tlaxilakalpan apanowayan okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal in itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak otlanankili testigo hwan martin. ante mí fransisko maldonado eskrivano. nimitstatawtiti itech nehin hora. 170 aw ik niman yewantsitsin kimonmotokilitiake in senka mawistililoni tlasoteopixke karmenitas deskalsos, in sanno itlasopilwantsitsinwan in toweisiwatlahtokatekwiyo totlasomawisnantsin in motenewtsinowa nwestra señora sankta maría del karme; amo miekintsitsin, ahso san ken matlaktintsitsin in onkan momaniltitiake omotenew ik tetokok, aw san kwawkrus tepitsin nepaniwki kostik teokwitlayo tlapalo in kimowikilike, itlok mantia ome kwawsiliares, iwan se kapa kimotlalilitia iwan nekok itloktsinko mantiake ome diágonos almátikas kitlalitiake. ¿quexquich oipatik inin kawayo? sayá tleyowas aw amo momati tle itoka in kwawitl. imohwanti initekitise para nemis ne mixtli aw inike i onekatka in tlamatinime, ye yiman on yomohtaya ke melawak nochtin chantlaka otlaneltokaya keni ka yaske kokone tlamachtilkalko. aihmo ka oyaya nian tsatsapaltik nian tsoyo. iki in ika yomomelawta, momelawtake chantlaka. aihmo onyeya nian tetsakos. nian aihmo, tetsakwiloya ipampan aihmo mowikaya pantalón. nochtlakatl yokipiaya ipantalon iwan kwali ikoton. nian tekixtililos mula. anka nochtin piltsitsintin ken palomaxtoton tsikwintiwe ompan tlamachtilkalko. awiya! kosawik xochitla o ya kweponka. yewa tonan a teumechave mokisikan tamoanchan. awiya! kosavik xochitla o ya moxocha val ochpan chalima avevetl ye kolhoa. wiya! tonakaakxolman sentla teumilko chikavastika motlakechiska. imets se piotsin timitzmactiliah. in miston okachi amo weyi keh in chichiton. kinmihmikti in pipiltoton kinkwatetlasinia yokimikti porke kiwikana' kanitohmiyo. tlahko kilo xitomatl aw in omotenew tlahtowani toteositewktli in tekwachkawtli inik onkan motekpankaltiko in omotenew in itokayokan chalchiwtepek, mochintin onkan kinwalwikak in iski tlayakatl kalpoli in imasewalwan akxoteka; iwan ye no nikwel onkan kimanako in intiyankis in onkan tiamikia akxoteka, iwan in sentetl inkwawkal in onkan teilpiaya. se kikwa in nanakatsin ika chilposon oso kaldoj. semi welik. itlanahnamik: owets tesiwitl iateskawpan tenochtitlan in okimmikti mimichin. yewatl in mochiw ipan matlaktli onse tochtli. tlakatle totekoe tlokehe, nawakehe, ipalnemoanie, yowale, ehekatle, totekoe, titlakawane, yaotsine a ka nele axkan, mixpantsinko ninoketsa, mixpantsinko nasi in titloke, in tinawake, sententika, ak senkamatika nimitsnotsa, nimitstsatsilia in ika in ipampa, in kwitlapili, in atlapali in nentlakatl in akimatinemi, in nennemi, in nenkochi, in nenmewa in kinenkixtia in motlakatsin, in moyowaltsin. yewa teka otlahto. in ipan axkan domingo ik xvii mani metstli agosto de 1603 años, in sankto yankwik sant raimundo sankto domingo teopixki ikwak tlayawalolistika kimokechilito in ikapilatsinko in ompa sankto domingo; tlapechtli motlatlali inik tlayawalolok, iglesia mayor walpeowak, inik kimokalakilito teopan wel kisenkawke in ixkichtin teopixke iwan tlahtoke oidores alkaldes de kortesme. amo monamaka. "cholojki nopa nochichi". amo xochiyowa. itlanahnamik: aw iwan ya yepowalxiwitl ipan matlaktlomei xiwitl in ipan v tekpatl xiwitl, 1536 años, in omomikili don pablo xochikentsin, in okwawtlahto tenochtitlan makwilxiwitl. iii tochtli xiwitl, 1066. in ixtlawatl itek. kinamakah kwesalan wan nikan, xolalpan. kikouaj, ta welik. mah takayowa, aw in oiw onkan motekato tisaapan in mexika, sa niman ipan in in omotenew 2 akatl xiwitl, 1299 años, in onkan kontlalike tenuchtsin tlenamakak inik kinyakanas mexika; inik niman okwawtlahto in onkan tisaapan kulwakan, ye noseppa yewatl konpewalti in kwawtlahtolistli. ma itstos noponi. o noso tonpew, ye no tikwalani, xolotsin. ye noniaw in nochan nokonetsin. anka so san nikan tinechnawalan, yektli tikchiw ye motlatoltsin. is im axkan tlawanketl, mah teh titlawanketl, ¿azo no netlakamachon tochan? .ah nomation a itolok. pipitla a itolok pipitla ah nomatian a itolok. cholotla a itolok pipitla ah nomatian a itolok. waukilit oso wauti axkan inin noso okse quimaihtohuah. nikan nimitsmaktiliti nehin tixochitsin: ontlanankili in testigos kitowa inik nikmati in itechkopa in onkan kinamaka atl in gabriel yaotl newan in inamik in itoka maria ok yewatl kitekatia in eswawakatsintli katka ikwak in manka chichikatl tlatokatia in motelchiutsin aw in ikwak omikke niman inmak konkawke in gabriel yaotl newan in inamik. aw ik yewatl nowian ipampa tlatlatlawtilok in kiyawitl manka; wel iskikan in teopan tlayawaloloya yexpa in momostlaye, yowatsinko niman ye nepantlah tonatiw niman ye teotlak, san kalitik, in ipampa ik sewis mokawas in kiyawitl, kimosewilis in totekwiyo dios. iwan wel iwki in itetopilo itenetlakechilo omochiwtsinotikatka okimotsitskilitikatka tlamachilismiyawayotika in nikan altepetl mexiko iwan inik nowiyan nweva españa, inteyakankatsin imachkawtsin itetsinko oitstikatka in mochintin nikan onkate tlamatinime in doktoresme inik senka okimotemachiliaya okimitlanililiaya in itlamachilistenonotsalistsin iteixtlatilitsin itenanamikilistlahtoltsin, kimotemakiliaya inik tlein wel mochiwas moyektilis in ihkwak tlein in itlah wewei netekipacholi, in aso neixnamikilistli akame oinpan motlaliaya, ka senka okinmopalewiliaya. in tonali omotlati ikapan mextli. onkan tlami || 135r in in itlahtoltsin in tlakatl don domingo hernándes ayopochtsin. titlanamakas sakanon kwali semiki eso kitu’wa ahmo tihmati koxmelawak košina’mo porke ikwakon titlapapahka chikiwti, kanastas, xokti ayame tlaxkalchikiwti ayatilakti, serbietas de muchi. inin kawayo okachi kwakwaltsin keh neka. itech in tekit ixnesi in inintamachilis in tochankawan masewalmeh ompa ixnesih nochi in xiutsitsin wan in tatok tein se kikwa, nochi in kwoumeh wan tein taxiuyotia nikawín : panowa chikwasensiento wan tahko tataman xiutsitsin wan kwoumeh tein kwali tikinixmatkeh ya. wan no tiksentilihtokeh in inintokaiwan in okwilimeh : panowa eyisiento wan tahko taman tapiyalmej, tekuanimej, kouamej, kuoujtajokuilimej, amichimej, chiktejmej, aokwilimeh wan okwiltsitsin. wan no moihkwilohtok keniuj motatohtokaitia nikawín itech nochi in xolalkonemeh tein powih nikan san migwel tsinakapan, kwesalan, pwebla. teipa san wahki nochi aw iwan ye kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan onpowali ipan onxiwitl in ipan xi kali xiwitl, 1269 años, in asito in ompa ikpak tepetl amakeme, inik onpa monamikito i nawintin tlahtoke chichimeka; achtopa yewantin ompa asito in totolimpaneka in tliltekatsin chichimekayaotekiwa iwan in iteikkawtsin atonaltsin chichimekatewktli amakemekan tlahtoke. ipan in xiwitl 1910 onikimpix achi kwakwali notemachtikawan. ipan in metstli de septiembre de 1602 años, ikwak wala asiko in itenyotsin in imawisotsin sant raimundo inik otlateochiwaltik, itetsinko powi in sankto domingo predikador. in mapapatawak tepitsin, tohtoponi in iteyo, yeh achi ololtik; pero sepa sah in tapani in ihwak se kiolinia. yewa wel tlahea owala kayowa. noponi yahki. . kisenyakanaya kisentlahtalwiya in ye nowian altepetl ipan. yompon owalpew sasanili ke ika achtokopa omimikoaloya ikan amo omixmatia xoletl. omokwaya san tlawis. ipampa on netekipacholoya ma kwakwali xoleme yekan. aihmo aka omikia. xitlatsotsona. aw in oyuh onmihto in omotenew se responso ipan inakayotsin mikkatsintli in onkan omotenew ipan túmulo mikkatlapechtli in kaltempa palasio, ik niman onkan ok yewantsitsin konmanilike konmonapalwike in inakayotsin teoyotika tlahtowani in senka mawistililoni || 174 kanónigos inik niman ohtlipan okimotlatoktilike, okimowikilike tlapowaltepostli ikal, san ixpan kimokixtilike inik tlayawalolotia inik kimawistilike inakayotsin mikkatsintli. in xiwit. ipa sayoh se kikwa in ikamohyo. mango ixiwiyo tlen yeiyektsi kostik. otik kwitiaya silvia. ihyo, rikardo, ¡tlenzan kwali omochin onimitsnamik! ¿yotiquilnamic tlen mostla tikchiwas ka in ilwitl? aw nikihtowa in oyuh pew tlatsitsilika nikan karme no niman ik pew in tlatsitsilikak iglesia mayor, iwan sa se inik nowiyan mochi teopan monasterios in onkan moyetstikate teopixke frailes iwan monhas tlatsitsilikak; iwan senka wel nowiyan tlatlak in kwawitl siudad mexiko in inchan in intlatlapanko in inkaltenpa españoles, sa se inik nowiyan ohtlipan tlatlak, yuhkin tlastalotl mokets mexiko. inik onkan kinkaw senka miyek tlakatl in españoles tewan in iteikaw itoka don diego kolón, iwan tlatekpantewak tlatlatlalitewak in tlein onkan mochiwas, aw inik noseppa ya in i mochtin in okseki tlakatl || 112r españoles kaxtoli omei legwas inik weka tlali in itik provinsia in itokayokan sibao, in onpa konmatia onka in kostik teokwitlatl iwan senka wewei inik onoke masewaltin. nima ye ik kipowa in iski imal mochiw, kimonilwia “ca otikchiwke in totekiw, ka inkala otiquincauato”. nikan nimitsmakati nehin taxtawiltsin. onkak ome taman: tein mapapatawak wan tein mapisiltik. mochiwa itech awakwapalak, taltik in nanakat. axkan martes in ik 15 mani metstli henero de 1613 años, ihkwak san ixtomamikilistika xoxowkamikilistika momiki- || 200 -lli in lwi lópes kastiso in chane okatka weikalko in tiktokayotia ichan tonatiw; inin otlayekoltiloya komendero okatka in askapotsalko tepanekapan iwan tenantsinko, sa ik yewatl itech otlamiko, inik niman okimokwili in rei in omotenew altepetl. xi akatl xiwitl, 1243. aw niman kiwalpanawike in tetl in kwawitl in onkan sakatla aw yewatl in axkan in ye kinkwilisneki ka wel itlatki imatika konkets in pedro nanali iwan in inamik san iskichi i nikitowa notlatol. pasó ante mi migwel hernandes eskribano. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. tein ika timotamacazqueh, nima ye walewa unmotlaliko kowatlikamak, no unkan motlalmomostike, yexiwtike. san nixochitlatlaonkoya, in namokniwtsin, in san chichimekatekwitli, tekayewatsin. kampa onkak uitskolantojkonemej, se kiwiwita wan se kitoka. teipa noponi domingo san tonili kipatlak aw iwan san moch senowala in españa in itlahtolo don fransisko de velasko, in intlahtokatekiw omentin tlamatinime se doktor iwan se lisesiado, in okinwalmotekimakili toweitlahtokaw rei. in kwowit. aw in ihkwak in ipan in omotenew xiwitl inik onkan ahsiko kwitlatetelko in teotenanka, ka ye onkan impan asiko ye onkan kate || 37v achtopa in oksentlamantin wewetke in motenewa akxoteka. yewa wel otlaixtlali oki. chin inin tekitl. itech kwawtlatli momochko malakatetikpak hasta itech ahuskotepetlinimekes tetepe nochipa tlaselik ipan in kwawtlatin. ika on nochtin tlaka ika siwame iki inik omopapanoltiaya. siwame tlen inmokes aihmo okipiaya inamik oyaya kwawtla xoletemoske, ye on okinamakaskia ipan tiankistli. tlen tomin okikixtiaya itech xoletl yewatl onika okimpanoltiaya iknotsitsin. inimekes kwawtinsiwame ikan achi okintlasotlaya inpilwan okwalikaya xoletl iwan ikwatikpak tepitsin kwawitl ikan okintlakwachiwiliskia tepilwantoton. xinechmawalwikili se te katekomatl atsintli. xaktli? aw iwan yewatl owalkwawtlahtotia yuhkin tlahtowani owalmochiwtia, inik yewatl witsiltsin okinwalsenpachotia mexitin, in iw niman ye onnesis. tlanamakaskiah aw no yewatl ipan in in omotenew in se tekpatl xiwitl in onkan walmikwanike in techkantitlan inawak chapoltepek in mexika. kwowit wan no xokot, no iuki ya kemeh in xokokwowit sayoh in toronha amo witsyoh wan itakka kachi weyi wan semi ayoj. ipan kaxitl motlalia in pitsochiyawisotl ma kwali totoni, motlalia in nakatl iwan motsoyonia; in waxchili mototonia komalko, satepan mosiyawa iwan motesi ika xonakatl iwan axox; motlalilia in nakatl inik tlewakis; in xoletl in ye tlachipawtli ye motlalia ihtik in chilmoli, motlapachoa inik ye wiksis. in amo se kitoka. kitlamia in tlauli onkan akwtlei para tikwaske. mosemanke nochi wan mokahke nopa aw intla ak ayak isiwaw in tealti, intla ye on ka itlaltsin omextin tleko ohome kitki in iwitopili. bweno, san hwan ipa eltok kani ahsiti aw san ya yewatl ipan in in omotenew 2 akatl xiwitl, 1299 años, in onkan omotenew akukolko || 65r astakalko tula anepantla onkan onewake in mexika, inik ompa ahsito inik ompa onmikwanike in kulwakan. tewan tikpia sente chichiton tliltik. oka iskintin in in mexika in asiko in ye mochintin sentekpantli onnawi, yese san yewantin in tenochtitlan mokawke in onkan motlalike in nikan no motokatenewke matlaktlomomentin in chichimeka, yewatl kinwalyakantia in tenochtsin; in ihkwak in ye iw senpowalonchikwasen xiwitl onkan kitlalike in kulwakan in mexika inik kinyakana. in ait keyéh iuki kitokaytiaj. ne e iw xi xiwitl tlantonkanti in kikets akwekwexatl. aw niman yewatl kisenkawa in ixkich tetech monekis: in tlali kwawkweskomatl ik kimamana iwan in etl no kikwawkweskonmotema; tlapanawia in tikihtoskeh ye ihkwak omochiw inik se tlakanechikolistli inin senka oteisawi ompa ipan altepetl senka oteyolahkoman in ipan inon tonali in tlatlakah neskiani in itla okonnextihkeh itechpa tlen omihto itechkopa in towewetlahtol towewetlamatilis yewatlo in semanawak in monekia ahmo tikkawaskeh ma miki iwan mochinin otechtlatemachiti wel ok itla mochiwaskiani inik motemakixtis inon tlen immanon ye ixnestika pohpoliwtoya ¡no xihmaka!", kiilwi " in ipan in inik senpowalxiwitl onmatlaktli ipan onxiwitl inik katka wewetke in ompa astlan; san ok sentetl in intlahtol katka, ayemo mokwekwepa in tlahtoli. nokwisewalo tlalpan on kisa. in ounasike konilwia kapitán: “totecuioé tlatoanié, miswalmotlatlawtilia i motechiwkawa in tlatilulka tlatoke, konitoa ‘ma kimokakiti in tlakatl in totekuyo motolini in imasewaltsi, ka ye konihiowia in awakan tepewakan in texomolko tekaltech; ka ye ika mokakaiawa in akolwa in otomitl, ye quichtacamictia’”. frai martín de valensia in nikan moyetstikatka. tlahko xonakatl, in ahmo wel wehyi tlasohkamati, kar l o h t si n. x o n m o temawistlahpalwi mosiwatsin; yenopakilismochiwas satepitsin tonaltin mochantsinko timitsnotilis. oktepitsinika. xoxowkichilmoli ika ayotochnakatl chichilayoh in san kwel achitsinkan tlaltikpak ¿ ok no iwkan kenonamikan ? ¿ kwix ok pakowa, ikniwtiwa in ? aw in amo sanyio nikan totiximatiko in tlaltikpak. itlanahnamik: aw inik no yewantin in otikintenewke in tokolwan in wewetke in chichimeka ka no onkan tetech kisa, in onkan atenkisako in onkan motlaliko astlan; aw yese amo wel momati ak yewatl in eintin ipilwantsitsinwan noé in itech kisa wewetke chichimeka, kwix yewatl in itoka haphet, anoso yewatl in itoka sem, anoso yewatl in itoka cham; ka san niman ayak wel kimati. aw in kinkawtia ipilwantsitsinwan omentin: in ikse itoka wewetewktli, in ikome itoka mapiwatsin. se mamahpikton yepasohtli yei akatl atle mochiw. in techialoyan amo tlakayo. ximopanolti. nepa tlakaltech manik se ahkopechtli ayakkipia. ompa totlalikan. ahkopechtekatl, rxwealmwikili inon amaxoxotlak tlakwali. in soyokilit kwamekat. onahsiko tochan ye yowak. onikintlamakak in nokawahwan, onikalak nochan iwan oninokochtekak. ayokmo oninokochkayoti; nonantsin, notahtsin, ahmaka yewantsitsin onechmotlahtlachialtili welis ipampa onechmohtilihkeh senka nixkomoltik. aw niman ik ontenots in mokiwixtli in wexotsinko, in kwaochpanko, in matlantsinko, inik toka nesentlalilok in titenochka. aw ka okse in titixnamiki itoka ana xwares ixkichin inik nitlanankilia in ya ninemi tlaltipak ye umpoal xiwitl onkaxtoli aw inik nikneltilia notlatol nikan niktlalia notoka yoan nofirma. testigo fransisko milan por testigo fransisko milan en testigo husep de la serda.ante mi gwilermo krusate eskribano. iwan itechpa xitlachie in kweye, in wipile, in tlein ikespan, ikechtlan ompilkas; iwan in tlein ik tlatotonias, ik tlayamanias immonextitlantsinko, immotlekwilantsinko, inik achitsin tikintotonilis, tikinyamanilis in inyolotsin, in innakayotsin immonawan, immottawan, immotlawan, immawiwan, immowayolke. ahnoso aka tlasiawketsalitsintli, tlatlapalolitsintli kichiwakiw, in mochantsinko, in mokalihtiktsinko, inik tonmotenamikilis. in kana achitsin in iknotlatetemolitsintli inik kichokaske; kitlaokoyaske immokokokatsin, immotetepontsin, immakoltsin, in itsopelika, in iawiyaka in chiltsintli, in istatsintli, in kwawtsintli, in kiltsintli, in nopaltsintli, in ipatiwtsin; inik mitsontimalotiaske, mitsonchamawtiaske in ipaltsinko in totekwiyo, dios. kenke para nama noha innechualtokiliaj?", nima ye mononotsa, kitoa “can tiwi, kan titlamatiwi? kaokmo timieki; ma kana tinamoeloti. ii.- testigo. martin hakobo ichan atlixokan in ixiwtlapowal ye onpowalxiwitl onkaxtoli okichiw huramento inik otlatlakoltilok ipalsinko dios iwan sankta maria iwan sankta krus. sekin kitokaitiah ‘yolopio’, kihtowah por in mahyá pió iyolo. wan teipa noponi itstoke ihkwak aka motemas, tlepitsalo ihtik in tlexiktli. intla moneki wel totonki yes in temaskali motlalilia in awa-kwawitl ahnoso tamaskikwawitl; intla ahmo moneki senka totonki san motlalilia okokwawitl. ihkwak ye netemalos achto mototonia in atl ihtik in temaskali, itech in itlexik. intla ye tlakwawtotonki motsakwa in tlexiktli ika sentetl tepatlachtli, inin motsikoa ika sokitl iwan mixtilinaltia ika tetoton. aw iwan ya yepowalxiwitl ipan chikwexiwitl in ipan 10 kali xiwitl, 1541 años, in omomikili tlakatl don diego de alvarado wanitsin tlahtowani governador katka tenochtitlan, in tlahtokat san nawxiwitl; aw san niman ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl motlahtokatlali mogovernadortlali in tlakatl don diego de sant fransisko tewetskititsin tlahto- || 96 -huani tenochtitlan. itlanahnamik: anentlaxiaw, . aw in ik ohtlatokaya moyaochichiwtiwia in inchimal inmakkwaw yetiw intlawis, ipampa ka yaotitlan in kisaya in kana mikia, in kana tlamaia. ika peones yahki tlayito 5 tochtli atle muchiw. "uan nama kwali para tikalakiti noponi. ya kiitako ya tlakuaj. ix tekpatl xiwitl, 1072 años. kinkalakito in onkan motenewa kalabosos ipampa intech tlan kilmach yaoyotl || 179 kihtowaya, makokwiskia in ipan hwebes sankto, kinmiktiskia in intekwiyowan españoles. kenin mochiwa sinanakat, oso miinanakat, oso elonanakat, kemeh se kinekis. kichihtoke inihwanti aw inin ka nel ye ixkich kawitl in ipan ka ka [sic] konkwis i kali aw in tlali ka taxka aw inik kikwis kali aso itla kintlaokolis in mimikke. aw .... || itlanahnamik: aw in oiwkimokakitih in itlahtol in hwan diego, kimonankililih in iknowakasenkis iniketlamantli nikitowa no senpowali pesos momoyawas teopan wentli yes makwili pesos honpa powis in ninotokas sankta maria del barrio kwawtepek [f. 16v] aw no makwili pesos sankta asupsion tlakwechiw omakwili pesos totekpan sank hoseph v pesos iglesia mayor. in sesek, yeh ika teamiksewia. in monentlamatia ka wel iknoyowas in moyolo mixayotsin tikmatenties. ipan in in xiwitl, hwebes a xxv de abril, ikwak momamal in ospital del espíritu sankto penthekostés; tlayawalolok, iglesia mayor walpeowak onkan kimotlaliliko sakramento; onkan witsa visurrei iwan ixkichtin tlahtoke oidores ik mochali ik momamal in teokali. aw in kaltsintli ka san toneixkawil inik tomatika otikketske ayak onkan tlachalanis aw in tla walas yewatl in pedro lwis chane quauhhchinanco in nikkaka tlalmantontli achiton ka okimotlachkwitlaxili aso tepantsin onkan kitlalis. aw kenka in kinokomonamikti magdalena ka senka tlawelilok aik ma itla onechtlaokoli atoltsintli yewatl kimati aso kiwikas ka chane in siwatsintli yuh kitotia in ilamatsin. se kinamaka. totonik tak, ta de paratani. in pochtekatl in akin tikixmati,oya ka tlakpak. aw tekpan kiyawak wel palasio ixpan kisato in tlayawalolistli, inik onkan kimottilike ventana walmoketsinoke in tlahtowani visurrei inewantsin in inamiktsin siwapili markesa; ik niman iglesia mayor kisato in tlayawalolistli, niman sankto domingo kisato, niman san lurenso monhas kisato, niman konsepsión monhas kisato, niman sankta isabel monhas kisako, niman san fransisko kisako, niman onkan kisako in kolegio de las niñas, inik niman noseppa okalakiko in onkan sant augustín. wan ta tikwalanisneki "ah, pero tohwanti titekitih . ma kana ankitlahxiliti ankinchitoniliti in imihiyo in intlatol in amonanwan in amotawan. in omik nima walmontlali kwawtlatowantsi in ipan x tekpatl xiwitl. in tetiachkaw, amo wel momati in itoka, yewatl intlahtokaw mochiw in kwexteka iwan i nepapan tlaka; aw in teteikkaw itoka chalchiwtlatonak, yewatl intlahtokaw mochiw in mexika. wan itstok ne nochichi, ne nochichi". ¡in tikmati ye ontlaneltokatoyiolo, tokniwan! ximotlasohtili ihoan in ixkich itlalo in ipan mani ihoan ontetl ichinayo tonatiw ikisanpa itstitemi inin okan inakastla san hwan yopiko konitoko ka wel toyolokakopan totlanekilistika inik wel tiknamakaske in kali ka ik otimakoke lisensia hustisia ini weli otechmomakili señor governador ihoan hweses. onkan walewake oksekkan oyake, nimann ik okalakiko in onkan sano akalkixowayan in itokayokan sanktiago de kuba; iwan onkan motekake motlalike || 109v anoso motlaliko in onkan atenko in itokayokan haití, ka ye onkan in sankto domingo, iwan in satepan in okiximatke in okseki atentli in kiyawalotok. onkán yepewa mopowtiw sentabo a sentabo asta kampa maxiltis in peso. ¿an tle notleyo yes in kenmanian? "tlauel kitohtoka ne tokone ne viii kali xiwitl, 1409. iska in itepewal: tlatlawkitepekek, tsotsolan, atlawko, tekwiktepekek, nochestlan, totontepeke, tlanistla, sola, ikpantepek, tlakotepek, chichiwaltatakalan, texotla, piastlan, molanko, wistlan, tsiwaktla, tlachinola, amaxtlan, xikontepekek, tostepekek, miktlan, wexolontla, tliltepeke, nopala, tekosautla, tekpantlayakak, kaltepek, tepepan, teoatlipantsinko, tlakaxolotlan, achtlachinolan, masatlan, siwatlan, tlachkiyawko, malinaltepekek, kimichtepekek, sentsontepekek, kesaltepeke, kweskomaixtlawakan, komaltepek, xalapan, xaltiankisko, yoloxonekwilan, issenitepek, iskwitepek, istitlan. kenin mochiwa makwili ahwiyak klavo aw in ok mokawas in ok napowali pesos yewatl kimati in nokonew kitemakas in hoseph lopes inin tomines napowali pesos notech powi misas ik nichiwililos ik palewilos in naniman aw onkan mokwis onpowali pesos notech monekis ik motlalakis in nonakayo. ihkwak in moxelowa momakawa in ilwikaatl i nose kitokayotia teoatl, ka yuh mochiw in in ihkwak; inik nekok moxelowa in ilwikaatl in anose teoatl, waktimomana in tlali. axkan sábado in ik 18 mani metstli henero de 1614 años, ihkwak muchiw kapítulo in xuchmilko, yewatsin onkan || 239 kis muchiwtsino provinsial in senka mawistililoni padre frai hwan de torkemada, kipatlak onkan kikaw in itekiw frai hernando durán inik provinsial katka. in chichime no wel miek kipalewia in ichkapixki ihkwak kinkixtia in metoton yewatl no kimati in itekiw kintsatsakwilia in ichkame makammo moxexelokan ma tlamochohwanakan ¿timoamapohualhuia in temonotsaloma tl ? solo kininmaka in pitsotsitsin inixiuyo. iwan oksepa tekiti axkan tlakame momochko. kimpia tepilwan: lisensiados, temachtikes, totopixke. yoixtlapowke. tikyamoyawa aya. moxaxakwaló san tepehtikate michime", kiilwi. amo wei in tlali kiwaltokake, ye nokwele onkan asiko onkan walmikwanike onkan motlaliko in kwitlatetelko in axkan itokayokan san nikolás; in onkan wala san ya ok yewatl in kiwalyakan in kinwalwikak in intlahtokaw in itoka totoltekatl tsompachtli tlailotlaktewktli, iwan in isiwaw in itoka kwawxuchtsin, iwan in itoka tonakachimal, iwan in oksekintin wewetke chichimeka. tlen 109 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlahtokan sennechikolistli iwan tlahtol tekichiwanih tlen tlaltlanahuatilmeh, kampa yewan tlanahuatiah, kikixtiseh tlanawatilmeh tlen inixkawil tlen altepeko tekichiwanih iwan sekinok tlanawatilmeh tlen ika matlatsakwiltiseh tlen, tla kipixtoseh inin tlahtol tlanawatili, motlahtlakoltiseh ken nikan moihtowa i. moixcahuiltiseh, ika tlahtokan tlasenkawali, in tlatsakwiltilistli tlen moihtowa ipan 110 tlanawatikayotl in altepeko tekitinih tlen moihtowa ipan yewa tlanawatikayotl, tlen keman tekiwachihoseh kiilkawaseh tlachiwalmeh tlen ika kintlatlakawiseh altpechanehke noso tlen nelkwali intekichiwalis. amo ipatih tlahtokan tlasenkawali ipampa akahya kiihtos tlen moyolnehnemilia. ii. in tlahtlakoli tlen akahya tlen altepeko tekitiketl kichiwas, motepotstokas iwan motlatsakwiltis ken moihtowa ipan tlanawatiltlahtoli tlen motekiwia; iwan iii. motekiwiseh tekiyotl tlatsakwiltili inipan altepeyotl tekitinih ipampa tlachiwaseh noso tlailkawaseh tlen ika kitlatlakawiseh tlanawatikayotl, nelkwali nemilistli, xitlawak nemilistli, seha nemilistli iwan kwali tekichiwali tlen moneki ika nemiseh ipan intequih, tlanawatili noso tekichiwali. in tekichiwalismeh iwikpa motekiwis tlatsakwiltilismeh tlen omoihtoh iselti omochiwas. amo welis ompa motlalis tlen san se tlahtlakoli tlatsakwiltili tlen seha tlamantli. in tlanawatilmeh kiitoseh katlia ihki tlamantli iwan tlehtleya tlen ika motlatsakwiltis ipampa amo xitlawak moyolchikahkeh altepeko tekichiwaneh tlen keman tlanahuatihqueh, noso iwikal tlanawatili, san iniwantiya noso seyok tlakatl, kimiakiliseh tlen iniwati intlapialis, moaxkatiseh tlapialmeh noso nemiseh kewak yewanti teaxcameh, tlen amo welis kinextiseh kani hualah. in tlahtol tlanawatilmeh tlen tlatsakwiltilistli kitlahtlakoltiseh iwan kikwiliseh tlen iaxka, iwan noihki kiselis tlen sekinok tlaiyowilistli itechpowi. san katlia ihki altepechaneh, san yehaya iixkotiah iwan tla kinextis tlehtleya tlamantli tlen ika momakixtis, welis moixpantis ipan tlahtokan tepantlahtoani tlen tlahtokan sennechikolistli tlen katlia ihki nemilistli moihtowa ipan ini tlanawatihkayotl. entons okixiwke para kikwanihke ye'on oksé mochiwaya de kosinera porke arranka pinos ke ye'on kosinera m ps lo mismo kichiwaltia mochtin ohkión kinchiwalti. ka yuh axkan owalmotlanawatili, kaokmo yuh kimonekiltia in toweitlahtokatsin rei don felipe tersero moyetstika españa aokmo yuh mochiwas in omotenewke siudad tlaka regidores, aokmo yuh kinnamikiske kwachkaltika in ihkwak inik walasiske yankwikan mexiko arsobisposme, ka kinmokixtililiaya; aw ka sa yewantin inneixkawilnemak yes in tlahtoke in visurreyes || 231 in ihkwak walasiske yankwikan mexiko, ka yewantin palio ika kwachkaltika namikoske. aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl okikawili in don christóval kolón almirante inik presidente mochiw in onkan motenewa española in aitik in don diego kolón, iwan inik itenanamikkawan itetlaixtlatikawan mochiwke in padre frai boil iwan okseki tlakatl. yei xumali pitsochiyawisotl aw iwan ye onpowalxiwitl ipan se xiwitl in ipan xi tekpatl xiwitl, 1568 años, in owala mexiko in don fransisko ximénes hwes governador mochiwako in nikan tenochtitlan, tekamachalko ichan; yewatl iksen kopewaltiko in altepetlipan ye walwi in hwesgovernadores in ye walapachowa tenochtitlan. aw ye itlamian in in omotenew metstli de febrero de 1608 años, ikwak mochintin onotsaloke nowian in anawaka in techyawalotoke itenkopatsinko in visurrei, inik onkan walake mochintin masewaltin in tlakpak omotokatenew in itokayokan wewetokan sitlaltepek; onkan otekitiko inik omokets in aotlih, inik omotatakak, inik omotlapo omotlakowiltek omokoyoni in tepetl. aw kikakke in witsiliwitsin iwan in kwatlekowatsin iwan in itskowatsin in iw kitowa in anawaka, in ye kinyaoyawaloske in yaoyotika, senka momawti in witsiliwitsin in iwan kwatlekowatsin iwan in itskowatsin, kitoke "camo tikmati in keni inik oyake in tlahtoke, ka san otechistlakawiko. in xochiyowa ihwak chikawaya. in pilantoton amo sasan tekitih ihkwak ayemo mowepawah mach ihkwak ye onmahtlaktli iwan ome noso mahtlaktli iwan yeyi xihtihqueh, semi ye tequitih, ye kixmatihtiweh nochi in owihtekitl tlen kichiwaskeh ihkwak yomohuepahqueh. aw iwan ye senpowalxiwitl ipan chikwasen xiwitl in ipan xiii akatl xiwitl, 1583 años, in owalmowikak nikan mexiko in krusifixos in onpa monextitsino sant gwilermo totolapan; sant pablo maxitiko. tiotlak ahsikoya. nikan motlalike in alkaldesme mexiko diego de san fransisko ichan tekikaltitlan iwan estevan en blanko ichan san christóval xankopinkan astakalko. aw satepan in yekene kimokokolchiwilia; sanno in neakatlaliayan mopewaltike in ye momamimiktia, yekene ye kimokokolchiwilia, ye kwawtlamatsayanaltika mowiteki ye kwawtlatsayantika momotla; senka ye kinkokowa in tlakochkalka, miekintin in ye temak miki. yewa amitla kimati. in oumikke niman ye ik kipopowa in imesyo. teipa nopa san pedro wan nopa san pablo axkan domingo in ik 24 mani metstli marso de 1613 años kwaresma, ihkwak omomikili in doktor don markos gwerrero oidor iwan alkalde de korte katka, aw ki lunes teotlak teopan sant augustín in tokoto inakayo; onkan mowikatsa motetokiliko tlahtowani visurrei iwan mochintin || 205 in tlahtoke oidores in audiensia real tlaka iwan alkalde de kortes iwan mochintin in siudad tlaka kavaleros iwan in klérigos iwan in nepapan teopixke frailes mexiko monoltitoke, moch onkan mowikatsa motetokiliko. aw wel kwali tlakatl okatka in omotenew hwan grande, amo imka omokakayawaya masewaltsitsinti in pleito kiwalchiwa imixpantsinko visurreyesme, in iwki okse tlakatl katka in achtopa omik nawatlahto in itoka katka fransisko de leiba, inik tlawelilok katka senka kintoliniaya masewaltsitsinti. kitstiwi in tepetl, senka san isiwka kompalo in ixkich klakwahitl. niman ye ik tlakawaka, kitoa mexikae ma walatotoka, tla sewilos, amaapilol. no nikan namechaxkatili namoorasiones mah techkawa axkan miérkoles ik 17tia metstli noviembre de 1610 años, ikwak omotlali retablo in onkan iglesia mayor teopan in onkan ikapilatsinko señor sant gregorio thamaturgo obispo konfesor, padrón totepantlatokatsin mexiko itechpa inik oapachiwia altepetl mexiko tenochtitlan inik amo wel opoliw. in axkan ik 2 mani metstli hunio de 1606 años, ikwak perú owala tlahtoli omachistiko in nikan || 47 mexiko omomikili in ompa perú in yewatsin tlakatl in tlahtowani don gaspar de súñiga i asevedo konde de monterrei visurrei katka in ompa perú; iw machistiko ik x mani metstli de febrero viernestika in momikili, aminalistli in kimowikili inik momikili. amo monamaka. chikwasen kali xiwitl ik omik tisosikatsi, nauxiwitl in ontlatokat. aw ini “ca iskatki ini kiwalmotlatlawtilia ka yewatl in intetew in inakoch i motechiwkaw, aw in totewwa in intech ukatka, aw in chimaltitech uka catca”. motetsawia motetsawia in chichime iwan okseki yolkarne mihtoa kinmach ihkwak inin ipan pano wel irnman kihta in ammo kwali ammo yektli in no kernmanian kikwitia yehyekatl in chichiine iwan okseki yolkarne no tlapalewia ika nekwihkwilos nepohpoalos in yehyekatl ihkwak tepan ahsi ihkwak tepan motsikoa wan kiihto wan mochiwa kampa eski maski milaj. in ixwa saj. in ipan hulio iwan xiwitl 98 años, ikwak wala asiko amatl in yankwik mexiko inik omaxitike teopixke sant fransisko, frai alonso martínes konmissario mochiwtia, aw iwan se kiwikake donado amakemekan ichan itoka fransisko faustino ketsalmasatsin. || 190 el lisensiado diego núñes de morkecho 2 xayakamach ye tepan kisa in ipan in omotenew kwaresma, ka in achtopa okimanaya intlakalakil in namikeke se peso iwan chikome tomin, aw in axkan ipan in omotenew xiwitl inik owalmakok nawi tomin, in ye mochi kimana intlakalakil namikeke ye ome peso iwan ei tomin; aw in telpochnemi iwan ichpochnemi in kimana axkan itlakalakil ye chiwknawi tomin iwan medio inik owalmakok, ka san ok chikome tomin iwan medio okatka. tlen 55 tlanawatihkayotl. iwikpa se elis tepantlahtoani moneki inin amatlanequilmeh: i. mexikatlakatl ika tlakatilistli, tlen kitekiwia tlen itechpowi; ii. kipias sempoali iwan se xiwitl keman mochiwas tlapehpentli. iii. ewa ipan tlaltlanawatili kampa mochiwas tlapehpentli noso nopayo chantis iwehkapayo kipanos chikwaseh metstli tlen keman ayamo mochiwa tlapehpentli. iwikpa welis se ixnesis ipan amatokayotl tlen tlalneskayotilistli tlen miakintin tlapehpentli ken se tepantlahtoani tlaixnextilistli, moneki elis se ewa tlen se tlaltlanawatiloyan kampeka mokawa tlalneskayotilistli kampa mochiwa tlapehpentli, noso nopayo chantis kipanos chikwasen metstli iwekawayo tlen keman mochiwas inon tlapehpentli. altepechantli amo poliwi ipampa se tekipanos ipan tekiwa altepeyotl tlen masewal tlapehpentli. iv. amo tekichihtos ipan ehérsito federal iwan amo kipias tlanawatili ipan polisía noso gendarmería rural ipan weyi altepeyotl kampa mochiwas tlapehpentli, kipano nahpoali iwan matlaktli tonatih tlen keman mochiwas tlapehpentli. v. amo kiyekantos tleweli tlayolkayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili kimaktilia iseltlanawatili, iwan amo tekipanohtos ken sekretario noso subsekretario tlen kaltlanawatiloyan, iwan amo kiyekanas tlehtleno tlayolkayomeh tlen dessentralisados iwan deskonsentrados tlen administrasión públika federal, kena welis tla mosen ihkwenis ipan itekih kipano nahpoali iwan mahtlaktli tonati keman ayamo mochiwa tlapehpentli. amo tekipanotos ken ministro tlen suprema korte de hustisia de la nasión, magistrado, sekretario tlen tribunal elektoral tlen poder hudisial tlen federasión, iwan amo konsehero presidente noso konsehero elektoral ipan konsehos general, lokales noso distritales tlen instituto federal elektoral, iwan amo sekretario ehekutivo, direktor ehekutivo noso tekitini tlayekanketl tlen instituto, san kena ipatih tla kinelkawas itlanawatil, eyi xiwitl tlen keman ayamo mochiwa tlapehpentli. tlahtoanih tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh iwan tlayekanani tlen iyolo weyi altepetl, amo welis kintlapepeniseh ipan intlaltlanawatiloyan kampa tlatskitokeh keman itechpowi tlayecanaseh, ikatsah kinelkawaseh intequih. in sekretarios tlen gobiernos tlen estados iwan iyolo weyi altepetl, magistrados iwan hweses federales noso tlen estado iwan iyolo weyi altepetl, iwan noihki tlayekananih tlen altepemeh tlanawatiloyan iwan tlayekanketl tlen se tlayoltilistli polítiko-administrativo tlen itechpowi iyolo weyi altepetl, amo welis kin tlapepeniseh ipan tlalneskayotilistli, tla amo kikawaseh intekih nahpowali tonatih iwan mahtlaktli tlen keman ayimo mochiwa tlapehpentli. vi. amo tekipanohtos ken ministro tlen tletleya teopankali, iwan vii. amo kipias tlehtleno kokolisltli tlen moihtowa ipan 59 tlanawatihkayotl. aw i axaiamachantewktli in wala iwa in kitemoko in atsalantli; i wala itoka tlotlitewktli asiko in nikan ye tlatlani, kihto "campa in atsalan?". ipampa in axkan amixpantsinko tinesi in antotekwioan antlatoke matikiknopilwika in amotlatokatepalewilitsin in tewantin tamoknomasewaltsitsinwan ka tiktemachia tokneliloka topalewiloka mochioas amohustisiatlatokayotsin pedro hernandes maria barbola hwan peres. 109. nikkawtsine, otikmihiyowilti, ma tlaltitech ximowetsiti. otlakawki immoyolotsin, otikmoknelili in ipetlatsin, in ikpaltsin in totekwiyo, dios. ma newatl niknolwiltoka, niknomaktoka in sententli, in senkamatl, in owalkis in owalwets immoxilantsinko, immotoskatlantsinko, in otokonsenman, in otokonmomoyaw, in wel chalchiwitl, in wel teoxiwitl, in wel malakachiwki, in wel ololiwki, in welachiktli, in welakanawali, in wel xiktik, in wel senkiski, in kwekweyoka, in vmpa ontlanesi. yekene in patlawak ketsali, in wel sensiakatl, in witoliwki, in ok ye itsin, in ok ye iyak, nikihtosneki makamo iyeyeyan in niktlali, ma san ipetlayok nikten, makamo itemian nikten, ma kana axixpan, kwitlapan nikmayaw, niktepew in tewkyotl, in tlahtokayotl , immochokitsin, immixayotsin inik tinechtetsilowa, inik tinechapana, inik akowik tinechmolpilia. otieya. tlen 45 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlaltlanawatilmeh tlen sentlanawatiloyan mopialiseh tlali iwan nepamitl tlen axkan mopialiah, san moneki amo onkas kwalantli ika inin tlahtoli. in tla mostla tikitas, okachi kwali ipampa mits chia. aw in ontlakwalok niman oksepa tetlawtia in tetlawtilok; niman kinmotlatlawtili in tlatoke akalan, kimolwilia “ma ixkich amotlapaltsin ipaltsinko teoutl; ma ximopakiltitiekan. asta ya noponi pehki ¡tequihuaque huecayuh, xinenkan! sam puro atl nankimitia'. tochan tikinpia miak xochimeh in inochtin tlapaloh ¿tlen ipan opanok? amotlen ipan opanok. in kwawxochitl in momak ommani, taxayakatsin. 2 akatl xiwitl, 1299. aw in kinwikake in kwikatiake klérigos iwan in hermanos ipilwantsitsin bato hwan de dios, tewikake iwan sekintsitsin tottatsitsinwan sankto domingo iwan san fransisko iwan sant augustín iwan la kompañía de hesús teopixke in motetokilito. in sesek. onkán yekwalika' kwitlaxtli para motekas i nekwatl o nekwtli wan ikanon yetlahchiko wan ye serbiroa para nekwatí para nekwtli moteka. xii.- pregon a desinoeve de hebrero 1587 años in tekpoyotl otsatsik teskatsonko okito monamaka in ikal in itlal isabel maria okito ipatiw napowali pesos ayak tlanankili in ixpan testigo fransisko martin. ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. in ma onkan niaw. nikan ipan in in yekene kokoltik in yaoyotl; in aokmo yekene kinkawaya in mexika pipiltin in kimasia in chalka, aw no iwi in yewantin in chalka pipiltin in kimasia in mexika aokmo kinkawaya. na no niyas, san nikani". in kekexikilit mochiwa milaj, kahfentah kampa tahtatekoch. aw iwan ye senpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolonse xiwitl in ipan 3 kali xiwitl, 1573 años, in owala mexiko tenochtitlan in tlakatl wewe don antonio valeriano tlamatini momachtiani hwes governador mochiwako tenochtitlan, askapotsalko ichan; inin imontsin in don diego wanitsin. nima ye ik konotsa in tekpoyotl, konilwia “tla xiaw, xikinpowa keski inik omaquizque”. aw san ye no ipan in in omotenew metstli de febrero, in pew inik nowian nikan ihtik siudad mexiko tenochtitlan inik kitlaltenke inik kiwekapanoke iwan kitemanke in wewei otlih; san yewantin kichiwke in mexika. milchiwa. aw yewatl in in ompa okinwalkixti in okinwalewalti mexitin || 21r asteka chikomostoka, aw niman satepan kimotokayotike kulwake teochichimeka; aw yehika ipampa in ompa owalkistikiske in wei teokulwakan in wei chichimekapan inik okimotokayotike kulwake teochichimeka asteka chikomostoka. . aw niman kin makak in tilmahtli amanepaniwki, tempapaloyo, iwan tilmahtli tetekomayo iwan temalakayo iwan nochpalaxochyo chichikweesotl iwan nochpalmaxtlatl yakawiak. monamaka ixochiyo, ikilo wan itakilo tein selik wan tein chikawak ya. tiktsitsikisneki in nochichiwaltsin, achi in noyolotsin. kexkipa. nokalselolpan onikahten. san tontemikiko oktubre imahtlaktetl metstli in xiwitl; disiembre imahtlakome. sempwali wan se . in ik wal asia itsyokan ok onkan motlalia onkan kittaya in kwali tonali asok matlak ilwitia anosok sempowalilwitia in kichie kwali tonali. onkak eyi taman: pisilchiltekpin wan ohololchiltekpin wan seki weweyak chiltekpin. nikawín mochiwa miak. amo se kimewa, ta ikespan kwowit motalia. nimitstatawtia ika nochin fwersas de noyolo. tlen 94 tlanawatihkayotl. motemaktilia tekiwakayotl tlen poder hudisial tlen sentlanawatiloyan ipan suprema korte tlen hustisia, ipan se tribunal elektoral, ipan tribunales kolegiados iwan unitarios tlen sirkwito iwan husgados tlen distrito. in tekitikayotl, tlamokwitlawilistli iwan xitlawak nemilistli tlen poder hudisial sentlanawatiloyan, amo ihkinoh tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia tlen totlalnantsin, imako elis konseho tlen hudikatura federal ken moihtowa ipan tlahtolpechtli tlen amatlanawatili, moixtlalis ipan tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh. in suprema korte tlen hustisia tlen totlalnantsin mochihchiwas ika matlaktli iwan se ministros iwan sentika tekichiwas noso achiton ipan salas. ken moihtos ipan tlahtol tlanawatili in sentika nechikolismeh iwan achiton nechikolismeh tlanempa mochihuaseh, iwan san kemantika ichtakaya tla ihkinoh itlanekilis nelkwali nemilistli noso itlanekilis altepeyotl. in itekiwakayo tlen suprema korte, itekichiwalis ipan sentlanawatiloyan iwan achiton nechicolismeh, tlen intechpowi tribunales tlen sirkwito, tlen husgados tlen distrito iwan tribunal elektoral, ihuna noihki tlehtleya tlahtoli tlen kichiwaseh altepeyotl tekitinih tlen poder hudisial tlen sentlanawatiloyan, mochiwas ken moihtowa ipan tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh, iwan ken ixnesi ipan tlahtolpechtli tlen inin amatlanawatili. in tlahtokan tlen hudikatura tlen sentlanawatiloyan kiixtlalis quesquih, tlaxexeloli nechicolismeh, tlanawatili ipan altepeyotl iwan, tla monekis, mosenkawas ika pamitl, tlen tribunales kolegiados iwan unitarios tlen sirkwito iwan tlen husgados tlen distrito. in sennechikolis tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia kipias tlanawatili iwikpa kinextis sentika tlanahuatilmeh, tlen ika welis nelkwali kixelos ipan salas amatlahtolmeh tlen itechpowi kiixmatis korte, iwan noihki kititlanis kampa tribunales kolegiados tlen sirkwito, iwikpa kachi niman kisenkawas amatlahtolmeh, tlen sekin monekis tlaixpantilistli noso tlen monekis moihtowa ipan sentika tlanahuatilmeh, yewa korte kiihtos iwikpa kachi kwali mochiwas tlasenkawali. inon tlasenkawali ipatih elis keman monextis ipan amatl. in tlahtol tlanawatili kiixtlalis tlahtoli tlen keman monekilis tlanawatikayotl tribunales tlen poder hudisial tlen sentlanawatiloyan tlen kenihki moasikamatis amatlanawatili, tlahtol tlanawatilmeh iwan amatlaxitlawalmeh tlen sentlanawatiloyan noso tlen chinankopa iwan semanawak amatlachiwalmeh tlen kichihtos mexikayotl sentlanawatiloyan, iwan noihki amatlanekilmeh iwikpa mokotonas noso moixpatlas. in tlaxtlawili tlen kiseliseh tlen intechpowi ministros tlen suprema korte, in magistrados tlen sirkwito, in hweses tlen distrito iwan konseheros tlen hudikatura sentlanawatiloyan, iwan noihki magistrados elekotorales, amo welis molokotsos keman tequipanohtoseh. in ministros tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia wekawaseh kaxtoli xiwitl ipan intequih, san welis kin ihkweniseh ken kiihtowa tlahtoli tlen nawi tokayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili iwan, keman tlamis kawitl tlen intekipanolis, intechpowi mopialiseh se tlapalewili tlen ika mohcueniseh. amo akah tlakayotl tlen ministro tekipanotos welis oksepa motokatlalis iwikpa seyok yankwik kawitl, kena welis tla tekipanotos san tlatokpa noso konpatlas akahya. kwaltia para se kiahwiyalia in tapalol. in kwowit. mah amo nechtatilikan inchayohkan wehweyi tapetaniloyan, aw nikan oksepa onpewa in isenmelawaka, ik mokwepa inik chiwalok in ilwikatl iwan in angelosme ompa chaneke iwan in tlaltikpaktli inik chiwalok, aw in keni yewantin angelosme senchiwaloke in ilwikatl, niman tenke in itik aw sa niman ikwak amo wel semilwitl in ilwikak in onkatka in tlaweliloke in akwaltin in angelosme, sa ka niman ikwak in kiwalmotokili in kiwalmotepewili in miktlan in totekwiyo dios, aw in kwaltin i moknomatini in angelosme ompa mokawke in ilwikatl itik. . in kitkitiake tlamakaske tlemaitl, kopali, iyawtli, teoksistli in kipitstiake iwan in totoxi kimahmamatiake yewatl in kopalxikipili. in et totonik tak. wan onkán yekitowa mono ki'to' in niño tlenon yas itoka. niman noseppa okimilwike "camo welitis, ka sa hanyaske". aw in testigo kitowa amo kenikinnotsa in ipan nitlaneltia inik mokaltike in pedro nanali iwan in inamik in itoka anan xoko in iw nikilnamiki aso ye matlakxiwitl nonawi i kixitinike kali in onpa manka makpalxochititlan in ikal ana xoko. tlatlahtoltin achtopa yewatl in anima imaktsinko nokontlalia in notekwiyo dios iwan in yewatsin i notepantlatokatsin in ilwikak siwapili sankta maria inik nopan motlatoltitsinos in ixpantsinko in itlasokonetsin in totekwiyo hesukristo ipampa in axkan niktlalia notestamento in newatl pedro hakobo nikan nochan sank hwan nekaltitlan iwan imixpan i nikan tlaxilakaleke iwan notlakayowan. inin umpa tsintik umpa pew sekni in ipan se altepetl in itech powi in itlatititsalpan in itlawilanalpan in wei altepetl arsobispado viena itokayokan mota. . in ahmo tle intlatlakul san nexikuxlistika in ik inka moskaltiaya in kwakwachiktin in otomi in yaotachkawan in ik inka owal ohtlatokatia in ik owal maantia in iteokyo in itlahtokayo. okachinepa ome ohtli ximopanolti, iwan kalnakaspa timonextilis in weyi painkalko. —para nfandango axan machyokikonsegiro sanserafi. tlakatle totekuyoye, a ka nele axkan: ka ye yaw, ka ye poliwi, in masewali, ka ye xaxamaka, ka ye ixpoliwi im masewali, in kwitlapili, in atlapali ka ye xamani, ka ye teini in piltsintli, in konetsintli in aya kimomachitia in tlali, in tapalkatl kololoa in tlali iixko ka, in kwawik onok, in kwawtentok; ka ye ixpoliwi in tlatkitl, in tlamamali, in kwawtli in oselotl: in wewe, in ilama in iyoloko siwatl, in iyoloko okichtli, in iyoloko tlapaliwi kaye ixpoliwi in matsin, in motepetsin. aw in okontlali niman ye ik kalaki in kalitik onkan kate tlatilulka. onkak se taman saj. se taman kilwiah ahkopawahkakawat wan seki kilwiah kriolo, yeh pisiltik. yon ahkopawahkakawat, yeh istak in ikwouyo wan okachi maxiuyoh wehweyi. wan tein kriolo yeh moradito in ikwouyo wan maxiuyohpisiitik. ye ikwak kimomachitokake, inik teyakanke xaltoka, kwachilko in pieloya itlatki, in unpa kisakato. ye onkan inpan asiko ye iw kaxtolonnawi xiwitl onkan kate in chapultepek in asteka mexika chichimeka, yewatl intlahtokaw mochiwtika in tlakatl wewe witsiliwitl. aw wel ixkichkaw ik nemowak in ipan se metstli oktubre, inik mochichiw. aw in ikwak in omik in atlixeliwkiniman nimak kikawtia in ichpoch in axkan moteilwia in itoka maria tekwihchon aw in atlixeliwki ka kin ikwak momikili in estli manka. monamaka itakilo.ne keman katka a sentavo. tlen 84 tekiwakayotl. tla nelpoliwis tlayekanani tlen totlalnantsin, iwan inin tlamantli onpanos ipan 2 xiwitl tlen itekichiwalis, iwan tla sennechikolistli tekichihtos, saniman mokwepas kewak kolegio elektoral, iwan san moneki mosentiliseh ome tlen eyi tlatlapantli tlen asitok tequichihuaneh, ika ichtakaya tlapowali iwan ika miak momatlananaseh, kitekiwamakas se tlayekanani tlen san tlatokpa; yewa sennechikolistli amachiwas, ipan mahtlaktli tonatih tlen keman motokahtis tlayekanani tlen san tlatokpa, amatlanotsali tlen ika motlapehpenis tlayekanani tlen kiixtlamis kawitl tlen itechpowi; san moneki mokawilis tlen keman kisas amatlanotsali iwan tlen keman mochiwas nechikolistli tlaixpehpentli, se kawitl tlen amo kentsi mahtlaktli iwan nawi metstli iwan amo panos kaxtoli iwan eyi metstli. tla sennechikolistli amo tekichihtos, in sentikichiwani nechikolistli kitokahtlalis se tlayekanani san tlatokpa iwan kikixtis amatlanotsali tlen axnochipa tlasentilistli tlen weyitlahtokan iwikpa inin, yewa kitokahtlalis tlayekanani tlen san tlatokpa iwan kikixtis amatlanotsali tlen ika motlapehpenis tlayekanani ken kiihtowa tlanawatikayotl tlen ompanok. keman poliwis tlayekanani onpanos keman poliwis tlen san iyohtsiya nawi xiwitl tlen itlanawatil, tla weyitlahtokan tlen sennechikolistli tekichihtos, kitokahtlalis tlayekanani tlen san tlatokpa tlen kitlamis kawitl tekichiwalis; tla weyitlahtokan amo monechikohtos, in sentekichiwani nechikolistli kitokahtlalis se tlayekanani tlen san tlatokpa iwan kikixtis amatlanotsali mawala weyitlahtokan tlen sennechikolistli tlen axnochipa tlasentilistli iwikpa mamokwepa konseho elektoral iwan makichiwa tlapehpentli tlen tlayekanani santlatokpa. istatl, ixkich in monekis tlen san kwaltetsin mopias se kali ika weyi ixochimil iwan se yetas nochipa itlak semanawak wepawalistli. ¿campa nel tinechmiwalis? ka tinonantsin, ka tinottatsin, ka nimesso, ka nimotlapalo; ka ok kisas, ka ok wetsis in sententli, in senkamatl, immonanyotsin, immottayotsin. ¿cuix tinechmoxikkawilis? ma kin ihkwak in awel nikana, in awel nikkwi ma tinechmokawilis. febrero wan marso in xochiyowa. itech abril tamixochiyowa ya wan itech in hulio onkak xipohlimahkonemeh ya. v kali xiwitl, 1341. o anka in mahsewal, atloyantepetl, wiya a inokitkiko in teteuktin, in konkawtewake. ipan in in sekintin wewetke kimachiyotia i motlahtokatlali in tisosikatsin. kitkilis itla ineska, in ineltika, inik kineltokkas. inik oneltik no imixpa in mochitin tlaxilakaleke in ye tenewtikate tlakpak inik tikneltilia inik otichwako posesio tiktlalia totoka iwan tofirma. axkan hweves a 18 de abril de mil e kinientos i setenta i un años. newatl fransisko moisen eskribano. nikan ipan in kinpewke tlatilolka, ikwak tlahtokatia in itoka kwawtlatowatsin; in ipan in ikseppa pewaloke in tlatilolka. inik yahke, sekintin namikeke kinkawtiake in innamik-wan, sekintin kinwikake in insiwawan; aw in soldadostin nonkwa yahke, in san inyolokakopa wi china, amo inwan nikan mosenpowa. ai nanita la kana niwinti kach ikw al i nikalaki kalihtek nikučtika wan ahmo kanin nakehktihkas fiero tele pero. pero nikan ka' areglo yaw kanatiw i karga para tlen tonali kinawatihke kikawatiw inyekiwika wan yokentregaroto yawahsis wan tlatemowiya wan kentregaroa i karga in len kihtlanelihke kwan yekwal tlaxtlawia wan yewik wal mokwepa ichanwahsikiw. kwatitla. titechtequipanotih. iwan no temikispan onechmomachiltili kanin niknextiskiani wel neli ihtik se inontin teocholi in ewatiketstaya ompa in itokayohkan sokiatonko tlalmili mostlatika itloktsinko se nokniwtsin iwan ika tlaltepustli iwan tlalacha oninohwanalti nepakopa in pisilwaxin mochiwa milah oso kampa tepeyoj, pero no talwakpan wan amo se kitoka. 76. ma yektli in amihtawka, in amotenyo, aw ma no onkan mopal niyekwewe, niyesilama; ma san iwi in temiko, niwalnomati, nesotse, notlapalotse. ma onkan nesi in tineso, in tinotlapalo; maka tle intawaloka, in topinawis, aw in totepacholoka, in totewiloka ommuchiwtiw. ma iwiyan, ma yokoxka, in xonsemilwiti, in xonteutlakili, aw yekene xontlamawistili, xontlaixtili in itwalko, aw yekene in tlekwili, in kiyawatl; maka tewtli, tlasoli ommoloni. maka tle chili nixko kompitsinikan, in niwewe, in nilama; ka wel kokok, aokmo nitlaweilia. aw ma wel, iwiyan, yokoxka, in xommowikatiwiyan, in xommohtlatoktikan, aw xokommokwilikan in nemowani, in yelowani; aw xokommokwitlawi in tepustsintli, in mekapaltsintli, aw no iwi iyewatl xokonkwitlawilti in tsotsopastli, in malakatsintli, aw xokonnextilitiw in katle ohtli in ankitokaske, nopiltsine, notelputsine, nokoske, noketsale. san iyo. san ok ixkich ik nimitsontlalilia, nimitsontewilia immix, immoyolo. mah amo kimatoka kimichin, in kalxexelol amo wel nech paktia. ¿cualii tinechmoititilis oksente? ayemo ka otlanankili. iwan opanok tonaítin. okitlalike in kwartel sapata iwan everardo gonsáles. inin tlatiwani omokaw onkwan kixotis in momochko malakatetikpak. wan chene kiileuiaj, kwahkwaltsi ichpokero, amo monamaka. nikan siudad de mexiko tenochtitlan axkan mie[r]koles xxix dias del mes de disiembre de 1563 años i newatl algwasil mayor por su magestad iwan eskribano migwel de los angeles san ipaltsinko in totlatokaw su magestad onechmonawatili i mwi magnifiko señor dotor seinos oidor por su magestad in presidente de la audiensia real i nikan nweva españa. wel miak nech yolkokoa, xinechmopahkayowaltikan. se weyi tekitl nikpia. nech chiah iwan awel ni wehkawas nian se minoto amo mkmati keyeh iuki kiluiaj. in tsinakaxalxokot se kikwi pahti iewayo, se kikíxtilia in iewayo wan se kimana ihwak tekwí estsompil.in ikwouyo amo kwaltia para kalkwowit, solo para kalikxit, kasá kikuij. taxikowa tein melawak, in takwawak in ikwouyo.se kikwa itakka. itakka welik taamanal mah se kitsopeli. para tapalol amo kikuij. in amo semi monamaka, monamaka pero tepitsin saj.in totonik. ma xi iknotlamati noyolo. maka ok tle xik yokoka. ye neli in ayaxkan niknopiltiwa in tlaltikpak. ka wel ok itla ineskayo moneki, inik wel neltokkos, in kenin wel yewatsin kimotitlanilia in ilwikak siwapili. aw in oiwkikak in hwan diego, kimolwilih in obispo tlakatl netlakentilo yekwalika akmo kwawpik. in ipan siudad mexiko a katorse dias mes de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años in diego astaxochitl otsatsik okitenew in kali in onpa mani teokaltitlan sankt ipolito okitenyoti in makwilpowali pesos ik patiyowa aw ayak otlanankili in ma okitenyoti ixpan testigo antonio xwares iwan pedro de galitia. teutla milakatsoa q.n. in olin in opew yawyutl aok ak mo- mamawtia in ikwak ye tewtli moketsa in otewtika tlayoak. intla omitspaktik axolotl iwan tikpalewisneki ammo xianoki kwali techmakixtis aw iwan ye chikonpowalxiwitl ipan makwilxiwitl in ipan xi tekpatl xiwitl, 1464 años, in otlakat nesawalpili tlahtowani tetskoko, ipiltsin i nesawalkuyotsin; ikwak senka otonalwakowak, motsitsinew hehekatika in kwawitl inik nowian. —asta kanin kwa' timika tikín mopialis intewa'kun. nikpia. nima ye ik witse, inpan asito i mexika kikwikatia in imamatepew; in kitake koyowake yuhkin tsitsimitl. kaxtapan aw i yewantin in waltewikake chalka san iwki inik kinwalmiktoktlaske kinwalmikkamayawke, ka amo yuh momatia intla welasitiwi in chichimeka; in iw momatia in chalka akxoteka ka san onkan mikitiwi in tlahtoke atonaltsin chichimekatewktli iwan tliltekatsin chichimekayaotekiwa iwan in mochintin inmasewalwan. ¿quexqui tomin kipia? wan no kwaltia para mole yon machohpahpata. aw niman okimoteotitasiko ininn atl in omotenewke ulmeka in xikalanka in xochteka in kiyawisteka in kukolka, iwan okikaltike kalitik omokaw in ameyali; aw in ipampa in okimoteotike ininn atl, ka noso ye wekaw tlaka katka kitokayotiaya in iksen mochi atl chalchiwmatlalatl. aw in iteyolkwitikaw ikonfesor owalmochiwtia visurrei in ompa okiwalmowikili españa se klérigo kitokayotia doktor gwerrero komendador kalatraba chichiltik krus in ikomienda kitlalia. nimitstatawtia ke axkan tiresarotih padrenwestro. amo wehkapania. aw iwan ma timochikoma, ma titeixtoka in ipampa in ikokokatsin in totekwiyo in ihkwak aka kimomakilia. ma aka tiktolini, ma aka ken tikchiw, ma aka ika timokakayaw, ka niman tewatl in timotolinis; iwan ma tikmokwitlawi, ma tikmawilti in tlawelilokayotl, ma tikmonanti iwan ma tikmottati in nextepewali, in otlamaxali. amo san se iman kipia. —bweno wan de se metl keski litro kikakawa. iwan ikwak tlalolin, senka totokak; miyek in tepetl xixitin in wiwiton, aw moch papachiw in kali. itlanahnamik: yon xipolimah semi fresko. achá totonik in limahlimon. pewa xochiyowa huliohkopa. . aw niman ye ik kikwepilia in itlahtul kilwia se kikwi owapach tein amo semi ixtapaktik, se kiwatsa tonalah wan se kichiwa se ikochpetauj oso se itankwapech. tehwa mopilwan, amo neh ta tehwa tinechimakatok. v tekpatl xiwitl, 1432. wan kikawili inana para ma kintlachili nopa anali ka tel yuh kimattiw in moyolo ka moyolo itlan yetiw ka ik timelakwawtiw in inchokis in tlaokol in monanwan in motawan. amimitl ikwik in sowapa amo moka tlahtolo. okwilti moyakatlanina otlika, aw in kaltech ahalakatok in kwatextli. aw in atl yuhki chichiltik, ka yuhki tlapalatl. ka yuhki tikike, tikia tekixkiatl. aw no ikwak kinpewke kwawtepek tlaka. in nohpal, yeh no mokehketsa mahyá kwowit, ihkón troso itsintah wan mamajtsakalej, ta moketsa kemeh kwowit wan yek uitsyoj, yek aachka uitsyoj. aw ik niman yewantsitsin kimonmotokilitiake in senka mawistililoni teopixke menores in itlasopilwantsitsinwan totlasomawistatsin san fransisko patriarcha; ahso wel makwilpowalonmatlaktin in onkan momaniltitiake omotenew ik tetokok. "kena, kena, pampa mifstemo mopapá nepa kapolatoli in ipan axkan hwebes ikomilwitl mani metstli de noviembre de 1595 años, wel ikwak in mikkailwitl onkan maxitiko in tepeyakak in visurrei don gaspar de súniga i asevedo konde de monterrei; ompa kimopapakiltilike in kastilteka iwan ompa masewato in mexika iwan chinampaneka. amo nikneki mah despwés okihmiktihke in tatahti porke kinwalkawiyaya. istatl, ixkich in monekis aw in axkan tikitlaniko in iwelitsin inik axkatiloske makoske posesion iwan venta in omotlakowike ka imixpan in fiskal fransisko santoval iwan pedro hakobite iwan eskribano in omokawato sank hoseph in tomines sempwali pesos yuh otlatolmelawke in testigos omochiwke in teopan tlatekipanowa sank joseph. aw in ipan lunes omotenew a xx de mayo 96 años, ikwak walmowikak maxitiko in obispo xalixko don fransisko sanktos garsía, ye tlapoyawa maxitiko nikan mexiko. aw in pablo seoanokatl onokimomachitokak ik tiktlachikawilia itenkopatsinko su magestad ayokak sepa kikwilis in ana nensiwatl ka wel iwewetlal in mochi ka tixpan oneltik aw in tla oksepa aka tesisikolistika kikwisnekis tlatsakaiwiltilos in iwka hustisia. kwaltlamotlatewa i kwitlapa wan wan motlaloa' wal čoloa' inewan ikonew xwan el oso. kuouj kamoh kwowit oso istakkwoukamohkwowit chikwei tochtli xiwitl atle mochiw. kitokah isemilita. in kemah momeutani, xiutah amo takis. ye ik kalake motlalito tlaxkalan; nima ye ik momanan kokolistli tlatlasistli tlachinoltotonki sawatl. aw in omotenew el lisensiado valesilo in alkalde de korte kiwalmochiwili in nikan mexiko. nikanka in maiknihtli akin onitetlanehti tomín. in ma on nel nonkis, in ma on nel nontlakat. se tapaloltsin wan nopa tenantsi axmolini mikistlawanke, ik onkan amilan ipan, atempanmexika i mehetla. niman ye ik kisenmana in sa ik nemi mitotitinemi. san ye teyontimani atl on yan tepetl a in tenochtitlan in ye ika mawisowa. ayak kimakasi yektli in mikistli, antepilwan. yuh amechnawati in teotl. in yektli momak iwi ¿ac nel kisiewis chimal, in ipetl in itlakochikpal in yewan? ye xik yokoyakan, xik elnamikikan, antepilwan, wiya. ¿ac kimoyawas atl on yan tepetl in tenochtitlan? ¿ac in topewas in itlaxilo in iwikatlan? totlakochtika, tochimaltika in ma ok wel mani ya in atl in tepetl in tenochtitlan. aw in onkan ik katka in popokatepetl imapan in kukolka, ka no ik monotsa ik motokayotia || 45v in axkan kukolko. axkan domingo in ik 2 mani metstli febrero de 1614 años, ihkwak wel ipan ilwitsin totlasonantsin de la furipikasión de la kandelaria, yowaltika ipan se tsilini, inik ye tlatwitiw axkan omotenew domingo, in okitlalike onkan eskwelas real inik okimakake in latintlahtolkopa in teoamoxtemachtilamapowalistli in padre maestro frai gonsalo de hermosilo teopixki sant augustín inik kathetrádiko de eskriptura omochiw, ixiptla ipatka muchiw in in senka mawistililoni teoyotika tlahtowani maestro don frai diego de kontreras arsobispo omochiwtsino in ompa aihtik sankto domingo la isla, kathetrádiko moyetstikatka. aw kayemo wewentsin omoyetstikatka, ka ye kin wel iyoloko okichtli, yuh omihto ye kin ye ompowalonmatlaktli ipan makwilxiwitl okimopialiaya. nikilnamiki ihkwak mochiwaya tlatsotsonaltlaixnamikilistli;inin ochiwaya imostlatika in wei ilwitl, ipan sempoali chikóme toanli hulio. yewantsitsin don porfirio avila, don klaudio, don emilio, kwali tlatsotsonkeh iwan oksekih tlakah kimomawismachiliaya in ome ahnoso yei banda ompa tlatzotzonayah. . mochi onkan mosen nechikowa in ixkich tlamamali in tiamiktli iwan in ixkich tetlatkitili in imaxka in puchteka tlahtoke. i tochtli xiwitl. in teskatlipoka itlatlatlawtilis in ikwak kokolistli motekaya mochiwa parahko. kiilwi o ka yewatl in inik senka tlatoliniaya omotenew padre frai herónimo de sárate, ayak tle ipan kittaya in mexika iwan seki españoles ayak tle ipan kittaya, imanel tlei ik tepampa kitlatlawtiaya; iwan okseki miek tlamantli in okichiwaya in intoliniloka mexika. ik niman ye kipowa ye kewa ye kihtowa in inchichimekayo in inchichimekatlahtol, in kenami katka. wawaxtla wan xalakapan semi mochiwa. ipa se taman saj. portadortin in kitsonke, aw in iten kichiwke tlatenchiwke tiankispan tlaka. yewan amo kimatih tlen tenemilispalewil onka. sa yetok. in nonkwikaamoxtlapal, nokonsokowtimani, nixochialotsin, nontlatetotika, in tlahkwilokalitik. mahtaktiomeyi mil ángeles sebastianes, tlahtoltin kwaltia kwali titekiti, ta tibwen hoven". ¡in tosan, in teuktla! no se texwapali kikwito kiski in ix akatl xiwitl. axkan martes in ik 22 mani metstli henero de 1613 años, ihkwak ye tlatwi, senka chikawak okiyaw in nikan mexiko iwan inik nowiyan kwawtla onowiyan tepew in seppayawitl. istatl, ixkich in monekis in kwowit. aw ixkich ik mikowak inik nowian ipan nweva españa; timikke in timasewaltin iwan tliltike aw san kexkich in españoles mikke. ye oksehpa onitenonots kenin otechisawi in timasewaltlakah in tiahsiah ipan seminario de kultura nawatl in kin iwti itla otikmatkeh itechpa in wewetlahtoli in miekintin kinemiliahyewatl in senka mawistik genero in ipan nawatlahtoltlatlalilistli wel no iwki in kwikapihkilistli in ika ye otiwelitihkeh tikiximatiskeh manel san achitsin towewealtepew in iyolia iniwki owelit kiyelismakas in tlahkwiloli senka wehkatlan iwan senka kwakwaltsin inik itechkopa mihtoa in kikwiltonoa itlamatilis in tlakayotl in omotenew kwawtleketski teomama onkan kikawtia in ipiltsin in itoka kowatsontli, itech kichiw in ichpuch tlasiwki kopil malinalkatl in itoka xikomoyawal sipili. —yakmo sa tiyeikmanike. kak in kwepohtli mexikko walamelauha, ye paktiwits, ye iw yetiwits in iyoloh ka yekkisakiw, kiyekitkis. wel kimokwitlawitiwits in tlein in icuëxanco, yetiwits in manen itla kimakaw. kimotlamachtitiwits in iawiayakka in nepapan tlasohxochitl. mo pero yekyektsi chipawak sintli xochiyowa hunio. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. eyi xilotl kipixki pero neli eltok weyi kiilwi san pablo san pedro kiilwi. pus in noe tle ahmo itla kilnamiki sikiera niantlen kipensaroa. necateh. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. aw in yewatsin tlasemiknopilwiani wei tetatsin patriarcha sant ignasio in intatsin klérigos teopixke la kompañía de hesús ayemo motlayawalwi in ipan in mochiw tlayawalolistli, ka san ok onkan in hospital del espíritu sankto teopan kiyawak in konmonamikiliko sakramento in sant ignasio; onkan kiwalmokixtilike in ichantsinko la kassa proffessa antastika in ipilwantsitsinwan kimonapalwike. in sesek. in chilxoxowik mapapatawak kemeh chiltekpin. domingo tewa'kun ixmika mika te'wankun. kontlananki ikwakwetlaxo amo nikpia. in amo se kitoka. makahmo ok ma mitstekipacho, mitsahmana, makahmo mitstekipacho in ikokoyalis motlahtsin, kahmo ik mikis in axkahn itechka; ma wel iw ye in moyolloh, ka ye opahtik. amoxtlahkwiloli moyol. xonkwika, tikwikamitl, titsotsona mowewew, tikwikani. xopankalitik titeawiltia. wan nikan namechaxkatiliti miak tlakah kinekih in xitomayotl ipampa wel vitaminahyo iwan istateyo. nemiskiah ¿tehua tikpia nototolakatl? kema, nikpia. nikan ipan in in omotlahtokatlali in kwawtlahtonak in kolwakan tlahtowani. topan kweponi yaoxochitl,in ehkatepek, in mexiko, ye yewilo ya ika iwintiwa in tonawak onok. in aokak wel konilnamiki, wan nohki ika tlahko xiwitl tlakatki wan komo se kineki se kitemowa oso se kikowa se plantita wan ikwouyotsin se kitoka, ompa kemah itsmolinia, ompa moskaltia itsmol hasta 30 sentímetros. ii tekpatl xiwitl, 12. in tlatlatskweponaiistli amitla kinchiwilis. iii akatl xiwitl, 1495. se kilo xaltemetl ii kali xiwitl, 1221. xkinaxkatili nopilwan. testigo martin tlakokowa ichan tlachkwititlan amo monamiktia aw in ixiwtlapowal ye lxx siwitl omakok huramento inik otlatlakoltilok inik amo istlakatis ipaltsinko in totekuyo dios. wawtsontli ika xitomamoli ixiuyo wan in iteyo kwaltia para kiahwialia in tapalol: aw nikan ipan in omikiko in yowalatonak in tlahtowani kolwakan, in tlahtokat chikwexiwitl. in sesek kemeh akolin. amo mah technexikoli, aw in akin tekowas senka wel motlahtlattiliaya in ak yewatl kanas, aw in ikontetl ye wekaw kali onkan mani, sentetl no tienda muchiwtika ye in ostokaltitlan arkotitlan mani; inin kali san tetlanewtilo kapelanía ik katki, yewatl yuh kitlalitia in padre masares klérigo, ka yaxka katka inin omotenew kali. tikilwiske xikahsiki motlaxkaletlatimusewistla tehwa tihmati. niyasa niahsiti nocha". kipowtike in tepewani kenin intlahtokayo mexikah ixkich welitini nekwiltonolistika nowiampa mani. ka iskate in tekwannawaleke in kiyawnawaleke in xochteka in ulmeka in kiyawisteka in kukolka in xikalanka, in tomalwan in otikimasike. yeskiah aw in ipampa ik nikan niktlalia nikmachiyotia in imikilitsin inin omotenewtsino wei teopixki omoyetstikatka yniqu iwki ixiptlatsin omochiwtsinotikatka nikan sankto padre, inik wel omowelitiltiaya yniqu ikatsinko ipampatsinko miek hubileos okimotemakilitia, in iw otikittake; aw moneki no kimatiske onkan in kittaske itokatenewalokatsin, in akike satepan ye nemikiwi in amo kimottilike in amo kimiximachilike inin ik wei teopixki okatka, ipampa yuh ninomati kaokak yuhki nikan mexiko okse teopixki ittos in ok ompa ye tonitstiwi ipan kawitl. ya nopaí mowowinatski, wahka kotonki nopa in mochiwa semi tamanka, se kitachihchiwia, se talkaxania wan ompa ya se kitoka. iwan nikitowa nikimixketsa alvasiasme fransisko malatl, lurenso kwawtli wel kimokwitlawiske in animan aw in ikwak tla ninomikilis onkan ninotokas in san sepastian kalitik iskichin in notlatol inik ninomakixtia ipaltsinko dios inik nikneltilia nikan niktlalia nofirma. nika nika neka kisa, choloa. achtopa inin tlatoli itech notatsin niaw nitlanonotsas. ikwak newa nitepiton notatsin ayemo wel omotekitiliaya. san yewatl omotlakichiliaya kwentla matlaktli wan ome metoton wan omotlachikiliaya onkwan on mochiwas newtli. ikan ayemo miak tepilwan oyeya kwali opanoaloya ika newtomin. ipan on tonaltin ipatiw se litro newtli yeyi sentavo. ika ipan tika on amo omopiaya litros ke axan. ika tlatamachiwalo iman tika on oyeya almontin tlakwalmon iwan kwarterón. in monamaka por bulto wan no kinamakah sehsé. teneneh inin kineskayotia in chichi telahchiwi in ika motsonkwi mihtoa kinmach ihkwak aka tlakwahtok iwan ammitla kitlakwilia in chichi ammitla kimaea iwan inin san mostlaktoloa immanon sawanenepilkisa in ahkin tlakwa inin tepan pano ipampa in chichi motlawelkixtia iwan yewatl tenenepiltlahchiwia intla inin tepan moehiwa nepahtilo yuhkin ni kan mihtoa mototonia komaleo in tlaxkali iwan ihkwak ye tlakwawtotonki ye mana mokwepa mixpichana niman ye nenepilpohpoalo ika inon tlaxkalkohkotoktli iwan yeka ye sewti ye pachiwti in sawatl ammo nochtin chichime kichiwa inin kemeh aman in hunio onkak xokokonemeh ya wan san tlapik. ayok welki tekitih mochiwa saj, ixwa iteyo. mamoyektenewa in itokatsin tetatsin tepiltsin espiritu sankto iwan tona[n]tsin santa maria i newatl hwana antonia nochan san hwan nekaltitlan in axkan ka notech hokimotlalili in ikokolistsin in totekuyo dios. axkinekiyaya ma monamikti porke ihwanti aw in kali yoan itlalo itenpanyo monamakas sempoali mokwis yehoatl kimanas in nopilotsin ana xwares ka nel itlalpantsinko in ipan ikak kali aw in atentli ka nel imaxkatsin ka muchi kisenwika. yuh motlanawatili ik neli nikan ka itokatsin ifirmatsin fecho en mexiko a veinte dias del mes de mayo de mil e kinientos 92 años. antonio valeriano itenkopatsinko governador hwes migwel monise eskrivano. yon xiutsin xochiyowa disiembre. kena kionitayaya eltok atl xopankwikatl in yektli kechol,in wel ya kwika. tlen 108 tlanawatihkayotl. iwikpa tlen mochiwas iixkawil tlen moihtowa ipan inin tokayotl moitaseh kewak altepeko tekitinih tlen ixnesiseh ipan chinanko tlapehpeniyotl, tlen tlatskitokeh ipan poder hudisial tlen sentlanawatiloyan iwan tlen poder hudisial tlen iyolo weyi altepetl, in tekichiwanih iwan tequitinih, iwan sentika, nochi tlakatl noso siwatl tlen kichiwas se tekitl, tekiwakayotl noso tekichiwali tlen san tleweli tlamantli ipan administrasión públika federal noso ipan iyolo weyi altepetl, iwan noihki tekichiwanih tlen instituto federal elektoral, tlen inixkotiah elis tlen tlachiwali noso tlailkawali tlen ipan wetsis keman kichiwaseh tekitl tlen intechpowi. in tlayekanani tlen totlalnantsin, keman kawitl tlen itlanawatil, san welis kitelwiseh tla kikahkayawas totlalnantsin iwan sekinok weyi tlatlakolmeh tlen san altepechantli. in weyi tekiwameh tlen tlaltlanahuatilmeh, in tepantlahtoanih tlen chinankopa amatlanawatil chihuanih, in magistrados tlen tribunales superiores tlen hustisia lokales iwan, tlen seha tlamantli, tlen tlatskitokeh ipan tlahtokan tlen hudikaturas lokales, yewan intlahtlakol tla moixpanos inin amatlanawatili iwan tlahtol tlanawatilmeh tlen sentlanawatiloyan, iwan noihki tla amo kwali moitskis tlaxtlawili iwan tlapialmeh tlen sentlanawatiloyan. in amatlanawatilmeh tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh tlen totlalnantsin nelkwali quiihtoseh, ken moihtowa ipan se tlahtolpamitl tlen inin tlanawatikayotl iwan iwikpa tlen itechpowi intekichiwalis, intlachialis tlen altepeko tekitinih tlen kiseliseh se tekitl, tlanawatili noso tekichiwali ipan tlaltlanawatilmeh noso altepeko tlanahuatilmeh. xik-walitta noxochitlakwilo, ma tonxikwalitta, no xochitlakwilolchichiwaltsin. ¿macazo kan on nen wetstiw, ye moyolotsin t'axayacaton ? iska ye momatsin, ma no matitech, xinechonantiw. xonawiakan. moxochinpetlapan nikawín amo keman se kiahsi solo mochiwa ne weyi kuoujtaj. iselti mochihki. aw no nikan ipan in in xiwitl i motlahtokatlali in akxitsin chichimekatewktli mochiw in amakemekan; inin ipiltsin in atonaltsin chichimekatewktli. xii tekpatl xiwitl, 1244. ¿auh in ahtlei imahsewalo, kan kikkwis, kan kittas in welik xochitl? ¿auh kwix nowan asis aya in xochitlalpan, in tonakatlalpan, in ahtle i imahsewalo, innentlamati, intlaitlakoiwa in tlaltikpak? ka san kitemahsewaltia in tloke in nawake, in tlaltikpak ye nikan. ik choka noyolo, nokonilnamiki a in ompa, onitlachiato i xochitlalpan, a nikwikani. ika owi tlatski ikwakwetlaxo wahkino. noponi, kiijtouaj, tlehkoyaya. kenin mochiwa ixkich in kitetlawtiaya tealtis. se mamahpikton silantro ye tlakpak omotenew, sann onmowiwikaya in tsakwaltitlan tenanko chikonkowak, onmotlachialtihtinenka inik onkan onmoxtlawaya ontlamasewaya ixpan in iteow nawyotewktli. aw in ipan ikwak ilwitsin sant bartholomén a 24 de agosto 94 años, in yewantin atlakwiwayan tlaka inik motlayekoltiaya istak oktli ikwak kikixtike mandamento in tlakpak || 14 kinmomakili visurrei don lwis de velasko inik wel kinamakaske nikan mexiko, ayak kinkwilis iwan anoak kimilpis, kinmottitilike mandamiento governador mexiko don antonio valeriano alkaldesme. axkan martes ik 10 mani metstli mayo de 1611 años, tlahka ipan matlaktli tsilini, ihkwak nikan siudad mexiko mokixti kitlalkawi in altepetl in tlahtowani don lwis de velasko markés de salinas, visurrei oppa omochiwtsino nikan mexiko nweva españa; mowika kastila, kiwalmonochili in toweitlahtokaw rei don felipe tersero inik ompa presidente del konseho de indias mochiwtsinoto. mochiwa kahfentah wan kwouhihtik. in kanon in nokonkaki itlatol, tlakahso yewatl ipalnemoa, kiyanankilia, kiyanankilia in koyolyantototl, onkwikatinemi, xochimana. aw intla ok itla tomasewal in tiwewetke in aso ok miloch monekwepal tikmochiwilikiw ka ok seppa ti mits iximatiske. sehkotsi mosentiliyayaj. in tlamatinime iwan teopixke intlahtol mochiwa mas newín tanikwakopa. aw ye neli niman okisako i yowaltika in tlasiwki kopil, kiwalwikak ichpuch itoka xikomoyawal. motokayoti pantla, aw sanno ipan in in omotenew xiwitl okinawatike in atonaltsin chichimekatewktli iwan oksekintin totolimpaneka chichimeka in toteositewktli in tekwachkawtli tlahtowani chalko akxotlan chalchiwtepek; in atentlipan kinnawatike mochintin in chalka akxoteka inik ye kinwalkawa. i akatl xiwitl, 1155 años. tlaxotlan tenamitl 2 tochtli xiwitl, 1286 años. kwaltia taki mopahpampilowa imahtsakalwan, etiya ika itakka kampa mochiwa miak. nikan ipan in pewaloke xochitlan tlaka, yewatl kinpolo in axayakatsin. in imostlayok, lunes, in ikwak kiwikkaskia in hwan diego in itla ineskayo, inik neltekkos, ayokmo owalmokwep, ye ika in ahsito in ichan, se itlah katka itoka hwan bernardino, oitechmotlalih in kokoyalistli, wel tlanawtok; ok quitizinochilitoh, ok ipdn tlahtoh, yese ayokmo imman, ye wel otlanaw. inik chikwetetl tetsawitl 23. iwan ma kwel tikmokwitlawi, ma tikelewi in kweitl, in wipili, teawilkixti, teisolo, tekatsaw, tetlawelilokatili. ma moyolo, monan, motta tikchiw. ma nextepewali, ma ohtlamaxali tiemonanti, tiemottati, ye itsontlan, ikwatla tiyas in totekwiyo. ma ye ok xontlakoti, xontekiti ixpantsinko, inawaktsinko, ka ok tatsintli, titototsintli; ka ok tixiloti, timiyawati. imma san yuhki tichalchiwtsintli, titeoxiwtsintli; imma san yuhki tiketsaltsintli, ma monewiyan timoteteso, timowawaso. se xonakatl kwaltia xii akatl xiwitl, 1075. tetsavistli q.n. id est okintetsavito aw ka yuhki in inik pewtika in itlakamekayo in akamapichtli, in iw kitowa in iw kimachiyotitiwi wewetke. aw ik niman ye kitowa in imomextin in tlahtoke in tlalmasewke in kwawitsatewktli iwan in atonaltsin chichimekatewktli, ye kihtowa in ye ontlachia, kihtoke in tlahtoke "aquique i nachka in tlapopotsa in kwawtenko?; totawané, xikinmiktiti, ompa xikimonmiminati, ka otomak wetsiko, ye tomalwan, ka ye otitlamasewke otitlamachiyotike; tlei kichiwaske in tlaweliloke?". yei kali xiwitl atle mochiw. burritos aw ma iw ye in moyolloh, ka wel niktlasohkamatis, aw ka nikixtlauhas, ka ik nimitskwiltonos,
