nimitstlamachtis, iwan miek onkan tikmasewas, ik nikkwepkayotia in mosiauhilis, in motlatekipanolis inik tiknemilitiw in tlein nimitstitlani. in sesek. se kitoka in iteyo komo se kiwelita, pero tein onkak ixwa saj. pihpitsaktsitsin ikwouyo wan wehkapantik kemeh serka tahko metro wan moyewalowa. wan imaxiuyo itech sehsé ramitah motaliliah eheyi xiutsin: ome tanakastan wan se tatahkoyan. achto mopohpoa kwali iwan ihtik in komitl mokwakwalatsa; kemmanian motlalilia tekixkitl inik xoxoktik kisas; motlalilia tepitsin istatl. ihkwak ye owiksik ayokmo tleko mokawas; ma itstia. satepan mopatska inik mokixtilis in atl. ipan sokikaxitl motlalia pitsochiyawisotl, xonakatl iwan ompa mowikxitia in kilitl ahso chikwei ahnoso mahtlaktli minuto; intla itech moneki oksehpa motlalilia istatl. achi muchipa mokwa ika chiltemoli. onkan impan motlali inik kilpiskia in ikmakwilpa in inxiw; aw yese ayemo wel onkan kilpike, ipampa in onkan yaoyawaloloke. in amoxtli, in tlakwiloli, in mokwikaiswayotia moxochiapana wewetitlan, momalina. ixochiyotsin welik se kikwa tatsoyon ika piotet. aw no iwan in iw kimitalwitiw in iw kimotekpanilitiw in iamatlakwilolpantsinko in don hwan de sandoval tekwanxayakatsin teowatewktli, ka iwin. kenin mochiwa tlehkoh wahkapa nikpia sempoali iwan chikweyi. iwan onkan sekintin momikilike in chichimeka in wewe ayopochtli iwan in kwatomawak iwan in totonwitstli; inin eintin onkan momikiliko. ah ka no chichik teopowki tenawak ye nikan. xi tochtli xiwitl, 1386. san nemi motewiah wan ihkí kiihto aw in iknawkan ka ye in wei tlahtowani in itoka sophi, rei in ompa persia; aw inin iaxka tlali ka ik itech ontsonkisa ik konkwaxochnamiki in itlal in turko ye tonatiw ikalakiampa, aw inik newan || [14r] mochipa moyaochiwtikate. tlen 6 tlanawatihkayotl. welis se kiihtos tlen kiyeyekowah iwan amo welis kikwatotoniseh ika tlatsakwiltikayotl noso amatlanotsali, san keman se teixpanos, akahya titlahtlakawis, kichiwas axkwali tlahtoli, noso tlaolinis ipan altechantli; tlen intechpowi tlahtolmatilis tekpantlanawatiloyan tlatemaktilis. iwikpa tlachiwali tlen itechpowi tlahtolmatilis, in sentlanawatiloyan, tlaltlanawatilmeh iwan iyolo weyi altepetl, kampa yewan intlanawatiloyan, kitokiliseh inin tlahtolpewalistli iwan tlahtolpechtli i. nochi tlahtolmatilistli tlen kipiaseh tlanahuatianih, tlachilwali, tlahtolchiwali tlen sentlanawatiloyan, tlaltlanawatiloyan iwan altepetlanahautiloyan, mosenmatis iwan welis motsakwas se ome tonatih ipampa ihkon moneki altepeko ken moixnextia ipan tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh. ipan kenihki mokwamachilis inin tlatechpowilistli moneki moitas tlahtolpewalistli tlen miak momatilistli. ii. in tlahtolmatilistli tlen itechpowi tlakanemilistli iwan tlahtol ixnextilistli welis motlapachos iwan mokotonas ken kihtowah tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh. iii. nochi tlakatl, amo moneki kiihtos tlenon ika kitekiwis, welis san molwi kiasis tlatolmatilistli tlen altepeko, tlen itlaixnextilis noso kikwaltlalis itlaixnextilis. iv. mokwaltlalis tlahtolmekatl tlen ika se kalakis ipan tlahtolmatilsitli iwan mochiwas tlahtolchiwali tlen saniman tlaitalistli. inin tlahtolchiwali motetonis ipan nelkwali tlachiwalmeh iwan xitlawak tlahtolmeh, iwaya sentlananwatili itekichiwalis, tlen tekipanos iwan tlaxolewas. v. tlakameh intlanekilis moneki kipiaseh amameh ipan amatlapiali tlasenkawali iwan kiixnextiseh ipan tlahtolmekatl, asitok tlahtolmatilistli iwan tlasenkawali tlen intekipanolis iwan intekichiwalis tlen tomin tlatekiwili altepeko. vi. in tlahtol tlanawatilmeh kiihtoseh kenihki moneki intlanekilis tlakameh kichiwaseh tlahtolmatilistli tlen tomin tlatekiwili altepeko tlen kinmaktiliseh tlakameh noso san tlatokayotl. vii. in amo kwali tlachialistli tlen kiihtowah tlahtolmeh kenihki se kiasis tlahtolmatilsitli ipan altepko motlatsakwiltis ken moihtowa ipan tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh. iiii kali xiwitl, 1457. itlanahnamik: . niman itlan konaki in amatl in ik wel kwetlanis. aw wel kitstimoketsa in ik tlatla wel kimokwitlawitikak: in pantsin ipan ahkopachtli ka. kema. yewipla owala sente iwan onechtitlanili sekin pahtololohtin wel chichik, ipahyo totonialistli, nesi kinina, iwan se pahtsopelik inik nohti. mach wel melawak nikonihto, kin ye axkan ayemo kwali nomati. yetok ya ichkatlapochina san ok nikan walatenko in asito chichimeka totolimpaneka. xa ipa se taman saj. aw motenewa, mitoa, ka ilwikatl iitik in tlatlatahtiaya in moteotiaya aw in kinnotsaya, sitlalikwe, sitlalatonak, tonakasiwatl, tonakatewktli, tekalikenki, yestlakenki, tlalamanak, tlalichkatl. aw ompa ontsatsia, yuh kimatia, omeyokan, chiuknepaniwkan, inik mani in ilwikatl. aw in yuh kimatia, yewantin ompa chaneke in kinnotsaya, in kintlatlatlahtiaya wel moknomattinenka, tlaokoxtinenka. xiii kali xiwitl, 1245 años. mokixtilia iiswayo in elotl. makahmo tsayani, ipampa ika inon mochiwas in elotamali. moowa in elotl iwan mopayana makahmo sasan tlatextli; in pilonsilo motetextilia iwan motlalilia in textli. motamalpiki iwan ihtik in textli motlalia ahso sentetl ahnoso ome awax, ixkich in monekis. san niman ika ahmo wei tletl ye moihpotokwikxitia. mahtlaktli wan orne aw in ikwak kaatekiaya, in kisewisnekia, san ye ilwise mopitsa. aokmo wel sew, wel tlatlak. momahkahki ipan atl semi mah kinehmahpihkan. okito in testigo ka wel melaoak inik onokonan huramento inik onitlatolmelaw in ye ninemi tlaltikpak ye epoalxiwitl aw inin ka amo nohoanyolki in hwan de eskalante yoan inamik amo nikimiximati don gaspar de mendosa nixpan fransisko milan eskribano. nochi san kwolyetok: in tzotzomah, nemilisyotl, tlakwali. itlanahnamik: mochiwa kajfentaj, kampa milah wan kampa kaltsintan. niyas nikitati". entonses mach okwal üamotlatewak primerito yehwatl in xulwastli. viii tochtli xiwitl, 1214. uta, axowi para mochiwas". tlanamakanis aw in hin: ka namech on notlatlawtilia ken tlakawas in iyolotsin totekuyo? asok amitsinko amokpatsinko nitlachiekiw. nachkawané noteikkawané, tla xik-walmokakiltikan, ka in totawan in tokolwan || 78r in wewetke in chichimeka in mexika kamo isippa inchan katka, aw ka sekni ka weka in oyolki in okinmotlakatilili in totekwiyo dios, aw ka umpa in owalmowikake inik omokalakiko omotlaltiko omochantiko in nikan mexiko. xippe ikwik totek yoalavana kwaltia tenonotsalistli ¡n tetta ye kinonotsa, ye kiskalia in ipiltsin inik kwali, yektli ye monemitis. xi tochtli xiwitl, 1490. itech nehin tonal, itech nehin hora. in ipan naxkan semilwitl lunes a veinte i sinko dias del mes de henero de mil e kinientos i setenta i ocho años i newatl neskrivano lasaro de sant hwan ihoan testigos motenehoaske ihoan diego astaxochitl pregun okichiw nowiyanpan tlaxilakalpan. —wan tewa'kun. talchawitsin, makwili pitsawak pimienta iamoxpan piltontli amotlen tlapololistli okipiaya. x kali xiwitl, 33. itech namoahtapal xikwalkwikan. tel iw mochiw; aw in hwan diego niman ik walamelaw, kitokkak in kwepbhtli. aw in quihualtepotztoccayah, onkan atlawtli kisa, inawak tepeyakak kwauhadntitlan, quipolocoh; manel ok nowian tlatemohqueh, ahkdn quittacqueh. san iw hualmocuepqueh, ahmo saniyo inik omoxixiuhtlatihtoh, no iwan ik oquimelleltih, oquincualancacuitih; iw kinohnotsato in tlahtoani obispo, kitlawelalilihkeh inik ahmo kineltokkas. kilwihkeh inik san konmostlakawilia, san kipihpiki, in tlein kiwalmolwilia; anose san okitemik, san okikochitlew, in tlein kimolwilia, in tlein kimihtlanililia. nelehwel totlasotlaya, aik tlanikilwi ke se entiende tlasotlaya'. in itech in tapalol se kipantalia, mah sikierah ome ramitas. len tanto nekwatl motekilia ixkichon de nekwtli onyas para ahmo nekwtias para bweno nekwtli yek ahmo feo solo welik. xochiyowa pero amo nikmati kemanian, ixochiyo kemeh wiwilakanikwamekat, istak ixochiyo wan moloxtik. mochi yomosowke rebeldes wan ye'on non yotopan nowahsiko in rebolúsio. amo xinechmikti se kilo tomatl se kitoka wan se kichipawa kwando plantitas kokonemeh ok. owalmowikak s[eño]r obispo d[on] hwan de palapos i mendosa okinkalaki klerikos. kema kampa kiita eltok atl san ihkwak yankwikan motlalika padreme in nikan amakemekan. tleno okseki nikitos. tlawel ahachika nomokokó". no niyas aw in ipan in omotenew metstli ipan niman kipewaltike in ihtik sankto domingo teopankali in ye anokilo, senka sa tetlaokoltikan, ka ateskapan katka. vii tochtli xiwitl, 1486. ye yuh epowali tikaliwa i ye kinomawiko spañoles, in tsatsiko itoka kastaneda itokayoka iyawtenko, tsatsiko kiwalwikak tlaxkalteka; i ye kiwaltsatsilia yaotlapia tenantitla tlaxoxiwko itoka itspankalki achkawtli chapoltsi, omesti tlapaltekatl kwesakaltsi. . niman yewatl kiteki in itech powi in yakateoktli in kokohkohimetl iyakapitsawak yewatl in otlatopili. kisenkwitlalpiaya wel yewatl in kimoteotiaya in puchteka in ostomeka in kampa wia. ikwak owiloak ika tlaxitla ma tikitokan ika kwawnawak asike ipan se tepetl itoka tepetl hilgwero. ompoyon okitlalis sapata iestakamento. ikan yokimatia yaw tlapolos amo ika on omotekwicho, sino okimilwik isoldadowan. in kilit se kikwa ipa taamanal saj, tein se kipiya gusto poyek wan tein amo, amo poyek kikuaj. para tlehko nopa tepeko. tehwa xikinaxkatili nopilwan. nika motekpana in ikwak in tlekwawitl wets; no ikwak molpili in ixiw mexika. itlanahnamik: kitiski kwali noka siwatekipano kalseliloyan, kaltlakwalko, kaltech weyak iwan tlakwalchihkan kinyektlalia, nonantsin in ome kochiwayan kinyektlalia. tomochantise". yexiwtika in oyekawiko teokali inik kichiwke atsakwalka, ya yewantin ipan motlahtoltike in sant augustín padreme, ka nel yewantin ye kinmopachilwia in atsakwalka in ye ixkichika ik kinkawke in achtopa intawan in intepachokawan katka kalmenitas deskalsos padreme, in okikwike in okimotechtike in inweweteokal || 138 katka atsakwalka. xisixwalti. aw san nowi in yewantin chikweintin nikan [f. 12v.] motenewa in teopantlaka in tlakamo tlasenmatiske in ompa intlan ompa motlamitinemiske notlatsakwitiloske iwan kichiwaske in kowatekitl. aw inik neli omotlanawatili nika ka itokatsin ifirmatsin fecho ut supra. antonio valeriano [rúbrica]. istatl, ixkich in monekis ok iwan nikitowa niknokowi mili in onpa atlixokan san chinamitl onpowal wiasin nikkowili itoka maria papan iwitilmachiwki ichantoskaminkan inik nikkowili ispan in governador don lwis de sankta maria. testigos regidor martin kano. kitamachiwato algwasil gaspar chichtli kwawxikan topile. iwan monamiktsin xochisokiayotl tlen weyi. tlen 5 tlanawatihkayotl. amo akah welis kikotanaseh ma ipan motlali tekitl, tepostekitl, tlanamakalistli noso tekitl tlen yewa kikwalmatis, san moneki tlen xitlawak tekitl. in tlachiwali tlen inin tlamakixtilistli san welis mokotonas keman kiihtos chikawalo tlatsakwiltikayotl, keman tlaixpanos tlen seyok itechpowi, noso keman ihkinoh kiihtos tlanawatiani, mohkwilohtos ken kiihtos tlahtol tlanawatili, keman tlaixpanos ipan itechpowi altepechantli. amo akah welis kikwiliseh tlen motlanilis ika itequih, san keman itlanawatil chikawalo tlatsakwiltikayotl. in tlahtol tlanawatili kiixtlalis ipan se iwan se tlaltlanawatiloyan, katlia ihki tekiyotl moneki kinextis tekimachiotl tlen ika welis tekipanos, katlia ihki moneki mochiwas iwikpa welis kimakaseh tekitl iwan tekiwameh tlen temakaseh amatl. ayak welis kinawatiseh matekith iwan amo kwali kitlaxtlwiseh tla yewa amo kineki, san keman tekitl kixkawiliseh tekiwameh tlatsakwiltianih ipampa itlatlakolyo, yewa tlahtoli moixkwis ipan i iwan ii tlahtol tlatlapantli tlen 123 tlanawatihkayotl. tlen itechpowi altepetekiyotl, san welis monawatis, ken moihtowa iixkotiah tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh, tlen tepostlatopontli iwan tlahtolamatinih, noihki tlen tlahtokan tekichiwaneh iwan tlen kintekiwa tlaliah, xitlawak noso amo xitlawak. tekitl tlen keman tlatekiwataliah iwan tech amatlaliah eltok tlanawatili mochiwas iwan amo motlaxtlawas; motlaxtlawas sekin tekitl tlen nelkwali mochiwas ken moihtowa ipan amatlanawatili iwan sekinok tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh. tlen nelkwali tekitl mochiwas ipan altepechantli noihki tlanawatilpa iwan motlaxtlawas ken mihtowa ipan tlahtol tlanawatili iwan moixkotonas keman kiihtos inin tlahtol tlanawatili. in kaltlanawatiloyan amo welis kikawas mamochiwa amatlahtoli, tlahtoli noso amatlakwiloli kampa nesis moxolewa, mopoloa noso mokotonas tlamakixtilistli tlen se tlakatl ipampa se tleweli tlamantli ipantis. noihki amo welis moselis amatlakwiloli kampa se tlakatl motemaktilis ma kikixtikan, noso kikawas se ome tonatih noso nochipaya kitekiwis itekiyo, tepostekiyotl noso tlanamakatiloyan. in amatlahtoli tekiyotl san tlanekilis tlapalewikayotl tlen kawitl moixtlalis ipan tlahtol tlanawatili, iwan amo welis panos se xiwitl kampa motlatlakawis tekitiketl, iwan amo welis kiasis, ipan nochi tlamantli, kampa kihtos kikawas, kipolos noso kitlatlakawis tlen itechpowi tlahtolyotl noso altepechantli. keman amo mokixtis amatlakwiloli tekiyotl, tlen itechpowi tekitiketl, san monekilis in tekitiketl makikixti itlanawatil tlen altepechantli, iwan amo ipampa inon welis kitlakayo tetzopaseh. wel neli nechtekipaehoaya in ammo nechtlanankilis nieimakahsia ahso nechmachilis ye nichikawak immanon onienemili nias niemohtiliti iawitsin se kwali siwatsintli in mochantiliaya san isehseltsin ye okiehmiseatsintli onikihto san ika nikmonematkanonochilia ahso nechmopalewilis kimolwilis ipilohtsin niman ihkwika kikwitikisa in tlemaitl. ik koxxopilowa in tletl, onkan konteka in istak kopali yewatl tsiwakkopali, in wel yahki in amo tlasolo in ahmo tewyio in wel chipawak, mihtowaya itonal. oksehpa tlennamayiske. kinnotstiwits in inteow itoka totolin. kaxtoli chilpitsawak in totonik. kampa tlatotonia, in kalila , pachoh xayakamahmantikeb. aw in onkan in i ye ontlachia in atenko poktli ayawitl yewatok, ik niman ye mochichiwa ye mopotonia in tlahtowani wewetewktli chichimekatewktli iwan eintin ipilwan: in ikse itoka tliltekatsin, in ikome itoka xochitsin, in ik-ei itoka atonaltsin, in iknawi itoka mapiwatsin. "uan na niatlakwiti". tlen 122 tlanawatihkayotl. ken moihtowa ipan 44 tlanawatikayotl tlen katlia ihki itekiwakayo tlen iyolo weyi altepetl, itekiwa imako eltos tlen chikawalmeh tlen sentlanawatiloyan iwan tlen itlakayowan weyi tekichiwani, tlanawatilchiwani iwan tlasenkawani tlen chinankopa, ken moihtowa ipan inin tlanawatihkayotl. yewan tekiwekemeh tlen iyolo weyi altepetl, in nechikolistli tlahtoltekichiwani, in tlayekanani tlanawatiani tlen iyolo weyi altepetl iwan tribunal superior tlen hustisia. in nechikolistli tlahtoltekichiwani tlen iyolo weyi altepetl monechikos ika tlapoali tepantlahtoanih tlen kintlapehpeniseh ken moihtowa ipan tlahtolxitlawalmeh tlen axnochimeh iwan tlen tlaixnextili tlatamachiwali, itechpan tlachiwali tlen tokayotl tlaixwasantli ipan se miakintin tlalyowali, ken moihtowa ipan inin amatlanawatili iwan tlahtoltamachiwali tlen tekiwakayotl. in tekiwa tlayekanani tlen iyolo weyi altepetl kipias tlanawatili tekichiwani iwan altepechantli tekitikayotl ipan itlalpan iwan imako wetsis san se tlakatl, tlen motlapehpenis ika tlamatlahantli semanawak, iseltitsin, xitlawak iwan ichtakayan. in tribunal superior tlen hustisia iwan konseho tlen hudikatura, iniwaya sekinok tlakayomeh tlen kiixtlalis tlahtoltlanawatili tlen tlanawatikayotl, kichiwaseh tekitl tlen tlasenkawali tlahtlakolmeh ipan iyolo weyi altepetl. in tlaxexeloli tekichiwalmeh tlen sennechikolistli chikawalmeh iwan chinanko tekiwahmeh tlen iyolo weyi altepetl motlatskilis ipan inin tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh: a. itechpowi tlahtokan tlen sennechikolistli i. tlanawatil tekichiwas tlen iyolo weyi altepetl, san amo tlen pamitl kinelmaktiltokeh in nechikolistli tlanawatil tekichiwani; ii. kikixtis in tlahto tlanawatikayotl tlen iyolo weyi altpetl itekiwakayo; iii. tlanawatil tekichiwas ipan pamitl tlawikalistli tlen iyolo weyi altepetl; iv. kiihkwilos nochimeh tlahtolmatilismeh tlen ika melawak saniman iwan nelkwali tekichiwaseh in sennechikolsitli chicahualismeh; iwan v. sekinok tlanawatilmeh tlen kimaktilis inin amatlanawatili. b. itechpowi tlayekanani tlen senchikolismeh tlaltlanawatimeh tlen mexihko totlalnantsin: i. kipewaltis tlahtol tlanawatilmeh iixpan tlahtokan sennechikolistli tlen imako iyolo weyi altepetl. ii. kintenkawilis in wekapa tlahtokan ahkia kipatlas, tla quiihcueniseh, in tekiwa tlayekanani tlen iyolo weyi altepetl; iii. kititlanilis se iwan se xiwitl imako tlahtokan tlen sennechikolistli, tlaixnewili ipatih tlawikawilistli tlen moneki iwikpa motlaxtlawas tomin tlen motekiwis ipan iyolo weyi altepetl. iwikpa welis mochiwas, in tekiwa tlayekanani tlen iyolo weyi altepetl, kimaktilis tlayekanani tlen totlalnantsin in tlayeyekoli tlen itechpowi, ken kiihtos in tlahtol tlanawatili. iv. tlatemaktilis ipan tekichiwalistli mamotlepanita tlahtol tlanawatilmeh tlen kikixtis in tlahtokan sennechikolistli tlen iixkotiah iyolo weyi altepetl; iwan v. sekinok tlanawatilmeh tlen kiixkawilis inin amatlanawatili, in tlahtoltlanawatili tlen tlanawatikayotl iwan tlahtol tlanahuatilmeh. k. in tlahtoltlanawatili tlen tlanawatikayotl iyolo weyi altpetl motlatskilis ipan inin tlahtoltlaquetzalmeh: tlen se tlahtolketsali. itechpan in tlanawatil tekichiwali nechikolsitli i. in tepantlahtoanih tlen tlanawatil tekichiwali nechikolistli kin tlapehpeniseh asitikah eyi xiwitl ika sentlamatlalantli, tlaseltitzih, xitlawak, iwan ichtakaya, ken kiixlalis tlahtol tlanawatili, tlen yewa moneki kikwilis, iwikpa mochiwas tlaixpehpentli, temaktilis amaneskayotl iwan tlahtol tlatelwili tlen itechpowi inin pamitl, ken moihtowa ipan 41, 60 iwan 99 tlen inin amatlanawatili; ii. in amatlanekilismeh iwikpa se elis tepantlahtoani ipan nechikolistli amo welis motemowis in monamaka kwesalan wan sakapoastan. aw in omotenew mikkatsintli alonso rodrígwes ye || 258 kin martes teotlak in ikomilwitl otokok inakayo ipan makwili tsilini in onkan iteopan hospital; iglesia mayor offisiales kantores in kwikako in kitokako, iwan onkan mowikatsa motetokiliko in teoyotika tlahtowani don hwan péres de la serna arsobispo mexiko. nikan ipan in in motlahtokatlali in wewe witsiliwitl; sekintin wewetke kimachiyotia, in iw kitowa, ye kin ipan in in onkan asiko mexitin in amalinalpan in askapotsalko inik onkan kitlahtokatlalike in intlahtokaw mexika. wel ikwak in visita general kichiwako in nikan tekpan, onkan in kimakak varra in kinawati; aw akulman katka in ikwak onxiwitl ipan makwiltetl metstli, in hwestito akolman in don hwan martín in ompa tlahtokatito. walewake unmotlalito chimalkok, no motlalmomostike, ye yuh oxiwtia; unkan tekuwets in kwawtliketski, makwilxiwtike in unka, in exiwitl ayak kiyaka i mexika. in ipan in iksenpowalxiwitl omei ayak tlahtokat, san kwawtlatolok; aw okseppa ipan in konpewaltike inik kwawtlatolok in kolwakan. ye onkan ixtlawatl itek aw in ikwak okittak tekusistekatl in ye tlatla kinikwak san tepan ipan onmomayaw, niman ye no ik tlatla. aw in yuh konitoa, kilmach, niman no ik onewak in kwawtli, kimontokili, onmotlastiwets in tleko, onmotlekomayaw, ok yewatl nowelalak ipampan iwiyo kwichewak, kwichektik. aw in tewantin alkaldes in oyuhtikkakke i tlatoli niman no tiknawatike algwasil lwis motolinia yewatl kitamachiwato in kali in tlali inik otoyolopachiw [tachado: letra ilegible] tiktokwitlawia ipanpa in axkan ye tikinmaka in tokarta de venta in omokalkowike in omotlalkowike in itoka hwan kwawtli itelpoch migwel popoyotl inamik maria tiakapan isiwamon isabel hakobia in ikisemaxkaw omochiw in kali in tlali in chinamitl inik oaxkatiloke itenkopa in hustisia. matlaktlomome kali ikwak awayoka ixpoliwke tenochka, etsontli mikito. makwilpowali gramos morita chili tehko itech kwowit wan in exot mochiwa wehweyi wan in exot iewayo kipiya witsti. tlen 87 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlayekanani, keman kiselis tlanawatikayotl, tlatemaktilis iixpan weyi tlahtokan tlen sennechikolistli noso iixpan sennechikolistli tekichiwalis, keman okse mosiahkawas, inin tlahtoli “nimotemactilia nitlamokwitlawis iwan nikmokwitlawis in amatlanawatili tlen nochi tlaltipaktli mexihko tlakameh iwan tlanawatilmeh tlen itlakayotipa kisas, iwan ika noyolo iwan kwali nitekichiwas tlen tlanawatili tlayekanani tlen totlalnantsin nochi tlakameh iwan siwameh altepechanehkeh nech mactilihtoqueh, nochipa nihtlachilis makwali timochantlalihtokah iwan sentika matimoyolchicahuacah; iwan tla amo ihkinoh nichiwas totlalnantsin manechtelhui”. omawkatsatsik kokoxtli in oyuh kittak pexonki xixikipili tinemih kenin mochiwa —wan tlenon kokse. para kiseliltis totatoktsin. yewa kipia sente kalmimiloli. mochi owak. ¿quen nemis, ken onos in masewali? ika nochi noalma. ipan verano mewah ihkwak ayemo kisa tonali. i akatl xiwitl, 1259. sábado a las dose mikwanian xochitl chichiltik wan motlalia xochitl kostik para wahsikiwe wehweyi tlakatl. nikan tlekiyaw mayanalok in mexiko. aw in oyuh kimilwi in in kimoteotiaya, aw niman ye mononotsa i yewantin in chichimeka in totolimpaneka; aw ka yuhki katka in in intlahtol inik monotsaya kimolwiaya "cocque tikke!". . aw in on tlaman niman ye ik tetlamako tlakwalo. in otlakwalok ok seppa temahtekilo tekamapako. okito in testigo ka wel melaoak in nikitoa ka in ikwak onkan onikatka in oniknotlanewiaya in kali chikonxiwitl aw in itlaneowaka nikmakaya in ana xwares yawitsin maria geronima in se metstli nikmakaya nawi tomin. aw ka yewatl in ipampan inik okkampa tetechpa kistika in ikome akamapichtli, inik ompa kanato kolwakan in mexika inik yewatl achto intlahtokaw mochiw, tlahtokakwawtsonyotl tlahtokanelwayotl mochiwako i nikan tenochtitlan. axakak itstok aw in wewetlan tlaka niman no isiwka sentetl kinextike kikowke in kostodia wel mawistik. in no monamaka. in yek totonik. (in masatl koliwakan iivitla ipotoka.) aw yewatl ikome inkisidor mochiwtsino in lisensiado don alonso fernándes de bonila, ka onixketsaloka ompa obispo mochiwtsinoskia in yankwik in motenewa del nwevo reino de galisia xalixko, iwan satepan mowikak inik visitador mochiwtsinoto in ipan tlahtokaaltepetl pirú. wehka sano ikwak isexiwyok in molpili inxiw mexika. . "ca nikan tika nopiltsé notelpuchtsé nosentekonetsiné: timotolinia, ¿tle nel tais? ¿tleh tikchiwas? ka o ik mits mochiwili in tlakatl totekwio in tloke nawake in tlaltikpake in ik tokichtli. in ipan in metstli omotenew ikwak momanako matlaltotonki; iw kihtoke in tlamatinime yewatl techwikak in ipan in xiwitl omotenew in kitokayotia planeta marte, wei sitlali wel ihiyo in kokolistika. namantsi ya ayohkana onkas tekitl sentetl onikak nokal ompa tesontlanamakoya xochimilkopa itstikak tlekopayo iwan kaltepiton itikikak inik motamachiwa in tlali in ipan ikak in xochimilkopa yematl iwan se siyakatl aw in tonatiw ikisayanpa makwilmatl aw in itwalo in ixochimilkopa ommatl iwan semmolikpitl aw in tonatiw ikisayanpa sa ye kiwika in kali makwilmatl in ika nikitowa monamakas in ipatiw mochiwas sempowali onmatlaktli aw in tomines misa ik topan mitos tomestin in nonamiktsin itoka katka pardolome xwares mochi teopan kalakis. nama nika niitstok". in tlatokat matlakowatl yepowalxiwitl umatlaktli; ok yehoatl i walteyaka in asiko, in ikwak asiko umpa askapotsaltonko. aw in otlakwalok niman ye wilowa; imeixtin momaniltitiwi in tlatoke, ka imak maxitito in soldatosme, yuhki chichitsitsin kimokekechmekayotike in tlatoke. aw in omotenewke ichpochtsitsinwan se iknosiwatl itoka doña maría dirsios, inin inamik katka don hwan altamirano; aw in okomentin siwateopixke monhastin in onkan moyetstikate monasterio totlasonantsin regina in ikse itoka doña beatris de la enkarnasió abbadessa in onkan, in ikome itoka doña isabel de hesús. in tetewktin itlatol yuh monanawatitia i inik okitlalitia in itlatol maria xoko muchintin tlaxilakaleke okinnahoatitia ihoan senka wel no tikmati inik weli ixkoyan kali. aw in inka ok ye tonyatiwi, mochiwa kuoujtaj. ipan in kwawtlatli itech momochko malakatetikpak onyeya miake kwawtin iwan tlaka miaktin oyaya kwakwawiske. okimamayawia kwawtin. ye yiman tika on amaka oteawaya noso otetsakwaya ipampa momamayawi kwawtin. ixachi miake onyeya inimekes kwawtin. nochtlakatl tlen iknotlaka okimatsatsayatsaya inomekes yowewetstaya kwawtin. on tla okinekia kwawitl onkwan kinamakas isiwaw ipan tiankistli, okwalikaya tlaxexeloli. kitlamamaltia ome kawatin iwan se axno, onkwan on axno okimamaya kwawitl tlen omonekia ipan kali. iki in miake tlaka onkwakwawia ipan on kwawtlatli. oyeya awakwawtin, ilkwawitl, tamaskikwawitl, okokwawitl iwan tepewexokwawitl. san ninentlamati a, san ni kwawtenkostli. san tlayokolia ik mapantikak toxochiwewew. —titečmo mononochilis den semiyas para močiwkunos. aw in techkwilisneki in totlal in tokal tochinan intokan ana xoko inwan inamik intokan pedro xochitlal aw in ik tikpia chinamitl in tiktenke ihkwak tlatokati in don pablo xochiketsin aw no inkwak niktlachkwitlas i notlalman atla katka. —pero nian mochi de tehwanke de nonmotia atenko pordios de namotia atenko techtlaxtlawitiwi len weliti. se kiixtapana exot wan se kikwa tein istak, pané ichkat, yehwa tsopek. ik yetetl se kikwa, se kimana ika se komit wan se kipoyelia wan se kikwa ya. nikan poliwke alotepeka. timochintin nonantsin noteicu otiknemilihkeh welis chikawaksekwistli ipantsinko oahsik iwan otikmatlitilihkeh mochinon in tikiximatiah inik tikmopahtiliskeh seki tonali ipan ayokmitla okimonekilti in kimokwaltis iwan in in ye otechmawkamiktih otiksentlalihkeh in totlahtol in niyaskiani in nikwalwikaskiani in tepati iwan oninohwanalti oninehnen ixkichkaw momosko malakatetikpakopa yehika nikan tochan ahmo onyeya in tepahtiani inin oahsiko yese ayokmitla netemachilistli totech okikaw notahtsin ye omotsonkixtihtaya axkan ipa semilwitl mierkores xx4 dias del mes de mayo de 1564 años in tewantin alkaldes don antonio de santa maria don martin de san hwan hustisia tiktokwitlawian i nika siudad de mexiko tenochtitlan nikan tixpa onwalake ompa chaneke san pablo tlaxilakalpa tlachkwititla. aw in tekale ye kitowa "in newatl in nitekale; ka iknoyowa in noyolo ka nokonilnamiki in ompa kolwakan in kontitlan tinawxiwtike". aw ik niman okinwalkixti in witsilopochtli tlamakaski in mexitin asteka in astlan, san akaltika, inik onkan kimaxitiko tsotsompa chikomostok; inik onkan okinwalkixti diablo tetsawteotl yaotekiwa. ompa se kikwechowa ya wan se kitsoyonia ika manteka, tami oksi mah se kikwa ya. iyo tlakatle totekuyoe tlokehe, nawakehe, iknowakatsintle awis nele axkan, manoso omeleltsin kis: manoso omokwiltono, ma omotlamachti in kwawitl, in tetl, in mokwitlapiltsin, in matlapaltsin in masewali aw in matsin, in motepetsin: a ka oinakastech tikmanili, ka oiyomotlan timopilotsino ka oitech pachiw, in atl sesek, in tsitsikastli a ka onele axkan, ka okontlamachti, in tetsikunolti, in tekwitiwets in tlankoliwki a ka oipan ompixaw, ka oipan wiwixaw, ontsetseliw in akatl awachyo. tein wehweyi, yon pahti, akin motsonteki, kikotonah in nanakat wan kikalakiliah mah pahti. yehwa in nanakat kiixwatsa. tehwatsin tikmandarohtok, sa walatsawktia in arsobispo kasola kiwalakitia iwan itopil imitra; aw san moch kapa in kitlalitiake obisposme, don frai gómes de kórdova obispo kwawtemala teopixki sant herónimo. kwika, tsahtsi, nawati, tlatemimiloa tlatoma, tlapitsawa; tlayamania, tlayamanilia. kimitalwi ipan lunes: "ma mochiwa in ilwikatl iwan tlaltikpaktli!". xmitalwi k:ema o ahmo. ipan in kalexelol ximochili tetepitsin ixkichka walas notata. ¿campa otiwalmwikak? aw i nika niman asiko yakakolko, ye ikwak unkan axiwake spañoles tlilwakan utliipa; niman ye ixkich awa tepewa makwiltsontli in unka mik, i sa ineixkawil tlatilulkatl. eli aw ya yetsonxiwitl ipan kaxtolpowalxiwitl ipan senpowalonnawi xiwitl axkan in opewke wewetke chichimeka in ompa ye witse astlan teokulwakan, in onkan ye walkistimani chikomostok kinewayan, inik ye moxexelowa inik ye tlatlamankawitse, inik nikan omotekako omosesenmanako in ipan tlali motenewa nweva españa; oiw ye se xiwitl mokwekwep in intlahtol in ikwak opewke ye walkistimani, in achtopa san ok sentetl katka in intlahtol. in mochiwa kampa eski, kahfentenoh oso miltenoj. nikan ipan in in ipan pewaloke chiapan tlaka. —kipoposteki in tlakotl pus kachin noe kachi ahmo kachin kwania tlama' ohkion kipoposteki pero n lisiana kana wan kipoposteki asta nopan motihtilana ahmo kineki. tihchiwilise se kahón para noponi tihtsakwase noponi yahki wan ihkino kiitato tikintayokoli nopilwan ne tiempo, in ipan domingo spíritu paskwa penthekostés, ipan ik 6 mani metstli de hunio de 1593 años, ikwak kiketske in kwawtli in ikpak teokali sant hoseph tlapanixkwak, in iw nestika axkan. na nokonkahki", kiilwi. aw ka nikan ka in siwatsintli ka kintlakaskaltilia kintlakawapawilia, ka in piltsintsin in okichpiltsintli in kitkitika in siwatsintli ka yewatl in ipiltsin in chichimekayaotekiwa in tliltekatsin; ka itlasopiltsin inin piltsintli itoka tsiwtekatl. in owalkiske nima ye mononotsa in kolwaka tlatoke, kitoke “aquique hi i mexika? sa amo quicaquizque”. taltikpaktsin de mi alma. in monamaka owat tein ixweweyak wan panelaj, ne kwesalan. axkan lunes ik 30 mani metstli henero de 1612 años, ihkwak onkan sankto domingo teotlak otlayawalolok, ipampatsinko nemekawitekok in teoyotika tlahtowani don frai garsía gwerra arsobispo visurrei inik senka mokokotsinotikatka momikilisneki, in kimokokolwia postema itskaltsinko motlali; aw in omotenew ik tlayawalolok, yewatsin okimotlayawalochtilike kimokixtilike in christo imikilistsin, in kimotemowilitiwi in kimotokilitiwi mochipa ipan viernes sankto. ye onmahpantia in teoaxochiaoktli in matlakkwiatsin. tlen 15 tlanawatihkayotl. amo onkah tlatemaktilistli tlen ika mochiwas amatlakwiloli iwikpa kinmalahkawaseh tlen tlahtol tlatlacahuianeh, iwan no ihki amo iwikpa tlen nochi tonal tlatlakawianeh tlen walawih seyok tlali kampa kichihke tlatlakawili, amo towenyo mochihuaseh, iwan no ihki amatlahkwiloli noso amatlahtoli kampa ixnesis mopatlas tlanelchiwalistli iwan taltechpowilistli tlen moixtlalia ipan amatlanawatili iwikpa in tlakatl iwan altepetlakatl. 2 tochtli xiwitl, 1598 años. ¿tiquixmati in tlakenchihki teka otitlahtohqueh? ahvia! an newa niyokolok an notew estlamiyawal a ilwisol nik ya wika tewitvalko achá totonik, ta sebola totonik. monamaka kwesalan. mowikxitia in awax in ye omokixtili in ikakalo ika in poyoxastlakapali, xonakatl iwan axox in ye tlapitsinili, iwan in istatl; ihkwak ye tlahkotlawikxitili ye motlalilia in itsmikilitl in ye kwali tlapaktli in mixtlapana ahnoso moteteki. kikekelo ikwitlapa newa tewan nitlahtoa. aw in iskikan antika tetlatlasaltiaya in españoles in teukwitlatl qujtemoa. amo tle ipan kitta, in chalchiwitl, in ketsali yoan in xiwitl. nikan ipan in omomamal in teokali in ikal katka tlakatekolotl witsilopochtli; aw in onkan in omikke in mamaltin in inka momamal tsiwkowaka iwan masateka iwan tlahpaneka. witsi de san lorenso, santa marta, santa krus iwan la koncha. nochtin on witsi ika seratin, ika popochtli iwan kohetes. tlatsonkisa misa topixkatsintli iwan kinmonamikilis in salveros. inin sa niksemantimani aw in ok kawtika ok sentsontli ipan makwilpowali onmatlaktli in ayamo tetechpowi. ika nehon tlahko kilo pitsonakatl aw in iskikan titetlamamaka sankt ipólito, desmanparado, ospital real, witsilan, kontaduría, de las vobas, chikwasekkan in titekimakoke. se tsitsikwewalton kanela aw inin tlatoli i nikan omotlali ka itech tlakixtili in chalko amakemekan chrónika. —tlenon nankimitia' namonka' nekwtli. miaktin in amo monamaka. ixiuyo kwaltia para pahti : makwil ixiuyo mah se kimolonti wan mah se tayi para ihwak se lokohkwi. mah nochi onka. nepa mapochkwepali kina* makah in painpepeyoktin. tlatlahtoltin aw inin omotenew fransisko faustino ketsalmasatsin donado san titewantin nikan titlaka amakemekan chalko ichan, umpa pili. xinemi iniketlamantli nikitowa noyolokakopa ok no on ikak nokal tonatiw ikalakiyanpa itstikak xamixkali in iyastokalo nikmaka in itoka marta iskixoch iwan in tlali in ipan ikak aw in ikpakikak akokali heltsakkayo in lurenso matheo konkawitimaniske. onkán okpa tlateteko onkán para mihkitis se tilmahtli. yoan niktenewa tepankalko toktitok tetl senmatl nekok yawalti senkwapantli intech powis in noxwiwan hoana maximiliana yoan niwktsitsiwan simon pedro yoan bernaldino. tak sesek, ta itech ahatauten mochiwa. tlatolpewalistli mitstemowa ne mocha. maske titechmawilis maske tehwanke timikwalmikaliwitiwa tehwan tihchiwa titonankun. aw ye onomito tlakpak, ye oyuh nepa ontsonxiwitl ipan matlakpowalxiwitl ipan epowali onnawi xiwitl motlakatilitsino in totekwiyo dios hesuchristo inik walolinke walewake in asteka ik ye walnenemi ye walotlatoka. el kwidado de hermanos menores es una tarea de los niños más grandes porke la mamá siempre está mwi okupada. ankipiaskiah xii akatl xiwitl, 1179. se kristiano takan aksa witsa kwawtlitlakwayan texkalyakak, niman kwawtenanpa, ik niman akatlaxo tepetlikpak, ik niman tonaliitlatlayan; in omotepantike sant fransisko tlalpan tlaka in ipan axkan xiwitl de 1612 años inik omaltepetlalike, in iw kichiwka ye wekaw don thomás de san martín ketsalmasatsin chichimekatewktli inik mokwaxochtika. ¿cuix on motta, kwix om monotsa in nesawalkoyotl wewetitlan? iwan ihkwak omomikili don felipe páes de mendosa, ipan ik xxvi de agosto. nonotsalistli otia. aw kil in ixkich altepetl inik nowiyan ipan nweva españa, kil ye moch okimomamakaka in tliltike in onkan otlahtokatiskia inik sekintin dukes, sekintin markestin, sekintin kondesme; kil omochiwka inik tinmasewalwan otochiwaskia otikintlakalakiliskia otikintlayekoltiskia, ok yewantin in nikan titlaka timasewaltin techkamaikwiloskia inik nesiskia ka totekwiyowan. aw in axkan nochpuchtse, tla wel xikkaki, tla xikiwianitta ka is unka in monantsin in motekwiotsin, in ixilan, in itoskatlanpa otitsikweoak, otitlapan. in mahan tixiwtsintli, in mahan tikiltsintli, otioali xeoak, otixotlak; otikwepon: in mahan nose otikochia, otioalisak. nikan ipan in inik asiko honkan chalko atenko in wewetke in chichimeka in totolinpaneka in amakemeke. 2 akatl xiwitl, 1299 años. semi welik ika se takwa. axkan lunes in ik 14 mani metstli mayo de 1612 años, ihkwak || 194 ye no se tliltik pilolok in onkan tekpan kiyawak, in kapitán in achtopa omotenewke tliltike piloloke. ixos xiihsiwikan xitlakwakan wan ximosewikan iwakunko nanyaske. wan maski onkaskí serilo onitlanamakaya nxan telwia ineyo lá saye nipahte in lá mo' en dios iwelikon. yehwa onkak wan itahtai, in tsohyak : nexkihit itahtai. ixtlilkwechawak ika ye onmawistia, kinamoya in ketsali, patsakonxiwkiyamoya kwextekatl. mahtlakpowali gr. waxchili witsiliwitsin omomikilitsino ipan ome tekpatl xiwitl. in miaktin tlakah san se tlahtoli quixmatih. seki kikwah in iteyo.amo monamaka in kwoutet.no kwaltia in kwowit para kalkwowit, para kalewal in tein mapisiltik wan tein mapapatawak.semi sesek porke tel ayoj. nimitsmaktia nehin orasiones ika nochi noyolo, . mosepan tlahtlawtia kikistia in imihiyo in intlatul in intlakasas kaltilis in intlakawapawalis. nikan ipan in in asiko in || 76v tekwanipan tlaka; yewatl kinwalyakan in yaopol tsiwtekatsin tsonpawakatewktli tlahtowani walmochiwtia inik motlaliko amakemekan. intla siwatl ichkatl kimakaya asok tsawaya in ik kichixtika in imikis in ik kitlatsontekilis. lka nehon semi titapolohtokeh ya. . in okonkechkoton niman ye ik vitsawki ik kiso in innakas anoso in inenepil in kiso. ives halbert wan elisa hanuselo de in departamento de antropología de in université de montréal, kineskayotihkeh in xiwit wan kuamej. makwili tekpatl motlasultewwike matlatsinka; ye ikwak momoyawak tepa xiti matlatsinkatl, yaoyotl kichiw, ye ikwak moyawake in axka ok no satepa moyawatoke. aw in ikwak mochiw tlatoli ka ye ixkich chikwasemilwi i nenemi akali. vii tekpatl xiwitl, 1356. xopantla yahtinemiskeh iwan miak maltiskeh ipan verano, in wel kin paktia in pilantoton. . yewatl in akin kwali iyolo in amo ihistlakati in ahmo monohnotsa in san itolol imalkoch ik nemi in ahmo ichteki in wel mihmati. aw in ipan in mani yaotl in chalko. i karga kwika yokonamakato lá onka marchante ahsi wan tlatemowia. aw in nikan mexiko, inik motlaliske inik kikwiske inin omotenew tlakentli in akin kineki inin kitepotstokas in iwki in teotlamawistililisnemilistli, ka yewatsin kinmomakili- || 238 -tiaz in hábito in omotenewtsino padre gwardián iwan no yewatsin kinmopachilwis; aw in ihkwak in ka san oqu isel ye kipia ye kimakia in hábito in kitokayotia hermano alfonso la tersera horden de san fransisko, inin wala españa. vii.- hwan garsia tepixki ik tíanankilia konitoa ka wel nixpan nomochiw inik omonanahoatitia in ilamatsin maria xoko yuh konitotia ka nel sa nosel ka ye nomomikilis inin kali ka wel tonetolinilis san tomextin i nonamik katka tiktokechilike ka neli ayak nima se tlakatl omokaw noxwihoan in tla semen onemini ka nikinmakatiaskia in kaltsintli. in xochiyowa itech marso, kostik ixochiyo, pero amo tel kostik. aw in kinchiwtewak in ipilwan in wewe motewksomatsin ilwikamina chikweintin: sa sen in okichtli, ye omotokatenew itoka ikewak; in ikome itoka chichimekasiwatl; aw in okchikwasemin san moch siwa, amo wel momati in intoka. mah más mochiwa miak. chikwekali atle mochiw. tewan tiknekia tikchiwaskeh in tlasentlalilamatl itechpa in tlakwali in ok miximati, intla ayokmo mokwa inon ipampa ye wehka mopatlahtiwits; yese san niman otikixaxilihkeh in ahweli mochiwaskiani. ahso ahmo moneki nikan mihtos tleika. se tekontontli iwan tlahko pitsochiyawisotl onechistlakat ika amo kwali itlahtol. achto mopaka in awax iwan san niman mowik xitia ika istatl, xonakatl iwan axox, inin in ye tlapitsinili; ihkwak ye achi tlawikxitili motlalilia in arros in ye tlapaktli; in patlawakchili moihseki iwan motesi; in silantro no iwki kwali mopaka, moteteki, iwan ye motlalilia in istayutl. —tlenon kachi, apoko ahmo. niman ik oyake mexika un kolwaka, unkan tlaliloke tisaapa; kimilwia “oanquihyouique, mexikaé; ma ximotlalikan unkan tiçaapa”. aw in akin kenmanian ipan tlachalanis in kali tlali ik tlatsakwiltilos in melawak hustisia yuh motlanawatili inik neltik iskatki itokatsin ifirmatsin fecho en mexiko a veinte i dos dias del mes de marso de mil e kinientos i noventa i tres años. don migwel garsia alkalde itenkopatsinko alkalde migwel monise exkrivano. miakpa ye otonyahkeh ipan se amanali amo wehka weyaltepetl ka . kinmaka sankasé puñete kintlamotla kimiktiaya. tlatlapalpoani, tlatlapalakiani, tlasewalotiani, tlakxitiani, tlaxayakatiani, tlatsontiani. atenko in tekawke in kinkawtikiska inpowan tekwanipan tlaka, in iw nesitiw itlamian in tlahtoli. aw in tomines yewatl omakok kristoval riverio mayordomo del konvento de sanktiago aw testigos ka amo kimati in tlakwiloli okitlatlawtike in señor hhoan de tovar inik impampa mofirmatis fecha ut supra.firmas christoval riveiro hwan de tovar. pasó ante mi martin frias de la krus eskribano nombrado. xik maka xik ilpili xik tlakenti xik atliti ka ipatilowan in tlakatl totekuyo. in pipiteka toyakan xi nech sentlaliske (sic), q.n. in pipiteka iyaoan mochiwke in kala in mochioa yauyutl in kalipan. iwan motlatsontiliaya se kikwalia in iteyo ihwak oksi. . ma kana tokonikxinamik in in tekowatl in kwawkowatl in tlakotsontli in sakatsontli. moketsaliskixochi in tsetseloa in ikniwyotl. astakatlatlapantika ye on malintikak, in ketsalxiloxochitl imapa on nenemi, konchichintomih in teteuktin in tepilwan. tewan tokakal tiknamakaxkia, tla akin techkowilix tikpiaskiah aw in ikwak oyuh konmokakilti in omotenewtsinko gobernador tlatowani ik niman omotlanawatili mochiwas informasion. xochiyowa itech septiembre wan oktubre. se kikwa, pero sayoh yek teyoj. taltikpaktsin, aoh in tla aka kenmanian kichalanis amo itlamatian i motlalkowiyani nehoatl nikixnamikis in ixpan hustisia aw inik aokiksepa ninotlatolkwepas nika nomatika niketsa krus ihoan nofirma. isaber ana. imixpan tlaxilakaleke pablo hernandes merino hwana baptista hoan peres barthasal xwares fransisko ximenes. testigos: migwel momatsakwili lusiana agustin de santiago eskribano. sakwan kala imanka in ixtilawakiteki. ixwa iteyo. nikan ipan in i yewatl tlakatl wewe itskwawtsin atlawtekatltewktli san chikwasenxiwtito in tsakwaltitlan tenanko amakemekan inik tlahtokatito, aw san ye nokwel ikwitlak-wik walyahki in onkan atenko inawak ayotsinko, san omiktasiko in onkan atenko in ipan in omotenew ome kali xiwitl, yese in okik ayemo momikiliaya in ihkwak onkan ahsiko atenko. yei axoxtlantli aw in yewatl in mixnamiki in itoka diego yaotl iwan in inamik isabel tlako ka san kikowke in tlali iwan kali aw inik moteilwia in akali in itoka diego yaotl kamo imaxka amo intlalkoaul ka yepa ipan kate in gabriel yaotl iwan in inamik maria tekwichon oyuh neltik in tlatoli aw satepan nikan omoyolsewike in imomtlamanixti okito in itoka diego yaotl ka ye kwali ma konkwi in akali aokmo sepa ik titochalaniske aokmo sepa tle nikitos ipampa ka okseki nikkwi in tlali in ipa no ikaka in imakal in itoka gabriel yaotl. "tezcatzonco tekpanteutl q.n. ye choka in omakok teutl teskat- sonko tekpan id est uktli kimonakayotia teutl. itlanahnamik: kaxtoli tepetlachili ahnoso kwawchili in talkamoh se kikwa taaman iwan seboyah oso chilposon iwan mimientahxiwit. ipan inin xiwitl chiwalo wei iteokaltsin méxiko. kenin mochiwa in no kikowah kwesalan wan sakapoastan. —ca yeh umpa hin, yeh unkan hin in kisakiw tonatiw. kwali metstika, tlasohkamati. sanyeno ihkwak, westfalennenonotsaltika ompa teutontlalpan, tlami in motokayotia "cempoalli ommatlaktli xiwitl inyaoyo". rayitos, newa miaktin tlalpan nikixinati, mach amonka okse keh in nikwalita. 31. iwan intlakamo yuh tikchiw, in yuh kimonekiltia in dios, intlakayamo moteiya, motekwaya inik otiteik, otitekwa, ka tikmotsakwiltitias, ka ye tixamanis, ka ye tipostekis in tlaltikpak ahnoso miktlan. ahtle ye tiwalmakos, ahtle ye tiwalittitilos. sa tiknewiyanwis immix, immoyolo, intla yuh tikchiwasin. iwan kitlalike in ixkich kwaxochtli, ik ye kate ye tlahtokati. mah mitstachipawikan yokiyakoke in lechonti. ka ye iski xiwitl okichiw inik axkan ipan in in itlamian ixiwtsin totekwiyo dios de 1608 años. itlanahnamik: sewan okse welika mikmomantenerwiske. aw in maxtlaton, yuh kitowa in wewetke, ompa mikito in tlachko, inik aokkan nes, imanel ipilwan ixwiwan, ipampa ka yewatl konkawili in altepetl in tepanekayotl. xiii kali xiwitl, 985 años. aw in ipan axkan lunes ik 29 mani metstli de setiembre de 1608 años, ikwak ipan sant migwel ilwitsin, maxitiko mokalakiko nikan ihtik in altepetl siudad mexiko tenochtitlan in yewatsin omotenewtsino in senka mawistililoni teoyotika tlahtowani don frai garsía gwerra arsobispo mexiko, ye omito teopixki sankto domingo, in axkan moyetstika teoyotika motlahtokatilia techmopa- || 72 -chilhuia tenochtitlan, ikchikwasen arsobispo in nikan mexiko. kitokaj. kimewah wan kitaluiaj. mochipautani. tlehko ni tlali 15 miérkoles a vii de hunio de 1595 años, ikwak tiankisko sant ipólito ik tsatsiwato in ipampa totolin tiktekitiske, inik mexiko in timakoke totekiw chikome mil i kwatrosientos i tantos galinas, in ikowaloka itech okis in ome tomines nanawi tomines, sesen tomin medio; iwan inik nowian altepetlipan senwets inik titekimakoke itenkopa in visurrei. in ipan axkan miérkoles ikmatlakilwitl onse mani metstli abril de 1601 años, ikwak kimotlaxilike in wei krus senka wiak katka in ikaka sant fransisko itwalko, in kimokechilitiw totlasotatsin frai pedro de gante kwatesontsin maestro iwan in matlaktin omomentin teopixke in achto yankwikan maxitiko nikan mexiko. onkak se taman saj. ka tiktowikilitiwi, iwan in ipan in omotenew metstli marso senka momikilike in pipiltsitsinti in ika sawatl saranpió, mochintin intech motlali in inpilwan españoles iwan tliltike. —nokompadre san tóbyas para tlatetekos para maik nomantenero ntlali nechkawtewak in nodifunto ganinias para nehwan tlali. ayopechtli ikwik 68. nottatsine, otlaokoxki immoyolotsin. ¿ac newatl? ¿ac ninomati? ¿in nikwawtli, in noselotl? ¿inic nimitsnotlalkawaltilis, ik nimitsnotlapololtilis in yuhki mokwawmiw, moselomiw, in nonasko, in noskalko in tokommakilia? aw in xiwmakistik, in ololiwki, in chalchiwitl in tinechommokwaltilia; yuhki in nikoski, nomakechtlan, notoskatlan tinechonilpilia. ma sa xinechmoknelili, ma ontlakneli immitsin, moyolotsin, kanel ok nimitsiknopilwiya semilwitl, omilwitl, ka ok mixko, mokpaktsinko nontlachia. an tinechmawilis konke nehwatl nikwilikak. "a i ketsalxiwkovatl nechiya ikinokawketl id est ya ye otechkaw in mayanalistli. q.n. ma maw ma nipolivi in iyoatsin id est ovatl. "in iwki chalchivitl noyolo ateokwitlatl nokon ya ittas q.n. ninoyolsevis. aw in hin ka nikan sententli senkamatl ik nimitsyolalia in ik nimichchikawa in tinopiltsin in ik nimonan nimota in ik timonanmati in ik timotamati. se kilo xolenanakatl iman imahtsinko general días ompa momochko oyeya altepetl kikwitiaya prefekto. yewatl on ma mitos okinmandaro ya okinmandaroaya in altepetlaka. tlekanamo, ernesto. xitemotlahpalo monantsin. se kikwa itakka se kipanxihximawan se kikwaiihtinakayo, xoxowik se kikwa ikomo se tanej! aih niman walmoman in metstli de febrero; ikwak ipan in onesiko nikan mexiko weyapan in motenewa atotoltin in aik onesia nikan. owat kunitoa ‘ma xikintlatlawtiti in tlatoke kolwaka. aw iwan senka miek tlakatl masewali onkan omomikiliko iwan sekintin omokoko onkan in omotenewke altepetlipan tlaka in otekitiko ipan in ontetl metstli henero iwan febrero iwann ipan in okseki metstli. ii kali xiwitl, 1481. aktopa kimpehpena in mihmatini in moskaliani in tlanemiliani in mokxiyehekowani in amo ikximihmikini in senka tlamawistililiani in kwali intlahtul in chikawak in kowaneske; in papaloh nowiampa patlanih, kwahnektemoa tlen xochimeh kipia. on ewalos in kwikatl on. aw in iwan yaomikke kulwakan itoka teskakowakatl iwan itoka simatsin. se kilo pitsonanakatl se mahpiktli xokoyoli amo tetlakaman, san ka wis, yekene ye poliwtiw. nihchiwas?" q u e s q u i ompa kipia san tlen nochi xochikwalkwawitl keh tlatokxokokwawitl, tetsotkokwawitl, mansanahkwawitl iwan perahkwawitl. tlatlaneski oantlanamakayah xiii kali xiwitl, 1297. iuki kitokaitiah por in ihwak se kitapana, mota in iihtikpa mahyá yon tonantsin gwadalupe. owesiton mono tatahtli ihteki in texkali wan de itek in texkali owesito opawek in mono tatahtli wan kikwawiyaya i konew. nimitstasohkamati miak nikan, aw no ipan in in xiwitl in tlakat in tlahtokapili in itoka nesawalpili ipiltsin i nesawalkoyotl tlahtowani akolwakan tetskoko. x akatl xiwitl, 1307. amo vi tekpatl xiwitl, 1264. na axnimitsmalahkanis para xiya. ¡tlen san kwali ka yotwalmwikak! maski ok okwalkan, tepakti amotochiah. wel kwali neka pantsin. iwan noihki ipan yowali tlamamawtiloli sente tlakatl iwan se siwatl tepan otechachankalakia. san oransio yonetetepacholo. aw in axolowa ye kitowa "yhyoyahué totekwiyoyé!, in newatl in naxolowa; tlein ye nopan mochiwa in tenochtitlan?". mochiwa kampa takwechautok.in mochiwa iselti wan in no se kitoka. mochiwa miak, sayoh mah se kitoka. xantiah mowaxka. tlatlanilok ken kimati in iyolo in itechpan inik moteilwia ana papan iwan marina susana iwan barbara maria iwan mensia marta kwix neli in kinkwiliyan in ikal iwan in itlal kito kainik nikmati ka yewatl tlale kale katka itoka chimaltsin ayamo mokwatekitia aw in momikili ayamo walwi in españoles. neka tepetl semi wehkapa. ipa se taman saj. mochiwa kampa se kitoka milaj. in totonik semi. mah kwando nesis se mamahpikton yepasohtli tlanamakatika v kali xiwitl, 1185. aw sano ikwak in ipan in xiwitl in momikili itoka yaotentsin tlahtowani opochwakan chalko tlalmanalko, in tlahtokat chikwexiwitl. iman on ika ipan yeyi tetepe okewaloke in federales. okinchololtike ika kwawtla. seki oyake ika san pablo ostotepek. oasito ipan tepetl itokan kwawtsin. ompoyon omomanke achi miak sapatistas: omotlatitaya ipan tetepe. iman on yokitake ipanotika federales. sapatistas opewke kinkwekwepotsa. ompoyon otlanke achi miake. ocholoke yeyi noso nawi federales. oasike milpa alta iwan ompa yoyeya okwachi federales; okintitla general días. yewa omomahpiltek ika se tlatekontli. . aso kana tontenepanowa tokowapan aso tenochtitlan aso kwawtitlan aso askapotsalko aso witsilopochko wel motlatolti kwali ik xi motenochili. in sesek. xxiiii pregon.- a trese dias del mes de mayo de mil e kinientos e ochenta i siete años in pedro awexotl otsatsik in tlaxilakalpan teskatsonko okito inik monamaka in ikal in itlal isabel maria kitenew in ipatiw napowali pesos ayak otlanankili testigo martin xwares. ante mí fransisko maldonado eskrivano. kiistewas mochiwa saj. aw in imelawaka i yewatl in senka kwali mawistik in ichiwaloka; inik tlaketsali in tlakatl kimomakili in itlaknakayo moketstinemi ikatinemi, aw in ixayak tlakpak inik wel konittas in ilwikatl aw inik konittas konelewis, in amo innemaktik in amo intech pow in ixkichtin manenenke inik nemi mochintin tolotinemi mopachotinemi tlalpa, kitlakwawtlalitinemi itech in intlachiyelis san ixkich ipan nemi kitemachia in intlakwal in inkochka in innehewka in ipakilis in innakayo. para kikwalantihtok. xiii tochtli xiwitl, 1362. aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl i motlahtokatlali in itoka witsilpopokatsin tlahtowani opochwakan chalko tlalmanalko. aw in ompa in okitlalito in iteow i nawyotewktli in tolteka tsakwaltitlan chikonkowak mochipa umpa owia; san walwia in chikonkowak walachixtinenka inik ompa omoxtlawaya omisoya, san ikochian katka in amakeme ikpak. miyak atl. aw san niman ipan in in omotenew xiwitl nikwele onkan walmikwani in tlahtoloyantli in okokkan in tulam, ipatka mochiw in kowatlichan, onkan walmikwani, aw in otumpa ipatka mochiw in askaputsalko, onkan || 20v walmikwani ikokkan tlahtoloyan; mochiw yankwikan in ik-exkan tlahtoloyan mochiw kulwakan. kiwalitoa ayokwan, san yewan kwetspaltsin. de beras kwak se koni yeknoni waliwinti yekisa komo rabia. aw iwan in axkan ipan in omotenew viernes sankto in onkan teopan sankto domingo ik okixowak inik otlayawa- || 214 -loloc teotlak, in iw mochipa mochiwtiw sesexiwtika, inik okimotokilike in imikilisixiptlatsin totekwiyo dios, in intech ponwi inik ompa kisa españoles. iwan nowian tlatlaxikak in tochachan in timasewaltin iwan kastilteka, iwan in teopan nowian atl nenes molon in atl: in sant fransisko, in sant augustín, in sankto domingo, in la kompañía teatinos. itlanahnamik: yese yehika yewatsin mochi inemilistsin omokatihtsino inik mosemmelawas kenin nemoaloya ipan wewe nawatlahtolmexihko niknemilia senka totechmoneki in ahkiwan tiktenkixtiah in intlahtoltsin nesawalkoyotsin iwan kwawtemoktsin inin temawistililistli ma motenewa manel san achitsin nawatlahtolkopa kani mokawak! yewatl in intilma yewatl in imaxtli, sotoli in inkak inkosoyawalol intlawitol intlemakwex; in kikwaya koatl tochi masatl netsoli xokonochtli nopali. inik niman ipan in omotenew viii akatl xiwitl inik onkan tsakwaltitlan tenanko omotlakatekolokalti aw inik tlemamalia san konnamikti matlaktlomei xiwitl; inik wel mihtowa in ipan in matlaktlomei akatl xiwitl in tlemamaltiwia tlahtowani kwawitsatsin, in i mochintin tsakwaltitlan tenanka kwixkoka temimilolka iwipaneka sakanka. mochiwa ne tonalixkopa, tatampakopa wan ne xaltipampa. ka ipampa || 89r in wewe ketsalmasatsin chichimekatewktli in amakemekan tlahtowani aw in yewatl in chalko tlahtowani in tositewktli tekwachkawtli, ka imomextin intech pewtika in tlatoli inik nexexelolok in amomolokko; aw niman ye no yewantin inpampa in aokwantsin iwan in kowasakatsin sanno amakemekan tlahtoke, yqu imontlamanixtinn in in intechpa in amomolokko nexexelolok. inin pastoratin intsotsoma nochi istak; okikwatikpanoaya se korona kename inon asahares de naranha. inin asahares okichichiwaya ika sera okinmakwiaya intsotsoma istak iwan se arko omototonpoxwaya iwan okitlaliliaya amaxochitl, onkwan on achi kwal nesis. wan tlatsotsonke okitsotsonaya se gwitarra wan se tlapitsalkwawitl. ika on kokone yokixmatia tlen tlen kitotiske kana ome metstli omomachtiaya sesen chikweyi tonali sábado wan domingo. onkwan on kwali kisaloske tlen mokwikatiske. wan okitoaya tiawe, tiawe titotiske ompa portal in belén. ¡timotilizque toteotatsin omotlakatili ompa belén! aw onkan kasike in kulwake in intlahtokaw mexika in itoka wewe witsiliwitl, newan in ichpuchtsin in itoka chimalaxotsin; in owikaloke ompa kulwakan, san pepetlawtiake, aoktle intech wetstia intlaken. noihki itsintla awakwawitl iwan okokwawitl iwan ilkakwawitl nochtin in kwawtin itsintla otlakatia xoleme. opewaya xoletl okisaya ipan metstli mayo. iman on kosa patiokes ikan ayemo wel kana oyeya. xoleme kosa omonamakaya ompa momochko. okseki tlaka okonkixtiaya inelwayo okotl ika okichichiwaya tlapapaxelwastin. iwan itsintla in okokwawitl otlakatia xoleme kosa chichipawake, achi kwaltsitsin, noihki welwelik. melawak inik okonanke posesio[n] san pakka yokoxka omochiw ayak otlachalani ayak tle okito iyomatsinko in alkalde migwel de los angeles imatitech komanili itik konkalakili in kali ipan motsawk in poerta. in ikmakwili ichpochwan kwawsesekwitsin in itoka amo wel momati, inin konmonamikti in itoka topaltsin tlakatewktli pili panowayan, itechpa kistika in toteknochwetsin in asiko panowayan achtopa. amo xiknamaka in chichiton, wel kwakwaltsin. ne se wala, no kiteuiaj, san moteuiaj. tipia' tukwartos a parte tisuwame a parte imuchachus. kexkich ye mokwik in ye mokwiltono tonteawiltia olini xochitl. nochi notomin otlamik. in kwikani tsahtsini, nawatini, tlatomowa tlapitsa. tlatlaliani, tlayokoyani, tlapikini, tlasaloani. kiilwi se kitaliliaemol oso mantekahchil. amo ximoilkawili. a temok ne atl asta... miek tonali ipan ihkwak newatl niknekia nitlalnamikis ahmowel kwali onikahsihkamat intla notahtsin okimolkawili nechmolwilis senkiska kwali kanin okimotlatili inon tomin inon tomin ahmo san tepitsin intla chikome komitl otentayah welis achiton weyi nikwawawaskataya niknemiliaya welis ipampa immanon inik senka ninoteopoaya ahmo kwali onikmokakiti in notahtsin in nechmolwilihtaya iwan ihkwak oniknek in nikilnamikis mochi tlayowaltik mixtekomakyo iwan ahmo wel kwali nikmatia tlein opanok titlano teyakanakiw méxiko tlahtokateixiptla in itoka karlos fransisko de kroix. aw inik sa se kitlali awitsotsin in tlahtowani tenanko yehika ipanpa ka san ikse altepetl in atlawtlan, sa se tekpakali kipiaya in achto in omentin tlahtoke katka; aw yewatl kipolo in awitsotsin in atlawtlan tlahtokayotl, inik sa tewktlato kontlali ompa iwan tlailotlakan, ka sa tlanepantla katka in tlahtowani weweyotsintli. newatl onikpiaya maktlaktli iwan nawi xiwitl iwan tetlak onomawtik ikan kosa otlakwekwepotsaya. ipan tepetl tewtli, tiheras iwan okpayokan omomanaya sapatistas. ipan altepetl milpa alta onemia federales. inimekes oyeya wan okinkwitiaya federales iman don porfirio días ometstak altepetl. in kwowit. in ipan axkan ik 5 mani metstli abril de 1606 años, ikwak omotlapoto in atenamitl mexikatsinko inik tsawktikatka inik onkan walkisas atl, san okseknin mokwitlakoyonito atenamitl; ipampa akalak in teokali kwitlawak iwan miskik, iwan no ipampa in ompa inik oyake ocholoke ik omokalkawke, kan mochipa kistimani yahtimani miyekintin masewaltin in ompa chaneke omotenew. ximotlalihtsino. wel melawak ammo wel kwali nitlapalewiaya yese notahtsinokimonemilili masiwki ok nitsitsikitsin kwali yeskiani ninomatis ipan miltekitkanemilistli sannitoliniya, tonewa noyolo, tinokniw in ayaxkan in tlaltikpak, ye nikan. tewatsin wel miak mantekila otinechmomakili. istatl, ixkich in monekis domingo ik 7 mani metstli de septiembre de 1603 años, ikwak teokalchalike teokalmamalke in la kompañía de hesús in teatinos teopixke; wel mawistik in teokali kimochiwilike, in axkan onkan missa mitowa la kompañía de hesús. aw ipan in in omotenew in xiii akatl xiwitl in yankwika ye ik kipewaltia in yaoyotl in kulwake inik kinwaltokake in mexika, onkan motlaliko i nextikpak sexiwtike, onkan in xiwitl se tekpatl, 1324 años; niman onkan walpewke inik asiko tenochtitlan. 24v 2 akatl xiwitl, 1091 años. "ca ye kokulistli nikkwis ye nimiquiz. anquipiah. kiwika ayatl para kiwalikati atl. aw inik tikneltilia nikan tiktlalia in totoka iwan tofirma. fecho e mexiko a desinoeve de hunio de mil e kinientos i setenta i seis años algwasil mayor melchior dias algwasiles pedro xiwtemalok pablo senones newatl fransisko moisen eskribano. aw ka noso chalchiwmomosko itoka katka in achto in ayamo walasia amakemeke; aw in ikwak asiko amakemeke kipatlatasiko in itoka tepetl in achto itoka katka, aw ka kin yewantin kitokayotitasiko inik amakeme ipampa in kamakentikentike in tepetl, inik axkan mitowa amakemekan. "yece awel amaxitiske -quimilhuique in chichimeka-, ka senka owikan; ka ompa kate || 54v in tekwannawaleke in kiyawnawaleke, ka yewantin in nikan waltekwa". iswat, xinach ika kipechtiah wan itakka ihwak chikawaya kitekih kwando pewa kosawia wan kipilowah kalihtik mah tilewi wan pewa tsayani tein ika piktok itakka. kenin mochiwa in taoltsin amo weli se kiawilowa, komo se kiawilowa temohmoutia in kowat, por in yehwa tamandorowa kampa mochiwa. xochiyowa itech febrero. in onkan tekpan ki- || 122 -yahuac palasio bentana walmoketsino in omotenewtsino visurrei, in kimopahpakiltilike onkan walmotstilitoya inik onkan tlatsintla ixkichkapa seseyaka oome mantiwi in ixkichtin kavaleros españolesme, in ye mochintin onpowalonchikwei, in ye no nikwel mosenkawke in intlasotlatkitika, unkan konmotlapalwiaya ixpantsinko onmopachowaya in tlahtowani, moch tlakavalowia kandelas achas in inmak tlatlatlatiw; inin mochiw ipan chikome tsilini ye yowak. in testigo kitowa amo ke niknotsa in ipan nitlaneltilia in ipanpa kali inik mokets in axkan in okikwitlakoyonike ka wel imaxka in kokoxkatsintli in itoka pedro nanal iwan in inamik itoka anan wel ye inamik in ana xoko tlatkiwa. ya ikwak pew in aokmo kiyawi, inik chalko nowian chalko i mochiw inin tlatoli omotenew. yoan niktenewa in maria inamik katka kwawxinki kimotlakwi chikome pesos niktlapopolwia amo kixtlawas. wel kwali otlachipan nochi in semana opanok. axkitlachilito ¡ tihiwintike! ayok wahkapa. i.- pregon san niman ikwak in ipan semilwitl in omito tlakpak in metstli in xiwitl in yewatl diego astaxochitl otsatsik in ipan tlaxilakali istakalekan okitekakiti inik monamaka in ikal in itlal isabel maria okitenew in ipatiw napowalli pesos ayak tlanankili testigo migwel de los angeles. ante mi fransisko maldonado eskrivano. ¿ticnequi timitsyektlalilis seki papantsin ika chichiawak iwan kwahnektli? ye tikmati, tlahko bolilo iwan tlahko sentetika trigohpantsin, keh ipan inin kali yotonemachtihqueh. kwali tikwas se tsopelchiwali fresa, tolachno noso matsali. noihki tiepia ikoxselik, kwahtotoloktli, plantanoh iwan manzanah. xinechtlahtolkaki ome tonalpa xonmixoti inik amo tonmitstilis. ximaki se tilawak tlaken, amo keh inintin amo tilahkeh ompa monterrei tiquinhuicah. ye tik mati, semi mopatla in kawitl, iwan tsorapilawistin kemanian wehkawah iwan amo tepakti. iwan in tlatilolka mostlakawika ompa tiamikoskia in inchan tlatilolko; aw ik moteilwike audiensia in mexika siwa, amo wel neltik. ye omopanawi nawpowali xiwitl iwan tetech mota nesi ok telpokatsin. techihchikan omopalewi ipampa in teyeknemilis. kimach mopewaltia tsonistalewiwa. wan nama imohwanti tlake imechkwesó aw satepan tlatlamana in iskikan tehteopan mihtowaya witsnawak, puchtlan, yohpiko, tlamahtsinko, momosko. aw ka sanno yewatl okanke okinmomakili in tonantsin sankta iglesia in omotenew teotlatekpanoktakanemilistli regla in kavaleros komendadores in itech powke omotenew horden de alkántara, sanno yewatl innehtol mochiwa inik san sepan nehtoleke in omotenewke teopixke monges san benito. aw in akxoteka chalka niman ik ye kintlatlania, ye kimilwia in totolimpaneka chichimeka "cuix ye nikan yes in tekitis in tlakotis in totew? manoso kana tiktotlachichiwililikan? aw kwix nanosomo kwix kana in motlamachititiw?". iwan amo poliw ahken otechilwi ¡namechcuamana tepatike! ¡xicmotenehuilican mawistik tlatiwani chalma iwan nankihtaske kename isihkan mosewitis namonantzin! ipa se taman saj. masayelnanakatl ihpotoktlawikxitili aw in ye oyuh mochintin kinpiloke, san ok onkan inpan yowak, senyowal in pipilkatimanka; aw no miekintin in amo piloloke tliltike iwan mulatotin san ok onkan tsawktikatka in kársel de korte, tlatlatolchixtikate. tlahtoltin aw niman ye ik kintlatlania in kolwaka tlatoke, kimilwia “mexicaé, katlike in amomalhua?”. sasampa amo oyake, san iyo oya in kuxkuxtli, kito “tla nikimita kenin kichiwaske mexica”. mochiwa kuoujtaj. matlaktlomei tochtli xiwitl yqu itoke spañoles atla; no ikwak mikito mexika tloapa. wetsi sepayawitl. tlaximohtili newatl onikihto melawak inon oniktenewyese wel neli ammo niknemilia nikisas newatl san nikixaxilia yewatsin totahtsin ammo monekiltia motsontekonewtsinos xitomat "¿uan melawak?" ipan chikwase tekpatl xiwitl, omikwanikoh akolnawak in onkan nauhxiuhticoh. waltemok kitl san kintlachiliko . aw manel nikan titech tlakwaltia titech atlitia, kwix ik titech tentsakwas? kwix ik timits imakasiske? kwix aokmo wel kisas in totlakawapawaya totlakaskaltiaya? nikan ipan in motlahtokatlali in itoka wewe || 26r achitometl ikmatlaktli tlahtowani mochiw in kulwakan. sempowalxiwitl in tlatokat tlakateutsi; sano ikwak xiwitl i walmotlatokatlalike kwawtlatowatsi tlatilulko, itskowatsi tenochtitla. aw in okik ayamo motlahtokatlaliaya in axayakatsin, aw yewatl kixketsaya tlahtokatiskia se ipiltsin in wewe motewksoma itoka ikewak; in ikome kixketsaya itoka machimale. nikawín mochiwa miak. no kinintasojkamatiliaj: in koordinasión del servisio gráfiko tein powi iwan universidad iberoamerikana, wan itayekankauj maría del mar sans tein kichihchiukeh in amaix. no ipan tlahtolnechikolamoxtli niknexti kenin nikihtos “queso” masewalkopa, ipan amoxtli mihtoa “chichihualayotlatetzauhtli”; san niman oninokwekwetlaxo ipampa senka tepiton in sente, senka weyak in oksente. iwan oksehpa onikyokox in tlahtoli itechpa in “licuadora” iwan onikihkwilo “tepuztlatzoaloni”, inin kimalkochoa tepustepustli, tlatsoaloniitla ika tlakwawwiteko. omokwepke niman in pantitlan, ipan ome tekpatl xiwitl, in kanin okaxiltikoh nawi xiwitl. "ah, noichpoka kwali itstok in ipan ome akatl xiwitl, kaxtiltlahtoani in itoka inikei karlos tenawati ma kixtiloh in iwikpa méxiko mochintin teopixke in itech powih teopixkanawatili in tlein motokayotia "iesusicniuhyotl". aw no iwan ye yuh nepa chikwepowalxiwitl ipan chikwexiwitl poliwke in tulam tlaka, inik momoyawake kikawke in imaltepew tulam. —kimaka tepetlaostok nikonana kimaka san agusti ompa nikonanan semiya. kihtowah ne keman ihwak amo onkaya kahfen, yehwa nehón kikuiaj, kiteuatsay-aj, kikwechowayah wan kikwiah para kitemiliayah in panelahat. mononotstoke kwawwewetke,in tlakaelel, kawaltsin, kilmach akanihke iachkawa, kankawtikiske tewtli michwakan. . aw in ihkwak ye witse in ye wal mokwepa, san iw tlantiwitse in innechichiwal in innexin in innenosalis tlawtika. inik makwiltlamantli nikitowa no senpowali pesos ik moxtlawas in tomines tiktotlakwike titoteilwike in ipanpa tlali yewatl kimati in nonamik isabel kixtlawas aw in tla walas in noteikaw baltasar yewatl kimati in ilamatsin fransiska kitlaokolis itlatsin ka nel itlalpan in onmokalti. itech hwan antonio trinidad, ¿ tlein tikwaske antokniwan ? ¿tle ika tawiaske? aw san omoch mosentlalike nikan in okwawtlahtoke iwan in tlahtoke iwan in hwesgovernadoresme omochiwke nikan tenochtitlan mexiko. ixiuyo se kikwi wan ika se motahtatia nikan se ipanko wan se ipoxko. v akatl xiwitl, 1315. aw in axkan wel imonekyan inik tikihtoske tiktenewaske in kenin kinwalkixti in kenin kinwalwikak in diablo tetsawteotl. keme iki mokamakun konik ohkion in te'wakun mika te'wakun. nopilwan nikan xkineskayotilia nochi nehin tein yehwan, mochiwa tepetaj. mochiwa maski kahfentah oso milaj. ya san ken kalakito xaxamaktsi ika se taktson se kitokas, wehka mowiwilana. no se kimewa para kwaltsin taki. pero komo san hwan bautista wel yakattiwia in tekwaltiloya nanakatl. in kikwaya ichkwak in kitowaya tlatlapitsalispan. ayamo tle tlakwali kikwaya son ok iyo in kakawatl koniya yowaltika. aw in oksekintin wewetke in iw kimachiyotia, ipan in in se tekpatl xiwitl in kimiktike mexika in maxtlahton tlahtowani askapotsalko; aw yese ayemo mik ikwak, ka san yewatl in altepetl poliw in ipan in xiwitl. i miaktin okinmamakake kaktin, tlen inomekes san chichipawake ikxiton oyaya. yewan on ompa okimakike kaktin. iwan tla okinmakaske tsotsomatli noihki okintlakiaya. in ipan siudad de méxiko a ocho dias del mes de novienbre de mil kinientos ochenta i nweve años i senka mawistililoni don antonio valeriano hwes governador in nika méxiko wei altepetl ipan inin petision audiensia omopow onkan okimokakilti in itlaitlanilis tlasintla tokatenew. yuh oneltik in tlatoli in imixpatsinko in señores alkaldes ik senka opachiw in iyolotsin iwan okimotilike in testamento onkan okimasikakakitike in tlatoli in iw melawatika in itechpa in testamento. ixkich inik niktsonkixtia i notestamento i newatl pedro hakobo amo sentetl onikilkaw imixpan in tepixke iwan nowayolke aw niman nikimixketsa alvaseas inik se tlakatl hoseph hernandes merino, hwan moisen, fransisko flores, hwan bautista, tetigos lwis de vilabar español maria de vilabar señora isabel vaskes señora domingo minero. kenin mochiwa aw ma wel xikmokakitikan in amixkichtin in antlaltikpaktlaka inik moman in ilwikatl iwan in tlaltikpaktli ka itlachiwaltsin in totekwiyo dios ka itlatoltsin; aw in totekwiyo dios yehika in kimitalwi in san iseltsin in san iyotsin in mochiwelitsin in kimochiwilia. tlake kikwah noponi wan axtleno axtlen nikita. wahka noponi itstok awaxkalson tlen 77 tlanawatihkayotl. san iseltika se iwan se tlahtokan welis kichiwas, amo mokalakis seyok: i. kisenkawas tlen kenihki mopanoltis ipan ichantlanawatil; ii. mokamawis iwaya seyok tlahtokan iwan noihki iwaya tekichiwani sennechikolistli, ika nechikolis tekitiloyan tlen yewa; iii. kintokahtalis tlen itekitikawa iwan kichiwas amatlaxitlahketl tlen yewa itechpowi; iv. kikixtis amatlanotsali, ipan 30 tonati mopowas tlen keman mokawas kaktli tlanawatili, iwikpa axnochipa tlaixpehpentli tlen moneki mochiwas ipan 90 tonati, tlen ika welis motekiwis kaktli tlanawatili tlen itekitikawa ken moihtowa ipan 63 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili, tlen kaktli tepantlahtoanih iwan wekapa tepantlahtoani tlen sentlanawatiloyan tlen tlapewaltili amo nochi miak, san mokixtia tla kaktli monextis ipan itlamiya xiwitl tlen ipan tekipanoyaya tepantlahtoani tlen itechpowi. tlaxexeloli tlen iv: tlen sennechikolistli ipan inin tekitl amotle nikchiwa. kostik, yawitl, chipawak ik chikwei in ipilwa tlakateusi. aw in ye mochi inik mosemasikapowa inik mosentlalia in ixkich intekiw mochiw morilos in ipan iknawkan xeliwtika in iknawkan kistika chalkayotl: in tlalmanalko, in amakemekan, in tenanko, in chimalwakan, iwan in ixkichika inik nowian in intlatititsalpan in intlawilanalpan in iskikan omotenew altepetl chalko, inik omosentlali mochi in iskikan intekiw mochiw morilos ochenta mil, in monawkanwi in nikan mexiko wala. aw i yewantin in xochteka in ulmeka in kiyawisteka in kukolka inik onkan katka omotenew chalchiwmomosko, inik senka tlaimakasia; awel onkan maxixaya, oksenka ompa onwia in atenko in onmaxixaya, i ye axkan onkan motokayotia kwitlatepek ahnoso kwitlatetelko, senka tlaimakasia. sa ixkich in kilwia "ca nikan tonka telpuchtlé: ka aokmo tipiltontli aokmo tiwki titenmachoni, ka ye tonitstika ka ye tontlachixtika ye mixtlalopan ye mixnentlan ye mixonikak in ompa tontlamatisneki. tlahkoxonakatl amo mochipautani. kitkike in ixkich tultekayotl, nikan ipan in in omikiko in itoka nawyotsin in tlahtowani katka kolwakan, aw in tlahtokat onpowalxiwitl onchikome; aw niman onmotlahtokatlali in itoka kwawtexpetlatsin tlahtowani kolwakan. intepalewilis mexikah inin xiwpan kaxtilan kimpewa malayatlacah, in onkan motokayotia "islas filipinas". amo se kimewa por in ihsiuka moskaltia. aw in ikwak oyake in tlamatinime in oyuh omik kwakwawtsi nime ye onmotlali in tlakateutsi tlatilulko. nepaka kwasekawili inon timotemolia. . ipampa in kontokaya in se kali kitoaya ka ye ik senkalaki in ikokokaw in tloke nawake in tlaltikpakke in yowali in ehekatl. tlachikili yawi. mahtlaktli wan se aw in ipan axkan ik 21 mani metstli setiembre de 1607 años, ikwak ipan ilwitsin kis sant matheo apóstol, ikwak mochi tlakatl okittak se sitlali popokaya; owalnes ilwikatitech, ye nipa walitstia miktlampa i norte, iwikpa in askapotsalkopa. akan wel ichan moyokoyatsin, in nowiyan notsalo, nowiyan no chialo, yewa tomolo in itleyo in imawisyo tlaltikpak. in momalakachoa, yaoxochimikistika. nonotsalistli . aw in ikwak tlawawano onkan ik mosewalwitoke. nimitsmaktiliti nehin kali. namewantsitsin nankimohtiliah inin neskiani itlaixkopinaltsin mikeltsin leonportila in omochiw achtotipa ihkwak ayahmo ahsiah in kaxtiltekah nowian tepewtiwits, in itena yetiwits kiawitl yeekatl. aw in omotenew tlahtowani totoltekatl tsompachtli tlailotlaktewktli ye tlakpak omotokatenew in ompa kiwalwikak teotenanko in isiwaw itoka kwawxochtsin in siwapili; aw niman onkan kichiwke in atentlipan onkan tlakatiko in ipiltsin totoltekatl tsompachtli in itoka kwawitsatsin teyakapan, itech kichiw in kwawxochtsin in isiwaw katka totoltekatl tsompachtli. tochichi. inik sentlamantli nikitohoa in nehoatl fransisko hernandes i nokal in onkan niwetstok tonatiw ikalakiyanpa itstikak iwan in totekuyo onkan monoltitok iwan in ithoalo iwan in ompa hoalkalakohoa monamakas in keski mokwis yewantin kimati in alvaseas nikintenewas aw in kaltepiton in tlanepantla ikak nikmakatiw i nonamik in ines papan ayak kikwilia aw in akin kalkowki kitsakwas analpa mowitis. aw in ikwak okonmokakiltike señores alkaldes in tlatoli in iw tlaitlaniko niman motlanawatilike notsaloke in tlaxilakaleke ah niman walake pedro witsiltewka merino, lukas tototl, gaspar morales, damian texoatl algwasil, martin kwawtlaotl, melchor dias, balthasar de rosas. aw sa ixkich chikwei tlakatl in momakixti in ihtik wei akali; in ikse tlakatl yewatsin in omotenewtsino in senkiska kwalnemilise noé, ka san isel itech kimottili kwaltiwani yektiwani grasia in ixpantsinko totekwiyo dios, iwan inamiktsin iwan yeintin ipilwan: in ikse itoka sem, in ikome itoka cham, in ikei itoka hapheht; iwan in insiwawan intoka in ikse titea magna, in ikome itoka || pandora, in ikei itoka noela, in iknawi itoka noegla. yemankitoton ahmo kwawpik kisa. bweno entonses yokihto bweno awelito pwes akmo nias in eskwela. tlen 83 tlanawatihkayotl. in tlayekanani pewas tekichiwa ipan 1º tlen disiembre metstli iwan mowekawilis chikwasen xiwitl. in altepechaneh tlen tekipanos ika tlanawatili tlayekanani tlen totlalnantsin, kitlapehpenihtoseh masehualmeh, noso san se ome tonatih tlapalewis, san se ome tonatih kimakaseh tlanawatili, ipan nochi inin tlamantli iwan sekinok tleweli amo welis oksepa kichiwas inin tekiwekayotl. ome peso ika ompoali iwan mahtlaktli sentavo, noso xinechmokawili man in nikixtlawa. amo pahti, ipa pahpata saj. aw sanno ipan in desiembre de 1600 años || 27 ye iw tiwalasi itlakatilispantsinko totekwiyo dios, ikwak momikili in tlahtowani maestreskwela don sancho sánches de muñón wei teopixki latinmatini katka klérigo. in asiko kapitán ye otechmikti tonatiw, ye senpowalilwitl techpoyomikti in tonatiw inik wia atenko kapitán. in kwowit, witsyoh wan mochiwa weyi. “auh in tewatl, temilo, melawak xikmokwiti keski wel otikinpopolo teteo”. aw in ye yowak, kitlatlawtih in itlah, in ok yowatsinko, ok tiatlaibwak, walkisas kimonochilikiw in onkan tlatelolko, semeh in tebpixqueh, inik mowikkas kimoiblkwitilitiw, iwan kimosenkauhilitiw, ye ika ka wel iw kah in iyblloh, ka ye imman ka ye inik mikis, ka ayok meuhas, ayokmo pahtis. in sakatl xoxoktik. aw in itepankal xiwtenamitl xiwtetsakwalo katka, nawkampa koyonki katka in ikiyawayo; aw ka yewatl ipampa in inik mihto motenew teotenanko. se pedaso de nokuñada onsé pedaso de no kuñada difunto yotokowihke. méxiko mawistiktlakatl presidente iwan husto sierra weles omihtalwiaya ke amo tlaneltokos iwan okititlanilike tsotsomatli iwan kahtin. miake kokone aihmo okinekia tsotsomatli tlen omotitlanike sekretarios ipampa nochtin tatatin otlaneltokake. kwaltia in aokak wel sempoa, ye yiman oyekok tonali ikwak kokonentoton opakiya omononotsaya nochtin ipan tlamachtilkalí: monamaka itech wehweyi benefisios, achto amo monamakaya, ihkón ompa pantepewia, kikwayah in chiktehmeh in iteyo. iwan ihtik, ye omihto, missa kimochiwilito, iwan kinmottilito kinmotlapalwito in itlapacholtsitsinwan kabildo tlaka kanónigos. in ik konitotewak in koyolchiwki ipan in in xi akatl xiwitl in kisako in tekwanipan tlaka en blanko. komo itech atsin, ompa niknotsati. in akike nikan kinchayawako, xitlachia, xitlakaki aw xitlamati, yuhkan, i, in tlaltikpak, ma tinen, ma sa tinen, ma achi tiktoka, ¿ kenin tinemis ? ¿ ken achi tiktokas? mach wel owikan in tlaltikpak, tetsaw owikan, nochpuchtse, kokotse, tepitse [...]. aw ini “camo ninoyokoya, ka nitlaiwal in kolwakan acxoquauhtli”. inihwanti kena tekitih nikneltoka, noso ixokoyatl limón amo kinpaktia in ichpocameh. okachi kinpaktia in chokolatl. no kichiwah paletah ika itakka. . niman ye ik ompewa in ik tlawawanos temalakak wel in ixpan mochiwaia wel kim ittaya in kiskitsontli mamaltin mikia. inik ontetl tetsawitl ye omihto wel iwkan mochiwtiwetska in ihkwak chikwei tsilini ye yowa; inik wel ontlayowatiwetska, inik niman moch walnestiwetska sisitlaltin in ilwikatitech. no ikwak wala españa in ibeatifikasioyotsin in sant ignasio de loyola fundador de la kompañía de hesús. mah amo kwalantikan 181 aw in ikomilwitl axkan ipan domingo de ramos in ik 15 mani metstli abril in ipan omotenew xiwitl 1612, ihkwak senka omokomonike in mochintin españoles in mexiko onoke, senka omomawtike, miek tlamantli intechpa okimotemowilike in tliltike in intlakawan; sa kimimakastinemia, sa inwikpa mihmattinemia imanel kintekipanowa. aw ye iknawxiwitl in in kaktoka in tlahtokayotl, in ayak tlahtokat amakemekan iwan in akxotlan. ayik tlanonotsalo ipan tepetl tehwewentsin wan nochtin tetepeme tlen techmalakachoa in ompa momochko malakatepek. inin tehwewentsin techmononochiliaya tokoltsitsiwan weyi momamalito ke in tlatoltin in tetepe. ompon mochiwa tlen weweyi tlaka, mawistikes: tepatikes ke non mitoa, inon kinkwitia tlamatkes, iwan ikwak aka mokokoa kitoa, tiawe topopoaske ka xiwitl noso ka totoltetl. yewan tlon ompon yaw kintepewaske totoltetl noso xiwitl ika tetl itokan chalchiwtetl; kampa metstika tehwewentsin. motaktsontalia de semila, ihwak kiteki in chiktehtsin, kiwika wehka wan kitamota wan ompa ixwa. in yelo ilwikapa tsotlani. san iwin inik motetlakewike tenochka i nowian altepepan. makwili xumali olipahchiyawisotl iwan ihkwak onkan in miyek tlakatl españoles iwan teopixke itech kwalanke inik amo tleik topan tlahtowa tlatlawtilistli mochiwas in ipampa yuhki topan omochiw axkan, ye oksenka okimonekilti in pahpaktinemis inik kwakwanminalos in ipan in viernes; ik senka okimopinawilike oksenka yewantsitsin inkisidores, inik satepan okiwalmotlakawaltilike in aokmo onkan tlamiminalos korral, ik okixitinike mochi in kwawtlatsatsakwali onkan kimanka, moch okikixtike. niman ik walpewke, walatiake, onok, ikwiliwtok, tokaietok, in onkan walkikistiake mexika, in ipan mexika tlatoli. aw in walake in mexika, ka nel noso ye nepa itstiaka, san, waltetsakwatiake inik walake. nawxiwitl kaktimanka tenochtitla, ayak tlatokat; in poliwke tolantsinka ayak tlatoani. omokwapa tosannakatl itlanahnamik: en el nombre de dios padre, aw iskate in intlasepanwil in omotenewke in tewktlahtoke in kiketske in ikal diablo nawyotewktli in teomeka yewatl in omotenew kwachipasoltsin tlakatewktli, inin chichimekatl ye omotenew imasikaw in tlakatekpan tlaka; in ikteyeka yewatl in omotenew teksismitl amilkatltewktli, inin chichimekatl ye omotenew imasikaw in amilka; itewktlahtokawan katka in omotenew tlahtowani kwawitsatsin. in monotsa tekwanenepil, por in xa no iuki ya in tekwani inenepil. onkán nitlawahsomas. nikilwia sikiera yunimisiskalti. aw ompa ipan moyetstikatka in itekitsin inik visita kimochiwilia inik niman nikan okiwalmixkechilike inik arkobispo omochiwtsino mexiko; amo wel walmowikak, ompa momikili in ipan altepetl siudad de lima san ye ok ompa ipan moyetstikatka in itekitsin inik visita kimochiwiliaya. "ah, tlaskamati para tiwala aw in akpakwehesiwatl niman ye kitowa "tlacatl totekwiyo, anka ye nikan yes in ihiyotl tokomatiske". manxitlasohtla aw in ikwak okimokakilti alkalde in intlatol iwan in intlaitlanilis in imontlamanixtin kimopakkaselilis aw in satepan okinmonochilike in tlaxilakaleke bwenaventura teles felipe sanches fransisko xwares felipe lwis gabriel ximenes kinmolwili in alkalde xikmokakiltikan inin kali iwan in itepankalo iwan in ichinanyo kwix [a]mo iyaxka amo itlatki in anan teles in kimonamakilia aso aka kelewilia. iuki kitokaitiah por in kostik hasta iihtik. kwaltia niman kimonanke; amoma kitoke “yn timexica”. . in akin iw kisentlaliaya in in puchteka tlahtoke in iskipetlame yewatl in ye otlaknopilwi in ye miek iaxka itlatki. —kanin timokowilian semiya tewa'kun. iwan karransistas otlayitaya itenko akaxtontli itentla tiankistli, ikwak otikimiktake waketstake. ah kimatis tlika waketstake. san niman tsatsi itik tiankistli sapatistas: ¡nian ka namotata! ¡ayemo miqui! iwan tewan ototohtiaya pilastras tiankistli. iki on amo techaxilis tepostlakweponali. awinin ma sentetsintli pantsintli xitechmomakilikan!". wahka nopa tlakatl kiihto aw yehika ka yewatl in wel kinotsaya kimotlakaittitiaya in diablo tetsawteotl yaotekiwa; iwan in ayemo walewaya ka chikwasentlamantli in tlakatekoloteonawatili in okimakak, inik okinawati in kichiwas in kineltilis witsiltsin, ik achtopa monetolti yewatl inik kineltilis kinmachtis kimittitis in iskitlamantli ik okinawati diablo in imasewalwan mexitin no kineltiliske kichiwaske in tlakatekoloteotenawatili. ya nopa kikwa. aw inik neltis mochiwas in iski tlamantli nikan ikwiliwtika ipan itestamento in iewatl fulana in ialbaseaswan kinchiwa in iewantin in imixpan onkan okatka okitoke toyolokakopa inik talbaseastin tiyeske inik tikneltiliske in itlanekilis in kokoxki ipanpa in amo wel titlakwilowa san nikan tomatika tikketsa krus aw titlalililoske in totoka. mokniwtlakke tepewani iwan tlaxcaltecah, in kiwikake mexiko. mochiwa kaltsintan wan kuoujtaj. para yehwan motekipanoskeh mosta, wipta. xoxochitla xochimilko itechmoneki atl mochi totechmoneki matikkwitlawikan kihto "ca wexotsinkopa oniwaltemok". na niyasa. axán yukimanamakak ni modos. o aik in xopan nikichiwa, nikan san ninotolinia, san ye ni kwakwawtsin, ma san ni chalchiwitl, ni teokwitlal, san ye on nipitsalos, on nimamaliwas in tlatilan. nikawín amo semi kitokaj, semi kitokah kuesaltekamej. tlanankililistli in tepiltsin ik kinankilia in itlahtol ittatsin. achi machiotlahtoli niman ye ik moyolnonotsa, ye kitoa ca iskatki in onech motlaokulili in totekwiyo in tlaltikpake in tloke nawake in ikokokaw in iaxkatsin in italtkitsin: aw konmakake in aokwantsin in tlahtokayotl, in tewktsontli iwan in xiwitsoli konakike, inin ontlamantli yuhki korona ipan powia; iwan in ixkich inik netlahtokatlaliloya ixkich komamakake. iteyo no kwaltia para pahti, kwali para estsompil, kitehtekih iteyo wan kimanah kemeh talkamoh wan tayih in atsin. tehwatsin yetok presente nehin mopilitsin. aw no ikwak in ipan in xiwitl omotenew ikwak pew in xochiyaoyotl in ompa chalko; yewantin kichiwke in chalka in tlakochkalka. aw in itoka martin ayaxkan iwan migwel yakamekatl iwan pedro epkowatl in tlaxilakaleke tlachkwititlan kitowa yewatl tlale in totol amo tikmati in kenin kinotsa in siwatsintli in itoka ana xoko. xi tekpatl xiwitl, 1308. konkake in tlatoke, kitoke “xoconilhuiti i witsiliwitl kwix no tisatl iwitl quinequi”. in amo moxiuyotia, in tani, moxiuyotiti hasta ahko de wewehtiti ya, tihtilawak mahyá yon kahfenxiwit, sayoh ne okachi tihtilawak. in amo se kitoka, ixwa iteyo. aw ye yexpan in ipan moteilwiya in inkal in intlal amo nistlakati wel yewantin chaneke in omotenewke marina susana, barbara maria, mensia marta ixkichin in itlatol omochiw. aw lunes a 29 de abril, ikwak kitamachiwke kitenexwike in teokali sant fransisko in iw yes, yewatl inik ye moteka tepantli. nepa tlakaltech itlak in tlanextiloyan manik se ahkopechtli ayak ki pia. ¿anotimocaulitilia? amo techpasoloskeh keh nikan kalakwayan. satepa oksé lado wal üayewaloa. iii akatl xiwitl, 1183. walewake omotlaliko tekpayoka, motlalmomostike, ipan asiko wawkil, tlotlitewktli; ye makwilxiwtia unka molpi ixiw, chiwknawxiwtike in unka. se kilo iwan tlahko itsmikilitl intla motemachtia san yolamachilistika iwan ahmo nemachilistika ahmo pehpechtilistika
