ahmo yolyamankatika inon kihtosneki in moiknotilia in senka yolopiltik in tlachihchiwkayotl in temachtiani intla ahmo tekwini itechkopa in tonemilis intla ahmo kixeliwkamati in itlamachtilwan impahpakilis intonewalis inon ahmo temachtiani inon san sasanka temachtihki tein mas wehweyi inimaxiuyo wan kachi tomawak in kwamekat. sano insexiwyok i molpili inxiw mexika. in ipan siudad de mexiko a kinse dias del mes de abril de mil e kinientos noventa i dos años axkan ik kastoli tonatiw in tekakitilo kali tlali in ikal mariana in kinamaka omotenew in makwilpowali pesos kitema se tlakatl español inin yaotlika in otsatsik tekpoyotl aw niman onkan oksepa owala in lwis savalos okito axkan niktenewa chikwasenpowali pesos yuh niktlalia notlatol ka wel notech powis in kali ka otitononots in chane testigo diego peres. iswatl ik niman ato kikwitiwets i siwatl xomimitl, ik ye walmotlaloa yaotekiwa kitlakawaltis xomimitl, ik no unka kikwitiwets, ikimomestin kimasik. aw i yewatl witsilopochtli, in achtopa san wel okixkich in itoka katka witsilton. iswatl noha temoyaya ne atlahtli. ix kali xiwitl, 1189. aw san yewantin in wewei teopankali in nikan omotenewke; aw amo nikan iwan motenewa in okseki teopankali, iwan in monasterios in onkan moyetstikate monhastin amo iwan nikan motenewa, ipampa ka nowian molon in atl in inchachantsinko in inmonasterios, in iw mochi tlakatl kittak iwan kimati. tlahkoxonakatl in okachi itstik mokwakwalatsa in atl ika kanela iwan tlatsopeliloni; arros motesi ipan metlatl ahnoso ika tepustlatsoaloni; intla metlapan. ma senka kwal 1 i motesi iwan inin textli in walkisa moatilia ihtik in komitl ika ome tekontontli atl; ihkwak ye kwakwalaka in atl in achto omotlali, san tlamach motlalilihtiw in tlaatililtextli iwan san teki molinia ixkichkaw in ye kwali tlawikxitili. tlen 105 tlanawatihkayotl. in suprema korte tlen hustisia tlen totlalnantsin kiixmatis, ken kiixnextis tlahtolpamil tlanawatili, tlen inin tlahtolmeh: i. tlen tlahtol ixnamikilismeh amatlanawatiloyan, san amo tlen itechpowi tlen tlahtol tlapehpentli iwan tlen moixtlalia ipan 46 tlanawatikayotl tlen inin amatlanawatili, mochiwas inipan: a) in sentlanawatiloyan iwan se tlaltlanawatili noso iyolo weyi altpetl; b) in sentlanawatiloyan iwan se altpetl tlanawatiloyan; k) in weyi tekichiwani iwan tlahtokan tlen sennechikolistli; yewa iwan san katlia ihki tlen tlahtokan tlen inin noso tla amo, in nechikolistli tekitiloyan, eliseh kaltlanawatilmeh tlen sentlanawatiloyan noso tlen iyolo weyi altepetl; d) se tlaltlanawatili iwan okse; e) se tlaltlanawatili iwan iyolo weyi altepetl; f) in iyolo weyi altepetl iwan se altepetl tlanawatiloyan; g) omeh altepemeh tlanawatiloyan tlen miakintin tlaltlanahuatilmeh; h) omeh tlachikawalmeh tlen seha tlaltlanawatili, tlen tlanawatikayotl innemilis noso nochimeh tlanahuatilmeh; i) se tlaltlanawatili iwan se ialtpeh tlanawatiloyan, tlen tlanawatikayotl innemilis noso nochimeh tlanahuatilmeh; j) se tlaltlanawatili iwan se altepetl tlanawatilyan tlen seyok tlaltlanawatili, tlen tlanawatikayotl innemilis noso nochimeh tlanahuatilmeh; iwan k) omeh kaltlanawatilmeh tlen iyolo weyi altepetl, tlen tlanawatikayotl innemilis noso nochimeh tlanahuatilmeh. nochipa keman tlahtol ixnamikilismeh tlahtoseh tlen nochimeh tlanawatilmeh tlen tlaltlanawatilmeh noso tlen nochimeh altpemeh sentlanawatiloyan kinixkowis sentlanawatiloyan, tlen altepetl tlanawatiloyan kinixkowis tlaltlanahuatilmeh, noso sekin tlamantli tlen kiihtowa tlakotontli k), h) iwan k) tlen onpanoqueh, iwan tlasenkawali tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia kiihtos amo ipatih, inin tlasenkawali ipatih elis keman nochimeh kikwalmatiseh nel amo miakeh se chikweyi tlamatlalantli. ipan sekinok tlamantli, in tlasenkawali tlen suprema korte tlen hustisia ipatih elis san tlen inixkotia motlahtol ixnamiki. ii. tlen tlachiwalismeh axnelkwali tlanawatili tlen kinekiseh kiixtlaliseh tlaixnamikilistli tlen se tlasentlaxitlawali iwan inin amatlanawatili. in tlachiwalismeh tlen axnelkwali tlanawatili welis mochihuaseh, iasika ipan sempoali iwan mahtlaktli tonatih tlen kitokilis tonatih tlen keman monextis ipan amatl tlaxitlawali, iixkawil: a) in seha ipatih tlen sempoali matlaktli iwan eyi por siento tlen tlatskitokeh ipan tlahtokan tlen tepantlahtoanih tlen sennechikolistli tlahtokan, kiixpanos tlanawatilmeh tlen sentlanawatiloyan noso tlen iyolo weyi altepetl tlen kiixnextis in sennechikolistli tlahtokan. b) in seha ipatih tlen sempoali matlaktli iwan eyi por siento tlatskitokeh ipan wekapa tlahtokan, kiixpanos tlanawatilmeh tlen sentlanawatiloyan noso tlen iyolo weyi altepetl, tlen kiixnextis sennechikolistli tlahtokan noso tlen semanawak tlahtol tlasanekawalmeh kisenkahtos mexikayotl kaltlanawatiloyan. k) in prokurador general tlen totlalnantsin, kiixpano tlanawatilmeh tlen sentlanawatiloyan, tlaltlanawatiuloyan, iwan noihki semanawak tlahtol senkawalmeh tlen kikwaltalis mexikayotl kaltlanawatiloyan. d) tlen iwikal sempoali matlaktli iwan eyi por siento tlen tlatskitokeh ipan tlehtleya tlanawatilmeh tlakayolchiwalmeh tlen tlaltlanahuatilmeh, tlen amo kikwalitah tlanawatilmeh tlen yehaya kikixtihtos. e) tlen iwikal sempoali iwan mahtlaktli iwan eyi por siento tlen tlatskitokeh ipan tlahtokan tlen kiixnextia iyolo weyi altepetl, tlen amo kikwalita tlanawatilmeh tlen yehaya tlahtokan kikixtihtos. f) in tlahtol nechikolismeh tlen mohkwilohtokeh ipan instituto federal elektoral, ipan itlakayotipah tlen sentlayecanah, tlen kiixnamikih tlapehpentli tlanawatilmeh tlen sentlanawatiloyan noso chinancopah; iwan tlahtokan nechikolismeh kwaltia tehwa timokawa timosewi komo se kalyolot. aw in yewatsitsin in ixkichtintsitsin teopixke frailestin iwan no yewantsitsin in ixkichtintsitsin siwateopixke in monhastin in mexiko monoltitoke, mochtintsitsin || 57 motekipachotsinoke in ipampa teopan iwan nika in inkaltsin in monasterios, inik senka ye nowian ye apachiwia, ihtik molon in atl. oyatiwintike notatawan, tlapaliwintitli. nima ye ik weka konita, san kenin nestiwits nenenki; nima ye ik kimolwia “mexicaé, aki ye wits, ma ok titotlatica!”. testigo.- migwel de san pedro namike nichane siudad makok huramento etk. tlatlanilok in testigo ilwilok kenin wel tikmati inik moteilwia maria geronima in inamik hwan eskalante inik nixnamiki antonio hoseph yoan in inamik magdalena ines katka ak tlale ak axkaoa katka in umpa otioalake. v tekpatl xiwitl, 1172. . aw in ik nawi motlaliko tlatowani yewatl in mokiwitsin. aw no ipan motlalike in puchtekatlahtoke yewantin in popoyotsin, tlakochintsin. ipanpa axkan noyolokakopa niknamaka ayak manechkwitlawiltia yewatl niknamakiltia in español itoka lwis de sevalos ixkich nechmaka senpoali onmatlaktli peso in tomines. sa tetepitsin toknan tacixqueh. in ikwak ye mikowa nima ye kikakke i mexika yoan i kuxkuxtli ye nanatska in ilwikatl. kehní kitl kichihke. aw inik onkan kixowak tekpan palasio, ka sanno yuh mochiw in tlakpak omotenew in iw mochiw in iw tokok inakayotsin teoyotika tlahtowani don frai garsía gwerra arkobispo i virrei; in iw netekpanok, san ye nokwel yuh motekpan in mochi kofradías onkatki mexiko, iwan san ye nikwel yuh motekpantiake in nepapan teopixke monoltitoke mexiko. in koyowa, in kolwakatl, kiwalkaki, senka inpan omoteka kwikatl. axkan ikse viernes in ipan kwaresma in ik 6 mani metstli marso de 1615 años, ihkwak omotlali opew otsintik in estasiones sant ipólito in onkan motenewa monte kalvario, yewatsin okimotlalili in señor don gabriel gwerrero tlatsintile fundador omochiwtsino ika itlatkitsin in okimochiwili; aw ipan omotlahtolti ipan wel omochikawtsino in padre frai alonso de molina lego kwatesontsin san fransisko teopixki, intepantlahtokatsin in ánimas, no yewatsin in tlatsintile fundador omochiwtsino, inik mochi tlakatl onkan onmoteochiwa in ipan chikome viernes kwaresma || 270 inik amo san kexkich onkan onmoknopilwia tesentlapopolwilistli indulugensias. aw in mimichtin mokawke onkan in atitla sentlani temoke, aw in totome patlanke akopa yake; kinmoteochiwili in totekwiyo dios aw sesentlamantli in kinmomakili in inyelis in intlakatilis inik moskaltiske tlapiwiyeske. iwan tlaka itech tupileho iwan kwawtsin itechkopa san pablo ostotepek noihki okikixtiaya in nelwayo okotl iwan tlachpawastli inon kikwitiaya popotl. noihki inin popotl okimano ochichiwaya iwan okwalnamakaya ompan méxiko. okseki san ipan ompa milpa alta okimanamakaya. noihki okwalikaya tlakotlachpawastli. tlen achto otenehke tlachpawastli in popotl ika otlachpanaloya ipan kalitik iwan tlako tlachpawastli ika mochpanaya nochi kaltemitl den kali. iki on opapanoaloya tlaka iwan siwame. semi welik mahyá abastaxkal. nochipa ihkatik nochipa mila tekipan ammo onyeya itia okse oahsik in tonali newatl onitlekanaya ichan otahsike itwalko otikalahkeh xitenotsa nechmolwili notahtsin amotlenika, newa miak nipahpaki tla kwali otimitsnonahnamiktsino. amo monamaka. tepitsin siwame iwan ichpokatoton momochko okintokake mimikes sankwalkantika. siwame otlaltatakake kan kintokaske inamik wan noso ipilwan. ikan tlakayo okinmomimiktilike ipan se tekochtli okintenke chikweyi noso matlaktli mimikes iwan okintlalpachoaya. isihkan, kwache pewaske mokwekwepotsaske oksepa tlakatekolotlaka. kasá nochi yehwa sah kitokah yowi por panti. .quilazteutl itlapan in makxoyaw. ni mits acatecu notsa aya chimaltikpak monesoa aya ni mits acatecu notsa xa itech hueyoh. aw awel mochiw, ka ik moteilwiko in amakemeke iwan tlalmanalka masewaltin, ik makomanke mochintin in teupixke dominigos iwan fransiskos in ompa kimopielia altepetl, iwan ompa vesinos españoles; ikformasión kichiwke in masewaltin in kenin wel imaxka tepetl, ik moteilwiko ixpantsinko visurrei ik pleito mochiw, testigos mochiwke in frailes iwan españoles in intechpa masewaltin chalka. aw in on tlayawaloke ye no seppa kintekpana seseyakan kinmana. niman ye ik tleko in painalton in ikpak witsilopochtli. in tonali oksepa tsotlantika. aw sano ipan in in omotenew xiwitl onkan kitlamiko in apasko in iteyakanalis in tsimpantsin, in okwawtlahto in kinyakan mexika onxiwitl; aw sa niman ipan in in omotenew xiwitl ye nokwel ewatl onkan walmotlali in apasko in tlasotsin inik kinyakanas mexika. "uajka ihkino tlaskamati. ihtik se inontin teocholi wel neli otitlanextihkeh yese san se tepiton komitl in achiwki ye xitinis inik ye palanki in san tlapachiwtaya ka se tatapahsoli in san omatokok san niman mokwihkwik ihtik onyeya sempoali iwan chikome istakteokwitlayo tlakohkowaloni in pepetlakaya yunkin kin okiskeh tominpialoyan yese ahmo wel miektin inik nepalewilos in nenemilispatilos nikan ompewa ok sentlamantli wewe xiwpowali mexiko tenuchtitlan itech onikopini in ixiwpowaltsin don gabriel de ayala pili tetskuko iwan nikan mexiko tekpan audiensia eskrivano wan oksé oksé kometa wal kisaya norte walaya walaya. aw in kinkawtia in ipilwan kaxtoli omome in ikse itoka tlakawepan xokoyotl tlahtowani, inin amo wel momati kampa in tlahtokatito; aw in ikome ipilwan axayakatsin itoka tesosomoktli akolnawakatl; in ik-ei itoka tikosik; in iknawi itoka awitsotl; in ikmakwili itoka ixtlilkwechawak tlahtowani, inin amo wel momati kampa in tlahtokatito, aw inin ixtlilkwechawak in iwan wewe tlakawepan ka sa se innantsin in imomextin, in siwapili in innantsin itoka miskixawaltsin, inin tolan siwapili, ompa wala ka ya itlakamekayo in tlakpak omotokatenew in kwitlachtsin, in ompa tlahtokatito tolam in ipiltsin akamapichtli; aw in ikchikwasen in ipilwan in axayakatsin itoka makwilmalinal; in ikchikome itoka motewksoma xokoyotl; in ikchikwei itoka kwitlawatsin; in ikchiwknawi itoka matlatsinkatl; || 102v in ikmatlaktli itoka yopiwewetl; in ik xi itoka koyoltsilin; in ik xii itoka sesepatik; in ik xiii itoka teyowalpachowa; aw in okmakwiltin amo wel momati in intoka tlahtokapipiltin. ¿quen in nemowa in tenawak? ¿mach iliwistia, nemia tewik, teyakoni? on nelos in kwikatl. pilkentsi. aw itlan tewktlahtowa tlakochkalkati in siwakowatl in tlakayeleltsin atenpanekatl, aw in wewe motewksoma tlakatekkati; yqu imomextin kinanamiki in itskowatsin. onikchix ohnepaniwyan ihkwak okisako ohnakasik san onikwawawaskak tonenepil omokaw yuhkin tapasoli tel oninoyolochikaw san tepitsin otitononotske san onikilwi ma notlok monamikti tlen 12 tlanawatihkayotl. ipan nochi mexihko tlaltlanawatiloyan amo tlaltemaktiliseh pilkayotl iwan wekaw tlakamekayotl, iwan amo ipatih elis tlen sehkanok tlali walah pilkayotl iwan tlakamekayotl tlanawatili. 87 aw iwan ye chiwknawpowalxiwitl ipan yexiwitl in ipan xii tochtli xiwitl, 1426 años, in omomikili tlakatl chimalpopoka tlahtowani katka tenochtitlan, in tlahtokat matlaktlomome xiwitl, san kimiktiko in tepaneka. aw no ikwak motlalike beatati in onkan teopan sankta mónika ipilwan onkan witsilan. mah amo taehekatto, 158 in ipan axkan ipewayan metstli setiembre de 1611 años, ihkwak omachistiko owala tlahtoli in ompa españa omomikili in lisensiado diego lanteras anoso valderas de velasko oidor del real konseho de las indias, yewatl in visitador omochiwtsinoko nikan ipan nweva españa mexiko. peukayot eltok se tepetl, wehweyi. ya nopa tel kiihkwenihke. kitkike in tlili, in tlapali, in sesek. aw inin ilankweitl atlawtekatltewktli amoma wel wala i nikan tsakwaltitlan tenanko, ye ompa tlahtokat in atenko intlan in onpa mokawke in tenanka. aw itech man in mikwilo kaltech in onkan sant joseph, itenkopatsinko mochiw || 23 in ganboa iwan frai hwan, ikwak motlapialiaya in nikan mexiko. —ikwak timokokonoaya. komo waki, ¿ac nel ah yas? axtekiti ne san hwan bautista. vainila istatl, ixkich in monekis iken momatis. inin tlakatl wel tlatkiwa. "ca nikan tika tle tikmati? aw in kali sa no onkan in ikak yopiko aw inik kikowa epowali pesos aw in akin osenka kiwalekawis yewatl makos iwihin in notechmonawatilike aw kimotlalilia in intokatsin iwan in firmatsin fecho mexiko. na nikininawatí komo nopa... ka nel noso tlatokatlatoli, ka yuhkin chalchiwitl, ka yuhkin teuxiwitl ololiwik, in akatik ipan momati. xikkwi xikmopialti, moiolo itech xiktlali, moyolo itech xiki kwilo. intla tinemis, yehoatl ik titlakaskaltis, ik titlakaoapawas, tiktemakas, tikteilwis. tlahko kilo selik keso hwan hernandes niknokichtli nikan nochan santiago tlatilulko siudad notlaxilakaltia santa lusia atempan mixpantsinko ninesi in tewatsin don geronimo lopes hwes governador yoan yewantsitsin alkaldes ordinarios in ikatsinko toweitlatokatsin rei nwestro señor ka amixpantsinko nikitoa senttetl kali ikal okatka in maria xwares omomikili yoan ok onka in tesi iknosihoatl itoka maria xwares. kanela tlatsikwewali nikawín mochiwa miak. itlanahnamik: aw no iwan in onkan selar tlapantikpak senka miek in tlatlapanalkwawitl pivas iwan tlatlatlak; sanno iwi in onkan tekpan kiyawak amo san kexkich in kwawitl iwan in pivas kitlatlatike, aw niman ye no yewatl in kowetes amo san kexkich in kitlatlaske onkan palasio in tekpan. iwan kitowa ikwak ikoppa tlalpoloke in mexika in matlatsinko iwan masawakan. xi kali xiwitl, 73 años. aw in ipan kitlapoto atenamitl mexikatsinko, ipampa in senka ye apachiwia in iski altepetl chinanpan katki in kulwakan, xochmilko, kwitlawak, miskik. yuhki teixpan oninoketsato ammida ok omihto onitlanawati iwan onikihkista vi kali xiwitl, 1277. kien sabe kanihki kichihketl tlehko. yewantin wel mochikawke in moteilwike intlatki imixkoyan kipopoloke; aw sa yuhki in ontlatokilitiake san pablo tlaka in hernando tewkxochitsin inewan in nikolás hernándes tlakayelel. . iwi in mochiwaia yowaltika. aw in owalatwik niman ye ik tlatitlani tlaiwa. in kimonnotsa in puchtekatlahtoke. kinsentlalia in ixkichtin puchteka nawalostomeka in tealtiani in tekowani. aw niman in yewatl hernan peres español okiwalitki i napowali pesos ixpantsinko señor gobernador ihoan señores hweses ihoan no ixpan hwan de la torre, gaspar de san pablo albaseas in kichiwtia maria xoko omomikili. oinahmo motoka ¡tía ahmo onka tlenkikwaske porke tikate en tiempo de seka. siwapili itokatsin tomasita okimopiliaya se pipiltontli itokan konchito. tsitsikitsin omokaw iknoton ipampa okimomiktilike itatsin. inin siwapili amo omomachtiaya kaxtilan tlatoli iwan owalmikak méxiko. omosekwili pantsin iwan omotlalitsin ixpan se sini. omotelwiliaya ¡nicnamaca cocoliztli! kana yexpa omotenewiliaya. wan siwame tlen okimixmachiliaya iwan kimatia kaxtilankopa okimoiwilike tomasita, aihmo ximitalwi nicnamaca cocoliztli'. ximitalwi nicnamaca cocoles'. iwan timotilis ika timotlanamaquiliz. aw in masewali wel tsitsika wel ixkich walaw in walachia. wel nowian netekoya netlatiloya in teoitwalko. ayak tlakwaya wel mochi tlakatl mosawaya. ometeotl ikwik ken in tahtsin kinonotsaya in ichpuchtsin xinechmopahkayowilti notah tsin, xinechmolwili kanin ka painkalko. in tlatepachoko in nikan talpan, wan seki xochiyowa mayo, kemeh pahpata mopanpilojtiuj, pero tsikitsitsin. lunes in ik 15 mani metstli hunio de 1615 años, ihkwak nikan mexiko onpew in doktor antonio de morga inik ompa mowikak perú, ompa presidente mochiwtsinoto in audiensia real, ompa kiwalmikwanili in rei. .tlatoa aya inkechol. a mach yewa in tomikkaw tlapitsa? a mach yeva tlakalvas? aiye oho iyaiya. san nik eyekavis san noxoch amo in tlapoali ximovayan ya ketsalkali nepanavia iaxka in teiskaltiketl. ahvia! vi yah novian aw inik moyolew inik senka kinek || 104r walas in kinextikiw tlali nikan, aw yuhki in nenemia se tlakatl in ipan weyapan in kinenemiltia weyakali kalachixki; aw yese in itoka amo wel momati iwan kampa tlakat amo wel melawak momati. "uan noha tiwalati. mochi tlakatl aokak kilnamikia in tlein sesenyaka sesentlakatl inchachan kimopialia in teokwitlatl in tlatkitl, moch kalitik mokawtikis; aokak konittak aokak konmokwitlawi inik chololowak inik necholtilok kiyawak in ohtlipan, in ixkichkaw manka tlalolinalistli. ¿quen konchiwas noyolo yewa? inoyuhomicque inik chikwase paulus iwan inik se ioannes paulus in onkan vatikanaltepetikpak, teopixkakoyome kipepen yuhkin wei tlahtokateopixki poltekatl karol wohtila, in akin wei teopixki katka in ompa krakovia altepetl. i matlaktlose kali xiwitl atle mochiw. ototlatlahtitineka itech techkali itech baranka ompa totlatla'titinika' itech kwebitas kokotokoaya komo se totochton tiweweyokatikate ompa itek in kweba itek in tekali totlatlahtitikate onikaw duro xwego i xwego balasos onkan mikawi'tinemi' itechin kampo a balasos mikawi'tinemi' n akehwatl otlaxiko wanakin yotlapolo chohlo oksé lado yuya. nopa ya nepa itstó kiilwiah xili aw inik otlika nenka rei in ihtik siudad kiitstinenka in otli in aso kwali inik onkan pahpakowas in ipampa inamik reina inik korona makos inik siwatlahtowani fransia. moxiwkosketsalpetlapan, tonihkaka. kakawaiskixochitl, san tonnetlanewilo, tikawalos, tiyaas, ximoas. ixochiyo kwaltia para ika se tachihchiwa. nima ye ik nekekesalo, sa tlakapa netlalolok, in atl tlakatika tsop tlakatika te, sa ye i makis. ipan asiko kastilteka ki ye nawxiwitl tlatokati i nikan tlatilulko, ipan mochiw yayotl i nikan tlatilulko. ye ik kiwaliwa in malitsin, kilwi “notlatzin mexikatl, ka otimitswikaskia in kastila; aw in axkan amo wel tias, xiyaw ximokwepa mochan tenochtitlan. ma ok ye moyolik xik motlaokolnonochilitiw in totekuyo; ma timoxikkaw ma xokon ixkawi xokon senmati in tlamasewalistli; yawi sayoh onkak se taman tomiyoj. kimononotsako “ca otlama i xomimitl, kolwake in oquimacic”. oktepitsin tokahyan tikpia. aw in ihkwak in ipan in omotenew xiwitl ye senpowalonchikwei xiwitl kipiaya inik nemi tlaltikpak in omotenew wewe witsiliwitl; aw in oiw onmomikili omotenew toskwekwextli in inteyakankaw mexika, aw sa niman ipan in in omotenew xiwitl onkan in kowatitlan kiwalatokatlalike in omotenew wewe witsiliwitl, wel achto || 36v intlahtokaw mochiw in asteka mexika teokulwake. in iteyotsin se kikwa ihwak oksi, se kikwa kemeh elot. aw ik niman kimonnamikito in chalka akxoteka, ik niman ye monotsa in tlahtoke in toteositewktli in tekwaukawtli in inewan wewetewktli in chichimekatewktli iwan in tlahtokapili atonaltsin. kahfenkwowit ¿quexqui tonali kipia in mestli disiembre? aw in chimalaxotsin kihto kimilwi in kulwake "ma tisatl iwitl xitechmomakilikan, ma pantsintli xikmomakilikan i nokichtiwatsin i nothatsin!"; aw in kulwake amo seske. tein monamaka xokoyolin no kitokaj. in oahsiko ihtëc altepetl, niman ik tlamelaw in itekpanchantsinko obispo in wel yankwikan walmowikkak, tebpixkatlahtoani itokatsin katka d. frai hwan de sumárraga, san fransisko teopixki. sa ye no ikwak in tlatilulko totosakatsi tlakatekatl teutwalko mik wexotsinko, kanaskia kamastle. aw niman axkan hwebes ye yowa ik 3 mani metstli in omotenew setiembre de 1609 años, ya yewatsin ikatsinko ipampatsinko in tlahtowani visurrei don lwis de velasko markés de salinas in opahpakowak mexiko. yewa se kwali tlahkwiloh —pero onkate ichkame. vi tekpatl xiwitl, 1160 años. o iskintin in in tlahtoke in kimochiwilike hustisia impan omotenewke senpowalonkaxtoli tliltike inik piloloke axkan ipan omotenew semilwitl. kampa taki kikwitih chechelomeh oso chiktejmej, in iteyo kitamotah wan ompa ixwa. niman ik walmokwep in onkan itokayokan isabela, inik onkan owasiko ipan iksenpowali onchiwknawi mani metstli setiembre; onkan okitstasiko onoasiko onkan in iteikkaw itoka don bartolomé kolón ei in akali okiwalwikak in ompa kastila, inik senka opapak aw yehika ipampa aokik okittaya inik se ompa kititlan inglaterra in ok ompa kastila ik katka, aw ik niman kontokamakak inik adelantado mochiw in ompa ipan tlali in kin konnextito. kampa totatok. ome litro atl aw in ikwak in okipantlaske. taki wan moololowiliti akin kineki kikwas. kampa kikwah wan kitamotah in iteyo ompa ixwa. kiitato se tekwani wilantok niketsal wixtoilpis, in ikniwyotl nikkwikailakatsoa kowayotl. in tekpan nikixtis ani a tonmochin, kin ikwak tonmochin in otiyake ye miktlan. ¡lnyuh ka san tiktlanewiko! in ititla wewe motekusoma itoka chichimekatewtli in kimonkwepato tenochka; in chichimekateutl yixpan i ya kwetlaxtekatl. kenin mochiwa in motewktitlanito intenkopa in wewe motewksoma ilwikamina iwan in tlakayelel siwakowatl, onmoknoitowaya wewei kwawitl, in tiktokayotia wepantli iwan wapali, in itech monekis inik motlapachos in ikal in witsilopochtli. xkintakawili mah tamayawikan, nitlasohtlaskia in okachi kwalyotika mayanah ualauij. mah walewa desde ne maski amo tik nekiskeh titemawisohkeh ipan in weyi mawisko. onkan i kinawati itokayokan chikimolan. aw yewatl ikmakwili inkisidor mochiwtsino || 116 in doktor don bartolomé lobo gwerrero, aw axkan arsobispo mochiwtsinotika in yankwik i motenewa del nwevo reino de granada. ihkon no sepa xikihkwani. kwaltia tlen 42 tlanawatihkayotl. nochi anawak tlaltipaktli iixcotiah: i. tlen ahachi ipan tlatskitok sentlanawatiloyan; ii. tlen ayohualmeh, iwaya axalmeh iwan atlakopichmeh tlen weyiatl; iii. tlen ayawalmeh gwadalupe iwan revilagigedo, ipan weyiatl motokayotia pasífiko; iv. tlapechtli semanawak iwan tlaltsintla tlen ayahualmeh, atlakopichmeh iwan axalmeh; v. in atl tlen tlali weyiatl iwexka iwan itlatamachiwaloh ken kiixtlalis semanawak tlaxitlawali iwan weyiatl tlen tlalkalaktok. vi. tlakaktli tlen mokawa ipan nochi anawak tlaltipaktli, iwexka iwan ipatlaka ken moihtos ipan semanwak tlaxitlawali. aw in omotenew inik kiwalmotemowilike umpa kapila palasio, no yewantin senpowalonkaxtoli in doktoresme in kiwalmololwilitiake mikkatsintli, in teopixke klérigos doktores iwan frailes maestros, oksenka yewatsin in senka mawistililoni maestro frai diego de kontreras kathedrátiko de essiptura; mochintsitsin san neneliwtiwi in españoles doktores, inik moomemaniltitiake in nepapa iskitlamantli ik doktores, moch kimotlalilitiwi in inkechkentsin in motenewa kapirotes iwan in borlas imikpak yayatiw, sesenyakan intech machionestiw in tlein ik tlamatini tlamachilisnemachtiltika. vi tochtli xiwitl, 1550. iwan nikan tenewalo in yewantsitsin senka mawistililoni inkisidoresme in ye omoyetstieko mexiko in ipan in tetlatsontekililistlahtokaikpali in motenewa sankto offisio in ipan in || 115 nweva españa, inik ompa walpewtika ipan xiwitl de 1571 inik yewatl walantika axkan ipan xiwitl de 1608; ka is tekpantoke. in nanakat. aw ki domingo mokalakiko || 16 in ihtik altepetl mexiko tenochtitlan, ipan a v de noviembre de 1595 años, in maxitiko in yankwik tlahtowani don gaspar de súniga visurrei, ye teotlak in maxitiko, aw in mokalakito audiensia ye tlapoyawa otsilin orasión. nima ye kiwalitoa tlatoani “mexicaé, ma xiwia, namechmaka in epkoatl in kwakwawto, unpa wapawalo oztocuiuaya”. niyaotekiwa nitikomekatl chichilquauitl”. a e tokonchia in iiyo in itlatol in totecoyouan”. walewake motlaliko in tepetsinko, motlalmomostike; ye yuh oxiwtia mayanke mexika yoan xixiyotke teukokuxke chikwe kali xiwitl ipa. in xiwtonali yei kali. aw in semilwitlapoali se koatl. ﻿in tepahtiani sesenkawel kwali tlakatl. wel owali notahtsin, tlasohkamati. yalwa ikayowa ye tlahea onotekak iwan ¡pampa inon ayemo newahtika ¿tlen imán ye tícateh? yei kanela tlatsikwewalton aw inik opew in tepantli inik omotsaw tixpan in okitak tepantli migwel komen aw inik kwawtik mochiw tepantli senneketsali wel tixpa no mochiw aw no tewantin tikneltilia in titlaiwalwan hustisia tiktlalia in totoka iwan tofirmas. axkan sabado a 21 dias del mes de hulio de mil e kinientos i setenta i un años. balthasar de luna [alguacil mayor] newatl fransisko moisen eskribano. mayana in wiwilotl, moneki tikmakaskeh trigo, sebada noso avena. kani tohwanti ya nopa yankwik titlakwiyaya aw in ipampa yuh kitokayotiaya in atl, itech konanke inik okitokayotike tepetsintli chalchiwmomostli; yuhkinma kihtosneki in tepetsintli imomos yaltar mochiwtika in ikpak mani in ikpak mextika in atl ahnoso chalchiw- || 42r -matlallatl. aw in kinkawtia ipilwan yeintin: in ikse itoka wewe tesosomoktli tlahtokapili; in ikome itoka wewe akamapichtli, inin tlahtokat in onkan kulwakan; in ikei siwatsintli itoka matotostli. in iuki kitokaitiah por in in tahtamati kemeh in waukilit, sayoh ke in witsyoh wan teyowa, no taman iteyo. aw niman ikwak owaltemoke oasiowasiko tepeyakak in tlaneltokilistli kiwalwika in kaxtilamtlaka niman oksepa oyaki okinnamikito in yewatl in tlatowani d[on] hoseph de san hwan xochitekutli kwawtli oselotl no ikwak omochiw wei kokolisdi popoxom. saniyo kwikatl ika tonawiyakan. saniyo in kwikatl ika on pupuliwi in amotlaokol. in tepilwan ika yewa, amelel on kisa. kiyokoya in ipalnemowa, ki ya waltemowiya moyokoyatsin, in ayahawilo xochitli, ika yewa amelel on kisa. kwaltia aw iwan ye sentsonxiwitl ipan nawxiwitl in ipan xii kali xiwitl, 1205 años, in kikaw teyakanalisyotl in kwawtleketski, in teyakan senpowalxiwitl ipan kaxtolomei xiwitl; aw sa niman ikwak in ipan omotenew xiwitl motlali in akasitli in teyakanas. aw ye yuh nepa matlaktlonnawi xiwitl ompa walkiske walewake in atenko chalchiwtepek akxotlan chalko in omotenewke amakemeke itstlakosawke; in onkan || 56r tlahtokati onkan kiwalkawke in toteositewktli in tekwachkawtli in intlahtokaw akxoteka, in wel momati ye senpowalonmatlaktli ipan ome xiwitl tlahtokati in onkan chalchiwtepek atentlipa. se mahpiktli ahwiyak xiwitl iikniwa. ka pinawtikate nichawawilo, nokonetsin. ¿ kwix no iw nechchiwas on o iw tokonchiw in kwawtlatotowaton? ma sa so iwian ximokwetomakan, ximomaxawikan antlatilolka, in anmiyake, xiwalachian nikan chalko. ma ninopotoni, tinonantsin, ma xi nexawako, niman yehoatl kipatiyotia in atl in sesem ilwitl popoliwia aso ye akali anoso naw akali. in sem akali ipatiw katka sentetl in tekwachtli momakaya. in ipan axkan domingo a xi de febrero de 1590 años, ikwak moteochiw in tlatlalantli inik mochiw inik mokets teokali sant fransisko, onkan walmowikak in visurrei don lwis de velasko komendador santiago iwan oidoresme. iwan newatl nikamati in kenin omoktamachi inin tlali newatl notoka xochitekutl nikwawtli niyoselotl iwan noteikaw itoka xayekasin xochisin kwawtli iwan notlasin xochiayawtli tekwani titetektin nikam ipan inin tlali tepeteopam anochi otechmakak moteuksomasin iwa{entre líneas: n} mochintin nopilwa{n} masewaltin otechtlaokoli ipanpa semka onechtlasotlayam in moteuksomasin in mochiwa kampa eski kajfentaj, kaltsintaj, ixtawat, milah oso ouatenoj. aw in ichikweilwiyok viernes ipan a xiii de febrero, in san ye ipan xiwitl omotenew de 1598 años, ikwak tlayawalolok in sant fransisko itwalko, senka ik mokwalanalti in ganboa iwan frai hwan inik achtopa ompa pew sankta maría; aw ik semikak pew mochipa iw mochiwtias in sesexiwtika in ipan kwaresma in viernestika tlayawalolotias. in kwoutah nanakat porke in amo mochiwa in kaltsintan. in ye o niwintik, ye nikwextekatl, yenixochikwaxoxo, ¿quen manis in tlali, tepetl? aw in oyuh asiko in itawan, kin ihkwak ontemok motlalito in ompa tekwalok, inik axkan motokayotia || 130r tekwanipan, ipampa in onkan tekwalok in motlalito. in nikan siudad de mexiko a nweve dias del mes de setiembre de mil e kinientos e ochenta i nweve años in yewatsin tlatowani don antonio valeriano hwes governador in ikatsinko su magestad ixpantsinko onesiko fransisko martin iwan lorenso thomas chaneke xiwitonko. aw in onkan omotenew okokkan in tlakatekpan iwan amilko, masiwi in onkan iwan tlahtoke katka, ka san tewktlahtoke; inik mitowa en blanko katka. 12 akatl xiwitl, 1387 años. in ipan a 3 de henero lunes, ikwak momikili in tlakatl in tlakopan tlahtowani katka itoka don hwan kortés, ipiltsin katka in tlakatl don antonio kortés totokiwastli, domingo yowan in momikili, in otlatwik lunes ye monoltitok, ikwak kimotokilike; chiwknawxiwitl in ontlahtokat in okipacho altepetl tlakopan. aw masiwi in sentlamantli in, ik nesi omotenew hábito in axkan ik omotemachtili padre gwardián makoske namikeke, yese ka sanno itetsinko powki san ye no ihabitotsin in totlasottatsin san fransisko kitokayotia ik kinotsa la horden de la penitensia, iwan in ikontlamantli kitokayotia la tersera horden de san fransisko, in ompa kastilan kintokayotia terserones, miek in inmonasterios umpa kipia; in akin kineki motsakwas kimotlayekoltilis totekwiyo dios teopan, san intlanekilistika in iw muchiwa motsakwa. nikan nimitstatawtia itech nehin tonal itenonotsalis, iteiskalilis in tetta in kinonotsa, in kixtlamachtia itelpuch. kipixtok tlaikwiloli nopa xiwitl. kiiskaltiyah nopa tepetl aw sa niman ipan in in omotenew in iii akatl xiwitl in walmotlahtokatlali oselotltewktli tlahtowani wixtoko; inik niman onkan asiko in atenko, amo wel momati tle ipan xiwitl in onkan asiko inik onkan motlaliko. "para ayok tiahsiti xii kali xiwitl, 1465. kipixtok se iwelti. namantsi mochiwas atl miyak nwestro señor hesukristo . aw in yewantin kimamaske in puchteka amo senka etik san tlaehekuli sam mochiwki. wan no se kikwi se kimaxakwalowa wan se kipantema ika refino wan no se kitalilia iyat tatewat komalko wan mofwertarowa wan ika se taahtselwia kalihtikkopa wan kaltenoh wan se kalyewalowa mah amo motoki in kwowat kampa se yetok. aw wel moch tikpouhilis, tikilwis, kenin onimitsnawatih inik titlekkos in ikpak tepetsintli, in tiktehtekitiw xochitl, iwan in ixkich otikittak, oticmahuizoh, inik wel tikyoloheuhas in teopixkatlahtoani, inik niman ipan tlahtos inik mochiuhas, moketsas in noteokal oniquihtlanilih. . iwan in intlatki im puchteka siwa nononkwa mochichiwa. wel im ixpan mochintín onkan mosentlalitoke unkan senkistoke. ¿tle okutl, tle tlawili mochiwas? chikwasen yawtlaxkali tekayewatsin aw inik yewatl in keni ik wits in aokmo chikawatiwits, onmomikili sa kexkichkawtika; aw in okik ayamo momikiliaya, inik senka kiwelamachtis in okimokalotili iwan inik okipalewi, inik kikneli in okimomasewi, aw yewatl inik kimakak amatl in sano yewatl okichiw, yehika ipampa ka senka wei no amatini, onkan kikwilo in kenin kaka tlali iwan in ipan in ixkichtlamantli kittak in wel okinemili. namechmomakitis sente kokolistli itoka atonahuiztli, okimilwike chantlakatl. nian nikan namotsonteko nanenemiske iwan amo nansewiske. ¡achi milagrosotzin! seki kimanah ixiuyo wan kikuaj. aw in ichpuch kiwalwikaka kopil in itoka xikomoyawaltsin niman konan kimosiwawati yewatl in kwawtleketski; inantsin mochiw in kowatsontli. tehwatsin tikpixtok. . in sekintin kin in yopa yaske aso kin telpuchtepitoton in kintewikaltiaya in intawan in innanwan. ye yuh yoaltika kisaske ok achtopa motlachielito masatsintamalko; in otlachieto ye ikwak i yowaltika kiske. fransisko chane akatla sa ixkich kipia notomines kwatro pesos inin notomines in ixkich in tetechka san moch intech powis in nopilwan nikimaxkatitiw inin onikito neltis in ikwak onimik. vi akatl xiwitl, 1303. aw intla ok itla tulwil tomasewal ka ti wal mokwepas ka timits ittaske mixko mokpak titlachieske, maka tle tik wal ilnamikis in mokalihtik i ye yuhki ikwak pew i ye walkalaki masewali inik motekako tlatilulko, nawi tochtli xiwitl ika. in mochiwa sah martes in ik 6 mani metstli oktubre de 1615 años ye yowa, ihkwak owala tlahtoli korreo kiwalwikak ompa in akapulko inik kenin onkan makwili akalin asih ke nemi weyapan in kintokayotia inglesestin inglatera tlaka, tlaweliloke chikotlaneltokanime motenewa eregesme; yuh omihto ka kichiako onkan in la china akali ye wits, onkan kinamoyaske in ixkich tlatkitl kiwalwika. san keski mansanah on kwalwikak. —noso nikitoa yetiotlak nihkwawiyaya san nechpopustekili in tlakotl. nekwikaka nikpiaskia. in ma yewantin telpopotsitsintin yewa tlamakasneki,intla ka ye, wan yankasaokik tikwawchokaske, aw iwan inin omotenew doña ana de kastila ka wel iwan tlakatia wel yuhktsin in ikome itoka don lwis de velasko markés de salinas, in yewatl oppa visurrei omochiw nikan mexiko nweva españa, aw satepan omowikak in españa umpa presidente del konseho de indias omochiwtsinoto, okiwalmonochili umpa in toweitlahtokatsin rei don felipe tersero. ma titlakwekwetlaxo ma timosotlaw iwan ma itla iliwis tikito motlatol, ma tisiwka tlato iyolik temak xon otiw. "chalchiuhpetlacalco ninaxka q.n. onkan ninotlati in chal- chiwpetlakalko ayaxkan inechalwikatiake in nokwakwilowan atli- yoloa in umpa tlalokan. kwatini nochi kitsohtsontektehki para ma ye yiman ye niweweiton notatsitsiwan onechmikilike ompa tlaweimachtilkalko. amo okinekia nechanaske ompa nomachtis. aw iwan ye matlakxiwitl ipann exiwitl in ipan xiii tekpatl xiwitl, 1596 años, in theniente mochiw in tlakatl don hwan martín mestiso kipalewi in wewe don antonio valeriano governador tenochtitlan. aw in tlali in itepotsko mani in nechkwilisnekia maria kwitlapanoselotl yichpoch inin ka ye titoteilwike se xiwitl iwan tlako aw in ipan poliw tomines epowali pesos. ipan in i motewktlali in tlakatl in akxitsin chichimekatewktli mochiw; inin ipiltsin in atonaltsin in chichimekatewktli, inin san wel se xiwitl in tlahtokat, motewksawtia in momikilito in ompa kwawkecholan; ye itlamian in matlaktli akatl xiwitl inik momikilito. aw sa niman ipan in in ome kali xiwitl motlahtokatlali in ipiltsin wewe itskwawtsin itoka ilankweitl atlawtekatltewktli in onpa atenko, san onpa motlali ye tlahtokati ompa in atenko. kitos neki temoa tochan. onkak ome taman: tein ipa noipal wan tein mochiwa tepehxikwako, yon kwaltsin monalwavotia, sanipa yowi itech tepehxit inalwayo mowilana wan kampa tamiti ompa mochiwa ya in xochit. weweyak wan kwaltsin papatakatok mahyá koskamait, kemah kwaltsin posoni, ihkón moxelowa. semi posontok ihwak tamahsewalis. kemansá kisa in tamahsewalis marso wan kemansá kisa abril. chichiltik in ixochiyo, pero amo semi. posontok pané listón. ompa xokoya in xochit pahpawetsi wan mokawa xochit itsintavo. veiwa va in itakka mochiwa. wan no welik in itakka. no tsopek. se kikwa no. komo semi weikapan, amo no wel se kiteki, ta pos tepehxiyoh mochiwa. wan tein ipa nohpal, tein talpan ewa, kan kanah semi mochiwa; se ihkayateikan wan kitahtapankeh in tet, kikwikeh para tiopan, wan nohpal kipantamotkej. tein ipa nohpal, tein talpan, mochiwa kampa kitokah wan oksé nohpal, tepehxikwako mochiwa. tein talpan, kitokaj. wan tein tepehxiyoh mochiwa ompa ixwa, ompa xokoya iteyo, paxiini wan ompa ixwa ya. amo kichipauaj, ¡akoni kichipawas tepehxikwako mochiwa! komo kahfentah yetok, kichipawah no. xochiyowa abril wan mayo. in ixiuyo monamaka wan itakka, tein talpan moketstewa. 4r nikan onpewa in innemilistsin in achto totatsitsinwan adam iwan eva. ah mits kawiliske ah mits makaske in sententli in senkamatl in intlatkia in intlamamaya in intlakaskaltiaya in intlakawapawaya in ik otlamawisoke in iwkan in wkwtla in sakatla. chilpitsawak ahnoso kwawchili aw iwan ye matlakpowalxiwitl ipan chikonxiwitl in ipan 1 se tochtli xiwitl, 1402 años, in otlakat nesawalkoyotsin tlahtowani tetskoko. aw yese ach kenin sa konchiwke inik konkwilike sisneros, aw in omotenew || 240 padre frai gosalo de hermosilo, ye omihto ka san iseltsin kimopalewili in tlahtowani visurrei iwan miekintin klérigos estudiantes. nochipa onikonkwalitak in awil techihchikan keh aanelol, tepetlehkos, kawayotlehkos bisitletanehnetli iwan okse. in kwamekat.
